U k u n g u u t _ nengllugute t _ , _ s i v u n g h i _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ tagi kau uq _ D a v i d - e m _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a n e n g _ . _ David _ A b r a h a m - e n k u n e n g _ pi u uq _ .
abraham _ ata ke a _ I s a a c - e m _ , _ isaac _ ata ke a _ J a c o b - e m _ , _ Jacob _ ata ke aat _ J u d a h - n k u t _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ,
Judah _ ata ke ak _ P e r e z - e n k u k _ , _ Z e r a h - n k u k _ ( _ naange ak _ T a m a r _ ) _ , _ perez _ ata ke a _ H e z r o n - e m _ , _ hezron _ ata ke a _ R a m - e m _ ,
ram _ ata ke a _ A m m i n a d a b - e m _ , _ amminadab _ ata ke a _ N a h s h o n - e m _ , _ nahshon _ ata ke a _ S a l m o n - e m _ ,
salmon _ ata ke a _ B o a z - e m _ , _ ( _ B o a z - e m _ naa ke a _ rahab _ ) _ . _ Boaz _ ata ke a _ O b e d - e m _ , _ ( _ O b e d - e m _ naa ke a _ R u t h _ ) _ , _ Obed _ ata ke a _ J e s s e - m _ ,
J e s s e _ ata ke a _ umiileg m _ D a v i d - e m _ . _ David _ ata ke a _ S o l o m o n - e m _ . _ ( _ S o l o m o n - e m _ naa ke a _ U r i a h - m _ n u l i g h q e s a q a n g a _ . _ )
solomon _ ata ke a _ R e h o b o a m - e m _ , _ rehoboam _ ata ke a _ A b i j a h - m _ , _ abijah _ ata ke a _ A s a - m _ ,
a sa _ ata ke a _ J e h o s h a p h a t - e m _ , _ Jehoshaphat _ ata ke a _ J o r a m - e m _ , _ Joram _ ata ke a _ U z z i a h - m _ .
U z z i a h _ ata ke a _ J o t h a m - e m _ , _ Jotham _ ata ke a _ A h a z - e m _ , _ ahaz _ ata ke a _ H e z e k i a h - m _ ,
H e z e k i a h _ ata ke a _ M a n a s s e h - m _ , _ manasseh _ ata ke a _ A m o s - e m _ , _ amos _ ata ke a _ J o s i a h - m _ .
J o s i a h _ ata ke aat _ , _ J e c h o n i a h - n k u t _ a n g l e g u t k u l l g h h i i t _ allgegh kau ut _ tamaani _ J e w s - e t _ tugu luki _ aglagh te aqe yatki _ B a b y l o n - m u n _ .
kingu aneng _ aglagh te llghite a _ B a b y l o n - m u n _ , _ J e c h o n i a h _ ata ke a _ S h e a l t i e l - e m _ , _ S h e a l t i e l _ ata ke a _ Z e r u b b a b e l - e m _ ,
zerubbabel _ ata ke a _ A b i u d - e m _ , _ A b i u d _ ata ke a _ E l i a k i m - e m _ , _ E l i a k i m _ ata ke a _ A z o r - e m _ ,
azor _ ata ke a _ Z a d o k - e m _ , _ zadok _ ata ke a _ A c h i m - e m _ , _ achim _ ata ke a _ E l i u d - e m _ ,
E l i u d _ ata ke a _ E l e a z a r - e m _ , _ E l e a z a r _ ata ke a _ M a t t h a n - e m _ , _ matthan _ ata ke a _ J a c o b - e m _ ,
Jacob _ ata ke a _ J o s e p h - e m _ . _ Joseph _ ugu ikagh a _ M a r y - m _ . _ mary _ naa ke a _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ Jesus _ M e s s i a h - n g u u q _ .
S i v u n g h i _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ whatete ut _ : _ 1 4 - n g u k a a g u t _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ A b r a h a m - e m e n g _ D a v i d - m u n _ . _ 1 4 - n g u k a a g u t l u _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ D a v i d - m e n g _ kenlanga _ J e w s - e t _ tugu luki _ aglagh te llegh itnun _ B a b y l o n - m u n _ . _ taagken _ B a b y l o n - m u n _ aglagh te llegh itneng _ 1 4 - n g u k a a g u t l u _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ kenlanga _ C h r i s t - a m _ allgellegh anun _ .
Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ allgegh kau uq _ whaten _ : _ naange a _ mary _ a a n g Ê¼ g h u t n g w a a q a q _ J o s e p h - m u n _ , _ iwernga _ nengughte te llghite lukek _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ quminge stekagh a _ .
ugi kaghqagh an _ J o s e p h - e m _ k e n q i g n e g h u t m i n e n g _ k a y n g u s a a k n e g h m e n g _ mary _ pi luku _ , _ aksaqe luku _ pegge naqekagh a _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ A t a n g h e m _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ qavangugh kun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Joseph _ , _ D a v i d - e m _ k i n g u n g h a _ , _ alinge gpenang _ n u l i g h q i g u _ mary _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aqsa nge stekaqe a _ .
ighnegh nge naqngu uq _ ; _ atigh naken _ J e s u s - m e n g _ qayughllak _ ellmi _ yug ni _ y u g u l i y a g h q a q i i _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ "
qamagte luni _ tawaten _ aneghtekau uq _ apeghiigh na luku _ A t a n g h e m _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ ,
" _ aghnagh aq _ yug m _ atuqe llghite kanga _ quminge luni _ , _ ighnegh nge lleqe uq _ . _ ategh kete yaghqaqe a _ E m m a n u e l _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ w h a n g k u n n i l n g u q _ . _ "
enkaam _ Joseph _ taghtugh luni _ A t a n g h e m _ yaquleg an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ mary _ n u l i g h q e g k a a _ ,
iwernga _ atuqe ma ite kanga _ kenlanga _ ighnegh nge llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ J o s e p h - e m _ J e s u s - m e n g _ ata iqe a _ .
Jesus _ allgegh aqngan _ B e t h l e h e m - e m i _ J u d e a - m e l n g u g h m i _ , _ herod _ umiileg u lghii _ . _ allgellegh an _ kingu aneng _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ a s i v a g h m e n g _ kaate tke aat _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ .
A a p q u g h w a a q a t _ , _ " _ naagu _ taghnughhagh _ allgegh lghii _ umiileg at _ J e w s - e t _ ? _ ighaleqetaagh a _ e s g h a a m a a g h p u t _ asivagh mete luku _ enkaam _ m a n i g u g h y a g h t u g h a q a g h p u t _ . _ "
umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ nagaqugh luku _ teggellghiigh ghllagkagh _ , _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g l l u _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ maligte te luteng _ .
T a g s i q l i g h t e g h l u k i _ qamagte luki _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ nani _ C h r i s t - a _ allgegh yaghqau a _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ B e t h l e h e m - e m i _ J u d e a - m e l n g u g h m i _ . _ U u k n a l i q i s t e m _ whaten _ igaqe kaqe a _ :
' _ elpek _ Bethlehem _ , _ J u d a h - m e l n g u q _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e y a g g i i t n e n g _ J u d a h - m _ u k a v a n t e l l e g h p i g a a n g h i t u t e n _ , _ qayughllak _ e l p e n e n g _ tagi naqngu uq _ igleghte te i sta _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqagh _ yug mneng _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n e n g _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ H e r o d - e m _ aksaqe luku _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ , _ liigike na luku _ qavngaq _ aliigh yuwhaagh kau ta a _ ighaleqetaagh _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ B e t h l e h e m - e m u n _ aghulaqe lusi _ elngaatall _ ivagh teggu _ taghnughhagh _ . _ naalke gkufsigu _ ungipaate yaghtugh nakefsinga _ , _ whanga llu _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ umiileg m _ p i y i s t e n g _ igleghtekagh t _ . _ esghagh laataghkagh at _ ataasigh _ taana _ ighaleqetaagh _ asivagh mete luku _ , _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ . _ maligtekagh at _ kenlanga _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ taghnughhagh m _ ne an _ qule ani _ .
itegh luteng _ mangteghagh mun _ esghaghkagh at _ taghnughhagh _ , _ naange a llu _ mary _ . _ segesqughte uute luteng _ manigugh qu aat _ . _ taagken _ aqeftaghaagh teng _ qelpeghte luki _ tunqugh qu aat _ tunute yameng _ : _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ f r a n k i n c e n s e - m e n g _ , _ m y r r h - m e n g _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ qavangugh kun _ yitekagh i _ H e r o d - m u n _ uteghnigh fqiita _ p i s q e l l u k i _ enkaam _ aglaghkagh t _ nuna meggnun _ alla tgun _ tume tgun _ .
ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ qavangugh kun _ A t a n g h e m _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ Joseph _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ anag te kek _ E g y p t - m u n _ . _ T a m a a n l l e g h h a t e n _ uteghnigh sqe lleg mnun _ kenlanga _ qayughllak _ H e r o d - e m _ ivagh ste naqe a _ taghnughhagh _ tuqute ste na luku _ . _ "
enkaam _ u n u g m i _ tawani _ J o s e p h - e m _ makete luni _ aghulaqe te gkakek _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ E g y p t - m u n _ .
T a m a a n t e k a t _ kenlanga _ H e r o d - e m _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ apeghiigh kau uq _ A t a n g h e m _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ , _ " _ tuqlugh kaqe aqa _ ighnegh ka _ tagi sqellug qu _ E g y p t - m e n g _ . _ "
H e r o d - e m _ liigike yamigu _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag nun _ puughte ma ni luni _ sakrite ghllagkagh _ . _ taagken _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ kayagtekagh i _ B e t h l e h e m - e m u n _ , _ u v i t a n g a n u n l l u _ t u q u q i i s q e l l u k i _ qamagte luki _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh neng _ , _ maalghug gnun _ ayumiqulleghtutka lghii nun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaakut _ taghnughhagh t _ nakmike kaqe ai _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh m _ allgellegh aneng _ maalghug ughte lghiik _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ apegh llegh itni _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh kun _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ J e r e m i a h - a m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ apeghiighkagh _ :
" _ ramah- mi _ nagaqugh qu aat _ l e g h a g h l l a g a a t a q _ . _ R a c h e l - n g u f t u q _ qiya lghii _ avaqutagh minun _ , _ repall _ i l u t u g h s a g h y a g h q a a g h h a a g p e n a n i _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ . _ "
J o s e p h - e n k u t _ E g y p t - m e l l u k i _ herod _ tuqukagh _ , _ qavangugh kun _ A t a n g h e m _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vikekagh a _ Joseph
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ uteghnigh te kek _ israel- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ tuqute i naqe yagh lghiit _ taghnughhagh meng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ . _ "
enkaam _ J o s e p h - e m _ makete luni _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ aglagh te gkakek _ israel- mun _ .
iwernga _ J o s e p h - e m _ nagaqugh luku _ nutaghagh _ umiileg a _ J u d e a - m _ , _ A r c h e l a u s - n g u n i l u k u _ H e r o d - e m _ ighnegh a _ , _ alingekagh _ tawavek _ aglagh nghmeng _ . _ qavangugh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh tke a _ Joseph _ J u d e a - t e f q a a n _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ enkaam _ nazareth- mun _ aglaghkagh t _ G a l i l e e - m e l n g u g h m u n _ . _ T a m a a n t e k a t _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ whaten _ p i l l g h a t _ , _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ , _ " _ M e s s i a h _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i n g u y a g h q a a g u q _ . _ "
T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ aglagh luni _ kilgaa anun _ J u d e a - m _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ u n g i p a q i m e n g _ .
whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ A v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ taaqe tek _ s e g h l e g h q e n n e g h m e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
J o h n - n g u u q _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ I s a i a h - a m _ akuzi tkekagh a _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ kilgaa ni _ kina _ akilghuu aqe uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ yataaghqe teggu _ A t a n g h e m _ tume kaghqagh a _ , _ taklaghrukegte yagh teggu _ igleghavigkagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
J o h n - e m _ aatkagh i _ c a m e l - e m _ melqugh aneng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ meqagh meng _ tafsi luni _ , _ n e q e k l u n i _ l o c u s t - m e n g l l u _ h o n e y - m e n g l l u _ .
yug t _ aglagh uute tke aat _ ellnga nun _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g l l u _ J u d e a - m e n g l l u _ u v i t a n g a n e n g l l u _ kiiw m _ J o r d a n - e m _ .
seghleghqe lleg teng _ qayvighqe nghatki _ , _ J o h n - e m _ p a a p t a a y a a q e g k a n g i _ J o r d a n - e g n i _ .
J o h n - e m _ esghagh luki _ P h a r i s e e s - e l g h u t e t l u _ S a d d u c e e s - e l g h u t e t l u _ tagi lghiit _ ellmi nun _ p a a p t a a y e s q e l l u t e n g _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ kitum _ anag sqe isi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleghqagh aneng _ kaate naqe lghii meng _ ?
sivuke lusi _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ i p a p i g h q i t e g g u _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ avuteghqe llegh i _ .
W h a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ qayughllak _ kingunegh ke ainkut _ A b r a h a m - e m _ . _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ kingunegh ngllagh te nayagh aa _ maaken _ uyghag neng _ !
whaa _ maaten _ q a l q a l i m a y a q l e g g i i n a g h l l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ uqfig t _ akugh itgun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ uqfig t _ pinigh lghii meng _ piite ste i nghite ngugh t _ kepe luki _ , _ k e n g h e g n u n _ miluute yaghqaa ut _ .
megh kun _ p a a p t a a y e g h i i q u n g a _ a v u t e g h k e g k a n u n _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ . _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh m _ kingu mneng _ paaptaaye lleqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng llu _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ kenegh meng llu _ . _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ whanga mneng _ , _ repall _ talwa _ kameg kek _ tugumiiqepagningite agka _ .
taana _ tagi yaghqagh _ n a n q i g t i y a q l e g g i i n a a g u q _ . _ aafte yaghqaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ yug t _ seghlegh neng _ , _ katam _ p i i t e s i i g h a g h t e m _ pekete ta mineng _ malliigh llegh atun _ g r a i n - e t _ . _ kagpag luki _ g r a i n - e t _ mallagh _ tamaa na _ miluute yaghqaqe a _ qaame yaghqaa nghite ngugh gnun _ k e n g h e g n u n _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ galilee- meng _ tagikagh _ J o r d a n - e g n u n _ , _ J o h n - m u n _ p a a p t a a y e s q e l l u n i _ .
iwernga _ J o h n - e m _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ " _ whanga _ elpek _ p a a p t a a y e y a g h q a q s a g h a g h p e n g a _ . _ sangavek _ whanga mnun _ tagi ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ legan _ sa aqe ziin _ p a a p t a a y e n g a _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi kumtung _ a p e g h i i g h l l e q a g h p u n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ " _ enkaam _ J o h n - e m _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
Jesus _ p a a p t a a y e y a t n i _ megh meng _ aanekagh _ . _ taagken _ qilag _ qelpegh luni _ esghagh kakek _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ uki lghiik _ d o v e - e t u n _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ nalugkagh k _ .
taagken _ me _ qilag meng _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ U n a n g u u q _ piniqekagh ghllag ka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigte aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghulaqe tke a _ Jesus _ kilgaa nun _ , _ tughneghagh mun _ seghleghqe ste naqutke sqellug qu _ .
4 0 _ aghneq _ , _ 4 0 _ unuk _ Jesus _ negh ma ite ngughk _ ; _ taagken _ taakut _ aghnegh t _ kingu itneng _ iyataghkagh _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ neqe ughte sqe ki _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ . _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ yuug _ kiyaghte naanghite uq _ neqe inagh ghhagh kun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta akun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ aglagh tke a _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ agleghnagh lghii mun _ ne ghllag mun _ . _ tawani _ T e m p l e - m _ uusqagh llegh akun _ nekeve ste luku
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ qetgegh i _ tesamavek _ ; _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ yaquleg minun _ p a q n a s i g h t e s a g h t u g h l l e q a a t e n _ ; _ iigge meggneng _ nuqnegh kete lleqe aaten _ luuraq _ itegagh ten _ u y g h a g h q u u n n a y u k a t a _ . _ ' _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten llu _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ nanghiiqu gpenaan _ sa sqellug qu _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke nghite ka aneng _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ mayugh te luku _ u u s q a p i g l l e g h i i m u n _ naayghagh mun _ keleg tke ai _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ ataneghpag u llegh i _ nuna m _ , _ pinighnagh llegh ghllag i llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ maakut _ tuune lleqe anka _ elpenun _ , _ segesqughte luten _ manigugh yagh kuvnga _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ , _ iqiten _ ! _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ manigugh yaghqaqe an _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ , _ e l l n g i n a a g u q l u _ qepghagh te yaghqagh n _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ unite yagu _ Jesus _ , _ yaquleg t _ aflengake yaghtugh qu aat _ .
J e s u s - e m _ nagaqugh luku _ John _ anusimingllaghvig mete ni luku _ , _ galilee- mun _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
nazareth- meng _ aglaghkagh _ C a p e r n a u m - e m u n _ tamaa uute na luni _ . _ C a p e r n a u m _ esne anite uq _ naayvagh m _ G a l i l e e - m _ , _ nuna mi _ Z e b u l u n - e n k u k _ N a p h t a l i - n k u k _ k i n g u n g h i t a _ kiyaghfig itni _ .
J e s u s - e m _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ . _ Q a v n g a r u g l l a k _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna gkeni _ Z e b u l u n - e n k u k _ N a p h t a l i - n k u k _ . _ taake uk _ nuna k _ naayvagh m _ t u n g a n g a n i l n g u u k _ , _ nalla ani _ kiiw m _ J o r d a n - e m _ , _ galilee- mete ngugh mi _ G e n t i l e - e t _ kiyaghfig itni _ !
I s a i a h - m _ pi kaqe kangi _ whaten _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ seghleghqe llegh m _ m a m l e g h q e s t e l l g h a n i _ esghaate yaghqaa ut _ nighug ghllag meng _ . _ alinge llghite a _ t u q u m e n g _ llangaqa _ nuna at _ saape nga lghii _ taghneghagh nge te llegh aneng _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ aghtaghagh te aqe ai _ . _ "
galilee- mun _ uteghnigh llegh mineng _ kenle ke luku _ J e s u s - e m _ piinlegh iqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleg ni _ , _ " _ A v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h t e k _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ igleghte te kete luku _ esne ani _ naayvagh m _ G a l i l e e - m _ , _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ S i m o n - e n k u n g u f t u k _ ( _ ategh an _ a l l g h a _ peter _ ) _ , _ A n d r e w - n k u k _ . _ iqalliniigh lghiik _ negaghpag ek _ miluute aqe luku _ naayvagh mun _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ , _ apeghtugh lleqe amtek _ i q a l l i n i i g h t e n g u g h t e s q e l l u t e k _ yug neng _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ negaghpag tek _ unite luki _ maligtekagh ak _ .
T a a g a n i q a a g h a q _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ ighnegh kek _ Z e b e d e e - m _ . _ angyagh meggni _ ata ke te lghiit _ negaghpag teng _ ilaaghtugh aqe ait _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ tuqlugh kakek _ .
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ angyagh tek _ unitekagh ak _ ata ek llu _ enkaam _ Jesus _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Jesus _ igleghakagh _ tea- ma anun _ galilee- mi _ , _ s y n a g o g u e - n g i t n i _ apeghtugh i aqe luni _ . _ nani _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke aq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ , _ naallghute qughkagh _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
ungipagh _ mingite kau lghii _ naallghute qugh llegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ S y r i a - m i _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ ellnga nun _ qamagte luki _ qinuyug lghiit _ , _ a l l a a g h h i i n a a g h n e n g _ aqnighnegh leg t _ , _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh leg t _ , _ sayugpagtagh kayug t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ . _ qamagte luki _ J e s u s - e m _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii m _ maligtekagh at _ galilee- meng _ , _ D e c a p o l i s - m e n g _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ , _ J u d e a - m e n g _ , _ J o r d a n - e m l l u _ inglu aneng _ t a a g e g k e n _ .
J e s u s - e m _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maligte te lghiit _ , _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ aqumekagh _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e m i _ taku laghate te yatni _ ,
apeghtugh ikagh _ :
" _ tamaakut _ liisimake i lghiit _ a k l u k i n g a l l e g h m e g g n e n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
tamaakut _ qivghu lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ q u s e v e g n g a l g h i i t _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe a _ nuna _ ellngit nun _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe i yu pigte lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe ai _ piyuke llegh itneng _ .
tamaakut _ nangllegtagh lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ umyugaqegtagh t _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ esghagh yaghqaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i kayug t _ yug neng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ni yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ amyuutke lleg nge lghiit _ atuqe te meggneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ qaatke te nga te meggneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
" _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ yug t _ s e g h l e q u u q a n g i s i _ , _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ iqlengiqe tke kangisi _ maligte yaaghte u te gpesineng _ whanga mnun _ .
elngaatall _ quya ghllag tek _ qayughllak _ qilag mi _ pama _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh leg ghllag u usi _ . _ amenqun _ , _ neghigh luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ amyuutkekagh it _ katam _ maaten _ a m y u u t k e l l g h i s t u n _ elpek si _ .
" _ taghyugh stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ iwernga _ taghyugh _ taghyughni igh u uute kuni _ , _ alla _ naten _ taghyughni ighsaghqagh u nghite uq _ . _ atugh u nanigh lleqe uq _ sa mun _ alngunak _ enkaam _ egte lleqe uq _ taagken _ yug t _ t u t m a a s g h a q e l l e q a a t _ . _ "
" _ nighug stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ negh ghllag _ qemi m _ qaye anite ngughk _ talugh nga yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ kenegh lghutagh k _ kumaghllug kek _ sagnegh mun _ asi igh te naanghite ak _ . _ itupill _ q u u l v a q u n _ lli lleqe ak _ nighug u te sqellug kek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ i l u n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ nighug i _ kuukgute steggu _ yug nun _ esghigh sqellug qu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ , _ enkaam _ usuqe nakangat _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ taaqesaghtugh u ni luki _ atuqe nghmeng _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh i llu _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ tagi u nga _ apeghtugh te kete na luki _ ipa _ sa meng _ p i s i g h p i g a a t a n g i _ .
ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ qilag nkuk _ nuna nkuk _ k e n l e t g h u u t e l l g h e g k e n u n _ kenlanga _ , _ talwa _ s a s q u v e g a g h h a q _ allangughte naanghite uq _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ kenlanga _ qamagte luteng _ L i i l i g h t u u s a n i l n g u u t _ apeghiigh llegh itnun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ ataasigh _ liilightuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke gkunigu llu _ yug nun _ qaatke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ u k a l i g h p i g a a n i l u k u _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ . _ N a q a m e n r a q _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ apeghtugh kumiki llu _ ila i _ yug t _ q a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ aange yaghqaa ni luku _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ itegh naanghite usi _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ , _ wetku qun _ q a a t k u t n g a a g h a t a g h a q u f s i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug neng _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n e n g l l u _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ yugtagh gpenasi _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yugtagh lghii _ n a n q i g s a q l e g u u q _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi yagute kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ nanqigtivig mun _ a g l a g h s a q l e g u u q _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ nallu ghllag _ ' _ , _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ a g l a g h s a q l e g u u q _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ sasii nghite ni kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ a g l a g h s a q l e g u u q _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ hell- mun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ aghqefig gni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuune i naqe ma luten _ tunusagh gpeneng _ , _ neqagh u uute kuvgu _ s u g a g s i m a n i l u k u _ yug lgute n _ ,
tunute yan _ unite luku _ ilaliigh yaghtugh naken _ . _ taagken _ tagi luten _ tunute yan _ t u u n a k e n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
" _ kitum _ avutke ma kangaten _ seghletun _ pi ma ni luni _ , _ ilaliigh aghte naken _ aglagh te ma luten _ nanqigtivig mun _ , _ luuraq _ a v u t k i s t e g p e k _ t u u n a y u k a n g a t e n _ n a n q i g t i s t e m u n _ . _ taagken _ n a n q i g t i s t e m _ k e l e n g a k i s t e m u n _ anusimingllagh ste na yu kangaten _ .
ipa _ pi amken _ , _ a n u s i m i n g l l a g h t e s i m a k a n g a t e n _ a a n a a n g h i t u t e n _ kenlanga _ n a n q i g t i s t e m _ llivike sqe llegh a _ qamagte luku _ llivike gkuvgu _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ gelgaghniigh gpenasi _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ qiliigh ke gkunigu _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh u uq _ qamagun _ ilu mikun _ .
enkaam _ aghenqignegh m _ iye gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ iike luku _ egte naken _ ! _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh aneng _ .
aghenqignegh m _ iigge gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ kepe luki _ egte naketen _ ! _ pinigh aghagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ pi lleghqagh aneng _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuliigh ni _ pegtekunigu _ , _ igagh ngllagh te nakanga _ kelgute sighqagh meng _ pegte ma ni luku _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegte yaghqaqe nghite a _ wetku qun _ gelgaghniigh kan _ . _ gelgaghniigh nghite ghngaan _ pegtekunigu _ , _ g e l g h a g h n i i g h t e s l e q a a _ alla neng _ yug meng _ ugiigh kan _ . _ kitum _ n u l i g h k e g k u m i g u _ , _ taana _ yuug _ ellnga llu _ gelgaghniigh u lleqe uq _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i llu _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ akequsagh n _ avelghagh gpenaan _ , _ iwernga _ atanegh mun _ akequsagh n _ atuqe aqe gu _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ akeqe i gpenang _ atuqe luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ akeqe i gpenang _ qilag kun _ qayughllak _ aqumutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh minun _ ,
nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ qayughllak _ itegagh iitagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ nalighmeng _ J e r u s a l e m - k u n _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag ke a _ U m i i l e g p a g l l a g e m _ .
akeqe i gpenang llu _ naasqugh gpegun _ qayughllak _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ nuyagh _ qategh snaanghite an _ nalighmeng _ tagnegh snaanghite an _ .
yeghlegi _ legan _ ' _ a a n g Ê¼ g h h a a s i _ ' _ , _ nalighmeng _ ' _ n a k a a g h h a a s i _ ' _ . _ sa u aat _ ilate kufsiki _ t a a k u g n u n _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u ut _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kina _ iye igh kuvgu _ elpek llu _ iye igh yaghqaa uten _ . _ kitum _ ggute a _ m u g h u g a g h t e k u v g u _ elpek llu _ ggute n _ m u g h u g a g h s a g h q a a g u q _ ' _ .
" _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ seghletun _ p i s t e s i _ akite gpenaki _ . _ kitum _ qasaghtegkangaten _ ullungag gpegun _ inglu a llu _ t u u n a k e n _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ aglagh u uute kangaten _ n a n q i g t i s t e m u n _ , _ g g a t e g k e n _ ellmi _ pi na lukek _ qaasligh gken llu _ t u u n a k e g k e n _ ellnga nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ q e l g h u s k a g u _ akmagtagh ni _ igleghte te sqellug qu _ ataasigh mun _ mile- mun _ , _ alla _ ataasigh _ mile- a _ ilate naken _ .
kitum _ sa meng _ tungsigh vike kangaten _ , _ t u u n a k e n _ . _ kitum _ sa meng _ navghagh vike kangaten _ , _ n a v g h i n n a k e n _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ilakumtaagh si _ , _ ugumi ke luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ , _ yughagh te kaqe teki llu _ a m y u u t k i s t e s i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q u y a s t e s q e l l u k i _ ' _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aisi _ avaqutagh qu tsi _ ata gpesinun _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h m u n _ . _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ t a w a t e g h l l u w a a q _ pi aqe a _ . _ siqinegh ni _ piite sta qaa _ seghlegh nun llu _ pinigh lghii nun llu _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ qaatke te kayug nun llu _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ a k i l e g h t u g h l l e q i s i i - i _ p i n i q i s t e n g i n a g h h a s i _ piniqe gkufsiki _ ? _ talwa _ t a x - m e n g _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e t _ piniqe aqe ait _ p i n i q i s t e t e n g _ .
enkaam _ i l a k u m t a g h h i i n a s i _ quyake aatagh kufsiki _ , _ naten _ alla u lleqe tsi _ ila itneng _ yug t _ ? _ talwa _ maniguute igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quya kaqe ait _ ilakumtaagh teng _ !
elpek si _ avaqutagh ke u ta aneng _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ pinigh tek _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ata gpesi _ pinigh llegh atun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ pilleg si _ e s g h a g h s a q e g p e n a k i _ . _ E s g h a g h s a q e g k u f s i k i _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ akileghtugh naanghite aisi _ .
" _ enkaam _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenang _ . _ qalghightagh ste i kayugu ut _ tuune i vagilgameng _ e s g h i i s q e l l u t e n g _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ s y n a g o g u e - n i l l u _ tume ni llu _ u s u q e s q e l l u t e n g _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ a k i l e g h t u u s a n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ,
kitumun _ alngunak _ nalluke sqellug qu _ tuune i i llegh n _ . _ ata gpek _ esghapag aqe aaten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ . _ "
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh yuneghtu ut _ nekevghagh meng _ s y n a g o g u e - n i l l u _ tume ni llu _ e s g h i i s q e l l u t e n g _ yug nun _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ a k i l e g h t u u s a n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yughagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ itegh luten _ ne gpenun _ umeg te luten _ yughagh aqe i _ ata gpenun _ a l i i n n e g h i l g u g h m u n _ . _ ata gpek _ liisimake a _ aksaqe luku _ s a l l g h e n _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh pig mun _ m a n i g u u s i g a l n g u g h e s t u n _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh negh meggni _ uteghpagtagh aqe ait _ akuzite t _ sa meng _ pi sigh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ sumegh meggni _ akuzillegh ghllag megteggun _ kiimsigh lleqe ni luki _ yughagh lleg teng _ pi aqe ait _ .
ellngistun _ ayuqe gpenasi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ a k l u k e g k a g h s i _ , _ talwa _ aapte ste gpenasi _ .
" _ enkaam _ whaten _ yughagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ pamani _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ ategh n _ q u u l v a l l e n g l i _ .
yughagh ukut _ ataneghpag u llegh n _ tagi sqellug qu _ , _ piyuke llegh n llu _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ katam _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h e s t u n _ .
N e g h y a g h q a l i t e q e g h t i k u t _ aghneghmi _ whani _ .
seghevute aghte ki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ seghevute ma luki _ seghletun _ p i s t e p u t _ .
nanghiiqu lleg nge ste gpenaamta _ , _ iwernga _ yugu likut _ taagken _ seghlegh meng _ . _ ataneghpag u llegh _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q _ , _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q _ , _ elpek _ pi katen _ quunperugllag _ . _ amen _ . _ '
" _ seghevute kufsiki _ seghletun _ p i s t e s i _ , _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ seghevute lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ seghevute nghite kufsiki _ seghletun _ p i s t e s i _ , _ ata gpesi _ seghevute naanghite ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
" _ F a s t - e n e g h p e s i n i _ i i l q e s u g n i g h q e g p e n a s i _ piniiyugnegh stun _ . _ aghmig igate ut _ , _ mesuuna igate ut _ l i i g i k e s q e l l u t e n g _ f a s t - e n g u n i l u t e n g _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ a k i l e g h t u u s a n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
F a s t - e n e g h p e n i _ aghmig aqe i llu _ mesuuna aqe i llu _ ,
ila gpenun _ nalluke sqellug qu _ f a s t - e l l g h e n _ . _ iwernga _ ata gpek _ aliite nghite ngugh m _ liisimake a _ sa aqe uten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ nuna mi _ whani _ kagpag gpenasi _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ kingug m llu _ anaghtaa llegh m llu _ naafqe lleqe ai _ , _ t e g l e g n i i g h t e t l u _ naafqii luteng _ tegleg lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ qilag mi _ kagpag i tek _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ m o t h - n g i t u q _ , _ a n a g h t a a n g i t u q _ naafqii yaghqagh meng _ , _ t e g l e g h n i i g h t e n g i t u q l u _ naafqii luteng _ t e g l e g u g h y a g h q a m e n g _ .
S u m e g h t a g h a a t k u m a n g i n a g h l l e q a g h s i _ aklungi gpesinun _ kagpag vig i _ .
" _ iye k _ kenegh lghutagh stun _ ayuqe uk _ yugusigh mun _ . _ iiskegtekuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ nighug ghllag u lleqe uq _ ,
iwernga _ iyellug mete kuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ mamleg ghllagu lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ nighug _ ilu gpenite ngughk _ mamleg u kuni _ , _ elngaatall _ mamleg pigte uq _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ qepghagh te naanghite ak _ maalghug _ umiileg k _ . _ maalghug gneng _ umiileg lgu kuni _ ugumi ke lleqe a _ ataasigh _ , _ piniqe lleqe a _ ila a _ . _ qaatke te nga lleqe uq _ ataasigh mun _ , _ pite kete naanghite a _ ila a _ . _ enkaam _ p i n i q n a a n g h i t a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe ma luku _ mat- ni _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ u n g v a l l e g h s i _ , _ sa meng _ neghe lleghqagh i _ , _ meghe lleghqagh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ aate lleghqagh i _ . _ sumeghtaghagh qagh tek qun _ , _ unguvallegh _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ neqe meng _ , _ yugusigh llu _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ aatkagh neng _ .
esghaqagh teki qun _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh igate ut _ , _ unatagh igate ut _ , _ kagpag i igate ut _ . _ naqamllu _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ neghqe aqe ai _ ! _ elpek si _ m e g n u n a g h a t a g h a n g h i t s i i _ qawaag neng _ ?
naligh gpesi _ nulqaviigh te kete luku _ unguvallegh ni _ t a a k u g h l l e q a g u u _ ?
" _ sangan _ n u l q a v i i g h t a q e t s i _ aate yaghqagh meng _ ? _ esghaqagh teki qun _ piitesighagh at _ piite llegh it _ , _ qepghagh igate ut _ talwa _ aatkagh ngllagh igate ut _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ .
ungipaate amsi _ talwa _ solomon _ aklungi ghllag mini _ aate igate uq _ p i i t e s i g h a g h e s t u n _ pinightutka lghii meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh aqe ai _ vegaagh t _ , _ iwernga _ aga _ unaami _ quug ke aqe ait _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh kayugu kaki _ v e g h a a g e t _ , _ aasi ightugh aghagh naanghite i sagh i _ elpek si _ ? _ U g p e q i l l e g h q e s t a a p i g u t s i _ !
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ n u l q a v i i g h t e g p e n a s i _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sa meng _ negh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ megh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ aate naqe sta _ ? _ '
G e n t i l e - e t _ tamaa na _ nulqaviigh te kaqe aat _ . _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ liisimake ai _ qamagte luki _ a k l u k e g k a s i _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh ughte stekek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ piyuke llegh a llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ a k l u k e g k a s i _ .
nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ unaami igh lleghqagh _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami m _ seghleliigh i _ itagnagh yaghqaa ut _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ . _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ pikayug u uq _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ ilaagh aghagh gpenaan _ unaami m _ seghleliigh lleghqagh aneng _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ nanqigte i gpenasi _ ila gpesineng _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ n a n q i g g n e g h i l l i s i _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ t a w a t e n g n g w a a q _ nanqigte i llegh gpesistun _ ila gpesineng _ . _ atuqe lleqe ai llu _ elpesi nun _ ataasigh t _ tamaakut _ pi kasi _ ila gpesinun _ .
sangan _ esghagh zigu _ yug lgute gpek _ iisqughute a _ , _ elpek _ katam _ iisqughute n _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ avelghagh luku _ ?
sa lghii meng _ yug lgute n _ pi zigu _ , _ ' _ entaa- a _ iisqughute igh qagh laken _ ' _ , _ elpek _ paninang _ iisqughute lgu luten _ unaghsigh ghllag meng _ ?
uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ sivuke luku _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ iye gpeneng _ nusug luku _ elngaatall _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ esghagh luku _ yug lgute n _ iisqughute igh naken _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ L e g a s i i g h w a g h t e n u n _ apeghtuusagh ke gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ qikmigh stun llu _ k u r u g a g h e s t u n l l u _ ayuqe ut _ . _ sa u aat _ agleghnagh lghiit _ tuune gpenaki _ qikmigh nun _ luuraq _ sughug na yu kangisi _ . _ akituqagh t _ sungagh t _ miluute gpenaki _ k u r u g a g h n u n _ , _ luuraq _ t u t m a a s g h a q n a y u k a t k i _ .
" _ aapte tek _ , _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ ; _ ivagh i tek _ , _ naalkute lleqe usi _ ; _ tenglugtugh tek _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe aisi _ .
qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ aapte lghii _ , _ allgegh te yaghqaa uq _ ; _ kina _ alngunak _ ivagh i lghii _ , _ naalkute yaghqaa uq _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ tenglugtugh lghii _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe a _ .
kitum _ yug m _ ighnegh ni _ tungsigh kan _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ uyghag meng _ ?
nalighmeng _ tungsigh kan _ iqallug meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ nemegh yameng _ ?
S e g h l e g h u g h n g a a g h p e s i _ , _ avaqutagh si _ tuune yaghqaqe asi _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ . _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ tuune i yug aghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ t a m a a k u n u n _ a a p l e g h h i n u n _ ellmi nun _ .
" _ enkaam _ yug lgute gpesinun _ pinitun _ pi ste sug kufsi _ , _ elpek si llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe teki _ . _ tawaten _ apeghtugh i u ut _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh i llu _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ itegh tek _ kagpestaaghhagh kun _ amig kun _ . _ amigh k _ hell- mun _ ayuqe lghii _ nuqutu uq _ , _ tume kegte uq llu _ enkaam _ uglagh _ taakwagun _ igleghte aqe uq _ .
iwernga _ amigh k _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghii _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ , _ t u u m l l u g m e t u q l u _ enkaam _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh m _ naalke aqe ai _ tume t _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ kelenga lusi _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h n e n g _ . _ taku lleqe aisi _ p e n n i i g h s u g n i g h q e l l u t e n g _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
liigike lleqe asi _ nangaghnegh itgun _ liigike llegh gpesistun _ uqfig t _ sa meng _ piite ste i llegh itgun _ . _ sikughllug t _ piite ste i igate ut _ grapes- meng _ nalighmeng _ figs- meng _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi igate ut _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ seghlegh meng _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ , _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
enkaam _ alngunak _ uqfig _ piite ste i nghite ngughk _ pinigh lghii meng _ kepe luni _ kumaghsaghqagh u uq _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ tawatete llegh itgun _ liigike lleqe asi _ uuknaliqe i ste sighwaagh ta i _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ ila i _ yug m _ whanga mnun _ m a l i g s a a g h t e k n i i q u t _ enkaam _ pi aqe aatnga _ , _ ' _ atanegh ke amken _ ' _ iwernga _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ T a m a a k u n g i n a a t _ atuqe i lghiit _ piyuke llegh aneng _ ata ma _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ uglagh m _ pi yaghqaqe aanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ ategh gpegun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ apegh qaghkagh ut _ . _ ategh gpegun _ aag negh squgh ke aqe aput _ tughneghagh t _ uglagh lghii neng _ yug neng _ . _ ategh gpegun _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i i g h a a t a q a a g u k u t _ uglagh ghngaan _ ! _ '
iwernga _ whaten _ pi lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ nallukngwaagh amsi _ , _ iqite tek _ whanga mneng _ , _ seghletun _ p i s t e n i _ ' _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate lghii _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke gkumiki _ peghqinegh lghii tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ t a w a l l i m a _ mangteghagh _ ullegh ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ uyghag kun _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
" _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate ghngaaghmi _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ , _ nalluqagh tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ qenaaghllug kun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ aga _ mangteghagh _ uulegh ke aq _ n a a v n g w a a g h l u n i _ . _ "
Jesus _ tamaaken _ apeghtugh i nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ ,
qayughllak _ apeghtugh ikagh _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i g h l u n i _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug stun _ liilightuusagh meng _ pi gpenani _ .
Jesus _ qemi meng _ ukig yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag m _ maligtekagh a _ .
taagken _ yuug _ , _ l e p r o s y - l e k _ , _ tagi luni _ ellnga nun _ , _ segesqughte vike luku _ , _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ , _ ukmangigh qagh nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ tawavek _ saafte luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke aqa _ , _ ukmangigh u aghten _ ! _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ l e p r o s y - n g i i t k a q _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ naallghute llegh gpeneng _ , _ yeghlegi _ aglagh a _ priest- mun _ esghagh ligu _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ taagken _ a g h q e r r a a g h h a a t e n _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ i p a p i g h q e s q e l l u k u _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ C a p e r n a u m - e m u n _ pi ke aq _ . _ kaate aqe uq llu _ , _ R o m e - e m _ u m i i l w a a g h a n _ taku luku _ k a y u s i i t a g h t e s q e l l u n i _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ atanegh _ , _ w h a n g k u n n i _ q e p g h a g h t e k a _ , _ uniigh ma uq _ , _ ikfiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ naallghute yaghtugh naqe aqa _ . _ "
iwernga _ u m i i l w a a g h e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ itagnagh nghite unga _ elpenun _ itegh vike yaghqaa lunga _ mangteghagh mnun _ . _ legan _ t a w a n l l u t e n _ naallghute sqe gu _ q e p g h a g h t e k a _ enkaam _ naallghute li _ .
qelegh i kayug meng _ umiileg lgu unga _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ qelegh aqe anka _ p i l l u w a g h t e n k a _ . _ ataasigh _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ ' _ aga _ aghulaqe lleqe uq _ . _ ila a _ whaten _ pi kumkun _ , _ ' _ tea- ai _ ' _ tagi lleqe uq _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e k a _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ una _ pi aghte gu _ ' _ , _ aga _ pi lleqe a _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nagate luku _ saghiigha yuke aq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ maligte te lghiit _ ellmi nun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nallagh te igate unga _ k i t u m e n g _ alngunak _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i m e n g _ , _ u u t u n _ yug tun _ ugpeqe i neghtutka lghii meng _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ a s i v a g h m e n g l l u _ pakfalla meng llu _ yug lghute t _ tagi laghate te yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ tawani _ aqume uute luteng _ neghe lgusigh lleqe ait _ sivunegh put _ A b r a h a m - e n k u t _ , _ I s a a c - e n k u t _ , _ J a c o b - e n k u t _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ataneghpag u llegh mete yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ aanesaghqagh u ut _ mamleg ghllag mun _ , _ tawani _ elngaatall _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ a v u t e g h q e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetun _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ . _ " _ enkaam _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ u m i i l w a a g h e m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
Jesus _ P e t e r - e n k u n u n _ pi luni _ , _ esgha qaa _ aghnagh _ P e t e r - e m _ saki a _ qavaghvig mete uq _ puqlegha luni _ .
S a a f s a q m i n i g u _ iiggagh kun _ puqlegha nga i tke aq _ , _ aga _ makete luni _ kepsiiqukagh a _ .
I g h i v g a g h y a g u _ J e s u s - m u n _ tagi qugh tke ait _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ enkaam _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh it _ akuzillegh mikun _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ q i n u y u g e t _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ apeghiigh na luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ I s a i a h - m _ whaten _ p i l l g h a _ , _ " _ tugu kaqe ai _ qinuyug lleg put _ , _ iqite kaqe ai _ aqnighnegh put _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ esghagh luki _ u v i t m i n i l n g u u t _ yug lghute ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe sqekagh i _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ aghvigh na luteng _ .
taagken _ apeghtugh i kayug m _ liilightuusagh meng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ natmun _ alngunak _ pi kuvek _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kaviigh t _ riigte lgu ut _ , _ qawaag t _ unglute lgu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ingaghte vig ite aqe uq _ . _ "
ila yan _ maligte yaaghte yan _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ iwernga _ sivuke luku _ ata ka _ llivegh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ tamaakut _ maligte te yu nghite ngugh t _ whanga mnun _ tuqu kau ut _ taghneghagh megteggun _ ; _ llivegh litki _ t u q u m a s l i i t e n g _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte yan _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i l l u _ u u g l l e g h a a t k a t _ .
puglegh llghite a _ k i i n g u n g i i g h h a a n e n g _ esla _ nuuskagllagan _ naafte ghllagkagh _ , _ naayvagh llu _ imaghllug ughte ghllag magh mi _ , _ repall _ angyagh _ i m i g h a a t a q e g k a a _ . _ iwernga _ Jesus _ qavaa lghii _ .
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ taku luku _ t a g h t u g h t e k a a t _ whaten _ pi magh an _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ yugu likut _ ! _ tuqu laghate te naqe ukut _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ alinge tsi _ ? _ U g p e q i l l e g h q e s t a a p i g u u s i _ ! _ " _ taagken _ nekeve luni _ ineghtekakek _ a n u q a l l u _ imaghllug t llu _ enkaam _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ .
qamagte luteng _ saghiigha yuke aat _ . _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ N a t e l n g u u w a _ yuug _ una _ ? _ talwa _ anuqe m llu _ imaghllug t llu _ qaatke kangat _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e n k u t _ kaate yameng _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ , _ aglaghkagh t _ G a d a r a - g h m i i t _ nuna itnun _ . _ taagken _ maalghug _ yug k _ tughneghagh leg k _ i l u m e g n e g u n _ tagi lutek _ llivegh neng _ nallaqagh ak _ Jesus _ . _ suugllug ghllag k _ repall _ kina _ alngunak _ taakwagun _ tume kun _ igleghte igate ngughk _ .
legan _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ sa naqe zikut _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ ikfiqe ste naqe zikut _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ ? _ "
taawa nguq _ qantagha ni _ kurugagh lghute t _ , _ negh aqe ut _ .
tughneghagh t _ maniguute pigte luteng _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ aane stekufkut _ , _ k u r u g a g h n u n _ i t e g h a a t e s n a k e f k u t _ . _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ " _ aanleghaate luteng _ k u r u g a g h n u n _ i t e g h a a t k a t _ . _ aga _ kurugagh at _ pangaleg tke aat _ asitmun _ naayvagh mun _ nagnegh luteng _ megh mi _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
K u r u g a g h n e n g _ aflengake i lghiit _ q i m a a g u u t k a t _ ne mun _ . _ tawani _ a a p q a g k e t _ sa mate kek _ tughneghagh lgu yagh lghiik _ i l u m e g n e g u n _ , _ samatagh nge i llu _ kurugagh lghute t _ .
enkaam _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ t a m a a k u m i i t _ esghagh yaghtugh tke aat _ Jesus _ . _ esghagh yamegteggu _ maniguute pigte luteng _ aghulaqe sqekagh at _ nuna meggneng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ aghvag iqe aq _ . _ enkaam _ C a p e r n a u m - e m u n _ aglaghkagh _ ne minun _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ellnga nun _ tagi tke aat _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ allighagh akun _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ liigike luki _ u g p e q i l l e g h t u l n g i t _ , _ pi ke aa _ unegh ii iqe aq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ quya _ ! _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ . _ "
taagken _ ila i _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ sumeghtaghaghkagh t _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ seghleghqe ghllag uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh u yug uq _ seghevute i llegh mikun _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ liisimake luki _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ seghlegh meng _ sumeghtaghagh tsi _ ?
naligh _ akuzillegh _ piyaqnagh u i te a _ , _ ' _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ makete luten _ piyug i _ ' _ ?
liigike ste naqe amsi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ seghevute i lleghqagh lgu ta a _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ " _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh a _ ! _ "
yuug _ makete luni _ aglaghkagh _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ tallugh yuke aat _ , _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ t a w a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i s k a n g i _ yug t _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ igleghte te kete luku _ esgha qaa _ t a x - e m _ qerngughte i ste nga _ , _ aqume luni _ qepghagh vig mini _ ; _ M a t t h e w - n g u f t u q _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ M a t t h e w - m _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ .
mulu gpenateng _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ negh yaghtuqagh t _ M a t t h e w - n k u n u n _ . _ neghe uute ma luki _ t a x - m e n g _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e l g h u t e t l u _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e l g h u t e t l u _ aqume luteng _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ neghe lgusighkagh it _ .
ila ita _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ esghagh luku _ neghe lgute yu igh i lghii _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtughiste gpesi _ neghe lgusigh aki _ t a x - m e n g _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e t l u _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t l u _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nagate luki _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ yugunqegtagh t _ a g h a l l e g t a g h s u g h n i i t u t _ , _ t a m a a k u n g i n a a t _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
liite yaghtugh teggu _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ una _ akuzite nite ngughk _ igaqegkagh _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ piyuke nghite anka _ aghqe te si _ , _ itupill _ nangllegtagh sug amsi _ . _ ' _ tagi u nghite unga _ tagsigh na luki _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tagi u unga _ tagsigh na luki _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ . _ "
taagken _ J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta llu _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ awen _ fast- u aqe sta _ , _ naqam _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t e n _ f a s t - e g p e n a t e n g _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nulightugh yaghqagh m _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ qivghu nga yaghqau aat _ t a w a n l l u k u _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ iwernga _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate yaghqaa uq _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ iqite stekumegteggu _ , _ elngaatall _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ f a s t - e l l e q u t _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaagh naanghite ak _ aatkagh lug k _ nutaghagh meng _ liiqnegh meng _ . _ ilaagh llegh _ qellughtekuni _ piig u lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ piig llegh _ sulleve lleqe uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ w i n e - e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ imigh naanghite a _ awataghpag lug _ qayughllak _ awataghpag lug _ imigh kuni _ aafkagh luni _ imaa igh u lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ awataghpag lug _ atugh u yaghqaa nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ iwernga _ awataghpagraghagh _ imigh kuni _ w i n e - e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ qerngagh egmek _ naave naanghite uk _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus _ akuzi ma luku _ J e w s - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g a t _ itegh luni _ segesqughte luni _ manu akun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panike a _ whaa _ t u q u n Ê¼ g h h a a g u q _ , _ iwernga _ taku luku _ saaftekuvgu _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i l l u _ maligte tke aat _ .
aglagh ma luki _ , _ qinuyug lghii m _ aghnagh m _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ t u n u t a n g a n e n g _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ k i i t e l q u n g i g a l n g u q _ . _ whaten _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ , _ " _ S a a f t e q e g h s a q u m k u n _ aatkagh akun _ , _ naallghute nayagh unga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ saaftekagh a _ atkuyaagh an _ kenigh akun _ .
J e s u s - e m _ qiive te kete luku _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panig mni _ alinge gpenang _ ! _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ naallghute uten _ . _ " _ aga _ aghnagh _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ kaate luni _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n k u n u n _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ tuqu i lghii ni _ q a l g h i g h t a g h t e t l u _ , _ yug lghute t llu _ qiya aghte tete te ghllag lghiit _ .
tawavek _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuqu llghite uq _ qavaa uq _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ n e n g l a q e g k a a t _ .
A a n l e g h a a t e s a t k i _ , _ itegh luni _ J e s u s - e m _ tugukagh a _ iiggagh kun _ , _ enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh _ unguvaqagh _ .
enkaam _ taana _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e q _ ungipagh kekagh at _ tea- ma ani _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ ne meng _ . _ ayaakagh k _ yug k _ maligte yu aqe ak _ , _ akilghuu magh egmek _ whaten _ , _ " _ ighneghagh ni _ D a v i d - e m _ , _ nanglleg yagute kung _ ! _ "
aga _ mangteghagh mun _ itegh yan _ maligtekagh ak _ , _ enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ U g p e q e s t e g n e g u u _ naallghute i lleghqagh ka _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ ! _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ iye gkenkun _ saafte lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetegetun _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ esghagh yagutekagh k _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q a k e k _ , _ " _ ungipagh gpenatek _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ "
iwernga _ navek _ pinegh megteni _ apegh aqe ka ak _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ ellmegnun _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ aghulaqe ma lukek _ , _ J e s u s - m u n _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ .
legan _ J e s u s - e m _ tughneghagh _ aane sta _ , _ yuug _ aga _ akuzikagh _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute t _ saghiigha yug te luteng _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ W h a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ a l l a a g h l l u w a g h t i l l e g h m e n g _ esghaate igate ukut _ israel- mi _ ! _ "
iwernga _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ umiileg ita _ tughneghagh t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i s i m a a t _ aane ste qigh sqellug qu _ tughneghagh neng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ galilee- mi _ , _ apeghtugh i magh mi _ s y n a g o g u e - n g i t n i _ , _ ungipagh ke i magh mi llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qamagte luki _ aqnighnegh leg t llu _ qinuyug lghiit llu _ .
esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nanglleg yagutekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh nga ghllaget _ , _ kayute ngunateng _ ; _ penniigh stun _ p e n n i i g h n i g h t e n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ .
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ ugpeqe yug aqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ uspute nga lghiit _ nunivagseghagh nun _ u n a t a g h y a q l e g g i i n a a g h t e k a t _ . _ taawanginaq _ p a l a p i g u u t _ q e p g h a g h t e t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ yughaghte k _ A t a n g h a n u n _ unataghyaghqagh t _ , _ kayagte i sqellug qu _ q e p g h a g h t e k a g h q a m e n g _ unataghyaghqagh anun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ qerngughte luki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i t k i i _ aane ste i yaghqaa luki _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
U k u n g u u t _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ a p o s t l e - e t _ : _ sivuligh _ , _ simon _ ( _ alla _ ategh leg _ peter- meng _ ) _ , _ A n d r e w _ ( _ a n g l e g u t a n g a _ ) _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ ( _ Z e b e d e e - m _ ighnegh kek _ ) _ ,
P h i l i p - e n k u t _ , _ B a r t h o l o m e w - n k u t _ , _ T h o m a s - e n k u t _ , _ M a t t h e w - n k u t _ ( _ t a x - m e n g _ qerngughte i ste u yagh lghii _ ) _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ ( _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e u s - e m _ ) _ , _ T h a d d a e u s - e n k u t _ ,
S i m o n - e n k u t _ Z e a l o t - a _ , _ Judas _ I s c a r i o t - l u _ ( _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ J e s u s - m e n g _ ) _ .
J e s u s - e m _ , _ taakut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ a p o s t l e - e t _ kayagtekagh i _ q e l g h u u m i i t a _ , _ " _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ , _ S a m a r i a - g h m i i t l u _ nuna itnun _ pi fqaafsi _ .
yeghlegi _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ pi tek _ qayughllak _ iflakagh stun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
navek _ alngunak _ pinegh gpesini _ whaten _ ungipagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ ! _ '
Q i n u y u g e t _ naallghute ki _ , _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh teki _ , _ l e p r o s y - l g e t _ naallghute ki _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ aane ste qugh teki _ yug neng _ . _ aki u na an _ allgegh te kau usi _ , _ enkaam _ aki u na an _ tuune tek _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ mani meng _ : _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ talwa _ c o p p e r - m e n g _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ akmagtagh meng _ , _ simiite kaghqagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ talwa _ ayaviigh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh a _ a k l u k e g k a a n e n g _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ .
" _ T o w n - e n u n _ nalighmeng _ v i l l a g e - e n u n _ kaate negh gpesini _ ivagh i aqe tek _ k i t u m e n g _ pinigh lghii meng _ enkaam _ ellngan ite aqe tek _ kenlanga _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte llegh gpesinun _ .
itegh kufsi _ mangteghagh anun _ quya ta qite ki _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a _ elpesi nite li _ . _ '
U p u g h a s k a n g i s i _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ t a w a n t e s n a k e s i _ . _ iwernga _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ veghte nakesi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ nalighmeng _ nagate nghite kangisi _ , _ aane te kete luku _ mangteghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ aghulaqe te kete luku _ t o w n - m e n g _ , _ itegagh gpesi _ pagula i _ ufsug te nakesi _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ S o d o m - e g h m i i t l u _ G o m o r a h - g h m i i t l u _ a g h y u u l l e g h q e s t a a g h h a a y a g h q a a g u t _ t a a m _ ne m _ yug aneng _ ! _ "
" _ ukughsi _ ! _ kayagtekumsi _ penniigh stun _ q u n g a n g i t n i l n g u g h e s t u n _ amaa t _ l l i i g h l e q u s i _ enkaam _ p e g h q i n g h u l u s i _ nemeghyagh stun _ , _ n e k e g g m e l l u s i _ d o v e s - t u n _ .
kelenga lusi _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ tugu lusi _ aglagh u lleqe aisi _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aisi llu _ s y n a g o g u e - m e g g n i _ .
whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ nekeve ste lleqe aisi _ sivu itgun _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t l u _ umiileg t llu _ . _ enkaam _ l i i g i k e s a g h q a a g h l l e q a g h p e s i n g a _ ellngit nun llu _ G e n t i l e - e n u n l l u _ .
N a n q i g t e s t e m u n _ aglagh u uute kangisi _ , _ teggellghiigh gpenasi _ naten _ akuzi lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh gpesineng _ . _ akuzi yaghqaaghtekufsi _ akuzite kaghqagh lgu lleqe usi _ .
akuzite t _ elpek si _ pike nghite asi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ taghneghagh kek _ akuzi lleqe uk _ elpesigun _ .
" _ yug t _ ellmeng _ katam _ anglegute teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ , _ ata t llu _ avaqutagh teng _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaqe ait _ . _ avaqutagh t _ angu yiite luki _ angayuqagh teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ .
whanga mneng _ apallugh ke lusi _ yug m _ qamagte luni _ ugumi ke lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ nuqete neghtuqagh t _ kenlanga _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ .
takukagh gpesini _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ ila anun _ t o w n - e m _ qimag ggaasi _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ qamagte naanghite asi _ I s r a e l - e m _ town-ngi _ , _ sivungagh ni _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh an _ .
" _ maligsaagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ apeghtughiste mineng _ , _ talwa _ qepghagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ umiileg mineng _ .
itagnaghi yaghqaa uq _ maligsaagh a _ apeghtughiste mitun _ lliigh kuni _ , _ qepghagh a llu _ umiileg mitun _ lliigh kuni _ . _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nengllugute mineng _ , _ B e e l z e b u l - m e n g _ atigh ma katgu _ , _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g i _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a l u k i _ atigh yaghqaqe ait _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ tamaakut _ a m y u q e t a g h t e t _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nallukekagh _ liitesaghqagh u uq _ , _ qamagte luni llu _ aksaqekagh _ qayvighqesaghqagh u uq _ .
elpesi nun _ sa u aat _ apeghkagh nka _ apegh yaghqaqe asi _ tea- ma anun _ . _ sigutqugh tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ , _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe asi _ mangteghagh t _ qaye itneng _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ tuqute i kayug t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh meng _ iwernga _ tuqute i naanghite ut _ unguva sigh meng _ . _ itupill _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ hell- mi _ naafqii yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh gkeneng _ yugusigh meng llu _ unguva sigh meng llu _ .
P e n n y - m e n g _ tukfigh yaghqaqe agsi _ q a w a a g g a a k _ , _ naqamllu _ aag llegh a _ ifkagh kan _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ aflengake aghagh lusi _ ayuqe aisi _ , _ qayughllak _ talwa _ nuyagh gpesi _ u g l a g h t a l n g i _ liisimake ai _ .
enkaam _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ ata gpesi _ megnu ke aghagh aisi _ q a w a a g g a g h n e n g _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ , _ whanga mnun _ p i k n i l u n i _ , _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ p i k n i l u k u _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luni _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luku _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ paninang _ aleghqugh qu ai _ , _ " _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u nghite unga _ , _ taawanginaq _ pillugute ste i yaghtugh u unga _ .
tagi u unga _ yug mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ ata a _ , _ aghnagh mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ naange a _ , _ ukaagh anun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ saki a _ aghnagh _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g i t a _ anguyag liite lleqe aat _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ighnegh ni _ nalighmeng _ panig ni _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaquuragh ni _ tugu yu nghite kunigu _ maligte naanghite aanga _ , _ enkaam _ whanga mni _ itagnagh nghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ ellmi nun _ p i k n i k u m i g u _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ pegtekunigu _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ unguvallegh pig _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ u p u g h a s k a n g i s i _ , _ whanga llu _ upugha lleqe aanga _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ u p u g h a s k u m i n g a _ , _ upugha lleqe a _ kayagte i steke _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ u p u g h a s k u m i g u _ uuknaliqe i sta _ uuknaliqe i ste u ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ uuknaliqe i stetu te _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ u p u g h a s k u m i g u _ elqughutngagh lghii _ yuug _ elqughute nga ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ elqughutngagh lghii tun _ yug tun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nenglekegte lghii meng _ meghsi kunigu _ u k a l i g h p i g a q _ maligte yaaghteke _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghtekete te mneng _ , _ ipa _ pi amsi _ akileghtuusagh nge pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ apeghiigh yamiki _ a p e g h t u g h a n e g h m e n g _ , _ tamaaken _ aghulaqekagh _ ila itnun _ t o w n - e t _ apeghtugh i na luni llu _ ungipagh ke i na luni llu _ .
anusimingllaghvig mete luni _ J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ nagaqugh luku _ C h r i s t - a _ sa aqe ta a _ , _ ila i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ kayagtekagh i _ J e s u s - m u n _ .
aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ E l p e n g w a a _ tagi naqe nikagh at _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ tagi yaghqau a _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teggu _ John _ nagatekagh gpesineng llu _ esghaghkagh gpesineng llu _ :
aya kaayagh lghiit _ esghagh yagute ut _ , _ piyug igate yagh lghiit _ piyug yagute ut _ , _ l e p r o s y - l g u y a l g h i i t _ naallghute ut _ , _ tuuslagh yagh lghiit _ nagaqugh te yagute ut _ , _ tuqu kaayagh lghiit _ unguvagh ut _ , _ aklumalghii nun llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i nanigh nghite kuni _ whanga mneng _ quya stekau uq _ ! _ "
aga _ J o h n - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ akuzi tkekagh a _ John _ yug lghute nun _ , _ " _ kilgaa nun _ pi aqngafsi _ , _ sa u a _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ vegaagh _ anuqe m _ u f s u g u s k a n g a a _ ?
sa qu tsi mi _ ? _ E s g h a g h n a l u k u u _ aatkagh kegte aq _ yuug _ ? _ tamaaken _ aate kaqe lghiit _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ umiileg t _ mangteghagh itni _ !
sa u a mi _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste inagh u nghite uq _ . _ megnu nagh aghagh uq
qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghkagh at _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ sivu gpeni _ kayagte lleqe aqa _ ungipaghteke _ , _ yataaghqesaghtigh sqellug qu _ tume kaghqagh n _ ' _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ yug neng _ a l l g e q a g h y a g g a g h n e n g _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ u k a l i g h p i g a q _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ J o h n - m e n g _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ .
John _ paaptaaye sta _ ungipagh ke i yuggaagh llegh aneng _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ , _ suugllug t _ wayagh naqutke aqe aat _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ .
qamagte luteng _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ M o s e s - e m l l u _ liilightuusagh ita _ u u k n a l i q u t k e n g n g w a a t _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kenlanga _ J o h n - e m _ tagi llegh anun _ .
J o h n - n g u u q _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ t a g i n a q n i l l e g h m e g g t e g g u n _ elijah _ . _ ugpeqe yu kufsigu _ uuknaliqe llegh _ , _ John _ E l i j a h - n g u u q _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ !
" _ maaten _ k i y a g h l l e g h h i t _ yug t _ sa mun _ uspute naqe zingi _ ? _ T a g h n u g h h a a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ aqume uute luteng _ akilpegaghvig ni _ , _ naghaalgute meggnun _ akilghuu te lghiit _ whaten _ ,
' _ qalghightaute amsi _ , _ t u k a l e g a n g h i t u s i _ ! _ qiyiqe te ukut _ , _ qiyiqe nghite usi _ ! _ '
" _ John _ tagi aqngami _ fast- u aqe uq _ , _ megh igate uq llu _ wine- meng _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ ' _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi aqngami _ , _ neghe lgusigh aqe ai _ , _ meghe lgusigh aqe ai llu _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ Y u u k q u n _ taana _ esghaqagh teggu _ ! _ neghetu pigte uq _ , _ meghetu pigte uq _ , _ ilakumtaagh ke aat llu _ t a x - e m _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e n g i t a _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t l u _ ! _ ' _ naqamllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a a q _ s a l l g h a k u n _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ allute luki _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e n i _ atuqe kaqe ai _ C h o r a z i n - m i _ , _ B e t h s a i d a - m i _ , _ C a p e r n a u m - e m i l l u _ . _ iwernga _ yug it _ a v u t e g h q e l l u t e n g _ taaqe llghite ngugh t _ s e g h l e g h q e n n e g h m e n g _ enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ a g h y u u g h m i k i i _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ , _ C h o r a z i n - e g h m i i n i _ ! _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ , _ B e t h s a i d a - g h m i i n i _ ! _ elpesi ni _ a l l a a g h l l u w a g h t i l l e g h l l a g e t _ apeghiighkagh t _ pi kaayagh kata _ T y r e - m i l l u _ S i d o n - m i l l u _ , _ neghigh pigte luteng _ yug it _ a v u t e g h q e l l u t e n g _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h n a y a g h t u t _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ suvinagh lghii meng _ qiipaghaghqagh meng _ aate luteng _ aqume nayagh ut _ p a n e t e l l e g h t e g g u n _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ T y r e - e g h m i i t l u _ S i d o n - e g h m i i t l u _ a g h y u l l e g h q e s t a a g h h a a y a g h q a a g u t _ elpesi neng _ !
enkaam _ elpek si _ , _ C a p e r n a u m - e g h m i i n i _ ! _ qaywa _ a n g l i s t e g h l l a g y a g h n g a a g h p e s i _ elpesi neng _ katam _ repall _ sumegh gpesini _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe nighllug si _ qilag mi _ , _ yeghlegi _ ukig lleqe aisi _ hell- mun _ . _ A l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e g h l l a g e t _ pi kaayagh kata _ S o d o m - e m i _ , _ paninang _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nekevgha nayagh uq _ !
iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aghagh yaghqaqe ai _ S o d o m - e g h m i i t _ p a k i g g u l l u k i _ elpesi neng _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ kaay _ a ta _ , _ atanegh ke aaten _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ ! _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ qayughllak _ liite kau nghite ngugh nun _ liite stekaqe an _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ iigh kan _ liitekagh neng llu _ peghqinegh neng llu _ .
aa-a _ , _ A t a a y _ , _ efqugh ke llegh gpetun _ pi kau uten _ .
" _ ata ma _ tagivagh kaqe a _ sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ ighnegh _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ata m _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ a ta _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ighnegh m _ , _ enkaam _ ighnegh m _ nakmikegkagh minun _ liite ste lleqe a _ a ta _ .
" _ tagi tek _ whanga mnun _ qamagte lusi _ u g h l e g h i l g h i i n i _ , _ uqigtuqagh meng llu _ akmag leg ghllag ni _ , _ meghnaali ste lleqe amsi _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ aate lukek _ liite i vike tengnga _ , _ qayughllak _ y a k u m a n g i n n e g h i t u n g a _ , _ ilu ka _ q u s e v e g n g a a q _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali lleqe usi _ unguva sigh gpesinun _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ piyaqnagh u i te uk _ , _ akmag ka llu _ uqengestaaghhagh u uq _ . _ "
taagken _ S a b b a t h - e m _ aghnegh ani _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ w h e a t - e m _ piite vig akun _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ iyataghkagh t _ enkaam _ w h e a t - m e n g _ qesug te aqe luteng _ neghekagh t _ .
P h a r i s e e s - e t _ esghagh luki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ w h e a t - m e n g _ qesug te aatagh lghiit _ , _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ S a b b a t h - m i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t e n _ qepghagh ut _ , _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe aat _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t i g h t u u m a n g i s t e g g u u _ D a v i d - e n k u t _ y u k u l l g h i i t _ sa kau ta i _ iyatagh aqngameng _ ?
itegh kau uq _ t a b e r n a c l e - m u n _ enkaam _ y u k u l l g h i i t _ neghe kaqe aat _ neqekrangllagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe kaqe aat _ qayughllak _ priest- nge i na ut _ negh yaghqaqe yagh kangat _ .
A t i g h t i i g a s t e g g u l l u _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ p r i e s t - e t _ temple- mi _ qepghagh negh meggni _ S a b b a t h - m i _ naafqe aqe kangat _ S a b b a t h - e m _ liilightuusagh a _ ? _ naqamllu _ p r i e s t - e t _ anaggute igate ut _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaante uq _ temple- mi _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ nangllegtigh sqe sug amsi _ yug lgute gpesinun _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ aghqe te gpesineng _ . _ ' _ taakut _ akuzite t _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h y a q u f s i k i _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ , _ nanqigte nayagh nghite asi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ anaggute llghite ngugh t _ ,
qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ atanegh ke a _ S a b b a t h - e m _ . _ "
T a a k e n _ Jesus _ aglagh luni _ s y n a g o g u e - n g i t n u n _ iteghkagh _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ iigge an _ inglu i _ unegh ii iqe aat _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ n a a l k e f i k n a l u k u _ anaggute llegh meng _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa- a _ naallghute i lleghqagh _ S a b b a t h - m i _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ naligh gpesi _ penniigh a _ k a l e f k a g s a q a n _ laawaagh mun _ S a b b a t h - m i _ , _ n u s u g n a y a g h e s t e g g u u _ ?
yuug _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ penniigh meng _ ! _ enkaam _ liilightuusagh ni _ itagnagh lghii u uq _ pinitun _ pi lleghqagh _ S a b b a t h - m i _ . _ "
taagken _ yuug _ uniigh nga lghii meng _ iigge leg _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nengug te ki _ iigge ten _ . _ " _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ , _ aga _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ , _ inglu megestun _ lli aqe aat _ .
taagken _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ aane luteng _ agghi saghtuqagh t _ naten _ tuqute na luku _ Jesus _ .
J e s u s - e m _ liisimake luku _ agghi llegh at _ , _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ m a l i g l l e g h a a t k a a t _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qinuyug lghiit _ qamagte luki _ ,
ineghtekagh i llu _ ungipagh ke te qugh a mi _ p i s q e l l u n i _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i l l g h a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ I s a i a h - k u n _ whaten _ :
" _ una _ esgha _ nakmikegkagh ka _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u k u _ . _ piniqe kaqe a _ unguva sigh gma _ efqugh ke pigte a _ . _ taghneghagh gka _ ellnga kun _ nekegte lleqe agka _ . _ ungipaate lleqe ai _ G e n t i l e - e t _ t a w a t e g h l l u w a a q _ nanqigte i lleghqagh mneng _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
aaghtiiraagh naanghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akilghuu naanghite uq _ , _ tume ni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ akuzi naanghite uq _ .
iike naanghite a _ vegaagh _ ullegh nga lghii _ , _ qaame yaghtugh u ngestaghkagh k _ kenegh lghutagh k _ q a a m n n a a n g h i t a a k _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ whaten _ piyug luni _ lliigh kan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte llegh a _ yug neng _ a v u t a n g i t u q _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh akun _ G e n t i l e - e t _ sighima lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - m u n _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ ayaakagh _ , _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ naagh llegh u tke a _ enkaam _ akuzi yagutekagh llu _ esghagh u sag u tke aq llu _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ repall _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ a a p q u g h a a g h u t k a t _ whaten _ , _ " _ una _ D a v i d - e m _ ighnegh ke nghite agu _ ? _ "
P h a r i s e e s - e t _ nagate luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ yug neng _ aane ste aqe ai _ tughneghagh t _ qayughllak _ atuqe u kanga _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ B e e l z e b u l - e m _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g a t _ tughneghagh t _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ liisimake kangi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alngunak _ ataneghpag u llegh _ aafqugh te luni _ pillugute kuni _ , _ naave lleqe uq _ . _ tanemlleqa _ ne ghllag t _ nalighmeng _ nengllugute t _ aafqugh te luteng _ pillugute kumeng _ , _ q e r n g a g h m e n n a a n g h i t u t _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ tughneghagh m _ aane stekunigu _ tughneghagh _ , _ taawa _ ellmi neng _ p i l l u w a a g u q _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ k e n l e t g h u u l l e q u q _ .
aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ B e e l z e b u l - k u n _ , _ naten mi _ yug gpesi _ aane ste qugh aqe atki _ tughneghagh t _ ? _ enkaam _ yug si _ nanqigte i stekete lleqe asi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ taawa _ t a a m _ i p a p i g h q a a _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ kaate ma uq _ elpesi nun _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh yug kuni _ iknaqe lghii m _ yug m _ mangteghagh anun _ t e g l e g u g h n a l u n i _ saghya aneng _ , _ sivuke luku _ yuug _ asighqesaghqagh ke a _ . _ taagken _ w a y a g h t e g h l l e q i i _ saghya i _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ w h a n g a m n i n n e g h i l n g u q _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h t e k a q a _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ qerngughte i lgusigh nghite kuminga _ mingite i ste u uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ yug t _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ alngunak _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ , _ alngunak llu _ s e g h l e q u u l l e g h m e g g n e n g _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ s e g h l e q u u q u m i k e k _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kunigu _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ maaten _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m i _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ .
" _ uqfig _ aflengakekagh _ pinigh lghii u uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ pinigh ut _ . _ uqfig _ aflengake llghite ngughk _ seghleghu uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ seghleghu ut _ . _ piite ste i llegh akun _ l i i s i m a k e l l e q a g h s i _ uqfig m _ nateghtu langa _ .
ukughsi _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ naten _ akuzi aqe tsi _ pinigh lghii meng _ s e g h l e g h u g h n g a a g h p e s i _ ? _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ ilu anite ngughk _ aane kau yug u uq _ akuzillegh akun _ .
pinigh lghii _ yuug _ pinigh lghii meng _ ilumike i lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ . _ seghlegh _ yuug _ seghlegh meng _ ilumike i lghii _ seghlegh meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ .
" _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ yug t _ apegh yaghqagh pestaagh ke ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ akuzite t _ atuqekagh teng _ sangita _ atuqe ma ta i _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ akuzite gpegun _ . _ akuzite gpek _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q a a t e n _ avute ite ni luten _ nalighmeng _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ . _ "
