taagken _ ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ liilightuusagh m _ , _ ila ita llu _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ pi ke aat _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l g h i i t e n _ e s g h a p a g y u w a m k e n _ liigike na luku _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e n _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghnegh m _ u u m _ yug i _ seghleghqe ma u ut _ , _ a t a a s i i g h n e g h i l n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ naqam _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i t e s q u t _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ T a a n a n g i n a g h h a q _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e q _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a a g h t i l l g h a _ J o n a h - m u n _ .
Jonah _ iqallug ghrugllag m _ a q s a q g h w a n i t k a a g u q _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ u n u g e t _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ s a m a n s a g h q a a g u q _ nuna mi _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ u n u g e t _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ nekeve luteng _ anaggute ni lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni lusi _ . _ uuknaliqe i sta _ Jonah _ ungipagh yan _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ a v u t e g h q e l l u t e n g _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i q a a g u t _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ a v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i l l g h i t u s i _ qaywa _ nagate kaqe ghngaaghpesigu _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ J o n a h - m e n g _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ queen- nge an _ S h e b a - m _ nekeve luni _ nanqigte yaghqaa ni lleqe aisi _ . _ tagi kau uq _ u y a v a g h p a n i l n g u g h m e n g _ ne mineng _ nagate na luku _ S o l o m o n - e m _ peghqinegh ghllag _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ S o l o m o n - m e n g _ whaante uq _ , _ t a w a l l i i m a _ i g h s a k a q a g h s i _ . _ "
" _ tughneghagh _ yug meng _ aane gkuni _ igleghte lleqe uq _ m e q r a g g i i l n g u g h m i _ nuna mi _ , _ ivagh i lleqe uq _ meghnaali vigkagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ naalkute nghite yami _ ,
pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghfig ke yagh ke mnun _ uteghte naqe unga _ . _ ' _ kaate yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ , _ a a l l w a a g h l u n i _ , _ m i n g l l e g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ tagi tke ai _ maaghraghvinleg _ tughneghagh t _ ellmi neng _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a l g h i i t _ . _ I t e g h a a l l u t e n g _ yug mun _ t a w a n t e k a t _ . _ enkaam _ taana _ yuug _ s i v u n g h a n e n g _ wataqaaghaq _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u g h t e k a q _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ maaten _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ s e g h l e g h u g h t a g h a g h y a g h q a a g u t _ sivugh nghaani _ pi llegh meggneng _ . _ "
paninang _ J e s u s - e m _ aleghqugh ma luki _ yug t _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ naange a llu _ a n g l e g u t a n g i l l u _ kaate luteng _ manughagh mi _ aleghqugh yug qu aat _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ ungipagh tke a _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ qakma _ naa n llu _ anglegute ten llu _ , _ aleghqugh yug aqe aaten _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ naa ka _ ? _ kinkungaawa t _ anglegute nka _ ? _ "
taagken _ kenigh luki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ T a a k u s t a _ naa ka llu _ anglegute nka llu _ !
kina _ alngunak _ ata ma _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ piyuke llegh atun _ pikumi _ , _ anglegute ke aqa _ , _ nayag ke aqa _ , _ naa ke aqa llu _ ! _ "
tawani _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ Jesus _ aane luni _ mangteghagh meng _ , _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ aqume luni _ apeghtugh ikagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ kangllu qaghte yatni _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aqumekagh _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esne metekagh t _ .
ungipaghaate tgun _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ apeghtugh qu ai _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piitesighagh a _ piitesighaghvig minun _ aglagh luni _ , _ ifkagh qughkagh _ piitute neng _ .
piitesighaghvig mini _ i f k a g h q i y a l g h i i m i _ piitute neng _ , _ ila i _ tume tgun _ tekite ke aat _ , _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ negh u qu ait _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ uyghagaghtuqagh kun _ s u n a p a g i l n g u g h q u n _ . _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ piite tke aat _ qayughllak _ suna a _ ugmestaaghhagh _ .
iwernga _ siqinegh _ piite yalghiimi _ maatnegh an _ paneghtekagh i _ qayughllak _ a k u p a g i l n g u u t _ .
ila i _ piitute m _ tekite ke aat _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ , _ sikughllug t _ piite yalghiimeng _ piite vig iqe ait _ piitute t _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ piite ste ikagh t _ g r a i n - m e n g _ , _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ ungipaghaate meng _ atuqe aqe ziin _ apeghtugh nghpeki _ yug t _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite stekaqe a _ talugh nga lghii _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h a _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ , _ iwernga _ ellngit nun _ liite tesi mangite a _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ liigike lleg ngekagh _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ liigike lleg nge aghagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ l i i g i k e l l e p a g i l n g u q _ liigike llegh a _ iqite lleqe uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ ungipaghaate tgun _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaate ghngaaghmeng _ esghaate igate ngugh t _ , _ nagate ghngaaghmeng _ n a g a q i i g a l n g u u t _ , _ talwa _ liigike igate ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ ellngitgun _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke i llegh a _ apeghiigh uq _ . _ taaggun _ uuknaliqe llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh lleqe ut _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ ; _ esghaate pestaagh lleqe ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ esghaghkagh teng _ ,
qayughllak _ ellngit a _ umyugagh it _ pi neghllugtekau ut _ . _ sigute it _ t u s a q n e g h l l u u g t e k a a g u t _ , _ iye teng llu _ quneghtekaqe ait _ . _ T a w a t e l n g u u n g h i s a q u m e n g _ iye meggneng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ sigute meggneng _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ umyugagh megteggun _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ enkaam _ qiive nayagh ut _ whanga mnun _ n a a l l g h u t e s q e l l u t e n g _ . _ '
" _ iwernga _ quyanaghhalek _ elpek si _ ! _ iye si _ esghaate aqe ut _ , _ sigute si llu _ nagaqugh te aqe ut _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e l g h u t e t l u _ , _ yug lghutagh nge an llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ esghagh yug kaqsagh ait _ esghagh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ esghagh mangite ait _ . _ nagaqugh yug kaqsagh ait llu _ nagaqugh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ nagaqugh mangite ait _ .
" _ nagate ggu _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta a _ ungipaghaate ke kaqe a _ piitesighagh a _ .
piitute t _ tume t _ saaghw itgun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ liigike nghite kagu _ ungipagh _ tughneghagh m _ tagi luni _ wayagh lleqe a _ tekite kaayagh lghii _ ilu akun _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ uyghagtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ ungipagh _ tugukligh iqe a _ quyake sigh ke luku _ .
iwernga _ ungipagh _ ilu ani _ mulu ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ akugh nge llghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh yalghiimi _ nalighmeng _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge yalghiimi _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipagh _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ ugpeqe i nanigh uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ teggellghiigh llegh an _ k i y a g h t a a g h u s i g h q a m e n g _ , _ aklungi igh i yu llegh ghllag an llu _ piite vig igh aqe a _ ungipagh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ piite ste i igate uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ uspute nga ut _ yug nun _ nagaqugh te lghii nun llu _ liigike i lghii nun llu _ ungipagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ piite ste qugh aqe ut _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ aapte qugh a _ ila a _ ungipaghagh an _ ellngit nun _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yug tun _ piitesighaghkagh tun _ pinigh lghii meng _ piitute meng _ piitesighaghvig mini _ ayuqe uq _ .
U n u g m i _ ataasigh mi _ q a v a s i m a l u k i _ , _ anguyag a _ tagi luni _ piitesighagh ke aq _ w e e d s - m e n g _ akule itgun _ w h e a t - e t _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
nunivagseghagh t _ piite yalghiimeng _ , _ w h e a t - e t _ akume luteng _ w e e d s - m e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
piitesighagh a _ q e p g h a g h t e l g h u t n g a n _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ pinigh lghii meng mi _ piitute meng _ piitesigh u aghagh ziin _ piitesighaghvig gpeni _ ; _ naken _ w e e d s - e t _ pi ut _ ? _ '
yug m _ kii msiigh ke ai _ , _ ' _ anguyag m _ tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ ' _ . _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ W e e d s - e t _ i k u u l t e k i i _ ? _ '
kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ ' _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ w e e d s - e t _ ikugh kufsiki _ qemall _ w h e a t - e t l u _ ila leg qite te lleqe asi _ .
qerngagh ita _ w h e a t - e t l u _ w e e d s - e t l u _ nagu steki _ kenlanga _ unatagh lleghqagh mun _ . _ enan _ unatagh yaghqaaghtekata _ u n a t a g h t e t _ ungipaate naagh anka _ w e e d s - e t _ s i v u k e s q e l l u k i _ , _ q e p u g h l u k i _ paneghte yaghqaa luki _ . _ enkaam _ w h e a t - e t _ unatagh ste luki _ kagpag ste naagh anka _ kagpag vig mnun _ . _ ' _ "
allameng _ J e s u s - e m _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ piitute atun _ m u s t a r d - e m _ ayuqe uq _ . _ piitute m _ m e k e s t a a l l e g h p i g a q a a _ , _ iwernga _ yug m _ piitesighagh nghminigu _ piitesighaghvig mikun _ n u n i v a g s e g h a g h y a g g a g h n e n g _ aange lleghpigagh u kayugu uq _ . _ uqfig ughte nghaani _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ avayagh akun _ unglute yagh u iqe ut _ . _ "
allameng _ J e s u s - e m _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ y e a s t - a t u n _ ayuqe uq _ . _ aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ a k u u t u s k a n g a _ avlawa ghllag mun _ , _ enkaam _ akuutagh ghllag a _ ghhuugh ste ghllag qagh a _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ apeghtugh nghminiki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ quunpeng _ atuqe aqe ai _ ungipaghaate t _ . _ ipapestaaq _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ ungipaghaate tgun _ ayuqe uq _ .
tawaten _ pi kau lghii _ apeghiigh na luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ p i l l g h a _ , _ " _ ungipaghaate t _ atuqe lleqe anka _ aleghqugh kumki _ . _ ungipaate lleqe anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite tesi ma ite ka aneng _ ima _ ulima yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ unite luki _ yug lghute t _ iteghkagh _ mangteghagh mun _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sa meng _ p i s i i g w a t _ ungipaghaate kekagh ten _ w e e d s - e t _ p i i t e s i g h a g h v i g m e l n g u u t _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ yuug _ piitesighagh ke aq _ pinigh lghii meng _ piitute meng _ , _ ighnegh ke a _ yug m _ ;
piitesighaghvig _ nuna u uq _ ; _ pinigh lghiit _ piitute t _ yugu ut _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ pi ke ai _ ; _ w e e d s - e t _ yugu ut _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ .
anguyag _ piite ste ikagh _ w e e d s - m e n g _ tughneghagh u uq _ . _ unatagh llegh _ nuna m _ k e n l e t g h u u t e l q a a _ , _ u n a t a g h t e t _ yaquleg u ut _ .
unatagh llegh mi _ w e e d s - e t _ qerngughte luki _ paneghte aqe ait _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ k e n l e t g h u u t e l l g h a n i _ nuna m _ , _ yug t _ tughneghagh m _ pi i _ qerngughte luki _ paneghte yaghqaa ut _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ yaquleg mineng _ kayagte i yaghqaa uq _ i q i t e s q e l l u k i _ ataneghpag u llegh mineng _ qamagte luki _ seghleghqe sigh t llu _ , _ seghletun llu _ p i s t e t _ .
enkaam _ k e n g h e g n u n _ miluute lleqe ait _ , _ tawani _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ kuukgute lleqe ut _ siqinegh tun _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ ata meng _ . _ sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ aklungi stun _ ayuqe uq _ iigh nga lghii _ piitesighaghvig mi _ . _ yug m _ n a a l k e l l u k i _ iiw nqigtekagh i _ . _ Q u y a m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ , _ aghulaqe luni _ qamagte luki _ saghya ni _ akike luki _ , _ taagken _ taana _ piitesighaghvig _ tukfigh iqe a _ . _ "
" _ whatete uq llu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ : _ tukfightugh a _ ivagh i lghii _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ p e a r l - m e n g _ tukfigh yaghqagh meng _ .
naalkute nghmini _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ akituqagh meng _ , _ akikugh aqe a _ qamagte luku _ saghya ni _ , _ tukfigh na luku _ taana _ p e a r l - a _ . _ "
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ , _ negaghpag tun llu _ ayuqe uq _ . _ I q a l l i n i i g h t e t _ negaghpag eng _ naayvagh mun _ ateghte luku _ aghqella aqe ut _ enkaam _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ iqallugte ghllag aqe ut _ .
negaghpag _ sayug luku _ qute mun _ , _ aqume luteng _ iqallug t _ avugh aqe ait _ , _ p i n i l g h i t _ kanaghte magh ita _ qalta nun _ , _ enkaam _ s e g h l e l l g h i _ egte aqe ait _ .
tawatete yaghqaa uq _ k e n l e t g h u u t e l l g h a n i _ nuna m _ . _ yaquleg t _ tagi luteng _ avugh lleqe ait _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pinigh lghii neng _ .
enkaam _ seghlegh t _ k e n g h e g n u n _ miluute lleqe ait _ , _ tawani _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ " _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ liigike stekagh i _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tamaghhagh mi _ apeghtugh i kayug _ liilightuusagh neng _ apeghtuqagh _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ qilag m _ w h a t e l n g u u g u q _ : _ mangteghagh leg _ yuug _ nusug ragh lghii _ kagpag vig mineng _ nutaghagh meng llu _ neghightagh meng llu _ . _ "
Jesus _ taaqe yami _ apeghtugh i nghmeng _ ungipaghaate neng _ aghulaqekagh _ .
aglagh luni _ ne minun _ apeghtugh i yan _ s y n a g o g u e - n g i t n i _ , _ yug t _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ . _ E l l m e g g n e n g _ a a p q u g h a a g h u t k a t _ , _ " _ naken _ peghqinellegh nge a _ ? _ naken llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g a _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i m u n _ ?
ighnegh ke nghite agu _ kaapenta m _ ? _ mary _ naa ke nghite agu _ , _ uuk _ a n g l e g u t k e n g h i t a k i i _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ , _ J o s e p h - e n k u t _ , _ S i m o n - e n k u t _ , _ J u d a s - e n k u t _ ?
nayag i llu _ mate- te nghite aat _ ? _ naken _ liite lleg nge ghllag a llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g a l l u _ ? _ "
enkaam _ t u g u k l i g h y u n g h i t k a a t _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nani _ alngunak _ yug t _ sii vag kaqe aat _ uuknaliqe i sta _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ nuna ani llu _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a n i l l u _ . _ "
tamaani _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i p a g u m a n g i l n g u q _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ .
tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ H e r o d - e m _ , _ igleghte te i ste yan _ G a l i l e e - m _ , _ nagaqugh qu a _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghseghugh u ma llegh a _ .
H e r o d - e m _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ una _ J o h n - n g u u q _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ unguvagh ma uq _ . _ esghaghhu qun _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e k _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e g h m u n _ . _ "
qavnganghhaq _ H e r o d - e m _ tuqute stekaqe kanga _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ qayughllak _ J o h n - e m _ ungipaate kaqe kanga _ , _ " _ qaatke te nghite uten _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ tugu llegh gpegun _ H e r o d i a s _ , _ anglegute gpek _ nulighh a _ . _ " _ ( _ H e r o d i a s - e m _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ philip _ , _ H e r o d - e m _ uyughagh a _ . _ ) _ J o h n - e m _ ungipaate llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ H e r o d - e m _ tugu sqekagh a _ John _ , _ asighqellug qu _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghte sqellug qu _ . _ H e r o d - e m _ tuqute sug u yagh kanga _ John _ , _ naqam _ alikekagh i _ J e w s - e t _ seghleliighqagh ii na yu kata _ qayughllak _ u g p e q e q k a n g a t _ John _ uuknaliqe ste u ni luku _ .
taagken _ H e r o d - e m _ allgeghvig an _ aghnegh ani _ , _ H e r o d i a s - e m _ panig a _ t u k a l e g a q a q _ H e r o d - e m l l u _ aqelqagh t llu _ sivu itni _ . _ elngaatall _ herod _ efqugh yug ghllagkagh _ ,
repall _ akeqekagh a _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh kuvek _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ "
naa mi _ kayagte llegh atun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whaa _ maaten _ tagivagh ghhu _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ n a a s q w a _ J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ . _ "
umiileg _ qivghuke aq _ iwernga _ akeqe i kau te mineng _ aqelqagh mi _ sivu itni _ piyuke llegh a _ kayagte tke a _ .
enkaam _ H e r o d - e m _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ J o h n - e m _ n a a s q w a _ kepe stekagh a _ .
naasqugh _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ tuunekagh at _ aghnaghagh mun _ , _ enkaam _ naa minun _ aglagh tke a _ .
J o h n - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ tagi luteng _ yugusigh a _ llivegh yaghtugh qu aat _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu aat _ .
J e s u s - e m _ nagaqugh yamigu _ ungipagh _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aghulaqekagh _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a n a l u n i _ . _ iwernga _ yug lghute t _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ ne meggneng _ maligtekagh at _ piyug meng _ .
Jesus _ qute mun _ uugte luni _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nanglleg yagute ghllagkagh i _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ q i n u y u g t e n g i t _ .
W h a n i k u y a g u _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ W h a n i k w a a _ , _ maana _ paaghqite uq _ ; _ aglagh uute sqe ki _ ne nun _ ellngit neng _ n e q e n g e s q e l l u k i _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ M a a n l l i t _ . _ elpek si _ n e g h y a g h q a l i t e k i _ . _ "
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ whaa _ legan _ t a l l i m a g g a a g u t _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ iqalluggagh ak llu _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tagite ki _ whavek _ . _ "
taagken _ yug lghute t _ aqume uute sqekagh i _ vegaagh kun _ . _ tugu luki _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ iqalluggagh ak llu _ , _ sivugte luni _ qilag mun _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ . _ iigge mineng _ aavgugh luki _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ tuunekagh i _ u y e g t e s q e l l u k i _ yug lghute nun _ .
qamagte luni _ negh te tke aq _ kepsugh te luni _ . _ taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ tugukagh it _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ paskete t _ esleqnga lghiit _ kagimlegh itneng _ neqekrangllagh t _ siipnegh t _ .
entaqun _ 5 , 0 0 0 - n g u u t _ yug t _ negh te tke aat _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ kesutke gpenaki _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ kayagtekagh i _ angyagh kun _ a g h v i q e s t i i s q e l l u k i _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ , _ ellnga n _ aglagh uute tesi ma luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ a g l a g h t u u t e s a m i k i _ ellnginagh mi _ naayghagh mun _ mat- yuqagh _ yughagh na luni _ . _ tawani _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ Jesus _ e l l n g i n a a m a l u k u _ ,
angyagh t _ u n Ê¼ g a _ naayvagh mi _ awavagh luteng _ , _ elngaatall _ imaghllug ii iqe aat _ qayughllak _ a y g u g h n a g h u s k a n g i _ .
akule gkeni _ t h r e e - k e l l a a g e n k u k _ , _ s i x - e k l a a g e n k u k _ unaangu luku _ J e s u s - e m _ takukagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ .
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ esghagh luku _ megh kun _ piyug lghii _ kakave na iqe aat _ . _ enkaam _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ taghneghagh u uq _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ whanga u unga _ ! _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ipa _ e l p e n g u k u v e k _ tagsigh nga _ elpenun _ aglagh langa _ megh m _ qaye akun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ . _ " _ enkaam _ peter _ ategh luni _ angyagh meng _ , _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ aglaghkagh _ J e s u s - m u n _ .
iwernga _ anuqe _ elpeg ke yamigu _ alingekagh _ , _ kaleve te kete luku _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ yugu linga _ ! _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ J e s u s - e m _ akuqagh luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ U g p e q i l l e g h q e s t a a p i g u u t e n _ ! _ sangavek _ malghukli ziin _ ? _ "
angyagh mun _ uugte aqe uk llu _ ellmaaragtekagh _ .
enkaam _ a n g y a m e l n g u u t _ manigugh qu aat _ Jesus _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke aaten _ ! _ "
taagken _ naayvagh _ aghvigh luku _ tamlagkagh t _ gennesaret- kun _ .
T a m a a k u m i i t _ liisuqe yamegteggu _ Jesus _ , _ ungipaate yaghtigh sqekagh it _ v i l l a g e - e n i l n g u u t _ q i n u y u g t i i g h i t _ t a g i t e s q e l l u k i _ J e s u s - m u n _ .
manigugh ututka ait _ qinuyug lghiit _ waran _ saafte sqellug qu _ kenigh akun _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ saafte i lghiit _ naallghute lleg ngekagh t _ .
taagken _ ila i _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ tagi luteng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ ,
" _ sangameng _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t e n _ qaatke te igate aat _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ ? _ negh naqe negh meggni _ uughtugh igate ut _ elqughute luteng _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ elpek si _ qaatke igate aqe ste ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ maligte na luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh ke a _ , _ ' _ Q u u l v a g h l u k e k _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ ' _ . _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ ata ni _ , _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke gkunigu _ , _ tuqute yaghqaa uq _ ' _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i aqe usi _ , _ ' _ yug m _ q u u l v a n g h i s a g h n g a a g u _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ whaten _ pi kagu _ , _ ' _ kayusiite yaghqagh lgu unga _ elpenun _ , _ iwernga _ t u u n a a n g h i t a q a _ qayughllak _ akequsagh ke kaqe aqa _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ pakig aqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ apallugh ke luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ .
ukughsi _ piniiyugnegh ni _ ! _ elqughte lusi _ whaten _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe aisi _ !
kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ ' _ ukut _ yug t _ akuzite megteggun _ q u u l v a g h a q a a t n g a _ , _ nakaan _ ilu meggneng _ .
temngi _ manigugh aqe aatnga _ qayughllak _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ , _ katam _ whanga _ liilightuusagh ke pigte lghii stun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute t _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate lunga _ liigike tek _ !
yug m _ sa u a _ qanegh minun _ kanaghtekagh a _ nukeggnaghqe i igate uq _ , _ iwernga _ yug m _ q a a n g h a n e n g _ aanekagh _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu uq _ . _ "
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ L i i s i m a k e n g h i s i g u u _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ anagtegketen _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpegun _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nunivagseghagh _ qamagte luku _ ata ma _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ piitesighagh ma ite kanga _ nusug yaghqaa uq _ .
avelghaqiinagh luki _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ ! _ ayaakagh stun _ maghyaghqugh i aqe ut _ . _ yug m _ ayaakagh m _ ila a _ ayaakagh _ taslugh kunigu _ , _ l a a g w a a g h m u n _ k a l e f k a g t a a l l e q u k _ . _ "
P e t e r - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ sa meng _ p i s i i g w a _ ungipagh aaten _ yug t _ nukeggnaghqe igate ni keten _ neghekagh megteggun _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si llu _ salin _ l i i g i k i g a t s i i _ ?
L i i s i m a k e n g h i s t e g g u _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ qanegh minun _ kanaghtekagh a _ a q s a q g h w a n u n _ pi aqe uq _ , _ taagken _ aane aqe uq _ yugusigh aneng _ ?
iwernga _ sa u a _ qamaken _ aanekagh _ qanegh kun _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu uq _ yug meng _ .
qayughllak _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ seghlegh _ sumeghtaghagh llegh _ pi kau yug u uq _ , _ yugte aq _ , _ gelgaghni ii aagh _ , _ allani ii aagh _ , _ tegleg ni uq _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i _ , _ s e g h l e q u u q _ yug neng _ .
T a m a a k u s t a _ nukeggnaghqe i kayug t _ yug neng _ , _ iwernga _ uughtugh gpenani _ neghe llegh m _ n u k e g g n a g h q e n n a a n g h i t a a _ yuug _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ tunge gkenun _ T y r e - e n k u k _ S i d o n - e n k u k _ .
taawa nguq _ C a n a a n - e g h m i i _ aghnagh _ . _ Jesus _ takukagh a _ akilghuu magh mi _ , _ " _ kaay _ atanegh _ , _ ighnegh a _ D a v i d - e m _ , _ n a n g l l e g y a g u t e q e g h t i n g a _ ! _ panike a _ tughneghagh m _ itegh ma a _ , _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u u q _ . _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ avelghaqiinagh qagh a _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ k a y a g t a g h w a a q a a t _ , _ " _ iqite sqe gu _ ! _ maligsaagh magh emta _ akilghuu uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n g i n a g h h a g h n u n _ , _ penniigh stun _ iflakagh stun _ ayuqe lghii nun _ . _ "
iwernga _ aghnagh _ tagi luni _ J e s u s - e m _ sivungagh kun _ qungughtu te kete luku _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kayusiite aghte nga _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anaggute nga uq _ taghnughhagh t _ neqe it _ tugu luki _ qikmigh nun _ miluute kumeng _ . _ "
aghnagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ atanegh _ , _ talwa _ yug m _ qikmigh a _ i f k a g h q e l l g h a n e n g _ negh aqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aghnagh _ elpek _ , _ ugpeqe i lleghtu pigte uten _ ! _ apeghiigh li _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ . _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ panig a _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ , _ esne akun _ naayvagh m _ G a l i l e e - m _ . _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ aqumekagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ taku laghate tke aat _ , _ tagite magh ita _ J e s u s - e m _ sivungagh nun _ p i y u g p a g n i n g i l n g u u t _ , _ aqnightekagh t _ , _ ayaakagh t _ , _ akuzi igate ngugh t _ , _ ila i llu _ qinuyug lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ esghapag luki _ akuzi igate ngugh t _ akuzi yagute lghiit _ , _ aqnightekagh t _ naallghute lghiit _ , _ p i y u g p a g n i n g i l n g u u t _ piyug yagute lghiit _ , _ ayaakagh t llu _ esghaate yagute lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh a _ I s r a e l - e m _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ maakut _ nanglleg yagute pigte anka _ qayughllak _ whanga mnite ut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ talwa _ neghyaghqagh ite ut _ . _ neghe ste gpenaki _ aghulaqe sug nghite anka _ , _ luuraq _ tumangani _ kayaali na yu kata _ . _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ maani _ kilgaa ni _ naken _ neqenge naqe sta _ naama yaghqagh meng _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ , _ qafsina t llu _ iqalluggagh at _ . _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qelqe ai _ a q u m u u t e s q e l l u k i _ nuna kun _ .
taagken _ tugu luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ iqallug t llu _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ . _ aavgugh luki _ tuunekagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ enkaam _ uyegtekagh it _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ .
qamagte luteng _ negh te tke aat _ kepsugh te luteng _ . _ taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ siipnegh _ qerngughte luku _ maaghraghvinleg _ paskete t _ imaa iqe ait _ e s l e q a g h a g h l u k i _ .
uglaghtala it _ negh te tke aat _ yug t _ 4 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ kesutke gpenaki _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aglagh uute ste luki _ ellngit nun _ ellnga _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ u v i t a n g a n u n _ M a g a d a n - e m _ aglaghkagh _ .
taagken _ ila i _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ S a d d u c e e s - e t l u _ tagikagh t _ J e s u s - m u n _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i g h n a l u k u _ . _ enkaam _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s q e g k a a t _ esghagh sighqagh u luku _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ .
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ siqinegh _ tevigh yaghtugh ngestagh nghaani _ esla _ kavighrug u nghaani _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ unaami _ pinigh naqe uq _ . _ '
siqinegh _ piite kestagh nghaani _ qilag a _ kavighrug u nghaani llu _ qilaga ii nghaani llu _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ aghneghmi _ esla _ seghleghu naqe uq _ . _ ' _ esghapag luku _ qilag a _ l i i s i m a k a q a g h s i _ esla _ natete naqute anga _ . _ iwernga _ esghapag nghpesiki _ s a l l g h e t _ aghnegh ni _ maani _ liigikepagningite asi _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ .
aghnegh m _ u u m _ yug i _ seghleghqe ma u ut _ , _ a t a a s i i g h n e g h i l n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ naqam _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i t e s q u t _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ T a a n a n g i n a g h h a q _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e q _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h a _ J o n a h - m u n _ . _ " _ taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ unite luki _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ kaate luteng _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ pi yalghiimeng _ puygu ma lghiit _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kelqe gpenateng _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ S a d d u c e e s - e t l u _ y e a s t - a n g i t n e n g _ . _ "
E l l m e g g n e n g _ a k u z i m g h h u t k e g k a a t _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi uq _ qayughllak _ kelqe nghite ngugh u kut _ neqekrangllagh meng _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ liisimake kangi _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ , _ u g p e q i l l e g h q e s t a a p i g u u s i _ ! _ sangafsi _ neqekrangllagh ite ni tsi _ ?
taawa _ l i i g i k i g a t s i i _ ? _ N e q a m i k e n g h i s t e k i i _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ aavgughkagh nka _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ yug nun _ , _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g u t a n g i l l u _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh kasi _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ ?
taakut llu _ n e q a m i k e n g h i s t e k i i _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug nun _ neghe stekagh nka _ , _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g u t a n g i t l u _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh kasi _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ ?
naten _ sangan _ liigike nghite steggu _ neqekrangllagh u nghite ngughk _ akuzi tke kegka _ ? _ kelenga lusi _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ S a d d u c e e s - e t l u _ y e a s t - a n g i t n e n g _ ! _ "
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ liigikekagh at _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta a _ . _ Y e a s t - a n g u n g h i t e f t u q _ neqekrangllagh mete ngughk _ kelenga sagh ughte tkekagh a _ , _ iwernga _ kelenga sqe aqe ai _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ S a d d u c e e s - e t l u _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ kaa sa mi _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ C a e s a r e a _ P h i l i p p i - e m _ , _ aaptekagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ " _ yug t _ kina u niigh katgu _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ila i _ pi aqe ut _ J o h n - n g u n i l u k u _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ ila ita _ elijah _ , _ paninang _ ila ita _ J e r e m i a h - n g u n i i q a a t _ nalighmeng _ naligh t _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ . _ "
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ elpesi mi _ kina u na iqe ste ngnga _ ? _ "
simon _ P e t e r - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ C h r i s t - a n g u u t e n _ , _ ighnegh a _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ quya ste lleg lgu uten _ , _ simon _ , _ ighnegh a _ J o n a h - m _ ! _ qayughllak _ yug meng _ liite mangite an _ , _ ata ma _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ elpenun _ liite stekaqe a _ .
enkaam _ pi amken _ , _ peter- nge te te n _ , _ uyghag _ . _ whagun _ uyghag kun _ nekefte lleqe aqa _ yughaghvig ka _ , _ tuqu llegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n _ k a y a a l q e s a g h q a q e n g h i t n g w h a a g h a a _ .
elpenun _ tuune lleqe anka _ key- nge i _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ asightekuvgu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ asighte yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ i t e m u s k u v g u _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ a p e g h t e s n a n i g h w a a q a q _ kitumun _ alngunak _ C h r i s t - a n g u n i l u n i _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ J e s u s - e m _ liigike ste naqekagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e t e p e s t a a g h y a g h q a a n i l u n i _ , _ tawani _ aw llaag ghhagh u i nakete te _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ni luni _ E l d e r - e n u n _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh meng _ . _ ungipagh tke ai _ tuqute yaghqaa ni luni _ taagken _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguvaghsaghqagh u ni luni _ .
P e t e r - e m _ iqitute luku _ aghyuuniigh qagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi snaanghite aaten _ ! _ tawaten _ pi naanghite uten _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ qiive luku _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ , _ iqiten _ whanga mneng _ ! _ A m i g i g h a g h p e n g a _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llegh n _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke nghite a _ ! _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ maligte yu kuminga _ , _ ellmi _ katam _ piyuke lleg ni _ pegte luku _ , _ qaquuragh ni _ uyamig luku _ maligte linga _ .
qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ ellmi nun _ katam _ p i k n i k u m i g u _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pegtekunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ allgegh lleqe a _ .
sa u a ngam _ yug m _ pinighqe sigh ke lleqe agu _ pi liite luku _ nunaghllag _ , _ ifla kunigu _ unguva sigh gni _ ? _ taawa _ avangite uq _ veghte sighqagh meng _ unguva sigh gminun _ .
apegh anka _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ ata mineng _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i g h l u n i _ yaqulegtuumagh mi _ . _ taagken _ tea- ma ghhagh a _ yuug _ nallangightugh lleqe a _ apeghiigh te llegh atun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ w h a a n l e n g u u t _ ila gpesi _ unguvallegh meggni _ esghagh yaghqaqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ umiileg u luni _ . _ "
aghvinleg _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ kelqekagh i _ peter _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u k l u _ , _ J o h n - e n k u k _ , _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ mayugh tke ai _ uusqagh lghii mun _ naayghagh mun _ ellnginagh ita _ .
iye itneng _ taagken _ Jesus _ allangughtekagh _ : _ gginagh a _ kuukgute ke aq _ siqinegh tun _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ q a t e g h r a k g u u g h t e k a t _ nighug stun _ .
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ e s g h a q a g k e t _ M o s e s - e n k u k _ E l i j a h - n k u k _ aliigh lutek _ aleghqugh ka ak _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ itagnagh pigte uq _ whaante llegh ut _ ! _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ nekefte langi _ pi nga yu t _ azigutagh t _ , _ elpenun llu _ , _ M o s e s - m u n l l u _ , _ E l i j a h - m u n l l u _ . _ "
salin _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ q i l a g w a a g h e m _ n i g h u g r a k e g t a m _ saapekagh i _ , _ enkaam _ qilawaagh meng _ me m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ ighnegh ke aqa _ , _ piniqe pigte aqa _ , _ efqugh ke pigte aqa _ , _ nagate aqe teggu _ ! _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ nagate luku _ me _ , _ a l i n g r u u g h e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ niinghutekagh t _ nuna mun _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ taku luki _ saafte luki _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nekeve tek _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ ! _ "
sivugte yalghiimeng _ J e s u s - n g i n a g h h a q _ esghaghkagh at _ .
ukig te kete luku _ naayghagh meng _ J e s u s - e m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q i i _ , _ " _ kitumun _ alngunak _ apegh yaqunaan _ esghaghwaagh llegh _ pi nakesi _ kenlanga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a n _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtughiste ita _ liilightuusagh t _ pi aqe atgu _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa ni luku _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ elijah _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ nallghusagh nqigte lleqe a _ .
iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ elijah _ t a g i n g w a a q a a g u q _ , _ iwernga _ yug t _ kina u ta a _ nalluke kaqe aat _ , _ piyuke llegh megestun llu _ pi kaqe aat _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ikfiqe ste lleqe aat _ . _ "
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ liigikekagh at _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ akuzite kaqe a _ .
yug lghute ghllag nun _ uteghnigh yata _ , _ yug m _ taku luku _ Jesus _ , _ aga _ s e g e s q u g h t e n g n g i n a a m a g h m i _ manu akun _ pi ke aq _ .
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighnegh ka _ nanglleg yagute aghte gu _ ! _ sayugpag ta lgu uq _ , _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe u uq _ . _ awen _ k e n g h e g n u n _ ullegh aghte aqe uq _ nalighmeng _ meghquute aqe uq _ .
M a l i g s a a g t e g p e n u n _ tagite yagh aqa _ , _ iwernga _ naallghutepag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ , _ ugpeqe i llghite usi llu _ , _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u u s i l l u _ ! _ naten _ t a g k a a n _ elpesinite naqe zinga _ u g p e q e s q e l l u n g a _ ? _ mekelghiigh _ whavek _ tagite ggu _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ taagken _ aanekagh _ mekelghiigh meng _ enkaam _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ mekelghiigh _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ e l l n g i n a a g h s a n _ m a l i g s a a g t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta _ aane ste nghmeng _ aghtugh steggu _ tughneghagh _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ qayughllak _ u g p e q i l l e g h q e s t a a g h h a a l g h i i s i _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu yagh kufsi _ m u s t a r d - e m _ p i i t u t e s q u g h h a n _ angtale atun _ , _ una _ naayghagh _ pi kufsigu _ , _ ' _ ingavek _ nuug ten _ ! _ ' _ nuugte nayagh uq _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ alngunak _ a g h t u g h n a y a n g h i t a g h s i _ ! _ "
iwernga _ t a w a t e l n g u q _ tughneghagh _ y u g h a g h h i i n a g h q u n l l u _ , _ f a s t - e l l e g h q u n l l u _ a a n e s a g h q a q a g h s i _ .
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ qerngughte te yata _ galilee- mi _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tugu luku _ tuune lleqe aat _ yug nun _ ,
enkaam _ tuqu lleqe aat _ . _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e s a g h q a a g u q _ . _ " _ taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ qivghu ghllagkagh t _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ C a p e r n a u m - e m u n _ tagi yata _ , _ T e m p l e - e m _ t a x - m e n g _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ peter _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ apeghtughiste i _ T e m p l e - e m _ t a x - n g a n e n g _ llivike ai qaa _ ? _ "
P e t e r - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ pi aqe uq _ . _ " _ peter _ itegh yan _ mangteghagh mun _ J e s u s - e m _ aleghqugh yuwhaagh ke a _ , _ " _ simon _ , _ natete a _ elpek _ sumegh gpeni _ ? _ K i n k u n g w a a q a t _ nuna t _ umiileg ita _ llivike i ste aqe kangit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ t a x - e m e n g _ ? _ nunalgute meggneng _ pi aqe aat _ nalighmeng _ n a k u m i i n e n g _ ? _ "
P e t e r - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ N a k u m i i n e n g _ . _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ enkaam _ umiileg t _ yug it _ llivike i naanghite ut _ .
iwernga _ seghleghyugsugh nghite apung _ t a x - m e n g _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e t _ . _ enkaam _ nulugh yagh a _ naayvagh mun _ iqallugte aqe yuggaagh gpek _ q a a n g h a n i _ naalke lleqe an _ mat- ni _ . _ tugu luku _ l l i v i k u s a g h t u g h n a k e f k u n g _ . _ "
T a a m _ kingu inagh aneng _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ J e s u s - m u n _ tagi luteng _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ kina _ angegh lleghpigagh u a _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ tagsigh luku _ taghnughhagh _ nekeve stekagh a _ qukagh itgun _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ itegh naanghite u aghte usi _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ w e t q u k u n _ t a g h n u g h h a g h e s t u n _ lliigh kufsi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ukaligh ughte lghii _ u u t u n _ taghnughhagh tun _ , _ angegh lleghpigagh u uq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ategh mkun _ tugukligh nghminigu _ w h a t e l n g u q _ taghnughhagh _ , _ whanga _ tugukligh aqe aanga _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghleghqe stekagu _ naligh t _ mekestaaghhagh t _ ugpeqe i nga lghiit _ whanga mneng _ , _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ yug t _ qaamqaghte vike luku _ u y a q w a g h k u n _ uyghag ghllag meng _ k a l e f s a q u m e g t e g g u _ uusqagh llegh anun _ kellii m _ .
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u t _ yug t _ qayughllak _ nuna mi _ whani _ nanghiiqu lleghtu pigte ut _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ nanghiiqu llegh t _ s e g h l e g h q i s t i m u n _ pi yaghqaa ut _ , _ iwernga _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u q _ kina _ seghleghqe ste i lghii _ yug neng _ !
" _ iigge gpek _ nalighmeng _ itegagh gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ kepe luki _ egte naketen _ ! _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh uten _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ itegh kuvek _ , _ iigge i te ghngaaghpek _ nalighmeng _ itegagh ite ghngaaghpek _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ kenle ite ngugh gnun _ k e n g h e g n u n _ , _ inglugtun _ iigge ligh luten _ nalighmeng _ itegagh ligh luten _ .
iye gpek llu _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ ipug luku _ egte naken _ ! _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh uten _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ itegh kuvek _ inglupigagh _ ii- uute kete luku _ , _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ k e n g h a n u n _ h e l l - e m _ inglugtun _ iye lgu luten _ .
" _ wataghllak _ , _ ukaligh ke gpenaki _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ ukut _ me ke ta ghhagh t _ . _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ qilag mi _ yaquleg ita _ quunpeng _ ata ma _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ gginagh a _ esghagh aqe aat _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kau uq _ y u g u l i n a l u k i _ iflakagh t _ .
" _ sumegh gpesini _ sa nayagh a _ yuug _ 1 0 0 _ penniigh leg _ , _ ataasigh _ aghulaqe yagh kan _ ? _ ivagh yaghtugh nayagh agu _ aghulaqekagh _ unite luki _ 9 9 _ penniigh ni _ qemi nite luki _ ?
ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ naalke gkunigu _ quyake ghllag yaghqaqe a _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ 9 9 - e n e n g _ aghulaqe ma ite ngugh neng _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ piyuke llegh ke nghite a _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ maakut _ me ke ta ghhagh t _ i f l a s q e l l u k i _ .
" _ U g p e q a a l g u t e g p e k _ seghletun _ pi kangaten _ , _ e l l n g i n a a g h u l l u k u _ ungipaate naken _ anaggute llegh aneng _ . _ nagate kuniten _ taawa _ i l a l i i g h u n n e q i g l l e q u t e k _ .
iwernga _ nagate yu nghite kangaten _ , _ taku nqigte naken _ kelqellug qu _ ataasigh _ nalighmeng _ maalghug _ ugpeqagh u lgute tek _ liisimake ste u lukek _ sa meng _ pi llegh gpetegneng _ . _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghtuusagh ke aat _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ l i i s i m a k i s t e t _ i p a p i g h q e s a g h q a q a a t _ anaggute llegh _ .
iwernga _ nagate yu nghite kaki _ apegh nakesi _ yughaghvig m _ yug itnun _ . _ nagate yu nghite kaki _ talwa _ yughaghvig m _ yug i _ , _ kiyaghute nakesi _ G e n t i l e - n g u l g h i i s t u n _ , _ t a x - m e n g l l u _ qerngughte i ste u lghii stun _ .
" _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ sa u a _ alngunak _ asightekufsigu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ asighte yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ i t e m u s k u f s i g u _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ .
" _ ila aneng llu _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ , _ nuna mi _ whani _ maalghug u lutek _ itagnagh qu te u kuftek _ aapte na lutek _ sa meng _ alngunak _ , _ ata ma _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ elpetegnun _ .
qayughllak _ m a a l g h u g g a a t _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yug ggaat _ q e r n g u g h u s k a t a _ whanga _ ategh mkun _ , _ a k u l n g i t n i s a g h q a a g u n g a _ . _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t m a _ seghletun _ pi manginagh kanganga _ naten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ seghevute yaghqaqe zikun _ ? _ K e t w e l l _ m a a g h r a g h v i n l a a k _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ M a a g h r a g h v i n l e g g i i n a q _ seghevute yaghqaqe nghite an _ , _ iwernga _ 7 0 _ x _ 7 _ .
tawaten _ pi amken _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh a _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ whatete uq _ : _ umiileg m _ q e p g h a g h t e m i _ igagh it _ yuvghiigh yaghtugh qu ai _ esghagh na luki _ a s e n g e t u l a n g i t _ .
iiwenllu _ igagh it _ yuvghiigh aqe ai _ , _ umiileg mun _ itghutekagh at _ qepghagh a _ a s e n g e l e k _ 1 0 , 0 0 0 _ mani meng _ .
tawaten _ angka an _ mani ite ngughk _ llivike uute yaghqagh meng _ a s e n g e m i n u n _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ akike sqekagh i _ ellnga _ , _ nulighh a _ , _ avaquti a _ , _ saghya i llu _ llivike uute yagh u luki _ a s e n g e n g a n u n _ .
iwernga _ qepghagh a _ sikmuute luni _ umiileg mi _ manu akun _ maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ U t a q i i g a g h t e n _ ! _ llivike naagh aqa _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ ! _ '
umiileg m _ nanglleg yagute luku _ puygu sqekagh a _ a s e n g e n g a _ enkaam _ aane stekagh a _ .
" _ taagken _ taana _ qepghagh a _ aane luni _ nallagh qagh a _ q e p g h a g h t e l g u t n i _ 1 0 0 _ mani meng _ asengekagh _ . _ akuqagh luku _ u y a q w h a k u n _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ llivike nga _ a s e n g e g p e n e n g _ ! _ '
Q e p g h a l g u t a n g a n _ sikmuute luni _ n a n g l l e g s i p i g l l u n i _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ U t a q i i g a g h t e n _ , _ llivike lleqe amken _ ' _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ nagate ma ite kanga _ , _ yeghlegi _ anusimingllagh stekagh a _ kenlanga _ a s e n g e n g a _ llivike llegh anun _ .
ila ita _ q e p g h a g h t e t _ esghapag luku _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ , _ seghleghyag te ghllag luku _ umiileg meggnun _ apegh yaghtugh qu aat _ .
enkaam _ umiileg m _ qepghagh a _ taana _ tagsiqligh luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ seghlegh pestaagh _ qepghagh a _ ! _ L e g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ seghevute amken _ a s e n g e g h l l a g p e n e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ n a n g l l e g s i l g h i i t e n _ .
qepghagh lguten _ n a n g l l e g y a g u s a q l e g e s t u n _ katam _ whanga _ nanglleg yagute lleg mtun _ elpek _ ! _ '
umiileg m _ sakrite pigte luni _ taana _ qepghagh a _ aglagh te stekagh a _ a m y u u t k i s t e n u n _ a n u s i m i n g l l a g h v i g m e l n g u g h n u n _ kenlanga _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ a s e n g e n g a _ llivike llegh anun _ .
" _ esgha _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ata ma _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ qamagte lusi _ p i y a g h q i i s i _ , _ qamaken _ ilu gpesineng _ seghevute nghite kufsiki _ yug lgute si _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh ke nghmeng _ taaqe yamiki _ aghulaqekagh _ galilee- meng _ , _ nuna anun _ J u d e a - m _ , _ i n g l u n g a n i l n g u g h m u n _ kiiw m _ J o r d a n - e m _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ m a l i g l l e g h a a t k a a t _ enkaam _ tawani _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ q i n u y u g e t _ .
ila ita _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ taku luku _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i g h n a l u k u _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa _ yug m _ pegtekunigu _ nuliigh ni _ sa u a _ alngunak _ apallugh ke luku _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ A t i g h t i i g a s t e k i i _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ p i l l g h i t _ , _ ' _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh mi _ kiyaghnegh _ yungllagh aqngami _ ulima kaqe kek _ yug nkuk _ aghnaa nkuk _ ' _ ? _ "
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ unite lukek _ , _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ qerngughte te lleqe uk _ , _ enkaam _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ yugusigh ak _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ maalghug u nanigh uk _ , _ ataasiighte uk _ yugusigh ak _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te stekakek _ yeqay _ yug m _ pellegh utu te ste nghite likek _ . _ "
P h a r i s e e s - e t _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan mi _ M o s e s - e m _ L i i l i g h t u u s a l i t i n k u t _ yug mun _ i g a l i t e s q e l l u k u _ nulighh a _ p e g t u g s i g h q a m e n g _ , _ a a n e s i m a a n l l u _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ M o s e s - e m _ pegtesaghqagh ughte stekaqe ai _ nula isi _ qayughllak _ pineghllug u lghiisi _ . _ iwernga _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawatetesaghqagh u nghite ni luku _ pi kaqsagh aa _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ yug m _ pegte yaghqaqe nghite a _ nuliigh ni _ wetku qun _ g e l g h a g h n i i q a n _ . _ pegtekunigu _ sa meng _ alla neng _ apallugh ligh luni _ , _ nulightugh nqigtekuni _ gelgaghniigh u lleqe uq _ n u l i g h q e n g h h a m i k u n _ . _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ T a a n a n g i n a g h h a a k a n _ apallugh _ yug m _ pegte sigh qaa _ nuliigh minun _ , _ yuug _ nulightugh nghite ghngaaghmi _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taana _ apallugh _ tamaghhagh mi _ tugukligh naanghite aat _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ila itnun _ tugukligh yaghqaaghte stekaqe a _ .
ila i _ yug t _ nulightugh igate ut _ allgegh kau te meggneng _ e u n u c h - n g n g u l u t e n g _ . _ ila i _ nulightugh igate ut _ qayughllak _ yug t _ e u n u c h - e n g l l a q a q i i t _ . _ paninang _ ila i _ e u n u c h - n g w a a q u t _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ qepghagh te na luku _ kiyaghnegh _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ taana _ tugukligh yaghqaqe gkunigu _ , _ tugukligh ligu _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi tke ait _ J e s u s - m u n _ saafte luki _ y u g h a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ . _ taawanginaq _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ ineghtekagh it _ t a g i t i s t e n g i t _ taghnughhagh t _ .
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yeqay _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi lit _ whanga mnun _ . _ ineghte gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ t a g h n u g h h a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ pi ke aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ saafte aqe luki _ quya stekagh i _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
taagken _ yug m _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ pi yaghqaqe zikun _ allgegh te sighqagh u luku _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sangan _ a a p s i n g a _ sa u a _ pi niite anga _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ pinigh lghii _ . _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge yu kuvek _ qaatke ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N a k u t _ ? _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ yugtagh gpenang _ , _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i gpenang _ ,
Q u u l v a g h l u k e k _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ , _ piniqe luki _ yug lgute ten _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ e l p e n e n g _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qamagte luki _ taakut _ qaatke aqe anka _ . _ sa u a llu _ pi yaghqaqe zikun _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ N a a m i g t e n g n g w a a g h y u k u v g u _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh a _ elpenun _ , _ aglagh luten _ qamagte luku _ saghya n _ akike luku _ , _ aki a _ tamaa na _ aklumalghii nun _ tunqugh naken _ . _ enkaam _ qilag mi _ aklungi lgu lleqe uten _ , _ taagken _ tagi luten _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ nagate luku _ , _ aghulaqekagh _ iilqe pigte luni _ qayughllak _ aklungite pigte lghii _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ piyaqnagh yaghqaa uq _ a k l u n g i l n g u g h m u n _ yug mun _ itegh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ .
ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ ila aneng _ , _ piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa uq _ c a m e l - e m _ suflughte te lleghqagh a _ sikugh m _ iye akun _ , _ a k l u n g i l n g u u m _ yug m _ itegh lleghqagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ nagate yamegteggu _ tawaten _ pi llegh _ saghiigha yug ghllag magh meng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe a _ ? _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ t a w a v e g h l l u w a a q _ esghagh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug t _ pi yaghqaqe nghite kangit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esghaqagh kut qun _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ unite luku _ maligtekaqe amken _ . _ sa u a ngam _ allgegh lleqe steggu _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ nutaghagh mi _ nuna mi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqume lleqe uq _ u m i i l g u s i g n e k u n _ aqumutagh gmikun _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m i n i _ . _ taagken _ elpek si llu _ maligte tekagh ni _ whanga mnun _ aqume lusi _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ umiileg m _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ igleghte te i lleqe usi _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ramke aneng _ I s r a e l - e m _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ kinku t _ alngunak _ unite kumegteki _ mangteghagh teng _ , _ anglegute teng _ , _ nayag teng _ , _ ata teng _ , _ naa teng _ , _ avaqutagh teng _ , _ nalighmeng _ piitesighaghvig teng _ , _ nula lleqe ut _ 1 0 0 - a l p a g l u k u _ . _ kenle ite ngugh meng llu _ unguvallegh meng _ allgegh u lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ aange lghii lghute t _ ukaligh igh lleqe ut _ enkaam _ u k a v a n l e n g u u t _ angegh llegh ughte lleqe ut _ . _ "
paninang _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig leg _ . _ unaangu luku _ aane luni _ tugulagh saghtuqagh _ q e p g h a g h t e k a g h q a m e n g _ piitesighaghvig minun _ .
aghnegh mun _ tawavek _ i t a g n a q e g k i i _ akileghtugh na luki _ a t a a s i k a g h t a a n _ d e n a r i u s - m e n g _ , _ taagken _ qepghagh yagh stekagh i _ .
N i n e - e k l a a g m i _ a a n e q i g l l u n i _ esghaghkagh i _ yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ sa gpenateng _ akilpegaghvig mi _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ elpek si llu _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ qepghagh yagh tek _ , _ akileghtugh naagh amsi _ qepghagh llegh gpesistun _ ' _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ qepghagh yagh tke aat _ . _ taagken _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni llu _ , _ t h r e e - k l a a g m i l l u _ tawaten _ pilagh te aqe aq _ .
iiwenllu _ f i v e - e k l a a g n a q a q a a _ , _ akilpegaghvig mun _ pi ke aq _ , _ taawa nguq _ paninang _ yug m _ ila i _ n e k e v g h a t a a g h a q e f t u t _ . _ aaptekagh i _ , _ ' _ sangafsi _ whaante aqe tsi _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ sa gpenasi _ ? _ '
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ ' _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugu nghite kanginkut _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u t a _ . _ ' _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ naqam _ elpek si llu _ qepghagh yagh tek _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ ' _ .
" _ I g h i v g a g h y a g u _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ pi ke aa _ q e p g h a g h t e t _ n a a s q u u t i s t e n g a t _ , _ ' _ Q e p g h a g h t e t _ t u q l u g h t e g h l u k i _ a k i l e g h t u g h t e g h q i _ kinguligh neng _ sivuligh nun _ . _ '
F i v e - e k l a a g m i _ qepghagh yagh tke aat _ tagi laghate te yameng _ akileghtuusagh ngekagh t _ d e n a r i u s - k a g h t a a n _ .
enkaam _ sivuligh t _ q e p g h a g h t e t _ akileghtuusagh nge aghagh naqe ni luteng _ pi kaayagh lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tagi laghate te yalghiimeng _ ellngit llu _ akileghtuusagh ngekagh t _ d e n a r i u s - k a g h t a a n _ .
akileghtuusagh nge yameng _ qivraagh tke aat _ piitesighaghvig m _ yug a _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ kinguligh u luki _ tugukagh ten _ qepghagh ut _ ataasigh ghhagh mun _ aflu mun _ . _ whangkuta _ ughleghiigh ukut _ puqla ghllag mi _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ , _ iwernga _ akileghtugh aten _ whangkutestun _ angka an _ . _ '
iwernga _ yug m _ pi ke aa _ ataasigh _ , _ ' _ nagate aghten _ , _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ puughte nghite amken _ . _ I t a g n a q e g k a q a n _ qepghagh na luten _ ataasigh mun _ d e n a r i u s - m u n _ .
enkaam _ tugu luku _ akileghtuusagh n _ aglagh a _ . _ akileghtugh yug anka _ kinguligh t _ yug t _ tugukagh nka _ akileghtuusagh gpetun _ angka an _ .
piyuke lleg mtun _ mani ka _ atugh yaghqaqe aqa _ . _ aqina ziin _ eight- leg ite u te mneng _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ enkaam _ tamaakut _ kinguligh t _ sivulii aghte yaghqaa ut _ , _ sivuligh t _ kinguligh ughte yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ mayugh te kete luku _ yug lghute neng _ aafte tke ai _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aleghqugh nagh u luki _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ mayugh naqe ukut _ . _ tawani _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n l l u _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ enkaam _ nanqigte luku _ tuqute yaghqaa ni lleqe aat _ .
taagken _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ tuune lleqe aat _ . _ tawani _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aat _ , _ qaquuragh lleqe aat llu _ . _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e s a g h q a a g u q _ . _ "
taagken _ Z e b e d e e - m _ ighnegh gkenka _ naange ak _ tagikagh _ J e s u s - m u n _ ighnegh gni _ kelqellug kek _ . _ manu akun _ segesqughtekagh _ aapte vike na luku _ .
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi iigh ziin _ ? _ " _ aghnagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ akeqe nga _ ataneghpag u llegh gpeni _ ighnegh gka _ aqume ste nakegken _ aag llegh a _ aghenqignegh gpegun _ , _ ila a _ saghumignegh gpegun _ . _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ L i i g i k e n g h i t a g h s i _ sa u ta a _ tungsighkagh i _ . _ M e g h v i k n a y a g h e s t e g n e g u u _ qayuusigh _ meghyaghqagh ka _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ piyaqleg u ukung _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ qaywa _ qayuusigh mneng _ meghe lleqe utek _ , _ iwernga _ whanga u nghite uq _ nakmiigh yaghqagh _ kinku k _ aqume yaghqaa te kek _ aghenqignegh mkun llu _ saghumignegh mkun llu _ . _ ata ma _ yataaghqe kaqe ak _ taake uk _ aqume vigkagh k _ nakmikegkagh minun _ . _ "
taakut _ ila ita _ qula _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ nagaqugh yamegtekek _ sa mate kek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ u g u m i y a g u t k a g k e t _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ tuqlugh luki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisima kasi _ G e n t i l e - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ a t a n g h u t a q i i t _ yug teng _ , _ a a n g w a a g h u g h t e k a t l u _ yug ita _ y u k e g h q u t k a q i i t _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite usi _ . _ naligh i _ igleghte te i ste u yu kuni _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u g h l l i _ elpesi nun _ .
naligh i _ aange lleghpigagh u yu kuni _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h s a g h q a a g u q _ elpesi nun _ ,
katam _ tawaten _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ . _ tagi mangite uq _ q e p g h a a t e s q e l l u n i _ iwernga _ tagi kau uq _ qepghagh te i na luni _ , _ t u u n a l u k u l l u _ unguvallegh ni _ n a v e g h q e l l i s i q n a l u k u _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ yug nun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ J e r i c h o - m e n g _ aghulaqe ma luki _ yug lghute ghllag m _ maligtekagh at _ Jesus _ .
taawa nguq _ tume t _ sani itni _ ayaakagh k _ yug k _ aqume lutek _ . _ nagaqugh yamegnegu _ Jesus _ naghughte ni luku _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ D a v i d - e m _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte kung _ ! _ "
yug lghute m _ ineghtekakek _ , _ nepiigh sqellug kek _ . _ iwernga _ qevuute aghaghllug qu _ wata _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ D a v i d - e m _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte kung _ ! _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ aghuliigh luni _ tuqlugh lukek _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ S a s q e l l u t e k _ pi aqe stek _ whanga mnun _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ iye pung _ esghagh ste aghte ki _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nanglleg yagute lukek _ iye ik _ saaftekagh i _ . _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ esghagh u sag u tke ak _ enkaam _ maligtekagh ak _ .
J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ t u g h a a g h y a l g h i i m e n g _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ kaate tke aat _ B e t h p h a g e - m u n _ M o u n t _ O l i v e s - m e l n g u g h m u n _ . _ tawani _ kayagtekakek _ maalghug _ m a l i g s a a g h t e g n i _ igleghte kestigh sqellug kek _ .
whaten _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ingavek _ ne nun _ aglagh lutek _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ esghagh lleqe aghte tek _ petug nga lghii _ donkey _ nughagh leg _ . _ I t e m l l u k e k _ tagite nakegtek _ whanga mnun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ sa meng _ pi ka nge istek _ , _ whaten _ pi naketek _ , _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ aklukagh ak _ . _ ' _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ tagite ste lleqe ak _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
whaten _ pi kau uq _ apeghiigh na luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ p i l l g h a _ ,
" _ ungipaate yaghtugh ki _ , _ Z i o n - e g h m i i t _ , _ ' _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ umiileg gpesi _ taku aqe aisi _ . _ Q u s e v e g n g a a q _ d o n k e y - k u n _ igleghte aqe uq _ , _ d o n k e y - m _ nughagh akun _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ maligsaagh tek _ igleghte kestagh lutek _ sivu itni _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pikagh k _ .
donkey _ nughaghtuumagh an _ tagi tke ak _ J e s u s - m u n _ . _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ teghig ke sagh k _ qaye itgun _ llikagh it _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ aqumekagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag m _ tume tgun _ aatkagh teng _ s a a g t e k i i t _ , _ enkaam _ ila i _ uqfig m _ avayagh aneng _ ikute aqe luteng _ tume t _ llilaghtugh vikekagh it _ .
Y u l g h u t e g h l a g e t _ J e s u s - e m _ s i v u n g a n i l n g u u t l u _ k i n g u n g a n i l n g u u t l u _ akilghuu tke aat _ , _ " _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ ighnegh a _ D a v i d - e m _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ ! _ usuqe i llegh _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h m u n _ ! _ "
Jesus _ itegh yan _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ qamagte luteng _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ k a g a y g u n n e q e g s a a t k a t _ whaten _ pi magh meng _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g t e s t e n g i t a _ yug lghute ghllag t _ kiimsigh iqe ait _ , _ " _ J e s u s - n g u u q _ , _ uuknaliqe i sta _ , _ nazareth- meng _ G a l i l e e - m e l n g u g h m e n g _ pi u uq _ . _ "
Jesus _ temple- mun _ itegh luni _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ qamagte luki _ tukfightugh lghiit llu _ , _ akikugh lghiit llu _ . _ taagken _ mani meng _ n a v e g h q u g h t e t l u _ t i p e l n g i t _ ullegh qugh qu ai _ , _ aqumutagh it llu _ qawaag meng _ a k i l p e g a g h t e t _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ ' _ mangteghagh ma _ atigh llegh kesaghqagh ke a _ , _ yughaghvig _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ elpek si _ i i g h a g h v i g u g h t a g h s i _ t e g l e g n i i g h t e n u n _ ! _ "
taagken _ ayaakagh t llu _ , _ i g h u l l u g m e l n g u u t l u _ takukagh at _ Jesus _ temple- mun _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ esghapag luki _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h i _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ nagate luki llu _ taghnughhagh t _ temple- mi _ akilghuu lghiit _ whaten _ , _ " _ usuqe i llegh _ ighneghagh nun _ D a v i d - e m _ ! _ " _ elngaatall _ ugumi yuke aat _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ N a g a n n e g h i s i k i i _ taghnughhagh t _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ ? _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ nagate anka _ . _ A t i g h t i i g a s t e g g u u _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i l l g h i t _ , _ ' _ Q a a n g h i t g u n _ taghnughhagh t llu _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh t llu _ yataaghqe kaqe an _ usuqe i llegh _ elpenun _ katam _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ unite luki _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ B e t h a n y - t k a q _ qavagh na luni _ tamaani _ .
Jesus _ unaangu luku _ uteghnigh te kete luku _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ iyataghkagh _ .
tume t _ saaghw itni _ esgha qaa _ f i g s - e m _ uqfig a _ . _ taku luku _ piyaqminigu _ ququngagh raaghinagh u uq _ figs- ngunani _ . _ enkaam _ uqfig _ tawavek _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ piite ste i naanghite uten _ . _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ uqfig _ paligh iqe aq _ .
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ esghapag luku _ , _ saghiigha yug te kete luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ naten _ uqfig _ sukate pigte luni _ paligh a _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ m a l g h u k l i l l n g u n a a n _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kufsi _ , _ whanga mtun _ pi lleqe usi _ , _ esghapag llegh gpesistun _ f i g s - e m _ uqfig a _ . _ T a w a t e n g i n a q _ pi naanghite usi _ talwa _ una _ naayghagh _ kayagtekufsigu _ , _ ' _ iike luten _ e l p e n e n g _ megh mun _ milugh te n _ ' _ , _ legan _ pi lleqe uq _ .
sa meng _ alngunak _ aaptekufsi _ y u g h a k u n _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kufsi _ allgegh te yaghqaa usi _ . _ "
Jesus _ kaate luni _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ temple- mun _ iteghkagh _ . _ apeghtugh i ma luku _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ kitum _ qelegh aten _ tawaten _ p i s q e l l u t e n _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi u ziin _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ aapte naqe amsi _ . _ kiimsigh kufsinga _ whanga llu _ ungipaate lleqe amsi _ kitumun _ qelegh mate ka _ .
kitum _ qelegh agu _ John _ p a a p t a a y e g h i s q e l l u k u _ ? _ kiyaghneghtagh u a _ nalighmeng _ yug meng _ pi u a _ ? _ " _ taagken _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ a k u z i m g h h u t k a t _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi naqe steggu _ ? _ kiimsigh kumteggu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ni luku _ , _ whaten _ pi lleqe ainkut _ , _ ' _ S a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ u g p e q e n g h i s t e g g u _ John _ ? _ '
iwernga _ , _ ' _ yug meng _ pi u ni kumteggu _ ' _ , _ qemall _ yug lghute t _ sa lleqe ainkut _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqekagh at _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luku _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ Jesus _ , _ " _ nallukagh ut _ . _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ ungipaate naanghite amsi _ kitumun _ qelegh lleg nge kau tke a _ tawaten _ pilleg mnun _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ una _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleqe steggu _ ? _ yug nguq _ taawa _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh leg _ . _ sivuligh mun _ pi luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ ighnegh mni _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ qepghagh yagh ghhaaten _ ! _ '
ighnegh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ wiin _ piyug nghite unga _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ aghneghmi _ taakwani _ a v u t e g h q e l l u n i _ qepghagh yaghkagh _ .
taagken _ tuungligh ghhagh anun _ ighnegh mi _ pi luni _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ pi ke aa _ . _ ighnegh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ aa-a _ , _ pi lleqe unga _ ' _ , _ iwernga _ pi ma ite ngughk _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naligh m _ ighnegh an _ qaatke kaqe agu _ ata ni _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ sivuligh m _ . _ " _ enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate amsi _ t a x - m e n g _ q e r n g u g h t e s t e t l u _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ akike i kayug t _ yugusigh meggneng _ sivu gpesini _ i t e g h a a t n g u u t _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ ungipaate yaghtugh kaqe aisi _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ , _ iwernga _ u g p e q u m a n g i t a g h s i _ . _ naqam _ t a x - m e n g _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e t l u _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ akike i kayug t _ yugusigh meggneng _ ugpeqe kaqe aat _ . _ talwa _ kingu aneng _ esghapag kaqe ghngaaghpesiki _ ugpeqe kangat _ John _ , _ paninang _ elpek si _ a v u t e g h q e l l u s i l l u _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i l l g h i t u s i _ , _ u g p e q u m a n g i t a g h s i l l u _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ila a _ ungipaghagh an _ nagate ggu _ . _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ piitesighagh ke aq _ grapes- meng _ nuna mikun _ . _ mingllu luku _ , _ laag te gkakek _ grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ , _ nekeftekagh a llu _ uusqagh lghii _ kelengake i vigkagh _ . _ taagken _ n a v g h i t k a a _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig ni _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e n u n _ aflengake sqellug qu _ . _ taagken _ ellnga _ ila anun _ nuna m _ aglaghkagh _ .
saghna yaghqaaghte yata _ g r a p e s - e t _ , _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ kayagtekagh i _ nengigh ni _ a q f a s q e l l u k i _ .
iwernga _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e t _ akuqagh luki _ q e p g h a g h t e t _ , _ ataasigh _ a n a g u l e g h t a a k a a t _ , _ ila a _ tuqu tke aat _ , _ pi nga yu aat _ m i l u g h p a g a a t a g h h i i n a q _ tuqu tke aat _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e m i _ ila i _ kayagte laataghkagh i _ , _ sivuligh neng _ uglagh aghagh luki _ , _ ellngit llu _ tawatengwaaq _ pilagh te aqe ait _ .
qenwat _ ighnegh ni _ kayagtekagh a _ ellngit nun _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ sii vag kete lleqe aat _ ighnegh ka _ . _ '
iwernga _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e t _ esghagh luku _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ ighnegh a _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ ' _ U u m _ ighnegh an _ pi liite lleqe a _ una _ nuna _ ata ni _ tuqu kan _ . _ tuqute kumteggu _ whangkuta _ p i l i i l l e q a g h p u t _ una _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig _ . _ '
E n k a a n g a m _ akuqagh luku _ , _ piitesighaghvig meng _ miluute luku _ tuqu tke aat _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ tagi kuni _ sa lleqe aki _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e t _ ? _ "
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ siivanllegh t llu _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ tuqu lleqe ai _ taakut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ . _ taagken _ n a v g h i l l e q a a _ piitesighaghvig ni _ alla nun _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e n u n _ . _ saghna lleghqagh _ kaate kan _ nengigh u lleqe aat _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t i g h t i i g a s t e k i i _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ p i l l g h i t _ ? _ ' _ uyghag _ taana _ m a n g t e g h a n g l l a g h t e t _ ighsakekagh at _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh ughtekau uq _ uyghag _ . _ taana _ A t a n g h e m _ p i l q a a _ , _ urang _ pinigh lleghpigagh u uq _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ! _ '
" _ E n k a a n g a m _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi neng _ awite yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ yug nun _ piite ste i yaghqagh nun _ f r u i t - n g a n e n g _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ "
" _ kina _ alngunak _ taaggun _ uyghag kun _ iqu kuni _ , _ pelime yaghqaa uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ t a a m _ uyghag m _ ifkagh vike gkunigu _ s i f t a a g h q e l l e q a a _ . _ "
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ nagate luki _ J e s u s - e m _ ungipaghagh ta i _ liigikekagh t _ J e s u s - e m n g u q _ ellngit _ akuzite kaqe ai _ .
enkaam _ tugu yu kaqsagh kangat _ , _ iwernga _ alingekagh t _ yug lghute ghllag neng _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ Jesus _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luku _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtugh laataghkagh i _ taakut _ yug t _ ungipaghaate tgun _ . _ pi ke aq _ ,
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ whatete uq _ , _ umiileg m _ ighnegh ni _ nengughte naqe lghii _ yataaghqe tke a _ neqenghaghqe te na luku _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e n i _ kayagtekagh i _ u n g i p a a s a g h t i i s q e l l u k i _ tagsiqligh iqe aat _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ t a g i l a g h a a t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ iwernga _ t a g i y u n g h i t k a t _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ pi ke ai _ ila i _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ , _ ' _ ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ tagsiqligh iqe anka _ neqenghaghqe lleg mnun _ , _ n e g h y a g h q a n Ê¼ n g u q _ apeghiigh ut _ . _ T u q u t i i g h t e s i m a a n k a _ yugtaanegh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ q u w i n t a l g h i i n e n g l l u _ n u g h a g h n e n g _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ apeghiigh uq _ . _ T a g i l i n Ê¼ n g u q _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ ! _ '
iwernga _ aqelqaghqagh t _ tagsiqligh iqe ait _ w a a k u m a n g i l n g u u t _ . _ yeghlegi _ navek _ sa yaghtugh tke aat _ , _ ataasigh _ piitesighaghvig minun _ pi ke aq _ , _ ila a _ estugagh minun _ ,
umiileg m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ ila ita _ akuqagh luki _ sakusiiqe luki _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ .
umiileg _ sakrite ghllagkagh _ enkaam _ p i l l u w a g h t e n i _ kayagtekagh i _ . _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ yugtaghkagh t _ , _ k u m a g h t e k a a t l u _ nenge aat _ .
taagken _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ nengughte naqe m _ neqenghaghqe sighqagh i _ apeghiigh ut _ . _ aqelqagh ngllagh kaqsagh kenka _ seghletun _ pi kau te meggneng _ tagipagningite ut _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ aane lusi _ tume nun _ nallagh kasi _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ neqenghaghqesaghtigh sqe teki _ . _ '
Q e p g h a g h t e t _ aane luteng _ tume ni _ qamagte luki _ nallaqagh teng _ seghleghu yagh nga a ta _ , _ pinigh yagh nga a ta _ negh yaghtigh sqekagh it _ , _ enkaam _ nengughte te vig _ esleqeaghaghtekagh _ .
" _ umiileg m _ e s g h a g h y a g h t u g h y a q m i n i k i _ aqelqagh t _ , _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ aate ma ite ngughk _ nengughte naqe lghii m _ aatkagh aneng _ .
enkaam _ aaptekagh a _ , _ ' _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ naten _ itegh ziin _ nengughte naqe lghii m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate gpenang _ ? _ ' _ yug m _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke a _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ q e p g h a g h t e t _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ iigge i llu _ , _ itegagh i llu _ asighte luki _ qagavek _ mamleg mun _ miluute ggu _ , _ tawani _ yug t _ qiya lleqe ut _ ggute teng llu _ terqitaagtagh lleqe ait _ . _ ' _ "
J e s u s - e m _ taaqe nigh ke ai _ akuzillegh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ uglagh pestaagh _ tagsiqligh kau ghngaan _ , _ iwernga _ palaghhagh u ut _ nakmikegkagh t _ . _ "
taagken _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ unite luku _ Jesus _ agghi tke aat _ naten _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i g h n a l u k u _ Jesus _ akuzillegh akun _ .
enkaam _ kayagtekagh it _ ila i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t e n g _ , _ ila i llu _ H e r o d i a n - e t _ J e s u s - m u n _ . _ whaten _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ liisimake amken _ akuzi aqe uten _ ipa u luku _ . _ apeghtuusagh n llu _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh a _ ipa u uq _ . _ aangwaagh u yagh nga a ta _ , _ u k a v a n s a g h n g a a t a _ paninang _ apeghtugh aqe aten _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate aghte kut _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpeneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ani _ elqughutngagh a _ llivike i lleghqagh ut _ t a x - e m e n g _ C a e s a r - m u n _ ? _ L l i v i k i l t a a - a _ nalighmeng _ pi nghite lta _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ liisimakekagh i _ seghletun _ piyug u kangat _ , _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piniiyugnegh ni _ elpek si _ ! _ sangama _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i g h n a q u t k e s t e n g n g a _ ?
keleg u vike tengnga _ mani meng _ t a x - m u n _ llivike i sighqagh meng _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tagi tke aat _ mani meng _ .
taagken _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ gginagh ke agu _ una _ ? _ kitum _ ategh kagu _ una _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ C a e s a r - e m _ . _ " _ E n k a a n g a m _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tuune teki _ C a e s a r - m u n _ tamaakut _ C a e s a r - e m _ pi i _ , _ tuune teki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi i _ . _ "
nagate yamegteggu _ saghiigha yuke aat _ taagken _ unite luku _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
tawani _ aghneghmi _ S a d d u c e e s - e t _ aapte yaghtugh qu aat _ Jesus _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh t _ tuqukagh t _ u n g u v a g h t e k a y u g u t a n g i _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh i _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ yuug _ nulightugh luni _ tuqu kan _ avaquti gpenani _ , _ a n g l e g u t a n g a n _ tugu yaghqaqe a _ ugi igh aq _ avaquti tete na luku _ anglegute ni _ tuqukagh _ . _ '
M a a n s a g h t u t _ maaghraghvinleg _ yug t _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ . _ nuyekligh _ nulightugh luni _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ enkaam _ nulighh a _ a n g l e g u t a n g a n _ tugukagh a _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a llu _ a n g l e g u t a n g a _ tuqu uq _ avaquti gpenani _ . _ enkaam _ pi nga yu an _ a n g l e g u t a n g a n _ tugu a _ taana _ aghnagh _ . _ qamagte luteng _ tugu aqe luku _ tuqu laghate te ut _ avaquti gpenateng _ .
kinguligh u luni _ aghnagh _ tuqu kau uq _ .
ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ unguvagh uute llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kitum _ aghnagh _ n u l i g h q e l l e q a g u _ , _ qamagte luteng qun _ tugu kaqe kangat _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ anaggute nga usi _ qayughllak _ liigike igate asi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ talwa _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute kumeng _ nengughte te yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ yaquleg stun _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h e s t u n _ .
A t i g h t i i g a s t e g g u u _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ elpesi nun _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute lleghqagh itneng _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ ,
' _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ A b r a h a m - e m _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ I s a a c - e m _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga llu _ J a c o b - e m _ . _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ nakaan _ tuqukagh t _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nagate luku _ , _ saghiigha yagute ghllagkagh at _ .
P h a r i s e e s - e t _ nagaqugh yamegteki _ S a d d u c e e s - e t _ J e s u s - m u n _ n e p i i g h q w a a n i l u k i _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
ataasigh m _ P h a r i s e e s - e m _ apeghtughiste an _ liilightuusagh t _ aapte qugh aa qaa _ Jesus _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i g h n a l u k u _ .
whaten _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ n a t u n g a a w a _ angegh lleghpigagh _ liilightuusagh ni _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ' _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ piniqe yaghqaqe an _ qamagte luku _ ilu gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku _ unguva sigh gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku _ umyugagh gpegun _ . _ '
taana _ angegh lleghpigagh u uq llu _ , _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq llu _ liilightuusagh _ .
