tuungligh ghhagh a _ angegh lleghpigagh _ liilightuusagh _ sivuligh tun _ ayuqe uq _ : _ ' _ piniqe yaghqaqe aten _ yug lgute ten _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ e l p e n e n g _ katam _ . _ '
taake uk _ liilightuusagh k _ tunemagh u uk _ t a m a g h h i t n u n _ liilightuusagh nun llu _ , _ apeghtuusagh itnun llu _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ qerngughte te nga ma luki _ ,
" _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe steggu _ C h r i s t - a _ ? _ kitum _ ighnegh ke agu _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke a _ D a v i d - e m _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ S a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ D a v i d - e m _ akuzi aqngami _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ atigh agu _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ ,
' _ A t a n g h e m _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ , _ aqume i _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ lli aghte lleg mnun _ . _ '
D a v i d - e m _ atigh ma kagu _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ naten _ ighnegh ke agu _ ? _ "
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke aat _ Jesus _ . _ taagken _ kenle ke luku _ kitum _ alngunak _ tetug yagutekagh at _ aapte nghmeng _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ yug lghute t llu _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i l l u _ ,
" _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ aqumga ut _ M o s e s - e m _ aqumutagh akun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke aqe teki _ qamagte luki _ apeghtuusagh it _ elpesi nun _ , _ iwernga _ ellngit a _ s a l l g h i t _ maligte gpenaki _ . _ sa sqe aqe aisi _ naqam _ ellngit a _ pi igate ait _ .
apeghtugh i llegh it _ liilightuusagh neng _ piyaqnagh pigte ut _ yug nun _ qaatkesaghqagh u luteng _ . _ apeghtuusagh it _ uqigtuqagh stun _ akmag stun _ ayuqe ut _ akmag ste aqe kangit _ yug nun _ , _ naqamllu _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ ighneghwaagh eng _ atuqe igate aat _ kayusiite na luki _ akmagite neng _ .
" _ qamagte luki _ pinitun _ pilleg teng _ pi aqe ait _ e s g h a g h s a q n a l u k i _ yug nun _ . _ talligh megteggun llu _ qagugh megteggun llu _ qillghutagh ke ait _ p a t e g h t a a g h a l l u k i _ s a l n g a w a a g h h a a t _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ imaleg t _ , _ qaasligh meng llu _ qughalkutagh it _ taake luki _ ulima aqe ait _ .
N e q e n g h a g h q e m m i _ , _ aqume yuneghtu ut _ a a n g w a a g h u g h t e k a t _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ s y n a g o g u e - n i l l u _ t a w a t e l n g u g h t e g g u n _ aqume yuneghtu ut _ .
Q u u l v a g h t e s u g a q u t _ akilpegaghvig ni _ , _ atigh sqe sug aqe ut llu _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste meng _ ' _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ atigh ste gpenasi _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste meng _ ' _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ apeghtughiste i _ , _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ ayuqe usi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ atigh gpenaan _ , _ ' _ ata meng _ ' _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ .
talwa _ kitumun _ alngunak _ atigh ste gpenasi _ , _ ' _ I g l e g h u t i s t e m e n g _ ' _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ i g l e g h u t i s t e z i _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ .
taana _ angegh lleghpigagh _ q e p g h a g h t e k a g h q a q a g h s i _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ angli stekuni _ qusevegtesaghqagh u uq _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ qusevegtekuni _ angli ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ .
" _ iwernga _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n i l l u _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ umeg te aqe asi _ itegh naqe lghiit _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ elpek si _ katam _ itegh igate usi _ , _ aghula i ughtagh kasi llu _ itegh yug lghiit _ !
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n i l l u _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ esghaghlaataqu luki _ ugingighagh t _ mangteghiigh aqe asi _ . _ taagken _ pinigh ni lusi _ p i s q e l l u s i _ taake luku _ yughagh aqe usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghyuugh lleg nge ghllag yaghqaa usi _ !
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n i l l u _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ iglegha aqe usi _ kellii kun llu _ , _ qute kun llu _ ivagh na luku _ ataasigh _ yuug _ u g p e g h h n n a l u k u _ elpesi stun _ . _ taagken _ apeghtuusagh si _ ugpeqe gkaki _ apeghtuusagh gpesi _ a g l a g h t e s a g h q a a g h l l e q a a _ hell- mun _ , _ enkaam _ elpek si _ aghyuugh llegh gpesineng _ m a l g h u g h q e n g n g a a n _ aghyuugh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ !
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ elpek si _ , _ ayaakagh ni _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n i _ ! _ apeghtugh i aqe usi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ temple- kun _ " _ taana _ p i t n g u n g h i t u q _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ g o l d - n g a k u n _ T e m p l e - e m _ " _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh ke a _ akequsagh ni _ ' _ .
elpek si _ ayaakagh ni _ t e m n g i t w h a s t e n i _ ! _ N a l i k e k _ megnu nagh aghagh ak _ , _ g o l d - a _ , _ nalighmeng _ temple- a _ agleghnagh ste i lghii _ g o l d - m e n g _ ?
apeghtugh i aqe usi llu _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ a g h q e f i g e g n e k u n _ " _ , _ taana _ p i t n g u n g h i t u q _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ tunusagh kun _ aghqefig gnite ngugh qun _ , _ " _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh ke a _ akequsagh ni _ . _ '
A y a a n g a g h h a a l e k _ elpek si _ ! _ N a l i k e k _ megnu nagh aghagh ak _ , _ tunusagh _ nalighmeng _ aghqefig k _ agleghnagh ste i lghiik _ tunute yameng _ ?
E n k a a n g a m _ kina _ akeqe i kuni _ a g h q e f i g e g n e k u n _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ taaggun llu _ sa kun llu _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ aghqefig gnite ngugh qun _ .
kina llu _ akeqe i kuni _ temple- kun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ taaggun llu _ kiyaghte lghii kun llu _ tawani _ .
kina llu _ akeqe i kuni _ qilag kun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aqumutagh gkenkun llu _ aqumga lghii kun llu _ tawani _ .
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n i l l u _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuune aqe asi _ q u l a g h q e l l g h i _ neqe mun _ neqnighsaate t _ , _ m i n t - e t _ , _ d i l l - e t _ , _ c u m m i n - e t _ . _ iwernga _ avelghagh aqe asi _ apeghtuusagh t _ megnu nagh aghagh lghiit _ L i i l i g h t u u s a n i l n g u u t _ katam _ : _ tanem ii llghite llegh _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh _ , _ ataasiighmete llegh _ . _ taakut _ atughqagh ke yagh asi _ avelghagh fqiita _ ila i llu _ liilightuusagh t _ .
ayaakagh ni _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n i _ ! _ yug tun _ ayuqe usi _ nguuyngaaghagh _ meghyaghqagh mineng _ iqite luku _ taagken _ c a m e l - a _ tuufte lleqe a _ !
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n i l l u _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ qayuusigh si llu _ sagnegh si llu _ qaye i _ sangigte aqe asi _ , _ naqam _ imigh nga ut _ wayagh niighkagh gpesineng llu _ , _ pakigniigh llegh gpesineng llu _ .
ayaa nga lghii _ P h a r i s e e _ ! _ sivuke lukek _ sangigte kek _ ilu ik _ qayuusigh m llu _ sagnegh m llu _ enkaam _ qaaske te lutek llu _ ukmangite te lik _ !
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n i l l u _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ tuqukagh t _ s a l n g a g i s t u n _ ayuqe usi _ piineqekagh t _ qatelghii meng _ . _ esghaqagh u luteng _ qaye i _ pinighhalek _ , _ iwernga _ qama _ imaqe ut _ neghqughrug meng llu _ aghu llegh meng llu _ .
elpek si llu _ tawatete usi _ . _ qaye gpesineng _ pi nighte yug ni ghllaget _ , _ iwernga _ ilu gpesini _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ , _ apeghtugh te gkasi _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe igate asi _ . _ "
" _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e n i l l u _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ mangteghasqwaagh ngllagh aqe asi _ llivegh itgun _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ , _ pinighnaghsagh aqe asi llu _ llivegh it _ tamaakut _ kiyaghtekagh t _ elqughute luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
taagken _ whaten llu _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghtekaayagh kumta _ sivunegh mnni _ , _ t u q u q u l g u s i g h n a y a n g h i t n g w a a g h a p u t _ u u k n a l i q i s t e n e n g _ ' _ .
tawaten _ akuzillegh gpesigun _ liigike ste usi _ , _ k i n g u n q e n n i l u s i _ t u q u q u g h t e n g i t n u n _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ .
enkaam _ sa aqe tsi _ sivunegh gpesi _ piinlegh iqe aat _ apeghiigh teggu _ .
nemeghyagh ni _ elpek si _ , _ avaqutagh itni _ nemeghyagh t _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa ni lusi _ , _ naten _ anag naqe steggu _ aghyuugh lleghqagh i _ hell- mi _ ?
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ kayagte vike amsi _ u u k n a l i q i s t e n e n g l l u _ , _ liisima lghii neng llu _ , _ apeghtughiste neng llu _ . _ ila it _ tuqu qugh lleqe asi _ , _ ila it _ qaquuragh lleqe asi _ , _ enkaam _ ila it _ s y n a g o g u e - e g p e s i n i _ kagsagmig lleqe asi _ , _ ila it _ t o w n - e n e n g _ ila itnun _ malighqugh lleqe asi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe aisi _ tuqu qu llegh itnun _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghtekagh t _ elqughute luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ A b e l - m e n g _ Z e c h a r i a h - m u n _ , _ ighnegh a _ B a r a c h i a h - m _ . _ tuqutekagh i _ akule gkeni _ T e m p l e - e m l l u _ aghqefig m llu _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ elpek si _ unguva lghii ni _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe aisi _ t a m a a k u n u n _ seghletun _ pi llegh nun _ !
" _ kaay _ , _ Jerusalem _ , _ Jerusalem _ ! _ tuqu qu qagh katen _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ , _ milugh agaatagh luki llu _ tuqu qugh katen _ kayagtekagh nka _ elpenun _ . _ uglagh u pigte luku _ qerngughte yug aqe yagh anka _ yug ten _ whanga mnun _ , _ katam _ qawaag m _ qerngughte llegh atun _ amaaghagh ghhagh ni _ yaqugh gmi _ asi anun _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ p i s t e s u g u m a n g i t a g h p e n g a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ mangteghagh n _ paaghqite te lleqe a _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ e s g h a g h n a a n g h i t a g h p e s i n g a _ alla _ kenlanga _ whaten _ pi llegh gpesinun _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus _ aane luni _ temple- meng _ aghulaqe ma luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ keleg tke ait _ mangteghagh t _ T e m p l e - e m _ pi i _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ esghagh asi _ tamaakut _ mangteghagh t _ . _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ n e m i n i n n a a n g h i t u q _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ullegh qugh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus _ aqume yan _ M o u n t _ O l i v e s - k u n _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a m a a g h l u t e n g _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ , _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqau aat _ ? _ sa u lleqe a _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ tagi lleghqagh gpenun _ , _ nuna m llu _ iqugte lleghqagh anun _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ .
qayughllak _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ka _ , _ whaten _ pi aqe luteng _ , _ ' _ whanga _ C h r i s t - a n g u u n g a _ ' _ , _ puughte qughtagh u yaghqaqe aat llu _ yug lghute _ .
nagaqugh u lleqe usi _ p i l l u w a n e n g _ , _ akusqaghtagh u tke llegh itneng llu _ p i l l u w a t _ ; _ alinge gpenasi _ qayughllak _ tamaa na _ pi yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ salin _ iqugte naqngu nghite uq _ .
nuna t _ yug it _ pillug utu lleqe ut _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh t llu _ pillug utu lleqe ut _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ neqangisag ghllag lleqe uq _ , _ nuna t _ uvelegtagh ghllag lleqe ut _ .
qamagte luni _ tamaa na _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu kestagh llegh atun _ ayuqe lleqe uq _ .
" _ taagken _ tamaa na _ pi ma luku _ yug t _ tugu lleqe aisi _ , _ amyuqetagh tke lleqe aisi _ , _ tuqu lleqe aisi llu _ . _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ tamaghhagh an _ ramke an _ ugumiite lleqe aisi _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghii m _ ugpeqe nanigh lleqe aatnga _ , _ uveghpag utu sag u lleqe ut _ , _ ugumiite yagute lleqe ut llu _ .
taagken _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a l g h u t e t _ tagi luteng _ puughte qugh lleqe ait _ yug lghute t _ .
seghlegh _ n u l a m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ apallugh ke luku _ allute luteng _ yug t _ piniqe i nanigh lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nuqete neghtuqagh _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ .
ukut llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa ut _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ramke itnun _ n a g a q i i s q e l l u k i _ . _ taagken _ nuna _ iqugte lleqe uq _ . _ "
" _ yeqay _ a t i g h t u g h t e m _ liigike ligu _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ D a n i e l - e m _ uuknaliqe tkekagh a _ . _ uuknaliqe tkekagh a _ taana _ agleghnagh ite ngugh u uq _ paaghqite te ste i lghii _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ ne mi _ . _ esghagh kufsigu _ tesqamani _ nekeve lghii _ ,
J u d e a - m e l n g u u t _ anagniigh ghhaat _ naayghagh nun _ .
yuug _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anite ngughk _ ukig luni _ saghyaqu te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
yuug _ piitesigh u aghagh vig mete ngughk _ qaasligh ghqu te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u t _ qumig leg t _ aghnagh t _ , _ mamaghtagh leg t llu _ !
yughaghte k _ anagniigh fqaafsi _ uksugh mi _ p i s q e l l u s i _ nalighmeng _ S a b b a t h - m i _ ,
qayughllak _ tamaani _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag ughte yaghqaa uq _ . _ S e g h l e g h a t a g h a a y a g h q a a g u q _ seghleliigh aqe llegh neng _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ . _ allameng llu _ t a w a t e l n g u q _ pi naanghite u aghte uq _ .
tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ p a l a l l i m a n g i s a q a k i _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ unguva nayagh nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ apallugh ke luki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ aghnegh t _ p a l a l l i y a g h q a q i i _ .
" _ tamaani _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ C h r i s t - a _ whaa _ ' _ , _ nalighmeng _ , _ ' _ T a z i n g a n t u q _ ! _ ' _ ugpeqe gpenaan _ ,
qayughllak _ C h r i s t - a s i g h w a a g h e t l u _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t l u _ tagi lleqe ut _ . _ A l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g l l e q u t _ , _ s a g h i i g h a n a g h q e g h l l a g l l e q u t l u _ puughhe na luki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ p u u g h s a q l e g u k u m e g t e k i _ .
taawa _ ungipaate amsi _ s i v u t g h u l l u k u _ pi lleghqagh _ .
" _ E n k a a n g a m _ whaten _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ C h r i s t - a _ paaghqagh igh llegh anite uq _ ! _ ' _ taku gpenaan _ ; _ nalighmeng _ whaten _ pika ta _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ mangteghagh m _ ilu anite uq _ ' _ , _ ugpeqe gpenaki _ .
qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kuni _ tawatete yaghqaa uq _ nighugte pagte te te llegh tun _ kuukgute lleqe uq _ a s i v a g h m e n g _ pakfalla mun _ .
" _ qawaagpag t _ qerngughte aqe ut _ nani _ alngunak _ k e m e g q w a a l g u n g h a n i _ .
" _ ' _ kingu ngiighhagh itneng _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ siqinegh _ mamleg ste lleqe a _ , _ tanqigh _ nighugte te nanigh ste lleqe a _ , _ ighaleqetaagh t _ ifkagh qu uute ste lleqe ai _ qilaga meng _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e t _ q i l a g a m e l n g u u t _ iglegha llegh it _ allangughte uute ste lleqe ai _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ qilaga kun _ sa u a _ allgegh lleqe uq _ liisimake sighqagh _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ . _ taagken _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ nuna m _ ramke i _ q i v g h u m _ qiya aghte te te ghllagte lleqe ut _ . _ esghagh lleqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ q i l a g w a a g h t e g g u n _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h t u u m a g h m i l l u _ n i g h u g h q e l l e l i g h l l a g l u n i l l u _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ qalghightu an _ qalghigh ste ghllag kunigu _ kayagte lleqe ai _ yaquleg ni _ navek _ alngunak _ q e r n g u g h t e s q e l l u k i _ nakmikegkagh ni _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ liite vike teggu _ uqfig a _ f i g s - e m _ . _ esghagh kufsiki _ avayagh i _ unite te lugh u i aghagh lghiit _ , _ ququngagh i _ piite kestagh lghiit _ , _ liisimakagh i _ kiig yaghtugh ngestagh aa _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ apeghkagh nka _ tamaakut _ esghagh kufsiki _ , _ l i i s i m a k e l l e q a g h s i _ ellnga _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh ma uq _ , _ aaqun _ amig mun _ lliigh ma uq _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maaten _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu laghate te ste gpenaki _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ .
qilag a llu _ , _ nuna llu _ aviighute yaghqaa uk _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ akuzite nka _ aviighute naanghite ut _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ t a a m _ aghnegh m _ aflu a _ qakun _ kaate yaghqaa ta a _ . _ talwa _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t _ yaquleg t _ nalluke aat _ , _ ighnegh m llu _ nalluke a _ , _ ata inagh ghhagh m _ liisimake a _ .
katam _ tamaani _ N o a h - m _ kiyaghte llegh ani _ , _ yug t _ tawatete yaghqaa ut _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh ani _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ , _ sivungagh ni _ u l e v e m _ yug t _ negh aqe luteng _ , _ megh aqe luteng _ , _ nengughte te aqe luteng _ ayuqekagh t _ kenlanga _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ N o a h - n k u t _ itegh llegh itnun _ ark- mun _ .
nallukekagh at _ natete yaghqaa ta a _ kenlanga _ uleve llegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kan _ , _ nalluke lleqe aat _ natete yaghqaa ta a _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ maalghug _ yug k _ piitesigh u aghagh vig megteni _ qepghagh te k _ , _ aag llegh a _ tugu lleqe a _ , _ ila a _ unegte lleqe a _ .
aghnagh k _ kagimte i lghiik _ g r a i n - m e n g _ , _ aag llegh a _ tugu lleqe a _ , _ ila a _ unegte lleqe a _ .
" _ E n k a a n g a m _ kelenga lusi _ , _ qayughllak _ n a l l u k n g w a a g h a g h s i _ nani _ aghneghmi _ atanegh gpesi _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
N a l l u n e q n i i t u q _ , _ mangteghagh m _ yug an _ liisimake yagh kunigu _ t e g l e g n i i g h t e m _ tagi lleghqagh a _ , _ qavagh gpenani _ kelenga nayagh uq _ naafqe te luni _ itegh na yu kan _ mangteghagh minun _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ elpek si llu _ apeghiighsagh lusi _ quunpeng _ , _ qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ waakenghillghaghte lusi _ .
" _ kinangaawa _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u q _ peghqinegh lghii _ qepghagh a _ ? _ T a a n a n g u u q _ umiileg an _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh a _ q e p g h a g h t e l g u t a n g a n u n _ , _ n e q e l i t a a t i i s q e l l u k i l l u _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
taana _ qepghagh a _ quya ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ umiileg an _ kaate luni _ esghagh kunigu _ qelegh llegh mitun _ pi lghii _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ taana _ qepghagh a _ umiileg an _ aflengake i ste ngllagh yaghqaqe a _ sa minun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
iwernga _ taana _ qepghagh a _ seghleghu kuni _ sumeghtaghagh lleqe uq _ whaten _ , _ ' _ umiileg ka _ tagi lghaghtugh naanghite uq _ ' _ ,
enkaam _ amyuutke sag u lleqe ai _ q e p g h a g h t e l g u t n i _ . _ ila lleqe uq llu _ suume lghii nun _ , _ neghe lgusigh aqe luki _ , _ meghe lgusigh aqe luki _ lliigh lleqe uq _ .
taagken _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ umiileg a _ kaate lleqe uq _ qepghagh a _ yataaghqe llghite luku llu _ , _ sighimake llghite luku llu _ .
enkaam _ umiileg an _ qevuute luku _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ , _ aglagh ste lleqe a _ piniiyugnegh nun _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ maligte te luku _ . _ tawani _ qiyiqe lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ .
" _ tawani _ pi llegh mi _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ uspute yaghqaa uq _ q u l a g h y a g n u n _ aghnaghagh nun _ k e l q e l l u k i _ kenelghutag teng _ paayghi lghiit _ nulightugh naqe lghii meng _ .
tallimat _ n a l l u u q a t _ tallimat _ peghqinegh lghiit _ .
N a l l u u q a t _ kelqekagh it _ kenelghutag teng _ uqughqagh ngunaki _ ,
iwernga _ peghqinegh lghiit _ kelqekagh it _ kenelghutag teng _ uqughqagh ligh luki _ .
nulightugh naqe lghii _ muluughkagh _ , _ qenwat _ aghnaghagh t _ qavaghnikagh t _ enkaam _ q a v a t g h u t k a t _ .
" _ U n u g e m _ qukaa ni _ kina _ akilghuukagh _ whaten _ , _ ' _ uka _ tagi aqe uq _ nulightugh yaghqagh _ ! _ aane lusi _ payegh teggu _ ! _ '
aghnaghagh t _ taghtugh aghtagh te luteng _ kenelghutag teng _ k e n g h i t _ nallghusaghkagh it _ .
taagken _ n a l l u u q a t _ pikagh t _ peghqinegh lghii nun _ , _ ' _ U q u g h q a l i t a g h t i k u t _ , _ kenelghutag put _ qaame naqe ut _ . _ '
peghqinellegh ita _ pi ke ait _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ tea- ma ghhagh mnnun _ uqughqagh pagite ukut _ , _ a k i l p e g a g h t e n u n _ tukfigh i yaghtugh tek _ . _ '
enkaam _ n a l l u u q a t _ uqughqagh nge yaghtugh tke aat _ . _ aviite ma luki _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ kaate tke aq _ . _ taakut _ y a t a a g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ iteg lgu sigh ke aat _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ , _ enkaam _ amigh k _ umeg ke aat _ .
" _ kingu aneng _ n a l l u u q a t _ aghnaghagh t _ kaate luteng _ , _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ qelpegh te aghte kut _ ! _ '
iwernga _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nalluke amsi _ kinku u tsi _ . _ ' _ "
J e s u s - e m _ ungipaghaate ni _ taaqe nigh ke a _ whaten _ , _ " _ E n k a a n g a m _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ n a t u n g u t a n g a _ aghneq _ nalighmeng _ n a t u n g u t a n g a _ aflu _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ uspute yaghqaa uq _ whavek _ ungipaghaate mun _ : _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ iglegha naqe lghii _ navek _ uyavagh nun _ . _ tuqlugh qu ai _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ aviillegh mini _ aflengake i ste u luki _ saghya minun _ .
ataasigh mun _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ mani t _ tuunekagh i _ , _ ila anun _ 2 , 0 0 0 _ , _ kinguligh mun _ 1 , 0 0 0 _ . _ tamaghhagh ita _ tunqugh qu ai _ p i l l e g t u l n g i s t u n _ . _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
yuug _ taana _ 5 , 0 0 0 - n e n g e g k a q _ , _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ aghulaqe luni _ akike yaghqagh meng _ tukfightuqagh _ . _ enkaam _ alla _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ a l l g e g h t e k a a _ .
taana llu _ 2 , 0 0 0 - n e n g e g k a q _ , _ allgegh tke aq _ alla _ 2 , 0 0 0 - m e n g _ .
iwernga _ taana _ 1 , 0 0 0 - n e n g e g k a q _ aane luni _ laag te luki _ iiw iqe ai _ umiileg mi _ mani i _ .
" _ muluugh ghllag luni _ q e p g h a g h t e t _ umiileg at _ uteghnigh yami _ ungipaghsugh qu ai _ samatagh nge i _ mani ni _ .
5 , 0 0 0 - n e n g e g k a m _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ tagivagh kaqe aten _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ mani t _ . _ taawa _ alla _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ a l l g e g h s i m a a q a a _ . _ '
umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ itagnagh pigte uten _ , _ pinigh uten _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u q _ qepghagh a _ ! _ ataasiighmete kau te gpeneng _ p a l a g h h a g h n u n _ aflengake i ste ngughte ste naqe amken _ uglagh lghii nun _ . _ itegh i _ quya lgusigh yaghtugh nga _ ! _ '
taagken _ 2 , 0 0 0 - n e n g e g k a m _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ tagivagh kaqe aten _ 2 , 0 0 0 _ mani t _ . _ taawa _ alla _ 2 , 0 0 0 _ a l l g e g h s i m a a q a _ . _ '
umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ itagnagh pigte uten _ , _ pinigh uten _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u q _ qepghagh a _ ! _ ataasiighmete kau te gpeneng _ p a l a g h h a g h n u n _ aflengake i ste ngughte ste naqe amken _ uglagh lghii nun _ . _ itegh i _ quya lgusigh yaghtugh nga _ ! _ '
taagken _ 1 , 0 0 0 - n e n g e g k a m _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ liisimake amken _ elpek _ aaghte yaghqaa nghite uten _ . _ unatagh aqe uten _ piitesighagh kaqe nghite ke gpeneng _ . _ qerngughte aqe aten _ piite tke aat _ piitute it _ ifkagh qugh kaqe nghite ke teng _ .
enkaam _ alinge lunga _ laag te luki _ mani ten _ iigh kaqe anka _ . _ ang _ , _ taawa _ elpek _ pin _ . _ '
iwernga _ umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ seghlegh _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii _ qepghagh a _ ! _ elpek _ p i i g h p e n g a _ unatagh aqe ni lunga _ piitesighagh kaqe nghite ke mneng _ , _ qerngughte i aqe ni lunga llu _ piitekagh neng _ piitute it _ ifkagh qugh kaqe nghite ke mneng _ .
S a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ mani ka _ kanaghte nanigh zigu _ b a n k - a m u n _ ? _ tawaten _ pi kaqsagh kuvgu _ , _ uteghnigh lleg mni _ veghte nayagh aqa _ a l l g e g h n e l i g h l u k u _ . _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ tugu luku _ 1 , 0 0 0 _ mani a _ , _ tuune teggu _ tea- mete te _ 1 0 , 0 0 0 - n e l e g m u n _ .
tamaakut _ pi lget _ tuune aghagh yaghqaa ut _ enkaam _ siipte i uute lleqe ut _ . _ iwernga _ taana _ ava ite ngughk _ pi llgagh u yagh ghngaan _ iqite yaghqaqe ait _ ellnga neng _ . _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ aane steggu _ taana _ sea-te u nghite ngughk _ qepghagh a _ qagavek _ mamleg ghllag mun _ . _ T a w a a n i _ yug t _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng llu _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ . _ '
" _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kuni _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m i k u n _ , _ yaqulegtugh ma ghllag mi _ , _ taagken _ aqume lleqe uq _ n i g h u g h q e n g n g a l g h i i g n e k u n _ aqumutagh gmikun _ .
sivungagh kun _ qerngughte te ste lleqe ait _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ nuna m _ yug i _ . _ taagken _ avugh lleqe ai _ , _ katam _ p e n n i i g h n i i g h t e m _ avugh llegh atun _ penniigh t _ g o a t - n e n g _ .
penniigh t _ a g h e n q i g n e g h m i n i t e s l e q i i _ , _ g o a t - e t _ saghumignegh mini _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ a g h e n q i g n e g h m i n i l n g u u t _ pi lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ tagi tek _ , _ ata ma _ quya stekagh itni _ , _ pi liite ggu _ ataneghpag u llegh _ yataaghqekagh _ elpesi nun _ ima _ nuna _ ulima aqngan _ .
iyatagh iqe u lunga _ n e g h q e g k a q a g h p e s i n g a _ ; _ meqsug u lunga _ m e g h s i k a q a g h p e s i n g a _ ; _ allaneghtagh u lunga _ u p u g h a t k a q a g h p e s i n g a _ .
amsikaghmete lunga _ aasi ightuqagh qagh zinga _ , _ qinuyug u lunga _ l a a l i g h f i k e g k a q a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ anusimingllaghagh u lunga _ esghagh yaghtuqagh qagh zinga _ . _ '
taagken _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ qavngaq _ iyatagh iqe u luten _ n e g h e s i k e n _ , _ nalighmeng _ meqsug u luten _ meghsi ziken _ ?
qavngaq _ allaneghtagh u luten _ upugha te ziken _ , _ nalighmeng _ amsikaghmete luten _ aasi ightugh ziken _ ?
qavngaq _ qinuyug u luten _ , _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllaghvig mete luten _ laalighfike ziken _ ? _ '
umiileg m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pikagh i _ u k a l i g h p i g a g h n u n _ anglegute mnun _ , _ whanga mnun _ pi aqe asi _ ! _ '
" _ taagken _ umiileg m _ s a g h u m i g n e g h m i n i l n g u u t _ pi lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ elpesi u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqagh i _ . _ awite te k _ whanga mneng _ , _ aglagh tek _ kenle ite ngugh gnun _ k e n g h e g n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqekagh anun _ tughneghagh mun llu _ , _ yaquleg anun llu _ !
iyatagh iqe u lunga _ n e g h e s t e l l g h i t a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ meqsug u lunga _ m e g h s i l l g h i t a g h p e s i n g a _ ,
allaneghtagh u lunga _ u p u g h a t e l l g h i t a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ amsikaghmete lunga _ aasi ightugh ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ qinuyug u lunga llu _ , _ anusimingllaghvig mete lunga llu _ laalighfike ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ '
taagken _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ qavngaq _ iyatagh iqe u luten _ , _ meqsug u luten _ , _ allaneghtagh u luten _ , _ amsikaghmete luten _ , _ qinuyug u luten _ , _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllaghvig mete luten _ , _ kayusiite mangite ziken _ ? _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ tawaten _ pi nghite llegh gpesistun _ naligh ghhagh inagh itnun _ ukut _ u k a l i g h p i g a a t _ , _ whanga _ p i n g h i t a q a g h p e s i n g a _ . _ '
enkaam _ taakut _ aglagh lleqe ut _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ aglagh lleqe ut _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ taaqe yamiki _ apeghtuusagh ke nghmeng _ tamaakut _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ liisimakagh i _ maalghug _ aghnegh k _ atugh lukek _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ pi naqngu uq _ . _ enkaam _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ . _ "
tawani _ aghneghmi _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte tke aat _ p a l a c e - n g a n i _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ , _ C a i a p h a s - e m _ .
agghi tkekagh at _ Jesus _ a k s a q l u k l u _ tugu luku _ , _ tuqute na luku _ .
iwernga _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ N e q e n g h a g h q e m m i _ p i n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ , _ luuraq _ yug t _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag na yu kata _ . _ "
Jesus _ B e t h a n y - m e t a q n g a m i _ S i m o n - e n k u n i t k a q _ l e p r o s y - l g u y a l g h i i m i _ .
aghnagh m _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ , _ tugumiiqe lukek _ a l a b a s t e r - e k _ aqimleghutagh k _ imaleg k _ akitu pigte lghii meng _ tepe ngllagh sigh meng _ . _ negh ma luku _ n a a s q w a k u n _ kuuve gkakek _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ .
iwernga _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ esghagh luku _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ugumi yagutekagh at _ whaten _ pi magh meng _ , _ " _ sangan _ sakusiiqe akek _ ?
akike kaqsagh kumikek _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ mani u tke ghllag lukek _ aklumalghii nun _ tunqugh nayagh aa _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ liisimake luki _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ s e g h l e q u u g h e s t e g g u _ aghnagh _ ? _ pi niigh pigte uq _ whanga mnun _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ .
akluma lghiit _ quunpeng _ t a m a a n s a g h q a a g u t _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ quunpeng _ elpesinite naanghite unga _ .
T e p e n g l l a g h q e l l e g h m i k u n _ yugusigh ka _ y a t a a g h q e n g n g w a a _ llivegh lleghqagh mnun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nani _ alngunak _ una _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ ungipagh ke nghmegteggu _ , _ aghnagh m _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ apegh aqe lleqe aat _ yug nun _ neqamike sqellug qu _ . _ "
taagken _ Judas _ iscariot _ ila at _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n _ pi luni _ ,
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa meng _ tuune lleqe ste ngnga _ Jesus _ elpesi nun _ tuune gkumkun _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ key-tu tete luku _ 3 0 _ silver _ mani meng _ llivikekagh at _ .
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ Judas _ pi lleghqagh nge naqekagh _ uvegh ghpagte te na luku _ Jesus _ .
sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ neqenghaghqe llegh an _ Y e a s t - a l i l l g h i l l n g u u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ Jesus _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ nani _ yataaghqe te sug ziin _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ n e g h e s q e l l u t e n _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ pi tek _ . _ yuug _ tea- magh an tuq _ ; _ ungipaate nakesi _ , _ ' _ apeghtugh i sta _ pi uq _ , _ pi lleghqagh ka _ kaate naqe uq _ . _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghii ni _ negh naqagh ut _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ elpesi ni _ . _ ' _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ J e s u s - e m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pikagh t _ , _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ yataaghqekagh at _ .
I g h i v g a g h y a g u _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ t i p e l n g i _ aqume te tke aat _ negh na luteng _ .
neghe uute ma luki _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ naligh gpesi _ uvegh ghpagte te naqngu aanga _ . _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ tuungligh igh qutagh luteng _ aapte aataghkagh at _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ whanga u a _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ t a a n a n g u u q _ negh ke ni _ neptekanga _ sagnegh mun _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ .
ipapestaaq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i n a q n i l l g h i s t u n _ . _ iwernga _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u q _ taana _ yuug _ uvegh ghpagte te i lghii _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ ! _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ allgegh mangite yagh kuni _ ! _ "
U v e g h p a g u t i s t e m _ J u d a s - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ whanga u a _ ? _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ taawa _ e l p e n e n g _ apegh uten _ . _ "
neghe uute u luteng _ J e s u s - e m _ tugu luku _ neqekrangllagh _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ tunqugh qu ai _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tugu luku _ neghe teggu _ , _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine- meng _ imaleg _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ tuunekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ megh vike aatagh teggu _ qamagte lusi _ .
taana _ aaw kaqe a _ , _ taaggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ tuqu kuma _ aaw ka _ kuuve lleqe uq _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ yug nun _ seghevute sigh u luni _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ wine- meng _ alla _ megh naanghite unga _ kenlanga _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ , _ w i n e - e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ meghe lgusigh lleqe amsi _ ata ma _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ . _ "
taagken _ ilagagh luteng _ aane luteng _ M o u n t _ O l i v e s - m u n _ pikagh t _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U n u g m i _ whani _ , _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ u n i q a g h a a l l e q a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ qayughllak _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ tuqu lleqe aqa _ penniighniigh a _ enkaam _ penniigh t _ mingug iqe lleqe ut _ . _ '
iwernga _ unguvagh stegkanganga _ tuqu llegh meng _ sivu gpesini _ aglagh lleqe unga _ galilee- mun _ . _ "
P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apallugh ke luten _ elpek _ qaywa _ ila ma _ u n i q a g h a a t e g h n g a a t e n _ , _ whanga _ u n i n n a a n g h i t n g w a a g h a m k e n _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ unukun _ r o o s t e r - a _ qalghigh ste gpenaan _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ k e t w e l l _ n a l l u n q e l l e q a g h p e n g a _ . _ "
P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qaywa _ tuquma lgusigh yagh ghngaamken _ , _ n a l l u n q e n n a a n g h i t a m k e n _ . _ " _ M a l i g s a a g h t e t l u _ qamagte luteng _ ungipagh tke aat _ tawaten _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ kaate tke aat _ tawavek _ atigh llegh ke lghii meng _ gethsemane- meng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aqumugh u tek _ taaggun _ , _ ingavek _ yughagh yaghtugh ma lunga _ . _ "
tazingavek _ kelqekagh i _ , _ peter _ , _ Z e b e d e e - m l l u _ ighnegh kek _ . _ taagken _ q i v g h u g h l l a g e m l l u _ s e g h l e l i i g h e m l l u _ kaate kestagh qagh a _ ,
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qaame na ke _ qivghu ghllagu uq _ , _ repall _ tuqu yaghqaaghte lunga _ . _ T a w a n l l u s i _ kelenga lgusigh tengnga _ . _ "
T a z i n g a p i g h q a a g h l u n i _ nuna mun _ sikmuute luni _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ ata mni _ , _ pi yaghqaa kan _ , _ meghe nghite langa _ whaken _ qayuusigh meng _ ; _ iwernga _ nakaan _ piyuke lleg mtun _ , _ elpek _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi gu _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ t a k u y a q m i n i k i _ pi nga yu t _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ qavaa ut _ . _ enkaam _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ K e l e n g a l g u s i g h p a g n i n g i t e s t e n g n g a a _ ataasigh _ aflu _ ?
kelenga tek _ , _ yughaghte k _ n a n g h i i q u l l e n g e n g h i t e s q e l l u s i _ . _ I p a a p e s t a a q _ taghneghagh k _ pi yaghqaa ghngaaghmek _ , _ iwerngaqun _ yugusigh _ kayaate uq _ . _ "
allameng _ Jesus _ tazingavek _ aglagh luni _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ ata mni _ , _ megh yaghqaqe u kumkun _ una _ qayuusigh _ elpek _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
T a k u n q i g s a q m i n i k i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ taawa _ qavaa te u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ qavagh m _ sakniqe stegkangi _ .
J e s u s - e m _ unite laatagh luki _ , _ tazingani _ pingayut iqe ai _ yughagh lleg ni _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ y u g h a t _ atuqe luki _ .
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ qavagh u aqe tsi _ , _ meghnaali aqe tsi _ ? _ taawa _ aflu _ kaa tuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ uvegh ghpagte te yaghqaaghte uq _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n u n _ .
nekeve tek _ , _ igleghte lta _ . _ ii-i _ , _ uka _ uvegh ghpagte te i steke _ . _ "
Jesus _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ Judas _ kaate tke aq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ ila at _ . _ yug lghute t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ ila i _ savigpag ligh luteng _ , _ ila i _ anagutagh ligh luteng _ . _ C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ kayagtekagh it _ maligte sqellug qu _ Judas _ .
U v e g h p a g u t i s t e m _ J u d a s - e m _ kaate vagilgameng _ ila ni _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ ungipaate kaqe kangi _ , _ " _ yuug _ naagh yaghqaqe a _ ellnga u uq _ piyukekagh i _ . _ tugu nakesi _ . _ "
J u d a s - e m _ takuaghaghte luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ apeghtugh i sta _ ! _ " _ taagken _ naate qugh a _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ aga _ sa aqe ziin _ pi lleghqagh n _ pi gu _ ! _ " _ taagken _ taku luku _ Jesus _ akuqagh luku _ n u q n e g h t e q a a t _ .
tawani _ naligh ita _ yug t _ J e s u s - m e l n g u u t _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ kepe qaghtekagh a _ sigute a _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h a n _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ savigpag n _ kanaghte gu _ qantagh nun _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ savigpag meng _ atuqe i lghiit _ savigpag kun _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ .
S u m e g h p e n i i - i _ ata ka _ kayute ngllagh naanghite ni luku _ p i z i g u u _ ? _ aaptekumkun _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ 7 2 , 0 0 0 - e n e n g _ uglagh lghiit _ yaquleg lghute ghllag t _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ kayagte nayagh ai _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ pi naanghite unga _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghiigh yaghqaa lghiit _ igaqe llegh megestun _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ T u g u y a g h t u g h e s t e n g n g a a _ savigpagtuumagh gpesi _ , _ anagutaghtuumagh gpesi _ , _ nikimqun _ w a y a g h n i i g h t e s t u n _ ayuqe lunga _ ? _ A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ aqume lunga _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ temple- mi _ t u g u n g i g a t a g h p e s i n g a _ .
iwernga _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ tawaten _ pi u ut _ , _ apeghiigh na luki _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ igaqegkagh it _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ . _ " _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ unite luku _ qimagugh tke aat _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ t u g u s t e n g i t a _ aglagh tke aat _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ , _ C a i a p h a s - e m _ , _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ tawani _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
U y a v a q a a n l l u n i _ P e t e r - e m _ maligtekagh a _ c o u r t y a r d - n g a n u n _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ mangteghagh an _ . _ itegh luni _ aqume lgusighkagh i _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t _ esghapag na luku _ Jesus _ sa yaghqaa ta at _ .
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ a g g h i s t e t _ i q l e n g i q u t k e s t e n g n a q u t k e g k a t _ Jesus _ tuqute ste pigesnagh na luku _ .
iwernga _ naalkute nghmeng _ aghtughkagh t _ . _ qaywa _ uglagh lghii m _ esnevagh aqe luteng _ apegh aatagh yagh ghngaaghmegteggu _ apeghkagh it _ allake tke aat _ . _ qenwat llu _ yug k _ esnevagh lutek
pikagh k _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ temple- a _ n a a f q e s a q l e g w a a q a _ enkaam _ nekefte lleqe aqa _ p i n g a y a n i _ aghnegh m _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ nekeve luni _ aaptekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh ite ziin _ yug k _ apegh llegh gkenun _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ qalleg kau ma ite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ ategh akun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh amken _ ungipaate kut _ C h r i s t - a n g u z i i n _ ? _ ighnegh ke aten _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ pi llegh gpetun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ u u m _ kingu aneng _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqume luni _ aghenqignegh akun _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh m _ , _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i l l u _ tagi lghii _ qilawaagh itgun _ qilaga m _ . _ "
taagken _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ aatkagh ni _ piigugh magh ita _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ kiyaghnegh u ni luni _ pi lghii _ ! _ alla _ l i i s i m a k i s t e n g i s a g h n g a a m t a _ pi lta _ . _ legan _ whaa _ n a g a t a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ !
naten _ elpek si _ nanqigte steggu _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ tuqute yaghqaaghte ma uq _ . _ "
taagken _ gginagh akun _ qesigh qukagh at _ , _ tenglug agaataghkagh at llu _ , _ enkaam _ q a s a g h t e s t e n g i t a
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ elpek _ C h r i s t - a _ uuknaliqe te kut _ ! _ kitum _ tenglug aten _ ? _ "
tawaten _ taakut _ pi ma luki _ c o u r t y a r d - m i _ peter _ aqumgakagh _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e m _ aghnaghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ elpek llu _ J e s u s - m e t k a a g u t e n _ , _ galilee-kagh mii mi _ . _ "
iwernga _ peter _ mesag igh aqe aq _ sivu itni _ tamaakut _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ . _ "
aane yan _ c o u r t y a r d - e m _ iteghvig anun _ ila yan _ q e p g h a g h t e m _ aghnaghagh m _ esghagh luku _ peter _ , _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ J e s u s - m e t k a a g u q _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i m i _ . _ "
peter _ mesighagh laataghkagh _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ pi amsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ . _ "
mulunghituq _ , _ yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ tagi luteng _ , _ peter _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ipa _ ila ke aaten _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g h s a g h t e n g i t a _ qayughllak _ akuzillegh n _ galilee-kagh mii stun _ ayuqe uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ ungipaate amsi _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ ! _ iqlengiqe u kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh linga _ ! _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ r o o s t e r - a _ qalghigh iqe aq _ .
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ neqagh tke a _ J e s u s - e m _ p i l l g h a _ , _ " _ R o o s t e r - a _ qalghigh ste gpenaan _ pi nga yu neng _ n a l l u n q e l l e q a g h p e n g a _ . _ " _ enkaam _ aane luni _ qiyaaghwagh ghllagkagh _ .
unaangu luku _ qamagte luteng _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ agghi tkekagh at _ tuqute ste na luku _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ asighqellug qu _ aglagh te luku _ tuunekagh at _ pilate- mun _ , _ R o m e - e m _ g o v e r n o r - n g a n u n _ .
U v e g h p a g u t i s t e m _ J u d a s - e m _ , _ l i i g i k s a q m i n i k i _ a g g h i s t e t _ nanqigte ma kangat _ Jesus _ tuqutesaghqagh u luku _ , _ qemall _ avuteghqe ghllagkagh _ . _ enkaam _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n l l u _ , _ siivanllegh nun llu _ veghute yaghtugh qu ai _ 3 0 _ s i l v e r - e t _ mani t _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ seghleghqe ma unga _ uvegh ghpagte te lleg mkun _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ yuug _ tuqute sqellug qu _ ! _ " _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ W h a n g k u n n u n _ sasii lleqe a _ ? _ elpek _ tawaten _ p i l q a n _ ! _ "
enkaam _ J u d a s - e m _ milugh tke ai _ mani t _ T e m p l e - e m _ ilu anun _ . _ taagken _ aghulaqe luni _ qemitekagh _ .
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t _ saghna te kete luki _ mani t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ ukut _ mani t _ kanaghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ manilghutagh anun _ T e m p l e - e m _ qayughllak _ l l i v i k u u s a q e g k a a g u t _ tuqute sighqagh u luteng _ yug mun _ . _ "
enkaam _ agghi tkekagh at _ mat- ni _ tukfigh i sigh ke na luku _ nuna mun _ ategh llegh ke lghii _ , _ " _ P o t t e r Ê¼ s _ field _ " _ llivegh vigkagh u luku _ n a k u u m i i n u n _ .
enkaam _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ t a a m _ nuna m _ ateligh tke a _ , _ " _ nuna a _ aaw m _ " _ .
neghigh luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ J e r e m i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ whaten _ , _ " _ ila ita _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ i t a g n a q e g k a q i i t _ a n g t a l a n g i t _ 3 0 _ silver _ mani t _ , _ qayughllak _ sumegh meggni _ tawaten _ akitutka ni luku _ pi ke aat _ . _ taagken _ taakut _ mani t _ tukfigh i sigh kekagh it _ P o t t e r Ê¼ s _ F i e l d - m u n _ . _ tawaten _ A t a n g h e m _ qelqe aqe aanga _ . _ " _ J e r e m i a h - m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ apeghiigh stekaqe aat _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t _ tukfigh aqe yamegteggu _ P o t t e r Ê¼ s _ field _ .
tawani _ Jesus _ nekevgha lghii _ sivungagh kun _ R o m e - e m _ g o v e r n o r - n g a n _ . _ G o v e r n o r - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ J e w s - e t _ U m i i l k a t a a n _ ? _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ tawatete ni luku _ pi an _ . _ "
iwernga _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ anaggute ni ghngaatni _ , _ sa meng _ pi ma nge i tke aq _ .
taagken _ P i l a t e - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N a g a s i k i i _ qamagte luki _ anaggute ni llegh it _ ? _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh ma ite kanga _ talwa _ ataasigh mun _ anaggute ni llegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ g o v e r n o r - a _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh _ .
ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ R o m e - e m _ g o v e r n o r - n g a n _ iteme te aqe a _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ yug lghute t _ nakmikegkagh at _ .
tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ t a m a a n t e f t u q _ apeghseghugh _ anusimingllagh aq _ , _ ategh a _ B a r a b b a s _ .
enkaam _ yug lghute _ qerngughte yan _ , _ P i l a t e - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naligh _ iteme te sug steggu _ B a r a b b a s _ nalighmeng _ Jesus _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ? _ "
P i l a t e - e m _ liisimake u kangi _ J e w s - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ aqinake luku _ Jesus _ tagite u kangat _ ellmi nun _ .
P i l a t e _ aqumga ma luku _ nanqigtivig mi _ , _ nulighh an _ ungipaatesaghtugh qu a _ , _ " _ sa naqe fqaan _ taana _ seghleghqe llghite ngughk _ yuug _ qayughllak _ qavangugh ke kaqe aqa _ enkaam _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ seghleliigh sigh ke aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi ma luku _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ aaghqute aqekagh it _ yug lghute t _ iteme te sqellug qu _ B a r a b b a s _ , _ Jesus _ tuqute sqellug qu _ .
G o v e r n o r - e m _ aapte laataghkagh i _ yug lghute t _ , _ " _ naligh _ iteme te sug steggu _ elpesi nun _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ B a r a b b a s _ ! _ "
P i l a t e - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ S a n a q s i k u n Ê¼ n g a m _ Jesus _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
P i l a t e - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ ? _ sa u a _ seghlegh _ pi kaqe agu _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ i g l a g t a a g h a l l u t e n g _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
P i l a t e _ liigike luni _ alla _ sapagningite yami _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute t _ seghleliigh kestagh lghiit _ , _ tugu lukek _ aghmigusigh k _ uughtughkagh _ sivu itni _ yug lghute t _ . _ taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga _ avute ite unga _ tuqute lleghqagh anun _ , _ elpek si _ tawaten _ p i s t e n g n g w a a g h s i _ ! _ "
yug lghute m _ i i n g u n a g h h a g h m e n g _ aki tke aat _ , _ " _ whangkuta _ kingunegh ke te lghii ni _ avute u lleqe ukut _ tuqute llegh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ P i l a t e - e m _ B a r a b b a s _ iteme te luku _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus _ kagsagmig ste luku _ tuunekagh a _ p i l l u w a g h t e n u n _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ .
taagken _ g o v e r n o r - e m _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t a _ aglagh tke aat _ Jesus _ q e r n g u g h t a a g h v i g m e g g n u n _ g o v e r n o r - e m _ mangteghagh ani _ . _ tawani _ ila teng _ qerngughte luki _ kangllukagh at _ .
aatkagh i _ mataghte qugh luki _ , _ kavirrakegtagh gneng _ atkuyaagh gneng _ aate ste vikekagh at _ .
taagken _ sikughllugtuqagh meng _ avayagh meng _ qaghpa ngllagh luku _ n a a s q w a k u n _ aate stekagh at _ . _ aghenqignegh an llu _ iiggagh kun _ tugu ste luku _ unaghsiighwagh _ , _ segesqughte uute luteng _ sivungagh kun _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Q u u l v a g h a m k e n _ umiileg at _ J e w s - e t _ ! _ "
taagken _ qesigh qu luku _ , _ tugu luku _ unaghsiighwagh _ n a a s q w a k u n _ anagu llegh ke aat _ .
legasiighwagh te kete nghmeng _ apeghiigh yamegteggu _ , _ atkuyaagh kek _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ katam _ aatkagh i _ aate te squgh ke ait _ . _ taagken _ qaquuragh yaghtugh qu aat _ .
aane ma luteng _ ne ghllag meng _ esghagh luku _ yuug _ , _ C y r e n e - e g h m i i _ , _ ategh a _ simon _ , _ qelqe aat _ uyamig sqellug qu _ J e s u s - e m _ qaquuragh a _ .
kaate yameng _ G o l g o t h a - m u n _ ( _ golgotha _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ yug m _ N a a s q w a n _ nenge a _ " _ ) _ ,
p i l l u w a g h t e t _ J e s u s - m u n _ tuunekagh at _ megh sqellug qu _ wine- a _ s u n g a g h n i l n g u g h m e n g _ akumekagh _ . _ iwernga _ naasiigh luku _ m e g h y u n g h i t k a a _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ qaquuragh yamegteggu _ , _ nengigh tke ait _ aatkagh i _ ateghteiiraagh te kaqe luki _ .
taagken _ tawani _ aqume uute luteng _ kelengakekagh at _ .
N a a s q w a n _ qule akun _ nekegtekagh at _ qaquuragh llegh anun _ apallugh _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ una _ J E S U S - N G U U Q _ , _ umiileg at _ J E W S - E T _ .
maalghug llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ qaquuragh ke agket _ , _ aag llegh a _ aghenqignegh akun _ , _ ila a _ saghumignegh akun _ .
yug t _ naghughte lghiit _ , _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ naasqugh teng _ ufsug te magh ita
akilghuukagh at _ , _ " _ elpek _ pi kau uten _ temple- a _ n a a f q e n n a q n i l u k u _ enkaam _ pingayut ni _ aghnegh ni _ n e k e f n e q i g g n a q n i l u k u _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ e l p e n e n g _ katam _ yugu li _ , _ qaquuragh meng _ ukig i _ ! _ "
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t _ , _ maligte te luteng _ apeghtugh i kayug nun _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh nun llu _ , _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ ,
" _ yuguligh u iqe ai _ ila i _ , _ naqam _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yugulighpag nigh nge i tuq _ ! _ umiileg u kuni _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ ukig li _ qaquuragh mineng _ enkaam _ u g p e q n a y a g h a g h p u t _ .
neghyuke u a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ pi aqe uq llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ighnegh ke ni luni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke u kunigu _ y u g u l i l i g u _ maaten _ . _ "
qaquuragh lgute kenka llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ legasiighwagh tkekagh ak _ .
taagken _ qamagte luni _ nuna _ m a m l e g h q w a a k a q _ aghnegh m _ qukaa neng _ kenlanga _ t h r e e - k l a a g m u n _ .
tea- ma ni _ nani _ t h r e e - k l a a g m i _ Jesus _ akilghuu ghllagkagh _ whaten _ , _ " _ E l i _ , _ E l i _ , _ l a m a _ s a b a c h t h a n i _ ? _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ sangama _ unite zinga _ ? _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ nagate luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U u m _ yug m _ elijah _ tuqlughagh aa _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ yuug _ ataasigh _ aqfaqughkagh _ nepsag sigh meng _ . _ taagken _ nepte luku _ q u w a a l g h i i m u n _ wine- mun _ , _ unaghsiighwagh qun _ nekegte luku _ nengug tke a _ J e s u s - m u n _ melugrigh sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ wiintaku _ , _ esghapag kau lteggu _ E l i j a h - m _ y u g u l i y a g h t u g h n a y u k a g u _ ! _ "
allameng _ Jesus _ aragh ghllag luni _ pegtekakek _ taghneghagh gni _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ temple- mete ngughk _ safkaaghute _ , _ pikegken _ kanavek _ pike aq _ m a l g h u g h q e l l u n i _ . _ nuna _ ufsug te yan _ , _ uyghag t _ quupe aghtagh tke aat _ ,
llivegh t _ qelpegh aghtagh tke aat _ , _ uglagh lghiit llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ tuqu laghate te kaayagh lghiit _ unguvagh uute tke aat _ ,
enkaam _ llivegh meggneng _ aanleghagh tke aat _ . _ kingu aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ u n g u v a g h t e l l g h a n _ aglagh uute tke aat _ agleghnagh lghii mun _ ne ghllag mun _ , _ tawani _ yug lghute m _ esghaghkagh it _ .
tawani _ qaquuragh vig mi _ , _ u m i i l w a a g h e n k u t _ p i l l u w a g h t e k u l l g h h i i t _ kelengake kangat _ Jesus _ , _ esghagh yamegteggu _ nuna _ qaprag ghllag lghii _ , _ tamaa na llu _ sa u a _ pi yan _ , _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ ighnegh ke ma yagh agu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
T a m a a n t e f t u t _ aghnagh lghute t _ esghapag lghiit _ uyavagh neng _ . _ galilee- meng _ maligtekagh at _ Jesus _ kayusiite na luki _ .
A k u l n g i t n i t e f t u t _ mary _ M a g d a l a - g h m i i _ , _ mary- llu _ naange ak _ J a m e s - e n k u k _ J o s e p h - e n k u k _ , _ Z e b e d e e - m l l u _ ighnegh gkenka _ naange ak _ .
W h a n i k u y a g u _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ yuug _ ategh a _ Joseph _ , _ A r i m a t h e a - g h m i i _ , _ maligte yaaghte nga _ J e s u s - e m _ kaate tke aq _ .
pilate- mun _ pi luni _ J e s u s - e m _ yugusigh a _ tungsigh iqe a _ . _ enkaam _ P i l a t e - e m _ qelegh tke a _ yugusigh _ J o s e p h - m u n _ tuune sqellug qu _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ tugu luku _ yugusigh a _ , _ nutaghaghllug kun _ q i i p a g h a k u n _ imeg tke a _ .
taagken _ llikagh a _ ellmi _ lliveghraghagh mig qu te _ , _ uyghag ghrugllag kun _ laag stekagh mikun _ siklagh kumeng _ . _ taagken _ paye anun _ up- llghite aghte luku _ uyghag ghllag _ , _ apeghiigh yami _ aghulaqekagh _ .
T a w a n t e f t u k _ mary _ M a g d a l a - g h m i i n k u k _ , _ aag llegh a llu _ mary _ llivegh mun _ ayuqe lutek _ aqumga lghiik _ .
unaami ani _ kingu aneng _ Y a t a g h q e f i g e m _ aghnegh an _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ aleghqugh yaghtugh qu aat _ P i l a t e _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yugu ni uq _ , _ n e q a m i k a g h p u t _ taana _ puughte i sta _ salin _ unguva luni _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh ste lleqe unga _ . _ '
E n k a a n g a m _ kayagte te gu _ llivegh a _ k e l e n g a k n g w a a g h e s q e l l u k u _ pi nga yu nun _ aghnegh nun _ , _ luuraq _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ yugusigh a _ tegleg luku _ ungipaate na yu katki _ yug t _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ . _ una _ i q l e n g a q _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a y a g h q a a g u q _ sivuligh meng _ . _ "
P i l a t e - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ K e l e n g a k i s t e l g u u s i _ , _ elngaatall _ k e l e n g a k e s t e n g n g w a a g h t e g g u _ llivegh _ . _ "
enkaam _ llivegh mun _ aglagh luteng _ maghqate luku _ nallu na iqe aat _ uyghag _ qelpeghte na yu katgu _ . _ taagken _ qelegh tke aat _ p i l l u w a g h t e n u n _ kelengake sqellug qu _ .
S a b b a t h - e m _ kingu aneng _ , _ aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ mary _ M a g d a l a - g h m i i _ , _ ila a llu _ M a r y - m _ , _ llivegh _ esghagh yaghtugh qu ak _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ nuna _ qaprag ghllagkagh _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ yaquleg a _ qilag meng _ ukikagh _ . _ llivegh m _ paye an _ uyghag a _ up- llghite aghtagh luku _ aqumekagh a _ .
esghaqaaluni _ nighugte pagte te te lghii stun _ nighugtu tekagh mi _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ qategh lghiit _ anigu stun _ .
K e l e n g a k i s t e t _ yaquleg meng _ alingruughkagh t _ repall _ ungelegte luteng _ , _ tuqukagh stun llu _ lli aqe aat _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh k _ yaquleg m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ alinge gpenatek _ . _ liisimake amtek _ Jesus _ ivagh aqe aghte tek _ , _ qaquuragh kaayagh lghii _ .
W h a a n n e g h i t u q _ ; _ unguvagh ma uq _ pi naqe ni llegh mitun _ . _ tagi tek _ , _ esghagh yaghtugh tegnegu _ llivike yagh kanga _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate qaghte yaghtugh tegneki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ aga llu _ sivullgaagh ma uq _ galilee- mun _ . _ taagani _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ ! _ taawa _ ungipaate amtek _ . _ "
E n k a a n g a m _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ llivegh meng _ aghulaqekagh k _ , _ alinge magh egmek llu _ quya ghllag magh egmek llu _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu aik _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ .
J e s u s - e m _ aliigh aghte vike lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh _ e l p e t e g n i l l i _ . _ " _ enkaam _ taake uk _ aghnagh k _ taku luku _ , _ itegagh i _ n u q n e q l u k i _ manigugh qu ak _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ alinge gpenatek _ . _ ungipaate yaghtugh tegneki _ m a l i g h s a a g h t e n k a _ anglegute yagh u i tke anka _ , _ G a l i l e e - m u n Ê¼ n g u q _ aglagh lit _ taagani nguq _ esghagh lleqe aatnga _ . _ "
aghnagh k _ igleghte ma lukek _ , _ l l i v e g h m e l n g u u t _ ila i _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ itegh luteng _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n _ apeghkagh at _ qamagte luku _ tamaa na _ apeghiighkagh _ .
enkaam _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte luteng _ agghi tke aat _ . _ taagken _ m a n i l i t e g h l l a g l u k i _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ ,
pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ungipaate nakesi _ yug t _ , _ ' _ U n u g m i _ qavaa te ma luta _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ tagi luteng _ tegleg ma ut _ yugusigh a _ . _ '
G o v e r n o r - e m _ nagaqugh ma kagu _ whangkuta _ a l e g h q u g h l l e q a g h p u t _ enkaam _ seghleliigh lleg nge naanghite usi _ . _ "
K e l e n g a k i s t e t _ mat- ni _ tugu luku _ pi sqe llegh megestun _ pikagh t _ . _ enkaam _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ J e w s - e t _ paninang _ apegh aqe aat _ J e s u s - e m _ yugusigh a _ tegleg kaqe ni luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g a n u n _ .
tawaten _ pi ma luki _ , _ taakut _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ aglaghkagh t _ galilee- mun _ , _ naayghagh mun _ J e s u s - e m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ tawaten _ .
esghagh yamegteggu _ Jesus _ manigugh qu aat _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ aygughikekagh at _ ellnga u ta a _ .
J e s u s - e m _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qamagte luni _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q _ qilag mi llu _ , _ nuna mi llu _ whanga mnun _ tagivagh kau uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghulaqe lusi _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ maligte yaaghte ngllagh teki _ whanga mnun _ , _ p a a p t a a y e l a g h t e k i _ ategh akun _ ata m _ , _ ighnegh m _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ .
apeghtuusagh qite ki _ q a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ qamagte luki _ qelegh tke anka _ elpesi nun _ . _ elpesinite pestaagh lleqe unga _ quunpeng _ kenlanga _ k e n l e t g h u u t e l l g h a n u n _ nuna m _ . _ "
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piinligh kau ut _ whaten _ :
U u k n a l i q i s t e m _ I s a i a h - m _ igaqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whaten _ p i l l g h a _ , _ " _ ungipaghteke _ kayagte kestagh naqe aqa _ sivu gpeni _ yataaghqe sqellug qu _ tume kaghqagh n _ .
kilgaa ni _ me _ akilghuu aqe uq _ whaten _ , _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ tume a _ yataaghqe teggu _ , _ taklaghte ggu llu _ ! _ ' _ "
taana _ ungipagh a _ J o h n - n g u u q _ paaptaaye sta _ . _ kilgaa ni _ p a a p t a a y e l a g h a q u q l u _ ungipagh aqe uq llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ A v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h l u s i _ p a a p t a a y e t e k _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute lleqe aisi _ . _ "
J u d e a - g h m i i t l u _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t l u _ nagate yaghtugh tke aat _ John _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lleg teng _ apeghragh nghatki _ p a a p t a a y a a q e g k a n g i _ kiiw gni _ J o r d a n - m e n g _ ategh ke lghii gni _ .
J o h n - e m _ aatkagh i _ c a m e l - e m _ m e l q w a n e n g _ ulimaagh t _ , _ meqagh meng _ tafsi luni _ , _ negh aqe lghii _ l o c u s t - m e n g l l u _ h o n e y - m e n g l l u _ .
ungipagh ke ikagh _ whaten _ , _ " _ kingu mneng _ yuug _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i t a g h a l g h i i _ whanga mneng _ . _ whanga _ sasii nghite unga _ repall _ i t e m t e p a g n i n g i t a n k a _ singigh a _ .
megh meng _ p a a p t a a y a a q a m s i _ , _ iwernga _ ellnga n _ paaptaaye lleqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
John _ tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ Jesus _ kaate tke aq _ nazareth- meng _ , _ G a l i l e e - m e l n g u g h m e n g _ , _ enkaam _ J o h n - e m _ paaptaayekagh a _ J o r d a n - e g n i _ .
paaptaaye negh meng _ taaqe yatni _ J e s u s - e m _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ esghaghkagh i _ qilag t _ qelpegh lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghiik llu _ taghneghagh k _ uki lghiik _ ellmi nun _ d o v e - e t u n _ ayuqe lutek _ .
me m llu _ qilag meng _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ , _ piniqekagh mni _ . _ efqugh ke pigte amken _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ Jesus _ aghulaqe stekagh a _ kilgaa nun _ .
E l l n g i n a g h h a a k a q _ iwerngaqun _ nuyaagh lghiit _ teghig ke sagh t _ t a m a a n t e k a t _ . _ T a m a a n s i m a l u k u _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqukagh a _ k e t w h e l l _ 4 0 _ aghneq _ , _ iwernga _ yaquleg t _ aflengakekagh at _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ kingu aneng _ J o h n - e m _ anusimingllagh llegh an _ , _ Jesus _ galilee-llug ni _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ kiyaghneghtagh neng _ .
pi ke aq _ , _ " _ pi lleghqagh _ whaa _ kaate ma uq _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whaa _ whaante uq _ ! _ A v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h l u s i _ ugpeqe teki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ! _ "
Jesus _ igleghte te kete luku _ naayvagh m _ G a l i l e e - m _ esne akun _ esghagh kakek _ maalghug _ iqalliniigh tek _ siifte i lghiik _ negaghpag meng _ . _ S i m o n - e n k u n g u f t u k _ A n d r e w - n k u k _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ , _ apeghtugh naqe amtek _ yug meng _ n a a p s a g u t e s q e l l u t e k _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ negaghpag tek _ unite luki _ maligtekagh ak _ .
T a z i n g a p i g h q a a g h l u n i _ esghagh laatagh kakek _ J a m e s - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ ighnegh kek _ Z e b e d e e - m _ . _ negaghpag megteneng _ ilaaghtu lghiik _ angyagh megteni _ .
J e s u s - e m _ esghaqagh inagh lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ ! _ " _ enkaam _ angyagh kun _ unite luku _ ata ek _ Z e b e d e e _ , _ taakut llu _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u k i _ tugukagh teng _ , _ maligtekagh ak _ Jesus _ .
J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ C a p e r n a u m - e m u n _ kaate tke aat _ . _ S a b b a t h - n g u g h s a g u _ , _ Jesus _ s y n a g o g u e - e l l u n i _ apeghtugh ikagh _ .
nagate lghiit _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ , _ qayughllak _ apeghtugh ikagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i l l e g h q a l i t e l l g h a k u n _ , _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e n g i s t u n _ liilightuusagh t _ pi gpenani _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ itegh luni _ s y n a g o g u e - m u n _ akilghuukagh _ ,
" _ Jesus _ , _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i _ , _ sangamta _ qinuyug zikut _ ? _ N a a f q e s a g h t u u z i k u u t _ ? _ kina nge uten _ liisimake aqa _ , _ yuguligh i ste u uten _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ kayagte lleqe ni luku _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ " _ N e p n g u n a n g _ , _ aane i _ yug meng _ . _ "
tughneghagh m _ yuug _ sayugpagtagh ste luku _ , _ aragh ghllag magh mi _ aanekagh _ .
yug t _ saghiigha yug luteng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ a a p q u g h a a g h u t k a t _ , _ " _ una _ sangaawa _ ? _ una _ apeghtuusaghraghagh u uq _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ u u m _ yug m _ qelegh ai _ tughneghagh t _ a a n e s q e l l u k i _ , _ legan _ qaatke aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ G a l i l e e - l q a a g h a g h m i _ yug t _ u n g i p a q n g i n a a m a a n _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aane ghesnagh luni _ s y n a g o g u e - m e n g _ , _ S i m o n - e n k u k _ A n d r e w - n k u k _ mangteghagh itnun _ pi ke aq _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u k l u _ J o h n - e n k u k _ maligtekagh ak _ .
S i m o n - e m _ saki a _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ puqlegha luni _ . _ legan _ Jesus _ kaa tuq _ ungipagh tke aat _ aghnagh _ qinuyug u ni luku _ .
itegh luni _ aghnagh _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ enkaam _ puqlegha nga i uute luni _ , _ kepsiiqu inagh magh ita _ pi ke ai _ .
S a b b a t h - e m _ i g h i v g a a n i _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ J e s u s - m u n _ tagi qugh tke ait _ qinuyug lghiit _ , _ tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ C a p e r n a u m - e g h m i i t _ mangteghagh m _ manughagh ani _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ uglagh lghiit _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ aqnighnegh itneng _ , _ aag negh squgh ke ai llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug lghute t _ ilu itneng _ . _ tughneghagh t _ sa meng _ pi te ma ite kangi _ , _ qayughllak _ kina u ta a _ liisimake kangat _ .
salin _ aghsug niite ghllag luku _ , _ Jesus _ makete luni _ aanekagh _ yughagh na luni _ kilgaa ni _ .
S i m o n - e n k u t _ i l a k u l g h i i t _ ivagh yaghtugh qu aat _ ,
n a a l k e s a m e g t e g g u _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yug t _ ivagh nghiighte te aqe aaten _ . _ "
yeghlegi _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ila itnun _ nuna t _ pi naqe ukut _ . _ ellngit ni llu _ ungipagh ke i yaghqaa unga _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tagi u unga _ . _ "
enkaam _ G a l i l e e - l q a a g h a g h m i _ igleghte te kete luku _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ s y n a g o g u e - n n i _ , _ aag negh squgh ke ai llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug t _ ilu itneng _ .
yuug _ l e p r o s y - l e k _ tagi luni _ J e s u s - m u n _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ n a n g l l e g s i p i g l l u n i _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ naallghute aghte nga _ u k m a n g i i g h t e s q e l l u n g a _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nanglleg yagute luku _ nengug luku _ sa uute te kete luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke aqa _ , _ naagh llegh u te n _ ! _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ yuug _ naallghute luni _ ukmangigh u aghtekagh _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q a a _ , _ " _ nagate aghten _ , _ wataghllak _ kinku t _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaki _ naallghute ni luten _ whanga mnun _ . _ itupill _ priest- mun _ yuvghiighsigh yagh a _ . _ enkaam _ a g h q e r r a a g h h a a t e n _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh ita _ p i s q e l l g h i s t u n _ i p a p i g h q e s q e l l u k u _ yug nun _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ " _ taagken _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ aghulaqe stekagh a _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ igleghte te kete luku _ nani _ alngunak _ apegh manginagh qagh a _ J e s u s - m u n _ n a a l g h u s i m a n i l u n i _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ Jesus _ alngunak _ ne nun _ pi na nigh ke aq _ , _ qayughllak _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taku aqe kangat _ , _ enkaam _ paaghqagh igh llegh ani _ kiyaghtekagh _ . _ iwernga _ naken _ alngunak _ yug lghute t _ paninang _ taku aqe kangat _ .
mulu gpenani _ Jesus _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ C a p e r n a u m - e m u n _ , _ enkaam _ ungipagh kekagh at _ n a y u q a q e g k e m i n i n n i l u k u _ mangteghagh mi _ .
yuug _ tagi laghate te yalghiimi _ ellnga nun _ kangsugh tke aat _ repall _ manughagh mun _ qakmavek _ . _ Jesus _ ungipagh ke i ma luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ,
estamat _ yug t _ kevegtugh luku _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ tagi tke aat _ ellnga nun _ .
kaat ute te luku _ itghute nghmeng _ aghtugh qu aat _ , _ qayughllak _ yuug _ kangsuute ghllagu lghii _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghagh m _ qaye an _ tile- nge i _ ikugh luki _ r e g h i g h u l l u k u _ , _ yuug _ allighagh akun _ u k i g t e k a a t _ J e s u s - e m _ nalla akun _ .
J e s u s - e m _ liisimake kangi _ u g p e q i l l e g h t u l n g i t _ , _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute lleg nge ut _ . _ "
tawani _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ aqumga te lghiit _ sumeghtaghaghkagh t _ ,
" _ sangami _ yuug _ una _ tawaten _ akuzi a _ ? _ akuzillegh a _ seghleghu uq _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ ! _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ seghevute i yaghqagh _ ! _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ J e s u s - e m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ liisimakekagh i _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh tsi _ ?
N a l i k e k _ piyaqnagh u i aatagh aghte lleqe ak _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi yagh kumkun _ , _ ' _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute lleg nge ut _ ' _ nalighmeng _ , _ ' _ makete luten _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ piyug i _ ? _ '
iwernga _ liisimake sug aqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ s e g h e v u t i y a q l e g u u q _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ " _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ ungipaate amken _ , _ maketen _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ , _ elpesi nun _ aglagh a _ ! _ "
yug t _ esghapagkagh at _ yuug _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ nekeve luni _ , _ allighagh ni _ tugu luku _ aane lghii _ . _ enkaam _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ usuqekagh at llu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ W h a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ esghaate igate yagh ukut _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ , _ esne anun _ naayvagh m _ G a l i l e e - m _ pi nqigtekagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taku laghate te yatni _ apeghtugh qu ai _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ esgha qaa _ t a x - n e n g _ qerngughte i sta _ , _ ategh a _ levi _ , _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e u s - e m _ . _ aqumga uq _ qepghagh vig mini _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ " _ L e v i - e m _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ .
tawani _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ , _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ L e v i - e n k u n u n _ negh yaghtuqagh t _ . _ neghe lgusighkagh it _ t a x - n e n g _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e l g h u t e t l u _ tamaakut llu _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh itnun _ . _ ( _ T a w a t e l n g u u t l u _ yug t _ maligsaagh u kangat _ Jesus _ . _ )
ila i _ apeghtughiste it _ liilightuusagh t _ P h a r i s e e s - n g u l g h i i t _ , _ esghagh yamegteggu _ Jesus _ neghe lgusigh i lghii _ , _ aaptekagh it _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ , _ " _ sangami _ Jesus _ negh aqa _ t a x - e m _ q e r n g u g h t i s t e n g i t n i l l u _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n i l l u _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nagate luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghallegtagh _ qinuyug lghii nun _ pi u uq _ , _ yugunqegtagh nun _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ungipaate yaghtugh u anka _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ a v u t e g h q e s q e l l u k i _ , _ nakaan _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe igate ni luteng _ pi lghiit _ . _ "
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ , _ J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i l l u _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ f a s t - e n g u l g h i i t _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangameng _ J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i l l u _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t _ fast- u aqe aat _ , _ naqam _ elpek _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t e n _ pi gpenateng _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ aqelqagh i _ f a s t - e l l e q a a t _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ paninang _ t a w a n l l u k u _ tawaten _ pi naanghite ut _ .
nulightugh naqe lghii stun _ ayuqe unga _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n k a _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ a q e l q i i s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ . _ aghulaqe stegkanganga _ elngaatall _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n k a _ f a s t - e l l e q u t _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ nutaghagh _ qiipaghagh _ qellughte ma ite ngughk _ ilaagh sigh ke naanghite a _ qaasligh lug gnun _ . _ ilaagh sigh ke gkunigu _ piigughtu aghagh lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ piig llegh _ s u l l e v a t a g h l l e q u q _ .
enkaamllu _ kitum _ alngunak _ awataghpag lug _ imigh naanghite a _ w i n e - e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ . _ imigh kunigu _ awataghpag lug _ quupaghte lleqe uq _ enkaam _ wine- a _ sakusiiqe lleqe uq _ , _ awataghpag lug llu _ naave lleqe uq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ w i n e - e g h r a g h a q _ awataghpagraghagh mete te _ kuuve yaghqaa uq _ ! _ "
ataasigh mi _ S a b b a t h - m i _ , _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ w h e a t - e t _ piite vig itgun _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ iglegha lgusigh te kete luku _ w h e a t - e t _ piigtu ta itneng _ ikute aghtagh qukagh t _ negh na luteng _ .
taagken _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ki qun _ ! _ sangameng _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t e n _ saghna ut _ w h e a t - e t _ piigtu ta itneng _ ? _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ qepghagh ut _ S a b b a t h - m i _ , _ enkaam _ qaatke te nghite u ut _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t i g h t i i g a s t e g g u _ D a v i d - e m _ p i l l g h a _ q a v n g a r u g l l a k _ ? _ Y u k u l l g h i i t _ iyatagh iqe aqngameng _ ,
David _ itegh luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh anun _ neghe kau uq _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunekagh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ A b i a t h a r _ , _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - n g u l u k u _ . _ liilightuusagh mta _ p i l l g h a n i _ priest- nge i nagh ghhaat _ negh yaghqaa yagh ut _ tamaaken _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ David _ negh luni _ yug ni llu _ tuune kaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ S a b b a t h - a _ nakmike kau uq _ m e g h n a l i v i g u l u n i _ yug m _ pinighqe lleghqagh anun _ . _ S a b b a t h - a _ nakmike kau nghite uq _ yug mun _ i k f i q l i i g h u t k e s q e l l u k u _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ whanga _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ yug m _ , _ A t a n g h u u n g a _ talwa _ S a b b a t h - m u n _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aglagh nqigtekagh _ s y n a g o g u e - m u n _ , _ t a w a n t e f t u q _ yuug _ inglu i _ iigge an _ unegh ii iqe aat _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ riirngi u aqe aat _ J e s u s - e m _ naallghute na yu kagu _ S a b b a t h - m i _ . _ naallghute kagu _ whaten _ pi na luku _ , _ " _ anaggute uten _ ! _ "
uniighkagh meng _ iigge leg _ yuug _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ whavek _ . _ "
taagken _ yug t _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mta _ sa sqe inkut _ S a b b a t h - m i _ ? _ pinitun _ p i s q i n k u u t _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ ? _ Y u g u l i g h i s q i n k u u t _ , _ nalighmeng _ t u q u t i s q i n k u u t _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ yug t _ q a l l e g n a n i g h w a a g h u t k a t _ .
J e s u s - e m _ esghapag ghngaaghmiki _ ugumi yagutekagh i _ , _ naqam _ iilqe tke magh ita _ pineghllug u llegh itneng llu _ w a a k i g a t n g i t n e n g l l u _ . _ taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ qiive luku _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iigge ten _ nengug te ki _ . _ " _ legan _ nengug te ai _ aga _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
enkaam _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ aane ghesnagh luteng _ s y n a g o g u e - m e n g _ , _ H e r o d - e m _ i l a p g a s t e n g i t n u n _ aglagh luteng _ agghi tkekagh at _ naten _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ Jesus _ .
J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ naayvagh mun _ galilee- mun _ aglaghkagh t _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maligtekagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh kaqe kangit _ J e s u s - e m _ a l l a a g h l l u g w h a g h t i l l g h i _ . _ tamaa na _ yug lghute _ galilee- meng _ , _ J u d e a - m e n g _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ , _ I d u m e a - m e n g _ , _ J o r d a n - e m _ kiiw m _ i n g l u n g a n i l n g u g h n e n g _ nuna neng _ , _ T y r e - m e n g _ , _ S i d o n - m e n g _ pi u lghiit _ .
yuug _ uglaghi ghllag yan _ Jesus _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ angyagh meng _ yataaghqe te sqekagh _ luuraq _ i g h l l e g h n a y u k a n g a t n i _ megh mun _ .
yug lghute _ naallghute qugh kaqe ta aneng _ qamagte luteng _ q i n u y u g e t _ ellnga nun _ kaate naqe ghllag ke aat _ saafte pigesnagh na luku _ .
tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug t _ i l u n g i t n i l n g u u t _ esghagh nghmegteggu _ Jesus _ , _ sivungagh kun _ u l l g h a g h l l u t e n g _ akilghuu aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke aaten _ ! _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q i i _ tughneghagh t _ kina u te ni _ apegh fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ yug t _ piyukekagh ni _ t a g s i g h t e q i i _ . _ tagi laghate te yata
nakmikegkagh i _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yug t _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u k i _ . _ taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ W h a n g a m n i t e s q e l l u s i _ nakmike amsi _ , _ kayagte lleqe amsi llu _ u n g i p a g h y a g h t i i s q e l l u s i _ .
A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u l l e q u s i l l u _ tughneghagh t _ a a n e s t e s q e l l u k i _ yug neng _ . _ "
ukut _ nakmike kaqe ai _ , _ simon _ , _ ( _ J e s u s - e m _ ateghagh iqe a _ peter- meng _ ) _ ;
J a m e s - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ , _ ighnegh kek _ Z e b e d e e - m _ , _ ( _ J e s u s - e m _ atigh kakek _ B o a n e r g e s - m e n g _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh meng _ , _ " _ ighnegh kek _ kallug m _ " _ ) _ ;
A n d r e w - n k u t _ , _ P h i l i p - e n k u t _ , _ B a r t h o l o m e w - n k u t _ , _ M a t t h e w - n k u t _ , _ T h o m a s - e n k u t _ , _ J a m e s - l l u _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e u s - e m _ , _ T h a d d a e u s - e n k u t _ , _ S i m o n - l l u _ Z e a l o t - a _ ,
Judas _ I s c a r i o t - l u _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ J e s u s - m e n g _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ tukugh minun _ aglaghkagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aglagh uute laataghkagh t _ ellngit nun _ , _ repall _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ neghepagningite tke aat _ .
N e n g l l u g u t a n g a n _ nagaqugh luku _ tawaten _ aneghte llegh a _ aqfakagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ pi kangat _ nallungughte ni luku _ .
ila i _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ tagikagh t _ whaten _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ Beelzebul _ J e s u s - e m _ ilu anite uq _ ! _ enkaam _ aane ste qugh aqe ai _ tughneghagh t _ yug neng _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ B e e l z e b u l - e m _ , _ u m i i l w a a g h i t g u n _ tughneghagh t _ . _ "
