enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ tagsigh luki _ yug t _ ungipaghaate ke ai _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ ellmi neng _ aane ste lleqe a _ ?
ataneghpag u llegh _ aafte uute kuni _ , _ taana _ ataneghpag u llegh _ q e r n g a g h m e n n a a n g h i t u q _ .
nengllugute t _ aafte uute kumeng _ , _ taakut _ nengllugute t _ q e r n g a g h m e n n a a n g h i t u t _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ tughneghaan- kut _ aafqugh te luteng _ pillugute kumeng _ , _ tughneghagh _ nekevghapagningite te luni _ kenle kaghqagh minun _ kaate lleqe uq _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh naanghite uq _ iknaqe lghii m _ yug m _ mangteghagh anun _ w a y a g h t e g h n a l u k i _ saghya i _ . _ sivuke luku _ iknaqe lghii _ yuug _ asighqe aghte luku _ , _ taagken _ w a y a g h t e g h l l e q i i _ saghya i _ .
" _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ yug t _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ seghletun llu _ akuzi tke llegh itneng _ kiyaghnegh _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke gkumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ , _ qayughllak _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute yaghqaqe nghite ka aneng _ . _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ k e n g l e n g i l n g u u g u q _ . _ "
Jesus _ tawaten _ akuzikagh _ qayughllak _ ila ita _ pi kaqe kangat _ , _ " _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ ilu mikun _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ naange a llu _ a n g l e g u t a n g i l l u _ kaate tke aat _ . _ manughagh mete luteng _ aanesqekagh at _ esghagh yug ni luku _ .
yug lghute t _ aqume uute nga lghiit _ J e s u s - e m _ u v i t a n g a n i _ ungipagh tke aat _ , _ " _ qakma _ naa gpek llu _ anglegute gpek llu _ esghagh yug aqe aaten _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ naa ka _ ? _ kinkungaawa t _ anglegute nka _ ? _ "
Y u g s u g h a l u n i _ aqumga lghiit _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ naa ke amsi llu _ , _ anglegute ke amsi llu _ !
kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ anglegute ke aqa llu _ naa ke aqa llu _ . _ "
T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ Jesus _ apeghtugh i laataghkagh _ naayvagh m _ G a l i l e e - m _ esne ani _ . _ elngaatall _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ tagi laghate te ghllag ke aq _ ellnga nun _ , _ repall _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aqumekagh _ , _ llaaghanwha _ yug lghute t _ naayvagh m _ e s n e n g a n i t k a t _ .
ungipaghaate tgun _ a l l a a g h i i n a g h m e n g _ apeghtugh qu ai _ . _ apeghtugh i te kete luku _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ nagate tek _ ! _ piitesighagh a _ aglagh luni _ piitesigh u aghagh vig minun
ifkagh qughkagh _ piitute neng _ . _ ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ tume tgun _ , _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ negh u qu ait _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ uyghagtuqagh kun _ s u n a p a g i l n g u g h q u n _ . _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ piite tke aat _ , _ qayughllak _ suna a _ ugmestaaghhagh _ .
enkaam _ siqinegh _ piite yalghiimi _ maatnegh an _ paneghtekagh i _ p i i n n e g h h a t _ , _ akugh nge llegh ite u te meggneng _ paligh rakegtekagh t _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ , _ sikughllug t _ piite yalghiimeng _ piite vig iqe ait _ g r a i n - e t _ .
naqamalla _ tamaakut _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ piite ste i ghllagkagh t _ g r a i n - m e n g _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ enkaam _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ taaqe nigh ke ai _ whaten _ , _ " _ sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ Jesus _ e l l n g i n a a g h s a n _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a l l u _ ila ita llu _ tamaakut _ nagatekagh t _ aaptekagh at _ ungipaghaate kekagh aneng _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike sta _ talugh nga lghii _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h a _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ liite tesi mangite yagh aa _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ iqite nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ nagaqugh aqe ut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ungipaghaate tgun _ .
enkaam _ ' _ esghaate naqe aqe ut _ , _ esghaate naqe aqe ut _ esghaate gpenateng _ . _ nagate aqe ut _ , _ nagate aqe ut _ liigike gpenateng _ . _ pi kaayagh kumeng _ qiive nayagh ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ seghevute nayagh ai _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ taana _ ungipaghagh an _ piitesighagh a _ l i i g i k e n g h i t e s t e g g u u _ ? _ naten mi _ liigike naqe steki _ alngunak _ ungipaghaate t _ ?
piitesighagh a _ ifkaghqagh igh lghii _ piitute neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ungipaghte ngatu te _ ayuqe uq _ .
ila i _ yug t _ qelli ghllagkagh stun _ tume stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ tekite nghata _ tume tgun _ qawaag t _ negh aqe ait _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh te nghata _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ tughneghagh m _ puygu ste aqe ai _ .
ila i _ yug t _ uyghagtuqagh stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ akugh t _ u y g h a g t u q a m e l n g u u t _ asivagh pagigate ut _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh te negh meggni _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ tugukligh aqe ait _ quyake sigh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ u g p e q n g w a a g h i g a l k a n g i t _ akuzi ta i _ enkaam _ ugpegh llegh it _ mulu igate ut _ . _ seghleliigh negh meggni _ , _ nalighmeng _ amyuutke lleg nge negh meggni _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ ugpeqe i nanigh aqe ut _ .
ila i _ yug t _ sikughllugtuqagh stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ tekite ke aat _ nagu igate ut _ , _ qayughllak _ sikughllug t _ piite vig igh aqe kangit _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh nghmegteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ qaatke igate ait _ ,
qayughllak _ una _ unguvallegh _ n u l q a a v i i g h u t k a q a a t _ , _ teghhwaaghigh te kaqe aat llu _ aklungi _ , _ sa meng llu _ wata _ a l l g e g h u t a g h a g h y u g a q u t _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ sikughllug t _ p i i t f i g i l l g h i s t u n _ piitute t _ , _ tamaakut _ yug t _ piyuke llghite a _ puygu ste aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ yug t _ pinigh lghii stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ pinigh lghii kun _ suna kun _ elngaatall _ nagu aqe ut _ . _ ila i _ piite ta iqe ut _ 3 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh nghmegteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ qaatke aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ qepghagh aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ila i _ wataqaaghaq _ q e p g h a g h a t a a g h a g h a q u t _ ila meggneng _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ kenegh lghutagh k _ itghute lukek _ sagnegh m _ asi anun _ lli naanghite ak _ , _ nalighmeng _ qavaghvig m _ asi anun _ . _ itupill _ q u u l v a q u n _ lli lleqe ak _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ iiw iqe aq _ qaye anun _ lliigh yaghqaa uq _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ saapekagh _ saaputagh igh yaghqaa uq _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
whaten llu _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate u aghte ngnga _ ! _ T u u n i l l e g h p e s i s t u n g w a a q _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe aisi _ , _ paninang _ tuune aghagh lleqe aisi _ .
yuug _ seal- k _ tuune aghagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ yuug _ s a p a g l l a g i l n g u q _ sangiighhagh i _ tugu yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
whaten llu _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whatete uq _ : _ yuug _ ifkagh qugh aqe uq _ piitute neng _ piitesigh u aghagh vig mini _ .
piitute t _ piite luteng _ nagu aqe ut _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yuug _ qavaa yagh ghngaan _ , _ t e g h h u m a y a g h n g a a n _ , _ paninang _ piitute t _ n a g w a a q u t _ . _ yug m _ nallu kaqe ai _ naten _ nagu aqe ta i _ .
suna inagh ghhagh m _ kayute ngunani _ piitute t _ nagu ste aqe ai _ enkaam _ piite steka nge aqe ut _ : _ sivuke luteng _ sungaghyug kegtagh ghhagh t _ piite aqe ut _ , _ taagken _ n a p a a z i i n g a q u t _ qenwat llu _ g r a i n - e n g a q u t _ .
G r a i n - e t _ qigugh nghata _ unatagh yaghqaaghte aqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ yug m _ kepugh aqe ai _ kepugh sigh mikun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa mun _ uspute naqe steggu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ sa u a _ ungipaghagh te kete naqe steggu _ liigike ste i sigh u luku _ ?
ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ m u s t a r d - e m _ piitute atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ M e k e s t a a l l e g h p i g a a g u q _ piitute neng _ nuna mi _ whani _ iwernga _ yug m _ piitesigh u aghagh nghminigu _ ,
angli ghllag aqe uq _ angegh lleghpigagh ughte luni _ n u n i v a g s e g h a g h y a g g a g h n e n g _ . _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ avayagh ghrugllag i _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ unglute yagh u iqe ut _ ququngagh an _ akule akun _ s i q i n g h i l l g h a k u n _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ atuqe luki _ ungipaghaate lghute t _ yug nun _ akuzi tke kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ . _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ l i i g i k e l l e g h t u l a n g i s t u n _ .
quunpeng _ yug t _ apeghtugh aqe kangi _ ungipaghaate tgun _ , _ iwernga _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ e l l n g i n a a g h h n e g h m e g g n i _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ liigike ste aqe kangi _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ ungipaghaate t _ .
T a a m _ i g h i v g a a n i _ J e s u s - e m _ angyagh mete luni _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghvigh lta _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ . _ " _ enkaam _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ uugte luteng _ angyagh mun _ unitekagh it _ yug lghute t _ . _ ila ita llu _ angyagh t _ maligtekagh it _ .
taagken _ anuqligh ghllagkagh _ , _ repall _ imaghllug m _ i m i g h a a t a q e g k a a _ angyagh _ qenwat _ esleqe yaghtuqagh _ .
Jesus _ angyalligh mi _ qavagh _ akisigh luni _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taghtughllug qu _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ t u q u y a g h n g a a m t a a _ p i z i k u u t _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ taghtugh luni _ a n u q a l l u _ imaghllug t llu _ ineghtekagh i _ , _ " _ anuqe _ taaqe i ngam _ , _ imaghllug t _ aghuliigh tek _ ! _ " _ enkaam _ ellmaaragte te kete luku _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ .
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ alinge tsi _ ? _ taawa _ u g p e q i g a s t e n g n g a a _ ? _ "
saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ repall _ tallugh yug ghllagkagh t _ alingruugh magh meng _ , _ enkaam _ a a p q u g h a a g h u t k a t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ , _ talwa _ anuqe m llu _ imaghllug t llu _ qaatke kangat _ ? _ "
naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ kaate tke aat _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ , _ nuna itnun _ gerasa-kagh mii t _ .
legan _ Jesus _ angyagh meng _ qute mun _ uugg tuq _ yuug _ aane luni _ suflugh itneng _ l l i v g h e t _ , _ payegh qagh a _ .
taana _ yuug _ ilu mikun _ tughneghaghtuqagh _ llivegh ni te aqe lghii _ . _ awen _ qiipraghute neng _ asighte aqe yagh kangat _ i i g g i t g u n l l u _ itegagh itgun llu _ iwernga _ sakeqe aqe kangi _ qiipraghute t _ , _ kagimte aqe kangi llu _ savikenghaagh t _ i t e g a m i n i l n g u u t _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ asighqepag nigh nge i tke a llu _ aghula i aghtepagningitekagh a llu _ , _ qayughllak _ iknaqe pigte lghii _ .
unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ igleghte aqe lghii _ llivegh t _ q u n g a n g i t n i l l u _ qemi ni llu _ , _ quunpeng _ araghaatagh magh mi _ , _ uyghag tgun _ kiitigh qu magh mi _ ellmi neng _ .
Jesus _ esghagh yamigu _ u y a v a q a a n l l u k u _ ketanqusnaq _ taku luku _ segesqughte vike luku _ manigugh qu a _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ yug m _ ilu anite ngughk _ tughneghagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ seghlegh _ tughneghagh _ , _ aane i _ yug meng _ ! _ " _ tughneghagh m _ araghaatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ Jesus _ , _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sa naqe zinga _ ? _ akeqe i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ikfiqe stesaghqagh u fqaama _ p i s q e l l u n g a _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kina u ziin _ ? _ " _ yug m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ategh kaqe a _ ' _ uglagh ghllag _ ' _ qayughllak _ uglagh ghllag ukut _ ! _ "
elngaatall _ J e s u s - m u n _ aapute uute tke ai _ tughneghagh t _ aghulaqe ste fqiita _ p i s q e l l u k i _ taagken _ nuna meng _ .
taawa nguq _ qemi m _ mingle ani _ kurugagh lghute ghllag t _ , _ neghe uute lghiit _ .
tughneghagh t _ aapute uute tke aat _ J e s u s - m u n _ , _ " _ K u r u g a g h n u n _ kayagte kut _ , _ ellngit nun _ itegh ste kut _ . _ "
enkaam _ angeghqe ma kekagh i _ . _ tughneghagh t _ yug meng _ aane ghesnagh luteng _ k u r u g a g h n u n _ i t e g h a a t k a t _ . _ entaqun _ 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u u t _ kurugagh at _ , _ pennagh neng _ asitmun _ pangaleg te luteng _ naayvagh mun _ ateghagh tke aat _ enkaam _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
kurugagh at _ a f l e n g a k i s t e n g i t _ qimagugh tke aat _ ne ghllag mun llu _ u v i t a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n l l u _ nuna nun _ . _ tamaani _ ungipagh kekagh it _ ilu mikun _ tughneghaghtuqagh llu _ , _ kurugagh at llu _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ esghagh yaghtugh tke ait _ samatagh nge i _ .
J e s u s - m u n _ kaate luteng _ esghaghkagh at _ yuug _ tughneghaghtu ghllag yagh lghii _ ilu mikun _ . _ taawa nguq _ aqumga uq _ p i l u g u w a a g h l u n i _ , _ umyugagh kek llu _ naallghute lutek _ enkaam _ alingruughkagh t _ .
tamaakut _ esghapagkagh t _ apeghkagh at _ naallghute ma ni luku _ yuug _ tughneghaghtu ghllag yagh lghii _ , _ apeghkagh it llu _ kurugagh at _ samatagh nge i _ .
taagken _ yug lghute t _ maniguute pigte luteng _ Jesus _ aghulaqe sqekagh at _ nuna meggneng _ .
Jesus _ uugte aqe uq llu _ angyagh mun _ , _ yug m _ tughneghaghtu yagh lghii m _ maniguute pigte luni _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ M a l i g l l a k e n _ ? _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ ighsake luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nengllugute gpenun llu _ , _ ilakumtaagh gpenun llu _ aglagh luten _ apegh naken _ A t a n g h e m _ nanglleg ke pigte luten _ apeghiigh llegh a _ elpenun _ . _ "
enkaam _ yuug _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ tamaani _ nuna mi _ ategh ke lghii mi _ , _ qula _ ne ghllag t _ , _ ungipagh kekagh a _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghiigh llegh a _ ellmi nun _ , _ tamaakut _ nagaqugh tke aat _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h y u k a t _ .
Jesus _ angyagh kun _ uteghnigh yan _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ , _ esne mi _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qerngughte tke aat _ u v i t a n g a n u n _ .
taagken _ ataasigh _ s y n a g o g u e - e m _ u m i i l w a a g h a _ , _ J a i r u s - n g u f t u q _ ategh a _ , _ tagi luni _ J e s u s - m u n _ segesqughtekagh _ manu akun _ .
maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ P a n i g g a q a _ qinuyug ghllagu uq _ , _ tuqu yaghtugh ngestagh ma uq _ . _ taku aghte gu _ saafte yaghtuqagh ghhu _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute luni _ kiyaghte li _ ! _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ maligtekagh a _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ m a l i g l l e g h a a t k a a t _ Jesus _ , _ repall _ kangllu qaghte luku _ .
aghnagh llu _ t a w a n t e f t u q _ aagtuqagh te aq _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngaan _ ayumiqullegh ni _ . _ talwa _ aghallegtagh lghute t _ kayusiite aqe yagh ghngaatni _ naallghute igate ngughk _ , _ yeghlegi _ n a a v n g i n a l g h i i _ . _ qenwat _ m a n i q r a g g i i g h u t k a q _ .
nagaqugh aqe kanga _ Jesus _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ a k u l a n g i t g u n _ t u n u t a n g a n e n g _ takukagh a _ .
sumeghtagh aqe aq _ , _ " _ aatkagh i _ s a a f t e q e g h s a q u m k i _ naagh llegh u nayagh unga _ . _ "
legan _ atkuyaagh kek _ saafte ak _ kii ii te inagh u magh mi _ pi ke aq _ , _ enkaam _ elpeg kekagh a _ naallghute llegh a _ qaamna mi _ .
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ J e s u s - e m _ liigikekagh a _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q _ aane lghii _ ellmi neng _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qiive luki _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ aatkagh nka _ saafte aki _ ? _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yug lghute ghllag t _ q u n g a n g i t n i l n g u u t e n _ sangan _ kitumun _ saafte ni luten _ pi ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ esghagh naqekagh a _ kitumun _ sa uute te ni _ .
aghnagh m _ liigike luku _ naallghute lleg ni _ a l i n g e m _ ungelegte magh mi _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ . _ taagken _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ ungipagh tke a _ sa llegh mineng _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panig mni _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpek _ naallghute ste aaten _ . _ nekeggmellegh ligh luten _ aglagh a _ , _ n a a l l g h u t n g w a a g h u m a a t e n _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aleghqugh ma luku _ aghnagh _ , _ k e v g a t _ tagi luteng _ ungipagh tke aat _ J a i r u s _ , _ " _ panig n _ tuquma uq _ , _ t a k u s q e g p e n a a n Ê¼ n g a m _ apeghtughiste mun _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nagate ghngaaghmiki _ avelghaqiinagh luki _ J a i r u s _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugpegh i _ . _ "
taagken _ kitumun _ alngunak _ maligte ste na nigh ke aq _ , _ iwerngaqun _ kelqekagh i _ P e t e r - e n k u t _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ J o h n - e n k u t _ , _ a n g l e g u t a n g a _ J a m e s - e m _ .
J e s u s - e n k u t _ kaate yalghiimeng _ J a i r u s - e n k u n u n _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t _ elngaatall _ qiya aghte te te ghllag u ut _ metuumagh meng _ .
J e s u s - e m _ itegh luni _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ qiya aghte te te ghllag u tsi _ ? _ sangafsi _ nepugti i ghllagu tsi _ ? _ taghnughhagh _ tuqu llghite uq _ , _ qavaa uq _ ! _ "
iwernga _ n e n g l a q e g k a a t _ tawaten _ p i y i s t e n g _ . _ qamagte luki _ a a n e s a m i k i _ angayuqagh kek llu _ taakut llu _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ itghutekagh i _ taghnughhagh m _ ne anun _ .
J e s u s - e m _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ T a l i t h a _ k u m _ ! _ " _ ( _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ makete sqe amken _ ! _ " _ )
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ makete luni _ piyuke aq _ . _ ( _ aghnaghaghhagh _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngaan _ uksughtutka uq _ . _ ) _ angayuqagh kek llu _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t l u _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yuke aat _ !
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q i i _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ neghyaghqagh ghhagh meng _ tuune teggu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ C a p e r n a u m - e m e n g _ , _ aglaghkagh _ ne minun _ nazareth- mun _ , _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a l l u _ maligtekagh at _ .
S a b b a t h - n g u g h s a g u _ s y n a g o g u e - m i _ apeghtugh ikagh _ . _ yug lghute t _ nagate luku _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ . _ A a p q u g h a a g h u t k a t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ , _ " _ naken _ liite aki _ ? _ kitum _ p e g h q i n g h u g h t e s t a g u _ ? _ saghiigha yug na ghllagu ut _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h i _ !
naten _ tawaten _ pi a _ ? _ kaapenta u nghite a _ , _ M a r y - m _ ighnegh a _ ? _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ , _ J o s e s - e n k u t _ , _ J u d a s - e n k u t _ , _ S i m o n - e n k u t _ a n g l e g u t k e n g h i t a k i i _ ? _ nayag i llu lli _ maa nte aat _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ tugukligh ma ite kangat _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ uuknaliqe i sta _ sii vag kaqe a _ , _ iwerngaqun _ nuna lgu ta ita llu _ nalleqligh ita llu _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g i t a l l u _ pi igate aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ tamaani _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i p a g n i n g i t k a q _ , _ iwerngaqun _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ saafte luki _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ N a z a r e t h - e m _ u v i t a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ ne nun _ pi aqe luni _ apeghtugh qu ai _ yug t _ .
tagsigh luki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ kayagte naqe nikagh i _ malghukaghte ai ta _ u n g i p a q i s q e l l u k i l l u _ n a a l l g h u q i i s q e l l u k i l l u _ . _ aghulaqe vagilgata _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i q u q i i _ yug neng _ a a n e s q i i s q e l l u k i _ tughneghagh t _ .
liilightugh qu ai llu _ , _ " _ iglegha llegh gpesini _ sa meng _ alngunak _ kelqe gpenasi _ iwerngaqun _ ayaviigh meng _ . _ neqekrangllagh ngunasi _ , _ aqeftaghaagh ngunasi _ , _ mani ngunasi _ pi lghaasi _ .
iwernga _ kameg lusi _ , _ simiite kaghqagh meng _ g g a a t m e n g _ kelqe gpenasi _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nani _ alngunak _ tukugh gpesi _ u p u g h a s k a n g i s i _ t a w a n l l e g h h a a s i _ kenlanga _ aghulaqe llegh gpesinun _ .
ne nun _ kaate kufsi _ upugha te i igate ngugh nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nagate yug igate ngugh nun _ , _ unite nakesi _ taana _ nuna _ itegagh si _ pagulangigh magh ita _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kelenga sagh ughte lleqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleghqagh aneng _ ! _ "
enkaam _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ aghulaqe luteng _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ yug nun _ a v u t e g h q e l l u k i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i i s q e l l u k i _ .
tughneghagh lghute t _ aag negh squgh ke ait _ yug neng _ , _ mesiighqe aqe luki llu _ qinu yu lghute t _ naallghute qugh qu ait _ .
umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ nagaqugh qu a _ qamagte luku _ J e s u s - e m _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ , _ qayughllak _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ apegh kangit _ J e s u s - e m _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h i _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ J o h n - n g u u q _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ unguvagh ma uq _ enkaam _ esgha _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e k _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e g h m u n _ . _ "
iwernga _ ila it _ yug t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ E l i j a h - n g u u q _ . _ " _ ila it _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ uuknaliqe i ste u uq _ , _ neghigh luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s t u n _ ayuqe uq _ . _ "
H e r o d - e m _ nagaqugh luku _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ J o h n - n g u u q _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ n a a s q w i g h t e s t e k a q a _ iwernga _ unguvagh ma uq _ ! _ "
qavnganghhaq _ H e r o d - e m _ kayagte te kaqe kanga _ John _ tugu luku _ , _ asighqe ste luku _ anusimingllagh stekagh a _ . _ tawaten _ pi stekagh a _ , _ qayughllak _ J o h n - e m _ pi iigh aa ta qaa _ herod _ whaten _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ anaggute ma uten _ tugu llegh gpegun _ anglegute gpek _ P h i l i p - e m _ nulighh a _ H e r o d i a s _ . _ "
enkaam _ H e r o d i a s - e m _ ugumi yagute ghllag kaqe kanga _ John _ repall _ tuqute sug pigtekaqsagh kanga _ . _ iwernga _ pipag nigh nge i tke a _ qayughllak _ H e r o d - e m _ tawaten _ pi stepag nigh nge i tke a _ .
H e r o d - e m _ alike kaqe kanga _ John _ liisimake te mineng _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatke te nga ghllag lghii _ . _ enkaam _ k e l e n g a k e s t e n g n g w a a q a a _ sa na yu katgu _ . _ H e r o d - e m _ nagate yug aqe kanga _ John _ qaywa _ seghleghyug aqe ghngaaghmi _ nagate nghminigu _ .
taagken _ H e r o d i a s _ qenwat llu _ pi lleghqagh ngekagh _ . _ H e r o d - e m _ allgeghvig ni _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ neqenghaghqe ste i ma lghii _ k a v e m e m _ u m i i l w a a g h i t n u n _ , _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ u m i i l w a a g h i t n u n _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t n u n l l u _ galilee-kagh mii t _ .
taagken _ panig a _ H e r o d i a s - e m _ itegh luni _ neghe uute lghii nun _ t u k a l e g a q a q _ . _ H e r o d - e n k u t _ aqelqagh ke te lghiit _ elngaatall _ efqugh kekagh at _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ pi ke aa _ aghnagh aq _ , _ " _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh vike gkuvnga _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ "
akeqekagh a llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ tuune lleqe amken _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh kuvek _ , _ talwa _ umiileg u te i ma llegh ma _ aklungi an _ aveg llegh a _ ! _ "
taagken _ aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ naa ni _ aapte yaghtuqagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ tungsigh naqe zinga _ ? _ " _ naa an _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ n a a s q w a _ tungsigh ghhu _ . _ "
aghnagh aq _ a g l i i g h w a g h l l u n i _ umiileg mun _ tungsigh vikekagh a _ , _ " _ whaa _ maaten _ , _ J o h n - e m _ P a a p t a a y e s t e m _ n a a s q w a _ piyug aqa _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ ! _ "
umiileg _ elngaatall _ qivghu ghllagkagh _ iwernga _ sa luku _ ighleke ligu _ , _ qayughllak _ akeqe u aqe aqe kanga _ aqelqagh lghute ni _ n a g a t e s t e k l u k i _ .
enkaam _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ umiileg m _ kayagtekagh a _ kelengake i sta _ tagite sqe ste luku _ J o h n - e m _ n a a s q w a _ . _ kelengake i sta _ aane luni _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ aglaghkagh _ J o h n - e m _ n a a s q w a _ kepe na luku _ .
naasqugh _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ aglagh te luku _ aghnaghagh mun _ tuunekagh a _ . _ enkaam _ aghnaghagh m _ naa minun _ tuunekagh a _ .
J o h n - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ nagaqugh luku _ , _ yugusigh a _ aqfa luku _ llivegh ke aat _ .
A p o s t l e - e t _ uteghnigh uute luteng _ J e s u s - m u n _ apeghkagh it _ apeghtugh i lleg teng _ , _ naallghute qugh llegh eng _ , _ tughneghagh neng llu _ aane ste qugh llegh eng _ yug neng _ .
yug ghllag u lghii _ tagi magh meng llu _ aghulaqe magh meng llu _ pi lghiit _ repall _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ neghepagningite tke aat _ . _ enkaam _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ natmun _ aghulaqe lta _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ , _ elpek si qun _ m e g h n a a l i i g h t e s q e l l u s i _ . _ "
enkaam _ angyagh kun _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ aghulaqekagh t _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a g h h n a l u t e n g _ ,
iwernga _ yug lghute m _ esghaghkagh it _ aghulaqe lghiit _ . _ liisimake luki _ navek _ pi naqe ta it _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ maligtekagh it _ . _ ne nun _ nallangigh te nghata _ legan _ yug t _ maligte aqe kangit _ . _ kaate tke aat _ takukagh meggnun _ ingyaghaghte luki _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ .
J e s u s - e m _ angyagh meng _ uugte luni _ qute mun _ yug lghute t _ esghagh luki _ nanglleg yagutekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ penniigh stun _ p e n n i i g h n i i g h t e n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ apeghtughtagh ukagh i _ .
W h a n i k u p i g s a g u _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ taku luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ maana _ paaghqite uq _ , _ w h a n i k u g h l l a g a a l l u _ . _ yug t _ aglagh uute sqe ki _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e n u n l l u _ , _ nengiighhagh nun llu _ . _ E l l m e g g n e n g _ neqenge yaghtugh lit _ n e q h y a g h q a m e n g _ . _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ n e g h y a g h q a l i t e k i _ . _ " _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ T u k f i g h i y a g h t u g h t e s u g s i k u u t _ 2 0 0 _ d e n a r i i - m _ aki aneng _ neqekrangllagh meng _ n e g h e s q e l l u k i _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ enta _ ivagh i aghte tek _ . _ " _ naalkute yameng _ ungipagh tke aat _ , _ " _ taawa _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maalghug llu _ iqallug k _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ qafsinkaghte ai ta _ aqume ste sqekagh i _ vegaagh kun _ .
enkaam _ aqume te tke aat _ 1 0 0 - n g w a a q l u t e n g _ 5 0 - n g w a a q l u t e n g _ .
J e s u s - e m _ tugu luki _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maalghug llu _ iqallug k _ , _ qule mun _ sivugte luni _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh t _ iigge mineng _ aavgugh luki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ tunqugh qu ai _ u y e g t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ iqallug k llu _ ii- gmineng _ aavgugh lukek _ tunqugh stekagh i _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ negh te tke aq _ kepsugh te luni _ .
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ tugulaghkagh it _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ paskete t _ esleqnga lghiit _ kagimlegh ughtekagh neng _ neqekrangllagh neng _ , _ iqallug neng llu _ .
yug t _ negh te tke aat _ 5 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ kesutke gpenaki _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ .
legan _ taaqe ut _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ qelqe ai _ angyagh kun _ i g l e g h t e k e s t i i s q e l l u k i _ B e t h s a i d a - m u n _ , _ naayvagh m _ i n g l u n g a n i l n g u g h m u n _ . _ taagken _ ellnga n _ yug lghute t _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ ne itnun _ .
A g l a g h t u u t e s a m i k i _ yughagh yaghtuqagh _ qemi mun _ .
U n u g m i _ taakwani _ angyagh t _ naayvagh mete luki _ Jesus _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a k a q _ qute mi _ .
esghaghkagh i _ m a l i g h s a a g h t e n i _ aygugh naqutke lghiit _ y a a v u q u m e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ anuqligh u uute kangi _ . _ akule gkeni _ t h r e e - k e l l a a g e n k u k _ s i x - e k e l l a a g e n k u k _ unaangu luku _ , _ takukagh i _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ . _ naghughte naqe aqe ai llu
esghaghkagh at _ megh kun _ piyug lghii _ . _ sumegh meggni _ taghneghagh u ni luku _ aragh ghllagkagh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ alingruugh tke aat _ . _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ilutughte tek _ ! _ whanga u unga _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ . _ "
legan _ angyagh mun _ uugg tuq _ e l l m a a r a g l l u g u g h t e k a q _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ ,
qayughllak _ paninang _ liigike igate kangat _ Jesus _ kina u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ esghapag ghngaaghmegteggu _ neqekrangllagh t _ nula stegkangi _ . _ tawatete kau lghiit _ qayughllak _ salin _ umyugagh it _ reghigh igate ngugh t _ .
taagken _ nagneqe aat _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ enkaam _ gennesaret- kun _ tamlag luteng _ angyagh eng _ petug qu aat _ .
legan _ angyagh eng _ unite aat _ yug t _ l i i s u q n g i n a a m a a n _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ .
enkaam _ keleg qaghtagh te ragkiighkagh t _ Jesus _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ Jesus _ navek _ pi yagh ghngaan _ q i n u y u g e t _ aglagh te aqe kangit _ allighagh itgun _ ellnga nun _ .
Jesus _ kaate nghmini _ ne ghllag nun llu _ , _ ne nun llu _ , _ e s l a m e l n g u g h n u n _ akilpegaghvig nun _ aglagh aqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagite aqe kangit _ q i n u y u g e t _ akilpegaghvig nun _ J e s u s - m u n _ n a a l l g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ J e s u s - m u n _ manigugh ututka ait _ qinu yu gnun _ waran _ saafte sqellug qu _ kenu i _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ saafte i lghiit _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ ila i llu _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ pi t _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ u v i t a n g a n u n _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
esghaghkagh it _ maligte yaaghte yan _ ila i _ uughtugh gpenateng _ neghe lghiit _ . _ uughtugh llghite ngugh t _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ p i s q e l l g h i s t u n _ .
( _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ J e w s - e t l u _ qamagte luteng _ negh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ wetku qun _ sivuke luteng _ u u g h t u g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ sivugh nghmeng _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe u kangit _ .
talwa _ akilpegaghvig meng _ tagi negh meggni _ negh igate ngugh t _ wetku _ sivuke luten _ u k m a n g i g h s a g h w a a g h a q e l g h i i t _ . _ ila i llu _ sivugh nghmeng _ a p e g h t u u s a l g h u t a n g i t _ atuqe u kangit _ . _ A t u q f a g i l g a m e g t i k i _ qayuusigh teng _ , _ sagnegh teng _ , _ siilu t _ gaaghusigh teng _ s a n g i g h q u g h w a a g h a q e g k a n g i t _ . _ )
enkaam _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangameng _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t e n _ uughtugh gpenateng _ negh aqe aat _ ? _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe igate ait _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elqughte lusi _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke ma kangisi _ piniiyugnegh ni _ elpek si _ . _ whaten _ igagh kau uq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ akuzite megteggun _ q u u l v a g h a q a a t n g a _ , _ nakaan _ ilu megteggun _ .
temngi _ manigugh aqe aatnga _ , _ qayughllak _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ katam _ whanga _ liilightuusagh ke pigte lghii stun _ . _ " _ '
enkaam _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pakig luki _ qaatke aqe asi _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pakig i lleg pigu usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh itnun _ qaatke pigesnagh na luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ .
una _ esgha _ uspute aq _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesinun _ : _ M o s e s - e m _ apegh kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ whaten _ pi lghiit _ , _ ' _ Q u u l v a g h l u k u _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ ' _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ s e g h l e q u u q u m i k e k _ tuqute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ '
iwernga _ elpek si _ alla u ut _ apeghtugh i lleg si _ . _ whaten _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ yug m nguq _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ whaten _ pi yagh ghngaaghmigu _ , _ " _ kayusiite sighqagh lgu unga _ elpenun _ iwernga _ t u u n a a n g h i t a q a _ qayughllak _ C o r b a n - n g u u q _ . _ " _ ' _ ( _ Corban _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ siingenllu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ akequsagh ke ma aqa _ . _ )
tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ apeghtugh aqe asi _ yug t _ kayusiite nghite yagh nga atki _ ata it llu _ naa it llu _ p i s q e l l u k i _ .
enkaam _ pakig aqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke pigesnagh na luki _ yug nun _ elpek si _ katam _ akuzite si _ . _ tamaakut _ temngi _ usputagh u ut _ , _ uglagh u pigte ut _ sa u aat _ pi aqe kesi _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute t _ ellmi nun _ tagsigh nqigte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u s i _ nagate lusi _ liigike teggu _ sa meng _ pi tke a _ .
yuug _ neghekagh an _ nukeggnaghqe igate a _ , _ seghletun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh an _ , _ s a l l g h a n l l u _ nukeggnaghqe aqe a _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ unite luki _ yug lghute t _ itegh yan _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ aaptekagh at _ ungipaghagh an _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si llu _ l i i g i k i g a t s i i _ ? _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ negh aqe kanga _ nukeggnaghqe sighqagh u nghite uq _ ellnga nun _ ,
qayughllak _ neghekagh i _ i g h s a q g h w a n u n _ pi naanghite ut _ . _ A q s a q g h w a n u n _ pi aqe ut _ enkaam _ yugusigh aneng _ aane aqe ut _ . _ " _ ( _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ J e s u s - e m _ apegh u a _ neqe t _ qamagte luteng _ negh yaghqaa ni luki _ . _ )
pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ yug m _ qamaken _ ilu mineng _ aane stekagh an _ nukeggnaghqe sta qaa _ .
qaamken _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ aane aqe ut _ : _ sumeghtaghagh lleg lug t _ , _ nengughte gpenani _ k i t u m e n g _ alngunak _ atuqe i llegh _ , _ tegleg ni uq _ , _ yugte aq _ ,
gelgaghni ii aagh _ , _ pakig ni uq _ , _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi llegh _ , _ puughte i _ , _ kayngusaghagh te llegh _ , _ aqina _ , _ yug lgute meng _ iqlengiqe tke i _ , _ qukaayug a _ , _ teme it wha _ .
tamaakut _ qamagte luteng _ seghlegh t _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ aanekagh t _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ T y r e - m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ , _ kaate luni _ mangteghagh mun _ iteghkagh _ . _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nalluke sug u yagh kanga _ kaate lleg ni _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ liisimakekagh at _ .
aghnagh m _ G e n t i l e - e m _ , _ allgeghkagh m _ P h o e n i c i a - m i _ , _ S y r i a - m e l n g u g h m i _ nagaqugh qu a _ Jesus _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ P a n i g g a a _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ enkaam _ aglagh ragkiigh luni _ J e s u s - m u n _ segesqughte luni _ manu akun _ , _ manigugh tke aq _ aane ste aghte sqellug qu _ tughneghagh _ panig mineng _ .
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh t _ sivuke luteng _ neghesaghqagh u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ anaggute nga uq _ taghnughhagh t _ neqe it _ tugu luki _ qikmigh nun _ miluute kumeng _ . _ "
aghnagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ atanegh _ , _ talwa _ qikmigh t _ tipele m _ a s i n g a n i l n g u u t _ negh aqe ut _ taghnughhagh t _ i f k a g h q e l l g h i t n e n g _ ! _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ naqam qun _ tawaten _ k i i m s i g h a g h p e n g a _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ tughneghagh _ aane ma uq _ panig gpeneng _ ! _ "
aghnagh _ ne minun _ aglagh yalghiimi _ panig a _ ingaghmete uq _ qavaghvig mi _ , _ taawa _ llaaghan _ tughneghagh _ aane ma lghii _ panig aneng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ T y r e - m e n g _ . _ S i d o n - k u n l l u _ , _ qula _ ne ghllag tgun llu _ aag luni _ naayvagh mun _ galilee- mun _ pi ke aq _ .
yug t _ ila ita _ , _ yuug _ nagaqugh te igate ngughk _ talwa _ akuziyiilngugh _ tagite luku _ J e s u s - m u n _ n a n g l l e g s i i t k a a t _ saafte sqellug qu _ .
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ aw iitutka a _ yug lghute neng _ . _ sivuke luku _ tekegh gni _ sigute gkenun _ kanaghte lukek _ , _ taagken _ iqite lukek _ qesigh luki _ iigge ni _ , _ ulu a _ saaftekagh a _ .
taagken _ sivugte luni _ qilag mun _ a n e g h p a k a g h l u n i _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ E p h p h a t h a _ ! _ " _ ( _ taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u lghii _ , _ " _ reghigh tek _ ! _ " _ )
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ yug m _ sigute kek _ reghigh iqe ak _ , _ ulu a llu _ piniightekagh _ , _ aga _ akuzi inagh magh mi _ pi ke aq _ akuzi yiilliqe gpenani _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q i i _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ iwernga _ i n e g h t a a t a g h y i s t e n g _ wata _ ungipagh kekagh at _ .
nagaqugh te lghiit _ tamaakut _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ , _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U u m _ yug m _ s a l l g h a _ qamagte luni _ pi nigh perewaagh u uq _ ! _ talwa _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh t _ nagaqugh te yagute ste ai _ , _ a k u z i y i i l n g u u t l u _ akuzi yagute ste ai _ ! _ "
T a a m _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ yug lghute ghllag _ qerngughte te laataghkagh _ . _ N e g h y a g h q a q r a g g i i g h u s a t a _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ ukut _ nanglleg yagute pigte anka _ . _ W h a n g a m n i n n a q n e g h m e n g _ pingayut ni _ aghnegh ni _ neghyaghqagh igh te ut _ .
ne itnun _ aglagh stekumki _ neghe ste gpenaki _ tume mi _ taakwani _ u l l e g h a a l l e q u t _ , _ qayughllak _ ila i _ uyavagh neng _ tagi laghate te kau ut _ . _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ maani _ paaghqite uq _ naken _ neqenge naqe sta _ whaten _ u g l a g h q a k a l g h i i n u n _ naama yaghqagh meng _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ neqekrangllagh t _ . _ "
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qelqe ai _ a q u m u u t e s q e l l u k i _ nuna kun _ . _ taagken _ tugu luki _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ , _ k a g i m l l u k i _ tuunekagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ u y e g t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ enkaam _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ uyegtekagh t _ .
qafsinkuuragh ghhagh neng llu _ a m s a k a l g h i i n e n g _ iqallug leg t _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ taakut llu _ m a l i g s a a g h t e m i n u n _ uyegte sqekagh i _ .
entaqun _ 4 , 0 0 0 - n g u u t _ yug t _ kepsugh te luteng _ negh te tke aat _ . _ taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ q e r n g u g h s a q m e g t e g g u _ siipnegh _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ paskete t _ imeg iqe ait _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ .
J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aghulaqe uute ste luki _ , _ enkaam _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ angyagh mun _ uugte luteng _ a g h u l a q n g i n a a m a g h m e n g _ pikagh t _ D a l m a n u t h a - m u n _ .
T a m a a n l e n g u u t _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaghtiiraaghkagh at _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ A l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g i _ , _ enkaam _ u g p e q e l l e q a g h p u t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e n _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi ke aat _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i g h n a l u k u _ .
J e s u s - e m _ a n e g h p a g l u n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangameng _ maaten _ aghnegh m _ yug i _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e g h m e n g _ tungsigh aqe aat _ ? _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i n n a a n g h i t a m s i _ . _ "
taagken _ unite luki _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ aghviqagh t _ .
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ puygu ma lghiit _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kelqe gpenateng _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kelqekagh at _ angyagh mete ngughk _ .
J e s u s - e m _ kelenga sagh uqagh i _ , _ " _ K e l e n g a n g w a a g h l u s i _ y e a s t - a t a n g i t n e n g _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ , _ y e a s t - a t a n g a n e n g l l u _ H e r o d - e m _ . _ "
taagken _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ aleghqugh tke aat _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi inkut _ qayughllak _ neqekrangllagh ite ngugh u kut _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ a k u z i t k e n g n g u k a n g i _ apeghtuusagh it _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ , _ apeghtuusagh i llu _ H e r o d - e m _ . _ liisimake kangi _ maligte yaaghte yan _ liigike nghite kangat _ akuzi tkekagh a _ enkaam _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ neqekrangllagh ite ni lusi _ pi tsi _ ? _ paninang _ n a l l u k a q e t s i l l u u _ , _ l i i g i k i g a t e t s i l l u u _ ? _ U m u g h t a k i i _ umyugagh si _ ?
iye lgu lghiisi _ , _ e s g h i i g a t s i i _ ? _ sigute lgu usi _ , _ n a g a q u u s i g a t s i i _ ? _ N e q a m i k e n g h i s t e k i i
tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ kagimtekagh nka _ 5 , 0 0 0 - e n u n _ ? _ qafsina t _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh steki _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ qula _ maalghug _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ kagimte aqe yamki _ 4 , 0 0 0 - e n u n _ , _ qafsina t _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh steki _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg _ . _ "
aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ paninang _ l i i g i k i g a t s i _ ? _ "
B e t h s a i d a - m u n _ kaa sa ta _ ila ita _ yug t _ J e s u s - m u n _ tagi tke aat _ ayaakagh _ yuug _ , _ saafte aghte sqellug qu _ .
J e s u s - e m _ ayaakagh _ t a s l u q l u k u _ aghulaqe tke a _ ne meng _ . _ taagken _ qesigh lukek _ iye kek _ saafte lukek _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ esghaate nghite ziin _ ? _ "
yug m _ sivugte luni _ y u g s u g h a l u n i _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ esghagh anka _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ esghaqagh u luteng _ llangaqa _ uqfig t _ piyug te lghiit _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ allameng _ saaftekakek _ yug m _ iye kek _ . _ maatenllaam _ yuug _ esghaate naqe ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ qemall _ e s g h a a s a g u n n e q i g t u q _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ .
J e s u s - e m _ agligh sqekagh a _ ne anun _ , _ pi ke aa llu _ , _ " _ aghuliigh fqaavek _ taakwani _ ne mi _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ aghulaqekagh t _ ne nun _ t u n g a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ C a e s a r e a _ P h i l i p p i - e m _ . _ tume mi _ taakwani _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kina u ni lunga _ yug t _ pi aqe atnga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ila ita _ pi aqe aaten _ J o h n - n g u n i l u t e n _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ ila ita _ E l i j a h - n g u n i i q a a t e n _ , _ enkaam _ ila ita _ nalug iqe ni luten _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ . _ "
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ elpek si _ k i n g a n g u n i i q e s t e n g n g a _ ? _ " _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ C h r i s t - a n g u u t e n _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q i i _ , _ " _ kitumun _ alngunak _ apegh gpenanga _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtugh kestaghkagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ ighsake yaghqaqe aat llu _ siivanllegh t _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ taagken _ tuqu lleqe aat _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
W h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ ungipagh tke ai _ . _ P e t e r - e m _ iqitute luku _ aghyuugh qu a _ .
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ qiive luni _ esghaghkagh i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ taagken _ peter _ aghyuugh qu a _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ awite te n _ whanga mneng _ , _ tughneghagh _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ten _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke ai _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke nghite ai _ ! _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i l l u _ t a g s i g h t e g h l u k i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ maligte yu kuminga _ , _ ellmi neng _ katam _ piyuke lleg ni _ pegte luki _ , _ qaquuragh ni _ uyamig luku _ maligte linga _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ yuguligh yu kunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ifla kunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ y u g u l i y a g h q a q a a _ .
sa u a ngam _ yug m _ pinighqe sigh ke lleqe agu _ pi liite luku _ nunaghllag _ , _ ifla kumikek _ unguva sigh gni _ ?
S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ yuug _ veghte sigh ke lleqe a _ unguva sigh gminun _ ?
maaten _ aghnegh m _ yug i _ ataasiighmete nghite ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghleghqe ma u ut llu _ . _ maani _ aghnegh ni _ kitum _ alngunak _ kayngu yagute kanganga _ , _ apeghtuusagh nka llu _ , _ whanga llu _ ighneghagh ni _ yug m _ kayngu yagute lleqe aqa _ tagi kuma _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i g h l u n g a _ ata mneng _ k e l q e l l u k i _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yaquleg t _ . _ "
nagnegh tke ai llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ila si _ nekevgha te lghiit _ whani _ tuqu naanghite ut _ kenlanga _ esghagh llegh meggnun _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi kan _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h t u u m a g h m i _ . _ "
aghvinleg _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ k e l q e l l u k i _ P e t e r - e n k u t _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ , _ J o h n - e n k u t _ , _ mat- yuqagh t _ uusqagh lghii mun _ naayghagh mun _ . _ E l l n g i n a g h h a a l g h i i t _ tawani _ J e s u s - e m _ yugusigh a _ allangughtekagh _ esghagh ma llegh itni _ .
aatkagh i _ qelmeghtekagh t _ qategtu te _ , _ qategh aghagh luteng _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuna mi _ qateghsagh aqe ka aneng _ .
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ e s g h a p a k a g k e t _ E l i j a h - n k u k _ M o s e s - e n k u k _ aliigh lutek _ aleghqugh ka ak _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ repall _ sa meng _ pipag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ itagnagh pigte uq _ w h a a n l e n g u u k u t _ ! _ pi nga yu t _ azigutagh t _ nekefte naqe aput _ , _ elpenun llu _ M o s e s - m u n l l u _ E l i j a h - m u n l l u _ . _ "
taagken _ qilag u aq _ aliigh luni _ saapekagh i _ . _ qilawaagh meng _ me m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U n a n g u u q _ piniqe pigtegkegka _ ighnegh ka _ ; _ nagate aqe teggu _ ! _ "
taagken _ yugsughagh uaghaghte yalghiimeng _ M o s e s - e n k u k _ E l i j a h - n k u k _ aviite uk _ , _ J e s u s - n g i n a g h h a q _ t a w a n t e f t u q _ .
ukig te kete luku _ naayghagh meng _ J e s u s - e m _ u n g i p a q e s n a n i g h w a a q a a _ esghaate llegh at _ kenlanga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu llegh meng _ u n g u v a g h t e k a n _ .
enkaam _ i n e g h s i s t e n g _ qaatkekagh at _ , _ iwernga _ e l l n g i n a a g h h n e g h m e g g n i _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ sa meng tuq _ p i s i i w a _ ' _ tuqu llegh meng _ u n g u v a g h t e l l e q _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ pi aqe atgu _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa ni luku _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa u uq _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ y a t a a g h q e n n a l u k u _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ A a p t a g h l l a m s i _ , _ naqam _ sangan _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kaqe atgu _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ikfiqe ghllag yaghqaa ni luku _ , _ s a s i i n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n l l u _ kiyaghute yaghqaa ni luku _ ?
iwernga _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ elijah _ tagi kau uq _ , _ yug t _ piyuke llegh megestun _ pi kaqe aat _ katam _ tawaten _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i n a q n i l l g h i s t u n _ . _ "
T a k u y a q m e g t e k i _ ila i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ , _ yug lghute ghllag _ t a w a n t u t e f t u q _ . _ ila ita _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaghtiiraagh aqe ait _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ .
legan _ yug t _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ saghiigha yug ghllag luteng _ payegh aghte luku _ quyakekagh at _ .
J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa meng _ aaghtiiraagh aqe steki _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ ? _ "
yug lghute ghllag t _ akule itneng _ yug m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ighnegh ka _ tagite yagh aqa _ elpenun _ , _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ . _ T a a m _ tughneghagh m _ akuzite igate a _ .
kaate pigte nghminigu _ iqu sta qaa _ , _ q a a n g h a l l u _ n u v a g l l i i g h q e s t a q a a _ , _ ggute i _ terqitaagtagh ste aqe ai _ , _ t e v e g h q w a a s t a q a a l l u _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e g p e n u n _ kayagte te aghte yagh aqa _ tughneghagh _ aane ste sqellug qu _ iwernga _ pipagningite aat _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ ugpeqe i llghite usi _ ! _ naten _ t a g k a a n _ elpesinite naqe zinga _ u g p e q e s q e l l u n g a _ ? _ mekelghiigh _ whavek _ tagite ggu _ ! _ "
enkaam _ tagi tke aat _ . _ legan _ tughneghagh m _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ , _ mekelghiigh _ iqu ste luku _ sayugpagtagh stekagh a _ . _ tamaani _ temngi _ ullghitag perewaaghte stekagh a _ , _ q a a n g h a l l u _ nuvagllug iigh stekagh a _ .
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh a _ ata a _ , _ " _ qavngaghhaaneng _ tawatete a _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ me ke ta ghhagh u te mineng _ ima _ .
uglagh ghngaan _ k e n g h e g n u n l l u _ megh mun llu _ iqu ste aqe yagh aa _ tuqu sqellug qu _ . _ pi yaghqaa kuvek _ nanglleg yagute lutung _ kayusiite aghte kung _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sangavek _ tawaten _ pi ziin _ , _ ' _ pi yaghqaa kuvek _ ' _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pi yaghqaqe a _ yug mun _ ugpegh lghii mun _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ mekelghiigh m _ ata a _ iglagtu luni _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ ugpegh unga _ , _ iwernga _ u g p e l l e g h t u g h t a g h a q a g h n g a _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ esghagh luki _ wata _ yug t _ tagi laghate te lghiit _ qevuute luku _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ " _ uyuq _ tughneghagh _ tuuslagh ste i lghii llu _ akuzi ste i igate ngughk llu _ qelegh amken _ aane i _ mekelghiigh meng _ , _ allameng llu _ itegh fqaavek _ ellnga nun _ pi lghaaten _ . _ "
tughneghagh m _ mekelghiigh _ araghaatagh ste ghllag luku _ , _ sayugpagtagh ste ghllag luku _ , _ aanekagh _ . _ legan _ mekelghiigh _ esghaqaaluni _ tuqukagh _ repall _ esghapag lghiit _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ tuquma uq _ ! _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ kayusigh tke a _ nekeve sqellug qu _ enkaam _ nekevekagh _ .
Jesus _ mangteghagh mun _ itegh yan _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a g h s a m e n g _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta _ aane ste nghmeng _ aghtugh steggu _ tughneghagh _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ T a w a t e l n g u q _ tughneghagh _ y u g h a g h h i i n a a m _ aanesaghqagh ke a _ , _ s a a m _ alla _ pi naanghite a _ . _ "
taagken _ ne meng _ aghulaqe luteng _ nagneqe aat _ galilee- kun _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ kitumun _ alngunak _ liisimake sug ma nge i tke a _ n a a n t u l e n i _ ,
qayughllak _ apeghtugh u u kangi _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ tuqu lleghqagh mineng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tugu luku _ tuune lleqe aat _ yug nun _ tuqute sqellug qu _ , _ n a q a m e n r a q _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ liigike ma ite kangat _ apeghtuusagh a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ , _ enkaam _ aapte yug ma ite kangat _ tetug luteng _ .
C a p e r n a u m - e m u n _ kaate luteng _ , _ i t e g h a a s a m e n g _ J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ igleghte te kete luku _ sa u a _ aaghtiiraagh te kaqe steggu _ ? _ "
kiimsigh yug ma ite kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ igleghte te kete luku _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ naligh eng _ angegh lleghpigagh u yaghqaa ta a _ .
J e s u s - e m _ aqume luni _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ tuqlugh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ sivulii aghte yu kuni _ nekegte li _ kinguligh u luni _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l i l l u _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ qukagh itgun _ . _ qete luku _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ taghnughhagh ghhagh _ u u t u n _ ayuqe lghii _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ tugukligh aqe aanga _ whanga _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kuminga _ , _ tugukligh lleqe a _ ata ka _ kayagte ikagh _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
mulu gpenateng _ J o h n - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ yuug _ e s g h a a m a a g h p u t _ ategh gpegun _ aane ste qugh lghii _ tughneghagh neng _ . _ I n e g h s i m a a g h p u t _ qayughllak _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ilate nga nghite ngughk _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ineghte gpenaan _ ! _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ategh mkun _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i n g u k u m i _ seghletun _ akuzi tke lghaghtugh naanghite aanga _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ pi nghite kanginkut _ , _ qepghagh lgutekagh ut _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ meghsi kangisi _ whanga _ p i k u t e m n e n g _ , _ ipapestaaq _ akileghtuusagh nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
" _ ataasigh _ taghnughhagh _ ugpeqe i nga lghii _ whanga mneng _ , _ yug m _ seghleghqe stekagu _ , _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ taana _ yuug _ megh mun _ ateghte yagh kuni _ u y a q g h w a k u n _ qaamqaghte vike luku _ uyghag ghllag meng _ .
iigge gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ kepe naketen _ . _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ yugusigh gpek _ nalighnegh a _ ifla kuvgu _ unguvallegh gpek _ ifla lleghqagh aneng _ quunperugllag _ . _ taana _ pinigh aghagh uq _ inglugtun _ iigge ligh luten _ hell- mun _ aglagh lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ tawani _ kumaghugh nga lghii _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
itegagh gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ iike naketen _ ! _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ yugusigh gpek _ nalighnegh a _ ifla kuvgu _ unguvallegh gpek _ ifla lleghqagh aneng _ quunperugllag _ . _ taana _ pinigh aghagh uq _ inglugtun _ itegagh ligh luten _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
iye gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ ipug naken _ ! _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ itegh kuvek _ i n g l u p i g a g h m e n g _ ii- uute kete luten _ , _ inglugtun _ iye lgu luten _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ taghyugh ligh lleqe uq _ kenegh meng _ .
" _ taghyugh _ pinigh uq _ iwernga _ taghyughni igh u uute kan _ , _ naten _ elpek si _ t a g h y u g h n i g h l l a a t a g h n a y a g h e s t e g g u _ ? _ taghyughni igh te gpenasi _ , _ n e k e g g m e t u l l u s i l l u _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ . _ aglagh luni _ nuna mun _ ategh ke lghii mun _ J u d e a - m u n _ , _ aghvigh kakek _ kiiw k _ J o r d a n - e k _ . _ yug lghute m _ qerngughte vike laatagh qagh a _ enkaam _ apeghtugh qu ai _ pi aqe llegh mitun _ .
ila ita _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ taku luku _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i g h n a q u t k e l l u k u _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegtekunigu _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ a a p t e m m e n g _ , _ " _ sangaawa mi _ M o s e s - e m _ qelegh sagh a _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ M o s e s - e m _ p i l l e g h q a l i t k a q a a _ yuug _ pegte sigh m _ igagh i _ imigh luki _ pegte sqellug qu _ nulighh a _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tawaten _ M o s e s - e m _ L i i l i g h t u u s a l i t k a q i i s i _ pineghllug ghllag te gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ nuna ngllagh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ak _ yuug llu _ aghnagh llu _ . _ '
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ unite lukek _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ nuliigh minun _ l l i i g h w a a g h y a g h q a a g u q _ .
enkaam _ maalghug u nanigh lleqe uk _ , _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te stekakek _ yeqay _ yug m _ pellegh utu te ste nghite likek _ . _ "
mangteghagh mun _ i t e g h a a s a m e n g _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ tamaaken _ p i l l g h a n e n g _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegte luku _ alla neng _ nulightugh kuni _ , _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh lleqe uq _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ aghnagh m _ ugi ni _ pegte luku _ alla neng _ ugiigh kuni _ , _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh lleqe uq _ . _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ taghnughhagh t _ J e s u s - m u n _ saafte luki _ q u y a s t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ iwernga _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ ineghtekagh it _ tagite i lghiit _ .
J e s u s - e m _ esghagh luki _ seghleghyag te luki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi lit _ whanga mnun _ . _ ineghte gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ t a g h n u g h h a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ pi ke aat _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh nghite kunigu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh tun _ , _ itegh naanghite uq _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh t _ tugu aqe luki _ , _ saafte aqe luki _ quya stekagh i _ .
Jesus _ i g l e g h h n e q i g t a q u q l u _ , _ yug m _ ketanqusnaq _ taku luku _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ pinigh lghii _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ naten _ sa lunga _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ a l l g e g h h n a y a g h s i k u n _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sangan _ pinigh ni zinga _ ? _ kina _ alngunak _ pinigh nghite uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ pinigh lghii _ .
liilightuusagh t _ liisima katen _ : _ ' _ yugtagh gpenang _ ; _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ ; _ tegleg gpenang _ ; _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaki _ yug t _ ; _ puughte i gpenang _ ; _ q u u l v a g h l u k e k _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ ' _ "
yug m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ima _ nukalpigagh u te mneng _ q a a t k e n g n g w a a n k a _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ piniqe pigte luku _ qiive luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ataasigh u uq _ pi yaghqagh n _ . _ akikugh yaghtugh ghhu _ qamagte luku _ saghya n _ , _ enkaam _ aki a _ tunqugh naken _ aklumalghii nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ aklungite lleqe uten _ qilag mi _ . _ taagken _ maligte yaghtugh nakevnga _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi yatni _ yuug _ nulgiighkagh _ , _ iqitekagh _ iilqe pigte luni _ qayughllak _ aklungite pigte lghii _ .
Jesus _ y u g s u g h a l u n i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ a k l u n g i l n g u g h n i _ itegh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
tawaten _ p i y i s t e n g _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ pilagh te aqe ai _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ itegh lleghqagh _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ !
piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa uq _ c a m e l - e m _ suflughte te lleghqagh a _ sikugh m _ iye akun _ , _ a k l u n g i l n g u u m _ yug m _ itegh lleghqagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ wataqaaghaq _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ enkaam _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ a a p q u g h a a g h u t k a t _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe a _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ qiive luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug t _ pi yaghqaqe nghite kangit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esghaqagh kut qun _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ unite luku _ m a l i g l l e g h a a t a m k e n _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ unite kumiki _ mangteghagh ni _ , _ anglegute ni _ , _ naa ni _ , _ ata ni _ , _ avaqutagh ni _ , _ nuna ni _ apallugh ke lunga _ whanga _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ ungipagh t _ ,
allgegh utu aghagh yaghqaa uq _ whani _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m i _ . _ mangteghagh a _ , _ a n g l e g u t a n g i _ , _ naange a _ , _ avaquti a _ , _ nuna a _ , _ nula ghllag yaghqaa ut _ ; _ t a m a a k u n u n _ maligte te luku _ amyuutke lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ taagken _ t a a k w a n i n g a n i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ uglagh lghiit _ angegh lleghpigagh at _ ukaligh ughte yaghqaa ut _ taagani _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh lghiit _ u k a l i g h p i g a a t _ angegh lleghpigagh ughte yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus _ aga _ sivu itnite ngughk _ iglegha u luki _ tume tgun _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ ayuqe lghii tgun _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ yug t llu _ alinge magh meng _ maligtekagh at _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aafte te luki _ ungipaate laataghkagh i _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e n n a q u k u t _ . _ tawani _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n l l u _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ nanqigte luku _ tuqute yaghqaa ni lleqe aat _ , _ enkaam _ tuune lleqe aat _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ .
taakut _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ , _ qesigh qu lleqe aat _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aat _ , _ tuqu lleqe aat llu _ . _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
taagken _ J a m e s - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ , _ Z e b e d e e - m _ ighnegh gkenka _ taku luku _ Jesus _ pikagh ak _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ elpenun _ sa meng _ pi sqe sug ukung _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ sa sqe sug stek _ whanga mnun _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ N i g h u g h q e n g n g a l g h i i m i _ ataneghpag u llegh gpeni _ aqume gkuvek _ aqume lgusigh yug amken _ , _ naligh ung _ aghenqignegh gpenite luku _ , _ naligh ung _ saghumignegh gpenite luku _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ nalluke aghte tek _ sa meng _ tungsigh llegh ek _ . _ meghyaghqagh mneng _ q a y u u s i m e l n g u g h m e n g _ meghe lleqe stek _ ? _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mtun _ paaptaaye lleqe stek _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ pi yaghqaa ukung _ . _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ meghyaghqagh ka _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ qaywa _ meghe lleqe aghte tek _ , _ paaptaaye lleqe utek llu _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mtun _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ nakmike yaghqaqe nghite anka _ kinku t _ aqume yaghqaa ta i _ aghenqignegh mkun llu _ saghumignegh mkun llu _ , _ yataaghqe tke aat _ tamaakut _ aqume yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
taakut _ qula _ m a l i g h s a a g h t e t _ nagaqugh lukek _ J a m e s - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ p i l l g h a k _ , _ u g u m i y a g u t k a g k e t _ .
enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ qerngughte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisima kasi _ G e n t i l e - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ a t a n g h u t a q i i t _ yug teng _ , _ a a n g w a a g h u g h t e k a t l u _ y u k e g h q u t a q i i t _ .
iwernga _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite usi _ elpek si _ . _ naligh i _ aangwaagh u yu kuni _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l i _ ila minun _ ,
naligh i llu _ aange lleghpigagh u yu kuni _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h l l i _ tea- ma anun _ .
talwa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kau nghite uq _ q e p g h a a t e s q e l l u n i _ , _ tagi kau uq _ qepghagh te i na luni llu _ t u u n a l u k u l l u _ unguvallegh ni _ y u g u l i n a l u k i _ yug lghute t _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ J e r i c h o - m u n _ kaate luteng _ , _ aghulaqekagh t _ . _ T a a w a a n g u q _ ayaakagh _ yuug _ , _ ategh a _ B a r t i m a e u s _ , _ ighnegh a _ T i m a e u s - e m _ aqume luni _ tume t _ sani itgun _ tungsigh ragh aqe lghii _ .
nagaqugh yamigu _ Jesus _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i _ , _ tughwaagh ni luku _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ Jesus _ ! _ ighneghagh ni _ D a v i d - e m _ ! _ nanglleg yagute aghte nga _ ! _ "
uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ aghyuugh qu aat _ nepiigh sqellug qu _ iwernga _ q e v u u t a g h a l l u n i _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ ighneghagh ni _ D a v i d - e m _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte nga _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aghuliigh luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tagi sqe teggu _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tuqlugh luku _ ayaakagh _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ tuqlugh aaten _ nekeve i _ ! _ "
qaasligh ak _ atkuyaagh gni _ mat-aghaghte lukek _ nekefqaghte luni _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ .
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ S a s q e l l u t e n _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ " _ ayaakagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ e s g h a a s a g u n n e q i g s u g t u n g a _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ igleghte lghaaten _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpek _ naallghute ste aaten _ . _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ esghagh u sag u tke aq _ taagken _ maligtekagh a _ Jesus _ .
T u g h a a g h y a l g h i i m e n g _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ kaate tke aat _ B e t h p h a g e - m u n l l u _ B e t h a n y - m u n l l u _ , _ M o u n t _ O l i v e s - m i _ . _ taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ kayagtekakek _ maalghug _ m a l i g s a a g h t e g n i _ ne mun _ pi sqellug kek _ . _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ kaate ghesnagh kuftek _ esghagh lleqe aghte tek _ d o n k e y - g h a q _ petug nga lghii _ kitum _ alngunak _ igleghte tke ma ite kanga _ . _ iteme te luku _ t a g i n n a k e s e k _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aapteka nge istek _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sa naqe stegnegu _ ? _ ' _ u n g i p a a n n a k e s e k _ , _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ atuqe yug aa _ . _ taaqe ghesnagh kunigu _ veghute ste naagh aa _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ ne mun _ kaate lutek _ tume nite luku _ esghaghkagh ak _ d o n k e y - g h a q _ petug nga lghii _ mangteghagh m _ amig an _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ . _ I t e m s i m a l u k u
yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ tawani _ aaptekagh gket _ , _ " _ sangan _ iteme te stegnegu _ d o n k e y - g h a q _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aik _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtugh llegh atun _ enkaam _ yug t _ nepiigh tke agket _ .
J e s u s - m u n _ kaat ute te luku _ d o n k e y - g h a q _ , _ qaasligh at _ atkuyaag tek _ teghig ke sagh m _ qaye akun _ lli yagneki _ , _ Jesus _ uugte luni _ igleghtekagh _ .
tamaakut _ yug lghute t _ igleghte te lghiit _ tume tgun _ saul- ghqu qu ait _ qaasligh at _ atkuyaag teng _ , _ ila it _ avayagh meng _ ququngagh leg meng _ ikute aqe luteng _ tume t _ sa aghte qugh vikekagh it _ .
J e s u s - e m _ s i v u n g a n i l n g u u t l u _ k i n g u n g a n i l n g u u t l u _ akilghuu tke aat _ , _ " _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ !
kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ sivunegh mta _ D a v i d - e m _ ! _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ q u l i g h p i g a g h m e l n g u q _ qilag mi _ ! _ "
Jesus _ kaate luni _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ aglaghkagh _ temple- mun _ . _ tawani _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ yuvghiigh qagh a _ . _ W h a n i k u n g u l g h i i _ , _ k e l q e l l u k i _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aglaghkagh _ B e t h a n y - m u n _ .
unaami ani _ , _ B e t h a n y - m e n g _ uteghnigh te kete luku _ Jesus _ iyataghkagh _ .
uyavagh neng _ esgha qaa _ f i g s - e m _ uqfig a _ ququngaghtuqagh _ , _ enkaam _ esghagh yaghtuqagh a _ f i g s - e l g u n a y u k a n _ . _ K a a s a q m i n i g u _ ququngagh raaghinagh u uq _ , _ qayughllak _ salin _ f i g s - e t _ piite yug nigh ite ngugh t _ .
J e s u s - e m _ uqfig _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ kitum _ alngunak _ f i g s - e t u g h v i k n a a n g h i t a a t e n _ ! _ " _ M a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ nagatekagh at _ .
kaate yameng _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ Jesus _ , _ temple- mun _ pi ke aq _ . _ tawani _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tukfightugh lghiit llu _ akilpegagh lghiit llu _ . _ mani meng _ n a v e g h q u g h t e t _ t i p e l n g i t _ ullegh qugh qu ai _ , _ aqumutagh it llu _ qawaag meng _ a k i l p e g a g h t e t _ .
nangaqaghte yaghqaa nanigh stekagh i llu _ kinku t _ alngunak _ sa meng _ tugumiigh leg t _ T e m p l e - e m _ manughagh akun _ .
taagken _ apeghtugh qu ai _ yug t _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ ' _ mangteghagh ka _ , _ yughaghvig u yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug anun _ nuna m _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ elpek si _ i i g h a g h v i g u g h t a g h s i _ w a y a g h n i i g h t e n u n _ ! _ "
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ nagaqugh luku _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ , _ a k u z i m g h h u t k e g k a a t _ naten _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ , _ naqam _ alike magh an _ . _ alikekagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yagute u kangit _ apeghiigh llegh i _ .
I g h i v g a g h y a g u _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ aghulaqekagh t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ .
unaangu luku _ igleghte te kete luku _ esghaghkagh at _ f i g s - e m _ uqfig a _ p a l i g h w a a g h u m a l g h i i _ akugh ghhagh minun _ kenlanga _ .
P e t e r - e m _ esghagh luku _ neqagh tke a _ J e s u s - e m _ p i l l g h a _ . _ enkaam _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ii-i _ , _ f i g s - e m _ uqfig a _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q a n _ p a l i g h w a a g h u m a a q _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ugpeqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ m a l g h u k l i l l n g u n a n i _ ilu mikun _ , _ ugpeqe gkumiki llu _ akuzite ni _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ , _ una _ naayghagh _ whaten _ pi kunigu _ , _ ' _ kellii nun _ ategh i _ , _ ' _ taawa _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ ellnga nun _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ : _ sa u a _ alngunak _ a k l u k e g k a g h s i _ yughagh tke gkufsigu _ ugpeqe luku _ a l l g e g h s a g h q a q u t s i _ , _ taawa _ a l l g e g h l l e q a g h s i _ .
nekeve negh gpesini _ yughagh na lusi _ , _ seghevute aqe teki _ seghletun _ p i s t e s i _ , _ enkaam _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ seghevute lleqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ "
iwernga _ seghevute i nghite kufsi _ , _ talwa _ ata gpesi _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ seghevute naanghite ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
J e s u s - e n k u t _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ k a a n n e q i g t e k a t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ . _ Jesus _ igleghte ma luku _ T e m p l e - e m _ manughagh ani _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ E l d e r - e t l u _ taku luku
aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ S a a m _ pi lleghqagh akun _ aane ste qugh ziki _ a k i l p e g a g h t e t _ ? _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi u ziin _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate lleqe amsi _ kitum _ q e l e l g h a k u n _ tawaten _ pi kau tke a _ kiimsigh kufsinga _ .
J o h n - e m _ p a a p t a a y e g h i l l g h a _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u a _ , _ nalighmeng _ yug neng _ ? _ ungipaate ngnga _ . _ "
E l l m e g g n e n g _ a k u z i m g h h u t k a t _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh meng _ p i k n i k u m t e g g u _ , _ pi lleqe ainkut _ , _ ' _ S a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ u g p e q e n g h i s t e g g u _ John _ ? _ '
yug neng _ p i k n i k u m t e g g u _ yug t _ angu yiite lleqe ainkut _ . _ " _ ( _ alingekagh t _ yug neng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqe u kangat _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste u ta a _ . _ )
enkaam _ Jesus _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ nallukagh ut _ . _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ ungipaate naanghite amsi _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi kau tke a _ . _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ ungipaghaate tgun _ aleghqugh qu ai _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ piite tesiigh aqe aq _ grapes- meng _ , _ mingllu sigh ke a llu _ u v i t a n g a _ piitesighaghvig ni _ . _ laag te gkakek _ grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ , _ nekeftekagh a llu _ kelengake i vigkagh _ . _ taagken _ piitesighaghvig ni _ n a v g h i t k a a _ grapes- meng _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e n u n _ n e n g i t e s q e l l u n i _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ natmun _ aghulaqekagh _ .
saghna yaghqaaghte yata _ ataasigh _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ keveg aqekagh a _ nengigh ni _ g r a p e s - e t _ a q f a s q e l l u k i _ .
kaate yan _ taakut _ a f l e n g a k i s t e t _ akuqagh luku _ q e v u t i i g h l u k u _ ava u na an _ aglagh stekagh at _ .
keveg aqlaatagh qagh a _ ila a _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ . _ taana _ n a a s q w a k u n _ kiitigh qu luku _ , _ kayngusaghagh te stekagh at _ .
keveg aqe i i laataghkagh _ ila aneng _ q e p g h a g h t e m i _ enkaam _ taana _ tuqu tke aat _ . _ ila i llu _ q e p g h a g h t e l g h u t e n i _ k e v g a q e n g h a k i _ legan _ tawaten _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ ila it _ qevute i aqe ait _ , _ ila it _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ .
" _ qenwat _ ataasighhaaghte uq _ keveg aqe yaghqagh a _ , _ ighnegh a _ piniqumtaagh a _ . _ keveg aqekagh a _ sumeghtaghagh magh mi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ ighnegh ka _ sii vag kete lleqe aat _ . _ '
iwernga _ taakut _ a f l e n g a k i s t e t _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ ' _ U u m _ pi liite yaghqaqe a _ una _ piitesigh u aghagh vig _ . _ tuqute lteggu _ enkaam _ piitesigh u aghagh vig _ whangkuta _ p i l i i l l e q a g h p u t _ ! _ '
enkaam _ akuqagh luku _ , _ tuqute luku _ yugusigh a _ egtekagh at _ piitesigh u aghagh vig meng _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ S a l l e q a n g Ê¼ n g a m _ piitesigh u aghagh vig leg _ ? _ tagi luni _ n a v g h i t i v i k e g k a q s a q e n n i _ taakut _ tuqu qugh luki _ , _ enkaam _ piitesigh u aghagh vig ni _ alla nun _ n a v g h i l l e q a a _ .
A t i g h t i i g a s t e g g u _ una _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ ? _ ' _ uyghag _ m a n g t e g h a n g l l a g h t e t _ ighsakekagh at _ pi yalghiimi _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ uyghag _ .
taana _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghiigh kaqe a _ , _ A l l a a g h l l u w h a g h y u g n a p i g t u q _ ! _ ' _ "
J e w s - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ tugu yu pigtekaqsagh kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ liigike lghiit _ ungipaghaate tgun _ J e s u s - e m _ ellngit _ akuzite kaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ alingekagh t _ yug lghute neng _ enkaam _ unite luku _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ J e w s - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ kayagtekagh it _ ila i _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i l l u _ H e r o d - e m _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i i s q e l l u k u _ Jesus _ . _ kayagtekagh it _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i i s q e l l u k u _ akuzillegh akun _ .
kaate luku _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ liisimake amken _ ataasiighmete uten _ . _ waakigate aten _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ , _ talwa _ waakigate aten _ yug t _ sa u yagh nga a ta _ , _ iwernga _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t e n _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe an _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ yug nun _ . _ ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ani _ elqughutngagh a _ llivike i lleghqagh ut _ t a x - e n e n g _ C a e s a r - m u n _ ? _ L l i v i k i l t a a - a _ nalighmeng _ pi nghite lta _ ? _ "
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ liisimake kangi _ seghletun _ pi u kangat _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangama _ anag vig igh naqutke ste ngnga _ ? _ M a n i l i t a g h t e n g n g a _ , _ esghaqagh lakun _ . _ "
tuune yatni _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ gginagh ke agu llu _ ategh kagu llu _ una _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ C a e s a r - e m _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tuune teki _ C a e s a r - m u n _ tamaakut _ C a e s a r - e m _ pi i _ . _ tuune teki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi i _ . _ " _ enkaam _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ Jesus _ .
taagken _ ila i _ S a d d u c e e s - e t _ , _ J e s u s - m u n _ pikagh t _ . _ ( _ tamaakut _ pi aqe lghiit _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa nghite ni luki _ . _ )
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh ngllagh kaqe ainkut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqu kan _ a n g l e g u t a n g a n _ tugu yaghqaqe a _ aghnagh _ avaquti tete na luku _ anglegute ni _ tuqukagh _ . _ '
taawa nguq _ m a a g h r a g v i n l e k _ yug t _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ . _ nuyeklighpigagh _ nulightugh luni _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqukagh _ .
enkaam _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ tugukagh a _ aghnagh _ , _ iwernga _ ellnga llu _ tuqukagh _ avaquti gpenani _ . _ pingayut ii ta an _ tugu luku _ aghnagh _ , _ tuqukagh _ avaquti gpenani _ .
qamagte luteng _ tugu aqe luku _ aghnagh _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ avaquti gpenateng _ . _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ aghnagh _ tuqukagh _ .
qamagte luteng _ maaghraghvinleg _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ n u l i g h q e g k a q s a q a n g a t _ . _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute llegh itni _ , _ naligh ita _ aghnagh _ n u l i g h q e l l e q a g u _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si _ anaggute nga ut _ qayughllak _ liigike igate kesi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ nalluke kesi llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute kumeng _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h e s t u n _ yaquleg stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ nengughte te saghqagh u nghite ut _ .
A t i g h t i i g a s t e g g u u _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ tuqukagh t _ unguva lleghqagh itneng _ tuqu llegh meng _ ? _ M o s e s - e m _ igagh ani _ apegh nga uq _ kumaghugh nga lghii mi _ uqfig llegagh mi _ . _ tawani _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ moses _ , _ ' _ whanga _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ A b r a h a m - e m _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ I s a a c - e m _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ J a c o b - e m _ . _ '
taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke nghite aat _ tuqukagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ unguva lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ anaggute pigte ma usi _ ! _ "
apeghtugh i kayug _ liilightuusagh neng _ tagi luni _ nagatekagh i _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ . _ nagate luku _ J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh i laataqu llegh a _ S a d d u c e e s - e n u n _ , _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N a t u n g a a w a _ liilightuusagh _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ M e g n u n a l l e g p i g a q _ u n a n g u u q _ : _ ' _ nagate tek _ , _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ ! _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a a g u q _ atanegh _ .
atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ piniqe yaghqaqe an _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ ilu gpegun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ unguva sigh gpegun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ umyugagh gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku llu _ iknaqe llegh gpegun _ . _ '
T u u n g l i g h h a _ whatete uq _ : _ ' _ piniqe yaghqaqe aten _ yug lgute ten _ , _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ e l p e n e n g _ katam _ . _ ' _ alla _ liilightuusagh ite uq _ t a a k u g e t u n _ megnu naghtutka lghii meng _ . _ "
