apeghtugh i kayug m _ liilightuusagh neng _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ elqughaghte an _ ! _ ipa u uq _ taana _ p i l l g h e n _ , _ atanegh _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ alla _ avangite uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ ilu mi _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ umyugagh gmi _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun llu _ iknaqe llegh mi _ . _ piniqe yaghqaqe ai llu _ yug lgute ni _ katam _ ellmi neng _ piniqe llegh mitun _ . _ taake uk _ liilightuusagh k _ megnu nagh aghagh uk _ paneghte luku _ tunusagh kekagh neng _ , _ nalighmeng _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ liigike yamigu _ yug m _ kiimsigh te a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qantaghante uten _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ " _ T a a m _ kingu aneng _ kitum _ alngunak _ tetug yagutekagh a _ a a p q u g h a a n e g h m e n g _ Jesus _ .
temple- mi _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtugh i te kete luku _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ pi aqe atgu _ C h r i s t - a _ D a v i d - m u n _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ ?
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ David _ whaten _ pi stekaqe a _ , _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ : _ aqume i _ whagun _ aghenqignegh mkun _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ lli aghte lleg mnun _ . _ '
" _ D a v i d - e m _ ellnga n _ katam _ atigh kaqe a _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ enkaam _ naten _ C h r i s t - a _ ighnegh ke agu _ D a v i d - e m _ ? _ " _ yug lghute t _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ nagatekagh at _ Jesus _ .
apeghtugh te kete luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ apeghtugh i kayug neng _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ aate yuneghtu ut _ atkuyaagh meng _ akughtuqagh meng _ , _ igleghte yuneghtu ut llu _ akilpegaghvig ni _ yug nun _ q u n g u g h f i k e s q e l l u t e n g _ .
aqume yuneghtu ut _ a a n g w a a g h u g h t e k a t _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ s y n a g o g u e - n i l l u _ neqenghaghqe lghii ni llu _ .
esghaghlaataqu aqe ait _ ugingighagh t _ mangteghiigh aqe luki _ . _ taagken _ pinigh ni luteng _ p i s q e l l u t e n g _ taake luku _ yughagh aqe ut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghyuugh lleg nge ghllag yaghqaa ut _ ! _ "
temple- mi _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ aqumga te kete luku _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ manilghutagh m _ , _ esghapagkagh i _ yug lghute t _ kanaghtagh igh aatagh lghiit _ mani meggneng _ . _ A k l u n g i l n g u u t _ yug lghute t _ mani lghute meng _ kanagh qughkagh t _ .
taagken _ akluma lghii _ ugi igh aq _ itegh luni _ kanaghtekakek _ maalghug _ mani ngiighhagh k _ , _ qerngagh egmek _ p e n n y - n g u f t u k _ .
J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ tuqlugh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ u u m _ aklumalghii m _ ugingighagh m _ tuune gkakek _ qaayghuti u uk _ a k l u n g i l n g u u t _ tuune ke ii te neng _ .
yug t _ kanaghte i u ut _ aklungi meggneng _ , _ iwernga _ u u m _ aghnagh m _ kanagh a _ qamagte luku _ mani ngiighhagh ni _ , _ a k l u k n g u y a q a n g a _ ellmi nun _ k i y a g h u s i g h q a a l u k u _ . _ "
Jesus _ aane ma luku _ temple- meng _ , _ ataasigh m _ maligte yaaghte yan _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ii-i _ ! _ esghaqagh ki qun _ maakut _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ mangteghagh t _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag neng _ ulimaagh t _ . _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ E s g h a g h s i k i i _ mangteghagh ghllag t _ maakut _ ? _ talwa _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ n e m i n i n n a a n g h i t u q _ ; _ qamagte luteng _ ullegh qugh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
M o u n t _ O l i v e s - m i _ , _ Jesus _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m i _ aqumga ma luku _ temple- mun _ ayuqe luni _ , _ P e t e r - e n k u t _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ J o h n - e n k u t _ A n d r e w - n k u t _ takukagh at _ .
aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ , _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqau aat _ ? _ sa u lleqe a _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ tamaakut _ apeghiigh lleghqagh itnun _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga tek _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ka _ , _ whaten _ pi aqe luteng _ , _ ' _ ellnga u unga _ ! _ ' _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ puughte qugh yaghqaqe aat _ .
nagaqugh kufsiki _ p i l l u w a t _ , _ akusqaghtagh u tke llegh t llu _ p i l l u w a t _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ . _ tamaa na _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ salin _ iqugte naqngu nghite uq _ .
nuna m _ ramke i _ p i l l u w u t u l l e q u t _ , _ nuna m llu _ ataneghpag u llegh i _ s u g h u g a a l l e q u t _ , _ nuna t llu _ nani _ alngunak _ t u y e p e g h t a g h a q l u t e n g _ pi yaghqaa ut _ , _ neqangisag ghllag aqe luni llu _ pi yaghqaa uq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu kestagh llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ .
" _ iwernga _ elpek si _ kelenga lusi _ . _ tugu lusi _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ aglagh u lleqe aisi _ . _ S y n a g o g u e - n i _ kagsagmig lleqe aisi _ . _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ nekeve lleqe usi _ sivu itni _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t l u _ umiileg t llu _ ungipaghte u lusi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa ut _ tea- ma anun _ ramke nun _ sivungagh ni _ iqugte llegh m _ .
tugu lusi _ aglagh u uute kangisi _ nanqigtivig mun _ sumeghtaghagh kestagh gpenasi _ akuzite kaghqagh meng _ . _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate aqe gkan _ akuzi aqe naagh usi _ pi sqe llegh gpesistun _ , _ qayughllak _ elpesi u naanghite ut _ akuzi lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ elpesigun _ akuzi aqe naagh uk _ .
yug t _ anglegute teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ , _ yug t _ avaqutagh teng _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ pi ste lleqe ait _ . _ taghnughhagh t llu _ angayuqagh teng _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h l u k i _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ .
whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ qamagte luni _ yug m _ ugumiite lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nuqete neghtuqagh _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
( _ yeqay _ atightugh lghii m _ liigike ligu _ una _ uuknaliqe llegh _ ! _ ) _ " _ esghagh kufsigu _ aglegh niigh te i sta _ paaghqite te ste i lghii _ , _ nekaghqagh ke nghite ke mini _ nekeve lghii _ , _ tamaakut _ J u d e a - m e l n g u u t _ anagniigh ghhaat _ naayghagh nun _ .
yuug _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anite ngughk _ qamavek _ kelqesaghqagh meng _ aqfate te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
yug m _ p i i t e s i g h a g h v i g m e l n g u u m _ qaasligh gni _ a q f a f q a a m i k e k _ pi lghaaq _ .
S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u t _ tamaakut _ qumig leg t llu _ mamaghti igh lghiit llu _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ !
yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ uksugh mi _ tawaten _ pi fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ !
qayughllak _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a y a g h q a a g u q _ seghleliigh aqe llegh neng _ ima _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ nuna _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ . _ allameng llu _ t a w a t e l n g u q _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ pi naanghite uq _ .
A t a n g h e m _ takelli mangite yagh kaki _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ unguva nayagh nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ apallugh ke luki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ aghnegh t _ takelli kaqe ai _ .
" _ taagken _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ esghaghte ggu _ , _ C h r i s t - a _ whaa _ ! _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ esghaghte ggu _ , _ tazigna _ esgha _ ! _ ' _ ugpeqe gpenaan _ .
C h r i s t - a s i g h w a a g h e t l u _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t l u _ allgegh uute yaghqaa ut _ . _ A l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g a a t a g h y a g h q a a g u t l u _ , _ s a g h i i g h a n a g h q e g h l l a g a a t a g h y a g h q a a g u t l u _ puughte qugh na luki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ p u u g h s a q l e g u k u m e g t e k i _ pi lleqe ait _ .
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ ! _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ungipaate kestagh amsi _ tamaakut _ pi ste gpenaki _ .
" _ ' _ kingu aneng _ t a a m _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag m _ siqinegh _ mamleg lleqe uq _ , _ tanqigh _ nighugte te nanigh lleqe uq _ ,
ighaleqetaagh t _ ifkagh qu uute lleqe ut _ qilaga meng _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e t _ q i l a g a m e l n g u u t _ iglegha llegh it _ alngunaghqe ste lleqe ut _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ yug t _ esghagh lleqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ q i l a w a a g h t e g g u n _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i g h l l a g l u n i l l u _ n i g h u g h q e l l e l i g h l l a g l u n i l l u _ .
" _ taagken _ yaquleg t _ kayagte lleqe ai _ q e r n g u g h t e s q e l l u k i _ nakmikegkagh ni _ yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ liite vike teggu _ f i g s - e m _ uqfig a _ . _ avayagh i _ unite te lugh u i aghagh luteng _ ququngagh i _ piite kestagh kata _ sungaghyug ketu te _ l i i s i m a k e l l e q a g h s i _ kiig yaghtugh llegh _ .
F i g s - e m _ uqfigagh neng _ liite llegh gpesistun _ esghagh kufsiki _ tamaakut _ q i l a g a m e l n g u u t _ apegh lleg mtun _ pi lghiit _ , _ l i i s i m a k e l l e q a g h s i _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh llegh a _ , _ aaqun _ amig mun _ lliigh ma uq _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maaten _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu naanghite ut _ sivungagh ni _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ pi lleghqagh ita _ .
qilag a llu _ nuna llu _ aviighute yaghqaa uk _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ akuzite nka _ aviigh u sagqagh u nghite ut _ .
" _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ nani _ aghneghmi llu _ aflu mi llu _ tagi yaghqaa ta a _ . _ talwa _ yaquleg t _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t _ nalluke aat _ , _ ighnegh m llu _ nalluke a _ , _ ata inagh ghhagh m _ liisimake a _ .
kelenga tek _ , _ waaknanigh gpenasi _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ qakun _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
yug tun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ natmun _ pi lghii tun _ . _ aghulaqe llghite luni _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ aflengake i ste ngllagh lleqe ai _ mangteghagh minun _ , _ ungipaate lleqe ai llu _ sa yaghqagh itneng _ . _ A m i g n i i g h t e m i n u n l l u _ kelengake sqekagh a _ uteghnigh lleghqagh ni _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ qakun _ mangteghagh leg _ uteghnigh yaghqaa ta a _ . _ walluumllu _ tagi uq lli _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ , _ u n u g e m _ qukaa ni _ , _ a g h t a g h a q e s t a m i _ , _ nalighmeng _ unaangu luku _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kelenga tek _ luuraq _ kaate qaghtekuni _ qavaa lusi _ angu na yu kangisi _ .
apegh kegka _ una _ elpesi nun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag anun _ pi u aqa _ : _ kelenga lusi _ ! _ "
neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ , _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a llu _ Y e a s t - a l i l l g i l n g u u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ kaate yaghqagh k _ maalghug _ aghnegh k _ atugh lukek _ . _ C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ paninang _ agghi te u lghiit _ aksaqe luku _ tugu luku _ Jesus _ tuqute na luku _ .
iwernga _ n e q e n g h a g h q e m m i _ piyug ma ite kangat _ luuraq _ yug t _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag na yu kata _ .
B e t h a n y - m i n g u q _ taawa _ yuug _ atigh aqe kangat _ , _ simon _ , _ leper- a _ . _ S i m o n - e n k u n i _ Jesus _ negh ma luku _ , _ aghnagh _ iteghkagh _ tugumiiqe lukek _ a l a b a s t e r - e k _ aqimleghutagh k _ akitu pigte lghiik _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ , _ n a r d - e p i g m e n g _ ulimaagh k _ . _ sigiqe lukek _ aqimleghutagh m _ paye kek _ kuuve gkakek _ J e s u s - e m _ n a a s q w a k u n _ .
T a w a n l e n g u u t _ ila i _ ugumi yug luteng _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ sangan _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ sakusiiqe akek _ ?
akike lukek _ allgegh te kete nayagh uk _ 3 0 0 _ siipngagh lghii mun _ d e n a r i i - m u n _ enkaam _ aki a _ tunqugh nayagh uq _ aklumalghii nun _ ! _ " _ taagken _ aghyuugh qu aat _ aghnagh _ .
iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ avelghagh teggu _ ! _ sangan _ s e g h l e q u u g h e s t e g g u _ ? _ pi niigh pigte uq _ whanga mnun _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ .
akluma lghiit _ quunpeng _ t a m a a n s a g h q a a g u t _ , _ enkaam _ qakun _ alngunak _ kayusiite aqe naagh asi _ . _ iwernga _ whanga _ quunpeng _ elpesinite naanghite unga _ .
U u m _ aghnagh m _ apeghiigh aa _ pi yaghqagh ni _ ; _ t e p e n g l l a g h q e k e s t a g h a a _ yugusigh ka _ llivegh lleghqagh mnun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke nghmegteki _ , _ apegh aqe naagh aat _ aghnagh m _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ yug nun _ neqamike sqellug qu _ . _ "
taagken _ Judas _ iscariot _ , _ ila at _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n _ pi ke aq _ uvegh ghpagte te yug ni luku _ Jesus _ ellngit nun _ , _ tugu sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ p i y i s t e n g _ elngaatall _ efqugh kekagh at _ , _ akeqekagh at llu _ m a n i l i l l e q n i l u k u _ . _ enkaam _ Judas _ pi lleghqagh nge naqutkekagh _ uvegh ghpagte te na luku _ .
sivuligh _ aghnegh a _ Y e a s t - a l i l l g h i l n g u u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ kaate tke aq _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ , _ J e w s - e t _ iiwleng _ tuqute aqe kangit _ pennagh ii aghagh aat _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ . _ M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ nani _ y a t a a g h q u l l a k e n _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh aneng _ ? _ "
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi kakek _ maalghug _ m a l i g s a a g h t e g n i _ , _ " _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ aglagh tek _ , _ yug m _ meghtagh lghii m _ nallagh lleqe i istek _ , _ m a l i g g n a k e s e k _ .
mangteghagh mun _ itegh kan _ t a a m _ mangteghagh m _ yug a _ p i n a k e s e k _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste m _ whaten _ pi sqe aaten _ , _ nani _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghii ni _ negh naqe steggu _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ ? _ '
keleg u vike lleqe i istek _ q e m t a m e l n g u g h m e n g _ ne ghllag meng _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ a p e g h i i g h w a a g h l u n i _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tawani _ yataaghqe te nakefkut _ . _ "
maligsaagh tek _ aghulaqe lutek _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ kaate yalghiimek _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ J e s u s - e m _ apegh llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqekagh qaa _ yataaghqekagh ak _ .
I g h i v g a g h y a g u _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ k e l q e l l u k i _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aglaghkagh t _ tawavek _ mangteghagh mun _ .
neghe uute u luteng _ tipele gni _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ naligh gpesi _ neghe lgusigh i lghii m _ whanga mneng _ uvegh ghpagte te naqngu aanga _ . _ "
M a l i g s a a g h t e t _ seghleghyug luteng _ k i p u l l g u s n a q _ a a p q u g h a a q a a t _ , _ " _ whanga u a _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ N a l i q a g h s i _ elpek si _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngagh lghii ni _ , _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ sagnegh mun _ neptekanga _ neqekrangllagh _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i n a q n i l l g h i s t u n _ . _ iwernga _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u q _ taana _ yuug _ uvegh ghpagte te i lghii _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ ! _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ allgegh mangite yagh kuni _ ! _ "
neghe uute u luteng _ J e s u s - e m _ tugukagh a _ neqekrangllagh _ . _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ tunqugh qu ai _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tugu luku _ neghe teggu _ , _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine- meng _ imaleg _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tuunekagh a _ ellngit nun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ megh vike aataghkagh at _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ aaw kaqe a _ , _ taaggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ tuqu kuma _ aaw ka _ kuuve lleqe uq _ u g l a a p i g l l e g h i i n u n _ yug nun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ wine- meng _ alla _ megh naanghite unga _ kenlanga _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ w i n e - e g h r a g h a q _ meghe gkumkun _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ ilagaate _ atugh luku _ , _ aane luteng _ M o u n t _ O l i v e s - m u n _ pikagh t _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U n i q a g h a a l l e q a g h p e s i n g a _ qayughllak _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ tuqu lleqe aqa _ penniighniigh a _ enkaam _ penniigh t _ mingug iqe lleqe ut _ . _ '
iwernga _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh stegkanganga _ galilee- mun _ aglagh kestagh lleqe unga _ sivu gpesini _ . _ "
P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ U n i t e q e g h h n a a n g h i t a m k e n _ qaywa _ ila nka _ qamagte luteng _ q i m a g u u t e g h n g a a t a _ ! _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ peter _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ unukun _ r o o s t e r - e m _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh ste gpenaan _ n a l l u n q e l l e q a g h p e n g a _ k e t w h e l l _ pi nga yu neng _ . _ "
iwernga _ P e t e r - e m _ sagiqe pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qaywa _ tuqu lgusigh yagh ghngaamken _ , _ n a l l u n q e n n a a n g h i t a m k e n _ ! _ " _ ila ita llu _ qamagte luteng _ tawaten _ pi ke aat _ .
kaate luteng _ tawavek _ atigh llegh ke lghii mun _ gethsemane- meng _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ " _ aqume tek _ taaggun _ , _ yughagh ma lunga _ . _ "
P e t e r - e n k u t _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ J o h n - e n k u t _ kelqekagh i _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ alingruugh ghllag kestaghkagh llu _ seghleliigh ghllag kestaghkagh llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ unguva sigh gka _ qivghu ghllagu uq _ repall _ tuqu yaghqaaghte lunga _ . _ T a w a n l l u s i _ kelenga lgusigh tengnga _ . _ "
T a z i n g a p i g h q a a g h l u n i _ , _ nuna mun _ sikmuute luni _ yughaghkagh _ pi lleghqagh lgu kuni _ ikfiqe sighqagh ni _ atuqe fqaan _ pi na luku _ .
pi ke aq _ , _ " _ A b b a _ , _ A t a a y _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pi yaghqaqe an _ . _ awite te gu _ una _ qayuusigh _ whanga mneng _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ piyuke llegh ka _ avelghagh luku _ elpek _ piyuke llegh n _ pi gu _ . _ "
taagken _ t a k u y a q m i n i k i _ pi nga yu t _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ qavaa ut _ . _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ simon _ , _ qavaa ziin _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh _ aflu _ t e g h h u m a t k e n n e g h m e n g _ a g h t u g h s i g u u _ ? _ "
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga tek _ , _ yughaghte k _ , _ n a n g h i i q u l l e n g e n g h i t e s q e l l u s i _ . _ ipapestaaq _ taghneghagh k _ pi yaghqaa ghngaaghmek _ iwerngaqun _ yugusigh _ kayaate uq _ . _ "
tazingavek _ aglagh nqigte luni _ yughaghkagh _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ akuzite kete luki _ .
T a k u n q i g s a q m i n i k i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ , _ taawa _ qavaa te u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ qavagh m _ sakniqe stegkangi _ . _ kukriqekagh t llu _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh meng _ .
pingayut ii te kun _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ qavagh u aqe tsi _ , _ meghnaali aqe tsi _ ? _ T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ ! _ taawa _ aflu _ kaa tuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ uvegh ghpagte te yaghqaaghte uq _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n u n _ .
nekeve tek _ , _ igleghte lta _ . _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ uka _ u v e g h p a q u t i s t e k a _ ! _ "
Jesus _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ Judas _ kaate tke aq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ ila at _ . _ yug lghute t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ ila i _ savigpag ligh luteng _ , _ ila i _ anagutagh ligh luteng _ . _ C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ kayagtekagh it _ maligte sqellug qu _ Judas _ . _ ( _ taana _ Judas _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ ila ke kangat _ . _ )
U v e g h p a g u t i s t e m _ pi kaqe kangi _ , _ " _ yuug _ naagh yaghqaqe a _ tugu nakesi _ , _ enkaam _ aghulaqe te nakesi _ k e l e n g a k i s t e l i g h l u k u _ . _ "
J u d a s - e m _ kaat ute ke llug qu _ nagnegh vike luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ ! _ " _ taagken _ naate qugh a _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ tugu luku _ nuqneghkagh at _ .
iwernga _ ataasigh m _ t a w a n l e n g u u m _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e m _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h a _ sigute igh aghtekagh a _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ T u g u y a g h t u g h e s t e n g n g a a _ savigpagtuumagh gpesi _ , _ anagutaghtuumagh gpesi _ nikimqun _ w a y a g h n i i g h t e s t u n _ ayuqe lunga _ ?
A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ temple- mi _ t u g u n g i g a t a g h p e s i n g a _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i l l g h i t _ apeghiigh ste asi _ . _ "
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ unite luku _ , _ qimagugh tke aat _ .
nukalpigagh m _ maligtekagh a _ Jesus _ qiipaghagh meng _ saputagh ke i i nagh luni _ . _ tugu kaqsagh kangat
iwernga _ saputagh ni _ unite qaghte luku _ qimagkagh _ amsikagh mi _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aglagh tke aat _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ qamagte luteng _ t a w a n t u l l g h i i t _ .
U y a v a q a a n l l u n i _ P e t e r - e m _ maligsaagh qagh a _ Jesus _ c o u r t y a r d - n g a n u n _ H i g h _ p r i e s t - e m _ mangteghagh an _ . _ tawani _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t _ akule itgun _ aqume luni _ ughugsigh iqe aq _ k e n g h e m _ manu ani _ .
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ qamagte luteng llu _ a g g h i s t e t _ tuqute sug pigtegkangat _ Jesus _ . _ enkaam _ tagsiqligh aqe luki _ yug t _ apegh sqekagh at _ Jesus _ sa meng _ anaggute ma ta a _ . _ iwernga _ naalkute ma ite ngugh t _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ ,
qayughllak _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ temngi _ iqlengiqe tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ apeghkagh it llu _ allake te lghiit _ .
taagken _ ila i _ yug t _ nekeve luteng _ iqlengiqe tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ pikagh t _ ,
" _ N a g a t k a q a g h p u t _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ una _ temple- a _ yug t _ ulimaagh at _ naafqe lleqe aqa _ . _ enkaam _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ alla neng _ nekefte i lleqe unga _ yug m _ ulima aqe nghite ka aneng _ ! _ ' _ "
talwa _ taakut llu _ apegh llegh it _ allake tke aat _ .
H i g h _ priest- a _ sivu itgun _ nekeve luni _ aaptekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ " _ avutke i llegh itnun _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh ite ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ qalleg kau ma ite ngughk _ , _ kiimsigh ma ite kanga _ . _ H i g h _ p r i e s t - e m _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ C h r i s t - a n g u z i i n _ , _ ighnegh a _ manigugh aqe ke mta _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ T a a n a n g u u n g a _ . _ E s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh akun _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g e m _ . _ E s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i l l u _ tagi lghii _ qilag m _ qilawaagh itgun _ ! _ "
H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ aatkagh ni _ piig luki _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ L i i s i m a k e s t e n g i s a g h n g a a m t a _ lliigh ukut _ !
N a g a t a g h s i _ seghletun _ akuzi lghii _ , _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ . _ naten _ elpek si _ agghi tke steggu _ ? _ " _ agghi llegh at _ ataasiightekagh _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tuqute yaghqaa nikagh at _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ qesigh qukagh at _ Jesus _ , _ gginagh a _ saape luku _ tenglug agaataghkagh at _ . _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ uuknaliqe i ste u kuvek _ , _ ungipaate kut _ kitum _ tenglug aten _ ? _ " _ taagken _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t _ tugu luku _ qasaghte aataghkagh at _ .
peter _ paninang _ qakma _ manughagh mete luku _ , _ ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ tagikagh _ .
esgha qaa _ peter _ ughugsigh lghii _ . _ liisuqe yamigu _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ elpek llu _ J e s u s - m e t k a y u g u u t e n _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i m i _ . _ "
iwernga _ mesag igh aqe aq _ , _ " _ nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ talwa _ liigike nghite aqa _ sa meng _ pi ten _ . _ " _ taagken _ peter _ aglagh aqe uq llu _ amig mun _ a a n a l u n i _ , _ r o o s t e r - a _ qalghigh iqe aq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ q e p g h a g h t e m _ esghagh yamigu _ allameng _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ taakut _ ila ke aat _ ! _ "
iwernga _ peter _ mesighagh laataghkagh _ . _ mulunghituq _ nekevgha te lghiit _ pi ke aat _ peter _ , _ " _ mesighaghpagningite uten _ , _ taakut _ ila ke aaten _ qayughllak _ elpek llu _ galilee-kagh mii u uten _ . _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ s i i n g v a l l a g h m e n g _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ iqlengiqe u kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh linga _ ! _ nalluke aqa _ yuug _ akuzi tke kesi _ ! _ "
legan _ nepiigh uq _ r o o s t e r - e m _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh iqe a _ . _ tawani _ P e t e r - e m _ neqagh tke a _ J e s u s - e m _ whaten _ p i l l g h a _ , _ " _ R o o s t e r - e m _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh ste gpenaan _ n a l l u n q e l l e q a g h p e n g a _ k e t w h e l l _ pi nga yu neng _ . _ " _ taagken _ qiyaaghwagh ghllagkagh _ .
aghtaghagh qiinagh yagu _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ a g g h i s t e t _ qerngughte tke aat _ agghite na luteng _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ asighqe ste luku _ aglagh te luku _ pilate- mun _ , _ tuunekagh at _ ellnga nun _ .
P i l a t e - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ J e w s - e t _ u m i i l k a t a a n _ ? _ " _ J e s u s - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ esgha _ umiileg u ni kevnga _ . _ "
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t _ uglagh u pigte lghii neng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ a n a g g u n i k a a t _ .
P i l a t e - e m _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ kiimsigh te kaghqagh ite ziin _ ? _ N a g a n n e g h i s i k i i _ uglagh u pigte lghii neng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ anaggute ni kangaten _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ sa meng _ pi ma nge i tke aq _ enkaam _ P i l a t e _ saghiigha yuke aq _ .
tea- ma ghhagh ani _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ , _ P i l a t e - e m _ aane ste aqe kanga _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ yug t _ nakmikegkagh at _ .
taawa nguq _ B a r a b b a s _ anusimingllaghvig mete ngughk _ , _ maligte te luni _ ila itnun _ yug nun _ yugte aghagh te aqe aq _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag mi _ .
yug lghute t _ tagi luteng _ pilate- mun _ aane ste sqekagh at _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ tawaten _ pi aqe llegh atun _ .
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ A a n e s t e s u g e s t e g g u u _ J e w s - e t _ umiileg at _ ? _ "
P i l a t e - e m _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a q a n g i _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t _ aqinake luku _ Jesus _ tagite u kangat _ ellnga nun _ .
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t _ aaghqute aqekagh it _ yug lghute t _ B a r a b b a s _ aane ste sqellug qu _ avelghagh luku _ Jesus _ .
P i l a t e - e m _ yug lghute t _ aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sa naqe zikun mi _ u m i i l k e n n i i q e g k e s i _ J e w s - e n u n _ ? _ "
akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
P i l a t e - e m _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ , _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ pi ma a _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ i g l a g t a a g h a l l u t e n g _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
enkaam _ P i l a t e - e m _ e f q u g h s u g l u k i _ yug lghute t _ , _ aane stekagh a _ B a r a b b a s _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ kagsagmig ste luku _ tuunekagh a _ p i l l u w a g h t e n u n _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ itghutekagh at _ Jesus _ umiileg m _ mangteghagh anun _ ( _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ P r a e t o r i u m _ ) _ . _ taagken _ p i l l u w a g h t e l g h u t e t e n g _ qerngughtekagh it _ .
J e s u s - m u n _ a a t e s t e k a g k e t _ esnegrukegtagh k _ atkuyaagh k _ . _ sikughllug meng _ qaghpa ngllagh luku _ aate stekagh at _ n a a s q w a k u n _ .
taagken _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ , _ " _ Q u u l v a g h a m k e n _ elpek _ umiileg at _ J e w s - e t _ ! _ "
U n a g h s i i g h w a g h m e n g _ n a a s q w a k u n _ a n a g u l e g h l u k u _ , _ qesigh qu luku _ , _ manu akun _ segesqughte luteng _ qungughte vikekagh at _ .
legasiighwagh te kete nghmeng _ taaqe yamegteggu _ esnegrukegtagh k _ atkuyaagh kek _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ katam _ aatkagh i _ aate stekagh it _ . _ taagken _ aane tke aat _ qaquuragh na luku _ .
tume ni _ taakwani _ nallaqagh at _ yuug _ , _ ategh ke lghii _ S i m o n - m e n g _ , _ C y r e n e - e g h m i i _ , _ ata ak _ A l e x a n d e r - e n k u k _ R u f u s - e n k u k _ . _ naken _ qantagha neng _ tagi u uq _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ . _ P i l l u w a g h t e t _ qelegh tke aat _ S i m o n - m u n _ uyamig sqellug qu _ J e s u s - e m _ qaquuragh a _ .
Jesus _ aglagh tke aat _ G o l g o t h a - m u n _ . _ ( _ golgotha _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ yug m _ N a a s q w a n _ nenge a _ . _ " _ )
tawani _ tuunekagh at _ wine- meng _ m y r r h - m e n g _ akumekagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ ighsakekagh a _ .
taagken _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ qaquuragh yamegteggu _ ategh ta ii ragh u aghte te luki _ aatkagh i _ tugulaghkagh it _ .
qaquuragh kaqe kangat _ unaangu luku _ 9 - e k l a a g m i _ .
qaquuragh akun _ nekegtekagh at _ avutke i llegh eng _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ umiileg at _ J e w s - e t _ .
maalghug llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ qaquuragh ke agket _ , _ ataasigh _ J e s u s - e m _ aghenqignegh akun _ , _ aag llegh a _ saghumignegh akun _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ p i l l g h a t _ apeghiigh uq _ , _ " _ ila leg qite te kaqe kangat _ seghletun _ p i s t e n u n _ . _ "
yug t _ naghughte lghiit _ naasqugh teng _ ufsug te magh ita _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ elpek _ ! _ temple- a _ naafqellug qu _ nekefte yaghqaqe u kuvgu _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ ,
sangan _ y u g u l i l u t e n _ e l p e n e n g _ qaquuragh meng _ ukig nanigh ziin _ ? _ "
C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ yuguligh u iqe i _ ila it _ naqam _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yugulighpag nigh nge i tuq _ !
C h r i s t - a _ , _ umiileg a _ I s r a e l - e m _ , _ ukig li _ maaten _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ enkaam _ esghapag luku _ ugpeqe lteggu _ . _ " _ qaquuragh lgute kenka llu _ s e g h l e q u u q a a k _ .
taagken _ qamagte luni _ nuna _ m a m l e g h q w a a k a q _ aghnegh m _ qukaa neng _ kenlanga _ 3 - k l a a g m u n _ .
tawani _ 3 - k l a a g m i _ Jesus _ akilghuu ghllagkagh _ , _ " _ E l o i _ , _ E l o i _ , _ l a m a _ S a b a c h t h a n i _ ? _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ sangama _ unite zinga _ ? _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ nagate luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ nagate aghte tek qun _ , _ elijah _ tuqlughagh aa _ ! _ "
yuug _ ataasigh _ aqfaqughkagh _ mesag igh kayug meng _ . _ taagken _ nepte luku _ q u w a a l g h i i m u n _ wine- mun _ unaghsiighwagh qun _ nekegte luku _ nengug tke a _ J e s u s - m u n _ melugrigh sqellug qu _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ wiintaku _ , _ esghapag kau lteggu _ E l i j a h - m _ iike yaghtugh aqe yaaghagh a _ qaquuragh meng _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aragh ghllag luni _ tuqukagh _ .
temple- mete ngughk _ safkaaghute _ malghughqekagh _ , _ pike aq _ pikegken _ kanavek _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ u m i i l w a a g h i t a _ qaquuragh m _ m a n u n g a n i l n g u u m _ , _ esghapag yamigu _ Jesus _ tawaten _ tuqu lghii _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ yuug _ ighnegh ke ma agu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
aghnagh m _ ila i _ uyavagh neng _ esghapagkagh t _ . _ T a w a n t e f t u t _ mary _ , _ M a g d a l a - g h m i i _ , _ S a l o m e - l l u _ , _ mary- llu _ naange ak _ uyuqligh m _ J a m e s - e m _ , _ J o s e s - e m l l u _ .
Jesus _ , _ galilee- mete luku _ taakut _ aghnagh t _ maligsaagh kaqe kangat llu _ kayusiite kaqe kangat llu _ . _ ila i llu _ aghnagh lghute t _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ , _ maligte te luteng _ ellnga nun _ J e r u s a l e m - e t k a t _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ , _ ategh ke lghii _ J o s e p h - m e n g _ , _ A r i m a t h e a - g h m i i _ , _ sii vag qumtaagh _ ila at _ a g g h i s t e t _ . _ ellnga n llu _ utaqa u kanga _ piinligh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ W h a n i k u y a g u _ , _ yataaghqe llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ S a b b a t h - e m _ , _ tetug nanigh luni _ pilate- mun _ pi luni _ tungsigh iqe a _ J e s u s - e m _ yugusigh a _ .
P i l a t e - e m _ saghiigha yagutekagh a _ nagaqugh luku _ Jesus _ tuqu lghaghtugh ma ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ u m i i l w a a g h a t _ tagsigh luku _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ lluu aghagh te _ Jesus _ tuqu lghaghtugh ma a _ ? _ "
U m i i l w a a g h m e n g _ liigike yamigu _ J e s u s - e m _ tuqu llegh a _ , _ J o s e p h - m u n _ tugu sqekagh a _ yugusigh a _ .
enkaam _ Joseph _ tukfigh i yaghtuqagh _ qatelghii meng _ qiipaghagh meng _ l l i i v e g h y a g h q a n u n _ atuqe aqe ke meggneng _ . _ taagken _ iike luku _ yugusigh a _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ imeg tke a _ qiipaghagh kun _ . _ taawa nguq _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ sani mineng _ ilu te mun _ laag ke aq _ llivegh u luni _ . _ tawavek _ yugusigh _ kanaghtekagh a _ . _ taagken _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ ullghitagh a qaa _ llivegh m _ paye anun _ .
M a r y - m _ M a g d a l a - g h m i i m _ , _ M a r y - m l l u _ J o s e s - e m _ naa an _ esghapagkagh ak _ nagun _ Jesus _ lli ma ta a _ .
S a b b a t h - a _ alpag yan _ mary _ , _ M a g d a l a - g h m i i _ , _ mary- llu _ naange a _ J a m e s - e m _ , _ S a l o m e - l l u _ , _ tepe ngllagh sigh ngekagh t _ J e s u s - e m _ yugusigh a _ angighhe na luku _ .
sivuligh m _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ unaangu pigte luku _ siqinegh _ piite kestagh u luku _ lliveghtekagh t _ .
tume mi _ taakwani _ a a p q u g h w a a g h u t k a t _ , _ " _ kitum ngam _ up- llghite aghtagh te naqe inkut _ uyghag ghllag meng _ llivegh m _ p a a y n g a n i l n g u g h m e n g _ ? _ "
taagken _ sivugte yalghiimeng _ uyghag ghllag _ a w i t n g w a a g h l u n i _ ayuqe uq _ .
llivegh mun _ itegh luteng _ esghaghkagh at _ nukalpigagh _ qatelghii meng _ atkuyaag leg _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh ani _ . _ aghnagh t _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yuke aat _ .
nukalpigagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ saghiigha yug gpenasi _ , _ liisimake amsi _ i v a a n g w a a g h s i _ Jesus _ , _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i _ , _ qaquuragh kaayagh lghii _ . _ W h a a n n e g h i t u q _ , _ unguvagh stekau uq _ ! _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ whagun _ lli kaqsagh aat _ .
ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ , _ peter- llu _ , _ aga _ galilee- mun _ sivullgaagh ma uq _ pi naqe ni llegh mitun _ . _ taagani _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ . _ "
aane luteng _ anag na iqe aat _ llivegh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kukrag yug magh meng _ alingruugh u lghiit _ , _ repall _ ungelegte luteng _ . _ talwa _ kina _ alngunak _ sa meng _ pi ma ite kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ alingruugh u lghiit _ .
sivuligh m _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ unaangu pigte luku _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau lghii _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ aliigh vike yuwhaagh ke a _ mary _ , _ M a g d a l a - g h m i i _ . _ ( _ aghnagh meng _ taagken _ aane stekaqe kangi _ maaghraghvinleg _ tughneghagh t _ . _ )
ungipaate yaghtugh qu ai _ ellngan isag lghiit _ qivghu ma luki _ , _ qiya ma luki _ .
iwernga _ u n g i p a a s i s t e n g _ Jesus _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma ni luku _ ugpeqe ma ite kangat _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ alla u luni _ aliigh vike gkakek _ maalghug _ m a l i g s a a g h t e g n i _ , _ navek _ pi ma lukek _ .
uteghnigh lutek _ ungipite kaqsagh kangik _ ila tek _ iwernga _ ugpeqe ma ite kegket _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ aliigh vikekagh i _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ neghe uute ma luki _ . _ aghyuugh qu ai _ ugpeqe i nghite llegh itneng llu _ aygughike llegh itneng llu _ esghagh tke aat _ ellmi neng _ unguvagh ste llegh mi _ kingu aneng _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghulaqe lusi _ nunatagh ghhagh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ungipagh qite ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lghii llu _ paaptaaye lghii llu _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i nghite ngughk _ aghyuugh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e q u t _ liigike sqellug qu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h t e n g _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ enkaam _ ategh mkun _ aane ste qugh lleqe ait _ tughneghagh t _ yug neng _ ; _ akuzi lleqe ut _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ ;
tugute yagh ghngaaghmeng _ nemegh yameng _ , _ nalighmeng _ megh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ sa naanghite ut _ ; _ qinuyug lghiit _ saafte nghmegteki _ naallghute aqe lleqe ut _ . _ "
A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n i _ aleghqugh nghmeng _ taaqe yaki _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekagh a _ qilag mun _ , _ enkaam _ aqumekagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh akun _ .
taagken _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ aghulaqe luteng _ tea- ma anun _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ qepghagh lgusighkagh i _ , _ i p a p i g h q e s t e k a a l l u _ ungipagh _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s t e l l e g h m i k u n _ . _ amen _ .
T h e o p h i l u s _ , _ igagh ngllagh kaqe yuwhaagh mkun _ igaqe kaqe aqa _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ J e s u s - e m _ qepghagh llegh a llu _ apeghtugh i llegh a llu _ , _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qilag mun _ m a y u g h t e s l e g h a n u n _ . _ sivuke luni _ nakmiigh kau uq _ a p o s t l e - k a g h q a m e n g _ enkaam _ apeghtugh ghllag kaqe ai _ uglagh pigte lghii meng _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ . _ T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ anguyag ita _ qaquuragh luku _ tuqute kaqe aat _ iwernga _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ unguvallegh mi _ kingu aneng _ 4 0 _ aghneq _ nuna mete kau uq _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte luku _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ esghagh ste aatagh kau uq _ ipapestaaq _ unguvagh ma ni luni _ , _ aleghqugh na luki llu _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ allameng _ qerngughte te yata _ J e s u s - e m _ liilightugh qu ai _ a p o s t l e - e t _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ aghulaqe gpenasi _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ kenlanga _ a l l g e g h t e l l e g h p e s i n u n _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ ata ma _ akequsagh ke kaqe ak _ tuune lleqe ni lukek _ elpesi nun _ katam _ tawaten _ apegh lleg mtun _ . _ John _ p a a p t a a y e g h i k a a g u q _ megh kun _ , _ iwernga _ ata ma _ p a a p t a a y e y a g h t u n g e s t a g h i i s i _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ " _ T a a k u s t a _ igaqegkagh nka _ igagh ngllagh kaqe yuwhaagh mkun _ .
sivu ngiighhagh ani _ J e s u s - e m _ mayugh lleghqagh an _ qilag mun _ , _ a p o s t l e - e t _ qerngughte te yameng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ I s r a e l - e m _ a t a n g h u t i l l g h a _ p i s n e q i g g n a q s i g u u _ ? _ "
J e s u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ata inagh ghhagh ma _ liisimake ai _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n _ uspeqe kaqe ai _ . _ elpek si _ liisimake yaghqaqe nghite asi _ sa u aat _ qakun _ pi lleghqagh i _ .
iwernga _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g e l l e q u s i _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ itegh kayek _ ilu gpesinun _ . _ taagken _ u n g i p a q e l l e q a g h p e s i n g a _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ , _ J u d e a - m i _ , _ S a m a r i a - m i _ , _ u y a v a g h p a n i l l u _ nuna ni _ . _ "
akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekagh a _ qilag mun _ . _ esghapag te ma luku _ qilawaagh m _ talughtekagh a _ esghagh ma llegh itneng _ .
A p o s t l e - e t _ qule mun _ esghapag uute ma luki _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ qatelghii meng _ aate kaqe lghiik _ aliigh aghtekagh k _ saaghw itgun _ .
pi ke aik _ , _ " _ yug itni _ G a l i l e e - m _ , _ sangafsi _ qule mun _ esghapag uute aqe tsi _ ? _ taagna _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekanga _ ukig yaghqaa uq _ e s g h a p a l l e g h p e s i s t u n g w a a q _ mayugh llegh atun _ qilag mun _ . _ "
taagken _ a p o s t l e - e t _ uteghnigh iqe aat _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ M o u n t _ O l i v e s - m e n g _ . _ M o u n t _ Olives _ q a n t a g h a g h h a n l e n g u q _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ .
P e t e r - e n k u t _ , _ J o h n - e n k u t _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ , _ A n d r e w - n k u t _ , _ P h i l i p - e n k u t _ , _ T h o m a s - e n k u t _ , _ B a r t h o l o m e w - n k u t _ , _ M a t t h e w - n k u t _ , _ James _ , _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e u s - e m _ , _ Judas _ , _ ighnegh a _ J a m e s - e m _ , _ simon _ Z e a l o t - a _ , _ kaate luteng _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ mat- yuqagh t _ qemtagh mun _ nayugh meggnun _ .
taakut _ a p o s t l e - e t _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ mary- llu _ J e s u s - e m _ naange a _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ a n g l e g u t a n g i l l u _ qerngughte te luteng _ elngaatall _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t e n g _ yughagh aqe lghiit _ ataasigh stun _ .
taagken _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte tke aat _ , _ entaqun _ 1 2 0 - n g u u t _ . _ tawani _ P e t e r - e m _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ n e q a m i k a g h s i _ q e p g h a l g u t f u t _ Judas _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ nakmikegkagh a _ . _ A y u m i r u g l l a k _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ D a v i d - k u n _ . _ taana _ uuknaliqe llegh _ apeghiigh kau uq _ J u d a s - e m _ uvegh ghpagte te aqe yagu _ Jesus _ . _ J e s u s - e m _ t u g i i s t e n g i _ J u d a s - e m _ maghyaghqugh kaqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ akileghtuusagh nge kau uq _ mani meng _ . _ taagken _ akileghtuusagh mineng _ nuna nge luni _ qemite kau uq _ ellmi neng _ tawani _ . _ yugusigh a _ ifkagh yalghiimi _ quupaghtekagh _ repall _ ighneghagh i _ aanqaghte luteng _ . _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ tuquma ta a _ tawani _ nuna mi _ , _ ata iqe aat _ taana _ nuna _ A k e l d a m a - m e n g _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ ' _ nuna _ aaghwqekagh _ . _ ' _ "
P e t e r - e m _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ David _ whaten _ igagh kau uq _ psalms- mi _ : _ ' _ mangteghagh a _ paaghqite te li _ , _ allameng llu _ kina _ alngunak _ t a w a n t e f q a a m i _ pi li _ . _ ' _ igaqe kau lghii llu _ whaten _ , _ ' _ qepghaqagh a _ kitumun _ tugute yagh kuni _ . _ '
" _ enkaam _ nakmiigh lta _ a p o s t l e - k a g h q a m e n g _ tugu sqellug qu _ J u d a s - e m _ qepghagh kaqsagh kanga _ . _ kina _ nakmike lteggu _ maligsaagh ikagh _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ iglegha lgusigh aqe yamteggu _ Jesus _ . _ T a w a n t e k a a l g h i i _ ima _ J o h n - e m _ ungipagh ke llegh aneng _ paaptaaye llegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh ste llegh anun _ Jesus _ qilag mun _ . _ enkaam _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ maligte te luni _ ungipagh li _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh gket _ maalghug _ yug k _ : _ M a t t h i a s - e n k u k _ , _ Joseph _ J u s t u s - e n k u k _ , _ allameng _ ategh leg _ B a r s a b b a s - m e n g _ .
taagken _ yughaghkagh t _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ simigh i stekaghqagh nge yug aqe ukut _ J u d a s - m u n _ , _ qayughllak _ unite kanga _ qepghaqagh ni _ nekaghqagh minun _ aglagh lghii _ . _ qamagte luku _ umyugagh _ liisima kan _ . _ enkaam _ naligh _ nakmike zigu _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u k u _ q e p g h a g h t e k a g h q a q _ elpenun _ ? _ "
taagken _ maalghug _ uyghag k _ sa mun _ kanaghte lukek _ a g h u l a s a q m e g t e g g u _ aag llegh a _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ M a t t h i a s - n g u f t u q _ nakmikegkagh _ . _ enkaam _ ila tke aq _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ .
P e n t e c o s t - e m _ aghnegh anun _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte tke aat _ ataasigh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ .
taagken _ nuuskagllagan _ anuqe ghllag stun _ sulug ghllag m _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ ukig luni _ i mi qaa _ mangteghagh _ .
taagken _ llangaqa _ ulusugnite ngugh t _ key- nghhagh at _ allgeghkagh t _ , _ esghapagkagh it _ ila meggnun _ n e k e g h q a a l l g h i i t _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ imeg iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ qamagte luki _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ . _ taghneghagh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n _ akuzi stekagh i _ n a k u m i i s t u n _ .
tamaa nguq _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ , _ J e w s - e t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ . _ naken _ nuna neng _ tagi aqe luteng _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i n g u g h q u u t k a t _ .
nagaqugh te yameng _ sulug ghllag meng _ upleg tke ait _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte vig itnun _ . _ kaate yalghiimeng _ n a k u m i i s t u n _ ugpeqagh t _ akuzite ghllagu ut _ repall _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ .
saghiigha yagute magh ita _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite lghiit _ galilee-kagh mii u ut _ .
naten _ ukut _ qamagte luta _ akuzillegh mtestun _ akuzi ut _ nallukngwaaghkagh meggneng _ ?
whaa _ w h a a n t u t u t _ P a r t h i a - g h m i i t _ , _ M e d i a - g h m i i t _ , _ E l a m - e g h m i i t _ , _ M e s o p o t a m i a - g h m i i t _ , _ J u d e a - g h m i i t _ , _ C a p p a d o c i a - g h m i i t _ , _ P o n t u s - e g h m i i t _ , _ A s i a - g h m i i t _ ,
P h r y g i a - g h m i i t _ , _ P a m p h y l l i a - g h m i i t _ , _ E g y p t - e g h m i i t _ , _ L i b y a - g h m i i t _ C y r e n e - e m _ t u n g a n g a n e n g _ pi t _ , _ C r e t e - e g h m i i t _ , _ A r a b i a - g h m i i t _ , _ whaa _ whaante ut llu _ R o m e - e m e n g _ laalighte aat _ J e w s - e t _ , _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ maniguute kayug t _ J e w s - e s t u n _ . _ nagate aput _ akuzillegh mtestun _ ungipagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh ghllag aneng _ . _ "
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ saghiigha yagutekagh it llu _ kukriqe tkekagh it llu _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ a a p q u g h w a a g h u t k a t _ , _ " _ sa aqe aat _ ukut _ ? _ "
iwernga _ ila ita _ nenglaghyugsagh tke magh ita _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ meghe ghllagu ut _ ! _ "
peter- llu _ t a w a n l e n g u q _ a p o s t l e - e l g u t m i n i _ . _ nekeve luni _ iglagtu luni _ yug t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l g u t e m n i _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ngnga _ .
meghe ghllagu ni ghngaaghpesikut _ meghe ghllagu nghite ukut _ nutaan qun _ 9 - e k l a a k a n g a _ unaangu luku _ .
una _ whaten _ aneghte llegh _ J o e l - e m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ whaten _ :
' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ ighnegh si _ , _ panig si _ uuknaliqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ nukalpigagh si _ esghaghwaagh yaghqaa ut _ , _ nanevgagh si _ qavangugh yaghqaa ut _ .
talwa _ q e p g h a g h t e m n u n _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ u u k n a l i q e s q e l l u k i _ .
yug nun _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke anka _ sa u aat _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ qilag mi llu _ nuna mi llu _ : _ a a k w h _ , _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh ghllag _ ,
siqi i negh _ mamlegte yaghqagh _ , _ tanqigh _ kavighte yaghqagh _ aaw stun _ . _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii _ A t a n g h e m _ nanqigtivigkagh a _ aghneq _ pi yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ aghneq _ taana _ kaate ste gpenaan _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ seghevute sqe lghii _ atanegh mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ Joel _ uuknaliqe kau uq _ .
" _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liisimakekagh i _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i _ Jesus _ , _ uglagh pigte luku _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g a a t a q a a l g h i i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi stekaqe a _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ ellmi nun _ nakmike kaqe te ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisima llegh mikun _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ taagken _ elpek si _ q a q u u r a g h t e s t a g h s i _ t a m a a k u n u n _ w a a k i g a l n g u g h n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ , _ iteme te kaqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ asighqe te llegh aneng _ , _ talwa _ tuqu llegh m _ nuqneghpagningite kaqe a _ .
D a v i d - e m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ Jesus _ whaten _ : _ ' _ esghagh aqe aqa _ atanegh _ sivu mnite luku _ quunpeng _ : _ unite igate aanga _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ seghlegh mun _ qaprag snaanghite unga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaame na ke _ quya ghllagu uq _ , _ akuzillegh nka _ quya lleg perewaagh meng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tuqu yaghqaa ghngaaghma _ sighimake naqe amken _ atanegh _ ,
qayughllak _ unite naanghite agken _ unguva sigh gka _ tuquma lghii ni _ , _ talwa _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh m _ yugusigh a _ aghu snaanghite an _ .
A p e g h t u q a q a g h p e n g a _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh meng _ , _ w h a n g a m n i s i m a n g i n a l l e g h p e k _ quya ste ghllagu aanga _ . _ ' _ "
P e t e r - e m _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l g u t e m n i _ , _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ apegh yug aqa _ sivunegh ut _ David _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ llivegh a llu _ n a a n t u l a n g a _ liisimakagh ut _ .
unguva u luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe a _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ k i n g u n g h e n _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ yug gpeneng _ . _ ' _ D a v i d - e m _ uuknaliqe i ste u te mineng _ liisimake kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ C h r i s t - a _ tuquma lghiinite naanghite ni luku _ talwa _ yugusigh a _ aghu naanghite ni luku _ , _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ , _ tawaten _ q u u l v a q a q a a _ . _ akeqe llegh mitun _ Jesus _ , _ tuune kaqe ak _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ellnga nun _ , _ enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ tuune ak _ . _ tamaakut _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ esghagh kesi _ , _ nagate kesi _ taghneghagh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ p i l l g h u u t _ .
" _ David _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ , _ aqume i _ aghenqignegh mkun _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe ste lleg mnun _ anguyag ten _ . _ ' _ David _ mayugh ma ite u te mineng _ qilag mun _ J e s u s - e t u n _ , _ ellmi neng _ a k u z i t k e n g n g u n g h i t u q _ , _ a k u z i t k e n g n g w a a _ Jesus _ .
" _ U n g i p a a t a g h l l a m s i _ qamagte lusi _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapestaaq _ nakmike kaqe a _ Jesus _ A t a n g h u l u k u l l u _ C h r i s t - a n g u l u k u l l u _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ Jesus _ qaquuraghkagh i _ ! _ "
yug t _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh t _ enkaam _ peter- llu _ a p o s t l e - e l g u t a n g i l l u _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ sa naqe sta _ ? _ "
P e t e r - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ A v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h l u s i _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ p a a p t a a y e t e k l u _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ seghleghqe lleg si _ s e g h e v u t e l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunute yakek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgegh tekek _ .
atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ akequsagh ke kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ elpesi nun _ , _ kingunegh gpesinun _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ u y a v a g h p a n s a g h n g a a n _ tuqlughkagh minun _ . _ "
P e t e r - e m _ t a w a t e n g i n a q _ pi gpenaki _ wata _ sa meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ pi ke ai _ . _ kelenga sagh uqagh i llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ seghletun _ p i s t e t _ , _ enkaam _ ellngistun _ seghletun _ pi gpenasi _ luuraq _ elpek si llu _ a g h y u u g h y a a g h i i s i _ . _ "
taagken _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ ungipagh aneng _ paaptaayekagh t _ . _ enkaam _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ 3 , 0 0 0 _ yuug _ ila tke aq _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ iiwleng _ qerngughte te u lghiit _ liite na luteng _ a p o s t l e - e n e n g _ . _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ kiyaghte aaghet _ , _ negh aqe lghiit _ , _ yughagh aqe lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ .
A p o s t l e - e t _ uglagh ghngaan _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i k a a l g h i i t _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ saghiigha yug kau lghii _ , _ tallugh yagute kaqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ nagneqagh u lghiit _ ataasigh stun _ , _ saghya teng _ atunem _ atuqe luki _ .
akike luki _ nuna teng llu _ saghya teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ tuune aqe kangit _ sa meng _ aklu lghii nun _ .
A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ temple- mi _ . _ neghe lgute ngllagh aqe luki _ ila teng _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luki _ neqe teng _ upugha te sigh ke aqe kangit _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ piniqe nigh ghllag t _ , _ usuqe manginagh aqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ A t a n g h e m _ y u g u l i n g u k a n g i _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
taagken _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ aglaghkagh k _ temple- mun _ 3 - k l a a g e m _ yughagh te llegh ani _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ piyug igate ngughk _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ , _ aqume luni _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ T e m p l e - e m _ iteghvig ani _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ , _ pinighnagh lghii _ amig ghllag _ . _ A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ kevegtugh aqe kangat _ tawavek _ n a g h u g h t a n e n g _ tungsigh naigh sqellug qu _ mani meng _ .
esghagh yamikek _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ itegh lghiik _ temple- mun _ tungsigh vike gkakek _ mani meng _ .
qerngagh egmek _ esghagh luku _ yuug _ tawavek _ , _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ukavek _ qiive i _ whangkutegnun _ . _ "
sighima pigte luni _ tuune aqe ni luni _ qiive gkakek _ .
P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ M a n i q r a g g i i t n g w a a g h t u n g a _ iwernga _ sa meng _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i m _ , _ piyug i _ ! _ "
tugu luki _ aghenqignegh i _ iigge i _ n e k e v e s i m a l u k u _ yug m _ itegagh i llu _ tukughagh i llu _ i k n a q u g h t e k a t _ ,
repall _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ nekevekagh _ aga _ piyug inagh magh mi _ pi ke aq _ . _ taagken _ maligte lukek _ iteghkagh _ temple- mun _ piyug magh mi _ , _ qetgegh qaghaqe luni _ , _ usuqe magh an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
T e m p l e - m e t u l l g h i i m _ esghaghkagh at _ piyug lghii _ , _ usuqe i lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
liisuqekagh at _ t u n g s i g h r a g h t e n g u y a l g h i i _ aqume luni _ t u n g a n g a n i _ iteghvig an _ T e m p l e - e m _ . _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ esghagh yamegteggu _ yuug _ piyug lghii _ .
paninang _ naallghutekagh m _ yug m _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ qete nga ma lukek _ , _ yug lghute m _ saghiigha yug magh meng _ kangllu qaghtekagh it _ S o l o m o n - e m _ P o r c h - n g a n i _ .
P e t e r - e m _ esghagh yamiki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ , _ sangafsi _ saghiigha yug tsi _ ? _ sangamta _ esghapag uute ste kut _ ? _ P i y u g t e s n e g h i t a g h p u n g _ una _ yuug _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e m t e g n e g u n _ , _ nalighmeng _ pinigh te mtegneng _ . _ piyug igate ngugh m _ yug m _ Jesus _ u g p e q s a q m i n i g u _ naallghute uq _ .
A b r a h a m - e n k u t _ , _ I s a a c - e n k u t _ , _ J a c o b - e n k u t _ , _ sivunegh mta llu _ qamagte luteng _ manigugh qite te a _ kiyaghnegh m _ q u u l v a g h a a _ Q e p g h a g h t e n i _ Jesus _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ a g l a a t k a q a g h s i _ pilate- mun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ , _ i g h s a k e g k a q a g h s i l l u _ P i l a t e - e m _ iteme te yug aqe yagu _ .
yeghlegi _ pilate- mun _ yugte aghagh llegh ke aq _ i t e m u t e s q e g k a q a g h s i _ ighsake luku _ Jesus _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ , _ qaatke te nga ghllag lghii _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ t u q u t e s t e k a q a g h s i _ unguvallegh m _ A l l g e g h v i g p i g a a _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h p u n g _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaqaghkagh ung _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ enkaam _ a p e g h y a g h q a q a g h p u n g _ .
esghagh kesi _ una _ yuug _ nekevgha lghii _ sivu gpesini _ , _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ piyug igate yagh lghii u uq _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ . _ I k n a q u g h t e k a a g u q _ ugpeqe luku _ ategh a _ t a a m _ ataasigh m _ J e s u s - e m _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a n _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ aa-a _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ J e s u s - k u n _ n a a l l g h u t n g w a a g h a a _ , _ esghagh kesi _ maaten _ .
" _ J e w - l g u t e m n i _ , _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t g u n _ nakmikegkagh ni _ C h r i s t - a _ ikfiqe luni _ tuqu lleqe ni luku _ . _ taana _ uuknaliqe llegh at _ apeghiigh kau uq _ igleghte te i stekete te lghii ni _ tuqute ste aqe yafsigu _ Jesus _ , _ nalluke luku _ C h r i s t - a n g u t a n g a _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ a v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h l u s i _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ugpeqe teggu _ atanegh _ enkaam _ sangigte lleqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ A t a n g h e m _ nutaghte aqe naagh ai _ taghneghagh si _ , _ k a y a g g n e q i g l l e q a a l l u _ Jesus _ nakmikegkagh ni _ C h r i s t - a n g u l u k u _ elpesi nun _ .
iwernga _ Jesus _ tagi vagilgami _ qilag mete yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghte llegh anun _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ akeqe i kau uq _ neghigh luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t g u n _ aaftekagh mikun _ ellmi nun _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u k i _ .
moses _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ , _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ N a g a t n g w a a g h n a k e s i _ akuzillegh a _ qamagte luku _ .
tamaakut _ nagate nghite ngugh t _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug aneng _ aafte luki _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ . _ '
" _ sa u a _ maana _ atugh ut _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ S a m u e l - e m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ . _ S a m u e l - e m _ kingu aneng _ ila ita llu _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ u u k n a l i q u t q e g k a q i i t _ .
kingunegh ke aisi _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ akequsagh t _ ellngitgun _ , _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u ut _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ A b r a h a m - e m l l u _ kingunegh ke aisi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe aqe yamiki _ sivunegh si _ A b r a h a m - k u n _ whaten _ , _ ' _ abraham _ , _ kingunegh gpegun _ quya ste lleqe anka _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ ' _ akequsagh _ taana _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u uq _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Q e p g h a g h t e n i _ kayagte yuwhaagh kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ . _ kayagtekaqe a _ quya ste na lusi _ qamagte lusi _ tunute ste llegh mikun _ seghleghqe ma llegh gpesineng _ . _ "
P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ paninang _ ungipagh ma lukek _ S o l o m o n - e m _ P o r c h - n g a n i _ , _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ umiileg at llu _ T e m p l e - e m _ k e l e n g a k i s t e n g i t a _ , _ S a d d u c e e s - e t l u _ tagi laghate tke aat _ .
piyuke ma ite kangat _ a p o s t l e - e k _ apeghtuusagh ak _ yug nun _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ t a a m _ i p a p i g h q e g k a n g a _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ unguvallegh mun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ a p o s t l e - e k _ tugu lukek _ a n u s i m i n g l l a q a g k e t _ . _ siingenllu _ unug naqe kanga _ u n a a q u s i t k a g k e t _ nanqigte gpenakek _ .
iwernga _ tamaa na _ ila a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nagatekagh _ P e t e r - e n k u g n e n g _ J o h n - e n k u g n e n g _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ yuggagh inagh t _ ugpeqagh t _ entaqun _ 5 , 0 0 0 - n g u g h t e k a t _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ ugpeqagh t _ ilate gpenaki _ .
unaami ani _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ qerngughte tke aat _ J e w s - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t _ , _ siivanllegh t _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ ,
H i g h _ priest- a _ A n n a s _ , _ C a i a p h a s _ , _ John _ , _ alexander _ , _ ila i llu _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e m _ ilakwaagh i _ .
taagken _ a p o s t l e - e k _ tagite ste lukek _ aaptekagh gket _ , _ " _ kitum _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ yuug _ piyugte sag u te stegnegu _ ? _ kitum _ ategh a _ atuqe luku _ tawaten _ pi stek _ ? _ "
P e t e r - e m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ , _ " _ I g l e g h u t i s t e n i l l u _ siivanllegh ni llu _ ,
a a p t a g h p e s i k u n g _ aneghneghte i lleg mtegneng _ , _ naten _ naallghute ma ta a _ piyug igate ngughk _ yuug _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ liigike sug amsi _ qamagte lusi _ , _ ila i llu _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ qamagte luki _ naten _ una _ yuug _ naallghute kau ta a _ . _ naallghute kau uq _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i m _ . _ ellnga n _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n _ naallghute kaqe a _ , _ elpek si _ qaquuraghkagh gpesi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ una _ yuug _ piyug igate yagh lghii _ whaa _ maaten _ nekevgha uq _ sivu gpesini _ .
J e s u s - n g u u q _ ukut _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ uyghag _ ighsakekagh i _ elpek si _ m a n g t e g h a n g l l a g h t e n i _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ uyghag _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ nuna mun _ , _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a g u q _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ . _ alla _ naten _ yuug _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ a a t a g h a k u n _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ "
J e w s - e t _ a g g h i s t e n g i t a _ s a g h i i g h a y a g u t k a g k e t _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ tetug nghite llegh gkeneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kegket _ igaghyagh ma ite ngugh k _ . _ L i i g i k s a q m e g t e k e k _ J e s u s - m e t k a a t m e g n e n g _ tawaten _ akuzi u uk _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaghkagh at _ yuug _ n a a l l g h u t n g w a a g h l u n i _ nekevgha lghii _ P e t e r - e n k u g n i _ J o h n - e n k u g n i _ .
agghi vig meng _ a g g h i s t e t _ aane stekagh it _ P e t e r - e n k u t _ J o h n - e n k u t _ naagh llegh u tke aq llu _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit _ agghi te inagh u magh meng _ pikagh t _ .
A a p q u g h a a g h u t k a t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ , _ " _ naten _ pi naqe stekek _ yug k _ ? _ seghleghhalek _ ipa u ni naqagh ut _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h a k _ , _ qayughllak _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ qamagte luteng _ liisimake aat _ .
taawanginaq _ ineghte yagh kumtekek _ alla llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ Jesus _ pi sqellug qu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ wata _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nagaqugh na yu katgu _ . _ "
enkaam _ itegh ste lukek _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q a g k e t _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke fqaan _ Jesus _ p i n a k e s e k _ . _ "
iwernga _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ kiimsigh iqe ait _ , _ " _ Q a a t k e l l a m s i i _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luku _ ? _ naligh _ efqugh nagh a _ kiyaghnegh mi _ ? _ ataasiighte ki _ umyugagh si _ .
whangkutung _ akuzite kete nghmeng _ t a a q n a a n g h i t a g h p u n g _ esghaghkagh ung llu _ nagaqughkagh ung llu _ . _ "
A g g h i s t e t _ aghyuughpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ usuqe kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e g h m u n _ . _ enkaam _ temngi _ alingsequ lukek _ a a n e s t e k a g k e t _ .
taana _ yuug _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ siipngaan _ uksughtutka lghii _ , _ piyugpagningite yagh lghii _ iwernga _ maaten _ naallghute lghii _ .
P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ a a n e s i s t e k _ aglaghkagh k _ u g p e q a a l g u t m e g n u n _ . _ ungipagh ke ak _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ siivanllegh t llu _ p i l l g h i t n e n g _ .
nagate lukek _ ataasiighte luteng _ yughaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ulima kaqe aten _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ megh _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ t a a k u n i l n g u q _ , _ igleghte te u aten llu _ qamagte luki _ .
A y u m i r u g l l a k _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ akuzi kau uten _ sivunegh mteggun _ D a v i d - k u n _ q e p g h a g h t e g p e g u n _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sangan _ G e n t i l e - e t _ temngi _ s a k r i t u t e g h l l a g t a t k e k _ A t a n g h e n k u k _ C h r i s t - a k u l l g h i i k _ , _ sangan llu _ yug t _ seghletun _ piyug pigte atkek _ pipagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ ?
nuna m _ umiileg i llu _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t l u _ qerngughte te luteng _ yataaghqe te ut _ p i l l u w a g h n a l u k e k _ A t a n g h e n k u k _ C h r i s t - a k u l l g h i i k _ ! _ '
" _ ipapestaaq _ maani _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ . _ H e r o d - e n k u k _ P o n t i u s _ P i l a t e - e n k u k _ ilate kau uk _ G e n t i l e - e n u n l l u _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n l l u _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h n a l u k u _ , _ Jesus _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Q e p g h a g h t e n _ , _ nakmike gkan _ C h r i s t - a n g u l u k u _ .
atanegh _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a q e n l l u _ yataaghqe kaqe ken llu _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
nagate aqe aten _ maaten _ whaa _ a l i n g s i q u k a n g i n k u t _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ni luta _ . _ atanegh _ , _ i k n a q u g h s a q a g h t i k u t _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaamta _ ungipagh lta _ ungipagh gpeneng _ ,
whangkutgun _ naallghute ki _ q i n u y u g e t _ , _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s t i k u t l u _ ategh akun _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh qun _ Q e p g h a g h t e g p e g u n _ . _ "
yughagh nghmeng _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ qerngughte te vig at _ mangteghagh _ ufsug tke aq _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ imeg iqe ai _ qamagte luki _ , _ enkaam _ tetug gpenateng _ ungipaghyag tke aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
A p o s t l e - e t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i g h l l a g l u t e n g _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ghllagu kangi llu _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ataasigh stun _ lli aqe aat _ ilu megteggun llu _ unguva sigh megteggun llu _ . _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ pi igate ngughk _ saghya teng _ e l l n g i n a g h m e g g n u n _ p i k n i l u k i _ , _ atunem _ atuqe aqe kangit _ .
nunaleg t _ , _ mangteghagh leg t _ akike nghmegteki _ nuna teng llu _ mangteghagh teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ tuune aqe kangit _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ sa meng _ aklu nghata _ m a n i l i t a q e g k a n g i t _ , _ tawaten _ kina _ alngunak _ aklu ma ite ngughk _ .
Joseph _ t a w a n l e n g u q _ , _ C y p r u s - e g h m i i _ , _ L e v i - e m _ k i n g u n g h a _ , _ ellnga n llu _ akike luku _ nuna ni _ tuunekagh a _ allgegh ta ni _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ . _ A p o s t l e - e t _ ata iqe aat _ B a r n a b a s - m e n g _ whaten _ pi sigh meng _ , _ " _ kayeme sta _ . _ "
taawa nguq _ yuug _ ategh a _ A n a n i a s _ , _ nulighh a _ sapphire _ . _ akikekagh a _ nalighnegh a _ nuna mi _ .
nuliigh mi _ liisima nghaani _ aksaqekagh a _ ila a _ mani m _ ellmi nun _ pi u luku _ . _ taana _ siipnegh ni _ tuunekagh a _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ sumegh mini _ qamagte luku _ tuune i luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
yeghlegi _ P e t e r - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sangan _ qaute kete zigu _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqu llegh a _ i q l e n g i q e s q e l l u t e n _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ aksaqe llegh gpegun _ ila a _ mani m _ ?
sangan _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh ma ziin _ ? _ yug nun _ iqlengiqe nghite uten _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iqlengiqe uten _ . _ akike llghite luku _ nuna n _ elpek _ p i k s a g h a n _ , _ enkaam _ aki kaqe yavgu _ mani a llu _ taana _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi yaghqaqe yagh an _ . _ "
legan _ A n a n i a s - e m _ peter _ nagate luku _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh luteng _ q i i p a g h a k u n _ imeg te luku _ yugusigh a _ aane te luku _ llivegh ke aat _ . _ ungipagh _ A n a n i a s - e m _ iqlengiqe llegh a llu _ tuqu llegh a llu _ mingitekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nagaqugh tke aat _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
pi nga yu t _ aflu t _ atugh luki _ A n a n i a s - e m _ tuqu llegh aneng _ , _ nulighh a _ iteghkagh _ nalluke luku _ ugi ni _ samatagh nge a _ .
P e t e r - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ tawaten _ akitutka an _ a k i k e s t e g n e g u u _ nuna ek _ ? _ " _ S a p p h i r a - m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
P e t e r - e m _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ sa yaftek _ ugi ke te lghii gni _ sumeghtaghagh ma stek _ nanghiiqu na lukek _ A t a n g h e m _ taghneghagh kek _ ? _ yug t _ llivegh ikagh t _ ugi gpeneng _ qakma _ manughagh mete ut _ . _ elpek llu _ tawaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ . _ "
T a w a n i g h l l u g g i i n a q _ ellnga llu _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh yalghiimeng _ sapphira- llu _ taawa _ tuquma lghii _ , _ enkaam _ aane te luku _ ugi an _ saaghw akun _ llivegh ke aat _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ nagaqugh te lghiit _ A n a n i a s - e n k u k _ S a p p h i r a - n k u k _ tuqu llegh gkeneng _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
yug lghute t _ q u n g a n g i t n i _ a p o s t l e - e t _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g u m a n g i n a q a t _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t llu _ a p o s t l e - e t l u _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ T e m p l e - e m _ manughagh ani _ ategh ke lghii mi _ , _ S o l o m o n - e m _ P o r c h - n g a n i _ .
iwernga _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ J e s u s - m e n g _ ilate igate ngugh t _ ugpeqagh nun _ qayughllak _ a l i n g e k a n i g h a q e l g h i i t _ , _ naqam _ pinigh na iqe kangit _ .
iwernga _ u g l a p i g l l e g h i i t _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe u kangat _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
A p o s t l e - e t _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h i t _ apallugh ke luki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ q i n u y u g t i i t e n g _ allighagh itgun _ tagite luki _ tume tgun _ lli aqe kangit _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ qayughllak _ P e t e r - e m _ naghughtekaki _ luuraq _ taghneghagh nge te llegh an _ naallghute na yu kaki _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
enkaam _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ q a n t a g h a n l e n g u g h n e n g _ nuna neng _ tagi laghate tke aq _ yug lghute _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ . _ Q i n u y u g t i i t e n g l l u _ tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ tagi tke ait _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tagi tke ait _ naallghute uute tke aat _ .
H i g h _ p r i e s t - e n k u t _ ila ke te lghiit _ S a d d u c e e s - e t _ aqina tke aat _ a p o s t l e - n e n g
enkaam _ tugu ste luki _ kanagh stekagh it _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ .
iwernga _ unug yan _ yaquleg an _ A t a n g h e m _ qelpeghtekagh i _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig i _ . _ enkaam _ aane te luki _ a p o s t l e - e t _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ aglagh lusi _ temple- mun _ , _ qamagte luku _ apegh teggu _ una _ nutaghagh _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ "
A p o s t l e - e t _ qaatkekagh at _ yaquleg _ . _ aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ itegh luteng _ temple- mun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ . _ H i g h _ p r i e s t - e n k u t _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngughtekagh it _ J e w s - e t _ siivanllegh it llu _ qamagte luki llu _ a g g h i s t e t _ , _ agghi te kete na luki _ a p o s t l e - e t _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ u m i i l w a a g h i t n u n _ aqfa stekagh it _ a p o s t l e - e t _ .
iwernga _ umiileg u aaghet _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ a p o s t l e - e t _ aviite ut _ . _ enkaam _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ aglagh luteng _ ungipagh tke ait _ ,
" _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiikut _ amig t _ m a g h q a q u g h w a a g h n g a f t u t _ , _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t l u _ amignitu te ut _ naqam _ itegh yalghiikut _ paaghqite uq _ ! _ "
T e m p l e - e m _ k e l e n g a k i s t e n g i t a _ umiileg at llu _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ u n g i p a a s i s t e n g _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ samatagh nge i _ a p o s t l e - e t _ .
taagken _ kitum _ itegh luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taakut _ yug t _ anusimingllagh kaqsagh kesi _ inga _ temple- mi _ apeghtugh i aqe ut _ . _ "
K e l e n g a k i s t e t _ umiileg ke te lghiit _ aqfakagh it _ a p o s t l e - e t _ . _ seghletun _ pi ma ite kangit _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ yug neng _ T e m p l e - m e l n g u g h n e n g _ t u q u n n a y u k a n g i s t e n g _ m i l u g h p a g a a t a g h h i i n a q _ .
tagite luki _ itghutekagh it _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ enkaam _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e m _ pi ke ai _ a p o s t l e - e t _ ,
" _ I n e g h t e n g n g w a a q a q s a g h a m s i _ allameng llu _ apeghtugh i fqaafsi _ ategh akun _ J e s u s - e m _ p i s q e l l u s i _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke ma nge itagh zikut _ ! _ yeghlegi _ allute luteng _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ liite aat _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ whangkuta llu _ a v u t n g u s n a q u t k a g h p e k u t _ J e s u s - e m _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ "
P e t e r - e m _ kiimsigh tke ai _ a p o s t l e - e t _ , _ " _ Q a a t k e s a g h q a q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luki _ yug t _ .
qaquuragh luku _ t u q u t e s t e k a q a g h s i _ Jesus _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ q u u l v a g h n a l u k u _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ nekegtekaqe a _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ . _ tawaten _ pika qaa _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ a v u t e g h q e s a g h q a a g h t e s q e l l u k i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i i s q e l l u k i _ , _ q i i v e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute na luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
whangkuta _ ungipaghte u ukut _ t a m a a k u n u n _ pi llegh nun _ , _ maligte te luta _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh gkenun _ t a m a a k u n u n _ qaatke te lghii nun _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
A g g h i s t e t _ s a k r i t u t k a a l g h i i t _ P e t e r - e m _ k i i m s i g h y i s t e n g _ tawaten _ , _ repall _ tuqute yu kaqe kangit _ a p o s t l e - e t _ .
iwernga _ ataasigh _ agghi sta _ nekevekagh _ akuzi na luni _ . _ G a m a l i e l - n g u f t u q _ , _ P h a r i s e e _ , _ apeghtughiste at _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh ita _ , _ elngaatall _ kitum _ alngunak _ q a a t k u m t a a g h a _ . _ K e l e n g a k i s t e n u n _ aane te aghte sqekagh i _ a p o s t l e - e t _ .
taagken _ a g g h i s t e l g u t n i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i l g u t e m n i _ , _ piraamsi tete luki _ taakut _ yug t _ pi teki _ .
N e q a m i k e n g h i s t e g g u u _ qavnganghhaq _ T h e u d a s _ pi kau lghii _ igleghte te ste ghllagu ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ 4 0 0 _ yuug _ maligsaagh ikagh _ ellnga neng _ . _ iwernga _ T h e u d a s _ tuqute yatgu _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ qimagugh tke aat _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke sug ma ite kangat _ .
T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ J u d a s - l l u _ galilee-kagh mii _ , _ qerngughte ikagh _ yugkagh meng _ k a v e m a _ keste i ta iqe yan _ yug m _ uglaghtala aneng _ . _ iwernga _ ellnga llu _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ yug i _ mingite kau ut _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ sume mni _ itagnagh nayagh ukut _ sa fqiita _ qakemkut _ yug t _ pi yagh kumteki _ . _ E l l m e g g n e n g _ pi u kumeng _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a t _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i l q e g k a g u _ aghula i aghte naanghite asi _ , _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h l l e q a g h s i l l u _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ " _ enkaam _ a g g h i s t e t _ qaatkekagh at _ gamaliel _ .
taagken _ k e l e n g a k i s t e n u n _ itghute ste luki _ a p o s t l e - e t _ kagsagmig stekagh it _ . _ I n e g h t e n g n g w a a q i i t l u _ ungipagh ke nanigh sqellug qu _ Jesus _ . _ apeghiigh yamegteki _ aane stekagh it _ .
A p o s t l e - e t _ a a n e s i s t e n g _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayngusaghagh te stekaqe kangi _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ temple- mi llu _ kinku ni llu _ ungipagh kaqe kangat _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe kangat _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u n i l u k u _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ ugpeqagh t _ nula u luki _ G r e e k - s t u n _ akuzi kayug t _ J e w s - e t _ seghleghyugkagh t _ , _ H e b r e w - s t u n _ akuzi kayug neng _ J e w s - e n e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ u g i n g i g h a g h t i i t e n g _ a k l u k e g k i i t n e n g _ t u u n l a a g h i g a l k a n g i t _ . _ enkaam _ yiillgikagh it _ , _ " _ A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ u y e g t i s t e t _ p a l a s q u g h h a a n _ tuune aqe ait _ whangkuta _ ugingighagh put _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ a p o s t l e - e t _ , _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ anaggute lleqe ukut _ pegtekumteggu _ ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ u y e g t i s t e n g u g h h n a l u t a _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nakmike teki _ maaghraghvinleg _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ imigh nga lghiit _ , _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ uyegte i ste ngllagh lleqe aput _ .
tawaten _ pi kumta _ whangkuta _ a p o s t l e - e n i _ yughagh manginagh lleqe ukut _ , _ ungipagh ke i manginagh lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ "
ugpeqagh t _ efqugh kekagh it _ a p o s t l e - e t _ agghi llegh it _ . _ enkaam _ nakmikegkagh at _ stephen _ , _ elngaatall _ ugpeqe i nga ghllag _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ imigh nga lghii llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ nakmikegkagh it llu _ P h i l i p - e n k u t _ , _ P r o c h o r u s - e n k u t _ , _ N i c a n o r - e n k u t _ , _ T i m o n - e n k u t _ , _ P a r m e n a s - e n k u t _ , _ N i c o l a u s - l l u _ gentile- a _ A n t i o c h - e g h m i i _ J e w s - e s t u n _ manigugh u sag u tke aq _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ y u g h a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ , _ n a a s q w i t g u n _ saafte luki _ yughagh tkekagh it _ .
