kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ nula kau lghiit _ ugpeqagh t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ , _ p r i e s t - e l g h u t e t l u _ ila lghute it _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ maligte te luteng _ .
stephen _ kayusillegh leg ghllag u te mineng llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e g l l a g u t m i n e n g l l u _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g a a t a q a q _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ J e w s - e t _ , _ C y r e n e - e g h m i i n g u y a l g h i i t l u _ , _ A l e x a n d r i a - g h m i i n g u y a l g h i i t l u _ aaghtiiraagh yaghtugh qu aat _ stephen _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ s y n a g o g u e - n g i t a _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ iteme tke aat _ Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ . _ " _ yug t _ C i l i c i a - g h m i i n g u y a l g h i i t l u _ , _ A s i a - g h m i i n g u y a l g h i i t l u _ ila tke aat _ t a a k u n u n _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ peghqinegh pigte luku _ akuzi stekagh a _ repall _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ila i _ yug t _ aksaqe luku _ akileghtugh qu ait _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ whaten _ , _ " _ N a g a t k a q a g h p u t _ s e g h l e q u u q e k _ M o s e s - e n k u k _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ . _ "
siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ nagate luteng _ iqlengiqe llegh itneng _ s a k r i t u t k a t _ . _ taagken _ aaghtiiraagh te luteng _ aglagh tke aat _ stephen _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ S t e p h e n - e m _ quunpeng _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe a _ temple- a _ , _ liilightuusagh t llu _ M o s e s - e m _ tuunekagh i _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
N a g a t k a q a g h p u t l u _ pi lghii _ J e s u s - e m n g u q _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i m _ naafqe lleqe a _ temple- a _ , _ allangughte lleqe a llu nguq _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h p u t _ M o s e s - e m _ apeghtugh tke a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ "
qamagte luteng _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ esghaghkagh at _ S t e p h e n - e m _ gginagh a _ kuukgute lghii _ yaquleg m _ gginagh atun _ .
taagken _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e m _ aaptekagh a _ stephen _ , _ " _ ipa _ tawaten _ akuzi kau ziin _ ukut _ a v u t k i s t e g p e k _ a p e l l g h i s t u n _ ? _ "
S t e p h e n - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ , _ siivanllegh ni llu _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ ungipamsug te naqe amsi _ ! _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ salin _ M e s o p o t a m i a - m e l l u k u _ , _ nuugte llghite luku _ haran- mun _ , _ N i g h u g h q e n g n g a l g h i i m _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh vike luku
pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ unite gu _ allgeghvig n _ nuna _ , _ ilakwaagh ten llu _ , _ aghulaqe i _ maghyaghqugh naagh amken _ . _ '
enkaam _ abraham _ aghulaqekagh _ C h a l d e a - m e n g _ , _ nuugtekagh _ haran- mun _ . _ ata a _ tuqu yan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ maghyaghqugh qu a _ abraham _ nuna mun _ maaten _ kiyaghfig gpesinun _ .
tagite yuwhaagh aqe yamigu _ natengiighhaq _ n u n a l i s i m a n g i t a a _ ellnga nun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ talwa _ salin _ avaquti uute luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ una _ nuna _ ellnga nun llu _ k i n g u n g h a n u n l l u _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ whaten llu _ pika qaa _ , _ ' _ kingunegh ten _ aghulaqe yaghqaa ut _ nuna ke nghite ke meggnun _ enkaam _ nunatagh u lleqe ut _ . _ tamaani _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u y a g h q a a g u t l u _ amyuqetagh tkesigh ghllag yaghqaa ut llu _ 4 0 0 _ ayumiqullegh lghute ni _ .
iwernga _ aghyuugh lleqe anka _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h t e s t i l g h i i t _ . _ kingu aneng _ aghyuugh i llegh ma _ kingunegh ten _ tagi lleqe ut _ nuna mun _ akequsagh kekagh mnun _ , _ tamaani _ manigugh lleqe aatnga _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsagh ngllaghkagh _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ nalluniigh tke sqellug qu _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l e q _ . _ enkaam _ abraham _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a q _ . _ ighnegh nge yami _ I s a a c - m e n g _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ aghneq _ atugh yagu _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a _ ellnga llu _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ I s a a c - e m _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a _ ighnegh ni _ Jacob _ . _ J a c o b - e m _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l a q i i _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighnegh ni _ . _ taakut _ piinligh sigh ke ai _ ramke an _ I s r a e l - e m _ .
" _ angli laghate te luteng _ J a c o b - e m _ ighnegh ita _ aqinake pigtekagh at _ a n g l e g u t s e n g _ Joseph _ , _ enkaam _ akikekagh at _ E g y p t - e g h m i i n u n _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u l u k u _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh kekagh a _ ,
seghleliigh nghaani _ kayusigh aqe kanga _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ p e g h q i n e l l e l i t k a a _ enkaam _ P h a r a o h - m _ umiileg an _ E g y p t - e m _ , _ efqugh ke luku _ u m i i l g a t a g h a a g h t e s t e k a a _ E g y p t - m u n _ , _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh a llu _ mangteghagh minun llu _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e m i n u n l l u _ .
taagken _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ E g y p t - m i l l u _ , _ C a n a a n - m i l l u _ , _ elngaatall _ uglagh _ iyatagh iqe te ghllag ke aq _ . _ sivunegh put llu _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aat _ .
J a c o b - e m _ nagaqugh yamiki _ E g y p t - e g h m i i t _ g r a i n - m e n g _ kagpag ghllag ma ni luki _ , _ ighnegh ni _ p i k e n g y a g h t i i s q e g k i i _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ alla _ pi yata _ , _ J o s e p h - e m _ anengagh ni _ ungipagh tke ai _ ellngit nun _ uyughagh ke ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ P h a r a o h - m _ a n g l e g u t k u t u t a n g i _ liigikekagh i _ .
taagken _ J o s e p h - e m _ lipeghsagh ke a _ ata ni _ Jacob _ , _ nengllugute lghutagh nge i llu _ n u u g t e s q e l l u k i _ E g y p t - m u n _ . _ qamagte luteng _ 7 5 - n g u f t u t _ .
enkaam _ J a c o b - e n k u t _ nuugtekagh t _ . _ tamaani _ Jacob _ tuqukagh _ , _ kingu aneng _ tagtalmi _ taakwani _ ila i llu _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ neghqwaagh it _ aglagh te luki _ S h e c h e m - e m u n _ , _ llivegh nqigtekagh it _ nuna kun _ A b r a h a m - e m _ tukfighkagh akun _ H a m o r - e m _ k i n g u n g h a n e n g _ .
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ akequsagh a _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ sivunegh put _ nula ghllagkagh t _ E g y p t - m i _ .
taagken _ E g y p t _ nutaghagh meng _ umiileg ngekagh _ , _ t a a m _ umiileg m _ nallukngwaagh kanga _ Joseph _ .
sivunegh mta _ nula ghllag llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ umiileg m _ peghqiniqe te luki _ ikfiqe stekagh i _ sivunegh put _ , _ talwa _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ aane te ste aqe luki _ pi ke ai _ t u q u s q e l l u k i _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ moses _ allgeghkagh _ , _ y u u k e g t e p i g l l e g h i i _ taghnughhagh _ . _ angayuqagh gkenka _ ne megteni _ i i g h a g h t u m e n g _ aflengakekagh ak _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ .
iighaghtughpagningite te yamegnegu _ aane tke ak _ . _ umiileg m _ panig an _ naalkellug qu _ allughqi luku _ , _ angli stekagh a _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ .
E g y p t - e g h m i i t _ apeghtugh qu aat _ liitekagh meggneng _ . _ enkaam _ moses _ p e g h q i n g h u g h i g h l l a g y a l g h i i m i _ a k u z i l l g u u g h q a a g h l l a k a q _ , _ aghtugh igate ngughk llu _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ moses _ 4 0 _ uksughtutkaligh yami _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i l g u t n i _ esghagh yug luki _ esghagh yaghtugh qu ai _ .
tawani _ esgha qaa _ E g y p t - e g h m i i m _ amyuutke kanga _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i _ . _ enkaam _ M o s e s - e m _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i _ igugh luku _ tuqu tke a _ E g y p t - e g h m i i _ .
tawani _ sumeghtaghagh kaayagh lghii _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i l g u t m i n u n _ liigike lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagte lleg ni _ ellngit nun _ aghulaqe te i ste u luku _ E g y p t - m e n g _ . _ iwernga _ liigike ma ite kangat _ .
unaami ani _ esghagh kakek _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i k _ pillugute lghiik _ . _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kek _ , _ ' _ pillugute gpenatek _ yug lgu tke te utek _ . _ '
yeghlegi _ amyuqetagh iqe lghii m _ yug m _ ayagaghte luku _ moses _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten _ , _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ?
whanga llu _ tuqute yug zinga _ ighivgaq _ tuqute llegh gpetun _ E g y p t - e g h m i i _ ? _ '
yug m _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ moses _ qimagkagh _ M i d i a n - m u n _ , _ tamaani _ allaneghtagh ukagh _ . _ qenwat _ nulightugh luni _ ighnegh ngekagh _ maalghug gneng _ .
" _ moses _ , _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ M i d i a n - m e t u t k e l l u k u _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqekagh _ M o u n t _ S i n a i - e m _ u v i t a n g a n u n _ . _ tawani _ esgha qaa _ yaquleg _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
A l l a a g h l l u w h a g h y a g u t k a q e g k a n g a _ . _ K e n q i g t e n g n g w a a g h n a l u k u _ takukagh a _ , _ kaate yaghtugh aqe a llu _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke aa _ ,
' _ kiyaghnegh u unga _ , _ sivugh nghpek _ A b r a h a m - e n k u t _ I s a a c - e n k u t _ J a c o b - e n k u t _ kiyaghnegh ke aatnga _ . _ ' _ moses _ alingruughkagh _ repall _ ungelegtekagh _ talwa _ esghagh yug ma nge i tke a _ .
A t a n g h e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kameg gken _ mataghte kek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ nekevgha vig n _ .
esghapag anka _ yug nka _ amyuutke kangit _ E g y p t - m i _ , _ nagate anka _ ngillegte lghiit _ . _ ukig unga _ y u g u l i n a l u k i _ E g y p t - e g h m i i n e n g _ . _ enkaam _ whaa _ kayagte naqe amken _ E g y p t - m u n _ . _ '
" _ T a a n a n g u u q _ moses _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ ighsa kaqe yamegteggu _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten llu _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ uteghnigh stekagh a _ E g y p t - m u n _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ ellngit nun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ yaquleg kun _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
moses _ a l l a a g h l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g a a t a g h l u n i _ E g y p t - m i _ , _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ E g y p t - m e n g _ . _ wata _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i i g h a a t a q a a g u q _ R e d _ S e a - m i l l u _ , _ iglegha llegh meggni llu _ kilgaa ni _ maghyaghqugh aqe yamiki _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ moses _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ '
T a a n a n g u u q _ moses _ s i v u n e m n n i t k a q _ qerngughte te aqngata _ kilgaa ni _ M o u n t _ S i n a i - e m _ t u n g a n g a n g i _ . _ tawani _ naayghagh mi _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh yatni _ tugukagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ apeghtuusagh t _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ . _ taagken _ apeghkagh i _ taakut _ sivunegh mnnun _ enkaam _ ellngit a _ n a g n e g h t e k a q i i t _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
" _ iwernga _ sivunegh mta _ moses _ qaatke sug mangite aat llu _ , _ igleghte te i steke yug mangite aat llu _ , _ yeghlegi _ uteghte yu kau ut _ E g y p t - m u n _ .
enkaam _ M o s e s - e m _ anengagh a _ aaron _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ K i y a g h n e n g l l a g h t e g h q u t _ m a g h y a g h q i i s q e l l u t a _ . _ nallukagh ut _ moses _ samatagh nge a _ , _ legan _ aghulaqe te luta _ E g y p t - m e n g _ unite ainkut _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ k a a w a g h a g h s u g n i l n g u g h m e n g _ , _ aghqerragh uqagh at llu _ . _ neqenghaghqekagh t llu _ q u u l v a g h n a l u k u _ ulimaagh eng _ .
" _ tawaten _ pi yata _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunutekagh i llu _ , _ pegtekagh i llu _ elngaatall _ m a n i g u u t e s q e l l u k i _ siqinegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ighaleqetaagh nun llu _ . _ atanegh _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ igaqe llegh itni _ , _ ' _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ , _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ iglegha u lusi _ kilgaa ni _ a g h q e r r a a g h u m a n g i t a g h p e s i n g a _ tuqutagh ii negh gpesini _ teghig ke te yameng _ .
yeghlegi _ k e l q u t a a q e g k a q a s i _ tiinta t _ manigugh vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ M o l o c h - m u n _ , _ k e l q u t a a q e g k a q a g h s i l l u _ ighaleqetaagh ngllaghkagh _ maniguute yu i luku _ rephan- mun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ anguyag gpesinun _ aghulaqe te ste lleqe amsi _ naghughte luku _ Babylon _ . _ ' _ "
stephen _ paninang _ akuzikagh _ , _ " _ sivunegh put _ kilgaa nite luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tiinta nglligh sqekagh i _ amigh meng _ manigugh vig u luki _ ellmi nun _ . _ ulima kaqe ait _ tawatengwaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh te llegh atun _ M o s e s - m u n _ . _ K e l q u t a a q e g k i i t _ taakut _ tiinta t _ neqangugh sigh u luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayute te nga llegh anun _ .
T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ moses _ tuqu yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ J o s h u a _ i g l e g h u t i s t e k e s q e l l u k u _ sivunegh mnnun _ . _ J o s h u a - m _ m a g h y a g h q u g h y i s t e n g _ nuna mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh anun _ taakut _ tiinta t _ kelqekagh it _ . _ takukagh meggnun _ nuna mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ yug lgu uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivunegh mnnun _ ighllegh stekagh i _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ sivunegh put _ nelikagh t _ taaggun _ nuna kun _ . _ tamaani _ nagnegh tke ait _ taakut _ tiinta t _ maniguute vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kenlanga _ umiileg liite llegh meggnun _ David _ .
D a v i d - e m _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h a _ elngaatall _ efqugh nagh pigtekau lghii _ kiyaghnegh mi _ . _ enkaam _ D a v i d - e m _ aaptekaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh a _ J a c o b - e m _ , _ m a n g t e g h a n g l l a g h l a k a a n _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi te ma ite kanga _ ,
yeghlegi _ D a v i d - e m _ ighnegh an _ S o l o m o n - e m _ mangteghagh ngllagh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
" _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh ghllag _ kiyaghsigate uq _ mangteghagh ni _ yug t _ ulimaagh itni _ . _ whaten _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ igaqe llegh ani _ ,
' _ qilag _ aqumutagh ke aqa _ , _ nuna llu _ itegagh iitagh ke aqa _ . _ sangan _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe ste ngnga _ ? _ M e g h n a l i v i g i t a a n g u n g h i t u n g a _ .
U l i m a a q e n g h i i s i k u u n _ sa u a _ q a m a t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ ? _ ' _ "
S t e p h e n - e m _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pi neghllug ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ q a a t k e s u g i g a t a g h s i _ , _ u g p e q s u g i g a t a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ nagate yug igate asi _ , _ ighsa keraaghagh ke agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ s i v u n e g h p e s i s t u n g w a a q _ .
qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ u u k n a l i q i s t e n g i _ sivunegh gpesi _ amyuutke kaqe ait _ . _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ uuknaliqe te kete yatgu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ tagi yaghqaa ni yatgu _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yan _ , _ uvegh ghpagte te luku _ t u q u t k a q a g h s i _ .
elpesi u usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg tgun _ tuunekagh i _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ qaatke mangite asi _ . _ "
A g g h i s t e t _ nagate luku _ stephen _ s a k r i t u t e g h l l a k a t _ repall _ ggiiste aghagh tke aat _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ imigh nga lghii _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ sivugte yalghiimi _ qilag mun _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a _ , _ J e s u s - l l u _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ ! _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ ighnegh a llu _ yug m _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ ! _ "
A g g h i s t e t _ sigute teng _ saape luki _ iigge meggneng _ , _ araghaatagh te magh meng _ qamagte luteng _ sughukagh at _ stephen _ .
S i i n g v a g a a t a m e n g _ aghulaqe tke aat _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ , _ tuqute na luku _ m i l u g h p a g a a t a g h h i i n a q _ . _ taagken _ S t e p h e n - e m _ a v u t k i s t e n g i t a _ qaasligh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ nukalpigagh m _ S a u l - e m _ saaghw akun _ lli luki _ milugh agaatagh yuggaagh ke aat _ . _ tamaakut llu _ ila ita _ milugh agaataghkagh at _ .
whaa _ uyghag m _ tekegh igh qagh vike yatni _ stephen _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ tugukligh kek _ . _ "
segesqughte luni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ seghevute ki _ whaken _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi luni _ tuqukagh _ .
S a u l - e m _ i t a g n a q e g k a a _ S t e p h e n - e m _ tuqute llegh a _ . _ yug t _ piniqe i nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ llivegh ke aat _ stephen _ qiya ke ghllag u magh an _ . _ taagken _ aghnegh meng _ kenlanga _ amyuutke ghllag yagutekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t _ . _ S a u l - e m _ elngaatall _ amyuutkekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ n a a n g e s q e l l u k i _ . _ itegh aqe luni _ ne itnun _ q a m u g h s i i g h m e n g _ aane te qugh qu ai _ aghnagh t llu _ , _ yug t llu _ anusimingllagh ste qugh na luki _ . _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ pelleghmun _ qimagugh tke aat _ nuna nun _ J u d e a - m e l n g u g h n u n l l u _ , _ S a m a r i a - m e l n g u g h n u n l l u _ , _ a p o s t l e - n g i n a g h h a a t _ qimag ma ite ngugh t _ .
tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ qimagugh tke aat _ tea- ma anun _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ n a a n s a g h n g a a g h m e n g _ .
philip _ S a m a r i a - l l u n i _ ungipagh kekagh a _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g a a t a q a q l u _ .
enkaam _ yug t _ nagate u aqe aqe kangat _ esghapag luki _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h i _ .
uglagh pigte lghii neng _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh t _ a k i l g h u u n g i t g u n _ . _ tamaakut llu _ piyug igate ngugh t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ S a m a r i a - g h m i i t _ elngaatall _ quya ghllagkagh t _ .
S a m a r i a - m i n g u q _ taawa _ alignagh lghii _ yuug _ , _ ategh a _ simon _ . _ salin _ philip _ kaate llghite luku _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ s a g h i i g h a y u g t a q e g k a n g i _ yug t _ , _ q u k a a y u g t a q e l g h i i l l u _ aghtugh igate ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ t a m a a n l e n g u u t _ , _ pingwaagh ghllag neng _ , _ u k a v a n l l e g h p i g a g h n u n _ nagate yu kestagh luku _ ayuqe kangat _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g e g h l l a k a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ "
yug t _ nagate yu pigte luku _ ayuqe kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h y u g t e k a y u g u k a n g i _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ .
iwernga _ P h i l i p - e m _ ungipagh ke yaki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ ategh aneng llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ ugpeqekagh it _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t llu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
talwa _ S i m o n - e m l l u _ ugpeqekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ paaptaaye llegh mi _ kingu aneng _ maligsaagh qagh a _ philip _ . _ esghapag luku _ philip _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i i g h a a t a l g h i i _ saghiigha yuke aq _ .
A p o s t l e - e t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t _ nagaqugh luki _ S a m a r i a - g h m i i t _ ugpegh ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ kayagtekagh gket _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ ellngit nun _ .
S a m a r i a - g h m i i t _ ugpeqe ait _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh inagh ghhagh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ naqam _ salin _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ a l l g e g h s i g a l k e g k e t _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ S a m a r i a - m u n _ kaate lutek _ aglaghkagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ taagken _ saafte aqe luki _ yughagh te kau uute aqe aik _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ a l l g e g h t e k a g k e t _ .
S i m o n - e m _ esghapag kakek _ a p o s t l e - e k _ , _ saafte nghmegneki _ ugpeqagh t _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
enkaam _ a p o s t l e - e k _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ tukfigh i aghte langa _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m e n g _ whanga llu _ saaftekumki _ yug t _ a l l g e g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
iwernga _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ n a a f q e l l i t e n _ manituumagh gpek _ . _ S u m e g h p e n i i - i _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ tukfigh lleqe ni luku _ pi zigu _ ?
qepghagh lgusigh i naanghite uten _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llegh n _ anaggute nga uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ .
A v u t e g h q e l l u t e n _ seghleghqe sigh ke nanigh ghhu ngam _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ piyuke llegh n _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh a _ atanegh mun _ luuraq _ seghevute na yu kagu _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ seghleghqe llegh n _ .
taawa _ liigike amken _ aqina lleg leg ghllag u uten llu _ a s i g h q e n g n g a a t e n l l u _ seghleghqe llegh gpeneng _ . _ "
S i m o n - e m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ yughagh te kaghte gnenga _ atanegh mun _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesistun _ pi fqaama _ p i s q e l l u n g a _ . _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e n k u k _ J o h n - e n k u k _ t i s t e m u n i l u t e k _ , _ ungipagh ke i lutek _ A t a n g h e m _ ungipagh aneng _ aghulaqekagh k _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ . _ S a m a r i a - m i _ iglegha u lutek _ , _ ne nun _ kaate negh megteni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghiik _ .
taagken _ yaquleg an _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ Y a t a a g h q e l l u t e n _ i k e v a a m _ t u n g a n g a n i l e n g u g h n u n _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ p a a g h q i l l g h a n i l n g u g h n u n _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ gaza- mun _ ayuqe lghii nun _ . _ "
enkaam _ y a t a a g h q e l l u n i _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ taakwani _ tumangani _ esgha qaa _ E t h i o p i a - g h m i i _ e u n u c h _ , _ E t h i o p i a - m _ queen- nge an _ C a n d a c e - e m _ , _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste nga _ . _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ uteghnigh aqe uq _ ne minun _ maniguute yaghtugh luni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ C h a r i o t - m i k u n _ igleghte te kete luku _ atightugh aqe ai _ u u k n a l i q e s t e m _ I s a i a h - m _ igaqegkagh i _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ C h a r i o t - n g a n _ saaghw anun _ aglagh luten _ maligsaagh ghhu _ . _ "
enkaam _ malighqagh luku _ nagatekagh a _ atightugh lghii _ u u k n a l i q e s t e m _ I s a i a h - a m _ igaqegkagh aneng _ . _ P h i l i p - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ L i i g i k s i k i i _ atightuqagh ten _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ naten _ l i i g i k e s q e l l u k i _ pi ziki _ , _ wetku qun _ kitum _ liigike stekaki _ whanga mnun _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta i _ . _ " _ taagken _ uugte ste luku _ saaghw mikun _ aqume sqekagh a _ .
E u n u c h - e m _ atightugh aqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ whaten _ pi lghiit _ : _ " _ penniigh t _ t u q u s a g h t u n g h i s t e n g _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aat llu _ q i g u n g h i s t e n g _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ellnga llu _ sa meng _ pi aghte ma ite ngughk _ .
K a y n g u s a a k e s t a q n g a t g u _ i g u g h i s t e n g i t k a q _ . _ unguvallegh a _ k e n l e t g h u u t e s t e k a q _ nuna mi _ . _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ apegh u aghte lleqe aki _ seghleghtu langi _ yug lgu ta an _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ ? _ "
E u n u c h - e m _ aaptekagh a _ philip _ , _ " _ ungipaate aghte nga _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ellmi neng _ akuzite kaqe a _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ alla _ pi aqe agu _ ? _ "
P h i l i p - e m _ piinligh sigh ke luki _ I s a i a h - a m _ igaqegkagh i _ , _ ungipagh tke a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ J e s u s - m e n g _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ megh mun _ kaate yamek _ e u n u c h - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esgha _ taana _ megh _ ! _ sa u a ngam _ eltugh sigh ke lleqe zikun _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mnun _ ? _ "
P h i l i p - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ I p a p i g h q e l l u t e n _ ugpegh kuvek _ paaptaaye lleqe amken _ . _ " _ E u n u c h - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa _ , _ ugpeqe aqa _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ ighnegh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
enkaam _ e u n u c h - e m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n i _ aghuliigh sqekagh a _ . _ ategh lutek _ c h a r i o t - m e n g _ megh mun _ ategh ke ak _ , _ enkaam _ P h i l i p - e m _ tawani _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
megh meng _ uugte yayek _ A t a n g h e m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ aghulaqe tke a _ philip _ , _ enkaam _ e u n u c h - e m _ alla _ e s g h a m a n g i t k a a _ , _ iwernga _ nagneqe aq _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luni _ .
taana _ philip _ pi yalghiimi _ A z o t u s - m e t e f t u q _ . _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ aglagh te kete luku _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ .
S a u l _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l l u n i _ taawa _ paninang _ a l i n g s i q u k i i _ tuqu qugh naqe ni luki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ qenwat _ D a m a s c u s - e s u k a q _ , _ luuraq _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tamaa uute na yu kata _ . _ esghagh kumiki _ tagite na luki _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ a n u s i m i n g l l i i s q e l l u k i _ . _ enkaam _ h i g h _ priest- mun _ pi luni _ lata ngllagh te sqekagh _ p i l l e g h q a l i t e s q e l l u n i _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t n u n _ s y n a g o g u e - e t _ D a m a s c u s - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ .
enkaam _ S a u l _ aghulaqekagh _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ . _ iiwenllu _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ , _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag m _ kukegtekagh a _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ nagaqugh qu a _ me _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ S a u l _ , _ S a u l _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke manginagh zinga _ ? _ "
S a u l - e m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ " _ me m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ J e s u s - n g u u n g a _ amyuutke gkan _ .
makete luten _ aglagh a _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ , _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
yug t _ i g l e g h a l g u t a n g i _ aghula i iqe aat _ tawani _ , _ akuzipag nigh ngunateng _ nagatekagh at _ me _ , _ naqam _ kina _ alngunak _ esghagh ma ite kangat _ .
S a u l _ makete yalghiimi _ esghaate nghite uq _ qayughllak _ ayaa ma lghii _ . _ enkaam _ t a s l u q l u k u _ aglagh tke aat _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ ayaa ngakagh _ , _ talwa _ negh ma ite ngughk llu _ , _ megh ma ite ngughk llu _ .
taawa nguq _ D a m a s c u s - m i _ , _ yuug _ ugpeqe i nga lghii _ J e s u s - m e n g _ , _ ategh a _ A n a n i a s _ . _ E s g h a a g h w a a l l e g h q u n _ A t a n g h e m _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ A n a n i a s _ . _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ay _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ "
A t a n g h e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ ategh ke lghii nun _ , _ ' _ taklaghrukegte aq _ ' _ taagken _ J u d a s - e n k u n u n _ aapte yaghtugh ghhu _ yuug _ , _ S a u l - n g u u q _ , _ tarsus- meng _ pi u uq _ , _ yughagh aqe uq _ .
E s g h a g h w a a g h q u n _ e s g h a m a a _ yuug _ itegh lghii _ , _ ategh a _ A n a n i a s _ , _ s a a f s a q m i n i g u _ e s g h a g h y a g u n n e q i g t u q _ . _ "
iwernga _ A n a n i a s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ uglagh pigte lghii neng _ , _ apegh naqe pigte aqe aat _ seghletun _ pi llegh ghllag a _ yug gpenun _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ .
pi lleghqagh nge kau uq _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n e n g _ tagi luni _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ tugulagh na luki _ qamagte luki _ yughagh kayug t _ ategh gpegun _ . _ "
iwernga _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aglagh a _ , _ taku gu _ qayughllak _ nakmike ma aqa _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u n g a _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ , _ umiileg nun _ , _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n l l u _ .
liigike ste naqngu aqa _ aange luku _ ikfiqe llegh meng _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ . _ "
enkaam _ A n a n i a s - e m _ takukagh a _ S a u l _ . _ itegh luni _ saafte magh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anglegute mni _ S a u l _ , _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ esghaghkagh gpek _ tume ni _ tagi u luten _ , _ kayagte aanga _ elpenun _ . _ kayagte te aaten _ s a a f t e s q e l l u t e n _ e s g h a a s a g u n n e q i g t e s q e l l u t e n _ , _ i m i i s q e l l u t e n l l u _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ iqallug m _ q a l t e s u g n i n g i _ iye gkeneng _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ , _ enkaam _ esghagh sag u tke aq _ . _ taagken _ makete luni _ paaptaayekagh _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ negh yalghiimi _ iknaqsuugtekagh _ . _ S a u l _ u g p e q a n i t k a q _ D a m a s c u s - m i _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ .
mulu gpenani _ s y n a g o g u e - n i _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
N a g a t u l l g h i i m _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ repall _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ aapte qugh aghte tke aat _ , _ " _ U n a n g u n g h i t a a - a _ yuug _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aq _ yughagh kayug neng _ J e s u s - e m _ ategh akun _ ? _ maavek _ tagi u yagh lghii _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ tugulagh na luki _ , _ a g l a n n a l u k i _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n _ . _ "
S a u l - e m _ ungipagh ke i llegh mikun _ wata _ l i i g i k e s t a g h a q a a _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u t a n g a _ repall _ J e w s - e t _ D a m a s c u s - m e l n g u u t _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
S a u l _ ungipagh ke i lqinagh yan _ tawaten _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ J e w s - e t _ wataqaaghaq _ ugumi yagutekagh at _ , _ repall _ qerngughte te luteng _ agghi tkekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ .
enkaam _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ D a m a s c u s - e m _ amig ghllag lghute ani _ kelengakekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ . _ iwernga _ S a u l - e m _ nagaqugh qu a _ tawaten _ agghi llegh at _ .
enkaam _ u n u g m i _ ataasigh mi _ , _ S a u l - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ p a s k e t - e g h r u g l l a g e g n e k u n _ mingllute meng _ eslate mun _ u k i g t e k a a t _ .
taagken _ S a u l _ kaa sa mi _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ ilate naqe kau yaag lghii _ J e s u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t n u n _ . _ taawanginaq _ i i n g u n a g h h a g h m e n g _ alikekagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ aygughikekagh at _ ellnga llu _ maligte yaaghte ngughsi ma ta a _ .
iwernga _ B a r n a b a s - e m _ S a u l _ aglagh te luku _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ aapte qugh a _ S a u l - m u n _ tume mi _ esghagh ma ni luku _ atanegh _ , _ aleghquute kau ni lutek llu _ . _ aapte qugh a llu _ D a m a s c u s - m i _ ungipagh kau ni luku _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ J e s u s - e m _ .
enkaam _ tugukligh iqe aat _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ S a u l _ u g p e q a n i t k a q _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ , _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ J e w s - e t _ G r e e k - e s t u n _ akuzi kayug t _ aaghtiiraaghkagh an _ tuqute yu kaqe kangat _ .
ugpeqagh t _ liigike yamegteggu _ J e w s - e n u n _ tuqute naqe ni luku _ S a u l _ , _ aglagh tke aat _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ , _ taagken _ kayagtekagh at _ tarsus- mun _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ J u d e a - m i _ , _ galilee- mi _ , _ S a m a r i a - m i l l u _ a m y u u t k e s t e n g n g u n a t e n g _ kiyaghtekagh t _ . _ ugpegh llegh it _ i k n a q u g h t e k a t _ , _ alinge aqe lghiit _ qaatke te nghite lleghqagh meggneng _ atanegh mun _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ kayusi i u kangi _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nulakagh t _ .
P e t e r - e m _ iglegha te kete luku _ laalighfike te qugh u i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ n a a n s a g h n g a a t a _ . _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ laalightekagh _ L y d d a - m e l n g u g h n u n _ .
tamaani _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ ategh a _ A e n e a s _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ ayumiqullegh _ makete igate ngughk _ uniigh nga te mii neng _ .
P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ A e n e a s _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ naallghute aaten _ , _ makete luten _ allighagh n _ imeg ggu _ . _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ A e n e a s _ maketekagh _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ L y d d a - g h m i i t l u _ S h a r o n - e g h m i i t l u _ esghagh yamegteggu _ A e n e a s _ naallghute luni _ , _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ atanegh kun _ .
J o p p a - m i n g u q _ taawa _ ugpeqe aq _ aghnagh _ ategh a _ tabitha _ , _ ( _ G r e e k - s t u n _ Dorcas _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ quyngigh _ ) _ , _ quunpeng _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ , _ kiyang _ t a m a a k u n u n _ aklumalghii nun _ .
taagken _ qinuyug luni _ tuqukagh _ enkaam _ ughvughqellug qu _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ .
J o p p a - g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh t _ nagaqugh qu aat _ peter _ L y d d a - m e n n i l u k u _ . _ lydda _ , _ J o p p a - m e n g _ q a n t a g h a g h h a n l e n g u q _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ k e v g a q e g k a g k e t _ maalghug _ yug k _ peter- mun _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ J o p p a - m u n _ .
P e t e r - e m _ y a t a a g h q e l l u n i _ maligtekakek _ . _ kaate yan _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ . _ legan _ itegh uq _ ugingighagh t _ qiya magh meng _ kangllu qaghte luku _ keleg u vikekagh at _ aatkagh neng _ D o r c a s - e m _ ulimaagh aneng _ .
P e t e r - e m _ aane ste qugh luki _ segesqughte luni _ yughaghkagh _ . _ taaqe luni _ yughagh nghmeng _ qiive luku _ yugusigh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tabitha _ , _ maketen _ . _ " _ tabitha _ esghaate kete luku _ esghagh yamigu _ peter _ aqumekagh _ .
P e t e r - e m _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ tuqlugh qu ai _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvagh ma ta a _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ J o p p a - g h m i i t _ nagaqugh qu aat _ T a b i t h a - m _ unguvallegh a _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
peter _ mulukagh _ J o p p a - m i _ , _ S i m o n - e n k u n i t k a q _ s a n a g h t i s t e m i _ .
C a e s a r e a - m i n g u q _ taawa _ yuug _ ategh a _ C o r n e l i u s _ . _ umiileg at _ R o m e - e m _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t a _ italy- meng _ pi t _ .
yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ yughaghtuqagh llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e k u l l g h i i t _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ 3 - k l a a g m i _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ . _ W h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg a _ itegh lghii _ , _ yaquleg m _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ C o r n e l i u s _ ! _ "
alingruugh magh mi _ esghapagtugh luku _ yaquleg _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ sa meng _ pi ziin _ ? _ " _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma ai _ yughagh llegh ten _ , _ efqugh ke pigte a llu _ kayusigh i llegh n _ aklumalghii nun _ enkaam _ neqamike aaten _ .
J o p p a - m u n _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
S i m o n - e n k u n i t u q _ s a n a g h t i s t e m i _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ tawaten _ pi luku _ unitekagh a _ . _ taagken _ C o r n e l i u s - e m _ tuqlugh kakek _ maalghug _ q e p g h a g h t e g n i _ , _ p i l l u g w a g h t a l l u _ . _ taana _ p i l l u w a g h t a _ C o r n e l i u s - e m _ kayute anga _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tagi yata _ ungipaate u aqe ai _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ , _ taagken _ keveg aqekagh i _ J o p p a - m u n _ .
unaami ani _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ k e v g a t _ kaate yaghtugh aqe ut llu _ J o p p a - m u n _ , _ peter _ mat- yuqagh _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ yughagh na luni _ .
taagken _ iyataghkagh _ , _ sa meng _ neghyuke aq _ . _ sama _ neqe meng _ yataaghqe ma luki _ peter _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ .
esgha qaa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taagken _ esgha qaa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ u k i g t e k a n g a t _ nuna mun _ e s t a m a t g u n _ tekerqagh akun _ .
taawa nguq _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ r e p t i l e - e n e n g _ , _ qawaag neng llu _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ "
iwernga _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeghlegi llu _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate unga _ iinghutekagh meng _ ukmangite nghite ngugh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ "
me m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ taakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ pi gpenaki _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ pi nga yu neng _ k e t w h e l l _ . _ taagken _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ taana _ iingunagh mi _ qilag mun _ mayugh tke aq _ .
P e t e r - e m _ kukriqe tkekagh a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ . _ tawaten _ pi ma luku _ C o r n e l i u s - e m _ keveg ai ta _ liite tke aat _ S i m o n - e m _ mangteghagh a _ n a a n t u l a n g a _ , _ enkaam _ manughagh anun _ kaate tke aat _ .
qamavek _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ whani _ aqelqagh u nghite a _ yuug _ ategh a _ simon _ peter _ ? _ "
P e t e r - e m _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ , _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ , _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ ivagh aqe aaten _ .
ukig luten _ qaqilqa fqaavek _ maligte ki _ , _ qayughllak _ whanga _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ . _ "
enkaam _ P e t e r - e m _ ukig luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ ivaghkagh i _ . _ sa meng _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ C o r n e l i u s - e m _ keveg aqe ainkut _ , _ umiileg u uq _ R o m e - e m _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t n u n _ . _ yuug _ pinigh ghllag uq _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ J e w s - e t _ sii vag ke pigte aqe aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ pika qaa _ C o r n e l i u s _ , _ ' _ aqfa ste gu _ peter _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh a _ elpenun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ itegh sqekagh i _ , _ tawani llu _ qavigh sqekagh i _ . _ unaami ani _ y a t a a g h q e l l u n i _ maligtekagh i _ C o r n e l i u s - e m _ keveg ai _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ila i _ J o p p a - m e n g _ maligte tke aat _ .
taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate tke aat _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ . _ C o r n e l i u s - e m _ ilakwaagh ni llu _ ilakumtaagh ni llu _ tagi laghate te ste luki _ ellmeggnun _ utaqakagh at _ peter _ .
peter _ itegh aqe uq llu _ C o r n e l i u s - e m _ payegh luku _ segesqughte vikekagh a _ manigugh na luku _ .
iwernga _ P e t e r - e m _ n e k e v e s t u t k e l l u k u _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nekeve i _ , _ whanga llu _ yugu unga _ . _ "
iitghute kete luku _ P e t e r - e m _ aleghqugh qu a _ C o r n e l i u s _ . _ itegh yalghiimi _ taawa _ yuug _ qerngughte te ghllag ma lghii _ tawani _ .
P e t e r - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h s i _ whangkuta _ J e w s - e n i _ liilightuusagh mta _ ineghtekaqe ainkut _ ilate fqaamta _ p i s q e l l u t a _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ , _ talwa _ laalighfike snanigh kaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kina _ alngunak _ ukmangite nghite ni luku _ sumeghtaghagh tke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
aqfate yafsinga _ tagi unga _ qaqilqa gpenanga _ . _ sangama _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ "
C o r n e l i u s - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whaten _ lliigh magh an _ a k u w a a q _ pi aqe lleg mtun _ yughagh ma lunga _ 3 - k e l l a a g m i _ , _ yuug _ manu mkun _ nekeve uq _ aatkagh i _ nighug ghllag t _ .
whaa _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ C o r n e l i u s _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ yughagh llegh ten _ nagaqugh ma ai _ , _ neqamike ai llu _ aklumalghii nun _ kayusigh i llegh ten _ .
J o p p a - m u n _ kina _ keveg aqe gu _ aqfa sqellug qu _ simon _ peter _ . _ S i m o n - e n k u n i t u q _ s a n a g h t i s t e m i _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ '
enkaam _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ aqfa sqe amken _ , _ quyake amken _ tagi lghiiten _ . _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh ke llegh a _ qamagte luta _ w h a a n l e n g u g h n i _ n a g a q u g h y u g a g h p u t _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ A t a n g h e m _ elpenun _ apegh sqekagh a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ "
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa _ liigike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pikayug u a _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag an _ yuug _ ataasigh stun _ .
tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ kina _ alngunak _ n a k u m i i n g u y a g h n g a a n _ alike i lghii _ ellmi neng _ , _ pinitun llu _ pikayug _ .
liisimakagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ungipagh kekagh _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ , _ taana _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ yug t _ nekeggmellegh nge sighqagh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ atanegh ke a _ t a m a g h h a g h w a a g h m i _ yug m _ .
liisimakagh i _ taana _ ungipagh _ mingite kau uq _ J u d e a - l q a a g h a g h m i _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ galilee- mi _ J o h n - e m _ ungipagh kaqe yagu _ paaptaaye llegh _ .
liisimakagh i _ Jesus _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ i mi qaa _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m e n g l l u _ . _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ pinitun _ pi aqe kangi _ yug t _ , _ naallghute qugh qu ai llu _ tamaakut _ tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ J e s u s - m e l n g u q _ .
whangkuta _ a p o s t l e - e n i _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a n u n _ J e w s - e t _ nuna itni _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i l l u _ . _ tuqute kaqe aat _ tuquuqagh te luku _ qaquuragh kun _ .
iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ esghagh stekaqe a llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ qamagte luni _ yug m _ esghagh mangite a _ . _ whangkuta _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ liisimake i ste u luta _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ meghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh ste llegh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ , _ apegh sqe kau uq llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nakmike kaqe ni luni _ nanqigte i ste u luni _ unguva lghii nun llu _ tuqukagh nun llu _ .
qamagte luteng _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ pi kau ut _ , _ kitum nguq _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ategh akun _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ . _ "
peter _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ qamagte luki _ nagate lghiit _ ungipagh meng _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ iteghkagh i _ , _ enkaam _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a t u n _ akuzi stekagh i llu _ usuqe i stekagh i llu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ C i r c u m c i s e - e k a t _ ugpeqagh t _ J o p p a - m e n g _ maligte tke aat _ peter- mun _ saghiigha yuke aat _ nagate yamegteki _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ . _ liigikekagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ tunusagh ke kek _ talwa _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ ukut _ yug t _ allgegh te ut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ w h a n g k u t e g h p i g a g h e s t u n _ . _ kitum ngam _ paaptaaye snanigh nagh kaki _ megh kun _ ? _ "
taagken _ qelqe ai _ p a a p t a a y e s q e l l u k i _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ T a a m _ kingu aneng _ e l l m e g g n i t a g h i i s q e g k a a t _ peter _ .
A p o s t l e - e t l u _ ugpeqagh t llu _ J u d e a - m e l n g u u t _ nagaqugh qu ait _ G e n t i l e - e n u n l l u _ ugpeqe ma ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
peter _ kaate yan _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ , _ J e w s - e t _ ugpeqagh t _ c i r c u m c i s e - e g h i y u k a t _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqagh itneng _ s e g h l e q u u q a a t _ peter _ , _ pi ke aat _ ,
" _ sangan _ c i r c u m c i z e - e m a n g i l n g u u t _ itegh vike luki _ ne itnun _ neghe lgusigh ziki _ ? _ "
L i i g i k e s q e l l u k i _ P e t e r - e m _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ kenlanga _ aapte qugh a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ apeghiighkagh _ .
" _ J o p p a - m i _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh kau unga _ . _ esghagh aqa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gni _ e s t a m a t g u n _ tekerqagh akun _ u k i g t e k a n g a t _ qilag meng _ whanga mnun _ .
tawavek _ y u v g h i i g h w a a g h y a q e g k a _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ r e p t i l e - e n e n g _ , _ qawaag neng _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ '
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ yeghlegi llu _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate anka _ tamaakut _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ neqe t _ iinghutekagh t _ . _ '
" _ me m _ pi laatagh aanga _ qilag meng _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ sumeghtaghagh te kete yaghqaqe nghite aten _ . _ '
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ pi nga yu neng _ k e t w h e l l _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ taakut _ aga _ qilag mun _ mayugh te aqe ut llu _ ,
whaa _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ kaate ut _ tukugh mnun _ , _ k e v g a a f t u t _ whanga mnun _ C a e s a r e a - m e n g _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ qaqilqa fqaama _ maligte sqe ai _ . _ ukut llu _ aghvinleg _ yug t _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u t _ maligte te ut _ J o p p a - m e n g _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ . _ kaa llu ta _ C o r n e l i u s - e n k u n u n _ i t e g h a a t u k u t _ .
C o r n e l i u s - e m _ apegh aa _ yaquleg meng _ esghaate lleg ni _ ne mini _ , _ yaquleg m nguq _ whaten _ pi a _ , _ ' _ J o p p a - m u n _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
ungipaate lleqe aisi _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ . _ '
enkaam _ akuzi aqe unga llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ itegh ai _ tawatengwaaq _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ itegh llegh mitun _ P e n t e c o s t - e m _ aghnegh ani _ .
taagken _ neqangugh aqa _ A t a n g h e m _ p i l l g h a _ whaten _ , _ ' _ John _ p a a p t a a y e l a q a a g u q _ megh kun _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ paaptaaye lleqe usi _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kaki _ G e n t i l e - e t _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ tunute yameng _ tuunekagh mineng _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ugpeqe aqe yamteggu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ whanga _ kina u zinga _ aghula i aghte naqe yaghqaa luku _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a n e n g _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ ? _ "
tawaten _ P e t e r - e m _ p i y i s t e n g _ qalleg nanigh luteng _ , _ yeghlegi _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taawa _ liigikagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ talwa _ G e n t i l e - e t _ p i l l e g h q a l i s i m a k a n g i _ a v u t e g h q e s q e l l u k i _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ u n g u v a l l e n g e s q e l l u k i l l u _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ! _ "
S t e p h e n - e m _ tuqute llegh a _ kenle ke luku _ J e w s - e t _ amyuutkekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ anagkagh t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ . _ aghulaqe te tke aat _ kenlanga _ P h o e n i c i a - m u n _ , _ C y p r u s - m u n _ , _ A n t i o c h - m u n l l u _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ ungipagh kekagh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ J e w s - n g i n a g h h a g h n u n _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ C y p r u s - m e n g l l u _ C y r e n e - m e n g l l u _ A n t i o c h - e t k a t _ , _ kaate luteng _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ talwa _ J e w s - n g u n g h i l n g u g h n u n _ .
A t a n g h e m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ ellngitnite kau lghii _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pestaagh _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ qiive te tke aq _ atanegh mun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ Barnabas _ kayagtekagh at _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ quya ghllagkagh _ qayughllak _ liigikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ yug nun _ . _ Barnabas _ pinigh lghii u lghii _ yuug _ , _ imigh nga ghllag llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg leg ghllag llu _ . _ taagken _ allangughte fqiita _ ataasiighmete kestigh sqekagh i _ atanegh mun _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
taagken _ B a r n a b a s - e m _ S a u l _ ivagh yaghtuqagh a _ tarsus- mun _ .
N a a l k e s a m i g u _ kelqekagh a _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ . _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ t a m a a n t e l l e g h m e g n i _ ilate aqe lutek _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ . _ tamaani _ A n t i o c h - m i _ ugpeqagh t _ atigh yuwhaagh ke ait _ , _ " _ C h r i s t i a n - e t _ . _ "
tamaani _ ila i _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ tagikagh t _ .
ataasigh _ A g a b u s - n g u f t u q _ , _ nekeve luni _ uuknaliqekagh _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ neqangisag ghllag naqe ni luku _ tea- ma ani _ . _ taawa _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ C l a u d i u s _ U m i i l e g p i g a a l u k u _ .
ugpeqagh t _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t e n g _ J u d e a - m e l n g u u t _ kayusigh yug qu ait _ p i t u t a l m e g e s t u n _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte i luteng _ mani meng _ tuyugh ikagh t _ e l d e r - e n u n _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u g h n u n _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u g n e k u n _ S a u l - e n k u g n e k u n _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ amyuutke sag u tke ai _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
J o h n - e m _ a n g l e g u t a n g a _ James _ tuqute stekagh a _ savigpag kun _ .
umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ liigike yamigu _ J e w s - e n e n g _ efqughtagh igh lleg ni _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ , _ qelegh tke a _ peter _ tugu sqellug qu _ . _ ( _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ N e q e n g h a g h q e n g n g u l u k i _ Y e a s t - a l i i m a n g i l n g u g h m e n g _ neqekrangllagh meng _ . _ )
peter _ tugu yatgu _ , _ umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ qelegh tke a _ 1 6 - e g h y a g n u n _ p i l l u w a g h t e n u n _ kelengake sqellug qu _ estamat kaghte ai ta _ kipullegte te aqe luki _ . _ yugtuqagh mi _ nanqigte yukagh a _ kingu aneng _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ .
enkaam _ peter _ anusimingllaghvig mete stekagh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh te ke ghllag ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
peter _ qavaa lghii _ maalghug _ kelengake istek _ akule gkeni _ , _ petug nga lghii llu _ m a l g h u g n e g h t e g g u n _ qiipraghute tgun _ . _ allameng _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig a _ k e l e n g a k i s t e l e k _ . _ whaa _ aghtekan _ H e r o d - e m _ tagite ste naqngu kanga _ yug nun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ .
A t a n g h e m _ yaquleg a _ aliigh aghtekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nighug _ kuukgute ke aq _ anusimingllaghvig m _ ilu anun _ . _ yaquleg m _ peter _ tuye akun _ aghulate luku _ , _ teghtughllug qu _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ egmiinaq _ maketen _ ! _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ qiipraghute t _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ iiggagh neng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ pilugug luten _ kameg gken _ aate kek _ . _ " _ peter _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ yaquleg m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ qaasligh gken _ aate lukek _ maligte nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ P e t e r - e m _ maligtekagh a _ . _ ugpeqe mangite u aqe aqe yagh kanga _ aane te lleg ni _ , _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ esghaghwaagh ni luni _ .
sivuligh t llu _ tuungligh ghhagh i llu _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t _ naghughte luki _ kaate tke ak _ savikenghaagh mun _ amig mun _ . _ amigh k _ ellmi neng _ qelpegh yan _ , _ aane lutek _ i g l e g h t e g h n g a a g m e k _ tume tgun _ yaquleg _ aviite qaghtekagh _ .
taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ liigike u aqe a _ sa mate ni _ enkaam _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa u uq _ A t a n g h e m _ kayagte ma a _ yaquleg ni _ i q i t u t e s q e l l u n g a _ H e r o d - m e n g _ , _ J e w s - e t l u _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
liigike luku _ sa mate ni _ M a r y - n k u n u n _ aglaghkagh _ , _ John _ M a r k - e m _ naa anun _ . _ tawani _ yug lghute _ qerngughte te luni _ yughagh te ghllagu lghii _ qerngagh mi _ .
peter _ e s l a k l i g h q u n _ amig kun _ tenglugtugh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ q e p g h a g h t e m _ , _ R h o d a - m _ qelpegh te yaghtuqagh a _ .
liisuqe yamigu _ P e t e r - e m _ me a _ , _ q u y a g h l l a g e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ qelpegh te gpenaan _ , _ yeghlegi _ ilu te mun _ itegh qaghte luni _ aapte qugh a _ qakma _ peter _ m a n u g h a m e n n i l u k u _ .
iwernga _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ temngi _ pi uten _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ sagiqe tke ai _ ipa u ni luku _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yaquleg ke nghite agu wha _ . _ "
qakma _ peter _ tenglugtugh ma inagh ke aq _ . _ Q e l p e g h u s a q m e g t e g g u _ ellnga u uq _ enkaam _ saghiigha yuke aat _ .
P e t e r - e m _ apaqukagh i _ q a l l e g n a n i i s q e l l u k i _ , _ enkaam _ ungipamsug te u aqe ai _ A t a n g h e m _ aane te llegh aneng _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ apegh qagh nakefsinga _ J a m e s - m u n l l u _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n u n l l u _ tawaten _ pi ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane luni _ natmun _ pi ke aq _ .
aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t _ a v i i l n g a q a a t _ peter _ , _ a l i n g r u g h u m a g h m e n g _ kukriqekagh t _ samatagh nge a _ .
H e r o d - e m _ i v a g h t e s i m a y a q a n g a _ iwernga _ naalke ma nge i tke aat _ . _ enkaam _ k e l e n g a k i s t e t _ a a p q u g h a a g h t e s l u k i _ nalluke yatgu _ tuqu qugh stekagh i _ . _ T a a m _ kingu aneng _ herod _ J u d e a - m e n g _ C a e s a r e a - l l u n i _ t a m a a n t e g h r a a k a q _ .
umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ ugumi yagute ghllagu kangi _ T y r e - e g h m i i t l u _ S i d o n - e g h m i i t l u _ , _ iwernga _ t a m a a k u m i i t _ yug t _ kayagtekagh it _ B l a s t u s - m u n _ a k u z i t u n n a q a g h t e s q e l l u t e n g _ H e r o d - m u n _ . _ Blastus _ i g l e g h u t i s t e k e g k a n g a _ umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ mangteghagh ghllag an _ . _ kaate luteng _ aaptekagh at _ Blastus _ a k u z i t u t a g h t e s q e l l u t e n g _ umiileg mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau lghiit _ neqenge nanigh na yukagh meng _ H e r o d - e m _ nuna aneng _ .
tawani _ aghneghmi _ pi vigkagh meggni _ H e r o d - e m _ umiileg u sigh t _ aatkagh ni _ a a t q u g h l u k i _ aqume luni _ aqumutagh ghllag gmikun _ akuzikagh _ .
taaqe yan _ akuzi nghmeng _ yug t _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ yugu nghite uq _ akuzi lghii _ , _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ ! _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ A t a n g h e m _ yaquleg an _ qinuyug ste ghllag qagh a _ herod _ , _ qayughllak _ tugukligh kanga _ q u u l v a l l e q _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi a _ . _ U n g u v a g h m i _ kingugtagh u ghllag luni _ tuqukagh _ .
taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke aat _ enkaam _ wata _ yuug _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ .
taake uk _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ S a u l - e n k u k _ apeghiigh yamegnegu _ qepghaqagh ek _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ , _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ .
A n t i o c h - m i _ ugpeqagh m _ ila i _ uuknaliqe i ste u ut llu _ apeghtughiste u ut llu _ . _ T a a k u n g u f t u t _ Barnabas _ , _ simeon _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ niger- meng _ , _ L u c i u s _ ( _ C y r e n e - m e n g _ pi _ ) _ , _ M a n a e n _ ( _ angli lgute anga _ umiileg m _ H e r o d - e m _ ) _ , _ S a u l - l l u _ .
maniguute ma luki _ atanegh mun _ , _ f a s t - e m a l u k i l l u _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aafte kek _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ S a u l - e n k u k _ , _ qayughllak _ nakmike agka _ alla neng _ qepghaqagh meng _ qepghigh sqellug kek _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
taaqe yameng _ f a s t - e l l e g h m e n g l l u _ yughagh llegh meng llu _ saafte lukek _ yughagh tkellug kek _ a g h u l a q e s t e k a g k e t _ .
B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ S a u l - e n k u k _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ k a y a g s i s t e k _ , _ S e l e u c i a - t k a k _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ kayute u luku _ . _ tamaaken _ angyaghpag kun _ qiighqagh mun _ C y p r u s - m u n _ pikagh t _ . _ kaate yameng _ salamis- mun _ s y n a g o g u e - n g i t n i _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
salamis- meng _ igleghakagh t _ inglu anun _ qiighqagh m _ P a p h o s - m u n _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ nallaqagh at _ yuug _ alignagh lghii _ ategh a _ B a r - J e s u s _ , _ u u k n a l i q e s t e s i g h w a a q _ , _ J e w s - a _ .
qiighqagh m _ G o v e r n o r - n g a n _ S e r g i u s _ P a u l u s - e m _ ilakumtaagh a _ . _ S e r g i u s _ P a u l u s _ pilleg ghllag _ . _ aqfa stekakek _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ S a u l - e n k u k _ nagate na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
iwernga _ B a r - J e s u s - e m _ alignalghii m _ , _ ateghagh leg m _ elymas- meng _ , _ aaghtiiraagh kakek _ g o v e r n o r - a _ ugpegh na yu kan _ . _ ( _ ategh _ elymas _ , _ G r e e k - s t u n _ whaten _ pi sigh u lghii _ , _ alignagh lghii _ . _ )
taagken _ S a u l - e m _ , _ ateghagh ke lghii m _ P a u l - m e n g _ , _ imigh nga lghii m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ esghapagtugh luku _ alignagh lghii
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ tughneghagh m _ ighnegh a _ ! _ ugumi ke an _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinigh lghii _ . _ iqlengasag ghllag u uten llu _ seghletun llu _ pi ste ghllagu uten _ . _ T a a q n a q e n g h i s i k i i _ iqlengiqe sigh ke nghmeng _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghtuusagh i _ ?
whaa _ A t a n g h e m _ aghyuugh naqe aaten _ a y a a s t e m m e n g _ , _ enkaam _ e s g h a a t e l g h a g h t u g h n a a n g h i t u t e n _ aghnegh m _ nighug aneng _ . _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ E l y m a s - e m _ iye kek _ m a m l e g h q w a a k a k _ , _ enkaam _ tamaani _ e f l u g h w a a g h m e n g _ ivagh ikagh _ kitumun _ t a s l u q i i s q e l l u n i _ .
G o v e r n o r - a _ ugpeqe aq _ esghapag luku _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ , _ saghiigha yagutekagh a llu _ apeghtuusagh _ atanegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
P a u l - e n k u t _ iglegha lgutke te lghiit _ angyaghpag kun _ igleghtekagh t _ P a p h o s - m e n g _ , _ perga- mun _ P a m p h y l i a - m e l n g u g h m u n _ . _ T a m a a n l l u k i _ John _ M a r k - e m _ unite luki _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
taagken _ P a u l - e n k u t _ perga- meng _ , _ A n t i o c h - e t k a t _ P i s i d i a - m e l n g u g h m u n _ . _ S a b b a t h - n g u g h s a g u _ s y n a g o g u e - n g i t n u n _ itegh luteng _ aqumekagh t _ .
I g l e g h u t i s t e n g i _ s y n a g o g u e - e m _ , _ taaqe yameng _ atightugh nghmeng _ liilightuusagh neng llu _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ igaqegkagh itneng _ , _ keveg aqe tke ait _ P a u l - e n k u t _ whaten _ p i s q e l l u k i _ , _ " _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ ungipagh lgu kufsi _ i k n a q s u u g u s i g h q a m e n g _ ugpegh lleg mnnun _ , _ sa aqe tsi _ akuzite k _ . _ "
taagken _ P a u l _ nekeve luni _ apaqu magh mi _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ , _ elpek si llu _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ nagate ngnga _ !
whangkuta _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ manigughkagh mta _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ , _ nula ste ghllag kaqe ai llu _ nunatagh u aqngata _ E g y p t - m i _ . _ T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h t e k a t _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h l l a g m i k u n _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ E g y p t - m e n g _ .
kilgaa nite luki _ q a a t k u t e p a g l l a n g h i t e g h n g a a t a _ ellmi nun _ paninang _ aflengake kaqe ai _ k e t w h e l l _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ n a a f q e s a m i k i _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ ramke t _ C a n a a n - m e l n g u u t _ nuna ke yagh kangat _ pi liite stekaqe a _ sivunegh mnnun _ pagite aqe sqellug qu _ .
entaqun _ 4 5 0 - n g u u t _ ayumiqullegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike llegh aneng _ sivunegh put _ kenlanga _ nuna _ pi liite llegh itnun _ . _ " _ T a a m _ kingu aneng _ nanqigte i ste ngestagh u aatagh kaqe ai _ i g l e g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ kenlanga _ samuel _ uuknaliqe i sta _ igleghte te i stekau aghte llegh itnun _ .
taagken _ u m i i l e n g y u w a q n g a t a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ S a u l _ umiileg ke sqellug qu _ K i s h - e m _ ighnegh a _ , _ B e n j a m i n - e m _ ramke aneng _ pi _ . _ umiileg u kau uq _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ u m i i l g u n a n i g h t e s a m i g u _ S a u l _ , _ David _ umiileg liite stekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ whaten _ , _ ' _ J e s s e - m _ ighnegh a _ David _ umiileg ughte sug aqa _ . _ T a w a t e l n g u q _ yuug _ piyuke aqe aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaqe a _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyuke kaqe a _ . _ '
" _ T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ D a v i d - e m _ k i n g u n g h a k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe i llegh mitun _ allgegh stekaqe a _ yuguligh i sta _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ . _ taana _ yuguligh i sta _ J e s u s - n g u u q _ .
J e s u s - e m _ salin _ qepghaqagh ni _ piinligh llghite luku _ John _ ungipagh ke i kau uq _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ whaten _ , _ ' _ A v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h l u s i _ , _ p a a p t a a y e t e k _ . _ '
J o h n - e m _ qepghaqagh ni _ taaqe yaghtugh ngestagh luku _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kina u ni lunga _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ whanga u nghite uq _ utaqakagh i _ . _ kingu mneng _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ aange ghllag lghii _ , _ repall _ whanga _ pinigh nghite unga _ singigh anun _ i t e m t i s t e n g u l u n g a _ . _ '
" _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ A b r a h a m - e m _ k i n g u n g h i t n i _ , _ G e n t i l e - e n i l l u _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana _ ungipagh a _ yuguligh llegh m _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ pi u uq _ !
J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ igleghte te i stekete te lghiit _ nalluke kaqe aat _ Jesus _ yuguligh i ste u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ S a b b a t h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ nagate ghngaaghmegteki _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ naqam _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ igaqegkagh it _ apeghiigh kaqe ait _ agghi te kaqe yamegteggu _ Jesus _ tuqute na luku _ .
taawa _ legan _ temngi _ apallugh ite ghngaan _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ pilate- mun _ tuqute sqe kaqe aat _ .
legan _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i n a q n i l l g h i s t u n _ pi kaqe aat _ . _ taagken _ qaquuragh meng _ ateghte luku _ llivegh kaqe aat _ ,
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ iglegha lgutke ke ii te a _ J e s u s - e m _ galilee- meng _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ esghagh aatagh kaqe aat _ qafsinegyag ni _ aghnegh ni _ . _ E l l n g i n g u u t _ ungipagh lghiit _ yug mnnun _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguva luku _ .
" _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
apeghiigh ma a _ akequsagh ni _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ k i n g u n g h i t n u n _ , _ unguvagh ste llegh mikun _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ P s a l m _ 2 - m i _ , _ ' _ elpek _ ighnegh ke amken _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ A t a l i i t a g h p e n g a _ . _ '
kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ e n k a a n g a m _ allameng llu _ tuqu naanghite uq _ aghyugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghiit _ akequsagh kekagh nka _ D a v i d - m u n _ ipapestaaq _ quya ste i sigh ke lleqe anka _ elpesi nun _ . _ '
ilangani _ P s a l m s - e m _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghii n _ aghu snaanghite aqa _ llivegh mi _ . _ '
" _ D a v i d - e m _ unguvallegh mini _ atuqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ taagken _ qavagh yan _ qungugh kaqe aat _ s i v u n g h a n _ saaghw itgun _ , _ yugusigh a _ aghu kau uq _ llivegh mi _ .
iwernga _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh a _ tuqu llegh meng _ aghu mangite uq _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ elpesi nun _ liite sqe sug aqa _ J e s u s - k u n _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ seghevute lleg nge kayugu ut _ . _ taana ta _ ungipagh ke kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
qaatke te llegh m _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh itgun _ kina _ alngunak _ iteme te naanghite a _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t g u n _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nagate tek _ elpek si _ aygugh itagh lghii ni _ . _ sa aqe tsi _ saghiigha yug lusi _ tuqu tek _ , _ qayughllak _ unguva u lusi _ sa lleqe unga _ iwernga _ u g p e q n a a n g h i t a g h s i _ talwa _ kitum _ ungipaate ghngaisi _ . _ ' _ kelenga lusi _ , _ luuraq _ tawaten _ p i n a y u k a f s i _ . _ "
P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ s y n a g o g u e - m e n g _ aane ma lukek _ alla _ t a g i s q e g k a g k e t _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ S a b b a t h - e m _ , _ wata _ u n g i p i q u t e s q e l l u t e n g _ .
aanleghaate yameng _ J e w s - e l g h u t e t l u _ , _ G e n t i l e - e l g h u t e t l u _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ J e w s - e s t u n _ , _ maligte tke aat _ P a u l - e n k u g n u n _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u g n u n _ . _ A p o s t l e - e k _ kayemekagh ik _ k i y a g h t e k e s t i i s q e l l u k i _ sighimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ S a b b a t h - e m _ qamagte vzigh luteng _ A n t i o c h - e g h m i i t _ nagate yagh tke aat _ A t a n g h e m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
J e w s - e t _ aqinake aat _ esghagh yamegteki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ enkaam _ P a u l _ k i p u l l g i n a q a a t _ , _ seghleqekagh at llu _ .
iwernga _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ tetug gpenaki _ J e w s - e t _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ elpesi nun _ sivuke luni _ apegh yaghqaa yagh uq _ iwernga _ nagate yug mangite usi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ighsake kaqe te gpesineng _ , _ palaqe kau te gpesineng llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ whaa _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ ungipagh ke i naqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ qelqe aqe ainkut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nakmike kaqe amsi _ nighug u lusi _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ , _ apegh sqellug qu _ yuguligh llegh _ nunatagh ghhagh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ ' _ "
G e n t i l e - e t _ nagaqugh luki _ taakut _ akuzite t _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ pi kau lghiit llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ pi niigh pigte uq _ . _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ u n g u v a l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ ugpeqe ikagh t _ ungipagh meng _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ A n t i o c h - m i _ , _ u v i t a n g a n i l n g u g h n i l l u _ nuna ni _ A t a n g h e m _ ungipagh a _ mingitekagh _ .
iwernga _ J e w s - e t _ takukagh it _ G e n t i l e - e t _ aghni ut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i l l u _ A n t i o c h - e m _ n a a v g u u n n a l u k e k _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ a m y u u t k e g k a g k e t _ taake uk _ yug k _ , _ a g h u l a q e s t e k a g k e t l u _ nuna meggneng _ .
enkaam _ a p o s t l e - e k _ itegagh tek _ pagulangigh iqe aik _ kelgute na luku _ pegge ni luki _ k i p u l l g i n a a l g h i i t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ taagken _ I c o n i u m - e m u n _ aghulaqekagh k _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ A n t i o c h - m e l n g u u t _ quya nga ghllaget llu _ , _ imigh nga lghiit llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
I c o n i u m - e m i _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ p i i q e l l e g h m e g e t u n _ s y n a g o g u e - m u n _ aglaghkagh k _ . _ tawani _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ akuzikagh k _ repall _ J e w s - e l g h u t e t l u _ , _ G e n t i l e - e l g h u t e t l u _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
enkaam _ I c o n i u m - e m e t e l q i n a q a k _ , _ tamaani _ tetug gpenatek _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ atanegh meng _ . _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ A t a n g h e m _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s t e g h l l a g a a t a q a k e k _ yug nun _ ipa u ta a _ liigike sqellug qu _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ A t a n g h e m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpegh yug ma ite ngugh t _ J e w s - e t _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ seghletun _ sumeghtaghagh tke stekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ .
enkaam _ I c o n i u m - e g h m i i t _ m a l g h u g h k e g k a t _ , _ ila i _ ila tke aat _ J e w s - e n u n _ , _ ila i _ a p o s t l e - e n u n _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ , _ J e w s - e t l u _ maligte te luteng _ i g l e g h u t i s t e m e g g n u n _ amyugh te kete yu ke agket _ a p o s t l e - e k _ , _ m i l u g h p a g a a t a g h h i i n a q l u _ tuqute yu ke agket _ .
nagaqugh yamek _ yug nun _ tawaten _ pi naqe ni lutek _ , _ qimagkagh k _ L y c a o n i a - m _ ne ghllag gkenun _ L y s t r a - m u n l l u _ , _ D e r b e - m u n l l u _ , _ u v i t e g k e n i l n g u g h n u n l l u _ ne nun _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ ungipagh kekagh ik _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
L y s t r a - m i n g u q _ taawa _ yuug _ itegagh i _ n a t e l n g u u t _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ ima _ enkaam _ piyug igate ngughk _ .
aqumgagh mi _ tawani _ nagatekagh a _ P a u l _ akuzi lghii _ . _ P a u l - e m _ liigikekagh a _ yuug _ ugpegh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ naallghute lleqe ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qiive luku _ tawavek _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ N e k e v n g w a a g h i _ itegagh gpegun _ ! _ " _ aga _ yuug _ nekefqaghte luni _ tamaani _ piyuke aq _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ P a u l - e m _ naallghute i llegh a _ araghaatagh tke aat _ L y c a o n i a - g h m i i s t u n _ , _ " _ yugu luteng _ kiyaghnegh t _ taku inkut _ ! _ "
Barnabas _ Z e u s - n g u n i k a a t _ enkaam _ P a u l _ H e r m e s - n g u n i k a a t _ kiyang _ akuzi ste u ta aneng _ .
priest- nge an _ Z e u s - e m l l u _ , _ yug t llu _ a g h q e r r a a g h y u k a g k e t _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ . _ enkaam _ priest- a _ tagi tke aq _ teghig ke te yameng llu _ p i i t e s i i g h a g h m e n g l l u _ L y s t r a - m _ mingllu ta an _ amig ghllag anun _ . _ ( _ temple- a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ Z e u s - m u n _ amig ghllag m _ t u n g a n g a n i l n g u q _ ) _ .
iwernga _ a p o s t l e - e k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ P a u l - e n k u k _ liigike yamegneki _ sa naqe ta i _ aatkagh tek _ piigugh qu aik _ . _ taagken _ aqfaasnaq _ yug nun _ qungangiite tke ak _ aragh magh egmek _ ,
" _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sangafsi _ tawaten _ pi tsi _ ? _ whangkutung llu _ yugu ukung _ e l p e s i s t u n g w a a q _ ! _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh u ukung _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun _ , _ tunute lusi _ sea-te u nghite ngugh neng _ manigughkagh gpesineng _ q i i v e s q e l l u s i _ unguva lghii mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ ulima kaqe ai _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaghhagh an _ t a a k u n i l n g u q _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ J e w s - n g u n g h i l n g u u t _ p i y u k e l l g h i s t u n _ pi stekaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ t a w a t e t e g h n g a a t a _ paninang _ liisimake stekau uq _ unguva ni luni _ pinitun _ pi llegh mikun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ nunivagseghagh t _ n a g u s q e l l u k i _ . _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte luku _ piite ste aqe ai _ piite yaghqagh t _ piite vig it _ kaate nghata _ n e q e l g u s q e l l u s i _ , _ q u y a n g a s q e l l u s i l l u _ . _ "
P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ tawaten _ akuzi ghngaayek _ taawa _ paninang _ L y s t r a - g h m i i t _ a g h q e r r a a g h n a q u t k e g k a g k e t _ . _ iwernga _ pegnem _ p i s n e g h i t k a k _ .
taagken _ ila i _ J e w s - e t _ A n t i o c h - m e n g l l u _ I c o n i u m - e m e n g l l u _ kaate tke aat _ L y s t r a - m u n _ . _ L y s t r a - g h m i i n u n _ n a a v g u u l l u k e k _ u g u m i i t e s t e k a g k e t _ . _ enkaam _ J e w s - e t l u _ , _ L y s t r a - g h m i i t l u _ P a u l _ milugh agaatagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ ne m _ k e l u t a n g a n u n _ sumegh meggni _ tuquma ni luku _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ taku laghate te yatni _ P a u l _ nekeve luni _ aglagh nqigtekagh _ ne mun _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ elkek _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ D e r b e - m u n _ aglaghkagh k _ .
P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ D e r b e - m i _ enkaam _ uglagh _ maligte yaaghte ngughtekagh _ . _ taagken _ L y s t r a - m u n _ pi nqigtekagh k _ , _ taagken _ I c o n i u m - e m u n _ , _ A n t i o c h - m u n l l u _ pikagh k _ P i s i d i a - m e l n g u g h m u n _ .
takuughaghkagh megteni _ tamaani _ apeghtugh qu aik _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ wata _ i k n a q u g h t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ kayemekagh ik llu _ ugpegh llegh it _ a g h u l i i t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ uglagh pestaagh _ seghleliigh llegh _ a t u q s a g h q a p e s t a a q a g h p u t _ itegh yaghqaaghte na luta _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
takuughaghkagh megteni llu _ nakmiightuqagh k _ E l d e r - k a g h q a m e n g _ i g l e g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ yughagh magh egmek _ f a s t - e k a k _ . _ T a a m _ kingu aneng _ atanegh mun _ ugpeqekagh megtenun _ yughagh tkekagh ik _ E l d e r - e t _ a f l e n g a k e s q e l l u k i _ .
taagken _ P i s i d i a - k u n _ igleghakagh k _ P a m p h y l i a - m u n _ .
tamaani _ perga- mi _ , _ P a m p h y l i a - m e l n g u g h m i _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ taaqe yamek _ tesamavek _ A t t a l i a - m u n _ pikagh k _ .
taagken _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh k _ . _ ( _ tamaani _ A n t i o c h - m i _ ugpeqagh t _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ aghulaqe llghite lukek _ yughagh tke kaqe kegket _ . _ aapute kaqe kegket _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusiite sqellug kek _ ungipagh ke i llegh gkeni _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ qepghaqagh _ apeghiighkagh ak _ . _ )
kaate yamek _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughtekagh ik _ . _ ungipagh tke aik _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ e l l m e t e g n e g u n _ , _ apeghkagh ak llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ u g p e q i l l e g h q a l i t e l l g h i _ G e n t i l e - e t _ .
tamaani _ muluugh ghllagkagh k _ ugpeqagh ni _ .
taagken _ J u d e a - m e n g _ ila i _ yug t _ tagi luteng _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ , _ " _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite usi _ wetku qun _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k u f s i _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ "
iwernga _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ elngaatall _ aaghtiiraaghkagh ik _ taakut _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh it _ P a u l - e n k u k _ , _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ A n t i o c h - m e n g _ pi t _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e t e s q e l l u k i _ a a p s a g h t i i s q e l l u k i _ a p o s t l e - e t l u _ E l d e r - e t l u _ q e r n g a g h m e l n g u u t _ naligh _ apeghtuusagh _ elqughute nga ta a _ .
K a y a g s i s t e n g _ P a u l - e n k u t _ iglegha te kete luku _ P h o e n i c i a - k u n l l u _ , _ S a m a r i a - k u n l l u _ ugpeqagh t _ t a m a a n l e n g u u t _ ungipagh tke ait _ G e n t i l e - e t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qiive uute ma ni luki _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ .
kaa sa ta _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ a p o s t l e - e t l u _ , _ E l d e r - e t l u _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ upugha tke ait _ . _ taagken _ P a u l - e n k u t _ apegh laataghkagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh a _ ellmegteggun _ .
ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ nekeve luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ G e n t i l e - e t _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ut _ wetku qun _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l u t e n g l l u _ , _ qaatke te luteng llu _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ a p o s t l e - e t l u _ E l d e r - e t l u _ qerngughte tke aat _ agghi te kete na lukek _ taake uk _ .
A k u z i t k e n n e g h p a g l l a k a a t _ . _ taagken _ P e t e r - e m _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ liisimakagh i _ qavngaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ u n g i p a q i s q e l l u n g a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ u g p e g h e s q e l l u k i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake i lghii m _ yug m _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng _ , _ tugukligh kaqe ai _ G e n t i l e - e t _ . _ kelgute kaqe a _ tugukligh i lleg ni _ ellngit neng _ tuune llegh mikun _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ katam _ tawaten _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ tuune llegh mitun _ .
W h a n g k u t e s t u n g w a a q _ kiyaghute aqe ai _ ; _ w h a n g k u t e s t u n g w a a q _ ukmangigh aqe ai _ ilu it _ ugpegh nghata _ .
enkaam _ s a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ kiyaghnegh _ s a k r a a s n a q u t k e n g n g u s t e g g u _ qelegh llegh gpesigun _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqe ait _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh put _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u k i _ ? _ talwa _ sivunegh mta llu _ whangkuta llu _ q a a t k e p a g n i n g i l k e p u t _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ yuguligh lleg nge na luta _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u g u l i k a q i i n k u t _ kayusillegh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ pi llegh mitun _ . _ "
taagken _ t a w a n t u l l g h i i t _ q a l l e g n a n i g h w a a g h u l l u t e n g _ n a g a t k a g k e t _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ , _ P a u l - e n k u k _ apegh kangik _ e l l m e t e g n e g u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h i _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ .
akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yayek _ J a m e s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ !
simon _ P e t e r - e m _ ungipaate ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ n a k m i k u q e s t a l l g h i _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ liigike stekaqe ai _ ellngit llu _ piniqe ni luki _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ s a l l g h a _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ elqughute uq _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ igaqegkagh itnun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ :
' _ D a v i d - e m _ mangteghagh a _ ullegh kau uq _ iwernga _ uteghnigh lunga _ n e k e f n e q i g l l e q a q a _ . _ naavuma yagh ghngaan _ nallghusagh lleqe aqa _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ yug t _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g _ nakmikegkagh ma _ whanga mnun _ katam _ pi u luki _ , _ ellngit a _ liite yug lleqe aat _ atanegh _ .
