A t a n g h u u q _ tawaten _ akuzikagh _ , _ ima _ q a v n g a r u g l l a k _ ellnga n _ liite stekaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ' _ "
J a m e s - e m _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ enkaam _ whanga _ sume mni _ G e n t i l e - e t _ qiivekagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q a a t k u t e s q u g h a a f q i i t a _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ pi lteki _ .
itupill _ lata tgun _ neghe snanigh lteki _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ , _ aaw meng _ ; _ ineghte lteki llu _ seghleghqe sigh ke fqaan _ sex _ pi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi yaghqaa nghite ut _ qayughllak _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh an _ iinghute kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ima _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ J e w s - e t _ nagate aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ atightugh luki _ u n g i p a q e n g h a t k i _ S a b b a t h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ s y n a g o g u e - n i _ . _ "
taagken _ a p o s t l e - e t _ , _ E l d e r - e t _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmiighkagh t _ yug meggneng _ maligte tesaghqagh meng _ P a u l - e n k u g n u n _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u g n u n _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ . _ nakmikegkagh gket _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ J u d a s - e n k u k _ ateghagh ke lghii _ B a r s a b b a s - m e n g _ . _ taake uk _ yug k _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh ita _ s i i v a k e p i g t e k a g k e t _ .
E l k e g n e k u n _ tuyugh qu ait _ lata t _ whaten _ igaqegkagh t _ : _ " _ whangkuta _ a p o s t l e - e n i l l u _ E l d e r - e n i l l u _ lata aqe ukut _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n u n _ A n t i o c h - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ S y r i a - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ C i l i c i a - m e l n g u g h n u n l l u _ , _ quyake amsi _ !
nagaqugh ma ukut _ yug mta nguq _ ila ita _ taku lusi _ sa meng _ pi lusi _ s e g h l e g h y u g t e k a q i i s i l l u _ k u k r a g y u g t e k a q i i s i l l u _ . _ naqamllu _ whangkuta _ tawaten _ pi sqe mangite aput _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emta _ agghite luta _ nakmike agput _ J u d a s - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ maligte te sqellug kek _ piniqekagh mnnun _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n u n _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u g n u n _ P a u l - e n k u g n u n _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ .
taake uk _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ P a u l - e n k u k _ tuqute yagh ghngaistek _ pi kau uk _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ .
J u d a s - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ kayagte naqe agput _ a a p g h w a a g h e s q e l l u k i _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata tkekagh put _ elpesi nun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ , _ whangkuta llu _ i t a g n a q a m s i _ allute luki _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh it _ atuqe nghite yagh ghngaaghpesiki _ p i s q e l l u k i _ . _ iwernga _ ukut _ liilightuusagh t _ elpesi nun _ atuqe sug aput _ :
neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ aaw meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ qemitekagh meng _ , _ n u q e t u t a q i t e g g u l l u _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ maligtekufsiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi lleqe usi _ . _ T a w a t e n g i n a q _ lata amsi _ . _ "
taagken _ taakut _ yug t _ aghulaqekagh t _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ A n t i o c h - m u n _ . _ kaate yameng _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ tuunekagh it _ lata t _ .
atightugh luki _ lata t _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ qayughllak _ i l u t u g h l l e g h i i t _ .
J u d a s - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ elkek llu _ uuknaliqe i ste u lghiik _ , _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke ii aghagh ta ghllag ke ak _ ugpeqagh nun _ ugpegh llegh it _ i k n a q u g h t e s q e l l u k i _ .
T a m a a n t e l q i n a g h l u t e k _ aghulaqe yu ke ak _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ a g h u l a q e s t e k a g k e t _ whaten _ pi lukek _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh lgute k _ iglegha llegh gpetegni _ . _ " _ taagken _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ k a y a g t i s t e m e g n u n _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u g h n u n _ .
iwernga _ silas _ t a m a a n s u k a q _ .
taake uk _ P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ A n t i o c h - m e t a a g h a q a k _ . _ elkek llu _ maligte te lutek _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k llu _ ungipagh ke ikagh k llu _ ungipagh aneng _ A t a n g h e m _ .
tagtalmi _ P a u l - e m _ pi ke aa _ Barnabas _ , _ " _ takuughagh kau ltegneki _ ungipagh ke i vikekagh pung _ A t a n g h e m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ esghagh yaghtugh ltegneki _ nateghtu langi _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u n g _ . _ "
B a r n a b a s - e m _ kelqe sug qu a _ John _ mark _ ,
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ kelqe sug ma ite kanga _ , _ qayughllak _ P a m p h y l i a - m e l l u t e n g _ John _ M a r k - e m _ unite kakek _ qepghaqagh eng _ taaqe ste gpenaan _ .
P a u l - e n k u k _ B a r n a b a s - e n k u k _ aaghtiiraagh tke ghllag luku _ pelleghmun _ aghulaqe te tke ak _ . _ B a r n a b a s - e m _ kelqellug qu _ mark _ angyaghpag kun _ C y p r u s - m u n _ pi ke aq _ .
enkaam _ P a u l - e m _ aghulaqe vagilgami _ nakmikegkagh a _ silas _ k e l q e n n a l u k u _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh tkellug kek _ neghyuke tke agket _ atanegh mun _ aflengake sqellug kek _ .
igleghtekagh k _ S y r i a - k u n l l u _ C i l i c i a - k u n l l u _ i k n a q u g h s a a m i i t a _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh it _ .
P a u l _ D e r b e - t k a q _ enkaam _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ L y s t r a - m u n _ , _ tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ T i m o t h y - m e n g _ . _ naange a llu _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ J e w s - a _ , _ naqam _ ata a _ greek- a _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ L y s t r a - m e l n g u u t l u _ I c o n i u m - e m e l n g u u t l u _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ T i m o t h y _ pi niigh pigte ni luku _ .
P a u l - e m _ kelqe sug qu a _ T i m o t h y _ kayute u luku _ enkaam _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s t e k a a _ . _ tawaten _ pi stekagh a _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ J e w s - e n u n _ , _ qayughllak _ t a m a a n l e n g u u t _ J e w s - e t _ liisimake kangat _ ata a _ G r e e k - n g u l g h i i _ .
taagken _ iglegha u luteng _ ne ghllag nun _ kaate negh meggni _ ugpeqagh t _ qaatke te sqe aqe kangit _ a p o s t l e - e t l u _ , _ E l d e r - e t l u _ liilightuusagh ngllagh qite te nun _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ wata _ ugpeqagh igh aghaghkagh t _ , _ nula ma inagh ke aat llu _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
P a u l - e n k u t _ igleghtekagh t _ akule gkenkun _ P h r y g i a - m l l u _ , _ G a l a t i a - m l l u _ , _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ u n g i p a g h t e s i m a n g i l k a n g i _ ungipagh meng _ A s i a - m i _ .
tughwaagh luteng _ M y s i a - m u n _ nagnegh naqe kaayagh lghiit _ B i t h y n i a - m u n _ , _ iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ p i s n e g h i t k i i _ .
enkaam _ M y s i a _ naghughte luku _ tesamavek _ T r o a s - m u n _ pikagh t _ .
U n u g m i _ tawani _ P a u l - e m _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ M a c e d o n i a - g h m i i _ tagsigh ragh lghii _ . _ yug m _ maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tagi luten _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ kayusiite aghte kut _ ! _ "
legan _ P a u l - e m _ esghaghwaagh llegh an _ kingu aneng _ yataaghqe ukut _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ pi na luta _ , _ qayughllak _ l i i g i k e g k e f u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh qite yu kanginkut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ t e l a n a n g a m e n g _ nangaqaghte ukut _ T r o a s - m e n g _ S a m o t h r a c e - m u n _ . _ unaami ani _ N e a p o l i s - m u n _ pi ukut _ .
taagken _ qute kun _ kaate ukut _ ne ghllag mun _ philippi- mun _ M a c e d o n i a - m e l n g u g h m u n _ R o m e - e g h m i i t _ neli ke ii te nun _ . _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ t a m a a n t u k u t _ .
T a m a a n s i m a l u t a _ S a b b a t h - n g u g h s a g u _ mingllute m _ amig ghllag akun _ aane luta _ kiiw gnun _ pi ukut _ , _ J e w s - e t _ tawani _ yughagh te aqe na yu kata _ . _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ t a w a n t u t e f t u t _ enkaam _ aqume uute luta _ aleghqugh aput _ .
ataasigh _ nagate lghii _ L y d i a - n g u f t u q _ , _ T h y a t i r a - g h m i i _ , _ akilpegagh qagh yu k _ esnegrukegtagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng _ , _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ l i i g i k e s t e n g n g w a a q i i _ P a u l - e m _ akuzi ta i _ L y d i a - m u n _ enkaam _ ugpeqekagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ p a a p t a a y e y a m e n g _ L y d i a - m _ aqelqagh ngllagh ainkut _ , _ " _ sumegh gpesini _ ipapik _ ugpegh ma kuma _ atanegh kun _ , _ w h a n g k u n n i t a g h h n a y a n g h i t s i i _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ sagiqe sigh nkut _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ kiiw m _ e s n e n g a n i l n g u g h m u n _ yughagh te vig mun _ aglagh ma luta _ , _ n a l l a g h a g h p u t _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a q _ aghnagh aq _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ T a a m _ tughneghagh m _ uuknaliqe tke ste aqe kangi _ sa u aat _ sa yaghqagh t _ s i v u t g h u l l u k i _ . _ enkaam _ p i l i i t e s t e n g i t a _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u kangat _ .
T a a m _ aghnaghagh m _ maligsaagh ainkut _ P a u l - l l u _ whangkuta _ akilghuu magh mi _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ q e p g h a g h t e k i i _ A a n g e l l e g h p i g a a m _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ ungipaate aqe aisi _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ ! _ "
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ tawaten _ pi uq _ . _ qenwat llu _ P a u l - e m _ qinuyagute luku _ tughneghagh _ ilu anite ngughk _ qiive luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ qelegh amken _ a a n e s q e l l u t e n _ ellnga neng _ ! _ " _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ tughneghagh _ ilu aneng _ aanekagh _ .
P i l i i t e s t e n g i t a _ liigike yamegteggu _ a l l g e g h u t u t k e s a g h q a a n a n i i m a t s e n g _ aghnagh aq _ , _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ akugh ke aqe agket _ . _ Q a m u g h s i i g h m e n g _ aglagh tke agket _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n u n _ a k i l p e g a g h v i g m e l n g u g h n u n _ .
taagken _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ aglagh te lukek _ R o m e - e g h m i i t _ n a n q i g t i s t e n g i t n u n _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ yug k _ ukuk _ J e w - n g u u k _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii u uk _ maani _ .
apeghtugh i aqe uk _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e n g _ whangkuta _ R o m e - e g h m i i n i _ liilightuusagh mta _ iinghute ke ii te neng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtuusagh ik _ atuqe naanghite aput _ . _ "
enkaam _ yug lghute _ ilate qaghtagh te luni _ sughukagh gket _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ . _ N a n q i g t i s t e t _ qelegh tke agket _ aatkagh ik _ q e s u g u m e n g _ mataghte qugh luki _ a n a g u l g h e s q e l l u k e k _ .
A n a g u l e g h t a a n e g h m e n g _ taaqe lukek _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghtekagh gket _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg anun _ m a g h q a t u t n g w a a g h e s q e g k a g k e t _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ tawaten _ kayagte yatni _ i l u k l i g h p i g a g h m u n _ qamavek _ kanaghtekakek _ . _ taagken _ u m u g h l l a g m e n g _ unaghsigh meng _ t u k u g h u s i g h l u k e k _ , _ maghqatekagh it _ taakut _ tukughte te t _ qaprag yaghqaa gpenakek _ .
nani _ tamaani _ u n u g e m _ qukaa ni _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ yughagh magh egmek _ ilagaghkagh k _ usuqe i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ anusimingllaghagh t _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ n a g a t k a g k e t _ .
nuuskagllagan _ nuna _ t u y e p e g h t a q a q _ , _ repall _ anusimingllaghvig _ tunemaghtuumagh an _ aghula tke a _ . _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ amig t _ qelpegh aghtagh tke aat _ , _ anusimingllaghagh neng llu _ qiipraghute t _ ilefkaghaghtagh tke aat _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ , _ amig t _ qelpatu te ut _ . _ sumegh mini _ anusimingllaghagh t _ qimagugh te ma ni luki _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ ellmi neng _ tuqute naqekagh _ .
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tuqute naqe gpenang _ e l p e n e n g _ qayughllak _ qamagte luta _ w h a a n t u t u k u t _ ! _ "
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ kenegh meng _ tungsigh luni _ itegh qaghtekagh _ . _ A l i n g r u u g h e m _ ungelegte magh mi _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ manu gkenkun _ segesqughtekagh _ .
taagken _ a a n u t u t k e l l u k e k _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ yug gni _ u k u g h t e k _ , _ naten _ sa lunga _ yuguligh lleg nge nayagh zinga _ ? _ "
pikagh ak _ , _ " _ ugpeqe gu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe uten _ , _ nengllugute ten llu _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ atanegh _ ellnga nun llu _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a n u n l l u _ .

aghte yagu _ R o m e - e g h m i i t _ n a n q i g t i s t e n g i t a _ keveg aqekagh it _ u m i i l w a a t e n g _ ungipaate yaghtigh sqellug qu _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ whaten _ , _ " _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ aane ste kek _ . _ "

iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ umiileg u aaghet _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u g h n g a a m t u n g _ yugtuqagh mi _ a n a g u l e g h t a a k a q i i n k u n g _ , _ talwa _ i p a p i g h q u t k e g p e n a a n _ sa meng _ a n a g g u s i m a t f u n g _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllagh ainkung _ . _ E n r a g h n g a m _ whaa _ maaten _ aksaqe luku _ a a n e s n a q i n k u u n g _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ E l l m e g g n e n g _ n a n q i g t i s t e t _ tagi luteng _ aane ste linkung _ . _ "
P a u l - e m _ tawaten _ p i y i s t e n g _ umiileg u aaghet _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu ait _ n a n q i g t i s t e t _ . _ enkaam _ n a n q i g t i s t e t _ alingekagh t _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ nagaqugh lukek _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u t k e k _ .

P a u l - e n k u t _ igleghtekagh t _ A m p h i p o l i s - k u n l l u _ , _ A p o l l o n i a - k u n l l u _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m u n _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ J e w s - e t _ s y n a g o g u e - e l g e t _ .
P a u l _ pi aqe llegh mitun _ s y n a g o g u e - m u n _ pi ke aq _ . _ pingayut ni _ S a b b a t h - e n i _ P a u l - e m _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ yug t _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
U u k n a l i q e l l e g h t e g g u n _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ ipa _ C h r i s t - a _ tuqu yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ unguvagh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ Jesus _ apegh kegka _ elpesi nun _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ . _ "
ila i _ J e w s - e t _ ugpegh luteng _ ila tke aat _ P a u l - e n k u g n u n _ S i l a s - e n k u g n u n _ . _ tamaakut llu _ G r e e k - e l g h u t e t _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ aghnagh lghute t llu _ pingwaagh t _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
taagken _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ J e w s - e t _ aqinake lukek _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ t e s q a g a n t a q e l g h i i n e n g _ sa igate ngugh neng _ yug neng _ qerngughte i luteng _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ qenwat _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - g h m i i t _ q a p r a g h q e g k i i t _ . _ taagken _ ketanqusnaq _ J a s o n - e n k u n u n _ aglagh luteng _ itegh qaghtagh tke aat _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ aane te na lukek _ yug lghute nun _ .
iwernga _ naalke nghite yamegtekek _ , _ J a s o n - l l u _ ila i llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qamughsiighkagh it _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t n u n _ . _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ navek _ alngunak _ pinegh megteni _ seghleliighqagh ii aqe uk _ , _ whaa _ maani llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe uk _ .
C a e s a r - e m _ liilightuusagh i _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe aik _ whaten _ p i l l e g h m e g n e g u n _ , _ ' _ Jesus _ u m i i l e g p i g a a g u q _ , _ Caesar _ umiileg u nghite uq _ . _ ' _ J a s o n - e m _ e l l m e g g n i t e s t a q a a k _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi yata _ yug t llu _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i l l u _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m _ sakraa ghllagkagh t _ .
taagken _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ pi ke ait _ J a s o n - e n k u t _ , _ " _ qelegh te agput _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ elpesi nun _ aghulaqe ste sqellug kek _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m e n g _ , _ iwernga _ sivuke lusi _ m a n i l i t i k u t _ . _ aghulaqe gkayek _ mani i _ v e g h u l l e q a g h p u t _ . _ " _ taagken _ aglagh stekagh it _ .
mamlegte ghesnagh yagu _ ugpeqagh t _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ a g h u l a q e s t e k a g k e t _ B e r e a - m u n _ . _ kaate yamek _ s y n a g o g u e - m u n _ pikagh k _ .
tamaakut _ Jews-ngit _ nagate yu kestagh lukek _ ayuqe kegket _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ , _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m e l n g u g h n e n g _ . _ A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ J e w s - e t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ liite naqekagh it _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ liigike na luki _ P a u l - e n k u k _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ apeghtugh i llegh ik _ ipa u ta i _ .
enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ , _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ pingwaagh t _ G r e e k - e t _ aghni ut llu _ yug it llu _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
iwernga _ J e w s - e t _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m e l n g u u t _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke i ni luku _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ B e r e a - m i _ , _ B e r e a - t k a t _ . _ kaate luteng _ q a p r a g h q i i k a t _ yug neng _ seghleliighqagh iikagh t _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ P a u l _ esne mun _ atghagh te qagh stekagh at _ iwernga _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ T i m o t h y - n k u k _ B e r e a - m e t k a k _ .
yug t _ igleghte te i lghiit _ P a u l - m e n g _ maligte tke aat _ athens- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ uteghnigh naqe yata _ B e r e a - m u n _ P a u l - e m _ lipeghsagh kakek _ S i l a s - e n k u k _ T i m o t h y - n k u k _ t a k u s q e l l u n i _ pi yaghqaaghte ghesnagh kayek _ .
athens- mi _ P a u l _ utaqa i te kete luku _ S i l a s - e n k u g n e n g _ T i m o t h y - n k u g n e n g _ , _ yuvghiigh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ngllagh qaghtu pigte uq _ .
enkaam _ P a u l - e m _ s y n a g o g u e - m i _ J e w s - e t l u _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u n i l u k u _ . _ akilpegaghvig mi llu _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ alngunak _ t a w a n n e g h a t a _ apegh aqe kanga _ C h r i s t - a _ .
ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ E p i c u r e a n - e t l u _ , _ S t o i c - e t l u _ taku luku _ P a u l _ aaghtiiraaghkagh at _ . _ ila ita _ ila teng _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ una _ a k u z i v a l l u g h l l a k _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ " _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ llangaqa _ n a k u m i i t _ kiyaghnegh it _ akuzite kaqe ai _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ P a u l - e m _ ungipagh ke u kanga _ Jesus _ , _ unguvallegh a llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ P a u l - m u n _ maligte stekagh t _ a g g h i s t e n u n _ A r e o p a g u s - m e l n g u g h n u n _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yameng _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ taana _ nutaghagh _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ken _ l i i s u w a g h p u t _ .
sa u a _ taana _ apegh kan _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a a g u q _ w h a n g k u n n i _ , _ enkaam _ l i i g i k s u w a g h p u t _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ "
( _ sa u aat _ nutaghagh t _ apeghtuusagh t _ pi nghata _ A t h e n s - e g h m i i t l u _ , _ n a k u m i i t l u _ tamaavek _ lli aqe aat _ a p e g h y u w a q i i t l u _ nagate yug aqe ait llu _ . _ )
enkaam _ A r e o p a g u s - m i _ P a u l - e m _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t h e n s - e g h m i i n i _ , _ liigike amsi _ elngaatall _ maniguute kayugu usi _ elpek si _ yug ni _ .
igleghte yalghiinga _ qagani _ akule mi _ , _ esghagh anka _ manigugh vig lghute si _ , _ aghqefig llu _ ataasigh _ igaqe vike nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nallukekagh mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ' _ T a a n a n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh _ nalluke ghngaaghpesigu _ manigughkagh i _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
T a a m _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ nuna _ , _ sa u a llu _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ nuna mete ngughk _ . _ atanegh ke a _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ enkaam _ m a n i g u u t f i n g l l a q a n i s i g a t u q _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh _ tuune i kayug _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ aneghnegh meng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ yug nun _ . _ aklu ke yaghqagh ke nghite a _ yug t _ kayusillegh at _ qayughllak _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ a k l u k i g a t a a _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ yuug _ nuna mete ngughk _ whani _ . _ I i n g k e r u g l l a k _ yataaghqe kaqe ai llu _ qakun _ yug t _ allgegh yaghqaa ta i _ , _ nani llu _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ta i _ .
tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ yug nun _ i v i i s q e l l u n i _ luuraq _ n a a l k e n n a y u k a n g a t n i _ . _ naqamllu _ naligh ghhagh inagh mnneng _ u y a v a n n e g h i t u q
qayughllak _ ' _ ellnga kun _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u k u t l u _ , _ qaprag u ukut llu _ , _ allgegh kau ukut llu _ . _ ' _ talwa _ ila i _ i g a n g l l a g h t e s i _ whaten _ pi kau lghiit _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ '
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e s a g h q a q e n g h i t a g h p u t _ yug t _ u l i m a a g h i s t u n _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uyghag meng _ ayuqe luki _ . _ yug t _ s u m e g h t a g h a l l g h i s t u n _ ayuqe nghite uq _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ yug t _ salin _ nalluke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghyuugh yug mangite ai _ a g h y u u s a q e g h n g a a t a _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ qelegh u ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ n a a n s a g h n g a a t a _ a v u t e g h q e l l u k i _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i i s q e l l u k i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ qelqe aqe ai _ qayughllak _ nekegtekaqe a _ aghneq _ nanqigtivig u luku _ . _ nakmikegkagh mikun _ yug kun _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ t a w a t e g h l l u w a a q _ nanqigte yaghqaqe a _ . _ liite ste na luku _ nakmikegkagh ni _ yuug _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
nagate luku _ P a u l - e m _ apegh kanga _ yuug _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n i l u k u _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ ila ita _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ P a u l _ , _ " _ wataqaaghaq _ n a g a s u w a g h p u t _ alla _ apegh naqe gkuvgu _ . _ "
taagken _ P a u l - e m _ unitekagh i _ ,
iwernga _ ila ita _ maligsaagh luku _ P a u l _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ . _ ataasigh _ D i o n y s i u s - n g u f t u q _ , _ A r e o p a g u s - m i _ agghi sta _ , _ aghnagh llu _ ategh ke lghii _ D a m a r i s - m e n g _ , _ kinku t llu _ ila i _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ P a u l _ C o r i n t h - e t k a q _ athens- meng _ .
tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ J e w _ ategh a _ A q u i l a _ , _ P o n t u s - m i _ allgeghkagh _ . _ italy- meng _ kaate negh ghhagh u uk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ P r i s c i l l a - n k u k _ , _ qayughllak _ U m i i l e g p i g a a m _ C l a u d i u s - e m _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ J e w s - e t _ R o m e - e m e n g _ . _ P a u l - e m _ laalighfike lukek
e l k e g k e n i t k a q _ qayughllak _ qepghaqagh ak _ ellnga n _ qepghaqagh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ tiinta ngllagh llegh m _ aki a _ k i y a g h u s i q e g k a n g a t _ .
S a b b a t h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ P a u l _ s y n a g o g u e - m u n _ pi luni _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ J e w s - e n u n l l u _ , _ G r e e k - e n u n l l u _ u g p e g h e s q e l l u k i _ .
S i l a s - e n k u k _ T i m o t h y - n k u k _ kaate tke ak _ M a c e d o n i a - m e n g _ , _ taagken _ kenle ke luku _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke i inagh luni _ lli aqe aq _ . _ J e w s - e n u n _ aapte qugh a _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u n i l u k u _ .
J e w s - e t _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h y a t n i l l u _ seghletun llu _ akuzite kete yatni _ , _ aatkagh mi _ pagula i _ ufsug te luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ifla kufsi _ elpek si _ p i l q a g h s i _ , _ whanga _ p i l q e n n a a n g h i t a q a _ . _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ ungipagh ke i naqe unga _ . _ "
enkaam _ unite luki _ J e w s - e t _ T i t i u s _ J u s t u s - m u n _ lli aqe aq _ , _ gentile- mun _ maniguute kayug mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ mangteghagh a _ s y n a g o g u e - e m _ saaghw anite ngughk _ .
S y n a g o g u e - e m _ igleghte te i ste nga _ C r i s p u s - n g u f t u q _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ . _ C o r i n t h - e g h m i i l g h u t e t l u _ nagate luku _ P a u l _ ugpegh luteng _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
taagken _ u n u g m i _ ataasigh mi _ P a u l _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ ungipagh ke i kestagh a _ iilqayug fqaavek
qayughllak _ e l p e n i t a q u n g a _ . _ kitumun _ alngunak _ aqnigh snaanghite amken _ , _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag mi _ whani _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ whanga _ pi kaqe a _ . _ "
enkaam _ P a u l _ tamaani _ apeghtugh ikagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
gallio _ , _ R o m e - e m _ umiileg ughte ste aqe yagu _ G r e e c e - m u n _ , _ J e w s - e t _ qerngughte te luteng _ sughug luku _ P a u l _ aglagh tke aat _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
kaat ute te luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U u m _ yug m _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh _ manigigh sqellug qu _ alla u luku _ liilightuusagh mnneng _ ! _ "
iiwenllu _ P a u l _ akuzi naqe aqe uq _ , _ G a l l i o - m _ J e w s - e t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ tegleg uqagh u yagh kan _ , _ yugtagh kaayagh kan _ nalighmeng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghlegh pestaagh _ pi kaqsagh kagu _ ilapga pestaagh nayagh amsi _ .
iwernga _ una _ yuug _ tawaten _ pi mangite uq _ . _ A a g h t i i r a a g h u t k e n g n g u n g h i t a s i _ R o m e - e m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ a a g h t i i r a a g h u t k e n g n g w a a s i _ elpek si _ katam _ liilightuusagh si _ , _ akuzite t llu _ ategh t llu _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ . _ tamaaken _ nanqigte i yaghqaa nghite unga _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi teki _ . _ "
enkaam _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ a a n e s q e l l u k i _ .
taagken _ yug t _ akuqagh luku _ s y n a g o g u e - e m _ igleghte te i ste nga _ S o s t h e n e s _ , _ qevute i aqe aat _ nanqigtivig m _ manughagh ani _ iwernga _ G a l l i o - m _ avelghagh ke ii naqe ai _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ P a u l _ paninang _ u g p e q a n i t k a q _ qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ C o r i n t h - m i _ . _ taagken _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ S y r i a - m u n _ kelqellug kek _ P r i s c i l l a - n k u k _ A q u i l a - n k u k _ . _ kaate yameng _ C e n c h r e a - m u n _ P a u l _ qigughkagh _ liigike sqellug qu _ akequsagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ apeghiigh llegh a _ .
kaate luteng _ ephesus- mun _ , _ tamaani _ P a u l - e m _ unite kakek _ P r i s c i l l a - n k u k _ A q u i l a - n k u k _ , _ s y n a g o g u e - e l l u n i _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ J e w s - e n u n _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u n i l u k u _ .
E l l m e g g n i t a g h i i s q e g k a q s a q a n g a t _ iwernga _ pipag nigh nge i tke aq _ .
enkaam _ aghulaqe naqe yami _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ alla _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ " _ taagken _ ephesus- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ .
kaate luni _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ nagneqe aq _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ laalighfike na luki _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ taagken _ A n t i o c h - e t k a q _ .
T a m a a n t a g h l l u n i _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ G a l a t i a - k u n l l u _ P h r y g i a - k u n l l u _ , _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ .
P a u l _ tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ apollos _ , _ ephesus- mun _ kaate tke aq _ . _ J e w - n g u l g h i i _ allgeghkagh _ A l e x a n d r i a - m i _ . _ elngaatall _ akuzi lleg ghllag llu _ liite te ghllag ke aq llu _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ .
salin _ A l e x a n d r i a - m e l l u k u _ kitum _ apeghtugh kaqe kanga _ A t a n g h e m _ t u m a n g a n e n g _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe pigte luni _ a k u z i t k e n g n g u k a n g a l l u _ apeghtuusagh ke u kanga llu _ elqughaghte luku _ Jesus _ , _ apeghtuusagh i llu _ . _ naqam _ liisimake kanga _ paaptaaye llegh _ J o h n - e m _ apeghtugh te llegh igh u naaghtu te _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ephesus- mi _ apollos _ s y n a g o g u e - e l l u n i _ tetug gpenani _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ . _ P r i s c i l l a - n k u k _ A q u i l a - n k u k _ nagate luku _ aqelqagh ngllaghkagh ak _ l i i g i k e s t a g h a g h n a l u k u _ kiyaghnegh m _ t u m a n g a n e n g _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ elqughaghte luku _ .
apollos _ G r e e c e - m u n _ piyug yan _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ kayemekagh at _ enkaam _ lata ke aat _ G r e e c e - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh itnun _ upugha te sqellug qu _ . _ taakut _ G r e e c e - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqe kaqe kangat _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh akun _ . _ A p o l l o s - e m _ kaate luni _ elngaatall _ i k n a q u g h s a q a q e g k a n g i _ ugpegh llegh it _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ .
yugtuqagh mi _ aaghtiiraagh ghllagkagh i _ J e w s - e t _ , _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ i p a p i g h q u s i q l u k i _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u n i l u k u _ .
apollos _ C o r i n t h - m e l l u k u _ , _ P a u l _ qute kun _ igleghakagh _ ephesus- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ ila i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e t _ nallagh luki
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ a l l g e g h s i m a s t e k e k _ ugpegh aqngafsi _ ? _ " _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ nakaa _ , _ nallukngwaagh agput _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ "
aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sa mun mi _ p a a p t a a y e m a t s i _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ J o h n - e m _ paaptaaye llegh atun _ . _ "
P a u l - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J o h n - e m _ p a a p t a a y e g h i l l g h a _ a v u t e g h q e l l u t e n g _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i l g h i n u n _ ayuqe uq _ . _ pi kaqe ai llu _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ kingu mineng _ tagi yaghqagh _ , _ taana _ J e s u s - n g u u q _ . _ "
nagaqugh yamegteggu _ taana _ , _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ .
P a u l - e m _ s a a f s a q m i n i k i _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ iteghkagh k _ ellngit nun _ . _ taagken _ akuzikagh t _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ ulu stun _ , _ uuknaliqe magh meng llu _ pikagh t _ .
entaqun _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yuug _ t a w a n t u q _ .
pingayut ni _ tanqigh ni _ S a b b a t h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ P a u l - e m _ tetug qagh gpenani _ aleghqugh qu ai _ yug t _ s y n a g o g u e - m i _ . _ aaghhe naqutkekagh i _ , _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ pineghllug lghiit _ u g p e g h y u n g h i t k a t _ , _ enkaam _ sivu itni _ yug t _ seghletun _ akuzi tkekagh at _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghtuusagh a _ . _ enkaam _ P a u l - e m _ unitekagh i _ k e l q e l l u k i _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ T y r a n n u s - e m _ apeghtugh i vig ani _ , _ P a u l - e m _ aleghqugh aqe kangi _ yug t _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ enkaam _ tamaghhagh meng _ J e w s - e t l u _ G r e e k - e t l u _ A s i a - m e l n g u u t _ nagaqugh qu ait _ akuzi ta i _ A t a n g h e m _ .
kiyaghnegh _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i i g h a a t a q a q _ saghiigha nagh lghii meng _ P a u l - k u n _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ yug t _ P a u l - e m _ kakegllugiitagh i llu _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ lli nghmegteki _ qinu yu gnun _ naallghute aqe lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ i l u n g i t n i l n g u u t _ aane aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ J e w s - e t _ iglegha u lghiit _ nuna nun _ , _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh u u kangit _ tughneghagh t _ . _ taagken _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ ategh a _ aane ste qugh sigh ke naqutke kaqsagh kangat _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ qelegh amken _ a a n e s q e l l u t e n _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ J e s u s - k u n _ P a u l - e m _ ungipagh kekagh akun _ . _ "
S c e v a - m _ m a a g h r a g h v i l e k _ ighnegh i _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ . _ ( _ taana _ sceva _ J e w - n g u l g h i i _ h i g h _ priest- a _ . _ )
iwernga _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ Jesus _ , _ liisimake aqa _ P a u l _ , _ elpek si _ kinku u tsi _ ? _ "
taagken _ yug m _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg m _ qetgegh vike luki _ taakut _ yug t _ qevute i aqe ai _ , _ i k n a q e p i g t u t m i n e n g _ qamagte luki _ ava igh lleg kekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghagh aneng _ aane qagh tate luteng _ qimagugh tke aat _ amsikagh meng _ , _ kiitigh qu lleg ligh luteng _ .
qamagte luteng _ E p h e s u s - e g h m i i t _ , _ J e w s - e t l u _ G r e e k - e t l u _ alingruugh tke aat _ taana _ nagaqugh luku _ , _ enkaam _ ategh a _ J e s u s - e m _ wataqaaghaq _ q u u l v a q a a t _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ u g p e n g h h a q a n i i t _ yugtuqagh mi _ apeghraghkagh it _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ alignaghtaagh kayugu yagh lghiit _ tagite uute luki _ alignaghtaagh sigh t _ igagh teng _ panegh qugh qu ait _ yug lghute t _ e s g h a a m a n g h i t n i _ . _ igagh lghute t _ a k i t u l e s u g h y a q m e g t e k i _ 5 0 , 0 0 0 _ silver _ d r a c h m a s - e t _ akike ait _ .
tamaa na _ apallugh ke luku _ wataqaaghaq _ akuzi ta i _ A t a n g h e m _ mingitekagh t _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpeqekagh it _ .
kingu itneng _ tamaakut _ P a u l _ qakiqniqekagh _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ pi na luni _ , _ M a c e d o n i a - k u n l l u _ G r e e c e - k u n l l u _ aag luni _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ J e r u s a l e m - e t a g h l l u n g a _ taagken _ R o m e - e s a g h q a p e s t a a g h u u n g a _ . _ "
taagken _ P a u l - e m _ kayute gni _ T i m o t h y - n k u k _ E r a s t u s - e n k u k _ kayagtekakek _ aglagh kestigh sqellug kek _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ , _ ellnga _ A s i a - m e t a g h a q a q _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ E p h e s u s - e g h m i i t _ elngaatall _ seghleliigh tkekagh at _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ .
tamaa na _ seghleliigh llegh _ D e m e t r i u s - e m _ silver- meng _ u l i m a s t e m _ piinlegh iqe a _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ qayughllak _ ulima lgutke te lghiit _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh sigh ke u kangit _ silver- meng _ ulimaagh t _ t e m p l e - e n g w a a g h h a a t _ . _ tamaakut _ t e m p l e - e n g w a a g h h a a t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ artemis- mun _ maniguute vig stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
D e m e t r i u s - e m _ u l i m a l g u t n i l l u _ ila i llu _ t a w a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ ulima kayug t _ qerngughte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh aqe ukut _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
iwernga _ e s g h a p a g a g h s i l l u _ n a g a t a g h s i l l u _ P a u l - e m _ p i l l g h a _ . _ pi aqe uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite ni luki _ . _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ allangughte qugh aa _ maani _ ephesus- mi _ , _ m a a n i n g i n a a g p e n a a n _ tea- ma ghhagh ani llu _ A s i a - m i _ pi aqe uq _ .
seghleghhalek _ sa nghite kumta _ qepghaqagh ut _ ukavagh lleqe uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ qamagte luteng _ A s i a - g h m i i t l u _ n u n a t a g h h a a n i l n g u u t l u _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghnagh _ kiyaghnegh _ artemis _ . _ sa nghite kumta _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh tke sag u lleqe aat _ temple- a _ megnu nagh ite ni luku _ , _ A r t e m i s - e m l l u _ aange llegh ghllag a _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ "
taakut _ yug t _ nagate luku _ D e m e t r i u s _ elngaatall _ sakraakagh t _ , _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t llu _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ E p h e s u s - e m _ ! _ "
mulu gpenateng _ qamagte luteng _ E p h e s u s - e g h m i i t _ k e t a n q w a a g h a a t k a t _ akilghuu magh meng _ nalluke ghngaaghmegteki _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ P a u l - e m _ igleghalgute kek _ G a i u s - e n k u k _ A r i s t a r c h u s - e n k u k _ M a c e d o n i a - g h m i i k _ t a m a a n l e n g u u k _ u v i t a n g i t n i _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taake uk _ akuqagh lukek _ qamugh ke lukek _ k e t a r w a k a t _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ maligte luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ .
P a u l _ itegh yug kaayagh lghii _ yug lghute _ aleghqugh na luku _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ ighlekekagh at _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ A s i a - m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ keveg aqe tke aat _ ilakumtaagh eng _ P a u l _ wataghllak _ itegh fqaan _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
taakut _ q e r n g u g h u t f i g l l a g m e l n g u u t _ wanlegi _ nepug ghllag ughtekagh t _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ sa meng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ , _ ila i _ sa meng _ alla neng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ . _ kiyang _ allute luteng _ nalluke kangat _ sangameng _ q e r n g u g h u s i m a t s e n g _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ A l e x a n d e r - m e n g _ , _ J e w s - e t _ a p e g h t u g h w a a g h l u k u _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ akuzi yaghtigh sqekagh at _ sivu itnun _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ A l e x a n d e r - e m _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ n a g a t e s q e l l u n i _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ yug lghute ghllag t _ liigike yamegteggu _ alexander _ J e w - n g u t a n g a _ , _ q e r n g a g h l l a g m e n g _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ E p h e s u s - e m _ ! _ " _ tawaten _ akilghuukagh t _ k e t w h e l l _ maalghug _ aflu k _ .
ataasigh m _ E p h e s u s - e m _ u m i i l w a a g h a n _ nepiigh ste qaghte yamiki _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ E p h e s u s - e g h m i i n i _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag mi _ liisimake a _ ephesus _ aflengake i stekagh a _ aange lghii m _ A r t e m i s - e m _ temple- nge an _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ uyghag m _ ifkaghkagh m _ qilag meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aygughike naanghite ainkut _ t a a k u g n e n g _ a f l e n g a k e s t e n g u t f u t _ enkaam _ nepiigh tek _ . _ sa u a _ teme igh ghllag _ apeghiigh vagilgafsigu _ sumeghtaghagh tek _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ whavek _ tagite kaqe agsi _ talwa _ sa meng _ tegleg nghite ghngaayek _ t e m p l e - e n e n g _ , _ akuzi tke nghite ghngaagnegu llu _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ kiyaghnegh ut _ artemis _ .
una _ nanqigtivig u nghite uq _ . _ D e m e t r i u s - e n k u t _ q e p g h a g h t e k u l l g h i i t _ sa meng _ apallugh lgu kumeng _ nanqigtivig mun _ aglagh lit _ . _ tawani _ n a n q i g t i s t e n u n _ apegh nakangit _ apallugh teng _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ avutkeiiraagh ghhaat _ .
wata _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh lgu kufsi _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ q e r n g u g h u t f i g p i g a g h m i _ agghi te kete nakesi _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ qayughllak _ R o m e - e m _ umiileg ita _ nagaqugh kumegteggu _ una _ seghleliigh llegh _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke te nghite ni luta _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi naqe ainkut _ . _ S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ pi lleqe steki _ qayughllak _ apallugh ite ukut _ seghleliighqagh ii lleg mnnun _ . _ "
T a a m _ u m i i l w a a g h e m _ tawaten _ pi luki _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ .
taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ alpag yan _ P a u l - e m _ aqfa stekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ kayeme luki _ aghulaqekagh _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ .
enkaam _ M a c e d o n i a - k u n _ igleghte te kete luku _ laalighqwaagh vikekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ . _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ G r e e c e - m u n _ ,
t a m a a n t e k a q _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ . _ yataaghqe aqe uq llu _ angyaghpag kun _ S y r i a - n n a l u n i _ , _ liigikekagh i _ J e w s - e n Ê¼ n g u q _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ tuqute na luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ uteghte yu ke aq _ M a c e d o n i a - k u n _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ .
M a l i g t e s t e k e f t i i _ S o p a t e r _ , _ ighnegh a _ P y r r h u s - e m _ , _ B e r e a - g h m i i _ , _ A r i s t a r c h u s - e n k u k _ S e c u n d u s - e n k u k _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - g h m i i k _ , _ G a i u s _ D e r b e - g h m i i _ , _ T y c h i c u s - e n k u k _ T r o p h i m u s - e n k u k _ A s i a - g h m i i k _ , _ T i m o t h y - l l u _ .
taakut _ aghulaqe kestagh luteng _ T r o a s - m u n _ , _ tamaani _ utaqa i ut _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ .
kingu aneng _ neqenghaghqe llegh an _ Y e a s t - a l i i m a n g i l n g u u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ , _ philippi- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ kaate aput _ ila put _ T r o a s - m i _ . _ T a m a a n t u k u t _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ .
sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ T r o a s - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqe ait llu _ whangkuta llu _ qerngughte te ukut _ negh na luta _ A t a n g h e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ . _ sivuke luni _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ u n u g e m _ qukaa nun _ kenlanga _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ aghulaqe yug u lghii _ .
Q e m t a m e l n g u u k u t _ kenegh lghutaghtuqagh mi _ .
nukalpigagh _ E u t y c h u s _ , _ aqume luni _ qergese m _ esne akun _ nagatekagh _ . _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke i ma luku _ qenwat _ E u t y c h u s _ qavaghni ke aq _ . _ qenwat llu _ umu qite luni _ qavagh yalghiimi _ eslate mun _ ifkaghkagh _ pamaken _ p i n g a y a a n e n g _ qemtagh m _ . _ aane luteng _ t u g u y a q m e g t e g g u _ tuqu luni _ .
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ uki ragkiigh luni _ segesqughte vike luku _ qetekagh a _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ whaa _ unguvagh ma uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ mayugh uute luteng _ P a u l - e m _ neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh luku _ neghekagh t _ . _ aleghqugh tke aat _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kenlanga _ aghte llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ P a u l _ aghulaqekagh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ nukalpigagh _ aglagh tke aat _ ne anun _ ilutu lleg nge ghllag luteng _ unguvallegh a _ a p a l l u q l l u k u _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ A s s o s - m u n _ sivungagh ni _ P a u l - e m _ , _ qayughllak _ qute kun _ A s s o s - m u n _ pi luni _ wetku _ tamaani _ uugte naqe ni lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ .
kaate yan _ A s s o s - m u n _ qaake luku _ angyaghpag mun _ M i t y l e n e - e t u k u t _ .
unaami ani _ M i t y l e n e - m e n g _ aghulaqe luta _ aghuliigh ukut _ C h i o s - e m _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ S a m o s - m u n _ , _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ kaate ukut _ miletus- mun _ .
P a u l - e m _ naghughte yukagh a _ ephesus _ qayughllak _ A s i a - m i _ kimaawi yu nghite ngughk _ . _ pi lleghqagh lgu kuni _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ k a a s u p i g t e n g n g u l g h i i _ angiite na luni _ P e n t e c o s t - m u n _ .
miletus- mete luni _ P a u l - e m _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ elder-ngit _ E p h e s u s - m e l n g u u t _ .
kaa sa ta _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimakagh i _ naten _ k i y a g h t a a l q a _ elpesi nite lunga _ A s i a - m u n _ kaate yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ ima _ .
qepghagh te kaqe aqa _ atanegh _ qusevegte pigte lunga _ , _ qunituumagh ma llu _ qaywa _ J e w s - e t _ s e g h l e l i i g h q e g h l l a g n g a a t n g a l l u _ , _ tuqute naqutke ghngaatnga llu _ .
iwernga _ liisimakagh i _ n u q e t u s i g a t a n k a _ sa u aat _ kayute kaghqagh si _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ , _ a p e g h t u n e m s i _ yugtuqagh mi llu _ ne gpesini llu _ .
qevuute luki _ qelegh aqe yagh anka _ J e w s - e t l u _ G r e e k - e t l u _ a v u t e g h q e l l u k i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i q a t a _ q i i v e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ u g p e q i s q e l l u k i l l u _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
whaa _ maaten _ qaatke te lunga _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ J e r u s a l e m - e n n a q u n g a _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa yaghqaqe aatnga _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ .
iwerngaqun _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ nuna ni _ takukagh mni _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaate aqe aanga _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ seghleliigh lleqe ni lunga llu _ anusimingllagh lleqe ni lunga llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ katam _ unguvallegh ka _ waakigate aqa _ apeghiigh qaghte na luku _ qepghaqagh _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ qelegh tke a _ whanga mnun _ . _ apegh sqe kaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ liisimake aqa _ allameng _ e s g h a g h n a a n g h i t a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ elpek si _ ungipagh iqe tekagh mni _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghneghmi _ whani _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ m a l g h u k l i l l n g u n a a n _ , _ naligh i _ ifla kan _ whanga _ p i l q e n g h i t a q a _ ,
qayughllak _ n u q e t u s i m a n g i t a q a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite sug qu a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nun _ aflengake sqe ai _ katam _ tawaten _ p e n n i i g h n i i g h t e m _ aflengake llegh atun _ penniigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ k e l e n g a n g w a a g h l u s i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ yug i _ k e l e n g a k n g w a a g h l u k i _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe ai _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mikun _ .
liisimake aqa _ unite kumsi _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ taku lleqe aisi _ . _ katam _ tawatete ut _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ naafqii naqe lghiit _ penniigh meng _ , _ n a a f q e n n a q u t k e l l e q i i t _ ugpeqagh t _ apeghtugh i llegh megteggun _ .
talwa _ ila i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ iqlengiqe yaghqaa ut _ u g p e q e s q e l l u k i _ apeghtugh i lleg teng _ , _ u g p e g h t e q e g h t e k u m e g t e k i _ m a l i g s a a g h t e k n a l u k i _ .
enkaam _ k e l e n g a n g w a a g h l u s i _ p u u g h t e l l e n g n a y u k a f s i _ . _ neqamike luku _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ qamagte lusi _ tamaaken _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ s e g h l e l i i g h l l a g h n g a a g h m a _ , _ qunituumagh ma _ .
" _ naange niite kete naqe aqa _ , _ neghyuke te amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a f l e n g a k e s q e l l u s i _ , _ ungipagh mun llu _ piniqe llegh anun _ q u y a s t e s q e l l u s i _ . _ nagate llegh gpesigun _ taana _ ungipagh _ ugpegh lleg si _ i k n a q u g h l l e q u t l u _ a l l g e g h l l e q a g h s i l l u _ elpek si _ pi liite yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taana _ pi liite yaghqagh _ t a m a a k u n u n _ pi u uq _ aaftekagh minun _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ mani gpesineng llu _ aatkagh gpesineng llu _ qiliigh mangite unga _ .
L i i s i m a k a g h p e s i n g a _ sa u a _ a k l u k e g k a q a _ , _ ila ma llu _ w h a n g a m n i l n g u u t _ a k l u k e g k i i t _ q e p g h a a t k a y u w a a n k a _ a l l g e g h h n a l u k i _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pi kaqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ usputagh u sqellug qu _ , _ whanga mtun _ ughleghiigh llegh gpesigun _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u k i _ p i p a g n i n g i l n g u u t _ . _ neqamike luku _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ whaten _ p i l l g h a _ , _ ' _ quyanagh aghagh uq _ tuune i i llegh _ allgegh te llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
P a u l _ tawaten _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ , _ segesqughte luni _ yughagh lgusighkagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiya magh meng _ P a u l _ qete aqe luku _ naagh aataghkagh at _ .
qivghuke lleghpigagh ke kangat _ qayughllak _ pi kaqe kangi _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite ni luteng _ . _ taagken _ qanig ke aat _ angyaghpag mun _ .
unite yamteki _ ugpeqagh t _ angyaghpag mun _ uugg llu ta _ nangaqaghte ukut _ C o s - m u n _ . _ unaami ani _ R h o d e s - m u n _ kaa llu ta _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ patara- mun _ .
tawani _ angyaghpag meng _ naalkute ukut _ P h o e n i c i a - n n a q e l g h i i m e n g _ enkaam _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ .
esghagh yamteggu _ qiighqagh _ C y p r u s _ uughqa akun _ nagnegh ukut _ S y r i a - m _ esne akun _ T y r e - m u n _ . _ tawani _ usingigh aat _ angyaghpag _ .
tamaani _ ivagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ n a a l k e s a m t e k i _ ellngit nite ukut _ ataasigh _ santillegh _ . _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ ugpeqagh t _ P a u l _ J e r u s a l e m - e t e s n a n i q a a t _ .
A g h u l a q s a g h q a a g h t e n g n g a m t a _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m t a _ nulighh ghqu te lghiit _ , _ avaqutagh ke te lghiit _ maligte ainkut _ esnagh mun _ . _ tawani _ segesqughte uute luta _ yughagh te ukut _ .
taagken _ uugte ukut _ angyaghpag mun _ , _ q a n i i g h i s t e p u t _ ne meggnun _ aglagh uute ut _ .
aghulaqe luta _ T y r e - m e n g _ kaate ukut _ P t o l e m a i s - m u n _ . _ tamaani _ quyake luki _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u t _ ataasigh _ aghneq _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
U n a m i n g a n i _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ kaa llu ta _ P h i l i p - e n k u n i t u k u t _ e v a n g e l i s t - e m i _ . _ M a a g h r a g h v i n l e q e g k a n g a t _ nakmikegkagh t _ kayute u luki _ .
E s t a m a n e n g _ panig leg _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh meng _ , _ qamagte luteng _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ .
salin _ t a m a a n s i m a l u t a _ uuknaliqe i sta _ agabus _ , _ J u d e a - m e n g _ kaa tuq _ .
W h a n g k u n n u n _ tagi luni _ P a u l - e m _ tafsi a _ iike luku _ a s i g h q e l l u k i _ itegagh ni llu _ iigge ni llu _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ ' _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ tafsi m _ u u m _ y u m a n g a _ J e w s - e t _ asighqesaghqagh ke aat _ , _ taagken _ tuune lleqe aat _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ ' _ "
whangkuta llu _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ nagate luku _ agabus _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ i g h l e g a a t k e s a g h a g h p u t _ P a u l _ J e r u s a l e m - e t e f q a a n _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ qiya magh gpesi _ tawaten _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ S e g h l e l i i g h q a g h p e s i n g a _ ! _ whaa _ a p e g h i i g h w a a g h l u n g a _ ayuqe unga _ asighqesaghqagh u lunga _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ , _ talwa _ tuqu yaghqaa lunga _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ "
P a u l _ sagiqe yan _ i i l q a y a g u t a g h p u t _ e n k a a n g a m _ piigh ut _ , _ " _ yeqay _ A t a n g h e m _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ qafsina _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ y a t a a g h q e l l u t a _ aghulaqe ukut _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ C a e s a r e a - g h m i i t _ maligte ainkut _ , _ kaate yamta _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ aglagh te ainkut _ tukughqagh mnnun _ M n a s o n - e n k u n u n _ , _ C y p r u s - e g h m i i m u n _ . _ U g p e q a q s u w h a a g h t e g g u n _ maligte te luni _ ugpeqekagh a _ Jesus _ .
J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m t a _ quyake luta _ upugha te ainkut _ .
unaami ani _ P a u l _ maligte luku _ e s g h a g h y a g h t u g h y a q e f u t _ James _ , _ E l d e r - e t l u _ qamagte luteng _ t a w a n t e f t u t _ .
P a u l - e m _ quyakekagh i _ . _ taagken _ ungipagh tke ai _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ qepghagh llegh mikun _ G e n t i l e - e n i l l u n i _ .
nagate luku _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ P a u l _ , _ " _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ liisima kan _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ J e w s - e t _ ugpeqe aat _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te manginagh yug aqe ut llu _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
U n g i p a a t a q i i n n g u q _ a p e g h t u g h a q a t e n n g u q _ qamagte luki _ J e w s - e t _ , _ G e n t i l e - e t _ n u n a n g i t n i l n g u u t _ qaatke te fqiita _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh anun _ p i s q e l l u k i _ . _ pi aqe aten llu nguq _ ighnegh it _ c i r c u m c i s e - e n g h i s a g h n g a a t a _ , _ talwa nguq _ atuqe snanigh aqe an _ J e w s - e t _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h a t _ .
kaate ma ni luten _ nagaqugh pestaagh naqngu aten _ . _ sa naqe sta ngam _ ?
itagnagh pigte nayagh uq _ pi sqe lleg mtestun _ pi yagh kuvek _ . _ estamat _ yug mta _ apeghiigh yaghtugh ngestagh ma ait _ akeqe i llegh eng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
elpek llu _ maligte luki _ temple- mun _ ukmangigh yagh a _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ tukfigh naketen llu _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh si _ enkaam _ aghqerragh ghhaasi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ T a a m _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ taakut _ taawa _ m e q e s t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ qigugh yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ liilightuusagh t _ p i s q e l l g h i s t u n _ . _ elpek llu _ ukmangigh kuvek _ qamagte luteng _ J e w s - e t _ liigike lleqe aat _ qaatke te nga llegh n _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ liigike lleqe aat llu _ nagaqughkagh eng _ tamaa na _ temngingu ta a _ .
taakut _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqe ait _ ungipaate kaqe aput _ lata tgun _ q a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ ukut _ , _ ' _ neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ aaw meng _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ nuqete aqe tek llu _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ unaami ani _ P a u l _ ukmangigh yaghtuqagh _ liilightuusagh t _ p i s q e l l g h i s t u n _ maligte luki _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangigh yaghtugh lghiit _ . _ taagken _ P a u l _ temple- mun _ itegh luni _ p r i e s t - e t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ santillegh _ atugh luku _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh eng _ apeghiigh naqe aat _ liilightuusagh t _ p i s q e l l g h i s t u n _ . _ tukfigh lleqe anka _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh it _ enkaam _ aghqerragh u aghte te aatagh qagh nakesi _ taakut _ yug t _ . _ "
iiwenllu _ santillegh _ naange naqe aqe uq _ taakut _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh at _ , _ A s i a - m e n g _ pi t _ J e w s - e t _ esghaghkagh at _ P a u l _ temple- mete luku _ . _ aga _ akuqagh luku _ akilghuukagh t _ ,
" _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n i _ , _ tagi aghte tek qun _ ! _ una _ yuug _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ s e g h l e q u u g h a q i i n k u t _ J e w s - e n i _ whangkuta _ , _ liilightuusagh put llu _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a g u q _ tagite aqe yamiki _ G e n t i l e - e t _ temple- mun _ liilightuusagh t _ iinghutekagh it _ . _ sakusiiqe aqe a llu _ una _ agleghnagh lghii _ temple- a _ . _ "
( _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ sumegh meggni _ P a u l - m u n _ gentile- a _ itghute ma ni luku _ temple- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ esghagh kaqe kegket _ T r o p h i m u s - e n k u k _ q e r n g a g h m e l l u k e k _ . _ trophimus _ G e n t i l e - n g u l g h i i _ E p h e s u s - e g h m i i _ . _ )
J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ ugumi yug ghllagkagh t _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ aglagh uute tke aat _ temple- mun _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ temple- mi _ P a u l _ akuqagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ eslate mun _ . _ T a w a n i n g i n a q _ kitum _ amig ghllag t _ umeg ke ai _ .
tuqute naqutke ma luku _ P a u l _ R o m e - e g h m i i t _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t a _ umiileg at _ ungipangekagh _ qaga _ iingunagh mi _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagu ni luku _ .
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ R o m e - e g h m i i t _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t a _ umiileg at _ kelqekagh _ u m i i l w a a g h n e n g l l u _ p i l l u w a g h t e n e n g l l u _ enkaam _ aqfaasnaq _ aglaghkagh t _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esghagh luki _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ qevute ta igh na nigh ke aat _ P a u l _ .
taagken _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ tugu luku _ P a u l _ asighqe stekagh a _ malghugnegh neng _ qiipraghute neng _ . _ P i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ ? _ sa ma a _ ? _ "
ataasigh kun _ a k i l g h u u m e n g _ k i i m s i i s a q m e g t e g g u _ repall _ umiileg m _ l i i g i k e n g h i t k i i _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ . _ enkaam _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ yug minun _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ P a u l _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
T u t e m q i i r a a g h n u n _ kaat ute te luku _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ kevegkagh at _ P a u l _ , _ qayughllak _ yug lghute ghllag t _ suugllug ughte ghllag lghiit _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ m a l i g l l e g h a a t k a a t _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ "
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ itghute naqe yatni _ P a u l - e m _ aaptekagh a _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg at _ G r e e k - e s t u n _ , _ " _ A l e g h q u q a g h n a y a n g h i s i k a a n _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ awii _ G r e e k - e s t u n _ akuzi kayugu ziin _ ?
T a a n a n g u n g h i s i i n _ E g y p t - e g h m i i _ qavnganghhaq _ qerngughte ikagh _ yug meng _ awite te na luku _ R o m e - e m _ k a v e m e n g a _ , _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqe tke ai _ 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ ategh leg t _ , _ Y u g t a g h t e t _ ? _ "
P a u l - e m _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ J e w - n g u u n g a _ , _ C i l i c i a - g h m i i _ , _ allgegh kau unga _ ne ghllag mi _ tarsus- mi _ . _ A l e g h q u q a g h n a y a n g h i s i n g i i _ yug t _ ? _ "
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ angeghqe ma ke yatni _ , _ P a u l _ nekeve luni _ t u t e m q i i r a a g h t e g g u n _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ n e p i g h e s q e l l u k i _ . _ enkaam _ qalleg nanigh yata _ aleghqugh qu ai _ H e b r e w - s t u n _ .
P a u l - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ siivanllegh ni llu _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liigike ste naqutke aghte naqe amsi _ sa aqe te mneng _ . _ "
J e w s - e t _ nagate yamegteggu _ akuzi lghii _ ellmegestun _ elngaatall _ q a l l e g n a n i g h w a a g h u t k a t _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - n g u u n g a _ allgeghkagh _ tarsus- mi _ C i l i c i a - m e l n g u g h m i _ iwernga _ maani _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ angli kau unga _ . _ gamaliel _ apeghtughiste ke luku _ liite u aqe aqe anka _ liilightuusagh t _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh kekagh it _ , _ enkaam _ tuune kau unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q a a t k e n g n g w a a g h n a l u k u _ katam _ tawaten _ elpesi stun _ .
elngaatall _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh anun _ repall _ tuqute naqutke kaqe anka _ . _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tugu ste aqe luki _ anusimingllagh ste qugh kaqe anka _ .
H i g h _ p r i e s t - e m l l u _ a g g h i s t e t l u _ ipa u ni naagh aat _ apegh llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ . _ whanga mkun _ lata t _ tuyugh ait _ J e w s - e l g u t e m n n u n _ D a m a s c u s - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ lata tke ma kangatnga _ ivagh i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ ugpeqagh neng _ . _ naalke gkumki _ a s i g h q e l l u k i _ tagite naqngu yagh anka _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ aghyuugh na luki _ .
" _ taagken _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ kaate yaghtugh aqe unga llu _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag _ kuukgute qagh uq _ whanga mnun _ .
ullegh aghte lunga _ nuna mun _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ S a u l _ , _ S a u l _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke aqe zinga _ ? _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ J e s u s - n g u u n g a _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i _ amyuqetagh te kegken _ . _ '
tamaakut _ igleghalgute ma _ esghagh kaqe aat _ nighug _ iwernga _ a l e g h q u g h t e m a _ me a _ nagaqugh mangite aat _ .
enkaam _ aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ sa langa _ ? _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ nekeve luten _ aglagh a _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ . _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqekagh aneng _ elpenun _ . _ '
ayaa ma lghiinga _ nighug ghllag m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ enkaam _ igleghalgute ma _ taslugh aatnga _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ .
" _ kaate yamta _ yug m _ A n a n i a s - n g u u n i i q e g k a n g i t a _ esghagh yaghtugh aanga _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te nga lghii _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ , _ D a m a s c u s - e g h m i i t _ J e w s - e t _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ .
taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ anglegute mni _ S a u l _ , _ e s g h a s a g u n n e q i g t e n _ ! _ ' _ enkaam _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ esghaate yagute lunga _ esghagh aqa _ .
pi unga _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ , _ nakmike aaten _ elpenun _ liigike sqellug qu _ piyuke lleg ni _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Q e p g h a g h t e n i _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ aleghqugh kangaten _ .
enkaam _ ungipaghtekete lleqe aaten _ tea- ma anun _ esghaate llegh gpeneng llu _ nagate llegh gpeneng llu _ .
sa meng _ utaqa i aqe ziin _ ? _ sa aqe ziin _ paaptaaye sten _ , _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ ughvugh ste ki _ tuqlugh i llegh gpegun _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ tagi nqigte lunga _ , _ temple- mi _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun
esghagh aqa _ atanegh _ . _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe ragkiigh i _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ qayughllak _ maani _ tugukligh naanghite aat _ ungipagh n _ whanga mneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ '
kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a a t _ s y n a g o g u e - n n u n _ pi aqe lunga _ tugulagh kaqe anka _ ugpegh lghiit _ e l p e n e n g _ , _ a n a g u l e g h t e s t a q a n k a l l u _ anusimingllagh ste aqe anka llu _ .
ungipagh ten _ stephen _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ legan _ i t a g n a q e g k a q a q a _ , _ taakut _ t u q u t i s t e n g i t a _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh it _ aflengake kaqe anka _ . _ '
A t a n g h e m _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ , _ kayagte naqngu amken _ agavek _ uyavagh nun _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ ' _ "
tamaakut _ yug lghute t _ nagatekagh at _ P a u l _ kenlanga _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ pi naqe ni llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ unguva u yaghqaa nghite uq _ ! _ "
S a k r i t u t e g h l l a g e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ akilghuu te kete luku _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh teng _ nengug te luki _ aghula tke ait _ , _ suna meng llu _ qule mun _ milughmigkagh t _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ esghapag luki _ p i l l u w a g h t e m i n u n _ itghute sqekagh a _ P a u l _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ mangteghagh itnun _ . _ kayagte tke a llu _ kagsagmig sqellug qu _ apegh sqellug qu _ sangan _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ akilghuu tke ta a _ .
iwernga _ a s i g h q e s a t n i _ P a u l - e m _ aaptekagh a _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ R o m e - e m _ liilightuusagh itni _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ kagsagmig kufsigu _ R o m e - e g h m i i _ , _ talwa _ nanqigte gpenaan _ sa meng _ anaggute ma ta a _ ? _ "
P a u l - e m _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ u m i i l w a a g h e m _ umiileg eng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sa naqe ziin _ ? _ una _ yuug _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u u q _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg m _ taku luku _ P a u l _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ ipa _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u z i i n _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ llivike te ghllag lunga _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u g h t e k a a g u n g a _ . _ " _ P a u l - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u l u n g a _ allgegh kau unga _ . _ "
taakut _ a a p q u g h a a g h t e k a g h q a q s a q a n g i _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ i q i l l a g h a a t k a t _ ellnga neng _ . _ P i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ liigike yamigu _ P a u l _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u t a n g a _ alingekagh _ qayughllak _ asighqe stekaqe kanga _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ liigike sug qu a _ J e w s - e n u n _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ P a u l _ . _ enkaam _ unaami ani _ qiipraghute igh stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ a g g h i s t e t l u _ qerngughte te ste luki _ aglagh tke a _ P a u l _ ellngit nun _ .
P a u l - e m _ qiive luki _ a g g h i s t e t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l g u t e m n i _ , _ aghnegh mun _ whavek _ kenlanga _ seghleghyug ta ite unga _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ "
aga _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ A n a n i a s - e m _ nekevgha lghii nun _ P a u l - e m _ t u n g a n g a n i _ qelegh tke a _ P a u l _ qasaghte sqellug qu _ q a a n g h a k u n _ .
taagken _ P a u l - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe aaten _ , _ uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ liilightuusagh tgun _ n a n q i g s a g h q a q a g h p e n g a _ iwernga _ elpek _ naafqe aten _ liilightuusagh t _ qasaghte ste llegh gpegun _ . _ "
P a u l - e m _ s a a g h w a n i l n g u u t _ nekevgha lghiit _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ seghletun _ aleghqugh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ h i g h _ priest- nga _ . _ "
P a u l - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l g u t e m n i _ , _ liisimake yagh kumkun _ h i g h _ priest- nge ta a _ tawaten _ pi nayagh nghite aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake yagh aqa _ akuzite i _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ igleghte te i lghiit _ yug gpesineng _ seghletun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe nghite asi _ . _ ' _ "
P a u l - e m _ liigike luki _ ila i _ S a d d u c e e s - n g u t a n g i _ , _ ila i _ pharisees- nge ta i _ iglagtu luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l g u t e m n i _ , _ pharisee- ngugh u nga _ , _ s i v u n g h e n k a l l u _ pharisees- ngugh t _ . _ whaa _ nanqigte na qagh zinga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u ta i _ . _ "
P a u l _ tawaten _ pi yan _ P h a r i s e e s - e t l u _ S a d d u c e e s - e t l u _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ aga _ m a l g h u g h q e n g n g i n a a m a g h m e n g _ pikagh t _ .
( _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ ugpeqe u kangit _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ , _ yaqulegtu ni luku _ , _ taghneghaghtu ni luku llu _ , _ naqam _ S a d d u c e e s - e t _ ugpeqe igate kangit _ tamaakut _ ) _ .
qenwat _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ i g l a g t u g h t e k a t _ . _ ila ita _ P h a r i s e e s - e t _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ mesag ii aghagh tke aat _ P a u l _ whaten _ , _ " _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ n a a l k e f i k n e g h m e n g _ a g h t u g h a g h p u t _ , _ ipa _ entaqun _ taghneghagh m _ nalighmeng _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh ma a _ . _ "
wanlegi _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag yata _ repall _ P a u l _ wayagh te luku _ lliigh yatgu _ , _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ yakugh yagute luku _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ p i l l u w a g h t e m i n u n _ aqfa ste luku _ aw ite u te sqekagh a _ a g g h i s t e n e n g _ . _ enkaam _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
tawani _ u n u g m i _ A t a n g h e m _ aliigh vike luku _ P a u l _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ilutu luten _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ ungipagh ke llegh gpetun _ , _ R o m e - e m i l l u _ u n g i p a q e l l e q a g h p e n g a _ . _ "
unaami ani _ 4 0 - n e n g _ uglagh lghiit _ J e w s - e t _ agghite luteng _ tuqute naqekagh at _ P a u l _ . _ E l l m e g g n e n g _ akeqe tke aat _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ .
enkaam _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n u n l l u _ siivanllegh nun llu _ aglagh luteng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ akeqe i ukut _ negh naanghite ni luta _ kenlanga _ tuqute lleg mnnun _ P a u l _ .
elpek si llu _ a g g h i s t e t l u _ aapte ggu _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg at _ t a g i n n e q i g t e s q e l l u k u _ P a u l _ a a p q u g h a a g h w a a g h n a q n i l u k u _ . _ enkaam _ tume mi _ taakwani _ whangkuta _ t u q u l l e q a g h p u t _ . _ "
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ uyghu an _ nagaqugh luki _ agghi llegh it _ ungipaate yaghtuqagh a _ P a u l _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
ungipaate yatni _ P a u l - e m _ tuqlugh luku _ umiileg u aq _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ U u m _ n u k a l p i g a a m _ u n g i p a a s u w a q a a _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg at _ sa meng _ , _ aglagh te aghte gu _ . _ "
U m i i l w a a g h e m _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh te luku _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg at _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anusimingllaghagh m _ P a u l - e m _ tagite sqe a _ elpenun _ una _ nukalpigagh _ , _ s a m e n g u q _ u n g i p a a s u w a a t e n _ . _ "
umiileg m _ t a s l u q l u k u _ iqitute luku _ e l l n g i n a a g h s a m e k _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ ungipaate yug zinga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ J e w s - e t _ agghi te ma ut _ aapte na luteng _ P a u l _ aglagh te aghte sqellug qu _ agghi vig mun _ unaami _ , _ a a p q u g h w a g h a t a g h a g h n a q n i l u k u _ .
ugpeqe gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ 4 0 - n e n g _ uglagh ut _ yug t _ iigh luteng _ tume mi _ utaqa i naqe ni lghiit _ tuqute na luku _ . _ akeqe i ma ut _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ P a u l _ . _ apeghiigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
umiileg m _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q a a _ nukalpigagh _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ungipaate yaghtugh ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane stekagh a _ .
taagken _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ tagsiqligh lukek _ umiileg u aaghek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ 2 0 0 _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ , _ 7 0 _ k u u n i t i s t e t _ , _ 2 0 0 _ p a n a s t e t _ i g l e g h s a q l e g g i i n a a g h l l i n n g u q _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ , _ ighivgaqun _ 9 - e k l a a g m i _ .
P a u l - l l u _ kuuni meng _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ i g l e g h u s i g h q a m e n g _ , _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ kaat ute na ke si _ G o v e r n o r - m u n _ F e l i x - m u n _ . _ "
taagken _ g o v e r n o r - m u n _ lata tkekagh a _ P a u l _ :
ukut _ lata t _ C l a u d i u s _ L y s i a s - m e n g _ pi u ut _ angegh lleg mnun _ G o v e r n o r - m u n _ F e l i x - m u n _ , _ quyake amken _ .
J e w s - e t _ tugu kaqe aat _ P a u l _ , _ tuqute naqe aqe yaghpete aat llu _ iwernga _ liigike luku _ R o m e - e g h m i i n g u t a n g a _ p i l l u w a g h t e k u l l g h i i n i _ a q f a a g h p u t _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ .
liigike yug luku _ J e w s - e n u n _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ a g g h i s t e n g i t n u n _ aglagh te aqa _ .
iwernga _ liigike yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ , _ talwa _ anusimingllagh yaghqaa luni _ . _ taawanginaq _ J e w s - e t _ q a a t k u u n e g h i n n i l u k u _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi aqe aat _ .
ungipaate yatnga _ J e w s - e n n g u q _ tuqute naqe aqe aat _ P a u l _ , _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ elpenun _ aglagh te ste aqa _ . _ taakut llu _ a v u t k i s t e n g i _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ apegh yaghtigh sqellug qu _ apallugh at _ .
enkaam _ u n u g m i _ tawani _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ kayagte llegh megestun _ aghulaqe tke aat _ P a u l _ kenlanga _ antipatris- mun _ .
unaami ani _ ila i _ uteghnigh iqe aat _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ mangteghagh itnun _ , _ taakut _ k u u n i t i s t e t _ nagnegh tke aat _ P a u l _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ .
kaate luteng _ P a u l _ aglagh tke aat _ g o v e r n o r - m u n _ , _ lata t llu _ tuunekagh it _ .
G o v e r n o r - e m _ lata t _ atightugh luki _ aaptekagh a _ P a u l _ , _ " _ nalighnegh aneng _ R o m e - e m _ pi u ziin _ ? _ " _ P a u l - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ C i l i c i a - m e n g _ " _ .
G o v e r n o r - e m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ A v u t k i s t e t e n _ kaate kata _ nanqigte lleqe amken _ . _ " _ taagken _ k e l e n g a k i s t e n u n _ kayagte tke a _ kelengake sqellug qu _ P r a e t o r i u m - e m i _ mangteghagh mi _ H e r o d - e m _ ulima stekagh ani _ .
tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ H i g h _ priest- a _ A n a n i a s _ , _ ila i llu _ siivanllegh t _ , _ akuzi stekaghqagh at llu _ tertullus _ , _ kaate tke aat _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ . _ nanqigtivig mi _ G o v e r n o r - m u n _ F e l i x - m u n _ apeghkagh it _ P a u l - e m _ seghletun _ p i l l g h i _ .
tuqlugh yatni _ tertullus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ angegh lleg mni _ governor _ F e l i x - m i _ , _ elpek _ apallugh ke luten _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut _ nuna mnni _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ . _ tamaakut llu _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ allangughte qughkagh ten _ pinigh ut _ .
sa llegh gpenun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ iyamsiqa yug ghllagu ukut _ .
kimaawi ste nayuke amken _ takestaaghhaa luku _ akuzi naqe unga _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ nagate naqe kefkut _ .
una _ yuug _ P a u l _ s e g h l e l i i g h q i s t e n g u u q _ . _ seghleliighqagh ke ai _ qamagte luki _ J e w s - e t _ n a a n s a g h n g a a t a _ . _ M a g h y a g h q u g h t e k a a t _ J e s u s - e m _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ .
talwa _ sakusiiqe naqe kaqsagh aa _ temple- a _ , _ iwernga _ t u g u k a q a g h p u t _ .
N a n q i g g n a q e g k a q s a g h a g h p u t _ l i i l l i g h t u u s a m t a _ p i l l g h a t u n _ , _ taawanginaq _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg ita _ L y s i a s - e m _ tagi luni _ p i l l u w a g h t e m i n u n _ wayagh stekaqe a _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ . _ taagken _ qelegh ai _ a v u t k i s t e n g i _ elpenun _ t a g i s q e l l u k i _ .
governor _ F e l i x - m i _ , _ a a p q u g h a a q u v g u _ liigike lleqe aten _ anaggute ni lleg put _ ipa u ta i _ . _ "
J e w s - e t _ ilate qaghtekagh t _ tertullus- mun _ , _ akuzillegh i _ qamagte luki _ ipa u nikagh it _ .
taagken _ g o v e r n o r - e m _ P a u l _ akuzi sqekagh a _ . _ enkaam _ P a u l _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ governor _ F e l i x - m i _ , _ quya unga _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ elpenun _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake amken _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ nanqigte i ste u uten _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ J e w s - e n u n _ .
elpek ni _ liigike yugnagh uq _ ipa u ta a _ a k u g a a r u g l l a k _ J e r u s a l e m - e t e l q a _ maniguute na lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
A n a g g u n n i s t e m a _ liisimake aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh mangite aqa _ kina _ alngunak _ , _ q a p r a g h q i i m a n g i t u n g a l l u _ yug neng _ temple- mi _ , _ s y n a g o g u e - n n i l l u _ , _ talwa _ nani _ alngunak _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ tawaten _ pi ma ni ghngaaghmegtengnga _ i p a p i g h q e n n a a n g h i t a a t _ .
iwernga _ apegh naqe aqa _ una _ elpesi nun _ , _ manigugh aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh at _ sivunegh mta _ maligte luku _ T u m a n g a _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ ukut _ yug t _ pi kangat _ temngingu ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ whanga llu _ ellngistun _ ugpeqe anka _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ igaqegkagh it _ .
A n a g g u n n i s t e m t u n l l u _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e s a g h q a q i i _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ tuqukagh t _ pinigh yagh nga a ta _ , _ seghleghu yagh nga a ta _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte naqutke aqe unga _ seghleghyug te kaghqagh ite te lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ .
" _ qafsinegyag _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ qantaghaqu nghhagh _ uteghnigh unga _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ m a n i l i n n a l u k i _ akluma lghiit _ J e w s - e l g u t e n k a _ , _ a g h q e r r a a g h n a l u n g a l l u _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
pelungighsagh nghmeng _ apeghiigh lunga _ temple- mi _ a g h q e r r a a g h u m a l u n g a _ , _ ila ita _ J e w s - e t _ A s i a - m e n g _ pi t _ esghagh aatnga _ . _ uvite ka _ paaghqite uq llu _ seghleliigh i tuq llu _ .
taakut _ J e w s - e t _ sangameng _ tagi nghite aat _ ? _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kuma _ e l l n g i n g u y a g h t u t _ apegh i stekaghqagh nka _ seghletun _ pilleg mneng _ iwernga _ aviite ut _ .
yeqay _ ukut _ w h a a n l e n g u u t _ nagate kaqe aatnga _ mesighagh aqngama _ J e w s - e t _ agghi vig itni _ , _ apegh litgu _ anaggute llegh meng _ n a a l k e f i k u m a k u m e g t e n g n g a _ .
entaqun _ ellngit ni _ seghleghu uq _ whaten _ pi aqe yamki _ , _ ' _ N a n q i g t a g h p e s i n g a _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ . _ ' _ "
iwernga _ F e l i x - e m _ , _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h l u k u _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh a _ , _ w i n t a k u s i t k a a _ nanqigte gpenaan _ P a u l _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ P i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg at _ L y s i a s _ kaate kan _ agghi tke lleqe aqa _ P a u l _ . _ "
taagken _ u m i i l w a a g h m u n _ kayagte tke a _ P a u l _ kelengake sqellug qu _ , _ naqam _ anusimingllagh snanigh qagh a _ . _ ighsake ste na nigh ke ai llu _ ilakumtaagh ita _ sa meng _ tagite nghatgu _ a k l u k e g k a a n e n g _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ F e l i x - e m _ J e w s - a _ nuliigh ni _ , _ D r u s i l l a _ , _ kelqellug qu _ tagikagh _ . _ tagsiqligh luku _ P a u l _ , _ nagatekagh ak _ ungipagh lghii _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
P a u l - e m _ akuzi tke sag ke i _ ukut _ : _ pinitun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ governor _ F e l i x - e m _ alinge luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ A a n e l g h a a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ , _ alla _ aqfa ste lleqe amken _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuma _ . _ "
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ felix _ neghyu u yagh lghii _ P a u l - m u n _ m a n i l i l l e q n i l u n i _ pegtekunigu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tagsiqligh aqe kanga _ mulu te gpenaan _ aleghquute na lutek _ .
taagken _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ atugh lukek _ , _ P o r c i u s _ festus _ g o v e r n o r - n g u g h t e k a q _ . _ iwernga _ F e l i x - e m _ e f q u g h s u g l u k i _ J e w s - e t _ P a u l _ unitekagh a _ paninang _ q i i p r a g h u s i g h n g a l u k u _ .
festus _ kaa sa mi _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ igleghte te i na luni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqekagh _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ .
tawani _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a l l u _ J e w s - e t _ ungipitekagh at _ , _ P a u l _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag kau ni luku _ J e w s - e n e n g _ .
sagiqe tke aat _ festus- mun _ , _ P a u l _ tagite sqellug qu _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ tuqute yu ke aat _ tumangani _ .
iwernga _ F e s t u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ P a u l _ k e l e n g a k a q a g h p u t _ C a e s a r e a - m i _ . _ qantaghaqun _ uteghnigh yaghqaa unga _ ,
i g l e g h u t i s t e g p e s i _ maligte nakangatnga _ . _ elngaatall _ tawani _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kan _ apegh nakangat _ . _ "
festus _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e t a g h a q a q _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ nalighmeng _ qula _ aghneq _ , _ taagken _ C a e s a r e a - t k a q _ . _ unaami ani _ nanqigtivig m _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ aqume luni _ aqfa stekagh a _ P a u l _ .
tagite yatgu _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i t _ J e w s - e t _ kangllu qaghte luku _ anaggute aatagh ghllag mani ke aat _ iwernga _ i p a p i g h q e p a g n i n g i t k i i t _ anaggute llegh i _ .
P a u l _ mesag igh aqe aq _ , _ " _ qaatke igate nghite anka _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh it _ , _ seghletun _ pi igate unga _ temple- mi _ , _ seghletun _ pi mangite aqa _ R o m e - e m _ U m i i l e g p i g a a _ . _ "
F e s t u s - e m _ e f q u g h s u g l u k i _ J e w s - e t _ aaptekagh a _ P a u l _ , _ " _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ whanga mnun _ nanqigte sug ziin _ ? _ "
P a u l - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ nakaa _ ! _ whaa _ U m i i l e g p i g a a m _ nanqigtivig ani _ nekevgha unga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whani _ nanqigte yaghqaa unga _ . _ L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a n _ J e w s - e n u n _ anaggute llghite unga _ .
