anaggute ma kuma _ R o m e - e m _ liilightuusagh an _ p i l l g h a n i _ repall _ tuqute yaghqaa lunga _ , _ anag naqe naanghite aqa _ tuqu llegh _ . _ iwernga _ J e w s - e t _ anaggute ni llegh at _ temngingu kan _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ J e w s - e n u n _ sastegkanganga _ , _ taana _ yuug _ qaatke te naanghite uq _ R o m e - e m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ R o m e - e m _ U m i i l e g p i g a a n u n _ nanqigte sug unga _ . _ "
F e s t u s - e n k u t _ agghi lgutke te lghiit _ agghite nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ P a u l - e m _ piyuke llegh aneng _ , _ P a u l _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nanqigte sug u lghiiten _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ , _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ aglagh lleqe uten _ . _ "
T a a m _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ umiileg _ agrippa _ kaate tke aq _ C a e s a r e a - m u n _ kelqellug qu _ nayag ni _ B e r n i c e _ , _ quyake na luku _ governor _ festus _ .
T a m a a n s i m a l u k e k _ F e s t u s - e m _ ungipamsug tke a _ agrippa _ P a u l - m e n g _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ G o v e r n o r - n g u g h s a l g h i i n g a _ F e l i x - e m _ yuug _ anusimingllaghvig mete ste aqe a _ maani _ .
J e r u s a l e m - e m e l l u n g a _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a l l u _ J e w s - e t _ ungipaate aatnga _ P a u l - e m _ anaggute llegh aneng _ . _ taagken _ aapte aatnga _ whanga mnun _ tuqute ste sqellug qu _ ,
iwernga _ kiimsigh kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ R o m e - e g h m i i n i _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nanqigte gpenaki _ tuqute igate aput _ . _ liilightuusagh put _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ seghletun _ pini ke aat _ , _ sivuke luni _ a p e g h t e s a g h q a a g u q _ ipa _ pi ma ta a _ a n a g g u n n i s t e t _ n a g a t e s t e k l u k i _ . _ taagken _ l i i g i k e l l e q a g h p u t _ sa lleghqagh ut _ . _ '
enkaam _ P a u l - e m _ a n a g g u n n i s t e n g i _ tagi laghate te yata _ aga _ unaami ani _ aqume kau unga _ nanqigtivig kun _ , _ tagite stekaqe aqa llu _ P a u l _ .
A n a g g u n i s t e n g i _ nekeve uute luteng _ seghletun _ p i l l g h i _ a p e g h y a q m e g t e k i _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleg mtun _ seghleghtutka nghite ut _ .
T a a w a n g i n a g h h a q _ aaghtiiraagh ma kangat _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ , _ taana llu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ J e s u s - m e n g _ tuquma ni luku _ , _ iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ sagiqe te kaqe a _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ .
liisimakepagunghite te mneng _ tamaakut _ , _ P a u l _ aapte aqa _ nanqigte sug ta a _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ .
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ nanqigte sug unga _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ . _ kelengake ste nga _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste llegh gpenun _ ellnga nun _ . _ ' _ enkaam _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ k a n a g h t e s n e q i g t a q a _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste lleghqagh mnun _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ . _ "
A g r i p p a - m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ nagate yug aqa _ P a u l _ . _ " _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ unaami _ nagate lleqe an _ . _ "
unaami ani _ A g r i p p a - n k u k _ B e r n i c e - e n k u k _ iteghkagh k _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ elngaatall _ a a r r a g h w a a g h l u t e k _ umiileg m _ aatkagh aneng _ , _ m a l i g t e s t e k l u k i _ umiileg it llu _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i l l u _ C a e s a r e a - m _ . _ taagken _ F e s t u s - e m _ itghute sqekagh a _ P a u l _ .
F e s t u s - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ w h a a n l e n g u g h n i _ , _ una _ yuug _ esghagh kesi _ , _ P a u l - n g u u q _ . _ qamagte luteng _ J e w s - e t _ m a a n l e n g u u t _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t l u _ q i k e g h q u k e g k a q a a t _ whanga mkun _ repall _ akilghuu tke kaqe aat _ tuqute yaghqaa ni luku _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ . _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte sug kau ta aneng _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ aglagh ste na luku _ pi aqe aqa _ .
iwernga _ lata tgun _ sa meng _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a l g h i i m e n g _ apegh yaghqagh ite unga _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ u u m e n g _ yug meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ enkaam _ tagite aqa _ sivu gpesinun _ , _ kiyang _ elpenun _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ ! _ neghyuke aqa _ a a p q u g h a a q u m t e g g u _ sa meng _ lata sighqagh meng _ n a a l k e f i k n a y u k a m k u n _ .
whanga mni _ temngingu uq _ aglagh stekumkun _ anusimingllagh aq _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ sa meng _ anaggute llegh meng _ apallugh ngunaan _ . _ "
A g r i p p a - m _ pi ke aa _ P a u l _ , _ " _ taawa _ mesighagh yaghqaaghte uten _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ akuzi _ . _ " _ P a u l - e m _ iigge ni _ nengug te luki _ , _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ elngaatall _ aneghneghte unga _ sivu gpeni _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ J e w s - e t _ a n a g g u t e l q e n n i k a n g i t n e n g _ ,
qayughllak _ n a l l u k e n g h i t n g w a a g h a t e n _ J e w s - e t _ nangaghnegh it llu _ apallugh ke te kaqe kangit llu _ . _ enkaam _ n a n g l l e g s i p i g l l u n g a _ aapte amken _ n a g a t a g h t e s q e l l u n g a _ .
" _ N u n a m n i l n g u u t l u _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t l u _ qamagte luteng _ J e w s - e t _ liisimake aat _ k i y a g h t a a l q a _ anglinghhagh u te mneng _ ima _ .
apegh yug yagh kumegteggu _ liisimakekagh eng _ apegh nayagh aatnga _ iiwleng _ qaatke te nga lghiinga _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh itnun _ .
whaa _ J e w s - e t _ tagi ste aatnga _ whavek _ n a n q i g t e s q e l l u n g a _ qayughllak _ neghyuke u kegka _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t i l l e g h q a a _ tuqukagh neng _ akequsagh kekagh a _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
taana ta _ akequsagh _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke lghiit _ ramke mta _ neghyuke kangat _ a l l g e g h h n a l u k u _ , _ elngaatall _ maniguute u luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ . _ umiileg mi _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ neghyuke i llegh _ apallugh ke luku _ J e w s - e t _ nanqigte sug aatnga _ .
sangafsi _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tsi _ kiyaghnegh _ u n g u v a g h t i p a g n i n g i n n i l u k u _ tuqukagh neng _ ?
" _ sivugh nghaani _ agani _ ugpeqe pigtekaqe aqa _ k i p u l l g i n a a l l e g h l l a k a _ elqughute nga ni luku _ ategh aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ N a z a r e t h - e g h m i i m _ .
tawaten _ pi kau unga _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ . _ C h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n e n g _ pi lleghqagh nge kau unga _ anusimingllagh ste na luki _ ugpeqagh lghute t _ . _ tuqu qugh naqe yatki _ itagnagh ke pigtekaqe anka _ t u q u t e s q e l l u k i _ .
uglagh ghngaan _ aghyuugh stekaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ s y n a g o g u e - n n i _ , _ whaten llu _ pi ste naqutke kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ ugpeqe nanigh ma aqa _ Jesus _ . _ ' _ ugumi yagute pigtekaqe anka _ repall _ malighqagh kaqe anka _ talwa _ G e n t i l e - e t _ nuna itnun _ amyugh te kete na luki _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ D a m a s c u s - e t u n g a _ pi lleghqagh ligh lunga _ , _ qelegh lleg ligh lunga _ c h i e f _ p r i e s t - e n e n g _ .
umiileg mi _ , _ i g l e g h t a a l u t a _ aghneq _ qukaghite aqe uq llu _ esghagh aqa _ nighug _ n i g h u g a t a g h a l g h i i _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ . _ elngaatall _ nighugh pigte luni _ kuukgute kau uq _ uvite mnun _ , _ igleghalgute mnun llu _ .
qamagte luta _ u l l e g h a a t u k u t _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ H e b r e w - g h m i i s t u n _ , _ ' _ S a u l _ , _ S a u l _ ! _ sangama _ amyugh te kete zinga _ ? _ aqnigh qugh u uten _ e l p e n e n g _ amyuutke i llegh gpegun _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ o x - e m _ aqnigh qugh llegh atun _ kete igh qugh llegh mikun _ yug mi _ maghyaghqugh sagh i _ . _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ A t a n g h e m _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ J e s u s - n g u u n g a _ , _ amyuutke ken _ .
nekeve i _ . _ aliigh vike amken _ qayughllak _ nakmike amken _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u t e n l l u _ liisimake i ste u luten llu _ . _ apegh naketen _ tamaakut _ esghagh uqagh ten _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ tamaakut llu _ kelgute yaghqagh nka _ k i n g u v a q u n _ aliigh vike gkumken _ .
yuguligh u iqe naagh amken llu _ elpek _ katam _ yug gpeneng _ , _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g l l u _ . _ ellngit nun _ kayagte naqngu amken
e s g h a g h t e s t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ tunute luki _ mamleg meng _ q i i v e s q e l l u k i _ n i g h u g h m u n _ , _ tunute luki _ tughneghagh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g _ q i i v e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n u n _ . _ taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute lleqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ ila lleqe ai llu _ tamaavek _ aaftekagh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ whanga mneng _ . _ '
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ qaatke kaqe aqa _ taana _ esghaghwaagh llegh ka _ qilag meng _ .
sivuke lunga _ ungipagh ke i unga _ D a m a s c u s - m i _ taagken _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ , _ tea- ma ani llu _ J u d e a - m i _ . _ ungipagh ke i unga _ J e w s - e n u n l l u _ G e n t i l e - e n u n l l u _ a v u t e g h q e l l u k i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h l u k i _ q i i v e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ pinitun llu _ pi sqe anka _ i p a p i g h q u t k e s q e l l u k u _ a v u t e g h q e l l u t e n g _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i i m a t a n g i _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ apallugh ke luku _ temple- mi _ J e w s - e t _ tugu lunga _ tuqute naqutke kaqe aatnga _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aqe aanga _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ , _ enkaam _ sivu gpesigun _ nekeve lunga _ apegh aqa _ C h r i s t - a _ pingwaagh ghllag nun llu _ u k a v a n t a l g h i i n u n l l u _ . _ apegh kaqe a _ t a a n a n g u u q _ ataasigh _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ M o s e s - e m l l u _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ .
pi kau ut _ C h r i s t - a _ ikfiqe pestaagh lleqe ni luku _ enkaam _ sivulii luni _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ apegh yaghqaa ni luku llu _ nighug a _ yuguligh llegh m _ yug nun llu _ G e n t i l e - e n u n l l u _ . _ "
P a u l _ mesighagh ma luku _ F e s t u s - e m _ akilghuu ghllag qagh a _ , _ " _ P a u l _ , _ nallungughte uten _ ! _ liite llegh ghllag gpek _ nallungughte ste aaten _ ! _ "
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ governor _ festus- mi _ , _ nallungughte llghite unga _ , _ liisima lunga _ ipa meng _ akuzi u unga _ .
umiileg m _ A g r i p p a - m _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a a _ tamaa na _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaan _ aleghqugh aqa _ . _ liisimake aqa _ nagaqugh kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ pi kau nghite ut _ .
umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ u g p e q a q s i k i i _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ igaqegkagh it _ ? _ liisimake amken _ ugpeqe aqe aten _ ! _ "
umiileg m _ A g r i p p a - m _ aaptekagh a _ P a u l _ , _ " _ S u m e g h p e n i i - i _ whaa _ tan- squghhagh n _ aleghqugh lunga _ ugpegh ste naqe zinga _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ? _ "
P a u l - e m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ tan- squghhagh u ghngaan _ , _ nalighmeng _ taake luku _ aleghqugh yagh ghngaamken _ y u g h a a t k e n g n g w a a m k e n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ u g p e g h e s q e l l u t e n _ . _ ellnginagh gpek _ y u g h a a t k e n g n g u n g h i t a m k e n _ , _ y u g h a a t k e n g n g w a a m s i _ qamagte lusi _ nagate lghii ni _ whanga mneng _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ whanga mtun _ l l i i g h e s q e l l u s i _ iwerngaqun _ qiipraghute ngunasi _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg _ agrippa _ , _ governor _ festus _ , _ B e r n i c e _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila i _ nekeve te tke aat _ .
aane luteng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ aleghqugh tke aat _ , _ " _ U u m u n _ yug mun _ sa meng _ apallugh ite ukut _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllagh sighqagh meng _ . _ "
A g r i p p a - m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ A a n e s n a y a g h a g h p u t _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ n a n q i g t e s q e l l u n i _ pi kau nghite yagh kan _ . _ "
F e s t u s - e m _ I t a l y - t e s q e s u g y i n k u t _ angyaghpag kun _ , _ aglagh te stekagh i _ P a u l - l l u _ ila i llu _ anusimingllaghagh t _ u m i i l w a a g h m u n _ J u l i u s - m u n _ . _ J u l i u s - e n k u t _ p i l l u w a g h t e k u l l g h i i t _ ategh ke lghiit _ , _ " _ U m i i l e g p i g a a m _ P i l l u w a g h t e n g i _ . _ "
taawa _ angyaghpag _ A d r a m y t t i u m - e m e n g _ pi _ , _ a g h u l a q s a q l e g g i i n a a g h t e k a q _ ne nun _ A s i a - m _ e s n e n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ . _ tawavek _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ A r i s t a r c h u s - e m _ maligte ainkut _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - g h m i i m _ . _ ( _ thessalonica _ M a c e d o n i a - m e l n g u q _ ) _ .
unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ S i d o n - m u n _ . _ J u l i u s - e m _ pinitungwaaq _ pi ke aa _ P a u l _ , _ laalighte ste aqe luku _ ilakumtaagh anun _ S i d o n - m i _ , _ sa meng _ a k l u k e g k a a n e n g _ tuune aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
S i d o n - m e n g _ aghulaqe ukut _ anuqe _ aygugh mun _ enkaam _ igleghte ukut _ u q i i n e l l g h a k u n _ qiighqagh m _ C y p r u s - e m _ .
iglegha ukut _ esne akun _ C i l i c i a - m l l u _ P a m p h y l i a - m l l u _ , _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ myra- mun _ L y c i a - m e l n g u g h m u n _ .
T a m a a n t e f t u q _ angyaghpag _ A l e x a n d r i a - m e n g _ pi _ , _ enkaam _ U m i i l w a a g h e m _ J u l i u s - e m _ liigike luku _ I t a l y - n n a q u t a n g a _ uugte ste ainkut _ .
N u n m a a s q u g h h a q _ igleghte ukut _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ iwernga _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ kaate ukut _ C n i d u s - m u n _ . _ anuqligh te m _ i g l e g h a p a g n i n g i i t e s i n k u t _ taagavek _ , _ igleghte ukut _ u q i i n e l l g h a k u n _ qiighqagh m _ C r e t e - e m _ , _ naghughte luku _ S a l m o n e _ .
esne ngiighhagh akun _ igleghte ukut _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ , _ kaate ukut _ kangighagh mun _ ategh ke lghii mun _ , _ U q i t a g h v i k _ kangegh igh aq _ , _ taana _ q a n t a g h a n l e n g u q _ L a s e a - m e n g _ .
T a m a a n t e g h l l a g t u k u t _ qenwat _ yakugh nagh a _ taake luku _ i g l e g h a m u n _ , _ siingenllu _ aghneq _ naghughte lghii _ p r i e s t - e t _ a g h q e r r a a g h v i g a t _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ J e w s - e t _ . _ enkaam _ P a u l - e m _ kelenga sagh u aghagh u i _ angyaghpag m _ u m i i l w a a g h i _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sume mni _ whaa _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh naqe ukut _ iglegha lleg mnni _ . _ ifla aqe lteggu llu _ angyaghpag ut _ usituumagh an _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ tuqu laghate te lleqe ukut _ . _ "
iwernga _ U m i i l w a a g h e m _ J u l i u s - e m _ nagate kaqe kek _ angyaghpag m llu _ umiileg a _ , _ angyaghpag leg llu _ yuug _ avelghagh luku _ P a u l _ .
allute luteng llu _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ igleghte yu ke aat _ qayughllak _ taana _ kangegh igh aq _ yakugh nagh lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ uksughte vig u luni _ . _ kaate naqe na luteng _ P h o e n i x - m u n _ pikagh t _ uksughte yaghqaa luteng _ tamaani _ . _ P h o e n i x - e m _ kangighagh a _ qiighqagh mete ngughk _ C r e t e - m i _ , _ n o r t h w e s t - m u n l l u _ s o u t h w e s t - m u n l l u _ ayuqe lghii _ .
I k e g k e m e n g _ anuqataghaaghte yan _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taana ta _ anuqe _ utaqakagh ut _ . _ " _ enkaam _ uyghigh te a _ sayug luku _ t e l a n a n g a a k u t _ C r e t e - e m _ esne ngiighhagh akun _ .
iwernga _ anuqligh ghllag uq _ nakaghya meng _ enkaam _ qiighqagh meng _ atghaghtegh ghllag aa _ .
angyaghpag _ awatmun _ t e n g s a g u _ qute mun _ taglagh naqutkesagh luta _ iilqayug ukut _ enkaam _ u p u u p e n g _ t e n g t e s t u k u t _ .
qiighqagh squghhagh m _ C a u d a - m _ uughqa anun _ lliigh sigh nkut _ up- qite ghraag ukut _ . _ tawani _ q a m u q s a q e f u t _ angyat ghhagh ut _ piyaqleg iigh tke ghngaamteggu _ qaakagh ut _ .
taagken _ angyaghpag _ ayugighsagh aat _ asighte luku _ t a p g h a g h m e n g _ . _ alinge luteng _ qenaaghte lugh qugh te na yukagh meng _ S y r t i s - m i _ t e l a n a n g a t _ ifkagh qugh luki _ t e n g t e s t u k u t _ .
unaami ani _ paninang _ esla _ almesiqe ghllag yagu _ , _ angyaghpag m _ usi an _ ila i _ megh mun _ ategh qugh ait _ .
awakaghaani _ esla _ almesiqe yagu _ angyaghpag m _ sanqute i _ ategh qugh ait _ .
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ s i q i n n g u n a n i _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ngunani _ pi uq _ esla m _ seghlegh ghllag m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ . _ enkaam _ talwa _ iilqayug ukut _ , _ isigima qun _ tuqu laghate te naqe lghiikut _ .
yug t _ neghe gpenateng _ muluugh ghllag yata _ P a u l - e m _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ nagate kaqsagh kufsinga _ kete nayagh nghite ngugh u kut _ C r e t e - m e n g _ enkaam _ aghsaan _ seghleliigh nayagh nghite usi _ , _ saghya igh te nayagh nghite usi _ .
iwernga _ iilqayug gpenasi _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ .
unuk _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ taku kaqe aanga _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh _ manigugh aqe kegka _ , _ ellnga n _ pi ke aanga _ .
yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ P a u l _ , _ alinge gpenang _ , _ kaate lleqe uten _ R o m e - e m u n _ , _ nekeve lleqe uten _ sivungagh kun _ U m i i l e g p i g a a m _ . _ yughagh tke kaqe te gpeneng _ a n g y a g h p a g m e t e l g u t e t e n _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u g u l i l l e q i i _ . _ '
enkaam _ quya tek _ , _ ugpeqe i unga _ kiyaghnegh kun _ t a w a t e t n g w a a g h e s q e l l u k u _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ .
iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ "
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ unuk _ kellii mi _ A d r i a t i c - m i _ t e n g t i i n k u t _ . _ taakwani _ u n u g e m _ qukaa ni _ yulaagh t _ pi aqe ut _ qute mun _ tughwaaghsugnite ni luta _ .
tapghagh _ uqigkutagh igh luku _ megh mun _ a t e g h s a q m e g t e g g u _ yuginagh _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutka uq _ . _ T a z i n g a p i g h q a a g h y a m t a _ tapghagh _ a t e g h l l a a t a g h y a q m e g t e g g u _ aki mig aq _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutkaligh ma lghii _ .
yulaagh t _ alingekagh t _ angyaghpag _ qalmesite na yu kan _ enkaam _ e s t a m a n e n g _ uyghigh aat _ kingu akun _ . _ taagken _ yughagh ut _ aghte ragkiigh sqellug qu _ .
angyaghpag m _ yulaagh i _ anag naqekagh t _ sivuyag a _ angyaghpag m _ uyghiite ligh naqe sighwaagh te kete luku _ , _ angyat ghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghtekagh at _ .
iwernga _ P a u l - e m _ pi ke ai _ umiileg u aq llu _ p i l l u w a g h t e t l u _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ aghulaqe gkata _ kayute pagite te lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ elpek si _ tuqu laghate te lleqe usi _ . _ "
enkaam _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ angyat ghhagh _ kepe tke aat _ .
aghtaghagh naqe aqe a llu _ P a u l - e m _ qamagte luki _ n e g h e s q u g h w a a q i i _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ aghneq _ n e g h e l q u n g h i t u s i _ qayughllak _ elngaatall _ kelengaruugh lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ n e g h e s q u g h w a a g h n a q a m s i _ i k n a q u g h t e s q e l l u s i _ . _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ talwa _ aqnighte naanghite uq _ . _ "
nepiigh yami _ neqekrangllagh meng _ tugu tete luni _ igamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ manu itni _ ikute luni _ neghekagh _ .
yug t _ i l u t u g h s a g h y i s t e n g _ ellngit llu _ qamagte luteng _ negh te tke aat _ .
Q e r n g a g h l l a g e m t a _ a n g y a g h p a g m e l n g u g h n i _ 2 7 6 - n g u u k u t _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ angyaghpag _ uqengelli na luku _ w h e a t - a _ megh mun _ ategh qugh aat _ .
aghte yagu _ qute meng _ esghaate ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liisuqe nghite aat _ n a t u n g u t a n g a _ . _ iwernga _ kangighagh lgu uq _ esnagh leg meng _ enkaam _ taaggun _ tamlag naqe yug ut _ .
kepugh te luki _ uyghiite t _ unitekagh it _ megh mete luki _ , _ petugutagh ik llu _ aquutagh k _ naghigh qugh qu ait _ . _ taagken _ sayug luki _ telaananga t _ s i v u y a g m e l n g u u t _ t e n g t e s t u t _ tespikavek _ esnagh mun _ .
iwernga _ angyaghpag m _ sivuyag a _ aghqe itagh i sagh n _ kingu a _ qagi ghllag t _ kagimte aat _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e t _ pi yagh ait _ anusimingllaghagh t _ tuqu qugh na luki _ luuraq _ qute mun _ pugime luteng _ navek _ anag na yu kata _ .
iwernga _ u m i i l w a a g h e m _ tuqute sug ma nge i tke a _ P a u l _ enkaam _ iinghutekagh i _ . _ yeghlegi _ qelqe ai _ p u g i m a q a y u g g a a t _ qute mun _ t a g l i i s q e l l u k i _ .
tamaakut _ pugime lleg ite ngugh t _ angyaghpag m _ i k e l l g h a a k u n _ tugu luki _ taglagh naqe sqekagh i _ qute mun _ . _ tawaten _ qamagte luta _ yaywaaseng _ u u g l l e g h a a t u k u t _ qute mun _ .
yaywaaseng _ qute mun _ uugte yamta _ liigikagh ut _ qiighqagh _ malta- nge ta a _ .
T a m a a k u m i i t _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ kumagh qite magh emta _ qayughllak _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ eslallugughte magh mi _ .
P a u l _ saqumig luni _ quugkagh meng _ qiigh i ma luku _ , _ tuqunagh lghii _ nemeghyagh _ maatnegh m _ aane ste luku _ quug neng _ , _ iiggagh kun _ amqeghtekagh a _ .
T a m a a k u m i i t _ esghagh luku _ nemeghyagh _ P a u l - e m _ iiggagh neng _ qughagh nga lghii _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ yuug _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ qaywa _ u n Ê¼ g a n i _ megh mi _ tuqu nghite ghngaaghmi _ esghaghhu _ tuqu yaghqaa ma lghii _ . _ "
P a u l - e m _ iigge ni _ u f s u g u s a q m i n i k i _ nemeghyagh _ ifkagh uq _ k e n g h e g n u n _ iwernga _ talwa _ nemeghyagh m _ aqnighte ma ite kanga _ .
yug t _ pi kaqsagh kangat _ P a u l _ puuve ghllag naqe ni luku _ nalighmeng _ tuqu naqe ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ sa gpenani _ muluugh ghllag yan _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh at _ , _ " _ una _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ . _ "
T a a m _ qiighqagh m _ umiileg a _ P u b l i u s _ , _ nuna lgu uq _ ughugsigh vig mta _ t u n g a n g a n i _ . _ P u b l i u s - e m _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ , _ ellnga nite ukut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
ata a _ puqlegha u uq _ aqsalliqe magh mi _ . _ P a u l - e m _ esghagh yaghtugh luku _ yughagh te kete luku _ , _ s a a f s a q m i n i g u _ naallghute uq _ .
P a u l _ tawaten _ pi yan _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ q i n u y u g e t _ tagi laghate tke aat _ enkaam _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ t u n q u g h t a a g i i n k u t _ tunute yameng _ . _ tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yamta _ tunqughtagh u laatagh ainkut _ tumangani _ atughqagh mnneng _ . _ angyaghpag _ A l e x a n d r i a - m e n g _ pi _ uksughte ma lghii _ tamaani _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ ategh ke a _ " _ malghi k _ kiyaghnegh k _ " _ s i v u y a g a n i t e f t u k l u _ ulimaagh u lutek _ taake uk _ . _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yan _ taaggun _ uugte ukut _ .
S y r a c u s e - m u n _ kaa llu ta _ t a m a a n t u k u t _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qapiighwtagh ukut _ R h e g i u m - e m u n _ kaate lleg mnnun _ kenlanga _ . _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ tamaani _ , _ unaami ani _ anuqataghaaghte te ainkut _ i k e v a g h m e n g _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ P u t e o l i - m u n _ kaate ukut _ .
T a m a a n t e f t u t _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ e l l m e g g n i t e s q i i n k u t _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ . _ taagken _ R o m e - e m u n _ nagnegh ukut _ .
ugpeqagh t _ R o m e - e m e l n g u u t _ nagaqugh luta _ , _ payegh ma kanginkut _ t u n g a n g i t n u n _ akilpegaghvig t _ A p p i u s - m e l n g u u t _ , _ ila ita _ payegh ma kanginkut _ t u n g a n g i t n u n _ pi nga yu t _ aqelqagh lghutagh t _ . _ P a u l - e m _ esghagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ ilutughtekagh _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
R o m e - e m u n _ kaate yamta _ P a u l _ e l l n g i n a g h m e t e s t a a t _ nani _ p i y u k e l g h a n i _ iwerngaqun _ ataasigh m _ p i l l u w a g h t e m _ kelengake a _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ P a u l - e m _ tagsiqligh ai _ J e w s - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t _ . _ tagi yata _ pi a _ , _ " _ J e w - l g u t e m n i _ , _ sa nghite ghngaamki _ yug put _ , _ nalighmeng _ k i p u l l g i n a a n g h i t e g h n g a a m k i _ nangaghnegh it _ sivunegh mta _ , _ paninang _ i g l e g h u t i s t e m t a _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t _ tugu lunga _ tuune aatnga _ R o m e - e g h m i i n u n _ .
A a p q u g h a a g h l u n g a _ sa meng _ apallugh ite yama _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ iteme te na lunga _ pi yagh aatnga _ .
iwernga _ J e w s - e t _ ighleke aatnga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pi aqa _ nanqigte i sta _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ nanqigte sug ni lunga _ . _ U m i i l e g p i g a g h m u n _ s e g h l e q u u g h y a g h t u u n g h i t a n k a _ yug lgute nka _ .
enkaam _ tagsiqligh amsi _ apegh na luki _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ . _ liite sug aqa llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ ataasigh _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ neghyukekagh at _ apallugh ke luku _ q i i p r a g h u s i g h n g a a n g a _ . _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ J u d e a - g h m i i t _ lata tke igate aaten _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ talwa _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m t a _ t a a g e g k e n _ tagi luteng _ ungipagh ke igate aaten _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ akuzi tke igate aaten _ .
whangkuta _ l i i s u g a g h p u t _ elpenun _ sa meng _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ J e s u s - m e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh ut _ nani _ alngunak _ s e g h l e q u u g h a q i i t _ . _ "
taagken _ nakmikegkagh at _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ qerngughte te vig u luku _ . _ taana _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ uglagh pigte luteng _ tagi laghate tke aat _ P a u l - e m _ kiyaghfig anun _ . _ unaagh ghhagh aneng _ unug llegh anun _ kenlanga _ apeghtugh qu ai _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ l i i g i k e s t e n g n g w a a g h n a q u t k e g k i i l l u _ J e s u s - m e n g _ atuqe luki _ liilightuusagh i _ M o s e s - e m _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ igaqegkagh it _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqekagh at _ iwernga _ ila ita _ ugpeqe ma ite kangat _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ . _ nekeve uute aqe ut llu _ aanleghaate na luteng _ P a u l - e m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ipa _ pi ma lghiik _ sivunegh gpesigun _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ I s a i a h - k u n _ .
whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ taku luki _ ukut _ yug t _ whaten _ pi ki _ , _ N a g a s a g h n g a a g h p e s i _ , _ e s g h a p a g n g a a g h p e s i _ liigike naanghite usi _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tawatete ut _ qayughllak _ umyugagh it _ p i n e g h l l u u g t e k a a g u t _ enkaam _ sigute teng llu _ iye teng llu _ saape kaqe ait _ . _ tawatete nghite yagh kumeng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ qiive nayagh ut llu _ whanga mnun _ n a a l l g h u t e s q e l l u t e n g _ . _ ' _ "
P a u l - e m _ taaqe niite te kun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ liigike sug aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ k a y a g t e n g n g w a a q a q i i _ u n g i p a g h t e n i _ u n g i p i i s q e l l u k i _ yuguligh llegh meng _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
tawaten _ P a u l _ pi yan _ J e w s - e t _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag magh meng _ aanleghagh tke aat _ .
maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ P a u l - e m _ kiyaghfig kekagh a _ mangteghagh _ llivike aqe luku _ . _ upugha te aqe kangi _ qamagte luki _ i t e g h t e n i _ ,
tetug gpenani llu _ ungipagh ke aq _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ apeghtugh tkekagh a llu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ kitum _ alngunak _ aghula i aghte ma ite kanga _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ ; _ q e p g h a g h t e k a a n g a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u n g a _ , _ nakmike kaqe aanga llu _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh ni _ .
ayumigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe ai _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m i k u n _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ait _ agleghnagh lghii tgun _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau uq _ umiileg m _ D a v i d - e m _ k i n g u n g h i t g u n _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liigike ste ainkut _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh u uq _ ighnegh a _ . _ taghneghagh m _ i p a p i g h q e g k a q a a _ unguvagh ste luku _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
ellnga kun _ nanglleg ke lleg nge ma unga _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u n g a _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi kaqe aanga _ t u q l i i s q e l l u k i _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ yug i _ ugpeqe sqellug qu llu _ , _ qaatke sqellug qu llu _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a m _ ategh a _ q u u l v a l l e n g e l l e q u q _ .
elpek si llu _ R o m e - e m e l n g u g h n i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ p i k e s q e l l u s i _ .
qamagte lusi _ elpek si _ R o m e - e m e l n g u g h n i _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ke ii te ni _ , _ tuqlugh qite te ni llu _ y u k n a l u s i _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ A t a n g h e m l l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ k a y u s i i l l i s i _ , _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i s i l l i l l u _ .
sivuke luku _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ qayughllak _ ungipagh a _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ mingite u uq _ yug lghute nun _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ungipagh ke na luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekaqe a _ quunpeng _ y u g h a a t k e n g n g u k e m s i _ .
yughagh aqe unga llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ qenwat llu _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghqaa lunga _ .
esghagh yug pigte aqe amsi _ q u y a s t e l l e l i n n a l u s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ i k n a q s u u g t e s q e l l u s i _ .
whaten _ pi u amsi _ : _ qerngagh emta _ kayemughtu tete na luta _ , _ elpek si _ ugpeqe i lleg mkun _ , _ whanga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ liisimake sug amsi _ awen _ laalighfike yug aqe amsi _ iwernga _ s a a m _ quunpeng _ pi nghite ste aqe aanga _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ kayusiite yug anka _ R o m e - e g h m i i t _ u g p e g h e s q e l l u k i _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ ila itnun _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ pilleg mtun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ , _ G r e e k - e n u n l l u _ G r e e k - n g u n g h i l n g u g h n u n l l u _ , _ peghqinegh nun llu _ n a l l u u q a n u n l l u _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ ungipagh ke i yug ghllagu unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun llu _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ R o m e - e m i _ .
kayngu ke igate anka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l q i i _ yuguligh llegh mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ sivuke luteng _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ J e w s - e n u n _ taagken _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ liigike ste ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe ta i _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh inagh itgun _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ . _ katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ N a l l g h u g h q e g k a q _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ neghyuke luku _ ellnga _ . _ "
qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ liigike ste ai _ s a k r i t u t n g u n i l u k i _ , _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ , _ seghletun llu _ p i l l g h i t n u n _ . _ seghletun _ pi llghite a _ liigike nanigh ste ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ i p a p i l l g h a n e n g _ .
sa u a _ yug t _ liisimakekagh at _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a g h u u q _ ellngit nun _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a g h u g h t a a _ ellngit nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima ta aneng _ nuna _ , _ yug t _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h a q a a t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ aghuliigh igate ngughk _ , _ ipallu _ kiyaghnegh u ta a _ . _ qaywa _ yug t _ esghaghpagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ taake uk _ , _ paninang _ liisimake agket _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh akun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ apallugh ite ut _ whaten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ nallukagh ut _ kiyaghnegh lgu ta a _ .
liisimake ghngaaghmegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ q u u l v i i g a t a a t _ kiyaghnegh u luku _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike igate aat llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ kiyaghnegh meng _ sea-te u nanigh kau ut _ , _ umyugagh it llu _ liigike nanigh kau ut _ .
P e g h q i n g h u n i i q u t _ iwernga _ n a l l u u g h t a q u t _ .
enkaam _ manigugh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ yeghlegi _ manigugh aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ , _ qawaagsugnite ngugh t _ , _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ nemeghyaghsugnite ngugh t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ a t u q e s q e l l u k i _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe ait _ yugusigh teng _ anagnga luki _ , _ seghleghqe aqe luteng _ s e x - k u n _ ila meggnun _ ,
qayughllak _ i p a p i l l e q _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ naavghute ma ut _ i q l e n g a m u n _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ manigugh aqe ait llu _ , _ qepghagh te aqe ait llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh i _ , _ avelghagh luku _ ulimaghista _ ellnga _ katam _ . _ ellnga u uq _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ a t u q e s q e l l u k i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ aghnagh t _ s e x - e y u g n a n i g h i i t _ yug t _ , _ yeghlegi _ s e x - e y a g u t u t _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ yug t llu _ s e x - e y u g n a n i g h i i t _ aghnagh t _ , _ yeghlegi _ s e x - e y a g u t e g h l l a g t u t _ yug lgute meggneng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ta itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh ai _ yugusigh itgun _ apallugh ke luki _ anaggute llegh ghllag it _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ sumegh meggni _ sea-te u nghite na iqe aat _ l i i s i m a k i p i i l l e q _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ sea-te u nghite ngugh nun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itnun _ , _ atughqagh ke nghite yagh ka itnun llu _ .
A l l a a g h h i n a g h m e n g _ seghlegh meng _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ , _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ , _ pakignegh u ut _ , _ ugumi ketagh ut llu _ . _ aqinaketagh ut _ , _ yugtagh yuneghtu ut _ , _ p i l l u w a g h y u n e g h t u u t _ , _ puughte i yuneghtu ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ait llu _ ila teng _ seghlegh pigu luki _ . _ yiillgi aqe ut _ ,
seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ait _ ila teng _ . _ ugumi ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ y u k e g h q e n g h u u t _ , _ q u k a a y u g n e g h u u t l u _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ wata _ seghletun _ pi na luteng _ ; _ qaatke te igate ut _ angayuqagh meggnun _ ,
nallu ut _ , _ akequsagh teng _ atuqe igate ait _ , _ nanglleg yug igate ut _ , _ nafugh ta ii te aqe ut llu _ ila meggnun _ .
liisimake ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pi lghiit _ t a w a t e l n g u u t _ yug t _ a l l g e g h s a g h q a q a a n Ê¼ n g u q _ tuqu llegh _ . _ N a g n e g h u t n g i n a g h p e n a k i _ tamaakut _ atuqekagh teng _ , _ talwa _ itagnagh kaqe ait _ tawaten _ pi lghiit _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nanqigte i kuvek _ yug neng _ a n a g n i i l q a v i g i t u t e n _ . _ nanqigte nghpeki _ , _ e l p e n e n g _ nanqigte aqe uten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ qayughllak _ elpek llu _ ellngistun _ pi aqe lghiiten _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nanqigte i aqe uq _ yug neng _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi lghii neng _ , _ liisimakagh ut llu _ nanqigte i llegh i _ elqughute nga ut _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte aqe aten _ anaggute lghiit _ , _ naqamllu _ elpek _ katam _ pi aqe aten _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ anaggute llegh t _ . _ enkaam _ s u m e g h p e n i i _ anag yaghqaa ni luku _ p i z i g u u _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh a _ ?
L i i g i k e n g h i s i g u u _ nangllegtaghtu langa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ aghyuugh aghte igate kangaten _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ qayughllak _ n u q e t u t a q e g k a n g a t e n _ . _ S u m e g h p e n i i - i _ taakut _ sea-te u nghite aat _ ? _ L i i s i m a k e n g h i s i g u u _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aqe kangaten _ qayughllak _ avuteghqe sqe sug kangaten _ ?
iwernga _ elpek _ aleghqugh neghllug u uten _ , _ pineghllug u uten _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ avuteghqe sug igate uten _ . _ E n k a a n g a a m _ elpek _ katam _ ulima u an _ aghyuugh lleg nge lleghqagh n _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a l u k u _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh lleqe ak _ sakraa lleg ni llu _ , _ elqughutngagh lghii llu _ nanqigte i lleg ni _ .
nanqigte lleqe ai _ tamaghhagh ita _ yug t _ a p e g h i i g h u t e l l g h i s t u n _ .
ila i _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh meng _ a l l g e g h s u k a n g i t _ usuqe llegh _ , _ q u u l v a l l e q _ , _ yugusigh llu _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ u n g u v a l l e l i l l e q i i _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ yug t _ e l l n g i n a a y u g n e g h u u t _ . _ ugpeqe yug igate aat _ i p a p i l l e q _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi na luteng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ s a k r i t u t e g h l l a g l u k i _ , _ aghyuugh ghllag lleqe ai _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ nuna mete ngughk _ yuug _ , _ J e w s - a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ s e g h l e l i i g h m e n g l l u _ ikfiqe llegh meng llu _ .
iwernga _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ yuug _ , _ J e w s - a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ pinitun _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe lleqe a _ , _ q u u l v a g h l l e q a a _ , _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i l l e q a a l l u _ .
T a n i i l l n g u n a k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ yug t _ .
G e n t i l e - e t _ a l l g e g h t e l l g h i t i i t _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ M o s e s - m u n _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lghiit _ nalluke luki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh lgu ut _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe gkata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ .
tamaakut _ nagate ghesnagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh igate ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke te lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ n a l l g h u g h q a q i i _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
G e n t i l e - e t _ a l l g e g h t e l l g h i t i i t _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ iwernga _ qaute kete nghmegteki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ qaatke te llghite a _ liilightuusagh leg stun _ ayuqe ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ , _ a l l g e g h t e k a q e n g h i t e g h n g a a g h m e g t e k i _ .
qaatke te llghite a _ yug nun _ liigike ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ liisimake ait _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a llu _ liisimake ste ait _ liilightuusagh t _ ilungite nightu langi _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a _ ilangakun _ anaggute na iqe ait _ nalighmeng _ ilangakun _ itagnagh na iqe ait _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ yug t _ aksaqekagh it _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ apegh aqe aqa _ taana _ u n g i p a q n e m k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
M a a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ lata yug anka _ J e w s - e t _ . _ J e w - n g u k u v e k _ , _ neghyu katen _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ qukaayug uten llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ p i k n i l u t e n _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ liisima kan _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa sqe sug llegh a _ elpenun _ , _ naten llu _ nakmike yaghqaa ta a _ sa u a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ sumegh gpeni _ m a g h y a g h q u g h t e n g u n i i q u t e n _ ayaakagh nun _ , _ nighug u na iqe uten llu _ m a m l e g m e l n g u g h n u n _ .
sumegh gpeni _ n a l l g h u s a g h t e n g u n i i q u t e n _ n a l l u u q a n u n _ , _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e n g u n i i q u t e n g l l u _ taghnughhagh nun _ . _ liilightuusagh lgute gpeneng _ , _ sumegh gpeni _ liisimake ni luku _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi iigh kan _ , _ qamagte luku llu _ i p a p i l l e q _ .
apeghtugh aqe aten _ ila ten _ , _ sangan _ e l p e n e n g _ apeghtugh igate ziin _ ? _ ungipagh kau iqe uten _ , _ " _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ " _ e l p a a - a k _ , _ tegleg qiigate ziin _ ?
pi aqe uten _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ " _ e l p a a k _ , _ gelgaghniigh qiigate ziin _ ? _ ugumi ke pigte aten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ , _ e l p a a k _ , _ tugute niigh qiigate ziin _ temple- nge i te neng _ ?
qukaayug taqu te n _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ni _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite nghpeki _ liilightuusagh t _ q u u l v i i g a t a n _ kiyaghnegh _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ apallugh ke lusi _ elpek si _ J e w s - e n i _ , _ G e n t i l e - e t _ sa ngugh ughte aqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ . _ "
Q a a t k e n g n g u k u f k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h e n _ pinigh uq _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite kufki _ liilightuusagh t _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe uten _ . _ enkaam _ quya ste lleg nge naanghite uten _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ .
gentile- a _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l n g u q _ qaatke te lghii _ qelegh sagh itnun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe a _ nikimqun _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a l u k u _ .
elpek si _ J e w s - e n i _ liilightuusagh lgu usi _ igaqe nga lghii neng _ , _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a g u s i l l u _ , _ taawanginaq _ qaatke igate asi _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ iwernga _ G e n t i l e - e t _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l n g u u t _ , _ qaatke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ enkaam _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
C i r c u m c i s e - e n g i n a g h l u k u _ yug m _ yugusigh a _ J e w - p i g u g h t e s n a a n g h i t a a _ . _ C i r c u m c i s e - e l l e p i i k _ pi igate uq _ yugusigh m _ qaye inagh akun _ .
itupill _ , _ yuug _ J e w - p i i g u u q _ J e w - n g u k u m i _ ilu mikun _ . _ I g h s a q g h w a _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a g u q _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ , _ nakaan _ igaqegkagh tgun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh meng _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ yug neng _ .
sa u a _ a n e g h n e g h q u s i i g w a _ yuug _ allgegh kuni _ J e w - n g u l u n i _ ? _ sa u a _ a n e g h n e g h q u s i i g w a _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l e g h m u n _ ?
uglagh u pigte ut _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh t _ ! _ S i v u l i g h p i g a q _ kiyaghnegh m _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ J e w s - e n u n _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ .
ila i _ ataasiighmete nghite kata _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ a t a a s i i g h m e n n e g h i t e s l e q a t g u u _ ?
yeghlegi llu _ ! _ tamaghhagh mi _ yuug _ iqlengiqe ste u ghngaan _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ipa u uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ akuzi negh gpeni _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ liisimake lleqe aaten _ elqughute nga ni luten _ . _ yug t _ nanqigtegkangaten _ , _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q a t e n _ anaggute nga ni luki _ . _ "
anaggute negh mta _ , _ anaggute lleg mta _ yug t _ l i i g i k e s t e n g n g w a a g h a q i i t _ kiyaghnegh _ elqughute nga ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ pi lleqe sta _ kiyaghnegh _ anaggute ni luku _ aghyuugh kanginkut _ anaggute lleg mnnun _ ? _ ( _ akuzi u unga _ yug stun _ . _ )
tawatete nghite uq _ ! _ kiyaghnegh _ elqughutngagh nghite kan _ , _ naten mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aki _ nuna m _ yug i _ ?
iwernga _ yuug _ pi nayagh lghii _ , _ " _ iqlengiqe llegh ma _ yug t _ usuqe i ste aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ iqlengiqe llegh ma _ aliigh a qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipa u llegh a _ . _ enkaam _ s a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte anga _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lunga _ seghleghqe stetu te _ ? _ "
yuug _ pi nayagh lghii llu _ , _ " _ seghletun _ pi lta _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ seghletun _ pilleg mnneng _ . _ " _ ila i _ yug t _ t e m n g i m e n g _ pi aqe ut _ whangkuta _ apeghtugh i aqe ni luta _ tawaten _ . _ nanqigte lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ , _ aghyuugh lleghqagh megestun _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ J e w s - e n i i _ , _ pinigh aghagh sta _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ apegh u aqe aqe anka _ J e w s - e t l u _ , _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aaghqute aqe luki _ ayuqe ai _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ taawa _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughutngagh nghite uq _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ .
kina _ alngunak _ liigike igate uq _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ivagh igate a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
qamagte luni _ yuug _ tunute kau uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ; _ qamagte luteng _ anaggute kau ut _ ; _ kina _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pi igate uq _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ .
ighsalqagh it _ q e l p a l n g u g h e s t u n _ llivegh stun _ ayuqe ut _ ; _ ulu teng _ atuqe u ait _ p u u g h t i m u n _ , _ qezigh megteggun _ p o i s o n - e l g u u t _ nemeghyagh stun _ ;
q a a n g h i t _ imigh nga ut _ c u r s e - e l l e g h n e n g l l u _ , _ u g u m i k e t i q e l l e g h m e n g l l u _ .
yugtagh i rakegte ut _ ;
navek _ alngunak _ pinegh meggni _ naafqii ste u aqe ut _ , _ s e g h l e l i i g h q i s t e n g w a a q u t l u _ .
nalluke aat _ n e k e g g m e l l u n i _ kiyaghte lleghqagh _ ,
talwa _ alike igate aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ "
liisimake aput _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh leg t _ qaatkesaghqagh ke ait _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ enkaam _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ n e p i i g h q e l l e q i i t _ yug t _ whaten _ pi lleghqagh itneng _ , _ " _ nalluke aput _ sa u ta i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ . _ " _ liilightuusagh t llu _ liigike ste lleqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nanqigte lleqe ni luki _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ .
nanqigtekumiki _ yug t _ nallghusagh naanghite ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ itupill _ liilightuusagh t _ liite ste ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe ste u ni luki _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ liigike ste ai _ nallghusagh lleqe ni luki _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ taana _ liilightuusagh tgun llu _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t g u n l l u _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ taana _ ipa u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpegh lghii nun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ qayughllak _ allake te nghite ut
qamagte luteng _ seghleghqe kau te meggneng _ . _ enkaam _ nuughhute kau ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngugh qun _ tunusagh mikun _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ i t e m u t i s t e n g i t g u n _ , _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ aghqe te u luku _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ aaw akun _ seghevute aqe ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ ugpeqe i nga lghiit _ ellnga kun _ . _ tawaten _ liigike stekaqe a _ elqughute nga ni luni _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ agani _ kiyaghnegh m _ n u q e t u t k a q i i _ yug t _ enkaam _ nepiigh te kaqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh it _ .
iwernga _ uumi _ pi llegh mi _ i p a p i g h q a a _ elqughute nga ni luni _ nallghusagh llegh mikun _ alngunak _ yuug _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ apallugh ke luki _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
enkaam _ sangaawa _ qukaayug te kete yaghqagh ut _ ? _ qukaayug te kaghqagh ite ukut _ ! _ Q u k a a y u g g n a a n g h i t e s t a a _ qayughllak _ qaute kete naqutke ke put _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kangi _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ J e s u s - k u n _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
enkaam _ liigikagh ut _ yuug _ nallghusagh kau uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te llegh kun _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ J e w s - n g i n a g h h a a t _ K i y a g h n e q a t g u u _ ? _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ K i y a g h n e q e n g h i t a t g u u _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ ,
ataasigh ghhagh u ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ enkaam _ nallghusagh lleqe ai _ J e w s - e t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ , _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ .
liilightuusagh at _ sea-te u nanighqe stekagh i _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ ugpeqe i lleg mta _ qaatke sug ste aqe ai _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh tke ait _ .
S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ pi lleqe sta _ A b r a h a m - e m e n g _ , _ sivunegh mnneng _ whangkuta _ J e w s - e n i _ ? _ sa meng _ liite kau a _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe u kagu _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ s a l l g h a k u n _ , _ sa meng _ qukaayug sighqagh lgu nayagh uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qukaayug tkepagningite ai _ salleg ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughutngagh lghii u luku _ . _ "
yuug _ qepghagh llegh mineng _ akileghtuusagh nge kayugu uq _ . _ akileghtuusagh a _ tunusagh u nghite uq _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a a _ qepghagh te luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh naanghite a _ yuug _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qepghagh te i llegh akun _ ellmi nun _ . _ itupill _ yug m _ neghyuke yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ nallghusagh i kayug _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n e n g _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ .
umiileg m _ D a v i d - e m _ igaqe kaqe a _ taana _ ataasigh _ . _ pi kau uq _ yug t _ q u y a s t e p i k a a n i l u k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe yaki _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ avelghagh luki _ qepghagh te i llegh it _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
" _ quya stekau ut _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ segheve tke ai _ , _ anaggute llegh it _ saapekagh i _ !
quya stekau uq _ yuug _ seghleghqe llegh i _ A t a n g h e m _ sumeghmike nanigh kangi _ . _ "
taana _ quya ste llegh _ D a v i d - e m _ akuzi tkekagh a _ , _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a g h h i i n a g h n u n _ pi u a _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ C i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l n g u g h n u n l l u _ pi u uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ . _ "
qavngaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh qagh kagu _ ? _ sivungagh ni _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h a a n _ nalighmeng _ kingu aneng _ ? _ sivungagh ni _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h a n _ , _ nakaan _ kingu aneng _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ abraham _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a g u q _ . _ C i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h a _ nalluniilkutagh u uq _ i p a p i g h q u s i i l u n i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe kanga _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh akun _ . _ salin _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l l u k u _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ abraham _ ata u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i t e g h n g a a t a _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh ma ai _ elqughute nga luki _ .
A b r a h a m - l l u _ ata ke aat _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a t _ . _ taana _ ipa u uq _ t a a w a n g i n a g h h a q _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kumeng _ A b r a h a m - e t u n _ , _ salin _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l l u k u _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe ai _ A b r a h a m - e n k u t _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ i i n g u n a g h h a a n _ nuna _ ellngit nun _ pagi lleqe ni luku _ . _ akequsagh ke llghite a _ taana _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ qayughllak _ qaatke kangi _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ itupill _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe a _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kanga _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ elqughute nga luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ tuune yaghqaa yagh kan _ qaatke te lghii nun _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ taawa _ ugpeqe i llegh _ sea-te u nghite uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ akequsagh a _ sea-te u nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh _ sakrite aqe uq _ yug t _ qaatke te nghite nghata _ liilightuusagh nun _ tuunekagh anun _ M o s e s - m u n _ . _ iwernga _ liilightuusagh ite yagh kan _ taawa _ yug t _ qaatke te nghite sagh ite nayagh ut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ yug t _ allgegh aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ aki ite ngugh u luku _ tunusagh _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ A b r a h a m - e m _ k i n g u n g h i t a _ a l l g e g h t e p e s t a a g h l l e q a a t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ taana _ akequsagh _ J e w s - n g i n a g h h a g h n u n _ ayuqe nghite uq _ liilightuusagh leg nun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i lghii nun llu _ ayuqe uq _ A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe i llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ abraham _ qamagte luta _ atakagh ut _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ ata ughte ste amken _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ nuna t _ yug itnun _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ akeqe kaqe a _ abraham _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuqukagh neng _ u n g u v a g h t i k a y u k _ , _ qelegh i llegh mikun llu _ ulima te kayug _ sa meng _ sa ite ngugh meng _ .
A b r a h a m - e m _ avaquti lleghqagh a _ sighima niite kau uq _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ sighimake manginagh kaqe a llu _ . _ enkaam _ ata ughtekau uq _ uglagh u pigte lghii nun _ nuna t _ yug itnun _ . _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ kingunegh ten _ kestepagningite yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
A b r a h a m - e m _ nulighh a _ , _ sarah _ , _ qumingepagningite kau lghii _ . _ ellnga _ abraham _ 1 0 0 _ ayumiqulleghtu tekagh ligh yaghtugh luni _ , _ t u q u m u n _ t u g h a a g h u l g h i i _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ sumegh ke ghngaaghmiki _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ukavagh ma ite ngughk _ .
ugpeqe i nanigh mangite uq _ talwa _ aygughike mangite a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh igh aghaghkagh _ , _ usuqekagh a llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
A b r a h a m - e m _ i p a p i g h q u t k e n g n g w a a q a q a a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pi yaghqaqe ni luku _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ t u g u q l i q a q a a _ elqughute nga luku _ , _ " _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ .
taakut _ akuzite t _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ t u g u q l i q a q a a _ elqughute nga luku _ , _ " _ igaqe kau ut _ nakaan _ A b r a h a m - n g i n a g h m u n _ ,
iwernga _ igaqe kau ut _ w h a n g k u n n u n l l u _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe ainkut _ elqughute nga luta _ qayughllak _ u g p e q e g k e f u t _ ellnga _ . _ ellnga u uq _ J e s u s - m e n g _ atanegh mnneng _ unguvagh ste ikagh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ t u q u m a t k e s q e l l u k i _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ u n g u v a g h t e k a q a a l l u _ nallghusagh na luta _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nallghusagh kau te mnneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ , _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ J e s u s - e m _ kiyaghte ste ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh ani _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu ukut _ qayughllak _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nengigh ste lleqe ainkut _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m i n e n g _ .
T a a m _ saaghw akun _ quya aqe ukut _ seghleliigh lleg mnni _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh ut _ seghleliigh llegh m _ nuqete neghtu lleg ngestagh ke ainkut _ .
nuqete neghtu lleg mteggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ itagnagh kaqe ainkut _ . _ itagnagh ke igh llegh an _ sighima lleg ngestagh ke ainkut _ .
T a a m _ sighima llegh m _ i i l q a m i q n a a n g h i t i i n k u t _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ kuuve kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ qamavek _ ilu mnnun _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh mikun _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
yugulighpag nigh nge i llu ta _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ , _ tawani _ p i l l e g h q a g h l l u w a a g h m i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ani _ .
entaqun _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh inagh t _ tuquma tke i yug nayagh ut _ elqughutngagh lghii mun _ yug mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ entaqun _ kina _ tuquma tke i yug nayagh uq _ pinigh lghii mun _ yug mun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ paninang _ seghleghqe ste u luta _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuquma tke kaqe ainkut _ !
N a l l u n e q n i i g h a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh ma ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ C h r i s t - a m _ aaw akun _ . _ N a l l u n e q n i i g h a t a g h a g h a g h p u t _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ukut _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ .
whangkuta _ kiyaghnegh m _ anguyag ke yagh ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ ilaliigh kaqe ainkut _ tuqu llegh akun _ ighnegh mi _ . _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilakumtaagh ke ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ n a l l u n e q n i i g h a t a g h a g h a g h p u t _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ukut _ C h r i s t - a m _ unguvallegh akun _ !
T a a m _ saaghw akun _ , _ quya ghllagu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ ellnga u uq _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ilaliigh te ste i lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Y u k s u w h a a q _ , _ adam _ , _ seghleghqe aqngan _ , _ seghleghqe llegh an _ tuqu llegh _ itegh stekaqe a _ nuna mun _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ qayughllak _ qamagte luni _ seghleghqe kau uq _ .
seghleghqe lleg lgu kau uq _ nuna mi _ salin _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune llghite luki _ liilightuusagh t _ M o s e s - m u n _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte llghite ai _ yug t _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ qayughllak _ L i i l i g h t u s i i l n g u q _ .
paninang _ yug t _ kiyaghtekau ut _ ima _ A d a m - e m e n g _ M o s e s - m u n _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ , _ maligte te luteng _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh it _ A d a m - e m _ seghleghqe llegh atun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh t _ . _ adam _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ ayuqe uq _ , _ tagi yaghqagh tun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ A d a m - e m _ seghleghqe llegh atun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ ipa u uq _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ yug t _ tuqu kau ut _ apallugh ke luku _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ seghleghqe llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ . _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a a t _ kiyaghnegh m _ a q e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i _ aki ite ngughk _ tunusagh a _ , _ piniqe llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
allake te ghllag uk _ , _ A d a m - e m _ seghleghqe llegh a llu _ , _ tunusagh a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ kingu aneng _ adam _ seghleghqe aqngan _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ . _ iwernga _ kingu itneng _ yug lghute ghllag t _ seghleghqe aqngata _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngugh qun _ tunusagh mikun _ nallghusagh stekaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
ataasigh _ yuug _ seghleghqe kau uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ tuqu llegh m _ igleghte te ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ iwernga _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ aange aghagh uq _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ . _ enkaam _ allgegh te lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ kemnagh pigte lghii meng _ piniqe llegh aneng _ , _ tunusagh aneng llu _ elqughutngagh llegh aneng _ , _ qamagte luteng _ igleghte te i lleqe ut _ kiyaghte llegh mi _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
apallugh ke luku _ A d a m - e m _ ataasigh _ seghleghqe llegh a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ apallugh ke luku _ C h r i s t - a m _ ataasigh _ elqughutngagh lghii _ p i l l g h a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ , _ tuune ai llu _ unguvallegh meng _ .
qaatke te nghite llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ , _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ seghleghqe ste ngughte kau ut _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ , _ qaatke te llegh akun _ ataasigh m _ yug m _ , _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ yug t _ nallghusagh yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ .
liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ M o s e s - m u n _ yug t _ liite yaaghagh ste ait _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ iwernga _ yug t _ seghleghqe aghagh yata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ nula inaghkagh _ .
seghleghqe llegh m _ igleghte te kaqe ai _ yug t _ tuqu llegh kun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ igleghte te u ai _ yug t _ nallghusagh llegh mikun _ ellngit _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ allgegh aat _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ atanegh mteggun _ .
S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ S e g h l e g h q u m a n g i n a a l t a a - a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ nula sqellug qu _ ?
nakaa _ ! _ qayughllak _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu kau kumta _ naten _ seghleghqe manginagh naqe sta _ ?
liisimakagh i _ , _ qamagte luta _ p a a p t a a y a a q n g a m t a _ ilate kau ukut _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ . _ I l a t k a a g u t k u t l u _ tuqu llegh anun _ p a a p t a a y a a q n g a m t a _ .
paaptaaye lleg mteggun _ tuqu qagh u ukut llu _ q u n g u k a a g u k u t l u _ C h r i s t - a m i _ . _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h l l a g m i k u n _ ata m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a q a a _ C h r i s t - a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe ukut _ k i y a g h t a a l l e l i g h r a g h a g h l u t a _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ilate ma kanginkut _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ tuqu llegh akun _ , _ taagken _ ilate ste pestaagh lleqe ainkut llu _ ellnga nun _ unguvagh ste luta _ ellnga tun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ w h a n g k u t e l u g u y a l g h i i t _ qaquuragh te kau ut _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ i g l e q a t a q n a n i i s q e l l u t a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n u n _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n a n i g h n a l u t a l l u _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
yuug _ tuqu nghmini _ iteme aqe uq _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g _ seghleghqe llegh m _ .
tuquma kumta _ C h r i s t - a m i _ , _ ugpeqagh ut _ k i y a g h t e l g u s i g h y a g h q a q a g h p u t l u _ ellnga _ .
liisimakagh ut _ C h r i s t - a _ unguvagh stekau uq _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ allameng llu _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite uq _ qayughllak _ tuqu llegh _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite lghii ii te kau uq _ ellnga nun _ .
ataasigh ghhagh meng _ tuqu kau uq _ k a y a a l q e n n a l u k u _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ iwernga _ unguva te mineng _ , _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ sumeghtaghagh tek _ tuqu kau lusi _ seghleghqe llegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n u n _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tek llu _ unguva u lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ i g l e q a t a q e s t e g p e n a k i _ yugusigh si _ tuqu kayug t _ . _ seghleghqe llegh m _ i g l e q a t a q e g k a k i _ yugusigh si _ , _ qaatke sug lleqe asi _ yugusigh gpesi _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh i _ .
alngunak _ nalighnegh i _ yugusigh gpesi _ tuune gpenaki _ seghleghqe sigh u luki _ , _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ tuune lleqe asi _ seghlegh mun _ . _ itupill _ tuune tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a q i i s i _ . _ enkaam _ tuune teki _ iingunagh ita _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ellnga nun _ a t u q e s q e l l u k i _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ .
seghleghqe llegh m _ i g l e q a t a q n a a n g h i t i i s i _ qayughllak _ i g l e q a t a q n g w i i s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ ; _ i g l e q a t a q n g u n g h i t i i s i _ liilightuusagh t _ .
enkaam _ sa naqe sta ngam _ ? _ itagnaghtaa- a _ seghleghqe lleghqagh ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh an _ i g l e q a t a q n g u k a n g i n k u t _ nakaan _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ itagnagh nghite uq _ !
liisima kaqe usi _ tuune gkufsi _ kitumun _ qaatkesaghqagh u luku _ , _ taawa _ ellnga n _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a q a a g h l l e q i i s i _ . _ qaatke gkufsigu _ seghleghqe llegh _ , _ tuqu ste lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke gkufsigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nallghusagh lleqe aisi _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u y a g h t u s i _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ maaten _ q a m a k e r u g l l a k _ qaatke kesi _ apeghtugh te yagh ragh aat _ apeghtuusagh kekagh t _ elpesi nun _ .
iteme te kau usi _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ enkaam _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h t e k a a g u s i _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ .
tamaakut _ liigike neghllug ta itneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ uspute aqe u anka _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t l u _ p i l i i t e s t e n g i t l u _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ tuune kayugu yagh asi _ yugusigh si _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u l u k i _ nukeggnagh lghii nun llu _ nula manginagh lghii nun llu _ seghletun _ pi llegh nun _ . _ maaten _ tuune teki _ yugusigh si _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u l u k i _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u s i _ pelungite lusi _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h w a a q n g a f s i _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ i g l e q a t a q e l l g h i t i i s i _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghletun _ pi kau usi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ k a y n g u k a a g h t a s i _ tamaakut _ seghletun _ pi kasi _ . _ sangaawa _ a l l g e g h t e k a g h s i _ tamaakut _ pi luki _ ? _ A l l g e g h t e k a q a g h s i _ t u q u l l g h i i n a g h h a q _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ iteme te lusi _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h t e k a a g u s i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ p e l u n g i i g h t e s i m i i s i _ , _ allgegh tesi ma aisi llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
akileghtuusagh a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqu llegh u uq _ ; _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aki ite ngughk _ tunusagh a _ kenle ite ngugh u uq _ unguvallegh _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ atanegh mteggun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ lata amsi _ liisimake i lghii ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ enkaam _ liigike asi _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh aqe ait _ yug t _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u k i _ .
ugu i iqe aq _ aghnagh _ usputagh u uq _ . _ liilightuusagh m _ qelegh llegh ani _ aghnagh _ u g i m i n i s a g h q a a g u q _ tagtale atun _ ugi mi _ kiyaghte llegh an _ . _ iwernga _ tuqu kan _ ugi ni _ , _ taawa _ iteme lleqe uq _ liilightuusagh aneng _ nengughte llegh m _ .
iwernga _ , _ ugi ni _ unguva luku _ alla mi _ yug mi _ kiyaghtekuni _ gelgaghni ii aghte u luni _ atigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ ugi a _ tuquma kan _ , _ iteme lleqe uq _ taagken _ liilightuusagh meng _ . _ gelgaghniigh u nghite uq _ ugiigh nqigtekuni _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ elpek si llu _ iteme ma usi _ liilightuusagh neng _ qayughllak _ tuqu kau usi _ C h r i s t - a m i _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi ke aisi _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
sivugh nghaani _ qaatke aqe aput _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh mta _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe i ste sug aqe ainkut _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe gkumteki _ tuqu ste lleqe ainkut _ .
sivugh nghaani _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe yagh ukut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ tuqu kau te mnneng _ C h r i s t - a m i _ , _ iteme te kau ukut _ qaatke te yaghqaa lleg mnneng _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ enkaam _ q e p g h a a t n g w a a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvalleghraghagh mteggun _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ , _ nakaan _ unguvallegh lug mteggun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ .
S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ liilightuusagh at _ seghleghqe llegh u aat _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ liite stekaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ seghleghqe llegh t _ sa u ta i _ . _ liite nayagh nghite aqa _ qiliiqetu iqe llegh _ sa u ta a _ liilightuusagh _ whaten _ qelegh i mangite yagh kan _ , _ " _ qiliiqetu iqe gpenang _ . _ "
iwernga _ atuqe luku _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ , _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ qiliigh ketagh ngllagh kaqe aanga _ . _ liilightuusagh ngunateng _ seghleghqe llegh t _ tuqu u aat _ .
sivugh nghaani _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u y a g h t u n g a _ liilightuusagh ngunaan _ ; _ iwernga _ liisagh kegka _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ , _ seghleghqe llegh _ unguvagh luni _ enkaam _ tuqu unga _ .
qelegh sagh _ unguva ste i yaghqaa yagh lghii _ whanga mnun _ , _ yeghlegi _ tuqu ste aanga _ .
taaggun _ qelegh sagh kun _ , _ seghleghqe llegh m _ p u u g h s a q l e g u g h t a a n g a _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe luku _ qelegh sagh _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqute aanga _ .
iwernga _ liilightuusagh t _ agleghnagh lghii u ut _ , _ qelegh sagh llu _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ , _ elqughute nga uq llu _ , _ pinigh uq llu _ .
T a a m _ qelegh sagh m _ pinigh lghii m _ , _ tuqu ta nge a _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqute aanga _ atuqe luku _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ . _ enkaam _ legh igh iitagh ut _ qelegh sagh kun _ seghleghqe llegh _ elngaatall _ seghlegh pigu uq _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ iwernga _ maghyaghqugh u nghite aanga _ taghneghagh m _ . _ M a g h y a g h q u u n g w a a n g a _ yugusigh ma _ piyuke llegh an _ , _ enkaam _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u u n g a _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
liigike igate aqa _ sa aqe tke a _ qayughllak _ atuqe igate aqa _ sa u a _ atuqe yu kaqe a _ . _ itupill _ atuqe aqe aqa _ sa u a _ ugumi ke kaqe a _ .
iwernga _ atuqe gkumki _ ugumi kekagh nka _ atuqe yu nghite ghngaamki _ , _ taawa _ itagnagh kaqe anka _ liilightuusagh t _ pinigh ta i _ .
enkaam _ whanga u nghite uq _ tawaten _ pi aqe lghii _ , _ itupill _ seghleghqe llegh _ ilu mnite ngughk _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ .
liisimake aqa _ avangite unga _ pinigh lghii meng _ ilu mni _ , _ yugusigh mni _ . _ pinitun _ piyug aqe yagh ghngaaghma _ , _ pipagningite aqa _ .
pi igate aqa _ pinigh lghii _ piyuke kaqe a _ , _ yeghlegi _ seghlegh _ pi aqe aqa _ p i y u k e n g h i t k a q a _ .
enkaam _ p i y u k e n g h i t k a q a _ pinegh mkun _ , _ taawa _ whanga u nghite uq _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ . _ itupill _ seghleghqe llegh u aqe uq _ ilu mnite ngughk _ tawaten _ pi aqe lghii _ .
enkaam _ liite aqa _ taana _ : _ pinitun _ p i n a q e g h n g a g h m a _ , _ paninang _ seghlegh _ t a w a n t a q u q _ .
Q a a m k e r u g l l a k _ p i n i g h y u u g u s i q a n k a _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
iwernga _ liite aqa _ taawa _ ila a _ liilightuusagh _ yugusigh mnite uq _ . _ P i l l u w a q a n g i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ umyugagh ma _ i t a g n a q e g k i i _ . _ liilightuusagh m _ y u g u s i m n i l n g u u m _ seghleghqe ste aqe aanga _ , _ enkaam _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe unga _ tea- mete te _ liilightuusagh mun _ .
S e g h l e g h w a a g h u u n g a _ ! _ kitum ngam _ iteme te lleqe anga _ whaken _ yugusigh meng _ tuqu ste i yaghqagh meng _ whanga mneng _ ?
iyamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ i t e m u s k a n g a n g a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ atanegh mteggun _ ! _ E n k a a n g a m _ qaatke anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ umyugagh mkun _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh mkun _ qaatke aqa _ liilightuusagh _ seghleghqe ste i lghii _ whanga mneng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kinku t _ alngunak _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ ilate kau kata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ai _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ .
qayughllak _ liilightuusagh an _ taghneghagh m _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i l g h i i m _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ iteme te kaqe aanga _ liilightuusagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh m llu _ tuqu llegh m llu _ .
M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh i _ tawaten _ pipagningite ut _ qayughllak _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llghite a _ k a y a a l e g h q e g k a q i i _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ liilightuusagh t _ pipag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ kayagtekaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ seghleghqe ma lghii tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe luku _ . _ tuune kaqe a _ ighnegh ni _ aghqe te u luku _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ . _ tawaten _ nanqigtekaqe a _ seghleghqe llegh _ yugusigh mete luku _ ,
w h a n g k u n n u n _ q a a t k e s a q l e g u g h t e s q e l l u k i _ liilightuusagh t _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ qelegh sagh i _ . _ W h a n g k u n g u u t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luta _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ nakaan _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh itnun _ .
tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh itnun _ , _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g i n a g h a q i i t _ piyuke lleg teng _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g i n a g h a q i i t _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh i _ .
umyugagh put _ malighqutagh ke gkata _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ iwernga _ umyugagh put _ malighqutagh ke gkata _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a l l e l i l l e q i i n k u t l u _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i l l e q i i n k u t l u _ .
umyugagh put _ m a l i g h q u t a q e n g h a t a _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ a n g u y a g w a a q u k u t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ qaatke igate ke put _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ ipa _ qaatkepagningite aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
tamaakut _ malighqutagh ke nga lghiit _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh anun _ e f q u g h t e p a g n i n g i t a a t _ kiyaghnegh _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ i g l e q a t a q n g u n g h i t i i s i _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh an _ . _ I g l e q a t a q n g w i i s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ , _ qayughllak _ ipa _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l g h i i _ ilu gpesini _ . _ C h r i s t - a m _ taghneghagh kek _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u n g h i l k a y e k _ ilu ani _ yug m _ , _ pike nghite a _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
yugusigh si _ tuqu naqngu ut _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ iwernga _ C h r i s t - a _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u k a n _ ilu gpesini _ , _ taawa _ taghneghagh m _ u n g u v a l l e l i l l e q i i s i _ , _ qayughllak _ C h r i s t - a m _ nallghusagh stekaqe aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ u n g u v a g h t i k a k _ J e s u s - m e n g _ , _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u k _ ilu gpesini _ . _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh ste llegh atun _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ unguvagh ste lleqe ai _ yugusigh si _ taghneghagh gmikun _ k i y a g h l l e g h h i i g n e k u n _ ilu gpesini _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ , _ nakaan _ yugusigh mta _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ .
K i y a g h t e n g n g u k u f s i _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ tuqu lleqe usi _ . _ iwernga _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ tuqute kufsiki _ yugusigh gpesi _ s e g h l e g h q e n g Ê¼ n g a l g h i i t _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghte lleqe usi _ .
qayughllak _ tamaakut _ maghyaghqugh qu ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ai _ .
taghneghagh m _ a l l g e g h t e k a g h p e s i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h t e s n e q i g g n a a n g h i t i i s i _ alinge llegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ taghneghagh m _ kiyaghnegh mun _ avaqutagh ke ste aisi _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ t u q l u g h a g h a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ A b b a _ ! _ A t a a y _ ! _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ e l l m e g n e n g _ ilate kau uk _ taghneghagh mnnun _ ungipaate na luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ avaqutagh ke ni luta _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ p a g i t i s t e k i i n k u t _ , _ C h r i s t - a m l l u _ pagite i ste lgutke ainkut _ . _ N i g h u g h q e l l e n g e l l e q u k u t _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ ikfiqe gkumta _ C h r i s t - a m _ ikfiqe llegh atun _ .
sume mni _ ikfiqe lleg put _ unguvallegh mnni _ inglutepagningite ut _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliighte yaghqagh anun _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
ulima uq _ qamagte luni _ utaqa i u uq _ qelanegh lleg ligh luni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a l i i g h t e s q e l l u k i _ kinku u ta i _ avaquti a _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe a _ ulima uq _ aghyugh yaghqaa luku _ enkaam _ atugh u nanigh ste a _ . _ ulima uq _ n a n q i g t e s u n g h i t k a a g u q _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ piyuke kaqe a _ . _ naqamllu _ paninang _ sighima lleg lgu uq
qayughllak _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te lleqe a _ ulima uq _ aghu llegh meng _ . _ taagken _ ulima uq _ ila lleqe uq _ iteme nga llegh ghllag itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh itnun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ iingunagh mi _ ulima uq _ n g i l l e g t e n g n g u u q _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ ighni yu lghii m _ .
iwernga _ ulimaagh ghhagh u i naanghite uq _ ngillegte lghii _ , _ whangkuta llu _ n g i l l e g t e n g n g u u k u t _ . _ W h a n g k u n g u u k u t _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi leg ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ t u n u s a q s u g w h a a g h a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ N g i l l e g t e n g n g u u k u t l u _ ilu mteggun _ utaqa i ma luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a l l u g h q i s q e l l u t a _ avaqutagh u luta _ ellnga nun _ , _ i t e m u t e s q e l l u k i l l u _ yugusigh put _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ .
taaggun _ sighima llegh kun _ y u g u l i k a a g u k u t _ . _ iwernga _ a l l g e g h s i m a k u m t e g g u _ sighimakekagh ut _ , _ taawa _ sighima llegh u nghite uq _ . _ yug t _ sighima igate ut _ sa meng _ a l l g e g h t e n g n g w a a q a m e g g n e n g _ .
iwernga _ sighima ma kumta _ sa meng _ a l l g e g h t e k a q e n g h i l k e m n n e n g _ , _ u t a q a l l e q a g h p u t _ qelanegh gpenaamta _ .
