T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ taghneghagh m _ kayusigh aqe ainkut _ kayaate lleg mnni _ , _ qayughllak _ nalluke lghiikut _ naten _ yughagh lleghqagh ke yagh ke mtestun _ . _ iwernga _ taghneghagh m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yughagh te aqe ainkut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ngillegte llegh ghllag kun _ akuzite u na an _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake ai _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ . _ liisimake ai llu _ sumeghtaghagh llegh i _ taghneghagh m _ , _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh m _ yughagh te kaqe ai _ yug i _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe luki _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ qepghagh ste aqe ai _ qerngagh ita _ pinighqe lleghqagh itnun _ p i n i q i s t e m i _ . _ E l l n g i n g u u t _ tuqlugh qu ai _ uspeqe llegh mitun _ .
T a m a a k u n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kestaghkagh i _ . _ aaftekaqe ai llu _ ighnegh mitun _ l l i i g h e s q e l l u k i _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ighnegh ni _ allgegh yuwhaagh ma sqellug qu _ a n g l e g u t e l g h u t a n g a n e n g _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekagh ni _ tuqlugh kaqe ai _ . _ tamaakut llu _ tuqlughkagh ni _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ nallghusaghkagh ni _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ q u u l v a q a q i i _ .
S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ pi naqe steggu _ una _ ? _ kiyaghnegh _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ayuqe u kan _ , _ kitum ngam _ t e n g v i m u n _ pi lleqe inkut _ ?
ighleke mangite a _ ellmi _ katam _ ighnegh ni _ ; _ itupill _ tuune kaqe a _ aghqe te u luku _ tea- ma ghhagh mnnun _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kanginkut _ ighnegh mineng _ , _ taawa _ ellnga kun _ ighleg gpenani _ tuune lleqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
kitum ngam _ anaggute ni lleqe aki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yug t _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ anaggute llghite ni kaqe ai _ !
kina ngam _ pi lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nanqigte yaghqaa ni luki _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ ? _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ pi lleqe agu _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ tuquma tke ikagh _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a g u q l u _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ maaten _ yughagh te kaqe ainkut _ aqume luni _ aghenqignegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
S a a m n g a m _ iqite ste lleqe inkut _ piniqe llegh aneng _ C h r i s t - a m _ ? _ S e g h l e l i i l l g h a a m _ , _ p i y a q l i i l l g h a a m _ , _ a m y u q e t a a t k e l l g h a a m _ , _ p a n e g h n i q e l l g h a a m _ , _ a k l u m a l l g h a a m _ , _ y a k u g h n a a m _ , _ nalighmeng _ t u q u t e l l g h a a m _ ?
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ elpek _ apallugh ke luten _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ yug t _ tuqute yug aqe ainkut _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh meggni _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe na iqe ainkut _ tuqute yaghqagh t _ . _ "
iwernga _ tamaakut _ qamagte luki _ k a y a a l q e n g n g w a a q a q a p u t _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ p i n i q i s t e m t e g g u n _ .
L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a q a _ s a a m _ alngunak _ iqite snaanghite ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ : _ talwa _ tuqu llegh m _ , _ unguvallegh m _ , _ yaquleg t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh- t _ . _ talwa _ sa u a _ sa ghngaan _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ sivu mi _ agani _ , _ nalighmeng _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e t _ .
talwa _ sa u aat _ qule mnni _ nalighmeng _ asi mnni _ . _ ulimaagh mi _ i q i t e s t i y a g h q a q r a g g i i t u q _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ atanegh mteggun _ .
apegh yug kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ ipa u uq _ . _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ qayughllak _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi ke aanga _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m llu _ igleghte te u ak _ umyugagh gka _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ whaten _ : _ qivghu ghllagu unga _ qayughllak _ q a a m g g u r u g l l a k _ ilu mkun _ naange igate ngugh meng _ a q n i g h q u t k e g h l l a g w a a n k a
yug lgute nka _ , _ J e w s - e t _ . _ piyaqleg u yagh kan _ , _ ellngit _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m tuq _ nanqigtegkanganga _ aghyuugh na lunga _ , _ iqite stegkanganga llu _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
yug lgute nka _ I s r a e l - e m _ kingunegh ke ai _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ allughqi kaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ avaqutagh u luki _ . _ aliightekaqe a _ n i g h u g h q e l l e n i _ ellngit nun _ . _ A k e q u u q a q i i _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ ellngit nun _ . _ tuune kaqe ai _ liilightuusagh mineng _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ maniguute lleghqagh meng _ elqughute luki _ . _ A k e q u u q a q i i l l u _ quya ste lleqe ni luki _ q a a t k e g k a n g a t n i _ .
kingunegh ke ait _ s i v u n e q s u w h a a m t a _ , _ t a a k u t g u n _ k i n g u n e g h t e g g u n _ C h r i s t - a _ allgegh kau uq _ yugu luni _ . _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ igleghte te i lghii _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ usuqe lleg nge i _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
K i y a g h n e g h a a m _ akequsagh ni _ pi mangite agu _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ akequsagh ni _ pika qaa _ ellngit nun _ , _ iwernga _ ila inagh ghhagh i _ k i n g u n g h i _ I s r a e l - e m _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i p i g u u t _ .
ila inagh ghhagh i llu _ A b r a h a m - e m _ k i n g u n g h i _ ellnga n _ a v a q u t a p i i k i i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ abraham _ whaten _ , _ " _ K i n g u n g h e t _ elpenun _ akequsagh nka _ I s a a c - e k u n _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ ila i _ avaqutagh t _ allgeghkagh t _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ avaqutagh ke nghite ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ iwernga _ allgeghkagh ghhagh inagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh akun _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ k i n g u n e p i i k i i _ A b r a h a m - e m _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ whatete uq _ , _ " _ ayumiqun _ uteghnigh kuma _ whaten _ lliigh kan _ sarah _ ighnegh nge lleqe uq _ . _ "
taana _ S a r a h - m _ ighnegh a _ I s a a c - n g u u q _ , _ sivunegh ut _ . _ nulightugh luni _ R e b e c c a - m e n g _ , _ ata ke ak _ malghi k _ ighnegh gkenka _ R e b e c c a - m _ .
talwa _ salin _ allgegh llghite lukek _ , _ salin llu _ pi igate lukek _ pinigh lghii meng _ nalighmeng _ seghlegh meng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ rebecca _ , _ " _ N u y e k l i i m _ qepghagh u lleqe a _ uyuqligh _ . _ " _ atanegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liigike sqellug qu _ ellnginagh mi _ n a k m i i g h t e n g u n i l u n i _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ taana _ ighnegh _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh yukagh a _ . _ nakmike kaqe nghite a _ qayughllak _ t a a m _ ighnegh m _ sa u a _ pi kaqe ta aneng _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ piniqe kaqe aqa _ Jacob _ , _ naqam _ ugumi ke kaqe aqa _ E s a u _ . _ "
S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ pi naqe steggu _ taana _ ? _ kiyaghnegh _ anaggute a _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ !
qayughllak _ moses _ whaten _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ nangllegtagh lleqe unga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ n a n g l l e q s a g h q a m n u n _ ; _ nafughtagh lleqe unga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nafuqe yaghqagh mnun _ . _ "
E n k a a n g a m _ yug t _ a l l g e g h t e p a g n i n g i t a a t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ piyuke luku _ nalighmeng _ sa llegh megteggun _ . _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ nakmiigh yaghqagh _ nanglleg ke yaghqagh minun _ .
akuzite ni _ I g a k e g k a n i _ igaqe nga uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ pharaoh _ whaten _ , _ " _ umiileg ughte stekaqe amken _ kelgute na luku _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l q a _ elpegun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ungipagh ke lleqe aat _ ategh ka _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kayugu a _ kina _ alngunak _ piyukekagh ni _ , _ p i n e g h l l u u g t e s t a q a a l l u _ kina _ alngunak _ piyukekagh ni _ .
enkaam _ a a p l e q a g h p e n g a _ whaten _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ tawatete u kan _ , _ s a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ nanqigte lleqe aki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ aygugh ii nagh yaghqaqe nghite a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ "
iwernga _ kina u ziin _ , _ yug mi _ , _ v e g h u s n a a s k e n _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ qiku meng _ ulimaagh m _ sagnegh m _ aapte igate a _ u l i m a s t e n i _ whaten _ , _ " _ sangama _ whatete lunga _ ulima zinga _ ? _ "
yug m _ qiku meng _ s a g n e n g l l a g h t e m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ atuqe yaghqaqe a _ qiku _ . _ ulima yu kumikek _ maalghug _ ataasigh meng _ qiku meng _ pi yaghqaqe ak _ , _ aag llegh a _ megnu nagh lghii mun _ atugh u luku _ , _ ila a _ sa mun _ alngunak _ atugh u luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute yu kaqe a _ ugumi yug llegh ghllag ni _ , _ liisimake sug aa llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n i _ . _ iwernga _ n u q e t u n n e g h p a k a q i i _ nanqigtekagh ni _ n a a f q e n n a l u k i _ .
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liisimake sqellug qu _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h l l a n i _ nanglleg kekagh minun _ . _ yataaghqe kestagh kaqe ai _ ellngit nun _ a l l g e g h t e s q e l l u k u _ n i g h u g h q e l l e n i _ .
talwa _ whangkuta llu _ tuqlugh kaqe ainkut _ , _ nakaan _ J e w - n g i n a g h n e n g _ iwernga _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g l l u _ .
H o s e a - m _ uuknaliqe llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ yug ke nghite kenka _ , _ atigh lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ yug nka _ ' _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ piniqe nghite kenka _ , _ atigh lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ piniqekagh nka _ ' _ .
tawani _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate vig itni _ , _ ' _ yug ke nghite amsi _ ' _ , _ tawani llu _ atigh lleqe ait _ , _ ' _ avaquti a _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ' _ "
I s a i a h - m _ akilghuu tke kaqe a _ israel _ whaten _ , _ " _ qaywa _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ esne m _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ uglagh tatekagh ligh nga a ta _ , _ t a w a l l i i m a _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ ,
qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ k i m a a w i l l n g u n a n i _ n a n q i g t e n g n g w a a g h l l e q i i _ nuna m _ yug i _ . _ "
sivugh nghaani _ I s a i a h - m _ pi naqe ni llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ " _ A t a n g h e m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ siipte te mangite yagh kanginkut _ kingunegh meng _ , _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t a _ naafqe lleg nge nayagh ukut _ S o d o m - e n k u k _ G o m o r r a h - n k u k _ ne ghllag gketun _ . _ "
S a m e n g Ê¼ n g a m _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ G e n t i l e - e t _ , _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ nallghusagh naqutke mangite ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ .
I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ malighqutagh ke naqutke kau ut _ liilightuusagh nun _ elqughute nga na luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ pilaataqu mangite ut _ .
sangameng _ pilaataqu nghite aat _ ? _ qayughllak _ nallghusagh naqutke lghiit _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ kiyaghnegh mun _ sa llegh megteggun _ , _ neghyuke gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh mun _ n a l l g h u s i i s q e l l u t e n g _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ naagte aqe ut _ " _ naagte sigh kun _ uyghag kun _ . _ "
igaqe kau lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ : _ " _ ii-i _ , _ Z i o n - m i _ nekegte aqa _ uyghag _ yug t _ n a a g t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ t a a m _ uyghag m _ iquslegh ke ai _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpegh kuni _ ellnga kun _ kayngu yug naanghite uq _ . _ "
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ qamagun _ ilu mkun _ piyuke pigte aqe anka _ whanga _ katam _ yug nka _ J e w s - e t _ y u g u l i l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ ! _ elngaatall _ kiyaghnegh mun _ yughagh te kaqe anka _ !
whaten _ piighhe naqe anka _ yug nka _ : _ qepghagh te yu pigte aqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ iwernga _ liigike igate aat _ naten _ kiyaghnegh _ qepghagh te sug aqe te ni _ ellngit nun _ .
liigike llghite aat _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe ta i _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ elqughutngagh ngllagh naqutke aqe ut _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ tugukligh igate aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh a _ .
C h r i s t - a _ kenle ke aat _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ enkaam _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqe i lleg leg _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh lleqe a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
moses _ igagh kau uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ nallghusagh i lghii meng _ yug neng _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ whaten _ igaqe kaqe a _ , _ " _ yug m _ qaatke ma kaki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ t a a k u t g u n _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallghusaghkagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ qelegh kau uq _ , _ " _ aapte gpenang _ , _ ' _ kina _ mayugh lleqe a _ qilag mun _ ? _ ' _ " _ ( _ u k i g g n a l u k u _ C h r i s t - a _ nuna mun _ ) _ .
nalighmeng _ aapte gpenang _ , _ " _ kina _ ukig lleqe a _ A b y s s - m u n _ ? _ " _ ( _ mayugh te na luku _ C h r i s t - a _ t u q u m e n g _ . _ )
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ qantaghante uq _ elpenun _ . _ akuzi tke lleqe an _ qanegh gpegun _ , _ ugpeqe lleqe an llu _ ilu gpegun _ . _ " _ ( _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ t a a n a n g u u q _ u n g i p a q e g k e f u t _ . _ )
apegh kuvgu _ qanegh gpeneng _ , _ " _ Jesus _ A t a n g h u n i l u k u _ , _ " _ ilu gpeneng llu _ ugpeqe gkuvgu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n i l u k u _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe uten _ .
yuug _ ugpegh uq _ ilu mikun _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aa _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ apegh aa llu _ qanegh mikun _ ugpeqekagh ni _ , _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge uq _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ellnga _ kayngu yug naanghite uq _ . _ "
allangughte te ite ut _ J e w s - e t l u _ G r e e k - e t l u _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh ke a _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ quya ste ghllag aqe a _ tamaghhagh an _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ellmi neng _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ T a m a g h a g h m i _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ naten _ yug t _ tuqlugh lleqe atgu _ ugpegh nghite kumeng _ ? _ naten _ ugpegh lleqe aat _ , _ nagaqugh te nghite kumeng _ ? _ naten llu _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ u n g i p a q i s t e n g u n a t e n g _ ?
naten _ yug t _ ungipagh qite lleqe aat _ ellnga neng _ wetku _ kayagte lleg nge gkumeng _ ? _ katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ pinighnagh ghhagh meng _ itegagh it _ tamaakut _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ! _ "
iwernga _ ila inagh ita _ qaatke kaqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ I s a i a h _ aaptekau uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kitum _ ugpeqe kaqe agu _ ungipagh ut _ ? _ "
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu naanghite uq _ nagate gpenani _ ungipagh meng _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
iwernga _ pi aqe zinga _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ nagaqugh te nghite ni luki _ ungipagh meng _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ nagaqugh pestaagh kau ut _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ me it _ aghulaqe ma ut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ nuna m _ ; _ akuzi ta it llu _ kenle itnun _ nuna m _ . _ "
alla _ a a p q u g h a a l l e l g u u n g a _ : _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ l i i g i k e n g h i t a t k i i - i _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n g u n g h i l n g u u t _ ellngit llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u k a t k i i _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ liigike ma ait _ . _ sivuke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ moses _ whaten _ pi sta _ : _ " _ elpesi nun _ aqinake ste naqe anka _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n g u n g h i l n g u u t _ . _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n g u n g h i l n g u g h t e g g u n _ liigike igate ngugh tgun _ ugumi yug ste naqe amsi _ . _ "
taagken _ I s a i a h _ tetug gpenani _ apegh i kau uq _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i l l g h a n e n g _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ ivagh i ma ite ngugh t _ whanga mneng _ , _ naalke kaqe aatnga _ . _ T a m a a k u n u n _ aapte i nghite ngugh nun _ whanga mneng _ , _ liite stekau unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ israel- meng _ kiyaghnegh _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ A g h n e l q u s i g h l l a k _ nengug te anka _ iigge nka _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ , _ k i p u l l g i n a a l g h i i n u n l l u _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ aapte amsi _ , _ " _ K i y a g h n e g h a a m _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ y u k s u g n a n i g h t a k i i _ ? _ " _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ whanga _ katam _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n g u u n g a _ , _ A b r a h a m - e m _ k i n g u n g h a _ , _ B e n j a m i n - e m _ ramke aneng _ pi u unga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ y u k s u g n a n i l l g h i t i i _ yug ni _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe ai _ salin _ nuna ngllagh llghite luni _ . _ L i i s i m a k e n g h i s t e g g u u _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ E l i j a h - m _ q i k e g h q u t k e g k a q e g k a n g i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ ,
" _ atanegh _ , _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t e n _ , _ ullegh qugh kaqe ait _ aghqefig ten _ ; _ whanga inagh ghhagh u unga _ siipnegh _ , _ tuqute naqutke aqe aatnga llu _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ paninang _ 7 , 0 0 0 - m e n g _ yug lgu unga _ maniguute igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ B a a l - m u n _ . _ "
maaten llu _ tawatete ut _ . _ siipnegh lgu uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh aneng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nakmiigh ma kuni _ nanglleg yug llegh mikun _ , _ taawa _ nakmike llghite ai _ pinitun _ p i l l g h i t g u n _ . _ tawaten _ nakmike ma kumiki _ , _ taawa _ nakmike llghite ai _ nanglleg yug llegh mikun _ .
whaten _ pi aqe unga _ : _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ naalke llghite aat _ ivaghkagh eng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ghhagh inagh ita _ naalke kaqe aat _ . _ ila i _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i n e g h l l u u g t e s t e k a q i i _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ umyugagh it _ liigike yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ . _ W h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ aghnegh mun _ iye it _ esghagh yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ , _ sigute it llu _ nagaqugh te yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ . _ "
D a v i d - l l u _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ neqenghaghqe llegh it _ negaghagh ughte lit _ , _ naapte llegh ughte lit _ , _ naagte sigh ughte lit _ , _ aghyuugh i sigh ughte lit _ ellngit nun _ .
iye it _ ayaa lleg nge lit _ e s g h a g h n a n i i s q e l l u k i _ , _ qukagh it llu _ p a k e g n e n g l i t _ uqig itneng _ seghleliigh llghite a _ quunperugllag _ . _ "
enkaam _ aapte amsi _ , _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ naagte aqngameng _ , _ alla _ nekevepagningite aqe aat _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ iwernga _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ , _ G e n t i l e - e t _ yuguligh lleg nge ut _ . _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge llghite a _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ aqina ste ait _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh it _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ tagite na luku _ quya ste llegh ghllag _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ iflii llghite a _ tagite aat _ quya ste llegh ghllag _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ nakmikegkagh t _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ , _ ilate kumeng _ y u g u l i k a n u n _ , _ quya ste llegh t _ naten mi _ u g l a g h t a t k a l l e q a t _ !
maaten _ aleghqugh yug amsi _ elpek si _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u n g a _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ enkaam _ piraamsi pigte lunga _ pi aqe aqa _ una _ megnu nagh lghii _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh tke a _ whanga mnun _ .
apeghtugh i lleg mkun _ elpesi nun _ aqina ste na luki _ pi anka _ J e w s - e l g u t e n k a _ , _ ila i _ y u g u l i l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighsa kaqe yaki _ J e w s - e t _ , _ nuna m _ yug i _ J e w - n g u n g h i l n g u u t _ ilaliigh stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ . _ enkaam _ J e w s - e t _ tugukligh nqigtekumiki _ , _ u n g u v a g h l l e g h h i i s t u n _ tuqukagh t _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ .
neqekrangllagh m _ i k e l l e q s u w h a a g h a _ tuunekagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ agleghnagh u u kan _ , _ taawa _ iingunagh mi _ neqekrangllagh k _ agleghnagh uq _ . _ A k g h w i _ uqfig m _ agleghnagh kata _ , _ avayagh i llu _ agleghnagh ut _ .
J e w s - e t _ piitesighaghkagh stun _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfigagh tun _ ayuqe ut _ ila i _ avayagh an _ ayemtekagh t _ . _ elpek si _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ avayagh stun _ ayuqe usi _ ayemtekagh t _ piitesighagh llghite ngugh meng _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfigagh neng _ . _ taameng _ uqfig meng _ , _ kitum _ tugu luku _ avayagh _ nekegtekunigu _ piitesighaghkagh mun _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfigagh nun _ , _ allgegh te yaghqaa uq _ akugh m _ mesugh aneng _ piite na pigte lghii meng _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ avayagh neng _ ayemtekagh neng _ . _ Q u k a a y u g t e g p e n a s i _ , _ qayughllak _ avayagh raaghinagh u usi _ . _ akugh t _ i k n a q u g h t e s i g a t a s i _ , _ akugh u ut _ i k n a q u g h s a g h i l g h i i t _ elpesi neng _ .
iwernga _ pi lleqe usi _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ avayagh t _ ayemtekau ut _ nekegte na luta _ uqfig mun _ . _ "
taana _ ipa u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayemte aqe ai _ avayagh t _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ ellnga _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ nekegte stekaqe aisi _ uqfig mun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ ellnga _ . _ enkaam _ q u k a a y u g t e g p e n a s i _ , _ yeghlegi _ alinge tek _ .
J e w s - e t _ a v a y a g h p i g a a g u t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayemtekaqe ta aneng _ a v a y a g h p i g a a t _ , _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ ayemte lleqe aisi _ uqfig meng _ nagnegh te nghite kufsigu _ ugpegh llegh i _ .
enkaam _ liigikagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ aghyuutagh pigte uq llu _ . _ aghyuugh aqe ai _ seghleghqekagh t _ , _ iwernga _ nanglleg ke aqe aisi _ neghyuke manginagh nghpesigu _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ neghyuke nanigh ma kufsigu _ elpek si llu _ kepe te lleqe aisi _ .
J e w s - e t _ ugpeqe nqigtekumegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nekeggneqigte lleqe ai _ uqfig mun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u q _ nekeggneqigte yaghqaa luki _ ne ke yagh ka itgun _ .
elpek si _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ avayagh pig ke nghite aisi _ piitesighaghkagh m _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfig an _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kepe kaqe aisi _ piitesighagh llghite ngugh meng _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfigagh neng _ . _ taagken _ nekegtekaqe aisi _ piitesighaghkagh mun _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfigagh nun _ , _ qaywa _ yug t _ nekegte i igate yagh nga a ta _ uqfig mun _ t a w a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ avayagh meng _ . _ J e w s - e t _ piitesighaghkagh meng _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfigagh neng _ pi u te meggneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh mi _ piyaqnagh u i te ut _ nekeggneqigte yaghqaa luki _ ellngit a _ katam _ uqfig itnun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ liigike sug amsi _ sa meng _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ A p e l u u g u s i q a _ elpesi nun _ u n a n g u u q _ : _ p e g h q i n g h u y u g n e g h u f q a a f s i _ p i s q e l l u s i _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ . _ ila ita _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqe yug mangite aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tawatete lleqe ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ G e n t i l e - e t _ qamagte luteng _ tagi laghate te llegh itnun _ ellmi nun _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ yuguligh i sta _ tagi lleqe uq _ Z i o n - m e n g _ ; _ iqite lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ k i n g u n g h a n e n g _ J a c o b - e m _ .
taana _ akequsagh ke aqa _ ellngit nun _ iqite kumki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ "
J e w s - e t _ ighsake kaqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ anguyag ke ai _ . _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe a _ ighsake i llegh at _ quya ste na lusi _ . _ iwernga _ J e w s - e t _ paninang _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ yug t _ . _ piniqe manginagh u ai _ apallugh ke luku _ akequsagh ni _ s i v u n g h i t n u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ umyugagh gni _ allangughte qaghte naanghite ak _ . _ veghte naanghite ai _ tunusagh ni _ , _ pegge naanghite ai llu _ nakmikegkagh ni _ ellmi nun _ yugu luki _ .
sivugh nghaani _ elpek si _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ q a a t k e l l g h i t a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ a l l g e g h t a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ qayughllak _ J e w s - e t _ qaatke te nghite ngugh t _ .
maaten _ J e w s - e t _ qaatke te igate ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ nanglleg ke aqe aisi _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ . _ iwernga _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ellngit a llu _ allgegh lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ yug t _ qaatke igate aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ qaatke te nghite llegh at _ anusimingllaghvig tun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawavek _ kanaghte aqe kangi _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ nanglleg ke na luki _ qamagte luki _ .
kaay _ , _ seghlegh ghllag u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aklungi i _ , _ peghqinellegh a _ , _ liisima llegh a llu _ ! _ kitum ngam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aki _ nanqigte i llegh i _ ? _ kitum ngam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aki _ i g l e g h n e g h i _ ?
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ kitum _ liisima kakek _ umyugagh kek _ A t a n g h e m _ ? _ kitum ngam _ aleghqugh lleqe agu _ apaqu tete na luku _ ?
kitum _ alngunak _ salisigataguu- u _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh mun _ llivike sqellug qu _ uteghmun _ ? _ "
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ellnga neng _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga kun _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga nun llu _ pi u uq _ . _ ellnga _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ ! _ amen _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh pigtu ta aneng _ , _ elngaatall _ kayeme amsi _ t u u n e s q e l l u k i _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguva lghii u luki _ aghqe te t _ . _ pelungite lit _ , _ tugukligh yugnagh lit llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ maniguute lleg pig i _ .
U u m _ nuna m _ yug atun _ kiyaghte gpenasi _ . _ yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ allangughte stek _ nutaghte ste luki _ umyugagh si _ . _ taagken _ l i i g i k e l l e q a g h s i _ piyuke llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghii _ , _ tugukligh yugnagh lghii _ , _ q a m a g t i i n g w a a g h n g a l g h i i l l u _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ta aneng _ tunute yameng _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u n g a _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ pi unga _ : _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenasi _ elpesi neng _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ ayuqe llegh gpesineng _ . _ yeghlegi _ i p a p i g h q e l l u s i _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe tek _ u g p e q i l l e g h t u l e g p e s i g u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh akun _ elpesi nun _ .
yugusigh put _ nalighneghtu pigte ut _ , _ t a m a g h a g h m i _ nalighnegh _ alla tun _ sa yaghqaa uq _ .
uglagh yagh ghngaamta _ , _ a t a a s i g u k u t _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh ani _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ nalighnegh ni _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ p i k u t u k u t _ .
qamagte luta _ allake te lghii neng _ tunusagh lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ . _ tunusagh ut _ ungipagh ke i u kan _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ ungipagh ke i lta _ ugpeqe i lleghtu ta leg mtestun _ .
tunusagh ut _ qepghagh te i u kan _ , _ qepghagh te i lta _ , _ apeghtugh i u kan _ , _ apeghtugh i lta _ ;
kayeme i u kan _ ila meng _ , _ kayeme i lta _ ; _ tuune i u kan _ , _ ighleg gpenaamta _ tuune i lta _ ; _ igleghte te i u kan _ , _ sagiqe luta _ igleghte te i lta _ ; _ nanglleg ke i u kan _ , _ quyake sigh ke luku _ nanglleg ke i lta _ .
piniqe tek _ i p a p i g h q e l l u s i _ . _ ugumi ke luku _ seghlegh _ , _ piyuke manginagh teggu _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ .
piniqe te utek _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ . _ Q u u l v a a t u t a q i t e k _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ q u u l v i i s q e s u l l e g h p e s i n e n g _ .
T a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ qepghagh tek _ , _ ighsani fqaafsi _ . _ sagiqe te luku _ qepghagh ta qite ggu _ atanegh _ qamaken _ ilu gpesineng _ .
quya nga tek _ qayughllak _ sighima lleg lgu usi _ , _ nuqete aqe tek _ n e k e g g m e l l u s i _ seghleliigh negh gpesini _ , _ yughagh aqe tek llu _ iiwleng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e g p e s i n u n _ aklu lghii nun _ tuune i aqe tek _ , _ upugha ta iqe tek _ kinku neng _ alngunak _ .
yughagh te kaqe teki _ a m y u q e t a a t k i s t e s i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q u y a s t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ nakaan _ a q n i g h t e s q e l l u k i _ .
quya lgusigh aqe teki _ tamaakut _ quya lghiit _ , _ qiya lgusigh aqe teki _ tamaakut _ qiya lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ n e k e g g m e t u l l u s i _ . _ Q u k a a y u g t e g p e n a s i _ yeghlegi _ ila ke teki _ u k a v a n t a l g h i i t _ . _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenasi _ p e g h q i n g h u n i l u s i _ ila gpesineng _ .
kitum _ seghletun _ pi kangisi _ , _ akite gpenaki _ seghletun _ . _ pi aqe teki _ pinigh lghiit _ tugukligh yugnagh lghiit _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
pi yaghqaa kan _ , _ pi aqe teggu _ sa u a _ pi yaghqagh i _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u s i _ n e k e g g m e l l u s i _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ akiniigh naqe gpenaki _ seghletun _ p i s t e s i _ , _ itupill _ pegte ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh anun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ aghyuugh i yaghqagh _ , _ whanga u uq _ akiniigh yaghqagh _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ . _ "
igaqe nga uq llu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ anguyag n _ iyatagh u u kan _ neghe ste naken _ , _ meqsug u kan _ meghsi naken _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvgu _ n a a s q w a k u n _ may- ughte vike lleqe an _ k u m a n g a l g h i i m e n g _ c o a l - m e n g _ . _ "
kayaalqe ste gpenasi _ seghlegh mun _ , _ itupill _ kayaalqe teggu _ seghlegh _ pinitun _ pi llegh kun _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ qaatke te yaghqaa uq _ a a n g w a a g h u g h t e k a n u n _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n u n _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ igleghte te i ste u naanghite uq _ wetku qun _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i ste ngughte stekunigu _ . _ igleghte te i ste u ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe ai _ i g l e g h u t i s q e l l u k i _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ qaatke igate ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ . _ enkaam _ aghyuugh ste lleqe uq _ .
pinitun _ pikayug t _ alike igate ait _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ iwernga _ seghletun _ pikayug t _ alike yaghqaqe ait _ . _ alike yu nghite kufsiki _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ pinitun _ pi tek _ , _ enkaam _ usuqe lleqe aisi _ .
I g l e g h u t i s t e t _ kiyaghnegh m _ q e p g h a g h t e k i i _ a n e g h n e g h q e l l e g h q a g h p e s i n u n _ . _ iwernga _ seghletun _ pi kufsi _ , _ alike nakesi _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh ma ai _ a g h y u u g h e s q e l l u k i _ seghletun _ pikagh t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ q e p g h a g h t e k i i _ , _ aghyuugh i stekagh i llu _ seghletun _ pi lghii nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke teki _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ . _ qaatke teki _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a g h y u u g h t e s u n g h i l n g u u s i _ . _ iwernga _ t a a n a n g i n a q _ apallugh u nghite uq _ . _ qaatke teki _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ qaatke te llegh _ elqughute nga uq _ .
taake uk llu _ apallugh ke lukek _ llivike aqe asi _ t a x - e s i _ , _ qayughllak _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ qepghagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghagh katen _ pi nghmegteki _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ t a x - e t _ a s e n g e s i _ qamagte luki _ llivike teki _ i g l e g h u t e s t e g p e s i n u n _ . _ sii vag qite ki llu _ q u u l v a g h t e k i l l u _ qamagte luki _ .
asenge gpenaan _ kina _ alngunak _ , _ iwerngaqun _ piniqe llegh i _ a s e n g e k n g i n a g h t e g g u _ ila gpesinun _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkumiki _ yug lgute ni _ q a a t k e n g n g w i i _ iingunagh ita _ liilightuusagh t _ .
igaqe nga ut _ liilightuusagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ yugtagh gpenang _ , _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ qiliiqetu iqe gpenang _ . _ " _ qaatke lleqe aten _ taakut _ qelegh sagh t _ , _ alngunak llu _ qelegh sagh t _ , _ qaatke gkuvgu _ una _ qelegh sagh _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ e l p e n e n g _ . _ "
kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i kuni _ yug lgute mineng _ , _ seghletun _ pi naanghite ai _ . _ piniqe i llegh mikun _ qaatke te u uq _ ii- u nigh itnun _ liilightuusagh t _ .
tamaakut _ pi teki _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ma uq _ . _ qavagh lghii stun _ ayuqe usi _ iwernga _ maaten _ taghtugh yaghqaaghte usi _ . _ yuguligh llegh ut _ t u g h a a g h t u q _ ugpegh yuggaagh lleg mnneng _ .
unuk _ alpag yaghtugh uq _ , _ whaa _ aghte yaghtugh ngestagh aa _ . _ taaqe lteki ngam _ atuqe nghmeng _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ mamleg mi _ . _ enkaam _ tugu lteki _ p i l l u w a a s i g h q a t _ nighug mi _ .
pinitun _ kiyaghte lta _ katam _ yug stun _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nighug ani _ aghnegh m _ . _ seghletun _ teghigniqe fqaamta _ , _ suume fqaamta _ , _ alngunak _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe fqaamta _ , _ p i l l u w u t e f q a a m t a _ , _ aqina te fqaamta _ .
itupill _ a k u l g h a a g h e s t u n _ aate ggu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke fqiita llu _ atuqe na luki _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh it _ .
upugha teggu _ yuug _ u g p e q i l l e g h q e s t a a g h h a q _ akule gpesinite ngughk _ . _ aaghtiiraagh sigh ke gpenaan _ sa u a _ u p e q e g k a a _ elqughute nga ta a _ nalighmeng _ anaggute nga ta a _ .
ataasigh m _ yug m _ ugpeqe a _ negh yaghqaa ni luni _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ . _ iwernga _ yuug _ u g p e l l e g h q e s t a a g h h a q _ negh aqe uq _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ .
yug m _ neghe kayug m _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ , _ s i i v a k l i g u _ yuug _ neqagh yu k _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ . _ yug m _ neghe kayug m _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ , _ nanqigte nghite ligu _ yuug _ neqagh yu k _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh ma a _ .
kina u ni luten _ pi aqe ziin _ nanqigte i lghii _ kitum _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a n e n g _ ? _ Q e p g h a g h t e m _ pi liite i ste inagh te _ nanqigte lleqe a _ pinitun _ pi ma ta a _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ pi ma ta a _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ pinitun _ pi lleqe uq _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ k a y u s i g h y a q l e g u k a n g a _ pinitun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
yug m _ ugpeqe a _ ataasigh _ aghneq _ megnu nagh aghagh ni luku _ ila itneng _ aghnegh neng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ ugpeqe ai _ qamagte luteng _ aghnegh t _ t a w a t e l k u n n i l u k i _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ umyugagh gni _ a t a a s i i g h t e n g n g w a a g h l i k e k _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ megnu nagh luku _ aghneq _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ q u u l v a g h n a l u k u _ atanegh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ neghe gkunigu _ alngunak _ neqe _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ q u u l v a g h n a l u k u _ atanegh _ , _ qayughllak _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ neqe meng _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ neghyu nghite kumiki _ ila i _ neqe t _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ q u u l v a g h n a l u k u _ atanegh _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe kanga llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
unguva igate ukut _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ tuqu igate ukut llu _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
unguva kumta _ , _ atanegh mun _ unguva u ukut _ . _ tuquma kumta _ , _ atanegh mun _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ enkaam _ unguva yagh ghngaamta _ nalighmeng _ tuqu yagh ghngaamta _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke ainkut _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tuqu luni _ , _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a g u q _ A t a n g h u n a l u n i _ unguva lghii nun llu _ tuqukagh nun llu _ .
elpek si _ , _ sangan _ nanqigte aqe steki _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ ? _ sangan llu _ s i i v a k i g a s t e k i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ ? _ neqamike luku _ , _ qamagte luta _ nekeve yaghqaa ukut _ sivungagh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ellnga nun _ n a n q i g t e s q e l l u t a _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ pi uq _ , _ qayughllak _ whanga _ unguva lghiinga _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ yuug _ segesqughte uute lleqe uq _ whanga mnun _ , _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ yug m _ usuqe lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ "
enkaam _ qamagte luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a p e g h y a g h q a q a g h p u t _ sa llegh ut _ , _ sangan llu _ tawaten _ p i m a t f u t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taaqe lta _ n a n q i g t u n n e g h m e n g _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ umyugagh put _ ataasiighte lteki _ u g p e q a a l g u t f u t _ naagte ste fqaan _ nalighmeng _ seghleghqe ste gpenaan _ pi steggu _ .
atanegh kun _ J e s u s - k u n _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a q a _ avangite uq _ iinghutekagh meng _ neqe meng _ . _ iwernga _ yug m _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ sa u a _ iinghute kau luku _ , _ taawa _ ellnga ni _ iinghute kau uq _ .
ugpeqagh u lguten _ uniigh miqe ma kan _ sa meng _ neghekagh gpeneng _ , _ taawa _ piniqe nanigh magh an _ . _ neghekagh gpenun _ naafqe ste gpenaan _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuquma tkekagh a _ .
ugpeqe gkan _ pinigh uq _ ; _ akuzi tke ste gpenaan _ seghleghu luku _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ sa u aat _ neghekagh put llu _ meghekagh put llu _ megnu nagh nghite ut _ . _ ukut _ megnu nagh ut _ : _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh _ , _ quya llegh llu _ ; _ taakut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi u ut _ .
taakut _ atuqe luki _ qepghagh te i lghii m _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ e f q u g h l l e q a a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ itagnagh kete lleqe aat llu _ yug t _ .
enkaam _ atugh lteggu _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghqagh _ , _ kayemughtu te lta llu _ u g p e l l e g h t u g h t a g h a g h n a l u t a _ .
naafqe gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghagh llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ neqe _ . _ qamagte luni _ neqe _ negh yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ anaggute nga uq _ neghe lleghqagh _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ seghleghqe ste i yaghqagh _ k i t u m e n g _ .
itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ kemekragtu nghite llegh _ , _ w i n e - e t u n g h i t e l l e q _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ naagte ste i yaghqagh _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e s i n u n _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh llu _ liisimake yaghqaqe atek _ tamaakut _ ugpeqekagh ten _ . _ quya nga aqe uq _ yuug _ atuqe nghminiki _ ugpeqekagh ni _ elqughute nga ni luki _ seghleghni tke gpenaki _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ neghekagh ni _ , _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ anaggute nga ni luku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe a _ qayughllak _ pi nghite kanga _ sa u a _ ugpeqekagh ni _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ugpeqekagh ni _ anaggute nga ni luku _ atuqe ma kunigu _ seghleghqe lleqe uq _ .
whangkuta _ ugpeqe i lleghtuqagh ni _ kayusiite yaghqaqe aput _ u g p e q i l l e g h q e s t a a g h h a a t _ seghleliigh nghata _ . _ E f q u g h s a g h q a a n g h i t u k u t _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ .
itupill _ , _ tamaghhagh emta _ e f q u g h h n a q e l t e g g u _ u g p e q a a l g u t f u t _ ellnga n _ katam _ pinighqe lleghqagh anun _ , _ u g p e q i l l e g h t u g h t e s q e l l u k u _ .
talwa _ C h r i s t - a _ e f q u g h s i m a n g i t u q _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ yeghlegi _ igaqe kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ yug t _ s e g h l e q u u l g h i i t _ e l p e n e n g _ , _ s e g h l e q u u l l g h i t _ tekite aqe ut _ whanga mkun _ . _ "
sivugh nghaani _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ igaqe kau ut _ apeghtugh na luta _ . _ nuqete neghtu ste ainkut _ , _ kayeme ainkut llu _ sighima lleg nge na yukagh mta _ .
nuqete neghtu llegh nkuk _ , _ kayeme llegh nkuk _ kiyaghneghtagh u uk _ . _ ellnga n _ k i y a g h t e s l i s i _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ katam _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ .
taagken _ qamagte lusi _ qerngagh gpesi _ ataasigh stun _ u s u q e l l e q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tugukligh utu tete lusi _ katam _ C h r i s t - a m _ tugukligh kayugu kangisi _ elpek si _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
amenqun _ C h r i s t - a _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u g h t e k a a l g h i i _ J e w s - e n u n _ l i i g i k e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh _ iiwleng _ i p a p i i q u q _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ J e w s - e t _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a a t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ s i v u n g h i t n u n _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tagi kau lghii llu _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ usuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh llegh anun _ . _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ E n k a a n g a m _ usuqe lleqe amken _ akule itni _ G e n t i l e - e t _ , _ ilagagh lleqe unga llu _ usuqe i llegh meng _ ategh gpenun _ . _ "
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ , _ quya tek _ maligte te lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ ! _ "
alla _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ usuqe teggu _ atanegh _ , _ qamagte lusi _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ ; _ usuqe teggu _ , _ qamagte lusi _ yug ni _ ! _ "
I s a i a h _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ K i n g u n g h a _ J e s s e - m _ tagi lleqe uq _ igleghte te na luki _ G e n t i l e - e t _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ sighima lleqe ut _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh u uq _ sighima ste i lghii _ . _ imigh lisi _ quya llegh ghllag meng llu _ nekeggmellegh meng llu _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun _ ellnga _ . _ taagken _ sighima lleg nge aghagh lleqe usi _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a m s i _ pi niigh pigte usi _ yug ni _ . _ liisimake aqa llu _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h l u k i _ ayuqe asi _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ a p e g h t u u s a q l e g w a a s i _ ila itnun _ .
iwernga _ t e t u l l n g u n a n g a _ lata kaqe amsi _ sa meng _ ila itneng _ negh ka ughte na lusi _ tamaaken _ . _ tawaten _ lata unga _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusug ightugh aanga
q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u n g a _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ P r i e s t - e t u n _ ayuqe aqe unga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ tawaten _ ungipagh kau iqe unga _ ellngit _ tunusagh tun _ a y u q e s q e l l u k i _ tugukligh yugnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ agleghnagh ste a _ tunusagh _ .
enkaam _ qukaayug taqu nga _ qepghaqagh mneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
akuzite kete yaghqaqe anka _ C h r i s t - a m _ apeghiighkagh ghhagh inagh i _ whanga mkun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g _ qaatke te ste i lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mkun llu _ qepghaqagh mkun llu _ .
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h e t _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n l l u _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ . _ ungipagh ke u aqe aqe anka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e n g _ t a a g a v e r u g l l a k _ I l l y r i c u m - e m u n _ .
iiwleng _ piyuke llegh kesagh aqa _ ungipagh ke na luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nuna ni _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh ni _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ qayughllak _ nekefte i yug u nghite ngugh u nga _ tunemagh kun _ ila yan _ yug m _ piinlighkagh akun _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ salin _ ungipaate igate ngugh t _ ellnga neng _ , _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ salin llu _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh t _ ellnga neng _ , _ liigike lleqe aat _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ uglagh ghngaan _ elpesi nun _ pipagningite aqe unga _ qayughllak _ ila itni _ nuna ni _ ungipagh kau iqe lghiinga _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ apeghiigh aqa _ qepghaqagh ka _ maani _ . _ uglagh lghii ni _ ayumiqullegh ni _ elpesi nun _ piyug pigte aqe yagh unga _ ,
enkaam _ sunanguq _ maaten _ laalighfike lamsi _ S p a i n - m u n _ pi tkellug qu _ . _ laalighte te aghte lleg mta _ kingu aneng _ sunanguq _ kayusigh tengnga _ aghulaqe naqe gkuma _ S p a i n - m u n _ .
iwernga _ elpesi nun _ pi vagilgama _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - m e n n a q a q u n g a _ kayusiite na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ t a m a a n l e n g u u t _ .
ugpeqagh t _ M a c e d o n i a - m e l n g u u t l u _ , _ A c h a i a - m e l n g u u t l u _ quyake sigh ke luku _ tuune i kau ut _ mani meng _ kayusiite na luki _ akluma lghiit _ a k u l n g i t n i l n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ .
quyake sigh ke luku _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ . _ taakut _ G e n t i l e - e t _ a s e n g e m i i t _ J e w s - e t _ qayughllak _ allgegh te kau lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste i llegh aneng _ ellngitgun _ . _ enkaam _ G e n t i l e - e t _ kayusigh yaghqaqe ait _ J e w s - e t _ ugpeqe ait _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t _ tuyugh luki _ mani meng _ .
whaa _ k e l q e n n a q a q a _ G e n t i l e - e t _ mani at _ J e w s - e n u n _ . _ apeghiigh kumkun _ una _ qepghaqagh _ tuune luku _ mat- ni _ ellngit nun _ , _ laalighfike yaghtugh lleqe amsi _ , _ taagken _ S p a i n - e l l e q u n g a _ .
liisimake aqa _ kaate kuma _ elpesi nun _ , _ pi lgu lleqe unga _ C h r i s t - a m _ iingunagh an _ quya ste llegh aneng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ piniqe llegh akun llu _ taghneghagh m _ , _ maligte te lusi _ whanga mnun _ yughagh tke ghllag qaghte ngnga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u n g a _ .
yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ p a q n i i g h s i i s q e l l u n g a _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ J u d e a - m i _ . _ yughagh tke teggu llu _ qepghaqagh ka _ J e r u s a l e m - e m i _ tugukligh yugnigh sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi lleqe unga _ quya lleg ligh ghllag lunga _ , _ enkaam _ p i n i g h y u u g g n e q i g l l e q u n g a _ laalighfike ma lusi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i t i l g h i i _ t a m a g h a g h p e s i n i l l i _ . _ amen _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n e n g _ , _ P h o e b e - m e n g _ . _ pinigh lghii u uq _ d e a c o n e s s - a _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ C e n c h r e a e - m _ .
upugha tete nakesi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ p i i q e l l g h i s t u n _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke aa _ . _ K a y u t k e s u n g h i s i _ kayusigh aqe luku _ qayughllak _ kayute ghllag u uq _ uglagh lghii nun _ yug nun _ , _ whanga mnun llu _ talwa _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ P r i s c i l l a - n k u k _ A q u i l a - n k u k _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ qepghagh lgutke agka _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ .
talwa _ tuqute lleghqagh ek _ pi tke gpenaan _ p a q n i i g h s a g h q a q a a g n e n g a _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iyamsiqa yug ghllagu unga _ e l k e g k e n e n g _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ G e n t i l e - e t _ y u g h a g h v i g i t n i l n g u u t _ iyamsiqa yug u ut _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ mangteghagh gkeni _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi _ piniqe kaqe a _ E p a e n e t u s _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ A s i a - m i _ ellnga _ ugpegh yuggaagh kau uq _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ mary _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ ; _ qevuute luni _ qepghagh te kaqe aisi _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ A n d r o n i c u s - e n k u k _ J u n i a s - e n k u k _ J e w - l g u t e g k a _ , _ anusimingllaghagh lgu tke kaqe agka llu _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ A p o s t l e - n g u u k _ yug t _ liisimake u aqe ke t _ ; _ sivu mni _ ugpeqagh ughtekau uk _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ A m p l i a t u s _ , _ piniqe kaqe a _ atanegh kun _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ .
U n i p a a t a g h h n a k e s i _ U r b a n u s _ , _ q e p g h a l g u t f u t _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ piniqe kaqe a llu _ S t a c h y s _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ A p e l l e s _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg nge aqngami _ i p a p i g h q e g k a q a a _ a t a a s i g h m i t e l l e n i _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g i _ A r i s t o b u l u s - e m _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ H e r o d i o n _ , _ J e w - e l g u t k a _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi llu _ ugpeqagh t _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a n i l n g u u t _ N a r c i s s u s - e m _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ T r y p h a e n a - n k u k _ T r y p h o s a - n k u k _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ taake uk _ aghnagh k _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u u k _ atanegh mun _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi llu _ piniqe kaqe a _ P e r s i s _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ ; _ qevute luni _ qepghaqagh u uq _ atanegh mun _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ R u f u s - e n k u k _ naa ke te lghiik _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ rufus _ A t a n g h e m _ nakmike kaqe a _ , _ naa an llu _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ pi aqe aanga _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ A s y n c r i t u s - e n k u t _ , _ P h l e g o n - e n k u t _ , _ H e r m e s - e n k u t _ , _ P a t r o b a s - e n k u t _ , _ H e r m a s - e n k u t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ e l l n g i t n i l n g u u t _ , _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ P h i l o l o g u s - e n k u k _ , _ J u l i a - n k u k _ , _ N e r e u s - e n k u k _ nayag ke te lghiik _ , _ O l y m p a s - l l u _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ e l l n g i t n i l n g u u t _ , _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh te meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ C h r i s t - a m _ y u g h a g h v i g a n i l n g u u t _ , _ liisimake sug aisi _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ qelegh amsi _ k e l e n g a s q e l l u s i _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ aafqugh te ste i kayug neng _ , _ tunute ste i lghii neng _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llegh itneng _ , _ k i p u l l g i n a a l g h i i n e n g _ apeghtuusagh neng _ liitekagh gpesineng _ . _ iqite nga tek _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ .
yug t _ tawaten _ pikayug t _ qepghagh te u nghite aat _ C h r i s t - a _ atanegh ut _ . _ T a a w a n g i n a g h h a q _ ellmeng _ katam _ efqugh kekagh ghhagh inagh teng _ pi aqe ait _ . _ apeghtugh i negh meggni _ a k u z i t e g h l l u w h a a t _ atuqe aqe ait _ , _ u s u q u u g h t a q i i t l u _ yug t _ puughhe na luki _ puughte yuguma lghiit _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ nagaqugh ma ut _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ atanegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ quyake ghllagu amsi _ . _ P e g h q i n g h u s u g a m s i _ sa mun _ pinigh lghii mun _ , _ iwernga _ a n a g g u t e l l n g u n a s i _ seghlegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i t i l g h i i m _ qantaghaqun _ kagimte lleqe a _ tughneghagh _ itegagh gpesi _ asi ani _ . _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ nangllegtagh li _ elpesi nun _ .
Q e p g h a l g u t m a _ T i m o t h y - m _ , _ J e w - l g u t m a l l u _ L u c i u s - e n k u t _ , _ J a s o n - e n k u t _ , _ S o s i p a t e r - e n k u t _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
T e r t i u s - n g u u n g a _ , _ igagh te aqe aqa _ P a u l _ lata aneng _ . _ whanga llu _ suumqagh ke amsi _ atanegh kun _ .
whanga _ P a u l _ , _ G a i u s - m e t a q u n g a _ . _ mangteghagh ani _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayugu ut _ . _ ellnga n llu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ ne ghllag mta _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste yan _ , _ E r a s t u s - e m _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m t a l l u _ Q u a r t u s - e m _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ ellnga n _ a y e p s u g i g h s a g h y a q l e g w i i _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghii meng _ ungipagh qu manginagh aqe ke mkun _ yug nun _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ aksaqekagh _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma nge i tke a _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ , _ piinlegh ite ngugh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ igaqugh llegh itgun _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ . _ qelegh te ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ l i i t e s q e l l u k i _ yug nun _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ u g p e q e s q e l l u n i l l u _ q a a t k e s q e l l u n i l l u _ .
E l l n g i n a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ peghqinegh lghii _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ yug t _ usuqe litgu _ quunperugllag _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh aneng _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u k u _ . _ U g p e q a a l g u t f u t _ S o s t h e n e s _ whanga mnite uq _ .
lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ u g p e g h t e n g i t n u n _ C o r i n t h - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekagh anun _ y u k n a l u s i _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ p e l u n g i t e s q e l l u s i _ maligte te lusi _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ t a m a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ , _ yughagh kayug nun _ atanegh mnnun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t a _ A t a n q a g h p u t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ n e k e g g m e l l e l g u s l i l s i l l u _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ nanglleg ke kaqe aisi _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
enkaam _ ellnga kun _ aklungi igh i kau usi _ liigike llegh meng llu _ akuzillegh meng llu _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ l i i g i k a t a g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ a k u z i t k a t a g h a g h l l e q a g h s i l l u _ atanegh _ .
allangughtekagh m llu _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h p e s i _ i p a p i g h q a a _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ C h r i s t - a _ .
agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ tunusagh lgu usi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ , _ utaqa i u lusi _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh aneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpegh lleg si _ i k n a q u g h s a a m a n g i n a g h n a a g h i i _ kenlanga _ kingulighpigagh mete te _ aghnegh mun _ . _ inqun _ a n a g g u t e l l g h i t e s q e l l u s i _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ nanqigte i kan _ yug neng _ .
A t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u m _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ i l a t e s q e l l u s i _ ighnegh minun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ atanegh mnnun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ ategh akun _ pi amsi _ t a a q e s q e l l u s i _ aaghtiiraagh te nghmeng _ . _ aafqugh te gpenasi _ . _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si llu _ sa naqe lleg si llu _ ataasiighte naqe luki _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ ila ita _ C h l o e - e m _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a n _ ungipaate kaqe aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe ni lusi _ .
ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ P a u l - e m _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ " _ ila si _ , _ " _ whanga _ A p o l l o s - e m _ . _ " _ ila si _ " _ whanga _ P e t e r - e m _ . _ " _ paninang _ ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ C h r i s t - a m _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ "
E n k a a n g a m _ q a f s i n a g h q a g h s i _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ P a u l - e m _ q a q u r a a t k e g k a q i s i i _ ? _ paaptaayekagh u tsi _ P a u l - e m _ ategh akun _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ p a a p t a a y e m a n g i l k e g k a _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ iwerngaqun _ C r i s p u s - e n k u k _ G a i u s - e n k u k _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kina _ alngunak _ pi naanghite uq _ p a a p t a a y e m a n i l u n i _ ategh mkun _ .
( _ atwhay _ paaptaayekagh ke anka llu _ S t e p h a n a s - e n k u t _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ neqamike nghite aqa _ kina _ alla _ alngunak _ p a a p t a a y e m a t k a _ ) _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ paaptaaye ligh sqe mangite aanga _ , _ iwernga _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ u n g i p a q i s q e l l u n g a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i igate unga _ atuqe luki _ yug m _ peghqinellegh i _ , _ luuraq _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite lghiite ste na yukagh mkun _ qaquuragh a _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
ungipagh _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu llegh a _ qaquuragh kun _ temngingu uq _ ifla naqe lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ yuguligh lleg nge lghii ni _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l q a a _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ P e g h q i n g h e t _ peghqinellegh at _ atugh u nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ liitekagh ghllag t llu _ liite llegh at _ sasii nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ "
enkaam _ s a n a q a n Ê¼ n g a m _ nuna m _ peghqinegh lghii i _ ? _ S a n a q a n Ê¼ n g a m _ apeghtughiste i _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ S a n a q a n Ê¼ n g a m _ a a g h t i i r a a g h t e t _ ? _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ l i i t e l l e g h l l a l l g h a t _ sasii nghite uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha ngllagh kaqe a _ peghqinellegh a _ nuna m _ .
peghqinellegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ nuna m _ yug anun _ nalluke lleqe ni luni _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike ai _ y u g u l i n a l u k i _ qamagte luki _ ugpegh lghiit _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ . _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aat _ taana _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ temngingu ni luku _ .
J e w s - e t _ esghaate yug aqe ut _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e g h n e n g _ ugpeqe na luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ; _ G e n t i l e - e t _ peghqinellegh nge yug aqe ut _ ugpeqe na luku _ ungipagh _ ipa u ta a _ .
iwernga _ paninang _ u n g i p a q n a q n g w a a g h p u t _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ tuqu tke kaqe ni luki _ qaquuragh kun _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ J e w s - e n i _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ ugpeqe yaghqaa luni _ , _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ teme igh u u uq _ .
iwernga _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ J e w s - n g u g h n g a a m t a _ , _ G e n t i l e - n g u g h n g a a m t a _ tawatete nghite uq _ . _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu llegh an _ qaquuragh kun _ liite stekaqe ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g l l u _ peghqinellegh aneng llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha llegh a _ p e g h q i n g h a t a g h g a g h t u q _ yug m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaate llegh a _ iknaqe aghagh uq _ yug m _ iknaqe llegh aneng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ neqamike luku _ natete yagh u tsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ t u q l u g h a q n g i s i _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ p e g h q i n g h u y a g h t u s i _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh itni _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ aghtugh igate yagh usi _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ nalighmeng _ a k l u n g i l n g u g h n e n g _ nengllugute neng _ pi u yagh usi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ n a l l u u q a t _ nuna mi _ k a y n g u s a a k n a l u k i _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ k a y a a l n g u u t _ nuna mi _ k a y n g u s a a k n a l u k i _ tamaakut _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ u k a v a n l e n g u u t l u _ a s i t n g i n a a q i i t l u _ nuna mi _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ , _ yug nun _ l i i g i k e s q e l l u k i _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh it _ aangwaagh u luki _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte naanghite uq _ nekeve gkuni _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ t u u n i s t e s i _ unguvallegh meng _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ tuune ste ainkut _ peghqinellegh meng _ , _ elqughute ste ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ a g l e g h n a g h t e s t i i n k u t u _ , _ iteme te ste ainkut llu _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ atuqe lteggu _ , _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte yu kuni _ , _ aangaayugte te kete liki _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghiighkagh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh aqngama _ elpesi nun _ , _ atuqe mangite anka _ akuzite t _ l i i g i k e p a g n i n g i l k e s i _ . _ peghqigh llegh ghllag mkun _ ungipagh ke i yu nghite unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
pakig kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke i yu lghiinga _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a n g i n a g h h a g h m e n g _ tuqu llegh aneng llu _ qaquuragh kun _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ tetug aatagh kau unga _ , _ alingruugh kau unga _ , _ ungelegtekau unga llu _ .
K u k r a g n a l g h i i m e n g _ akuzi tke mangite unga _ peghqinegh ghllag m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n _ i p a p i g h q e g k a q i i _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ ipa u ta i _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ugpegh usi _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ , _ nakaan _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ peghqinellegh a _ .
A n g t a n i i t k a n u n _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtuusagh ke aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ . _ iwernga _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ nuna meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ talwa _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g a n e n g _ . _ qantaghaqun _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ .
peghqinellegh _ apeghtuusagh ka _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh ke a _ , _ nalluke aat _ yug t _ . _ yug t _ nallukngwaagh yagh kangat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite ste llegh anun _ . _ talwa _ nuna ngllagh mangite luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe yaghqaa luta _ pi kaqe ainkut _ peghqinellegh mikun _ .
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ nuna m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ liigike mangite aat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ . _ liigike kaqsagh kumegteggu _ , _ qaquuragh nayagh nghite aat _ A t a n g h a _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h e m _ .
igaqegkagh ni _ akuzite ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ iye m _ e s g h a m a n g i l k a n g i _ , _ tamaakut _ sigute m _ nagaqugh ma ite kangi _ , _ tamaakut _ umyugagh m _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma ite kangi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe kaqe ai _ p i n i q i s t e m i n u n _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike stekaqe ai _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ taghneghagh gmikun _ . _ taghneghagh m _ yuvghiigh aqe a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ q a a m n a r u g l l a g a n i l n g u u t _ .
yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ .
nuna m _ taghneghagh aneng _ allgegh te mangite ukut _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a g p u t _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi k _ , _ liigike na luki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
enkaam _ akuzi igate ukut _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe aqe aput _ akuzite t _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtugh tke ai _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ a p e g h t u u s a q n e m t e k i _ taghneghagh m _ i p a p i l l g h i _ t a m a a k u n u n _ allgegh tekagh nun _ A g l e g h n a l i i g n e n g _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ allgegh te ma ite ngughk _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ tugukligh i igate uq _ tunusagh neng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi neng _ . _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ temngitwha u ut _ ellnga ni _ . _ liigikepagningite ai _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ kayusillegh igh inagh u kete te _ liigike yaghqaa uq _ .
yug m _ allgegh tekagh m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ nanqigte aqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite a _ ellnga _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i l l g h i s t u n _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ A t a n g h e m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liilightugh naanghite a _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ukut _ C h r i s t - a m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh atun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ elpesi nite aqngama _ aleghqughpagningite kaqe amsi _ a l e g h q u g h w a q e l l e m t u n _ ugpeqagh ghllag t _ . _ yeghlegi _ aleghqugh kaqe amsi _ ugpegh lleg si _ a n g l i l l g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe luki _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ t a g h n u g h h a g h h a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ .
K u k r a g n a n g u n a a n _ apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ . _ katam _ tawaten _ mamagh ghhagh meng _ meghe ste lghii stun _ pi kaqe amsi _ . _ neqe pig meng _ neghe stepag nigh nge i te kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ n e q e p i g t u g h p a g n i n g i l n g u u s i _ salin _ . _ paninang _ maaten _ neqe pigtughpagningite aqe usi _ , _ qayughllak _ u g p e q a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe usi _ salin _ . _ L i i g i k e s t e n g n g w a a g h s i _ ugpegh llegh gpesi _ angli nghite llegh a _ aqina llegh gpesigun llu _ aghiva te llegh gpesigun llu _ . _ U g p e q a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u s i _ .
naligh i _ pi nghmini _ , _ " _ whanga _ P a u l - e m _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ ila si llu _ pinegh meggni _ , _ " _ whanga _ A p o l l o s - e m _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ u g p e q a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ pi aqe usi _ .
kinangaawa _ apollos _ ? _ kina u zinga _ whanga _ ? _ Q e p g h a g h t e k i i n k u n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayusiite kaqe amsi _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ qepghaqagh leg staghhiinagh u ukung _ A t a n e g h e m _ qelegh tekagh aneng _ .
elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesighagh vike aisi _ . _ piitesighagh aqe unga _ , _ A p o l l o s - e m _ meghqe aqe a _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagu sta qaa _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kina _ alngunak _ piitesigh u aghagh lghii llu _ meghqe i lghii llu _ u k a v a n t u q _ . _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh _ aange ghllag uq _ nagu ste i kayugu uq _ .
piitesigh u aghagh a llu _ meghqe i sta llu _ t a w a t e l k u t u k _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ak _ qepghagh llegh gkenkun _ .
qepghagh lgutke te ukung _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ; _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesigh u aghagh vike aisi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ke aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh _ tagivagh qagh a _ atuqe luku _ piinligh kaqe aqa _ qepghaqagh _ elpesi ni _ . _ peghqinegh lghii stun _ tunemagh iqe aqe aqa _ mangteghagh _ ulima yaghqagh _ . _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a n g i n a a g u q _ tunemagh _ , _ alla _ saaghw akun _ tunemaghqagh ite uq _ . _ ila ita _ ulima vike u aat _ qaye akun _ . _ qamagte luni _ piraamsi luni _ ulima li _ .
ila ita _ atugh lleqe aat _ g o l d - a _ , _ silver- a _ , _ j e w e l - a _ , _ ila ita _ unaghsigh _ , _ paligh iqe aq _ vegaagh _ , _ ungagagh llu _ tunemagh kun _ taaggun _ .
sa u a _ atuqekagh ut _ e s g h a g h y a g h q a q a g h p u t _ a t a a s i k a g h t a a m t a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t a _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ C h r i s t - a m _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ani _ . _ K e n g h e m _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke a _ qepghaqagh ut _ nateghtu langa _ .
sa u a _ yug m _ atuqekagh a _ kumagh nghite kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ ila yan _ yug m _ qepghaqagh a _ ifla yaghqaa uq _ kumagh kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge naanghite uq llu _ . _ N a q a m e n r a q _ ellnga _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ kenegh meng _ aane lghii stun _ .
L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke aisi _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh kek _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u k _ ilu gpesini _ !
kitum _ alngunak _ naafqe gkagu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke a _ ellnga _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ . _ elpek si _ temple- ke aisi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ puughte te qugh a mi _ ellmi neng _ pi li _ . _ naligh i _ sumeghtaghagh u u kuni _ liite pagllag kau ni luni _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ , _ yeqay _ maligte ligu _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ t e m n g i n g u n i g h n g a a t g u _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuni _ elngaatall _ p e g h q i n g h u g h t e p i i g l l e q a a _ .
kiyaghnegh mi _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh a _ temngingu uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ P e g h q i n g h e t _ yug t _ nuna mi _ whani _ kiyaghnegh m _ pipagningite te ste aqe ai _ ellngit a _ katam _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ "
igaqe kau uq llu _ , _ " _ A t a n g h e m _ liisimake a _ p e g h q i n g h e m _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ sasii nghite uq _ . _ "
E n k a a n g a m _ kitum _ alngunak _ qukaayug te kete yaghqaqe nghite ai _ sa u aat _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighqe sighqagh ughte stekaqe a _ elpesi nun _ ,
talwa _ P a u l _ , _ apollos _ , _ peter- llu _ . _ nuna llu _ una _ , _ unguvallegh llu _ , _ tuqu llegh llu _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e l n g u q _ maaten _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ kaate yaghqagh _ , _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ elpek si _ pi kasi _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi ke aisi _ , _ C h r i s t - a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke tekut _ q e p g h a g h t e k n i l u t a _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e n g u u k u t _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh tekagh aneng _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ ataasiighmete yaghqaa ut _ .
whanga _ , _ ataasiighmete ni lunga _ qepghagh a _ pi kufsinga _ , _ nalighmeng _ ataasiighmete nghite ni lunga _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kanganga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete naanghite aqa _ . _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ nanqigte igate unga _ .
nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ anaggute mate ka _ , _ iwernga _ anaggute llghite ni lunga _ pi nghite unga _ . _ A t a n g h h i i n a a m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe aanga _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ wiin _ nanqigte gpenaan _ kina _ alngunak _ s a l l g h a n e n g _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ tagi nqigtekuni _ kukegte yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ ilu it _ a l i i g h q e l l u k i _ sa u aat _ iigh nga yagh lghiit _ tesqamani _ . _ A l i i g h q e s a g h q a q i i _ sangameng _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ taagken _ usuqe yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ usuqe lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ A p o l l o s - l u _ whangkutung _ uspute aqe u ukung _ . _ usputagh u ukung _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ una _ igaqe na lghii _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ " _ qaatke aqe teki _ sa u aat _ igaqe nga lghiit _ akuzite ni _ igaqekagh ni _ . _ " _ naligh ghhagh inagh gpesi _ aangaayugte te kete yaqunaan _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ aag llegh a _ ugumi ke luku _ .
kitum _ pinigh aghagh ste isi _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e s i n e n g _ ? _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pikagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kangisi _ , _ aangaayugte gpenasi _ . _ ungipagh gpenasi _ whaten _ , _ " _ S a n g w a _ qamagte luku _ whanga mneng _ pi kaqe aqa _ . _ "
A l l g e g h t e n g n g w a a g h u m a a g h s i _ a k l u k e g k a g h s i _ qamagte luku _ ! _ A k l u n g i g h i n g w a a g h l u s i _ ayuqe usi _ ! _ W h a n g k u n g u n a s i _ umiileg ughte ma usi _ ! _ umiileg u lghiisi tuq _ , _ enkaam _ umiileg u te i lgusigh nayagh amsi _ !
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe ainkut _ a p o s t l e - e n i _ u k a l i g h p i g a a l u t a _ yug neng _ . _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh stun _ . _ yug t _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ , _ yaquleg t llu _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ .
whangkuta _ nallungughtekau ukut _ C h r i s t - a _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigu usi _ ugpeqagh ni _ . _ yug t _ waakigate ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ sumegh gpesini _ elpek si _ nagate aqe aisi llu _ q u u l v a g h a q i i s i l l u _ , _ whangkuta _ pi igate ainkut _ .
W h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ neqangisag aqe ukut _ , _ meghyaghqagh isag aqe ukut _ , _ aatkagh isag aqe ukut _ . _ yug t _ qevute kaqe ainkut _ . _ ne ite ukut _ , _ i g l e g h t a a g u k u t _ quunpeng _ .
qepghagh aqe ukut llu _ qevuute luta _ mani nge na luta _ k i y a g h t a a g h u s i g h q a m e n g _ . _ S e g h l e q u u l g h i i t _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ . _ ugpeqagh u te mnneng _ a m y u u t k e n g h i n k u t _ a k u z i l g i i g a t u k u t l u _ akite igate aput llu _ .
I q l e n g i q u t k e n g h i n k u t _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ tawaten _ pi fqiita _ p i s q e l l u k i _ . _ W h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ainkut _ sakwaagh stun llu _ s a s i i n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n l l u _ .
lata u nghite unga _ k a y n g u y u g g n a l u s i _ . _ iwernga _ piniqe pigte lusi _ whanga _ katam _ t a g h n u g h h a q e l g h i s t u n _ liilightugh yug aqe amsi _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh gpesineng _ .
qaywa _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e t u p i g s a g h n g a a g h p e s i _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ , _ atatu ghllag nghite usi _ . _ U g p e q s u w h a g h a q n g a f s i g u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ nagaqugh luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ tawani ta _ ata stun _ lliigh kanga _ elpesi nun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kiyaghte sug pigte amsi _ whanga mtun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ T i m o t h y _ k a y a g t e n g n g w a a q a _ elpesi nun _ . _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe aqa _ atanegh kun _ . _ A t a a s i i g h m e l n g u q _ ugpeqe aq _ piniqe pigte aqa _ . _ negh ka ughte naagh aisi _ naten _ whanga _ kiyaghte aqe lleg mneng _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ T a w a t e l n g u q _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ ugpeqagh nun _ t a m a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ .
ila si _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h u g h t a q u t _ , _ qayughllak _ sumegh meggni _ laalighte naanghite ni lunga _ pi kaqe aatnga _ C o r i n t h - m u n _ .
iwernga _ A t a n g h e m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh unga _ . _ taagken _ liigike lleqe anka _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h e t _ aangaayugte llegh megestun _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ akuzite tgun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ iwernga _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h q u n _ ayuqe uq _ .
kaate kuma _ s a s q e s u g e s t e n g n g a _ ? _ A n a g u t a l i g h l u n g a a _ a g h y u u g h l a m s i i _ , _ nalighmeng _ piniqe lusi _ , _ pinitungwaaq _ p i l a m s i i _ ?
nagaqugh aqe aqa _ naligh gpesi nguq _ a ta mi _ nulighh a _ n u l i g h q e l g h i i s t u n _ ayuqe a _ . _ seghlegh pigte lghii meng _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u u q _ talwa _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ atuqe ste nayagh nghite aat _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ .
paninang _ yuuke te kaqe tsi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ ? _ Q i v g h u g h l l a g y a q l e g e s t u n _ ! _ elpek si _ i q i s a q l e g e s t u n _ yuug _ taana _ akule gpesineng _ .
U y a v a n t e g h l l a g y a g h n g a a g h m a _ sumeghtaghagh tke ghllagu aqa _ . _ T a w a n l e n g u g h e s t u n _ elpesi ni _ agghi tke kaqe aqa _ naten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ taana _ yuug _ ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ ugpeqagh ni _ , _ allameng _ q e r n g u g h u s k u f s i _ , _ t a w a n l e n g u g h e s t u n _ umyugagh mig ke lunga _ , _ aghtughyaghqanghillegh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ yuug _ taana _ elpesinite ste gpenaan _ allameng llu _ pi nakesi _ . _ tuune teggu _ tughneghagh- mun _ , _ piyuke llegh mitun _ yugusigh a _ n a a f q e l l i g u _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh kek _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug kek _ atanegh _ tagi nqigtekan _ .
P i n i i y u g t e l l e g h s i _ seghleghu uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ " _ Y e a s t - a m _ g h h u u g h t e s t e g h l l a k a y u w a a _ akuute aq _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallug ke luku _ seghleghqe llegh t _ a k u l e g p e s i n i l n g u u t _ iqite ki _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ pelungite lleqe usi _ akuutagh stun _ y e a s t - a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ . _ ipa _ pelungite usi _ qayughllak _ C h r i s t - a _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ pennagh ii aghagh aqe a _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
katam _ J e w s - e t _ i q i t e l l g h i s t u n _ y e a s t - a t _ mangteghagh meggneng _ yataaghqe te vagilgamegteggu _ P a s s o v e r - e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ seghleghqe lleg put _ iqite lleqe aput _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ pelungite lleqe ukut _ , _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a l l e q u k u t l u _ .
ila itgun _ lata ma _ ilate nga snanigh amsi _ ugpeqagh nun _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghii nun _ .
A k u z i t k e n g n g u n g h i t a n k a _ u u m _ nuna m _ yug i _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh t _ , _ w a y a g h n i i g h t e t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tamaakut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ iqite yu kufsi _ t a w a t e l n g u g h n e n g _ yug neng _ nuna _ u n i s a g h q a q a g h s i _ .
iwernga _ lata mkun _ ilate snanigh kaqe amsi _ t a m a a k u n u n _ ugpeqagh u lgute u ni luteng _ pi lghii nun _ s e x - k u n _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u k a t a _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh u kata _ , _ maniguute kayugu kata _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h u t n g u k a t a _ yug lgute meng _ , _ meghe ste u kata _ , _ wayagh nigh ughte u kata llu _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh gpenaki _ t a w a t e l n g u u t _ .
whanga _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite anka _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ nanqigte yaghqaqe yagh asi _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ . _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe sta _ iqite ggu _ akule gpesineng _ . _ "
naligh i _ aaghtiiraagh nghmini _ u g p e q a a l g u t m i n e n g _ , _ sangan _ aglagh te aqe agu _ nanqigtivig mun _ ? _ K a y n g u y u g i g a t s i i _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ nanqigte ste negh gpesini _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ ? _ ugpeqagh t _ u g p e q a a l g u t m e g g n u n _ taklaghte tesaghqagh u yagh ut _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh meggneng _ .
L i i s i m a k e n g h i s t e g g u u _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ nanqigte yaghqagh i _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ? _ nanqigte yaghqaqe u kufsiki _ , _ naten _ piyaqnaghtutka lleqe aat _ elpesi nun _ nanqigte lleghqagh i _ p i y a q n i i l n g u u t _ ?
L i i s i m a k e n g h i s t e k i i _ n a n q i g s a g h q a q e k e p u t _ yaquleg t _ ? _ enkaam _ taklaghte qugh llegh t _ aaghte i ragh u aghte te llegh neng _ whani _ unguvallegh mi _ piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa yagh ut _ .
aaghtiiraagh te negh gpesini _ sangafsi ngam _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ pi aqe tsi _ n a n q i g t e s q e l l u s i _ ?
kayngu nagh ghhagh meng _ elpek si _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ akule gpesini _ liisima lghii meng _ taklaghte te i stekaghqagh lgu ut _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ .
yeghlegi _ ugpeqagh m _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ aglagh te aqe a _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ n a n q i g t i s t e n u n _ , _ a g g h i t k e s q e l l u k i _ aaghtiiraagh te lleg tek _ .
