tawatete llegh gpesigun _ u g p e q a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ k i y a g h t a a g h u u s i _ . _ U g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ aglagh te gpenaki _ nanqigtivig mun _ . _ nepiigh ta qite ki _ anagte ghngaisi _ , _ puughte ghngaisi _ .
itupill _ elpek si _ katam _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ anagte aqe asi llu _ puughte aqe asi llu _ .
ipapestaaq _ l i i s i m a k s a g h q a q s a g h a g h s i _ seghletun _ p i s t e t _ nekaghqagh ite ngugh t _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ puughte ste gpenasi _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ : _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe kayug t _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ g e l g a g h n i i g h t e t _ , _ aghnaasigh t _ , _ yug t _ yug lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ , _ aghnagh t _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug t _ .
tamaakut llu _ teglenga lghiit _ , _ pakignegh t _ , _ m e g h e s t e t _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h t e t _ yug neng _ , _ w a y a g h n i i g h t e t _ , _ nekaghqagh ite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ila si _ tawatete yagh lghiit _ salin _ ugpeqe i llghite luteng _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ ughvughqe kaqe aisi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ , _ aaftekaqe aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ s e g h l e g h q u m a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n l l u _ lli aghtekau usi _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ atanegh kun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ . _ aa _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiinga _ seghlegh mun _ ayghigh pagllag na yukagh ma _ pi naanghite unga _ .
kina llu _ pi nayagh lghii _ , _ " _ neqe _ ulimaagh u uq _ aqsaqugh mun _ , _ aqsaqugh _ neqe mun _ . _ " _ aa _ , _ iwernga _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke ak _ qamagte lukek _ aqsaqugh llu _ n e q a l l u _ . _ yugusigh _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe sighqagh u nghite yagh uq _ qayughllak _ yugusigh _ atanegh mun _ pi u uq _ , _ atanegh _ yugusigh mnnun _ pi u uq _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ makete yaghqaqe ai _ yugusigh put _ tuqu llegh meng _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ makete llegh mitun _ atanegh _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
L i i s i m a k e n g h i s t e g g u u _ yugusigh si _ nalighnegh ke kangi _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh an _ ? _ yugusigh ka _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi ligh tke a _ a t u q n a a g h s i k u u n _ aghnagh mun _ akike i kayug meng _ yugusigh mineng _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ pi naanghite aqa _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ yug m _ atuqe gkunigu _ aghnagh _ akike i lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ ataasiightekayug k _ yugusigh ak _ . _ qayughllak _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ maalghug _ yugusigh k _ ataasighte yaghqaa uk _ . _ "
iwernga _ atanegh mun _ lliigh kuvek _ , _ ataasigh u utek _ taghneghagh kun _ .
L i i s i m a k e n g h i s t e g g u u _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke kangi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghfig i _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ T a g h n e g h a g h m i n e n g _ , _ enkaam _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi liite kaqe aisi _ . _ elpesi neng _ pike nghite usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe gpenasi _ . _ S e x - k u n _ seghleghqe gkufsi _ , _ nukeggnaghqe lghii stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ p i l l e q a g h s i _ . _ ila i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ tawatete nghite ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ akitu pigte luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ q u u l v a g h t e g g u _ kiyaghnegh _ yugusigh gpesigun _ .
A a p t e k a q a g h p e s i n g a _ nengughte te llegh meng _ lata gpesigun _ . _ U k u s t a _ kiimsigh te nka _ . _ pinigh uq _ yuug _ nuliigh ngunani _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tamaghhagh mi _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ aghnagh _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugi lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ n a n g h i i q u l l e n g n a y u k a f s i _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
yug m _ e f q u g h s a g h q a q a a _ nuliigh ni _ . _ T a w a t e g g h p i g a q _ aghnagh m _ e f q u s a g h q a q a a _ ugi ni _ atuqe te llegh megteni _ .
aghnagh m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ ugi an llu _ pi ke aa _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ yug m _ ellnginagh mi _ yugusigh ni _ pike nghite a _ , _ nulighh an llu _ pi ke aa _ .
nengughte ma kufsi _ ighsake te gpenasi _ . _ wetku qun _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ atuqe te yaghqaa fqaafsi _ qafsina t _ u n u g e t _ yughagh aghagh na lusi _ . _ taagken _ a t u q u n n e q i g l l e g h h a a s i _ n a n g h i i q u l l e n g n a y u k a f s i _ tughneghagh- meng _ qayughllak _ nuqete yaghqaa nanigh kau lghiisi _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ n u l i g h t i i s q e l l u s i _ nalighmeng _ u g i i g h e s q e l l u s i _ . _ iwernga _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ .
whanga mtun tuq _ nulightugh fqaafsi _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh fqaafsi _ . _ iwernga _ allake te ukut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nuliigh lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ugi lgu stekayugu ai _ ila i _ aghnagh t _ . _ iwernga _ itagnagh stekayugu ai _ ila i _ yug t _ nula i u na ki _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugi u na ki _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ allake te lghii _ tunusagh _ t u u n e g k a y u w a a _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
una ta _ pi kegka _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh nun _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh nun llu _ , _ ugingighagh nun llu _ : _ pinigh nayagh usi _ nulightugh nghite yagh kufsi _ whanga mtun _ , _ aghnagh ni llu _ ugiigh nghite yagh kufsi _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ nulightugh luni _ n u q e t e p a g n i n g i l n g u q _ aghnagh yug llegh mineng _ . _ aghnagh llu _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ ugiigh luni _ n u q e t e p a g n e n g i l n g u q _ yug yug llegh mineng _ . _ pinigh aghagh nayagh usi _ nengughte lusi _ nanghiiqu lleg nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ s e x - k u n _ .
ukut _ akuzite t _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ qelegh sagh u ut _ atanegh meng _ nengughtekagh nun _ . _ aghnagh _ iqite yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi mineng _ .
iwernga _ iqite kuni _ , _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ ugi minun _ lliigh nqigte li _ . _ yug m llu _ iqitesaghqagh ke nghite a _ nuliigh ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh _ whanga mneng _ pi u uq _ ila itnun _ . _ ( _ A t a n g h e m _ sa meng _ pi aghte mangite a _ . _ ) _ yuug _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ nuliigh lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite ste nghite ligu _ .
aghnagh llu _ ugpeqe aq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ ugi lgu kuni _ ellminite yu lghii meng _ , _ iqite nghite li _ .
inqun _ yuug _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ a a f t e n g n g w a a q a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ nulighh a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ aghnagh llu _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ a a f t e n g n g w a a q a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ ugi a _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ taghnughhagh it _ pelungite ut llu _ a a f t e n g n g w a a q a a g u t l u _ .
iwernga _ naligh _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ iqite yu kuni _ , _ iqite li _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ nalighmeng _ aghnagh _ iteme li _ t a w a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ nengughte llegh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ n e k e g g m e l l u s i _ kiyaghte sqe sug aqe aisi _ .
ugpeqagh mi _ aghnagh mi _ , _ ugi gpenite kuvek _ k a y u s i i t a q s a a g h a n _ yuguligh llegh mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh mi _ yug mi _ , _ nuliigh gpenite kuvek _ k a y u s i i t a q s a a g h a n _ yuguligh llegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ a t a a s i k a g h t a g h p e s i _ u g p e q i s t a q n g i s i _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ , _ nengughtekau tsi _ nalighmeng _ nengughte ma nge i tsi _ ? _ C i r c u m c i s e - e k a a t s i i _ nalighmeng _ pi ma nge i tsi _ ? _ Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u y a g h e t s i i _ nalighmeng _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i t e t s i i _ ? _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ nagnegh tek _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ tawatete stekaqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ taagken _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ .
yuug _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a q _ ugpegh aqngami _ , _ allangughte te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ C i r c u m c i s e - e m a n g i l n g u q l u _ ugpeqe aq _ , _ c i r c u m c i s e - e n a q e f q a a m i _ pi lghaaq _ .
C i r c u m c i s e - e l l e q l u _ c i r c u m c i s e - e n g h i t e l l e q l u _ p i t n g u n g h i t u k _ . _ P i t n g u y a g h q a q t a _ taana _ qaute kete luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
A t a a s i k a g h t a g h p e s i _ ugpeqe i aqngafsi _ , _ natete llegh gpesistun _ almesiqe teggu _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u y a g h s i i n _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh aqe yaten _ ? _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ . _ iwernga _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n a n i g h n a q n g u k u v e k _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ legan _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a q _ nakmikegkagh a _ A t a n g h e m _ , _ ellnga n _ iteme nga lghii ke a _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u q _ yuug _ nakmikegkagh a _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ ellnga n _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a q a a _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tukfighpag kaqe aisi _ , _ enkaam _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h t e g p e n a s i _ yug nun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ aghula igh te yaghqaa usi _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ almesiqe lusi _ tawaten _ tuqlugh llegh atun _ .
A a p t a q a g h p e s i n g a _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ nulightugh ma ite ngugh t llu _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ ungipaate mangite aanga _ liilightuusagh meng _ t a m a a k u n u n _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ a p o s t l e - n g u g h t e k a a g u n g a _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ neghyuke nakefsinga _ .
S e g h l e l i i g h l l a g u g h t u q _ nuna _ maaten _ . _ sume mni _ whanga _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yuug _ almesiqe luni _ .
nulightugh ma ziin _ ? _ iqite ste gpenaan _ nulighh n _ . _ nulightugh ma ite kuvek _ , _ nulightugh naqe gpenang _ .
iwernga _ nulightugh kuvek _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u n g h i t u t e n _ . _ ugiigh ma ite ngughk _ ugiigh kuni _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u n g h i t u q _ . _ iwernga _ nulightugh kufsi _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugiigh kumeng _ piyaqleg iigh aghagh yaghqaa usi _ whani _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m i _ . _ piyaqleg iigh sug nghite pigte amsi _ tawaten _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ una ta _ pi kegka _ : _ atanegh ut _ tagi yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ nengughtekagh t _ qepghagh te litgu _ atanegh _ n e n g u g h s i m a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ .
qivghu lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ q i v g h u n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ . _ quya nga lghiit llu _ qepghagh te litgu _ q u y a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ . _ tamaakut llu _ tukfightugh ghllag kayug t _ qepghagh te litgu _ a v a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ .
K i y a g h t e n g n g u l u s i _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ megnu ke aghagh gpenaan _ nuna m _ s a n q u t a n g a _ . _ qayughllak _ nuna _ almesiqe luni _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ .
K i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e n g t u q _ whaken _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e g k i i l n g u u s i _ . _ nulightugh ma ite ngughk _ q e p g h a l l e g h q a g h t a a g h a t u q _ A t a n g h e m _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ e f q u g h s u g a q e g k a n g a _ .
nuliigh leg _ qepghagh aghagh qagh yu qu uq _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h e m _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ e f q u g h s u g a q e g k a n g a _ nuliigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ m a l g h u g h q e n g n g a a q u q _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ aghnagh t llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ aghnagh t _ ugi igh tke aat _ , _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh t llu _ q e p g h a l l e g h q a g h t a a g h a t u t _ A t a n g h e m _ qepghaqagh aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh teng llu _ taghneghagh teng llu _ tuune yug aqe ait _ iingunagh ita _ atanegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ ugi leg _ qepghagh aghagh kayugu uq _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h e m _ qepghaqagh aneng _ qayughllak _ e f q u g h s u g a q e g k a n g a _ ugi ni _ . _ ellnga n llu _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ m a l g h u g h q e n g n g a a q _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ nengughte snanigh nghite amsi _ . _ iwernga _ nakmike sug aqa _ pinigh lleghpigagh _ elpesi nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ atanegh _ uglafqe sigh ngunasi _ .
nuliighqagh leg m _ atuqe yug yagute kunigu _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ nengughte lik _ . _ enkaam _ nengughtekumek _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u n a a n g h i t u k _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a q u m i g u _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ n u q e t u t n g u k u m i g u l l u _ atuqe yu llegh mineng _ nuliighqagh ni _ , _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ n u l i g h t i i s q u g h a a n g h i l k u m i g u _ , _ nulightugh yug nghite kuni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ .
nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte luni _ pinitun _ pi u uq _ , _ iwernga _ nuliighqagh leg _ nengughte nghite kuni _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ pi u uq _ .
aghnagh _ alla neng _ ugiigh yaghqaa nghite uq _ ugi ni _ kiyaghte luku _ . _ iwernga _ ugi ni _ tuqu kan _ , _ piyuke llegh mineng _ ugiigh yagh ghngaaghmi _ itagnagh uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugpeqagh ghhagh inagh meng _ .
iwernga _ q u y a n g a a g h a t a g h a g h y a g h q a a g u q _ ugiigh nqigte nghite kuni _ . _ T a a k u s t a _ sumeghtaghagh llegh nka _ . _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ whanga mnite uk _ .
kiimsigh yug anka _ a a p q u g h a a l l e s i _ negh ke neng _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ ipa u uq _ whaten _ pi llegh i _ , _ " _ liisima lleg lgu ukut _ qamagte luta _ . _ " _ T a w a t e l n g u q _ liisima llegh _ aangaayugte ste i kayugu uq _ , _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh m _ i k n a q u g h t e n g n g w a a _ ugpegh llegh ut _ .
yuug _ p i l l g u y u g n e q _ , _ esghaghhu ta _ taana _ paninang _ liite yaghqaghtuqagh _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i n i q i s t e n i _ whaten _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ , _ " _ whanga _ pi ke anka _ . _ "
enkaam _ neghe lleqe sta _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ? _ liisimake aput _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh u nghite ut _ . _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ alla _ kiyaghnegh ite uq _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ kiyaghneghtu ni luku _ , _ ataneghtu ni luku _ qilag llu _ nuna llu _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ellnga _ A t a n g h u u q _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ellnga neng _ pi u uq _ , _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u k u t _ ellnga nun _ . _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ . _ ellnga kun _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ulima kau uq _ , _ unguva u ukut llu _ ellnga kun _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ nalluke ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite u langi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe aqe ait _ neqe t _ aghqe te kaqe ni luki _ kiyaghnegh pig nun _ . _ enkaam _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ neqe _ p i t n g u n g h i t u q _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe aghagh naanghite aisi _ neghe llegh gpesigun _ neqe meng _ . _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ neghenghite kumta _ sa u a _ alngunak _ i f l a n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ talwa _ neghe ghngaamta _ allgegh te na nghite ukut _ ellnga neng _ .
ugpeqagh ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi yaghqaa lghiisi _ , _ liigike nga te gpesineng _ taana _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ apeghtuusagh ke kaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kelenga lusi _ k a y a a l n g u u t _ ugpegh llegh it _ a y u q n i i g h q e g p e n a k i _ ellngit a _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ .
naligh ita _ esghagh kuniten _ negh ma luten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ temple- nge i te ni _ , _ ellnga llu _ negh yug yaaghte uq _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mini _ anaggute nga yagh ghngaan _ .
enkaam _ liisima llegh gpek _ seghleghqe stesagh u aghagh a _ k a y a a l n g u q _ ugpegh llegh a _ ifla ste luku _ , _ ugpeqagh u lgute kan _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu tkekagh a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ a y u q n i i g h q e g k u f s i k i _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itni _ anaggute nga lghii meng _ , _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ ellngit nun llu _ C h r i s t - a m u n l l u _ .
enkaam _ neghe lleg mkun _ a g h q u t q e g k a m e n g _ seghleghqe ste na yukagh mkun _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ , _ allameng llu _ negh naanghite unga _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ .
iteme nga unga _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa unga _ . _ A p o s t l e - n g u u n g a _ esghagh tke aq _ J e s u s - m e n g _ atanegh mnneng _ . _ qepghagh te lleg mkun _ ellnga _ ugpeqagh u usi _ elpek si _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ a p o s t l e - e p i g u n g h i n n i g h n g a a t n g a _ elpek si _ l i i s i m a k a g h p e s i n g a _ a p o s t l e - e p i i g u u n g a _ atanegh kun _ , _ qayughllak _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h p e s i _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ kelgute kanga _ .
T a a k u s t a _ apegh aqe kenka _ s e g h l e q i s t e m n u n _ .
B a r n a b a s - l u _ whangkutung _ t u n g s i g h n a a n g h i s t u u n g _ neghyaghqagh meng llu _ meghyaghqagh meng llu _ elpesi neng _ apeghtuqagh mtegneng _ ?
navek _ pinegh mtung _ k e l q e p a g n i n g i t e s t e g n e k i i _ ugpeqagh t _ nuliigh pung _ i l a n g i s t u n _ a p o s t l e - e t _ , _ A t a n g h e m _ a n g l e g u t a n g i s t u n l l u _ , _ P e t e r - e t u n l l u _ ?
B a r n a b a s - l u _ w h a n g k u t u u n g _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a m t u n g _ q e p g h a a s i m a n g i n a g h y a g h q a q e s t e g n e g u u _ neqekaghqagh ung _ ?
P i l l u w a g h t e m _ tukfigh yaghqaqe nghite ai _ saghya ni _ p i l l u w a g h t e n i l l u n i _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ grapes- meng _ p i i t e s i i g h a g h t e m _ neghe kayugu ai _ ila i _ piite stekagh ni _ . _ P e n n i i g h n i i g h t e m l l u _ penniigh mi _ mamagh an _ ila a _ pikayug u a _ .
taakut _ usputagh t _ yug m _ apeghtuusagh ke ai _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ L i i l i g h t u s a a n i l l u _ apeghtuusagh t _ tawatete ut _ .
igaqe kau uq _ liilightuusagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh akun _ M o s e s - m u n _ : _ " _ S u g r u g i i t a l i g h p e n a n _ o x - a _ w h e a t - e t _ tutmagh ste nghpesiki _ qantagh it _ s i g i q e s q e l l u k i _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghmike nghite agu _ o x - a _ ?
sangami _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi a _ ? _ O x - n g i n a g h h a a q _ sumegh ke agu _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ whangkuta llu _ suumqagh ke ainkut _ . _ ipapestaaq _ w h a n g k u n n u n l l u _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ qayughllak _ piitesighaghvig meng _ y a t a a g h q i s t e n u n l l u _ s a g h n a s t e n u n l l u _ neghyuke kayugu aput _ nengighqe aput _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ piite yaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ whangkutung _ piitesighagh vike kaqe amsi _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh si _ quya stekau ut _ . _ tungsighpag lleqe stuung _ tungsigh vike gkumsi _ a k l u k e g k a m t e g n e n g _ ?
apeghtughiste m _ ila i _ elpesi neng _ allgegh te u kata _ a k l u k e g k a m e g g n e n g _ , _ whangkutung _ wataqaaghaq _ p i y a g h q a g h p i g a a y a g h t u k u n g _ . _ yeghlegi _ qepghagh yug kau ukung _ m a n i n g e r e g a g h n a l u t u n g _ a k l u k e g k a m t e g n e n g _ allgegh te na lutung _ . _ ilangani _ mani pagite aqe ukung _ . _ talwa _ tamaani _ aapte yug igate amsi _ a k i l e g h t i i s q e l l u t u n g _ . _ una ta _ apallugh ka _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi sug nghite ukung _ , _ " _ P a u l _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
liisima kasi _ T e m p l e - e m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ neghe kayug t _ neqe meng _ temple- mun _ tuunekagh meng _ . _ aghqefig m llu _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ nengigh kayugu ut _ aghqe te kaghqagh meng _ .
tawatete uq _ A t a n g h e m _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ U n g i p a g h t e t l u _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ a k l u k e g k a t e n g _ allgeghsaghqagh ke ait _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
elpesi neng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te igate unga _ pi kaghqagh ke yagh ke mneng _ . _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh ni lunga _ maaten _ . _ quya aqe unga _ akileghtigh sqe igate ngugh u nga _ elpesi nun _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i naqngu unga _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ talwa _ panegh yagh ghngaaghma _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi naanghite aanga _ , _ " _ P a u l _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na luni _ . _ "
iwernga _ a a n g a a y u g u s i g h q i i t u n g a _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelqe aqe aanga _ u n g i p a q i s q e l l u n g a _ . _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a y a g h t u n g a _ qaatke nghite yagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ .
nakmike kaqsagh kumkun _ una _ qepghaqagh _ whanga mneng _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh lgu ni lunga _ pi nayagh unga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ta aneng _ pi yaghqaqe aqa _ akileghtuusagh ite ghngaaghma _ . _ alla _ naten _ pi lleghqagh ite unga _ .
sangaawa _ akileghtuusagh ka _ ? _ akileghtuusagh ke aqa _ una _ , _ quya pigte aqe unga _ akileghtuusagh ngunanga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qaywa _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe yagh ghngaaghpesinga _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i s a g h n g a a g h m a _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h t e k a a g u n g a _ kitumun _ alngunak _ , _ yug mun _ uglagh lghii mun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ C h r i s t - a _ .
J e w s - e n i n n e m n i _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ ellngistun _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ kiyaghte negh mni _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ liilightuusagh tgun _ k i y a g h t a a g h n i _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ liisimake ghngaamkun _ qaatke te lleg mkun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ C h r i s t - a _ .
G e n t i l e - e n i n n e m n i _ nalluke i lghii ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ellngistun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ nalluke lghii stun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ Q a a t k e n g n g u n g h i n n i l u k i _ pi u nghite anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ iwernga _ q a a t k e n g n g w a a n k a _ C h r i s t - a m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
K a y a a l n g u g h n i _ kiyaghte negh mni _ ellngistun _ lliigh aqe unga _ , _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ kinku stun _ alngunak _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ natete yagh nga a ta _ , _ naten _ alngunak _ y u g u l i l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ n a g a q i i s q e q e g h l l u k i _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ qayughllak _ quya ste lleg nge aqe lghiinga llu _ u g p e q e n g h a t g u _ C h r i s t - a _ .
qamagte luteng _ k e t a n q u s t e t _ sivulii yu kayugu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ataasigh ghhagh _ kayaalqe i i kayugu uq _ . _ K i y a g h t a a l l e g h p e s i n i _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ k e t a n q u s t e s t u n _ kayaalqe i i naqe aqe tek _ .
K e t a n q u s t e t _ ulape aqe ut _ yugusigh teng _ i k n a q u g h h n a l u k i _ qayughllak _ qaghpa nge yug aqe lghiit _ avayagh meng _ ququngagh leg meng _ . _ tamaakut _ paligh yaghqaa ut _ . _ iwernga _ qaghpa _ ugpeqagh t _ allgeghsaghqagh at _ q u u n p e k a g h q a a g u q _ .
K e t a n q u s t e s t u n _ taklaghruketun _ ketanqu aqe unga _ kaate na lunga _ kenle mun _ . _ nalighmeng _ t e n g l u g t e s t u n _ , _ tenglug agaatagh aqe unga _ kayaalqe i i na lunga _ .
ungipagh kau iqe unga _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ whanga llu _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u n g a _ ellnga nun _ enkaam _ yugusigh mnun _ qaatke ste aqe unga _ , _ luuraq _ pi nghite kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite na yu kanganga _ ellmi neng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke sqe sug anka _ J e w s - e t _ , _ maligsaagh ikagh t _ M o s e s - m e n g _ . _ E g y p t - m e n g _ aghulaqe aqngameng _ qamagte luteng _ maligtekaqe aat _ qilag u aq _ , _ maghyaghqugh i lghii _ tume kaghqagh itgun _ . _ kaa sa ta _ kavilngugh mun _ kellii mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ p e l l e g h t e k a q e g k a n g a _ megh _ a g h v i i s q e l l u k i _ yaywaaseng _ .
qamagte luteng _ paaptaayekagh u lghiit _ qilawaagh kun llu _ kavilngugh kun llu _ kellii kun _ maligte yaaghte u luteng _ M o s e s - m u n _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe kau ut _ manna- meng _ ,
meghe kau ut _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ megh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ meghe kaqe aat _ megh _ maaqekagh _ uyghag meng _ . _ T a a m _ uyghag m _ maligsaagh kaqe kangi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ . _ uyghag _ taana _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kaqe ghngaisteng _ , _ paninang _ allute luteng _ e f q u g h s i m a n g i l k a n g a t _ ellnga _ . _ enkaam _ tumangani _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu ste aqe luki _ yugusighkwaagh it _ mingite kau lghiit _ kilgaa ni _ .
tamaa na _ qamagte luni _ p i l l g h a t _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ usputagh u uq _ , _ k e l e n g a s a a g h i i n k u t _ ellngistun _ piyuke fqaan _ seghlegh _ pi sqellug qu _ .
manig ughte ngughte gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ i l a n g i s t u n _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ negh aqe ut _ , _ megh aqe ut _ taagken _ aghula aqe ut _ . _ " _ tawaten _ maniguute kau ut _ g o l d - m e n g _ ulimaagh mun _ k a a w a g h a g h m u n _ .
seghleghqe fqaamta _ s e x - k u n _ i l a n g i s t u n _ . _ A l l g e g h n e g h a _ seghleghqe llghite a _ 2 3 , 0 0 0 _ yuug _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ .
N a n g h i i q u n a q e f q a a m t e g g u _ A t a n g h e m _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ pi lteggu _ , _ i l a n g i s t u n _ . _ nemeghyagh t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ nanghiiqu kaqe kangat _ atanegh _ .
A k u z i l g a g h p e n a s i _ i l a n g i s t u n _ . _ yaquleg m _ tuqu ste i kayug m _ tuqu qugh kaqe ai _ ila i _ sivunegh put _ qayughllak _ a k u z i l g a a t k a q e g k a n g a t _ kiyaghnegh _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ sivunegh mta _ atuqekagh it _ , _ usputaghqagh u kau ut _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ igaqe kau ut _ kelenga sagh u te u luteng _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ , _ ellngistun _ pi fqaamta _ p i s q e l l u t a _ .
enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ pikumi _ ugpegh lleg ni _ aghula igh te ni luku _ , _ kelenga li _ luuraq _ seghleghqesagh u aghte uq _ .
qamagte luteng _ nanghiiqu lleg si _ a l l a k a a y a g u n g h i t u t _ yug nun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ ata siigh mete uq _ , _ nanghiiqu llegh mun _ qaasghutesaghqagh ke nghite ai _ iknaqe lleg si _ , _ i k n a q e l l e l i t a q n a a g h i i s i _ nuqete sighqagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ iqite aqe lleqe usi _ taagken _ nanghiiqu llegh meng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ maniguute gpenasi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
aleghqugh amsi _ sumeghnegh lgu lusi _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nakesi _ sa meng _ p i l q a _ .
I y a m s i q a y a g u n n e m t e g g u _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ wine- a _ A t a n g h e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ C h r i s t - a m _ aaw aneng _ . _ iigge mnneng _ aavgugh luku _ neqekrangllagh _ n e n e m t e g g u _ , _ nengigh aqe ukut _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh aneng _ .
neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh kau ghngaaghmi _ ataasigh u uq _ . _ uglagh ghllag yagh ghngaamta _ , _ ataasigh meng _ taagken _ negh aqe ukut _ . _ enkaam _ kelgute aqe a _ n a l i g h n e q u g h n i l u t a _ ataasigh mun _ yugusigh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ ; _ nenegh meggni _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ , _ ilate aqe ut _ maniguute lghii nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqefig gni _ .
S u m e g h p e s i n i i _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu aat _ ? _ neqe t llu _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ manigugh sigh pigu aqe aat _ ?
nakaa _ ! _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ a g h q e r r a a g h a q u t _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ n a k a n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ilate nga ste sug nghite amsi _ tughneghagh nun _ .
C h r i s t - a m u n _ pi liite stekau kufsi _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naanghite asi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ A t a n g h e m _ qayuusigh aneng _ meghe gkufsi _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ qayuusigh itneng _ megh naanghite usi _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ A t a n g h e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ neghe kayugu kufsi _ neqekrangllagh meng _ A t a n g h e m _ tipele gkeni _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ tipele itni _ negh naanghite usi _ neqe meng _ .
whangkuta _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ tughneghagh t _ maligte naqe gkumteki _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ q u n g y a g h t e s l e q a g h p u t _ . _ neqamike luku _ ellnga _ iknaqe ghllag uq _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ .
ila si _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ila i _ salleg si _ pinigh nghite ut _ . _ aa-a _ , _ entaqun _ , _ " _ itagnagh uq _ sa u a _ piyuke llegh ka _ pi yagh ghngaamkun _ , _ " _ iwernga _ ila yan _ sa llegh gpesi _ kayuute yiite naanghite ai _ ugpegh lleg si _ .
kina _ alngunak _ e l l n g i n a a y u g t e f q a a m i _ pi uq lli _ , _ yeghlegi _ ila ni llu _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe luki _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kemeg qragh k _ tukfighkagh i _ estugagh meng _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
qayughllak _ igaqe kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ nuna _ , _ sa u aat llu _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke ai _ . _ "
ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh m _ negh yaghtigh sqe kangisi _ piyug kufsi _ pi lghaasi _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ketfaghtuqagh at _ negh aqe teggu _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaan _ aghqe tke kau ta a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ pi kangisi _ , _ " _ taana _ aghqe tke kau uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ " _ neghe gpenaan _ , _ u n g i p a a t i s t e g p e s i _ ugpegh llegh a _ k a y a a l i s n a y u k a f s i g u _ , _ qayughllak _ ellnga ni _ anaggute nga lghii u uq _ . _ entaqun _ sumeghtaghagh na yalghiisi _ , _ " _ sangama tuq _ piyuke lleg mtun _ pi yaghqaa nghite zinga _ ? _ sangama tuq _ kitum _ i n e g h q u g h a g h a q a n g a _ alla tun _ sumeghtaghagh kayug m _ whanga mneng _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike gkumkun _ kiyaghnegh _ neghyaghqagh mneng _ , _ s a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ kitum _ s e g h l e q u u g h l l e q a n g a _ neghe gkuma _ iyamsiqa yug tkekagh mneng _ ? _ "
enkaam _ qamagte luku _ sa llegh i _ q u u l v a a s i q a q i t e g g u _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ talwa _ neghe lleg si llu _ meghe lleg si llu _ .
sa gpenasi _ seghleghqe ste i yaghqagh meng _ J e w s - e n u n _ , _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ , _ ugpeqagh nun llu _ .
E f q u g h h n a q u t k a q a n k a _ yug lgute nka _ salleg mkun _ alngunak _ . _ whanga inagh mnun _ pinigh lleghqagh _ pi igate aqa _ , _ iwernga _ pinighqe lleghqagh itnun llu _ yug lgute ma _ pi aqe unga _ , _ uglagh lghii _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug qu _ .
enkaam _ whanga mtun _ pi aqe tek _ , _ katam _ whanga _ maligte lleg mtun _ C h r i s t - a _ .
usuqe amsi _ neqamike kefsinga _ , _ atuqe kesi llu _ apeghtuusagh nka _ .
iwernga _ liigike sug amsi _ C h r i s t - a _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ yugu uq llu _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nuliigh mineng _ .
nasqughiitagh igh luni _ yuug _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ yughaghvig mi _ , _ q u u l v a g h y a g h q a q e n g h i t a a _ n a a s q u u t i l g h i _ .
enkaam _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh gpenani _ yughagh kuni _ nalighmeng _ ungipagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ q u u l v a g h y a g h q a q e n g h i t a a _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ . _ tawaten _ pikumi _ q i g u g h w a a q a s t u n _ meqe ste luni _ ayuqe lleqe uq _ .
aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yug nghite kuni _ , _ kepugh li _ nuyiigh te luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh ni _ kayngu nagh lghii u uq _ qigugh llegh llu _ nuyiigh te luni llu _ kepugh llegh _ , _ enkaam _ nasqughiitagh igh nga li _ .
yuug _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa nghite uq _ maniguute kuni _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh atun _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ u l i m a a g h u q _ yug m _ aange llegh a _ esghigh sqellug qu _ .
liisimake kesi _ yuug _ aghnagh meng _ ulimaagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u lghii _ .
yuug _ ulimaagh u nghite uq llu _ aghnagh mun _ iwernga _ aghnagh _ ulimaagh u uq _ yug mun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnagh _ nasqughiitagh igh yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ yaquleg t _ liigike litgu _ yuug _ aghnagh mun _ naasqugh u te i u ta a _ .
iwernga _ neqamike teggu _ A t a n g h e m _ uspeqe llegh a _ , _ yug nkuk _ aghnaa nkuk _ aklu kete te nga uk _ .
aghnaqe yug ggaaq _ yug meng _ ulimaagh u ghngaan _ , _ taagken _ kenlanga _ yuug _ qamagte luni _ allgegh kau uq _ aghnagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh t llu _ yug t llu _ qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ : _ ipa _ anaggute nga a _ aghnagh m _ nasqughiitagh ngunani _ yughagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ?
yug t _ quunpeng _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ n u y i i g h t e k a g h n g u q _ yuug _ u k a v a g h t a q u q _ ellmi neng _ ,
iwernga _ aghnagh m _ nuyagh ghllag ni _ q u u l v a a s i q a a _ . _ nasqughiitaghqagh u luni _ ellnga nun _ pi kau uq _ .
paninang _ kina _ aaghtiiraagh yug u kuni _ nasqughiitagh meng _ , _ u n g i p a a n n e q i g t a g h l l a k u n _ taana ta _ a p o s t l e - e n i _ a p e g h t u u s a q a q e g k e f u t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ atuqe aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ n a a n s a g h n g a a g h m e n g _ .
whaken _ apeghtugh yug amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesineng _ maniguute llegh mun _ . _ usuqepagningite amsi _ qerngughte te aqe llegh gpesinun _ qayughllak _ a q n i g h q u u t a g h a g h a q u s i _ pinighqe te gpenasi _ .
ungipaate aqe aatnga _ qerngughte te negh gpesini nguq _ ila si _ a a f q e m e r a a g h u t a q u t _ , _ ataasigh stun _ pi gpenateng _ . _ ugpeqe kestagh luku _ lliigh aqa _ .
entaqun _ aafqugh te llegh gpesigun _ liigike yaghqaqe asi _ naligh si _ ipa _ qaatke te nga ta i _ atanegh mun _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ A t a n g h e m _ neghesta igh llegh anun _ , _ n e g h y a g h t u u n g h i t a q a g h s i _ .
neghe uute negh gpesini _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ negh ragkiigh aqe usi _ neqe gpesineng _ , _ ila si _ utaqa gpenaki _ . _ enkaam _ ila si _ iyatagh aqe ut _ , _ ila si _ suume aqe ut _ .
N e g h i g a t s i i - i _ , _ m e g h i g a t s i i - i _ ne gpesini _ ? _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke stekagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ? _ kayngusaghagh te ste naqutke aqe stekagh i _ ava ite ngugh t _ ? _ sa meng _ pi lamsi _ ? _ U s u q l a m s i i _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ usuqe naanghite amsi _ !
sa u a _ liite kaqe a _ atanegh meng _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ tawani _ uvegh ghpagte te lleghqagh mini _ tugukagh a _ neqekrangllagh _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike yamigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ elpesi nun _ pi u uq _ . _ negh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ w i n e - e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ imaleg _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ qayuusigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghagh u uq _ akequsagh a _ aaw mkun _ . _ awen _ megh aqe teggu _ neqamike sigh u luku _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nenegh gpesini _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ menegh gpesini llu _ taagken _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ k e l g u t n g w a a q a g h s i _ A t a n g h e m _ tuqu llegh a _ kenlanga _ alla _ tagi lleghqagh anun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ temngi _ neghe gkuni _ A t a n g h e m _ neqekrangllagh aneng _ , _ meghe gkuni llu _ A t a n g h e m _ qayuusigh aneng _ , _ q u u l v a g h n a a n g h i t a a _ A t a n g h e m _ yugusigh a llu _ aawallu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sivuke luni _ yug m _ avuteghqe te kete liki _ seghleghqe lleg ni _ alla _ pi yaghqaa fqiita _ pi na luki _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lghaaq _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghaaq llu _ qayuusigh meng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ neghe lghii _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ meghe lghii llu _ qayuusigh meng _ , _ A t a n g h e m _ yugusigh a _ liigike naqe gpenaan _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ n a n q i g t e l l e n g y a g h q a a q u q _ atanegh meng _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ uglagh usi _ k a y a a l n g u g h n i l l u _ qinuyug nga lghii ni llu _ enkaam _ qafsina t _ tuqu laghate te kau ut _ .
iwernga _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t a _ nanqigtekumta _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ katam _ enkaam _ avuteghqe tke gkumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ A t a n g h e m _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ .
iwernga _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghtugh yug nghminikut _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ , _ nanqigte aqe ainkut _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaa fqaamta _ pi na luta _ nanqigte i kuni _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh neng _ .
enkaam _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ negh na lusi _ A t a n g h e m _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ neghe kestagh gpenasi _ , _ utaqatu te aqe lusi _ .
iyatagh lghiit _ tamaakut _ ne meggni _ negh lit _ e n k a a n g a m _ A t a n g h e m _ nanqigte nghite liki _ . _ aglagh kuma _ elpesi nun _ ila i _ aaptekasi _ kiimsigh naagh anka _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ liite sug amsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ .
N e q a m i k a g h s i _ salin _ ugpegh llghite lusi _ maniguute ste aatagh kaqe kangisi _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ akuzi igate ngugh nun _ . _ aaghqute aqe stekau lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ liigike sug amsi _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ seghleghu uq _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ a k u z i s t e n g n g u n g h i t a a _ tawaten _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ A t a n g h u u q _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ a k u z i s t e n g n g w a a _ tawaten _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ alla ghhagh inagh u ut _ , _ iwernga _ tunusagh t _ qamagte luki _ t a a m _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh ke ai _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qepghagh te i lleghqagh _ ila mun _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ atanegh _ qepghagh te lleg nge aqe uq _ .
uglagh u pigte uq _ allake te lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaqagh a _ , _ iwernga _ t a a m _ ataasigh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ste aqe ai _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liite stekayugu a _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n i _ ugpeqagh tgun _ t u n u s a l i t k a m i k u n _ . _ tunusagh t _ kitumun _ alngunak _ pinighqe sighqagh u ut _ .
T a a m _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ ila i _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ peghqinellegh mikun _ , _ ila i _ liisima llegh mikun _ .
T a a m _ ataasigh m _ taghneghagh m _ u g p e q i l l e l i t a g h a q a q i i _ ila i _ yug t _ , _ ila i _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i t a q i i _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ aqnighnegh neng _ .
taghneghagh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s i g h q a m e n g _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleghqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ tugukligh kaqe a _ liigike i lleghqagh _ agleghnagh lghii m _ T a g h e g h a m _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh t _ igleghte te u ta a _ kina _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ akuzi ste aqe ai _ ila i _ yug t _ aw llaag ghhagh u i nakete te _ ulu kun _ . _ enkaam _ ila itnun _ mumegh igh qugh ste aqe ai _ akuzillegh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ a t a a s i k a g h t a g h h a g h m e n g _ taagken _ ataasigh gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi u ut _ . _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
katam _ yugusigh _ ataasigh _ nalighneghtu ghllag _ , _ qamagte luteng _ nalighnegh t _ yugusigh m _ pike kangi _ . _ qaywa _ uglagh ghngaaghmeng _ ataasigh u uq _ yugusigh _ , _ C h r i s t - a l l u _ tawatete uq _ .
qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ n a l i g h n e q u g h i i _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh an _ . _ ila put _ J e w s - n g u u t _ , _ ila i _ G e n t i l e - e t _ , _ ila i _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ , _ ila i _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i t u t _ . _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ paaptaayekagh u ukut _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ , _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ y u g u s i l i i t e s q e l l u t a _ . _ qamagte luta _ tugukligh kaqe agput _ ataasigh k _ taghneghagh k _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u nghite uq _ nalighnegh _ , _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
itegagh t _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmeng _ , _ " _ I i g g e n g u n g h i l n g u u n g a _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte ut _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
sigute _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ iye u nghite unga _ , _ yugusigh m _ pike nghite aanga _ . _ " _ taaqe naanghite u aghte uq _ yugusigh mete nghmeng _ .
yugusigh _ iye raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ n a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ nagaqugh nayagh a _ ? _ nalighmeng _ sigute raaghinagh u yagh kuni _ , _ n a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ naagh te nayagh a _ sapag nigh meng _ ?
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima mangite ai _ yugusigh put _ tawatete luki _ . _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ nalighnegh lightuqagh ke ai _ .
yugusigh _ ataasigh u yagh kuni _ nalighnegh _ yugusigh u nayagh nghite uq _ .
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh _ nalighneghtu pigte uq _ .
tea- ma ken _ apallugh ke luku _ iye m _ pinagh nghite ai _ iigge t _ , _ " _ A k l u k e n g h i t a m s i _ . _ " _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ naasqugh m _ pinagh nghite i _ itegagh t _ , _ " _ A k l u k e n g h i t a m s i _ . _ "
ipapestaaq _ yugusigh mta _ n a t a n g i _ kayaate tesugnite ngugh t _ megnu nagh pigte ut _ .
yugusigh mta _ n a t a n g i _ sume mnni _ m e g n u n a p a g i l n g u u t _ , _ elngaatall _ aflenga kaqe aput _ . _ yugusigh mta _ n a t a n g i _ esghagh sug igate ke put _ pilugug nga aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ tamaakut _ esghagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe lghiit _ pilugug igate aput _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe yamigu _ yugusigh _ , _ megnu nagh aghagh stekaqe ai _ megnu naghpag i tesugnite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ yugusigh _ qepghagh kayugu uq _ qerngagh mi _ . _ nalighnegh m _ qamagte luteng _ aflenga kaqe ait _ ila teng _ tawatengwaaq _ .
ataasigh _ aqnigh nghaani _ qamagte luteng _ aqnigh kayugu ut _ . _ ataasigh _ u s u q e l l e n g e n g h a n i _ qamagte luteng _ quya kayugu ut _ .
qamagte lusi _ ugpeqagh ni _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh ke aisi _ , _ n a l i g h n e q u g h i i s i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpeqagh nun _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivuke luki _ A p o s t l e - e t _ aange lleghpigagh u luki _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh i _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ ( _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ ) _ pingayut igh a _ apeghtughiste t _ , _ taagken _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s t e t _ , _ tamaakut llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i t k a t _ n a a l l g h u t i m u n _ , _ kayusigh i yaghqagh t _ ila meggneng _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayug t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yukagh ni _ tamaakut _ naligh itneng _ tunute yaghqagh mi _ tuune aqe ai _ .
qamagte lusi _ A p o s t l e - n g u t s i i _ , _ uuknaliqe ste u tsi _ , _ apeghtughiste u tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i t k a a t s i i _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s i g h q a m e n g _ ,
naallghute i kayugu tsi _ ? _ qamagte lusi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ akuzi kayugu tsi llu _ mumegh igh qugh kayugu tsi llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ akuzillegh neng _ ? _ nakaa _ !
iwernga _ piyuke teki _ aange aghagh lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ . _ whaa _ maaten _ apegh naqe aqa _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ t a a k u n e n g _ .
akuzi kayugu yagh ghngaaghma _ yug t llu _ yaquleg t llu _ a k u z i l l g h i s t u n _ , _ temngi _ tengngaagtagh lleqe unga _ nalighmeng _ lengaaghtagh lleqe unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
uuknaliqe kayugu ghngaaghma _ , _ liigike kayugu ghngaamki _ aliite nghite ngugh t _ qamagte luki _ , _ liisima llegh _ qamagtekaqsagh ghngaamkun _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ghngaaghma _ naayghagh nun _ nuugte i sighqagh meng _ , _ p i t n g u n a a n g h i t u n g a _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
tuune yagh ghngaamki _ qamagte luki _ sa nka _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ paneghtesagh ghngaaghma _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ piniqe i nghite kuma _ .
piniqe llegh _ nuqete neghtu uq llu _ , _ nangllegtagh uq llu _ ; _ piniqe llegh _ a q i n a n g i t u q _ , _ nalighmeng _ y a m r r a n g i t u q _ , _ nalighmeng _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h i t u q _ .
piniqe llegh _ seghleghyug te ite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ e l l n g i n a a y u g n e g h i t u q _ . _ piniqe llegh _ sagiqe igate uq _ piyuke llegh mitun _ pi na luni _ , _ q i k e g h q u n g i g a t u q _ , _ nalighmeng _ neqamike i igate uq _ anaggute llegh meng _ .
piniqe llegh m _ quya sigh ke igate a _ seghlegh _ , _ yeghlegi _ quya sigh ka qaa _ i p a p i l l e q _ .
piniqe llegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ s a n g w a _ sa yagh ghngaan _ . _ iiwleng _ ugpeqe i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ neghyuke i nga uq _ , _ iiwleng _ nuqete neghtu uq _ .
piniqe llegh _ kenle ite ngughk _ . _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ k e n l e t g h u u s a g h q a a g u t _ ; _ alla stun _ akuzillegh t _ taaqe yaghqaa ut _ ; _ liisima llegh _ k e n l e t g h u u s a g h q a a g u q _ .
qayughllak _ tunusagh gput _ liisima llegh llu _ uuknaliqe llegh llu _ iighwite nghite ngugh k _ .
iwernga _ iighwilngugh _ kaate kan _ , _ qamagte luteng _ iighwite nghite ngugh t _ a v i i g h u g h s a g h q a a g u t _ .
taghnughhagh u lunga _ akuzi kayugu yagh unga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh kayugu yagh unga _ , _ liigike kayugu yagh unga _ t a g h n u g h h a g h e s t u n _ , _ iwernga _ yugughte yalghiinga _ t a g h n u g h h a g h e s t u n _ pi nanigh unga _ .
liigike llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ iighwite nghite uq _ , _ katam _ tawatete uq _ esghagh lghii stun _ taghneghaghqugh te lug kun _ . _ Q a k u q a a q u n _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h y a g h q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h p u t _ gginasaghqugh luku _ . _ maaten _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwite nghite uq _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ liisima llegh ka _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ katam _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a q a n g a n g a _ i i g h w i g h m a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ukut _ pi nga yu t _ k e n l e t g h u u n n a a n g h i t u t _ : _ ugpegh llegh _ , _ sighima llegh _ , _ piniqe llegh _ ; _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ .
piniqe lleg nge yug aghagh yaghqaa usi _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ iwernga _ piyuke teki llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh i _ , _ wata _ p i y u k s a g h q a q a g h s i _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
yuug _ akuzi nghmini _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ aleghqugh aqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ yug t _ aleghqagh igh igate ai _ qayughllak _ liigike naagh i te aat _ . _ akuzi aqe uq _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ yug m _ nallukekagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ tunusagh leg _ ungipagh ke i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi kayugu uq _ yug nun _ . _ akuzi ta i _ kayusigh i kayugu ut _ , _ kayeme i kayugu ut _ , _ ilutughsagh i kayugu ut _ yug nun _ .
yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ kayusiite kayugu uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ ungipagh ke i kayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ kayusigh i kayugu uq _ ugpeqagh neng _ .
qamagte lusi _ piyug kaqsagh amsi _ a k u z i s q e l l u s i _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ iwernga _ wataqaaghaq tuq _ tunusagh lgu lghiisi _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ aange aghagh ut _ akuzi kayug neng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ . _ akuzi kayug t _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ m u m i g h q u g h t e l g u y a g h q a a g u t _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u k i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi lunga _ aleghqugh yagh kumsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesigun _ n a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ k a y u s i i n n a y a g h e s t e m s i _ ? _ iwernga _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgutekagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ , _ nalighmeng _ ungipaate yagh kumsi _ sa meng _ liitekagh mneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uuknaliqe tkesagh kumkun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa lleghqagh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ apeghtugh yagh kumsi _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ elngaatall _ kayusiite nayagh amsi _ .
flute- a llu _ harp- a llu _ seghletun _ q a l g h i g h t e k a y e k _ kitum _ alngunak _ l i i g i k n a a n g i t a a _ sa u a _ ilagaate _ atugh aqe ta a _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e m _ b u g l e - a _ q a l g h i g h t e k a g u _ seghletun _ ila ita _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ nalluke lleqe aat _ p i l l u w a l l e g h q a g h t e n g _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ akuzi kufsi _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigike naanghite aisi _ sa meng _ pi i qu tsi _ . _ A k u z i n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ pi yaghqaa usi _ .
uglagh pigte uq _ allaghhiinaq _ akuzillegh _ , _ a t u q i s t e n g i t a _ liigike aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ liigike nghite kumkun _ yuug _ akuzi lghii _ alla kun _ akuzillegh kun _ n a k u m i i n g u u q _ whanga mni _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ n a k u m i i n g u n g a _ ellnga ni _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ elpek si _ , _ tunusagh nge yu pigtekufsi _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tunusagh aneng _ , _ tungsigh tek _ kayute kaghqagh meng _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yuug _ akuzi kayug _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ yughagh li _ mumegh igh qugh yaghqaa luku _ sa meng _ pilleg ni _ .
yughagh yagh kuma _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ yughagh lleqe uk _ , _ iwernga _ umyugagh gma _ liigike naanghite ak _ .
sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ yughagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ yughagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ilagagh lleqe unga _ taghneghagh mkun _ , _ ilagagh lleqe unga llu _ umyugagh mkun _ .
qayughllak _ taghneghagh gpegun _ usuqe gkuvgu _ kiyaghnegh _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ n a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ liigike igate ngugh m _ usuqe i lgusigh lleqe aten _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iyamsiqa yug llegh gpeneng _ ? _ nalluke a _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ .
yughagh llegh n _ pi niigh pigte yagh ghngaan _ ila a _ yug m _ kayusillegh nge naanghite uq _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqe lghiinga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh aghagh luku _ elpesi neng _ .
iwernga _ yughaghvig mete negh mni _ apeghtugh i yug aqe unga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ akuzite t _ atuqe luki _ liigike yaghqagh si _ , _ akuzi naanghite unga _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ uglagh pigte luku _ liigike yaghqaqe nghite ke gpesineng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ t a g h n u g h h a g h h a g h e s t u n _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tek _ anglikagh stun _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe sug llegh i _ t a g h n u g h h a g h h a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe uq _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ : _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ ' _ kayagte lleqe anka _ yug t _ alla neng _ nuna neng _ a l e g h q u g h y a g h t i i s q e l l u s i _ ellngit a _ katam _ u l u n g i s t u n _ . _ aleghqugh lleqe amsi _ q a a n g h i t g u n _ iwernga _ paninang _ n a g a n n a a n g h i t a g h p e s i n g a _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ tunusagh a _ akuzillegh m _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ i p a p i g h q u s i i g u q _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i kayug nun _ . _ ungipagh ke i llegh _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ yughaghvig gpesini _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ akuzite yagh kumeng _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ ila i _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ itegh kumeng _ nallungughte ni lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughk _ nalighmeng _ liigike igate ngughk _ yughaghvig gpesinun _ itegh luni _ nagate kunisi _ ungipagh lghiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ nagate luni _ n a n q i g t e n g n g w a a g h l l e q u q _ seghleghqe ste u ni luni _ .
qamanlliqekagh i _ aksaqe nga lghiit _ qayvighqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qungughte luni _ manigugh lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ whaten _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ whaante uq _ elpesi ni _ . _ "
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ una ta _ apeghtuusagh ke naqutke aqe kegka _ . _ qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maniguute na lusi _ ila si _ ilagagh aqe naagh ut _ , _ kina _ apeghtugh i aqe lleqe uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ ungipagh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh ke sqekagh aneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh i _ akuzi lleqe uq _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ naligh gpesi _ mumegh igh qugh lleqe ai _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh itnun _ i k n a q u g h u s i i l i t _ qamagte luteng _ .
yughaghvig mi _ kina _ akuzi naqngu kuni _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ pi lghaat _ , _ utaqa luki _ ila teng _ taaqe lleghqagh it _ . _ kitum llu _ mumegh igh qugh nakangi _ sa meng _ p i l l g h i t _ .
iwernga _ m u m i g h q u g h t e n g i s k a n _ akuzi lghii mun _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ , _ akuzi te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ . _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ akuzi yu kuni _ kavyuguute gpenani _ akuzi lghaaq _ ellmi nun llu _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ .
uuknaliqe istek _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ ungipange lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ akuzi lit _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nagate lit _ , _ liigike litgu _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ .
iwernga _ kina _ ungipange gkan _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ akuzi lghii _ nepiigh li _ , _ ungipange lghii _ akuzi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ qamagte luteng _ ungipagh ke i yaghqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ akuzi aqe lleqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ nagate lghii _ , _ liite li _ , _ t a a g a v e n g i n a a l l e n g l i l l u _ .
neqamike luki _ ungipagh ke i kayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i t k a a g u t _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ , _ taaqe sighqagh meng llu _ . _ iiwleng _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u t _ akuzi sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ taaqe sighqagh meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ alngunak _ pi sug igate ainkut _ . _ qerngughte te lleg put _ nekegmete sug aqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ qerngughte te nghata _ ,
aghnagh t _ akuzi ste u yaghqaa nghite ut _ yughaghvig ni _ . _ akuzi yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g u y a g h q a a n g h i t u t l u _ qerngughte te nga lghii ni _ , _ qayughllak _ liilightugh sag ni llu _ igaqe nga uq _ tawaten _ .
A a p q u g h a g h y u k u m e n g _ , _ ugi teng _ ne meggni _ aapte litki _ . _ yughaghvig ni _ aghnagh t _ akuzi lleghqagh at _ anaggute nga uq _ .
elpek si _ C o r i n t h - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh t _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h u u s i _ . _ S u m e g h p e s i n i i _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ elpesi neng _ pi u aat _ ? _ E l l n g i n a g h h a g h p e s i n u n _ apeghtugh te kau aat _ ?
kina _ alngunak _ sumegh mini _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luni _ pikumi _ , _ nalighmeng _ ugpegh ghllag ma ni luni _ , _ liigike liki _ lata tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ A t a n e g h e m _ qelegh sagh ke ai _ .
tugukligh nghite kagu _ una _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ tugukligh gpenaan _ ellnga _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ ungipaghte u yug aqe tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe ste gpenaki _ akuzi lghiit _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ .
yughaghvig ni _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinitungwaaq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pi aqe teggu _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh kekagh mneng _ elpesi nun _ . _ tugukligh kaqe asi _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg si _ taaggun _ nekegnga ut _ ayugite luteng _ .
yuguligh lleg nge kau usi _ ugpeqe aqe yafsiki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe manginagh teki _ apeghkagh nka _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe nanigh kufsiki _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii naanghite ut _ .
apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ apeghtuusagh kekagh meng _ whanga mnun _ . _ taakut _ ugpeqe yaghqaqe asi _ : _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i n a q n i l l g h i s t u n _ .
taagken _ llivegh kaqe aat _ , _ enkaam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ p i n a q n i l l g h i s t u n _ .
P e t e r - e m _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ taagken _ kingu aneng _ qamagte luteng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ a p o s t l e - e t _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kingu itneng _ 5 0 0 - n e n g _ uglagh lghii m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ q e r n g a g h l l a g m e n g _ esghagh kaqe aat _ . _ kiyang _ taakut _ unguva ut _ , _ ila i _ tuqu kau ghngaaghmeng _ .
taagken _ J a m e s - e m _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ enkaam _ k i n g u v a q u n _ qamagte luteng _ a p o s t l e - e t _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kinguligh u lunga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ , _ u g p e g h y a g h q a g h p a g n i n g i t k a a g h n g a a g h m a _ kitum i _ alngunak _ .
U k a l i g h p i g a a g u n g a _ a p o s t l e - e n i _ , _ talwa _ atigh yaghqaa nghite yagh unga _ a p o s t l e - m e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ a m y u q e t a a t q e g k a q a n k a _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ a p o s t l e - n g u u n g a _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ whanga mnun _ avangite nghite uq _ . _ qepghagh aghagh unga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ a p o s t l e - e t _ , _ iwernga _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ pi aqe unga _ .
qepghagh aghagh llegh ut _ ila mnneng _ megnu nagh ite uq _ . _ megnu nagh lghii ta _ taana _ qamagte luta _ ungipagh ke kaqe aput _ elpesi nun _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe kaqe asi _ .
ugpeqe u kesi _ ungipagh _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ : _ C h r i s t - a m _ u n g u v a g h t e l l g h a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ S a n g a m e n g a m _ ila si _ pi aqe aat _ , _ " _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh naanghite ut _ ? _ "
kina _ alngunak _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n g i l k a n _ , _ C h r i s t - a _ paninang _ tuqu nga nayagh uq _ .
paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ungipaghqe i uute ukut _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe yaghqagh ite usi _ .
tuqukagh t _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n g i l k a t a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n g i t a a _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ whangkuta _ a p o s t l e - e n i _ qamagte luta _ iqlengiqe ste u ukut _ qayughllak _ pi kau ukut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ C h r i s t - a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
tuqukagh t _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n g i l k a t a _ , _ C h r i s t - a l l u _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n g i t u q _ .
C h r i s t - a _ paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii nghite ut _ enkaam _ aghyugh lleg nge lleqe usi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesinun _ .
U g p e q i s t e t _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ qamagte luteng _ ifla nayagh ut _ .
neghyuke i llegh ut _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ w h a n i n g i n a g h h a q _ k i y a g h t a a l l e m n n i _ atugh u kan _ , _ nanglleg nagh lleghpigagh u yaghqaa ukut _ yug ni _ k i t u m e n g _ alngunak _ .
ipa u uq _ C h r i s t - a _ unguvagh kau uq _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h p u t _ whangkuta llu _ u n g u v a g h t e s a g h q a a g u k u t _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ .
tuqu llegh _ allgegh kau uq _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ , _ A d a m - k u n _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ unguvagh ste llegh _ tuqu llegh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ ilangakun _ yug kun _ , _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
A d a m - k u n _ qamagte luni _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luteng _ C h r i s t - a m e l n g u u t _ u n g u v a g h t e s a g h q a a g u t _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ pi lleghqagh teng _ kaate nghata _ unguvagh aqe naagh ut _ : _ C h r i s t - a _ s i v u l i g h p i g a a l u n i _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ taagken _ tagi nqigtekan _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi i _ unguvagh yaghqaa ut _ .
C h r i s t - a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe llegh minun _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e t _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ yug t llu _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ ilate luki _ . _ C h r i s t - a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe llegh anun _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ C h r i s t - a m _ anguyag i _ . _ kingulighpigagh _ anguyag _ tuqu llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqesagh qugh a _ . _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuune gkagu _ ataneghpag u llegh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata mun _ taagken _ kenle a _ kaate lleqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ lli aghtesaghqagh ke a _ . _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ qaatke stesaghqagh ke a _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte stekunigu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi kan _ , _ taagken _ ighnegh _ ellmi neng _ katam _ asi ligh u aghte yaghqaa uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ elngaatall _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ igleghte te lleqe a _ .
ila i _ yug t _ paaptaaye ste aqe ut _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ . _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u nghite kata _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ s a n g a m e n g a m _ ila i _ paaptaaye ste aqe aat _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ ?
liisimake aput _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh kau ut _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ ungipagh ke i u ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tuqute naqe yagh ghngainkut _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
ipa u uq _ t u q u s a q l e g g i i n a q _ ayuqe aatnga _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ katam _ liisimake llegh gpesistun _ quyake llegh ka _ ugpegh llegh i _ angli lghii _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ atanegh mteggun _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ i p a p i g h q u t k e s a g h q a q a g h s i _ t u q u s a q l e g g i i n a q _ ayuqe kangatnga _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yug t _ E p h e s u s - m e l n g u u t _ p i l l u w a q a n k a _ teghig ke sagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ allgegh te na lunga _ whani _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ p i l l u w a q u m k i _ , _ sa meng _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ . _ tuqu lleg mta _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh yaghqaa nghite kumta _ , _ " _ negh lta _ , _ megh lta _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ "
kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ilakumtaagh nge ma kufsi _ seghletun _ pikayug meng _ , _ a t u q s a g u l l e q a g h s i _ sa u a _ pi aqe kangat _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lusi _ pi nigh itun _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h t e k _ , _ ila si _ a k u l e g p e s i n i l n g u u t _ apeghtugh ma ite ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ qayughllak _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayngu yug yaghqaa usi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi kan _ : _ " _ naten _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh ste aqe aat _ tuqu llegh meng _ ? _ N a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ yugusigh lgu yaghqau aat _ ? _ "
uyuq _ n a l l u u q a q _ ! _ piitute _ nuna kun _ peghu kuvgu _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ sivungagh ni _ piite lleghqagh mi _ .
piitute meng _ alla u luni _ angli aqe uq _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh negh gpeni _ , _ p i i t u t e s q u v e g a g h h a q _ peghu aqe an _ nuna kun _ , _ w h e a t - k a g h q a q _ nalighmeng _ sa u yaghqagh _ .
P i i t u t e s q u v e g a g h h a q _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ y u g u s i l i t a q a a _ . _ allake te lghiit _ piitute t _ allake te lghii meng _ yugusighqagh lgu ut _ .
T a w a t e l k u t n g w a a g h u n g h i t u t _ yugusigh t _ . _ yug t _ , _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ iqallug t _ allake te ut _ yugusigh at _ .
qilag _ yugusightu uq _ , _ nuna _ yugusightu uq _ . _ yugusigh t _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ . _ yugusigh t llu _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ .
siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ ighaleqetaagh t llu _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ . _ talwa _ ighaleqetaagh t _ a l l a k a q a g h t a g h m e n g _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ .
tawatete yaghqaa ut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh stekata _ tuqu llegh meng _ : _ nuna mi _ yugusigh put _ tuqu aqe ut _ , _ aghu aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh igh ragh aput _ tuqu naanghite u aghte ut _ .
llivegh kumeng _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ yugusigh put _ seghlegh ughte yaghqagh t _ kayaali yaghqagh t _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ pinighnagh yaghqagh llu _ iknaqe yaghqagh llu _ .
llivegh nghmini _ yugusigh _ yug m _ pi ke aa _ . _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ taghneghagh mnnun _ yugusigh u yaghqaa uq _ . _ yugusigh lgu kata _ yug t _ yugusighqagh lgu ut llu _ taghneghagh put _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ Y u k s u w h a a q _ adam _ unguva lghii ughtekau uq _ . _ " _ iwernga _ kinguligh _ adam _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i k a y u g u u q _ taghneghagh _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ .
sivuke luta _ yug m _ yugusigh aneng _ yugusigh nge aqe ukut _ , _ taagken _ t a a k w a n i n g a n i _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u g u s i l i t a q i i _ taghneghagh put _ .
Y u k s u w h a a q _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ , _ pagula aneng _ nuna m _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ yuug _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ qilag meng _ pi u uq _ .
yug t _ kiyaghtekumeng _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ yugusigh lgu ut _ A d a m - e m _ yugusigh itun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ qilag mi _ kiyaghte yaghqagh t _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ut _ .
A d a m - e t u n _ yugusigh lgu lleg mtestun _ , _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ukut _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ liite sug amsi _ yugusigh put _ ukut _ kemekrag meng _ , _ aaw meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ . _ unguva naanghite ut _ quunperugllag _ .
U n g i p a a t a g h l l a m s i _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ : _ qamagte luta _ tuqu naanghite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ allangughte yaghqaa ukut _ ,
sukate pigte luta _ qunqalleg llegh stun _ kingulighpigagh _ q a l g h i g h t a q _ nagaqugh kumteggu _ . _ tawani _ qalghightagh llegh mi _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ unguvagh uute yaghqaa ut _ nutaghagh meng _ yugusigh ligh luteng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ taagken _ whangkuta llu _ paninang _ unguva lghii ni _ nutaghagh meng _ y u g u s i n g a g h a g h t a a l l e q u k u t _ .
yugusigh put _ pagula meng _ ulimaagh t _ allangughte yaghqagh pestaagh u ut _ naafqesaghqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ . _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kayug t _ simigh yaghqaa ut _ yugusigh meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqegkagh _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ : _ " _ tuqu llegh _ naafqe uq _ ; _ kayaalqe i i llegh _ iighwigh uq _ ! _ "
" _ tuqu _ , _ kayaalqe i i llegh n _ naagu _ ? _ tuqu _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e n _ aqnighqe uute ziin _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ naagu _ ? _ "
tuqu llegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n i _ allgegh a qaa _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ aqnighte na luta _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llegh m _ liilightuusagh t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l q i i _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ i y a m s i q a y u g v i k a q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe i i stekaqe ainkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ , _ piniqekagh mni _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ kayaalqe i i lleghqagh ut _ i p a p e s t a g h u t a n g a n e n g _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ aghula i te ste luki _ , _ n u u g g a g h t a f q a a f s i _ , _ quunpeng _ qepghagh teggu _ A t a n g h e m _ qepghaqagh a _ . _ liisimakagh i _ atanegh kun _ qepghagh llegh i _ avangite nghite uq _ .
ukut _ esgha _ elpesi nun _ qelegh sagh nka _ mani meng _ tuune yaghqagh gpesineng _ ugpeqagh nun _ J u d e a - m e l n g u g h n u n _ . _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ G a l a t i a - g h m i i t _ ugpeqe ait _ , _ elpek si llu _ ellngistun _ pi tek _ .
S i v u l i g h p i g a g h m i _ santillegh m _ aghnegh ani _ qamagte lusi _ aafte i aqe tek _ mani meng _ a l l g e g h n e g h p e s i n e n g _ . _ tuune yaghqagh gpesi _ a n g t a l a n g a _ a l l g e g h n e g h p e s i _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ iike luku _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ . _ enkaam _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ qerngughte i fqaafsi _ mani meng _ pi lghaasi _ .
kaate kuma _ kayagte lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ nakmike gkasi _ lata tgun _ aglagh te sqellug qu _ tunusagh i _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ .
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ whanga llu _ pi lleghqagh ka _ pinigh yaghqaa kan _ , _ maligte nakangatnga _ .
elpesi nun _ laalighte naqe gkuma _ sivuke lunga _ M a c e d o n i a - k u n _ aag lleqe unga _ .
entaqun _ elpesinite aghagh qagh lleqe unga _ walluumllu _ uksulqusigh _ . _ taagken _ navek _ pi naqe gkuma _ yataaghqe lgusigh qagh nakefsinga _ .
A t a n g h e m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ maaten _ pi kuma _ elpesinite aghagh yug aqe unga _ , _ aag vike ghesnagh yug nghite amsi _ .
iwernga _ ephesus- mete lleqe unga _ kenlanga _ P e n t e c o s t - e m _ aghnegh anun _ ,
qayughllak _ megnu nagh lghii _ , _ aange lghii _ qepghagh lleghqagh ka _ atanegh mun _ pi aqe uq _ . _ M a a n l l e q u n g a _ qaywa _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ anguyag ke yagh ghngaatnga _ .
T i m o t h y _ elpesi nun _ pi kan _ , _ elngaatall _ upugha tete nakesi _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uq _ atanegh mun _ whanga mtun _ .
qamagte lusi _ a s i t n g i n a a g h p e n a a n _ , _ enkaam _ quya nga an _ kayagte nakesi _ whanga mnun _ . _ utaqa aqe aqa _ maligte te luku _ u g p e q a a l g u t n u n _ .
U n g i p a a t a g h l l a m s i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n e n g _ A p o l l o s - m e n g _ . _ elngaatall _ qelegh kaqsagh aqa _ l a a l i g h f i k e s q e l l u s i _ maligte luki _ ila i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ piyug nghite uq _ . _ laalighfike naagh aisi _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuni _ .
kelenga tek _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesini _ aghula itek _ , _ ilutu tek _ , _ iknaqe tek _ .
piniqe llegh kun _ pi aqe teggu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ liisima kasi _ S t e p h a n a s - e n k u t _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe aqe yuwhaagh u lghiit _ A c h a i a - m i _ . _ atanegh mun _ tuune kau ut _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ ila i _ kayusiite na luki _ .
qelegh amsi _ q a a t k u m a n g i n i i s q e l l u k i _ liilightugh llegh it _ t a w a t e l n g u u t _ yug t _ , _ ila i llu _ q e p g h a l g u t a n g i t _ .
quya unga _ S t e p h a n a s - e n k u t _ , _ F o r t u n a t u s - e n k u t _ , _ A c h a i c u s - e n k u t _ kaate lghiit _ qayughllak _ kayusiite u aatnga _ aviillegh gpesini _ .
Q u y a s t e n g n g w a a t n g a _ quya ste llegh megestun _ elpek si _ . _ kayusiite i llegh itnun _ iyamsiqa yug vike llegh gpesineng _ l i i s i m a k e s t e n g n g w a a g h n a k e s i _ .
ugpeqagh t _ A s i a - m e l n g u u t _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ A q u i l a - n k u k _ P r i s c i l l a - n k u k _ sumegh ke ghllag aisi nguq _ atanegh kun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ e l k e g k e n k a _ mangteghagh itni _ .
qamagte luteng _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ w h a n g a m n i l n g u u t _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ quyake te aqe tek _ naagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ .
whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ una _ igaqe aqa _ : _ sumegh ke amsi _ . _ P a u l _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ atanegh _ , _ naafqe lleg lgu uq _ . _ " _ M a r a n a t h a _ , _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ tea- ai _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ elpesi nite li _ .
piniqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ , _ a p o s t l e - n g a n e n g _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ , _ T i m o t h y - m e n g l l u _ pi u ut _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n e n g _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ C o r i n t h - e m _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ i i n g u n a g h h a a n i _ A c h a i a - m _ .
yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuune lisi _ quya ste llegh meng llu _ nekeggmellegh meng llu _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ n a n g l l e g t a p i g l l e g h i i _ a ta _ , _ kiyaghnegh meng _ tagi aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ kayute kaghqagh _ !
kayusigh aqe ainkut _ qamagte luta _ seghleliigh lleg mnni _ , _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ k a y u s i g h y a q l e g w a a p u t _ tamaakut _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh lghiit _ , _ atuqe luku _ ataasigh _ taana _ kayusillegh _ a l l g e g h t e k a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
katam _ ilate nga lleg mtestun _ C h r i s t - a m _ uglagh u pigte lghii nun _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ , _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ ilate nga lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh ghllag anun _ .
ikfiqe gkumta _ , _ kayusillegh gpesinun llu _ yuguligh llegh gpesinun llu _ p i l l g h u u q _ ; _ kayusillegh nge gkumta _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ kayusillegh nge lleqe usi _ enkaam _ tuune lleg nge lleqe usi _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ suflughte yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ ikfiqe llegh t _ suflughtekagh put _ .
enkaam _ sighimake i llegh ut _ elpesi nun _ aghula i tuq _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ taana _ katam _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ ikfiqe lleg mnnun _ , _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ kayusillegh mun _ a l l g e g h t e k a m n n u n _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ nalluke sug nghite amsi _ seghleliigh llegh meng _ nanghiighkagh mnneng _ A s i a - m i _ . _ elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ uqigtu pigtekau uq _ , _ repall _ sighima nanigh kau ukut _ kiyaghte lleghqagh mnneng _ .
ipapestaaq _ tuqu naqe ni luta _ pi yagh ukut _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ aneghte ukut _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ sighimake fqaamta _ p i s q e l l u t a _ , _ t a a w a n g i n a g h h a q _ kiyaghnegh _ sighimake sqellug qu _ unguvagh ste i kayug _ tuqukagh neng _ .
elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh meng _ t u q u m _ tevnegh aneng _ y u g u l i i n k u t _ , _ y u g u l i l l e q i i n k u t l u _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ sighima u ukut _ ellnga n _ y u g u l i l a a t a g h l l e q i i n k u t _ ,
elpek si _ kayusiite ma luta _ yughagh llegh gpesigun _ . _ yughagh tke i llegh ghllag i _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ kiimsigh lleg nge lleqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste lleqe ainkut _ ; _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ i g l a g t u g h l l u t e n g _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ .
una _ esgha _ qukaayug sigh ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mta _ ungipaate ainkut _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h p u t _ whani _ nuna mi _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a a q l u _ piniqe i nga uq llu _ , _ kiyang _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii kun _ kayusillegh akun _ , _ nakaan _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ .
qamagte luteng _ lata put _ elpesi nun _ piyaqnagh u i te ut _ atightugh yaghqaa luteng llu _ liigike yaghqaa luteng llu _ . _ sighima kaqe amsi _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h e s q e l l u k u
sa u a _ maaten _ liigikekagh gpesi _ nalighnegh ghhagh inagh a _ , _ enkaam _ aghnegh ani _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ elpek si _ q u k a a y u g u t k e l l e q a g h p e s i k u t _ katam _ whangkuta _ qukaayug tke lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
qayughllak _ i p a p i g h q u t k e g k a q a q a _ qamagte luku _ tamaa na _ , _ sivuke lunga _ elpesi nun _ laalighte na lunga _ pi kaayagh unga _ , _ q u y a s t e l l e n g n a y u k a f s i _ m a l g h u g h q e n g n g a a n _ .
laalighfike yu kaqe amsi _ aglagh te kete luku _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ , _ uteghnigh te kete luku llu _ tamaaken _ , _ kayute nge na lunga _ elpesi neng _ iglegha lleghqagh mnun _ J u d e a - m u n _ .
S u m e g h p e s i n i i _ tawaten _ qakiqniqe lleg mni _ a t a a s i i g h n e g h i s i n g a a _ ? _ S u m e g h p e s i n i i _ qakiqniqe llegh ka _ nuna m _ yug atun _ ayuqe a _ , _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ pi yaghqagh _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ " _ " _ nakaa _ ? _ "
ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ , _ akequsagh ka _ elpesi nun _ " _ A a n g Ê¼ g h u n g h i t u q l u _ " _ " _ N a k a a g h u n g h i t u q l u _ " _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ elpesi nun _ S i l a s - l u _ T i m o t h y - l l u _ whanga llu _ , _ " _ A a n g Ê¼ g h u n g h i t u q l u _ " _ " _ N a k a a g h u n g h i t u q l u _ " _ ; _ iwernga _ ellnga ni _ quunpeng _ " _ A a n g Ê¼ g h u u q _ " _ .
ellnga u uq _ " _ angegh llegh _ " _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh itnun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whangkuta _ " _ amen- u aghagh qu kut _ " _ ellnga kun _ u s u q n e m t e g g u _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh ainkut _ , _ maligte te luta _ elpesi nun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ aafte ainkut _ ;
nalluniigh ainkut _ ellmi nun _ pi u luta _ , _ tuune ak llu _ taghneghagh gni _ ilu mnnun _ nallangigh sagh u lukek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ akequsagh kekagh minun _ w h a n g u k u n n u n _ .
tuqlugh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i ste u luku _ qayughllak _ liisimake kanga _ qaamna _ ilu ka _ ! _ C o r i n t h - e s u g u n g h i t u n g a _ s e g h l e l i i g h q e s n a y u k a m s i _ .
I g l e g h u n n a q u t k e n g n g u n g h i t a g h p u t _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ ; _ qepghagh lgusigh yug amsi _ q u y a m a s q e l l u s i _ , _ qayughllak _ aghula i te usi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
taawa _ umyugagh gka _ ataasiighte ma agka _ alla _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ quya nghitesaghqagh u fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ .
qayughllak _ quya nghite stekumsi _ kitum ngam _ whanga _ q a q a y u g t e s l e q a n g a _ ? _ alla _ kitum _ pi naanghite anga _ iwerngaqun _ elpek si _ quya nghite stekagh ma _ .
