tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ elpesi nun _ piyug nghite ngugh u nga _ q u y a n g h i t e s n a y u k a f s i n g a _ , _ elpek si _ q u y a n g h i t e s n a y u k a f s i n g a _ , _ elpek si _ q u y a s t i s t e m n i _ . _ I p a p i g h q u t k e n g n g w a a q a _ una _ , _ whanga _ quya nga negh mni _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ quya nga aqe usi _ .
lata kau unga _ elpesi nun _ elngaatall _ aange luku _ qivghu lleg ligh lunga _ qamagun _ ilu mkun _ , _ qiya magh ma _ alla _ quya nghite ste fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ taawanginaq _ liigike sqellug qu _ piniqe llegh ghllag ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ yuug _ seghleghqe lghii _ tawani _ , _ seghleghqe nghite uq _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi _ elpesi nun _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u u q _ iwernga _ nakaan _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ . _ U n i i g h m i g h s u n g h i t a q a _ sa meng _ pilleg mkun _ .
T a w a t e n g i n a q _ aghyuugh i llegh i _ itagnagh uq _ .
maaten _ s e g h e v u l l u k u n g Ê¼ n g a m _ kayeme teggu _ wata _ i i l q e n n a y u k a n _ repall _ iilqayug ghllag na yu kan _ .
manigugh utu te aqa _ elpesi nun _ liigike ste sqellug qu _ ipapestaaq _ piniqe ni luku _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ : _ liisimake na luku _ q a a t k u t n g w a a q u t s i _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kina _ s e g h e v u n n e g h p i s i g u _ sa meng _ elpesi nun _ p i l l g h a n e n g _ whanga llu _ seghevute aqe aqa _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghevute yaghqagh _ seghevute yug aqe aqa _ elpek si _ apaghllug lusi _ C h r i s t - a _ t a w a n t e p i g l l e g h h i i s t u n _ ,
tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqe na yu kanginkut _ qayughllak _ l i i s i m a k e g k e f u t _ sa u ta a _ yataaghqekagh a _ .
kaate yalghiinga _ T r o a s - m u n _ ungipagh ke na luku _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh a _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ A t a n g h e m _ p i l l e g h q a n g e s t e n g n g w a a g h u m a k a n g a n g a _ .
iwernga _ pengeg ghllag kau unga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ titus _ a v i i l n g u q _ tamaani _ . _ enkaam _ unite luki _ aghulaqe unga _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ .
iwernga _ iyamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ iiwleng _ igleghte te u ainkut _ k a y a l l q i i n g a l l e g h q u n _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkutgun _ m i n g i t e s t e n g n g w a a _ liisima lleg ni _ nani _ alngunak _ katam _ neqnigh lghii m _ tepe ngllagh sigh m _ tepagh nge an _ mingite llegh atun _ .
qayughllak _ whangkuta _ tepkegtagh stun _ neqnighsaasigh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ C h r i s t - a m _ aghqe tkekagh atun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tepe ut _ me ite u uq _ y u g u l i k a n u n l l u _ iflakagh nun llu _ .
T a m a a k u n u n _ iflakagh nun _ tepe ke ainkut _ tuqu llegh m _ tuqute i kayug m _ ; _ iwernga _ y u g u l i k a n u n _ tepe ke a _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug m _ . _ kina ngam _ qepghagh yaghqau a _ t a w a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ qepghaqagh meng _ ?
uglagh pigte lghii stun _ kinku stun _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ salin _ q e p g h a g h y a g h q a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ tamaaken _ qepghaqagh meng _ . _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ pi aqe ait _ i l a n g i s t u n _ qepghaqagh stun _ ayuqe ni luki _ allgegh te sighqagh t _ k i y a g h t a a g h u s i g h q a m u n _ . _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ataasiighmete luta _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t a _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ ; _ apegh aqe aput _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ kayagte llegh atun _ ungipaghte u luta llu _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u t a l l u _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ .
whangkuta _ u s u q e s a a y u g g n a q l a a t a g h e s t a a _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ katam _ ? _ nalighmeng _ i l a n g i s t u n _ a k l u k i n g u s t a a _ lata meng _ a a p g h e s q e l l u t a _ elpesi nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ elpesi neng _ ?
elpek si _ , _ elpek si _ katam _ whangkuta _ lata ke amsi _ , _ igaqe nga usi _ ilu mteggun _ tea- ma anun _ l i i s i m a k e s q e l l u s i l l u _ a t i g h t i i s q e l l u s i _ .
W h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ lata u usi _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ pi t _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ tuyugh qu ai _ . _ lata tke kau nghite usi _ ink- akun _ nalighmeng _ lliivneqegtagh tgun _ uyghag tgun _ . _ lata tke kau usi _ yug t _ ilu itgun _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ neghyu lleg lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
W h a n g k u n n e n g _ p i k n i n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ q e p g h a g h y a q l e g u n i l u k u _ taana _ qepghaqagh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyaqleg ughte ste aqe ainkut _ qepghaqagh mun _ .
ellnga n _ q e p g h a g h y a q l e g u g h t e s t i i n k u t _ nutaghagh mun _ akequsagh mun _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh _ akequsagh _ igaqe nga lghii u nghite uq _ liilightuusagh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh gneng _ ayuqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga lghii m _ liilightuusagh m _ tagite a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh m _ tuune a _ unguvallegh _ .
liilightuusagh t _ igaqe kau ut _ uyghag tgun _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a _ aliigh kau uq _ liilightuusagh t _ tuune aqngata _ . _ M o s e s - e m _ gginagh a _ kuukgute kau uq _ taagken _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ , _ qaywa _ gheve ghngaan _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ esghaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ gginagh a _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ tuqu ste i yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ yug t _ qaatke nghite kangit _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ n i g h u g h q e s t i g h l l a g u m a k a t a _ ,
naten mi _ angka an _ qepghagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ n i g h u g h q e s t i i g h a t a g h a g h l l e q a _ !
liilightuusagh _ nanqigte i yaghqaa kan _ yug meng _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ n i g h u g h q e n g n g a y a g h t u q _ ; _ anaggute llghite ni luteng _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ naten mi _ angka an _ n i g h u g h q e n g n g a l l e g h t u l l e q a t _ !
tawaten _ pi u ukut _ qayughllak _ n i g h u g a t a g h a l g h i i n g u g h t u q _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q _ maaten _ , _ taana _ n i g h u g h q e n g n g a y a l g h i i _ sivugh nghaani _ aviighute ma uq _ .
N i g h u g h q e l l e l g u y a q a n _ tawaten _ mulu ghraagkagh meng _ , _ naten mi _ angka an _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g u l l e q a _ mulu ghllag yaghqagh meng _ quunperugllag _ !
taana _ sighimake te mnneng _ tetug igate u aghte ukut _ .
M o s e s - e t u n _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ , _ gginagh ni _ saaputagh iqe a _ enkaam _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ esghagh mangite aat _ nighug ghllag _ aviighute lghii _ .
umyugagh it _ liigikepagningite te kau ut _ , _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ umyugagh it _ saape nga ut _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ saaputagh meng _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ neghigh aat _ akequsagh t _ . _ taana _ saape te aq _ iqite yaghqaa uq _ C h r i s t - a n g i n a g h h a g h q u n _ .
talwa _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ liilightuusagh t _ M o s e s - m u n _ tuunekagh t _ , _ umyugagh it _ saaputagh meng _ saape nga aqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ qiive nghmini _ atanegh mun _ saaputagh a _ iqite aqe uq _ .
maaten _ atanegh _ taghneghagh u lghii _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ A t a n g h e m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi lgu kuni _ , _ iteme nga lleg lgu uq _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t a _ saape ta u na ki _ gginagh put _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h p u t _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ taana _ ataasigh _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q _ tagi lghii _ atanegh meng _ taghneghagh u uq _ , _ allangughte ainkut _ e l l n g a s u g n i g h t e s q e l l u t a _ aange aghagh luku _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut _ whaken _ qepghagh yaghqagh meng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iilqayugigate ukut _ .
ighsayagute kaqe aput _ aksaqekagh t llu _ kayngu nagh lghiit llu _ . _ puughte igate aput _ yug t _ , _ allangughte igate aput llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ . _ W h a t e g h l l u w a a q l u _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ i p a p i l l g h i _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ yug t _ liite lleqe ainkut _ n a t e l n g u u t f u t _ esghagh ma nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ungipagh kekagh put _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ saape nga kata _ , _ saape nga ut _ ifla yaghqagh ghhagh inagh nun _ .
ellngit a _ ugpeqe igate aat _ ungipagh ut _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh m _ , _ u u m _ nuna m _ kiyaghnegh an _ , _ ayaa stekaqe ai _ umyugagh it _ . _ esghagh nghite sta qaa _ nighug a _ pinigh lghii m _ ungipagh m _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a n e n g _ C h r i s t - a m _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ C h r i s t - a _ kiyaghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
W h a n g k u n n e n g _ katam _ ungipagh ke u nghite ukut _ , _ itupill _ u n g i p a q n g w a a g h p u t _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ A t a n g h u n i l u k u _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e k a g h p e s i k u t _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ yeqay _ nighug _ kuukgute li _ mamleg llegh meng _ ! _ " _ ellnga u uq _ ataasigh _ kiyaghnegh _ kuukgute ste i lghii _ nighug meng _ ilu mnnun _ . _ taaggun _ nighug kun _ legh igh iitagh ut _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ gginagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ kanaghtekaqe a _ taana _ nighug _ kuukgute sqellug qu _ ilu mnni _ . _ whangkuta _ qiku stun _ qantaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ enkaam _ tea- ma yan _ liigike lleqe aat _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag _ kiyaghneghtagh u ni luku _ , _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ pi u nghite ni luku _ .
seghleliigh lleg nge aqe ukut _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ iwernga _ kayaalqe igate ainkut _ . _ ilangakun _ kukrag yug lleg nge aqe ukut _ iwernga _ sighima llghite te igate ukut _ .
amyuqetagh tke lleg nge aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unite igate ainkut _ ; _ a q n i g h q w a a l l e n g a q u k u t _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ukut _ .
iiwleng _ tuqu llegh a _ J e s u s - e m _ yugusigh mnnite uq _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvallegh a _ J e s u s - e m _ yugusigh mnni _ .
unguva u luta _ iiwleng _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ J e s u s - e m _ unguvallegh a _ yugusigh mnni _ tuqu kayug ni _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ qayughllak _ q e p g h a a t n g u k e f u t _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ iwernga _ qepghagh lleg mta _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ u n g u v a l l e n g e s t e n g n g w i i s i _ .
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ akuzite kaqe aqa _ . _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ tawatete uq _ igaqe stetu te _ . _ whangkuta llu _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ a k u z i t k a q a g h p u t _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a q a a _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ whangkuta llu _ unguvagh lleqe ainkut _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ taagken _ aglagh u lleqe ainkut _ qerngagh emta _ elpek si llu _ t a w a n t e l l e g h m i n u n _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ apeghiighkagh t _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh an _ nula ste lleqe ai _ yug t _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nula lleqe uq _ , _ q u u l v a l l e n g e g h l l a g l l e q u q l u _ .
enkaam _ iilqayugigate ukut _ . _ qaywa _ yugusigh put _ kayaali kestagh yagh nga a ta _ , _ taghneghagh put _ n u t a g h t e n g n g u u t _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
seghleliigh lleg put _ sa squghhagh u ut _ mulu yaghqaa nghite ut _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ yataaghqe te u ainkut _ a l l g e g h t e s q e l l u k u _ kiyaghnegh meng _ kenle ite ngughk _ quya llegh ghllag _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh lleg put _ a v a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke manginagh igate aput _ seghleliigh lleg put _ . _ itupill _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aput _ e s g h a g h p a g n i n g i l k e p u t _ . _ qantaghaqun _ seghleliigh lleg put _ k e n l e t g h u u l l e q u t _ , _ iwernga _ quya llegh ut _ e s g h i i g a l k e f u t _ q u u n p e k a g h q a a g u q _ .
whani _ nuna mi _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ kiyaghfig put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh _ mangteghagh lgu uq _ qilag mi _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ kiyaghfigkagh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ mangteghagh _ , _ yug m _ ulima aqe nghite a _ . _ taana _ mangteghagh _ q u u n p e k a g h q a a g u q _ .
ipa _ ngillegte ukut _ nuna mete u luta _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yu pigte lghiikut _ yugusighraghagh mnni _ qilag mi _ .
aatkagh stun _ aate lleqe aput _ tamaakut _ yugusigh igh ragh aat _ amsikaghmete nghite na luta _ .
yugusigh put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tiinta mete luta _ ngillegte aqe ukut llu _ , _ seghleliigh ukut llu _ qayughllak _ mat- aghte yug igate ke put _ . _ itupill _ simigh yug aqe aput _ yugusigh nun _ tuqu igate ngugh nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe ainkut _ whavek _ allangughte llegh mun _ . _ W h a n g k u n n u n l l u _ tuune kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ liisimake sqellug qu _ allangughte lleghqagh ut _ ipapestaaq _ apeghiigh lleqe ni luku _ .
enkaam _ iiwleng _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ ne mete u luta _ yugusigh mnni _ , _ atanegh mete igate ukut _ .
K i y a g h t e n g n g u u k u t _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ nakaan _ esghaqagh yu mteggun _ .
enkaam _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ unite yug aqe aput _ yugusigh put _ ne mete na luta _ atanegh mi _ .
ne mete yagh ghngaamta _ nalighmeng _ ne mete nghite ghngaamta _ , _ e f q u g h s u g a q a g h p u t _ atanegh _ .
qamagte luta _ nekeve pestaagh yaghqaa ukut _ C h r i s t - a m _ sivungagh kun _ n a n q i g t e s q e l l u t a _ . _ A t a a s i k a g h t a a m t a _ allgegh u lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii meng _ nalighmeng _ seghlegh meng _ apeghiigh te lleg mtestun _ yugusigh mteggun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ a l i k a q a g h p u t _ atanegh _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpegh ste naqutke aqe aput _ yug t _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake ainkut _ n a t e l n g u u t f u t _ yug ni _ , _ sunanguq _ elpek si llu _ liisimake tekut _ tawatete luta _ .
elpesi nun _ t u g u k l i g h t e s n a q u t k e n g n g u n g h i t u k u t _ allameng _ . _ itupill _ ungipaate aqe amsi _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ elpesi nun _ q u k a a y u g u t k e s q e l l u t a _ . _ taagken _ a p e g h y a q l e g u g h l l e q a g h p e s i k u t _ qukaayug tke i lghii nun _ yug m _ q a a s t u l n g i n a g h h a a n e n g _ . _ waakigate aat _ sa u ta a _ yug m _ ilumikekagh a _ .
N a l l u t u y i q n g u k u m t a _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ n a l l u t u y i q n g u n g h i l k u m t a _ , _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe uq _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ igleghte te u ainkut _ piniqe llegh mikun _ . _ L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h p u t _ yug m _ ataasigh m _ tuquma tke kaqe a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ yuug _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ yug t _ tuqu kau ut _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lghiit _ k i y a g h s a q l e g u l l e q u t _ ellnga nun _ , _ nakaan _ ellmeggnun _ katam _ . _ tuqu luni _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a g u q _ ellngit _ apallugh ke luki _ .
whaken _ kenle ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n n a n i i m a a g h p u t _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh atun _ . _ qaywa _ ataasigh meng _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e g k a q a g h p u t _ C h r i s t - a _ nuna m _ yug an _ p i l l g h a t u n _ , _ tawaten _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n n a n i i m a a g h p u t _ .
kina _ alngunak _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi liite nghminigu _ nutaghaghllug ughte aqe uq _ . _ K i y a g h t a a l l e l u g a _ aviighute aqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ nutaghaghllug _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h a _ piinligh aqe uq _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ . _ ellnga n _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut llu _ ila i llu _ yug t _ i l a l i i g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ ellmi nun _ .
C h r i s t - a k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilaliigh u ai _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ yug t _ , _ umyugagh mig ke gpenaki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ u n g i p a g h q a l i t k a q i i n k u t _ a a p g h e s q e l l u k i _ naten _ ellmi nun _ ilaliigh ta i _ ellngit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipaghte u luta _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ enkaam _ whangkutgun _ t a g i s q e l l u s i _ ellmi nun _ . _ akuzi ste u ukut _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ kayeme i lghiit _ i l a l i i g h u t e s q e l l u s i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ seghleghqe mangite u aghte uq _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ seghleghqe kau luku _ . _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh ngllagh kaqe ainkut _ .
Q e p g h a l g u t k u t u t e m n n e n g _ kiyaghnegh llu _ , _ taawa _ kayeme amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ tugukligh gpenaan _ temngitwha u luku _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ P i l l e g h q a g h l l u w a a g h m i _ nagaqugh kaqe amken _ , _ aghnegh ani _ yuguligh llegh m _ kayusigh kaqe amken _ . _ " _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ m a a t e n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i l l e g h q a g h l l u w a a g h a _ ; _ nagate tek _ , _ m a a t e n g u u q _ aghnegh a _ yuguligh i llegh m _ !
K i y a g h t a a l l e m t e g g u n _ naagte yaghagh ngllagh igate aput _ yug t _ , _ s e g h l e q u u f q a a n _ pi sqellug qu _ qepghaqagh ut _ atanegh mun _ .
iwernga _ salleg mteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ liigike ste aqe ukut _ yug nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q e p g h a g h t e k n i l u t a _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ n u q e t u t i m a l l e m t e g g u n _ suflughtagh aqe aput _ seghleliigh llegh t _ , _ piyaqli i llegh t _ , _ ikfiqe llegh t _ .
Q e v u t q u q a a g u k u t _ , _ anusimingllagh kau ukut _ , _ uglagh te lleg nge kau ukut llu _ . _ ughleghiigh kau ukut _ , _ qavagh llegh ke mangite ukut _ , _ iyatagh kau ukut llu _ .
L i i g i k e s t e n g n g u u k u t l u _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q e p g h a g h t e k u t f u t _ pinitun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e m t e g g u n _ , _ liisimake i lleg mteggun _ , _ n u q e t u t i l l e m t e g g u n _ , _ nangllegtagh lleg mteggun _ , _ p i n i q i p i l l e m t e g g u n _ , _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ .
Q e p g h a a t n g w a a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ ungipagh ke lleg mteggun _ i p a p i l l e q _ . _ atugh qaghkagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ guutute kellug qu _ aghenqignegh mnnun llu _ saghumignegh mnnun llu _ .
Q u u l v a l l e n g a q u k u t l u _ u k a v a g h l l e n g a q u k u t l u _ ; _ s e g h l e q u u g h s i g h a q u k u t l u _ usuqe lleg nge aqe ukut llu _ . _ iqlengagh lghii u na iqe ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ akuzi aqe ukut _ ipa pig meng _ .
yug t _ nalluke nigh ke ainkut _ , _ naqamllu _ liisimake luta _ ; _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ unguva ukut _ . _ aghyuugh yagh ghngainkut _ , _ tuqute igate ainkut _ .
qivghu u ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ quya nga ghllagu aqe ukut _ ; _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ aklungi igh i ste aqe aput _ yug t _ ; _ a v a q r a g g i i t e g h n g a a m t a _ , _ naqamllu _ pi lgu aqe ukut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ C o r i n t h - e g h m i i n i _ , _ i p a p i g h q u l l u s i _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ ungipaate amsi _ piniqe pigte amsi _ .
nuqnegh te mangite amsi _ piniqe lleg mnneng _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi u ut _ nuqnegh te ikagh t _ piniqe i llegh gpesineng _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
maaten _ aleghqugh amsi _ avaqutagh ke pigte lghii stun _ , _ p i n i q e q e g h t i k u t _ katam _ whangkuta _ piniqe lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
inglu ke gpenaki _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ elqughutngagh llegh nkuk _ seghlegh nkuk _ inglu ke tepagningite uk _ . _ nighug nkuk llu _ mamleg nkuk llu _ q e r n g a g h m e t e p a g n i n g i t u k _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ i t a g n a q s a g h q a q e n g h i t n g w a a g h a a _ tughneghagh _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ piyuke llegh it _ alla u ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ .
kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ manigugh yaghqaa nghite ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga ni _ . _ qayughllak _ whangkuta _ temple- ke ainkut _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ ellngitnite lleqe unga llu _ a k u l n g i t n i l l e q u n g a l l u _ ; _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ , _ ellngit llu _ yug ke lleqe anka _ . _ "
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ unite ki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ aafte tek _ ellngit neng _ . _ saafte gpenaki _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ ; _ enkaam _ tugukligh lleqe amsi _ .
A t a k e l l e q a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ enkaam _ elpek si _ ighnegh ke lleqe amsi llu _ panike lleqe amsi llu _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ . _ "
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ akequsagh ngllagh kau ta aneng _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ ukmangighsagh lteki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ nukeggnagh i _ yugusigh mta llu _ taghneghagh mta llu _ . _ P e l u n g i g h t e n g n g w a a g h e l t a _ qayughllak _ a l i k a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ilaliigh qagh kut _ ilu gpesigun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ anagnga lghii meng _ p i n g i g a t a g h p u t _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ n a a f q u m a n g i t a g h p u t _ , _ talwa _ p u u g h n e q g u u s i m a n g i t a g h p u t _ .
ungipaate u nghite amsi _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ a v u t k e n n a l u s i _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ piniqe pigte ni lusi _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lgusigh lleqe amsi _ nalighmeng _ tuqu lgusigh lleqe amsi _ .
neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ , _ qukaayug tke pigte amsi _ . _ K a y e m e g h l l a g a q a g h p e s i n g a _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag mnni _ paninang _ tevugha aqe unga _ quya llegh meng _ .
kaate aqngamta _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ , _ meghnaalipagningite kau ukut _ . _ seghleliigh kau ukut _ tea- ma ani _ , _ yug t _ aaghtiiraagh kaqe ainkut _ , _ teggellghiigh kau ukut llu _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh aqe ai _ i i l q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ , _ enkaam _ ilutughsagh ainkut _ tagi ste llegh mikun _ titus _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
ilutughtekau ukut _ tagi aqngan _ titus _ , _ iwernga _ i l u t u g h l l e n g a t a g h a g h t u k u t _ ungipagh sigh nkut _ elpesi nun _ ilutughsagh ma ni luni _ . _ ungipaate ainkut _ elpesi nun _ esghagh yug pigte ni lunga _ , _ qivghuke ni lunga _ s e g h l e l i i g h q e l l e g h p e s i n e n g _ , _ kayusigh yug pigte ni lunga llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesi _ wanlegi _ quya ste ghllag aanga _ .
qaywa _ lata mkun _ qivghu ste ghngaamsi _ , _ a v u t e g h q u t k e n g n g u n g h i t a n k a _ lata nka _ . _ sivukun _ avuteghqesagh unga _ qayughllak _ lata ma _ qivghu ste aghtegkangisi _ .
quya u nghite unga _ lata mnun _ qivghu te ma ni lusi _ . _ iwernga _ quya ghllagu unga _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ allangughte stekaqe kangi _ k i y a g h t a a l l e s i _ . _ qivghu llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ , _ enkaam _ naten _ alngunak _ whangkuta _ aqnighte llghite amsi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe aqe a _ qivghu llegh _ yug nun _ a v u t e g h q e l l u k i _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ y u g u l i l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ avuteghqe te kete naanghite a _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ iwernga _ qivghu llegh _ nuna meng _ pi _ tuqu ta iqe uq _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ sa u ta a _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ qivghu llegh gpesigun _ . _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ efqughute sug ghllag aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ elngaatall _ i p a p i g h q e n n a q u t k e g k a a y a g h t u s i _ anaggute llghite ni lusi _ . _ U g u m i y a g u t k a q a g h s i _ anaggute llegh _ , _ alingruugh kau usi llu _ . _ E s g h a g h y u p i g t e k a q a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ pinitun _ pi kau usi _ , _ aghyuugh qaghkagh i llu _ anaggutekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ i p a p i g h q e g k a a g u s i _ apallugh ite ni lusi _ .
enkaam _ qaywa _ tawaten _ lata yagh ghngaamsi _ , _ apallugh ke u nghite aqa _ anaggutekagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawavek _ seghletun _ pikagh anun _ . _ itupill _ lata kaqe amsi _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h e s q e l l u s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma nghaani _ t u u n Ê¼ n g w a a g h l u s i _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ayuqe lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ i l u t u g h t e n g n g a a k u t _ . _ I l u t u g h t e n g n g i n a g h p e n a a m t a _ , _ iwernga _ q u y a a g h a t a g h a g h t u k u t _ esghagh luku _ T i t u s - e m _ quya ma llegh a _ . _ qamagte lusi _ s u m e g h y a l i n g i i t e s i m a a g h s i _ .
Q a n a t k e g k a q a m s i _ titus- mun _ efqugh ke ni lusi _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi aqngami _ liite kaqe ai _ ipa u ta i _ sa meng _ p i l l g h e n k a _ elpesi neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ kayngu yagute llghite anka _ q a n a t k i l l g h e n k a _ . _ iiwleng _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t a _ aleghqugh aqe amsi _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ipa u ut _ q a n a t k i l l e g h p u t _ titus- mun _ .
enkaam _ T i t u s - e m _ wanlegi _ pinigh kau aghte aisi _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nghminigu _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ upugha te kaqe kesi llu _ alinge lleg ligh lusi _ , _ up- nge llegte llegh ligh lusi _ .
quya ghllagu unga _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ !
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ whangkuta _ l i i s i m a k e s u w a m s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvig itni _ M a c e d o n i a - m _ .
I k f i q l i i g h t e l l e g h l l a g i t a _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg nge ste ghllag kaqe ait _ . _ qaywa _ akluma ghllag yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ paninang _ quya ma ghllag kau ut _ repall _ ighleg gpenateng _ tuune i kau ut _ kayusigh na luki _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
ungipaate amsi _ tuune i kau ut _ t u u n y a g h q a g h t u t a l m e g e s t u n _ , _ talwa _ t u u n i i g h a t a g h a q a a g u t _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ ellngit _ tuune i yu lghiit _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi sqe mangite ai _ .
talwa _ aapute uute ghllag kau ut _ tuune i lgusigh i na luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
tuune i llegh at _ uglagh kau uq _ sighimake lleg mnneng _ . _ sivuke luteng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ pegte ut _ atanegh mun _ , _ taagken _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ piyuke llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
titus _ elpesi nite aqngami _ piinligh i kau uq _ qerngughte i llegh gpesineng _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ k a y e m a g h p u t _ k a y u s i i s a g h t i i s q e l l u s i _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nanglleg ke sagh i _ tunusagh _ .
sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ pinitun _ pi aqe usi _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ liisima llegh gpesigun _ , _ kayusigh i yu kestagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ piniqe i llegh gpesigun llu _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ mate- te mi llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe tek _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ t u u n i s q e l l u s i _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate u amsi _ naten _ ila it _ tuune i ma ta i _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesi _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q a a _ piniqe i llegh i _ ipa u ta a _ .
liisimakagh i _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ aklungi ghllag mini _ t a w a l l i i m a _ ellmi neng _ katam _ akluma aghtekau uq _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aklungi igh i sqe qaghte lusi _ akluma llegh mikun _ .
awatangani _ elpek si _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh kau usi _ mani meng _ , _ tuune i kau usi llu _ qayughllak _ tuune i yu lghiisi _ . _ sume mni _ whatete luku _ pi yagh kufsigu _ , _ itagnagh nayagh usi _ ,
nagnegh te yagh kufsigu _ piinlighkagh i _ ! _ sagiqe nga kau usi _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh aqngafsi _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe nqigte lusi _ apeghiigh teggu _ qerngughtekagh i _ . _ tuune tek _ tuune i lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
tuune i yu pigtekufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ tunute yasi _ . _ piyuke aqe a _ yuug _ tuune i sqellug qu _ tuune yaghqagh lgu kan _ , _ iwernga _ avangite kan _ tuune i nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
nuuqragti ste sug u nghite amsi _ ila si _ n u u q r a g t i n g h i s i m a l u k i _ .
maaten _ llilegh ghllag lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ kayusigh yaghqaqe asi _ tamaakut _ aklu lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ aklu kufsi _ taawa _ ellngit a _ kayusigh lleqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kayu siightu lleqe usi _ enkaam _ atunem _ pi lleqe usi _ .
katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ i g a q e l l g h i s t u n _ , _ " _ yuug _ saghna ghllagkagh _ suyvaghte mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ saghnapag ma ite ngughk _ aklu naanghite uq _ . _ "
iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ titus _ kayusigh i yug ste ghllag kanga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ whangkutestun _ .
titus _ angeghqe ma kau uq _ elpesi nun _ p i s q e s a m t e g g u _ . _ elpesi nun _ piyug pigtekau uq _ , _ taana _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke a _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t f u t _ titus- mun _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ . _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ usuqe pigte aqe aat _ ungipagh ke i llegh aneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
T a a n a n g i n a a g p e n a a n _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmike kaqe aat _ maligte te sqellug qu _ whangkutgun _ , _ tuune i yaghtugh kumta _ nanglleg ke te yameng _ tunute yameng _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi u ukut _ usuqe lleg nge sqellug qu _ atanegh _ , _ yug nun llu _ liite sqellug qu _ kayusigh i yu llegh ut _ .
piraamsi u ukut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ s e g h l e q u u f q a a m t a _ p i s q e l l u t a _ naten _ a f l e n g a k a q u t f u t _ taana _ tunute yagh ghllag _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ a t u q s u g a q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh mi _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ yug ni llu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
T i t u s - e n k u g n u n l l u _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ ila a _ u g p e q a a l g u t f u t _ . _ awen _ esghagh na luku _ nateghtu langa _ pi iqagh ut _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ iiwleng _ kayusigh i yu kestagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wanlegi _ maaten _ k a y u s i g h i y u g l l a g u g h t u q _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag kangisi _ .
titus _ qepghagh lgutke aqa _ , _ qepghagh lgusigh aqe aanga _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ taake uk llu _ ugpeqagh u lgute tek _ ugpeqagh t _ y u g h a g h v i g n i l n g u u t _ kayagtekaqe agket _ . _ Q u u l v a g h l l a g l u k u _ C h r i s t - a _ ayuqe ak _ .
enkaam _ C o r i n t h - e g h m i i n i _ , _ esghaghte steggu _ piniqe i llegh i _ t a a k u g n u n _ yug gnun _ . _ taagken _ piniqe i llegh gpesi _ i p a p i g h q e s l e q i i t _ ugpeqagh t _ y u g h a g h v i g n i l n g u u t _ sangan _ q a n a t k e l l e m n n e n g _ elpek si _ .
lata tke nghite yagh ghngaamkun _ ayuqe aqa _ tunusagh _ tuyugh yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ J e r u s a l e m - e m _ .
liisimake amsi _ kayusigh i yug lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ q a n a t k a q a m s i _ ugpeqagh itnun _ M a c e d o n i a - m _ . _ whaten _ pi kau unga _ , _ " _ awatangani _ ima _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ A c h a i a - m e l n g u u t _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tuune i na luteng _ . _ " _ sagiqe llegh gpesi _ allute luki _ ugpeqagh t _ m a a n l e n g u u t _ tuune i yug stekaqe ait llu _ .
iwernga _ kayagte naqe anka _ ila i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u t _ elpesi nun _ . _ apallugh ke aqa _ q a n a t k i l q a _ elpesi neng _ temngingu fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ yataaghqe sqe sug amsi _ katam _ whanga _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ elpek si _ ,
luuraq _ M a c e d o n i a - g h m i i t _ ila ita _ maligte na yu kangatnga _ C o r i n t h - m u n _ . _ esghagh kunisi _ yataaghqe llghite lusi _ tunute yaghqagh gpesineng _ , _ taawa _ whangkuta _ kayngete te yaag kete lleqe ainkut _ , _ elpek si llu _ kayngu yug lleqe usi _ .
enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh unga _ sivu mni _ kayagte kestagh na luki _ ila i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u t _ . _ tawaten _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ yataaghqe sqellug qu _ akequsagh kekagh i _ tunusagh _ . _ taagken _ kaate kuma _ tunusagh i _ apeghiigh nga lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aat _ tuune i yu llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ .
neqamike luku _ una _ , _ yuug _ p a l a g h h a g h m e n g _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ palaghhagh an _ saghna lleqe uq _ . _ yuug _ uglagh luku _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ uglagh luku _ saghna lleqe uq _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sumeghtaghagh tke teggu _ tuune i lleghqaghtu ta leg si _ . _ ighleg magh gpesi _ tuune i gpenasi _ nalighmeng _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ quyake sigh ke luku _ tuune i aqe tek _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ai _ t a w a t e l n g u u t _ t u u n i s t e t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ t u u n y a q l e g w i i s i _ a k l u k e g k a g h p e s i n e n g _ qaayghute luku _ . _ enkaam _ iiwleng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ pi lgu aqe lleqe usi _ , _ siipngaan llu _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u k i _ ila si _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ I g h l e l l n g u n a n i _ tuune i aqe uq _ aklumalghii nun _ ; _ pinitun _ pi nga llegh a _ nagnegh yaghqaa uq _ quunpeng _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuune i kayug _ piitute meng _ p i i t e s i g h a g h t e m u n _ , _ neqe meng llu _ neghyaghqagh meng _ . _ tuune lleqe a _ qamagte luku _ piitute _ a k l u k e g k a g h s i _ , _ nagu ste lleqe ai llu _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ unatagh ghllag lleqe usi _ qayughllak _ i g h l e g i l n g u u s i _ .
sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ aklungi igh i ste lleqe aisi _ , _ n a r a n Ê¼ n g u n a a n _ t u u n i s q e l l u s i _ sa llegh mi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ whangkutgun _ uglagh lghii m _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ J e r u s a l e m - e m e l n g u u t _ allgegh lleqe ait _ a k l u k e g k a t e n g _ tunusagh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ iyamsiqa yug llegh meng _ tevugha lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tuune yaghqagh gpesigun _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q u s i _ ugpeqe i nga ni lusi llu _ qaatke te nga ni lusi llu _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ usuqe lleqe aat llu _ i g h l e l l n g u n a s i _ tuune i llegh gpesineng _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h m i i n u n l l u _ ila itnun llu _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ piniqe pigte lusi _ yughagh tke lleqe aisi _ apallugh ke luku _ piniqe llegh ghrug ghllag _ kiyaghnegh m _ t u u n Ê¼ n g a k a n g a _ elpesi nun _ .
yeqay _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ tunusagh anun _ akuzite t _ a p e g h p a g n i n g i l k a n g a t _ .
ila ita _ yug gpesi _ pi aqe aatnga _ tetugtagh ni lunga _ elpesinite negh mni _ , _ iwernga _ tetug igate na iqe aatnga _ elpesinite nghite negh mni _ . _ whanga _ P a u l _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ , _ C h r i s t - a m _ q u s e v e g n g a l l g h a k u n l l u _ piniqe llegh akun llu _ ,
tetug ste nghite aghte nakefsinga _ laalighfike nqigtekumsi _ . _ iwernga _ tetug yaghqaqe nghite kumki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u n i l u n g a _ nuna m _ y u g i s t u n _ , _ elngaatall _ tetug naanghite anka _ .
nuna mete u ghngaamta _ p i l l u w i i g a t u k u t _ nuna m _ yug an _ p i l l u w a l l g h i s t u n _ .
guutute t _ p i l l u w a a s i p u t _ nuna m _ yug an _ guutute ke nghite ai _ . _ guutute put _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g _ pi lgu ut _ . _ N a a f q e s a q l e g w i i t _ a y e p s u g i l n g u u t _ mingllute t _ anguyag m _ nekefte qugh qu ai _ yug t _ u v i t a n g i t g u n _ .
T a a k u t g u n _ guutute tgun _ naafqe aqe aput _ anguyag m _ iqlengagh u i _ , _ sumeghnegh it llu _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h e t _ . _ apeghtugh i llghite a _ amig igh aqe ait _ yug t _ liite lleghqagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ katam _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ t u g u t e l l g h i s t u n _ anusimingllagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ whangkuta llu _ t u g w a a q a p u t _ qamagte luki _ sumeghnegh t _ q a a t k u t e s q e l l u k i _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ .
C h r i s t - a m u n _ q a a t k u t n g n g w a a q u f s i _ , _ taawa _ aghyuugh i yaghqaaghte lleqe ukut _ qaatke te nghite ngugh nun _ .
nanqigte i aqe usi _ e s g h a l l g h i i n a g h p e s i g u n _ . _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ pike pestaagh ni kufsi _ , _ neqamike luku _ whangkuta llu _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ elpesi stun _ .
kayngu ke igate aqa _ q a n a t k i v l e g h a p a l q a _ A t a n g h e m _ igleghte te i ste ngughte stegkanganga _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ kayeme sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ n a a f q e n n a l u k u _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ a l i n g e s n a q u t k e n g n g u n i l u s i _ lata mkun _ .
ila ita _ pi aqe ait _ P a u l - e m _ lata i _ seghlegh ghllag u ni luki _ a g h s a a g h m i k a g h n g a n i l u k i _ , _ naqam _ w h a n g k u n n i n n e g h m i n i _ , _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe uq _ , _ akuzi yiite aqe uq llu _ !
tamaakut _ yug t _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ liigike litgu _ sa meng _ pi llegh ut _ lata tgun _ , _ t a m a a k u n g u u t _ ataasigh t _ pi yaghqagh put _ ellngit nun _ pi kumta _ .
inglute naqute kete naanghite ukut _ t a m a a k u n u n _ aangaayugte lghii nun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ aange ni luteng _ qayughllak _ ungipagh utu te aqe lghiit _ aange ni luteng _ . _ N a l l u u g h h a g h m e n g _ !
Q u k a a y u g u t k e n n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ alngunak _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte te ma ite kanga _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ iwernga _ q u k a a y u g u t k e n g n g i n a g h l l e q a g h p u t _ qepghaqagh _ kayagte tke a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ qepghaqagh mnnun _ .
S i v u l i g h p i g a a g u k u t _ ungipagh ke i yaghtuqagh ni _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ enkaam _ a l p a g i g a t a g h p u t _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte tke a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
Q u k a a y u g u t k e l l e q a g h p u t _ t a a n a n g i n a q _ qepghaqagh _ pikagh ut _ , _ nakaan _ ila ita _ qepghaqagh at _ . _ U g p e l l e g h t u g h t e k u f s i _ sighima ukut _ k a y u s i g h a t a g h i i s q e l l u t a _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
enkaam _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ila itnun _ nuna t _ . _ Q u k a a y u g u t k e s u g u n g h i t a g h p u t _ qepghaqagh _ ila ita _ apeghiighkagh at _ .
iwernga _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ q u k a a y u g s u k u m i _ , _ qukaayug te kete ligu _ A t a n g h h i i n a q _ . _ "
A t a n g h e m _ tugukligh igate ai _ pinighnagh igh lghiit _ . _ itupill _ A t a n g h e m _ tugukligh aqe ai _ tamaakut _ pinigh ni luki _ pikani _ .
sighimake amsi _ n e k e g g m e t u t e s q e l l u n g a _ akuzi kuma _ temngitwha lghii stun _ natengiighhaq _ . _ N e k e g g m e t u t e q a g h t e n g n g a _ .
qungyagh aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qungyaqe llegh atun _ elpek si _ , _ qayughllak _ tuute ma amsi _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ P e l u n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ugiigh naqe lghii stun _ a a n g Ê¼ g h u s i m a a m s i _ ellnga nun _ , _ ugi ke sqellug qu _ e l l n g i n a a _ .
iwernga _ alingutke aqe amsi _ anguyag m _ puughhe na yu kangisi _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ nemeghyagh m _ peghqiniqe te kete luku _ puughte llegh atun _ E v e _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ p i n i q n a n i g h w a a g h n a y u k a f s i g u _ C h r i s t - a _ .
ungipagh kaqe yamteki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ elpesi nun _ , _ u g p e q e g k a q a g h s i _ Jesus _ , _ tugukligh agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ iwernga _ nagate yu kestagh luki _ ayuqe kaqe asi _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lghiit _ ila aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ tugukligh i yug usi llu _ ila aneng _ taghneghagh m _ , _ ugpeqe yukagh kasi llu _ ila i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
tamaakut _ u n g i p a q i s t e t _ a p o s t l e - n g u n i l u t e n g _ pi aqe ut _ . _ sumegh meggni _ aangwaagh u na iqe ut _ a p o s t l e - e t _ . _ iwernga _ liisimake anka _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
akuzi llgite ghngaaghma _ , _ liisima ghllag unga _ . _ uglagh ghngaan _ liigike ste aqe amsi _ liisima lleg mneng _ .
elpesi nun _ akileghtughsagh qu mangite unga _ ungipagh kaqe yamki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ qusevegte lunga _ q u u l v a g h n a l u s i _ . _ S e g h l e g h q e s i n g a a - a _ tawaten _ pi lunga _ ?
ugpeqagh t _ i l a n g i t n i l n g u u t _ yughaghvig t _ akileghtugh kaqe aatnga _ elpesi nite lunga _ . _ W a y a q a l l g h u u g h a n k a _ mani itneng _ kayusiite na lusi _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ u g h l e g h i i g h t e l l g h i t a m s i _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u n g a _ a k l u k e g k a m n e n g _ . _ U g p e q a a l g u t e t _ M a c e d o n i a - m e n g _ tagite kaqe aatnga _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ a k l u k e g k a m n e n g _ . _ enkaam _ aapte vike llghite amsi _ a k l u k e g k a m n e n g _ , _ aapte vike naanghite amsi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ A c h a i a - m i _ aghula i aghte naanghite a _ q u k a a y u g t e l q a _ taagken _ . _ tawaten _ pi unga _ C h r i s t - a m _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h a k u n _ whanga mnite ngugh qun _ .
kayute ngllagh nghite u te mneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ s u m e g h p e s i n i i - i _ piniqe nghite ni lusi _ pi tsi _ whanga mnun _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ piniqe i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taawa _ ighsa ke ii vike manginagh naqe amsi _ mani gpesineng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ q u k a a y u g g n a n i i s q e l l u k i _ a p o s t l e - e s i g h w a a g h e t _ whangkutestun _ qepghagh ni lghiit _ akileghtuusagh ngunateng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ a p o s t l e - e s i g h w a a g h u u t _ puughte i lghiit _ yug neng _ iqlengiqe llegh megteggun _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ a p o s t l e - e p i i k n i l u t e n g _ .
T a a m e n g w h a q u n _ . _ talwa _ tughneghagh _ allangughte aqe uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aliigh yaghqaa luni _ kuukgute nga lghii tun _ yaquleg tun _ .
enkaam _ saghiigha nagh ite ut _ tughneghagh m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ tawaten _ pi kumeng _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ elqughutngagh lghii u ni luteng _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ iwernga _ kenle mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ elqughutngagh lghii meng _ aghyuugh llegh meng _ anaggute llegh itnun _ .
alla _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tke nghite linga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g u k u f s i n g a _ , _ tugukligh qaghte ngnga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ taagken _ whanga llu _ q u k a a y u g t e v l e g h a g h l l e q u n g a _ .
qukaayug tke llegh ka _ whanga mneng _ atanegh meng _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ itupill _ akuzi u unga _ temngi _ pi lghii stun _ .
uglagh lghiit _ u g p e q a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ q u k a a y u g t a q u t _ qepghaqagh meggneng _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ tawaten _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ .
sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigte ni lusi _ pi aqe usi _ . _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ nagate aqe asi _ temngitwha lghiit _ .
tugukligh aqe asi _ qelegh llegh it _ nikimqun _ elpek si _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ ellngit nun _ . _ kagu kaqe ste aqe usi _ , _ tegleg vike ste aqe usi _ , _ ukaligh ke ste aqe usi llu _ , _ talwa _ gginagh gpesigun _ qasaghte ste aqe lusi _ .
kayngu yug unga _ kayaate pigte ukut _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ t a m a a k u s t u n _ a p o s t l e - e s i g h w a a g h e s t u n _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qukaayugsaghqagh u kan _ , _ whanga llu _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh _ temngitwha u uq _ .
taakut _ a p o s t l e - e s i g h w a a g h e t _ , _ H e b r e w - n g w a a t _ ? _ whanga llu _ H e b r e w - n g u u n g a _ . _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n g w a a t _ ? _ whanga llu _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n g u u n g a _ . _ A b r a h a m - e m _ k i n g u n q a k i i _ ? _ whanga llu _ kingunegh ke aanga _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ q e p g h a g h t e k a k i i _ ? _ iwernga _ whanga _ pinigh aghagh unga _ qepghagh a _ ellngit neng _ . _ taawa _ akuzi unga _ n a l l e k a g h n i l n g u g h e s t u n _ . _ qepghagh aghagh kau unga _ ellngit neng _ , _ a n u s i m i n g l a g h v i g m e t a a g h a q a a g u n g a l l u _ ellngit neng _ . _ kagsagmig lleg nge kau unga _ kestekau nghite ngugh meng _ , _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aatagh kau unga _ .
T a l l i m a g y a g n e n g _ J e w s - e t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ kagsagmig ste aatagh aatnga _ . _ ( _ 3 9 - n g w a a q u t _ ataasigh t _ kagsagmig llegh t _ . _ )
R o m e - e g h m i i t _ u m i i l w a a g h i t a _ pi nga yu neng _ a n a g u l e g h t e s t e k a q a a t n g a _ . _ ataasigh meng _ ila ita _ yug t _ milugh agaatagh aatnga _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ angyagh igh utu te aqe aanga _ enkaam _ ataasigh meng _ unug llegh ke sigh _ , _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ ughhe te kaqe aanga _ kellii ni _ .
uglagh pigte lghii mi _ iglegha lleg mni _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ kiiw ni _ , _ w a y a g h n i i g h t e n e n g _ , _ talwa _ yug lgute mneng llu _ , _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g l l u _ . _ yakugh nagh igh unga llu _ ne ghllag ni _ , _ kilgaa ni _ , _ kellii ni llu _ . _ talwa _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i g h w a a g h n e n g _ .
ughleghiigh ghllag kau unga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh aqe lunga _ . _ ilangani _ qavagh gpenanga _ , _ iyatagh nga aqe lunga _ , _ meqsug nga aqe lunga _ . _ awen _ neqe ite aqe lunga _ , _ azigutigh te aqe lunga _ , _ ghhuute aqe lunga llu _ aatkagh ii te m _ .
tamaakut _ saaghw itgun _ , _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghyali tke kaqe anka _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ t a m a g h h i t n i _ y u g h a g v i g n i _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ kayaate nghaani _ , _ whanga llu _ kayaate aqe unga _ . _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ kitum _ seghleghqe ste nghagu _ , _ sakrite aqe unga _ .
Q u k a a y u g g n a q n g u k u m a _ , _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe naanghite unga _ . _ ellnga _ ata ke a _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ .
D a m a s c u s - m e l l u n g a _ , _ g o v e r n o r - e m _ tugu ste sug kaqe aanga _ . _ ( _ umiileg m _ A r e t a s - e m _ g o v e r n o r - n g u g h t e s t e k a q a a _ . _ ) _ enkaam _ t u g u s q e l l u n g a _ p i l l u w a g h t e n i _ kelengake i stekaqe ai _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itni _ .
iwernga _ ilakumtaagh ma _ u k i g t e k a q a a t n g a _ p a s k e t e g n e k u n _ mingllute m _ qergese gkenkun _ enkaam _ anag kau unga _ g o v e r n o r - m e n g _ .
qukaayugsaghqagh u unga _ , _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh u nghite ghngaan _ . _ paninang _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ esghaghwaagh lleg mneng _ , _ A t a n g h e m l l u _ aliigh qughkagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ .
liisimake aqa _ yuug _ C h r i s t - a m e l n g u q _ . _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ ayumiqullegh ni _ agani _ naghughtekagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ p i n g a y a a n u n _ qilag m _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ y u g u s i m i n i t u t a n g a _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ a a n Ê¼ n g a k a a t a n g a _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
liisimake aqa _ taana _ yuug _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ P a r a d i s e - m u n _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ y u g u s i m i n i t u t a n g a _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ a a n Ê¼ n g a k a a t a n g a _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
tawani _ nagate kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ apegh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ . _ tamaakut _ iinghute kau ut _ yug mun _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luteng _ .
qukaayug te kete naqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ , _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete naqe nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ iwerngaqun _ kayaaghlliqe sigh kekagh ghhagh inagh mneng _ .
qukaayug tke sug kuma _ whanga mneng _ , _ temngingu naanghite unga _ qayughllak _ apegh lleqe aqa _ i p a p i l l e q _ . _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete na nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke sug unga _ elqughte lunga _ esghapag llegh itgun llu _ nagate llegh itgun llu _ whanga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe ghngaaki _ whanga mnun _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ sa u aat _ qilag mi _ , _ qukaayug ste sug nghite aanga _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ q u s e v e g t e s q e l l u n g a _ sikughllug ngestagh u nga _ yugusigh mkun _ . _ taana _ sikughllug _ ungipaghte u uq _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ T a a m _ ikfiqe ste aanga _ q u s e v e g n g a s q e l l u n g a _ .
pi nga yu neng _ k e t w e l l _ atanegh mun _ yughagh aqe unga _ iqite sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ kayusillegh ka _ naama uq _ elpenun _ suflughte sqellug qu _ taana _ ikfiqe llegh _ qayughllak _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l q a _ i k n a q e l l e g h p i g a a g w a q u q _ kayaaghlliqe negh gpeni _ . _ " _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ qukaayug taqu nga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ w h a n g a m n i t e s q e l l u k u _ C h r i s t - a m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ quya aqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ , _ s e g h l e q u u l l e n g n e m n i _ , _ piyaqli i negh mni _ , _ amyuutke lleg nge negh mni _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng llu _ seghleliigh negh mni _ C h r i s t - a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ qayughllak _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ taawa _ iknaqe aqe unga _ .
akuzi u unga _ t e m n g i t w h a s t u n _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ tawaten _ p i s t a g h p e s i n g a _ . _ elpek si _ pinitun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe yaghagh zinga _ ila gpesinun _ . _ qaywa _ sasii nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ tamaakut _ " _ aw nge aaghet _ a p o s t l e - e t _ " _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
elpesi nite lunga _ n e k e g l l u w a a n _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h e t _ pi kaqe anka _ . _ tamaakut _ i p a p i g h q a a t n g a _ a p o s t l e - e p i i g u t k a _ .
sa kaqe zingi _ ugpeqagh t _ i l a n g i t n i l n g u u t _ yughaghvig t _ elpesi nun _ pi ma ite ke mneng _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh inagh _ alla u uq _ , _ akilguqe mangite amsi _ . _ seghevute aghte ngnga _ anagte ma kumsi _ !
laalighfike naqe aqe amsi _ pingayut ii te kun _ , _ iwernga _ ughleghiigh tke ste sug nghite unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ elpek si _ sumeghmike aqe amsi _ , _ nakaan _ saghya si _ . _ taghnughhagh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ taghnughhagh t _ aflengake i yaghqaa nghite ut _ angayuqagh meggneng _ , _ iwernga _ angayuqagh t _ aflengake yaghqaqe ait _ taghnughhagh teng _ .
tuune yaghqaaghte amsi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ whanga _ pi mneng _ , _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ tuune lleqe unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ P i n i q a t a g h a n e m s i _ , _ llangaqa _ elpek si _ p i n i q e p a g i g a t a g h p e s i n g a _ .
elpek si llu _ whanga llu _ liisimakagh ut _ u g h l e g h i i g h t e s i m a n g i t a m s i _ . _ iwernga _ ila gpesi _ anaggute ma ni aatnga _ . _ pi aqe ut _ p u u g h n e q g u u n n i l u s i _ iqlengiqe lleg mkun _ .
naten _ tawaten _ p i s t e m s i _ ? _ sakenge kau zinga _ elpesi neng _ kayagte aqe yamki _ yug t _ elpesi nun _ ?
kayagtekaqe aqa _ titus _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t f u t l u _ maligte te sqe aqa _ . _ T i t u s - e m _ puughtekagh qite yu ai _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ T i t u s - l u _ whangkutung _ qepghaqagh ung _ ataasigh u uq _ , _ ataasigh kun _ taghneghagh kun _ .
S u m e g h p e s i n i i - i _ elpesi nun _ i p a p i g h q e n n a q u t k e s t e g n e g u u _ anaggute llghite ni lutung _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma nghaani _ , _ akuzi aqe ukung _ C h r i s t - a m _ akuzi sqe llegh atun _ . _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ s a n g w a _ qamagte luku _ pi iqagh ung _ i k n a q u g h s a g h n a l u k u _ ugpegh llegh i _ .
sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ kaate kuma _ esghagh kumsi _ allake nayuke amsi _ whanga _ sighimake lleg mneng _ . _ elpek si llu _ whanga _ esghagh kufsinga _ a l l a k n a y u k a f s i n g a _ sighimake llegh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ a g h i v a t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ , _ a q i n a k u t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ , _ s a k r a a t u t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ , _ e l l n g i n a a y u g u t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h u t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ , _ y i i l l g i t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ , _ q u k a a y u g u t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ , _ s u u g l l i q u t n g u n a y u k a f s i _ .
sumeghyali aqe unga _ alla _ taku kumsi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ k a y n g u s a a k n a y u k a n g a n g a _ sivu gpesini _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ enkaam _ qivghu ghllag lleqe unga _ qayughllak _ uglagh lghii ni _ elpek si _ seghleghqe manginagh u usi _ avuteghqe gpenasi _ . _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh aqe usi _ s e x - m e n g _ pelungite nghite ngugh meng _ , _ s e x - a _ seghletun _ atugh qaghkagh i _ , _ s e x - e l l g h e t l u _ anagnga lghiit _ n u q e t u s i g a t a s i _ .
una _ pingayut ii tke a _ laalighte naqe llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ anaggute ma ni katgu _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ l i i s i m a k i s t e t _ i p a p i g h q e s a g h q a q a a t _ anaggute llegh a _ . _ "
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ laalighfike aqe yamsi _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ tamaakut _ sivugh nghaani _ seghleghqe lghiit _ . _ ila it llu _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke anka _ , _ tagi nqigtekuma _ a g h y u u g h m i g l l e q n i l u k i _ seghleghqe manginagh kata _ . _ tamaa uute nghite ghngaaghma _ k e l e n g a s a a g h n a q a n k a _ .
whanga mnun _ i p a p i g h q e s t e s u k e s i _ C h r i s t - a _ akuzi aqe ta a _ whanga mkun _ . _ C h r i s t - a _ kayaate nghite uq _ a g h y u u g h m i k u m i s i _ , _ itupill _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
qaywa _ C h r i s t - a _ kayaate kaayagh uq _ qaquuragh aqe yamegteggu _ , _ maaten _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ . _ whangkuta llu _ kayaate ukut _ katam _ C h r i s t - a m _ kayaate kaayagh llegh atun _ . _ iwernga _ elpesi nite kumta _ kayusiite lleqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ .
yuvghiigh tek _ elpesi neng _ liigike sqellug qu _ u g p e q e p i i g u t s i _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ L i i g i k e n g h i s t e g g u u - u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u t a n g a _ ilu gpesini _ ? _ I l u g p e s i n i n n e g h i t n g u k a n _ , _ taawa _ u g p e q e p i i l l g h i t a g h s i _ .
sunanguq _ liigike teggu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ .
yughagh aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u s i _ anaggute fqaafsi _ p i s q e l l u s i _ . _ iwernga _ yughagh u u nghite ukut _ i p a p i g h q e n n a l u k u _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ . _ itupill _ whangkuta _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ elqughute nga an _ p i s q e l l u s i _ , _ qaywa _ yug t _ pi ghngainkut _ i t a g n a q e l l g h i n n i l u t a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
K i p u l l g i n a a g h p a g n i n g i t a g h p u t _ i p a p i l l e q _ ; _ itupill _ i l a p g a y a g h q a q a g h p u t _ .
quya aqe ukut _ kayaate negh mta _ , _ iknaqe u negh gpesini _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ v e g h u n n e q i g t e s q e l l u s i _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata aqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ pi vagilgama _ qayughllak _ nanqigte yu nghite kemsi _ a g h y u u g h m i g y a g h q a a l u s i _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ qelqe aqe aanga _ nanqigte ste u lunga _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ nanqigte yug amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ u g p e q i l l e g h t u g h t e s q e l l u s i _ , _ nakaan _ k a y a a l i s q e l l u s i _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ t a w a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ pi unga _ . _ quya nga tek _ . _ veghute tek _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ pi sqe sug lleg mtun _ pi tek _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ , _ n e k e g g m e t u l l u s i _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ t e n e m e n g a _ piniqe llegh m llu _ nekeggmellegh m llu _ elpesi nite li _ .
Q u y a k u t u t a q i t e k _ agleghnagh lghii kun _ naagh llegh kun _ .
qamagte luteng _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ q e r n g a g h m e t e l l g h a l l u _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ , _ a p o s t l e - m e n g _ . _ yug t _ nakmike llghite aatnga _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u n g a _ , _ talwa _ kayagte llghite aatnga _ . _ A p o s t l e - n g u u g h t e k a a g u n g a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n l l u _ kiyaghnegh kun llu _ ata kun _ , _ unguvagh ste ikagh _ ellnga neng _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
lata aqe amsi _ ugpeqagh ni _ G a l a t i a - m e l n g u g h n i _ . _ qamagte luteng _ u g p e q a a l g u t m a _ m a a n l e n g u u t _ pinigh ke ii sigh nge uk _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luteng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ n e k e g g m e l l e l g u s l i s i l i l l u _ .
C h r i s t - a _ ellmi neng _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ iteme te na luta _ whaken _ seghlegh meng _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e n g _ . _ kiyaghnegh mta _ ata m _ piyuke llegh atun _ pi kau uq _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
saghiigha yagute amsi _ aawallu _ p e g t a g h t a g h s i _ t u q l u g h i s t e z i _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ tugukligh aisi _ alla neng _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ .
A v a q r a g g i i t u q _ alla _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ yug t _ teggellghiigh ste aqe aisi _ allangughte naqutke llegh megteggun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
qaywa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh mta _ whangkuta _ ungipagh ke gkumteki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ taana _ u n g i p a q i l g h i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ , _ whaa _ ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke gkumiki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
tawaten _ akuzillegh mkun _ e f q u g h h n a q u t k e n g n g u n g h i t a n k a _ yug t _ . _ nakaa _ , _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ e f q u g h s u k a q a _ . _ paninang _ yug nun _ e f q u g h t i n a q u t k e n g n g u k u m a _ , _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u n a a n g h i t u n g a _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ una _ liisimake sug aqa _ elpesi nun _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ yug neng _ pi u nghite ut _ .
nagaqugh kaqe nghite anka _ yug neng _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh tke mangite ai _ whanga mnun _ . _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ aliightekaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ .
nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ natete yagh tke a _ m a l i g t e n g n g u l u k i _ J e w s - e t _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t _ . _ elngaatall _ n a n g l l e g y u l l n g u n a n g a _ amyuutke kaqe anka _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ aviighute ste naqutke kaqe anka _ .
ingyagh kaqe anka _ allute luki _ angtaagh lgute nka _ atuqe u luki _ J e w s - e t _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t _ , _ qayughllak _ sagiqnegh ghllag u yagh unga _ sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh itnun _ .
iwernga _ allgegh mangite lunga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ .
enkaam _ whanga mnun _ aliightekaqe a _ kina u ta a _ ighnegh ni _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ kinku nun _ alngunak _ akuzi tkesaghtugh llghite aqa _ taana _ ,
talwa _ J e r u s a l e m - e t e l l g h i t u n g a _ akuzite kete na luku _ a p o s t l e - n g u g h t e k a n u n _ sivu mni _ . _ yeghlegi _ A r a b i a - m u n _ pi unga _ . _ tagtalmi _ uteghnigh unga _ D a m a s c u s - m u n _ .
tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh luki _ J e r u s a l e m - e t u n g a _ aleghqugh na luku _ C e p h a s _ ( _ peter _ ) _ . _ ellnga nite unga _ aki mig aq _ unuk _ .
kina _ alla _ a p o s t l e - a _ aleghqugh nghite aqa _ iwerngaqun _ James _ , _ A t a n g h e m _ a n g l e g u t a n g a _ .
apeghkagh nka _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ .
taagken _ iglegha unga _ S y r i a - m u n l l u _ C i l i c i a - m u n l l u _ .
tamaani _ J u d e a - m i _ ugpeqagh t _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ salin _ nallagh igate kangatnga _ gginasaghqugh lunga _ .
taawanginaq _ liisimake aat _ nagaqugh llegh eng _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ a m y u q e t i q e s t e k e g k a g h p u t _ , _ naafqii naqutkekagh llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mnneng _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ maaten _ whaa _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ ! _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe aqe aat _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ uteghnigh unga _ J e r u s a l e m - e m u n _ ; _ B a r n a b a s - e m _ maligte aanga _ T i t u s - l u _ kelqe aqa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liigike ste aanga _ J e r u s a l e m - e t e s q e l l u n g a _ . _ kaate yamta _ ugpeqagh t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i n i i t _ qerngughte te aghte sqe anka _ . _ tawani _ ungipamsug te anka _ naten _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ ungipagh ke i lleg mneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ luuraq _ taakut _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ temngingu ni na yu katki _ sivugh nghaani llu _ maaten llu _ .
liigike anka _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ tugukligh ait _ qayughllak _ maligte i steke _ titus _ , _ G r e e k - n g u g h n g a a n _ , _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s q e n g h i l k a n g a t _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ u g p e q a s i g h w a a g h e t _ aksaqe luku _ ilate ut _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ riirngi na luku _ iteme nga llegh ut _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h h n e q i g t e s q e l l u t a _ pi inkut _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
ellngit nun _ malighqutagh ke llghite ukut _ talwa _ natengiighhaq _ a l m e s i q e s q e l l u k i _ ipa u llegh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apeghtuusagh ke lleg mtestun _ elpesi nun _ .
taakut _ ugpeqagh t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ allangughte mangite ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ . _ ( _ I g l e g h u t i s t e n g u y a g h n g a a t a _ , _ whanga mni _ allangughte te ite ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ . _ )
I g l e g h u t i s t e t _ liigike ma ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghyuke te ma ni luki _ whanga mnun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ neghyuke te llegh atun _ peter- mun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ J e w s - e n u n _ .
katam _ kiyaghnegh _ qepghaqagh u uq _ peter- kun _ a p o s t l e - k e n n a l u k u _ J e w s - e n u n _ , _ whanga mkun llu _ qepghaqagh u uq _ a p o s t l e - k e n n a l u n g a _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ J a m e s - e n k u t _ P e t e r - e n k u t _ J o h n - e n k u t _ , _ nekevgha te i lghiit _ ugpeqagh nun _ , _ liigike aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ t u n u s a l i s i m a n i l u n g a _ tawaten _ q e p g h i i s q e l l u n g a _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ B a r n a b a s - l u _ iigge pung _ aghulate ait _ tugukligh ni luku _ qepghagh u u llegh ung _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ , _ ellngit _ J e w s - e n u n _ .
T a a n a n g i n a q _ puygu snanigh aat _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u k i _ akluma lghiit _ , _ taana ta _ nagnegh te yu pigtegkegka _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ peter _ A n t i o c h - m e l l u n i _ sa meng _ anaggutekagh _ . _ enkaam _ sivu itni _ ugpeqagh t _ a g h y u u g h m i g a q a _ anaggute llegh aneng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
peter _ neghe lgusigh i kayugu yagh lghii _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqagh itneng _ kenlanga _ J a m e s - e m _ yug t _ A n t i o c h - e t e s t e l l g h i t n u n _ . _ iwernga _ kaa sa ta _ neghe lgusigh nanigh ai _ G e n t i l e - e t _ , _ aaftekagh llu _ ellngit neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau lghii _ qayughllak _ alinge lghii _ taakut _ yug t _ sagiqe te u kangit _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqe ait _ c i r c u m c i s e - e y a g h q a a n i l u k i _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ A n t i o c h - e g h m i i t _ J e w s - e t _ ugpeqe ait _ maligte tke aat _ P e t e r - e m _ anaggute llegh anun _ , _ talwa _ B a r n a b a s - l u _ ilate luni _ .
liigike yamki _ qaatke te nghite llegh it _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ sivu itni _ yug t _ peter _ pi aqa _ , _ " _ elpek _ qaywa _ J e w - n g u g h n g a a g h p e k _ kiyaghte u uten _ G e n t i l e - e s t u n _ , _ nakaan _ J e w s - e s t u n _ . _ sangita ngam _ G e n t i l e - e t _ J e w s - e s t u n _ kiyaghte ste naqute kesi ki _ ? _ "
J e w s - n g u l u t a _ allgegh kau ukut _ , _ nakaan _ G e n t i l e - e t _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ .
naqamllu _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ nallghusagh naanghite a _ yuug _ qaatke te llegh akun _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ t a w a t e n g i n a q _ nallghusagh lleqe a _ ugpeqe i llegh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ . _ talwa _ whangkuta _ J e w s - e n i _ u g p e q e g k a q a g h p u t _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ n a l l g h u s i i s q e l l u t a _ ugpeqe lleg mteggun _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te lleg mteggun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te llegh akun _ liilightuusagh nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ nallghusagh yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
J e w s - e n i _ whangkuta _ nallghusagh sug u kumta _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ nakaan _ liilightuusagh tgun _ , _ ila ita _ J e w s - e t _ seghleghqe ste u ni lleqe ainkut _ G e n t i l e - e s t u n _ . _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a n g u f t a a _ seghleghqe ste ngughte ste i lghii _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ !
liilightuusagh t _ pegtekaqe anka _ , _ atuqe nqigte yagute kumki _ taawa _ liilightuusagh nun _ anaggute lleqe unga _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ tuqu kau unga _ liilightuusagh nun _ kiyaghte yaghqaa lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qaquuragh te kau unga _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ maligte te lunga _ , _ enkaam _ whanga u nanigh ma uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ ; _ C h r i s t - a n g u g h s i m a a q _ kiyaghte lghii _ ilu mni _ . _ K i y a g h t e n g n g u g h n g a a g h m a _ yugusigh mni _ , _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u n g a _ ugpeqe i lleg mkun _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ piniqe kanganga _ , _ tuune kau lghii llu _ whanga mnun _ .
enkaam _ pakig igate aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ . _ yuug _ qaatke te llegh mikun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nallghusagh yaghqaa yagh kan _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ , _ taawa _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu llegh a _ temngingu nayagh uq _ .
N a l l u g h h a g h m e n g _ elpek si _ G a l a t i a - g h m i i n i _ ! _ kitum _ puughte isi _ ? _ P u y g u s t e g g u u _ apegh u aqe aqe yaqegka _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu llegh a _ qaquuragh kun _ ?
A a p t a g h l l a m s i _ : _ naten _ a l l g e g h t e k a q e s t e k e k _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ qaatke te llegh gpesigun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun _ nagatekagh i _ ?
N a l l u u p i g e t s i i _ ? _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ piinligh luku _ nutaghagh _ unguvallegh i _ , _ a p e g h i i g h n a q e s t e g g u u - u _ elpesi neng _ katam _ ?
ikfiqe llegh i _ temngingu a _ ? _ ugpeqe pestaagh aqa _ temngingu nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ t u u n e g k a q i s i i - i _ taghneghagh gmineng _ , _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i k a a w a l l u u _ akule gpesini _ qayughllak _ qaatke kesi _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqe kesi _ nagaqughkagh i _ ?
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apegh kaqe aat _ A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ liisimake lleqe asi _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i lleg leg t _ kiyaghnegh kun _ A b r a h a m - e m _ k i n g u n e g h p i g a q i i _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ a a p q e s t a q a q a a t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nallghusagh naqe ni luki _ G e n t i l e - e t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ . _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ taana _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ , _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ nuna m _ ramke i _ quya ste lleg nge naqngu ut _ elpegun _ . _ "
A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ enkaam _ quya ste lleg ngekagh _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqe i lghii _ quya ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ ellnga tun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ tamaakut _ sighima lghiit _ qaatke te llegh megteggun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nallghusagh lleqe ni luteng _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ . _ qayughllak _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kaki _ tamaghhagh ita _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh itgun _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte lleg nge lleqe uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ "
W h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ liigike nagh uq _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ nallghusagh yaghqaa nghite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ qaatke te llegh mikun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh qagh a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ ugpegh llegh mikun _ . _ "
iwernga _ qaatke te lghii _ liilightuusagh nun _ sighima u nghite uq _ ugpegh llegh kun _ , _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ sighima lghii _ liilightuusagh tgun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ qaute kete luki _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe ainkut _ aghyuugh na luta _ apallugh ke luki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ iwernga _ C h r i s t - a m _ n a v e g h q e l l i k a q i i n k u t _ n a n q i g l l e g h q a m n n e n g _ tugu llegh mikun _ aghyuugh lleghqagh ut _ . _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ nanqigtekau uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ tamaghhagh mi _ agaghtekagh _ uqfig kun _ . _ "
Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ n a v e g h q e l l i k a q i i n k u t _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya stekaqe ai _ G e n t i l e - e t _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ quya ste llegh meng _ akequsagh kekagh minun _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ . _ enkaam _ ugpegh llegh kun _ allgegh ta gput _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke gkakek _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ u n g i p a a t a g h l l a m s i _ usputaghqagh meng _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi aqe lghii neng _ : _ yug k _ a k e q u s k u m e k _ sa meng _ , _ igaqe luku _ igagh kun _ , _ ategh tek llu _ igaqe lukek _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ aghula i aghte yaghqaqe nghite a _ a k e q u t u t e l l g h a k _ nalighmeng _ ila yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
kiyaghnegh _ a k e q u s a n g l l a g h t e q a a g u q _ A b r a h a m - e m u n l l u _ k i n g u n g h a n u n l l u _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ngllagh mangite ai _ , _ " _ K i n g u n g h i _ , _ " _ A k e q u s a n g l l a g h t e q a a g u q _ ataasigh inagh mun _ kingunegh mun _ , _ taana _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ .
taana _ liigike sug aqe yagh aqa _ : _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsagh ngllagh kau uq _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ enkaam _ akequsagh ni _ pi naqe ni kaqe a _ . _ 4 3 0 _ ayumiqullegh t _ kingu itneng _ akeqe i llegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ taana _ akequsagh _ s a t n g u n a n i g h q e n n a a n g h i t a a _ nalighmeng _ n a a f q e n n a a n g h i t a a _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ a l l g e g h h n a q n g u k u m t e g g u _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ , _ taawa _ akequsagh akun _ a l l g e g h h n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ . _ iwernga _ akeqe i llegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh ni _ tuune kaqe a _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ .
sangameng _ liilightuusagh t _ tuune kau aat _ ? _ tuune kau ut _ yug nun _ l i i g i k e s q e l l u k i _ anaggute llegh it _ seghleghqe llegh u ni luki _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ tawatete kau ut _ kenlanga _ kingunegh _ tagi llegh anun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ngllagh qagh a _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg tgun _ tuune kaqe ai _ M o s e s - m u n _ . _ taagken _ M o s e s - e m _ u y g u k u t i s t e m _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ uygu ke te i stesugh niite uq _ ataasigh _ akeqe i kuni _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasigh ghhagh u te mineng _ uygu ke te i stesugh niite uq _ .
liilightuusagh at _ t e n g v i m u n _ a y u q a t k i i _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh i _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ liilightuusagh m _ unguvallegh ngesaghqagh ke yagh kumikut _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh nayagh ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ taaggun _ liilightuusagh kun _ .
iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ seghleghqe llegh m _ anusimingllagh aqe ai _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ tuune lleqe a _ ugpeqe ikagh ghhagh inagh nun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
salin _ ugpegh llghite luku _ anusimingllaghagh u yagh ukut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ aaghqute aqe u yagh ainkut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ liite ste llegh anun _ ugpegh llegh _ .
liilightuusagh t _ apaqu te i steke yagh aput _ kenlanga _ C h r i s t - a m _ tagi llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh yaghqaaghte ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
ugpegh llegh _ tagi ta aneng _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ liilightuusagh t _ a p a q u t i s t e k n a n i g h a p u t _ .
ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ , _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ .
P a a p t a a y a a q n g a f s i _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ aate lghii stun _ C h r i s t - a _ p i k a q a g h s i _ tawaten _ pilugug aqe llegh gpesistun _ .
allangughte te ite ut _ J e w s - e t l u _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ ; _ allangughte te ite ut _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t l u _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u u t l u _ ; _ allangughte te ite ut _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte lusi _ atunem _ ayuqe usi _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ p i k n g u k a n g i s i _ taawa _ A b r a h a m - e m _ kingunegh ke aisi _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si llu _ p i l i i l l e q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ .
nagnegh te aghte lakun _ whaten _ , _ ighnegh _ pi liite i yaghqagh _ a ta mi _ saghya aneng _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e s t u n _ kiyaghute kayugu uq _ mekestaaghhaa luni _ , _ qaywa _ ellnga n _ p i k s a g h n g a a g u _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ a ta mi _ pi a _ .
mekestaaghhaa luku _ yug t _ aflengake kaqe aat _ , _ sa u aat llu _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi kaghqagh i _ kenlanga _ ata an _ pi yaghqaaghte ni llegh anun _ .
whangkuta llu _ tawatete yagh ukut _ . _ taghnughhagh u luta _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u y a g h t u k u t _ nuna m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t n u n _ tughneghagh nun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ kayagtekagh a _ ighnegh ni _ , _ allgeghkagh _ aghnagh kun _ . _ ellnga n _ qaatke kaqe ai _ liilightuusagh t
iteme te na luta _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ a v a q u t a l i i t e s q e l l u t a l l u _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
elpek si _ avaqutagh ke te mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ighnegh mi _ taghneghagh kek _ kayagtekaqe ak _ ilu mnnun _ , _ qevute lutek _ pikagh k _ , _ " _ A b b a _ , _ a ta _ ! _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh kun _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n a n i g h t u t e n _ , _ avaqutagh ke aaten _ . _ A v a q u t a q a a g h t u t m i n e n g _ ellmi _ pi ni _ elpenun _ pi liite ste lleqe ai _ .
sivugh nghaani _ n a l l u k s a g h a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u y a g h t u s i _ kiyaghnegh u nghite ngugh nun _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ liisimakagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nalighmeng _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ l i i s i m a k i s t e z i _ . _ sangafsi ngam _ uteghte yug tsi _ k a y a a l n g u g h n u n _ sasii nghite ngugh nun _ igleghte te i lghii nun _ tughneghagh nun _ ? _ sangan _ t a m a a k u n u n _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h h n e q i g s u g e t s i _ ?
paninang _ qaatke aqe asi _ a p e g h t u g h a l l g h i t _ aghnegh nun _ , _ tanqigh nun _ , _ ayumiqullegh nun _ aghnegh nun llu _ s a l q u m s i v i k a q e g k a n g i t n u n _ .
alingutke aqe amsi _ , _ qamagte luni _ qepghagh te i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ sasii nghite na yu kan _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ tungsigh vike amsi _ , _ whanga mtun _ lliigh sqe qaghte lusi _ qayughllak _ whanga llu _ elpesi stun _ lliigh kau unga _ G e n t i l e - e s t u n _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ ungipagh qite aqe yamsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ seghletun _ pi ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ N e q a m i k a g h s i _ tawani _ taku kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ qinuyug u lghiinga _ .
qaywa _ qinuyug llegh ma _ seghlegh ligh u aghtesagh ghngaaghmisi _ u k a v a g h s i m a n g i t a g h p e s i n g a _ nalighmeng _ ighsake ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ upughatagh zinga _ nikimqun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg atun _ , _ nalighmeng _ Christ _ J e s u s - e t u n _ .
naagu _ quya nga llegh kesagh kesi _ ? _ liisimake amsi _ piyaqleg u yagh kata _ iye si _ nusug luki _ tagivagh nayagh asi _ .
enkaam _ a n g u y i i t e s t e n g n g a a _ qayughllak _ ungipaate kemsi _ ipa pig meng _ ?
tamaakut _ yug t _ qaatke te sug kangisi _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh itnun _ , _ piyuke pigte aisi _ ellmeggnun _ m a l i g h q u t a q e s q e l l u s i _ , _ iwernga _ apallugh at _ pinigh nghite uq _ . _ ellngit a _ aafte sug aisi _ whanga mneng _ , _ ellnginagh meng _ m a l i g t e s q e l l u t e n g _ .
pinigh uq _ yug t _ sumegh ke gkumegteki _ yug lgute teng _ , _ t a a w a n g i n a g h h a q _ apallugh it _ pinigh kata _ . _ quunpeng _ taana _ ipa u uq _ , _ aviite yagh ghngaaghma _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ katam _ aghnagh m _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ ighni yu llegh mini _ whanga llu _ tawaten _ a q n i g h q u t k e n n e q i g t e n g n g w a a m s i _ kenlanga _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ lliigh lleghqagh gpesinun _ .
whaa tuq _ maaten _ e l p e s i n i l n g u u n g a _ enkaam _ liisimake na yalghiinga _ naten _ aleghqugh yaghqaa lusi _ . _ sumeghyali tke ghllagu amsi _ .
elpek si _ atuqe i yu lghii ni _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh itneng _ , _ talwa _ liigike igate asi _ liilightuusagh t _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ .
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ A b r a h a m - n g u q _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh lgu uq _ , _ aag llegh a _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h q u n _ aghnagh kun _ , _ ila a _ q e p g h a t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u g h q u n _ aghnagh kun _ .
