ighnegh a _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h q u n _ allgegh kau uq _ yug stun _ kitumtu te _ alngunak _ . _ iwernga _ ila a _ ighnegh an _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u g h q u n _ allgegh kau uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kanga _ .
taake uk _ aghnagh k _ usputagh u uk _ maalghug gnun _ akequsagh gkenun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e l a a q _ H a g a r _ akequsagh atun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayuqe uq _ M o u n t _ S i n a i - m i _ enkaam _ allgegh kau ut _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h q a a l u t e n g _ .
H a g a r _ M o u n t _ S i n a i - n g u l u n i _ ayuqe uq _ , _ A r a b i a - m e l n g u q _ . _ A g h n e g h m i m l l u _ J e r u s a l e m - n g a t u n _ ayuqe uq _ , _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke te lghiit _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u u t _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
iwernga _ paamna _ Jerusalem _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h i t u q _ , _ ellnga _ naakagh ut _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ quya ghllag i _ , _ elpek _ quminge igate ngugh u te n _ , _ aqnighqe igate ngugh u te n _ ighni yu llegh meng _ . _ ugi gpek _ unite ghngaaten _ , _ aragh a _ q u y a g h l l a g e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ qayughllak _ t a g h n u g h h a g h t a a g h a s a g h q a a g u t e n _ aghnagh meng _ ugi leg meng _ . _ "
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ I s a a c - e t u n _ ayuqe usi _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ apallugh ke luku _ akequsagh ni _ A b r a h a m - e m u n _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ taana _ ighnegh _ allgeghkagh _ yug stun _ kitumtu te _ alngunak _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe a _ ighnegh _ allgeghkagh _ taghneghagh m _ p i l l g h a k u n _ . _ paninang _ maaten _ tawatete uq _ .
iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ sa meng _ pi atgu _ ? _ " _ Q e p g h a g h t e l a a q _ aghnagh _ , _ ighnegh a llu _ aghulaqe stekek _ . _ qayughllak _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e m _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh a _ nengigh naanghite uq _ a ta mi _ saghya aneng _ maligte te luni _ ighneghagh nun _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u u m _ aghnagh m _ . _ "
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ whangkuta _ avaqutagh ke nghite ainkut _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e m _ aghnagh m _ , _ iwernga _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u u m _ aghnagh m _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ whangkuta _ iteme te kaqe ta aneng _ , _ i t e m e p i i g u m a a k u t _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ nekevgha tek _ a g h u l i i l k a a l u s i _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h h n e q i g t e g p e n a s i _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
nagate tek _ ! _ whanga _ , _ P a u l _ , _ ungipaate amsi _ : _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s t e k u f s i _ liilightuusagh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ taawa _ C h r i s t - a m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ k a y u t k e n n a a n g h i t a g h s i _ .
alla _ kelenga sagh u aghagh ke _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ , _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s t e k u m i _ taawa _ q a a t k e n g n g w a a g h y a g h q a q i i _ qamagte luki _ liilightuusagh t _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ nallghusagh ste naqutke gkufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ , _ aafte lleqe usi _ elpesi neng _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ , _ u n i l l e q a g h s i l l u _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ u t a q a n g w a a g h p u t _ sighima llegh ut _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ . _ sighima llegh ut _ t a a n a n g u u q _ : _ kiyaghnegh mun _ n a l l g h u s i i s q e l l u t a _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe lleg mteggun _ C h r i s t - a _ .
Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ p i k n g u k a n g i n k u t _ , _ yuug _ megnu nagh nghite uq _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a k u m i _ nalighmeng _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l k u m i _ . _ una _ esgha _ megnu nagh lghii _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ piniqe i ste i lghii _ yug lgute mnneng _ .
sivugh nghaani _ pinitungwaaq _ pi u yagh usi _ . _ kitum _ qaatke te nanigh ste isi _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m u n _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ t u q l u g h i s t e g p e s i _ p i l q e n g h i t a a _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ " _ Y e a s t - a n g i i g h h a a m _ ghhuugh ste ghllag aqe a _ akuute aq _ . _ "
elpek si llu _ whanga llu _ p i k u t a n g a n e n g _ A t a n g h e m _ , _ n a l l u n e q s u k e n g h i t a n k a _ ugpeqe nanigh fqiita _ apeghtuusagh nka _ elpesi nun _ p i s q e l l u k i _ . _ liisimake aqa llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ seghleliighqagh igh lghii _ elpesi neng _ , _ kina u yagh ghngaan _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ ungipagh ke i igate unga _ yug t _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s q e l l u k i _ . _ tawaten _ ungipagh ke i u yagh kuma _ J e w s - e t _ amyuqetagh te kete nanigh nayagh aatnga _ enkaam _ qaquuragh a _ C h r i s t - a m _ sugag niigh te kete nayagh nghite aat _ .
tamaakut _ seghleliighqagh igh lghiit _ elpesi neng _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l e g h m e n g _ , _ e l l n g i s t u q _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s t e n g n g u l u t e n g _ e u n u c h - e n g l a l l g h i i t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aisi _ iteme nga llegh mun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ taawanginaq _ atuqe gpenaan _ iteme nga llegh i _ atugh yaghqaa luki _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ . _ itupill _ qepghagh te ki _ ila si _ piniqe llegh gpesigun _ .
qayughllak _ qaatke lleqe asi _ qamagte luki _ liilightuusagh t _ qaatke gkufsigu _ una _ liilightuusagh _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ e l p e n e n g _ katam _ . _ "
iwernga _ elpesi neng _ qani iqe te naqngu kufsi llu _ pillugute naqngu kufsi llu _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ teghig ke sagh stun _ , _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ naafte qughtu tete naqe usi _ .
whaten _ pi amsi _ , _ kiyaghte tek _ qaatkellug kek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ atuqe naanghite asi _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ .
qayughllak _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ k i p u l l e g n g a a t _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ piyuke llegh i _ taghneghagh m _ k i p u l l e g n g a a t _ piyuke llegh anun _ yugusigh m _ . _ taake uk _ anguyag ke te uk _ enkaam _ atuqe naanghite asi _ piyuke lleg si _ .
taghneghagh m _ maghyaghqugh u u kangisi _ taawa _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh asi _ .
yugusigh m _ seghleghqe lleghtuqagh m _ piyuke llegh i _ nalluniite ut _ . _ U k u n g u u t _ : _ a l n g u n a s e g h a q _ , _ seghletun _ atuqe te llegh _ , _ nuqete igate ngugh t _ alngunak _ a t u q i m u n _ ,
m a n i i g u u t e l l e q _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ uyviinegh iqe llegh _ , _ anguyiqe llegh _ , _ pillugute llegh _ , _ qungyaqe i llegh _ , _ sakrite llegh _ , _ e l l n g i n a a y u g t e l l e q _ , _ a a f q e m e r a a l l e q _ , _ q e r n g u g h p a g t a a t e l l e q _ ,
aqina llegh _ , _ suume llegh _ , _ qerngughte te luteng _ a g h s a g h p a a g t a q u t _ seghletun _ pi llegh mun _ , _ ila aneng llu _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ . _ K e l e n g a s a a g h n a q l a a t a g h a m s i _ sivugh nghaani _ pilleg mtun _ , _ tamaakut _ tawaten _ kiyaghte lghiit _ ilate nga naanghite ut _ q u y a s l e g h a n e n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ .
N a q a m e n r a q _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ piite stekagh i _ u k u n g u u t _ : _ piniqe llegh _ , _ quya ma llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh _ , _ pinigh llegh _ , _ ataasiighmete llegh _ ,
y a k u m a n g i n g i t e l l e q _ , _ nuqete llegh llu _ . _ taakut _ iinghute llghite ut _ alngunak _ liilightuusagh ni _ .
Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ pi ita _ qaquuragh te kaqe ait _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh it _ yugusigh meng _ .
K i y a g h t e n g n g u k u m t a _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ , _ qaatke ltekek _ taghneghagh k _ .
Q u k a a y u g n e g h u f q a a m t a _ , _ qinuyugte i fqaamta _ , _ aqinake te fqaamta _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ kina _ seghleghqe llegh m _ k a a t f a l l u g t e k a g u _ , _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ , _ pinitungwaaq _ yakugh ke luku _ kayusiite ggu _ m a l i g u n n e q i g t e s q e l l u k u _ atanegh mun _ . _ elpek si llu _ , _ k e l e n g a n g w a a g h l u s i _ luuraq _ n a n g h i i q u l l e n g n a y u k a f s i _ .
K a y u t k u t u l l u s i _ seghleliigh llegh gpesini _ ; _ tawaten _ q a a t k e l l e q a g h s i _ liilightuusagh _ C h r i s t - a m _ qelegh tke a _ .
kina _ sumeghtaghagh kuni _ sa u ni luni _ , _ sa u nghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ ellmi neng _ p u u g h t e n g n g u u q _ .
yeqay _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ y u v g h i i g h w a a g h l i g u _ k i y a g h t a a l l e n i _ . _ enkaam _ pinigh kan _ quyake nakanga _ ellmi _ katam _ apeghiighkagh ni _ u s p u t a q e l l n g u n a a n _ kitum _ apeghiighkagh anun _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ igleghte te yaghqaqe ai _ ellmi _ pi yaghqagh ni _ .
kina _ alngunak _ apeghtuqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh aneng _ , _ pinigh lghii meng _ tuune i li _ apeghtughiste minun _ .
sumeghtaghagh kuvek _ puughte lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh _ e l p e n e n g _ p u u g h t e n g n g u u t e n _ . _ yug m _ sa u a _ piitesigh u aghaghkagh ni _ unatagh yaghqaqe a _ .
piitesighagh kuvek _ e f q u g h h n a l u k u _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i _ piyuke llegh n _ , _ taagken _ unatagh lleqe an _ tuqu llegh _ . _ iwernga _ piitesighagh kuvek _ e f q u g h h n a l u k e k _ taghneghagh k _ , _ taagken _ taghneghagh gneng _ unatagh lleqe an _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
enkaam _ qinuyagute gpenaan _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ pi lteggu _ , _ qayughllak _ iilqayug nghite kumta _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate kan _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe ukut _ .
enkaam _ pi lleghqagh lgu negh mta _ iiwleng _ pinitun _ pi aqe lteki _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ yug t _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakut _ anglegute ligh tke aput _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
esghaqagh teki qun _ yaagtu ghllaget _ igagh llegh nka _ lata ma lusi _ !
yug t _ esghaghte yagh ke yug neghtuqagh t llu _ q a n a t k i y u n e g h t u q a t l u _ pinitun _ qepghagh llegh meggneng _ , _ e l l n g i n g u u t _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s q u u g h w a a g h i l g h i i t _ elpesi neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ qayughllak _ alinge aqe lghiit _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge na yukagh meng _ ungipagh ke gkumegteggu _ qaquuragh ghhagh inagh a _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ avelghagh luku _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l e q _ .
qaywa _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a y a g h n g a a g h m e n g _ , _ ellngit _ katam _ qaatke te igate ut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ C i r c u m c i s e - e s q e s u g a q i i s i _ q a n a t k e p i g e s n a g h n a l u s i _ ellmeggnun _ c i r c u m c i s e - e s t e k a q n i l u s i _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ q a n a n a a n g h i t u n g a _ sa meng _ alngunak _ iwerngaqun _ qaquuragh aneng _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ tuqu llegh akun _ qaquuragh mi _ nuna _ qaquuragh ma uq _ whanga mnun _ , _ enkaam _ whanga _ qaquuragh ma unga _ nuna mun _ .
megnu nagh nghite uq _ yuug _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a k u m i _ , _ nalighmeng _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l k u m i _ . _ una _ megnu nagh lghii u uq _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ainkut _ nutaghagh u luta _ yug ni _ .
tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ apeghtuusagh mnun _ , _ yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ nangllegtagh llegh a llu _ ellngit nite li _ , _ israel- nga ni llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
whaken _ kenle ke luku _ kitum _ alngunak _ alla _ seghleliigh ste fqaama _ pi linga _ qayughllak _ y u g u s i m n i l n g u u t _ maamellegh t _ kelgute u aat _ q e p h a g h t e l a a g h u l q a _ J e s u s - m u n _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ yeqay _ piniqe i nga lghii _ kayusillegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ . _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ . _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ a p o s t l e - k a a n g a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ . _ lata u unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ E p h e s u s - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u t _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ n e k e g g m e l l e l g u s l i s i l l u _ .
usuqe lleg nge li _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ ! _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ q u y a s t e n g n g w i i n k u t _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ tunute yameng _ qilag ta meng _ .
nuna _ ulima llghite luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ p e l u n g i t e s q e l l u t a l l u _ a v u t n g i t e s q e l l u t a l l u _ ellmi nun _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe kanginkut _ , _ neghigh luku _ a l l u g h q i n a k e g k a q i i n k u t _ avaqutagh u luta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ piyuke kanga _ , _ efqugh ke kanga llu _ .
enkaam _ u s u q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ ighleg gpenani _ nanglleg ke ghllag ainkut _ piniqekagh mikun _ ighnegh mikun _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ aaw akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ seghevute ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni
a q e g h q u s i q e g h l l a k a n g a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ P e g h q i n g h u s t i i n k u t l u _ liigike ste ainkut llu
uspeqe llegh mineng _ salin _ a l i i g h s i g a l k e m m i n e n g _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh a _ , _ pika qaa _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqe lleg ni _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ p i l l e g h q a g h l l u g w a a g h m i _ . _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ ulimaagh ni _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t l u _ n u n a m e l n g u u t l u _ qerngughte lleqe ai _ , _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ i g l e g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ .
C h r i s t - a k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ yugu luta _ . _ A y u m i r u g l l a k _ piyuke llegh mitun _ uspeqe kaqe a _ . _ ellnga n _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ piyuke llegh mitun _ pi sta qaa _ .
whangkuta _ J e w s - e n i _ ugpeqagh ni _ sighimake i yuwhaagh kau ukut _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ enkaam _ k i y a g h t a a l l e m t e g g u n _ u s u q e s l e q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ .
C h r i s t - a k u n _ elpek si llu _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ ipapik _ ungipagh _ . _ pinigh lghii u uq _ ungipagh _ ungipaate i lghii _ yuguligh llegh gpesineng _ . _ ugpeqe aqe yafsigu _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nalluniigh kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ tuune lleqe ni lukek _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ i p a p i g h q e s t i i n k u t _ pagitaghqagh mnneng _ kenlanga _ whangkuta _ pi liite lleghqagh mnnun _ . _ enkaam _ u s u q e l l e q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ !
nagaqugh ma aqa _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ atanegh kun _ J e s u s - k u n _ , _ piniqe llegh i llu _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ,
neqamike aqe amsi _ yughagh negh mni _ , _ iyamsiqa yagute nghmeng _ taaqe igate amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
ata ghllag ke a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ ellnga nun _ tungsigh te aqe amsi _ p e g h q i n g h u s q e l l u s i _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ , _ l i i g i k a t a g h i i s q e l l u s i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
yughagh tke aqa _ nighug _ kuukgute sqellug qu _ ilu gpesinun _ , _ liigike sqellug qu _ sighima llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi nun _ pike stekagh a _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ . _ yughagh tke amsi llu _ l i i g i k e s q e l l u k i _ kemnagh ghllaget _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ yug minun _ .
yughagh unga llu _ liigike sqellug qu _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h l l a g a _ qepghagh lghii _ w h a n g k u n n i _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ . _ taana _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite llegh ghllag _ ataasigh u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t i s i q e g k a a _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ taagken _ qilag mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ a q u m e s i m a a _ aghenqignegh mikun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ q u l i g h p i g a a g h t e s t e k a q a a _ C h r i s t - a _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n e n g _ , _ qelegh i kayug neng _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e g n e n g _ , _ umiileg neng llu _ . _ ategh a _ ingyagh te nga ghllag uq _ a t e g h y a g g a g h n e n g _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ n u n a g h r a g h a g h q a m i l l u _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ lli kaqe a _ sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ C h r i s t - a m _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ , _ n a a s q u u t i s t e n g l l a q a q a a l l u _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ apallugh ke luki _ ugpeqagh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ yugusigh ke ai _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ iighwigh uq _ . _ C h r i s t - a m _ iighwigh a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nani _ alngunak _ .
sivugh nghaani _ taghneghagh si _ tuqu nga yagh ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke ma ite kesi _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ seghleghqe ste u yagh usi llu _ .
tawatete yagh usi _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u s i _ nuna m _ seghlegh mun _ i g l e g h n e g h a n u n _ . _ Q a a t k e n g n g u y a g h a g h s i l l u _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g a t _ tughneghagh t _ q i l a g a m e l n g u u t _ . _ ellnga u uq _ aangwaagh lleghpigagh _ tughneghagh _ igleghte te i lghii _ yug neng _ qaatke te igate ngugh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qamagte luta _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ t a m a a k u s t u n _ yug stun _ . _ atuqe kaqe aput _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh mta llu _ umyugagh mta llu _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luta _ allgegh kau te mnneng _ seghleghqe ste u luta _ , _ aghyuugh lleg nge naqngu yagh ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh akun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh ghllag uq _ , _ piniqe pigte ainkut llu _ .
qaywa _ taghneghagh put _ tuqu nga yagh ghngaita _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtu inkut _ maligte te luta _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ ( _ Y u g u l i k a a g u s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke llegh akun _ . _ )
kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtu inkut _ maligte te luta _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ , _ w h a n g k u n n u n l l u _ aqume lgusigh ste a _ qilag mi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ k i n g u l i i g h a g h n u n _ liite sqellug qu _ piniqe llegh ghrukutaaghllag ni _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ y u g u l i k a a g u s i _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ yuguligh llegh i _ elpesi neng _ p i l q e n g h i t a g h s i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh ke a _ elpesi nun _ .
yuguligh llghite aisi _ apallugh ke luku _ sa llegh i _ , _ enkaam _ q u k a a y u g u t k e s a g h q a q e n g h i t a g h s i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe ainkut _ tawatete luta _ . _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ ulima aqe ainkut _ q e p g h i i s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit _ qepghaqagh t _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ qepghaqagh t _ y a t a a g h q e n g n g w a a q a q i i _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ q e p g h i i s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ .
neqamike luku _ gentile- ngugh lug si _ allgegh kau usi _ . _ J e w s - e t _ atigh aqe aisi _ " _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l n g u u t _ " _ , _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ atigh kayugu ut _ " _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a t _ " _ . _ ( _ C i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h a t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh itnite uq _ . _ )
neqamike luku _ tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ n a l l u k s a g h a g h s i _ C h r i s t - a _ kina u ta a _ . _ nunatagh u yagh usi _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ enkaam _ ilate llghite yagh usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh anun _ ellngit nun _ . _ nuna mi _ whani _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u y a g h t u s i _ s i g h i m a l l n g u n a s i l l u _ kiyaghnegh ngunasi llu _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ pi llegh mi _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ ilate ma usi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ a w a v a n s a g h t u s i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ pi llegh mi _ t u g h a a g h u s i m a a s i _ ellnga nun _ C h r i s t - a m _ aaw akun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ ellnga _ katam _ n e k e g g m e l q a g h p u t _ . _ ellnga u uq _ ataasiighte ste i lghii _ J e w s - e n e n g l l u _ G e n t i l e - e n e n g l l u _ . _ naafqe kaqe a _ mingllu te a _ aafte i lghii _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ , _ enkaam _ anguyag ke te nanighqe kaqe ainkut _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu llegh mikun _ atugh u nanighqe kaqe ai _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh it llu _ qelegh sagh it llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ J e w s - e t l u _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ a t a a s i i g h t e s q e l l u k i _ ellmi kun _ . _ enkaam _ nekeggmellegh nge stekaqe ai _ .
tuqu llegh mikun _ qaquuragh kun _ , _ C h r i s t - a m _ ugumi ke te nanighqe ai _ J e w s - e t l u _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ . _ taagken _ ataasiighte ste ai _ , _ ilaliigh te ste ai llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tagi luni _ ungipagh ke i kau uq _ nekeggmellegh meng _ elpesi nun _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ , _ a w a v a n t e n g n g u y a l g h i i s i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ungipagh ke i kau uq llu _ nekeggmellegh meng _ J e w s - e n u n _ , _ q a n t a g h a n t e n g n g u l g h i i t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
enkaam _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ J e w s - e n i l l u _ G e n t i l e - e n i l l u _ t a g i y a q l e g u g h t u k u t _ ata mun _ ataasigh kun _ taghneghagh kun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ elpek si _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ nunatagh u nanigh usi _ . _ itupill _ nuna lgu te kau aghte aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ , _ ilate usi llu _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
mangteghagh atun _ ayuqe usi _ nekeftekagh t _ tunemagh ngllaghkagh itgun _ a p o s t l e - e t l u _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ . _ Christ _ Jesus _ ellnga _ katam _ kangighagh m _ uyghag ke a _ .
qamagte luteng _ mangteghagh m _ nalighnegh i _ n e k e g h q u u t n g a a t _ qerngagh meng _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ taakut _ nalighnegh t _ nula yalghiimeng _ t e m p l e - n g u g h t e n g n g u u t _ atanegh mun _ . _ taana _ temple- a _ agleghnagh uq _ .
ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ maligte te lusi _ ila itnun _ ugpeqagh nun _ n e k e f t e n g n g u u s i _ mangteghagh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghfig anun _ taghneghagh gmikun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ whanga _ , _ P a u l _ , _ anusimingllaghvig mete unga _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uute kegka _ Christ _ Jesus _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ G e n t i l e - e n i _ .
entaqun _ n a g a q u u m a a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ q e p g h a q a l i t k a q a a n g a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liite sta _ whanga mnun _ qayvighte llghite ngughk _ uspeqe lleg ni _ . _ qavnganghhaq _ lata te kaghtekaqe aqa _ taana _ .
atightugh kufsigu _ lata tke kaqe a _ l i i l l e q a g h s i _ liigike llegh ka _ qayvighte llghite ngughk _ uspeqe llegh _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghii _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate llghite ai _ yug t _ qayvighte llghite ngugh meng _ uspeqe llegh mineng _ . _ iwernga _ up-uni _ aghnegh ni _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ qayvighte a _ uspeqe lleg ni _ agleghnagh lghii nun _ a p o s t l e - m i n u n l l u _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m i n u n l l u _ .
whatete uq _ uspeqe llegh a _ : _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ilate ma ut _ J e w s - e n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste llegh anun _ . _ N a l i g h n e q a a g h s i m i i _ ataasigh m _ yugusigh m _ , _ enkaam _ ilate ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh anun _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n l l u _ tunusagh lightu aanga _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u n g a _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
U k a l i g h p i g a a g u n g a _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug aneng _ . _ T a w a l l i i m a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tunusagh lightu aanga _ whaten _ : _ nakmike aanga _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ C h r i s t - a m _ aklungi aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ aklungi i _ ingyagh te nga ut _ yug t _ liigike llegh itneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga llu _ l i i g i k e s t e s q e l l u k i _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ uspeqe llegh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ u l i m a g h i k a m _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ , _ qayvighte llghite a _ uspeqe lleg ni _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ m a a t e m u n _ .
taagken _ q i l a g n i l n g u u t _ : _ igleghte te i lghiit llu _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g e t l u _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite ste lleqe ai _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ peghqinellegh mineng _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ yug mikun _ y u g h a g h v i g n i l n g u g h t e g g u n _ .
T a m a a k u n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh i _ salin _ n u n a n g l l a l g h i l l u n i _ . _ apeghiigh ma ai _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ atanegh mteggun _ .
ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ aglagh yaghqaaghte ma ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ t e t u l l n g u n a a m t a l l u _ a l i n g e l l n g u n a a m t a l l u _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ iilqayagute gpenaan _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ apallugh ke luku _ i k f i q u t k e n g n g u k e m s i _ . _ ikfiqe llegh ma _ q u u l v a g h t e s l e q i i s i _ .
enkaam _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ segesqughte unga _ sivungagh ni _ ata m _ .
ellnga u uq _ atigh i lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ nengllugute neng _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h n e n g l l u _ n u n a m e l n g u g h n e n g l l u _ .
yughagh unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aklungi ghllag aneng _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i t e s q e l l u s i _ i k n a q u g h s i i s q e l u k i _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ .
yughagh tke amsi _ C h r i s t - a _ kiyaghte sqellug qu _ ilu gpesini _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ yughagh tke amsi _ a k u l g u s q e l l u s i l l u _ , _ t u n e m a l g u s q e l l u s i l l u _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
yughagh tke amsi _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ l i i g i k s a q l e g u s q e l l u k u _ C h r i s t - a m _ piniqe llegh an _ , _ iqetu langa _ , _ tagtala a _ , _ uusqaghtu langa _ , _ s a m a v n e g h t u l a n g a l l u _ .
elpesi nun _ liisimake sqe sug aqa _ C h r i s t - a m _ piniqe llegh a _ , _ qaywa _ piyaqnagh ghngaan _ l i i g i k n g w a a l l e g h q a a _ . _ taagken _ piniqe llegh akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh atun _ wata _ lliigh lleqe usi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ qepghagh lghii kun _ ilu mnni _ , _ ellnga n _ p i y a q l e g w a a _ qaayghute luku _ sa u a _ alngunak _ aaptekagh ut _ nalighmeng _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh ut _ .
kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge li _ ugpeqagh tgun _ y u g h a g h v i g n i l n g u g h t e g g u n _ , _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n l l u _ . _ usuqe teggu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uute kegka _ atanegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kayeme amsi _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ .
iiwleng _ qusevegte lusi _ , _ yakumangighlliqe gpenasi _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi _ , _ tugukligh utu tete lusi _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ qerngughte te kaqe aisi _ nekeggmellegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ nanghiiqu ghllag tek _ iiwleng _ kiyaghte tek _ tawaten _ .
ataasigh u uq _ yugusigh _ , _ ataasigh u uk llu _ taghneghagh k _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ ataasigh mun _ sighima llegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh aisi _ .
ataasigh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ ataasigh u uq _ ugpeqe i llegh _ , _ ataasigh u uq _ paaptaaye llegh _ .
ataasigh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata ke aat _ s a a m _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ ellnga n _ igleghte te u a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh anite uq _ , _ sa mete uq llu _ alngunak _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ tamaghhagh emta _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ tunute yameng _ qepghaqagh ni _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ tuune kaqe ai _ taakut _ tunusagh t _ tuune yu ke llegh mitun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ mayugh aqngami _ uusqagh llegh mun _ tugu kaqe ai _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ wayagh ke aat _ , _ yug t llu _ tunusagh ligh quqagh ke ai _ . _ "
sa meng _ p i s i i w a _ , _ " _ mayugh kau uq _ " _ ? _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ sivuke luni _ uki kau uq _ samavek _ a s i l i g h n e g h a n u n _ nuna m _ .
enkaam _ ellnga _ taana _ ukikagh _ samavek _ , _ ellnga u uq _ ataasigh _ taana _ mat- yuqagh _ pamavek _ ingyagh luki _ qilag t _ , _ imigh na luku _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nayute te nga llegh mineng _ .
ellnga u uq _ tunusagh ligh quqagh _ yug nun _ : _ ila i _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u k i _ , _ ila i _ uuknaliqe i ste u luki _ , _ ila i _ evangelist- ngugh lug ke i _ , _ ila i _ yughaghte u luki _ , _ apeghtughiste u luki llu _ .
taakut _ t u n u s a l i t k a q i i _ a p e g h t i i s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ellngit nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ ellnga _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ nekefte sqellug qu _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh a _ .
taana _ qepghaqagh _ nagnegh lleqe uq _ kenlanga _ ataasiighte lleg mnnun _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ , _ liisimake lleg mteggun llu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taagken _ a n g t a n i i t n g w a a g h l u t a _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ lliigh lleqe ukut _ .
enkaam _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u nanigh lleqe ukut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ puughte snaanghite ukut _ yug nun _ t e m n g i m e n g _ apeghtugh i llegh itgun _ . _ apeghtugh i llegh it _ anuqe stun llu _ imaghllug stun llu _ ayuqe ut _ nuugte aatagh lghiit _ yug neng _ . _ tamaakut _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ iqlengagh lghiit _ yug t _ , _ i q l e n g a t e n g _ ipate yug nighte yagh aqe ait _ maghyaghqugh neghllugte na luki _ yug t _ .
itupill _ akuzi tke lteggu _ i p a p i l l e q _ piniqe llegh kun _ , _ enkaam _ wata _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ lliigh lleqe ukut _ salleg mteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ . _ C h r i s t - a _ naasqugh ke aat _ ugpeqagh t _ .
ugpeqagh ni _ yugusigh ke ainkut _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ ellnga kun _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh _ qerngughte te kau uq llu _ nuverragh te kau uq llu _ yugusigh m _ ivalu akun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nalighnegh t _ q e p g h a n n e g h m e g g n i _ qepghagh lleghqagh megestun _ , _ taawa _ yugusigh _ n a g w a a q u q _ , _ i k n a q u g h s a g h a q u q l u _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ A t a n g h e m _ ategh akun _ whaten _ pi amsi llu _ k e l e n g a s a a g h a m s i l l u _ : _ kiyaghte gpenasi ngam _ G e n t i l e - e t _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i s t u n _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ sasii nghite ngugh u ut _ ,
umyugagh it llu _ liigike i igate ngugh u ut _ . _ ilate nga nghite ut _ unguvallegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh anun _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukngwaagh aat _ , _ pineghllug u ut llu _ .
talwa _ kayngu yug yaghqaa nanigh ma ut _ ; _ atuqe aqe ait llu _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ seghlegh t _ yugusigh meng _ piyukekagh it _ . _ nagnegh te yug aqe ait _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ n u q e t u t e g p e n a k i _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ liite llghite asi _ C h r i s t - a m _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ !
nagaqugh pestaagh qaghkagh i _ ellnga _ , _ qayughllak _ m a l i g s a a g h t e k e g k a n g i s i _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtugh kau usi _ ipa _ apeghtuusagh aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ .
whaten _ apeghtugh kaqe aisi _ : _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ puughte lleqe aisi llu _ naafqe lleqe aisi llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pegte ki _ nangaghnegh lug si llu _ k i y a g h t a a l q e s a q e s i l l u _ .
itupill _ taghneghagh m _ nutaghte liki _ umyugagh si _ .
enkaam _ atuqe teggu _ nangaghneghraghagh i _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ ellmi tun _ ayuqe luku _ : _ e l q u g h u t n g a p i i g l u k u _ , _ agleghnagh luku llu _ .
enkaam _ i q l e n g i q n a n i g h t e g n g a m _ ! _ itupill _ iiwleng _ apegh teggu _ i p a p i l l e q _ ila gpesinun _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luta _ n a l i g h n e q u g h i i n k u t _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh an _ .
sakrite tek _ iwernga _ seghleghqe gpenasi _ . _ siqinegh _ tevigh ste gpenaan _ paninang _ sakrite u lusi _ .
talwa _ tughneghagh _ p i l l e g h q a l i t e g p e n a a n _ n a n g h i i q u s q e l l u s i _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
T e g l e g h n i i g h t a _ tegleg nanigh li _ . _ itupill _ qepghagh li _ allgegh te yaghqaa luni _ a k l u k e g k a m i n e n g _ , _ tuune i yaghqaaghte lleqe uq llu _ aklu ke igh lghii nun _ .
akuzi tke i gpenasi _ seghlegh meng _ . _ itupill _ aleghqugh teki _ pinitun _ yug t _ aklu ke igh llegh itni _ . _ pinigh lghiit _ akuzite t _ kayeme yaghqaqe ait _ , _ a n e g h n e g h q e s a g h q a q i i t _ nagate lghiit _ .
qivghu ste gpenakek llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taghneghagh gmineng _ nalluniigh kaqe aisi _ ellmi _ p i k n a l u s i _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ iteme te lleqe aisi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ iteme te llegh m _ aghnegh a _ kaate kan _ .
pegte ggu _ u g u m i k e r a a q _ , _ s a k r a a _ , _ sakraa ghllag _ , _ y u p i g h q a g h a a t a q _ , _ s e g h l e q u u q _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ seghlegh t _ .
yeghlegi _ nangllegtagh tek _ , _ nafughtagh tek _ ila gpesinun _ , _ s e g h e v u t u l l u s i l l u _ , _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute kaqe kangisi _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ elpek si _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ piniqe pigtekagh i _ , _ ayuqesighagh teggu _ .
K i y a g h t a a l l e s i _ aaghqute aqe steki _ piniqe llegh mun _ , _ katam _ C h r i s t - a m _ piniqe kanginkut _ , _ tuquma tke kaqe kanginkut llu _ . _ tuqu llegh a _ tepkegtagh tun _ tunusagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ aghqe te u uq llu _ ellnga nun _ .
elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke kangisi _ , _ enkaam _ kitumun _ alngunak _ allaniigh ste u ni fqaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe ste u ni fqaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakig nigh ughte u ni fqaafsi _ . _ tamaakut _ seghleghu ut _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pi yaghqaqe nghite ait _ .
kayngusaghagh te gpenasi _ , _ t e m n g i t w h a m e n g _ akuzi tke gpenasi _ s e x - m e n g _ , _ nalighmeng _ amyughaagh tke gpenasi _ s e x - m e n g _ . _ itupill _ i y a m s i q a y u g v i k s a g h q a q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ .
N a l l u n e q n a g h h i i t u q _ una _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ pagite yaghqagh ite uq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ C h r i s t - a m l l u _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ seghleghqe lghii _ a l l a n i i g h m e n g _ , _ alngunak _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ p a k i g n i i g h m e n g _ . _ ( _ pakignegh t _ manig ughte u ut _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ )
yug nun _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ungipaate kangisi _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ seghleghu nghite ni luki _ . _ iwernga _ t a w a t e l n g u u t _ seghleghqe llegh t _ kiyaghnegh _ sakraa ste ghllag aqe aat _ qaatke te nghite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilate gpenasi _ t a w a t e l n g u g h n u n _ yug nun _ .
yug stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ mamleg mi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u s i _ nighug mi _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ pike kangisi _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte tek _ yug stun _ n i g h u g m e l n g u g h e s t u n _ .
( _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte negh gpesini _ nighug mi _ pinigh ste aqe aisi _ , _ elqughute nga ste aqe aisi _ , _ ipa u ste aqe aisi _ . _ )
liite naqe teggu llu _ sa u a _ efqugh nagh lghii _ atanegh mun _ .
ilate qaghtagh gpenasi _ yug nun _ sea-te u nghite ngugh meng _ pi lghii nun _ mamleg mi _ . _ itupill _ liigike steki _ tawaten _ p i l l g h i t _ seghleghu ut _ .
kayngu nagh pigte ut _ talwa _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luteng _ tamaakut _ pi aqe kangit _ aksaqe luku _ .
iwernga _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ aliightekumeng _ nighug mun _ , _ taawa _ n a t e t e g h p i g a a t a n g i _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ aliigh lleqe ut _ , _ qayughllak _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ nighug m _ esghagh yaghqaaghte ste lleqe a _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ qavagh lghii mi _ , _ taghtugh ghhaaten _ . _ unguva a _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a m _ kukegte lleqe aaten _ . _ "
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ . _ P e g h q i n g h u n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ kiyaghte gpenasi _ ; _ itupill _ p e g h q i n g h e s t u n _ kiyaghte tek _ .
pinitun _ atuqe teggu _ tamaghhagh an _ pi lleghqagh i _ qayughllak _ aghnegh ni _ maaten _ yug t _ seghletun _ pi aqe ut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nallu fqaafsi _ , _ iwernga _ liigike teggu _ sa u a _ A t a n g h e m _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ elpesi nun _ .
suume gpenasi _ wine- meng _ qayughllak _ naafqe lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ imigh tek _ taghneghagh gneng _ ,
aleghquute aqe lusi _ akuzi ta itneng _ p s a l m s - e t _ , _ ilagaate t _ , _ taghneghagh kun llu _ ilagaate neng _ . _ ilagagh aqe tek _ ilagaate neng llu _ p s a l m s - e n e n g l l u _ atanegh mun _ , _ usuqe i lleg ligh lusi _ ilu gpesigun _ .
ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike manginagh teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata a _ s a a m _ tamaghhagh an _ .
malighqutagh ke nga lusi _ ila gpesinun _ qayughllak _ s i i v a k n g u k e s i _ C h r i s t - a _ .
nuliigh ni _ , _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ katam _ atanegh mun _ pi lghii stun _ .
qayughllak _ ugi _ naasqugh ke a _ nulighh an _ katam _ C h r i s t - a _ naasqugh ke kangat _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ C h r i s t - a _ yuguligh i stekagh at _ ugpeqagh t _ ; _ ellnga n _ yugusigh ke ai _ .
katam _ ugpeqagh t _ m a l i g h q u t a q e l l g h i s t u n _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ sa llegh kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ nulighh t _ malighqutagh ke yaghqaa ut _ ugi meggnun _ .
ugi ni _ , _ piniqe luki _ nula isi _ katam _ C h r i s t - a m _ piniqe llegh atun _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ piniqe pigtekaqe ai _ repall _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ .
ugpeqagh t _ agleghnaghsagh kaqe ai _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ akuzite mi _ , _ pelungighsagh kaqe ai llu _ aghvig luki _ megh kun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ a a n g Ê¼ g h u n n a l u k i _ ugpeqagh t _ ellmi nun _ katam _ pinighnagh lghii tun _ ugiigh naqe lghii tun _ . _ tuqu kau uq _ ugpeqagh t _ t a g n e q r i i t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ u n g l l e v r e g i i t e s q e l l u k i _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ a f k u y i i t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ enkaam _ nuliighqagh a _ agleghnagh lleqe uq _ , _ avute ite lleqe uq llu _ .
ugi m _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ nuliigh ni _ piniqe llegh mitun _ yugusigh ni _ . _ ugi _ piniqe i lghii _ nuliigh mineng _ ellmi neng _ piniqe u uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke igate a _ ellmi _ katam _ yugusigh ni _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ negh sta qaa llu _ aflenga kaqe a llu _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi aqe llegh atun _ ugpeqagh nun _ ,
qayughllak _ n a l i g h n e q u g h i i n k u t _ ellnga n _ yugusigh an _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ unite lleqe ak _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ ilate na luni _ nuliigh minun _ . _ enkaam _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ . _ "
T a a m _ akuzite m _ igaqegkagh m _ qayvighte a _ megnu nagh pigte lghii _ i p a p i l l e q _ : _ C h r i s t - a l l u _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ataasigh u ut _ .
iwernga _ taana _ elpesi nun llu _ ayuqe uq _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugi m _ piniqe pestaagh yaghqaqe a _ nuliigh ni _ ellmi neng _ katam _ piniqe lghii stun _ . _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ nulighh m _ sii vag ke yaghqagh ke a _ ugi ni _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ qaatke te lusi _ angayuqagh gpesinun _ A t a n g h e m _ pi sqe sug llegh atun _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ elqughute nga uq _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh _ qelegh i kau uq _ , _ " _ Q u u l v a g h l u k u _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ " _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ sivulii uq _ akequsagh leg _ .
whaten _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ K i y a g h t a a l l g h e n _ itagnagh lleqe uq _ , _ taake luku llu _ kiyaghte lleqe uten _ nuna mi _ . _ "
angayuqagh ni _ , _ sakrite ste gpenaki _ taghnughhagh si _ . _ yeghlegi _ angli steki _ peghqigsagh luki llu _ a p e g h t u g h a g h l u k i l l u _ A t a n g h e m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h n i _ , _ alinge lleg ligh lusi llu _ u n g e l e g l l e l i g h l u s i l l u _ qaatke teki _ p i l i i t i s t e s i _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ I p a p i g h q e l l u s i _ qepghagh ta qite ki _ , _ katam _ C h r i s t - a _ qepghagh te llegh gpesistun _ .
P i l i i t i s t e s i _ qaatke teki _ qaywa _ esghapag nghite ghngaisi _ . _ qepghagh tek _ e f q u g h h n a l u k i _ p i l i i t i s t e s i _ katam _ e f q u g h t e l l e g h p e s i s t u n _ atanegh _ . _ ilu gpesineng _ atuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a q e l g h i i s t u n _ .
enkaam _ qepghagh tek _ sagiqe lusi _ atanegh mun _ pi lghii stun _ , _ nakaan _ yug nun _ .
neqamike luku _ A t a n g h e m _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ , _ pinitun _ p i l l g h i t n u n _ . _ atanegh _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h n u n l l u _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u g h n u n l l u _ .
P i l i i t i s t e n i _ , _ pinitun _ pi teki _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a s i _ katam _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ ellngit _ pinitun _ p i s q e l l u s i _ . _ alingsequ gpenaki _ . _ neqamike luku _ elpek si llu _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a s i l l u _ ataasigh meng _ atanegh lgu usi _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h m e n g _ . _ ellnga n _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ t a n i i l l n g u n a k i _ .
kinguligh _ apegh yaghqaqe a _ u n a n g u u q _ , _ iknaqe lleg nge tek _ atanegh meng _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h l l a g a n e n g l l u _ .
aate kek _ i i n g u n a a g k e n k a _ a k u l g h a a g h e k _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe gkakek _ elpesi nun _ . _ taagken _ t e n g v i m u n _ nekevgha saghqagh ughte lleqe asi _ tughneghagh m _ puughte i llegh i _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ p i l l u w a a n g u n g h i t a p u t _ yug t _ . _ itupill _ p i l l u w a a n g w a a p u t _ igleghte te i lghiit _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g e t _ , _ igleghte te i lghiit _ nuna m _ mamleg aneng _ , _ seghlegh t llu _ tughneghagh t _ q i l a g a n i l n g u u t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aate kek _ i i n g u n a a g k e n k a _ a k u l g h a a g h q e k _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe gkakek _ elpesi nun _ ! _ enkaam _ s e g h l e l i i g h e m _ aghnegh ani _ p i l l u w a g h y a q l e g u l l e q a s i _ anguyag m _ s u g h u g a l l g h i _ . _ taagken _ p i l l u w a n e g h m e n g _ apeghiigh kufsi _ , _ elpek si _ paninang _ nekevgha u lleqe usi _ .
enkaam _ nekevgha manginagh tek _ . _ I p a p i l l e q _ tafsi uute ggu _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ sakimag iitagh ite ggu _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nekeggmellegh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ kameg ii teki _ .
tamaakut _ saaghw itgun _ , _ atuqe teggu _ ugpeqe i llegh _ amiigigh aghtagh sigh u luku _ q a a m s a g h q a a l u k i _ k u m a n g a l g h i i t _ aaygu i _ tughneghagh- m _ .
aate ggu _ yuguligh llegh _ naasqughiitagh u luku _ , _ taghneghagh m llu _ savigpag a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi tke a _ .
iiwleng _ yughaghte k _ taghneghagh m _ maghyaghqugh te llegh akun _ . _ atuqe luki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ yughagh llegh t _ , _ aapte niigh tek llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kelenga lusi _ , _ iilqayug gpenasi _ . _ iiwleng _ yughagh te kete luki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
whanga llu _ yughagh tke tengnga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a k u z i t e l i t e s q e l l u n g a _ . _ taagken _ tetug gpenanga _ apegh lleqe aqa _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ salin _ liigike ste llghite kanga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ akuzi ste u lunga _ ellmi nun _ . _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ q i i p r a g h u s i g h l u n g a _ . _ yughaghte k _ ungipagh ke i na lunga _ tetug gpenanga _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ .
liisimake sug amsi _ n a t e t u l e m n e n g l l u _ sa aqe te mneng llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kayagte ma aqa _ T y c h i c u s _ elpesi nun _ . _ piniqekagh ut _ u g p e q a a l g u t f u t _ , _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u g u q l u _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ kaate kuni _ ungipaate lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ whanga mneng _ , _ kayeme lleqe aisi llu _ .
kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ atanegh meng llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ elpesi nun _ pi u uk _ nekeggmellegh llu _ , _ piniqe llegh llu _ ugpeqe i lleg leg _ .
nangllegtagh llegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ pi u uq _ piniqe i lghii ni _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ piniqe lleg ligh luku _ naange yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g l l u _ T i m o t h y - m e n g l l u _ pi u ut _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e k i i n k u n g _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ lata aqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ yughaghvig m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t n i _ , _ d e a c o n - e n i l l u _ P h i l i p p i - m e l n g u g h n i _ , _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ n e k e g g m e l l e l g u s l i s i l l u _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ elpesi neng _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n n e m s i _ .
Y u g h a a t k e n n e m s i _ quya pigte aqe unga _ ,
qayughllak _ neqamike aqa _ ungipagh ke i lgusigh qagh qagh zinga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ kayusigh qagh qagh zinga _ ugpeqe i yuggaagh llegh gpesineng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ w h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ .
L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a q a _ kiyaghnegh _ piinligh ikagh _ pinigh lghii meng _ qepghaqagh meng _ ilu gpesini _ , _ ellnga n _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ Christ _ Jesus _ uteghnigh kan _ .
itagnagh pigte uq _ whanga mni _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n n e m s i _ tawaten _ qayughllak _ i l u m n i t a q u s i _ . _ ungipagh ke i u lunga llu _ i p a p i g h q i n g u l u n g a l l u _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ipa u ni luki _ , _ maaten llu _ anusimingllaghvig mete lunga _ , _ qamagte lusi _ a l l g e g h t e n g n g w a a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ whanga mnun _ maligte te lusi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekaqe a _ esghagh yug pigte aqe amsi _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte lusi _ piniqe amsi _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ piniqe llegh atun _ elpek si _ .
yughagh te kaqe amsi _ p i n i q i g h l l a g e s q e l l u s i _ , _ l i i s i m a l l e n g a t a g h i i s q e l l u s i _ , _ l i i g i k e l l e n g a t a g h i i s q e l l u s i l l u _ .
tawaten _ lliigh kufsi _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ sa u a _ pinigh lleghpigagh _ n a k m i k u m a n g i n a g h y a g u l l e q a g h s i _ . _ taagken _ C h r i s t - a _ tagi nqigtekan _ pelungite lleqe usi llu _ anaggute llghite lleqe usi llu _ .
enkaam _ unguvallegh si _ imigh lleqe ut _ ipapestaaq _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a n g i n a g h h a a m _ piite stekagh aneng _ . _ taagken _ yug t _ q u u l v a g h l l e q a a t l u _ , _ usuqe lleqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sug aqa _ anusimingllaghvig mete llegh ma _ ipapestaaq _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ nagate sta _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qamagte luteng _ umiileg m _ mangteghagh an _ k e l e n g a k i s t e n g i t a _ liite aat _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qayughllak _ q e p g h a g h t e k e g k a n g a n g a _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
anusimingllaghvig mete llegh ma _ allute luteng _ ugpeqagh lghute t _ ugpeqagh igh aghagh ste ai _ atanegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ wata _ tetug nanigh aghagh ut _ ungipagh ke nghmegteggu _ C h r i s t - a _ .
ipa u uq _ ila i _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ qayughllak _ aqinake u kangatnga llu _ aaghtiiraagh u kangatnga llu _ . _ iwernga _ ila i _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ elqughute luteng _ .
ungipagh ke i u ut _ qayughllak _ piniqe kangatnga _ . _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi stekaqe aanga _ whavek _ n e k e v g h a t e s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ anguyag mnneng _ .
iwernga _ ila it _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ e l l n g i n a a y u g t e m _ , _ i p a p i g h q e g p e n a t e n g _ . _ sumegh meggni _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ s e g h l e l i i g h q a t a g h a g h n i l u n g a _ pi atnga _ anusimingllaghvig mete ma lunga _ .
itagnagh uq _ , _ ungipagh ke i llegh at _ elqughute nga yagh ghngaan _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ alla neng _ apallugh lgu yagh ghngaan _ , _ ungipagh ke i llghite a _ quya ste aqe aanga _ , _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ u g l a p i g l l e g h i i n u n _ .
aa-a _ quya nga lleqe unga _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake aqa _ aane yaghqaa unga _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ yughagh tke llegh gpesigun _ , _ kayusillegh akun llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ taghneghagh an _ .
piyuke llegh ghllag ka llu _ , _ sighimake llegh ghllag ka llu _ esgha _ taana _ , _ kayngusaghagh te fqaama _ pi na lunga _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ itupill _ kiyaghte yug aqe unga _ ilutu lunga _ wataqaaghaq _ maaten _ anusimingllaghvig mete lleg mni _ . _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a _ q u u l v a l l e n g e l l e q u q _ unguva ghngaaghma _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghma _ .
whanga mni _ unguvallegh _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu llegh _ a l l g e g h u t a g h a l l g h u u q _ .
iwernga _ unguva naqngu kuma _ qepghagh aghagh lleqe unga _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ N a l i k e k _ nakmike lleghqagh ka _ nalluke aqa _ , _ unguvallegh _ nalighmeng _ tuqu llegh _ .
kukriqe u unga _ n a l i g k e n e n g _ nakmiigh lleghqagh mneng _ . _ aghulaqe yu pigte aqe yagh unga _ C h r i s t - a m e n n a l u n g a _ , _ qayughllak _ pinigh aghagh yaghqaa uq _ taana _ .
iwernga _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ unguva u unga _ .
I p a p i g h q u t k u m a a q a _ taana _ , _ liisimake aqa _ wiin _ unguva naqngu unga _ . _ elpesinite naqngu unga _ kayusiite na lusi _ n a g u s q e l l u s i _ , _ q u y a m a l l e n g e s q e l l u s i _ ugpegh llegh gpesigun _ .
elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ , _ u s u q a t a g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ Christ _ Jesus _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
sa yagh ghngaatnga _ nagnegh te ki _ k i y a g h t a a l l e s i _ C h r i s t - a m _ apeghtugh llegh atun _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ . _ enkaam _ esghagh yaghtugh kumsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ aviite ghngaaghma _ nagaqugh kumsi _ , _ liigike lleqe aqa _ ataasigh stun _ pi llegh i _ . _ liigike lleqe aqa llu _ qerngagh gpesi _ nekevgha tete naqutke lleg si _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ anguyag gpesineng _ .
alike gpenaki _ angu yasi _ , _ quunpeng _ ilutu tete lusi _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesi _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q a a t _ ellngit _ kayaalqe i i naanghite ut _ . _ elpek si _ kayaalqe i uute lleqe usi _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ kayaalqe i i ste i lghii _ elpesi neng _ .
elpesi nun _ q e p g h a a s a q l e g u g h t e s t e k a q a a _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ u g p e q n g i n a g h p e n a a n _ , _ ikfiqe lgusigh kesi llu _ .
P i l l u w a l g u s i g h t e n g n g a _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ esghapag qagh qagh zinga _ piyaqli i lghiinga _ , _ nagaqugh kaqe asi llu _ piyaqli i llegh nka _ maaten _ . _ elpek si llu _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ piyaqleg iigh te kete naqngu asi _ .
K i y a g h t a a l l e g h p e s i _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ i k n a q u g h t i s i i _ ? _ piniqe llegh an _ ilutughte i sagh i _ ? _ quya aqe tsi _ ataasigh stun _ lliigh lghiisi _ ugpeqagh u lgutke te lghii ni _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ ? _ pinitun _ pi aqe stekagh i _ , _ nanglleg ke aqe stekagh i _ ila si _ ?
tawatete u kufsi _ , _ quya ma ste ghllag tengnga _ piniqe te llegh gpesigun _ , _ ataasigh stun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ ataasigh stun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ .
E l l n g i n a a y u g n e g h u g p e n a s i _ , _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h u g p e n a s i _ . _ yeghlegi _ q u s e v g u t u l l u s i _ , _ ila gpesineng _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ .
sumegh ke gpenaki _ p i y u k e l l g h i i n a s i _ , _ yeghlegi _ piyuke lleg si _ pakig qagh luki _ kayusiite aqe luki _ ila si _ .
sumeghnegh si _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ sumeghnegh atun _ ayuqligh t _ .
Jesus _ kiyaghnegh tun _ ayuqe yagh ghngaaghmi _ sumeghtaghagh mangite uq _ kiyaghnegh _ inglu ke yaghqaa luku _ .
yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh u lleg ni _ pakig luku _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e s t u n _ lliigh kau uq _ . _ yug stun _ lliigh kau uq _ , _ allgegh kau uq llu _ yug stun _ .
yugughte yami _ qusevegtekau uq _ enkaam _ qaatke te kau uq _ tuqu llegh mun _ , _ talwa _ tuqu kau uq _ qaquuragh kun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ Jesus _ aange lleghpigagh u luku _ , _ atigh kaqe a llu _ atanegh meng _ a a n g e l l e g h p i g a g h m e n g _ a t e g h y a g g a g h n e n g _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ q i l a g m e l n g u u m _ , _ n u n a m e l n g u u m _ , _ nuna m _ a s i n g a n i l n g u u m _ q u u l v a g h l l e q a a t _ Jesus _ qungughte uute llegh megteggun llu _ apegh llegh megteggun llu _ , _ " _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ A t a n g h u u q _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ q u u l v a g h l l e q a a t _ kiyaghnegh _ a ta _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ elpesi nite lunga _ qaatke manginagh qagh qagh zinga _ , _ maaten _ aviillegh mni _ qaatke aghagh tengnga _ . _ I i g h w i g h t e s q e l l u k u _ yuguligh llegh i _ qepghagh manginagh tek _ alinge lleg ligh lusi llu _ ungelegte lleg ligh lusi llu _ ;
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ quunpeng _ qepghagh u uq _ elpesi ni _ atuqe yagute sqellug qu _ piyuke lleg ni _ , _ q a a t k u s a g u t e s q e l l u s i l l u _ piyuke llegh minun _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi aqe teggu _ a k u z i l g a f q a a f s i _ , _ nalighmeng _ aaghtiiraagh te fqaafsi _ .
enkaam _ avute ite lleqe usi llu _ pelungite lleqe usi llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaquti a _ avute ite yaghqaa ut _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u t e n g _ akule itni _ p u u g h t i n g h e t l u _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t l u _ . _ kuukgute pestaagh yaghqaa usi _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ nuna mi _ ,
ungipagh ke i u lusi _ ellngit nun _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug meng _ . _ enkaam _ tagi nqigtekan _ q u y a s l e q a g h p e s i n g a _ elngaatall _ , _ qayughllak _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h p e s i _ kelgute yaghqaqe a _ qepghagh llegh ka _ temngingu nghite ngughk _ .
ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqe te stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tuqute kangatnga _ whani _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ quya lleqe unga _ , _ qayughllak _ tuqu llegh ka _ aghqe te stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ tuune lghii _ elpek si _ aghqe te gpesinun _ iighwigh sigh u luni _ . _ T a a m _ qamagte luta _ quya ste lleqe ainkut _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ elpek si llu _ quya yaghqaa usi _ , _ q u y a l g u s i g h l l a g y a g h q a q a g h p e s i n g a _ .
A t a n g h e m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ T i m o t h y _ kayagte yaghtugh ngestagh aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ quya lleqe unga _ ungipange gkuma _ elpesi neng _ .
T i m o t h y - n g i n a g h h a a m _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aisi _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleg mtun _ .
tamaakut _ ila i _ kiyang _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ katam _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ut _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ qepghaqagh a _ avelghagh luku _ .
iwernga _ T i m o t h y _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h s i _ nateghtu langa _ . _ ighnegh stun _ kayuute yiite kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i u lunga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
liigike ghesnagh kumkun _ aanesaghqagh u tke a _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ kayagte lleqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ .
neghyuke aqa _ atanegh _ whanga llu _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh unga _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aqa _ u g p e q a a l g u t f u t _ epaphroditus _ elpesi nun _ uteghnigh ste na luku _ . _ kayute kaghqagh yug ma lunga _ tagi stekaqe kesi _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u n g a _ . _ qerngagh emtung _ qepghaqagh u ukung llu _ ungipagh ke i kau ukung llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ nekevgha te kaqe apung llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ k i p u l l g i n a a l g h i i n e n g _ .
aglagh ste naqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ aghyuqe u uq _ . _ P e n g Ê¼ g a q i i s i _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh kaqe kesi _ qinuyug llegh aneng _ .
ipa u uq _ qinuyug ghllag kau uq _ repall _ tuqu vzigh kau uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kaqe a _ , _ whanga llu _ nanglleg yagute kaqe aanga _ . _ tuquma yagh kan _ wataqaaghaq _ qivghu lleg nge aghagh nayagh unga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ wataqaaghaq _ aglagh sug aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ kaate kan _ esghagh kufsigu _ quya lleqe usi _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ itagnaghi lleqe unga _ whanga llu _ .
epaphroditus _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghmi _ qepghaqagh u uq _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ aaqun _ tuqu vzigh kau uq _ . _ kayusiite kaqe aanga _ qayughllak _ elpek si _ k a y u s i i t e p a g n i n g i t k a q a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ a v i i l n g u u s i _ . _ quyake sigh ke luku _ upugha tete nakesi _ qayughllak _ a n g l e g u t k a g h s i _ atanegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ q u u l v a g h l u k i _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ E p a p h r o d i t u s - e t u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ naange niite te kun _ u n g i p a a s u w a m s i _ , _ " _ quya ma aqe tek _ atanegh kun _ ! _ " _ qinuyagute igate unga _ u n g i p a a n n e q i g g n e m s i _ lata tgun _ igaqegkagh mneng _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ enkaam _ ila lleqe uq _ paqniite llegh gpesinun _ .
kelenga lusi _ seghletun _ pikayug neng _ , _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ qikmigh neng _ , _ yugu ut _ sagiqe te i lghiit _ k e p f i k e s q e l l u k i _ yugusigh t _ .
whangkuta u ukut _ ugpeqagh ni _ c i r c u m c i s e - e p i i w a a q a n i _ qayughllak _ m a n i g u g h a q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ , _ u s u q a q a g h p u t l u _ Christ _ Jesus _ . _ neghyu igate ukut llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ p i l i i t e s q e l l u t a _ whangkuta _ katam _ salleg mteggun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi liite yaghqaqe yagh kagu _ ellnga n _ katam _ s a l l g h a k u n _ , _ whanga _ pi yaghqaa yagh unga _ . _ yug t _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa yagh kata _ whanga _ wataqaaghaq _ pi nayagh unga _ ukut _ apallugh ke luki _ :
C i r c u m c i s e - e k a q a a t n g a _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ aghneq _ atugh yamkun _ kingu aneng _ allgellegh ma _ . _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n e n g _ pi u unga _ , _ ramke aneng _ B e n j a m i n - e m _ . _ H e b r e w - p i i g u u n g a _ , _ angayuqagh gka llu _ H e b r e w - n g u u k _ . _ malighqutagh ke nga ghllag unga _ J e w i s h - e t _ liilightuusagh itnun _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pharisee- ngughte unga _ .
sagiqe pigte lunga _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe anka _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ Q a a t k e n g n g w a a q a q a n k a _ J e w s - e t _ liilightuusagh it _ repall _ anaggute llegh mun _ a v u t n g i t k a a g u n g a _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ a l l g e g h t e k a q n i k a q s a q e n k a _ ifla ma anka _ apallugh ke luku _ C h r i s t - a _ .
ipa _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ifla ma anka _ apallugh ke luku _ m e g n u n a g h t u l n g a _ l i i t n g w a a l l e m n e n g _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ atanegh ka _ . _ ellnga _ apallugh ke luku _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ egte ma anka _ . _ esghagh anka _ mallagh stun _ ayuqe luki _ a l l g e g h t e q e g h n a l u k u _ C h r i s t - a _ ,
ilate u aghte unga llu _ ellnga nun _ . _ ugpeqe nanigh ma aqa _ whanga mneng _ pinigh naqe llegh _ qaatke te lleg mkun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ yeghlegi _ liisimake aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh ste aqe aanga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kegka _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ una _ pinigh llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe uq _ , _ yug t _ allgegh taqagh at _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
piyuke llegh ghllag ke aqa _ , _ liite na luku _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ nanghiigh na luku llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ u n g u v a g h t e l l g h a n _ ; _ ilate na lunga llu _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ , _ ellnga tun llu _ lliigh yaghqaa lunga _ tuqu llegh ani _ .
tawaten _ pi kuma _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ sighimake aqa _ whanga llu _ u n g u v a g h t e s q e l l u n g a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
whaten _ pi u nghite unga _ , _ " _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ lliigh ma unga _ nalighmeng _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ quunpeng _ . _ " _ iwernga _ p i n a q e l l g h a q a _ qamagte luku _ atuqe u aqa _ C h r i s t - a m _ piyuke llegh atun _ lliigh na lunga _ atuqe na luku llu _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ whanga mnun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ sumeghtaghagh igate unga _ k a y a a l q e l g h a g t u u m a n i l u k u _ . _ iwernga _ ataasigh _ pi aqe aqa _ , _ puygu luku _ sa u a _ t u n u t e m n i l n g u q _ s i v u t m i i g h n a q u t k a q u n g a _ kaate na luku _ sa u a _ sivu mnite ngughk _ .
enkaam _ taklaghruketun _ kilgaaqu u unga _ kayaalqe i i sigh ke na luku _ akileghtuusagh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh tekagh anun _ pamavek _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh nghite kufsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike ste naagh ai _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si _ anaggute nga lghiit _ .
una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ , _ nagnegh te lteki _ k i y a g h t a a l l e p u t _ maligte luku _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ liitekagh ut _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ uspute aqe lunga _ maligte ngnga _ . _ esghapag luki _ ila i llu _ kiyaghte lghiit _ whanga mtun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ uglagh ghngaan _ ungipaate aatagh kaqe amsi _ , _ maaten _ ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ qunituumagh ma _ . _ uglagh u pigte ut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ anguyag u luteng _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu llegh aneng _ qaquuragh kun _ .
suumqagh ke ait _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh it _ kiyang _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luku _ . _ kayngu yug sighqagh ke yagh ke teng _ a a n g a a y u g u s i q a q i i t _ . _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aat _ n u n a m e l n g u g h h i i n a q _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h t e n g _ enkaam _ naafqe lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ hell- mi _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh ni _ whangkuta _ qilag mii u ukut _ . _ enkaam _ u t a q a n g w a a g h p u t _ yuguligh i sta _ , _ atanegh _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ ukig yaghqagh _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ .
tagi kuni _ allangughte yaghqaqe ai _ k a y a a l n g u u t _ , _ t u q u m u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ yugusigh put _ . _ U n g u v a g h t e k a t u n _ yugusigh mitun _ lli aghte yaghqaqe ai _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n _ . _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h q u n _ igleghte te yaghqaaghte lleqe a _ sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ piniqekagh mni _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ esghagh yug pigte amsi _ , _ quya ma sigh ke amsi _ , _ akileghtuusagh ke amsi llu _ qepghagh lleg mnun _ . _ tawaten _ aghula i te kestagh tek _ atanegh kun _ .
E u o d i a _ , _ S y n t y c h e _ , _ qevuute lunga _ qelegh naqe amtek _ , _ taaqe tek _ aghiva tete nghmeng _ . _ ataasigh stun _ lliigh tek _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke te utek _ atanegh kun _ .
Q e p g h a l g u t e m n i _ S y z y g u s _ , _ elpek llu _ kayuute yiite aghte kek _ aghnagh k _ taake uk _ taaqe sqellug kek _ aghiva tete nghmeng _ . _ E l k e g k e n k a _ qevuute lutek _ qepghagh lgusigh kaqe ainkut _ C l e m e n t - l u _ ila i llu _ q e p g h a l g u t e n k a _ , _ qamagte luta _ ungipagh ke i u luta _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ . _ Q e p g h a l g u t m a _ qamagte luteng _ ategh it _ igaqe nga ut _ igagh akun _ unguvallegh m _ . _ T a w a n t u t _ igagh ni _ ategh it _ qamagte luteng _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh ngekagh t _ .
iiwleng _ quya ma aqe tek _ atanegh kun _ . _ pi naqlaatagh amsi _ , _ quya ma aqe tek _ !
nuqete neghtu llegh i _ yug m _ qamagte luni _ liite ligu _ . _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ .
sumeghyali tke gpenaan _ sa u a _ alngunak _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ sa meng _ aklu kufsi _ yughagh negh gpesini _ tungsigh aqe tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ t u u n e s q e l l u s i _ . _ iiwleng _ tungsigh aqe tek _ igamsiqa yug lleg ligh lusi _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilu si llu _ umyugagh si llu _ n e k e g g m e t e s n a a g h i i _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a _ aange ghllag uq _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h n a a n g h i t a a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ naange niite ta akun _ lata ma _ u n g i p a a s u w a m s i _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k u m a n g i n i i s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit llu _ usuqe yaghqagh t llu _ w h a t e l n g u u t _ : _ tamaakut _ ipa pig t _ , _ q u u l v a g h y a g h q a t _ , _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ p e l u n g i l n g u u t _ , _ piniqe yaghqagh t _ , _ tamaakut llu _ pinitun _ akuzite kete yaghqagh t _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nagnegh te ggu _ liitekagh i _ whanga mneng _ apeghtugh i lleg mkun llu _ k i y a g h t a a l l e m k u n l l u _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i t i k a y u k _ elpesinite lleqe uq _ .
elngaatall _ quya pigte unga _ atanegh kun _ qayughllak _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ whaa _ allameng _ kayusiite laatagh kefsinga _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ kayusiite yukagh qagh zinga _ , _ iwernga _ pipagningite kau usi _ .
aklu u ni lunga _ pi u nghite unga _ qayughllak _ natete yagh ghngaaghma _ itagnagh aqe unga _ .
ilangani _ n u u g h n g a g h m a _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ , _ ilangani _ siipte i i lunga _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ . _ itagnagh yagute ma unga _ nani _ alngunak _ s a t u l e m t u n _ kiyaghte negh mni _ . _ itagnagh aqe unga _ k e p s u g h n g a g h m a _ kiyaghte negh mni _ , _ iyatagh ghngaaghma llu _ kiyaghte negh mni _ , _ talwa _ akluma ghngaaghma llu _ , _ aklu nghite ghngaaghma llu _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ pi yaghqaqe aqa _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ i k n a q u g h s a g h t e m k u n _ .
paninang _ elpek si _ pinitungwaaq _ kayusigh u aatagh qagh zinga _ seghleliigh negh mni _ .
elpek si _ P h i l i p p i - y e g h m i i n i _ , _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h s i _ aghulaqe aqngama _ M a c e d o n i a - m e n g _ , _ ungipagh ke i yuwhaagh aqngama _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ e l l n g i n a a g u s i _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayusigh ikagh t _ whanga meng _ . _ E l l n g i n a a g u s i _ ilate nga lghiit _ allgegh te lleg mnun llu _ iflii lleg mnun llu _ .
ataasigh ghhagh u gpenaan _ a k l u p i g n e m n i _ mani meng _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m e l l u n g a _ , _ t u y u g h a q a g h p e s i n g a _ .
iwernga _ liigike sug amsi _ tunute yasi _ mani t _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u nghite ut _ whanga mni _ . _ M e g n u n a l l e g h p i g a q t a _ esgha _ una _ : _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh _ allgeghsaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pinitun _ pilleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ .
whaa _ maaten _ naama unga _ , _ aa-a _ , _ talwa _ siipte i i lunga _ ayuqe unga _ . _ tuyuusagh si _ E p a p h r o d i t u s - k u n _ qamagte luteng _ kaate ma ut _ , _ enkaam _ whaa _ aklu igate unga _ . _ tunute yasi _ whanga mnun _ aghqe tkekagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ e f q u g h t i n a p i g l l e g h h i i t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kiyaghnegh ma _ yataaghqe te naagh aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ a k l u k e g k a g h p e s i n e n g _ aklungite llegh ghllag mikun _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh mnnun _ , _ ata mun _ usuqe i lta _ , _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
ungipagh u aatagh nakesi _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ . _ U g p e q a a l g u t e t _ w h a n g a m n i l n g u u t _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ , _ kiyang _ taakut _ C a e s a r - e m _ mangteghagh mii ita _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ taghneghagh gpesinite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ a p o s t l e - n g u g h t e k a a g u n g a _ Christ _ J e s u s - m u n _ . _ T i m o t h y - m e n g l l u _ pi u ut _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n e n g _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ pi u ut _ C o l o s s a e - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u t _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i s i l l i l l u _ .
iiwleng _ i y a m s i q a y u g v i k a q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ y u g h a a t k e n n e m s i _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ n a g a q u u m a a g h p u t _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ Christ _ J e s u s - m e n g _ , _ piniqe i llegh i llu _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh pigu ut _ . _ nagaqugh yuwhaagh aqe yafsiki _ , _ liite kau usi _ sighima llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ s i g h m a l l e g h p e s i _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ste aqe aisi llu _ piniqe i lleg lgu ste aqe aisi llu _ . _ qilag mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kagpag ma a _ elpesi nun _ sa u a _ sighimakekagh i _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ quya ste i manginagh u ut _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ mingite u ut _ i i n g u n a g h h a a n u n _ nuna m _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ q u y a s t i l l g h i s t u n _ elpesi nun _ nagaqugh yuwhaagh aqe yafsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ legh igh iitagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
L i i t k a q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ n a n g l l e g h t a l l g h a _ epaphras- meng _ , _ piniqekagh mnneng _ q e p g h a l g u t e m n n e n g _ . _ ataasiighmete luni _ qepghagh u uq _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ qepghaqagh ke a _ whangkuta _ q e p g h a g h y u k a q s a q e f u t _ .
ellnga n _ ungipaate ma ainkut _ piniqe i llegh meng _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
aghnegh meng _ taagken _ nagaqugh te mnneng _ tamaakut _ , _ yughagh te kete nanigh igate amsi _ . _ tungsigh te u amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ qamagte luku _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ yughagh te kaqe amsi llu _ p e g h q i n g h u s q e l l u s i _ , _ l i i g i k e s q e l l u k i l l u _ sa u aat _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtugh tke ai _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe usi _ A t a n g h e m _ piyuke llegh atun _ , _ iiwleng _ a t u q a q e l l e q a g h s i _ sa u a _ efqugh nagh lghii _ ellnga ni _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ pinigh lghii _ q e p g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ enkaam _ wata _ l i i l l e q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yughagh te kaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ i k n a q u g h s i i s q e l l u s i _ ilu gpesigun _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h l l a g m i k u n _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ n u q e n n e g h t u g h t e g h l l a g e s q e l l u s i _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
enkaam _ quya ma lleg ligh ghllag lusi _ i y a m s i q a y u g v i k e l l e q a g h s i _ a ta _ . _ ellnga u lghii _ elpesi nun _ nengigh lgute ste ikagh _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ tuune lleqe ni luki _ yug ni _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nighug mi _ .
ellnga n _ y u g u l i k a q i i n k u t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g _ mamleg m _ enkaam _ tagite kaqe ainkut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ pinigh kegka mi _ ighnegh mi _ .
ellnga n _ tukfigh kaqe ainkut _ , _ seghevute kaqe ai llu _ seghleghqe lleg put _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tawatete u aghte uq _ aliite nghite ngugh tun _ kiyaghnegh tun _ . _ kiyaghte u uq _ sivungagh ni _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ulima llghite luku _ , _ enkaam _ q u l i g h p i g a a g u q _ u l i m a a g h y a g g a g h n e n g _ .
ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t l u _ n u n a m e l n g u u t l u _ . _ ulima kaqe ai _ esghaqagh yu put _ , _ esghagh igate ke put llu _ tamaakut llu _ umiileg t _ , _ a t a n g h e t _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ pi lleghqagh leg t llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ C h r i s t - a m u n l l u _ .
C h r i s t - a _ t a w a n t e k a a g u q _ sivu itni _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n l l u _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ellnga n _ n e k a g h q a g h l l u w a a g h i t n i t e s t a q i i _ .
ellnga _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ ugpeqagh nun _ y u g h a g h v i g m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ ellnga n _ yugusigh ke ai _ . _ ellnga n _ yugusigh _ u n g u v a n g u s t e n g n g w a a _ . _ ellnga u uq _ unguvagh yuwhaagh ke aq _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ enkaam _ q u l i g h p i g a a g u q _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ ellmi _ katam _ kiyaghte na luni _ ighnegh mi _ ilu ani _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh mikun _ veghute stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ nuna mi llu _ qilag mi llu _ . _ enkaam _ aaw akun _ ighnegh mi _ tuqu aqngan _ qaquuragh mi _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ .
ataasigh meng _ pellegh nga yagh usi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ anguyag ke yagh aisi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ seghletun llu _ pi llegh gpesigun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ i l a l i i g h u n n e q i g t e s t i i s i _ ellmi nun _ ighnegh mi _ yugusigh an _ tuqu llegh akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tagite na lusi _ nayute te nga llegh minun _ agleghnagh lusi _ , _ pelungite lusi _ , _ a v u t n g i l l u s i l l u _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ nagnegh kufsi _ ugpeqe luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ a y g u g h i k e l l n g u n a k i _ . _ iqite gpenasi _ s i g h m a l l e g h m e n g _ a l l g e g h t e k a g h p e s i n e n g _ nagaqugh aqe yafsiki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke u ut _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nuna m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ , _ whanga _ P a u l _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u l u n g a _ ellmi nun _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
ikfiqe llegh ma _ yugusigh mkun _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ quya ste ghllag aanga _ . _ tawaten _ kayusigh i u unga _ apeghiigh na luki _ C h r i s t - a m _ ikfiqe llegh i _ yugusigh minun _ . _ ellnga n _ yugusigh a _ ugpeqagh u ut _ y u g h a g h v i g m e l n g u u t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g l l a q a q a a n g a _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ tagivagh kaqe a _ una _ qepghaqagh _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u s i _ , _ elpesi nun _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte mangite a _ una _ i p a p i l l e q _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ q a y v i g h t e n g n g w a a _ ellmi _ yug minun _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ nakmiigh lghii _ yug minun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ sa u a _ qayvighte llghite kete ni _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ nakmike kaqe a _ liisimake sqellug qu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ u u m _ i p a p i l l g h e m _ akule itni _ G e n t i l e - e t _ . _ I p a p i l l e q _ qayvightekagh a _ u n a n g u u q _ : _ C h r i s t - a _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ ilu gpesini _ . _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ sa igh i ma ut _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u t a _ kiyaghnegh mi _ ellnga n _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a n i _ .
enkaam _ u n g i p a q n g w a a g h p u t _ C h r i s t - a _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ qamagte luku _ peghqinellegh kun _ , _ kelenga sagh u aghaghkagh put llu _ apeghtugh aqe aput llu _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ tagite na luki _ a t a a s i k a g h t i i t a _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayute te nga llegh anun _ a n g t a n i i t k a a l u k i _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
taana _ pi na luku _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ ughleghiigh unga _ atuqe luku _ C h r i s t - a m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ qepghagh lghii _ iknaqe pigte luni _ ilu mnni _ .
U n g i p a a t a g h l l a m s i _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ qepghagh te i lleg mneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ ugpeqagh nun llu _ L a o d i c e a - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh anun llu _ esghaate igate ngugh neng _ whanga mneng _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ ilu it _ i l u t u g h l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ , _ a t a a s i i g h t e s q e l l u k i l l u _ piniqe llegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aat _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma ite kanga _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvightekagh a _ C h r i s t - a n g u q _ .
qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh i llu _ liigike i nga llegh i llu _ C h r i s t - a m e t u t _ . _ taake uk _ aklungi stun _ ayuqe uk _ iigh nga lghiik _ C h r i s t - a m i _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ t e m n g i n e n g _ a p e g h t u g h a l l g h i t n e n g _ , _ qaywa _ i p a s u g n i t e g h n g a a t a _ .
qaywa _ u y a v a n s a g h n g a a g h m a _ elpesi neng _ , _ umyugagh mkun _ elpesinite aqe unga _ . _ quya unga _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte lghiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ a g h u l i i l n g u q _ .
tugukligh llegh gpesistun _ Christ _ Jesus _ A t a n g h u l u k u _ , _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghte tek _ ellnga kun _ .
ellnga kun _ akugh lgute k _ asivagh nun _ samavek _ , _ ellnga kun _ nekefte ki _ k i y a g h t a a l l e s i _ enkaam _ i k n a q u g h t e k _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ apeghtugh llegh gpesistun _ . _ iyamsiqa yug manginagh tek _ .
kelenga lusi _ ! _ kitumun _ alngunak _ aghulaqe te ste gpenasi _ t e m n g i t w h a t g u n _ a p e g h t u g h a l l g h i t g u n _ . _ tamaakut _ a p e g h t u g h a l l g h e t _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itneng _ pi u ut _ , _ tughneghagh neng llu _ pi u ut _ , _ igleghte te i lghiit _ whani _ nuna mi _ . _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ pi u nghite ut _ ,
qayughllak _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ kiyaghnegh _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh ani _ .
C h r i s t - a _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n u n l l u _ pi lleghqagh leg nun llu _ . _ ilate ste lusi _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe aisi _ unguvallegh pig meng _ .
ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a a g u s i _ . _ C i r c u m c i s e - e l l e g h s i _ yug t _ pi ste llghite aat _ , _ iwernga _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi stekaqe a _ . _ enkaam _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g _ yugusigh gpesi _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ piyuke llegh itneng _ .
