P a a p t a a y a a q n g a f s i _ qungugh te kau usi _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ taagken _ makete kau usi _ unguvallegh mun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ makete kaqe a _ C h r i s t - a _ t u q u m e n g _ .
tuqu kau usi _ qayughllak _ seghleghqe ste u yalghiisi _ , _ qayughllak llu _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l g h i l n g u u s i _ yugusigh gpesigun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe aisi _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ qayughllak _ seghevute kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ .
qaatke nghite aqe yamteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ L i i l i g h t u u s i _ seghleghqe llegh t _ pi ke aput _ igaqe kau ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite kaqe ai _ igaqughkagh t _ seghleghqe lleg put _ tuqu qagh te luki _ C h r i s t - a m _ qaquuragh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ wayaghteqagh ke ai _ g u u t u t a n g i t _ igleghte te i lghiit llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g e t l u _ tughneghagh t _ . _ tawaten _ tea- ma anun _ esghagh stekagh a _ kayaalqe i i lleg ni _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ tughneghagh neng _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ nanqigte ste gpenasi _ neghe llegh meng llu _ meghe llegh meng llu _ , _ neqenghaghqe llegh t _ aghnegh itneng _ , _ nutaghagh t _ tanqigh t _ aghnegh itneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ S a b b a t h - e t _ aghnegh itneng _ .
taakut _ taghneghagh nge te lghii stun _ ayuqe ut _ t a a k u n u n _ pi yaghqagh nun _ aga _ s i v u m e l n g u g h n u n _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ ipa pig t _ C h r i s t - a m e t u t _ .
ila i _ yug m _ q u s e v e g n g a s u g n i g h q e s u n e g h t u u t _ , _ manigugh aqe ait llu _ yaquleg t _ . _ iiwleng _ akuzite kaqe ait _ esghaghwaagh lleg teng _ esghaghkagh teng _ . _ ellngit nun _ ungipaate ste gpenasi _ anaggute nga ni lusi _ . _ ellngit _ esleqnga ut _ t e m n g i t w h a m e n g _ q u k a a y u g l l e g h m e n g _ qayughllak _ sumeghnegh it _ yug m _ sumeghnegh ke ai _ .
ellngit _ ilate nanigh ut _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ naasqugh u te i lghii meng _ yugusigh mun _ . _ igleghte te u a _ iingunagh an _ yugusigh _ , _ i k n a q u g h s a g h a q a a l l u _ neghqe aqe luku _ . _ Q e r n g a g h m e t e s t a q a a _ yugusigh _ atuqe ste luki _ naflugh i llu _ ivalu i llu _ . _ enkaam _ yugusigh _ nagu u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagu ste sqe sug llegh atun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tuqu aqngan _ t u q u l g u s i q a l l g h u u q a q a g h s i _ . _ enkaam _ iteme te kau usi _ tughneghagh neng _ igleghte te i lghii neng _ whani _ nuna mi _ . _ S a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ kiyaghte aqe tsi _ nuna mun _ pike pigte lghii stun _ ? _ sangan _ qaatke aqe steki _ l i i l i g h t u g h a l l g h i t _ w h a t e l n g u u t _ ,
" _ safleg gpenaan _ , _ naasiigh gpenaan _ , _ saafte gpenaan _ ? _ "
taakut _ l i i l i g h t u g h a l l g h e t _ yug t _ neghe ke ii te neng llu _ meghe ke ii te neng llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ neghekagh it llu _ meghekagh it llu _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ l i i l i g h t u g h a l l g h e t _ t a a w a n g i n a g h h a q _ yug t _ l i i l i g h t u g h a l q i i t l u _ apeghtuusagh ke ait llu _ .
tamaakut _ l i i l i g h t u g h a l l g h e t _ apeghtugh ait _ yug t _ p e g h q i n e s i g h w a a g h e s q e l l u k i _ . _ apeghtugh ait llu _ a m y u u t k e s q e l l u k i _ yugusigh at _ , _ a t u q n a n i i s q e l l u k i _ yugusigh ita _ p i k y u k e l l g h i t _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi llghite a _ aghula i aghte igate ait _ atuqe nanigh lleghqagh meng _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ . _ tamaakut _ l i i l i g h t u g h a l l g h e t _ ipate yu gnite ut _ iwernga _ temngingu ut _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
U n g u v a g h t e k a a t e g p e s i n e n g _ maligte te lusi _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ piyuke aqe teki _ sa u aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi nun _ p i k e s q e l l u k i _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t _ . _ tawani _ C h r i s t - a _ aqumga uq _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
suumqagh qite ki _ tamaakut _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t _ , _ nakaan _ tamaakut _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ .
tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tek _ qayughllak _ tuqu kau usi _ . _ unguvallegh i _ iigh nga uq _ C h r i s t - a m i _ kiyaghnegh kun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ u n g u v a l q a g h p u t _ . _ aliigh kan _ , _ elpek si llu _ a l i i l g u s i g h l l e q a g h s i _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a n i _ .
taaqe teki _ atuqe nghmeng _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh it _ , _ katam _ allani ii aagh _ , _ ukmangite nghite ngughk _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ , _ atuqe yu llegh a _ seghlegh m _ , _ pakig ni uq llu _ . _ pakig ni uq _ maniguute lghii stun _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ayuqe uq _ .

sivugh nghaani _ tawaten _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u y a g h t u s i _ .

iqlengiqe te gpenasi _ qayughllak _ t a a q u m a a g h s i _ k i y a g h t a a l l e l u g s i _ , _ ayghigh te kaqsagh kesi llu _ .
enkaam _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h r a g h a q _ a t u q a a g h s i m a a g h s i _ . _ N u t a g h t e n g n g u u s i _ , _ U l i m a g h i s t e g p e s i s t u n l l u _ lliigh u usi _ . _ tamaaken _ a p a l l u q u k u _ l i i g i k e k e s t a g h a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ k i n a g h p i g a a t a n g a _ .
K i y a g h t a a l l e g h r a g h a g h m i _ , _ allangughte te ite ut _ akule itni _ G e n t i l e - e t l u _ J e w s - e t l u _ , _ akule itni _ c i r c u m c i s e - e k a t l u _ c i r c u m c i s e - e l l g h i l n g u u t l u _ , _ akule itni _ b a r b a r i a n - e t l u _ , _ S c y t h i a n - e t l u _ , _ akule itni llu _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t l u _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u u t l u _ . _ iwernga _ C h r i s t - a _ q u l i g h p i g a a g u q _ , _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q l u _ tea- ma ghhagh mnni _ ugpeqagh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke aisi _ agleghnagh lghiit _ , _ piniqe pigte aisi llu _ . _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ . _ enkaam _ nangllegtagh lusi _ , _ nanglleg ke i lusi _ , _ qusevegte lusi _ , _ yakugh ke lusi _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi llu _ .

qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ megnu nagh ut _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ . _ piniqe te llegh m _ a t a a s i i g h t e n g n g w a a g h i i n k u t _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ nalighnegh ke aisi _ C h r i s t - a m _ yugusigh an _ , _ enkaam _ nakmike kau usi _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u s i _ qerngagh gpesi _ nekeggmellegh kun _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ C h r i s t - a m _ nekeggmellegh an _ igleghte te liki _ ilu si _ . _ iyamsiqa yug nga tek llu _ .
yeqay _ C h r i s t - a m _ apeghtuusagh i _ kemnagh luteng _ kiyaghte lit _ ilu gpesini _ . _ apeghtugh utu te aqe lusi _ , _ k e l e n g a s a a g h u t u t a q l u s i l l u _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ peghqinellegh kun _ . _ ilagagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iyamsiqa yug lleg ligh lusi _ ilu gpesigun _ , _ ilagagh tek _ psalms- neng _ , _ ilagaate neng _ , _ manigugh te mun llu _ ilagaate neng _ .
enkaam _ sa u a _ pikagh i _ , _ akuzite kun _ nalighmeng _ qepghagh llegh kun _ qamagte luku _ pi aqe teggu _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ ellnga kun _ iyamsiqa yug vike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ a ta _ .
nuliigh ni _ , _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ A t a n g h e m _ p i s q e s u w i i s i _ .
ugi ni _ , _ piniqe luki _ nula isi _ , _ yakugh ke luki _ pi aqe teki _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ qaute kete luki _ angayuqagh si _ sa llegh kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ p i l l g h e m _ efqughtagh ke a _ atanegh _ .
ata ni _ , _ sakraa uute yaghagh gpenaki _ taghnughhagh si _ luuraq _ i i l q e n n a y u k a t a _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h n i _ , _ iiwleng _ qaute kete luki _ p i l i i t i s t e s i _ . _ iiwleng llu _ e f q u g h h n a q l u k i _ e s g h a p a g u g h n g a a t a _ nalighmeng _ e s g h a p a g u n g h i t e g h n g a a t a _ . _ qepghagh te ki _ i p a p i g h q e l l u s i _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ q u u l v a a n g w a a g h s i _ atanegh _ .
sa llegh gpesini _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ qepghagh aqe tek _ p i n a q e l l g h a g h s i _ qamagte i i luku _ qepghagh te pigte lghii stun _ atanegh _ , _ nakaan _ yug nun _ .
neqamike luku _ A t a n g h u u q _ C h r i s t - a _ qepghagh tekagh i _ . _ A l l g e g h l l e q a g h s i _ akileghtuusagh i _ ellnga neng _ . _ akileghtuusagh _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ yug minun _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi sta _ nallangigh yaghqaa uq _ seghletun _ p i l l g h a n u n _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe a _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ t a w a t e g h l l u w a a q _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ p i l i i t i s t e n g i t n i _ , _ pinitungwaaq llu _ a t u n e n g w a a q l u _ pi aqe teki _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a s i _ , _ liisimake luku _ elpek si llu _ P i l i i t i s t e l g u u s i _ qilag mi _ .
yughagh manginagh tek _ , _ iilqayug gpenasi llu _ yughagh aqe tek _ iyamsiqa yug vike magh an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yughagh kufsi _ , _ y u g h a a t k e n n a k e f s i k u t l u _ . _ yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q e l p e g h u t e s q e l l u t a _ amig meng _ m i n g i t e s q e l l u k i _ akuzi ta i _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte mangite a _ i p a p i l l e q _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate aanga _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ taana _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ i p a p i l l e q _ . _ ungipagh ke kaqe te mneng _ taana _ i p a p i l l e q _ anusimingllagh aatnga _ .
enkaam _ yughagh tke tengnga _ una _ ungipagh _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa luku _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ whanga mnun _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
P e g h q i n g h w a a q i t e k _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughnite negh gpesini _ . _ atuqe aqe teggu _ tamaghhagh an _ pi lleghqagh i _ ungipaate yaghqaa luki _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
aleghqugh nghpesiki _ iiwleng _ nangllegtagh lusi _ , _ akuzi aqe lusi _ itagnagh yugnagh lusi _ , _ nagate yugnagh lusi llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe tek _ l i i s i m a k e s q e l l u s i _ naten _ kiimsigh lleghqagh it _ a a p q u g h a a l l g h i t _ .
T y c h i c u s _ ugpeqagh u lgutke aqa _ , _ piniqe pigtekaqe a _ . _ qepghagh lgutke aqa _ , _ qepghagh te aqe a llu _ atanegh _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ .
kayagte aqa _ elpesi nun _ , _ liisimake sqellug qu _ n a t e t u l v u t _ enkaam _ k a y e m e l l e n g e s q e l l u s i _ . _ ungipaate naagh aisi _ whanga mneng _ .
kayagte aqa llu _ Onesimus _ elpesi nun _ . _ piniqe kau uq _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u q _ u g p e q a a l g u n _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi u uq _ . _ T y c h i c u s - e n k u k _ ungipaate lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ sa llegh neng _ maani _ .
A r i s t a r c h u s - e m _ anusimingllaghagh lgute ma _ , _ M a r k - e m l l u _ ata lgu ta an _ B a r n a b a s - e m _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ ( _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ lata tgun _ mark- meng _ , _ kaate ma kan _ elpesi nun _ upugha te sqellug qu _ . _ )
J e s u s - e m l l u _ , _ alla _ ategh leg m _ J u s t u s - m e n g _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ T a a k u n g i n a a g u t _ J e w s - e t _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ qepghagh lgusigh aqe aatnga _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ilutu qu tke anka _ elngaatall _ .
epaphras _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga n llu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ iiwleng _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ yughagh te kaqe aisi _ a n g t a n i i t e s q e l l u s i _ , _ l i i s i m a k n g n g w a a g h e s q e l l u k u _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ elpesi nun _ , _ elpesi nun llu _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ piyuke llegh a _ pike sqellug qu _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ epaphras _ qepghagh ghllag kau uq _ kayusiite na lusi _ , _ kayusiite na luki llu _ L a o d i c e a - g h m i i t l u _ H i e r a p o l i s - e g h m i i t l l u _ .
L u k e - e m l l u _ piniqe pigtekagh mta _ aghallegtagh m _ , _ D e m a s - e m l l u _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t n u n _ L a o d i c e a - m e l n g u g h n u n _ , _ nympha- mun llu _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t n u n l l u _ q e r n u g h u t k a y u g n u n _ maniguute na luteng _ mangteghagh ani _ , _ ungipaate nakesi _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
atightugh nakesi _ ukut _ lata t _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ C o l o s s a e - m _ . _ wataghllak llu _ atightugh nakesi _ ukut _ lata t _ L a o d i c e a - g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh itnun _ . _ atightugh nakesi llu _ lata t _ L a o d i c e a - g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh ita _ tuyugh yaghqagh it _ elpesi nun _ .
archippus _ u n g i p a a t a g h n n a k e s i _ whaten _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ apeghiigh naken _ qepghaqagh _ A t a n g h e m _ qelegh tke a _ elpenun _ . _ "
whanga _ , _ P a u l _ , _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ una _ igaqe aqa _ . _ neqamike lunga _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ , _ q i i p r a g h u s i g h l u n g a _ ayuqe unga _ . _ qamagte lusi _ suumqagh ke amsi _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh li _ elpesi nun _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ , _ silas- meng _ , _ T i m o t h y - m e n g l l u _ pi u ut _ , _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - g h m i i t _ ugpeqagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ pi i _ A t a n g h e m l l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke i llegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ elpesi nite lik _ .
quunpeng _ i y a m s i q a y u g v i k a q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ , _ iiwleng llu _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ .
yughagh negh mta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata mnnun _ n e q a m i k a q a g h p u t _ qepghagh llegh i _ ugpegh llegh gpesigun _ , _ qepghagh llegh i _ piniqe llegh gpesigun _ . _ I y a m s i q a y u g v i k a q a g h p u t l u _ ugpegh llegh i _ n a g n e g h u s k e s i _ iknaqe luku _ qayughllak _ sighima u lghiisi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqekagh ani _ , _ liisimakagh ut _ nakmike kaqe aisi
qayughllak _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tagite aqe yamsi _ , _ akuzite raaghinagh tgun _ pi mangite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h q u n l l u _ , _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n l l u _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ pi kau ukut _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqe asi _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ipa u ta i _ . _ liisimakagh i llu _ naten _ k i y a g h t e k a a t f u t _ elpesi nite luta _ , _ tawaten _ kayusiite na lusi _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ .
enkaam _ whangkutestun llu _ atanegh tun llu _ lliigh tek _ . _ qaywa _ i k f i q e g h l l a g n g a a g h p e s i _ , _ tugukligh asi _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ quya ma lleg ligh lusi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
enkaam _ usputagh ughte usi _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ ugpeqagh nun _ M a c e d o n i a - m i l l u _ A c h a i a - m i l l u _ .
A t a n g h e m _ ungipagh a _ mingite u uq _ elpesi neng _ M a c e d o n i a - m i l l u _ A c h a i a - m i l l u _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ liite aat _ tea- ma ani _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ pi nghite yagh ghngaamteggu _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ qayughllak _ siingenllu _ yug t _ nagaqugh ma ut _ .
tea- ma ani _ apegh aqe aat _ upugha te i llegh ghllag i _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ elpesinite u luta _ . _ qiive ma ni lusi llu _ unguva lghii mun _ kiyaghnegh pig mun _ qepghagh te na luku _ , _ pegte luki _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ .
U t a q a a q a g h s i l l u n g u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ Jesus _ , _ tagi yaghqagh _ qilag meng _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ yuguligh u iqe ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ kaate yaghqagh meng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ liisimakagh i _ elpesi nun _ pi llegh ut _ t e m n g i n g u n g h i t k a a g u q _ .
iwernga _ sivugh nghaani _ elpesi nun _ pilleg mta _ , _ liisimakagh i _ philippi- mi _ i k f i q l i i g h t e s t e k a q i i n k u t l u _ s e g h l e q u u q a q i i n k u t l u _ . _ tea- magh an llu ta _ qaywa _ uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ aghula i aghte naqutke ghngainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutu stekaqe ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ ungipaate yaghtugh amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ ipa u uq _ . _ iqlengiqe u nghite ukut _ elpesi nun _ , _ seghlegh meng _ piyuke ke ii te ukut _ elpesi nun _ , _ puughhe naqutke igate amsi _ .
yeghlegi _ , _ ungipagh kaqe aput _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ i t a g n a q l u t a _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ akuzillegh mteggun _ e f q u g h h n a q u t k e n g n g u n g h i t a p u t _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ e f q u g h s u k a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ , _ nanqigte i nga lghii _ ilu mta _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng _ .
liisimakagh i _ u s u q u u g h s a g h t u u n g h i t a m s i _ nalighmeng _ sakenge vike yaghtugh u nghite amsi _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekagh ut _ .
U s u q e s a a y u g t e n g n g u n g h i t u k u t _ yug neng _ , _ elpesi neng _ , _ nalighmeng _ kinku neng _ .
A p o s t l e - n g u t e m n n e n g _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ tungsigh niigh vike yaghqaqe yagh amsi _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ iwernga _ elpesi nite luta _ yakumangighlliqe tke mangite amsi _ , _ yeghlegi _ mamaghti kayug stun _ naa stun _ aflengake i lghii stun _ taghnughhagh meggneng _ ayuqe kau ukut _ .
piniqe pigte amsi _ , _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sug aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh i _ . _ pinigh lghii inagh t _ ungipagh t _ pi gpenaki _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ kayusigh yug lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ , _ qayughllak _ p i n i q s a l i i t k a q a m s i _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ n e q a m i k a g h s i _ naten _ angka an _ qepghagh llegh ut llu _ ughleghiigh llegh ut llu _ ! _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ qayughllak _ elpesi nun _ u q i g t u q u t n g u y u n g h i l n g u u k u t _ ; _ elpesinite ma luta _ ungipagh ke i kau ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
elpek si llu _ kiyaghnegh llu _ l i i s i m a k i s t e k a m s i _ . _ elpesi ni _ ugpeqagh ni _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ pelungite luta _ , _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t a _ , _ a n a g g u t e l l n g u n a a m t a _ .
liisimakagh i _ katam _ ata m _ aflengake i llegh atun _ taghnughhagh mineng _ , _ whangkuta llu _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ tawaten _ katam _ aflengake kaqe amsi _ . _ kayeme kaqe amsi _ , _ ilutughsagh kaqe amsi _ , _ qelegh te aatagh qaghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ atuqe sqellug qu _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ efqugh nagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mi _ . _ T u q l u u n g w i i s i _ i l a t e s q e l l u s i _ ellmi _ katam _ ataneghpag u llegh minun llu _ pinighnagh llegh ghllag minun llu _ .
I y a m s i q a y u g v i k u m a n g i n a a n g w a a g h p u t l u _ kiyaghnegh _ una _ apallugh ke luku _ : _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ nagaqugh luku _ t u g u k l i g h a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ . _ elpek si _ t u g u k l i g h a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ungipagh u luku _ , _ nakaan _ yug neng _ ungipagh u luku _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g i p a g h p i g a a _ qepghagh lghii _ elpesi ni _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ elpek si _ tawatete usi _ u g p e q i s t e n g i s t u n _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig itni _ kiyaghnegh m _ J u d e a - m i _ . _ nunalgute gpesi _ ikfiqe stekaqe aisi _ katam _ J e w s - e t _ i k f i q e s t e l l g h i s t u n _ ugpeqagh t _ J u d e a - m i _ .
J e w s - n g u u t _ tuqute ikagh t _ atanegh meng _ J e s u s - m e n g _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e n e n g l l u _ , _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe ainkut llu _ . _ E f q u g h h n e g h i t a a t _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h u u t l u _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun
aghula i aghte naqutke llegh megteggun _ ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ yuguligh lleg nge na yu kata _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ ila manginagh ait _ seghleghqe lleg teng _ enkaam _ qenwat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ugumi yagute ghllag luki _ qantaghaqun _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ a m y u q e t a a t k i s t e m t a _ aghulaqe ste aqe yamikut _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m e n g _ , _ pellegh utu te ste aghte ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ sumeghmike aqe amsi _ . _ esghagh yug pigte aqe yagh amsi _ gginasaghqugh lusi
enkaam _ taku naqute kaqsagh amsi _ . _ whanga _ , _ P a u l _ , _ taku naqutke aatagh aqe yagh amsi _ iwernga _ tughneghagh m _ amig igh aghte aqe ainkut _ .
elpek si _ sighima llegh ke amsi _ , _ quya sigh ke amsi _ , _ qaghpa ke amsi llu _ . _ taana _ qaghpa _ whangkuta _ q u k a a y u g u s i q e l l e q a g h p u t _ manu ani _ atanegh mta _ J e s u s - e m _ tagi kan _ .
ipapestaaq _ elpek si _ qukaayug sigh ke amsi llu _ quya sigh ke amsi llu _ !
iwernga _ e s g h a a t u s i g a t u t e m n n e n g _ qavngaghhaaneng _ pellegh ngatu te llegh ut _ n u q e t u t e p a g n i n g i i t a g h p u t _ . _ enkaam _ agghi te kau ukut _ whanga _ ellnginagh ma _ athens- mete na lunga _ ,
k a y a g t e k a q a g h p u n g l l u _ T i m o t h y _ elpesi nun _ . _ ugpeqagh u lgutekagh ung _ , _ q e p g a l g u s i g h a q i i n k u n g _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ungipagh ke i lgusigh aqe ainkung _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghii neng _ . _ K a y a g t e k a q a g h p u n g _ i k n a q u g h s a g h y a g h t i i s q e l l u k i _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ , _ k a y e m e s q e l l u s i l l u _ ,
qayughllak _ iilqayug sug nghite kemsi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesineng _ seghleliigh lleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ . _ iwernga _ liisimakagh i _ ugpeqagh ni _ whangkuta _ seghleliigh yaghqaa ukut _ .
elpesi nite luta _ ungipaate u aqe aqe amsi _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge lleqe ni luta _ ; _ enkaam _ liisimakagh i _ taawa _ ipa _ i k f i q u t k e g k a q a g h p u t _ amyuqetagh tke llegh _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghtugh yagute yama _ nuqete nghmeng _ , _ kayagtekaqe aqa _ T i m o t h y _ elpesi nun _ liigike na luku _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ natete aqe ta a _ . _ pengke aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqu ma na yu kangisi _ u g p e q i n a n i i s q e l l u s i _ , _ enkaam _ qepghagh llegh ut _ teme isug nighsi ma na yu kan _ .
iwernga _ T i m o t h y - m _ uteghnigh luni _ ungipaate ainkung _ quyanagh lghii meng _ ungipagh meng _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesineng llu _ piniqe llegh gpesineng llu _ . _ ungipaate aqe ainkung llu _ iiwleng _ neqamike aqe ni lutung _ pinitun _ , _ esghagh yug aqe ni lutung llu _ katam _ whangkutung _ e s g h a g h y u l l e m t e s t e g e t u n _ elpek si _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ seghleliigh ghllag ma luta _ , _ ikfiqe ghllag ma luta _ ilutughte ukut _ qayughllak _ nagnegh te u kesi _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ .
whaa _ aneghte aghagh ukut _ qayughllak _ a g h u l i i l k a a l g h i i s i _ atanegh kun _ .
enkaam _ i y a m s i q a y u g v i k n g w a a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ elpesi neng _ . _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ quya ghllagu ukut _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mta _ .
T a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ y u g h a a t k e n g n g w a a m s i _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ alla _ esghagh yaghqaa lusi _ , _ ila yaghqaa luki _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ a k l u k e g k i i t _ .
kiyaghnegh mta _ , _ ata m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ J e s u s - e m _ qantaghaqun _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghqaaghte ste likut _ !
A t a n g h e m _ , _ p i n i q s a l i i t u t e s t a g h a g h l i s i _ . _ piniqe llegh i llu _ tevugha ste ligu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ katam _ whangkuta _ piniqe lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
tawaten _ ayepsugighsagh lleqe ai _ ilu si _ a v u t n g i t e s q e l l u s i l l u _ p e l u n g i t e s q e l l u s i l l u _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mta _ ata m _ , _ atanegh mta _ J e s u s - e m _ tagi llegh ani _ . _ tawani _ kelqe lleqe ai _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ ellmi _ yug ni _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ alaghrang _ whaten _ pi naqe amsi _ , _ l i i t i v i k e g k a q a g h p e k u t _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ efqugh nagh lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ esgha _ tawaten _ kiyaghte lghiisi _ . _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ kayeme amsi _ wataqaaghaq _ tawaten _ p i s q e l l u s i _ .
liisima kasi _ sa u aat _ qelegh tke aput _ elpesi nun _ p i s q e l l u k i _ atanegh kun _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
whatete uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ elpesi nun _ : _ pelungite sug aisi _ seghleghqe ste sug nghite aisi _ atuqe te llegh kun _ .
liite sug aisi llu _ t a m a g h a g h p e s i _ n u q e t u t e s q e l l u k i _ yugusigh si _ pinigh llegh mun _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lleqe usi _ pelungite lusi _ , _ efqugh nagh lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ .
ilapga te gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ atuqe i yu llegh anun _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ p i l l g h i s t u n _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ sakusiiqe fqaan _ pi ligu _ u g p e q a a l g u t m i _ inglu a _ atuqe i llegh mun _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ aghyuugh ghllag lleqe ai _ tawaten _ pikayug t _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ kelenga sagh u ghllag kaqe amsi _ tamaaken _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u t a _ pelungite luta _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e l l n g u n a a m t a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ qaatke nghite kanga _ nakaan _ yuug _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ t u u n i s t e z i _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ lata nghite yagh ghngaaghmisi _ ayuqe aisi _ ungipaate na lusi _ p i n i q e s q e l l u k i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh kaqe aisi _ p i n i q u t e s q e l l u s i _ .
ipa u uq _ piniqe asi _ qamagte luki _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ M a c e d o n i a - m i _ . _ iwernga _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ qelegh amsi _ p i n i q u t a g h i i s q e l l u s i _ .
P i n a q e l l g h a g h s i _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghte tek _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ , _ elpek si _ sa yaghqagh si _ pi aqe teki _ , _ avelghagh luki _ ila gpesi _ sa yaghqagh it _ . _ qepghagh tek _ allgegh te yaghqaa lusi _ a k l u k e g k a g h p e s i n e n g _ katam _ whangkuta _ qelegh lleg mtestun _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ neghyuke naanghite asi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ a k l u k e g k a g h p e s i n u n _ , _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t llu _ sii vag kete lleqe aisi _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ liisimake sug amsi _ ugpeqagh neng _ qavagh lghii neng _ qivghuke fqiita _ p i s q e l l u k i _ s i g h i m a l l g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ .
ugpeqagh ut _ Jesus _ tuqu luni _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi lleqe ai _ J e s u s - k u n _ tamaakut _ qavagh ke aat _ ugpeqe i luteng _ ellnga neng _ .
U n g i p a a t n g w a a g h a m s i _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghtugh tekagh aneng _ . _ atanegh _ tagi kan _ , _ whangkuta _ paninang _ unguva lghii ni _ i n g y a g h a g h n a a n g h i t a p u t _ tamaakut _ qavagh ke aat _ .
atanegh _ ellnga _ katam _ qilag meng _ ukig lleqe uq _ , _ yug t _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ iglagtuqagh _ qelegh llegh _ , _ me a _ a r c h a n g e l - e m _ , _ qalghightaute anga llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i luteng _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ unguvagh yuggaagh lleqe ut _ .
taagken _ whangkuta _ unguva lghii ni _ unegtekagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te ste luta _ , _ ellngit nun _ , _ ghhatagh aghtagh te ste lleqe ainkut _ q i l a g w a a g h n u n _ payegh sqellug qu _ atanegh _ esla mi _ . _ enkaam _ atanegh mete lleqe ukut _ quunperugllag _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilutughsagh sigh ke aqe teki _ taakut _ akuzite t _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ elpesi nun _ lata te kete niite ut _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
qayughllak _ elpek si _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a g h s i _ aghnegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ waakenghillghaghte te luni _ tagi llegh atun _ t e g l e g n i i g h t e m _ u n u g m i _ .
yug t _ whaten _ pi ma luki _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut llu _ paqniite ukut llu _ , _ " _ naafqe llegh m _ kaate qagh lleqe ai _ katam _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu llegh an _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ . _ yug t _ anag naanghite aat _ taana _ naafqe llegh _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ mamleg ghllag mete nghite usi _ enkaam _ aghnegh an _ aghnegh m _ waakenghillghaghte naanghite aisi _ t e g l e g h n i i g h t e t u n _ .
qamagte lusi _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ nighug m _ , _ avaqutagh ke aisi llu _ aghnegh m _ . _ U n u g e m _ pike nghite ainkut _ nalighmeng _ mamleg ghllag m _ .
enkaam _ qavaa fqaamta _ pi lta _ i l a n g i s t u n _ , _ itupill _ tegh u ma lta _ , _ liisima luta _ .
tamaakut _ qavagh lghiit _ qavagh aqe ut _ u n u g m i _ , _ tamaakut _ meghe lghiit _ suume aqe ut _ u n u g m i _ .
iwernga _ A t a n g h e m _ pi ke ainkut _ enkaam _ liisima luta _ kiyaghte lta _ . _ P a q n i i g h s a a s i l l e g h q a m n n u n _ sakimag mteggun _ aate lteggu _ sighima llegh _ yuguligh llegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke nghite a _ i k f i q e s q e l l u t a _ sakraa llegh meng _ , _ iwernga _ yuguligh lleg nge sug ainkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
J e s u s - e m _ tuquma tke kaqe ainkut _ e l l m i n i t e s q e l l u t a _ unguva yagh ghngaamta _ , _ tuqu kaayagh ghngaamta _ tagi kuni _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ kayemughtu te aqe tek llu _ kayute ke te aqe tek llu _ whaa _ maaten _ pi llegh gpesistun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ sii vag qite ki _ atanegh mun _ qepghagh lghiit _ akule gpesini _ . _ ellnga n _ nakmike kaqe ai _ igleghte te i ste u luki llu _ apeghtughiste u luki llu _ elpesi nun _ .
S i i v a k e g h l l a g a q i t e k i l l u _ piniqe aqe teki llu _ apallugh ke luki _ qepghagh llegh it _ . _ N e k e g g m e t u l l u s i _ pi tek _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ kelenga sagh ughte ki _ ighsanitagh lghiit _ , _ ilutughsagh teki _ aling tagh lghii t _ , _ kayusigh teki _ k a y a a l n g u u t _ , _ n e g k e g h l l u w a a n _ pi aqe teki _ qamagte luki _ .
wataghllak _ akite yaqunaki _ seghletun _ p i s t e s i _ iwernga _ pinitun _ pi aqe teki _ ila si _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ .
quya manginagh lusi _ ,
yughagh manginagh lusi _ ,
iyamsiqa yug lusi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ n e k e g n e g h m i _ . _ T a a k u n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh i _ elpesi nun _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ pi liite ke ii te nun _ .
qaamte gpenakek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ,
sasii nghite ni gpenaki _ uuknaliqe i llegh t _ .
iwernga _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nanghiiqu aqe teggu _ enkaam _ tugukligh aqe luki _ sa u aat _ pinigh lghiit _ ,
iqite nga tek _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghlegh meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i t i s t e m _ i i g h w i g h t e n g n g w a a g h l u s i _ p e l u n g i g h l l i s i _ . _ avute ite ste liki _ taghneghagh si _ , _ unguva sigh si _ , _ yugusigh si _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ tagi kan _ .
T a g s i q l i g h t e g p e s i _ pi lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmete uq _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ yughagh te kaqe luta _ .
quya kaqe teki _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ naagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ .
qelegh amsi _ A t a n g h e m _ p i l l e g h q a l i t e l l g h a k u n _ ukut _ lata t _ a t i g h t i i s q e l l u k i _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e s i n u n _ .
piniqe llegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ elpesi nite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ , _ silas- meng _ T i m o t h y - m e n g l l u _ pi u ut _ . _ ugpeqagh nun _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m e l n g u g h n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ pi itnun _ , _ A t a n g h e m l l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
nangllegtagh llegh llu _ nekeggmellegh llu _ elpesi nun _ pi u uk _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ atanegh meng llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ iiwleng _ iyamsiqa yagute yaghqaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ elqughute nga uq _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh ut _ , _ qayughllak _ u g p e q i n e g h t u g h t a g h a l g h i i s i l l u _ , _ p i n i q u t a g h a g h l u s i l l u _ lliigh usi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ q a n a t k a q a m s i _ ila itnun _ ugpeqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u g h a g h v i g i t n i l n g u g h n u n _ . _ A a p g h a q a g h p u t _ n u q e t u t i n e g h t u l l e g h s i l l u _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ qaywa _ a m y u u t k e l l e n g e g h n g a a g h p e s i _ , _ i k f i q e l l e n g e g h n g a a g h p e s i l l u _ .
tamaakut _ i p a p i g h q a a t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh a _ elqughutngagh lghii u uq _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh aisi _ itagnagh ni lusi _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u s i _ ataneghpag u llegh mini _ qayughllak _ i k f i q u t k e n g n g u k e s i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe a _ sa u a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ : _ ikfiqesaghqagh ke ai _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe ste i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ ikfiqe lghii ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali ste naagh aisi _ ikfiqe llegh meng _ whangkuta llu _ maligte te luta _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ aliightekumiki _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ iknaqe ghllag lghiit llu _ yaquleg i _ . _ qilag meng _ ukig lleqe ut _ kenegh mete luteng _ kumaghugh nga lghii mi _ .
taagken _ J e s u s - e m _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ qaatke te igate ngugh t llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ J e s u s - m e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
aghyuugh naqngu ai llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ naafqe llegh meng _ , _ iqite ste naqngu ut llu _ atanegh meng _ , _ nighug aneng llu _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n _ .
tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ atanegh _ Jesus _ tagi kan _ . _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ ugpeqe ikagh t _ ellnga neng _ usuqe lleqe aat _ , _ saghiigha yagute lleqe aat llu _ . _ elpek si _ a k u l n g i t n i l l e q u s i _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ ungipagh _ apeghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ whaten _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh lisi _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u n i l u s i _ ellmi _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh mitun _ . _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n l l u _ naamigte ligu _ qamagte luku _ piyuke llegh i _ pinigh llegh mun _ , _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ .
enkaam _ ategh a _ atanegh mta _ J e s u s - e m _ q u u l v a l l e n g e l l e q u q _ elpesigun _ , _ elpek si llu _ ellnga kun _ q u u l v a l l e n g e l l e q u s i _ nafughtagh llegh akun llu _ nangllegtagh llegh akun llu _ kiyaghnegh mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ ungipaate yug amsi _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ qerngughte te lleghqagh mnneng llu _ ellnga nun _ .
umyugagh si _ q a p r a g a g h t e s u n g h i t n g w a a g h a p u t _ nalighmeng _ kakave sug nghite aput _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ aghnegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ entaqun _ kitum _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ ungipagh kegka qaa _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ lata tke ma ni luku _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ pika qaa _ .
iwernga _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ! _ taana _ aghnegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ kaate naanghite uq _ kenlanga _ yug t _ m a l i g h q u t a q s u g n a n i l g h i t n u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh anun _ , _ kaate llegh anun llu _ seghlegh pestaagh m _ yug m _ . _ ( _ ellnga _ naafqesaghqagh u uq _ hell- mi _ . _ )
T a a m _ yug m _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h l l e q i i _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ nalighmeng _ manigugh yaghqagh t _ , _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ ellmi neng _ q u l i g h p i g a a g h s a g h q a a g u q _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ itegh luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ T e m p l e - n g a n u n _ aqume luni _ kiyaghnegh u ni lleqe uq _ .
N e q a m i k e n g h i s t e g g u u _ salin _ elpesi nite lunga _ ungipaate kaqe kemsi _ tamaaken _ ?
liisimakagh i _ kitum _ maaten _ nuqnegh kaqe a _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ . _ wetku _ aghnegh ni _ kaate kan _ tagi lleqe uq _ .
aawallu _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ qepghagh u aghte ma uq _ nuna mi _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ kitum _ kimaawi sta qaa _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ kimaawi ste i ste nga _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite ste llegh anun _ .
taagken _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ a l i i g h t e s l l e q u q _ , _ iwernga _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ tagi kuni _ tuqu lleqe a _ aneghnegh aneng _ qanegh mi _ , _ naafqe lleqe a llu _ nighug ghllag akun _ tagi llegh mi _ .
S i v u t g h u l l u k u _ A t a n g h e m _ J e s u s - e m _ tagi lleghqagh a _ , _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ tagi lleqe uq _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i g h l u n i _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ taana _ yuug _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i s i g h w a a g h l l e q u q _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ saghiigha nagh lghii neng _ .
atuqe lleqe ai llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ puughhe na luki _ tuqu yaghqagh t _ . _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe yu nghite kangat _ i p a l l e q _ y u g u l i s i g h q a q s a q e s e n g _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ p u u g h n e q g u u t e s l e q i i _ u g p e q e s q e l l u k i _ sa u aat _ ipa u nghite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ugpeqe i nghite ngugh t _ i p a p i l l e g h m e n g _ nanqigte yaghqaa ut _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ qayughllak _ p i n i g h y u u g u s i q e g k a n g a t _ s e g h l l e g h q e l l e q _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ iiwleng _ iyamsiqa yagute yaghqaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ elpek si _ piniqe ke ii te ni _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ I y a m s i q a y u g v i k a q a g h p u t l u _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ y u g u l i s q e l l u s i _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ . _ Y u g u l i k a a g u s i _ pelungighsagh llegh akun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ , _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun llu _ i p a p i l l e q _ .
tawaten _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aisi _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ ungipagh kekagh megteggun _ ; _ tagi sqe aqe aisi _ pi liite sqellug qu _ nengighqagh i _ pinighnagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
enkaam _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ aghula i te kestagh tek _ , _ ugpeqe kestagh teggu _ i p a p i l l e q _ apeghtugh tekagh ut _ elpesi nun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mteggun llu _ lata lleg mteggun llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ p i n i q i s t e m t a _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ ilutu llegh meng _ , _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ ellnga n _ katam _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ ata mta _ , _ e l k e g k e n k a
ilutughsagh lisi llu _ , _ i k n a q u g h s a g h l i s i l l u _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ pinigh lghii kun _ qepghagh llegh gpesigun llu _ akuzillegh gpesigun llu _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ taaqe niite te kun _ sa meng _ pi iigh aatagh qagh lamsi _ . _ yughagh tke tekut _ A t a n g h e m _ ungipagh a _ mingite ragkiigh sqellug qu _ , _ yug nun llu _ q u u l v i i s q e l l u k u _ , _ katam _ elpek si _ pi llegh gpesistun _ .
yughagh tke tekut llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ y u g u l i s q e l l u t a _ seghlegh neng _ yug neng _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu nghite uq _ .
iwernga _ atanegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ ; _ i k n a k q u g h s a g h l l e q i i s i l l u _ p a q n i i g h s a g h l l e q i i s i l l u _ tughneghagh meng _ .
A t a n g h e m _ n a l l u n e q n i i g h u m a a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ qaatke te u usi _ qelegh lleg mnnun _ , _ q a a t k u m a n g i n a g h l l e q a g h s i l l u _ .
A t a n g h e m _ l i i g i k e s l i s i _ wataqaaghaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ , _ C h r i s t - a m l l u _ n u q e t u t i n e g h t u l l g h a n e n g _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ qelegh amsi _ i q i t n g a s q e l l u s i _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e s i n e n g _ ighsanitagh lghii neng llu _ malighqutagh ke igate ngugh neng llu _ apeghtugh tekagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ .
elpek si _ katam _ liisimakagh i _ a y u q e s i g h a g h y a g h q a q s a g h a g h p e k u t _ ; _ elpesi nite luta _ ighsanitagh iqe mangite ukut _ .
tugukligh igate aput _ neqe t _ kinku neng _ alngunak _ t u k f i l l n g u n a k i _ . _ iwernga _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ , _ ughleghiigh kau ukut _ u q i g t u q u t n g u y u n g h i t u t e m n n e n g _ naligh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ .
elpesi nun _ a a p s a q l e g u y a g h t u k u t _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u t a _ , _ yeghlegi _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ aflengake na luta _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ usputagh u na luta _ elpesi nun _ a y u q e s i g h i i s q e l l u t a _ .
talwa _ elpesi nite luta _ whaten _ qelqe aqe kemsi _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ qepghagh yug nghite ngughk _ neghe ste gpenaan _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi kau ukut _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh aqe ukut _ ila si nguq _ ighsanitagh ut _ , _ qepghagh yug igate ut _ , _ yeghlegi _ yanutqu aqe ai nguq _ yug t _ .
ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ qelegh aput llu _ kayeme aput llu _ t a w a t e l n g u u t _ yug t _ ighsanitagh iqe fqiita _ a l l g h e g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ k i y a g h u s i g h q i i t n e n g _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n n i _ , _ qinuyagute gpenasi _ pinitun _ pi nghmeng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te yu nghite kan _ sa meng _ pilleg mnnun _ u k u t g u n _ lata mteggun _ , _ s u u m q e n n a k e s i _ kinku u ta i _ . _ enkaam _ iqite nga lghaasi _ ellnga neng _ kayngu yug sqellug qu _ anaggute llegh aneng _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghute gpenaan _ anguyag u luku _ , _ itupill _ kelenga sagh ughte ggu _ ugpeqagh u lgute kete luku _ .
A t a n g h e m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i t i k a y u g e m _ , _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i s i l l i _ iiwleng _ sa mi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ atanegh _ t a m a g h h a a g h p e s i n i l l i _ .
whanga _ , _ P a u l _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ igaqe aqa _ piniqe i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ igagh aqe unga _ qamagte luki _ lata mkun _ elpesi nun _ l i i s i m a k e s q e l l u k i _ whanga mneng _ pi u ta i _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ a p o s t l e - n g a n e n g _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ A p o s t l e - n g u g h t e k a a g u n g a _ qelegh llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a _ , _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m l l u _ sighimakekagh mta _ .
T i m o t h y - m u n _ ; _ ighnegh pig ke amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mtegnegun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m l l u _ atanegh mta _ q u y a s l i t e n _ , _ n a n g l l e k l i t e n _ , _ n e k e g g m e l l e l g u s l i t e n l l u _ .
aghulaqe naqe ma lunga _ M a c e d o n i a - m u n _ ephesus- mete sqe kaqe amken _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ t a m a a n l e n g u u t _ apeghtugh i u ut _ ipa u nghite ngugh meng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ . _ qelegh ki _ t a a q e s q e l l u k i
s a n g i l l g h a a t k e g p e n a k i n g u q _ a k u z i m g h h u t k e l l u k i _ ungipaghaate ngllaghkagh t _ , _ sivunegh lghute ghllag t llu _ ategh it _ . _ tamaakut _ aaghtiiraagh sigh ghhagh inagh u ut _ , _ kayute u nghite ut _ qepghaqagh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ellnga n _ qepghaqagh a _ apeghiigh aqe uq _ u g p e q i l l g h i i n a g h h a g h q u n _ .
Q e l e l u u g u t k a q a _ ugpeqagh t _ p i n i q u t e p i i g e s q e l l u k i _ , _ umyugagh kegte luki _ , _ ipa pig meng _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu luki _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ pegtekaqe ait _ tamaakut _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh aqe ut _ t e m n g i m e n g _ .
apeghtughiste u yug aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ iwernga _ liigike igate ait _ akuzi tkekagh teng _ qaywa _ apeghtuusagh ke ghngaaghmegteki _ ipate yu gnite luki _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ pinigh ut _ elqughte luki _ atuqe lghii ni _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ ulimaagh u nghite ut _ pinigh lghii nun _ yug nun _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ liilightuusagh neng _ naafqii kayug nun _ , _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh yug igate ngugh nun _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n u n l l u _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ w a a k i g a l n g u g h n u n _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ legasiighwagh tke i lghii nun llu _ agleghnagh lghii nun _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ tuqute i kayug nun _ ata meggneng _ nalighmeng _ naa meggneng _ , _ y u g t a g h t e n u n l l u _ .
ulimaagh u ut _ s e x - k u n _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n u n _ , _ yug nun _ yug lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug nun _ , _ yug nun _ akike i kayug nun _ yug meng _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u l u k i _ , _ i q l e n g i q e s t e n u n _ , _ iqlengagh lghii nun _ l i i s i m a k i s t e n u n _ , _ k i p u l l g i n a a l g h i i n u n l l u _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a l g h i i n u n _ .
taakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ pi niigh pigte lghii neng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ pi u ut _ . _ apegh u aat _ usuqnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ a a p g h e s q e l l u k i _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ Christ _ Jesus _ atanegh ut _ , _ i k n a q u g h s a q a q a a n g a _ qepghaqagh mnun _ . _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ esghagh kaqe aanga _ ataasiighmete lunga _ nakmike lunga _ q e p g h a a t e s q e l l u n i _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke kaqe aqa _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ pi kaqe aqa _ . _ amyuqetagh te kaqe yamki _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i _ tawatete uq _ a m y u q e t a a t k e n g n g u f t a q a _ ellnga _ . _ T a w a l l i i m a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke kaqe kanganga _ qayughllak _ salin _ ugpeqe igate kegka _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ liigike ma ite kegka _ sa aqe tke a _ .
iwernga _ atanegh mta _ nanglleg ke ghllag kaqe aanga _ ! _ U g p e q i l l e l i t k a q a a n g a _ , _ p i n i q e l l e l i t k a q a a n g a l l u _ Christ _ J e s u s - m e l n g u g h m e n g _ .
sa meng _ pi lleghqagh ka _ ipa u uq _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ ugpeqe yaghqaa uq _ , _ " _ Christ _ Jesus _ tagi kau uq _ nuna mun _ y u g u l i n a l u k i _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ . _ " _ whanga _ s e g h l e l l e g h p i g a a g u n g a _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n e n g _ .
naqamllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kaqe aanga _ . _ enkaam _ usputagh u unga _ naten _ t a g k a a n _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ utaqa i lleghqagh aneng _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n e n g _ u g p e q e s q e l l u n i _ . _ taana _ uspute aq _ t a m a a k u n u n _ ayuqe uq _ ugpeqe i yaghqagh nun _ ellnga neng _ u n g u v a l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
umiileg mun _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ , _ t u q u p a g n i n g i l n g u g h m u n _ , _ aliite nghite ngugh mun _ , _ e l l n g i n a a _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ ; _ ellnga _ q u u l v a l l e n g l i l l u _ usuqe lleg nge li llu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
T i m o t h y - m i _ ighnegh mni _ , _ qavngaq _ ila ita _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ akuzi tke kaqe aaten _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ qelegh amken _ akuzi ta it _ guutute ke ki _ p i l l u w a m u n _ . _ tawaten _ pinitun _ p i l l u w a g h l l e q u t e n _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ .
ugpeqe i kestagh a _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ atuqe luku _ liisimake gkan _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ atuqe igate ait _ liisimakekagh teng _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ enkaam _ naafqe aqe ait _ ugpeqe i lleg teng _ katam _ angyaghpag igh te lghii stun _ .
H y m e n a e u s - e n k u k _ A l e x a n d e r - e n k u k _ tamaakut _ akule itnite uk _ . _ tuune kaqe agka _ tughneghagh- mun _ liite sqellug kek _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke fqaan _ kiyaghnegh _ pi sqellug qu _ .
sivuke luku _ kayeme amken _ y u g h a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ , _ t u n g s i i t e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a k l u k e g k i i t n e n g _ , _ iyamsiqa yagute naketen llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
yughagh tke ki _ umiileg t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ igleghte te i lghiit _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa luta _ n e k e g g m e l l u t a _ maniguute ma luta _ , _ q u u l v a a m a l u k u l l u _ kiyaghnegh _ .
T a w a t e l n g u q _ yughagh llegh _ pinigh uq _ , _ efqugh nagh uq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m n n i _ ,
qayughllak _ qamagte luku _ yuug _ yuguligh lleg nge sug aa _ , _ liite sug aa llu _ i p a p i l l e q _ .
taawa _ ataasigh inagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ataasigh inagh u uq llu _ ilaliigh te i sta _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ yuug _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
ellmi neng _ tuune kau uq _ aghqe te u luni _ iteme te na luki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ p i l l e g h q a g h l l u w a a q _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute i llegh a _ yuguligh lleg nge sug ni luki _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i ste u lunga _ , _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u n g a _ . _ kayagte aanga _ a p e g h t i i s q e l l u k i _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqe i llegh meng llu _ i p a p i l l e g h m e n g l l u _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ !
tea- ma ghhagh ani _ yughaghvig ni _ yugu i na ut _ yughigh sqe sug anka _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u l i t _ k i y a g h l l e g h h i t _ qaatke te luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ . _ yughagh lit _ nengug te luki _ iigge teng _ s a k r a a l l n g u n a t e n g l l u _ a a g h t i i r a a l l n g u n a t e n g l l u _ .
piyuke anka llu _ aghnagh t _ pinighnagh llegh it _ k e l g u t e s q e l l u k i _ pinitun _ pilugug llegh itgun _ . _ aatkagh it _ malleg nga fqiita _ nalighmeng _ kayngu nagh yaghqaa fqiita _ . _ itupill _ pinighnagh lleg teng _ kelgute litki _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh megteggun _ , _ nakaan _ n u y a q e g s a g h w a a l l e g h q u n _ nalighmeng _ g o l d - m e n g l l u _ p e a r l - m e n g l l u _ u l l n g a q l u t e n g _ nalighmeng _ akituqagh meng _ aatkagh meng _ aate luteng _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh _ elqughute nga uq _ aghnagh nun _ maniguute kayugu ni lghii nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
yug t _ apeghtugh i nghata _ yughaghvig ni _ aghnagh t _ nagate yaghqaa ut _ n e p i i g h n g a g h m e n g _ , _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ .
aghnagh t _ apeghtugh i ste sug igate anka _ nalighmeng _ igleghte te i ste u sug igate anka _ yug nun _ . _ nepiigh nga yaghqaa ut _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima yuggaagh kaqe a _ adam _ , _ taagken _ E v e _ .
A d a m - n g u n g h i t u q _ puughte lleg ngekagh _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh u uq _ puughte lleg ngekagh _ enkaam _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n g u g h t e k a a q u q _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh t _ ighnegh iightugh kumeng _ taghnughhagh neng _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ nagnegh ma kumeng _ neghyuke luku _ Jesus _ , _ piniqe i manginagh kumeng _ ila meggneng _ , _ kiyaghte manginagh kumeng llu _ agleghnagh luku _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e n g _ qusevegte lleg ligh luteng _ .
whaten _ pi llegh _ ipa u uq _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ igleghte te i ste u yu kuni _ ugpeqagh nun _ taana _ qepghaqagh _ piyukekagh a _ pi niigh pigte uq _ .
igleghte te i sta _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ , _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ , _ s u m e g h t a g h a q e g s a g h q a a g u q _ , _ y u p i i n g h u y a g h q a a g u q _ , _ u p u g h a n g h u y a g h q a a g u q _ , _ a p e g h t u g h i y a q l e g u u q l u _ .
suume ste u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ suugllug u yaghqaa nghite uq _ iwernga _ n a n g l l e g h t a g h y a g h q a a g u q _ , _ qanegh nge naqe igate yaghqaa uq _ , _ mani yuneghtu yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
I g l e g h u t i s t e m _ i g l e g h u t n g w a a g h y a g h q a q i i _ mangteghagh mii ni _ , _ avaqutagh ni llu _ apeghtugh yaghqaqe ai _ v e g h u s n a a t e f q a a m i _ q a a t k e s q e l l u n i _ .
igleghte te i sta _ igleghte te i llgite kuni _ ellmi _ katam _ nengllugute mineng _ , _ n a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ aflengake lleqe aki _ u g p e q i s t e n g i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ?
igleghte te i sta _ ugpegh nghhagh u nghite yaghqaa uq _ , _ luuraq _ q u k a a y u g t e p a g n a y u k a n _ enkaam _ nanqigte lleg nge lleqe uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ tughneghagh tun _ .
igleghte te i sta _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ akuzi tke sqellug qu _ itagnagh luku _ . _ enkaam _ s e g h l e q u u g h p a g n i n g i l l e q a a t _ , _ tughneghagh m llu _ kayaalqepagningite lleqe a _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ D e a c o n - e t l u _ pinigh luki _ akuzite kete yaghqaa ut _ , _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a y a g h q a a g u t _ , _ wine- meng _ meghepag yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ pakignegh u yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ mani meng _ .
pegte yaghqaqe nghite ait _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighqekagh i _ , _ umyugagh it llu _ seghleghyug i saghqagh u ut _ .
I g l e g h u t i s t e t _ nakmiigh vagilgameng _ d e a c o n - k a g h q a m e n g _ q e p g h a q a l i l l u k i _ liigike nakangit _ pinigh ta i _ yug t _ . _ taagken _ d e a c o n - n g u g h t e s n a k a n g i t _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ aghnagh t llu _ pinigh luki _ akuzite kete yaghqaa ut _ , _ yiillgi yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ iwernga _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa ut _ , _ ataasiighmete yaghqaa ut llu _ sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ .
D e a c o n - e t _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa ut _ , _ i g l e g h u t n g w a a g h y a g h q a q i i t _ avaqutagh teng llu _ mangteghagh mii teng llu _ .
tamaakut _ d e a c o n - e t _ q e p g h a q e g t a t _ q u u l v a l l e n g y a g h q a a g u t _ , _ n a l l u n e q s u k n a a n g h i t a a t l u _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
sunanguq _ qantaghaqun _ elpenun _ pi langa _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ elpenun _ lata tke anka _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
enkaam _ kimaawi ma kuma _ lata ma _ liisimake ste lleqe aaten _ naten _ ugpeqagh t _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a n i l n g u u t _ . _ E l l n g i n g u u t _ u g p e q i s t e n g i _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ aghveghaqetagh u ut _ , _ tunemagh u ut llu _ i p a p i l l e g h m u n _ .
N a l l u n e q n a g h h a n g u n a k i _ ugpeqe aput _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvightekagh i _ seghlegh ghllag u ut llu _ ipa pestaagh u ut llu _ : _ C h r i s t - a _ allgegh kau uq _ yugusigh pigu luni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ liisimake ste ai _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi ke ai _ elqughute nga ta i _ , _ yaquleg t llu _ esghagh kaqe aat _ . _ ungipagh ke kau uq _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ , _ ugpeqe kaqe aat _ nunatagh ghhagh ni _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ , _ taagken _ qilag mun _ m a y u u t k a g u q _ .
agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ pi uk _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ ila ita _ yug t _ pegte lleqe aat _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke lleqe kangit _ iqlengagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ , _ apeghtuusagh it llu _ .
T a w a t e l n g u u t _ apeghtuusagh t _ iqlengagh lghii neng _ pi u ut _ . _ iqlengiqe lleg teng _ apegh aqe ait _ i p a p i g s u g n i g h q e l l u k i _ . _ nagate nanigh kaqe ait _ umyugagh teng _ liisimake i lghiit _ elqughutngagh llegh meng llu _ anaggute nga llegh meng llu _ .
T a w a t e l n g u u t _ yug t _ nengughte te snanigh i aqe ut _ , _ ila i llu _ neqe m _ neghe snanigh aqe ait _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe ai _ qamagte luki _ neqe t _ negh yaghqaa luki _ iyamsiqa yagute aqe luki _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ liisimake i lghiit _ i p a p i l l e g h m e n g _ liisimake ait _ tamaakut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh i _ qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghii u ut _ . _ enkaam _ ighsake yaghqaa nghite ut _ tugukligh ma kumeng _ iyamsiqa yagute luki _ .
akuzi ta akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ y u g h a k u n l l u _ aaftekau ut _ agleghnagh luki _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ l i i g i k e s t e n g n g w a a q u f k i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e n u n _ , _ pinigh lghii u lleqe uten _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh n _ i k n a q u g h l l e q a a _ liisima inagh kufki _ i p a p i l l g h e t _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqe aqe kangit _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ apeghtuusagh t _ qaatkekagh ten _ .
nagate gpenaki _ sasii nghite ngugh t _ ungipaghaate t _ t e n g v i m u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ i p a p i l l g h a n u n _ . _ yeghlegi _ peghqigsagh tke gu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe lghii _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ .
yugusigh m _ ulape llegh a _ pinigh uq _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ pinigh aghagh uq _ . _ kayusiite yaghqaqe ainkut _ whani _ unguvallegh mnni _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh ani llu _ unguvallegh m _ .
taana _ pi llegh _ ipa u uq _ , _ enkaam _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ ugpeqe yaghqaa uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qepghagh ghllagu ukut llu _ s a g i q l i i g h t e n g n g u u k u t l u _ yug nun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ i p a p i l l e q _ . _ tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ neghyukagh ut _ unguva lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e n g a t _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakut _ ugpegh lghiit _ ellnga kun _ .
qelegh ki _ apeghtugh ki _ tamaaken _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ palaqe ste gpenaan _ anglinghhagh u ma llegh n _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh nun _ u s p u t a a w i _ akuzillegh gpegun _ , _ sa llegh gpegun _ , _ piniqe llegh gpegun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ , _ pelungite luten _ kiyaghte llegh gpegun _ .
kaate lleg mnun _ kenlanga _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te nghata _ atigh uute aqe ki _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ , _ ungipagh qite aqe ki _ , _ apeghtugh aqe ki _ .
atuqe aqe gu _ t a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ tunusagh _ ilu gpenite ngughk _ . _ taana _ tunusagh _ tuune kau uq _ elpenun _ uuknaliqe llegh kun _ E l d e r - e t _ i i g t i g h a q n g a t e n _ .
pi naqe llegh n _ qamagte luku _ pi aqe ki _ qelegh tke anka _ . _ tawaten _ yug t _ liite lleqe aat _ p i l l g u u g h l l e g h h i i t e n _ .
P i r a a m s i n g w a a g h l u t e n _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h p e n i l l u _ apeghtugh i llegh gpeni llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ e l p e n e n g _ y u g u l i l l e q u t e n _ , _ tamaakut llu _ n a g a t e s t e t e n _ .
aghyuugh gpenaan _ siivanllegh _ yuug _ , _ iwernga _ k a v y u n g u n a a n _ nallghusagh aqe gu _ ata ke lghii stun _ . _ uyuqligh t _ yug t _ anglegute ke lghii stun _ pi aqe ki _ .
siivanllegh t _ aghnagh t _ naa ke lghii stun _ pi aqe ki _ , _ enkaam _ uyuqligh t _ aghnagh t _ nayag stun _ pi aqe ki _ , _ qiliigh yuke fqiita _ .
kayusiite ki _ ugingighagh t _ aflengake i ste nga i tke aat _ .
iwernga _ ugi igh aq _ avaqutaghtu kuni _ nalighmeng _ eltughaghtu kuni _ , _ kelgute lit _ nengllugute meggnun _ kiyaghte yug ni luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe llegh atun _ . _ aflengake llegh megteggun _ angayuqagh teng _ aki naqe lleqe ait _ enkaam _ e f q u g h l l e q a a t _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugi igh aq _ ilakwaagh igh tke aq _ sighima u uq _ kiyaghnegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yughagh manginagh u uq _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u n i _ .
iwernga _ ugi igh aq _ t e g h i g n i q n g i n a q u m i _ ellmi neng _ e f q u g h h n a l u n i _ , _ unguva ghngaaghmi _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ .
qelegh ki _ ugpeqagh t _ tamaakut _ p i s q e l l u k i _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ s e g h l e q u u n g h i l l i t k i _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aflengake nghite kumiki _ ilakwaagh ni _ , _ wata _ ellmi _ katam _ nengllugute ni _ , _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ pegtekaqe a _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ . _ enkaam _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a l l e q u q _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ .
ugi igh aq _ 6 0 _ uksughtutkaligh ma kan _ , _ nengughtekau kan llu _ ataasigh meng _ , _ ategh a _ igaqe yagh ghngaaghmi _ ayuqe uq _ ugingighagh t _ ategh lghutagh itgun _ .
amalleqa _ tea- ma yan _ liisimake aat _ qepghagh llegtu langa _ , _ katam _ avaqutagh ni _ pinitun _ angli ste llegh atun _ , _ upugha neghtu langa _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t m i _ itegagh it _ ughvugh aqe luki _ , _ kayusigh i aqe luni _ seghleliigh lghii neng _ , _ quunpeng llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe lghii _ .
iwernga _ nuteghagh t _ ugingighagh t _ ategh it _ igaqe gpenaki _ ategh lghutagh tgun _ . _ yugusigh ita _ piyuke llegh an _ s a k n i q e s n e g h i s t e n g _ ugiigh yug lleqe ut _ . _ tawaten _ pi ma kumeng _ naafqe lleqe aat _ akeqe i llegh eng _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ qayughllak _ naafqe kangat _ akeqe i llegh eng _ .
T a a m _ saaghw akun _ ighsani te aghte aqe ai _ , _ itghagh u i te ughtaghkagh i _ , _ yiillgi te ughtaghkagh i _ , _ yanutqu neghtugh taqagh i _ , _ akuzite kaqe ait llu _ sa u aat _ akuzi tkesaghqagh ke nghite ke teng _ .
enkaam _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh ut _ nuteghagh t _ u g i n g h i g h a t _ ugiigh yagh kumeng _ , _ taghnughhagh nge luteng _ , _ a f l e n g a k e s q e l l u k i l l u _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g i t _ . _ tawaten _ pi kumeng _ anguyag _ s e g h l e q u u g h v i g i i t e s l e q a a t _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ .
aawallu _ ila i _ nuteghagh t _ ugingighagh t _ ugpeqagh u nanigh luteng _ maligte te ma ut _ tughneghagh- mun _ .
ugpeqe aq _ aghnagh _ ilakwaagh lgu kuni _ ugingighagh neng _ , _ ellnga n _ kayusiite yaghqaqe ai _ . _ enkaam _ ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ kayusiite nghite yagh ghngaaghmegteki _ ayuqe ait _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqagh t _ kayusiite lleqe ait _ u g i n g h i g h a t _ aflengake i ste nga i tke aat _ .
E l d e r - e t _ igleghte te i yuqagh t _ y u g a g h v i g m i _ , _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g l l u _ qepghagh lghiit _ apeghtugh i llegh kun _ , _ ungipagh ke i llegh kun llu _ , _ q u u l v a g h a q i t e k i _ m a l g h u g h q e l l u k i _ akileghtuusagh it _ .
qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ O x - a _ tutmagh lghii _ g r a i n - m e n g _ malliigh na luki _ , _ negh sqellug qu _ g r a i n - m e n g _ sugrugiitagh igh gpenaan _ . _ " _ amalleqa _ , _ " _ qepghagh a _ akileghtugh yaghqaa uq _ qepghagh llegh anun _ . _ "
nagate gpenaki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ avutke i lghiit _ E l d e r - m e n g _ anaggute ma ni luku _ , _ wetku qun _ avutke i lghii _ l i i s i m a k i s t e l g u k a n _ maalghug gneng _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu neng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh kan _ , _ aghyuugh naken _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i i s q e l l u k u _ ugpeqagh t _ manu itni _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvgu _ ila i _ tamaakut _ alinge lleqe ut _ .
tamaakut _ qelegh te anka _ elpenun _ q a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ , _ p a k i g g u t i f q a a v e k _ nalighmeng _ taniilqe i fqaavek _ p i s q e l l u t e n _ . _ tawaten _ qelegh amken _ e s g h a a m a n g h i t n i _ kiyaghnegh nkut _ , _ Christ _ J e s u s - e n k u t _ , _ nakmikegkagh t llu _ yaquleg t _ .
I i g t i g h a g h t e g p e n a a n _ kina _ igleghte te i stekaghqagh u luku _ yughaghvig mi _ . _ taayughqe gkuvek _ i l a l k i i n n a y u k a v e k _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ . _ kiyaghte kestagh a _ pelungite luten _ .
meghhagh inagh meng _ meghe gpenang _ , _ iwernga _ wine- ngiighhagh meng _ megh qaghaqe luten _ kayute ke lleqe an _ aqsaqugh gpenun _ , _ qinuyug aatagh llegh gpenun llu _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ a l i i t n g w a a g h a q u t _ , _ talwa _ salin _ nanqigte llghite luteng _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ aliighte yaghqaa ut _ kinguvaqwaaqun _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh at _ a l i i t n g w a a g h a q u t _ , _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ aliite nghite ngugh t _ iigh nga naanghite ut _ .
qamagte luteng _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ s i i v a k e g h l l a g l i t k i _ tamaakut _ p i l i i t i s t e t e n g _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke nghite likek _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apeghtugh i llegh ut llu _ .
Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ p i l i i t i s t e n g i t _ ugpeqagh u lgute u kata _ sii vag kataghagh litki _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke kangit _ . _ enkaam _ q e p g h a a t a g h a g h l i t k i _ qayughllak _ kayusigh u ngugh it _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t e n g _ piniqekagh teng _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh ke ki llu _ ungipagh ke ki llu _ .
kina _ alngunak _ apeghtugh i kuni _ alla u luku _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ apeghtuusagh neng _ , _ i t a g n a q e n g h i t i i _ apeghtuusagh pig i _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ ellnga n _ apeghtuusagh an _ ungipaate ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ alla tun _ apeghtugh i lghii _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h l l a g u u q _ , _ liigike igate uq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ aaghtiiraagh yuneghtu uq llu _ qani iqe yuneghtu uq llu _ akuzite neng _ . _ tawaten _ p i l l g h e m _ allgegh taqagh i _ : _ aqina llegh _ , _ aghiva te llegh _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h u t e l l e q _ , _ ugpeqe te nanigh llegh _ .
T a w a t e l n g u u t _ quunpeng _ aaghtiiraagh te ta iqe ut _ . _ umyugagh it _ s u m e g h n e g h l l u u g t a q u t _ enkaam _ liisimake nanigh aqe aat _ i p a p i l l e q _ . _ sumegh meggni _ qepghagh u uute kumegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ aklungi igh i lleqe ni luteng _ pi aqe ut _ .
iwernga _ allgegh te ghllag lleqe ukut _ kiyaghtekumta _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ i t a g n a q l u k u _ p i t u t a l v u t _ .
allgegh aqngamta _ nuna mun _ kelqe te ite ukut _ , _ tuqu kumta llu _ kelqe te lgu naanghite ukut _ .
enkaam _ itagnagh lleqe ukut _ neqe lgu kumta _ , _ aatkagh lgu kumta _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ aklungi igh i yu lghiit _ nanghiiqu lleg nge aqe ut _ . _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llghite a _ t u g w a a q i i _ enkaam _ t e m n g i t w h a g h l l a g u g h t a q u t _ . _ taagken _ piyuke llghite a _ sayug aqe ai _ naafqe llegh mun _ .
mani meng _ piniqe i llegh _ akuqagh a _ qamagte luni _ seghlegh m _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ pegte aqe aat _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ qayughllak _ manitughqagh u ghllag yug lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ q i v g h u g h l l a g u g h t a q u t _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke aaten _ , _ enkaam _ iqite nga luten _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ . _ sagiqe te ki _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ kiyaghten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe llegh atun _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg ligh luten _ , _ piniqe i lleg ligh luten _ , _ nuqete neghtu luten _ , _ nangllegtagh luten _ .

qelegh naqe amken _ nagate ma nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i k a m _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ unguva lghii nun _ , _ nagate ma nghaani llu _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ k i i m s i g h i l a a t a q u g h i k a m _ P o n t i u s _ pilate- mun _ .
qelegh amken _ piraamsi luten _ q a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ qamagte luki _ q e l g u t k a n k a _ elpenun _ . _ nagnegh te ki _ kenlanga _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ u t e g h n i n q i g l l e g h a n u n _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ kitum _ alngunak _ a n a g g u n i l u t e n _ pi naanghite aaten _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ p i l l e g h q a g h l l u w a a g h m i n i _ tagi ste lleqe a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ usuqnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ e l l n g i n a a g u q _ igleghte te i ste ghllag _ , _ ellnga u uq _ umiileg at _ umiileg t _ , _ A t a n g h a t _ a t a n g h e t _ .
ellngagh inagh u uq _ tuqu igate ngughk _ . _ K i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ n i g h u g r a k e g l l a g m i _ repall _ kitum _ alngunak _ t u g h a a g h p a g n i n g i t a a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ esghagh igate a _ , _ talwa _ esghagh naanghite a _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i k l i k e k _ q u u l v a l l e q l u _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q l u _ quunperugllag _ . _ amen _ .
qukaayug snanigh ki _ tamaakut _ a k l u n g i l n g u u t _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ talwa _ sighima snanigh ki _ aklungi itgun _ n a l l u n e q n a l g h i i t g u n _ . _ iwernga _ sighima sqe ki _ kiyaghnegh kun _ . _ ellnga n _ ighlegute gpenaamta _ tuune aqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ p i n i g h y u u g u s i g h q a m e n g _ .

tawaten _ pi kumeng _ kagpag lleqe aat _ aklungi _ ellmeggnun _ . _ taana _ aklungi _ a y u g i l n g u u g u q _ tunemagh _ aag nakaghqagh itnite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ unguvallegh nge lleqe ut _ unguvallegh pig meng _ .

ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ a p o s t l e - n g a n e n g _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ . _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ apegh sqellug qu _ akequsagh kekagh _ unguvallegh _ Christ _ J e s u s - m e l n g u q _ .

unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yughagh lleg mkun _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ e l p e n e n g _ . _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ s e g h l e g h y u l l n g u n a n g a _ , _ katam _ sivunegh mtun _ .
esghagh yug pigte aqe amken _ allameng _ , _ qayughllak _ neqamike aqa _ pellegh utu te aqngamtung _ qiya kau lghiiten _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllag lleqe unga _ q e r n g u g h u n n e q i g t e k u m t u n g _ .
neqamike aqa _ u g p e q i l l e p i i g e n _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ ataasigh _ ugpeqe i llegh _ nengyugh gpek _ L o i s - e m _ , _ naa gpek llu _ E u n i c e - e m _ atuqe ka ak _ . _ L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a q a _ elpek llu _ atuqe u an _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh ka ughte yug amken _ , _ atuqe manginagh ghhu _ tunute yan _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ tuune kaqe a _ i i g t i g h a q n g a m k e n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ t a g h n e g h a l i t e l l g h i t i i n k u t _ alingyug na lghii meng _ . _ itupill _ taghneghagh gkenka _ imigh kaqe ainkut _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m e n g _ , _ piniqe llegh meng _ , _ nuqete llegh meng llu _ .
kayngu ke gpenaan _ ungipagh ke gu _ atanegh ut _ , _ talwa _ kayngu yagute gpenanga _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ C h r i s t - a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ itupill _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ ikfiqe lgusigh nga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ y u g u l i k a q i i n k u t l u _ nakmike kaqe ainkut llu _ p e l u n g i t e s q e l l u t a _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ apallugh ke luki _ ellmi _ katam _ uspeqe lleg ni llu _ piniqe i lleg ni llu _ , _ nakaan _ qepghagh llegh ut _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ piniqe kaqe ainkut _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ s i v u t g h u l l u k u _ piinligh lleghqagh an _ nuna m _ .
iwernga _ whaa _ piniqe lleg ni _ liite sta _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ tagi llegh akun _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ C h r i s t - a m _ naafqe kaqe a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ taagken _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ liite ste ainkut _ tuqu igate ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i ste u lunga _ , _ a p o s t l e - n g u l u n g a _ , _ apeghtughiste u lunga llu _ .
taakut _ apallugh ke luki _ ikfiqe u unga _ . _ iwernga _ kayngu yug nghite unga _ qayughllak _ liisimake aqa _ kina u ta a _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ . _ L i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a q a _ ellnga n _ k e l e n g a k s a q l e g w a a _ sa u a _ neghyuke tke aqa _ ellnga nun _ kenlanga _ kinguligh mun _ aghnegh mun _ .
maligte ki _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ nagaqughkagh ten _ whanga mneng _ . _ usputagh u ut _ atughqagh ke aten _ . _ apeghtuusagh ke ki _ ugpeqe i llegh kun llu _ piniqe llegh kun llu _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a t e n _ Christ _ J e s u s - m e n g _ .
kelengake gu _ i p a p i l l e q _ neghyuke tke aq _ elpenun _ . _ kelengake gu _ kayute kellug kek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ .
liisima kan _ qamagte vzigh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ A s i a - m e l n g u u t _ kayusigh yug nanigh ma aatnga _ , _ talwa _ P h y g e l u s - e n k u k _ H e r m o g e n e s - e n k u k _ .
Y u g h a a t k e n g n g w a a n k a _ atanegh mun _ n a n g l l e g y a g u t e s q e l l u k i _ O n e s i p h o r u s - e m _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g i _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh ghngaan _ ilutughsagh aqe aanga _ . _ kayngu yagute mangite a llu _ anusimingllaghagh u ma llegh ka _ .
kaate aqngami _ R o m e - e m u n _ i v a n Ê¼ g h i i g h u t k a q a a n g a _ kenlanga _ naalke llegh minun _ .
atanegh mun _ yughagh te kaqe aqa _ Onesiphorus _ nanglleg yagute sqellug qu _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ ! _ liisima kan _ kayute ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ ephesus- mi _ .

elpek llu _ t a w a n t u t k a t l u _ nagate kaqe asi _ apeghtuusagh nka _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtuusagh nka _ neghyuke te ki _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u g h n u n _ . _ taagken _ ellngit a _ a p e g h t u u s a q l e g u l l e q i i t _ ila meggnun _ .
ikfiqe lgusigh kut _ pinigh lghii tun _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g a t u n _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e m _ ilate nga lghii m _ p i l l u w a g h t e n u n _ e f q u g h s u g a q a a _ umiileg ni _ , _ enkaam _ a k u m g h h u u s i g a t u q _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g u n g h i l n g u u t _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t n u n _ .
kayaalqeiiraagh a _ k i l g a a q u m u n _ malighqutagh ke nghite kuni _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ , _ allgegh te naanghite uq _ qaghpa aneng _ k a y a a l q i i s t e m _ .
ughleghiigh ghllagkagh _ piitesighagh a _ nengigh yuwhaagh yaghqaa uq _ unatagh kata _ .
sumeghtu aghagh tke ki _ sa meng _ p i l l g h e n k a _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ liigi ksagute ste lleqe aaten _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
neqamike luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ kingunegh ke a _ D a v i d - e m _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ a p e n e m k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
ikfiqe u unga _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke gkenka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ talwa _ q i i p r a g h u s i g h l u n g a _ ayuqe unga _ liilightuusagh meng _ naafqii stetu te _ . _ iwernga _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ qiipraghute ite ut _ .
enkaam _ ikfiqe sigh ke yug luku _ ayuqe aqa _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ y u g u l i l l e n g e s q e l l u k i _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ . _ yuguligh llegh megteggun _ n i g h u g h q e l l e n g e l l e q u t _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
maakut _ p i l l g h e t _ ipa u ut _ : _ tuqu lgusigh ma kumteggu _ , _ k i y a g h t e l g u s i g h l l e q a g h p u t _ .
iilqayug nghite kumta _ , _ i g l e g h u t i l g u s i g h l l e q a g h p u t _ . _ nallu negh ke gkumteggu _ , _ ellnga n llu _ nallu negh ke lleqe ainkut _ .
ataasiighmete nghite kumta _ , _ ellnga _ ataasiighmete aqe uq _ qayughllak _ taaqe naanghite uq _ ataasiighmete nghmeng _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ puygu ste gpenaki _ tamaakut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagate ma nghaani _ , _ k e l e n g a s a a g h q i _ qani qutu tke fqiita _ akuzite t _ p i s q e l l u k i _ . _ qani qu te llegh at _ kayute u naanghite uq _ , _ n a a f q e n g n g i n a g h l l e q a a t _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ nagate lghiit _ .
T a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ qepghagh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ i t a g n a q e s q e l l u t e n _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e n g u _ kayngu ke i igate ngughk _ qepghaqagh mineng _ . _ elqughaghte luku llu _ apeghtuusagh ke gu _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g i p a g h p i g a a _ .
iqite nga luten _ t e m n g i t w h a n e n g _ , _ sa meng _ pi sigh u nghite ngugh neng _ aleghquute llegh neng _ . _ T a w a t e l n g u u t _ aleghquute llegh t _ uyavagh u aatagh aghte lleqe ait _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
T a w a t e l n g u u t _ t e m n g i t w h a t _ apeghtuusagh t _ aqnighnegh stun _ ayuqe ut _ mingite kayug t _ maame yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ . _ H y m e n a e u s - e n k u k _ P h i l e t u s - e n k u k _ apeghtugh i llegh ik _ t a w a t e l n g u u g u t _ .
pegtekaqe aik _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ qayughllak _ pi aqe uk _ siingenllu _ tuqukagh t _ u n g u v a g h t e s i m a n i l u k i _ . _ enkaam _ ila itnun _ ugpeqe nanigh stekaqe ak _ i p a p i l l e q _ .
iwernga _ a y u g i l n g u q _ tunemagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekagh a _ q a p r a g t e p a g n i n g i t u q _ . _ taaggun _ tunemagh kun _ igaqe nga ut _ akuzite t _ : _ " _ A t a n g h e m _ liisimake ai _ ellmi _ pi ni _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ategh aneng _ A t a n e g h e m _ , _ seghletun _ pi nghmeng _ taaqe li _ . _ "
mangteghagh ghllag mi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ salghutaghtu uq _ : _ ila i _ ulimaagh u ut _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ qiku meng llu _ . _ ila i _ salghutagh t _ megnu nagh lghii nun _ atugh u ut _ , _ ila i _ sa mun _ a l n g u n g a k _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ katam _ pelungighsagh kuni _ seghlegh meng _ , _ salghutaghtu te _ atughqagh ughte lleqe uq _ megnu nagh lghii mun _ . _ aaftekau aghte lleqe uq _ atugh u luni _ mangteghagh m _ yug anun _ . _ taagken _ atughqagh ughte lleqe uq _ alngunak _ pinigh lghii mun _ qepghaqagh mun _ .
iqite nga luten _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ anglinghhagh t _ atuqe yug aqe ka itneng _ . _ quunpeng _ atuqe aqe gu _ elqughutngagh llegh _ . _ ataasiighmete luten _ , _ piniqe i nga luten _ , _ n e k e g g m e l l u t e n l l u _ . _ tamaakut _ atuqe ki _ , _ maligte te luten _ tuqlugh i lghii nun _ atanegh mun _ qamaken _ p e l u n g i l n g u g h m e n g _ ilu meggneng _ .
iqite nga luten _ t e m n g i t w h a n e n g _ aleghquute llegh itneng _ yug t _ akuzi tke i lghii neng _ liigike ma ite ke meggneng _ . _ liisima katen _ aaghtiiraagh te ste i kayugu ut _ .
A t a n g h e m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ a a g h t i i r a a g h t e n g u n g h i t u q _ . _ itupill _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma anun _ . _ pinigh lghii u yaghqaa uq _ apeghtugh i sta _ . _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ .
A t a n g h e m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ kavyugite yaghqaa uq _ apeghtugh i kuni _ k i p u l l g i n a a l g h i i n u n _ . _ walluumllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ avuteghqe ste aqe liki _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ i p a p i l l e q _ .
enkaam _ liite yaaghagh yagh kumeng _ anag nayagh aat _ tughneghagh m _ negagh aa _ . _ tughneghagh m _ naapte ma nghminiki _ aaghqutagh ke aqe ai _ .
liisimake sug amken _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ seghleliigh ghllagu yaghqaa uq _ .
yug t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ piniqe lleqe ut _ , _ mani yuneghtu lleqe ut _ , _ yamrratu lleqe ut _ , _ aangaayugte lleqe ut llu _ . _ S e g h l e q u u g h l l e q i i t _ ila teng _ , _ qaute kete naanghite ait _ angayuqagh teng _ , _ iyamsiqa yug naanghite ut _ , _ waaknanigh lleqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
piniqe i naanghite ut _ , _ seghevute i naanghite ut _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i lleqe ut _ , _ suugllug u lleqe ut _ , _ amyuqetagh iqe lleqe ut _ , _ ugumi ke lleqe aat llu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pinigh lghii _ .
uvegh ghpagte te lleqe ait _ ila teng _ , _ nangyagh u i aghte te lleqe ut _ , _ q u k a a y u g t e g h l l a g l l e q u t _ , _ teghigniqe llegh _ piniqe aghagh lleqe aat _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
qaye megteggun _ ugpeqagh u yug lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t a _ apegh lleqe aat _ a v a n g i t u l n g i _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g _ . _ iqite nga luten _ t a w a t e l n g u g h n e n g _ yug neng _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ ne nun _ itegh aatagh lleqe ut _ aaghqute aqe pigesnagh na luki _ n a l l e k a g h n i l n g u u t _ aghnagh t _ . _ tamaakut _ aghnagh t _ seghleghqe llghite a _ uqigtu qusigh ghllag lleqe ai _ , _ seghlegh m llu _ piyuke lleg lghute ita _ aaghqute aqe lleqe ai _ .
