tamaakut _ aghnagh t _ nagate lleqe ut _ apeghtugh i llegh anun _ kitum _ alngunak _ , _ taawanginaq _ liite naanghite aat _ i p a p i l l e q _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ ellngit nun _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h l l e q a a t _ i p a p i l l e q _ , _ katam _ J a n n e s - e n k u k _ J a m b r e s - e n k u k _ k i p u l l g i n a a l l g h e g k e t u n _ moses _ . _ U m y u g a g h l l u u g l l e q u t _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh at llu _ ipa u nghite lleqe uq _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a t _ mulu naanghite uq _ . _ temngitwha llegh at _ aliite lleqe uq _ tea- ma anun _ , _ katam _ J a n n e s - e n k u k _ J a m b r e s - e n k u k _ temngitwha llegh ak _ aliite nga llegh atun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a t e n _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ , _ k i y a g h t a a l q a _ , _ apallugh a llu _ kiyaghte llegh ma _ . _ liisima kan llu _ ugpeqe i llegh ka _ , _ iilqayug nghite llegh ka _ , _ piniqe i llegh ka _ , _ a g h u l i i l k a a m a l q a _ .
liisima kan _ amyuqetagh tkesigh llegh ka _ , _ ikfiqe llegh ka llu _ . _ liisima kan _ tawaten _ pi kaqe aatnga _ A n t i o c h - m i _ , _ I c o n i u m - e m i _ , _ L y s t r a - m i l l u _ . _ uglagh ghngaan _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge kau unga _ , _ t a w a l l i i m a _ A t a n g h e m _ y u g u l i k a q a a n g a _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge lleqe uq _ kiyaghte yu lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
seghlegh t _ yug t _ , _ p u u g h t i s t e t l u _ , _ seghlegh ughteaghaghte lleqe ut _ . _ puughte qugh lleqe ut _ , _ ellngit llu _ puughte lleg nge lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ atuqe manginagh ki _ apeghtuusagh t _ liitekagh ten _ , _ u g p e q e p i i k a g h t e n _ . _ liisima katen _ ipa u ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ liisima katen _ kinku u ta i _ apeghtughiste kekagh ten _ .
ima _ taghnughhagh u te gpeneng _ liisimake kaqe aten _ agleghnagh lghiit _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ . _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ a p e g h t u g h y a q l e g w a a t e n _ yuguligh lleghqagh meng _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ Christ _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
qamagte luteng _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aneghziig llegh ke ai _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtugh i sighqagh u ut _ , _ aghyuugh sagh ighqagh u ut _ , _ nallghusagh sighqagh u ut _ anaggute llegh mun _ , _ apeghtugh i sighqagh u ut llu _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh mun _ .
enkaam _ atuqe luki _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ p e g h q i g s a g h w a a g h n g a l l e q u q _ , _ y a t a a g h q e n g n g a l l e q u q l u _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mun _ .
Christ _ Jesus _ tagi kuni _ igleghte te i na luni _ ataneghpag u llegh mini _ , _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ unguva lghiit llu _ tuqukagh t llu _ . _ enkaam _ n a g a s i m a n g h e g k e n i _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ Christ _ J e s u s - e n k u k _ , _ qelegh amken
ungipagh ke ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ sagiqe luten _ ungipagh ke ki _ yug nun _ n a g a s u g u g h n g a a t a _ nalighmeng _ n a g a s u g u n g h i t e g h n g a a t a _ . _ N e k e g g m e l l u t e n _ apeghtugh i llegh gpegun _ ugpegh ste naqe ki _ , _ ineghte ki _ anaggute llegh itneng _ , _ kayeme ki llu _ .
pi lleghqagh _ tagi u uq _ yug t _ nagate yug nanigh lleqe ut _ ipa pig nun _ apeghtuusagh nun _ . _ ivagh i lleqe ut _ piyukekagh meggneng _ apeghtughiste lghute neng _ nagate pigesnagh na luki _ nagaqugh yukekagh ghhagh inagh teng _ .
nagate yug nanigh lleqe ut _ i p a p i l l e g h m u n _ , _ nagate yug yagute lleqe ut _ t e m n g i n u n _ ungipaghagh nun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ iiwleng _ n e k e g g m e l l u t e n _ , _ nagnegh te gu _ sa u a _ pi yaghqagh n _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghpek _ , _ ungipagh ke i kestagh a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ elpek _ q e p g h a g h t e k e g k a n g a t e n _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apeghiigh ghhu _ qamagte luku _ qepghaqagh _ elpenun _ pi sqekagh a _ .
whanga _ aghqe te kete yaghqaaghte ma unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ tuqu lleghqagh ka _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ .
P i l l u w a a m a a q a _ pinigh lghii _ p i l l u w a l l e q _ , _ apeghiigh aqa _ kilgaaqu llegh ka _ , _ ataasiighmete manginagh kau unga _ atanegh mun _ .
enkaam _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ utaqa i te u a _ whanga mnun _ qaghpa a _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ elqughte luku _ n a n q i g t i s t e m _ akileghtugh lleqe aanga _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ whanga inagh u gpenanga _ iwernga _ akileghtugh lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ qelanegh lghiit _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ .
P i n a q e l l g h a a g k e n _ qamagte lukek _ tagi ragkiigh i _ whanga mnun _ .
D e m a s - e m _ p i n i q s a l i i s i m a a _ nuna m _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h a _ enkaam _ unite ma unga _ , _ aghulaqe ma uq _ T h e s s a l o n i c a - m u n _ . _ C r e s c e n s _ G a l a t i a - s i m a a q _ enkaam _ titus _ D a l m a t i a - m u n _ pi ma uq _ .
L u k e - n g i n a g h h a q _ whanga mnite uq _ . _ mark _ aqfa luku _ k e l q e n n a k e n _ qayughllak _ kayute ke pigte aqa _ qepghagh lleg mni _ .
T y c h i c u s _ ephesus- mun _ kayagte ma aqa _ .
T r o a s - m e l l u n g a _ unite kaqe agka _ qaasligh gka _ C a r p u s - e n k u n i _ . _ tagi naqe gkuvek _ tagite aghte nakegken _ . _ tagite aghte naketen llu _ i i m g a t _ igagh nka _ , _ kiyang _ taakut _ amiiragh meng _ ulimaagh t _ .
A l e x a n d e r - e m _ siilu meng _ s a n g l l a g h t e m _ elngaatall _ seghletun _ pi kaqe aanga _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ aghyuugh naagh aa _ tawaten _ p i l l g h a n e n g _ .
elpek llu _ kelengake luku _ tawaten _ pinagh yu kangaten _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ut _ ugumi ke pigte a _ .
N a n q i g t i s t e m u n _ aglagh te yuwhaagh aqe yatnga _ kitum _ alngunak _ mesighagh te yaghtugh llghite aanga _ , _ yeghlegi _ u n i q a g h a a t k a q a a t n g a _ . _ yughagh te kaqe anka _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aki naqe fqiita _ p i s q e l l u k i _ tawaten _ p i l l g h i t n e n g _ .
iwernga _ atanegh _ w h a n g a m n i t k a a g u q _ . _ iknaqe sigh ke aqe aanga llu _ u n g i p a q e s q e l l u k i _ iingunagh ita _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ qamagte luki _ G e n t i l e - e t _ n a g a q i i s q e l l u k i _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u g u l i k a q a a n g a _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ .
A t a n g h e m _ y u g u l i y a g h q a q a a n g a _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghlegh m _ s u g h u g a l l g h a n e n g _ , _ enkaam _ paqna nagh ngunaan _ aglagh u lleqe aanga _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h m u n _ ataneghpag u llegh minun _ . _ ellnga nun _ usuqe i llegh _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
ungipaate aghte naketen _ P r i s c i l l a - n k u k _ A q u i l a - n k u k _ , _ O n e s i p h o r u s - e n k u t l u _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
erastus _ unegtekau uq _ C o r i n t h - m i _ ; _ qinuyug ta aneng _ trophimus _ unite kaqe aqa _ miletus- mi _ .
uksugh vagilgan _ tagi naqe ghllag i _ . _ E u b u l u s - e n k u t _ , _ P u d e n s - e n k u t _ , _ L i n u s - e n k u t _ , _ C l a u d i a - n k u t _ , _ ila ita llu _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ ungipaate sqe aisi _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
atanegh _ taghneghagh gpenite li _ , _ q u y a s l i s i l l u _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a n e n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ a p o s t l e - n g a n e n g l l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ kayagtekau unga _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yug t _ u g p e l l e g h t u g h t a g h i i s q e l l u k i _ , _ liite sqellug qu llu _ i p a p i l l e q _ . _ T a a m _ i p a p i l l g h e m _ kayusigh lleqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghte lleghqagh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ .
taagken _ ataasigh meng _ i p a p i l l e g h m e n g _ sighima lleg lgu ukut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ I q l e n g i q i g a t n g w a a g h e m _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ taana _ unguvallegh _ ima _ a y u m i r u g l l a g g a a n e n g _ .
enkaam _ p i l l e g h q a g h l l u w a a g h m i n i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite stekaqe a _ taana _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ ungipagh mikun _ . _ whanga mnun _ neghyuke te kaqe a _ ungipagh ni _ enkaam _ ungipagh kaqe aqa _ qelegh te llegh atun _ kiyaghnegh m _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a _ .
ukut _ lata t _ titus- mun _ pi u ut _ , _ ighnegh pig ke amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mtegnegun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ J e s u s - e m l l u _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a _ q u y a s l i t e n l l u _ n e k e g g m e l l e l g u s l i t e n l l u _ .
unite kaqe amken _ C r e t e - m i _ , _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ qepghaqagh ut _ apeghiigh llghite ngughk _ . _ nakmiigh ta ii sqe sug amken _ E l d e r - k a g h q a m e n g _ yughaghvig nun _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ t o w n - e t _ . _ neqamike luki _ qelegh tke anka _ :
elder-kaghqagh _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ ; _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ avaquti a llu _ ugpeqagh u yaghqaa ut _ ; _ nelliqe negh u yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ qaatke te igate yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ .
igleghte te i ste u te mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaqagh anun _ , _ E l d e r - a _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ . _ Y u k e g h q e n g h u y a g h q a a n g h i t u q _ , _ nalighmeng _ kaate qaghtagh ma u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ suume ste u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ suugllug u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh u yaghqaa nghite uq _ aklungi igh i na luni _ .
itupill _ u p u g h a n g h u y a g h q a a g u q _ , _ piniqe i stekaghqagh ke a _ pinigh llegh m _ . _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ , _ elqughute nga yaghqaa uq _ , _ taghneghagh gmikun _ pelungite yaghqaa uq _ , _ n u q e t u t i y a g h q a a g u q _ alngunak _ seghlegh meng _ .
ellnga _ ataasigh mete yaghqaa uq _ ipa pig nun _ apeghtuusagh nun _ a p e g h t u g h a l l e n g e l l e g h m i t u n _ . _ atuqe luki _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ kayeme lleqe ai _ yug t _ , _ liigike ste lleqe ai llu _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ anaggute nga ni luki _ .
uglagh u pigte ut _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh t _ , _ temngi _ akuzi lghiit _ puughte i lghiit _ ila meggneng _ , _ kiyang _ t a m a a k u n g u u t _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ G e n t i l e - e t _ ugpeqe ait _ c i r c u m c i s e - e y a g h q a a n i l u k i _ .
taaqe ste ki _ tawaten _ apeghtugh i llegh itneng _ . _ T e m n g i m e n g _ apeghtugh i llegh megteggun _ alngunaseghaghqagh ke ait _ iingunagh ita _ nengllugute t _ . _ apeghtugh i aqe ut _ apeghtugh te yaghqaqe nghite ke meggneng _ ; _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ aklungi igh i pigesnagh na luteng _ .
ataasigh m _ C r e t e - e g h m i i m _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m _ pi kaqe ai _ , _ " _ C r e t e - e g h m i i t _ quunpeng _ iqlengagh ut _ , _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ teghig ke sagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii u ut llu _ neghe ghllaget _ . _ "
tawaten _ p i l l g h a _ ipa u uq _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ qevuute luki _ aghyuugh ki _ C r e t e - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqe ait _ u g p e q e s q e l l u k i _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
ungipaate ki _ nagate nanigh litki nguq _ J e w s - e t _ temngi _ ungipaghagh ta it _ . _ qaute kete nanigh litki nguq _ yug t _ qelegh sagh ngllaghkagh it _ . _ T a a k u n g u u t _ ighsake ikagh t _ ipa pig neng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ pelungite uq _ t a m a a k u n u n _ p e l u n g i l n g u g h n u n _ . _ iwernga _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ pelungite nghite uq _ t a m a a k u n u n _ pelungite nghite ngugh nun _ . _ K i y a g h t e n g n g u u t _ seghleghqe llegh mi _ , _ ugpeqe igate aat llu _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ umyugagh it llu _ sumeghnegh it llu _ nukeggnaghtekau ut _ , _ enkaam _ liigike yaghqaa nanigh ma ut _ pinigh llegh llu _ s e g h l e l l e q l u _ .
liisimake na iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ iwernga _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t a _ i p a p i g h q a q a a t _ nalluke ta a _ : _ ugumi ke ni pigte ut _ , _ qaatke te igate ut _ , _ sasii nghite ut llu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pi naanghite aat _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ apeghtuusagh ke ki _ ugpeqagh nun _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
apeghtugh ki _ nuyekligh at _ yug t _ n u q e n n e g h t u s q e l l u k i _ , _ s i i v a k n a l g h i i n g u l u k i _ , _ s u m e g h t a g h a y u s q e l l u k i _ , _ a y e p s u g i t e s q e l l u k i _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ piniqe i llegh kun _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh kun _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ apeghtugh ki _ nuyekligh at _ aghnagh t _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u k i _ t u u n Ê¼ n g a l u k i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ seghletun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe nghite ait _ ila teng _ , _ nalighmeng _ meghe ghllag fqiita _ wine- meng _ . _ apeghtugh i yaghqaa ut _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh meng _ ,
enkaam _ peghqigh lleqe ait _ uyuqligh t _ aghnagh t _ p i n i q e s q e l l u k i _ ugi it llu _ avaquti ut llu _ .
S u m e g h t a g h a q e g s a g h q a a g u t _ , _ pelungite yaghqaa ut _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e g g n i _ , _ q e p g h a q e g s a g h q a a g u t _ ne meggni _ , _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa ut _ , _ qaatke te yaghqaa ut _ ugi meggnun _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ s e g h l e q u u g h n a a n g h i t i i _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh i _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ qelegh ki _ nukalpigagh t _ n u q e n n e g h t u s q e l l u k i _ .
elpek _ sa llegh gpegun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ u s p u t a a w i _ ellngit nun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh gpegun _ . _ apeghtugh i aqe i _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t e n _ , _ piraamsi luten _ .
wataghllak _ apeghtuusagh ke gkan _ elqughute nga li _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ s e g h l e q u u n g h i l l i n k u t _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h t e t _ seghletun _ akuzite kete naanghite ainkut _ , _ k i p u l l g i n a a l l g h i t a l l u _ kayngu yug ste lleqe ai _ .
apeghtugh ki _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ q a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ p i l i i t e s t e n g i t _ , _ e f q u g h t e n g n g w a a g h e s q e l l u k i l l u _ . _ V e g h u s n a g h y a g h q a q e n g h i t i i t _ ,
nalighmeng _ tegleg vike yaghqaqe nghite ait _ . _ yeghlegi _ quunpeng _ pinitun _ , _ ataasiighmete luteng _ pi yaghqaqe ait _ . _ enkaam _ sa llegh megteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ piyuke na ngllagh lleqe ait _ apeghtuusagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug qu _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ .
T a a m _ piniqe llegh m _ apeghtugh ainkut _ pegte sqellug qu _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ , _ i g h s a k e s q e l l u k i _ nuna m _ yug an _ piyuke llegh i _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ . _ apeghtugh ainkut llu _ n u q e n n e g h t u s q e l l u t a _ , _ elqughute nga luta _ , _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u t a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte lta _ utaqa i ma luta _ quyanagh lghii meng _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ S i g h i m a l q a g h p u t _ n i g h u g h q e n g n g a l g h i i _ aliigh lleghqagh a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ kiyaghnegh ghllag mta _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a _ .
ellmi neng _ tuune kau uq _ y u g u l i n a l u t a _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ pelungighsagh yug kanginkut _ ellmi nun _ yugu luta _ , _ sagiqe luta _ a n e g h n e g h q i s q e l l u t a _ yug nun _ .
apeghtuusagh ke ki _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ atuqe luki _ kayeme ki _ , _ aghula i aghte ki llu _ seghletun _ pi u kata _ . _ yeqay _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ukavagh ste gpenang _ .
negh ka ughte ki _ ugpeqagh t _ m a l i g h q u t a q e s q e l l u k i _ k a v e m e m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t n u n _ , _ u m i i l w a a g h n u n l l u _ . _ qaatke te nga yaghqaa ut _ , _ apeghiigh nga yaghqaa ut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh nun _ .
ungipaate ki _ kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke fqaan _ , _ aaghtiiraagh fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ itupill _ n e k e g g m e t u l l u k i _ , _ q u s e v e g n g a t u l l u k i _ p i s q e l l u k i _ tea- ma anun _ .
whangkuta llu _ sivugh nghaani _ nallu yagh ukut _ , _ qaatke te igate yagh ukut _ , _ p u u g h t e n g n g a y a g h t u k u t l u _ . _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh a _ ayghigh te luku _ , _ i t a g n a g h q u s i q l u k u _ a y u q s a g h a g h p u t _ . _ unguvallegh put _ k i y a g h u s i q s a g h a p u t _ seghlegh pestaagh mun _ , _ aqina llegh mun llu _ . _ yug t _ ugumi ke yagh ainkut _ , _ ugumi ke te yagh ukut llu _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a _ liisimake stekaqe ainkut _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng _ , _ piniqe llegh mineng llu _ .
Y u g u l i k a q i i n k u t _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh lleg ni _ , _ nakaan _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mteggun _ . _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ ughvugh kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ nutaghagh meng llu _ u n g u v a l l e l i t k a q i i n k u t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kuuve kaqe ak _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kemnagh pigte lukek _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t e g g u n _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ piniqe llegh mikun _ nallghusagh na luta _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ sighima lleg lgu ukut _ whangkuta _ pi liite na luku _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
tamaakut _ p i l l g h e t _ ipa u ut _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ elpenun _ sagiqe te sqe sug anka _ yug nun _ q a a t k e s q e l l u k i _ . _ taagken _ ugpegh lleg leg t _ kiyaghnegh kun _ aneghneghqagh igh pestaagh lleqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh t _ pinigh lghii u ut llu _ kayute u ut llu _ tea- ma anun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ iqite nga luten _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ temngi _ qani qu te lghii neng _ , _ aaghtiiraagh te lghii neng _ sivugh nghmeng _ ategh itneng _ , _ liilightuusagh neng llu _ . _ tamaa na _ sasii nghite uq _ , _ kayute u naanghite uq _ kitumun _ alngunak _ .
kina _ alngunak _ aafqugh te ste i lghii _ k e l e n g a s a a g h n a k e n _ ataasigh meng _ nalighmeng _ alghigh luku _ . _ nagate nghite kan _ pegge naken _ .
liisima kan _ t a w a t e l n g u u m _ yug m _ ighsake kaqe a _ i p a p i l l e q _ , _ seghleghqe ste u uq llu _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga n _ katam _ seghleghqe llegh an _ nanqigte yaghqaaghte ste lleqe a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ .
aglagh stekumkun _ A r t e m a s _ nalighmeng _ T y c h i c u s _ elpenun _ , _ N i c o p o l i s - e n n a q e g h l l a g g a a t e n _ , _ qayughllak _ uksughte yug aqe unga _ tamaani _ .
kayusigh naqe ghllag nakegken _ lawyer- a _ Z e n a s _ , _ A p o l l o s - l u _ iglegha lleghqagh gkenun _ . _ wataghllak _ yataaghqe te nakegken _ kelqesaghqagh meng _ sa meng _ a k l u k e g k a g k e n e n g _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m t a _ peghqigsagh te kete litgu _ aneghnegh ghqu te kaghqagh _ enkaam _ k a y u s i g h y a q l e g u g h h n a k a n g i t _ a k l u k e g k a p i l g e t _ . _ temngi _ k i y a g h t a a f q a a m e n g _ pi lit _ .
qamagte luteng _ w h a n g a m n i l n g u u t _ piniqe aisi nguq _ . _ piniqe llegh ut _ apegh qagh naken _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n u n _ p i n i q i s t e m n n u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ q u y a s l i s i _ qamagte lusi _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a u l - m e n g _ pi u ut _ , _ anusimingllagh aq _ Christ _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n e n g l l u _ T i m o t h y - m e n g _ . _ piniqekagh mtegnun _ q e p g h a l g u t e m t e g n u n _ P h i l e m o n - m u n _ ,
ugpeqagh nun llu _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ mangteghagh gpeni _ , _ A p p h i a - m u n l l u _ nayag mnnun _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ A r c h i p p u s - m u n l l u _ p i l l u w a l g u t e m t e g n u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ , _ n e k e g g m e l l e l g u s l i s i l l u _ .
P h i l e m o n - m i _ , _ quunpeng _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ y u g h a a t k e n n e m k e n _ ,
qayughllak _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ piniqe llegh n _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh n llu _ atanegh kun _ J e s u s - k u n _ .
yughagh te kaqe amken _ u n g i p a a t e s q e l l u k i _ ila ten _ ugpeqe i lleg mnneng _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ liigike aghagh lleqe aten _ qamagte luki _ quya ste llegh t _ a l l g e g h t e k a p u t _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ piniqe i llegh gpek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug anun _ quya ste ghllag aanga llu _ kayeme aanga llu _ ! _ piniqe llegh gpek _ quya ste ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
tetug naanghite unga _ qelegh na luten _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ atuqe sqellug qu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi naanghite unga _ .
piniqe te llegh ung _ apallugh ke luku _ aapte vike amken _ atuqe sqellug qu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ whanga _ , _ P a u l _ , _ nanevgagh u unga _ , _ anusimingllaghagh u unga llu _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
whanga u uq _ aapute i lghii _ ighnegh mnun _ , _ O n e s i m u s - m u n _ . _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ ata liite kaqe aanga _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
sivugh nghaani _ sasii nghite yagh uq _ elpenun _ , _ iwernga _ whaa _ kayute ughte pigte ma uq _ whangkutegnun _ .
Onesimus _ elpenun _ aglagh ste naqe aqa _ , _ leganqun _ ilu ka _ maligte te naqe uq _ ellnga kun _ .
W h a n g a m n i t e s u g u y a g h a q a _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u n g a _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ , _ katam _ elpek _ kayusiite na yaqevnga _ m a a n s a q u v e k _ . _ liisima kegken qun _ anusimingllaghagh u lghiinga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ w h a n g a m n i t e s n a a n g h i t a q a _ wetku qun _ sivuke luten _ aapte aghte luten _ . _ itagnagh qu ma kuvgu _ w h a n g a m n i t e s q e l l u k u _ taawa _ elpek _ piyuke llegh ke lleqe an _ , _ qayughllak _ qelegh u nghite amken _ tawaten _ p i s q e l l u t e n _ .
entaqun _ Onesimus _ iqite aghtekau uq _ e l p e n i s a g h q a a l u n i _ quunperugllag _ .
ellnga _ paninang _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u u q _ . _ iwernga _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u m a l l e g h m i n e n g _ anglu iigh aghagh ma uq _ qayughllak _ piniqe kau aghte ma uq _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ . _ piniqe pigte aqa _ , _ iwernga _ elpek _ piniqe aghagh lleqe an _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u l u k u _ , _ ugpeqagh u lgute u luku llu _ atanegh kun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ tugukligh ma kuvnga _ qepghagh lgute u lunga _ , _ tugukligh naken _ Onesimus _ whanga u ste luku _ .
sa meng _ seghletun _ pi ma kangaten _ nalighmeng _ a s e n g e m a k a n g a t e n _ , _ a s e n g e n g a _ whanga _ llivike lleqe aqa _ .
whaa _ , _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ igagh unga _ whaten _ : _ whanga _ , _ P a u l _ , _ llivike lleqe amken _ . _ iwernga _ puygu gpenaan _ unguvallegh n _ a s e n g e l u k u _ ayuqe an _ whanga mnun _ .
aa-a _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ aapte vike amken _ atanegh kun _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ Onesimus _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ q u y a s l e q a g h p e n g a _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ !
lata amken _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h l u k u _ qaatkesaghqagh ke an _ qelegh tke aqa _ elpenun _ , _ repall _ qaayghute luku _ pi lleqe uten _ .
atwhay _ , _ nekaghqagh ngllagh te aghte nakevnga _ qayughllak _ sighima u unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ yughagh lleg si _ , _ enkaam _ elpesi nun _ pi lleqe unga _ .
E p a p h r a s - e m n g u q _ piniqe aisi _ ; _ anusimingllaghagh lgu tke aqa _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
Q e p g h a l g u t m a l l u _ M a r k - e n k u t _ , _ A r i s t a r c h u s - e n k u t _ , _ D e m a s - e n k u t _ , _ L u k e - e n k u t _ ellngit a llu nguq _ piniqe aisi _ .
piniqe llegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ uglagh luku llu _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u luku llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aleghqugh kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t g u n _ .
iwernga _ up-uni _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ aleghqugh kaqe ainkut _ ighnegh mikun _ . _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh _ nuna ngllagh kau uq _ , _ nakmike kaqe a llu _ pi liite sqellug qu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
ighnegh m _ kuukgute aqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a _ , _ K i y a g h n e g h t u n g w a a q l u _ ayuqe uq _ . _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ n a g n e g h a s t e n g n g w i i _ tawatete luki _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh tgun _ akuzite mikun _ . _ ighnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ unguvallegh ni _ ukmangigh na luta _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ apeghiigh yamigu _ tawaten _ pilleg ni _ , _ qilag mi _ aqume kau uq _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i t e l l e g h p i g a a m _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ qule ii aghtekaqe a _ ighnegh _ yaquleg neng _ , _ a t e l i t k a q a a l l u _ ingyagh te nga lghii meng _ ategh itneng _ .
tawaten _ pika qaa _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi mangite ai _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg t _ whaten _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ ; _ aghneghmi _ A t a l i i t a g h p e n g a _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ pi mangite ai _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg t _ whaten _ , _ " _ ata ke lleqe aanga _ enkaam _ ellnga _ ighnegh ke lleqe aqa _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte yaghqaaghte yamigu _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh ni _ nuna mun _ , _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ yeqay _ qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ita _ manigugh litgu _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ yaquleg neng _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ni _ anuqe stun _ lliigh stekaqe ai _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ kumaghugh lghii stun _ k e n g h e s t u n _ lliigh stekaqe ai _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ ighnegh mineng _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ kaay _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aqumutagh gken _ kenle ite yaghqaa uk _ quunperugllag _ ! _ igleghte te lleqe an _ ataneghpag u llegh n _ elqughutngagh lleg ligh luku _ .
pinigh kan _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ ugumi ke an _ anaggute nga llegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh gpek _ nakmike ma uten llu _ q u u l v a a m a a t e n l l u _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ ila gpeneng _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ quya ste i ghllag uq _ a n o i n t - e l u t e n _ mesiigh meng _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ elpek _ , _ atanegh _ , _ piinligh yuggaagh mi _ nuna ngllagh kau uten _ , _ iigge gpeneng llu _ qilaga ngllagh kau uten _ .
qamagte luteng _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ , _ iwernga _ elpek _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uten _ . _ aghyugh yaghqaa ut _ aatkagh stun _ .
I m e g t e g h l l e q a t e n _ q a a s l i g e t u n _ , _ simigh lleqe aten llu _ aatkagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ elpek _ quunpeng _ almesiqe lleqe aaten _ , _ aghyugh yaghqaa nghite uten llu _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ p i m a n g i t n g w a a g h i i _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg ni _ whaten _ : _ " _ aqume i _ whagun _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ tunemagh liite ste lleg mnun _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ . _ "
S a n g a a w a n Ê¼ n g a m _ yaquleg t _ ? _ qamagte luteng _ taghneghagh u ut _ qepghagh te i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ kayagte aqe ai llu _ k a y u s i i t e s q e l l u k i _ tamaakut _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqagh t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g w a a g h e l t e k i _ i p a p i l l g h e t _ nagaqughkagh put _ luuraq _ w a a k n a n i q e s t a g h n a y u k a m t e k i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh i _ ipa u ut _ ; _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ yaquleg tgun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te nghite ngughk _ apeghtuusagh nun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ aghyuugh lleghqaghtutala atun _ .
enkaam _ ighsake ma kumteggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuguligh i llegh ghllag a _ a n a g p a g n i n g i t a g h p u t _ aghyuugh i lleghqagh a _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ apegh yuggaagh kaqe a _ taana _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ taagken _ tamaakut _ nagaqugh tke aat _ ellnga neng _ , _ i p a p i g h q a a t _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m llu _ i p a p i g h q e g k a q a a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ atuqe llegh mikun _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l g h e t _ , _ uyegte llegh mikun llu _ tunusagh i _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike llghite ai _ yaquleg t _ i g l e g h u t i s q e l l u k i _ s i v u m e l n g u g h m u n _ nuna kaghqagh mun _ . _ ( _ T a a n a n g u u q _ nuna _ a k u z i t k e g k e f u t _ . _ )
nalighnegh itni _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ sangaawa _ yuug _ umyugagh mig kaqe ken _ , _ nalighmeng _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aflengake gkan _ ?
ulima aqe an _ u k a v a q a a n l l u k u _ yaquleg neng _ , _ qaghpa ligh qagh kan _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m e n g l l u _ q u u l v a l l e g h m e n g l l u _ ,
igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh kan llu _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ " _ tawani llu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe a _ yuug _ " _ igleghte te i ste u luku _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ " _ taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ilate nga uq _ igleghte te i llegh anun _ . _ naqamllu _ salin _ e s g h i i g a t a g h p u t _ yuug _ igleghte te i lghii _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
iwernga _ e s g h a g h a g h p u t _ Jesus _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ natengiighhaq _ ukavagh stekaqsagh aa _ yaquleg neng _ . _ maaten _ e s g h a g h a g h p u t _ qaghpa lug ni _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m e n g l l u _ q u u l v a l l e g h m e n g l l u _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe luni _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ Jesus _ tuqu kau uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ u l i m a g h i k a q _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ellmi nun _ , _ n a g n e g h a s t e n g n g w i i l l u _ tawatete luki _ . _ itagnagh pigtekau uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i n i g h s a g h w a a q a q a a _ Jesus _ ikfiqe llegh kun _ p i i n l i g h t e n g u l u k u _ yuguligh llegh itnun _ . _ enkaam _ J e s u s - e m _ tagite yaghqaaghtekaqe ai _ yug lghute t _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m u n _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pelungighsagh kaqe ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga llu _ tamaakut llu _ pelungighsaghkagh i _ , _ qamagte luteng _ ata ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ J e s u s - e m _ kayngu ke igate ai _ atigh yaghqaa luki _ anglegute u luki _ .
J e s u s - e m _ pika qaa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ apegh lleqe aqa _ ategh n _ anglegute mnun _ ; _ usuqe lleqe amken _ qerngughte te gkata _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ neghyuke lleqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ " _ pi kau uq llu _ , _ " _ whaante unga _ , _ taghnughhagh t llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagivaghkagh i _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
taakut _ taghnughhagh t _ yugu ut _ kemekrag leg t llu _ aaw lgu ut llu _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus _ ellngistun _ lliigh kau uq _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuqu na luni _ n a a f q e n n a l u k u _ tughneghagh _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e k _ t u q u m u n _ .
enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ iteme te kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ unguvallegh teng _ qamagte luki _ qayughllak _ alike u kangat _ tuqu llegh _ .
W h a t e g h l l u g a a g h u u q _ yaquleg u nghite ut _ J e s u s - e m _ kayusigh iqe ai _ , _ iwernga _ A b r a h a m - e m _ k i n g u n g h i _ kayusigh aqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus _ l l i i g h t e s t e n g n g w a a g h y a g h q a q a a _ whangkutestun _ . _ tawaten _ q e p g h a a s a q l e g w a a _ kiyaghnegh _ H i g h _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ , _ nangllegtagh luni llu _ ataasiighmete luni llu _ . _ enkaam _ t u u n i y a q l e g u g h t e k a a g u q _ aghqe te meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ s e g h e v u t e s q e l l u k i _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ .
Jesus _ ikfiqe kau te mineng llu _ nanghiiqu lleg nge kau te mineng llu _ , _ k a y u s i g h y a q l e g w i i _ tamaakut _ nanghiiqu lleg nge lghiit _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi llu _ e l l m i n i t e s q e l l u s i _ qilag mi _ . _ sumeghmike luku _ Jesus _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekagh a _ A p o s t l e - n g u l u k u l l u _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - n g u l u k u l l u _ a a p g h a q e g k e f u t _ ugpeqe ni luku _ .
Jesus _ ataasigh mete kau uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ n a k m i k i s t e m i n u n _ , _ katam _ moses _ ataasigh metekagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghagh te aqe yamigu _ kiyaghnegh _ mangteghagh ani _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ mangteghagh _ k i t u m e n g _ u l i m a g h i s t e l g u l g h i i _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ J e s u s - k u n _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ ulima aqe a _ . _ yug t _ usuqe aghagh yaghqaqe aat _ Jesus _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ M o s e s - m e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ mangteghagh ngllagh a _ p a k i g g u l l u k u _ mangteghagh meng _ .
moses _ ataasiighmete kau uq _ qepghagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ani _ , _ ungipaate kaqe ai llu _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh _ sa meng _ apegh yaghqagh lgu ni luku _ t a a g a n i q a a g h a q _ .
iwernga _ C h r i s t - a _ ighnegh u luni _ ataasiighmete kau uq _ igleghte te i sta _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ani _ . _ whangkuta _ mangteghagh ke ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ilutu manginagh kumta _ , _ i p a p i g h q u t k u m a n g i n a q u m t e g g u l l u _ sighimakekagh ut _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ katam _ tawaten _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ ,
pineghlliqe gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ kilgaa nite luteng _ qaatke sug mangite aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nanghiighsaghagh kaqe aat llu _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ tamaani _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ sivunegh gpesi _ esghagh kaqe ghngaaghmegteki _ apeghiighkagh nka _ , _ paninang _ nanghiighsaghagh kaqe aatnga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tamaakut _ yug t _ sakrite stekaqe aatnga _ . _ enkaam _ pi kau unga _ , _ ' _ iiwleng _ ataasiighmete igate ut _ whanga mnun _ , _ liigike igate ut llu _ natete luku _ kiyaghte sqe sug lleg mneng _ .
sakrite u lunga _ akeqe i kau unga _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ ' _ whaten _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ I t e g h n a a n g h i t n g w a a g h a a t _ meghnaali vigkagh _ yataaghqe kaqe a _ ellngit nun _ . _ ' _ "
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ kelenga lusi _ , _ seghlegh meng _ sumeghtaghagh llegh neng llu _ ugpegh nghite llegh neng llu _ , _ iqitute ste gpenasi _ unguva lghii meng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
iwernga _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ kayeme te aqe tek _ pi lleghqagh lgu ma luku _ atigh llegh ke lghii meng _ " _ aghneghmi _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ taawa _ seghleghqe llegh m _ puughte lusi _ pineghllug ngllagh lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ a t a a s i i g h m e l k u m t a _ unguvallegh mta _ kenle anun _ , _ neghyuke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ ugpegh yuwhaagh lleg mtestun _ , _ taawa _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi lgutke lleqe ainkut _ ellmi _ pi mineng _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ , _ pineghllug u gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ "
kinkungaawa t _ nagaqugh tke aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ me aneng _ naqam _ qaatke te gpenateng _ ? _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ yug t _ M o s e s - e m _ maghyaghqugh qu ai _ E g y p t - m e n g _ .
4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kinku t _ kiyaghnegh _ sakrite ste atgu _ ? _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ s e g h l e g h q e l l u t e n g _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ kilgaa ni _ .
kinku nun _ kiyaghnegh _ akeqe i kau a _ i t e g h n a a n g h i t n g w a a g h n i l u k i _ meghnaali vigkagh mun _ yataaghqekagh minun _ ? _ akeqe kaqe ai _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
taawa _ liigikagh ut _ iteghpagningite kau ut _ tawavek _ meghnaali vig mun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ yug nun _ aghula i tuq _ i i t g h e s q e l l u k i _ meghnaali vig minun _ . _ iwernga _ alinge lta _ luuraq _ naligh i _ nuughhute na yu kan _ itegh gpenani _ meghnaali vig anun _ .
pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig aneng _ ayuqe lghii _ nagaqugh qaghkagh ut _ katam _ t a m a a k u s t u n _ yug stun _ M o s e s - e m _ m a g h y a g h q u q i i s t u n _ E g y p t - m e n g _ . _ iwernga _ pinigh lghii m _ ungipagh m _ kayusiite llghite ai _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe mangite aat _ nagaqughkagh eng _ .
whangkuta _ ugpegh lghii ni _ itegh lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi tke kaqe ai _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ whaten _ , _ " _ sakrite u lunga _ akeqe i kau unga _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ whaten _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ itegh naanghite u aghte ut _ meghnaali vigkagh mnun _ . _ ' _ " _ tawaten _ akuzi kau uq _ qepghaqagh ni _ apeghiigh kaqe ghngaaghmiki _ ima _ nuna ngllagh llegh mineng _ .
naa n tuq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe luni _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta a _ aghnegh m _ whaten _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ meghnaali kau uq _ t a m a a g h h a a n e n g _ qepghaqagh mineng _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ . _ "
akuzite ni llu _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ itegh naanghite u aghte ut _ meghnaali vigkagh mnun _ . _ "
paninang _ ila i _ yug t _ itegh lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh te yuwhaagh ke aat _ pinigh lghii meng _ ungipagh meng _ , _ itegh llghite ut _ meghnaali vig mun _ qayughllak _ qaatke te llghite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ ila a _ aghneq _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ " _ aghneghmi _ . _ " _ K i n g u r u g l l a g a n e n g _ M o s e s - e m _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ taana _ aghneq _ D a v i d - k u n _ . _ uteghte pagte anka _ D a v i d - e m _ igaqegkagh i _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ , _ pineghlliqe gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ "
J o s h u a - m _ maghyaghqugh llghite ai _ yug t _ tawavek _ meghnaali vig mun _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ qayughllak _ t a a m _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ ila a _ aghnegh a _ meghnaali llegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ taawa _ S a b b a t h - a _ aghula i tuq _ , _ meghnaali vig _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ itegh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ , _ meghnaali lleqe uq _ qepghaqagh mineng _ katam _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali llegh atun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ itegh naqe ghllag lta _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ qaatke nghite fqaan _ pi lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ sivunegh mta _ p i l l g h i s t u n _ .
akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguva ut _ qepghagh u ut _ . _ ipeg aghagh ut _ alngunak _ inglugtun _ ipegsaghkagh neng _ savigpag neng _ . _ kaapute kayugu ut _ q a m a v e r u g l l a k _ unguva sigh m llu _ taghneghagh m llu _ kaat ute nga llegh gkenun _ , _ naflugh t llu _ pategh t llu _ kaat ute nga llegh itnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ nanqigte i kayugu ut _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng llu _ sa naqe llegh aneng llu _ .
sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh a _ iigh nga nghite uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ aliite ut _ , _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a g h u u t l u _ iye gkeni _ . _ ellnga nun _ qayvighqesaghqagh ke aput _ salleg put _ qamagte luki _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - e l e g l l a g u u k u t _ qilag mun _ mat- yuqagh meng _ . _ J e s u s - n g u u q _ , _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh mete kestagh lta _ apeghkagh mnni _ yug nun _ .
H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m t a _ liigike u aqe aqe ai _ kayaaghlliqe sigh put _ , _ qayughllak _ nuna mete luni _ nanghiiqu lleg nge kau uq _ w h a n g k u t e s t u n g w a a q _ . _ naqamllu _ seghleghqe mangite uq _ .
enkaam _ t e t u l l n g u n a a m t a _ aglagh lta _ umiileg u sigh gnun _ aqumutagh gkenun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ a l l g e g h u s e g h q a a l u t a _ nangllegtagh llegh anun _ . _ tawani _ nanglleg ke lleqe ainkut _ , _ kayusigh lleqe ainkut llu _ aklu ke igh lleg mnni _ .
tamaghhagh an _ h i g h _ priest- a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ yug lgu ta aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aglagh aqe uq _ yug t _ apallugh ke luki _ t u u n a l u k i _ tunusagh it _ aghqerragh u aghte te na luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ .
H i g h _ priest- a _ kayaaghlliqe kayugu te mineng _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa uq _ t a m a a k u n u n _ nalluke lghii nun llu _ ugpeqe i nanigh lghii nun llu _ i p a p i l l e g h m u n _ .
qayughllak _ kayaaghlliqe kayugu te mineng _ , _ h i g h _ priest- a _ a g h q e r r a a g h y a g h q a a g u q _ ellmi _ katam _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ seghleghqe llegh itnun llu _ yug t _ .
kina _ alngunak _ nakmike igate uq _ ellmi neng _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - n g u g h h n a l u n i _ q u u l v a g h y a g h q a a l u n i _ . _ iwernga _ yuug _ h i g h _ priest- ngughte aqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ n a k m i k e n g h a t n i _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ nakmike llegh atun _ aaron _ .
tawaten llu _ C h r i s t - a _ q u u l v a l l g h i t u q _ ellmi neng _ nakmike luni _ h i g h _ priest- ngughte llegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ . _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ ; _ aghneghmi _ whani _ A t a l i i t a g h p e n g a _ . _ "
nalighnegh itni _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ priest- nge te lleqe uten _ quunperugllag _ , _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ p r i e s t - n g u l l g h a t u n _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u q _ y u g u l i y a g h q a a l u k u _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ Jesus _ nuna mete u luni _ , _ iglagtu luni _ qunituumagh mi _ yughagh kau lghii llu _ tungsigh kau lghii llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ y u g u l i s q e l l u n i _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagate kaqe ai _ yughagh llegh i _ , _ qayughllak _ qusevegte luni _ qaatkekagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ .
qaywa _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke ghngaatni _ , _ paninang _ liite kau uq _ qaatke te ma llegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh mikun _ .
apeghiigh yagu _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh a _ , _ J e s u s - n g u g h t u q _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ yuguligh lleg nge ste i yaghqagh _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ ellmi nun _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - n g u l u k u _ , _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - n g u l l g h a t u n _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u ukut _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ . _ iwernga _ apeghtugh neghllug pigte usi _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ qayughllak _ l i i g i k a g h a g h s i g a l n g u u s i _ .
neghigh pigte lusi _ ugpeqagh u lghiisi _ enkaam _ apeghtugh i yaghqaaghtekau usi _ ila gpesinun _ . _ yeghlegi _ paninang _ aklu aqe usi _ kitumun _ a p e g h t u n q i g t e s q e l l u s i _ ugpegh nghhagh t _ liite yuwhaagh yaghqagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ katam _ t a g h n u g h h a g h h a g h e s t u n _ mamaghtugh yug aqe usi _ , _ neqe pig yug gpenasi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ mamaghtuqagh yu k _ paninang _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u uq _ . _ salin _ nalluke a _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ anaggute nga llegh llu _ .
iwernga _ neqe pig _ a n g t a n i i t k a n u n _ pi u uq _ . _ peghqigsagh kau ut _ liigike yaghqaa lukek _ pinigh lghii nkuk _ , _ seghlegh nkuk _ .
enkaam _ liite lteki _ apeghtuusagh t _ a n g t a n i i t k a n u n _ ugpeqagh nun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ liite u aqe aqe asi _ apeghtugh te yuwhaagh ke aat _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ e n k a a n g a m _ l i i n n e q i g s a g h q a q e n g h i t a s i _ . _ L i i t n g w a a g h u m a a s i _ atuqe yaghqaa fqiita _ pi na luki _ tamaakut _ t u q u m u n _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ L i i n n e q i g s a g h q a q e n g h i t a g h s i l l u _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ kiyaghnegh kun _ ,
paaptaaye llegh neng _ , _ i i g t i l l e g h n e n g _ , _ u n g u v a g h t i l l e g h n e n g _ tuqukagh neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh aneng _ yug neng _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ kenle u na an _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi stegkanginkut _ , _ apeghtugh lleqe amsi _ a n g t a n i i t e s q e l l u s i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
tamaa _ ila aneng _ yug lgu uq _ allgegh te kaayagh lghii neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighug aneng _ , _ naasiigh kaqe aat llu _ qilag m _ tunusagh a _ . _ allgegh te kau ut llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ nanghiigh kaqe ait _ pinightu langi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ nanghiigh kaqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ nuna kaghqagh mete ngughk _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqe nanigh kumegteggu _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ avuteghqe nqigtepagningite te lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaquuragh nqigtegkangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ k a y n g u s a a k e g k a n g a t l u _ yugtuqagh mi _ .
nuna _ megh aqe uq _ e s l a l l u g u g h n n e g h a n i _ , _ piite ta iqe uq llu _ nunivagseghagh meng _ atughqagh meng _ t a m a a k u n u n _ p e k s i g h q i k a n u n _ nuna meng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighqe sta qaa _ nuna _ .
iwernga _ nuna _ piite ste i ma kuni _ sikughllug neng llu _ w e e d s - n e n g l l u _ sea-te u nghite uq _ . _ yakugh nagh anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghu ni lleghqagh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ paneghte yaghqaa uq _ .
piniqekagh mnni _ , _ qaywa _ elpesi nun _ lata tke ghngaamteki _ tamaakut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke igate amsi _ tawatete lusi _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ yuguligh llegh gpesigun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ elqughute nga an _ nanqigte i aqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ puygu naanghite a _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ , _ piniqe i llegh i llu _ ellmi nun _ kayusiite llegh gpesigun _ yug i _ . _ neqamike lleqe a llu _ paninang _ kayusiite u kesi _ .
nagnegh sug amsi _ sagiqe lusi _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale atun _ . _ enkaam _ a l l g e g h t e p e s t a a g h l l e q a g h s i _ sighimakekagh i _ .
ighsanitagh lghii ughte sug nghite amsi _ . _ yeghlegi _ t a m a a k u s t u n _ ayuqe ste sug amsi _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ , _ n u q e t u t i l l e g h m e g t e g g u n l l u _ allgegh te yaghqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe aqe yamigu _ abraham _ , _ akeqe kaqe a _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku _ . _ ava ite u ta aneng _ aange aghagh lghii meng _ ellmi neng _ , _ atuqe luku _ ellmi _ katam _ ategh ni _ akeqe i kau uq _ .
abraham _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ quya ste pestaagh luten _ , _ uglagh u pigte luku _ k i n g u n e l i l l e q a m k e n _ . _ "
abraham _ qelanegh gpenani _ utaqa i kau uq _ , _ enkaam _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ .
kitum _ neklegsugh nghminigu _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh _ , _ akeqe i aqe uq _ sa meng _ pilleg ni _ ipa u ni luku _ atuqe luku _ kitum _ ategh a _ ellmi neng _ aange aghagh lghii m _ .
allgegh te yaghqagh t _ akequsagh mineng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ l i i g i k e s t e s u g w i i _ a l l a a n g u g h s a g h q a q e n g h i t n g w a a g h n i l u k i _ agghi lleg ni _ . _ enkaam _ akeqe i kau uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ kayeme ainkut _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqe igate uq _ akeqe i nghmini _ , _ iqlengiqe naanghite uq llu _ akeqe i kuni _ atuqe luku _ ategh ni _ i p a p i g h q e n n a l u k u _ pi yaghqaqe te ni _ . _ taake uk _ allangughte qaghte naanghite uk _ . _ whangkuta _ anagniighkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ paqniite na luta _ , _ kayeme lleg nge ghllag ukut _ sighimake na luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ .
taana _ sighima llegh _ uyghiite u uq _ unguva sigh mnnun _ , _ paqna nagh igh te ste ainkut llu _ ayepsugite ste ainkut llu _ . _ taana _ sighima llegh _ itegh uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ safkaaghute m _ a w a t a n g a n i l n g u g h m u n _ .
tawavek _ Jesus _ itegh kau uq _ sivu mnni _ whangkuta _ apallugh ke luta _ . _ H i g h _ priest- ngughte kau uq _ q u u n p e r u g l l a g m u n _ , _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ priest- nge ma llegh atun _ .
taana _ melchizedek _ umiileg kesagh aa _ S a l e m - e m _ , _ p r i e s t - e k a a l l u _ Q u l i g h p i g a a m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ abraham _ uteghnigh ma luku _ p i l l u w a m e n g _ k a y a a l q u g h l u k i _ umiileg t _ , _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ nallagh luku _ quya stekaqe a _ .
taagken _ A b r a h a m - e m _ tuunekagh a _ q u l a g h q e l l g h a n e n g _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ tugukagh mineng _ p i l l u w a m i _ . _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ ategh a _ maalghug gneng _ sa meng _ pi sigh lgu uq _ , _ sivuligh _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ umiileg a _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ . _ " _ umiileg ke kau ta aneng _ S a l e m - e m _ , _ ategh an _ aag llegh a _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ umiileg a _ nekeggmellegh m _ . _ "
igagh ite uq _ igaqe vikekagh meng _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ ata aneng llu _ naa aneng llu _ nalighmeng _ s i v u n g h a n e n g _ , _ talwa _ allgellegh aneng llu _ tuqu llegh aneng llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighneghagh tun _ aghula i tuq _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ quunperugllag _ .
taawa _ liigikagh i _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ aange ma llegh ghllag a _ . _ talwa _ s i v u n e q s u w h a a m t a _ A b r a h a m - e m _ tuunekagh a _ melchizedek _ q u l a g h q e l l g h a n e n g _ tugulaghkagh mineng _ p i l l u w a m i _ .
P r i e s t - e t _ kingunegh ke ai _ L e v i - e m _ . _ liilightuusagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelqe aqe ai _ p r i e s t - e t _ q e r n g u g h t i s q e l l u k i _ yug lgu ta itneng _ q u l a g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ a l l g e g h t e k i i t n e n g _ . _ P r i e s t - e t _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ p r i e s t - e t l u _ yug t llu _ A b r a h a m - e m _ kingunegh ke ghngaisteng _ .
melchizedek _ kingunegh ke nghite a _ L e v i - e m _ , _ iwernga _ tugukligh kaqe a _ q u l a g h q e l l e q _ A b r a h a m - e m _ tuune yagu _ . _ quya stekaqe a llu _ abraham _ , _ allgegh te kau lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ .
N a l l u n e q n i i t u q _ taana _ quya ste i lghii _ aange aghagh uq _ taagken _ quya stekagh meng _ .
P r i e s t - e t _ yugu ut _ tuqu kayug t _ naqamllu _ allgegh te kau ut _ q u l a g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ . _ M e l c h i z e d e k - l l u _ allgegh te kau uq _ q u l a g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ , _ iwernga _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ , _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ a p e l l g h i s t u n _ .
levi _ allgegh te kau uq _ yug neng _ q u l a g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ . _ pi na yalghiikut _ talwa _ ellnga llu _ llivike i kau uq _ q u l a g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ M e l c h i z e d e k - m u n _ A b r a h a m - k u n _ .
qaywa _ levi _ allgegh llghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ sivunegh mi _ A b r a h a m - e m _ yugusigh u ni te kau uq _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ nallagh aqe yagu _ abraham _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ p r i e s t - e t _ kingunegh kesaghqagh ke ai _ L e v i - e m _ . _ ellngit a _ liilightuusagh t _ apeghtugh te kaqe ait _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ qepghaqagh at _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nuughhute kau uq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ aklu kau ut _ priest- meng _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e t u n _ ayuqe lghii meng _ , _ A a r o n - e t u n _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ .
L e v i t e _ p r i e s t - e t _ simigh nghmegteki _ alla neng _ p r i e s t - e n e n g _ , _ taawa _ liilightuusagh t llu _ allangughte yaghqaa ut _ .
P r i e s t - e t _ quunpeng _ L e v i - e m _ ramke aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ iwernga _ atanegh ut _ ramke aneng _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ atanegh mta _ ramke aneng _ pi _ qepghagh igate u aghte uq _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ aghqefig gni _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ liisimake aat _ atanegh ut _ allgegh kau uq _ ramke anun _ J u d a h - m _ . _ M o s e s - e m _ pi mangite ai _ k i n g u n g h i _ J u d a h - m _ p r i e s t - n g u y a g h q a a n i l u k i _ .
enkaam _ tamaakut _ liigike aghagh aput _ w h a t e g l l u w a a q _ qayughllak _ ila a _ p r i e s t - e m _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e t u n _ ayuqe lghii _ tagi ma uq _ .
liilightuusagh t _ qelegh te kaqe aat _ priest- a _ kingunegh kesaghqagh ke ni luku _ levi- mun _ . _ atanegh ut _ priest- ngughte kau nghite uq _ liilightuusagh t _ pi sqe llegh itgun _ , _ iwernga _ priest- ngughte kau uq _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh qun _ unguvallegh mikun _ k e n l e t g h u u s a g h q a a n g h i l n g u g h q u n _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau lghiit _ , _ " _ priest- nge te te n _ quunperugllag _ , _ M e l c h i z e d e k - e m _ p r i e s t - n g u l l g h a t u n _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ simigh kaqe a _ liilightuusagh _ p r i e s t - e n e n g _ ayuqe lghii _ qayughllak _ k a y a a l n g u q l u _ atugh u nghite ngughk llu _ .
liilightuusagh t _ kina _ alngunak _ p i s t e s i m a n g i t a a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma ainkut _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ taaggun _ sighima llegh kun _ aglagh yaghqaaghte ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
T a a m _ sighima llegh m _ saaghw akun _ kiyaghnegh _ allangughte naagh nghite ngugh meng _ akeqe i ma uq _ .
iwernga _ t a w a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ akeqe i llghite uq _ L e v i - e m _ k i n g u n g h i _ priest- ngughte aqngata _ . _ J e s u s - n g i n a g h m u n _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ akeqe i ma uq _ , _ allangughte naanghite ak llu _ umyugagh gni _ ; _ ' _ elpek _ priest- nge te te n _ quunperugllag _ . _ ' _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ J e s u s - n g u u q _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ni _ pi pestaagh lleqe a _ . _ taana _ akequsagh _ pinigh aghagh uq _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ M o s e s - k u n _ .
sivugh nghaani _ p r i e s t - e t u y a g h t u q _ . _ tuqu nghata _ ila ita _ p r i e s t - e t _ nagnegh te aqe aat _ qepghaqagh at _ .
iwernga _ Jesus _ p r i e s t - n g u u q _ quunperugllag _ qayughllak _ unguva lleqe uq _ quunpeng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ J e s u s - e m _ iiwleng _ y u g u l i y a q l e g w i i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aglagh lghiit _ ellmi kun _ , _ qayughllak _ quunpeng _ unguva u uq _ manigugh utu tete na luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Jesus _ H i g h _ P r i e s t - n g u u q _ tuune i kayug _ sa meng _ a k l u k e g k a m n n e n g _ . _ agleghnagh uq _ , _ avute ite uq _ , _ pelungite uq _ , _ a a f t e n g n g a a q _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n e n g _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ q u u l v a q a q a a _ q u l i g h p i g a g h m u n _ qilag mun _ .
Jesus _ i l a n g i s t u n _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e s t u n _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ h i g h _ priest- a _ a g h q e r r a a g h y a g h q a a g u q _ , _ sivuke luni _ ellmi _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ taagken _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ . _ Jesus _ tuune aqngami _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ yug t _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ yug t _ nakmiigh yaghqaa ni luki _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e k a g h q a m e n g _ seghleghqe kayugu ghngaan _ alngunak _ yug stun _ . _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh an _ liilightuusagh t _ M o s e s - m u n _ , _ tagtalmi _ taakwani _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ akeqe i kau uq _ . _ taaggun _ akeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ni _ H i g h _ priest- ngughte stekaqe a _ , _ afkuyagh ngunaan _ , _ quunperugllag _ .
apeghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ : _ t a w a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - e l g u u k u t _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh ani _ saaghw akun _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i t e l l e g h p i g a a m _ qilag mi _ .
qepghagh te i u uq _ h i g h _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ s a n c t u a r y - m i _ . _ taana _ t a b e r n a c l e - e p i g u u q _ A t a n g h e m _ nekeftekaqe a _ , _ yug m _ nekeftekaqe nghite a _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ h i g h _ priest- a _ nakmike kau uq _ tuune i sqellug qu _ tunusagh neng _ , _ teghig ke sagh neng llu _ a g h q e r r a a g h e s q e l l u k u _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ H i g h _ p r i e s t - e v u t l u _ sa meng _ tuune yaghqagh lgu yaghqaa uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Jesus _ nuna mete yagh kuni _ p r i e s t - n g u n a y a n g h i t u q _ , _ qayughllak _ p r i e s t - e l g u u q _ nuna mi _ tuune i kayug neng _ tunusagh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liilightuusagh t _ p i s q e l l g h i s t u n _ .
P r i e s t - e t _ qepghaqagh u ut _ s a n c t u a r y - m i _ , _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h t u n _ a y u q e s u g n i l n g u g h m i _ . _ salin _ M o s e s - e m _ t a b e r n a c l e - a _ nekefte llghite luku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ apaqu te kaqe a _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ ulima naken _ tawatengwaaq _ uspeqe lleg mtun _ kelgutekagh mtun _ elpenun _ naayghagh mi _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus _ q e p g h a q a l i t k a q a a _ p r i e s t - n g u l u k u _ . _ qepghaqagh a _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ L e v i t e - e t _ p r i e s t - e t _ qepghagh llegh itneng _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pinigh aghagh lghii u uq _ akequsagh lug meng _ qayughllak _ taaggun _ J e s u s - e m _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh llu _ yug t llu _ . _ pinigh aghagh uq _ qayughllak _ tunemagh ite nga uq _ akequsagh tgun _ pinigh aghagh lghii tgun _ .
sivuligh _ akequsagh _ afkuyagh ite yagh kan _ , _ taawa _ tuungligh ite nayagh uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ afkuyagh lgu ni kaqe ai _ yug ni _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ aghnegh t _ kaate lleqe ut _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ , _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pi lleqe aqa _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n l l u _ J u d a h - g h m i i n u n l l u _ .
akeqe te yagh ragh aqa _ tawatete naanghite uq _ akequsagh kekagh mtun _ s i v u n g h i t n u n _ t a s l u q l u k i _ aghulaqe te aqe yamki _ E g y p t - m e n g _ . _ qaatke te mangite ut _ akequsagh ma _ pi sqe llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ avelghaqiinagh kaqe anka _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ .
aghnegh t _ taakut _ kingu itneng _ una _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pi lleqe aqa _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i n u n _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ : _ liilightuusagh nka _ umyugagh itnun _ kanagh lleqe anka _ , _ igaqe lleqe anka llu _ qamagun _ ilu itgun _ . _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ , _ ellngit _ yug ke lleqe anka _ .
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ apeghtugh yaghqaqe nghite a _ nunalgute ni _ , _ nalighmeng _ nengllugute ni _ liite sqellug qu _ atanegh _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ liisimake lleqe aatnga _ , _ u k a l i g h p i g a g h h a g h n e n g _ pingwaagh ghllag nun _ .
seghevute lleqe anka _ anaggute llegh it _ , _ allameng llu _ neqamike naanghite anka _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kaqe yamigu _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ , _ sivuligh _ akequsagh _ atugh u nanigh stekaqe a _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ alngunak _ atugh u nanigh luni _ aghyugh luni _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute lleqe uq _ .
akequsagh ke yuwhaagh mini _ kiyaghnegh m _ igaqe kaqe ai _ qelegh sagh t _ naten _ maniguute lleghqagh meng _ ellmi nun _ , _ naten llu _ nekefte lleghqagh a _ s a n c t u a r y _ nuna mi _ .
taana _ s a n c t u a r y _ yug t _ ulimakagh at _ tiinta u uq _ maalghug gneng _ ne leg _ . _ sivuligh m _ ne m _ ategh ke a _ agleghnagh lghii _ na _ . _ ilu nga ni te ut _ kenelghutag lghutagh k _ , _ tipele k _ neqekrangllagh leg k _ tuunekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
awalighnegh ani _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ safkaaghute m _ ila a _ ne m _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh _ na _ .
ilu ani _ taawa _ g o l d - e k _ aghqefig k _ p a n e g h r e g h a a s i k _ i n c e n s e - m u n _ . _ taawa llu _ salngag k _ qaspeghagh iqe ak _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ ategh kek _ ark- ek _ , _ neqangugh sighqagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh anun _ . _ A r k - e m _ imaqe ai _ g o l d - e k _ aqimleghutagh k _ manna- meng _ imaleg k _ , _ A a r o n - e m _ ayaviigh a _ piitqughvikekagh _ , _ maalghug llu _ lliivneqegtagh k _ uyghag k _ igaqugh vike nga lghiik _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh aneng _ .
qule ani _ a r k - e m _ taawa _ g o l d - e k _ c h e r u b i m - e k _ , _ y a q g h w i k _ taghneghagh nge te lghiik _ m e r c y _ s e a t - k u n _ . _ iwernga _ uumi _ pi llegh mi _ akuzi tkepagningite aput _ tamaakut _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ tiinta nite ngughk _ apeghiigh luku _ , _ taagken _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ p r i e s t - e t _ itegh aqe ut _ sivuligh mun _ ne mun _ qepghagh na luteng _ .
iwernga _ h i g h _ p r i e s t - n g i n a g h h a q _ itegh yaghqaa uq _ tuungligh ghhagh anun _ ne anun _ tiinta m _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ayumiqullegh mi _ . _ itegh nghmini _ tawavek _ ne mun _ iiwleng _ kelqesaghqagh u uq _ aaw aneng _ aghqe tkekagh m _ teghig ke sagh m _ . _ tuune i aqe uq _ aaw meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ellmi _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ yug t llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ . _ taana _ a a w k _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ pi u uq _ nalluke luteng _ pi ke ii te nun _ .
T a m a a k u t g u n _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liigike ste ainkut _ iteghvig _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ salin _ qelpeghte igate ngughk _ t a b e r n a c l e - a _ atuqe u luku _ .
taakut _ usputagh u ut _ m a a t e m u n _ . _ liigike ste ainkut _ tunusagh t llu _ aghqe tkekagh t llu _ teghig ke sagh t _ nallghusaghpagningite aat _ m a n i g u u t i s t e m _ sumeghnegh a _ .
tamaakut _ tunusagh t llu _ aghqe te t llu _ atuqe kau ut _ qaatkesaghqagh u luki _ qelegh sagh t _ negh ke neng llu _ , _ meghyaghqagh neng llu _ , _ pelungighsagh lleghqagh neng llu _ yugusigh itneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ tamaakut _ qelegh sagh t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh mun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ qaatkesaghqagh u ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe te yagh ragh aa _ atugh ughte llegh anun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tagi aqngami _ H i g h _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ , _ tagite kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ pinigh lghiit _ quya ste i llegh t _ whaa _ maaten _ w h a a n l e n g u u t _ . _ itegh kaqe a _ t a b e r n a c l e - a _ qilag mete ngughk _ , _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii llu _ pinigh aghagh lghii llu _ n u n a m e l n g u g h m e n g _ t a b e r n a c l e - m e n g _ . _ qilag mete ngughk _ t a b e r n a c l e - a _ yug t _ ulima aqe nghite aat _ enkaam _ nuna m _ pike nghite a _ .
taagken _ C h r i s t - a _ itegh kau uq _ ataasigh meng _ quunperugllag _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ iteme te na luta _ kenle u na an _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuune llegh mikun _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw ni _ , _ atugh gpenaki _ aaw it _ g o a t - e t l u _ , _ k a a w a g h a a t l u _ .
legh iightugh sagh t _ qelqe aqe ait _ p r i e s t - e n u n _ s i v i l l a g t i i s q e l l u k i _ yug t _ aaw itneng _ g o a t - e t _ , _ b u l l - e t _ , _ panellegh aneng llu _ k a a w a g h a a m _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ pelungighsagh na luki _ yug t _ yugusigh at _ t u g u k l i g h y u g n a g h t e s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tamaakut _ p e l u n g i g h i y a q l e g u k a t a _ yug t _ yugusigh itneng _ , _ taawa _ C h r i s t - a m _ aaw an _ wata _ pi lleqe ai _ . _ pelungigh lleqe ai _ umyugagh si _ sea-te u nghite ngugh neng _ ugpeqe i llegh neng _ elpesi nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ unguva lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ K e n l e n g i l n g u u g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ , _ C h r i s t - a _ seghleghqe llghite ngughk _ , _ tuune kau uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqe te u luni _ .
enkaam _ C h r i s t - a m _ tagite kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe te yagh ragh aa _ yug nun _ tuqlughkagh anun _ . _ C h r i s t - a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ a l l g e g h t e s q e l l u k u _ kenle ite ngughk _ pagite aq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ allgegh lleqe ait _ pagitagh t _ qayughllak _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuquma tke kaqe kangi _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ kiyaghtekagh t _ akequsagh ke yuwhaagh mi _ , _ iteme ma ut _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ .
igagh kun _ yug m _ igaqugh lleqe ai _ saghya ni _ kitumun _ pagite yaghqaa ni luki _ tuqu kuni _ . _ pagite i yaghqagh m _ a l l g e g h h n a a n g h i t i i _ pagite yaghqagh ni _ wetku _ kitum _ i p a p i g h q e g k a g u _ yuug _ tuquma ta a _ .
T a a m _ yug m _ igaqugh qu ai _ p i t n g u n a a n g h i t u t _ salin _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u k u _ . _ igaqugh qu ai _ p i t n g u g h l l e q u t _ kingu aneng _ tuqu kan _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ talwa _ akequsagh ke yuwhaagh _ p i t n g u m a n g i t u q _ a a w n g u n a n i _ .
M o s e s - e m _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ qamagte luki _ qelegh sagh t _ L i i g h t u u s a n i l n g u u t _ . _ taagken _ k a a w a g h a a t l u _ , _ g o a t - e t l u _ aaw itneng _ tugu tete luni _ megh meng _ akumekagh a _ . _ tugu tete luni _ kavilngugh meng _ w o o l - m e n g _ , _ avayagh aneng llu _ h y s s o p - e m _ neptekagh i _ aaw mun _ . _ taagken _ sivillagte aqe ai _ igagh t _ liilightuusagh lghutagh t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U n a n g u u q _ a a w k _ apeghiigh i lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ q e l g h u s k a n g a _ elpesi nun _ qaatke sqellug qu _ . _ "
T a w a t e n g n g w a a q _ M o s e s - e m _ sivillagte aqe aqe ai _ aaw meng _ t a b e r n a c l e - a _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ saghya t _ atuqekagh t _ maniguute llegh mun _ .
ipapestaaq _ liilightuusagh t _ p i l l g h i t n i _ , _ q a m a g t e v z i g l u n i _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ pelungigh kau uq _ aaw kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute naanghite ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ wetku qun _ a a w k _ maaqe gkan _ .
nuna mete ngughk _ t a b e r n a c l e - a _ , _ i l u n g a n i l n g u u t l u _ saghya t _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ saghya t _ pelungigh yaghqaa ut _ aaw itgun _ teghig ke sagh t _ . _ iwernga _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t _ saghya pig t _ pelungigh yaghqaa ut _ aghqe te tgun _ pinigh aghagh lghiit _ nuna mi _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ .
C h r i s t - a _ itegh mangite uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ yug t _ ulimaagh itnun _ . _ taana _ ipa pig tun _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h t u n _ ayuqe uq _ . _ yeghlegi _ qilag mun _ itegh kau uq _ enkaam _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh mete uq _ H i g h _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
C h r i s t - a _ nuna m _ h i g h _ priest- ngatu te _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ a y u m i q u n g h a n i _ h i g h _ priest- a _ itegh aqe uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ k e l q e l l u n i _ aaw meng _ ellmi _ pike nghite ke mineng _ . _ iwernga _ C h r i s t - a _ aghqe tke mangite uq _ ellmi neng _ u t e g h p a g t i i n a q _ ,
qayughllak _ ikfiqe nayagh uq _ uglagh inagh luku _ ima _ ulima llegh aneng _ nuna m _ . _ iwernga _ up-uni _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ tagi kau uq _ ataasigh meng _ quunperugllag _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe llegh t _ aghqe tke llegh mikun _ ellmi neng _ .
T a m a g h a g h h m i _ tuqu yaghqaa lghii _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ , _ enkaam _ t a a m _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ C h r i s t - a _ aghqe tke kau uq _ ellmi neng _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ yug lghute t _ . _ iwernga _ alla _ tagi kuni _ , _ aghqe tkesaghtugh u nghite uq _ ellmi neng _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ y u g u l i y a g h t u g h l l e q i i _ qelanqe i lghiit _ ellmi neng _ .
liilightuusagh t _ taghneghagh nge te lghii stun _ ayuqe ut _ pinigh lghii nun _ kaate yaghqagh nun _ , _ iwernga _ liilightuusagh t _ t a a k u g h p i g a a n g h i t u t _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ q e l e l l g h i s t u n _ J e w s - e t _ a g h q e r r a a g h u m a n g i n a g h a q u t _ ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ aghqerragh u llegh t _ u k m a n g i g h w a a g h p a g n i n g i t i i t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ manigugh yaghtugh nghmegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yug t _ m a n i g u u t e s t e n g i _ kiyaghnegh m _ u k m a n g i p i i g u m a k u m e n g _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ , _ seghleghni nanigh nayagh ut _ . _ enkaam _ aghqe tke i nanigh nayagh ut _ .
iwernga _ ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tamaakut _ aghqerragh u llegh t _ neqangugh ste aqe ait _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ ,
qayughllak _ aawite a _ b u l l - e t l u _ g o a t - e t l u _ seghleghqe llegh ighpagningite ait _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ C h r i s t - a _ tagi aqngami _ nuna mun _ pika qaa _ kiyaghnegh _ : _ " _ A g h q u t e y u g u m a n g i t u t e n l l u _ tunusagh yug mangite uten llu _ , _ iwernga _ yataaghqe kaqe an _ yugusigh _ whanga mnun _ .
efqugh ke mangite aten _ teghig ke sagh t _ iingunagh ita _ paneghtekagh t _ aghqefig gni _ nalighmeng _ aghqe te t _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
taagken _ whanga _ pi aqa _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tagi unga _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi na lunga _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ igaqugh kaqe kangatnga _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ . _ ' _ "
C h r i s t - a _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ A g h q u t e y u g u m a n g i t u t e n l l u _ tunusagh yug mangite uten llu _ . _ A g h q u t e y u g u m a n g i t u t e n _ teghig ke sagh neng _ iingunagh meng _ paneghtekagh neng _ aghqefig gni _ nalighmeng _ aghqe te neng _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ tamaakut _ e f q u g h s i m a n g i t a a t e n _ . _ " _ C h r i s t - a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liilightuusagh t _ q e l g h u t k a q e g h n g a a t k i _ tamaakut _ aghqe te t _ p i s q e l l u k i _ .
taagken _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ tagi unga _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi na lunga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ qamagte luki _ iqite qugh luki _ aghqe te lug t _ nengigh tgun _ nekegtekaqe a _ C h r i s t - a _ aghqe te u luku _ .
Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ q a a t k e s a q m i n i g u _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ pelungigh kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ tuune llegh mikun _ yugusigh ni _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ quunperugllag _ .
A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ p r i e s t - e t _ nekevghagh meng _ qepghaqagh teng _ pi aqe ait _ . _ U t e g h p a g t i i n a q _ tuune i aqe ut _ t a w a t e l k u l l g h i i n e n g _ aghqe te neng _ . _ T a w a l l i i m a _ tamaakut _ aghqe te t _ s e g h l e g h q e l l g h i g h i y a g h q a g h h a a n g h i t u t _ .
iwernga _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuune kaqe a _ ataasigh _ aghqe te _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ q u u n p e r u g l l a g m u n _ . _ taagken _ aqumekagh _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tawani _ C h r i s t - a _ utaqa i aqe uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegte lleghqagh anun _ anguyag i _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ .
taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ aghqe tke llegh kun _ , _ C h r i s t - a m _ quunperugllag _ naamigte stekaqe ai _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ .
agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaate ainkut _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ . _ sivuke luni _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ ,
" _ U n a n g u u q _ akequsagh ka _ yug mnun _ , _ kingu itneng _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ , _ liilightuusagh nka _ kanagh lleqe anka _ ilu itnun _ , _ igaqe lleqe anka llu _ u m y u w i i t g u n _ . _ "
taagken _ pi uq _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ neqamike naanghite anka _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ seghletun llu _ p i l l g h i t _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute kaki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ aghqe te t _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh lleqe ut _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ a l i n g i l l n g u n a a m t a _ itegh lleghqagh nge ukut _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ aaw akun _ J e s u s - e m _ .
qelpegh te ma ainkut llu _ t u m e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ unguvallegh mun _ safkaaghute kun _ ; _ taana _ safkaaghute _ yugusigh ke a _ .
P r i e s t - e l e g l l a a g u u k u t l u _ igleghte te i lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh aneng _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ t u g h a a g h e l t e g g u _ kiyaghnegh _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t a _ , _ n e g h y u k n g w a a g h l u k u _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh nge ukut _ qayughllak _ umyugaghllug put _ s i v i l l a g t a q a a g u t _ C h r i s t - a m _ aaw aneng _ u k m a n g i i g h t e s q e l l u k i _ , _ yugusigh put llu _ ughvughqe kau ut _ p e l u n g i l n g u g h q u n _ megh kun _ .
yeqay _ ataasiighmete luta _ sighima llegh mete kestagh lta _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ p i k n i k a m n n u n _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ enkaam _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ akequsagh ni _ .
yeqay _ sumeghtaghagh lta _ naten _ qiilngumighte te yaghqaa luta _ piniqe yaghqaa luki _ ila t _ , _ pinitun llu _ pi yaghqaa luta _ .
yeqay _ taaqe fqaamta _ qerngughte te nghmeng _ pi lta _ manigugh na luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ila ita _ p i i q e l l g h i s t u n _ . _ yeghlegi _ qerngughte te manginagh lta _ kayemughtu tete na luta _ . _ wata _ kayeme te manginagh lta _ qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ aghnegh a _ t u g h a a l g h i i _ .
seghleghqe sug aatagh kumta _ kingu aneng _ liite luku _ i p a p i l l e q _ , _ taawa _ aghqe te kaghqagh ite uq _ iqite sighqagh meng _ tamaavek _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
tamaakut _ tawaten _ pi lghiit _ a l i n g r u u g h m e n g _ utaqa i lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh aneng _ . _ atuqe lleqe ak _ uguqnagh ghllagek _ k e n g h e k _ n a a f q e n n a l u k i _ tamaakut _ k i p u l l g i n a a l g h i i t _ ellmi neng _ .
maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ l i i s i m a k i s t e t _ apegh katgu _ yuug _ qaatke te mangite ni luku _ M o s e s - e m _ liilightuusagh anun _ , _ n a n q i g t i s t e m _ nanglleg ke gpenaan _ tuqute ste lleqe a _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu _ naten mi _ a n g k a s l u g a n _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe agu _ yuug _ t u t m a a s g h a q i i q e l g h i i _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ pi aqe lghii _ sea-te u nghite ni luku _ a a w k _ apeghiigh tke aq _ a k e q u s a g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ ( _ qaywa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangiisigh ke kaqe ghngaagu _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ ) _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h i i q e l g h i i l l u _ nangllegtagh lghii gnun _ T a g n e g h a g n u n _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ ellnga u lghii _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ aghyuugh i yaghqagh _ , _ akite yaghqaqe anka _ seghletun _ p i l l g h i t _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ A t a n g h e m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ ellmi _ yug ni _ . _ "
tatame aatagh na pigte uq _ kina _ alngunak _ i i g g a n i s a g h q a q _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ !
neqamike kesi _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ sivugh nghaani _ liite yuwhaagh aqe yafsigu _ i p a p i l l e q _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ aghula i te kau usi _ ataasiighmete lusi _ qaywa _ i k f i q e g h l l a g h n g a a g h p e s i _ .
ilangakun _ yugtuqagh mi _ yug t _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe aisi llu _ amyuqetagh te kaqe aisi llu _ . _ ilangani _ nekevgha lgusigh aqe asi _ tamaakut _ amyuqetagh tkesigh lghiit _ .
nanglleg ke aqe asi _ a n u s i m i n g l l a g h v i g m e l n g u u t _ . _ talwa _ quya nga aqe usi _ yug t _ tugulagh nghatki _ saghya si _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ paninang _ sa lgu usi _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ q u u n p e k a g h q a m e n g _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ iilqayug gpenasi _ qayughllak _ ilutu manginagh kufsi _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ akileghtuusagh ghllag meng _ .
A k l u k n g w a a g h s i _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ atuqe yaghqaa luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ taagken _ allgegh lleqe asi _ akequsagh kekagh i _ .
katam _ igaqe nga lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ qantaghaqun _ taana _ tagi yaghqagh _ kaate lleqe uq _ ; _ kimaawi naanghite uq _ .
elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug nka _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ pegtekunigu _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ , _ unguva sigh gma _ efqugh ke naanghite aqa _ . _ "
iwernga _ whangkuta _ pegte ikagh stun _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ , _ naafqe lleg nge yaghqagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ukut _ enkaam _ unguva sigh put _ y u g u l i k a a g u k u t _ .
ugpeqe i llegh m _ l i i s i m a k e s t e n g n g w a a g h i i n k u t _ allgeghsaghqagh ke ni luku _ s i g h m a k e g k a g h p u t _ , _ i p a p i g h q u s i g u q _ esghagh yaghqaqe nghite ke mnnun _ .
ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ ayumigh m _ yug i _ i t a g n a q e l l e n g e g k a a g u t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ l i i g i k e g k a q a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe a _ nuna _ akuzite mikun _ . _ tamaakut _ aligh ite ngugh t _ ulimaagh u ut _ esghagh yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ abel _ tuune i kau uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tugukligh yugnagh aghagh lghii meng _ aghqe te meng _ C a i n - e m _ aghqe tkekagh aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ abel _ elqughutngagh lghii u ni luku _ yuug _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ i p a p i g h q e g k a q a a _ abel _ elqughute nga ni luku _ tugukligh llegh mikun _ tunusagh i _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh mikun _ abel _ paninang _ akuzi u uq _ , _ tuqu kaayagh ghngaaghmi _ .
U p e q i l l e g h q u n _ enoch _ mayugh te stekau uq _ qilag mun _ enkaam _ nanghiigh llghite a _ tuqu llegh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ naalke llghite a _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugu kaqe kanga _ . _ mayugh llghite luni _ qilag mun _ , _ igaqe nga kau uq _ E n o c h - e m _ e f q u g h t e k a q a a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
U g p e q i l l n g u n a n i _ kitum _ alngunak _ e f q u g h t e p a g n i n g i t a a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ tagi yu kuni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpeqe pestaagh yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh lgu ni luku _ , _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ai llu _ i v a g h i p i i l g h i i t _ ellmi neng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ N o a h - m _ nagate kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelenga sagh ughte tke ai _ tamaakut _ salin _ pi igate luki _ . _ enkaam _ qaatkellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ angyaghpag ngllagh kau uq _ nengllugute ni _ y u g u l i n a l u k i _ uleve llegh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ N o a h - m _ nuna m _ yug i _ nanqigte stekaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a g h y u u g h e s q e l l u k i _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ apallugh ke luku _ N o a h - m _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a a _ elqughutngagh llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ A b r a h a m - e m _ qaatke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqlugh aqe yatni _ aghulaqe sqellug qu _ ila anun _ nuna m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke a _ taana _ nuna _ ellnga nun _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ unite kaqe a _ ellmi _ nuna ni _ nalluke luku _ navek _ pi naqe te ni _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghtekau uq _ nunatagh u luni _ nuna mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh ani _ . _ tiintanite kau uq _ katam _ I s a a c - e n k u k _ J a c o b - e n k u k _ p i l l g h e g k e t u n _ . _ E l k e g k e n k a l l u _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a a k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ taana _ nuna _ .
abraham _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ utaqa i u lghii _ kiyaghte na luni _ ne ghllag mi _ tunemaghtuqagh mi _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ uspeqe i ste nga llu _ u l i m a g h i s t e n g a l l u _ ne ghllag m _ .
abraham _ n a n e v g a g h l l a g h n g a a g h m i _ , _ sarah- llu _ quminge yaghqaa nghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ paninang _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ sarah _ quminge kau uq _ , _ qayughllak _ neghyuke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pi lleqe ni luku _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ abraham _ tuqu yaghtugh ngestagh kau ghngaaghmi _ , _ paninang _ kinguneghtughqagh u ghllag kau uq _ . _ ellngit a _ u g l a g h t a l n g i t _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ q i l a g a m e l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ , _ k e s t e k a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n l l u _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ esnagh m _ .
