qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ yug t _ paninang _ kiyaghtekau ut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ tuqu llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tuqu laghate te kau lghiit _ a l l g e g h t e g p e n a k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ ellmeggnun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ esghagh kaqe ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ u y a v a n l l u k i _ sivu meggnite luki _ quyake kaqe ait llu _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ yug t _ nunatagh u ni luteng _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ nuna mun _ pike nghite ni luteng _ .
tamaakut _ tawaten _ akuzi lghiit _ , _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ apegh u aat _ nuna kaghqagh yug ni luteng _ ellmeggnun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ .
sumegh ke kaqsagh kumegteggu _ taana _ nuna _ unitekagh eng _ , _ uteghte lleghqagh lgu nayagh ut _ .
yeghlegi _ piyuke aghagh kaqe aat _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ nuna _ , _ q i l a g h m e l n g u q _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ kayngu yug igate uq _ kiyaghnegh ke ni nghatni _ . _ talwa _ yataaghqe te kaqe ai _ ne ghllag meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe kanga _ abraham _ , _ " _ I s a a c - e k u n _ kingunegh ghllag u lleqe uten _ . _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ A b r a h a m - e m _ neghyuke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ nanghiiqu aqe yatni _ . _ enkaam _ aghqe te kete yaghqaaghtekagh a _ kezemagh ghhagh _ ighnegh ni _ , _ isaac _ .
A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ u n g u v a g h t i y a q l e g u n i l u k u _ tuqukagh neng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqute snanigh aqe yagu _ isaac _ , _ A b r a h a m - e m _ v e g h t e k a l l g h u u q a q a a _ isaac _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ I s a a c - e m _ quya stekaqe ak _ J a c o b - e n k u k _ E s a u - n k u k _ , _ tungsigh te kaqe ak _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quya ste sqellug kek _ aag naqe kaghqagh ik _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ J a c o b - e m _ , _ tuqu naqngu luni _ quya stekaqe ak _ a l l a k a q a g h t a a g k e n k a _ ighnegh kek _ J o s e p h - e m _ . _ taagken _ qungughte luni _ ayaviigh mikun _ manigugh kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ J o s e p h - e m _ , _ k e n l e t g h u u n n a q e l l g h a n i _ unguvallegh mi _ , _ akuzite kegka qaa _ aghulaqe lleghqagh at _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ E g y p t - m e n g _ . _ apeghtugh te kaqe ai llu _ neghqwaagh ni _ naten _ sa lleghqagh i _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ M o s e s - e m _ angayuqagh gkenka _ iighaghtugh kaqe ak _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ allgellegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ esghagh ka ak _ y u u k e g t e p i g l l e g h i i _ , _ alinge ma ite ngugh k llu _ qaatke te nghite yaghqaa lutek _ umiileg m _ qelegh te llegh anun _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ moses _ , _ yugughte yami _ ighsa kau uq _ ighnegh ke ste nghmeng _ P h a r a o h - m _ panig anun _ .
yeghlegi _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ikfiqe lgusigh na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ a v e l g h a g l u k u _ efqugh yug na llegh a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ mulu yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
itupill _ sumeghtaghagh tke kaqe a _ ikfiqe lleghqagh ni _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ itagnagh aghagh ni luku _ a k l u n g i l g h u t a n g a n e n g _ E g y p t - e m _ . _ S u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g w i i _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh t _ aga _ s i v u m e l n g u u t _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ M o s e s - e m _ unite kaqe a _ E g y p t _ a l i n g e l l n g u n a n i _ umiileg m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ . _ iilqayug mangite uq _ qayughllak _ esghagh lghii stun _ pi kaqe kanga _ aliite nghite ngughk _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ M o s e s - e m _ qelqe aqe ai _ yug t _ P a s s o v e r - e s q e l l u k i _ , _ qelegh te kaqe a llu _ aaw _ s i v i l l a g t a a t e s q e l l u k u _ amig tgun _ . _ enkaam _ yaquleg an _ tuqu llegh m _ tuqute llghite ai _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh it _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ aghviqagh ke aat _ R e d _ S e a _ nikimqun _ qute stun _ . _ iwernga _ E g y p t - e g h m i i t _ , _ a g h v i g h n a q u t k e n g n g u l u t e n g _ pekagh qu te kau ut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ aghnegh ni _ uzivgagh kaqe aat _ J e r i c h o - m _ mingllu ta a _ . _ taagken _ mingllu te a _ u l l e g h a a t k a a g u q _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ R a h a b - e m _ , _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ upugha te kaqe ak _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ riirngi steke t _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llghite uq _ maligte te luni _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
wataqaaghaq _ u n g i p a m s u g u l l a m s i i _ yug neng _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ? _ taake ghllag yaghqaa ut _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luki _ G i d e o n - e n k u t _ , _ B a r a k - e n k u t _ , _ S a m s o n - e n k u t _ , _ J e p h t h a h - n k u t _ , _ D a v i d - e n k u t _ , _ S a m u e l - e n k u t _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t l u _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ ila i _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ : _ kayaalqe kaqe ait _ ataneghpag u llegh t _ , _ elqughute nga luteng _ igleghte te i kau ut _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh i _ tugu kaqe ait _ . _ ila ita _ l i o n - e t _ q a a n g h i t _ meqete ste aqe ait _ .
kumaghugh ghllaget _ k e n g h e t _ qaamte aqe ait _ , _ anag aqe luki llu _ tuqute i stekaghqagh teng _ savigpag kun _ . _ kayaate aqe ut _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i llghite a _ iknaqe ughtaghkagh it _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t _ i k n a q u g h t e g h l l a g a q u t _ enkaam _ kayaalqe aqe ait _ ila ita _ nuna t _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ aghnagh t _ t u q u m a s l i i t e n g _ veghte aqe ait _ tuqu llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h h n e g h a k i _ . _ ila i _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe ste ghllag aqe ait _ pegte sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ . _ iwernga _ tuqu na luteng _ pi aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ u n g u v a g h t e s q e l l u t e n g _ p i n i g h a t a g h a l g h i m u n _ unguvallegh mun _ .
ila i _ legasiighwagh te kaqe luki _ , _ ila i _ kagsagmig aqe luki _ , _ ila i _ q i i p r a g h u s i g h l u k i _ anusimingllagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ m i l u g h p a g a a t a m e n g _ tuqute aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ yugusigh at _ pilagtugh luki _ malghughqe aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ tuqute aqe ait _ savigpag kun _ . _ ila i _ t e m g i _ tamaani _ igleghte aqe ut _ aate luteng _ penniigh m llu _ g o a t - e m l l u _ amigh aneng _ . _ ila i _ akluma pigte lghiit _ , _ yug t _ amyuqetagh tkekagh it _ , _ seghletun llu _ kiyaghute ke ait _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ pinighpagunghite ut _ kiyaghte lgusigh yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ ! _ ila i _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ temngi _ tamaani _ iglegha kau lghiit _ paaghqagh igh llegh ani _ , _ naayghagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte aqe luteng _ qaye ni _ , _ laawaagh ni llu _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ i t a g n a q e g k a q i i _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ ! _ naqamllu _ a l l g e g h s i m a n g i t a a t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ pinigh aghagh lghii u uq _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ whatete uq _ : _ akequsagh ni _ pi naanghite ai _ ellngit nun _ w h a n g k u n g u n a k i _ . _ qerngagh emta _ qamagte luta _ iighwigh lleqe ainkut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liigike ste ainkut _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ naten _ kiyaghte llegh megteggun _ . _ maaten _ uvitangigh luta _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ k i l g a a q u s t e s t u n _ iqite lteki _ qamagte luki _ uqigkutagh t _ , _ seghleghqe llegh t llu _ iglagute lghiit _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ sagiqe luta ngam _ kilgaaqu lta _ s i v u m n n i l n g u g h m u n _ ,
esghagh ma ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ piinligh i ste nga llu _ apeghiigh i ste nga llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mta _ . _ kayngu nagh uq _ tuqu lleghqagh _ qaquuragh kun _ , _ iwernga _ J e s u s - e m _ pi tke mangite a _ kayngusaghagh te llegh _ . _ yeghlegi _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ikfiqe na luni _ qaquuragh kun _ apallugh ke luku _ quya llegh _ allgeghsaghqagh ni _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ aqumga uq _ aghenqignegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ Jesus _ . _ iilqayug mangite uq _ qaywa _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ u g u m i k e r a a g h l l a g h n g a a t n i _ . _ tawaten _ elpek si llu _ ilutu llghite te naanghite usi llu _ iilqayug naanghite usi llu _ .
seghleghqe nghite naqutke llegh gpesi _ salin _ yug nun _ tuqute sigate aisi _ .
puygu stekagh i _ ilutughsagh sigh t _ akuzite t _ ungipaate i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ighnegh ke ni lusi _ ? _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ avelghaqiinagh gpenaan _ A t a n g h e m _ nallghusagh nghaten _ , _ iilqayug gpenang llu _ aghyuugh nghaten _ .
qayughllak _ qamagte luki _ piniqekagh ni _ A t a n g h e m _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ q a a t k e s q e l l u n i _ , _ aghyuugh aqe ai llu _ tuguklighkagh ni _ avaqutagh u luki _ . _ "
tugukligh aqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ pi aqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ avaqutagh teng _ ata ita _ aghyuugh aqe ait _ n a l l g h u g h q e n n a l u k i _ .
qamagte luteng _ avaqutagh t _ aghyuugh lleg nge aqe ut _ . _ aghyuugh lleg nge nghite kuvek _ taawa _ ata ite ngugh u uten _ enkaam _ avaqutagh pig ke nghite aaten _ .
T a a m _ saaghw akun _ , _ ata mta _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ apeghtugh na luta _ q a a t k e s q e l l u t e n g _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ q u u l v a g h a q a p u t _ . _ enkaam _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ q a a t k a t a g h a g h y a g h q a q a g h p u t _ unguva na luta _ .
ata mta _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ aghyuugh aqe inkut _ natengiighhaq _ , _ sumegh meggni _ elqughte luku _ aghyuugh i u ni luteng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ pinighqe lleghqagh mnnun _ p e l u n g i i g h t e s q e l l u t a _ ellmi tun _ .
quya niite uq _ aghyuugh lleg nge negh mta _ qayughllak _ aqnighte aqe kanginkut _ . _ iwernga _ tagtalmi _ , _ l i i t f i k n e m t e g g u _ , _ nekeggmellegh nge aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yagute aqe ukut _ elqughute luta _ .
keveg teki _ iigge si _ qughagh nga lghiit _ , _ taagken _ i k n a q u g h s a g h t e k i _ k a y a a l n g u u t _ segesqugh si _ !
taklaghte ki _ tume i _ tutmagh llegh gpek _ , _ taagken _ k a y a a l n g u q _ ighu n _ aane qagh naanghite uq _ naflugh mineng _ , _ iwernga _ naallghute lleqe uq _ .
kiyaghte naqe tek _ n e k e g g m e t u l l u s i _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ kiyaghte naqe tek llu _ s e g h l e g h q e l l n g u n a s i _ . _ kinku t _ alngunak _ pelungite nghite ngugh t _ esghagh naanghite aat _ atanegh _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ luuraq _ a l l g e g h h n e g h i s a a g h a a t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ nagu tete yaqunaan llu _ sungagh nite ngughk _ akugh _ seghleliighqagh ii luni _ naafqii yaghqagh _ yug lghute meng _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ seghleghqesagh u aghte ut _ s e x - k u n _ , _ nalighmeng _ kinku t _ alngunak _ q u u l v a g h i n g h i s a a g h t u t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ E s a u - t u n _ . _ akike kaqe kanga _ pagitaghqagh ni _ ataasigh ghhagh mun _ neghyaghqagh mun _ .
liisimakagh i _ t a a m _ kingu aneng _ , _ a l l g e g h s u g a q n g a m i g u _ a ta mi _ quya ste llegh a _ , _ ata an _ ighsake kaqe a _ . _ E s a u - m _ allangughtepagningite kaqe a _ apeghiighkagh ni _ , _ qaywa _ qunituumagh mi _ tungsigh ghngaaghmigu _ a ta mi _ quya ste i llegh a _ .
sivunegh gpesistun _ ayuqe nghite usi _ M o u n t _ S i n a i - m u n _ pikagh stun _ . _ esghagh yaghqagh at _ , _ saafte yaghqagh at llu _ . _ tawani _ mamleg ghllagukagh _ , _ naafte ghllagukagh _ , _ naayghagh llu _ kumaghugh ghllagu lghii _ .
nagaqugh qu aat _ qalghightu an _ q a l g h i g h l l e g h h i i _ , _ nagaqugh qu aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ . _ iwernga _ nepiigh qigh sqekagh at _ ,
qayughllak _ tugukligh yug nghite kangat _ qelegh i llegh a _ w h a t e l n g u q _ , _ " _ taana _ naayghagh _ , _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ teghig ke sagh m _ saaftekunigu _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh pestaagh u uq _ m i l u g h p a g a a t a m e n g _ . _ "
M o s e s - e m _ esgha qaa _ kakavaatagh na pigte lghii _ repall _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ E l l n g a a t a l l _ ungelegte unga _ a l i n g r u u g h e m _ . _ "
iwernga _ katam _ elpek si _ tagi kau usi _ M t _ . _ Z i o n - m u n _ , _ qilag m _ J e r u s a l e m - n g a n u n _ , _ ne ghllag anun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kestekau nghite ngugh nun _ yaquleg nun _ qerngughte tekagh nun _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luteng _ .
tagi kau usi _ qerngughte te llegh itnun _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ugpeqagh t _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ qilag mi _ ategh it _ igaqe nga ut _ igagh tgun _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ n a n q i g t i s t e n g i t n u n _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ yug t _ , _ taghneghagh itnun llu _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ iighwigh stekagh nun _ .
tagi kau usi _ J e s u s - m u n _ , _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsaghraghagh ngllagh kau uq _ . _ tagi kau usi llu _ s i v i l l a g t a a t k a m u n _ aaw anun _ J e s u s - e m _ . _ pinigh aghagh uq _ A b e l - e m _ aaw aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute ai _ seghleghqe llegh t _ J e s u s - e m _ aaw akun _ .
enkaam _ kelenga tek _ , _ nagate yu nghite gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi lghii _ . _ sivunegh mta _ n a g a s u n g h i t k a q a a t _ k e l e n g a s a a g h i l l g h a _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ enkaam _ anag mangite aat _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ . _ whangkuta _ aghyuugh aghagh lleqe ainkut _ nagate yu nghite kumteggu _ kelenga sagh u llegh a _ qilag meng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqngami _ M o u n t _ S i n a i - m e n g _ , _ me an _ ufsugute ka qaa _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ akeqe i ma uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ u f s u g u n n e q i g l l e q a q a _ nuna _ , _ iwernga _ qilag llu _ ufsug u lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ akuzillegh an _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ u f s u g u n n e q i g l l e q a q a _ nuna _ , _ " _ l i i g i k e s t e n g n g w a a g h i i n k u t _ whaten _ , _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ulimaagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ ufsug te yaghqagh t _ . _ T a m a a k u n g i n a g h h a a t _ u f s u g u t e p a g n i n g i l n g u u t _ t a m a a n l l e q u t _ quunperugllag _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ tuune kanginkut _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ufsug te yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ manigugh lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ efqugh nagh leg kekagh atun _ alinge lleg ligh luta llu _ q u u l v a g h i l l e l i g h l u t a l l u _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ut _ naafqii lghii u uq _ kenegh _ .
piniqe kestagh teki _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ .
upugha manginagh tek _ aqiiyag nun _ qayughllak _ ila ita _ upugha te aqe ait _ nalluke luki _ yaquleg u ta i _ .
neqamike luki _ a n u s i m i n g l l a g h v i g m e l n g u u t _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ a n u s i m i n g l l a g h v i g m e t e l l g h i s t u n _ . _ neqamike luki _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ ikfiqe lghii stun _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sii vag qite ggu _ nengughte te llegh _ enkaam _ ugi t llu _ nulighh t llu _ a t a a s i i g h m e t u l l i t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ gelgaghniigh lghiit _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila aneng _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ pakignegh u gpenasi _ mani mun _ , _ itagnagh aqe tek llu _ seat- ta leg gpesistun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ U n i n n a a n g h i t n g w a a g h a m s i _ ; _ p e g g n a a n g h i t n g w a a g h a m s i _ . _ "
enkaam _ t e t u l l n g u n a a m t a _ whaten _ pi lta _ , _ " _ atanegh _ kayute ke aqa _ ! _ alinge naanghite unga _ yug t _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
neqamike luki _ i g l e g h u t i s t e s i _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ neqamike luki _ naten _ kiyaghtekau ta i _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg lgu naqe tek _ ellngistun _ .
Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ almesiqe aqe a _ ighivgaq _ , _ aghneghmi _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ .
iqitute ste gpenasi _ i p a p i l l e g h m e n g _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh nun llu _ allakaayagh gnun llu _ apeghtuusagh nun _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh teki _ ilu si _ , _ nakaan _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh t _ negh ke neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ taakut _ neqe t _ liilightuusagh it _ qaatke gkufsiki _ ayepsugighsagh naanghite ait _ ilu si _ .
P r i e s t - e t _ qepghagh lghiit _ t a b e r n a c l e - m i _ ineghtekau ut _ neghe lleghqagh itneng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ aghqefig mteggun _ .
H i g h _ P r i e s t - e m _ tagite aqe ai _ aaw it _ teghig ke sagh t _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ aghqe te kete na luki _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ iwernga _ kemegkwaagh it _ teghig ke sagh t _ ne ghllag meng _ iqitute luki _ paneghte aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ J e s u s - l l u _ iqitute kau uq _ ne ghllag meng _ . _ tawani _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ pelungighsagh na luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mineng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ne ghllag meng _ whangkuta llu _ aglagh lta _ J e s u s - m u n _ , _ seghletun _ a k u z i t k e s q e l l u t a _ katam _ ellnga _ seghletun _ a k u z i t k e l l g h i s t u n _ .
nuna mi _ whani _ q u u n p e k a g h q a m e n g _ ne ghllag ite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ u t a q a n g w a a g h p u t _ negh ghllag _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
J e s u s - k u n _ iiwleng _ aghqe tke i lta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ aghqe te put _ usuqe i llegh ke aput _ a p e n e m t e g g u _ Jesus _ A t a n g h u n i l u k u _ .
puygu gpenaan _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ , _ tuune te aqe tek llu _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ aghqe te u ut _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qaatke teki _ i g l e g h u t i s t e s i _ atuqe luki _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ kelengake i u ut _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ n a n q i g s a g h q a a t s e n g _ . _ quya nghite ste gpenaki _ i g l e g h u t i s t e s i _ , _ itupill _ qaatke llegh gpesigun _ qepghaqagh teng _ pi lleqe ait _ quyake sigh ke luki _ . _ qaatke nghite kufsiki _ kayusiitepagningite aisi _ .
yughagh tke tekut _ . _ liisimake ukut _ umyugagh mta _ anaggute llghite na ainkut _ , _ qayughllak _ iiwleng _ p i y u k e l q a g h p u t _ elqughutngagh lghii _ pi yaghqaa luku _ .
T a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ kayagte amsi _ y u g h a a t k e s q e l l u n g a _ qantaghaqun _ elpesi nun _ uteghnigh na lunga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ n e k e g g m e l l e l i t i s t e m _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ aaw mikun _ P e n n i i g h n i i g h t e g h l l a g u g h t e k a a g u q _ penniigh nun _ . _ aaw an _ atugh u yaghqaaghte stekaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ q u u n p e k a g h q a q _ akequsagh a _ .
yughagh unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ t u u n e s q e l l u s i _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pinigh lghii meng _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh a _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n l l u _ ilu gpesinun _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ligu _ efqugh nagh lghii _ ellmi nun _ . _ Christ _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ki _ lata nka _ qayughllak _ kayeme yug aqe amsi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ takestaaghhaa luku _ lata amsi _ .
liisimake sug amsi _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n e n g _ , _ T i m o t h y - m e n g _ , _ a a n e s i m a a q _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ K a a t e l g h a g h t u g h y a q a n _ qerngagh emtung _ esghagh yaghtugh lleqe amsi _ .
quyake aghte nakesi _ qamagte luki _ i g l e g h u t i s t e s i _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ . _ U g p e q a a l g u t e t l u _ italy- meng _ pi t _ quyake aghte na ke ii sigh nge uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii _ kayusillegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ J a m e s - m e n g _ pi u ut _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a n e n g _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ A t a n g h e m l l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ lata aqe unga _ J e w s - e t _ ugpeqagh itnun _ mingite nga lghii nun _ tea- ma ani _ . _ quyake amsi _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ quya aqe tek _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh negh gpesini _ ,
qayughllak _ liisima kasi _ seghleliigh llegh gpesi _ n a n g h i i q u n g w a a t _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nuqete neghtughsagh na lusi _ .
taagken _ nuqete neghtu llegh i _ nagnegh nga steggu _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ a n g t a n i i l l e q u s i _ , _ iighwigh lleqe usi _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenasi _ .
naligh i _ peghqinellegh nge yu kuni _ tungsigh li _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ighlegite ghllag uq _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ t u u n e g k a y u w a a _ qamagte luku _ yuug _ aapte lghii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe aisi _ tungsigh kufsi _ .
enkaam _ aapte tek _ ugpeqe i lleg ligh luku _ m a l g h u k l i l l n g u n a a n _ . _ malghukli nga lghii _ imaghllug stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ anuqe m _ tenge qagh te aqe kanga _ .
malghukli nga lghii _ ataasiighte igate uq _ sa llegh mikun _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ T a w a t e l n g u q _ yuug _ talwa _ sumeghtaghagh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh u lleqe ni luni _ atanegh meng _ .
yeqay _ akluma lghii _ u g p e q a a l g u n _ quya li _ q u u l v a g h t e s t e n g n g a l l e g h m i n e n g _ .
yeqay _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ u g p e q a a l g u n _ quya li _ q u s e v e g t e s t e n g n g a l l e g h m i n e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ p i i t e s i g h a g h e s t u n _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghmini _ m a a t n e g h q w a a g h l l a g a q e l g h i i _ , _ piitesighagh at _ paligh ste luki _ . _ taagken _ piitesighagh at _ ifkagh qu uute aqe ut _ , _ pinigh niigh te aqe ai _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ yuug _ sa kestagh ghngaaghmi _ aviighute lleqe uq _ .
quyanaghhalek _ yug m _ nanghiiqu lleg ni _ n u q e t u t k a y u g i _ . _ suflughtekumiki _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ akileghtuusagh ni _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ p i n i q i s t e m i n u n _ .
kina _ alngunak _ nanghiiqu lleg nge gkuni _ whaten _ pi te qugh a mi _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe ste naqutke aanga _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ nanghiiqu lleg nge yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe ste naqute kete yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ piyuke lleg lug an _ nanghiiqu lleg nge sta qaa _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ sivuke luku _ piyuke lleg lug an _ sayug aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh m _ naapte aqe a _ .
piyuke lleg lug m _ allgegh ste aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh _ angli nghmini _ tuqu llegh ughte aqe uq _ .
piniqekagh mni _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ puughtesigh gpenasi _ .
qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit llu _ , _ s a l l g h w a a g h h i i l n g u u t l u _ tunusagh t _ qilag meng _ pi u ut _ . _ tamaakut _ ata meng _ pi u ut _ u l i m a g h i s t e n g a n e n g _ qamagte luni _ nighug m _ ; _ allangughte igate uq llu _ , _ mamleg ste i igate uq llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ piyuke llegh ke a _ , _ t u u n a l u t a _ nutaghagh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ungipagh akun _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h e m _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ whangkuta _ m e g n u n a l l e g h p i g a a s q e l l u t a _ u l i m a a g h y a g g a g h m i n e n g _ .
piniqekagh mni _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ neqamike luku _ una _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ nagate yu kestagh luni _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ a k u z i i g h a g h t a f q a a m i l l u _ s a k r a a g a g h a g h t a f q a a m i l l u _ ,
qayughllak _ s a k r a a m _ kayusiite igate aisi _ pinitun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyukekagh anun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pegte ggu _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqe aqe kesi _ . _ Q u s e v e g n g a g h p e s i _ tugukligh teki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piite tesiigh aqe ai _ ilu gpesigun _ , _ qayughllak _ y u g u l i y a g h q a q i i s i _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ .
nagate ghesnagh gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ itupill _ atuqe teki _ . _ puughte aqe usi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ nagate ghesnagh nghpesiki _ atuqe gpenaki _ .
yuug _ nagate ghesnagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ atuqe gpenaki _ , _ taghneghaghqugh lghii stun _ ayuqe uq
tunute kuni _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ puygu lleqe a _ n a t e t u l e n i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh i _ iteme te ta iqe ut _ yug neng _ . _ yug m _ liinnaquma inagh kumiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ puygu gpenaki _ atuqe gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya saghqagh ke a _ s a l l g h a k u n _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh yu k _ ugpeqagh ghllag u ni luni _ , _ naqam _ a k u z i t k e s a g h q a q e n g h i l k e m m i n e n g _ akuzi kayug _ temngi _ p u u g h t e n g n g u u q _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ ugpegh llegh a _ sea-te u nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ p i l l g h a n i _ yuug _ u g p e l l e p i i l g u k u m i _ , _ kayusigh yaghqaqe ai _ yaywaali t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ seghleliigh nghata _ , _ nuqete yaghqaa uq llu _ seghlegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ ugpeqe i u te gpesineng _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ , _ A t a n g h a n e n g _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h e m _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaki _ ila i _ yug m _ megnu nagh aghagh ni luki _ ila meggneng _ .
maalghug _ yug k _ itegh yagh kayek _ qerngughte te vig gpesinun _ , _ aag llegh a _ aarragh luni _ , _ g o l d - m e n g _ alangqughiitagh ightugh luni _ , _ aag llegh a _ aatkagh lug kaghte luni _ ,
taana _ aarragh nga lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ whagun _ aqume i _ pinigh llegh akun _ aqumutagh m _ , _ " _ naqam _ akluma lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ tawani _ nekevgha _ , _ " _ nalighmeng _ , _ " _ aqume i _ itegagh ma _ saaghw akun _ , _ "
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ p a k i g g u l l e q a s i _ ila i _ yug t _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ nagate aghte tek qun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ a k l u m a a l g h i i t _ nuna mi _ whani _ u g p e q i l l e g h t u s q e l l u k i _ . _ nakmike kaqe ai _ t u g u k l i g h t e n g u l u k i _ ataneghpag u llegh mineng _ , _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ yug minun _ , _ piniqe i nga lghii nun _ ellmi neng _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ a k l u m a a l g h i i t _ yug t _ ukaligh u ste aqe asi _ . _ liisima kasi _ a k l u n g i l n g u u t _ piyaqleg iighqagh ke aisi _ , _ aglagh te aqe lusi _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
E l l n g i n g u u t _ seghletun _ akuzi tke i lghiit _ q u u l v a g h n g a l g h i i m e n g _ ategh aneng _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ ategh _ tuunekagh _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ pike kangisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ L i i l i g h t u s a a _ unaagh nge uq _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ e l p e n e n g _ katam _ . _ " _ Q a a t q e g k u f s i g u _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ , _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi usi _ .
iwernga _ p a k i g g u s k u f s i k i _ ila i _ yug t _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ , _ q a a t k e n n a a n g h i t a g h s i l l u _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ .
kitum _ qaatkesagh ghngaaghmiki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ ataasigh _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ , _ qamagte luki _ q a a t k e n g n g u n g h i t i i _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ yugtagh gpenang _ . _ " _ gelgaghniigh nghite yagh ghngaaghpek _ yugtagh kuvek _ taawa _ q a a t k e n g n g u n g h i t a t e n _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ sa llegh gpesigun _ piraamsi lusi _ qayughllak _ elpesi u usi _ nanqigte yaghqagh t _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh qun _ liilightuusagh kun _ . _ T a a m _ liilightuusagh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ atuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekunisi _ nanglleg yagute naanghite aisi _ , _ nanglleg yagute nghite kufsiki _ yug lgute si _ . _ iwernga _ nanglleg ke gkufsiki _ yug lgute si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute lleqe aisi _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ kina _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu unga _ , _ " _ iwernga _ t a a m _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ y u g u l i n a a n g h i t a a _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun _ . _ sasii lleqe a ngam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ a n e g h n e g h q i l l n g u n a n i _ ?
sa nayagh tsi _ u g p e q a a l g u t s i _ aatkagh isag yagh kan llu _ , _ neqangisag yagh kan llu _ ?
tuune gpenaan _ a k l u k e g k a a n e n g _ temngi _ whaten _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste naagh aaten _ ; _ sunanguq _ neghyaghqagh nge i llu _ aate kangi llu _ maqagh lghii meng _ , _ " _ s a s i i l l e q a n Ê¼ n g a m _ akuzite si _ a n e g h n e g h q i l l n g u n a t e n g _ ?
ugpeqe i llegh llu _ tawatete uq _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh kun _ atuqe nghite kuni _ sasii nghite uq _ .
kina _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ elpek _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu uten _ , _ whanga _ a n e g h n e g h q e l l e l g u u n g a _ . _ " _ keleg u vike nga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpeneng _ aneghneghqagh igh llghite ngugh meng _ , _ keleg u vike lleqe amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mneng _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mkun _ .
ugpegh kan _ ataasigh ghhagh u ta a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taana _ pinigh uq _ ! _ tughneghagh t llu _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ taana _ e n k a a n g a m _ alingruugh aqe ut _ , _ ungelegte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe kangi _ .
uyuq _ n a l l u u q a q _ yuug _ , _ paninang _ l i i g i k i g a s i g u u _ ugpeqe i llegh _ a n e g h n e g h q i l l n g u n a n i _ sasii nghite u langa _ ?
sangan _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh qagh kagu _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ s e g h l e g h q u m a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ? _ tugukligh kaqe a _ abraham _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ atuqe kaqe a _ a n e g h n e g h q e l l e g h m i k u n _ aghqe te kaqe yamigu _ ighnegh ni _ isaac _ a g h q e f i g e g n e k u n _ .
L i i g i k s i g u u _ ? _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh llu _ qerngagh egmek _ qepghagh kayugu uk _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ i i g h w i g h t e k a q a a _ a n e g h n e g h q e l l e g h q u n _ .
enkaam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ p i l l g h i t _ A b r a h a m - e m e n g _ apeghiigh kau ut _ , _ " _ A b r a h a m - e m _ ugpeqe kaqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ abraham _ s e g h l e g h q u m a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ . _ " _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ ilakumtaagh ke ni luku _ pika qaa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh aqe a _ yuug _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh akun llu _ ugpeqe i llegh akun llu _ ; _ tugukligh igate a _ ugpeqe i lleg raaghinagh akun _ .
R a h a b - l l u _ usputagh u uq _ . _ akike i kayugu yagh lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ s e g h l e g h q u m a n g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ apallugh ke luku _ kayusigh i llegh a _ . _ J o s h u a - m _ kayagtekaqe kek _ maalghug _ yug k _ aksaqe luku _ nuna at _ yuvghiigh sqellug qu _ . _ yug t _ ivagh yatkek _ , _ R a h a b - e m _ alla kun _ tume kun _ anag stekakek _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ yugusigh _ taghneghagh ngunani _ tuqu nga uq _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ a n e g h n e g h q i l l n g u n a n i _ tuqu nga uq _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ allute lusi _ apeghtughiste ughte fqaafsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ whangkuta _ apeghtughiste ni _ n a n q i g t e n g n g w a a g h a t a g h a g h y a g h q a a g u k u t _ .
qamagte luta _ anaggute aghagh neghtu ghllag ukut _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yuug _ akuzillegh mikun _ anaggute igate ngughk _ elqughutngagh pestaagh u uq _ . _ yug m _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ talwa _ yugusigh ni llu _ agghi te kete luku _ ayuqe yaghqaqe a _ .
savikenghaagh ghhagh t _ sa ni te mun _ ayuqe luki _ kuuni t _ q a a n g h i t n u n _ kanaghte aqe aput _ q a a t k e s q e l l u t a _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ igleghte te aqe aput _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun llu _ angyaghpag ghllag t _ ; _ a q u u t a s q u v e g a g h h a a m _ qiifte aqe ai _ angyaleg m _ piyuke llegh anun _ talwa _ a n u q a t e g h l l a g y a g h n g a a n _ .
ulu llu _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ iwernga _ a a n g a a y u g n e g h l l a g u u q _ . _ K e n g h h a a m _ uqfig lghute ghllag t _ kumaghsaghqagh ke ai _ !
ulu llu _ k e n g h e s t u n _ ayuqe uq _ . _ esleqnga uq _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ enkaam _ seghleghqe ma llegh a _ mingite kayugu uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ enkaam _ naafqii kayugu uq _ k i y a g h t a a l l e m n n e n g _ qayughllak _ h e l l - e m _ k e n g h a n _ kumagh a qaa _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ nemeghyagh t _ , _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh i _ qimugtekayugu ut _ , _ aaqun _ yug m _ qimugtaghkagh i
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qimugte naanghite a _ ulu _ . _ nekleg igate ngugh u uq _ , _ seghleghu uq _ , _ esleqnga uq _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ p o i s o n - m e n g _ .
ulu _ u s u q u s i q a q a g h p u t _ atanegh mnnun _ ata mun _ . _ naqam _ seghlegh meng _ neghyugtaghagh usigh qaghkagh ut _ yug lgute mnnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh itnun _ ellmite yu gnite luki _ .
usuqe i llegh llu _ , _ seghlegh meng llu _ neghyugtaghagh llegh _ aane kayugu uk _ ataasigh meng _ qanegh meng _ . _ U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite yagh uq _ .
pinigh lghii llu _ seghlegh llu _ megh _ m a a q e g k a y u w a a k _ ataasigh meng _ sengngugh meng _ ?
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ f i g s - e m _ uqfig a _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ o l i v e s - m e n g _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ g r a p e s - e m _ vine- nga _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ figs- meng _ . _ talwa _ meghtaghvig _ t a g h y u g h n i l n g u g h m e n g _ meqe lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ megh ite uq _ .
kina _ akule gpesinite a _ peghqinegh lghii _ , _ liigike i ma lghii llu _ ? _ tawatete lleg ni _ kelgute ligu _ pinitun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m i k u n _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun llu _ q u s e v e g n g a g h m i _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ aqina nga kufsi llu _ , _ e l l n g i i n a a y u g n e g h u k u f s i l l u _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaan _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ , _ qaghya llegh gpesigun _ liisima ni lusi _ .
T a w a t e l n g u q _ peghqinellegh _ qilagtagh u nghite uq _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u uq _ .
nani _ alngunak _ aqina lleg lgu nghaani llu _ , _ e l l n g i n a a y u g l l e l g u n g h a n i l l u _ taawa _ k i p u l l g i n a a l l e l w a a q u q _ , _ sa u aat llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ t a w a n t a q u t _ .
iwernga _ peghqinellegh _ qilagte aq _ kiyang _ pelungite uq _ . _ A m a l l e q a a _ n e k e g g m e t u q _ , _ kavyugite uq _ , _ malighqutagh ke i nga uq _ , _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ pikayug u uq _ , _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ y u p i i n g h u u q _ .
nekeggmellegh _ piitute stun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh mun _ qepghagh kayug t _ piitesighagh aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ saghna aqe ut _ elte qugh nga lghii meng llu _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e g g n i _ .
S a a m _ aaghtiiraagh te ste aqe isi llu _ , _ pillugute ste aqe aisi llu _ ? _ apate lugh qaghkagh i _ , _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ p i l l u w a g h a q i i _ pinigh lghiit _ piyuke lleg si _ .
qiliigh aqe usi _ avangite negh gpesini _ enkaam _ yugtagh yaghqaghte aqe usi _ a l l g e g h h n a l u k i _ qiliigh ke gkasi _ . _ qiliigh ghllag aqe usi _ taawanginaq _ a l l g e g h t e p a g n i n g i t a q a s i _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe usi _ , _ p i l l u w u t a q u s i _ . _ allgegh te igate usi _ kiyaghnegh _ a a p s i g a t u t e g p e s i n e n g _ .
talwa _ aapte ghngaaghpesigu _ kiyaghnegh _ a l l g e g h s i g a t a s i _ qayughllak _ seghlegh mun _ atughqagh u luki _ aapte aqe lghiisi _ . _ piyukekagh i _ elpek si _ katam _ piyukekagh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ .
ukughsi _ a t a a s i i g h n e g h i l n g u g h n i _ ! _ L i i s i m a k e n g h i s t e g g u u _ piniqe gkufsigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ , _ u g u m i k a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ anguyag u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ temngingu ni luku _ whaten _ p i l l g h a t _ , _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ aqina naqe neghtu uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aghagh aqe ainkut _ n u q e t u t e s q e l l u k i _ piyuke lleg lug put _ . _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusigh aqe ai _ q u s e v e g n g a l g h i i t _ puuru _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe ai _ q u k a a y u g n e g h e t _ . _ "
tuune lusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ , _ anagniigh lleqe uq _ elpesi neng _ .
qantaghalli i aghagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qantaghalli i aghagh lleqe uq _ elpesi nun _ . _ S e g h l e g h q e s t e n i _ , _ uughtugh tek _ ! _ elpek si _ ataasiighte llghite ngugh ni _ , _ ukmangigh teki _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ .
quya nghite tek _ , _ asemeghqe tek _ , _ qiya tek _ ! _ nenglaghqagh iqe lleg si _ qiya llegh ughte ki _ , _ quya lleg si _ quya nghite ngugh ughte steki _ .
qusevegte tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ q u u l v a g h l l e q i i s i _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h u t e g p e n a s i _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ s e g h l e q u u q u m i g u _ u g p e q a a l g u t e n i _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h l l e q i i _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekunigu llu _ u g p e q a a l g u t e n i _ n a n q i g t e n g n g w i i _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekufki _ liilightuusagh t _ q a a t k e n g n g u n g h i t a t e n _ . _ yeghlegi _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte i stekau te n _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ liilightuusagh ngllagh a _ , _ nanqigte i sigh u luki _ atuqe aqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ s a n g a n Ê¼ n g a m _ n a n q i g s i g u _ yug lgute n _ ? _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ , _ naafqe i yaghqagh _ .
ila si _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ unaami _ tawavek _ nuna mun _ aghulaqe lleqe unga _ . _ T a m a a n l l e q u n g a _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ mani ngllagh lleqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallukagh i _ unaami _ sa lleghqagh i _ ! _ talwa _ nallukagh i _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale kaghqagh a _ . _ unguvallegh i _ tan- squghhagh u uq _ , _ a g e p s u g h r u g g a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe uq _ , _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute kayug _ .
itupill _ whaten _ pi aqe tek _ , _ " _ A t a n g h e m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ unguva kestagh lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ apeghiigh te aqe lleqe ukut _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ aangaayugte lleqe usi llu _ q a n a n g u l l e q u s i l l u _ . _ tamaakut _ aangaayugte llegh t _ seghleghu ut _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liisimake ghngaaghmigu _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u u q _ .
nagate tek _ a k l u n g i l n g u g h n i _ ! _ qiya kestagh tek _ , _ iilqe kestagh tek _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh naqngu usi _ .
aklungi si _ aghu ma ut _ , _ aate kasi _ m o t h - e m _ negh ma ai _ .
G o l d - e s i l l u _ s i l v e r - e s i l l u _ anaghtaa ma ut _ . _ anaghtaa llghite a _ i p a p i g h q e n n a q n g w a a _ e l l n g i n a a y u g n e g h u l l e g h s i l l u _ , _ pakignegh u llegh i llu _ nanqigte lleg nge gkufsi _ . _ taagken _ anaghtaa llegh m _ yugusigh si _ naafqe lleqe ai _ katam _ k e n g h e s t u n _ . _ qaywa _ kinguligh nun _ aghnegh nun _ l l i i g h n g a a g h p e s i _ , _ qerngughte i manginagh u usi _ wata _ aklungi igh i na lusi _ .
talwa _ akileghtugh llghite asi _ q e p g h a g h t e s i _ unatagh ke aat _ piitesigh u aghagh vig gpesini _ . _ nagate ki _ a k u z i l g a l l g h i t _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i t e g h l l a g e m _ nagaqugh ma ai _ akilghuu llegh it _ .
K i y a g h t a a l l e g h p e s i n i _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ aklungitu te gpesineng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyukekagh i _ allgegh taqagh i _ e f q u g h h n a l u s i _ elpesi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe usi _ . _ penniigh t _ q u g i l i s i g h a t _ nalluke aat _ qantaghaqun _ tuqute lleghqagh eng _ . _ N a l l u k e s t e g g u u _ qantaghaqun _ A t a n g h e m _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ ?
elpesi u ut _ nanqigte i ste ikagh t llu _ tuqute i ste ikagh t llu _ anaggute ma ite ngugh neng _ yug neng _ , _ ellngit a _ ayag qligh u mangite aisi _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ qelanegh gpenasi _ kenlanga _ A t a n g h e m _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh anun _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh a _ usputagh qite ggu _ . _ nuna mi _ piitesigh u aghagh luni _ qelanegh yukagh gpenani _ utaqa i aqe uq _ uksaagh m llu _ u p e n g h a a m l l u _ e s l a l l u w a n e n g _ nagu ste i kayug meng _ piite yaghqagh neng _ .
elpek si llu _ qelanegh neghllug te k _ neghyu manginagh lusi _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh uq _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h p e n a k i _ ila si _ enkaam _ A t a n g h e m _ n a n q i g g n e g h i l l i s i _ . _ ellnga u uq _ nanqigte i sta _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh lghii _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ neqamike luki _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ akuzikagh t _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ . _ usputagh qite ki _ qelanegh gpenateng _ nuqete neghtu luteng _ ikfiqe llegh mi _ pikagh t _ .
quya nga na iqe aput _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghmeng _ paninang _ neghyuke manginagh kaqe aat _ atanegh _ . _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ J o b - e m _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ , _ quya ste llegh a llu _ atanegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh a _ alpag yan _ . _ enkaam _ J o b - k u n _ A t a n g h e m _ liite ste aisi _ nafughtagh llegh mineng llu _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng llu _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ apegh naqe kegka _ una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ . _ akeqe i negh gpesini _ , _ akeqe i gpenasi _ qilag kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ pi yaghqaa kufsi _ legan _ a a n g Ê¼ g h h a a s i _ , _ pi yaghqaa nghite kufsi _ legan _ n a k a a g h h a a s i _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe teki _ akequsagh si _ , _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ A t a n g h e m _ nanqigte naanghite aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
kina _ akule gpesini _ ikfiqe u a _ ? _ yughagh li _ . _ kina _ quya nga a _ ? _ ilagagh li _ usuqe i llegh meng _ .
kina _ q i n u y u w a a _ ? _ tuqlugh liki _ E l d e r - e t _ enkaam _ yughagh te kete litgu _ mesiighqellug qu _ ategh akun _ A t a n g h e m _ .
yughagh llegh m _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ naallghute yaghqaqe a _ qinuyug lghii _ yuug _ . _ enkaam _ A t a n g h e m _ y u g u n q w u u g h t e s n e q i g l l e q a a _ , _ seghleghqe llegh i llu _ seghevute lleqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apegh aqe luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ ila gpesinun _ , _ y u g h a a t k u t u t a q l u s i _ n a a l l g h u t e l l e n g e s q e l l u s i _ . _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ yug m _ yughagh llegh i _ iknaqe ghllag ut _ , _ allgegh te kayugu ut _ .
elijah _ yugu uq _ whangkutestun _ a y u q e l g i i _ . _ T a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte ma ite ngughk _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh _ ilate luku _ .
taagken _ alla _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte yalghiimi _ nuna _ piite ste ikagh _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ una _ kinguligh u uq _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ . _ naligh i _ ugpeqe i nanigh kan _ apeghtuusagh pig neng _ , _ kitum _ kayusigh ligu _ ugpeqe i nqigte llegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kunigu _ y u g u l i s l e q a a k _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e m _ unguva te zikek _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ s e g h u v u l l e q i i _ t a a m _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e m _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag i _ .
ukut _ lata t _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ a p o s t l e - n g a n e n g _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ yug nun _ aghulaqe uute stekagh t _ P o n t u s - m u n _ , _ G a l a t i a - m u n _ , _ C a p p a d o c i a - m u n _ , _ A s i a - m u n _ , _ B i t h y n i a - m u n l l u _ .
neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ pelungighsagh kaqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uk _ q a a t k u t e s q e l l u s i _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ u k m a n g i i g h t e s q e l l u s i l l u _ aaw akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi nun _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ ! _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni _ allgegh nqigte ste ainkut _ u n g u v a g h t e l l e g h m i k u n _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ T a a m _ sighima lleg nge ste ghllag ainkut _ n a l l u n e q n i i l n g u g h m e n g _ .
enkaam _ utaqa u aput _ pi liite yaghqagh put _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kangi _ yug minun _ . _ aflengake u ai _ qilag mi _ elpesi nun _ enkaam _ aghu naanghite ut _ , _ naave naanghite ut _ , _ gheve naanghite ut llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n _ p a q n i i g h s a g h l l e q i i s i _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ k e n l e t g h u u t e l l e g h m i _ aliigh lleqe a _ yuguligh llegh _ y a t a g h q e g k a q _ elpesi nun _ .
T a a m _ quya ma ste aisi _ , _ qaywa _ maaten _ natengiighhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ s e g h l e l i i g h y a g h n g a a g h p e s i _ .
tamaakut _ seghlegh ligh u aaghet _ nanghiiqu sigh u ut _ i p a p i g h q e n n a l u s i _ u g p e q i l l e p i i l g u t s i _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii nguq _ g o l d - n n e n g _ . _ G o l d - e t _ nanghiiqu nghmegteki _ kenegh kun _ naafqe kayugu ut _ . _ paninang _ k e n g h e t _ atuqe aqe ait _ pelungigh na luki _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ nanghiiqu yaghqaa uq _ . _ aghula i uute kan _ pelungite luni _ , _ a l l g e g h l l e q a g h s i _ usuqe llegh _ , _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q _ , _ q u u l v a l l e q _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aliightekagu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ .
esghagh igate ghngaaghpesigu _ pinighkagh i _ , _ esghagh nghite ghngaaghpesigu _ maaten _ ugpeqagh i _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu usi _ repall _ a a p g h w a a g h p a g n i n g i t a g h s i _ a n g t a l a n g a _ quya llegh gpesi _ ,
qayughllak _ a l l g e g h t e n g n g u k e s i _ yuguligh llegh a _ unguva sigh gpesi _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ apallugh a _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
neghigh luku _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h n a q e g k a q a a t _ taana _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe aat _ tunusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ elpesi nun _ .
taghneghagh kek _ C h r i s t - a m _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ i l u n g i t n i t k a a g u k _ . _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe ai _ ikfiqe lleghqagh aneng _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ q u u l v a l l e n g e l l e g h q a g h l l a g a n e n g l l u _ ikfiqe llegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ enkaam _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ liigike naqutke kaqe aat _ kina u yaghqaa ta a _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ qakun llu _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ liigike stekaqe ai _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ellngit nun _ pi u nghite ni luki _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi nun _ pi u ni luki _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kayagtekau uk _ qilag meng _ . _ ellnga n _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a k u n _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipaate kaqe aisi _ tamaaken _ . _ talwa _ yaquleg t _ liigike yu pigtekaqe ait _ tamaakut _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ umyugagh si _ a p e g h i i g h s a g h w a a g h l u k i _ ayuqe teki _ sa lleghqagh mun _ . _ umyugagh si _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a g h u l u k i _ , _ sighimake u aghte ggu llu _ tunusagh _ yuguligh lleg nge llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ tagi kan _ .
qaatke te lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe gpenaki _ seghlegh t _ piyuke lleg si _ atuqe u yagh kesi _ . _ tawatete yagh usi _ nalluke te gpesineng _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh an _ ayuqe ta a _ .
kiyaghnegh _ n a k m i k e s t e z i _ , _ pelungitu ta aneng _ elpek si llu _ pelungi tek _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ pelungi tek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ pelungite unga _ . _ "
yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata ke niighkagh i _ . _ nanqigte aqe a _ a t u n e n g w a a q _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ s a l l e g h t u l n g a t u n _ . _ enkaam _ tallugh ke teggu _ nunatagh ma lusi _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
liisimakagh i _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghtekau usi _ sasii gpenasi _ katam _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ taagken _ sasii nghite ngugh meng _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e n g _ . _ tukfigh llghite aisi _ silver- meng _ nalighmeng _ g o l d - m e n g _ naave kayug meng _ ,
iwernga _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ megnu nagh pigte lghii meng _ aaw aneng _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ ellnga _ p e n n i i g h a g h a g h t u n _ ayuqe uq _ s a l l w h a a g h h i i l n g u q _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ C h r i s t - a _ talwa _ sivungagh ni _ nuna _ ulima llghite luku _ . _ maaten _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ aliightekaqe a _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ .
C h r i s t - a k u n _ ugpeqagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ ellnga n _ u n g u v a g h t e k a q a a _ C h r i s t - a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ q u u l v a g h l l a k a q a a l l u _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ sighima llegh i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ .
qaatke te llegh kun _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m u n _ p e l u n g i g h t e k a q a s i _ unguva sigh si _ , _ enkaam _ p i n i q e p i i g a s i _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ . _ piniqe te kestagh tek _ ilu gpesineng _ qamaken _ .
allgegh nqigtekau usi _ . _ unguvalleghraghagh i _ tuqu kayug meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ngugh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ allgegh nqigtekau usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta itgun _ , _ unguva lghiit _ , _ kenle ite ngugh t _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ vegaagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ pinighnagh llegh i llu _ p i i t e s i g h a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ . _ vegaagh t _ paligh aqe ut _ , _ piitesighagh at llu _ ifkagh aqe ut _ ,
iwernga _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ q u u n p e k a g h q a a g u t _ . _ " _ T a a k u s t a _ akuzite t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kangit _ elpesi nun _ .
enkaam _ taaqe teggu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqekagh i _ . _ iqlengiqe nanigh tek _ , _ p i n i i y u g g n a n i g h t e k _ , _ aqina nanigh tek _ , _ s e g h l e q u u g h u n n a n i g h t e k l u _ .
allgegh nghhagh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug aqe ut _ . _ ellngistun _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug tek _ p e l u n g i l n g u g h m e n g _ taghneghagh m _ mamagh aneng _ . _ A n g t a n i i t e s l e q a a _ yuguligh llegh i _ ,
qayughllak _ n a a s i i g h a g h s i _ A t a n g h e m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tagi tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ ellnga _ unguva lghii u uq _ uyghag _ . _ yug t _ ighsakekagh at _ s a s i i n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ megnu nagh luku _ .
elpek si llu _ unguva lghii stun _ uyghag stun _ ayuqe usi _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ nekefte sigh ke lisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ Q e p g h a a l l e q a g h s i _ aaftekau lusi _ p r i e s t - e t _ tuune i lghiit _ aghqe te meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ aghqe te t _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ .
igaqe kau lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ Z i o n - m i _ nekegte aqe aqa _ megnu nagh lghii _ uyghag _ ; _ kangighagh m _ uyghag ke a _ nakmikegkagh ka _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lghii _ ellnga neng _ kayngumiqe naanghite uq _ . _ "
taana _ uyghag _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ w h a t e l n g u u g u q _ , _ " _ taana _ uyghag _ m a n g t e g h a n g l l a g h t e t _ ighsakekagh at _ , _ kangighagh m _ u y g h a k a a g h s i m a k a n g a _ . _ "
amalleqa _ , _ " _ T a a m _ uyghag m _ yug t _ naagte ste aqe ai _ , _ iqu ste aqe ai llu _ . _ " _ naagte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta anun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqe kaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ yug ni _ nakmike kau usi _ , _ umiileg m _ p r i e s t - e k i i s i _ , _ aaftekau usi _ yug ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ yug ke aisi _ . _ nakmike kau usi _ a a p g h e s q e l l u k i _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a a t _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ tagsigh ikagh _ elpesi neng _ mamleg ghllag meng _ ellmi _ katam _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h m u n _ nighug minun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke nghite yagh aisi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ yug liite ma aisi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ n a l l u k s a g h a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ a l l g e g h s i m a a g h s i _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ nunatagh u usi llu _ allaneghtagh u usi llu _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ enkaam _ kayeme amsi _ ilapga te gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh an _ p i l l u w a a n g w a a _ unguva sigh i _ .
pinitun _ kiyaghte tek _ akule itni _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ , _ luuraq _ ellngit a _ seghletun _ pi ste u ni na yu kangisi _ . _ esghagh kumegteki _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg si _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ aghnegh ani _ C h r i s t - a m _ tagi llegh an _ .
atanegh _ apallugh ke luku _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ k a v e m e m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t n u n _ . _ qaatke te lusi _ umiileg mun _ ; _ ellnga u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ igleghte te i sta _ .
qaute kete luki llu _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ ; _ umiileg m _ a g h y u u g h i y a q l e g u g h t e s t a q i i _ seghletun _ p i s t e n u n _ , _ u s u q i y a q l e g h u g h t e s t e k a q i i l l u _ pinitun _ p i s t e n u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke a _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ n e p i i g h t e s q e l l u k i _ n a l l u u q a t _ t e m n g i t w h a m e n g _ akuzite lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ iteme nga lghii stun _ iwernga _ iteme nga llegh i _ atuqe fqaan _ seghlegh mun _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u l u s i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Q u u l v a g h l u k u _ tea- ma ghhagh a _ yuug _ , _ piniqe luki _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ , _ alike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ q u u l v a g h l u k u l l u _ umiileg _ .
elpek si _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h n i _ qaatke utek _ p i l i i t e s t e g p e s i n u n _ s i i v a k e l l e l i g h l u s i _ . _ qaatke gpenaki _ nangllegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ umyugaqegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke aqe teki llu _ amyuqetagh lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke aqe aisi _ sumeghmike nghpesigu _ ellnga _ ikfiqe u lusi _ sa meng _ sapiglleghhiistun _ .
iwernga _ suflughsi ma kufsiki _ q e v u t q u l l e s i _ , _ seghletun _ pilleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ usuqe naanghite aisi _ . _ N a q a m e n r a q _ suflughsi ma kufsigu _ ikfiqe llegh _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesinun _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke lleqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ s u f l u g h t e s q e l l u k i _ ikfiqe llegh t _ qayughllak _ C h r i s t - a m _ ikfiqe tke kaqe aisi _ . _ ikfiqe llegh a _ usputagh u uq _ elpesi nun _ maligte sqellug qu _ .
ellnga _ seghleghqe igate uq _ , _ iqlengiqe igate uq _ .
S e g h l e q u u l l e n g a q n g a m i _ akite mangite ai _ . _ ikfiqe aqngami _ akeqsagte mangite ai _ . _ itupill _ neghyuke te kau uq _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte i kayug mun _ elqughaghte luku _ .
C h r i s t - a m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aglagh te kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ yugusigh mig ke luki _ qaquuragh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ t u q u n g a s q e l l u t a _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ u n g u v a s q e l l u t a _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ . _ kiitigh qu llegh akun _ naallghute kau usi _ .
penniigh stun _ aghulaqe aatagh lghii stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ uteghnigh ma usi _ P e n n i i g h n i i g h t e m u n _ K e l e n g a k i s t e n g a n u n _ unguva sigh gpesi _ .
elpek si _ ugiighkagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte tek _ qaatke te lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ . _ ila i _ nuliigh leg t _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh gpesigun _ ugpeqagh ughte na yu kata _ sa meng _ pi nghite ghngaaghpesiki _ ,
qayughllak _ esghapag kangat _ pelungi tun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h s i _ , _ alike i llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
nuyagh kegte yagh llegh m _ , _ u l l n g a q e l l g h e m _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ aarragh llegh m _ pinighnaghsigh igate ai _ ilu si _ .
itupill _ pinighnagh tek _ ilu gpesigun _ q u s e v e g l l e l i g h l u s i _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi llu _ . _ T a w a t e l n g u q _ pinighnagh llegh _ q u u n p e k a g h q a a g u q _ , _ megnu nagh ghllag uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ , _ aghnagh t _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pinighnaghsagh kayugu ut _ ilu megteggun _ , _ q u s e v e g l l e l i g h l u t e n g _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh luteng llu _ . _ neghyuke kaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke kaqe ait llu _ ugi teng _ .
sarah _ tawatete kau uq _ ! _ qaatke kaqe a _ abraham _ , _ a t a n q e n n i k a q a a l l u _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ panike aisi _ pinitun _ pi ma kufsi _ , _ alinge igate kufsi llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ .
elpek si llu _ nulighhtuqagh ni _ kiyaghute ki _ nula isi _ liigike luki _ nateghtu langi _ qayughllak _ kayaate aghagh ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ Q u u l v a g h l u k i _ nula isi _ qayughllak _ atunem _ a l l g e g h s a g h q a q a g h s i _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ s a a m _ alngunak _ pillgilliqe naanghite ai _ yughagh lleg si _ .
T a a q n i g h n a q a n k a _ sa meng _ p i l l g h e n k a _ whaten _ : _ qamagte lusi _ ataasigh stun _ sumeghnegh lgute k _ , _ aqniqe te utek _ , _ piniqe utek _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ , _ nanglleg ke te utek _ , _ qusevegte te utek _ .
yug t _ seghletun _ pi kangisi _ akite gpenaki _ seghletun _ , _ nalighmeng _ s e g h l e q u u q a n g i s i _ akite gpenaki _ s e g h l e q u u g h m e n g _ . _ itupill _ akite ki _ quya ste llegh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ tawaten _ p i s q e l l u s i _ elpesi nun _ a l l g e g h t e s q e l l u k u _ quya ste i lleg ni _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i l l g h i s t u n _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ quya nga lghii meng _ unguvallegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ quya ma lghii neng llu _ aghnegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ seghletun _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe li _ , _ iqlengiqe nanigh li llu _ .
seghletun _ pi nanigh luni _ , _ pinitun _ pi li _ . _ N e k e g g m e n n a q l u n i l l u _ kiyaghte li _ ,
qayughllak _ A t a n g h e m _ esghapag u ai _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ nagate aqe ai llu _ yughagh llegh it _ . _ iwernga _ A t a n g h e m _ t e n g v i m u n _ ayuqe ai _ seghletun _ pi lghiit _ . _ "
kitum ngam _ aqnigh lleqe isi _ sagiqe u kufsi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ ?
iwernga _ i k f i q e g h n g a a g h p e s i _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ quya ste lleg nge lleqe usi _ . _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ sumeghyali gpenasi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ manigugh aqe teggu _ C h r i s t - a _ A t a n g h u l u k u _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ aaptegkangisi _ sighima llegh meng _ i l u g p e s i n i l n g u g h m e n g _ quunpeng _ liigike natu te _ k i i m s i g h y a q l e g g i i n a a w a q i t e k i _ .
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqe teki _ q u s e v e g l l e l i g h l u s i _ , _ sii vag ke igh lleg ligh lusi _ . _ seghleghqe nghite kufsi _ umyugagh si _ seghleghni naanghite ut _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ s e g h l e q u u q a n g i s i _ pinitun _ kiyaghte llegh gpesineng _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ , _ kayngu yug lleqe ut _ tawaten _ akuzillegh meggneng _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i y u k e l q e n g n g u k a g u _ i k f i q e s q e l l u s i _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ , _ taana _ itagnagh aghagh uq _ ikfiqe lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghletun _ pi llegh mun _ .
C h r i s t - a _ tuqu kau uq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ apallugh ke luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ seghleghqe mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ tagite na luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yugusigh a _ tuqute kau uq _ iwernga _ taghneghagh kek _ u n g u v a g h t e k a a g u k _ .
enkaam _ taghneghagh u luni _ ungipagh yaghtugh kau uq _ taghneghagh nun _ a n u s i m i n g l l a g h v i g m e l n g u g h n u n _ .
T a a k u n g u u t _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghigh luku _ noah _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u k u _ . _ noah _ a r k - e n g l l a a l u k u _ kiyaghnegh _ qelanegh gpenani _ utaqa i kau uq _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh nun _ a v u t e g h q e s q e l l u k i _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu llgagh inagh t _ yug t _ itegh luteng _ ark- mun _ y u g u l i k a a g u t _ megh kun _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ megh _ uspute aq _ paaptaaye llegh mun _ yuguligh i lghii _ elpesi neng _ maaten _ u n g u v a g h t e l l g h a k u n _ Jesus _ Christ _ . _ paaptaaye llegh _ iqangigh sigh u nghite uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ itupill _ paaptaaye llegh kun _ akeqe i ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ umyugagh mnneng _ seghleghni ite ngugh meng _ .
Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ qilag mun _ mayugh luni _ aghenqignegh anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte te u ai _ qamagte luki _ yaquleg t _ , _ qilag m _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h e t l u _ .
ikfiqe kau ta aneng _ C h r i s t - a _ yugusigh mikun _ elpek si llu _ yataaghqe tek _ ikfiqe yaghqaa lusi _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ , _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ yugusigh mikun _ ikfiqe lghii _ seghleghqe sug nanigh ma uq _ .
enkaam _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale atun _ malighqutagh ke gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lqinagh usi _ q a a t k u s i g a l n g u g h e s t u n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ whaten _ pi kau usi _ : _ seghleghnagh pigte luku _ atuqe te kayugu yagh usi _ , _ qiliigh ke te aqe lusi _ , _ suume uute aqe lusi _ , _ q e r n g u g h u t u l l u s i _ uglagh pestaagh t _ seghlegh t _ atuqe aqe luki _ , _ neqenghaghqete lusi _ , _ meghe uute ghllag lusi _ enkaam _ a l n g u n a s e g h a g h l l a g u g h t a q u s i _ , _ manigugh kaqe asi llu _ iinghutekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ .
kiyaghte nanigh lghiisi _ u g p e q a a n g h i l n g u g h e s t u n _ , _ liigike igate aat _ sangan _ ilate nanigh u tsi _ seghletun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e g g n u n _ , _ enkaam _ s e g h l e q u u g h a q i i s i _ .
iwernga _ salleg teng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ katam _ apegh yaghqaqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ n a n q i g t i y a q l e g g i i n a g h m u n _ unguva lghii neng llu _ tuqukagh neng llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ talwa _ tuqukagh nun _ . _ tamaakut _ nanqigtekau ut _ unguva u luteng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ ellngit nun _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh it _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte llegh atun _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ k e n l e t g h u u s a g h t u g h t u q _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a g h u l u k i _ umyugagh si _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi _ yughagh yaghqaa lusi _ yughagh lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ una _ : _ p i n i q u t e p i i g l u s i _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh m _ seghevute ste aqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag t _ .
U p u g h a n g h u l u s i _ qikeghte qugh fqaafsi _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ allgegh te kau usi _ tunusagh neng _ atughqagh meng _ ila gpesinun _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ tunusagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi si _ atuqe aqe teki _ pinitun _ .
tunusagh leg t _ a k u z i m u n _ akuzi lit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ tunusagh leg t _ q e p g h h a a t i m u n _ q e p g h h a a t i l i t _ iknaqe lleg ligh luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ enkaam _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ . _ ellnga n _ pikagh ak _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q l u _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q l u _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ quupkagh gpenasi _ seghleliigh ghrukutaagh ghllaget _ kaate kangisi _ nanghiighsaghagh na lusi _ . _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg si _ a l l a k a a y a g u n g h i t u t _ .
itupill _ quya tek _ ilate lghiisi _ C h r i s t - a m _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ q u y a n g a g h l l a g e s q e l l u s i _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a _ aliightekan _ .
S e g h l e q u u q a n g i s i _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghte u ma llegh i _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ , _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ n i g h u g h q e n g n g a l g h i i k _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u k _ elpesi ni _ .
ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ , _ ikfiqe gpenasi _ yugte aghte u lusi _ , _ tegleg nigh ughte u lusi _ , _ seghletun _ pi ste u lusi _ , _ nalighmeng _ yanutqu ste u lusi _ .
N a q a m e n r a q _ ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ C h r i s t i a n - n g u t e g p e s i n e n g _ , _ kayngu yug gpenasi _ iwernga _ usuqe nakesi _ kiyaghnegh _ atigh kangisi _ C h r i s t - a m _ ategh aneng _ .
nanqigte i lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ sivuke luni _ piinligh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g a k u n _ . _ piinligh naqngu kan _ whangkutgun _ , _ s a l l e q a n Ê¼ n g a m _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ ?
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ p i l l g h i s t u n _ , _ " _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ pegnem _ y u g u l i k a a k u y e n g _ , _ a v e l g h a s i n g w a a l g h i i t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t l u _ n a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe aat _ ? _ "
E n k a a n g a m _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe lghiit _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ elqughute luteng _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ neghyuke te lleqe ait llu _ unguva sigh teng _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u g h m u n _ U l i m a g h i s t e m u n _ .
sa meng _ piighhe yug anka _ E l d e r - e t _ y u g h a g h v i g p e s i n i l n g u u t _ . _ whanga llu _ E l d e r - n g u u n g a _ , _ esghapag kaqe kegka llu _ C h r i s t - a m _ ikfiqe llegh a _ , _ ilate yaghqaa unga llu _ C h r i s t - a m _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekagu _ .
enkaam _ qelegh yug amsi _ E l d e r - e n i _ whaten _ : _ pennagh igh nigh ughte u tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ penniigh itnun _ ; _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ elpesi nun _ a f l e n g a k e s q e l l u k i _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ aflengake yu kesi _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi sqe sug aisi _ . _ aflengake teki _ nakaan _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na lusi _ , _ iwernga _ qayughllak _ kayusigh yug u kesi _ .
agghi te kaqe gpenaki _ aflengake gkasi _ , _ iwernga _ m a l i g s u g n a g h q i t e k _ ellngit nun _ .
enkaam _ I g l e g h u t i s t e n g a t _ P e n n i i g h n i i g h t e t _ tagi kan _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ pinighnagh pigte lghii meng _ qaghpa meng _ qelmegh i uute yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ elpek si _ uyuqligh ni _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ siivanllegh nun _ . _ qamagte lusi _ q u s e v g u t u l l u s i _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kipullegmun _ ayuqe ai _ q u k a a y u g n e g h e t _ , _ iwernga _ kayusigh aqe ai _ q u s e v e g n g a l g h i i t _ . _ "
E n k a a n g a m _ elpesi neng _ katam _ q u s e v e g n g a t e k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i t e g h l l a g m u n _ . _ taagken _ q u u l v a g h l l e q i i s i _ nakmikegkagh mini _ aghneghmi _ .
qamagte luki _ sumeghyali tke gkasi _ pegte ki _ ellnga nun _ , _ qayughllak _ aflengake u aisi _ .
liisima lusi _ , _ kelenga lusi _ . _ anguyag i _ tughneghagh _ iglegha u uq _ ugini lghii tun _ l i o n - e t u n _ , _ ivagh i aqe uq _ kina _ n a a f q e n n a l u k u _ .
ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ a y e p s u g i l n g u g h q u n _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ liisimake luki _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ n u n a t a g h h a a n i l n g u u t _ tawaten _ ellngit llu _ ikfiqe u ut _ .
iwernga _ natengiighhaq _ ikfiqe llegh gpesi _ kingu aneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i n i q i n g a g h l l a g e m _ tea- ma anun _ , _ ellnga n _ katam _ nallghusagh u lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ i k n a q u g h s a g h l l e q i i _ , _ ayepsugighsagh lleqe ai _ , _ a g h u l i i l k a a g h t e s l e q i i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ i l a t e s q e l l u s i _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ aange llegh ghllag minun _ .
qamagte luku _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q _ ellnga n _ pi ke aa _ quunperugllag _ ! _ amen _ .
silas _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u g u q _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ ; _ igagh te aqe aanga _ takestaaghhagh tgun _ lata mkun _ elpesi nun _ . _ lata nka _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i n i q e l l e p i i g a n e n g _ ayuqe ut _ . _ ungipaate amsi llu _ kayeme amsi llu _ k i y a g h t e k e s t i i s q e l l u s i _ piniqe llegh ani _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e s i _ B a b y l o n - m e l n g u u t _ , _ elpesi stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ . _ ellngit a llu _ , _ eight- nghma llu _ M a r k - e m _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh llegh kun _ C h r i s t - a m _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ nekeggmellegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ C h r i s t - a m _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ .
ukut _ lata t _ simon _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e k a a n g a l l u _ , _ a p o s t l e - k a a n g a l l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ lata aqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ allgegh tekagh ni _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ A l l g e g h t e k a q a g h p u t _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ elqughutngagh llegh akun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ K i y a g h n e q e g k e f u t l u _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e k e g k e f u t l u _ .
piniqe llegh nkuk _ nekeggmellegh nkuk _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi ni _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh llu _ J e s u s - l u _ atanegh ut _ .
Jesus _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u q _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taaggun _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h q u n _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ a k l u k e g k a m n n e n g _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u t a _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu luta _ . _ tamaakut _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a p u t _ qayughllak _ l i i s i m a k e g k e f u t _ Jesus _ . _ tuqlugh ainkut _ i l a t e s q e l l u t a _ q u u l v a l l e g h m i n u n l l u _ pinigh llegh minun llu _ .
A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i k u n _ , _ J e s u s - e m _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ akequsagh mineng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii neng llu _ pi vag na pigte lghii neng llu _ . _ tamaagun _ akequsagh tgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilate ste lleqe aisi _ nangaghnegh minun _ . _ taagken _ a n a g y a q l e g u g h l l e q a s i _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh i _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ n a a f q i i y a q l e g e t _ elpesi neng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ n a n g a g h n e l i t k a q u t a n g a n e n g _ elpek si _ , _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ p i n a q e l l g h a g h s i _ qamagte luku _ ilate ki _ ukut _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ pinigh llegh _ , _ pinigh llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ liisima llegh _ ,
liisima llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ n u q e t u t i l l e q _ , _ n u q e t u t i l l e g h p e s i n u n _ ilate ggu _ a g h u l i i l k a a m a l l e q _ , _ a g h u l i i l k a a m e l l e g h p e s i n u n _ ilate ggu _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh _ ,
kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ n a n g l l e k u t u t e l l e q _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e s i n u n _ , _ n a n g l l e k u t u t e l l e g h p e s i n u n _ ilate ggu _ piniqe llegh _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe u kufsiki _ , _ nula stekufsiki llu _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ atughqagh u lusi llu _ kayute kaghqagh u lusi llu _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe nghite kumiki _ tamaakut _ , _ amugtagh pigte uq _ enkaam _ esghaatepagningite uq _ . _ puygu kaqe a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe kanga _ seghleghqe lleqe yagh ka aneng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ n a l l u n e q n i i g h w a a g h t e g g u _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi llu _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ taawa _ iqiteqaghte naanghite usi _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyake sigh ke ghllag lusi _ itegh ste lleqe aisi _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ atanegh mta llu _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m t a l l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ .
qaywa _ liisimake ghngaaghpesiki _ taakut _ i p a p i l l g h e t _ , _ sagiqe te u ghngaaghpesiki llu _ qaute kete na luki _ , _ iiwleng _ neqangugh lleqe amsi _ t a a k u n e n g _ i p a p i l l e g h n e n g _ elpesi nun _ apeghtugh tekagh mnneng _ .
sume mni _ itagnagh uq _ negh ka ughte aatagh kumsi _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ unguva u lunga _ .
liisimake aqa _ tuqu yaghtugh unga _ qayughllak _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe aanga _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ apeghtugh amsi _ tamaaken _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu llegh ma _ kingu aneng _ neqagh te aqe lleqe asi _ .
atuqe mangite aput _ p e g h q i n i q u t n g w a a g h l u k i _ ungipaghaate ngllaghkagh t _ apegh aqe yamtekek _ elpesi nun _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a l l u _ tagi llegh a llu _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ . _ whangkuta _ katam _ i y e g h l l u w a a m n n e n g _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ellnga n _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
J e s u s - e m _ a l l g e g h t a q n g a g u _ q u u l v a l l e q l u _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q l u _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ nagaqugh kaqe a _ me a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ Q u l i g h p i g a a l g h i i _ N i g h u g h q e n g n g a g h l l a k _ . _ ata m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ U n a n g u u q _ piniqe pigtegkegka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigtegkegka _ . _ "
whangkuta _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ katam _ n a g a t k a q a g h p u t _ me _ qilag meng _ J e s u s - m e t a q n g a m t a _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ naayghagh mi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ w h a n g k u n n i _ n a l l u n e q n a q r a g g i i t u t _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ipa u ta i _ . _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lleqe ut _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g w a a q u f s i k i _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ kenegh lghutagh m _ kuukgute llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ mamleg mun _ . _ tawatete kestagh tek _ kenlanga _ C h r i s t - a m _ tagi lleghqagh an _ aghnegh anun _ . _ taagken _ nighug a _ kuukgute lleqe uq _ ilu gpesinun _ , _ u n a a n g u m _ ighaleqetaagh atun _ ayuqe luni _ .
L i i g i k n g w a a g h y a g h q a q a g h s i _ una _ : _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ katam _ liigikepagningite ai _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ A k u z i t n i l n g u u t _ igaqegkagh ni _ .
U u k n a l i q i s t e t _ nakmike mangite ait _ uuknaliqe te kete yaghqagh teng _ . _ itupill _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ a k u z i t e l i t k a q i i _ a k u z i s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i i g h w a a g h e t _ a k u l n g i t n i s a g h t u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ katam _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ a k u l e g p e s i n i l l e q u t _ . _ nallu negh gpesini _ apeghtugh lleqe aisi _ i q l e n g a m e n g _ n a a f q e n n a l u k i _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ . _ qaywa _ C h r i s t - a m _ P i l i i t e s t e n g i t a _ tukfigh kaqe ghngaisteng _ iteme te na luki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ p i k n a n i g h l l e q a a t _ . _ enkaam _ n u u s k a g a n _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ naafqe ste lleqe ut _ .
yug lghute t _ maligte te lleqe ut _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h n u n _ k a y n g u n a l g h i n u n _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t n u n _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ s e g h l e q u u g h l l e q i i t _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ atugh put _ .
P a k i g t e l l e g h m e g t e g g u n _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ aklungi igh i yug lleqe ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ enkaam _ apegh lleqe ait _ apeghtuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ mani nge na luteng _ elpesi neng _ . _ ima _ n e g h i g h h a a n e n g _ kiyaghnegh _ N a n q i g t i s t e n g a t l u _ N a a f q i i s t e n g a t l u _ qavagh igate uq _ a g h y u u g h y a q l e g u g h l l u k i l l u _ ayuqe ai _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yaquleg t _ seghleghqe aqngata _ , _ iwernga _ miluute kaqe ai _ hell- mun _ . _ tawani _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ q i i p r a g h u s i g h n g a a t _ , _ utaqa i lghiit _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
neghigh luku _ noah _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u k u _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yug t _ a v e l g h a s i n g w a a g h i k a t _ ellmi neng _ , _ enkaam _ uleve stekaqe a _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ y u g u l i k a q a a _ noah _ , _ ila i llu _ maaghraghvinleg _ yug t _ . _ ( _ noah _ ungipaghte u kau uq _ elqughutngagh lghii mun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m u n _ . _ )
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe ak llu _ ne ghllag k _ S o d o m - e n k u k _ G o m o r r a h - n k u k _ . _ naafqe kaqe ak _ kenegh kun _ kenlanga _ ashes- ngughte llegh gkenun _ . _ enkaam _ usputagh ughtekaqe ak _ sa yaghqaa ta i _ yug t _ avelghagh sighwaagh ikagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
L o t _ elqughutngagh lghii u yagh uq _ yuug _ kiyaghtekagh _ akule itni _ tamaakut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ . _ A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ seghleliigh tke ghllag kaqe ai _ unguva sigh gmikun _ esghapag luki _ , _ nagate luki _ seghletun _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t _ , _ nuqete gpenateng llu _ s e x - e l l g h i t _ . _ enkaam _ A t a n g h e m _ y u g u l i k a q a a _ .
taawa _ legh igh iitagh ut _ , _ atanegh _ liisimake uq _ naten _ yuguligh lleghqagh meng _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ , _ n a n g h i i g h s a g h a l l e n g e n g h a t a _ . _ kelengake u ai llu _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ a g h y u u l l e n g e l l e g h m e l n g u u t _ , _ utaqa i ma luki _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
taana _ aghyuugh llegh _ kiyang _ t a m a a k u n u n _ ayuqe uq _ maligte te lghii nun _ yugusigh meng _ seghletun _ piyuke llegh ghllag itnun _ , _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh nun llu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ tamaakut _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ tetug igate ut llu _ e l l m i n g u y u g n e g h u u t l u _ . _ alinge gpenateng _ s e g h l e q u u g h a q i i t _ n i g h u g r a k e g t a t _ .
