yaquleg t _ iknaqe aghagh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte ut _ t a a k u n e n g _ n i g h u g r a k e g t a n e n g _ , _ paninang _ sivungagh ni _ A t a n g h e m _ anaggute ma ni naanghite ait _ n i g h u g r a k e g t a t _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ s e g h l e q u u g h a q i i t _ sa u aat _ liigike gpenaki _ . _ teghig ke sagh stun _ s u m e g h t a g h a g h p a g n i n g i l n g u u g u t _ . _ tuqute lleg nge lleqe ut _ teghig ke sagh stun _ allgegh luteng _ t e g h i g t u g h l u k i _ tuqu tke aat _ .
uglagh lghiit _ ikfiqe ste aqe ait _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ai _ . _ talwa _ aghnegh raaghinagh mi _ meghe uute ghllag aqe ut _ , _ yugusigh meng llu _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh it _ atuqe aqe ait _ . _ kayngusaghagh te ghllag aqe ut _ neqenghaghqe lgusigh ma lusi _ , _ enkaam _ akule gpesini _ nukeggnaghqekagh stun llu _ e l l m i i g u t k a s t u n l l u _ ayuqe ut _ .
esghagh nghmegteki _ aghnagh t _ qiliigh ke aqe ait _ . _ seghleghqe sug neghtu ut _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lghutagh nge i ta _ k e p s u g h s i g a t n g w a a g h i i t _ . _ manu igh aqe ait _ yug t _ puughhe negh kegtagh t _ s e g h l e g h q e s u g e s q e l l u k i _ , _ pakignegh pigte ut llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ !
tamaakut _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ ugpeqe nanigh kaqe ait _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ . _ enkaam _ aghulaqe kau ut _ B a l a a m - e m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ pi na luteng _ . _ ( _ ighnegh ke yagh kanga _ B e o r - e m _ . _ ) _ quya aqe uq _ yug t _ akileghtugh nghatni _ seghletun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ d o n k e y - m _ a k u z i p a g n i n g i l n g u u m _ , _ yug m _ me akun _ ineghtekaqe a _ Balaam _ . _ enkaam _ aghula i aghtekaqe a _ uuknaliqe i sta _ sumeghnegh igh ulliqe llegh aneng _ .
tamaakut _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ pateghkagh stun _ sengngugh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ q i l a g w a a g h e s t u n l l u _ ayuqe ut _ anuqe ghllag m _ t e n g t e k a n g i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekaghqagh ngllagh te kaqe ai _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ .
A g h s a a g h m i k a m e n g _ aangaayugte aqe ut _ t e m n g i t w h a m e n g _ akuzite kete luteng _ . _ pi aqe ut _ itagnagh ni luku _ malighqutagh ke lleghqagh _ seghlegh nun _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh meggneng _ , _ manu igh aqe ait _ tawaten _ p i n q i g t e s q e l l u k i _ .
A p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ tamaakut _ yug t _ iteme nga ni luki _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh itnun _ , _ ellngit _ katam _ iteme nga u nghite ghngaaghmeng _ . _ Q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u u t _ seghleghqe llegh meggnun _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llghite a _ n a a f q e s a q l e g w i i _ . _ yuug _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u u q _ alngunak _ sa mun _ i g l e q a t a q i l g h i i m e n g _ ellmi nun _ .
yug t _ liite aqe yamegteggu _ atanegh ut llu _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e v u t l u _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ anag yaghqaqe aat _ nukeggnagh a _ nuna m _ . _ iwernga _ uteghnigh nqigtekumeng _ seghletun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m e g g n u n _ uaf- ghqutagh kesi ma kumeng llu _ t a m a a k u n u n _ , _ taawa _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a y a g h q a a g u t _ pi yuwhaagh llegh meggneng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ l i i t n g w a a g h l u k u _ agleghnagh lghii _ qelegh sagh _ a l l g e g h t e k a g h t e n g _ , _ tunute kaqe aat _ . _ I t a g h n a g h a t a g h a g h n a y a g h t u t _ liite mangite yagh kumegteggu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ .
tawaten _ aneghte llghite a _ ipa ughte ste aat _ yug t _ p i l l g h a t _ , _ " _ qikmigh m _ uteghte vike aqe a _ mighyaghkagh ni _ , _ kurugagh llu _ ughvughqekagh _ aglagh nqigte luni _ u g h a r r a m u n _ m i n g u g h u n n e q i g t a q u q _ . _ "
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ ukut _ alghigh tke ai _ lata llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ tea- ma ghhagh gkenkun _ lata llegh ma _ neqangugh ste naqutke amsi _ liisimakekagh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghtaghigh sqe sug amsi _ t a m a a k u n e n g _ i p a p i g h q e l l u s i _ .
elpesi nun _ neqamike sug anka _ agleghnagh lghiit _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ . _ neqamike sug aqa llu _ qelegh sagh _ atanegh mta _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e m _ aapte qugh a _ a p o s t l e - e g p e s i g u n _ .
L i i g i k n g w a a g h y a g h q a q a g h s i _ una _ : _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ l e g a s i i g h w a g h t e l g u y a g h q a a g u q _ ; _ t a m a a k u n g u u t _ malighqutagh ke nga lghiit _ seghlegh nun _ piyukekagh meggnun _ . _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ ,
whaten _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ Jesus _ akeqe i kau uq _ tagi nqigte lleqe ni luni _ . _ naagu _ ? _ ima _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate te llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ almesiqe aqe a _ nuna m _ piinlillegh aneng _ . _ "
nakmiigh kau ut _ a v e l g h a s i n g w a a g h n a l u k u _ una _ i p a p i l l e q _ : _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite mikun _ ulima kaqe a _ qilag a _ , _ ulima kaqe a llu _ nuna _ megh meng _ , _ megh kun llu _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ megh meng _ uleve ste luku _ nuna _ naafqe kaqe a _ .
iwernga _ taaggun _ akuzite kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflenga kaqe ai _ qilag a llu _ nuna llu _ naafqesaghqagh u luki _ kenegh kun _ . _ aflengake u ut _ kenlanga _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ . _ tawani llu _ aghneghmi _ naafqe lleqe ai _ yug t _ a v e l g h a s i n g w a a g h i k a t _ ellmi neng _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ puygu gpenaan _ una _ ! _ atanegh mi _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ t h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ t h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh tun _ aghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
atanegh _ egnaangite nghite uq _ akequsagh ni _ pi yaghqaa luku _ , _ ila ita _ yug t _ s u m e g h t a g h a l l g h i s t u n _ . _ yeghlegi _ n e k e g g m e t u t a q i i s i _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ifla yug u nghite kanga _ . _ itupill _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ avuteghqe sqe sug aa _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
iwernga _ aghnegh a _ A t a n g h e m _ tagi lleqe uq _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ qilag a _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ eftughuute te ghllag meng _ . _ sa u aat _ qamagte luteng _ q i l a g a m e l n g u u t _ k e n g h e m _ ughug lleqe ai _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ panegh lleqe ut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ ughug yaghqaa ta itneng _ , _ elpek si _ yug ni _ n a t e l n g u u n a q e t s i _ ? _ K i y a g h t a a l l e s i _ pelungite lit _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ ayuqligh t _ ,
utaqa i ma lusi _ aghnegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ P i n a q e l l g h a g h s i _ qamagte luku _ pinitun _ pi tek _ aghneq _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ k e n g h e m _ naafqe lleqe a _ qilag a _ , _ maatnegh m llu _ ughug lleqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ q i l a g a m e l n g u u t _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ utaqa i u ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ . _ pi kau uq _ nutaghagh meng _ qilaga ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ nutaghagh meng llu _ nuna ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ . _ tawani _ elqughutngagh lghii inagh t _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ utaqa i ma lusi _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ p i n a q e l l g h a g h s i _ qamagte luku _ pelungi tek llu _ afkuyagh ii tek llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ . _ N e k e g g m e t e k l u _ ellnga ni _ .
sumeghmike teggu _ atanegh mta _ n u q e t u t i l l g h a _ elpesi neng _ yuguligh lleg nge sqe qaghte lusi _ . _ piniqekagh mta _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m t a _ P a u l - e m _ apegh kaqe ai _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata aqe yamisi _ peghqinellegh ligh luni _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
lata tke kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ qamagte luki _ lata mikun _ . _ nalighnegh i _ P a u l - e m _ lata yan _ liigike neghllug u ut _ . _ yug t _ l i i g i k e l l e p a g i l n g u u t _ , _ u g p e q i l l e p a g i l n g u u t _ allangughte aqe ait _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ l a t a n g a n i l n g u u t _ . _ tawaten llu _ pi aqe ait _ ila i _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ enkaam _ n a a f q e n g n g u u t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ liisimake te gpesineng _ sa aqe ta i _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ kelenga tek _ . _ aghulaqe te ste gpenasi _ anaggute nga lghii nun _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ malghukli naanghite usi _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ nagnegh tek _ wataqaaghaq _ liisimake luku _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ Y u g u l i g h i s t e v u t _ , _ nagnegh tek llu _ wataqaaghaq _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a _ usuqe lteggu _ , _ q u u l v a a l t e g g u _ maaten _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ ! _ amen _ .
taana _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ : _ nagaqughkagh ut _ , _ esghaghkagh ut _ whangkuta _ katam _ iye mnneng _ , _ esghapagkagh ut _ , _ saaftekagh ut _ iigge mnneng _ , _ t a a n a n g u u q _ akuzite _ unguvallegh _ .
taana _ unguvallegh _ esghagh yaghqaaghte ste aqngan _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ; _ enkaam _ whaa _ a a p g h a g h p u t l u _ ungipaghkagh ut llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ ata mete yagh lghii _ , _ esghagh stekagh _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
A a p g h a g h p u t _ elpesi nun _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ut llu _ nagatekagh ut llu _ i l a t e s q e l l u s i _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ ilate nga lleg mnnun llu _ ata mun _ , _ ighneghagh nun llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ .
lata tke aput _ tamaakut _ quya llegh ut _ iighwigh sqellug qu _ .
una _ ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh ut _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh naqagh ut _ elpesi nun _ , _ K i y a g h n e g h n g u q _ nighug u uq _ , _ m a m l e l l e q r a g g i i t u q _ .
iwernga _ ilate nga ni kumta _ ellnga nun _ naqam _ paninang _ mamleg mi _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u t a _ , _ iqlengiqe u ukut _ , _ a t u q i g a t a g h p u t l u _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ .
iwernga _ nighug mi _ kiyaghtekumta _ ellnga n _ nighug mete llegh atun _ taawa _ ilate nga ukut _ ila mnnun _ , _ aaw an llu _ J e s u s - e m _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh an _ , _ u k m a n g i i w i i n k u t _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
seghleghqe llghite ni kumta _ p u u g h t e n g n g u u k u t _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ katam _ , _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h i t u k u t l u _ .
iwernga _ apegh kumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute yaghqaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ , _ ukmangigh yaghqaqe ainkut llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ anaggute aghagh lleg mnneng _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmete uq llu _ elqughute luni llu _ ayuqe lghii u uq _ .
seghleghqe igate ni kumta _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ i q l e n g i q e s t e n g u g h l l e q a g h p u t _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ atuqe u nghite aput _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ whaten _ lata u amsi _ seghleghqe fqaafsi _ p i s q e l l u s i _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe gkan _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ manigugh utu te aqe ainkut _ ata mun _ .
ellnga u uq _ iqite sigh _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ w h a n g k u n g i n a a m t a _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ t a m a g h a g h l l a g a n _ yug m _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ ayuqe uq _ .
esgha _ whaten _ i p a p i g h q u t k e s a g h q a g h p u t _ liisimake i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun _ qelegh sagh i _ .
kina _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ qaatke gpenaki _ qelegh sagh i _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ , _ nalluke a llu _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piniqe i llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ipapestaaq _ iighwigh kau uq _ , _ tawaten _ i p a p i g h q u t k e s a g h q a q a g h p u t _ e l l n g a n i t u l v u t _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u n i l u n i _ ellnga ni _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ neghightagh _ qelegh sagh _ nagate kayug i _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ , _ taana _ ungipagh u uq _ nagate kayug i _ .
iwernga _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u uq _ . _ T a a m _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h a _ esghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ C h r i s t - a k u n l l u _ elpesigun llu _ qayughllak _ mamleg _ aga _ n a g h u g h t e n g n g u u q _ , _ nighug pig _ kuukgute u uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ nighug mete ni luni _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ , _ paninang _ m a m l e g m e l n g u u g u q _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ nighug mi _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ , _ n i g h u g m e t u t m i n e n g _ naagte sighqagh ite uq _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ , _ mamleg mete uq _ . _ I g l e g h t e n g n g u u q _ mamleg mi _ , _ talwa _ nalluke uq _ navek _ pi u te ni _ qayughllak _ mamleg m _ ayaa stekaqe a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ seghleghqe lleg si _ seghevute lleg nge kau ut _ apallugh ke luku _ C h r i s t - a _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi _ tughneghagh _ . _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ a ta _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghiisi _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ i l u g p e s i n i l n g u u t _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi llu _ tughneghagh _ .
piniqe gpenaan _ nuna _ talwa _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nuna m _ pi a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna _ , _ piniqe llghite uq _ ata mun _ .
ukut _ esgha _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ pi i _ : _ sa u a _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh a _ seghleghqe sigh ke aqe lghii _ , _ iye m _ qiliigh ste llegh a _ , _ sa u aat llu _ yug t _ qukaayug te kaqe kangit _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ taakut _ ata meng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ .
nuna _ aviighute u uq _ , _ tamaakut llu _ s e g h l e g h q u s i i w a q e l g h i i t _ yug m _ piyuke aqe kangi _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ atuqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ ! _ ungipaate kau usi _ anguyag ke i lghii _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ tagi lleqe ni luku _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ u g l a p i g l l e g h i i t _ anguyag ke i lghiit _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ a l l g e g h t u u t n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ .
tamaakut _ w h a n g k u n n i s a g h t u t _ iwernga _ unite kaqe ainkut _ qayughllak _ i l a t n g w a a g h u m a n g i l n g u u t _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ I l a t n g w a a q a a y a q u m e n g _ unite nayagh nghite ainkut _ . _ unite llegh megteggun _ l i i g i k e s t e n g n g w a a g h a a t _ i l a t n g w a a g h u m a n g i t e l l e g h t e n g _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ , _ C h r i s t - a m _ kuuve kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ .
L a t a n g u s t e m s i i - i _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ nalluke te gpesineng _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ lata u amsi _ liisimake te gpesineng _ . _ liisimake kesi llu _ iqlengiqe llegh _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ pi u nghite ngughk _ .
kina _ iqlengiqe ste u a _ ? _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u n g h i t u q _ . _ " _ taana nguq _ anguyag ke i lghii _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ qayughllak _ ighsake kek _ ata nkuk _ ighnegh nkuk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ighsake gkunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ ighsake yaghqaqe a _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ iiwleng _ neqamike luku _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh kekagh _ elpesi nun _ ugpegh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ ima _ . _ atuqe manginagh kufsigu _ nagaqughkagh i _ taawa _ iiwleng _ ighnegh mete lleqe usi llu _ ata mete lleqe usi llu _ .
U n a n g u u q _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ elpesi nun _ tamaakut _ puughte i naqutke lghiit _ elpesi neng _ apallugh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ C h r i s t - a m _ k u u v i k e g k a q i i s i _ taghneghagh gmineng _ . _ taghneghagh kek _ i l u g p e s i n i t u t m e g n e n g _ alla _ kina _ alngunak _ A p e g h t u g h i s t e k s u g n a a n g h i t a g h s i _ , _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh gkenka _ apeghtugh aqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ apeghtuusagh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ temngingu nghite ut _ enkaam _ taghneghagh m _ a p e g h t u l g h a t u n _ C h r i s t - a m e t e k e s t a g h t e k _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ C h r i s t - a m e t e k e s t a g h t e k _ enkaam _ uka _ aliigh kan _ ilutu yaghqaa luta _ , _ iigh naqe fqaamta _ k a y n g u y u g e m _ ellnga neng _ pi lghaakut _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ tagi llegh ani _ .
liisimake kesi _ C h r i s t - a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ enkaam _ liisimake yaghqaqe asi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ elqughute nga an _ pikayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh ke ai _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ ata m _ piniqe i ma llegh ghllag a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ avaqutagh ke na iqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ , _ ipa _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ tamaaken _ apate lugh qu luku _ nuna m _ yug an _ nalluke ainkut _ qayughllak _ nalluke kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ taawa _ avaqutagh ke kanginkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ iwernga _ salin _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ l i i g i k i g a t a g h p u t _ naten _ lliigh lleghqagh ut _ . _ iwernga _ liisimakagh ut _ , _ C h r i s t - a _ aliigh kan _ ellnga tun _ ayuqe lleqe ukut _ qayughllak _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h p u t _ legan _ tawatete luku _ .
taana _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ sighimake gkunigu _ C h r i s t - a k u n _ pelungighsagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ C h r i s t - a m _ pelungite llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ s e g h l l e g h q e g k a y u k _ qaatke te igate uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ qaatke te nghite llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
liisimakagh i _ C h r i s t - a _ allgegh kau uq _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ ellnga _ seghleghqe llghite uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ C h r i s t - a m i _ kiyaghte lghii _ s e g h l e g h q u m a n g i n a g h n a a n g i t u q _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh kuni _ , _ liigike mangite a llu _ nallu kaqe a llu _ C h r i s t - a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pikayug _ elqughute nga uq _ katam _ C h r i s t - a m _ elqughutngagh llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh lghii _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u l g h i i _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ . _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ allgegh kau uq _ una _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ n a a f q e n n a l u k u _ tughneghagh m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
kina _ alngunak _ taghnughhagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe manginagh igate uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh a _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ; _ qayughllak llu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata ke kanga _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ .
whaten _ liisimake yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ avaquti a _ , _ tughneghagh m llu _ avaquti a _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pi igate ngughk _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke i nga lghii _ yug lgute mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke nghite a _ .
ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ u n a n g u u q _ : _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
C a i n - e t u n _ ayuqe yaghqaa nghite ukut _ . _ C a i n _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ enkaam _ tuqute kaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ anglegute ni _ . _ sangan _ tuqute agu _ ? _ qayughllak _ s a l l g h i _ anaggute nga lghiit _ naqam _ a n g l e g u t a n g a n _ s a l l g h i _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m n i _ , _ saghiigha yug gpenasi _ nuna m _ yug an _ ugumi ke kangisi _ .
liisimake ukut _ t u q u m e n g _ alpag kau ukut _ unguvallegh mun _ qayughllak _ piniqe ke put _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u t _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i igate ngughk _ paninang _ t u q u m e t u q _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ y u g t a g h t e m _ ilu ani _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u n g h i t u q _ .
whaten _ esgha _ l i i s i m a k e g k e f u t _ piniqe llegh _ sa u ta a _ : _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuune llegh akun _ unguvallegh ni _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ tuune lteki _ unguvallegh put _ u g p e q a a l g u t e m n n u n _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ n a a m a g h m i _ k i y a g h t a a g h e m _ esghagh luku _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ akluma lghii _ nanglleg ke nghite kunigu _ , _ n a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ ilu nga ni lleqe a _ ?
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ ! _ piniqe i yaghqaa nghite ukut _ akuzite raaghinagh tgun llu _ akuzillegh mteggun llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ piniqe i lta _ i p a p i g h q e l l u t a _ nangaghnegh mteggun _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ liisimake lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m u n _ p i k u t f u t _ . _ seghleghni negh mta llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ n a l l u n e q s u k n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ seghevute i nga llegh a _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ aange aghagh uq _ seghleghyug nga lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimake kanga llu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghleghni nghite kumta _ t e t u g n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ .
aapte negh mta llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ ellnga neng _ qayughllak _ qaatke aqe ke put _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ , _ atuqe aqe ke put llu _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ ellnga ni _ .
una _ esgha _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ighnegh mi _ ategh a _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ pinigh qutu tete luta llu _ C h r i s t - a m _ qelegh llegh atun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ l i i s i m a k e g k e f u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ w h a n g k u n n i t e l l g h a _ : _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ tuunekagh mikun _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ ugpeqe gpenaki _ qamagte luki _ taghneghagh t _ . _ yeghlegi _ liigike naqe aqe teki _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ mingite ma ut _ nuna mi _ .
esgha _ whaten _ liisimake yaghqagh gsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ taghneghagh ke te kek _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ , _ kiyaghneghtagh u uq _ .
iwernga _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ mesag ii aghagh u uute kagu _ Jesus _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau nghite ni luku _ kiyaghneghtagh u nghite uq _ . _ taake uk _ taghneghagh k _ anguyag ke i lghii meng _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ pi u uk _ nagaqughkagh gpesineng _ tagi i yaghqaa ni lukek _ . _ taawa _ maaten _ k a a t n g w a a g h l u t e k _ nuna mun _ ayuqe uk _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ p i k u t a n g a n e n g _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe asi _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ilu gpesinite ngughk _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte uq _ n u n a m e l n g u g h m e n g _ .
tamaakut _ nuna m _ pi ke ai _ , _ apeghtuusagh it _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug an _ nagate aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ liisimake i lghii m _ kiyaghnegh meng _ nagate aqe ainkut _ . _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ kiyaghnegh m _ pike nghite ka an _ nagate igate ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ esgha _ liisimake yaghqagh gput _ taghneghagh kek _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h e m _ nalighmeng _ taghneghagh kek _ ipa u nghite ngugh m _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ yeqay _ pinigh qutu te lta _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i nga lghii _ taghnughhagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ liisimake a llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe i nghite ngugh m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a q _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ , _ u n g u v a l l e n g e s q e l l u t a _ ellnga kun _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
piniqe llegh _ akuzi tke kegka _ whangkuta _ p i n i q e l q e n g h i t a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh ke a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ keleg tke a _ kayagte llegh mikun _ ighnegh ni _ iqitute yu i luku _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ tawatete kan _ whangkuta llu _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ e s g h i i g a t n g w a a g h a a _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ p i n i q u s k u m t a _ kiyaghnegh _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ ilu mnni _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ ilu mnni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ ellmi _ katam _ taghneghagh gmineng _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ w h a n k u n n i _ , _ whangkuta _ ellnga ni _ .
esghaqaghkagh ut _ ighnegh a _ . _ enkaam _ u n g i p a q n g w a a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagtekaqe ni luku _ yuguligh i ste u luku _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ ellnga ni _ , _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ugpeqagh ut llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i llegh a _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghte lghii _ piniqe llegh mi _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ .
enkaam _ piniqe llegh _ i i g h w i g h t e k a a g u q _ ilu mnni _ i l u t u s q e l l u t a _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawatete ukut _ qayughllak _ C h r i s t - a t u n _ ayuqe lghiikut _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
piniqe llegh mi _ alinge llegh _ aviite uq _ qayughllak _ iighwighkagh m _ piniqe llegh m _ i g h l l e q a y u w a a _ alinge llegh _ . _ E n k a a n g a m _ piniqe llegh _ iighwigh mangite uq _ tamaa kuni _ paninang _ alinge kayug ni _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lleg lgu uq _ aghyuugh llegh _ .
piniqe i aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivuke luni _ piniqe kaqe ainkut _ .
kina _ pikumi _ , _ " _ piniqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ . _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ esghaqagh yu ni _ , _ piniqe naanghite a _ kiyaghnegh _ esghagh igate kete ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh ke a _ C h r i s t - a m _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ kitum _ piniqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i l l u _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe u kunigu _ Jesus _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g u t a n g a _ , _ avaqutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ a ta _ piniqe yaghqaqe ai _ avaquti a _ .
whaten _ l i i s i m a k s a g h q a q a g h p u t _ piniqe i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh itnun _ : _ piniqe lleg mteggun _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun llu _ qelegh sagh i _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ : _ qaatke te llegh ut _ qelegh sagh anun _ . _ qelegh sagh i _ piyaqnagh ghllagu nghite ut _ ,
qayughllak _ tamaghhagh mi _ avaqutagh liitekagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe kaqe a _ nuna _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ kayaalqesaghqagh ut _ nuna _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ .
kinangaawa _ kayaalqe i i sta _ nuna meng _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana ta _ kayaalqe i i sta _ .
Jesus _ C h r i s t - a n g u u q _ tagikagh _ . _ tagi kau uq _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ . _ tagi mangite uq _ meghhagh inagh kun _ iwernga _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ tagi kau uq _ .
taghneghagh m _ apegh aa _ taana _ ipa u ni luku _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh k _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h u l g h i i k _ .
taawa _ pi nga yug u ut _ a a p g h i s t e t _ , _ taghneghagh k _ , _ megh _ , _ a a k w h _ ; _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ itagnagh kete te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ugpeqe u kumteki _ yug t _ apeghkagh it _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ , _ ipapestaaq _ ugpeqe aghagh yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ ighnegh mun _ ipa u uq _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qama _ ilu anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe nghite kunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqe ste ngllagh lleqe a _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ ighnegh mineng _ ugpeqe nghite kanga _ .
una _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ taana _ unguvallegh _ ighneghagh nite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ unguvallegh lgu uq _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh ma ite kunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvallegh nge llghite uq _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ategh aneng _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh i _ .
N a l l u n e q s u k i g a t a g h p u t _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ nagate aqe ainkut _ a a p n e m t e g g u _ sa meng _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh akun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
liisimake gkumteggu _ nagate llegh a _ sa meng _ alngunak _ aapte lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimakagh ut _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ tungsighkagh mnneng _ ellnga neng _ .
kitum _ esghagh kunigu _ u g p e q a a l g u t n i _ seghleghqe lghii _ t u q u m u n _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ yughagh te kete ligu _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ligu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ A k u z i t k e n g n g w a a n k a _ yug t _ seghleghqe llghite a _ t u q u m u n _ pi yaghqaqe nghite ka itneng _ . _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ t u q u m u n _ ayuqe lghii mun _ . _ iwernga _ y u g h a a t k e s q e n g n g u n g h i t a q a _ tawaten _ seghleghqe lghii _ .
qamagte luni _ seghletun _ pi llegh _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ . _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ t u q u m u n _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh a _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ , _ qayughllak _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake u kanga _ enkaam _ tughneghagh m _ seghletun _ pi naanghite a _ .
liisimake ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ qaywa _ tughneghagh m _ igleghte te u ghngaagu _ qamagte luku _ nuna _ .
liisimakagh ut _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi luni _ liigike stekaqe ainkut _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh pig _ . _ kiyaghnegh pig mete ukut _ I g h n e g h a n i t u t e m n n e n g _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m i _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh pig llu _ kenle ite ngughk llu _ unguvallegh _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ iqite nga lusi _ k i y a g h n e s i g h w a a g h n e n g _ !
ukut _ lata t _ E l d e r - m e n g _ pi u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ aghnagh mun _ , _ avaqutagh anun llu _ ipa pig meng _ piniqekagh mnun _ . _ E l l n g i n a a n g h i t u n g a _ p i n i q i s t e z i _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ liisimake lghiit _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ piniqe aisi _ ,
qayughllak _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ ilu mnnite ngughk _ . _ taana _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ i l u m n n i s a g h q a a g u q _ quunperugllag _ .
kayusillegh _ , _ nanglleg yug llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh llu _ w h a n g k u n n i l l e q u t _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u t a _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h q u n l l u _ piniqe llegh kun llu _ . _ taakut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g l l u _ , _ ata m _ ighneghagh neng _ pi u ut _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ nagaqugh luki _ ila i _ avaqutagh ten _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u n i l u k i _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h q u n _ t a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ata m _ qelegh llegh atun _ whangkuta _ .
aghnagh mi _ , _ pi amken _ pinigh qutu te lta _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ q e l g h u u s a q _ lata tke kegka _ elpenun _ ; _ qelegh sagh u uq _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ qaatke te llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ q e l g h u u s a a n u n _ . _ Q e l g h u u s a q _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ u n a n g u u q _ : _ qamagte lusi _ piniqe te lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ .
uglagh pigte lghii _ puughte i sta _ nuna mi _ mingite luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ apegh naanghite aat _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe igate aat _ . _ T a w a t e l n g u q _ yuug _ puughte i ste u uq llu _ , _ anguyag ke i lghii u uq llu _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ .
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ , _ pegte yaqunaan _ qepghagh tekagh i _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh i _ qamagte luku _ a l l g e g h s a g h q a q a g h s i _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaasghute kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ C h r i s t - a m _ kiyaghnegh _ ellngan ite nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe manginagh kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ C h r i s t - a m _ , _ a ta llu _ ighnegh llu _ ellnga nite uk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh yaghtugh kangisi _ atuqe gpenaki _ C h r i s t - a m _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ aqelqagh ngllagh gpenaan _ nalighmeng _ quyake gpenaan _ ,
qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ quyake gkunigu _ q e p g h a l g u s i q a l l g h u u g h l l e q a a _ seghlegh meng _ qepghaqagh aneng _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u ghngaaghma _ elpesi nun _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ . _ iwernga _ sunanguq _ laalighfike lamsi _ , _ aleghquute nayagh ukut _ gginasaghqugh te luta _ , _ enkaam _ quya te ghllag nayagh ukut _ .
avaqutagh ita _ nakmikegkagh m _ aakagh gpesi _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
ukut _ lata t _ E l d e r - m e n g _ pi u ut _ G a i u s - m u n _ ipapik _ piniqekagh mnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ liisimake aqa _ unguva sigh gken _ itagnagh uq _ . _ yughagh te kaqe amken _ i t a g n i i s q e l l u t e n _ sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ y u g u n q e g t e s q e l l u t e n l l u _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ ila ita _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ kaate luteng _ ungipaate yatnga _ ataasiighmete llegh gpeneng _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m u n _ , _ iiwleng _ elpesi nun _ atuqe u ni luku _ i p a p i g h q e l l e q _ .
quya pigte aqe unga _ n a g a q u n e m k i _ avaqutagh ligh tke anka _ atuqe i u ni luki _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ . _ alla _ s a a m _ alngunak _ quya te igate aanga _ tawaten _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ pi niigh pigte uq _ ataasiighmete luten _ qepghagh llegh n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflengake llegh gpegun _ u g p e q a a l g u t e t _ talwa _ tamaakut _ nallukekagh ten _ .
maani _ yughaghvig mi _ apegh aqe aat _ piniqe llegh n _ . _ kayusiite aghte ki _ n a g n e g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ iglegha llegh it _ . _ kayusigh i llegh n _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe luku
qayughllak _ iglegha u ut _ apallugh ke luku _ C h r i s t - a _ . _ tugukligh i igate ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ kayusillegh meng
enkaam _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayusigh yaghqaqe aput _ tamaakut _ yug t _ . _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ qepghagh lgutke lleqe ainkut _ apeghtugh i u luteng _ i p a p i g h q e l l e g h m e n g _ .
lata kaayagh unga _ ugpeqagh nun _ iwernga _ D i o t r e p h e s - e m _ u m i i l g u y u g n e g h e m _ waakigate ai _ liilightugh llegh nka _ .
elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ apegh lleqe aqa _ sa aqe ta a _ . _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ainkut _ , _ iqlengiqe te kaqe ainkut llu _ . _ T a w a t e n g i n a q _ pi igate uq _ upugha sug igate ai _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u t _ kaate nghata _ . _ upugha te i yu lghiit _ ineghte aqe ai _ , _ upugha te i nghata llu _ eflequgh aqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te vig itneng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghletun _ pikayug stun _ pi gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ pinitun _ pikayug stun _ pi aqe i _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pikayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pikayug m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqagh m _ D e m e t r i u s _ pinigh na iqe aat _ yuug _ . _ I p a p i g h q e l l u n i _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h a n _ i p a p i g h q u t k e s t a a _ . _ taawa _ whangkuta llu _ tawaten _ piigh ut _ , _ liisima kasi _ akuzillegh put _ ipa u ut _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u unga _ elpenun _ iwernga _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ .
sunanguq _ qantaghaqun _ esghagh laken _ enkaam _ aleghquute lleqe ukung _ gginasaghqugh te lutung _ .
ukut _ lata t _ J u d e - m e n g _ pi u ut _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a n e n g _ , _ J a m e s - e m _ uyughagh aneng _ . _ lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ piniqe aisi _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m l l u _ aflenga kaqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a llu _ , _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ nula li _ elpesi ni _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ lata yu pigte aqe amsi _ yuguligh lleg mnneng _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh yamki _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ e l p e s i n i l n g u u t _ , _ apegh yug kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ simigh aqa _ . _ liisima kasi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ai _ A p o s t l e - e t l u _ ila i llu _ yug t _ a p e g h t i i s q e l l u t a _ ugpeqe yaghqagh mnneng _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ allangughte yaghqaqe nghite ait _ ellngit a _ apeghtugh i llegh it _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata u unga _ qevuute lusi _ k i p u l l g i n a a g h e s q e l l u k i _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ . _ apeghtugh i ste gpenaki _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ .
qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maligte te aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate igate aisi _ sa meng _ apeghtugh yug aqe ni lusi _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tugukligh yug igate aat _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a q _ I g l e g h u t i s t e v u t _ , _ atanegh ut llu _ . _ enkaam _ allangughte aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ n a n g l e g t a g h l l a g t u q _ , _ seghevute i kayugu uq _ enkaam _ itagnagh uq _ seghleghqesagh ghngaamta _ s e x - k u n _ . _ " _ Q a v n g a r u g l l a k _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate kaqe ainkut _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luku _ kina _ alngunak _ apeghtugh i lghii _ tawaten _ .
U n g i p a a t k a a y a g h n g a a g h p e s i _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh aneng _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n u n _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ allameng _ taakut _ uspute aqe luki _ . _ neqamike luku _ A t a n g h e m _ y u g u l i k a q i i _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ E g y p t - e g h m i i n e n g _ , _ aghulaqe stekaqe ai _ E g y p t - m e n g _ . _ iwernga _ kingu aneng _ t a a m _ ila i _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ ugpeqe i nanigh yata _ , _ qaatke te nanigh yata _ ellmi nun _ , _ tuqu stekaqe ai _ .
neqamike luki _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqekagh a _ nagnegh te ma nge i tke aat _ , _ unitekagh at llu _ ne eng _ qilag _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ asighqekagh i _ qiipraghute neng _ nekegnga yaghqagh neng _ quunperugllag _ , _ nekegte stekagh i _ mamleg ghllag kun _ . _ T a w a n t e s n a q n g w i i _ kenlanga _ aghyuugh lleghqagh minun _ nanqigtivig m _ aghnegh ani _ .
neqamike luki _ S o d o m - e g h m i i t l u _ G o m o r r a h - g h m i i t l u _ , _ u v i t a n g i t n i l n g u u t l u _ nuna t _ . _ yaquleg stun _ seghleghqe kau ut _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghleghqe llegh _ s e x - k u n _ pi ke aat _ , _ talwa _ yug t _ yug lgu tke te lghiit _ atuqe te aqe luteng _ , _ sa u aat llu _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a t _ atuqe kaqe ait _ . _ usputagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyugh i llegh aneng _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n u n _ kenle ite ngugh qun _ kenegh kun _ .
A p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ tawatete ut _ . _ pi aqe ut _ qavangugh llghite a nguq _ seghleghqe ste aqe ait _ s e x - k u n _ , _ qaatke sigate ait llu _ yug t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ , _ seghletun llu _ akuzi tke ste aqe ait _ yaquleg t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ .
naqam _ michael _ , _ yaquleg t _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t a _ ila at _ , _ tawaten _ pi llghite uq _ . _ tughneghaan- ke uk _ aaghtiiraagh te kaqe yamegnegu _ M o s e s - e m _ yugusigh a _ , _ M i c h a e l - e m _ seghletun _ akuzi tke mangite a _ , _ anaggute ma ni luku llu _ pi llghite a _ . _ yeghlegi _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ A t a n g h e m _ a g h y u u g h m i g l i t e n _ . _ "
iwernga _ tamaakut _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ sa u a _ alngunak _ l i i g i k e n g h i l k e s e n g _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe aat _ . _ sa u a _ ila a _ liigike aqe aat _ teghig ke sagh stun _ s u m e g h t a g h i i g a l n g u g h e s t u n _ . _ teghig ke sagh t _ piyuke llegh megestun _ pikayug u ut _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t _ pikayug u ut _ . _ enkaam _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e n g u g h t a g h a g h a q u t _ .
S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u t _ ellngit _ ! _ C a i n - e t u n _ pi u ut _ , _ tuqute kaqe a _ anglegute ni _ . _ allgegh teqaghte na luteng _ mani meng _ seghletun _ pi kau ut _ B a l a a m - e m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ . _ K o r a h - t u n _ pi u ut _ , _ q a a t k e s u n g h i t k a q e g k a n g i _ i g l e g h u t i s t e t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe kaqe a _ ellnga _ , _ a p e g h t u g h i s t e s i g h w a a g h e t l u _ naafqesaghqagh ke ai _ .
neqenghaghqe te yaghtugh negh gpesini _ , _ c o m m u n i o n - e m a g h p e s i _ , _ tamaakut llu _ apeghtughiste t _ pi aqe ut _ . _ yakugh nagh ut _ ugpeqagh nun _ katam _ tawaten _ uyghag ghllag _ megh m _ asi anite ngughk _ yakugh nagh lghii _ angyagh nun _ . _ negh aqe ut _ qerngagh meng _ nenglaghqagh iqe te magh meng _ , _ akuzi magh meng _ nepug ghllag t _ kayngu yug gpenateng _ . _ ellnginagh meng _ negh aqe ut _ kinku t _ tuune gpenaki _ . _ sasii nghite ut _ qilawaagh stun _ e s l a l l u g i l n g u g h e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ , _ anuqe m _ n a g h u g h u s k a n g i _ qule akun _ nuna m _ megh i sag ghllag m _ . _ sasii nghite ut _ p i i t e s t i n g i g a l n g u g h e s t u n _ uqfig stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ unatagh vig mi _ . _ piite ste i igate ngugh t _ uqfig t _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ p i i t e s i i g h a g h t e m _ nusug aqe ai _ paneghte na luki _ . _ enkaam _ maalghug gneng _ t u q u k a l l g h u u g h a q u t _ .
kayngu nagh lghiit _ nangaghnegh it _ qagi ghllag stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ temngi _ p u u g l l u n g l l a t _ . _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ qaprakayug stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ qayughllak _ t a w a t e l n g u u t _ ighaleqetaagh t _ nalluniigh te u yaghqaa nghite ut _ i g l e g h a n u n _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g - a q _ igleghte te yaghqaqe nghite aat _ kina _ alngunak _ a p e g h t u g h i l l e s i g h w a a l l e g h m e g t e g g u n _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe ai _ p i s a g h t i i g h l l a g m e n g _ nekaghqagh meng _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
E n o c h - n g u q _ maaghraghvinleg ii tke kangat _ k i n g u n g h i t a _ A d a m - e m _ , _ ellnga n _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ yug t _ . _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ esghagh tek _ , _ atanegh _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yaquleg lghute ghllag ni _ k e l q e l l u k i _ ,
nanqigte na luki _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ yug t _ . _ qayvighqesaghqagh ke ai _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ akuzi tke i llegh it _ ellmi neng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ A t a n g h e m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ seghleghqe ste ghllaget _ . _ "
tamaakut _ yug t _ quunpeng _ temngi _ a k u z i l g a g h l l a g e t _ , _ e f q u g h u t k i g a l k a n g i t _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ . _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ seghleghqe sigh t _ atuqe yu nghmegteki _ atuqe aqe ait _ , _ piniiyugnegh ghllag t _ , _ usuqe u ughtaghkagh it llu _ kinku t _ sa meng _ qiliigh vike nghmegteki _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ neqamike luki _ A t a n g h e m _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ a p o s t l e - n g i t a _ apeghkagh it _ sivugh nghaani _ .
ungipaate kaqe aisi _ whaten _ , _ " _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ n e n g l a g h y u g s a g h t e l g u y a g h q a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h a n e n g _ ayuqe lghii neng _ . _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh i _ atuqe yu nghmegteki _ pi aqe ait _ . _ "
tamaakut _ yug t _ aaghtiiraagh te ste i yug aqe ut _ ugpeqagh neng _ . _ maligte aqe ait _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh it _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ ava ite u te meggneng _ .
iwernga _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ wata _ i k n a q u g h s a a m a n g i n a g h t e g g u _ ugpeqagh u ma llegh i _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh m _ agleghnagh lghii tgun _ apeghtuusagh itgun _ . _ yughagh aqe tek _ A g l e g h n a l g h i i g n e k u n _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ p i n i q e l l g h a n i t e k e s t a g h t e k _ , _ utaqa i ma lusi _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ t u u n e s q e l l u s i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ .
nanglleg ke luki _ tamaakut _ malghukli nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h a n e n g _ .
Y u g u l i t e k i _ a k u q a q a l l g h u u l g h i i s t u n _ k e n g h e g n e n g _ . _ nanglleg ke aqe luki _ ila it llu _ iwernga _ p i r a a m s i n g w a a g h l u s i _ luuraq _ s e g h l e g h q e l l g h i s t u n _ pi aqe yaaghte usi _ . _ ugumi ke luki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ katam _ ugumi ke llegh gpesistun _ nukeggnaghqe ghllagkagh it _ aatkagh teng _ s e g h l e g h q e n g n g u l u t e n g _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kelengake yaghqaqe aisi _ seghleghqe lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ seghleghqe llghite tesaghqagh ke aisi llu _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllag lleqe usi _ nekeve gkufsi _ sivungagh kun _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a n _ .
kiyaghnegh _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ y u g u l i k a q i i n k u t _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ tuqu llegh akun _ . _ ima _ t a z i m a k e r u g l l a k _ , _ maaten _ , _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ kiyaghnegh _ aange ghllag uq _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ , _ igleghte te u a _ sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaqe nghite a _ sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe li _ . _ amen _ .
whani _ igagh ni _ igaqe nga ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekagh i _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe ai _ ellnga nun _ l i i g i k e s t e s q e l l u k i _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ sa u aat _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh ni luki _ . _ enkaam _ C h r i s t - a m _ kayagtekaqe a _ yaquleg ni _ q e p g h a g h t e m i n u n _ J o h n - m u n _ tamaakut _ l i i s i m a k e s q e l l u k i _ .
taagken _ J o h n - e m _ apegh kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ esghaghkagh ni llu _ nagatekagh ni llu _ . _ nagate kaqe ai _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ungipagh llu _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g _ ayuqe lghii _ .
quya stekau uq _ atightugh lghii _ iglagtu luni _ akuzi ta itneng _ uuknaliqe llegh m _ . _ quya stekau ut llu _ nagate luteng _ qaatke te lghiit _ qayughllak _ qantaghaqun _ tamaakut _ pi lleqe ut _ .
ukut _ lata t _ J o h n - m e n g _ pi u ut _ ugpeqagh nun _ q e r n g u g h t u k a y u g e t _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ A s i a - m i _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh llu _ nekeggmellegh llu _ elpesi nite lik _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh neng _ , _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m e n g l l u _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ . _ ( _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh t _ sivungagh nite ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh an _ . _ ) _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u g u q _ liisimake i sta _ i p a p i l l e g h m u n _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h s u w h a a q a a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ ellnga u uq _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g a t _ umiileg ita _ nuna m _ . _ ellnga u uq _ piniqe i lghii _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ , _ aaw mikun llu _ iteme te kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ A t a n e g h p a g u l l e g h m i n i t e s t i i n k u t _ , _ priest- ngughte ste ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh minun _ ata mun _ . _ Jesus _ C h r i s t - a m _ a l l g e g h l l i k e k _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q l u _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q l u _ i g l e g h u t i m u n _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
ii-i _ ! _ Jesus _ tagi aqe uq _ q i l a g w a a g t e g g u n _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ talwa _ tamaakut _ pana sqellug qu _ pi ke ai ta _ esghagh lleqe aat _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nuna m _ ramke i _ qiya aghte te te ghllagte lleqe ut _ apallugh ke luku _ ellnga _ . _ aa-a _ , _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ ! _ amen _ .
" _ whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga llu _ O m e g a - n g u u n g a l l u _ , _ " _ pi uq _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
J o h n - n g u u n g a _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t k a g h p e s i n g a _ . _ ikfiqe unga _ elpesi stun _ qayughllak _ J e s u s - e m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ pi ke ainkut _ . _ ellnga kun _ ikfiqe lleg put _ n u q e t u t a p u t _ . _ aglagh stekau unga _ qiighqagh mun _ ategh ke lghii _ P a t m o s - m e n g _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke gkenka _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ ungipagh llu _ J e s u s - m e n g _ ayuqe lghii _ .
A t a n g h e m _ aghnegh ani _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ itegh ghhaanga _ . _ taagken _ t u n u t e m n i l l u k u _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtuqagh _ qalghightautetu te _ .
whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ igaqugh ki _ igagh tgun _ esghaghkagh ten _ . _ taagken _ tuyugh naketen _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ : _ E p h e s u s - m e l n g u u t _ , _ S m y r n a - m e l n g u u t _ , _ P e r g a - m e l n g u u t _ , _ T h y a t i r a - m e l n g u u t _ , _ S a r d i s - m e l n g u u t _ , _ P h i l a d e l p h i a - m e l n g u u t _ , _ L a o d i c e a - m e l n g u u t l u _ . _ "
taagken _ qiive unga _ esghagh na luku _ me _ a l e g h q u g h t e k a _ . _ qiive yalghiinga _ esghagh anka _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ g o l d - e t _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh it _ .
taawa _ qukagh itni _ kina _ llangaqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ a k u g h t u g h l l a g e g n e n g _ atkuyaagh ke uq _ , _ sakimag mikun llu _ tafsi nga uq _ g o l d - m e n g _ .
N a a s q w a l l u _ nuyagh a llu _ qategh uk _ w o o l - e s t u n _ nalighmeng _ anigu stun _ , _ iye kek llu _ k e n g h e m _ k u m a n g a l l g h a t u n _ ayuqe lutek _ .
itegagh i _ qelmeghsaghkagh stun _ siilu stun _ ayuqe ut _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ kenegh kun _ . _ me a llu _ eftugh ghllag atun _ meghllag m _ tevugha llegh an _ ayuqe luni _ .
aghenqignegh mineng _ tugumiiqe ai _ m a a g r a g h v i n l e k _ ighaleqetaagh t _ , _ q a a n g h a n e n g l l u _ aane uq _ savigpag _ inglugtun _ gginagh kek _ ipegsaghkagh k _ . _ gginagh a _ nighug ghllag _ aghnegh m _ qukaa n _ s i q i n g h u u g h t e l l g h a t u n _ .
esghagh yamkun _ itegagh an _ manu akun _ ullegh aghte unga _ tuqukagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ aghenqignegh mineng _ iigge mineng _ saafte lunga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ whanga _ sivulii unga llu _ kinguligh u unga llu _ .
unguva lghii u unga _ ! _ tuqu kaayagh unga _ , _ iwernga _ ii-i _ , _ unguva u unga _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ key- lgu unga _ tuqu llegh mun llu _ H a d e s - m u n l l u _ .
" _ sa aqe ziin _ igaqugh ki _ igagh tgun _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ esghagh keten _ maaten _ , _ sa u aat llu _ k i n g u v a q u n _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
esghagh aten _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh t _ aghenqignegh ma _ i i g g a n i l n g u u t _ , _ maaghraghvinleg llu _ g o l d - e t _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh it _ , _ taakut _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ salin _ qayvighte llghite ut _ . _ whaten _ pi sigh u ut _ : _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh t _ yaquleg u ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaghtekagh i _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug t _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ . _ maaghraghvinleg _ kenegh lghutagh m _ tunemagh i _ t a a k u n g u u t _ maaghraghvinleg _ yughaghvig t _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ E p h e s u s - e m _ . _ whanga u uq _ tugumiigh leg _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ i g l e g h t e n g n g u u n g a l l u _ akule itni _ maaghraghvinleg _ g o l d - e t _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh itni _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ , _ ughleghiigh lghiisi _ , _ iilqayug nghite llegh i llu _ . _ liisimake amsi llu _ tugukligh igate asi _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ a p o s t l e - n g u n i l g h i i t _ liite aqe asi _ esghapag luki _ temngingu ta i _ . _ taawa _ liite asi _ iqlengiqe ste u ut _ .
meghnugh igate usi _ ikfiqe llegh gpesineng _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ iilqayugigate usi llu _ .
iwernga _ piyuke nghite sigh ka _ elpesi nun _ u n a n g u u q _ , _ p i n i q n a n i i m a a g h p e s i n g a _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i l l u _ sivugh nghaani _ piniqe llegh gpesistun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ puygu gpenaan _ piniqe ghllag yaqefsinga _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e s i l l u _ . _ P i n i q n a n i g h a g h p e s i n g a _ pi aqe llegh gpesistun _ . _ enkaam _ avuteghqe tek _ . _ piniqe nqigte kut _ p i n i q s u g w h a a l l e g h p e s i s t u n _ . _ avuteghqe nghite kufsi _ , _ taku lusi _ iqite lleqe aqa _ kenegh lghutagh gpesi _ tunemagh a _ ne aneng _ .
iwernga _ una _ pinitun _ p i l q a g h s i _ : _ ugumi ke asi _ pi aqe kangit _ N i c o l a u s - e m _ m a l i g s a a g h t e n g i t a _ , _ katam _ whanga _ ugumi ke lleg mtun _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ tamaakut _ kayaalqe i i lghiit _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ negh sqe lleqe anka _ piite stekagh aneng _ uqfig an _ unguvallegh m _ , _ t a w a n l e n g u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesighaghvig ani _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ S m y r n a - m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ whanga mneng _ pi u uq _ : _ sivulii unga llu _ kinguligh u unga llu _ , _ tuqu lunga _ unguvagh kau unga _ .
liisimake anka _ seghleliigh lleg si _ , _ akluma u usi llu _ iwernga _ aklungite usi _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ seghlegh t _ akuzite t _ ila ita _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ elpesi nun _ . _ J e w s - n g u n i i q u t _ , _ J e w s - e p i g u n g h i t e g h n g a a g h m e n g _ . _ yugu ut _ qerngughte te kayug t _ tughneghagh m _ s y n a g o g u e - n g a n i _ .
alike gpenaki _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe te kete naqe kesi _ . _ nagate tek _ ! _ tughneghagh m _ ila si _ anusimingllagh ste naqe ai _ nanghiiqu na lusi _ . _ enkaam _ ikfiqe lleqe usi _ qula _ aghnegh nun _ . _ iwernga _ ataasiighmete tek _ , _ qaywa _ t u q u y a g h q a a g h n g a a g h p e s i _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ , _ a k i l e g h t u u s a l i l l e q a m s i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ tamaakut _ kayaalqe i i lghiit _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ tuqu llegh m _ aqnighte naanghite ai _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ P e r g a m u m - e m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ savigpag leg meng _ pi u uq _ inglugtun _ gginagh leg _ ipegsaghkagh meng _ .
liisimake amsi _ n a a n t u t s i _ , _ t a w a n t u s i _ tughneghagh m _ umiileg u te i vig an _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ whanga mnun _ ataasiighmete usi _ , _ u g p e q n a n i l l g h i t a g h p e s i n g a l l u _ . _ tawatete kau usi _ talwa _ A n t i p a s _ , _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u q _ ungipaghteke _ , _ k i y a g h t e n g n g u l u k u _ . _ tawani _ tughneghagh m _ kiyaghfig ani _ tuqute kaqe aat _ .
iwernga _ piyuke nghite sigh nka _ elpesi nun _ u k u n g u u t _ : _ taawa _ elpesi nite ut _ ila i _ qaatke te lghiit _ B a l a a m - e m _ apeghtuusagh anun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe a _ Balak _ naten _ s e g h l e g h q e s t e s q e l l u k i _ I s r a e l - e g h m i i t _ . _ enkaam _ B a l a k - e m _ apeghtugh kaqe ai _ negh yagh ghngaita _ p i s q e l l u k i _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe ai llu _ itagnagh ni luku _ alngunak _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe lleghqagh _ .
T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ ila si _ qaatke te ut _ N i c o l a u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh anun _ .
A v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h t e k _ ! _ pi nghite kufsi _ qantaghaqun _ taku lleqe amsi _ . _ taagken _ p i l l u w a g h l l e q a n k a _ tamaakut _ yug t _ savigpag meng _ q a n e m n i l n g u g h m e n g _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ ! _ manna- meng _ iigh nga lghii meng _ , _ m a n n a - l i l l e q a q a _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ ellnga nun llu _ tuune lleqe aqa _ qategh lghii _ uyghag _ , _ a t e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ igaqe vikekagh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nallukekagh a _ ategh _ iwerngaqun _ a l l g e g h t i k a g h h i i n a a m _ uyghag meng _ liisimake a _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ T h y a t i r a - m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi u uq _ . _ iye kek _ kumaghugh u uk _ k e n g h e s t u n _ , _ itegagh i _ qelmeghtutka ut _ siilu m _ q e l m e g h s a l g h a t u n _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ liisimake aqa _ piniqe llegh i _ , _ ugpeqe llegh i _ , _ qepghagh te i llegh i _ , _ n u q e t u t i l l e g h s i l l u _ . _ liisimake anka _ tamaakut _ wata _ pi aqe asi _ sivugh nghaani _ pi aqe llegh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ u k u n g u u t _ t e n g v i m u n _ ayuqekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ : _ A g h u l i i g h n n e g h i t a g h s i _ aghnagh _ Jezebel _ apeghtugh i lghii _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ . _ uuknaliqe ste u na iqe uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ puughte aqe ai _ yug nka _ s e g h l e g h q e s q e l l u k i _ s e x - k u n _ , _ n e g h e s q e l l u k i l l u _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
P i l l e g h q a l i t k a q s a g h a q a _ avuteghqe sqellug qu _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe yu nghite uq _ allaniigh nghmeng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ miluute naqe aqa _ qavaghvig mun _ tawani _ ikfiqe sqellug qu _ . _ maligte te luki _ ellnga nun _ miluute lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ g e l g a g h n i i l g u t a n g i _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe anka _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe unga _ wetku qun _ a v u t e g h k e g k a t a _ seghletun _ p i l l g h i t n e n g _ .
tuqu lleqe anka llu _ avaquti a _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ y u g h a g h v i g n i l n g u u t _ liite lleqe aatnga _ whanga u uq _ liisimake i lghii _ yug m _ t a m a g h a g h h m i _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itneng llu _ ilumike ke ii te neng llu _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe amsi _ t a m a g h a g h p e s i _ s e g h l e g h q e t u l e g p e s i s t u n _ .
iwernga _ ila gpesi _ T h y a t i r a - m i _ , _ maligte llghite asi _ J e z e b e l - e m _ seghlegh t _ apeghtugh i llegh i _ . _ liite llghite asi llu _ tughneghagh m _ aksaqumtaagh ghllag i _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qelegh aghagh naanghite amsi _ ,
iwerngaqun _ ugpeqe manginagh teggu _ apeghtugh lleg si _ kenlanga _ uteghnigh lleg mnun _ .
ellnga _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ , _ atuqe i lghii llu _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mneng _ kenle mun _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i l l e q a q a _ i g l e g h u t e s q e l l u k i _ n a t i o n - e t _ .
igleghte te sqe luki _ i r o n - m e n g _ r o d - e l i g h l u k i _ enkaam _ k a g i m n n a k a n g i t _ qiku meng _ qulmesiite ngllaghkagh stun _ .
tuune lleqe anka llu _ u n a a n g u m _ ighaleqetaagh aneng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ S a r d i s - e m _ . _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh aneng _ pi leg _ m a a g h r a g v i n l e k l u _ ighaleqetaagh leg _ , _ pi uq _ , _ liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ yug t _ pi aqe aisi _ unguva ni lusi _ iwernga _ tuqu nga usi _ .
taghtugh lusi _ , _ i k n a q u g h s a g h t e g g u _ sa u a _ salin _ elpek si _ pi i _ tuqu naqe lghii _ . _ liite anka _ u k a v a n t u t _ sa u aat _ pi aqe kesi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ pi sqe sug llegh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
neqamike luki _ apeghtugh tke aat _ elpesi nun _ , _ nagaqugh kasi llu _ . _ qaatke teki _ , _ avuteghqe tek llu _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ taghtugh nghite kufsi _ , _ taku lleqe amsi _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ N a l l u k e l l e q a g h s i _ qakun _ tagi lleghqagh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
paninang _ q a f s i n g g a a g u t _ yug t _ S a r d i s - m i _ aatkagh teng _ nukeggnaghqe llghite kangit _ . _ igleghte lgusigh lleqe aatnga _ aate luteng _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ qayughllak _ itagnagh lghii u ut _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ , _ ellngistun _ aate lleqe uq _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ . _ ategh a llu _ gheve snaanghite aqa _ kenle ite ngugh m _ unguvallegh m _ igagh aneng _ . _ ata ma llu _ yaquleg an llu _ sivu itni _ whanga mnun _ p i k n i l l e q a q a _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ P h i l a d e l p h i a - m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ agleghnagh lghii meng _ , _ ipa pig meng _ pi u uq _ . _ ellnga nite uq _ D a v i d - e m _ key- nga _ . _ qelpeghtekunigu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg naanghite a _ . _ umeg kunigu llu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ qelpeghte naanghite a _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ , _ liisimake amsi llu _ kayaate usi _ . _ naqamllu _ qaatke asi _ apeghtuusagh nka _ , _ mesighagh igate usi llu _ whanga mnun _ m a l i g s a a g h t e k n i l u s i _ . _ ii-i _ , _ qelpegh te ma amsi _ amig meng _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg yaghqaqe nghite ka aneng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ tamaakut _ qerngughte te lghiit _ tughneghagh m _ s y n a g o g u e - n g a n i _ , _ J e w s - n g u n i i q u t _ . _ iwernga _ iqlengiqe ste u ut _ ; _ J e w s - n g u n g h i t u t _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi ste luki _ qungugh ste naqe anka _ sivu gpesigun _ . _ taagken _ liite lleqe aat _ piniqe kemsi _ .
qelqe aqe amsi _ n u q e t e s q e l l u s i _ . _ qaatke kaqe te gpesineng _ qelegh i llegh ka _ p a q n i i g h s a g h l l e q a m s i _ seghleliigh llegh neng _ kaate naqe lghii neng _ n u n a t a g h h a n u n _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh t _ nanghiiqu lleqe ait _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ .
tagi yaghtugh unga _ . _ ayepsugite lusi _ ugpeqe manginagh tengnga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ w a y a n g h i t e s q e l l u k i _ qaghpa si _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ aghveghaqetagh ughte ste lleqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ma _ temple- nga ni _ , _ allameng llu _ a a n a a n g h i t u q _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh ma _ , _ ategh a llu _ kiyaghnegh ma _ ne ghllag an _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h r a g h a q _ , _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh mneng _ . _ ellnga kun llu _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh ragh aqa _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ L a o d i c e a - m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ amen- meng _ pi u uq _ . _ A t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u g u q _ , _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a l g h i i n g u u q _ liisimake i sta _ . _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ : _ isekinagh nghite usi _ , _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh nghite usi _ . _ isekinagh lghiisi tuq _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh lghiisi tuq _ !
enkaam _ m a q a g h r a a g g a a t e g p e s i n e n g _ , _ i s e k i n a n g h i l n g u u s i _ nalighmeng _ u g u q n a n g h i l n g u u s i _ , _ qesiite naqe amsi _ qanegh mneng _ !
pi aqe usi _ aklungite ni lusi _ , _ allgegh te ghllag aqe ni lusi _ , _ aklu igate ni lusi llu _ . _ iwernga _ nalluke usi _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u u s i _ , _ nanglleg nagh usi _ , _ akluma usi _ , _ ayaa nga usi _ , _ amsikaghmete usi llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ a k l u n g i g h i s q e l l u s i _ g o l d - t e n g y a g h t u g h t e k _ whanga mnun _ q i g e g h t e n g n g w a a q a m e n g _ kenegh kun _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ qatelghii neng _ aatkagh neng _ s a a p e s q e l l u k i _ kayngu nagh lghiit _ amsikaghmete lleg si _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ agha kaghqagh meng _ iye gpesinun _ e s g h a a s a g u t e s q e l l u s i _ .
tamaakut _ piniqekagh nka _ nallghusagh aqe anka _ , _ aghyuugh aqe anka llu _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqnegh ughte tek _ , _ a v u t e g h q e l l u s i _ s e g h l e g h q e n n a n i g h t e k _ .
ii-i _ ! _ nekeve lunga _ amig mi _ tenglugtugh unga _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh kunigu _ me ka _ , _ amig meng _ qelpegh te ma kanganga _ itegh lleqe unga _ ellnga nun _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aqa _ , _ ellnga n llu _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aanga _ .
kayaalqe i i lunga _ enkaam _ aqumga unga _ saaghw ani _ ata ma _ umiileg u sigh akun _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ . _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ aqume ste lleqe aqa _ saaghw mkun _ u m i i l g u s i g n e k u n _ aqumutagh mkun _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ "
taagken _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ amigh k _ q e l p a l n g u q _ ! _ me _ nagate kaqe a _ qalghightautetu te _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ mayugh a _ whavek _ . _ elpenun _ esghagh ste naqe anka _ sa u aat _ pi yaghqagh t _ . _ "
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ taghneghagh gnite unga _ . _ taawa _ qilag mi _ e s g a g h a g k a _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh k _ , _ kina _ aqumga uq _ .
aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gni _ esghaqaaluni _ iqeghta gketun _ j a s p e r - e n k u k _ c a r n e l i a n - e n k u k _ ayuqe uq _ . _ U v i t a n g a n i _ umiileg u sigh m _ taawa _ aglu k _ iqeghta kek _ e m e r a l d - e t u n _ ayuqe lutek _ .
U v i t a n g a n i _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh lghute t _ . _ T a a k u t g u n _ aqumga te nga ut _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ e l d e r - e t _ qatelghii meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ , _ g o l d - m e n g l l u _ qaghpa lug teng _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkeneng _ kallug m _ nighwaagpagtagh u i _ , _ leveklugti a _ , _ tengngaagti a llu _ pi ut _ . _ sivu gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ t o r c h - e t _ k u m a n g a l g h i i t _ , _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ taghneghagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ sivu gkeni _ taawa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ qergese _ , _ m e g h r a a k e g h t a q _ c r y s t a l - e s t u n _ . _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ u v i t a n g a n i _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ sani gkeni _ , _ taawa _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ iye ghllag u ut _ saye megteggun llu _ a q s a g e m e g t e g g u n l l u _ .
sivuligh _ unguva lghii _ l i o n - e s u g n i t e f t u q _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ o x - e s u g n i t e f t u q _ , _ pi nga yu aat _ sa u a _ unguva lghii _ gginagh lgu uq _ yug m _ gginagh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ tengaa kayug tun _ qawaagpag tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ tamaghhagh meng _ aghvinleg neng _ yaquleg utu te ut _ , _ elngaatall _ yugusigh at _ iye ghllag u ut _ talwa _ qamavek _ y a q g h w i t a _ asi itnun _ . _ aghneghtugh ma n _ unugtugh magh an _ taaqe igate ngugh t _ ilagagh nghmeng _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ A t a n g h u u q _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ ellnga u uq _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ ! _ "
taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ ilagagh ut _ ilagaate itneng _ usuqe i llegh m _ , _ q u u l v a g h i l l g h e m _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh m _ aqumga lghii mun _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh ghllag gni _ , _ kiyaghte lghii mun _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ tawaten _ pi nghata
yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ e l d e r - e t _ niinghute aqe ut _ sivungagh kun _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenun _ , _ manigugh aqe aat _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ taakut _ e l d e r - e t _ qaghpa teng _ mat- aghte luki _ lli aqe ait _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenka _ , _ enkaam _ ilagagh aqe ut _ ,
" _ whangkuta _ atanegh ut _ kiyaghnegh ut _ ! _ elpek _ tugu pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ usuqe llegh ghllag t _ , _ q u u l v a l l e g h l l a g e t _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h p e n u n _ . _ ulima kaqe te gpeneng _ sa u a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ , _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ enkaam _ allgegh u lleqe ut llu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh nite luki _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ taakut _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ igagh vike kau ut _ inglugtun _ , _ umeg luteng _ maaghraghvinleg _ s e a l - e n e n g _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ yaquleg _ . _ iglagtu luni _ aapte i lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ s e a l - e l l g h e t _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ ? _ "
taawa _ avangite uq _ k i t u m e n g _ alngunak _ qilag mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna m _ asi ani _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
enkaam _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag unga _ qayughllak _ naalke nghite kangat _ kina _ alngunak _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ e l d e r - e n e n g _ pi unga _ , _ " _ qiya gpenang _ ! _ ii-i _ , _ l i o n - a _ . _ J u d a h - m _ ramke aneng _ pi u uq _ , _ D a v i d - e m l l u _ kingunegh ke a _ . _ kayaalqe i i ste u uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ itagnagh uq _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ s e a l - e l l g h e t _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ saaghw ani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ . _ Q u k i i t n i t e f t u q _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ e l d e r - e t l u _ . _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ esghaqaaluni _ nikimqun _ tuqu tke aq _ . _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ , _ maaghraghvinleg neng llu _ iye lgu uq _ . _ taakut _ iye t _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh ke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayagtekagh i _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ nuna m _ .
P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ taku luku _ umu i llgu sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh neng _ t u w i i _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ .
tugu yaki _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ , _ taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ yuginagh llu _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ e l d e r - e t _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ . _ T a m a g h a g h m e n g _ tugumiiqe luteng _ harp- meng _ , _ g o l d - m e n g l l u _ sagnegh ghhagh neng _ esleqnga lghiit _ i n c e n s e - m e n g _ . _ I n c e n s e - e t _ yughaghkagh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ .
ilagagh ut _ nutaghagh meng _ ilagaate meng _ whaten _ : _ " _ itagnagh uten _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ , _ ikugh yaghqaa luki llu _ s e a l - n g i t _ . _ tuqute kau lghiiten _ , _ a a w p e n e n g l l u _ tukfigh kaqe aten _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellngit _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ ramke neng _ , _ ulu neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ nunatagh aneng llu _ .
enkaam _ A t a n e g h p a g u l l g h a n i t e s t a t e n _ , _ priest- ngughte ta ten llu _ kiyaghnegh mnnun _ , _ umiileg stun llu _ igleghte te i lleqe ut _ nuna mi _ . _ "
esghapag ma lunga _ nagaqugh anka _ me it _ yaquleg lghute ghllag t _ . _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ k e s t e p a g n i n g i l n g u u t _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ u v i t a n g a n i _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ e l d e r - e t l u _ .
iglagtu luteng _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ tuqu tke aq _ , _ itagnagh uq _ allgeghsaghqagh u luku _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q _ , _ aklungi _ , _ peghqinellegh _ , _ iknaqe llegh _ , _ q u u l v a l l e q _ , _ n i g h u g h q e l l e q _ , _ usuqe llegh llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ tamaghhagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ q i l a g m e l n g u u t _ , _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ , _ nuna m _ a s i n g a n i l n g u u t _ , _ k e l l i i n i l n g u u t l u _ . _ qamagte luteng _ pi lghiit _ aqumga lghii mun llu _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ , _ P e n n i i g h a g h a g h m u n l l u _ , _ " _ usuqe i lleg nge tek _ , _ q u u l v a l l e n g i t e k _ , _ n i g h u g h q e l l e n g i t e k _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u t e k l u _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ , _ " _ e l d e r - e t l u _ sekete uute luteng _ nuna mnun _ , _ manigugh agket _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ , _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a n k u k _ .
taagken _ esghapag aqa _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ qelpeghtekanga _ sivuligh _ s e a l - e l l e q _ t a a k u n e n g _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ s e a l - e l l e g h n e n g _ . _ T a w a n t e f t u t _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ ataasigh _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ me a _ kallug stun _ t e n g n g a a l g h i i _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ ughluvegh lgu uq _ , _ qaghpa lightu aat llu _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kayaalqe i ikagh _ anguyag mineng _ , _ enkaam _ aane uq _ kayaalqe i i manginagh na luni _ .
P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ q e l p e g h s a q m i n i g u _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ s e a l - e l l g h e m _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
ila a _ kuuni m _ aane uq _ , _ kavilngugh u uq _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ pi lleghqagh lightu aat _ yug t _ n e k e g g m e t u n n a n i i t e s q e l l u k i _ t u q u q u u t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ tuunekagh at llu _ savigpag ghrugllag meng _ .
taagken _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ q e l p e g h s a q m i n i g u _ pi nga yiite anga _ s e a l - e l l g h e m _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ pingayut ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ esghagh aqa _ tagnegh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ apegh kau sigh lgu uq _ iigge mini _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me stun _ a y u q e s u g n i l n g u q _ akule itni _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Q u a r t - e m _ imagh a _ w h e a t - a _ akike a _ ataasigh m _ d e n a r i u s - e m _ . _ pi nga yu t _ q u a r t - e m _ imigh a _ b a r l e y - t _ akike ai _ ataasigh m _ d e n a r i u s - e m _ . _ iwernga _ naafqe gpenakek _ o l i v e - e m _ mesiigh a _ , _ wine- a llu _ . _ "
taagken _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ q e l p e g h s a q m i n i g u _ estamat ii ta a _ s e a l - e l l g h e m _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
esghagh aqa _ a g h s a a l l a a k _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste yan _ ategh ke a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ H a d e s - e m _ maligte a _ . _ P i l l e g h q a l i t k a a f t u k _ t u q u q i i s q e l l u k i _ e s t a m a g h q e l l g h a n _ nuna m _ yug i _ savigpag kun _ , _ p a n e g h a a t e l l e g h q u n _ , _ aqnighnegh kun _ , _ u g w i g h s a l g h i i t g u n l l u _ teghig ke sagh itgun _ nuna m _ .
taagken _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ q e l p e g h s a q m i n i g u _ tallimat ii ta a _ s e a l - e l l g h e m _ , _ esghagh anka _ asi anite luki _ aghqefig m _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu quqagh t _ . _ tuqute kaqe kangit _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kaqe kangit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ ungipagh qu ma inagh ke ait llu _ .
akilghuu ghllag ut _ , _ " _ kaay _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ atanegh _ , _ agleghnagh uten llu _ , _ ipa pigu uten llu _ ! _ tamaakut _ nuna m _ yug i _ tuqu quqagh t _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ , _ naten _ t a g k a a n _ utaqa i uute naqe ziki _ nanqigte yaghqaa luki llu _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki llu _ ? _ "
taagken _ a t a a s i k a g h t i i t a _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu tke aat _ qatelghii meng _ a t k u y a a l i t k i i t _ , _ meghnaali aghte sqekagh it llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ ila i _ u g p e q a a l g u t n g i t _ , _ C h r i s t - a m l l u _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ ellngit a _ t u q u t e l l g h i s t u n _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali naqe ut _ kenlanga _ u g l a g h t a l n g i t _ naamigtekata _ tamaakut _ tuqute yaghqagh t _ .
esghapag aqa _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ q e l p e g h s a q m i n i g u _ aghvinleg ii ta a _ s e a l - e l l g h e m _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ siqinegh _ tagnegh a _ suvinagh lghii tun _ qiipaghagh tun _ ulimakagh tun _ g o a t - e m _ m e l q w a n e n g _ . _ T a n q i q l l u _ esleqnga lghii _ aaw stun _ lliigh uq _ .
ighaleqetaagh t _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ nuna mun _ katam _ tawaten _ q i g u m a n g i l n g u u t _ f i g s - e t _ ifkagh qu uute lghiit _ uqfig meng _ anuqe ghllag m _ ufsug te llegh atun _ .
qilag a _ aviighute uq _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ i m e l l g h i s t u n _ , _ qamagte luteng _ naayghagh t llu _ qiighqagh t llu _ nuugh qugh te ut _ ne meggneng _ .
taagken _ nuna m _ umiileg i _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i _ , _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg it _ , _ a k l u n g i l n g u u t _ , _ qiilngumighte i kayug t _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u u t l u _ iigh uute ut _ qaye ni _ , _ akule itni llu _ uyghag t _ naayghagh ni _ .
