naayghagh nun llu _ uyghag nun llu _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ ullegh vike kut _ i i g h e s q e l l u t a _ gginagh aneng _ aqumga lghii m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ , _ sakraa llegh ghllag aneng llu _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ !
kaa tuq _ aghneq _ aghyuugh i lleghqagh ghllag ak _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ anag lleqe agu _ ! _ "
tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ esghagh anka _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ estamat ni _ kangighagh itni _ nuna m _ . _ yaquleg t _ n u q n e q e f t i i t _ estamat _ anuqe t _ anuqligh nghite sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ nalighmeng _ kellii ni _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig ni _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ mayugh lghii _ a s i v a g h m e n g _ tugumiigh leg _ nalluniigh ta aneng _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ yaquleg m _ a k i l g h u u g i i _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m e n g _ naafqe sqellug qu _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a llu _ .
yaquleg m _ pi a _ , _ " _ naafqe gpenaan _ nuna _ nalighmeng _ kellaag igh a _ nalighmeng _ uqfig t _ ! _ utaqa itek _ kenlanga _ s e a l - e l l e m n n u n _ qagugh itgun _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ kiyaghnegh mta _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ qafsig nge ta i _ yug t _ s e a l - e l a g h t u q i i t _ qagugh itgun _ . _ yug t _ uglaghtala it _ 1 4 4 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ ramke aneng _ I s r a e l - e m _ .
J u d a h - m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ R e u b e n - e m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ G a d - e m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ ,
A s h e r - e m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ N a p h t a l i - m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ M a n a s s e h - m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ ,
S i m e o n - e m _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ L e v i - e m _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ I s s a c h a r - e m _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ ,
Z e b u l u n - e m _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ J o s e p h - e m _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ , _ B e n j a m i n - e m _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - n g u f t u t _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ esghagh anka _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ yug lghute ghllag t _ kitum _ alngunak _ k e s t e p a g n i n g i l k a n g i _ ! _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ nunatagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ ulu neng llu _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m l l u _ sivu gkenkun _ . _ qiipaghagh u uute luteng _ qatelghii neng _ , _ tugumiigh iigh luteng llu _ p a l m - e m _ uqfig an _ avayagh itneng _ .
akilghuu te ghllag ut _ , _ " _ yuguligh llegh _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m l l u _ ! _ "
qamagte luteng _ yaquleg t _ nekeve uute ut _ u v i t a n g i t n i _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ e l d e r - e t l u _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ . _ taagken _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tamaghhagh mi _ usuqe ligu _ , _ n i g h u g h q e l l i g u _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike ligu _ , _ q u u l v a g h l i g u _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ peghqinellegh leg _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e k _ , _ iknaqe lleg leg llu _ . _ ellnga _ tawatete uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ ! _ "
taagken _ ataasigh m _ e l d e r - e n e n g _ aapte aanga _ , _ " _ kinkungaawa t _ qatelghii meng _ q i i p a g h a g h n g a l g h i i t _ , _ naken llu _ pi u aat _ ? _ "
kiimsigh aqa _ , _ " _ yugu ni uq _ , _ elpek _ liisima katen _ . _ " _ E l d e r - e m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ T a a k u n g u u t _ suflughte tke aat _ s e g h l e l i i g h r u k u t a a g h l l a g m e n g _ . _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ aaw akun _ aghvig luki _ qiipaghagh teng _ , _ qategh stekaqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivu gkeni _ kiyaghnegh m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ temple- nga ni _ . _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ azigutigh lleqe ai _ nayute te nga llegh mineng _ .
iyatagh iqe nanigh lleqe ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ meqsug yug nanigh lleqe ut _ . _ S i q i n g h e m _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uguqnagh ghllag lghii m _ ugute naanghite ai _ .
pennagh ii aghagh aq _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ saaghw anite ngughk _ pennagh igh nigh ughtekete lleqe aat _ . _ maghyaghqugh lleqe ai _ sengngugh lghii nun _ megh nun _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i k a y u g n u n _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ quni ightugh lleqe ai _ . _ "
P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ qelpeghte aqe yamigu _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta a _ s e a l - e l l g h e m _ , _ qilag mi _ q a l l e g n a n i g h w a a g h u t u t _ entaqun _ aflu m _ aveg llegh atun _ t a g k a a n _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh kun _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ qalghightaute ngugh u te ut _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ , _ tugumiigh leg _ g o l d - m e n g _ sagnegh meng _ , _ tagi luni _ nekeve uq _ aghqefig gni _ . _ tuunekagh at _ i n c e n s e - e l g h u t m e n g _ i l a t e s q e l l u k i _ qamagte luki _ yughagh u i te nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ . _ yaquleg m _ lli a _ g o l d - e g n u n _ aghqefig gnun _ s i v u n g a n i l n g u u k _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ .
I n c e n s e - e m _ agepsugh a _ mayugh uq _ maligte te luni _ yughagh llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ . _ mayugh ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ sagnegh meng _ yaquleg m _ tugumiigh aneng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ , _ tugu luku _ sagnegh _ , _ imigh aa _ k e n g h a n e n g _ aghqefig m _ . _ sagnegh m _ imigh a _ miluute ai _ nuna mun _ . _ enkaam _ kallugughte ghllag uq _ , _ kavlegtagh ghllag uq _ , _ n i g h w a a g h p a g t a g h l l a g t u q _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ qalghightate te leg t _ yataaghqe ut _ q a l g h i g h t i n a l u t e n g _ .
sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ kaftekrag nkuk _ , _ k e n g h e n k u k _ akume lutek _ aaw meng _ nuna mun _ miluute agket _ . _ enkaam _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h a _ nuna m _ panegh uq _ , _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i t l u _ uqfig t _ panegh ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ sungaghyug lghiit _ vegaagh t _ panegh ut _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ sa u a _ naayghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ k u m a g h u g n g a l g h i i _ , _ miluute aat _ kellii nun _ . _ enkaam _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h a _ kellii m _ a a w g u g h t u q _ .
P i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i t _ k e l l i i n i l n g u u t _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu ut _ , _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i t l u _ angyaghpag t _ n a a f q e n g n g w a a g h i i _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii _ t o r c h - e t u n _ , _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh uq _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i t g u n _ kiiw t llu _ sengngugh lghiit llu _ megh t _ .
ategh a _ ighaleqetaagh m _ " _ sungagh ni _ " _ . _ P i n g a y u g h q e l l g h a _ megh m _ s u n g a g h n i g h t e k a q _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ megh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ qayughllak _ megh _ s u n g a g h n i g h t e k a a l g h i i _ .
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ s a a m _ tenpe ai _ siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ i g h a l e q a t a a g h e t l u _ , _ enkaam _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i _ mamlegte ai _ . _ P i n g a y u g h q e l l g h a _ aghnegh m _ mamleg a _ , _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h a l l u _ u n u g e m _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ nagaqugh aqa llu _ qawaagpag _ tengaa lghii _ quulvani _ , _ iglagtu luni _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u q _ ! _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u q _ ! _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u q _ ! _ kinguligh t _ pi nga yu t _ yaquleg t _ q a l g h i g h h n a q e g k u m e g t e k i _ qalghightate te teng _ , _ taagken _ elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh u naqngu uq _ yug nun _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ ! _ "
taagken _ tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ esghagh aqa _ ighaleqetaagh _ ifkaghkagh _ qilaga meng _ nuna mun _ , _ k e y - l i t k a a f t u q l u _ qelpeghte sqellug qu _ a s i l i g h n e g h i l n g u q _ laag u aq _ .
ighaleqetaagh m _ qelpegh a _ a s i l i g h n e g h i l n g u q _ laag u aq _ . _ T e s a m a k e n _ agepsugh _ aane uq _ katam _ agepsugh atun _ egllu ghllag m _ repall _ siqinegh llu _ qilag a llu _ mamleg a _ agepsugh m _ .
taagken _ agepsugh meng _ aanleghaate ut _ l o c u s t - e l g h u t e t _ , _ nuna mun llu _ ukig uute ut _ . _ K a a p i g a q l e g h u t e k a t _ yug neng _ , _ katam _ s c o r p i o n - e t _ k a a p i i q e l l g h i s t u n _ .
ungipaate kau lghiit _ l o c u s t - e t _ naafqe fqiita _ vegaagh t _ p i s q e l l u k i _ nalighmeng _ sungaghyug t _ nunivagseghagh t _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig t _ . _ aqnighte sqekagh i llu _ t a m a a k u n g i n a a t _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nalluniigh llghite kangi _ qagugh itgun _ .
L o c u s t - e n u n _ tuqu qugh ste na nigh ke ai _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ taawanginaq _ i k f i q e s t e g h l l a g e s t e s q e g k i i _ t a l l i m a n u n _ tanqigh nun _ . _ S c o r p i o n - e t _ k a a p e l l g h i s t u n _ yug t _ ikfiqe ghllagkagh t _ .
T a a k u n i _ tallimat ni _ tanqigh ni _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuquyug pigte lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqupagningite lleqe ut _ . _ yug t _ tuqu naqe ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu naanghite ut _ .
L o c u s t - e t _ esghaqagh u luteng _ kuuni stun _ ayuqe ut _ p i l l u w a m u n _ yataaghqekagh t _ . _ N a a s q w i t n i t e f t u t _ llangaqa _ g o l d - e t _ qaghpa t _ , _ gginagh it llu _ yug t _ g g i n i i s t u n _ ayuqe luteng _ .
nuyagh it _ aghnagh t _ n u y i i s t u n _ ayuqe luteng _ , _ ggute it llu _ l i o n - e t _ g g u u t n g i s t u n _ ayuqe luteng _ .
yugusigh megteggun _ q a l t e l g u f t u t _ esghaqagh u luteng _ savikenghaagh t _ sakimag iitagh t _ . _ Y a q w g h i t a l l u _ sulugtagh llegh it _ llangaqa _ c h a r i o t - e t _ kuunituqagh t _ sukera lghiit _ p i l l u w a m u n _ .
papeg lgu ut _ s c o r p i o n - e s t u n _ kaape i kayug meng _ . _ enkaam _ t a l l i m a n u n _ tanqigh nun _ yug t _ ikfiqe ste ghllag ait _ papeg meggneng _ kapugh luki _ .
umiileg lgu ut _ igleghte te i lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ yaquleg u uq _ esghagh ma ke i ste nga _ a s i l i g h n e g h i l n g u u m _ laawaagh m _ . _ H e b r e w - s t u n _ ategh a _ A b a d d o n _ , _ G r e e k - e s t u n _ A p o l l y o n _ , _ ( _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ naafqii sta _ " _ ) _ .
sivuligh _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag _ alpag uq _ , _ t a a m _ kingu aneng _ paninang _ maalghug _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag k _ pi yaghqaa uk _ .
taagken _ aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ g o l d - e g n e n g _ aghqefig gneng _ e s t a m a n e n g _ sighunegh leg gneng _ t e k e r q a m e g n e k u n _ kiyaghnegh m _ s i v u n g a n i l n g u u k _ .
T a a m _ me m _ aleghqugh aa _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ yaquleg t _ qalghightate te leg _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iteme te ki _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ a s i g h q e n g n g a l g h i i t _ k i i g w l l a g e g n i _ E u p h r a t e s - e g n i _ ! _ "
enkaam _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ iteme tke ai _ . _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tea- mete te _ aflu mun _ , _ aghnegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mun llu _ t u q u q i i s q e l l u k i _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i _ yug t _ .
ungipaate aanga _ uglaghtala itneng _ kuuni tgun _ igleghte lghiit _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ , _ 2 0 0 _ m i l l i o n - n g u f t u t _ .
esghaghwaagh lleg mkun _ esghagh anka _ kuuni t _ , _ i g l e g h u t i s t e n g i t l u _ . _ sakimag iitagh it _ k e n g h e s t u n _ kavite ut _ , _ s a p p h i r e - e s t u n _ sungaghyukegte ut _ , _ s u l p h u r - e s t u n _ , _ y e l l o w - n g u f t u t _ . _ kuuni t _ n a a s q w i t _ l i o n - e t _ n a a s q w i s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ , _ q a a n g h i t n e n g _ aane ut _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
T a a k u t g u n _ pi nga yu tgun _ naafqii llegh ghllag tgun _ tuqu qugh ait _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i _ yug t _ . _ kuuni t _ q a a n g h i t n e n g _ aanleghaate ut _ kenegh _ , _ a g e p e s u q _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
kuuni t _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u t _ q a a n g h i t n i l l u _ papeg itni llu _ . _ papeg it _ nemeghyagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ naasqugh leg t _ kiitigh qu sagh it _ yug nun _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuqute llghite kangit _ tamaakut _ naafqii llegh ghllag t _ , _ avuteghqe ma ite ngugh t _ pegte yug ma ite kangit _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ . _ manigugh nanigh mangite ait _ tughneghagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t llu _ ulimaagh t _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ siilu meng _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng llu _ . _ tamaakut _ esghaate yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nagaqugh te yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ piyug yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ .
talwa _ avuteghqe tke ma ite kangit _ yugtagh lleg teng _ , _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te llegh eng _ , _ nalighmeng _ tegleg niigh lleg teng _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ aghtugh igate ghllag _ yaquleg _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ . _ pilugug nga uq _ q i l a g w a a g h m e n g _ , _ n a a s q w a n _ qula ani _ aglu k _ , _ gginagh a _ siqinegh tun _ kuukgute luni _ , _ ighu kek llu _ kumaghugh lghii stun _ p i l l a r - e s t u n _ ayuqe lutek _ .
tugumiiqe ai _ i i m g a t _ igagh ghhaat _ q e l p a l n g u u t _ . _ aghenqignegh t _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ kellii m _ megh an _ qaye akun _ , _ saghumignegh t llu _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ qute kun _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ akilghuu uq _ l i o n - e m _ u w i g h h n i i l l g h a t u n _ . _ akilghuu ghllag yan _ m a a r a g h v i n l e g y a g e t _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh ut _ .
maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh yata _ igaqe naqe yagh anka _ sa meng _ p i l l g h i t _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aksaqe ki _ maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ sa meng _ p i l l g h i t _ , _ igaqe gpenaki _ ! _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ qilag mun _ nengug te ai _ aghenqignegh t _ iigge ni _ ,
akeqe i uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ellnga u lghii _ u l i m a g h i k a q _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ t a a k u n i l n g u g h n e n g _ . _ yaquleg _ pi uq _ , _ " _ pi lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ .
iwernga _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ q a l g h i g h h n a q e g k u m i g u _ qalghightate te ni _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ uspeqe i lleg ni _ qayvighte ma ite kete ni _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ ataasigh u uq _ aapte qugh a _ q e p g h a g h t e m i n u n _ u u k n a l i q i s t e n u n _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqughkagh ma _ me m _ qilag meng _ aleghqugh laatagh aanga _ , _ " _ aglagh luten _ tugu ki _ q e l p a l n g u u t _ i i m g a t _ igagh t _ i i g g a n i l n g u u t _ yaquleg m _ nekevgha lghii m _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ "
yaquleg mun _ aglagh lunga _ tungsigh anka _ imeg nga lghiit _ igagh ghhaat _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tugu luki _ neghe ki _ ; _ aqsaqugh gpeni _ qugaagte lleqe ut _ iwernga _ qanegh gpeni _ muugate lleqe ut _ h o n e y - s t u n _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ iiggagh neng _ tugu luki _ i i m g a t _ igagh ghhaat _ negh anka _ , _ imani _ qanegh mni _ muugate ut _ h o n e y - s t u n _ . _ iwernga _ tuufte yaqenka _ aqsaqugh ka _ q u w a a g t a a _ .
taagken _ pi atnga _ , _ " _ allameng _ uuknaliqe tke pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ yug lghute t _ , _ nunatagh lghute t _ , _ a l a a g h h i i n a a t _ ulu lghute t _ , _ umiileg lghute t llu _ . _ "
taagken _ kitum _ ayaviigh lightu aanga _ usputagh sigh ke sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ kayagte aanga _ , _ " _ usputagh yaghtugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ aghqefig k llu _ , _ keste naketen llu _ yug t _ maniguute lghiit _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ usputagh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nge an _ court-nga _ eslatagh anite ngughk _ , _ qayughllak _ tuune kau uq _ G e n t i l e - e n u n _ . _ T u t m a a s g h a q n a q n g w a a t _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ f o r t y _ t w o - g h y a g n i _ tanqigh ni _ .
ungipaghteke _ pilugug nga lghiik _ s a c k c l o t h - m e n g _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e l l e q a g k a _ uuknaliqe sqellug kek _ 1 , 2 6 0 _ aghnegh nun _ . _ "
maalghug _ ungipagh tek _ maalghug u uk _ o l i v e - e m _ uqfig k _ , _ maalghug u uk llu _ kenegh lghutagh m _ tunemagh kek _ nekevgha lghiik _ sivungagh ni _ A t a n g h a n _ nuna m _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ , _ q a a n g h e g k e n e n g _ k e n g h e m _ aane luni _ tuqu qugh lleqe aik _ anguyag ik _ . _ kitum llu _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ taawa _ tuqute yaghqaaghte lleqe uq _ .
A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u k _ qilag a _ e s l a l l u g u g h n a n i i s q e l l u k u _ u u k n a l i q e l l g h e g k e g n i _ . _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u k _ megh t _ a a w u g h t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l g u u k l u _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ikfiqe na lghii neng _ s e g h l e l i i g h l l a g n e n g _ , _ awen _ tawaten _ pi aqe lleqe uk _ p i y u k e l l e g h m e g e t u n _ .
apeghiigh kayek _ ungipagh nghmeng _ , _ a s i l i g h n e g h i l n g u g h m e n g _ laawaagh meng _ aane lleqe uq _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ . _ P i l l u w a g h l l e q a a k _ enkaam _ kayaalqe gkumikek _ tuqu lleqe ak _ .
kemegkwaagh ik _ t a m a a n l l e q u k _ tume ani _ ne ghllag m _ , _ A t a n g h i t a _ qaquuragh vig ani _ . _ taana _ negh ghllag _ ategh ke uq _ S o d o m - e m e n g l l u _ E g y p t - m e n g l l u _ qayughllak _ yug i _ S o d o m - e g h m i i s t u n l l u _ E y g p t - e g h m i i s t u n l l u _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ulu neng _ , _ nunatagh neng llu _ tagi lleqe ut _ esghagh na lukek _ kemegkwaagh ik _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe ut _ pi nga yu nun _ aghnegh nun _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ qungugh snanigh lleqe agket _ .
taake uk _ uuknaliqe istek _ ikfiqe ste i ghllag kau lghiik _ nuna m _ yug itnun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ quya ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ tunqugh u lleqe ut llu _ tunute yameng _ ila meggnun _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llegh gkenun _ .
iwernga _ kingu itneng _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aneghnegh ni _ itegh stekagh a _ u u k n a l i q i s t e g n u n _ . _ enkaam _ nekeve yayek _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ esghagh lukek _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
taagken _ uuknaliqe istek _ n a g a q u g h a a k _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ mayugh tek _ whavek _ ! _ " _ anguyag ik _ esghapag ma luki _ mayugh uk _ qilag mun _ qilawaagh kun _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ qevuute pigte luni _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ ; _ q u l a g h q e l l g h a _ ne ghllag m _ naave uq _ . _ enkaam _ seven _ t h o u s a n d _ yuug _ tuqu qugh aa _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag an _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ yaywaasekagh t _ kakavaatagh te ghllag luteng _ u s u q u u g h t a a t _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ alpag uq _ , _ iwernga _ esghaghte ggu _ pi nga yu a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ iglagtu pigte luteng _ me t _ qilag mi _ pi ut _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ nuna m _ a t a n e g h p a g u l q a a g h t a a k _ atanegh mta llu _ C h r i s t - a n g a n l l u _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ igleghte te i lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ siivanllegh t _ aqumga lghiit _ umiileg u sigh tgun _ aqumutagh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ , _ gginagh teng _ sekete luki _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ke aat _ : _ " _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ iiwleng llu _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ tugu magh an _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite llegh ghllag n _ enkaam _ piinligh uten _ i g l e g h u t i m u n _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ sakrite ghllag ut _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ sakraa lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ . _ tuqukagh t _ nanqigte yaghqaaghte ut _ . _ akileghtugh yaghqaaghte aten _ q e p g h a g h t e t e n _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ , _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yug ten _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ sii vag ke igh lghiit _ e l p e n e n g _ , _ u k a v a n l e n g u u t l u _ apeghseghugh t llu _ . _ tuqu qu lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ t a m a a k u n u n _ tuqu quqagh neng _ yug neng _ nuna mi _ . _ "
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ qilag mete ngughk _ qelpate uq _ . _ tawani _ temple- nga ni _ esghagh agka _ ark- ek _ kiyaghnegh m _ C o v e n a n t - e l g h u t a k e k _ . _ taagken _ nighwaagpagtagh uk _ , _ eftughtagh uk _ , _ tengngaagtagh uk llu _ kallug k _ ; _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ , _ kaftekrag ughte ghllag aa llu _ !
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ : _ aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ itegagh i _ tanqigh kun _ nekegte luteng _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lug ni _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ .
qumig lgu uq _ , _ i g h n i y u g e m _ aqnighqellug qu _ lliigh aa _ , _ aane aqe llegh an _ taghnughhagh m _ aragh qugh a _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ ila a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ apeghiigh naqe lghii mun _ : _ taawa _ kavite ngughk _ d r a g o n - e g h l l a k _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ , _ qula _ sighunegh leg _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ n a a s q w i _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ .
papeg mineng _ saqipeg te ai _ nuna mun _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l g h i _ qilaga m _ ighaleqetaagh i _ . _ taagken _ d r a g o n - a _ nekevekagh _ manu akun _ aghnagh m _ negh na luku _ taghnughhagh a _ ighni i ghesnagh kagu _ .
aghnagh _ ighnegh nge uq _ , _ igleghte te yaghqagh i _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ nuna m _ yug i _ i r o n - m e n g _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh a _ akuqagh luku _ aglagh te aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ umiileg u sigh gkenun llu _ aqumutagh gnun _ .
aghnagh _ qimag uq _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe kanga _ nekaghqagh meng _ , _ aflengake yaghqaqe kangat _ 1 , 2 6 0 _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qilag mi _ pillugute ut _ . _ M i c h a e l - e n k u t _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ p i l l u w a g h a a t _ d r a g o n - a _ . _ D r a g o n - e n k u t _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ p i l l u w a g h i i t _ M i c h a e l - e n k u t _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ ,
iwernga _ M i c h a e l - e n k u t _ kayaalqe aat _ d r a g o n - a _ . _ enkaam _ d r a g o n - e n k u t _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ qilag mete yaghqaa nanigh ut _ .
qilag meng _ miluute aat _ d r a g o n - e g h l l a k _ . _ ( _ neghightagh lug _ nemeghyagh _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh _ , _ p u u g h q u g h t e n g a _ nuna m _ yug an _ . _ ) _ miluute aat _ nuna mun _ yaqulegtuumagh an _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu luni _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ whaa _ kaate ma ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuguligh i llegh a _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ C h r i s t - a n g a n l l u _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ . _ salin _ tughneghagh _ miluute llghite luku _ qilag meng _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ anaggute nga na iqe ai _ u g p e q a a l g u t e p u t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
U g p e q a a l g u t e m t a _ kayaalqe ma ut _ aaw akun _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ , _ ungipagh ke llegh megteggun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ i p a p i g h q e l l g h a _ . _ talwa _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ C h r i s t - a _ apallugh ke luku _ .
enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ qilag mi _ , _ quya te ghllag tek _ ! _ iwernga _ s e g h l e g h w a a g h u n a q n g u u s i _ n u n a m e l n g u g h n i l l u _ k e l l i i n i l n g u g h n i l l u _ ! _ tughneghagh m _ ukig vike ma aisi _ , _ sakrite ghllagu uq _ qayughllak _ liisimake a _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghtugh uq _ . _ "
D r a g o n - e m _ liigike yamigu _ nuna mun _ miluute lleg ni _ , _ malighqagh aa _ aghnagh _ ighnegh ngekagh _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh _ tuunekagh at _ qawaagpag ghrugllag m _ yaqugh gkeneng _ tengaa sqellug qu _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ paqniite lleqe uq _ nemegh yameng _ , _ aflengake lleqe aat llu _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
taagken _ nemeghyagh m _ ughyugh te a _ megh _ kiiw stun _ ayuqe lghii _ aghnagh _ maaqute sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ nuna m _ kayusiite a _ aghnagh _ . _ nuna m _ agitaghte te luku _ tuufte a _ megh ghllag _ d r a g o n - e m _ ughyugh tke a _ .
taagken _ d r a g o n - e m _ ugumi yagute ghllag luku _ aghnagh _ , _ enkaam _ p i l l u w a g h y a g h t u g h i i _ qamagte luki _ ila i _ k i n g u n g h i _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh itnun _ , _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u t l u _ i p a l l e g h m u n _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ J e s u s - e m _ .
taagken _ d r a g o n - a _ nekeve uq _ kellii m _ esnagh akun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ aane lghii _ kellii meng _ . _ qula u ut _ s i g h u n g h i _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ . _ qamagte luteng _ s i g h u n g h i _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ naasqugh t _ igaqugh vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ s e g h l e q u u l g h i i m e n g _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
taana _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ l e o p a r d - e s u g n i t u q _ , _ itegagh i _ kaynge m _ itegagh atun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ q a a n g h a _ l i o n - e m _ q a a n g h a t u n _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ D r a g o n - e m _ tuune a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h m i n e n g _ , _ umiileg u sigh gmineng _ aqumutagh gneng _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqaaghte sta llu _ ategh ni _ atuqe luku _ .
ataasigh _ n a a s q w a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ tuqute sug ni tke aq _ kiitigh luni _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ kii yagh llegh a _ maame kau uq _ . _ I i n g u n a g h h a g h m e n g _ nuna m _ yug ita _ saghiigha yagute luku _ maligte aat _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ manigugh aat _ d r a g o n - a _ qayughllak _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m u n _ tuune kanga _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n i _ . _ manigugh aat llu _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ , _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g t u n _ ayuqe a _ ? _ kitum ngam _ p i l l u w a g h l l e q a g u _ ? _ "
taagken _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ akuzi yaghqaaghte uq _ . _ aangaayugte ghllag uq _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ akuzi tke a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g u q _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luni _ 4 2 - n u n _ tanqigh nun _ .
piinligh aa _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke i lleg ni _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ ategh aneng _ , _ kiyaghfig aneng _ , _ t a m a a k u n e n g l l u _ kiyaghte lghii neng _ qilag mi _ .
A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l i t a a _ p i l l u w i i s q e l l u k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ k a y a a l q e s q e l l u k i l l u _ . _ igleghte te yaghqaaghte ste ai _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ , _ yug t _ , _ ulu t _ , _ n u n a t a a n i l n g u u t l u _ yug t _ .
qamagte luni _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii m _ manigugh lleqe aat _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ manigugh naanghite aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ igaqe kaqe ai _ ategh it _ nuna ngllagh llghite luni _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ pi ke ai _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ , _ yug t _ tuqu tke ai ta _ .
" _ nagate tek _ , _ sigute lgu kufsi _ :
kina _ alngunak _ tugu yaghqaa kuni _ , _ tugu lleqe aat _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ tuqute yaghqaa kuni _ savigpag kun _ , _ tuqu lleqe aat _ savigpag kun _ . _ taake uk _ whaten _ pi sigh u uk _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa ut llu _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ nuna meng _ aane lghii _ . _ maalghug gneng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ p e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ s i g h u n g h a t u n _ , _ akuzi uq llu _ d r a g o n - e t u n _ .
sivuligh _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ t a w a n l l u k u _ t u n g l i g h h a a n _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ atuqe a _ qamagte luku _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a _ . _ taaggun _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e g h q u n _ maniguute ste ai _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ sivuligh mun _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m u n _ . _ ( _ kii yagh llegh an _ tuqute sug ni tke a _ , _ iwernga _ kii yagh llegh a _ maamekagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i g h l l a g a a t a g h t u q _ , _ talwa _ qilag meng _ nuna mun _ kenegh _ ukig ste a _ yug t _ e s g h a a m a n g h i t n i _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g u q _ a l l a a g h l l u w a g h t i y a g h q a a l u n i _ t a w a n t e l l g h a n i _ sivuligh m _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ . _ tamaagun _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i l l e g h t e g g u n _ puughte ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ . _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ n a n g a g h n e n g l l i i s q e l l u k i _ q u u l v i i s q e l l u k u _ sivuligh _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ . _ ( _ taana _ tuqute kaayagh lghii _ savigpag kun _ iwernga _ unguvaqagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g u q _ aneghnegh nge ste i yaghqaa luni _ unguvallegh meng _ nangaghnegh anun _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ . _ enkaam _ nangaghnegh _ a k u z i y a q l e g u g h t u q _ . _ taagken _ nangaghnegh m _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ t u q u q i i s q e l l u k i _ tamaakut _ maniguute yu nghite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ nalluniigh ta ii sqe ai _ n u m b e r - m e n g _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ aghenqignegh itgun _ i i g g i t g u n _ nalighmeng _ qagugh itgun _ . _ tawaten _ qelegh ai _ a a n g w a a g h u g h n g a a t a _ , _ u k a v a n s a g h n g a a t a _ , _ a k l u n g i t e g h n g a a t a _ , _ a k l u m a g h n g a a t a _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i t e g h n g a a t a _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u g h n g a a t a _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tukfigh i yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akike i yaghqaa nghite uq _ wetku qun _ nalluniigh lleg lgu kuni _ . _ taana _ nalluniigh lleg ke te aq _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ ategh ke a _ nalighmeng _ ategh an _ n u m b e r - k a a _ .
peghqinellegh leg m _ liigike naagh aa _ una _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mikun _ liigike lleqe a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ number-nga _ . _ taana _ n u m b e r - a _ yug mun _ ategh u uq _ , _ 6 6 6 - n g u u q _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ naayghagh mi _ Z i o n - m i _ . _ ellngan ite u te ut _ 1 4 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ , _ qagugh megteggun _ igaqe vikekagh t _ ategh aneng _ , _ ata an llu _ ategh aneng _ .
nagaqugh aqa llu _ me _ qilag meng _ . _ nagate kau luni _ llangaqa _ qalla atun _ meghllag t _ , _ tengngaag atun llu _ kallug m _ . _ nagate kaqe a _ me _ llangaqa _ h a r p - e s t e t _ ayngananga te lghii stun _ h a r p - e t g u n _ ayuqe lghii _ .
1 4 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ e l d e r - e t l u _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ ilagagh aqe ut _ i l a g a a t e g h r a g h a g h m e n g _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ taana _ ilagaate _ liite yaghqaqe nghite kanga _ iwerngaqun _ 1 4 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ . _ E l l n g i n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u g u l i k i i _ q u n g a n g i t n e n g _ nuna m _ yug aneng _ .
taakut _ yug t _ nukeggnaghqe ma ite ngugh u ut _ aghnagh meng _ atuqe i llegh kun _ . _ maligte aqe aat _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghaani _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u g u l i k a q i i _ akule itneng _ nuna m _ yug an _ , _ tunusagh ke yuwhaagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ P e n n i i g h a g h a g h m u n l l u _ .
iqlengiqe igate u aghte ut _ . _ apallugh ite ut _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ tengaa lghii _ q u u l v a g h p a n i _ . _ apegh ai _ kenle ite ngugh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ n u n a t a a n i l n g u g h n u n _ yug nun _ , _ ramke nun _ , _ ulu nun _ , _ yug nun llu _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ usuqe teggu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ ! _ yug neng _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ kaawtu uq _ . _ manigugh teggu _ u l i m a g h i k a q _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sengngugh lghii neng llu _ megh neng _ ! _ "
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ maligte a _ sivuligh _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ B a b y l o n - e g h l l a k _ naavuma uq _ ! _ B a b y l o n - e m _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ s e x - m e n g _ w i n e - e t u n _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wine- mineng _ megheg squgh igh a _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit a llu _ seghletun _ sex _ atuqe yagute aat _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuugh ste lleqe ut _ . _ "
pi nga yu ak _ yaquleg m _ maligte te uq _ sivuligh gnun _ . _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ manigugh kunigu _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ , _ nangaghnegh a llu _ , _ a l l g e g h s i m a k u m i g u l l u _ nalluniigh llegh _ qagugh mikun _ nalighmeng _ iigge mikun
megh yaghqaqe a _ wine- nga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh an _ . _ taana _ wine- a _ me ligh ma ite ngughk _ kuuvekagh _ qayuusigh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ke a _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ manigugh tke aq _ t a a k u g n u n _ ikfiqe ghllag yaghqaa uq _ kenegh mi llu _ , _ sulphur- mi llu _ , _ sivu itni _ agleghnagh lghiit llu _ yaquleg t _ , _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m l l u _ .
K e n g h e m _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe ai _ , _ agepsugh a _ mayugh lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ikfiqe nanigh naanghite ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtu magh an _ , _ maniguute kau te meggneng _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m u n _ , _ nangaghnegh anun _ , _ nalluniigh kau te meggneng llu _ ategh aneng _ . _ "
tamaakut _ qamagte luteng _ whaten _ pi sigh u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh anun _ , _ ataasiighmete luteng llu _ J e s u s - m u n _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ qilag meng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ igaqe gu _ una _ : _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ quya saghqagh u ut _ tuqu yaghqagh t _ qepghagh te ma luku _ atanegh _ ! _ " _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ " _ quyanagh pestaagh ut _ ! _ meghnaali lleqe ut _ ughleghiigh llegh meggneng _ , _ yug t _ neqamike lleqe ait _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh it _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ qilag u aq _ , _ q i l a w a g h q u n _ aqumga uq _ llangaqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ . _ naasqugh mikun _ g o l d - m e n g _ qaghpa lgu uq _ , _ tugumiiqe a llu _ ipeg lghii _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ aqumga lghii _ q i l a g w a a g h m i _ , _ " _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig n _ atuqe luku _ unatagh a _ , _ qayughllak _ unatagh lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuna m _ piite stekagh a _ u n a t a g h y a g h q a a g h t e n g n g u u q _ ! _ "
enkaam _ qilawaagh mi _ aqumga lghii m _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ unatagh sigh ke a _ nuna mun _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ qilag mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ ipeg lghii meng _ p a k r e g m e l n g u g h m e n g _ savig lgu uq _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ aghqefig gneng _ aflengake i ste nga _ k e n g h a n _ aghqefig m _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ yaquleg _ ipeg lghii meng _ p a k r e g m e l n g u g h m e n g _ savileg _ , _ " _ savig gpeneng _ kepugh ki _ g r a p e s - e t _ nuna m _ v i n e - n g a n e n g _ , _ qayughllak _ g r a p e s - e t _ q i g u m a a t _ ! _ "
enkaam _ y a g u l g e m _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ saqipeg te a _ nuna mun _ , _ kepugh ai _ g r a p e s - e t _ nuna m _ v i n e - n g a n e n g _ . _ taagken _ miluqutagh ke ai _ g r a p e s - e m _ qageghqugh sigh ghllag anun _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakrite vig ghllag a _ .
grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ e s l a t a a n i l n g u u k _ ne ghllag m _ . _ G r a p e s - e t _ qageghqugh yalghiimeng _ a a w k _ maaqe uq _ qageghqugh sigh neng _ 1 8 0 _ m i l e s _ tagtale kellug qu _ , _ 5 _ feet _ uusqaghtu lleg kellug qu _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ aliigh uq _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ . _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ tagite i lghiit _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ taakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ taaqe niite tke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ meghraag kegte aq _ s i q i n w a a g h e s t u n _ , _ akume nga lghii _ kenegh meng _ . _ esghagh anka llu _ kayaalqe i ikagh t _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m e n g _ , _ nangaghnegh aneng _ , _ ategh an llu _ n u m b e r - n g a n e n g _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ s a a g h w a g h n i _ kellii m _ , _ h a r p - e l i g h t u u l l u t e n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ke ii te neng _ ellngit nun _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ ilagagh ta aneng _ M o s e s - e m _ , _ ( _ kiyaghnegh m _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a _ ) _ , _ ilagagh ta aneng llu _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ : _ " _ kaay _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ qepghagh llegh ten _ seghlegh ghllag u ut _ , _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h l l a g u u t _ ! _ kaay _ , _ umiileg at _ nuna m _ yug ita _ , _ elpek _ sa llegh ten _ elqughute nga ut llu _ ipa u ut llu _ !
atanegh _ , _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ yug t _ alike lleqe aaten _ , _ q u u l v a g h l l e q a a t l u _ ategh n _ ! _ E l l n g i n a a g u t e n _ agleghnagh lghii _ ! _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ nunatagh t _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aaten _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ nanqigte i llegh ten _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ ! _ "
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ qelpeghtegkangat _ temple- a _ . _ ( _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh u uq _ na _ , _ ellnga n _ yug ita _ liisimake sigh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ t a w a n n i l u k u _ . _ )
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ aanleghaate ut _ temple- meng _ k e l q e l l u t e n g _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ nighugh lghii meng _ , _ sakimag megteggun _ g o l d - m e n g _ tafsi luteng _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ unguva lghii m _ e s t a m a n e n g _ t a a k u n e n g _ , _ g o l d - m e n g _ s a g n e l i q u g h i i _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ . _ taakut _ sagnegh t _ imigh nga ut _ s a k r a a l l e g h l l a a g a n e n g _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
T e m p l e - e m _ ilu a _ a g e p s u g h q a a g a a _ kiyaghnegh m _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a n e n g l l u _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l g h a n e n g l l u _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh naanghite uq _ temple- mun _ kenlanga _ maaghraghvinleg _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ k e n l e t g h u u t e l l g h i t n u n _ , _ tagi tke ait _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ .
taagken _ temple- meng _ nagaqugh aqa _ iglagtu lghii _ me _ , _ ungipaate kangi _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ " _ kuuve yaghtugh teki _ nuna mun _ maaghraghvinleg _ sagnegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag i _ ! _ "
enkaam _ sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve yaghtugh aa _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag t _ aqnighnagh pigte lghiit _ pupig t _ p i i t q u u t u t _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh nun _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m e n g _ . _ T a m a a k u n g u u t _ manigugh tke aat _ nangaghnegh anun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kellii nun _ . _ taagken _ kellaag igh a _ aaw atun _ tuqukagh m _ yug m _ lliigh luni _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ unguva lghiit _ kellii ni _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ k i i g w n u n l l u _ , _ sengngugh nun llu _ megh nun _ enkaam _ aaw ughte uute ut _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ igleghte te i lghii _ megh neng _ yaquleg _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ kaay _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ e l p e n g u u q _ maaten _ kiyaghte lghii _ , _ e l p e n g u u q _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ nanqigte i llegh ten llu _ aghyuugh i llegh ten llu _ elqughute nga ut _ .
yug t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ yug ten _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t e n l l u _ , _ enkaam _ m e g h y a g h q a l i t a t e n _ aaw meng _ . _ tawaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a a t _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ aghqefig gneng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ ! _ ipa u ut llu _ elqughute nga ut llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ten _ ! _ "
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ s a g h n e n i _ kuuve a _ siqinegh kun _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ s i q i n g h e m _ k e n g h a n u n _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ .
S i q i n g h e m _ uguqnagh ghllag an _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ igleghte te i ste u ta aneng _ tamaavek _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag nun _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ , _ usuqe nghite aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ , _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ m a m l e g h q w a a g a a _ . _ yug t _ i k f i q e m _ ulu teng _ amqeghqugh ait _ .
sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ apallugh ke luku _ aqnighqe llegh meggneng llu _ pupigtaa llegh meggneng llu _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ seghletun _ pi llegh meggneng _ .
aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ k i i w l l a g e g n u n _ E u p h r a t e s - e g n u n _ . _ kiiw k _ pategh uk _ yataaghqe te na luki _ tume kaghqagh meng _ umiileg t _ tagi lghiit _ a s i v a g h m e n g _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ pi nga yu t _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ f r o g - e s u g n i l n g u u t _ . _ aane ut _ q a a n g h i t n e n g _ d r a g o n - e m _ , _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h e m l l u _ .
taakut _ tughneghagh t _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h t i k a y u g u f t u t _ . _ aghulaqe ut _ umiileg itnun _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte na luki _ p i l l u w a m u n _ aghnegh ghllag ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atanegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate aghte tek _ ! _ tagi u unga _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ ! _ quyanagh uq _ t e g h h u m a l g h i i _ , _ aatkagh ni _ p i i f t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ ayuqe kangi _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte naanghite uq _ amsikagh mi _ , _ kayngusaghagh te naanghite uq llu _ tesqagani _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ ! _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ qerngughte ait _ umiileg t _ A r m a g e d d o n - m u n _ . _ tawaten _ H e b r e w - g h m i i s t u n _ atigh llegh a _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ esla kun _ . _ temple- mi _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ iglagtu pigte luni _ me _ pi uq _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ "
taawa _ nighwaagpagtagh uq _ , _ tengngaagtagh uq _ , _ ka lli tuq _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ taana _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag a _ s e g h l e l l e g h p i g a a g u q _ kiyaghnegh m _ y u n g l l a g h y u g g a l l g h a n e n g _ .
negh ghllag _ pellegh uq _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l u n i _ . _ nuna t llu _ ne ghllag it _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ naave uute ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ B a b y l o n - e g h l l a g e m _ seghleghqe llegh i _ . _ enkaam _ megh sta _ wine- a _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ sakrite llegh ghllag mineng _ imaqe lghii _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiighqagh t _ aviighute uute ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ naayghagh t _ kaave uute ut _ .
kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ 1 0 0 _ uqigtutka vzigh lghiit _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ tamaakut _ yug t _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh _ apallugh ke luki _ kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ . _ taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ seghlegh pigu lghii _ .
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ , _ t a a k u n e n g _ ataasigh m _ taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ aghyuugh lleghqagh aneng _ a p e g h s e g h u u m _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ aqumga lghii _ meghllag tgun _ .
nuna m _ umiileg i _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ atuqe aqe luku _ aghnagh _ . _ seghlegh t _ atuqe i ste i llegh i _ w i n e - e t u n _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug i _ suume aqe ut _ megh nghmegteggu _ wine- nga _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ T a g h n e g h a g n e k u n _ aglagh te aanga _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tawani _ esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ aqumga lghii _ kavirrakegtagh kun _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g k u n _ . _ T e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ igaqugh vike nga uq _ uzimun _ sa ngugh ughte sigh neng _ ategh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh lgu uq _ , _ qule u ut llu _ s i g h u n g h i _ .
aghnagh _ pilugug nga uq _ esneyaagh meng llu _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ enkaam _ u l l n g a q l u n i _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ a k i t u g h l l a g m e n g _ uyghag meng _ , _ p e a r l - m e n g l l u _ . _ tugumiiqe a _ g o l d - a _ qayuusigh _ esleqnga lghii _ s e g h l e g h n a l g h i i n e n g _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h n e n g _ , _ nukeggnagh lghii neng llu _ s e x - k u n _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ .
qawaag ni _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ apeghseghugh _ Babylon _ , _ naa ke aat _ yugusigh meggneng _ akike i kayug t _ aghnagh t _ , _ s e g h l e g h n a l l g h a n e n g l l u _ nuna m _ .
esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ suume lghii _ aaw itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ , _ aaw itneng llu _ tuqu quqagh t _ qayughllak _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u t _ J e s u s - m u n _ . _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ saghiigha yug ghllag unga _ .
iwernga _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ sangavek _ saghiigha yug ziin _ ? _ ungipaate naqe amken _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi sigh u te kek _ aghnaa nkuk _ , _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e n k u k _ . _ taana _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ igleghte te i lghii _ aghnagh meng _ , _ naasqugh lgu uq _ maaghraghvinleg _ , _ sighunegh lgu uq llu _ qula _ .
T e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ esghagh kan _ unguva yagh lghii u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ mayugh lleqe uq _ S a a m n a n g i l n g u g h m e n g _ L a a g w a a g h m e n g _ naafqe lleg nge na luni _ . _ yug lgu uq _ nuna mi _ ategh it _ igaqe llghite ngugh t _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ nuna _ piinligh llghite luku _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ saghiigha yug lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ unguva yagh lghii _ , _ tuqukagh _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh yuqagh m _ liigike lleqe a _ una _ : _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ qemi t _ aghnagh m _ aqumga vig i _ .
taakut _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut llu _ umiileg t _ . _ tallimat _ tuqu kau ut _ , _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i u uq _ , _ enkaam _ ataasigh _ salin _ tagi igate uq _ . _ tagi kuni _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
T e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ unguva yagh lghii _ iwernga _ tuqukagh _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite u uq _ umiileg _ . _ taana _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite a _ umiileg _ ila ke aat _ sivuligh t _ maaghraghvinleg _ umiileg t _ , _ naafqe lleg nge yaghtugh u uq _ .
" _ esghaghkagh ten _ qula _ s i g h u n g h e t _ , _ qula u ut _ umiileg t _ salin _ igleghte te i igate ut _ . _ iwernga _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e n g e l l e q u t _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luteng _ ataasigh _ aflu _ maligte te luteng _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m u n _ .
taakut _ ataasigh _ umyugagh ke luku _ tuune lleqe ait _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m u n _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e t e n g l l u _ pi lleghqagh teng llu _ .
enkaam _ p i l l u w a g h l l e q a a t _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ . _ iwernga _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ kayaalqe lleqe ai _ qayughllak _ atanegh ke kangat _ a t a n g h e t _ , _ umiileg ke kangat llu _ umiileg t _ . _ P e n n i i g h a g h a g h m e l n g u u t _ tuqlugh kau ut _ , _ nakmike kau ut _ , _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u g u t l u _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ esghagh aten _ megh t _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ aqumga vig i _ . _ taakut _ megh t _ yug lghute ghllag u ut _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ ulu ke lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
esghaghkagh gpek _ qula _ s i g h u n g h e t _ , _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m l l u _ , _ ugumiite lleqe aat _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ . _ S a q r a g g i i g h u l l u k u _ , _ a m s i q a g h q e l l u k u _ , _ kemeg a _ negh luku _ , _ taagken _ siipnegh a _ kumagh lleqe aat _ .
taakut _ qula _ s i g h u n g h e t _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellngit nun _ atuqe stekaqe a _ piyuke lleg ni _ . _ angeghqe ma te kau ut llu _ t u u n a l u k i _ ataneghpag u lleg teng _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m u n _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh llegh anun _ .
taana _ aghnagh _ esghagh kan _ negh ghllagu uq _ igleghte te i lghii _ umiileg itneng _ nuna t _ . _ "
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ . _ A g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e l e g l l a g u f t u q _ , _ n i g h u g h q e l l e g h m i n e n g _ i i n g u n a g h h a a n _ nuna _ nighugte a _ .
akilghuu ghllag uq _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ naavuma uq _ B a b y l o n - e g h l l a k _ ! _ nekagh ughte ma ut _ tughneghagh t _ , _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ , _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ kusge nagh lghiit _ qawaag t _ .
B a b y l o n - e m _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ s e x - m e n g _ w i n e - e t u n _ ayuqe uq _ , _ n u n a t a g h h a n _ tamaghhagh an _ meghe a _ . _ nuna m _ umiileg ita _ atuqe aqe aat _ , _ nuna m llu _ a k i l p e g a g h t e n g i t a _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u aat _ nuqete saghqagh u nghite ngugh qun _ s e x - k u n _ atuqe i yu llegh akun _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ ila a _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ yug mni _ , _ aanleghaate tek _ B a b y l o n - m e n g _ ! _ ilate gpenasi _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ a g h y u u l l e n g n a y u k a f s i _ ellnga nun _ maligte te lusi _ .
seghleghqe llegh i _ may- ughte ghllag nga ut _ u u s q a g h t u t k a g h m e n g _ qilag tun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ seghleghqe llegh i _ .
seghletun _ pi teggu _ Babylon _ katam _ ellnga n _ seghletun _ p i l l g h a t u n _ . _ malghughqellug qu _ seghletun _ p i l l g h a _ pi teggu _ . _ qayuusigh akun _ kuuve teggu _ wine- a _ i k n a q e t u l n g a _ m a l g h u g h q e n g n g a a n _ ellnga n _ atuqe aqe ka aneng _ .
ellmi neng _ usuqe ghllag aqe uq _ , _ aklungi ghllag ni llu _ atuqe aqe a _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyukekagh minun _ . _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag teggu llu _ qivghu ste ghllag teggu llu _ atunekiite ste luku _ qaghya llegh ghllag anun _ . _ ellmi neng _ pi aqe uq _ , _ ' _ queen- ngugh u nga _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh mkun _ . _ ugingighagh u nghite unga _ enkaam _ qivghu naanghite u aghte unga _ ! _ '
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnegh ghhagh inagh mi _ kaate lleqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ , _ qivghu llegh m _ , _ negh ke igh sag ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ k e n g h e m _ panegh lleqe a _ qayughllak _ aghyuugh i ste nga _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ . _ "
nuna m _ umiileg i _ ila tke aat _ atuqe i llegh anun llu _ qiliigh yug llegh anun llu _ , _ esghagh kumegteggu _ agepsugh a _ panellegh an _ qiya kete lleqe aat _ , _ iglagtu pigte luteng llu _ qiya ke ghllagte lleqe aat _ .
U y a v a n l l u t e n g _ nekeve lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ellmeng llu _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ ! _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ elpek _ aange ghllag _ aghtugh igate ngughk _ negh ghllag _ , _ Babylon _ ! _ aghyuugh lleg nge uten _ ataasigh ghhagh mi _ aflu mi _ ! _ "
nuna m _ a k i l p e g a g h t e n g i t a _ qiyaaghwagh tke aat _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ tukfigh nanigh kangit _ saghya it _ .
B a b y l o n - m i _ a k i l p e g a g h t e t _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ g o l d - e t _ , _ s i l v e r - e t _ , _ akitu ghllaget _ uyghag t _ , _ p e a r l - e t l u _ ; _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ qiipaghaghqagh t _ ulimaagh t _ linen- meng _ , _ silk- meng _ , _ qiipaghaghqagh t llu _ iqeghte aqe lghiit _ esneg yagh u aaghet _ , _ kavirrakegtagh t llu _ . _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ unaghsigh t _ , _ ulimaagh t _ naangqugh neng _ , _ a k i t u g h l l a g n e n g _ unaghsigh neng _ , _ siilu neng _ , _ s a v i k e n g h a a g n e n g _ , _ m a r b l e - e n e n g l l u _ .
aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ c i n n a m o n - e t _ , _ s p i c e - e t _ , _ i n c e n s e - e t _ , _ m y r r h - e t _ , _ f r a n k i n c e n s e - e t _ ; _ w i n e - e t _ , _ o l i v e - e m _ mesiigh i _ ; _ avlawa t _ , _ w h e a t - e t _ ; _ c a t t l e - e t _ , _ penniigh t _ , _ kuuni t _ , _ w a g o n - e t _ ; _ talwa _ yug t _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u l u k i _ .
A k i l p e g a g h t e t _ Babylon _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit _ a l l g e g h s u k e g h l l a k a g h t e n _ aviighute ut _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ aklungi ghllag ten _ qelmegh ghllaget _ aviighute ut _ , _ allameng llu _ allgeghsaghqagh u nanigh aten _ ! _ "
A k i l p e g a g h t e t _ aklungi igh ikagh t _ akike i luteng _ B a b y l o n - m u n _ , _ nekevgha lleqe ut _ u y a v a n l l u t e n g _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ qiya lleqe ut _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ ,
whaten llu _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ ' _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u u q _ ! _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u u q _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aate kayugu yagh uq _ linen- meng _ , _ esneyaagh meng _ , _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ u l l n g a q e g k a y u g u y a g h t u q l u _ g o l d - m e n g _ , _ a k i t u g h l l a g m e n g _ uyghag meng _ , _ p e a r l - m e n g l l u _ !
ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ " _ qamagte luteng _ angyaleg t _ , _ yug it _ , _ passenger-ngit _ , _ a k i l p e g a g h t e t l u _ iglegha kayug t _ angyaghpag tgun _ allgegh te na luteng _ k i y a g h u s i g h q a m e g g n e n g _ , _ angyaghpag it _ aghula i iqe aat _ u y a v a n l l u t e n g _ B a b y l o n - m e n g _ kumagh aqngan _ .
esghagh luku _ agepsugh a _ kumagh llegh an _ , _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ alla _ ne ghllag ite uq _ w h a t e l n g u g h m e n g _ ! _ '
naasqugh teng _ pagula lightugh ait _ qiya te kete luku _ , _ qivghu te kete luku _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u u q _ ! _ S e g h l e g h w a a g h u u q _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aklungi ghllag aneng _ qamagte luteng _ angyaghpag leg t _ aklungi igh i kayugu yagh ut _ ! _ iwernga _ ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ qilag meng _ kina _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kaay _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h n i _ , _ quyake teggu _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe a _ Babylon _ ! _ quya tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ a p o s t l e - e n i _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e n i l l u _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aa _ qayughllak _ seghletun _ pi kaqe kangisi _ ! _ "
taagken _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ keveg aa _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ , _ g r a i n - m u n _ kagimte i sigh stun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ miluute a _ k e l l i m u n _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ T a w a t e g h p i g a q _ negh ghllag _ Babylon _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ miluute ghllag lleqe a _ asitmun _ enkaam _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite aat _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh naanghite ai _ h a r p - e s t e t e n _ , _ p i l l g u g h i k a t _ a y n g a n a n g a s t e t e n _ , _ f l u t e - e s t e t e n _ , _ q a l g h i g h t a g h t e t e n l l u _ ! _ qamagte luteng _ p i l l g u g h i k a t _ q e p g h a g h t e t e n _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ , _ g r a i n - m e n g _ k a g i m t e s t e t e n _ alla llu _ nagaqugh naanghite ait _ !
kenegh lghutagh m _ nighug a _ k u u k g u n n a a n i g h n a q u q _ elpek ni _ . _ me ik _ nulightugh naqe lghii m llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii m llu _ nagaqugh nanigh naqe uk _ elpek ni _ . _ A k i l p e g a g h t e t e n _ a g h t i i g a t n g w a a g h y a g h t u t _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ alignaghtaagh llegh gpegun _ puu ghqu qagh katen _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ nuna m _ yug i _ !
B a b y l o n - m i _ taawa _ aaw it _ u u k n a l i q i s t e t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ tuqu tke aat _ nuna mi _ . _ "
kingu aneng _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ akuzillegh an _ , _ qilag mi _ nagaqugh anka _ yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu lghiit _ , _ " _ H a l l e l u j a h _ ! _ yuguligh llegh _ , _ q u u l v a l l e q _ , _ a g h t u g h y a g h q a a n g h i l l e q l u _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke ai _ !
ellnga n _ nanqigte i llegh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ elqughute nga ut _ ! _ ellnga n _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ apeghseghugh _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ qayughllak _ nuna m _ yug i _ seghletun _ pi stegkangi _ s e x - k u n _ atuqe ste aqe luni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akite kaqe a _ qayughllak _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i _ tuqu qugh stegkangi _ . _ "
yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu laatagh ut _ , _ " _ H a l l e l u j a h _ ! _ ne ghllag m _ kumagh lghii m _ agepsugh a _ mayugh u uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ e l d e r - e t _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ niinghute uute luteng _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gmikun _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ H a l l e l u j a h _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ me _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ usuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ qamagte lusi _ q e p g h a g h t e n g a n i _ alike i lghii ni _ ellnga neng _ , _ u k a v a n l e n g u g h n i l l u _ aangwaagh ni llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ llangaqa _ me it _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ nagate kau luteng _ s u k s u g i s t u n _ tevlughte ghllag lghiit _ megh t _ , _ kallug m llu _ tengngaagtagh llegh atun _ ayuqe luteng _ . _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ H a l l e l u j a h _ ! _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ igleghte te i uq _ !
quya te lta _ , _ elngaatall _ quya ghllag lta llu _ usuqe lteggu llu _ ! _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ nengughte lleghqagh a _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuliighqagh a llu _ yataaghqe ma uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh ma a _ ugiigh naqe lghii _ p i n i g h r a k e g t a m e n g _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ . _ " _ ( _ " _ linen- a _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ )
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ una _ igaqe gu _ : _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ nengughte llegh an _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ negh yaghtigh sqekagh t _ quya stekau ut _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh akun _ manigugh na luku _ , _ iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ elpetun _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e t u n l l u _ . _ E l l n g i n g u u t _ a t a a s i i g h m e l n g u u t _ i p a l l e g h m u n _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ . _ I p a l l e q _ J e s u s - e m _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ t a a n a n g u u q _ i p a l l e q _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ u u k n a l i q i s t e n u n _ ungipagh ke stekagh a _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ ! _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ ategh a _ " _ A t a a s i i g h m e l n g u q _ , _ ipapik _ " _ . _ elqughute nga ut _ nanqigte i llegh i _ , _ p i l l u w a q a n g i l l u _ anguyag ni _ .
iye kek _ kumaghugh llegh atun _ k e n g h e m _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lghute lgu uq _ . _ ategh a _ ellnga kun _ igaqe nga uq _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke kanga _ iwerngaqun _ ellnginagh an _ .
atkuyaagh k _ atugh kek _ neptekau uk _ aaw kun _ . _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite anga _ " _ .
qilag meng _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i t a _ maligsaagh aat _ uugte luteng _ qatelghii tgun _ kuuni tgun _ , _ a t k u y a a g h l u t e n g _ iqa ite ngugh meng _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ .
Q a a n g h a n e n g _ aane uq _ ipeg lghii _ savigpag _ , _ taaggun _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ n a k u m i i t _ k a y a a l q u g h l l e q i i _ . _ igleghte te lleqe ai _ i r o n - m e n g _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ taagken _ tutmagh lleqe ai _ anguyag ni _ katam _ yug t _ t u t m a g h a q e l l g h i s t u n _ g r a p e s - e t _ q a g e g h q u u s i g n i l n g u u t _ . _ taana _ tutmagh llegh _ sakraa llegh ghllag ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atkuyaagh akun llu _ qugtuqagh akun llu _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ whaten _ ; _ umiileg a _ umiileg t _ , _ A t a n g h a _ a t a n g h e t _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ siqinegh kun _ . _ qamagte luki _ qawaag lghute t _ quulvani _ tengaa lghiit _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi a _ , _ " _ tagi laghate te lusi _ qerngughte te k _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ghllag anun _ !
tagi tek _ , _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ umiileg t _ , _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ umiileg it _ , _ p i l l u w a g h t e t l u _ . _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ kuuni t _ , _ kuuni kun _ i g l e g h t e s t e t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h e t _ , _ q e p g h a g h t e l a a g h u n g h i l n g u u t _ , _ u k a v a n l e n g u u t _ , _ aw nge aaghet llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k l u _ , _ nuna m llu _ umiileg i _ , _ p i l l u w a g h t e k u l l g h i i t _ qerngughte te ut _ p i l l u w a g h n a l u k u _ igleghte lghii _ kuuni kun _ , _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i l l u _ .
T u g w a a g k e t _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e n k u k _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h e n k u k _ a l l a a g h l l u w a g h t i i g h a a t a q a q _ t a w a n l l u k u _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u k _ . _ ( _ A l l a a g h l l u w a g h t i i q e l l e g h m i k u n _ puu ghqu qu ai _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh t _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m e n g _ , _ manigugh qu aat llu _ nangaghnegh a _ . _ ) _ T e g h i k u s a l l u u g e n k u k _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h e n k u k _ u n g u v a a g k e n k a _ miluute ak _ naayvagh m _ k e n g h a n u n _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ sulphur- meng _ .
P i l l u w a g h t e n g i k _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ tuqu qugh ai _ savigpag kun _ qanegh mineng _ aanekagh kun _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ qawaag t _ negh ait _ kemegkwaagh it _ kepsugh qiinagh llegh meggnun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ tugumiiqe luni _ k e y - n g a n e n g _ S a a m n a n g i l n g u u m _ laawaagh m _ , _ qiipraghute ghllag neng llu _ .
kayaalqellug qu _ d r a g o n - a _ t u w a a _ . _ ( _ D r a g o n - a _ t a a n a n g u u q _ ayumightagh _ nemeghyagh _ , _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ tughneghagh _ . _ ) _ taagken _ yaquleg m _ asighte qugh a _ qiipraghute neng _ t h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
miluute luku _ laawaagh mun _ , _ taagken _ amig meng _ umeg te luku _ m a g h q a t u t k a a _ s e a l - e l u k u _ . _ enkaam _ D r a g o n - e m _ puughte yaghqaa nanigh ai _ yug t _ kenlanga _ t h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ alpag kata _ iteme te aghte lleqe aat _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh t _ , _ aqumga lghiit llu _ t a a k u t g u n _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i yaghqaaghte stekagh i _ yug neng _ . _ E s h a g h a n k a l l u _ unguva sagh it _ tamaakut _ n a a s q w i g h t u q i i t _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ . _ ungipagh ke kaqe kangat _ i p a l l e q _ J e s u s - e m _ qayvighqekagh a _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taakut _ maniguute mangite ut _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g m u n _ , _ nalighmeng _ nangaghnegh anun _ . _ talwa _ qagugh megteggun _ , _ nalighmeng _ iigge megteggun _ a l l g e g h t e l l g h i t a a t _ nalluniilkutagh a _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e m _ . _ unguvagh uute luteng _ igleghte te i lgusigh aat _ C h r i s t - a _ t h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
taana _ sivulii uq _ unguvagh qugh llegh _ . _ ( _ ila i _ tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute naanghite ut _ kenlanga _ t h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ )
tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ u n g u v a g h t e k i i _ unguvagh uute yuwhaagh llegh mi _ quya stekau ut llu _ agleghnagh ut llu _ . _ tuqu naanghite ut _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ p r i e s t - n g u n a q n g u u t _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ C h r i s t - a m u n l l u _ . _ igleghte te i lgusigh lleqe aat llu _ C h r i s t - a _ t h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
T h o u s a n d _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag kata _ , _ tughneghagh _ anusimingllaghvig aneng _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ .
enkaam _ aane luni _ puughte qugh lleqe ai _ nunatagh t _ mingite nga lghiit _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tamaakut _ nunatagh t _ ategh ke ait _ G o g - e n k u k _ M a g o g - e n k u k _ . _ yug ik _ uglagh ghllag ut _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ esne m _ . _ taagken _ tughneghagh m _ qerngughte lleqe ai _ p i l l u w a m u n _ .
tughneghagh m _ p i l l u w a g h t e n g i _ iqelmun _ mingite luteng _ igleghte lleqe ut _ nuna kun _ . _ kaate luteng _ kangllu lleqe agket _ nunaagh llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ nayugh at _ , _ negh ghllag llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqekagh a _ . _ taagken _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenegh _ ukig ste luku _ paneghtekagh i _ p i l l u w a g h t e t _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh _ puughte ikagh _ nunatagh neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ita _ miluute lleqe aat _ naayvagh mun _ kumaghugh lghii _ sulphur- meng _ . _ tawavek _ miluute kaqe kegket _ t e g h i k u s a l l u u g e n k u k _ , _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s i g h w a a g h e n k u k _ . _ tawani _ ikfiqe ghllag lleqe ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ aqumga lghii _ q a t e l g h i i g n e k u n _ u m i i l g u s i g n e k u n _ a q u m u t a g h l l a g e g n e k u n _ . _ nuna llu _ qilag a llu _ q i m a a g u u t u k _ kiyaghnegh m _ t a w a n t e l l g h a n e n g _ , _ alla llu _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenatek _ .
esghagh anka llu _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ , _ u k a l i i w a q l u t e n g l l u _ aangwaagh u aqe luteng llu _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ igagh t _ qelpeghte ait _ , _ igagh i _ unguvallegh m _ , _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ ategh itneng _ tamaakut _ unguva yaghqagh t _ quunperugllag _ . _ ila i llu _ igagh lghute t _ qelpeghte ait _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ tuqukagh t _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t n e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ atuqe luki _ igaqughkagh t _ igagh tgun _ .
taagken _ kellii m _ tuquma ste lugh u i ni _ pegte ai _ . _ tuqu llegh m llu _ H a d e s - e m l l u _ tuquma ste lugh u i tek _ pegte aik _ . _ Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i s t u n _ .
taagken _ tuqu llegh llu _ H a d e s - l u _ miluute agket _ naayvagh m _ k e n g h a n u n _ . _ naayvagh m _ k e n g h a _ tuungligh ke a _ tuqu llegh m _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ategh a _ igaqe ma ite kan _ igagh ani _ unguvallegh m _ , _ milugh tke aat _ naayvagh m _ k e n g h a n u n _ .
taagken _ esghagh agka _ qilag ragh aq llu _ n u n a g h r a g h a q l u _ . _ qilag ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ nuna ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ kellii igh te kau uq llu _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ , _ J e r u s a l e m - e g h r a g h a q _ , _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h m e n g _ . _ negh ghllag _ y a t a a g h q e l l u n i _ ugiigh naqe lghii m _ u l l n g a q e l l g h a t u n _ ugi minun _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh gneng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghfig a _ yug nite uq _ ! _ kiyaghfig ke lleqe ai _ enkaam _ ellngit _ yug ke lleqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga _ katam _ ellngitnite lleqe uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aat _ .
quni igh lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ . _ tuqu u i lleqe a _ , _ qivghu u i lleqe a _ , _ qiya nga i lleqe a _ , _ talwa _ a q n i g h q e n g n g i i l l e q a a _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ atuqe yagh kangit _ atuqe nanigh lleqe ait _ . _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gnite ngughk _ aqumutagh gni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ki qun _ , _ ulima aqe anka _ sa u aat _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ nutaghagh u luki _ ! _ " _ whaten llu _ pi uq _ , _ " _ igaqe ki _ tamaakut _ apeghkagh nka _ elpenun _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ akuzite t _ ipa u ut _ , _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ O m e g a - n g u u n g a _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ , _ aki u na an _ meghsi lleqe aqa _ sengngugh lghii meng _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug meng _ megh meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kayaalqe i i lghii m _ allgegh lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ whanga mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ enkaam _ ellngit _ avaqutagh ke lleqe anka _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ quyughtagh lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ , _ s e g h l e l l e g h p i g a g h n e n g _ seghleghqe lghiit _ , _ y u g t a g h t e t _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ alignagh lghiit _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ iqlengagh lghiit _ , _ nekaghqagh at _ naayvagh u uq _ kumaghugh lghii _ kenegh meng llu _ sulphur- meng llu _ . _ T a a n a n g u u q _ tuungligh a _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ esleqnga lghii neng _ kinguligh neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ , _ ataasigh m _ t a a k u n e n g _ taku anga _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ ugiigh naqe lghii meng _ , _ nuliighqagh a _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ yaquleg m _ tugu lunga _ aglagh te aanga _ uusqagh lleghpigagh anun _ naayghagh m _ . _ tawani _ kelgute a _ Jerusalem _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ q i l a g m e l n g u g h m e n g _ .
K u u k g u t n g a g h m i _ kiyaghnegh m _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a n e n g _ . _ negh ghllag _ kuukgute uq _ akitu ghllag lghii tun _ uyghag tun _ , _ j a s p e r - e t u n _ , _ m e g h r a a k e g t u t k a g h m i _ c r y s t a l - e t u n _ .
uusqagh ghllag meng _ mingllute leg _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ a m i g l l a l g a a t a q _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yaquleg t _ amig ghllagnite ut _ . _ A t a a s i k a g h t a g h m e n g _ amig ghllag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ramke aneng _ I s r a e l - e m _ .
mingllu ta a _ ne ghllag m _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag leg _ , _ pi nga yu t _ asivagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aywaa ni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ ikevagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ pakfalla mi _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta a _ tunemagh igh kau uq _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ uyghag neng _ . _ A t a a s i k a g h t a g h m e n g _ uyghag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ a p o s t l e - n g a n e n g _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ .
yaquleg _ a l e g h q u g h t e k a _ g o l d - m e n g _ usputagh lgu uq _ usputagh na luku _ negh ghllag _ , _ amig ghllag i llu _ mingllu ta a llu _ .
negh ghllag _ u l l u v i i g h r a k e g t e f t u q _ t a g t a l n g a _ , _ p a t e g h t u l n g a t u n _ ayuqe uq _ . _ yaquleg m _ negh ghllag _ u s p u t a g h y a q m i n i g u _ : _ 1 , 5 0 0 _ m i l e s _ tagtale ke a _ , _ pateghtu lleg ke a _ , _ uusqaghtu lleg ke a llu _ .
mingllu ta a llu _ u s p u t a g h y a q m i n i g u _ , _ 2 1 6 _ f e e t - n g u f t u q _ u u s q a g h t u l n g a _ . _ yaquleg m _ usputagh llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ yug m _ usputagh llegh a _ .
mingllu ta a _ ulimaagh u uq _ j a s p e r - m e n g _ . _ negh ghllag _ ulimaagh u uq _ g o l d - e p e r e g w a a g h m e n g _ . _ G o l d - a _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ s i q i n w h a a g h t u n _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta an _ tunemagh i _ pinigh naagh qusigh luteng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ a k i t u g h l l a g n e n g _ uyghag neng _ . _ sivuligh _ j a s p e r - n g u f t u q _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ s a p p h i r e - n g u f t u q _ , _ pingayut ii ta at _ a g a t e - n g u f t u q _ , _ estamat ii ta at _ e m e r a l d - n g u f t u q _ ,
tallimat ii ta at _ o n y x - n g u f t u q _ , _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ c a r n e l i a n - n g u f t u q _ , _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta at _ c h r y s o l i t e - n g u f t u q _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu ligh ta at _ b e r y l - n g u f t u q _ , _ e s t a m a n e n g _ inglu ligh ta at _ t o p a z - n g u f t u q _ , _ qule ughte ta at _ c h r y s o p r a s e - n g u f t u q _ , _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ii ta at _ j a c i n t h - e n g u f t u q _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ii ta at _ a m e t h y s t - n g u f t u q _ .
qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag t _ p e a r l - n g u f t u t _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ amig ghllag t _ ataasigh meng _ p e a r l - m e n g _ ulimaagh u ut _ . _ ne ghllag m _ tume i _ g o l d - e p e r e g w a a g h u f t u t _ ; _ g o l d - a _ m e g h r a a k e g t e p i g l l e g h i i _ siqinghwaagh tun _ .
ne ghllag mi _ esghaate nghite unga _ temple- meng _ , _ qayughllak _ temple- nga _ A t a n g h u u q _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a g u q l u _ .
negh ghllag _ s i q i n e g h s u g h n i i t u q _ , _ nalighmeng _ tanqigh ighsugh niite uq _ nighugkagh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ n i g h u g h q e l l g h a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighug ke kanga _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aq llu _ kenegh lghutagh ke kanga _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ nuna m _ yug i _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ nighug akun _ kuukgute nga lghii kun _ . _ nuna m llu _ umiileg ita _ aklungi teng _ tagite uute ait _ ne ghllag mun _ .
ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag i _ umeg naanghite ut _ aghnegh m _ naange nghaani _ qayughllak _ unug naagh nghite ngughk _ tamaani _ .
nuna m _ yug ita _ ne ghllag mun _ tagite uute lleqe ait _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ aklungi teng _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa u a _ seghlegh _ , _ talwa _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghnagh tun _ pi sta _ , _ nalighmeng _ iqlengiqe sta _ . _ iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ t a m a a k u n g i n a g h h a a t _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh akun _ unguvallegh m _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m _ pi ke ai _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kiiw gneng _ maaqe lghiik _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ P e n n i i g h a g h a a m l l u _ umiileg u sigh gkenka _ aqumutagh gkeneng _ . _ U n g u v a l l e l i t i k a y u g m e n g _ me leg k _ , _ m e g h r a a k e g t u t k a l g h i i k _ c r y s t a l - e t u n _ .
maaqe nga lghiik _ qukaa kun _ t u m a n g a n _ ne ghllag m _ . _ kiiw k _ inglugtun _ uqfigtuqagh k _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i k a y u g n e n g _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ uqfig _ piite ste i kayugu uq _ f r u i t - n e n g _ tanqigh inagh kun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mi _ , _ ququngagh it llu _ naallghute sigh u ut _ nunatagh anun _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekagh a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ , _ ne ghllag mete naanghite uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ P e n n i i g h a g h h a a n k u k _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh gket _ ne ghllag mete yaghqaa uk _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ q e p g h a g h t e n g i t a _ manigugh lleqe aat _ .
gginagh a _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ ategh a llu _ qagugh itgun _ igaqe nga lleqe uq _ .
tamaani _ unug nanigh lleqe a _ , _ k e n e l g h u t a g h s u g h n i i g h u l l e q i i _ , _ nalighmeng _ s i q i n e g h s u g h n i i g h u l l e q i i _ , _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ nighug ke lleqe aat _ . _ igleghte te i lleqe ut llu _ umiileg u luteng _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite t _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ ipa u ut llu _ . _ A t a n g h e m _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i lghii m _ taghneghagh itneng _ u u k n a l i q i s t e m i _ , _ kayagtekaqe a _ yaquleg ni _ k e l g u v i k e s q e l l u k i _ q e p g h a g h t e n i _ sa u aat _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh ni luki _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ quya stekau ut _ qaatke te lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqe nga lghii nun _ u k u t g u n _ igagh tgun _ . _ "
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ nagate kaqe anka llu _ esghagh kaqe anka llu _ tamaakut _ . _ nagaqugh aqe yamki llu _ esghagh aqe yamki llu _ tamaakut _ , _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh ani _ manigugh na luku _ , _ keleg u vike i steke _ tamaaken _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ whanga llu _ q e p g h a g h t e n g u u n g a _ elpetun _ , _ u g p e q a a l g u t e g p e t u n l l u _ u u k n a l i q i s t e s t u n _ , _ qaatke te lghii stun llu _ akuzi ta itnun _ ukut _ igagh t _ . _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ aksaqe gpenaki _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ ukut _ igagh t _ apeghkagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ pi lleghqagh it _ kaate yaghtugh ma ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi lghii _ nagnegh li _ seghletun _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ nukeggnagh meng _ sumegh ke lghii _ nagnegh li _ nukeggnagh meng _ s u u m q e l l u n i _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughutngagh lghii _ nagnegh li _ elqughute nga luni _ , _ kina llu _ alngunak _ p e l u n g i l n g u q _ nagnegh li _ pelungite luni _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh nka _ kelqe lleqe anka _ nallangightugh na luki _ yug t _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i s t u n _ .
