whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ O m e g a - n g u u n g a _ , _ whanga _ sivulii unga _ kinguligh u unga _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga llu _ . _ "
quya stekau ut _ tamaakut _ atkuyaag teng _ aghvig ke ait _ iqangite te ste luki _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh yaghqaaghtekau ut _ piite stekagh aneng _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i k a y u g e m _ uqfig m _ . _ itegh yaghqaaghtekau ut llu _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itgun _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag m _ e s l a t a a n i l n g u u t _ qikmigh u ut _ , _ alignalghii u ut _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe i ste u ut _ , _ yugte aghte u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ maniguute ste u ut _ , _ iqlengiqe yuneghtu ut _ , _ iqlengiqe manginagh aqe ut llu _ .
" _ whanga _ , _ Jesus _ , _ kayagtekaqe aqa _ yaquleg ka _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ y u g h a g h v i g n i l n g u g h n u n _ . _ apegh lleqe ak _ ukuk _ elpesi nun _ , _ ' _ whanga _ D a v i d - e m _ kingunegh ke aanga _ , _ whanga _ n i g h u g r a k e g t a a g u n g a _ u n a a n g u m _ ighaleqetaagh a _ . _ ' _ "
taghneghagh k llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii llu _ pi uk _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ nagate lghii _ pi li _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ tagi li _ ; _ tugukligh ligu _ aki ite ngughk _ megh _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i k a y u k _ .
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ k e l e n g a s a a g h y u g a n k a _ nagate lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ u k u t g u n _ igagh tgun _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaraagh kaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ . _ ellnga nun _ ila lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ igaqe nga lghiit _ u k u t g u n _ igagh tgun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ikuvike gkaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ nengighqe ai _ piite stekagh t _ uqfigagh neng _ u n g u v a l l e l i t i k a y u g e m _ . _ kiyaghte snaanghite a llu _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ ne ghllag mi _ . _ taake uk _ apegh nga uk _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
J e s u s - n g u u q _ apegh i lghii _ tamaaken _ qamagte luteng _ ipa u ni luki _ . _ pi uq llu _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ " _ amen _ . _ tea- ai _ , _ atanegh _ Jesus _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ J e s u s - e m _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ . _ amen _ .
sangami _ qiighqagh _ sivuqagh meng _ atigh kau a
sivuqagh m _ ungipagh aa
nuna _ ulima nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ , _ ulimaghista _ m e g h n a l i k a q _ , _ ulimaagh ni _ yuvghiigh qagh a _ .
T a a k u m _ t u n g a n g a _ e s g h a g h y a q m i n i g u _ m e r a g h i n a a f t u q _ .
enkaam _ t a a k u m _ kellii n _ megh anun _ kagukagh _ .
megh m _ saamken _ t e g h h a n e n g _ nuna meng _ tugu tete luni _ sivuqagh a _ .
taana _ sivuqagh ni _ nuna _ llikagh a _ megh m _ qaye akun _ , _ qiighqagh ughtekagh _ .
tagtalmi _ qiighqagh _ nevugh ngekagh _ .
piite vikekagh a _ veg m _ , _ p i i t e s i g h a a m _ , _ n u n i v a g s e g h a a m _ , _ q u q u n g a a m _ .
afsengagh t _ , _ sikig t _ , _ kaviigh t _ uugtekagh t _ qiighqagh mun _ .
aghvegh t _ , _ ayvegh t _ , _ neghsagh t _ , _ ulghaagh t _ , _ nanugh t llu _ tagikagh t _ qiighqagh m _ megh an _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ .
ila a _ uugte yagutekagh _ , _ ila yan _ nayugh ksagutekagh at _ .
ila a _ teghig ke sagh _ uksugh mi _ s i k u g n e k u n _ kaate kayug _ .
upenghagh mi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qagugh ak _ katelghaate yagutekagh _ , _ ighni laghate yagutekagh _ .
ila it _ uksughte aqe lghiit _ .
K i y a g h t a a l l g h e m _ tagtale ani _ y u g w e m _ naalkekagh a _ qiighqagh _ .
nelikagh at _ kiyaghfig kekagh at _ .
qiighqagh _ esghaqaaluni _ llangaqa _ qetekagh _ i n g l u p i g a g h m e n g _ iigge meng _ , _ enkaam _ ategh ke a _ sivuqagh _ , _ U l i m a g h i s t e m _ sivuqagh a _ .
A l l a a g h l l u w h a q _ ayungkaghagh
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ nenglu mete ngughk _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a l g h i i _ , _ iwernga _ a g h n a g h a g h p a g g a a g h t e k a q _ , _ anglu ighpagkagh ghhagh _ .
kaame llgagh u aqe lghii _ , _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh meng _ , _ ayumigh m _ k a a m e n g a n e n g _ ayngusikagh meng _ .
emta _ tawaten _ aane aqngami _ t a a k w e g k u t g u n _ qilaga t _ tulimagh ita _ kenle itgun _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh ni _ lli ma kanga _ .
lli luku _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ pamavek _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ tesqakmani _ a n Ê¼ g i q r i q l u n i _ , _ iiyagh m _ sani ngiighhagh ani _ .
tawaten _ nekevgha ghngaaghmi _ , _ a n Ê¼ g i g h n g a a g h m i _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te uq _ me meng _ .
tawaten _ nagate ghngaaghmi _ sa u a _ qama _ allgegh lghii _ me _ :
â _ S a k - m a a - n i i - n g u u q _ sakma _ ,

unaagh _ i i - m a a _ n e g h i i s t e t
A g h u l a q u u - s i - m a a t _ !
I i t g h e l t e n _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â

iitghute kete luku _ esghaqu aghte yalghiimi _ megh gnun _ tawavek _ .
megh ma lghii _ taagken _ .

legan _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aga _ aqfaasnaq _ itegh qaghte aqe lghii _ .

taawa _ meghe nghite aghte igate ngughk _ , _ megh aqe lghii _ aghnagh aq _ .
tamaa na _ yuvghiigh aa _ , _ uumtagh m _ saamna _ asi a _ , _ tamaa na _ sa u a _ alngunak _ wata _ .
aane laatagh uq _ .
legan _ aane luni _ mayugh luni _ , _ mayugh luni _ qakmavek _ iiyagh m _ saaghw anun _ kaate luni _ nekeve uq _ , _ qama nguq _ pi laatagh uq _ tawatengwaaq _ legan _ :
â _ S a k - m a a - n i i - n g u u q _ sakma _ ,

unaagh _ i i - m a a _ n e g h i i s t e t

legan _ aqfaasnaq _ esghaate naqe pigte luni _ maatenllaam _ aga _ elngaatall _ aqfaasnaq _ itegh qagh uq _ .
maaten _ tawani _ pingayut ii te kun _ meqsug nghite uq _ , _ megh k _ legan _ esghagh lukek _ a v e l g h a g h a a k _ .
tamaani _ esghaqu luni _ , _ esghaqu luni _ , _ esghaghte yu gnite a _ iye gmi _ aag llegh gkeneng _ inga _ .
kii _ , _ ayungkaghagh a nguq _ whaa _ uqlughte aqe uq _ !
tawavek _ esghapag luku _ , _ esghapag luku _ , _ tekegh mineng _ imeg aa _ , _ imeg aa _ t e s p i k a p i g h q a a g h l u k u _ sakeqe a _ .
sakeqe luku _ taana _ sakeqe llegh a _ negh luku _ aane uq _ .
aane luni _ mayugh luni _ qaye anun _ tamaakagh _ .
elngaatall _ tamaa a _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmi _ pi laatagh uq _ maateghniineng _ alla pigu luni _ , _ llangaqa _ qengaghllug pigu luni _ :
â _ S a k - p a a - t i i - k u u q _ s a k p a _ ,

up-tu aq _ i i - p a a _ t e g h i i s - t e k

aga nguq _ alla _ itegh qaghte te kete luku _ , _ nutem _ tutemqaghqagh meng _ pi luni _ test- pig ke na _ qamagte luku _ elngaatall _ iike a _ , _ liite kanga _ t a a n a n g u t a n g a _ akuzi i aghagh u aatagh lghii _ .
qamagte luku _ t u g w a a _ .
negh luku _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mayugh luni _ tespamavek _ tawaten _ tamaa te kete luku _ nagate yagh uq _ .
naagu _ alla _ pi nghite uq _ , _ avangite te uq _ .

taawa _ alla llu _ pi nghite uq _ .
tefaay _ ! _ A l i i n g h a k u u n _ , _ amsanagh u keuute te _ !
ayungkaghagh ngllagh aqe ut _ upenghagh mi _ salin _ nuna _ anigu lgu luku _ .
meghutlugkwaagh ghhagh t _ nanigh m _ ellngaate aneng _ imigh luki _ laag utu aqe ait _ nuna kun _ anigu m _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ .
T a a m _ m e g h u t l u g w e m _ piiznga llegh an _ paye i _ uzimun _ qiigh luki _ kumagh taqagh it _ .
qiigh qiinagh aqe luki _ k u m a n g a s t a a q i i t _ kenlanga _ ellngaate t _ ilu llegh itnun _ , _ maatnegh m _ k u m a g h n e g h a k i _ .

amenam _ .
meteghllug ghllag nguq _ taana _ estaaghagh ma lghii _ .
naayghagh meng _ iggagmete lleghpigagh aneng _ anigu leg ani _ , _ suqlunqagh gneng _ a s i t u m _ estaaghagh yalghiimi _ meteghllug ghllag _ .

E l p e n e n g _ uugten _ estug lgu uten _ , _ â _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ pi a _ .

pangalwaagh uq _ .
pangalwaagh luni _ , _ pangalwaagh luni _ , _ u f s u g h q u t a q l u n i _ , _ mingwaagtuute luni _ anigu kun _ pangalwaagh luni _ , _ piniighte ngnga mi _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ ilu uq _ . _ â

nutem qun _ iqlengagh qrug lghiiten _ ! _ nagun _ , _ n a l i i g n e k u n _ s u q l u n g h e g n e k u n _ aag naqe ziin _ ? _ â

aghulaqe uute uk _ .

taagavek _ meteghllug _ naayghagh m _ talugh nga llegh akun _ qiive uq _ , _ aygugh mun _ , _ aygugh mun _ , _ aygugh mun _ amaa m _ tume kaghqagh gkenun _ .
tume kaghqagh nun _ lliigh yami _ i f k a m a l g h i i _ tungtu u luni _ tuqu nghhaghllug ghllag _ .

tungtu ghllag nguq _ legan _ t u q a a g h e s n a q _ !
â _ uuk _ , _ iyatagh ma lunga _ seghleghhalek _ , _ seghleghhalek _ nanglleg ke te yagh ghllag _ una _ . _ â
kaate luku _ , _ nullu kek _ taake uk _ sivuke lukek _ n g u u g r a g h a a k _ , _ neghe ak _ , _ t u n u g h l l a g u f t u g h n g u q _ ! _ iwerngaqun _ aqsa ni _ e s l e q a g h a g h s a q m i n i g u _ kepsugh uq _ .
â _ unaami _ alla _ teghtugh kuma _ neghe lleqe lghiinga _ . _ â
S a a g h h w a a k u n _ taaggun _ ingaghte uq _ .
amagh u ghllag _ qavagh naqe uq _ .
iiwen _ qavagh naqe aqe uq _ , _ a q s a n g a n e n g u q _ qama _ , _ â _ Q u q _ , _ q u q _ , _ q u q _ , _ q u q _ ! _ â

aawallu _ ilughagh ma _ aki aghte laatagh aanga _ ! _ â
â _ ilu uq _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ ukut _ s a k s i k i _ ? _ â

iike ma kangi _ .

iike luki _ miluute ai _ .

iike lukek _ e g l l a a t a g h a a k _ .

â _ Q u q _ , _ q u q _ , _ q u q _ , _ una _ s a k s i g u _ ? _ â

â _ temngi _ ! _ temngi _ una _ k a l n g a g a l l e g h q w a a q _ sa u a _ aqsaqugh ke zigu _ ! _ â
iike luku _ miluute a _ .
â _ Q u q _ , _ q u q _ , _ q u q _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ una _ s a k s i g u _ ? _ â

iike luku _ m i l u u s a q m i n i g u _ tuqute a _ !
tulimagh ii kete te _ taaggun _ puvughqu yalghiimi _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ m e l q u m s u w h i i g h u s i m a k a n g a _ .

K i i l u u m _ akmag a
K e s l i i m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ ategh a _ K i i l u u q _ .
elngaatall _ a g g h i y u g n e g h l l a k _ , _ aaghhe neghllug ghllag _ .
angayuqagh ni _ , _ anglegute ni llu _ p i n i g h t e s i g a l k a n g i _ , _ naqam _ panignagh ghllag _ .
tawaten _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ K i i l u u q _ aaghhneghlliqe ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ samavek _ elqwaagh yagh na luni _ .
qenwat _ naa an _ maligte ma kanga _ .
kii _ , _ qagi ghllag u uq _ .
K i i l u u q _ elqwaagh niigh gpenani _ qagi t _ nengulgha llegh itni _ naghaagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qagi t _ kasug ma kangat _ , _ ghhuughaghte ma kanga _ , _ naange a _ n a l l u t g h a a g h l l u k u _ .
iitek _ naa an _ akuqagh naqe ma yagh kanga _ siingenllu _ aga _ kaleve uq _ .
K i i l u u q _ liite yalghiimi _ s a a m _ mangteghagh ghllag m _ ilu nga ni te uq _ .
tamaa nguq _ pegnem _ piyug te aqe ut _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ taku luku _ nekeve sqe ma kanga _ .
tuune ma kanga _ kalngagagh _ uqig ghllag _ , _ a k m a g t e s i m a k a n g a _ .
meghnugh luteng _ a g h u l i i g h n a q e n g h a t a _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kagsagmig aqe kangi _ .
K i i l u u q _ meghnugh uq _ , _ qiya luni _ lliigh uq _ .
qiya magh mi _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sangan lli _ agghiyugniqe ma zinga _ , _ aaghhneghlliqe ma zinga _ !
nutaan tuq _ pinitun _ kiyaghte lghiinga _ ! _ â
pi neghllug meng _ taghnughhagh meng _ taana _ mangteghagh _ imaqe uq _ .

meghnugh luteng _ a g h u l i i g h n a q e n g h a t a _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kagsagmig aqe kangi _ .

nutaan tuq _ pinitun _ kiyaghte lghiinga _ ! _ â

akluma lleghpigagh _ quyanagh lleghpigagh _ kuusme
ayuqligh m _ ungipagh ke llegh a
kuusme m _ P i n i g h y u u g t e s t e l l g h a
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ neqamike aqe aqa _ kuusmeyaghtu nghaani _ esla _ quunpeng _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aliineghllug ghllag u aqe lghii _ naqam _ a q l a g h a k e g l l a k _ enkaam _ qakma _ kinku t _ naghughte negh meggni _ piyug llegh it _ aghqiiwtu te _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ u n a n g u p i g l l u k u _ aag negh mta _ q a l g h i g h q i t e g h l l a g e t _ tevragh naqe lghiit _ napi naqe lghiit _ qimugsigh meng _ .
A m s a n a a m _ angtale aneng _ qilug llegh it _ , _ talwa _ u g w a t a n g a g h m i i t _ qikmigh at _ , _ a l i r u g w a k e g l l a g e t _ .
piyug meng llu _ p i y a a n n e q e g s a a t a q u t _ q a a n n g w a a t e n g _ qamugh ke luki _ .
nalluniite aqe uq _ sivuqagh _ kuusmete yug nightu aqe a _ , _ kinku t _ e s g h a n e m t e k i _ quya ma ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe te ghllag t _ .
tamaani _ naagu _ kinku t _ suume qaghte gpenaki _ aqimle meng _ meghe uute lleghqagh it _ , _ aqnighte lleghqagh it _ .
Q e l a n q e n n e m t e g g u _ ataata mta _ tagi lleghqagh a
ataata ut _ qelanqe sag utagh uqagh ut _ pugughilegh meng _ tagi lleghqagh a _ qayughllak _ kuusme _ s i v u t g h u l l u k u _ qimugsigh ghhagh meng _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
ataata ma _ qamite kek _ t e g h i g l u g w e m _ inglu aneng _ usi ii ghllag lutek _ tamaaken _ uksaagh mi _ agaghtekagh meng _ k i n g h a a g a g h l u t e n g _ kumlate luteng _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
awen _ apegh aqe kangat _ apa ka _ , _ ataata ma _ awtu anga _ , _ neqe ngllaghtu ni luku _ enkaam _ nagnegh te a _ a t a a t a m a a l l u _ .
ataata ka _ n u t a a g h a m e n g _ kineghkagh meng _ iqallug meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ qamiye gni _ u s i l u k e k l u _ taawa _ ayuqe ak _ .
uksugh ghllag mi _ ilangakun _ neqangisag aqe uq llu _ .
amenqun _ laluramke t _ kuusme mi _ t a b l e - e n i _ neqenghaghqe te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ whangkuta llu _ legan _ whaa _ t a w a a t e n _ negh u lleqe ukut _ iwerngaqun _ q a y u t i g h l u t a _ nuna mi _ .
llaaghanwha _ neqe lgu aqe ukut _ i n g a v e l q i i n a q l u _ .
kiyang _ ataata ka _ kaate aqe uq _ pugughilegh meng _ siqinegh _ tevigh kestagh nghaani _ .
aanqaghte aatagh qu kut _ quya pigte luta _ .
nekefqaghte luteng _ qikmigh t _ u v e g h t a q i i n k u t _ ellngit llu _ esghagh nghmegtekut _ quya aqe ut _ .
ila i _ unglegh aqe ut _ entaqun _ m e g h n u m _ qayughllak _ taake lghii _ tume _ pugughilegh meng _ .
qikmigh a _ makughqugh aqe aput _ , _ p e t u g t e g h u m i i t a _ , _ neghqe aqe luki _ .
ila i _ naatghigh qugh te luteng _ qikmigh an _ kameg i _ ayuqe ut _ .
talwa _ qikmigh a _ kameg meng _ p r a a s e n t a a q a n k a _ .
mamleg a qaa _ , _ qama _ g a s _ l a m p - p e m _ qergese kun _ nighug kek _ nighug u te aqe uk _ salin _ sivuqagh _ k e n g h i l l u k u _ .
iwernga _ g e n e r a t o r - e s q u g h h a a k _ atugh aqe agput _ wetku _ uqug lgu negh mta _ .
ataata mta _ kameg i _ , _ allighte i _ , _ p i g i n g h i _ , _ a t k u g w i _ , _ temkagh i _ agaghte qugh aqe aput _ .
akmagtagh an llu _ imigh a _ n u s u g r a g h t e g h a q a p u t _ .
S u f l u g w i i _ qesighte neghsigh luki _ sangighqugh luki _ , _ mesiighqe aqe anka _ .
K a v i i g h s i i g h u m a q e l g h i i l l u _ .
unaami _ ughug nghata _ afta aqe aput _ , _ niightugh aqe aput _ , _ kinegh nghata _ pinighsagh aqe aput _ a v l a a w a k u n _ .
awen _ itegh qagh qu aqe ut _ ataata ma _ teghiglugtagh aneng _ a a p s a t _ .
tunqugh aqe ukut _ elngaatall _ .
ellngit a llu _ liisimake kangat _ kinegh vyiighkagh meng _ kumlatekagh meng _ teghiglug meng _ tagite aqe lghii _ .
ilangqughqu llegh ut
enankin _ aange lghii kun _ ataata mta _ qamiye akun _ naayvagh meng _ ikellegh itneng _ taghnughhagh ni _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ .
B o i l e r - e t _ , _ qalta t _ , _ salngagkwaagh t _ imightugh aqe aput _ .
naayvagh mun _ sukera aqe ukut _ atghii negh mta _ , _ nenglagh magh emta _ , _ i l a a g a a m a a m t a _ , _ uteghmun _ weni _ qule mun _ siinge lqiinagh aqe ukut _ angegh lleg kellug kek _ qamiye gput _ .
kaate negh mta _ miigh aqe ukut _ ilangqugh meng _ .
tamaani _ q e l e g h t e n g n g u u n a a m t a _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ .
aqlaghate ngugh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ kiyaghte llegh ut
mangteghagh ut _ m e k e s q u g h h a a y a g h t u q _ entaqun _ 1 0 _ feet _ b y _ 1 2 _ f e e t - n g n g u u q _ .
quunpeng _ supug ghllag _ ulima llegh a _ seghlegh _ , _ qayughllak _ ata mta _ naken _ s a g h n a a g h a n e n g _ ulima uq _ .
U n u g m i _ q a a m n g a a m t a _ qavagh aqe lghiikut _ .
aghneghmi _ k e r o s e n e _ h e a t e r - m e n g _ itagsi pigte luta _ atuqe aqe ukut _ .
sakighte uute luta _ nuna mi _ qavagh aqe ukut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ , _ sakighte uute negh mta _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ r o o m - e n g i i g h h a q _ e s l e q a q a g h p u t _ .
A r m y - t _ qavaghvig ita _ m a t t r e s s - n g a n e n g _ egte llegh neng _ s a g h n a a g h m e n g _ a l l i i g h i g h a q u k u t _ .
Y o - y o - n g l l a n e m t a _ aangqagh ngllagh u negh mta _ aki kaghqagh meng _ t a m a a t u m _ m a t t r e s s - e m _ imaa neng _ kevigh aqe aput _ enkaam _ allighagh mta _ nalighnegh i _ i m i g h u t a a q u t _ .
iwernga _ aatkagh meng _ imigh u llegh i _ tamaakut _ k a n a g h f i k u g h a q a p u t _ .
repall _ qivghuke kaqe anka _ amigh meng _ allighagh igh te lghiikut _ , _ itupill _ maqagh aqe yagh lghiit _ .
uglaghi yalghiikut _ alngunak _ sa meng llu _ ulig meng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ alla ii aghagh kau qu kut _ .
kiyang _ atkug mnneng _ i i m w a a g h l u k i _ akite kaqe ukut _ puvite i _ q a m a n l l u k i _ i g h t u g h q e n n a y u k a a t a _ .
kuusmeyaghtugh kanga _ sighima kestagh aqe ukut _ yughaghvig m _ mission _ b o x - n g a n _ maqagh lghii meng _ ulig meng _ .
itegagh lghute put _ naa mta _ itegagh anun _ qerngughte te aqe aput _ qayughllak _ itegagh i _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
U n a n g u l u k u _ teghtugh kete te negh mta _ naasqugh put _ n u u g t e s n e m t e k i _ aneghnegh nge luta _ , _ q a a m n g a a m t a _ qavagh aqe lghiikut _ .
naave ut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh nghmini _ kenegh lghutagh k _ k u m a g h h n e g h m i n i k e k _ p u q l a g h t a q i i n k u t _ .
mat- ke qu tete negh mta _ qaprag te negh mta _ wata _ sukate luni _ p u q l a g h t a q i i n k u t _ .
Y u g m e k a g h t a t _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe ta i
ata mta _ naken _ imani _ lipeghsagh ma aki _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ .
K e t f a g h y a q m i n i k i _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ .
wallu _ nutaan _ repall _ tamaaken _ p i k e n g y a l g h i i k u t _ n u t e m k a g h t a m e n g _ w h a n g k u n n i _ quyanagh ghllag t _ .
taawa _ q u g w i n t a p a y u g w e k _ s n o w m a n - a l l u _ , _ sa n ta _ C l a u s - a l l u _ , _ c a n d l e - e k _ .
K u m a g h s u g l l a g n g a a m t e k i _ itake aput _ alla _ ayumiqun _ ketfagh yaghqaa luki _ nalighmeng _ quunpeng _ a f l e n g a k u r a a q s a g h q a a l u k i _ .
uqfig squghhagh ut
awatkaghtagh _ q e m t a m e s a l g h i i _ uqfig _ naken _ ata mta _ s a g h n a a g h a _ , _ N a t i o n a l _ G u a r d - e t _ tagi tke aat _ , _ a t e g h s a q m i n i g u _ p i n e _ needle-ngi _ ifkagh te uute ma lghiit _ .
naken _ , _ wallu _ igaghvig meng _ n a l i g k e n k a _ angayuqagh mta _ sungaghyug kegtagh meng _ c r e p e _ paper- meng _ p i k e n g l u t e n g _ tamaakut _ avayagh i _ i i m g u t f i i k u g h y a q m e g t e g n e g u _ legan _ w h a n g k u n n i _ u q f i g l l u w h a q _ .
kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ t a w a a v e k _ uqfig mun _ l l i l a g h t u g h a a p u t _ .
leganqun _ whanga mni _ laluramke t _ m a n g t e g h i i t n i l n g u u t _ , _ c a t a l o g - e n i _ esghagh aqe ke put _ t a w a a t e l n g u q _ kuusme m _ uqfig ut _ .
A l l a a g h l l u w h a a t _ k e n g h e t _ uqfig kun _ i i m g u t k a y u g w e t _ kumagh u negh meggni _ qallaqugh aqe ut _ , _ o r n a m e n t - e t _ , _ whangkuta llu _ igaghvig mi _ ulima aput _ uqfig kun
agaghte uute ghllag luki _ , _ uqfig squghhagh _ esghaqaaluni _ u g h l e g h i i g h t e g h l l a g l u n i _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanglleg nagh igh te a _ u q f i i l l e g a a g h h a q _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ c e i l i n g - e f u t _ a g h q e s q u g h h a q _ qughaseketiigh ghllag luni _ iyaghvig mi _ ulimaagh mnneng _ , _ alla _ tamaa na _ aatkagh lghute _ agaghnga lghii _ .
iwernga _ n a l i i g h h i i n a g h p u t _ q i k e g h q u n g i g a l n g u q _ amig igh te ghllag ghngaita _ .
kuusme m _ Cards-ngi
yughaghvig ut _ naken _ akmaken _ awtuqagh meng _ c a r d s - e n g a q e l g h i i _ ayumigh ke te nghaani _ ategh it _ negig luteng _ iikekagh t _ .
nagaqugh aqe ukut _ pika _ tugulagh te ni luki _ .
Y i m i y u m t e g g u n _ taglagh aghte aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ u g l a g h l l a g w a a q e l g h i i _ tugulagh te yagh uq _ .
A k u l a n g i t g u n _ iwernga _ tugutagh ke ukut _ .
quyake pigte luki _ atghagh te luki _ yuvghiigh aqe aput _ , _ ila i _ mingle kun _ neve ste qugh aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ p r a a s e n t a s i m u n _ ateligh sigh ke aqe aput _ , _ iyagh ngllagh aqe ukut llu _ ila i _ aflenga kaqe aput _ .
piniqumtaagh nka _ t a m a a k u n g u u t _ akmani _ nani _ s k a t e - t i i n g e l g h i i t _ naayvaghaghni _ .
aghni ut _ akughtuqagh meng _ qaasligh igh luteng _ .
qaasligh at _ n a s a p e r a a g h i t l u _ sa meng _ melqugh meng _ e s n e l a a g h u s i g h l u t e n g _ .
I i g g a g h l u t e n g _ m u f f - e m e n g _ .
anglikagh t _ taslugh kete te luteng _ s k a t e - t e l g h i i t _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ qiighnite aghagh magh meng _ .
mangteghagh at _ qama _ puqlate sug nigh ghllag t _ nighug ghllag t _ .
W h a n i k u n g h a a n i _ entaqun _ s k a t e - t e t a q u t _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh lgu aqe ut _ .
tamaakut _ s k a t e - t i i n g e l l g h i i t _ q u y a m s u g n i g h l l a g e t _ .
pinighnagh ghllag k _ qergese gput
qergese gput _ e s t a a m a n e n g _ qergese ke lghiik _ q a s p i q u n n e g h i l n g u u t _ enkaam _ uksugh mi _ kanegh meng _ umeg igh qite ghllag aqe uk _ .
K a a n g h i _ iwernga _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ .
U m y u g w a m k u n _ elngaatall _ navek _ t a m a a t u m _ uqfig m _ a k u l a n g a n i _ piyaa aatagh aqe unga _ .
tamaa _ legan llu _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ aliite aqe ut _ kanegh mi _ .
S i g i i q e l l g h e m _ e s n e g h r u g w i _ kumlate igate ngugh t _ kiig u ste aqe anka _ .
kumlu mnneng _ ighneghwaagh mnneng _ aneghnegh mnneng llu _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ q a g a a v e k _ esghapag na luta _ .
ilangakun _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g u l l u k u _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ umu ghllaget _ .
naqamllu _ esghaatepag igate ngugh u kut _ alungutellegh _ qakma _ .
repall _ whanga mni _ qergese k _ taake uk _ esghagh uqagh u lutek _ kuusmete yug nighllug tek _ ayuqe uk _ .
qantaghtugh i _ P r a a s e n t a s i m e n g
ata ut _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ piraamsi negh ghllag _ .
talwa _ qantaghtu llegh i _ a y u g w i n n a q e p i g l l u k i _ ila i _ t a p g h a g h p a w a a g h m e n g _ .
ila i _ sa u aat _ atugh qagh ghhaat _ n a g h a g h u t e t _ aatkagh t _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luteng _ qantagh aqe ai _ .
taakut _ qantagh llegh i llu _ leganqun _ p r a a s e n t a a s i w a q u t _ .
neqamike aqa llu _ tamaani _ quunpeng _ ilughagh niigh te neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ .
ata ma _ ilughagh ni _ p r a a s e n t a a _ qiipaghagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ iiggagh t _ , _ laluramke t _ iigge ait _ .
inglu inagh a _ mekestaaghhagh kun _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luku _ qantagh luku _ , _ inglu a _ aangeghllag kun _ sa kun _ pikraghniite luku _ qantagh luku _ .
naa mta _ ungipaghagh te aqe ainkut _ ingaghte uute negh mta _ q a v a r a g k i i g h e s q e l l u t a _ qantaghtugh na luteng _ .
qenwat _ naave ut _ tulughagh aqe uq _ whangkuta _ K u u s m e n a q e m _ t e n g g h u n i q e m _ p r a a s e n t a s i g h q i i t n e n g _ l e g r e y u g w e m _ qavagh lghaghtugh gpenaamta _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ P r a a s e n t a s i t
whanga mni _ tegh igh na ghllag _ nengyugh ut _ i i m g u t a n g l l a a n n e m t e g g u _ .
elngaatall _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ u l i m a a q a g h p u t _ .
Q i i p a g h a m e n g _ , _ u y g i i n a g h m e n g _ , _ m e l q i g h a g h m e n g _ k a k i p i g g a g h m e n g _ u l i m a l a g h t e g h a q a p u t _ .
ila i _ qafsina neng _ esteg lgu aqe luteng _ , _ z i p p e r - e l w a a q l u t e n g _ , _ nagtuqagh lgu aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ t u u g t e k a y u g w e t _ .
I l a a k w a a p u t _ ayapghaatagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ , _ allighte meng _ u l i i m a a m n n e n g _ p r a a s e n t a l a g h a a q a p u t _ .
ila i llu _ legan _ q i i p a p i g g a g h m e n g _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ ulima tete luki _ kaki iqe aput _ .
I v a g h i l e g h t a a g a q u k u t _ anglegute ke te lghii ni _ qantagh yaghqagh meng _ kinku nun _ .
sa tke igate ke put _ s e g h l e q e s i s i g a l k e p u t _ atuqe aat _ sa u aat _ p r a a s e n t a s i q n e g h m e n g _ liisimake luku _ t a w a a t e t e g h n g i i t a _ quyake lleqe kangit _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ t a m a a n l e n g u g h m e n g _ esghaqu sigh ghllag mnneng _ p r a a s e n t a t a q u k u t _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ .
N a a t n g w a a g h l u t a l l u _ qantaghkagh meng _ uyghagsugnite ngugh meng _ c a n d y - m e n g _ sa n ta _ C l a u s - e m _ iiyagh mteggun _ kanaghte vike ma kanginkut _ .
taana _ q a a m g g u n g i n a q _ a y g u g h i k a a q a _ .
yughaghvig mi llu _ igaghvig mi llu _ p r a s e n t a a s i t _ tunqugh aqe ait _ p r o g r a m - e n e g h m e n g _ t a a q e n g h a a t a _ .
aange lghiit _ qiipaghagh t _ nasagh i llu _ aligh a llu _ qepe luki _ p r a a s e n t a a s i p u t _ aglagh te aqe ait _ .
ata mta _ quunpeng _ sa u aat _ igaqugh aqe kangi _ , _ talwa _ p r a a s e n t a s i p u t _ naken _ pi u ta i _ igaqugh aqe ai _ akite yaghqagh t _ .
Q e l a a n e g h n a g h l l a k _ , _ iwernga _ t u r n - k a g h t a a m t a _ i y a q u g h a a q i i _ .
R e d _ C r o s s - e m _ S a l n g a a w r i i
iyaghvig mi _ tunqugh aqe ainkut _ R e d _ C r o s s - e t _ tunusagh itneng _ .
S a l n g a a w a a s q u g h h a a t _ naqam _ imagh ghllag t _ .
imigh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u aqe ut _ , _ igaasigh t _ , _ r u l e r - e t _ , _ igaasigh mun _ ipegsagh sigh t _ , _ h a n d k e r c h i e f - e t _ , _ igaghyaghqagh ngestagh t _ , _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ iye it _ u u m k a y u g w e t
n e v e g h l l e g h h i i n i _ , _ c o l o r - e t _ , _ taqughutagh t _ , _ m e s u n a t _ , _ j a c k s - e t l u _ , _ c o m p a s s - e s q u g h h a a k l u _ taawa _ .
ata mnun _ tuune agka _ a q u p i l e g h s a g h a a t k e g k e k _ ulimaagh minun _ atuqe na lukek _ , _ u s p u t a a s i q u m a a g k e n k a _ i y a q r a a s i q u m a a g k e n k a _ .
mekelghiigh nun _ aghnaghagh nun llu _ R e d _ C r o s s - e t _ qantaghtuqagh u ut _ tamaakut _ .
M i s s i o n - e m _ salngag i
E n k a a n g a m _ yughaghvig meng _ seal- nga u uute aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ sivuqagh m _ family- nga _ .
mangteghagh m _ imigh a _ qamagte luteng _ aatkagh nge te aqe ut _ , _ sakenge uute aqe ut _ .
aatkagh it _ , _ j e a n s - e n g i t _ n u t a g h a g h l l u g w a a q u t _ .
ila it _ s u i t - e m _ qaasligh a _ a a n g e g h n g a a t a _ a a t a q a a p u t _ .
ulig t llu _ quyanagh ghllag t _ q u i l t - e t _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
aklungi igh i ste aqe ainkut _ y u g h a g h v i m t a a l l u _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh sighqagh t
naa mta _ a t k u y a a n g l l a g h t e g h a q i i n k u t _ qiipaghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ i g a g h r a k e g t e l l g h a n _ a v l a a w a a t a m _ qantagh aneng _ .
pinigh ghllagu aqe ut _ atkuyaag put _ .
enkaam _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ g g a a t m e n g l l u _ q u l l i i r a a g h m e n g l l u _ .
naave ut _ angatughqe i aqe uk _ ilangakun _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kakisigh aqe uq _ a a t k a g h r a a g h i i s q e l l u t a _ .
alla _ naa mta _ nuyagh lghute put _ q i p e l l e g a g h t e g h a q i i _ qupughhughkagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng llu _ c o f f e e _ c a n - e m _ qelpeghte llegh an _ savikenghaagh i _ igaghqwaagh meng
qantagh luki _ .
igamsiqa yug llegh ka
sa u a _ K u u s m e y a q _ , _ p r a a s e n t a a s i q _ , _ laalighqwaagh te _ apeghiigh nghaani _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe te ni _ taawa _ k a g p a g t u g h a q a g h p u t _ .
kuusmeyaghkagh _ ataata ut llu _ pugughilegh mun _ a g l a n q i g t u t u q _ .
taawa _ mangteghagh squghhagh ut _ n u n a a t u g h q w a a g a a _ iwernga _ elngaatall _ pinighyug te ukut _ quya te ukut _ .
uteghmun _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ K u u s m e l l e g h p u t _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ q e r n g a a g h h a a m t a _ , _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ kayute ke teqaghte luta _ .
akluma lleg mnnun _ iilqe ste gpenaamta _ angayuqagh mta _ apeghtugh ma aqe ainkut _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ pivake luki _ a f l e n g a k n g w a a g h l u k i _ .
kina _ alngunak _ kayusiite luku _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ K u u s m e l l e g h p u t _ neqamike aqa _ pinigh ghllag _ .
pupig allugh _ mekelghiigh _ nulightugh lghii
ungipaghagh ta a _ T u l i i m
eltughagh ghhagh a _ taana _ pupig ghllag _ quunpeng _ kumeg aqe lghii _ , _ â _ g - g - g _ , _ g - g - g _ . _ â
T a a g k e n n g u q _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ keveg aqe ma kanga _ a g h n a n g l l a a t e s q e l l u n i _ .
nenglutuqagh _ .
pi ma kanga _ eltughagh n _ , _ â _ aghnangllagh yagh uute nga _ . _ â
I q u k l i g h p i g a g h n u n _ aghnangllagh yagh ma lghii _ nengyugh a _ .
taagken _ kaate ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q a m a a y _ !
eltughagh ghhagh ma nguq _ panig n _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu nakanga _ . _ â
â _ N a k a a n n g u q _ .
S a k e s q e l l u n i n g u q _ pi a _ .
aagra ligh u aghte ngugh lug ni _ ?
aante i ste u luni _ ? _ â _ akite ma kangat _ .
taagken _ sivugte ma lghii _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ eltughagh ni _ , _ â _ S a k e s q e l l u t e n n g u q _ pi ziin _ ?
aagra ligh u aghte u luten _ ?
aante i ste u luten _ ? _ â
eltughagh ghhagh n _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ ila itnun llu _ piigh ten _ aatak _ . _ â
ila itnun llu _ taglagh laatagh ma lghii _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
taagken _ sivuligh t _ saaqwligh ghhagh itnun _ .
kaate luni _ qineghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
pi laatagh ma kangi _ , _ â _ eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ , _ panig gpek nguq _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ â
pi laatagh ma kangat _ , _ â _ S a k e s q e l l u n i _ pi a _ ? _ â
T a w a t e n g w a a g h w a a q _ sivuligh ghhagh m _ akuzillegh atun _ akite laatagh aat _ .
taagken _ sivugte laatagh uq _ .
atghagh laatagh uq _ .
kaate yan _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ ? _ â
nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ imatuq _ aghni lleqe aten _ .
qenwat _ a n a g u l e g h t e s l e q a g h p e n g a _ . _ â
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ , _ â _ whanga llu _ a n a g u l e g h l l e q a m k e n _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ qamagte ma kanga _ nenglu _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh t _ nenglu t _ taku ma kangi _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ qineghte uq _ , _ yug nguq _ esghagh u aghagh a _ .
Y u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ seal- gnun _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
nulighh a _ nuughqaghte ma lghii _ .
nuughqaghte luni _ pi ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ , _ â _ neqe leg nun _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nakaan _ , _ neqe leg nun _ pi nghite unga _ .
eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ .
P a n i g e n n g u q _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tugu naqe a _ .
atghagh lleqe uq _ , _ maligte lleqe aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ u g w i i n e g h m e n g _ ighsa luni _ .
naa an _ angegh te yu nghite kanga _ tawavek _ yaywaali mun _ , _ qayughllak _ pupig ghllag u lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
taagken _ itegh luni _ aghnagh aq _ aagra nun _ ayapegh ma yagh lghii _ .
vuvegh k _ aghipa ghllag u uk _ .
kangighagh ghhagh kun _ peghleghte ma lghii _ , _ ighu gni _ qantagh lukek _ atkug mineng _ .
qiya ma lghii _ , _ u g w i k a g h q a n i _ n a g a s a q m i n i g u _ , _ kumeg yalghiimi _ , _ â _ g - g - g _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ , _ eltughagh ghhagh ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ ghhute gnun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
kelig ma kanga _ pupig a _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ p i n i i g h q w a a m a k a n g a _ .
esghaqaaluni _ nukalpigagh _ , _ pinighhalek _ !
taagken _ nenglu mi _ nategh a _ tanughqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nenglu ni _ tukegh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nanigh t _ kumagh qugh ma kangi _ .
nenglu _ n i g h u w h a l e k _ .
nunivag m _ t u n g a n g a n i _ nenglu mi _ m i i n g l u t a n g a _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ , _ awergha _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ atg- ke uk _ , _ i l e p g h a a q _ , _ qallevag _ , _ k a p e s e g a q _ , _ agaghte uute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ aywaa n _ t u n g a n g a _ , _ megh m _ t u n g a n g a n _ m i i n g l u t a n g a _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ .
tanemlleqa _ aklungi _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
eltughagh ni _ taagken _ pilugug ma kanga _ ukileghyag meng _ .
quyngigh liigh ghllag ma lghii _ .
sagnegh ghllag t _ malghugnegh t _ pugnegh meng _ imigh ma kangi _ .
alegh kek _ mekestaaghhagh k _ qaye gkenkun _ tawaqapig t _ lli ma kangi _ .
aghnagh aq _ teghsagh ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ , _ angayuqagh ten _ neqe meng _ taglaate ki _ . _ â
taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ u g w i k a g h q a m i n u n _ , _ e s g h a g h y a q m i n i g u _ nukalpigagh _ pinighhalek _ !
aghnagh aq _ nenglagh kau ma lghii _ , _ â _ T e h e m _ , _ t e h e m _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sukate luten _ aqume i _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aqume luni _ aatkagh ni _ mataghte qugh ma kangi _ .
alla neng _ aatkagh neng _ tuune ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ .
qalleg vag ma lghii _ naayghagh _ ughug kestagh lghii stun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ , _ ukileghyag m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ .
taagken _ k a p e s e g a a m a l g h i i _ qaye akun _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghiik _ u g w i k u l l g h i i k _ .
S a g n e g h p a g e t _ tugu luki _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
kaate lutek _ mangteghagh mun _ , _ aghnagh aq _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q a m a a y _ ! _ kenegh meng _ nuug te ngnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh t _ anighqute _ kumaghllug qu _ nuug te ma kangat _ .
E s g h a g h y a q m e g t e k e k _ ne k _ pinighhalek _ ! _ qimag ma lghiit _ .
itegh qaghtagh te ma lghiit _ , _ kenegh eng _ unite luku _ .
ungipaate ma kegket _ a n g a y u q a g t e n g _ , _ â _ ne k _ sama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi laatagh ai _ , _ â _ sukate lusi _ , _ kenegh meng _ tuune tengnga _ . _ â
kenegh meng _ aatghute ma lghiit _ .
itegh ma lghiik _ u g w i k u l l g h i i k _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh m _ saki ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nunalgute ten _ kelgugh ki _ .
T a g i l a g h a l l i n n g u q _ . _ â
tagi laghate ma lghiit _ .
I t e g h a a s a t a _ ungipamsug te ma kangi _ pupig mineng _ q a l m a m i n e n g _ .
taagken _ s a g n e g h p a g e m _ angenegh kek _ tawavek _ ellngit nun _ n e g h e s i m a k e k _ .
taagken _ qiliigh nagh meng _ tawaqapig meng _ q a n e g h m i q u u m a k a n g i _ .
taake uk _ ila kek _ sagnegh m _ saki minun _ tuune ma kek _ .
taagken _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
aghnaghagh t _ maligte ma kegket _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnaghagh t _ ayapegh lghiit _ amiwaagh kun _ repa ma aqe kangi _ , _ qayughllak _ angayuqagh ita _ ighleke kaqe kangit _ .
taawa _ nulightugh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
tefaay _ !
I i s t u m i i m _ tugukagh i _ afsengagh m _ negh kangi _ qamagte luki _ , _ siipte te aghte gpenaan _ uksuqun _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
seghleghyugkagh _ elngaatall _ .
iwernga _ nanevgagh _ afsengagh _ pi ke aq _ , _ â _ itagnagh uq _ ellnga llu _ kitum _ panike a _ . _ â
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ segheve tke a _ , _ neqamike yaghqaaghtekagh a _ allameng _ afsengagh t _ neqe meng _ naange te fqiita _ pi yaghqaaghtekagh _ .
U g w i n g a n _ p i n i q s a l i i t a g h a q a a _ qayughllak _ ila ni _ sumegh ke sag u te kangi _ , _ nangllegtaghtekanga _ .
I i s t u m i i _ megnu nagh lghii meng _ liite lghii
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ t a a k u n n g u q _ aghnaghagh t _ tallimat _ .
aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ , _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ t a a g a v e q a a g h a q _ kaate luteng _ iigge llegh ghllag _ kaate ma kangat _ aange pigte lghii _ .
ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ kanagh ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ q e l p e g h s a q m i n i g u _ peknegh meng _ imigh ghllag luni _ .
tagsigh ai _ ila ni _ , _ â _ tagi tek _ , _ whaa _ naalkute unga _ . _ â
taakut _ aghnaghagh t _ tagi ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ I i s t u m i i _ , _ ila a _ ketngigtu ma ai _ , _ ataasigh _ Q u g t u q a g h t u u r u g h m i i _ , _ enkaam _ A g h v e g h t u g h m i i _ , _ t a l l i m a a t _ U l l u n g a g t u u r u _ .
taagken _ elngaatall _ nengighqe ait _ aghnaghagh t _ taakut _ kenigh megteggun _ t a w a n l l u k i _ , _ s i q l u g w a q _ a v a n g i i t n g w a a g h l u k u _ .
tawaten _ peghu vyiigh luku _ unite ma kangat _ .
elngaatall _ quya pigte luteng _ aglagh ut _ aghnaghagh t _ .
aglagh luteng _ ne meggnun _ , _ u g w i n g a _ I i s t u m i i m _ naken _ pi a _ , _ entaqun _ ama _ peknegh yaghkagh _ .
itegh luni nguq _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ elngaatall _ sumeghtaghagh ghllag _ .
U g w i n g a n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iyatagh unga _ , _ s i q l u g w a g h q u _ . _ â
taawa _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
â _ enta _ sukate luten _ iyatagh unga _ s i q l u g w a g h q u _ , _ â _ pi laatagh aa _ u g w i n g a n _ .
alingughyug te inagh mineng _ aane luni _ s i q l u g w a n i _ legan _ esghapagtu qiinagh luku _ unite ma kanga _ .
unite luku _ , _ u g w i n i _ pi ma kanga _ :
â _ A a y _ , _ u q e s q a g h h a g h m a _ sa ite u unga _ !
I i s t u m i i n k u t _ , _ ketngigtu ma ainkut _ ,
A g h v e g h t u g h m i i n k u t _ , _ U l l u n g a g t u u r u n k u t _ ,
qugtuqagh mii nkut _ n a a n g s i m i i t _ ! _ â
legan _ u g w i n g a n _ tawavek _ , _ qezigh ni _ amqeghte aghte luku _ , _ s i i n g y a q m i n i g u _ legan _ aga _ n e v a g h m i _ ullegh uq _ , _ q e t e g h a g h t u q _ .
imani nguq _ pi a _ qiya magh mi _ :
â _ M a k e t e n g n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ !
M a k e t e n g n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ ! _ â
T a a w a n l e n g u g h n g u q _ u g w a t a n g a n i _ nanevgagh ghllag _ , _ afsengagh _ .
T a a m _ pi ma kanga _ :
â _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ ,
Q u g h r u g h a a m _ avaqutagh a _ ,
K u y a p e g r u g a a g h e m _ eltugh aa _ ! _ â
makete ma kanga _ .
tawaten _ e s g h a p a g h n g a a g h m i g u _ legan _ siinge laatagh aa _ !
legan _ qiyaaqe lghii _ aghnagh _ :
â _ M a k e t e n g n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ !
M a k e t e n g n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ , _ n g a a y _ ! _ â
T a a g u m _ pi laatagh aa _ :
â _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ !
Q u g h r u g h a a m _ avaqutagh a _ ,
K u y a p e g r u g a a g h e m _ eltugh aa _ ! _ â
makete ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ a q u m e s i m a k a n g a _ .
taawa _ pinigh kau aghte a _ , _ aghyuugh kanga _ t a a m _ nanevgagh m _ .
taawa _ pinitun _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
tefaay _ , _ a l i i n g h a k u n _ , _ amsanagh akun _ !
aa _ ggute ke a _ !
iyaa-kagh m _ ungipagh aa
qaa ii te aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ gguusiqe ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ , _ W i l l u _ , _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ ggute ka _ aqnigh ghllagu uq _ . _ â
W i l l u m _ u g w i n i _ seat- a _ itegh yan _ pi a _ , _ â _ qaa ii te aq _ gguusiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ , _ G g u t l u m u n _ esghaghtesaghtugh ltegnegu _ , _ â _ sa ta m _ qaa ii te aq _ pi ma kanga _ .
aagra neng _ nategh mun _ ategh lutek _ sa ta m _ atkug ni _ aate a _ .
Y u g w e t _ atkug teng _ nategh kun _ agaghtekayugu kangit _ .
qamaken _ s u u g w e r n g e n e n g _ Q i i t a a m _ naange a _ nuug luni _ Q i i t a a m _ nasaperagh a _ tuune a _ .
Q i i t a a m _ nasaperagh ni _ aate luku _ , _ ata ke te lghiik _ aglagh uk _ G g u t l u n k u n u n _ .
guygu u uq _ G g u t l u n k u t _ mangteghagh at _ .
kaate yaghtugh yalghiimek _ tepe a _ neqnigh ghllag _ naagh aa _ Q i i t a a m _ , _ o v e n - k u n _ neqekrangllaghpag ni _ .
Q i i t a a n k u t _ ellngit _ egllu ite ngugh t _ .
nanigh meng _ gaaghusigh ke lghiit _ .
O v e n - k u n _ gaaqagh m _ tepe anga _ n a l l u n i i t n g w a a l g h i i _ n a a g h y a q m i n i g u _ neqnigh ghllag _ .
E s l a k l i q _ amigh k _ qelpate uq _ .
Q i i t a a n k u k _ ata ke te lghiik _ saayguraagh mun _ itegh yalghiimek _ nategh meggneng _ alla u uq _ imani _ , _ s u u g w e r n g e n g i t e f t u q _ .
ilukligh _ amigh k _ q e l p e g h s a q m e g t e g g u _ aagra stun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ .
nengigh ita _ q a a m n a n g a t _ i g a g h t e s t u n _ , _ yughaghte stun _ ayuqe uq _ .
taawa _ egllu k _ o v e n - e l g e k _ , _ maalghug _ qayungllaasigh k _ qaye ani _ .
egllu m _ qula ani _ llivelghagh mi _ taawa _ c o f f e e - n g l l a a s i q l u _ qayugh ligh sigh llu _ .
llivelghagh lgu uq _ mingle mi _ inglugtun _ .
T a b l e - e k _ qergese m _ manu ani _ .
kangighagh mi _ taawa _ sa u ak _ llivelghagh k _ , _ qaye gkeni _ ukitu tete lutek _ angighhe te leg k _ aghmigusigh k _ .
G g u t l u m _ upugha te ai _ .
â _ uteghvagh lusi _ .
aqume i _ taaggun _ , _ â _ k e n i i m a a g k e n k a _ aqumutagh k _ .
sa ta m _ pi a _ , _ â _ gguusiqe lghii _ taana _ esghaqigh sqellug qu _ tagi aqe ukung _ . _ â
â _ aa-a _ , _ taaggun _ aqume i _ , _ â _ aghmigusigh leg m _ llivelghagh m _ saaghw akun _ aqume sqe a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ G g u t l u m _ .
â _ whaa _ legan _ esghagh naqe aqa _ .
qayugh a _ utaqa i te kete luku _ , _ â _ G g u t l u m _ pi a
seat- a _ .
aghnagh m _ seat- a _ qayugh ste a _ , _ neqekrangllagh meng _ tuune a llu _ .
G g u t l u m _ taku luku _ qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ â _ agitaghten _ . _ â
qaa ii te aq _ agitaghte yan _ G g u t l u m _ yuvghiigh ai _ g g u t a n g i _ .
â _ N a t u n g w a a _ aqnigh lghii _ , _ â _ aapte a _ .
qaa ii ta m _ kelgute a _ .
â _ kii _ , _ suflu u ma lghii _ , _ pinighsagh naqe aqa _ , _ â _ G g u t l u m _ pi a _ .
â _ S i i m i i y a q _ !
kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ , _ â _ G g u t l u m _ tuqlugh aa _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ qemtagh meng _ ukig uq _ .
â _ taana _ kayute ke aqa _ , _ â _ G g u t l u m _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ .
G g u t l u m _ g g u u t n i i g h u s i n i _ piite te kete luki _ , _ S i i m i i y a q _ pi a _ , _ â _ T a z i n g k u k _ igarutaagh k _ tagite kek _ . _ â
I g a r u t a a g h s u g n i n g i i g h h i i l n g u u k _ tagite ak _ .
itegagh mineng _ S i i m i i y a a m _ sa u ak _ t u k e g h r a g h a a k _ .
G g u t l u m _ tugumiigh aneng _ Q i i t a a m _ nagate a _ , _ â _ t z z z z _ , _ t z z z z _ , _ t z z z z _ â _ .
G g u t l u m _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ â _ iflasagh luku _ whaken _ kaape sigh meng _ , _ igarutaagh luku _ ilaagh naqe aqa _ .
piniighte lleqe a _ aqnigh nanigh lleqe uq _ .
S i i m i i y a a m _ kayusigh naqe aanga _ . _ â
â _ agitaghten _ , _ â _ G g u t l u m _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ .
agitaghte uq _ qaa ii te aq _ .
pi laatagh aa _ G g u t l u m _ , _ â _ Q a a n g h e n _ kagpestaagh pigu uq _ agitaghte ghllag i _ . _ â
qaa ii te aq _ q u n e g h q u m a g h m i _ agitaghte ghllag yan _ ifla uute yagh aa _ .
M a a t e q w a q u n _ nagate a _ temngi _ , _ â _ t z z z z _ â _ aqnighte nghite te a _ .
G g u t l u m _ , _ Q i i t a a m _ g g u t a n g a _ qepghagh luku _ taaqe yamigu _ pi a _ , _ â _ taawa _ taaqe amken _ alla _ aqnigh naanghite uq _ . _ â
taaqe yan _ qaa ii te aq _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ neqekrangllagh ta ii sqesugh ghngaamken _ q a a n g h e n _ u m u g h q w a a n g a l g h i i _ .
ang _ , _ aglagh kuvek _ q a a n g h e n _ piniightekan _ negh naketen _ . _ â
paper _ s a c k - a _ tuune a _ , _ imani _ tepe kegte uq _ .
Q i i t a a n k u k _ sa ta nkuk _ aane aqngamek _ sa ta m _ igamsiqa yug vike ai _ G g u t l u n k u t _ .
Q i i t a a m _ aglagh te kete luku _ naagh aqe a nguq _ tugumiigh ni _ , _ o v e n - k u n _ gaaqagh t _ neqekrangllagh t _ .
kaspig m _ paqnamiqe llegh a
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ tengutkaleg nkuk _ ungipagh aat
kaspig _ itegh yaghagh ma lghii _ , _ qayugh ghllag nge uq _ anuqe ghllag _ aqlagha ghllag _ , _ uksugh u lghii _ .
wata _ anuqligh kanga _ umegnegh ughte magh mi _ t e g h i g n i i g h u s k a n g a _ esla mi _ n a g h a a q _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ p i n i g h y u u g t u q _ nighugh lghii llu _ p u q l a l n g u q _ nenge aat _ .
suupe liighpag ni _ naagh ma kanga _ .
naange a _ quyngigh meng _ suupe liigh aqe uq _ neqekrangllagh magh mi _ suupeliightugh sighqagh meng _ .
â _ kameg gken _ ufsug yaghtugh kek _ !
itegh kuvek _ agaghte nakegken _ , _ â _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ .
kaspig _ ategh luni _ saayguraagh mun _ ufsug luni _ , _ itegh luni _ kameg gni _ agaghte ma kek _ .
taagken _ taku ma kek _ anengagh ni llu _ n a y a g g a n i l l u _ .
anengagh a _ atightugh aqe uq _ igagh neng _ l i b r a r y - m e n g _ navghaghkagh mineng _ .
N a y a a g g a a _ negikragh aqe uq _ t a g h n u g h h a g h w a g h m e n g _ m a g a z i n e - m e l n g u g h m e n g _ .
apa _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ t a b l e - l e g n i _ .
kaspig m _ taku luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A p a a y _ ungipaghagh te nakefkut _ ! _ â
taghnughhagh t _ n a g a s u g w a q e g k a n g a t _ apa eng _ ungipaghagh nghaani _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi _ taghnughhagh u luni _ naghaagh llegh meggneng _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi llu _ ayvegh niigh llegh meggneng _ , _ nanugh niigh llegh mineng _ .
piniqe lleghpigagh ke aqe kangit _ ungipagh ai _ mayeraaghpag t llu _ teghig ke sagh t llu _ a k u z i k a y u g w e t _ .
â _ ungipaghagh u lleqe amsi _ ighivgaqun _ mayeraaghpag meng _ u n Ê¼ g a n l e n g u g h m e n g _ kellii ni _ , _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .
kaspig _ suupe liigh uute kete luku _ s u m e g h t a g h a m a l g h i i _ q e l a n g h u m a g h m i _ apa ita _ ungipaghagh u lleghqagh aneng _ , _ sa naqe lleqe a tuq _ mayeraaghpag _ !
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ egllu m _ saaghw ani _ aqume te ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ apa eng _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ungipagh aa _ . _ â
legan _ iiwen _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g i n a g h n g a a g h m i g u _ apa mi _ ungipaghagh qugh a _ , _ iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ .
apa at _ piinligh ma lghii _ , _ â _ apegh vagilgamkun _ kellii n _ mayeraaghpag a _ apegh naqe aqa _ naayvagh m _ yug nge sta _ .
ilangani _ nalluniite aqe uq _ qayughllak _ megh _ q a p r a g t a q e g k a n g a _ .
uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ siku yuwhaagh nghaani _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ siku igate ngughk _ .
ila a _ naten _ siku llghite kayug _ .
tamaakut _ siku llghite ngugh t _ ategh i _ negagh yu llegh ke aat _ .
Y u s e n g e t a g h h a a m _ megh _ q a p r a g t a q e g k a n g a _ kumlate snanigh aqe kanga _ qayughllak _ naayvagh _ iingunagh mi _ siku nghaani _ naayvagh m _ ilu a _ m a m l e g h q w a a g a q e g k a n g a _ qule mun _ esghapag nanigh aqe lghii _ .
enkaam _ aghtugh yagute llegh minun _ kenlanga _ n e g a y u l q a l g u s n a q a q e g k a n g a _ . _ â
â _ A p a a y _ , _ sa aqa ngam _ negagh yu llegh ke i aghte te nghaani _ ? _ â
kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ Y u s e n g e t a g h h a q _ qefliqe ghllag aqe lghii _ enkaam _ kumlate snanigh i aqe lghii _ siku _ u m u g h t e s n a n i g h a q e g k a n g a _ megh _ q a p r a g t a q l u k u _ .
utaqa i aqe lghii _ kanagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ kanagh kata _ ila ke na luki _ siku m _ asi ani _ mamleg ghllag mi _ . _ â
â _ S a a q a n n g a m _ kanaghkagh t _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nalluke aput _ , _ enkaam _ pinigh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ kinku t _ kanagh kata _ . _ â
â _ N a t e n n g a m _ pi lleqe sta _ , _ sa yaghqaa sta _ , _ a p a a y _ ? _ â
â _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ pinigh uq _ .
kayute meng _ aqfate qaghte yaghqagh t _ .
ila ita _ sayug naqe yaghqagh at _ taana _ kanaghkagh _ .
K e l e n g a n g w a a g h l u n i _ e s n e v a p a g l l a f q a a m i _ kanagh na yu ka mi _ ellnga llu _ . _ â
â _ S a m e n g a m _ sayug sigh ke lleqe sta _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
â _ ivagh i luni _ sa meng _ , _ u u n g h a m e n g _ , _ taake lghii meng _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ talwa _ j a c k e t - t e t _ aligh a _ q i l l g h u q u u l l u k i _ , _ sa u aat _ tafsi t _ , _ sayug sighqagh u luki _ tawavek _ kanaghkagh mun _ .
aqlagha mi _ n u s u g w a g h h n a q s a g h q a a l g h i i t _ kanaghkagh t _ .
I s e k i n a m i _ y u g w e t _ mulupag igate ngugh t _ . _ â
â _ kelenga ghllag lleqe unga _ n e g a y u l q a m e n g _ .
wiin _ y u s e n g e t a a m e s u n g h i t u n g a _ mamleg ghllag mi _ .
K e l l i i n n g a m _ mayeraaghpag a _ apegh ghhu _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ pi a _ .
â _ aa _ , _ â _ apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ mayeraaghpag _ kellii nite ngughk _ wata _ s e g h l e g h a t a g h a a g u q _ , _ y a k u g h n a g h a t a g h t u q _ .
umiileg ke a _ kellii n _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ , _ siku yan _ , _ i i w e m _ , _ t u n g y u u m _ , _ maaqellegh m _ .
ilangani _ wata _ ugumi yagute ghllag aqe ai _ y u g w e t _ wataqaaghaq _ naayvagh m _ yungestagh aneng _ talwa _ . _ â
â _ sa aqa ngam _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ puughte aqe ai _ y u g w e t _ , _ â _ apa an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ puughte i sighqaghtu ghllag uq _ . _ â
â _ sangaawa t _ puughte i sagh i _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ anglegute ni _ nagate ma luki _ iye it _ n a n g l l a g r a k e t u n _ .
â _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ sigugnegh _ .
alqime i an _ tamaa na _ puughte i sagh igh kaqe a _ .
qaye mineng _ esghaqaaluni _ anigu _ nallunagh lghii _ piiznga ta a _ megh mun _ , _ tuute lghii ni _ ifkagh te na lghii _ .
kayute meng _ aqfaate uute ghngaaghmeng _ kaate ste gpenaki _ aga _ ughhe yaghqagh _ ifkagh tke aq _ . _ â
â _ esnaghni ii te qugh a mi _ pinigh uq _ , _ â _ kaspig _ pi ma lghii _ .
â _ taawa _ ipa _ pi uten _ , _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .
â _ T a a n a n g i i n a a n g h i t u q _ puughte i sagh i _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ megh _ i i g g w t e s n e g h m i n i g u _ esne _ u u s q a g h q w a a g a q a a _ .
qiighnite luni _ aatqaghte lghii ni _ uugte naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ e s n e v e q e s t i i g h t e s n a n i g h a q i i t _ .
wata _ taghnughhagh t _ esnagh niigh snanigh aqe ait _ . _ â
â _ A p a a y _ , _ ungipagh aten _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
kelenga lleqe ukut _ mayeraaghpag meng llu _ y u s e n g e t a a m e n g l l u _ , _ â _ kaspig _ pi ma lghii _ . _ â
â _ I n g a g h s a g h t u g h t e g n g a m _ ! _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ eltughagh ni _ .
â _ unaami _ igaghyagh yaghqaa usi _ . _ â
â _ G o o d n i g h t _ apa _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sunanguq _ qavangugh ke nghite langi _ mayeraaghpag t _ . _ â
taagken _ ingaghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
M e g h n u m _ sukate luni _ q a v a m a l g h i i _ talwa _ unug llegh ke sigh _ qavangugh qagh gpenani _ .
unaami _ e l l m a a r a g h q w a a m a k a n g a _ , _ siqi neghllug ughte ma kanga _ .
qayug nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kaspig _ aane luni _ ilakumtaagh ke te lghiik _ igaghvig mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aleghqugh tke magh an _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe gkan _ sa lleghqagh ek _ .
kaspig _ n a g a l l a a g h p e n a n i _ unaaghsi ma lghii _ .
S i q i n g h e m _ repall _ anigu _ n i g h w a a g p a g t a g h q e l l u k u _ qakma _ .
nighwaagpagtagh llegh t _ esghagh nghminiki _ llangaqa nguq _ pi aqe aat _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ aane i _ , _ naghaagh yagh a _ . _ â
kaspig m _ kellaag k _ esghagh nghminikek _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kek _ sa yamek _ nalleq _ sukangiite ghllag akek _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ imani _ .
qenwat llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ r i i s a a g h n a q n i m a k a n g i _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ amig mun _ piyug ragkiighute ma lghiit _ .
aane luteng _ naligh ita _ kaspig m _ ilakumtaagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ esnagh mun _ pi lta _ , _ siku _ igleghte lghii _ esghapag yaghtugh lteggu _ . _ â
kaspig llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k llu _ maalghug _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
agigte yalghiimeng _ talwa _ kellaag igh a _ pinighnagh pigte uq _ .
sikuqwaagh ghhagh t _ a g h u l i i g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ llangaqa _ suupeliigh mi _ s a l t i n e _ c r a c k e r - e t _ puglegha lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ataasigh m _ pi ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ â _ kaangqwagh lta _ yeqay _ , _ siku t _ aghula i te u aghte ut _ ! _ â
kaspig m _ aag llegh gni _ aatqaghtagh te yayek _ siku mun _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenani _ ellnga llu _ qetgegh ma lghii _ .
kaangqwagh te ma lghiit _ , _ teghigniqe te ma lghiit _ .
A w a v a n l l e g h p i g a a n n a q u s i m a l g h i i t _ .
kaangqwagh te ghngaaghmeng _ naligh t _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ ughhe aqe ai _ .
aragh ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ â _ H a a k _ , _ u u g h h i i n k u u t _ ! _ â
qamagte luteng _ kelute mun _ qiive luteng _ aragh u aghagh taute ma lghiit _ , _ â _ U u g h h i i n k u u - u t _ ! _ U u g h h i i n k u u t _ ! _ â
qaasqagh mi _ y u g w e m _ angyagh meng _ qepghagh lghii m _ n a g a q u m a k a n g i _ .
kayute meng _ piighaghte luni _ , _ d o r y - m e n g _ atghagh te luteng _ aqfa ma kangit _ i v e n r u m e n g _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ awavagh te ghllag ma kangi _ , _ llangaqa _ esghaqagh u luteng _ q a w a a g g a a t _ sikuqaagh mi _ .
mulu gpenateng _ kaate luki _ tugu ma kangit _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ esghaqagh qu te magh meng _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh t _ iqenge aghte gpenateng _ , _ a g h s u g h w a a l u t e n g _ .
llangaqa nguq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh ni _ kelute mun _ muluugh ghllag lghiit _ .
llangaqa llu _ n u n m a a s q u v e g a g h h a q _ igleghte lghiit _ .
kaspig _ tuufsagh nge ghllag ma lghii _ apa ni llu _ mayeraaghpag a llu _ kellii n _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e s a q m i n i k e k _ .
qute mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .
Y u g w e t _ qaake ma kangit _ qute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ uugte ghngaaghmeng _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ mayugh ma lghiit _ qaasqagh mun _ igaghvig mun _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ alegh kek _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghiik _ , _ â _ sa meng tuq _ apeghtughiste mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ?
sa meng tuq _ igaghyagh lgute mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ?
sa meng tuq _ angayuqagh mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ? _ â
kaspig m _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a q _ sumegh kekagh a _ , _ â _ apa ma _ sa meng tuq _ pinagh kanga _ ? _ â
qaasqagh m _ qaye anun _ qaygeghte yalghiimi _ pika _ esghagh aa _ yuug _ , _ apa ni _ .
S i k i g g a a m _ P u u g h n e q g u u t k a n g a _ meteghllug ghrug
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ taana nguq _ s i k i g g a q _ m e t e g h l l u g w e m _ neghe vzigh qagh a _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ , _ meteghllug _ tengaa ma lghii _ pagani _ asitmun _ ivagh i magh mi _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
S i k i g e n n g u q _ ellnga ni _ elngaatall _ negh yugnagh lghiit _ .
esghaate yami _ yagtaghagh ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sikig _ riigte mineng _ aane luni _ navek _ pangaleg lghii _ .
N a l u g h q a g h s i m a l g h i i _ riigte an _ manu akun _ .
S i k i g g a q _ tagi luni _ itegh yug ghllag ghngaaghmi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ qayughllak _ meteghllug _ t a w a n l e n g u q _ .
taagken _ S i k i g g a a m _ itegh na luni _ puughte yuguma kanga _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ M e t e g h l l u u y _ , _ aghula aqe ziin _ ? _ â
S i k i g g a a m _ aawallu _ meteghllug _ puughte aghte ma kanga _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ aghula pestaagh kayugu unga _ , _ â _ q u y a a g h a g h t e g h r u g u m a g h m i _ meteghllug _ angegh aghte ma lghii _ , _ â _ aghula nayagh unga _ legan _ whaa _ . _ â
â _ aa _ naqam _ ! _ â _ S i k i g g a a m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ atugh utagh ghllag ken _ .
aghula _ . _ â
taagken _ atugh te ma kanga _ iigge mineng _ saguyagh ke luni _ :
â _ Q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ , _ q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ !
Q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ , _ q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ !
Q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ q u n e g h t e p a l l a g h q a a g h l u t e n _ ,
q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ !
Q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ a v l e g h t e p a l l a g h q a a g h l u t e n _ ,
q u n g _ q u g h l u n g _ ! _ â
meteghllug ghrug nguq _ aghula ma lghii _ yaagpagte aghte aqe luni _ sighla ma lghii _ atugh te yatni _ .
S i k i g g a a m _ atuute mi _ q u n e g h q e n n a l l g h a _ kaate yagu _ , _ meteghllug _ q u u n g h a g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
Q u n e g h q e l l u n i _ elngaatall _ aghula ma lghii _ .
S i k i g g a g h n g u q _ atugh ghllag _ , _ w h a t e n n g u q _ pi magh mi _ lliigh uq _ , _ â _ itegagh n _ inglu a _ quulvani _ , _ q u g h l u n g _ . _ â
L e g a n n g u q _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ itegagh ni _ q u u l v a g h a g h t e g h r u n e g h m i n i g u _ p a a g g u q a g h a q _ .
S i k i g g a q _ s u k a n g h h a g h m i t u n _ itegh qaghte ma lghii _ t a a m _ aghula lghii m _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ ighu gkenka _ akule gkenkun _ .
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ akuqagh yagh aa _ yaghlegi _ papeg igh inagh a _ a k u q a m a k a n g a _ , _ sakeqe ma kanga _ .
iwernga _ S i k i g g a q _ itegh qagh uq _ sakeqe llegh meng _ papeg ligh luni _ .
meteghllug _ unite qaghte ma kanga _ papeg m _ sakeqe llegh aneng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aglagh te ma kanga _ .
riigte mi _ ilu ani _ n g i l l e g r u g s i m a g h m i _ i i l q u m a l g h i _ papeg igh te ni luni _ .
qiive magh mi _ ataasigh _ avaqutagh ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ N a t u n g a m _ s i k i g g a q _ papeg ita _ ?
aatak _ veghte naqe yaghtuqagh ghhu _ p a a p g a q a _ meteghllug meng _ .
qikmigh m nguq _ iye aneng _ n a v e g h l l e q a q a _ . _ â
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ ne anun _ s i k i g a g h a q _ aglagh luni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ naa ma _ papeg ni _ veghute sqellug qu _ aapte sqe aaten _ .
N a v e g h l l e q a a n g u q _ qikmigh m _ iye aneng _ . _ â
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tuuneqaghte naanghite aqa _ papeg a _ .
saama llu _ qikmigh m _ iye aneng _ pitu unga _ . _ â
aglagh ma lghii _ s i k i g a g h a q _ naa ni _ ungipagh saghtu ma kanga _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ k i i m s i t a n g a n e n g _ .
â _ kii _ , _ n a t u n g a m _ sikig _ papeg ita _ , _ â _ ngillegte pigte luni _ s i k i g a g h a a m _ naange a _ p i l a t a a m a l g h i i _ .
â _ enta _ aatak _ u n g i p a n n e q i g s a g h t u g h h u _ neghsagh m _ i i y n g a n e n g u q _ n a v e g h l l e q a q a _ papeg ka _ . _ â
S i k i g a g h a q _ aglagh nqigte ma lghii _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ ne anun _ .
taawanginaq _ w a a k e p a n g h i l l a t a g h t u q _ naavghute yaghqagh aneng _ S i k i g g a a m _ .
â _ yaghlegillu _ whaa _ iyetu unga _ , _ â _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ s i k i g a g h a q _ .
S i k i g a g h a q _ aglagh nqigte luni _ naa ni _ u n g i p a s i m a k a n g a _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ kiimsigh llegh aneng _ .
S i k i g a g h a a m _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ u n g i p a s a g h t u g h h u _ whaa nguq _ n a v e g h l l e q a q a _ maatenllaam _ n e q n i g h r a k e g t a m e n g _ .
ungipaate naken _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ tuune lleqe aqa _ . _ â
S i k i g g a a m _ avaqutagh ghhagh a _ aglagh laatagh ma lghii _ meteghllug mun _ ungipaate na luku _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ n a v e g h h n a a g h n i l u k u _ p a a p g a q _ .
M e t e g h l l u k r u g w e m _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ N a v e g h h n a a n g h i t a a _ papeg ni _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ , _ y e q a y t u q _ aa _ , _ y u g w e m _ iye aneng _ .
itupill _ t a m a n a m e n g _ n a v e g h t e s n a a y a g h a q a _ ! _ â
aglagh luni _ s i k i g a g h a a m _ naa ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ wetku _ y u g w e m _ iye aneng _ n a v e g h l l e q n i l u k u _ papeg a _ .
naa ngiighhagh a _ i i l q a m i q n g w a a g h l u n i _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ kaay _ seghleghhalek _ , _ n a k e n n g a m _ y u g w e m _ iye aneng _ p i k e n g n a q s i n g a _ ! _ â
S u m e g h y a l i g h t u q _ wata _ s u m e g h t a g h a a t k e n g n g i i n a q _ .
â _ E m a a y _ , _ â _ s i k i g a g h a a m _ naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan mi _ ivagh i nanigh stuung _ me ke ta ghhagh meng _ uyghag meng _ y u g w e m _ iye atun _ a y u q e s u g n i l n g u g h m e n g _ , _ tawaten wha _ p u u g h h n a y a n g h i s t e g g u _ meteghllug _ ! _ â
S i k i g g a a m _ avaqutagh ghhagh ni _ tuune ma kanga _ qaliqenghaagh ghhagh meng _ aqeftaghaagh meng _ , _ pi ma kanga llu _ saghna yigh sqellug qu _ i y e s u g n i t a a g h m e n g _ uyghag meng _ .
uteghnigh yan _ a q e f t a g h a g h h a n i _ esleqe luku _ uyghag meng _ , _ naa an _ keveg aqlaatagh ma kanga _ meteghllug mun _ .
â _ meteghllug _ , _ meteghllug _ , _ ang _ taawa _ piyukekagh gpeneng _ y u g w e m _ iye aneng _ tagite amken _ ! _ â _ kaate qaghte te kete luku _ s i k i g a g h a a m _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ .
E f q u g h q w a a m a k a n g a _ elngaatall _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug nguq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ K g w u g g _ , _ tea- ma ken ta _ esgha _ n e g h y u g w a q e l g h i i n g a _ ! _ â
A k u q w a a m a a n _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh _ s i k i g a g h a g h m u n _ tuune ma kanga _ naa an _ papeg a _ .
aga _ s i k i g a g h a q _ ne minun _ s u k a t n g w a a g h l u n i _ aglagh aghte ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ E m a a y _ , _ taawa _ papeg n _ ! _ â
naange a _ q u y a a p i g l l u n i _ papeg ni _ aatqaghte ma kanga _ aga _ paperegte i inagh magh mi _ .
inga _ ne mini _ M e t e g h l l u g r u g w e m _ qelpeghte luku _ qaliqenghaagh _ a q e f t a g h a g h h a q _ nusug ma kanga _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ iyete yu gnite ngughk _ .
taagken _ iigge mini _ u l l g h i t a p e r e g w a a g h t e s i m a k a n g a _ .
N e q n i g h y u g w e m _ angtale aneng _ q a a n g h a _ meghaaghtu qu ma lghii _ .
aga _ qaneghmig aghte a nguq _ , _ imani nguq _ aqnighnagh ghhalek _ , _ k a n g r u g u t e g h l l a g u m a l g h i i _ C - R - U - U - U - N - C - H _ !
ayungkaghagh
tamekestagh t _ yaagigh igate ngugh t _ , _ ughhe igate ngugh t _ ellngaate meng _ , _ mesiigh meng _ ulimaagh t _ :
â _ aghnagh aq _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ ayungkaghagh _ taana _ siipnegh _ tuune gu _ aghnaghaghhagh mun _ . _ â
qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun
aagra m _ ilu yan _ paagna i _ , _ qulighnegh i _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iiggagh ten _ qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun _ teghlegtekaqe anka _ . _ â
aneghte lghii nguq _ ( _ aneghte lghii _ )
maaten _ pi llegh mitun _ alla _ pi iigh aatagh lghii _ :
S i k i g g a q _ neghe lleg mta _ neqekrag m _ kagimleghwaagh aneng _ negh luni _ riigte minun _ aglagh luni _ itegh luni _ aag nghmini _ tagi aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte lghii nguq _ esghapag aat _ .
uumtagh m _ ( _ uumtagh _ )
nenglu m _ ilu yan _ n u n a m e l n g u u t _ , _ sa meng _ alngunak _ k a n a g h f i k e g k a y u g w e t _ :
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ p i r u g h t a n i _ qawaag m _ qateg i _ tukrug aat _ uumtagh m _ asi anun _ kanaghte ma kangi _ .
tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ ( _ t u t m a g h w a a q _ )
uksaagh mi _ nuna _ kumlaregagh nghaani _ ne meng _ uyavagh ni _ afsengagh m _ s i q l u g w a a n e n g _ ivagh i lghiit _ nuna _ tutmagh aqe luku _ .
S i q l u g w a t _ akuuragh nghmegteki _ ketngig it _ nalighmeng _ p u t u k g h w i t _ kanagh aqe ut _ :
aghnaghagh t _ ata eng _ tangigh sqellug qu _ pekneghtigh sqellug qu _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
kenigh megteggun _ ( _ kenigh t _ )
A t k u g w e m _ , _ qaligh m _ , _ qiipaghagh m _ a s i l i g h n e g h i _ nuqutuqagh t _ g g a a t m e g g n e n g _ qantagh ke lghii ni _ :
yuug _ esnagh mun _ agigte yalghiimi _ i q a l l u g w a q _ tepe qaghtagh ma kanga _ .
Y u g w e m _ ila i llu _ esnevagh luteng _ kenigh megteggun _ saghna te ma lghiit _ qantaghqagh ite ngugh t _ .
tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ ( _ t u t m a g h w a a q _ )
tutmaghwaagh ghngaaghmi _ sa lghii _ , _ nalighmeng _ tutmaghwaagh te kete luku _ sa lghii _ :
aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ aghula ma lghii _ .
ila it _ asa- ni luku _ , _ apagh aatagh ni luku _ taku ma kangat _ .
peknegh meng _ ( _ peknegh _ )
P i i t e s i g h a a m _ p i i k n a n g i _ c o t t o n - n e s u g n i l n g u u m _ akugh i _ :
aghnagh aq _ peknegh meng _ naalkute nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ saqlagte luni _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ufsug yagh a _ ( _ u f s u k _ )
sa u aat _ aatkagh t _ , _ ulig t _ anigu i _ , _ pagula i _ , _ ifkaghte na luki _ k a a g t u l g h i i n i _ u n a g h s i i g h w a g h m e n g _ , _ alngunak _ sa meng _ a n a g u t a g h q a g h y u g n a m e n g _ :
â _ kameg gken _ anigu ghllag u uk _ ufsug yagh a _ qakmavek _ , _ â _ naa an _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
n i g h w a a g p a g t a g h q e l l u k u _ ( _ n i g h w a a g p a g t a q _ )
S a a m _ a k i s q a g h n e g h a n _ nighug u uute aatagh ste llegh i _ :
aw ligh neghllug mi _ meghutlug lghute _ egte llegh ni _ s i q i n g h e m _ a k i s q a g h n e g h a n _ n i g h w a a g p a g t a g h q e l l u k u _ e s g h a g h a g h p u t _ .
s i q l u g w a q
neqelghutagh _ nuna kun _ laag te luni _ , _ laag llegh _ mingllu luni _ qaye a _ aghvegh m _ a g l a a n e n g _ takaghqughvike luni _ nevugh meng _ saapekagh _ umu luku _ iwerngaqun _ paye a _ .
isekinagh lghiit _ enkaam _ neqe mun _ aghu nigh ite ngugh t _ :
S i q l u g w a q _ ukmangigh aqe luku _ i m i g h a q a g h p u t _ enkaam _ imagh kegte aqe uq _ .
qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ ( _ qaghlu _ )
T a p g h a g h n e n g _ pateghtuqagh t _ aqnigh nigh ite ngugh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ t e g h i g l u g w e m _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimakagh t _ qamugh sigh u luki _ qikmigh nun _ :
yuug _ nutaghagh meng _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ qikmigh minun _ .
iingunagh mi _ ( _ iingunagh an _ )
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ , _ sa u aat _ ikuvike llghite ngugh t _ :
nengiighhagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh _ iingunagh an _ qaake naqe kangat _ esghapag yaghtugh ma kangat _ .
siku yan _ ( _ siku _ )
siku _ taana _ , _ n a t u m _ s a a m _ siku a _ :
naayvagh m _ siku yan _ iqeghte a _ sungaghyug a _ ughug kestagh yalghiimi _ .
i i w e m _ ( _ i i k w _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne meng _ awavagh ghllag negh meggni _ llangaqa _ naange ghllag luteng _ :
I i w e m _ qalmesagh _ a w a v a n l e n g u q _ aliigh uute ghllag ma uq _ .
t u n g y u u m _ ( _ tungyugh _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne mun _ taglagh ghllag negh meggni _ , _ uleve ghllag negh meggni _ :
angyagh _ e s n e v a n l e n g u q _ t u n g y u u m _ kaate ma a _ .
maaqellegh m _ ( _ m a a q e m _ )
kellii n _ megh an _ maaqellegh an _ saste llegh a _ nalighmeng _ maaqellegh m _ a y u q e t u l n g a _ :
maaqellegh m _ aghvightagh u aatagh llegh an _ siku _ n e k e g n e g h a _ allangughte aqe a _ .
alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ ( _ alqime i an _ )
uksugh mi _ naayghagh t _ , _ uusneghwaagh t _ , _ sigugnegh t _ , _ q a g u r u g w i t _ paagken _ a n u q a n n e g h m i n i _ , _ umegnegh _ suupe m _ anigu _ neve aqe uq _ awatmun _ p i i z t a q u q _ qagughrug neng _ .
qaye mineng _ nallunagh lghii _ tuute lghii ni _ ayeme luni _ ifkagh u qagh yu k _ .
naayghagh ni _ alqime i an _ uglaghi nghmini _ uqigtughte nghmini _ ellmi neng _ ifkagh qagh yu k _ , _ lengke kayug _ : _ paagken _ anuqe _ mulu nghmini _ sigugnegh _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ .
nunaki aqe uq _ ( _ nuna ke i _ )
teghigniqe a _ , _ p i n i g h y u u g t a _ :
yuug _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m i _ a l i i n e g h l l u g l a g m i _ kiiw m _ esne ani _ k u m a q i l u n i _ , _ negh aqe luni _ , _ nulugh magh mi _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ nunaki aqe uq _ .
uvegte luku
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ tukughagh ni _ aqnighte luki _ mulu magh an _ naa an _ c l i n i c - m u n _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
H e a l t h _ a i d e - t e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uvegte luku _ tagite qaghte naqe gpenaan _ . _ â
atngaghute leg _ ( _ atngaghute t _ )
aghnagh t _ neghigh luku _ t a a t g i t n i l n g u u t _ terellegh t _ :
aghnalqwaagh _ atngaghute leg _ , _ taqugh kek _ igaghtuqagh k _ esghaqaaluni _ a g h n a l q w a a g h s u g n i n g i t n g w a a g h t u q _ .
ighwaaghtuute te n _ ( _ ighwaaghtuute a _ )
teghig ke sagh t _ anigu mun _ , _ nuna mun _ ingaghte aqe luteng _ n e v e g h t a q l u t e n g _ mingughhu te lghiit _ :
Y u g w e m _ qikmigh ni _ megh meng _ uugte yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tamaani _ ighwaaghtuute te n _ . _ â
qikmigh _ ighwaaghtuute luni _ nekeve luni _ efsug te yalghiimi _ yuug _ isiqaghte ma kanga _ .
waamte amken _ ( _ waamte a _ )
puughte i _ .
A m y u g h w a a g h l u k i _ , _ ipa u nghite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi lghii ni _ :
aghnaghagh m _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag _ inga _ . _ â
qiya yan _ pi a _ , _ â _ waamte amken _ , _ nanugh u nghite uq _ . _ â
a g g h i y u g n e g h l l a k _ ( _ a g g h i y u g n e q _ )
P i y u k e l l g h i i n a g h m i t u n _ pi naqe ghllag _ , _ sagiqe ghllag _ :
mekelghiigh _ uksugh mi _ maqaghqe gpenani _ napi naqe ghllag _ angayuqagh mi _ maqaghqe sqe ghngaatni _ .
ata an _ a g h y u g h u m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ elpek _ a g g h i y u g n e g h l l a k _ !
esla _ nallu kan _ qakun _ allangughte lleghqagh a _ . _ â
kasug ma kanga _ ( _ k a s u k _ )
qagi m _ sa kun _ alngunak _ tekite yuwhaagh llegh a _ isiqghuute ghllag qagh yu k _ :
mekelghiigh m _ elqwaagh t _ sigugnegh m _ a s i n g a n i l n g u u t _ aqfaagh aghte yagh luki _ kasug ma kanga _ .
suflu u ma lghii _ ( _ suflugh _ )
ggute m _ aghu llegh a _ :
ggute nka _ g g u u t n i i g h t e m _ yuvghiigh luki _ , _ ataasigh _ suflu u ma lghii _ .
aghqiiwtu te _ ( _ aghqiiw _ )
uksugh mi _ s a p e g h h n a g h q w a a n g h a n i _ anigu kun _ piyug lghii ni _ piyug llegh t _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiw i _ nagate aqe ke put _ :
qakma _ manughagh mteggun _ naghughte lghiit _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiwtu te _ piyug llegh it _ .
p i y a a n n e q e g s a a t a q e l g h i i t _ ( _ pi yu a _ ) _ Y u g w e t _ uksugh mi _ piyug meng
siku gnun _ ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ unangniigh na luteng
megh meng _ ivagh i yagh te aqe lghiit _ : _ siku k _ k a a s u w h a a n g h e g k e n i _ y u g w e t
p i y a a n n e q e g s a a t a q e l g h i i t _ .
ataata ut _ ( _ atugh a ta _ )
ata m _ a n g l e g u t a n g a _ yuug _ :
ataata ut _ quunpeng _ napi ghllag _ enkaam _ unange aqe lghii _ .
ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ ( _ ilangqughqu _ )
ilangqugh meng _ aqfate lghiit _ meghqagh meng _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangit _ enkaam _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ esla _ naafte ghngaan _ meghagh ite igate ngugh u kut _ .
b o i l e r - e t _ ( _ boiler _ )
melghutagh t _ entaqun _ 1 0 _ g a l l o n - e t _ umeg leg t _ , _ tugutagh leg t _ takemriig u aaghet _ :
B o i l e r - e t _ kagimlegh meng _ ilangqugh meng _ imigh aqe aput _ .
ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ ( _ ilughaghte ni uq _ )
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ a m y u g h w a a g h u l l g h i i t _ , _ s u g w a a g u s i g a l n g u u t _ :
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ maaten _ pi pagnanigh ut _ .
qaasligh at _ ( _ qaasligh t _ )
umuqagh t _ akughtuqagh t _ qaasligh u luteng _ ggateg ke te _ atughqagh t _ :
ukut _ qaasligh at _ mat- qaghte yug nigh ghllag u ut _ .
kaki sigh ghllag _ ( _ kaki _ )
kaki sigh kun _ kaki ghllag _ :
aghnagh m _ u g w i n i _ , _ avaqutagh ni _ , _ a n Ê¼ g a g h a n i _ aatkagh ngllagh aqe kangi _ qiipaghagh meng _ k a k i s i g n e k u n _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ kaki sigh ghllag _ .
yupig m _ S a n q u t a n g a n u n _ apeghtuusagh kekagh nun _ liite aghagh sighqagh t
iyaa-kagh m _ apeghtu sagh i
sa ngllagh yaghqagh t _ : _ T u g w e q _ nalighmeng _ uunghagh
atughqagh t _ : _ atugh llghite ngughk _ igaasigh _ nalighmeng _ unaghsiighwagh _ igagh _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ x _ 2 _ inches _ kuynge mun _ ukmangiisigh _ nalighmeng _ paper _ c l i p - m e n g _ .
naten _ t u g w e q _ ulima yaghqau a _ :
imeg te luku _ m a a l g h u g w e g n e n g _ igagh _ a m e s t a a g h h a q _ igaasigh m _ i q u g w a k u n _ e r a s e r - e m _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ .
igagh _ neve ste luku _ igaasigh kun _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ i l e f k a g h a g h h n a y u k a n _ .
kepe nakesi _ igagh _ imeg tke aq _ saqugmun _ n u v u k r u g w a _ ipeg sqellug qu _ .
wayagh _ kepe luku _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inches _ t a g k a a n _ .
agughte luku _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ i n c h - n g u l u k u _ uzive qaghtagh na yu kan _ igaasigh mun _ nekegtekuni _ .
agughtekagh _ wayagh _ neve ste nakesi _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ igaasigh mun _ i g i i l g h a k u n _ i q u g w a k u n _ 1 _ inch _ piiznga an _ .
agughte nakesi _ wayagh _ piiznga lghii _ nekreg u luku _ .
igaghqwaagh leg _ t u u g g h u u q _ , _ nekreg aa _ alngunak _ sa mun _ atugh u uq _ .
akuzillegh t _ sa llegh mun _ uspute nga lghiit
1 _ . _ tunag m _ qukaa ni _ .
efqughute nga lghiit _ , _ qaatke te ma lghiit _ , _ qepghaghtuqagh t _ , _ qepghagh tke ai ta _ , _ ilakwaagh ita _ piniqe pigtegkangit _ .
â _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ qaatke te nga te mineng _ tunag m _ qukaa nite uq _ â _ angyaleg an _ pi ma kangi _ y u g w e t _ .
2 _ . _ K a a g k a s a g h t a _ .
E f q u g h a g h t a _ elngaatall _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa ni _ kaapelqagh meng _ awaligh ma kanga _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tamaaken _ negh yuguma lunga _ k a a g k a s a g h t a g h p e n g a _ ! _ â
3 _ . _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
puughte i lleg _ , _ peghqinegh _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ puughte luku _ dollar-nga _ sa meng _ n a v e g h s i m a k a n g a _ .
naa ita _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ â _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ t a a m _ puughte laatagh ma uten _ .
4 _ . _ meteghllug ghllag _ .
puughhe negh kegte aq _ , _ nalluqagh _ .
naa an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ legan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ tuune laatagh magh an _ d o l l a r - e n _ â _ .
5 _ . _ iye k _ miluqutagh ka _ .
alngunak _ e s g h a q w a a g h a g h t a l g h i i n i _ iye t _ q a p r a g s i m i i t a _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ aangqagh ghhagh ni _ n a a l k e n n e g h m e n g _ aghtugh luku _ naa ni _ aapte yagh aa _ k a y u s i t e s q e l l u n i _ ivagh kanga _ yaghlegi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ amen _ iye gken _ miluqutagh ke kek _ , _ naalke lleqe an _ . _ â
quyngigh k _ maalghug _ sumeghneghtuqagh k
Q a y g e g h h a a m _ ungipagh aa
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ ighnegh leg _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ , _ panig leg llu _ .
taana _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ quunpeng _ quyngigh mi _ nayugh i aqe lghii _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ esnaghtagh t _ tannge t _ naghughte te kete luku _ taana _ quyngigh igh ghllag _ mekelghiightuumagh an _ tugu ma kangat _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tawani _ uksaagh u uq _ .
qenwat _ uksugh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ mekelghiigh _ ratamyaag luni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
naqam _ neghe ste aqe kangat _ , _ taawanginaq _ ilu ani _ qavagh igate ngughk _ !
maaten _ ilangani _ , _ esla mi _ qavagh naqe yan _ quyngigh k _ maalghug _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
ila a _ gginagh a _ aveg luni _ tagnegh lghii _ inglu a _ qategh lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ yugusigh a _ ukileghyag _ .
taake uk _ apa an _ q a m u g h t e k e f t a a k _ .
taake uk _ ingaghte aqe lghiik _ akeleghraagh ke luku _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ghhuute igate kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m i _ mengteghagh mii i _ ivagh i aqe ut _ .
aghnagh aq _ nayag a _ ivagh i ma lghii _ , _ naayghagh m _ a m a t a n g a n u n _ pi yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ tume ghllag t _ .
ataasigh meng _ unug yagu _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte yata _ aag llegh an _ quyngigh m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a a k u n i s k u v e k _ wata _ ikfiqe lleqe uten _ .
whaa _ maalghug gneng _ m e g h n a l i k u y e n g _ kaate lleqe ut _ ne meggnun _ !
unaami _ aane gkuvek _ ingavek _ u y a v a g h p a n u n _ tume nun _ aglagh ghhaaten _ .
kaate kuvek _ ukavek _ ayuqe luten _ nekevgha lghaaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
negh te ma lghiit _ .
taaqe yata _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ , _ kaa sa mi _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ tume nun _ u y a v a g h p a n u n _ .
kaate luni _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
inga _ qaghluughi na luteng _ tagsigh ma yagh kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ .
A v e l g h a q i n a a m a k a n g i _ legan _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
ila ita _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ tuqu li _ qaywaam _ ! _ â
taagken _ tuqutagh igh na luteng _ malighqugh ma lghiit _ .
sivuke luni _ quyngigh _ uzive ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ taake uk _ quyngigh k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ qavagh lgute kek _ uzive ma lghiik _ maligte te lutek _ .
pangaleg ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ .
mulu luni _ tazingavek _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh magh mi _ aag llegh a _ quyngigh a _ guughte ma lghii _ .
quyngigh m _ kaate yatni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ uughqaghte ma lghii _ sivutmute _ ayuqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pangaleg te ma kangat _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ malighqagh i ma yagh lghii _ .
uyavagh te luki _ quyngigh m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U m e g n e g h s i g h h u _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ u m e g n e g h s i g h y a q e n n i _ .
umegnegh ughte ma kanga _ qanigtuumagh mi _ , _ anuqetu magh mi _ .
naqam _ kingu at _ umegnegh _ sivungagh t _ aliinegh _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ tuqu laghate ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ legan _ igatagh negh gpeni _ tuqute luki _ negh luten _ pegte luki _ igleghte aqe i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ igatagh nghmini _ tuqute luki _ neqagh luni _ pegte luki _ t a m a v e k _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ima _ uksaagh _ tannge t _ metngegh tke aat _ , _ i g l e g h t e n g n g i i n a a m a l u k u _ qenwat _ upenghagh u ma lghii _ .
ighni laghate te ma lghii _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ â _ legan _ ighninghhagh t _ unite aqe ki _ , _ malighqagh te aqe naagh ut _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ unite aqe kangi _ .
mulu luteng _ ataasigh meng _ qavagh luteng _ kaate aqe lghiit _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ quyngigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ una _ s a a m _ naayghagh ke agu _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ naayghagh _ esghapag yagh kete ni _ naayghagh eng _ asi mikun _ uusneghwaagh leg _ .
uusneghwaagh m _ a w a t a n g a n i l n g u u t _ mengteghagh i _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ naayghagh _ whangkuta _ naayghagh ut _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwenllu _ qemi meng _ teve naqe aqe uq _ , _ y u g w e m _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ghhukaghagh _ kuuve yaghtugh ghhu _ up- ghhagh ghllag nge a _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ ghhukaghagh _ tugu luku _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
kuuve luku _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kek _ maalghug _ quyngigh k _ teve lghiik _ uusneghwaagh meng _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma kangi _ qenwat _ ata an _ qama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nalleghiite ziin _ , _ nikimqun _ sa meng _ esghapag inagh uten _ ! _ â
itegh luni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aane lutek _ e s g h a g h y a q e g t e n g _ quyngigh eng _ , _ qenwat _ uglaghi ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
Y u g w a _ talugh nga lghii _ .
wetku _ mulu luni _ y u g w a _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
