esghagh yamegteggu _ quyake luku _ q i y a k l u k u _ .
yuug _ qavaghtuqagh
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ ne mi _ tea- ma ni _ esne meng _ unegken _ kellii neng _ neqenge kayug ni _ uksugh yuwhaagh mi _ siku k _ m a l l e g y u w h a a n g h e g k e n i _ .
Y u g w e t _ , _ nukalpigagh t _ ategh utu aqe lghiit _ , _ a y v e g h a a t a q e l g h i t _ puglegh akun _ .
unange aqe lghiit _ maklagte aqe lghiit _ anglu akun _ .
tamaa _ y u w h a q _ ellnga llu _ piyaa aqe lghii _ unug ghllagu luku _ nighugte ste gpenaan _ .
sikuvag nun _ kaate nghmini _ vuuslegh t _ q u n g a n g i t g u n _ laag te luni _ uqiite luni _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ qavagh aqe lghii _ ivagh i niigh gpenani _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ aghnegh m _ qukagh a llu _ naghughte luni _ , _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .
taglagh aqe lghii _ maligte te luni _ .
Y u g w e t _ ungipamsug te nghata _ , _ taana _ yuug _ p i m a q e l g h i i _ , _ â _ ii _ , _ e l n g a a t a l l - a a _ , _ e s g h a t a g h t e g p e n a n g a _ naalkute aghte gpenanga _ , _ akuuraate aghte gpenanga _ anglu meng _ puglegh meng _ uteghnigh laatagh unga _ . _ â
ataasigh meng _ y u g w e t _ naligh ita _ e s g h a m a k a n g a t _ naten _ sa aqe ta a _ .
E s g h a p a g y a q m e g t e g g u _ , _ i i s k u g h s a q m e g t e g g u _ vuuslegh t _ , _ sikuvag t _ q u n g a n g i t n u n _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma aqe lghii _ .
N u l i i g h h a n u n _ apegh ma kangat _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ yuug _ y a t a a g h q e l l a a t a m a l g h i i _ .
U n u g w a g h l l a g y a n _ , _ n u l i i g h h a n _ kingu aneng _ tuumte ma kanga _ .
maligte ma kanga _ u y a a v a n l l u n i _ e s g h a g h n a y u k a n g a t n i _ l i i g i k n a y u k a n g a t n i _ .
llaaghanam _ sikuvag nun _ t a k u k u m t a a g h m i n u n _ kaate luni _ aghuliigh llegh ani _ tuvagh m _ , _ naagu _ talugh uq _ q u n g a n g i t n u n _ tamaavek _ .
tawani _ esghapag llegh ke i i na ma kanga _ .
tazingavek _ t a k u k e s t a m a k a n g a _ i i g k a g h a m e n g _ .
elngaatall _ igkamsug luku _ pi yalghiimi _ taawa _ s a n q u t a n g i _ , _ uyiigh i _ , _ uunghagh i _ saaghw ani _ naqam _ .
qavagh ani _ uyiigh a _ tugu luku _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ ne mun _ kaate luni _ u g w i m i _ uyiigh a _ iigh luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghan _ w h a n i k u m a a n _ taglagh luni _ yuug _ ungipagh yalghiimi _ , _ â _ ii _ , _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ angtughte yagh aqa _ sa u a _ maklag _ , _ ima _ sa aqe kete te uq _ .
saavgumiigh i uute unga _ .
taawa _ s a n q u t a a g h h a a n k a _ ima _ aghulaqe te ai _ . _ â
taawa _ n u l i i g h h a n _ angegh luku _ sa meng _ pi nghite a _ .
I g h i v g a g h m i _ taakwani _ n u l q a a v i i g h t u q _ yuug _ .
nuliigh ni _ keveg aqe a _ , _ â _ ingavek _ k u g w e g h p e n u n _ keveg aqe laken _ .
U y i i g h a g h h a g h m e g g n e n g u q _ a q u p i l q e n n a q l i t n g a _ s a n q u t a a g h i i t n g w a a g h u m a n g a _ . _ â
angegh luni _ nulighh a _ aane luni _ tazingavek _ k u g w e g h m i n u n _ pi ma lghii _ .
uteghnigh luni _ uyiigh _ iighkagh ni _ tugu luku _ itghute luku _ tuune ma kanga _ .
Y u g w e m _ tugu luku _ yuvghiigh aa _ , _ liigike a _ ellmi _ uyigh ani _ .
sa meng _ pi nghite uq _ .
unaami _ u n u g w a g h l l a g l a a t a g h t u q _ .
maaten _ tawavek _ iighagh vig minun _ pi gpenani _ , _ anglu meng _ ivagh i uq _ .
anglu _ kaate luku _ , _ maklag m _ anglu a _ , _ esghapag aa _ .
llaaghanwha _ uka _ mayugh uq _ maklag _ .
iwerngaqun _ sugupag kek _ nuug yayek _ tawavek _ n a g h u l l e g y a q m i n i g u _ legan _ unake a _ .
kii _ , _ imani _ iknaqe uq _ elngaatall _ .
aga _ pi akun _ taaggun _ nengte uq _ iwernga _ kiksag aa _ uyiigh m _ kangigh a _ .
tawaten _ maklag stun _ uyatu tekagh mi _ sama _ nengte uq _ .
maklagte lghii _ , _ anglu a _ nuqutughte a _ tawaten _ qaake yaghqaaghte luku _ .
naghigh yan _ s a y u g w a a _ , _ s a y u g w a a _ .
S a y u g w a a _ , _ s a y u g w a a _ iiwenllu _ whaa _ aliigh naqe aqe uq _ , _ samaken _ nuughqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ y u g w e m _ n e g h q u g h r u g w a _ .
neghqughrug _ uughqaghte luni _ yuug _ taana _ q e v u t q u g h t a a m a k a n g a _ gginagh a _ e s n e g u u g h l l u k u _ puufqellug qu _ .
N e g h q u g h r u g w e m _ nuqnegh luku _ uyiigh a _ pi kaqe kanga _ , _ aga _ itegh uq _ veghute uq _ anglu mun _ .
yuug _ nekeve luni _ uyigh ani _ , _ sanqute ni _ imeg luki _ taglagh uq _ .
esghagh luku _ nulighh an _ aapte a _ , _ â _ kii _ sa ghllag ziin _ , _ sangavek _ gginagh igh te ghllag ziin _ ? _ â
â _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ . _ â
y u g w e m _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ sa u a _ taaga _ , _ repall _ n e n g t e m _ angtale aneng _ nuqnegh naqe m _ anglu m _ esne akun _ gginagh ka _ k a a g u t a a t a m _ g g i n i i g h u t n g w a a g h a a n g a _ . _ â
taawa _ angegh aqe kanga _ , _ sa meng _ pi igate kanga _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ gginagh ni _ pi niigh ghraagte yan _ , _ y a t a g h q e l l u n i _ aghulaqe laatagh uq _ , _ piyaa laatagh uq _ .
unange uute aqe lghiit _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .
taawa _ qavagh nghite uq _ i v a g h i l a t a g h t u q _ anglu meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ anglu meng _ naalkute luni _ taawa _ u q l i g h l l a t a g h t u q _ .
uka _ mayugh laatagh uq _ , _ nuug laatagh aa _ sugupag m _ .
iwerngaqun _ tawaten _ alla _ naghulleg aa _ , _ nengte uq _ aga _ .
tawaten _ pilate- aghte uq _ , _ imani _ iknaqe uq _ .
I l u m s u w h a n g u n a n i _ , _ legan _ whaa _ neghqughrug _ sama _ q e v u t q u g h n a q l a t a g h a a _ .
iwernga _ y u w h a a m _ nuqnegh aa _ .
taawa _ naghigh yan _ uka _ sayug laatagh aa _ , _ amu a _ , _ amu a _ .
N u u g t e s a q m i n i g u _ maklag ghllag _ .
legan _ p a n a g h a g h m i n e n g _ tuqute a _ angtaagh ghllag _ .
qaake luku _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m i _ maklag ghllag _ angtaagh ghllag _ repall _ nalluke a _ sa u ta a _ .
U n a n g i g a l l g h e m _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ una _ t e g h i g l u g w e m _ a v a a q u t a g h l l a k e n g h i t a a g u _ , _ â _ n a l l u m _ angtale an _ .
taawa _ m a k l i l u n i _ , _ qamiigh luni _ taglagh uq _ .
E l n g a t a l l _ quyake aat _ upugha te aat _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ taawa _ qavagh yaghtugh nanigh uq _ , _ unange yagute uq _ t a m a a k u s t u n _ maligte te luni _ .
yugu lghii _ ellnga llu _ , _ p i k e n g y a g h q a y a l g h i i _ qavagh igate yagh kuni _ .
tefaay _ ! _ tagtale ke a _ taawa _ .
Q a y a g h t u g h h a q l u _ maalghug _ aghnagh k llu
E l q i i l a a m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ , _ aghnagh k nguq _ taake uk _ maalghug _ uusnegh m _ qaye ani _ unatagh ma lukek _ u u g k e n _ uka _ sa u a _ q a y a g h t u g h h a q _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
nallangigh lukek _ tespikavek _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ kinku k _ p a a g k u u k _ , _ aghnagh k _ p a a g k u u k _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kangat _ .
maamtawha nguq _ , _ â _ kinku k _ p a a g k u u k _ , _ aghnagh k _ p a a g k u u k _ ? _ â
aag llegh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A n g a l q a t a n y a a n g a n k u k _ , _ U n a y a a n g a n k u k _ . _ â
â _ tagi tek _ qaake naqe amtek _ , _ aglagh te naqe amtek _ ne gpetegnun _ . _ â
aavgugh vig tgun _ taakwagun _ ukig ma lghiik _ .
aag llegh a _ u g w a v e k _ itegh ma lghii _ qayagh an _ , _ aag llegh an _ kingu anun _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ .
nalleghaghhalek _ q e l a n g h u m a l g h i i k _ elngaatall _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ .
qenwat _ sivuyag mete ngughk _ u g w a _ g h h u u t e g h l l a g y a q m i n i g u _ .
â _ A a - v e - v e - v e - v e - v e - y a a - a a _ !
salin _ kaate yug niite aqe sta _ ? _ â
Y u w h a a m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ U u - k u - k u - k u - k u u k _ , _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ t a z i n a _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ â
taawa _ igleghte ut _ .
nasiqe luku _ ivgagh yaghqagh _ kingu anite ngughk _ enraq _ , _ â _ A a - v e - v e - v e - v e - v e - y a a - a a _ !
salin _ kaate yug niite aqe sta _ ? _ â
â _ U u - k u - k u - k u - k u u k _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ t a z i n a _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ â
Q e n w a n n g u q _ aghnagh k _ ghhuu yaghtugh ngestagh uk _ .
aanqute i ma lghii _ sivuyag mete ngughk _ u g w a _ ,
â _ P i n a - a a g h - _ n g a a g h - m a a - n g a a _ ,
P i y u u g h - a a - n g a a - a a g h - m a a - n g a a _ ,
Y a a - a - y a a - a - y a a - n g a a _ ,
N a a g u n g u u q _ p a a m - n a - n g a a _ , _ Q u y g g u u
P i y u u g h - i i - y a g h i i - y a a - y a - y i i - y a a - y a - y i i - y a a _ ,
M e n g a a - g h u u - n g u u q - a n g a y _ . _ â
â _ U u - k u - k u - k u - k u u k _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ t a z i n a _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ â
kingu anite ngughk _ maateqwaaqun _ aanqute ma lghii _ ,
â _ P i n a - a a g h - n g a a g h - m a a - n g a a _ ,
P i y u u g h - a a - n g a a - a a g h - m a a - n g a a _ ,
Y a a - a - y a a - a - y a a - n g a a _ ,
N a a g u n g u u q _ p a a m - n a - n g a a _ , _ Q u y g g u u
P i y u u g h - i i - y a g h i i - y a a - y a - y i i - y a a - y a - y i i - y a a _ ,
M e n g a a - g h u u - n g u u q - a n g a y _ . _ â
nepiightugh ngugh _ legan _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek _ uugna _ u g w a t a n g a n i l n g u q _ qayagh ani _ sivuyag anite ngughk _ aga _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ t a n p e g h h a k u n _ ukite qaghte te luni _ , _ aghqullug _ .
maateqwaaqun _ kingu aneng _ .
taawa _ aghqullug u lutek _ , _ iwerngaqun _ qula igh luku _ m i g h y a g h y a q m e g n e g u _ , _ m i g h y a g h y a q m e g n e g u _ , _ m i g h y a g h y a q m e g n e g u _ , _ i w e r n g a q u n n g u q _ y u w h a q _ kaleftagh at _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ tagitug mi _ I f l a n g w a a g h a k a q
A l g a l i k
iimnanguq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ iimna _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ iwernga _ apa leg _ nengyugh leg _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuna lgu ta ita _ aghnaghagh t _ keleg ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aghulaghqugh naqe ni luteng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapute ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh minun _ .
angegh ma kanga _ ellnga llu _ maligte te sqellug qu _ a g h u l a g h q u n u n _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ .
unatagh ma luki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ piitekagh meng _ tagitug ughte te ghllag ma kangi _ .
tagitug ughte ghllag yagu _ aghnaghagh t _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
A t g h a m u n _ aghnaghaghhagh _ p i y a q e s e n g _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghagh t _ alinge luteng _ angayuqagh meggneng _ aghnaghaghhagh _ t u q l u g h a g h a a t a g h y a q e s e n g _ akite nghite ai _ .
ima _ aviite uq _ .
aghtugh luku _ tuqlughagh aatagh nghmeng _ miiwen _ sivu meggni _ atghagh ma na yu kan _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa i _ a a p s a q m e g t e k i _ kaate ma ta a _ , _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila ni _ a v i i l n g a g h y a m i k i _ qiyaaghwagh magh mi _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ .
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavaa ma luku _ t a g h s a g h r a m _ taghtugh a _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ aghnagh ngugh _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghulaghqugh yagh luta _ tagitug ughte yagu _ ila nka _ iflii ma anka _ .
entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ .
ifla u iqe lunga _ ila nka _ aghtugh luki _ ivagh nghmeng _ whani _ qavaa ma lghiinga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ nenge lunga _ qetngigh uq _ , _ u g w a t a n g a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqetu uq _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ n e g h e s i m a k a n g a _ mangtag meng _ quyngigh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ â _ wiin _ whani _ kiyaghten _ !
unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ , _ whani _ utaqa aqe nga _ .
igatagh aqe gkuvek _ neghyukekagh gpeneng _ negh aqe i _ utaqa gpenanga _ . _ â
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ aghnagh _ aane aqe lghii _ .
A g h n e l q u s i q _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yaghtugh magh an _ tagi nghmini _ itghute aqe lghii _ tungtu meng _ ilangani _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ apa an _ nuna lgu ta ita _ ivagh yagh luku _ aghtugh yamegteggu _ aviite yan _ qenwat _ wesqaawi te ma kangat _ .
tagtalmi _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h e m _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ apa gpenun _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ aglagh langa _ .
N a a n t a t _ apa nka _ nalluke kenka _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ qavagh yaghtugh unga _ .
qavagh kuma _ angatumeng _ taghtugh naanghite unga _ .
qemall _ aghyuqe lleqe uten _ , _ pellagh yug lleqe uten _ .
apa gpek _ saama _ s u u m q e n n e g h m e n g _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
repall _ iye it _ iqaghtagh igh ma ut _ .
I g h i v g a n g h a g u _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavagh naqe aqe uk _ . _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wetku qun _ elpek _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ â _ aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
â _ whaa _ apeghtugh naqe amken _ .
vuvalla mi _ egmightaatagh u uute kumeng _ k a y a a l q e n n a a y u k a n g a t e n _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ alignaghtaagh ma lghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ liite i ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A - a _ liite unga _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ legan _ atghagh luten _ v u v a l l a k u f s i _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ . _ â
taagken _ aane yalghiimek _ nutaan _ uksaagh aqe a _ .
atghagh ma lghiik _ , _ atghagh ma lukek _ unug ma kanga _ .
kaate yaghtugh yamek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uteghte naqe unga _ whanga _ .
ellnginagh gpek _ kaate lghaaten _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uteghmun _ qiive yagh kete ni _ , _ kaynge _ aga _ maaten _ t u m a n g i t g u n _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ kaate luni _ amig m _ reghillegh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ apa kek _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavaa te aqe uk _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ tenglugtugh magh an _ amigh k _ q a m a y a a g h m i g y a q e n n i _ t a g h t u g h s i m a k e k _ .
qama _ pi ma lghiik _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ llangaqa _ eltughagh ghhagh mta _ me a _ ! _ â
â _ aaqun _ whanga u unga _ tagi unga _ !
enmis _ sukate lusi _ qelpegh te ngnga _ ! _ â
â _ kaay _ eltughagh ghhagh ut _ tagi uq _ ! _ â
qelpegh te ma kangat _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ q a v a g h l a a g h i g a l l g h e m _ iqaghtagh igh luteng _ .
eltughagh ghhagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ a a p q u g h a a g h y a g h a a t _ apa gkenka llu _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ a g h u l a g h q u l g u t a n g i t a _ naken _ pi ta a _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ a k s a q n g w a a g h u m a l g h i i _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa a _ v u v a l l a m a l g h i i _ .
sughu ke aq _ tagi laghate te luni _ negh te nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ ungipaghagh te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ alla _ neghe uute luteng _ enraq _ egmightaatagh u te ma lghiit _ , _ alignaghtaagh te ma lghiit _ .
ila ita _ sungagh t _ k a g i m l l u k i _ saguyagh megteggun _ qaake luki _ saguyagh teng _ k a l l a g a n e g h m e g t e k i _ sungagh t _ iighwigh aqe ut _ .
enraq _ ila ita _ tugu ta i _ ayvegh m _ mengqugh tun _ ullegh qaghtagh aqe kangit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga llu tuq _ egmightu aatagh lghiinga _ ! _ â
nutem nguq _ apa a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ , _ sa naqe aqa _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ E l l n g a l l u t u g h n g u q _ egmightu aatagh lghii _ . _ â
â _ legan mi _ sa aqa _ , _ â _ pi ma lghii _ apa a _ .
nutem nguq _ ila i _ sughukagh m _ aghnalqwaagh t _ pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ yakugh ke luten _ !
A g h n a g h a q r u w h a q _ a g g h i y u g n e p i w a a _ !
kimaawi ste i naqe uq _ ila itneng _ alignaghtaagh naqe lghii neng _ . _ â
aghnaghaghhagh _ ketfagh luni _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uka nguq _ suksug ghllag _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ pi aqe ut _ amig kun _ u g w a _ qagi t _ kasug ma lghiit _ ilu te mun _ nategh mun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ saguyagh gni _ k a l l a g a g h y a q e n n i _ qagi t _ i i g w y a l g h i i m e n g _ , _ kii _ nategh mi _ tepe aq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ i i g u s i m a k a n g a _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nekeve luni _ sagnegh gneng _ tugu tete luni _ tamaaken _ tepagh meng _ imigh lukek _ sagnegh gni _ sughu ke aq _ tunqugh ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ tunqugh nghmeng _ enraq _ siklagh meng _ tungsigh ma lghii _ .
tuune yatni _ u g w a t a n g a n u n _ aglagh luni _ mingle _ siklagh yagh kete ni _ kii _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tangegh iqe aq _ peksigaghte ma kanga _ .
itagnatun _ sagnegh k _ tugu lukek _ imigh aqe lukek _ tamaaken _ tangighkagh meng _ .
sughu ke aq _ uyegte ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ mumegh _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mingle _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ maaqe ma lghii _ mingle aneng _ .
meghute meng _ tugu tete luni _ m e g h s i l a a m a k a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ sughu ke aq _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ u g p e q s a l i i t a a t _ .
V u v a l l a n e g h m e g g n i _ aqfa aqe kangat _ nuna lgu ta ita _ .
qamagte uq _ .
qilughwaagh neng _ wayagh te lghiik
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
ungipagh aq _ , _ anipaghllag _ nalug ma kestagh ma luku _ qilughwaagh ghllag ni _ naken _ meteghllug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ aapte ma kanga _ ,
â _ A n i p a a y _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ?
awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ , _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ . _ â
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ .
iqlengiqe uten _ ne ke nghite aten _ .
whanga _ ne ke anka _ , _ awite te n _ iqite te n _ taagken _ . _ â
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ ,
â _ entami _ tuqlugh qagh ki _ qilughwaagh t _ taakut _ , _ angegh kangaten _ taawa _ ne ke lleqe aaten _ . _ â
anipa _ qalghigh yagh uq _ , _ naagu _ sa meng _ pi aghte nghite ut _ .
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga qun _ nagate aghte nga _ tuqlugh qagh langi _ . _ â
qalghigh yalghiimi _ meteghllug qrug _ ,
â _ Q g h w a a g h w q _ , _ q g h w a a g h w q _ , _ q g h w a a g h w q _ ! _ â
ii _ , _ akiingqwaghte aghagh u i _ .
â _ qayugham _ angegh kangatnga _ esghaghhu _ , _ awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ . _ â
anipa _ tenge ghrug ma lghii _ ima _ .
U q i t a q e s t a g h n g a a n _ aga _ tenge ste luku _ , _ meteghllug qrug _ nalug ma lghii _ taaggun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ metngegh tke aq _ A g h s i g a l l g h a a n u n
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ ungazigh meng
yuug _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh lgu ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ .
ataasigh _ panig a _ , _ ataasigh _ ighnegh a _ , _ tamaghhagh egmek _ mekestaagh staghhiinagh k _ .
yuug _ taana _ unange yu pigte lghii _ , _ unange aqe lghii _ neghsagh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ .
nulighh an _ neghsagh t _ unangkagh i _ afta aqe kangi _ mengteghagh mini _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ n e q e k u m a a q e l g h i i t _ .
ilangani _ naghaagh ma lukek _ taghnughhagh k _ mengteghagh m _ uughqa ni _ esghagh ma kangat _ angyagh _ igleghte lghii _ megh mi _ ataasigh meng _ yug ke lghii _ .
legreliqe tke ma kangat _ taghnughhagh k _ kina u ta a _ tagi lghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nuyekligh u ma lghii _ uyughagh mineng _ , _ tamaaken _ naa minun _ apegh ma kanga _ sivuke luku _ ,
â _ U p a g u g h n a q a g h p u t _ angyagh _ uukna _ nallukekagh ut _ . _ â
angegh ma kangi _ naa ita _ .
aqfaasnaq _ taghnughhagh k _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ kaate ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ taawanginaq _ uugte gpenani _ qute mun _ .
nayag an _ uyughagh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ talligh akun _ .
Y u g w e m _ aghnagh aq _ aapte ma kanga _ angyagh meng _ ,
â _ uyughagh n _ tagivagh nayagh nghite zigu _ tugumiiqe sqellug qu _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ entaqun _ qiya lleqe uq _ . _ â
Y u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ qiya kan _ tuune lleqe aqa _ .
aghnaghagh m _ tuune a _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ iiggagh nun _ y u g w e m _ .
Y u g w e m _ qaake luku _ angyagh minun _ taghnughhagh _ kete ma lghii _ kilgaa nun _ megh mun _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ s i q i n g h e m _ tevigh vig anun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ naa minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
ungipaate ma kanga _ sa mun _ yug mun _ tugu ma ni luku _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ .
naange aat _ qiya ma lghii _ ighnegh minun _ saama _ alinge ma lghii _ u g w i m i n e n g _ .
tagi ma lghii _ u g w i n g a _ mughu ta neng _ tusigate luni _ , _ uglagh u pigte luku _ unange ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
itegh luni _ aapte ma kangi _ ,
â _ naagu _ ighnegh ka _ ? _ â
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ ,
â _ Y u g w e m _ tagikagh m _ angyagh kun _ tugu ma a _ ighnegh ut _ , _ enkaam _ aghulaqe te ma a _ .
alangghu nagh ghhalek _ whangkuta _ !
ellnga n _ aghulaqe te ma a _ whangkuta _ ighnegh ut _ a g h s i g a l l g h a n _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ . _ â
Y u g w e m _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nallunagh llegh anun _ esnagh m _ .
mamleg pigte ma lghii _ .
Y u g w e m _ unite ma kanga _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ava u na an _ neqe u na an _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ a l n g u n a g a n _ igleghte ma lghii _ mamleg mi _ .
qula ani _ qalghigh magh meng _ tengaa ma lghiit _ turiig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ qalghigh llegh itneng _ nagaqugh te luni _ alingyug ma lghii _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m i _ mamleg mi _ .
negh ka nge i te ma lghii _ igatagh luni _ aligh ni _ nguug ragh luku _ lliigh ma kanga _ .
meghnugh ghllag yami _ asivaqun _ qavaa ma lghii _ temngi _ tamaani _ .
taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ma luku _ tafsi a _ ileme ma lghii _ .
tafsi a _ qughagh ghllag ma lghii _ qinuyugte ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nalluke ma kanga _ naten _ naallghute lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ esghagh ma lghii _ sivutmute _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sivu mini _ m e k e l e n g e s t a g h h a q _ n i g h u w h a q _ a k a m k e g t a l g h i i _ ighaleqetaaghte yug nitagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ n i g h u w h a g h m u n _ .
igleghte yalghiimi _ wata _ sivutmute _ n i g h u u g s i m a n g i n a a m a k a n g a _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ esghagh ma kanga _ t u r i i g g a q _ .
T u r i i g g a a m _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
â _ tugu gu _ whanga _ amiiragh ka _ . _ â
enkaam _ turiig m _ qesug ma kanga _ yaqugh mineng _ taake lghii _ silug _ .
tuune ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ pi magh an _ ,
â _ qavagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ qavagh aqe i _ qagi t _ kelu kaghagh itni _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh aqe gkuvek _ esghagh aqe gkufki _ naayghagh t _ aglagh aqe i _ tazingavek _ .
Q a y g e q l i t k u v e k _ naayghagh neng _ esghagh lleqe aten _ asi itni _ mengteghagh t _ .
ukig ggaaten _ enkaam _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luki _ aghuliigh ghhaaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ igleghte ma lghii _ tugumiiqe luku _ turiig m _ s i l u g w a _ .
aghneq _ qamagte yan _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ qagi t _ turiig m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ esghagh ma kangi _ naayghagh t _ .
taku ma kangi _ kaate luki _ maye ii ma lghii _ qule mun _ .
qaygeghte luni _ llaaghanam _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh lghute _ naayghagh m _ awatangani _ .
ukig ma lghii _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luni _ mengteghagh nun _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag ma lghii _ .
turiig m _ iknaqughi te ma kanga _ .
ne mi _ tawani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pinitun _ n e g h e s i m a k a n g a t _ .
ne m _ y u g w i _ qerngughte ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nanghiigh na luku _ .
aglagh ma lghiit _ pennagh nun _ .
asi akun _ pennagh m _ llilaghtugh ma kangat _ uglagh pigte lghii _ savig _ .
pi ma kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ n a l u g u t e s q e l l u k i _ awatghute luki _ savig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sivulii luni _ nalugute ma lghii _ qamagte luki _ savig t _ qayetghute ma kangi _ .
ila i llu _ nalugute ma lghiit _ , _ savig tgun _ tuute ma lghiit _ , _ uglagh llegh a _ tuquma lghii _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ mengteghagh mun _ .
taagken _ ungipaate ma kangi _ mengteghagh mii it _ , _ ila i _ y u g w i t a _ q e t g e g h a g h l u t e n g _ savig kun _ tuquma ni luki _ .
upugh ma lghiit _ iknaqe lghii meng _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
kayagte ma kangat _ aghulaqe sqellug qu _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ n a y y g h a m u n _ esghagh ma kanga _ ne ni _ .
uteghnigh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag luni _ .
aqupilqe i llegh m _ A k i l e g h t u s a a
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ y u w h a g h n g u q _ taana _ u n a n g u p i g l l u k u _ e s n i g h q w a t a a m a l g h i i _ .
sigugnegh igh ghllag luni _ uusqagh pigte luku _ esnagh _ ayuqe uq _ .
tawaten _ yuug _ igleghte ma luku _ n a k e n n g u q _ qikmigh ghhagh _ mulaagh qu aqe uq _ .
mulu luni _ q a l g h i l q w a a g h a g h a q e l g h i i _ llangaqa _ a q n i g h q w a a l u n i _ .
taawa _ t a w a t e s t a g h h i n a q _ naqam _ y u w h a a m _ n a a n t u l n g a _ esghagh gpenaan _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ qenwat _ esghagh aa _ sigugnegh m _ esne akun _ pakineg kau te lghii _ .
sivuligh t _ itegagh ghhagh u i ni _ aliigh qagh lghiit _ nuqnegh naqe mikun _ taaggun _ ima _ aga _ este aghagh uq _ .
sama _ tekite luni _ qalghigh ghllag uq _ .
sama _ m u l a q u m a l u k u _ tawavek _ pakineg qagh vig anun _ upleg luku _ up-tu aqe a _ .
Y a t a a g h q e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ whaa _ nalugute ghesnagh te _ akuqagh ma kanga _ , _ qaake a _ .
qikmigh ghhagh _ qaake yatni _ q u y a m _ ighwaaghtuute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ y u g w e m _ ighu kek _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ paagh ma kek _ inglugtun _ .
paagh lukek _ taagken _ aga _ sivungagh ni _ pangaleg uq _ .
maligte nghite yatni _ uteghte luni _ paagh laatagh aa _ , _ naqam _ aga _ pangaleg aqe luni _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ qikmigh ghhagh _ aneghte uq _ .
qenwat _ elpeg yug luni _ y u w h a a m _ malighqagh aa _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ unite luku _ ayuqe kanga _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ uteghte vike luku _ paagh aqe luku _ pangaleg aqe lghii _ .
qenwat _ y u w h a q _ s u k a a g h t a a _ .
aawallu _ maateqwaaqun _ y u w h a a m _ unite yagute a _ qikmigh ghhagh _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ kaate luku _ q u y a a l a a t a g h t u q _ ighwaaghtuute laatagh uq _ .
taawa _ y u w h a q _ sukaghi ma lghii _ maateghhaq _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ a k i l e g h t u m a k a n g a _ s u k a g h i m e n g _ .
tefaay _ a l i i n g h a k u n _ !
kevgaaslug _ neghnavregagh
V i r i _ V _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ataasigh _ yuug _ e l l n g i n a q e l t a g h h a q _ .
nuna mi _ t u n g a n g a n i _ ava ite ngughk _ nuna lgu ta ite ngughk _ .
unangniigh llegh ke kanga _ taawanginaq _ s i k i g g i i n a g h m e n g _ .
talwa llu _ sikig meng _ n e q e k e l g h i i _ .
naqam _ quunpeng _ p i y a a n a g h a a q e l g h i i _ .
gaagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ negh luni _ , _ taaqe nghmini _ ingliigh luni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
unaami _ piyaa aqe lghii _ .
unange luni _ uteghnigh nghmini _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig t _ afta aqe luki _ .
aymaake i _ gaagh aqe kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ kinegh ngllagh aqe kangi _ ingleghqagh u luki _ naliini _ tanpeghqagh u luki _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ sivuke luni _ esnighqwagh na luni _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ esnagh m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ igleghte ma luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ unguva lghii _ tepe nghhagh _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ .
taana _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ tugu luku _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
taglagh luni _ kangighagh ani _ mengteghagh m _ petugtu aq _ amigh _ up- yu aatagh a _ kepe luku _ u k i g s i m a k a n g a _ .
ukigllug qu _ i t e m s i m a k a n g a _ .
I t e m l l u k u _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ qepute ma kanga _ .
qepute luku _ almesigh itun _ petug ma kanga _ kangighagh kun _ .
piyaa vig mi _ unange laatagh ma lghii _ sikig meng _ .
sikigtagh ni _ akmag iigh luku _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig _ lli ma kanga _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ .
lli luku _ akite kun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ neghnavregagh _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ enta _ sa aqe ziin _ , _ p i s t e m n i _ unangkagh ka _ afta gu _ ! _ â
unangkagh a _ sikig _ u m y u g w a m i n e n g _ qayuutagh mun _ uugte luni _ ellmi neng _ amiiragh igh ma lghii _ .
amiiragh ii nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi neng _ llaag t _ uglafqe te ma lghiit _ , _ ighneghagh igh ma lghii llu _ .
U g l a f q u n e g h m e n g _ taaqe yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ p i s t e m n i _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
Y u g w e m _ e s g h a p a g y a q m i n i g u _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ ugkellikagh i _ qulmesiite mun _ kanaghte uute ma lghiit _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ .
egllu m _ qula akun _ qulmesiite _ ellmi neng _ agaghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ p i s t e m n i _ ingliigh te nga _ !
ingaghte naqe unga _ ! _ â
yuug _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ , _ mulu gpenani _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ungavig _ ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yami _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ .
I i w e n n g u q _ qemi meng _ teve aqe uq _ meteghllug _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ y u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ uuk _ aqelqagh _ !
natmun _ igleghte aqe ziin _ ? _ â
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ temngi _ maani _ igleghte aqe unga _ . _ â
Y u g w e m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ ,
â _ uuk _ weni _ whanga _ aqelqagh ke laken _ , _ atghagh ltung _ , _ negh yaghtugh ltung _ ! _ â
taagken _ y u g w e m _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ mengteghagh minun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itegh lutek _ y u g w e m _ upugha te ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug _ utaqa i ma lghii _ aqume luni _ sikig m _ amiiragh akun _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ p i s t e m n i _ , _ aqelqagh _ gaagh te gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ ketfagh luteng _ ugkelli aqe lghiit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula akun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ .
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ e s g h a n n e g h m e n g _ .
kitum _ yuug _ apeghiighsagh te aqe agu _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ ungavig mun _ .
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ , _ negh lutek _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
Y u g w e m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ piyaa naqe unga _ , _ elpek _ navek _ pi naqe ziin _ ? _ â
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ akite ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ aki yan _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ ivagh i aqe unga _ ne meng _ . _ â
taagken _ pellegh utu te ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ aki yan _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ pengughqagh meng _ talughte luni _ , _ yuug _ iigh te luku _ esghapag ma kanga _ , _ talughte neghsigh ma kanga _ .
talughte yan _ qemi meng _ meteghllug _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ y u g w e m _ mengteghagh anun _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
yug tun _ ellnga llu _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ enta _ p i s t e m n i _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
neghnavregagh m _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ iwernga _ wata qun _ .
qenwat _ aghtugh luni _ meteghllug _ qefliqe ma lghii _ .
uzimun _ mengteghagh _ ivagh i vike ma kanga _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ esghagh kanga _ kangighagh mi _ petug luni _ amigh _ i i m w a q a q _ .
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ ketfagh luku _ i t e m s i m a k a n g a _ .
S a a g s a q m i n i g u _ esghagh ma kanga _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva lghii _ .
meteghllug _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ U n a n g w a a q s e n g a l g h i i _ y u g w e m _ kayute anga _ . _ â
M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ neghnavregagh _ qesugragh luku _ amigh mun _ imeg te ma kanga _ .
ne akun _ petug luku _ aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
yuug _ unange luni _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ unangkagh ni _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ lli luku _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ p i s t e m n i _ , _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
alla _ pi laatagh aa _ .
aghtugh ma kanga _ .
mataawi tete yamigu _ amigh _ ketfagh luku _ s a a g s a q m i n i g u _ imeg tekagh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ qesugragh luni _ .
taagken _ almesigh liite laatagh ma kanga _ kiyaghnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh luni _ lliigh laatagh ma lghii _ .
A l i i n g h a k u n _ amsanagh akun _ .
tefaay _ !
T u n g y u u k _ , _ I i w e k _ , _ maaqellegh k _ sivuqagh mi
A k u l k i m _ apegh llegh a
maaqnegh ughte nghaani _ t u n g y u g h a q a a _ .
quunpeng _ tanqigh _ naqenqaghqe nghaani _ t u n g y u p a g l l a g a q a a _ .
tawani llu _ maaqellegh k _ iknaqe pigte aqe uk _ .
A s i v a g h a t a g h a a m _ nalighmeng _ q u u n g v a a m _ t u n g y u p a g t e s t a q a a _ .
kiyang _ six _ h o u r s - m i _ maaqellegh k _ aghvightagh ke ak _ .
I k e v r e g h a a g h h n e g h a n i _ iiw aqe a _ .
tepe aghte nagh uq _ esnighqwagh lghii ni _ i i w m u n _ ayuqe luku _ .
tepe aq _ i i g h h w t a q a a _ t u n g y u n g h a n i _ .
I i w m i _ iqanengenaaghte nagh a qaa _ qalmesaghtu llegh ani _ esne mi _ .
kayute nagh aqe uq _ iqanengenaagh meng _ nayigh itni _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ qalmesagh ni _ .
aywaayage m _ iiwpag ste aqe a _ .
I i p a g h l l a n g h a n i _ e l l m a a r a l q i n a a n a q a q u q _ .
S u l p i k
T u u g _ â _ g h i m _ apegh llegh a
M e k e l g h i i g h h a g h n g u q _ taana _ S u l p i k _ , _ aange ghllag nghite ngughk _ , _ q u g w i n t a r k a g g a q _ , _ a n g l i n a s u w h a q _ elngaatall _ .
I g g a a r k i t a a g h a q e l g h i i _ ilangani _ piyug nghmini _ .
elngaatall _ iye kek _ n a n g l l a g r a k g u u t a q e l g h i i k _ ilangani _ .
nasaperaghpag qaghte luni _ ayuqe lghii _ army _ c a p - m e n g _ .
atugh kek _ j a c k e t - e g h l l a g e k _ , _ n a g t u q a g h p a l g e k _ , _ aligh kek _ taake lghiik _ ellnga ni _ .
atuqe aqe lghii llu _ q u l l i g l l a g e g n e n g _ segesqugh kek _ ilaagh ghllagkagh gneng _ , _ kameraagh ghllag gneng llu _ singigh a _ singigh gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ legra aqe lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ sa meng _ esghaghkagh mineng _ .
A m y u g h w a a t u q a q _ a m y u g h w a a g h u s i q a q e g k a n g a _ uglagh lghii _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ni _ ilakumtaagh minun _ .
quunpeng _ teghigniqe u lghii _ nenglagh aqe lghii _ .
nenglagh kaqe kangi _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh ni _ .
sumegh ke igate kanga _ talwa _ esla m _ a l l a n g u g h h r a k e g t u l n g a _ ne meng _ uyavagh nun _ piyutagh u nghmini _ .
A m y u g h w a a g h n g a a g h m i _ pinitun _ pingwaagh ke lghii _ .
ilakumtaagh an _ piyuke aqe kangat _ ila u luku _ qayughllak _ u m y u g w a q e g t a q _ .
sa lleghqagh meng _ s u u m q a a l l a t a n e g h m i n i _ n u l q a v i i g h s i m a a q e l g h i i _ , _ a g h u l i i l k i q n a n i m a a q e l g h i i _ .
kiyang _ nenglaghnagh luku _ sa u a _ e s g h a m a a q e g k a n g a _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ sa meng _ ila minun _ n e n g l a g h t i l l e g h q a m e n g _ u m y u g w a m i k u n _ sumeghtaghagh ma aqe lghii _ .
kaagkagh _ q e l l u u g t a _ .
kaagkagh t _ q e l l u u g t a a t a n e g h m e g g n i _ q e s u g y u g w e m _ .
â _ atugh lghiit _ qesug nagh pigte ut _ aghula te ghllag t _ repall _ kaagkagh ka _ q e l l u u g t a a _ .
qenwat _ aghula unga _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh m _ ilakumtaagh ni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
S A N G U L L U U K _ qemi mi
S i v u q a g h h m i i t l u _ , _ sivungagh mii t llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ ulimaagh at
S u l p i k _ taana _ qemi mun _ mayugh kusiigh ghngaaghmi _ sa meng _ allakaayagh gmeng _ esghaate igate ngughk _ .
alla _ maaten _ mayugh luni _ , _ agigte luni _ , _ y u g s u g h a y a l g h i i m i _ sa u a _ allake ma kanga _ esghagh igate kete ni _ t e s p a m a n l l u k u _ , _ elngaatall _ iye kek _ n a n g l l a g r a k g u u s i m a l g h i i k _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sa u a _ taana _ esghagh luku _ elngaatall _ egtugte pagte ma lghii _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ egtugte pagte te kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ ,
â _ K a - a - a y _ ! _ â
E s g h a g h y a q m i n i g u n g u q _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ angqaperug kegte aq _ , _ uka llu nguq _ taku kestagh aqe a _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ â _ pi ma lghii _ S u l p i k _ .
E s g h a n q e g s i t k e s a q m i n i g u n g u q _ iye ghllag kek _ , _ ggute ghrugllag i llu _ .
A g i t a g h q e g h l l a g l u n i _ e l l n g a g h l l u g w i n a a n u n _ ayuqe uq _ .
nanugh m _ m e l q w a t u n _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ ayvegh m _ tugu ta atun _ tulughyag ghllag kek _ , _ iye ghrugllag kek _ legan _ kilgaa ni _ miluqutagh ke kek _ .
N u n m a a s q u g h h a q _ uka _ taku kestagh aa _ .
alingruugh ghllag luni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qimag na luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ enraq _ pi yalghiimi _ a l i n g r u u p a g l l a g e m _ ighu kek _ kayaali ste qugh u aghagh ma lghiik _ .
iitek nguq _ talligh gni _ a g h u l a s i m a a g k e n k a _ pi yagh uq _ ,
â _ H u y _ ! _ H u y _ ! _ â
alike aghte nghite a nguq _ .
taagken _ s l i n g s h o t - e g n i _ suumqagh u te ma kek _ .
nusug lukek _ uyghag ligh lukek _ qiinghute luku _ guute naqe yagh aa _ , _ guutepagningite uq _ , _ talligh kek _ u n g e l e g t e g h l l a g e m _ .
E n r a g h n g u q _ s l i n g - e n g a n _ r u b b e r - k e k _ a g h y u m _ kepe kaqe ma lghiik _ .
â _ A - a y _ ! _ â _ , _ pi uq _ S u l p i k _ .
T a w a t e t e g h n g a a g k e n k a _ inglu inagh u ghngaan _ qiinghute luku _ guusagh aa _ , _ manu ngiighhagh akun _ uyghag a _ tekite uq _ .
sumeghtaghagh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ .
â _ sa meng _ milugh qaghte lakun _ ! _ â
tamaavek _ esghaquaghaghte yalghiimi _ uyghag nguq _ whaa _ saaghw ani _ , _ akuqagh aa _ tawavek _ milugh na luku _ .
uqliite luku _ , _ nekefqaghte magh mi _ miluute kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ â _ A a - a a _ ! _ â
aragh te lghiit _ n a g a s a q m i n i k i _ llangaqa nguq _ igaghvig mi _ ilakumtaagh i _ ,
â _ A q n i g h n n a q a g h p e k u u t _ alla _ m i l u g h p e n a a m t a a _ ! _ â
pi yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ taakut _ pi nga yu t _ igaghyagh lgute i _ amiiragh ghllag m _ asi aneng _ aga _ qimagugh te ma lghiit _ .
S u l p i g e m _ malighqagh luki _ kaate yamiki _ qeleqetaaghtagh ma kangi _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ alinge ma lghiit _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ wata _ s u w a g u l u n i _ .
A k e q u u g h t a a t _ seal- i qugh naqe ni luku _ , _ savig teng _ , _ uunghagh teng _ , _ qamiye teng _ tuune aqe ni luki _ sa u a _ ipa _ akequsagh keqaghte litgu _ .
wetku _ a k e q u u g h t e n g n g w a a g h y a t n i _ q e l e q e t a n e g h m e n g _ taaqe ai _ .
taagken _ a g l a m a l g h i i t _ .
kaate luteng _ akequsagh teng _ tagite uute ma kangit _ S u l p i g m u n _ .
aane te kete luku _ S u l p i g e n k u n e n g _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ allameng llu _ a m y u g h w a a g h n a a n g h i t a g h p u t _ .
qakimallu _ s u f l u g w a l w a a q l i _ ! _ â
iye _ inglupigagh
angyagh na mi _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ egtug nagh mi _ u g m e s t a a g h h a l u k u _ qavagh lghii ni _ .
Y u g w e t _ pi aqe ut _ ,
â _ T e n g _ â _ g h u n a a g u q _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ u n u g m i _ qavagh naqe ut _ . _ â
S U L P I G E M _ pilaataqu llegh a
W a m i y a a m _ apegh llegh a
â _ S u l p i i k _ !
S u l - P I I K _ ! _ â
S u l p i g e m _ naa an _ t u q l u m a k a n g a _ ,
â _ S u l p i k _ , _ tagi aghten _ , _ tagi ragkiigh qagh a _ ! _ â
S u l p i g n g u q _ igleghte te kete luku _ H o n d a - m e g t e g g u n _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ whaa _ aghyuugh naqe aatnga _ . _ â
legan _ naa an _ i n e g h q u g h w a a g h w a a g h a a _ honda-k _ m e t n g e g h u t e f q a a y e k _ pi sqellug kek _ .
ineghtekau ghngaaghmi _ n u q e n n e g h m e n g u q _ aghtugh uq _ , _ metngegh yug ghllag _ , _ esnighqwagh yug ghllag _ qenwat _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
naqamllu _ esnighqwagh llegh a nguq _ una _ a g h y u u l l n g u n a n i _ aghqe aghtekagh _ .
esnighqwagh vigkagh minun _ kaate luni _ , _ qagughrug kun _ H o n d a - g n i _ aghula i aghte lukek _ , _ ategh luni _ piyug meng _ esnagh mun _ a t g h a a m a l g h i _ .
taakwani nguq _ tepagh meng _ saghna yalghiimi _ .
qagi igh ghllag nguq _ , _ saveg ii aghte luni _ megh _ u n _ â _ g a _ , _ imani nguq _ qagitu uq _ .
S u l p i k _ saghna pigte ghngaaghmi _ sivugte yalghiimi _ neghsagh _ qagi m _ ayeme te aqe a _ , _ repall _ n a n g l l a g p a g t u q _ .
quya pigte luni _ nalla anun _ aglagh aghte luni _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh luku _ kelevagh ma kanga _ .
iiwenllu _ k e l e v a g h q a g h a q a a _ nengulgha llegh neng _ sivugte yalghiimi _ ila a _ neghsagh m _ kana _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
legan _ taana _ peghhe qagh luku _ ila a llu _ teskana _ takuaghaghte luku _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh aa _ .
imange i nguq _ aangwaagh uq _ .
P e g n e k a n i q _ s a y u g w a a _ .
alla _ qingsig qagh yalghiimi _ qagi nun _ , _ paninang _ pi nga yu a _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ wiin _ allameng _ qingsig naqe nghite unga _ ! _ â
elngaatall _ quya uq _ .
â _ taawa _ aghyuugh naqe nghite aatnga _ honda-k _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ â
salin _ k a y a a l n g u q _ enraq _ nuna _ k u m l a l u n i _ qiighnagh ghllag _ enkaam _ q a m u l l g i n n a q _ .
qiighnite nghmini _ nuna mun _ gginagh a _ mateg qaghte vzigh aqe lghii _ .
iwernga _ n e n g l e n g e l t a g h a q e l g h i i _ q u y a m _ neghsagh meng _ .
taagken _ pegnem _ ataasigh _ kaat ute qaghte luku _ H o n d a - m i _ uvite anun _ ila i llu _ aqfa i _ .
elngaatall _ piyaqli aqe aq _ qayughllak _ mekestaaghhaa lghii _ .
Q i i g h n i t a g h a m i k u n _ taaggun _ qamagte qaghte luki _ pegnem _ kaat ute te luki _ H o n d a - g m i n u n _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
S u m e g h t a g h a m a l g h i i _ ,
â _ seghleghhalek _ n a t e n n g a m _ q a k u g h n a q s i n g i _ , _ aglagh te naqe zingi _ . _ â
aghliigh yug yagh luni _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ ,
â _ iitek llu _ uteghpagtagh lleqe unga _ , _ ataasigh t _ k a t u l l u k i _ ila i _ aqfa aqe luki _ pi lleqe anka _ . _ â
meghnaali yami _ ataasigh _ qaake naqutke ma kanga _ H o n d a - m i n u n _ .
tugu luku _ kevegsigh u aghagh a _ ima _ peghhe qaghaqe a _ qayughllak _ uqigtu ghllag _ .
ila i llu _ n a n g h i q w a g h s i m a y a q a n g i _ mataawi te ma kangi _ .
S u l p i k _ y u g s u g h a y a l g h i i m i _ , _ h i i k _ , _ maalghug _ e s n i g h q w a k _ esnevagh aqe uk _ .
ukapighqaagh yayek _ tagsigh ma kek _ .
arekull _ nulighh ghqu te uk _ elkek llu _ e s n i g h q w a k _ .
uka _ tagi qrugtugh ngugh _ y u w h a q _ .
Y u w h a a m _ kaate luku _ upugh ma lghii _ ,
â _ kii _ , _ u n a n g s a m a t e n _ ! _ â
S u l p i k _ quya pigte lghii _ , _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ T e p u g h i i _ taaggun _ elngaatall _ uygute luteng _ ! _ tea- te te _ â _ g a v e k _ esghagh negh mni _ a k u r a g h a q a n k a _ ayeme te lghiit _ , _ kelevagh aqe anka _ legan _ . _ â
taagken _ y u g w e m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ una _ a m s a k e n g h a t _ qaake naqe aqa _ H o n d a - g p e n u n _ qayughllak _ honda-gken _ me ke ta ghhagh k _ . _ â
iwernga nguq _ t u n u t e g k e n k u n _ qaake luku _ asighte te vyigh aa _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ y u g w e m _ ,
â _ maalghug _ taake uk _ qaake lleqe agka _ honda-gka _ aange uk _ , _ saama _ iknaqe uk _ . _ â
Y u g w e m _ q u y a k u l l u _ aga _ i g l e g h q a a t n g i n a m a g h m e n g _ .
angayuqagh an _ S u l p i g e m _ p e n g _ â _ gun- ii te aat _ a v i i t n g w a a l g h i i _ S u l p i k _ .
liigike kangat _ metngeqagh u lghii _ H o n d a - g n e k u n _ .
S u l p i g e m _ naa an _ u g w i n i _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ naagu _ S u l p i k _ , _ navek _ pi a _ , _ p e n g e n g h i s i g u u _ ?
ivagh yaghtugh naqe gu _ ! _ â
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ navek _ m e k e l g h i i q r u w h a q _ aghulaqe laatagh a _ !
whaa _ legan _ a g h y u u g h m i g t a a n a q n g w a a q a _ ! _ â
ata a _ y a t a a g h q e l l u n i _ ila gkenkun _ H o n d a - m _ aghulaqe uq _ .
iiwenllu _ igleghte lqinagh aqe uq _ uka _ key- nghhagh at _ , _ mamlegte yaghtugh lghii _ .
H o n d a - n g i g h h a a t _ taakwavek _ tume tgun _ s a n i v a q u n _ i g l e g h a t _ , _ taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ liisuqe a nguq _ S u l p i k _ uka _ H o n d a - n g i i g h h a a g n e k u n _ tagi lghii _ .
taagavek _ qiive qaghte luni _ a m i g i m a k a n g i _ .
T u g h w a a g h y a q m i n i k i _ piyaqminiki _ , _ kii _ , _ neghsagh meng _ usi lug teng _ .
kaate luki _ aghuliigh uute ma lghiit _ .
S u l p i g e m _ ata a _ p u y g u u g h n g u q _ ima _ a g h y u u g h m i g n a q n g u y a q a n g a _ S u l p i k _ .
S u l p i g e m _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ata ni _ ,
â _ qivghu pigte unga _ elngaatall _ metngegh lghiinga llu _ H o n d a - k l u _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ aa-a _ , _ wiin _ aglagh kumta _ aleghqugh lleqe amken _ . _ â
wetku _ kaate luteng _ ne mun _ S u l p i g e m _ n e n g l l u g u t a n g i _ pi yalghiimeng _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pi nga yu t _ neghsagh t _ S u l p i g e m _ mallu ke ai _ .
qamagte luteng _ quya te ut _ elngaatall _ .
pi nga yu a _ taana _ neghsagh m _ u s i i t i l g h i m u n _ tuune ma kangat _ , _ kayusigh i lghii _ qayughllak _ .
naange a _ elngaatall _ afta ma lghii _ .
afta nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ uyegte ma lghii _ awalightu ma lghii _ u v i q l i m e g g n u n _ , _ q u y a g h l l a g e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ , _ S u l p i g e m _ naange a _ neghsagh liigh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute neghsigh te kete luki _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aleghqugh ma kangat _ S u l p i k _ qaatke te nghite llegh aneng _ , _ metngegh llegh aneng _ , _ H o n d a - g n e n g _ metngeghute i llegh aneng _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ S u l p i k _ !
qakimallu _ uqiigh te aqe i _ , _ n a a v u t a q l i t e n _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ tenpe te aqe i _ .
iwernga _ aneghneghte uten _ mallu nge ughtagh u lghiiten _ . _ â
alaghrang _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ aghulaqe naqe negh gpeni _ navek _ a a p u t n g w a a q a g h l u t e n _ pi aqe i _ !
ungipaate aqe luta _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ pengeg fqaamta _ pi aqe lta _ !
aapute aghte manginagh lukek _ honda-k _ atugh aqe i akek _ . _ â
taawa _ S u l p i k _ liite uq _ aapute yagute naqe uq _ .
akeqe ma kangi _ angayuqagh ni _ ,
â _ quunpeng _ neqamike aqe lleqe aqa _ n a p i y u g l l a g h n g a a g h m a _ sivuke lunga _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ .
whaken _ kenlanga _ elpetegnun _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ elngaatall _ aviite yaghqagh ghllag _ taawa _ a l l g e g h s i m a a n _ .
taana llu _ ilate luku _ atuqe gkuvgu _ qaatke te ma llegh _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ , _ quya te aqe lleqe ukut _ . _ â
siingvallagha
Q u g w a y u n g h i t e m _ , _ e f q u g h y u n g h i t e m _ me t _ a a n e s q a g h t a m e n g _ akuzi lghii ni _ .
mekelghiigh _ naa mi _ m e g h t i i s q e s a t n i _ naa ni _ pi a _ ,
â _ aa-a _ , _ pi lleqe unga _ ! _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ siingvallagha igate ut _ , _ me n _ ayghigh lleqe uq _ . _ â
naayghagh _ taku ste na nigh ke aq
Q i r g e n g a a w e t e m _ apegh llegh a
S u l p i g e m _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ megh iitagh ke ukut _ ! _ â
â _ meghtagh lleqe unga _ ! _ â _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ S u l p i g e m _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ taayughqe ma lghii _ meghtagh na luni _ .
aate ma kangi _ uqig allugh ghhagh k _ k a m e r a a g h p a g g a a g n i l l u _ j a c k e t - t e g h p a g g a a g n i l l u _ .
tespamavek _ kiiw gnun _ piyug meng _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
aghneghmi _ tawani _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh ghllag _ .
elngaatall _ n g u u y n g a g h a a t _ qinuyugte ma kangat _ S u l p i k _ .
malghugnegh neng _ qalta ligh luni _ kiiw gnun _ tespamavek _ meghtagh ma lghii _ a t u q r u g h w a a g h u m a g h m i _ ,
â _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa _ . _ â
â _ K a a - a a _ ! _ â
A q n i g h q w a a m a l g h i i _ elngaatall _ .
arekull _ vegtaagh m _ kaape ma kanga _ aghenqignegh akun _ ullungag akun _ .
qiya vzigh ma lghii _ a q n i g h q w a a m _ angtale aneng _ .
I i g g e l l u w h a g h m i n e n g _ q u g w i n p a y u w h a g h n e n g _ e f l u g h w a g h a g h s i m a k a n g a _ kaape lleg ni _ .
kiiw gnun _ kaate luni _ qalta ni _ imigh ma kangi _ .
A t g h a m u n _ qalghigh te lghiit _ piyaqminiki _ leghllegh t _ aga _ tespamavek _ kiiw m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ pi aqe ut _ .
tumangani _ qalta ghhagh ni _ lli luki _ m e g h n a a l i m a l g h i _ .
nekevgha te kete luku _ tawani _ esghapag ma kanga _ naayghagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ apegh qumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh mini _ .
awen _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kanga _ ungipaghagh mi _ taana _ nateghtu langa _ naayghagh _ sangami llu _ taku snanigh kau ta a _ .
taagken _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiimi _ mangteghagh mun _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ p e n g g a a q e f t u q _ uteghpaarkitaagh magh mi _ esghagh naqe magh an _ uka _ qemigh a mi _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ S u l p i k _ elngaatall _ pengegsigh uten _ ! _ â _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
S u l p i g e m _ iqenge te yagh aa _ nengyugh ni _ , _ pegnem _ inglupigagh meng _ iqenge te a _ qayughllak _ ullungag a _ puuve ghllag nga lghii _ .
â _ ukavek _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ gginagh n _ !
kii _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ ?
sullevneghhaleg _ una _ !
kitum _ pi uten _ ? _ â _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
S u l p i g e m _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ nakaa _ , _ vegtaagh m _ taglagh ma lunga _ kaape kaqe aanga _ pamavek _ meghtagh ma lunga _ ! _ â
piniqe pigtekanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ t a w a n i g h l l u w h i i n a q _ ukmangigh aghte ma kanga _ ullungag a _ .
I g h i v g a g h y a n _ , _ negh te nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ , _ S u l p i g e m _ taku yuguma kangi _ ilakumtaagh ghhagh ni _ kiiw gnun _ pikagh t _ .
taagken _ p i y a a t a a g h l u n i _ kiiw gnun _ sa u a _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
nagasugni yalghiimi _ llangaqa _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ , _ nalighmeng _ kaynge _ , _ nanugh _ .
nagaqugh ma kangi _ akuzite lghiit _ k i i g w e m _ esne gkeni _ .
piyaqminiki _ aragh kaqe te lghiit _ arekull _ ilakumtaagh i _ naghaagh te aqe ut _ .
â _ S u l p i k _ , _ sukate luten _ tea- ai _ ! _ â _ aragh ma lghii _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
â _ kayusiite aghte kut _ iqallug _ una _ t u g u n a q u t k a q a g h p u t _ . _ â
S u l p i k _ sukate naqe pigte luni _ p i y u l l u n a a g h u m a l g h i i _ enraq _ ighu k _ takestaaghhagh m _ suka ighlliqe ma lghii _ .
â _ S u l p i k _ aghuliigh i _ nagnegh aghte lleqe uten _ esnevaghpag kuvek _ ! _ â _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
siingenllu _ S u l p i k _ uka _ u l l g h i t a p e r e w a a g h a q e f t u q _ aragh magh mi _ .
aga _ isiqghuute ghllag uq _ ! _ naate naagh a nguq _ iqallug _ tugu naqekagh at _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ t a k w a g h a g h l l u k u _ S u l p i k _ kayusiite luku _ n e k e v e s i m a k a n g a t _ .
qute mun _ taslugh luku _ uyghag m _ saaghw akun _ a q u m e s i m a k a n g a t _ .
kameraagh kek _ anighaaghte lutek _ u q i g t u g h q w a a m a l g h i i k _ megh m _ i m i g h y a q m i n i k e k _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ iqallug _ kameraagh an _ ilu ani _ .
taagken _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ S u l p i g e m _ iqallug _ tugumiiqe luku _ .
S u l p i k _ u n i q a g h a a s i m a k a n g a t _ qayughllak _ a g h i r a a m _ sukangiite ghllag lghii _ .
nagate laatagh ma kanga _ taana _ qawaagte yu gni _ qalghigh lghii _ llangaqa _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ .
U p u m _ angtale aneng _ elngaatall _ iqallug _ qete ghllag ma kanga _ .
S u l p i k _ ne mun _ kaate yalghiimi _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pengeg aqlaatagh uq _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ sangavek _ aghitqe ghllag ziin _ !
P u g w i m a g h y a g h s i i n _ ? _ â
I q l i g h m i _ S u l p i g e m _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ E s t u g h a g h l l u n g a _ kiiw gnun _ aghitqe unga _ ! _ â
â _ kii _ , _ S u l p i k _ uyuq _ q a k u n n g a m _ liite naqe ziin _ ! _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ a g h y u n i i g h u m a k a n g a _ .
U n u g m i _ tawani _ amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ .
tanqigh _ elngaatall _ nighugtu te _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ aliigh kestagh aqe uq _ .
S u l p i k _ aane yuguma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ mayugh luni _ a m a a n g u y u g s i m a l g h i i _ .
â _ A a a - r u u u _ ! _ â _ mulaagh ma lghii _ .
â _ paamyuq _ u n u g w a a _ itegh i ngam _ , _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ amig meng _ eslate mun _ qineghte luni _ tuqlugh aa _ .
S u l p i k _ qetgegh yalghiimi _ qakma _ miiguute ghllag uq _ manughagh kun _ .
S u l p i k _ itegh yalghiimi _ aagra ita _ ilu a _ nighug ghllag _ qayughllak _ nanigh at _ qetngigh lghiit _ .
A l l i g h i g h w a a g h l u k u _ nuna kun _ y a t a a g h q u t n g w a a g h l u k u _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ayuqe a _ .
â _ A p a a y _ , _ alla _ ungipaghagh te aghte nga _ ! _ â
S u l p i g e m _ aapte a _ nengyugh ni _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ â _ nengyugh an _ angegh ma kanga _ ,
â _ emta _ nagate lghaaten _ naghaagh gpenang _ a g h u l i i g h w a a g h l u t e n _ ! _ â
S u l p i g e m _ piniqumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh an _ atugh laatagh aa _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ , _ tanqigh m _ y u g w i _ .
S u l p i k _ nagate u ghngaaghmi _ aghsaan _ a a p q u g h w a a g h l l a k _ .
qenwat _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ ungipaghaate mete nghite ngugh meng _ ,
â _ sangami _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a a w a _ naayghagh _ piikna _ ? _ â
nengyugh an _ k i i m s i m a k a n g a _ ,
â _ kitum _ alngunak _ taku igate a _ test- pig ke na _ naayghagh _ ! _ â
â _ sangan _ ? _ â _ i q l i m y u g w a a g h u m a g h m i _ S u l p i g e m _ aapte a _ .
â _ qayughllak _ whangkuta _ tespikavek _ pi igate ngugh u kut _ ! _ â
nengyugh ghhagh n _ qenwat _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ N a t a a t a g h t i i n g a _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a g h a q a m k e n _ tespagavek _ pi gpenang _ ! _ â
ineghte ghngaatni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ u m y u g w a g h h a a g k e n e n g _ avaagh igate ngughk _ aligate llegh a _ naayghagh mun _ .
legan _ iiwen _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ pengeg aqe kanga _ .
repall _ p e n g g e m _ iiskughte aqe kanga _ S u l p i k _ navek _ aghulaqe na yu kan _ nallu nghmini _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ S u l p i k _ n u l q a a v i i g h s i m a l g h i i _ navek _ pi na luni _ .
iiwen _ t a a n a n g w a a q e l g h i i _ naayghagh _ u m y u g w a a n i l n g u q _ .
naqamllu _ esghagh nghminigu _ almesiqe aqe kanga _ , _ alla u nghite ngughk _ ila itneng _ naayghagh neng _ .
â _ A a p _ , _ a p a a y _ ! _ â
S u l p i g e m _ nengyugh ni _ t u q l u m a k a n g a _ iighaghtugh magh mi _ mangteghagh m _ tunuqagh anun _ .
nengyugh an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ ay _ , _ sa meng _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ â
S u l p i g e m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ naayghagh _ taku kaqsagh aqa _ a p a a y _ , _ naqamllu _ sa nghite unga _ ! _ â
â _ sangama _ qaatke nghite zinga _ ! _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ a g h y u g h u m a k a n g a _ .
S u l p i g e m _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ,
â _ puughte amken _ ! _ â
â _ ii-i _ , _ â _ k e n i m i i t a _ S u l p i k _ piighaghte ma kanga _ nengyugh an _ ,
â _ paagkut qun _ esghaqagh ki _ kaangugh lghute t _ . _ â
S u l p i k _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ A p a a y _ , _ naayghagh m _ qula akun _ aag ut _ , _ naqamllu _ sa nghite te ai _ . _ â
â _ sa u luku _ emta _ ! _ â _ pi ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ .
uksaagh nghaani _ vegaagh llu _ , _ nunivagseghagh llu _ paligh kestagh nghaani _ ne mi _ tawani _ q u u g g u t a q e l g h i i t _ .
S u l p i g e n k u t l u _ angaghqugh aqe lghiit _ esnagh meng _ quugkagh meng _ uksulqusigh _ atughqagh meng _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ naagu _ qalqalima ut _ ? _ â _ nengyugh an _ aapte ma kanga _ S u l p i k _ .
â _ kii _ , _ puygu ma aqa _ quugte vig mni _ , _ â _ S u l p i g e m _ ungipaate a _ .
â _ aa _ , _ aqfa aghte gu _ q u g w a g h s i i g h n a l u n g a _ pi aqe unga _ kumagh u qu te kaghqagh meng _ , _ â _ nengyugh an _ kayagte a _ .
S u l p i g e m _ esnagh mun _ quugte vig minun _ tesamavek _ qalqalima _ aqfa ma kanga _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ taakwani _ tumangani _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ .
nagasugni yalghiimi _ naayghagh meng _ sa u a _ n a g a q u m a k a n g a _ .
llangaqa nguq _ ellnga _ tuqlugh kanga _ .
nagasugni kestagh ghngaaghmi _ neqagh te ma kanga _ qalqalima _ a q f a a k e n n i _ .
naalkellug qu _ wata _ quugte luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
Q a a m g g u n g i n a q _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ elngaatall _ n u l q a a v i i g h t e m _ p i l a t a a m a k a n g a _ , _ navek _ p i y a a t a a g h y u g l l a g e m _ .
kaateqaghte luni _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ ,
â _ pagavek _ pi aghte langa _ , _ uqfigagh yagh qagh langa _ ? _ â
â _ aa _ , _ k e l e n g a n g w a a g h l u t e n _ .
sa u a _ allake gkuvgu _ tespagani _ uteghte lghaaten _ , _ â _ nengyugh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
unaami ani _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ allake ma kanga _ S u l p i k _ .
P i n q u s i g h m i n e n g _ S u l p i k _ aghuliigh lleg ke iqe nghite uq _ .
repall _ nengyugh an _ aksaqe luku _ iiskughte ma kanga _ kelengake ma kanga _ qayughllak _ S u l p i k _ naayghagh mun _ a y u q n g w a a l g h i i _ .
llaaghanam _ S u l p i k _ aga _ tespagavek _ pi aqe uq _ .
nengyugh an _ esghapag ma kanga _ uteghmun _ qiive ghesnagh aqe luni _ n a a y g h a g h l l u g w i n a g h m u n _ taglagh lghii _ .
S u l p i k _ iiwenllu _ naayghagh m _ nategh anun _ kaate aqe uq _ naken _ sa u a _ nagate laatagh aa _ .
naayghagh _ qule mun _ y u v g h i i g h w a a g h y a q m i n i g u _ paga _ kiigh ani _ qughsatku ghllag _ e l l n g a g h l l u w i n a a n u n _ ayuqe luni _ .
qughsatku ghllag _ nekefqaghte luni _ q a l g h i i l l u u g l l a g u m a g h m i _ esla _ p a t e g p a g h q w a a _ .
S u l p i k _ a l i i n g e m _ repall _ iflaaghwagh ma lghii _ sa ma lghii _ aviite qaghte aghte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ liite qaghte luni _ qimag naqe ma lghii _ .
kayalaawi ghngaaghmi _ ungelegte ghngaaghmi _ s u k a a n g i i g h h a a g n i _ qamagte lukek _ aqfaate ma lghii _ .
elngaatall _ aqfaate ma lghii _ uteghmun _ qiive yukagh gpenani _ .
pi yalghiimi llu _ whaa _ mangteghagh meggnun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ amig meng _ eslate mun _ e s g h a p a g a a q e f t u q _ .
taawa _ liite a _ sangami _ naayghagh _ taku snanigh kau ta a _ .
liite a llu _ sangan _ nengyugh ni _ qaatkesaghqagh ke te ni _ .
aqsa m _ imigh a
anglegute ke te ii na lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh k _ nayag eng _ p i n g a y u q l u k u _ angyagh meng _ nunaagh meggnun _ pi ma lghiit _ .
apa ita _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ taaga _ aqsa m _ imigh a _ kete ut _ . _ â
kilgaa n _ qikmighagh a
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
S u l p i g e m _ qikmigh ni _ S i i l p a k _ mangteghagh meggnun _ l i v i n g - r o o m - m e m u n _ itghute luku _ , _ neghsagh m _ q u g w e z i i n e n g _ iqlugte yaghqagh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
A q u m u t a g h l l a g e g n e k u n _ n e v e g h l l u n i _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ , _ navek _ piyaa aatagh u lleghqagh meng _ .
â _ S u l p i k _ !
una _ qikmigh _ sa aqlaatagh a _ whani _ ?
legan _ tanughqe i u aghte unga _ !
aane ste gu _ ! _ â _ naa an _ agniqe te ma kanga _ .

qallate luku
T a w a n i n g i n a q _ , _ mulu gpenani _ sa yaghqagh t _ piighaghte lghii ni _ .
mekelghiigh _ neghsagh meng _ afta lghii _ kilighpag ma lghii _ .

igaghvigraaghagh
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
usi ii sta _ angyaghpag _ kaate ma lghii _ .
qaa ii te aq _ esnagh mun _ pi na luni _ naa ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ naagu _ M a a r p a _ ?
angyaghpag t _ e s g h a g h y a g h t u g h y u g w a n k a _ . _ â

â _ M a a r p a _ qepghagh aqe uq _ esnagh mi _ .
I g a g h v i g r a a g h a g h q a g h n g u q _ kaat ute a _ u s i i s t e m _ , _ â _ naa an _ ungipaate a _ .
apa an _ qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ â _ whangkutung _ pi ltung _ . _ â
Q i i t a a n k u k _ apa ke te lghiik _ qaasqagh meng _ agigte yalghiimek _ unaghsigh _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ q a k u m a k a n g a t _ .
alla _ salngag _ uglagh ghllag _ aange aqe luteng _ mekestaaghhagh u aqe luteng _ tamaa _ .
sa u ak _ iglegha aqe uk _ leveklug ghllag k _ qamiye vyiigh gneng _ qamugh ke lutek _ .
aghuliigh yayek _ qepghagh te lghiit _ saghya meng _ usi ghllag u ma kegket _ qamiye k _ .

â _ maakut _ aghtugh yiite ut _ , _ â _ naligh ita _ siivanllegh _ pi uq _ .

naa an _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ â _ uksaaqun _ elpek llu _ igaghyagh lleqe uten _ . _ â
â _ igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ ? _ â _ Q i i t a a m _ aapte a _ naa ni _ .
naa an _ pi a _ , _ â _ taaqe ma katgu _ . _ â
vegaagh _ s u n g a g h y u w i i l l u n i _ , _ unug rakegte tete te magh mi _ lliigh magh an _ qaa ii te aq _ a n _ â _ gun- igh luni _ itegh yan _ naa an _ pi a _ , _ â _ ingaghte yaghagh lleqe uten _ ighivgaqun _ .
unaami _ igaghyagh lleqe uten _ . _ â
I g h i v g a g h m i _ t a w a a n i _ qaa ii te aq _ ingaghte luni _ qavagh nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ unaami _ igaghyagh lleghqagh ni _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nghmeng _ .
iwernga _ qavagh qaghte ma lghii _ .
unaami _ naa an _ qaa ii te aq _ p i l u g u g w a a _ nutaghagh perewaagh meng _ .
Q u l l i r a a n g l l a m a k a n g a _ b l u e _ d e n i m - m e m e n g _ .
kuusme mi _ M i s s i o n - n e k e g k a k _ shirt- tek _ Q i i t a a m _ e s g h a g h a a k _ naa an _ aflengake ma kek _ igaghyagh sigh u lukek _ .
kameg k llu _ nutaghagh u uk _ b l u e _ d e n i m - m e k _ flannel- meng _ ilupeghagh leg k _ iwernga _ nateghqagh pig meng _ nateghqagh leg k _ .
aate ai _ M a c k i n a w - g n i l l u _ nasaperagh ni llu _ qateghrakegtagh _ s a i l o r _ c a p - a _ angyaghpag neng _ ata an _ tukfigh aa _ .
naa an _ aglagh ta k _ igaghvig mun _ Q i i t a a n k u k _ saaqwligh ghhagh meng llu _ ighnegh ghhagh t _ P a n t u _ .
Q i i t a a n k u t _ itegh yalghiimeng _ uglagh u pigte uq _ igaghyagh _ .
mekestaaghhagh t _ naa ita _ nalighmeng _ nengyugh ita _ maligte aqe luki _ .
P a n t u n k u k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ ataasigh _ q i y a a m a l g h i i k _ apeghtughiste meng _ alinge lutek _ .
apeghtughiste m _ aghnagh m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aag llegh a _ wiin _ aglagh te sqe a _ salin _ mekestaaghhaa ni luku _ .
qaa ii te aq _ t a b l e - l e g n u n _ apeghtughiste m _ aglagh te a _ .
sa meng _ apeghtugh i sta _ akuzi uq _ laluramke stun _ Q i i t a a n k u t _ liigike nghite aat _ .
aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh mineng _ tagite i lghii m _ Q i i t a a n k u t _ m u m i g g u t i i _ , _ â _ elpek si _ t a w a n l e n g u g h n i _ t a b l e - l e g n i _ , _ T a b l e _ O n e - n g u u s i n g u q _ . _ â
E s t a m a g u f t u t _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ tawani _ t a b l e - l e g n i _ .
apeghtugh i sta _ laluramke _ akuzi laatagh uq _ .
aghnagh m _ t a a m _ tagite i lghii m _ mumegh igh qugh te laatagh aa _ igaghyagh nun _ , _ â _ N o r t h _ star _ usi ii sta _ tagi aqe uq _ .
aghnequn _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkufsi _ igagh naanghite usi nguq _ . _ â
taagken _ apeghtughiste m _ apeghtugh ai _ Q i i t a a n k u t _ whaten _ p i s q e l l u k i _ , _ â _ N o r t h _ star _ i s _ c o m i n g _ . _ â
Q i i t a a m _ liite naqe ghllag aa _ aglaqugh mi _ apegh na luku _ angayuqagh minun _ .
qamagunginaq _ peghqigsagh uq _ , _ â _ N o r s _ star _ i s _ c o m i n g _ . . . _ N o r s _ star _ i s _ c o m i n g _ . . . _ â
aanleghaate luteng _ tamaakut _ i g a g h y a q u u s i t _ igaghyagh nghhagh t _ Q i i t a a n k u t _ pi aqe ait _ , _ â _ L i t t l e _ Y e l l o w _ B e g i n n e r _ ! _ â _ R e a d i n g _ Book-ni _ liite tke aat _ â _ L i t t l e _ Y e l l o w _ C h i c k e n _ â _ enkaam _ igaghyagh nghhagh t _ mekestaaghhagh t _ L i t t l e _ Y e l l o w _ B e g i n n e r s - n g u n i i q e g k a n g i t _ .
qaa ii te aq _ aglagh yami _ ellmeggnun _ iitghute kete luku _ aragh uq _ , _ â _ N o r s _ star _ i s _ c o m i n g _ ! _ â
ata an _ usuqe a _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ aawallu _ liite aghte ma uten _ igaghyagh luten _ . _ â
uksaagh aqe a llu _ Q i i t a a m _ ata a _ itegh luni _ ungipaate a _ nuliigh ni _ igaghvigraaghagh _ taaqe ni luku _ , _ yuvghiigh yagh te aqe ni luku _ .
qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ â _ whangkutung _ igaghvigraaghagh _ yuvghiigh yagh ltegnegu _ . _ â
igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ itegh yayek _ Q i i t a a n k u k _ ata ke te lghiik _ aghnaghagh m _ ungipaate ak _ ellnga n _ igleghte te naqe ni lukek _ .
amigh k _ q e l p a l n g u q _ itegh yuwhaagh aat _ .
taana _ r o o m - m e g h r u g l l a k _ llivelghagh ghllag u uq _ , _ s a y u g w a a t a t _ savikenghaagh t _ tamaa _ .
yuug _ laluramke _ inga _ r a d i o - m _ manu ani _ aqume luni _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi uk _ Q i i t a a n k u k _ , _ â _ taana _ o f f i c e - n g u u q _ . _ â
yuug _ laluramke _ nekeve luni _ sa meng _ a l e g h q u g h w a a _ Q i i t a a m _ ata a _ .

O f f i c e - m i _ ila a _ taawa _ amigh k _ ila anun _ r o o m - m e m u n _ .
taamavek _ ivgagh yalghiimeng _ taawa _ t a b l e - l e g h r u g l l a g e k _ uzimun _ pumsugtu uk _ .

ataasigh m _ aghnaghagh m _ q i i p s a q m i n i g u _ megh _ maaqe uq _ .
aag llegh a _ q i i p s a q m i n i g u _ uguqnagh lghii _ megh _ maaqe uq _ .

amsanagh a qaa _ aghneq _ qafsina

kavilngugh k _ qiipaghagh k
Q i r g e n g a a w e m _ apegh llegh a
kiig m _ w h a n i k u k e s t a a n i _ amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ a q l a g h a g h r a a g t e k e s t a q _ .
qagugh ak _ q a l g h i s i m a g h m i _ naghughte qugh a tuq _ negh niigh vig meggnun _ aglaghtu te aqe ut _ .
siqinegh _ asivagh kestaamaan _ ilakumtaagh ke te lghii ni _ t e g h i g n a l k u m t a m n n e n g _ naghaagh te ukut _ iighaate ukut _ sungaghyug kegtagh mi _ vegaaghtuqagh mi _ .
esla mi _ neqelghutagh m _ saaghw ani _ naa ka _ qasiqagh meng _ gaagh aqe uq _ esghapag magh emta _ .
tamaani _ aghnagh t _ qiipaghagh igh te aqe lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ q i p a g h a g h q a m e n g _ .
ila i _ a v l a a w a a t a m e n g _ saghna luteng _ naama yaghqaaghte nghata _ qiipaghagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ e s t u g w a g h m e n g _ tukfighagh meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ iqeghte aqe lghii meng _ qiipaghagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
naa ka _ pingayugnegh neng _ q i i p a g h a a l e k _ .
ataasigh k _ qepghagh te zikek _ g a g h u s i k e k _ .
ila kek _ temngi _ a n _ â _ gun- igh qragh te zikek _ .
pingayugnegh kek _ wetku _ sa mi _ J u l y - m i _ , _ kuusme mi _ , _ S u n d a y - y a m u n _ aate aqe kek _ .
taake uk _ qiipaghagh k _ gaaghusigh kek _ puygu naagh nghite kegka _ .
kavilngugh k _ p i i t e s i i g h a m e n g _ igagh leg k _ qatelghii meng _ , _ sungaghyug kegtagh meng _ , _ sungaghyaag meng _ .
llangaqa _ i g h i v g a n g h h a s t u n _ n e q a m i k n g w a a g h a g k a _ taake uk _ atugh u kek _ quni ii nga i sigh ke gkakek _ whanga mun _ .
T a a m _ qiipaghagh m _ aligh a _ n e g h u v a l n g u q _ qigughrug nite ngughk _ allangughte te ukagh _ k i y a g h t a a l l e m n i _ .
tawani _ kiig mi _ kitum _ milugh aanga _ naasqugh mkun _ .
Q i i y a a g h w a g h t u n g a _ elngaatall _ .
gaagh vig mineng _ naa ma _ tuqlugh aanga _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ ! _ tea- ai _ whavek _ .
unite ki _ taakut _ qinunaghqe lghiit _ . _ â
naa ma _ a p e g h t u g h a n g a _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh t _ qinunaghqe nghata _ avelghaqiinagh aqe ki _ , _ unite aqe ki _ . _ â
taagken _ quni igh aanga _ aligh aneng _ t a a m _ n e g h u v a l n g u u m _ , _ ilutu na lghii m _ kavilngugh m _ qiipaghagh m _ .
kina _ alngunak _ efqugh kekagh lgu aqe lghii _ enkaam _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i t _ m a l i g g n a q e g k a y u g w i t _ .
whanga _ efqugh ke kaqe a _ piniqe pigtekaqe a _ naa ke aqa _ S i v u g l l e g h i i _ .
ungazigh meng _ t a g i k a g u q _ C h u k o t k a - m e n g _ e s n e n g a n i l n g u g h m e n g _ ungazigh meng _ .
maaten _ ungazigh m _ y u g w a _ nuughqagh u te kau lghii _ tasigh mun _ .
naa ka _ e l n g a t a l l _ kaki yuqagh _ .
uglagh u pigte luku _ muutagh nge aqe lghii _ kameg meng _ , _ atkug meng _ ila aneng llu _ aate te kaghqagh m _ .
kitumtu te _ alngunak _ sa u a _ pi naqe kayugu kanga _ , _ ilangani _ apeghtughiste u magh mi _ , _ ilangani _ aghallegtagh nge magh mi _ .
nenge a _ quunpeng _ m i n g l l e g n e q e g t a q _ .
temngi _ k i y a g h t a a g h i g a l n g u q _ piniqe i nga lghii _ aghnagh _ .
maaten _ paninang _ w h a t e g h l l u w a a q _ neqagh te aqe agka _ kavilngugh k _ qiipaghagh k _ .

sivuqagh m _ naayghagh a

upenghagh m _ ughug a qaa

pinighnagh llegh kesagh kanga _ uksaagh m _ ,

kiik _ tagi uq _ nuverragh magh mi _ uksugh _ aghulaqe ma luku _ .

uksaagh m _ tagite aqe a _ iqeghtagh kegte aq _ u l i t e l l g h a
