allanqik _ alla _ uksugh _ sekete laatagh uq
ulig na luku _ qategtu te _ anigu meng _ .
nunaagh mnni _ teghigniqe llegh ut
ukaagh
iglegha llgu uq _ aghneghmi _ nunaagh mnnun _ nasqagh mun _ itghagh naqe lghiikut _ .
amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ qilagigh luni _ naqam _ iglegha nagh uq _ .
maaten _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ nasqaghte aqe ghngaamta _ , _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ kiig ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ itghagh aqe yalghiikut _ .
angyat mnnun _ uugte naqe te inagh _ , _ â _ t v v v v _ â _ l e v e k l u g w a n _ ivenruute m _ , _ megh m _ kasughqu llegh an _ kaate ragkiigh yug ste aqe kanginkut _ nasqagh mun _ .
ataasigh meng _ kaate naqe te inagh _ teskiwavek _ aag kaqe te lghii gni _ , _ A q e t l u _ , _ aqfaasnaq _ esnagh meng _ uusnegh u aq _ m a y u g h a g h p u n g _ .
naangngwaaghagh ta lgu lghii _ q e l a n g h a q e l g h i i k u n g _ kaate lleghqagh mnneng _ nunaagh mnnun _ .
â _ A q e t _ , _ ii-i _ !
naangngwaaghaate m _ utaqa aqe ainkung _ ! _ â
pekagh magh ma _ pi aqa _ .
A q e t _ n a a n g w a a g h a t a g n u n _ aqume qaghte te kete luku _ kayagte aanga _ , _ â _ aaga ste nga _ . _ â _ aaga ste aqa _ qevute lugh u i aghagh te kestaamaan _ aaga llegh igh inagh u kete te _ .
qevuute luni _ aaga yalghiimi _ taqughte ghllag kek _ q a g h l e g a g h t a a g h a a k _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ napaqagh kek _ aghvegh m _ a g l u q s a q e k _ , _ tapghagh kek _ aqumutagh igh lutek _ unaghsigh meng _ .
ilangani _ aaga ghllag negh mta _ napaqagh kek _ qaprag aqe lghiik _ aaga llegh inagh mteggun _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ asi i _ iime luteng _ itegagh mnneng _ pakig qaqu nghmeng _ aaga naqe m _ .
T a a n a n g i n a a n g h i t u q _ p i i q e g k e f u t _ nasqaghte lleg mnneng _ kenlanga _ p i w a l l e m n n u n _ sivuqagh mun _ igaghyagh na luta _ .
ila a _ t e g h i g n a l k u m t a a g h p u t _ p u g w i m a n e m t a _ naayvaghpag mi _ nasqagh meng _ q a n t a g h a n l e n g u q _ .
liite naqe aqe lghiikut _ p u g w i m a m e n g _ aghqestaallegh ani _ esne ani _ .
ivegh aqe lghiikut _ kenlanga _ megh _ tamlu mnnun _ kaate llegh anun _ .
megh m _ asi ani _ nuna _ piyugkagh ut _ maatnegh aqe lghii _ qetustaaghhagh u magh mi _ itegagh mnni _ .
ila a _ teghigniqe sigh ut _ iigge mnneng _ ila put _ i s i q a g h t a n e m t e k i _ kenlanga _ ghhuu te m _ ungelegte luta _ lliigh lleg mnnun _ .
taagken _ itegagh raaghinagh m ta _ vegaaghtuqagh kun _ piyug aqe lghiikut _ .
ataasigh meng _ A q e t _ qetgegh uq _ aragh magh mi _ , _ â _ kaa _ ! _ â
tuute qaghte yalghiimi _ sikughllug kun _ .
taagken _ s e n g e l q a m e n g _ uteghpaarkitaagh uq _ a l l a g h l l u w h a g h m e n g _ nutaghagh meng _ t u k a l e g a l g h i i s t u n _ .
â _ kelenga luten _ , _ â _ aragh aanga _ , _ â _ ila i _ tamaakut _ vegaagh m _ ipeg pigte ut _ .
aqnighnagh pigte ut _ tuute qaghtekufki _ . _ â _ iwernga _ ilangani _ mangteghagh mun _ i i t q a g h s u g w a q e l g h i i k u t _ aqfaate aqe lghiikut _ vegaagh m _ qaye akun _ leganqun _ sikig stun _ kaviigh meng _ qimag lghii stun _ .
aliineghllug mi _ piyutagh u aghagh qu kut _ esnagh mi _ ivagh i aqe ukut _ tepekagh meng _ aqimle lghutagh meng _ , _ negaghpag m _ p u g n a t n g a n e n g _ .
mulu gpenaamta _ uglaghi ghllag aqe ut _ s a g h n a p u t _ enkaam _ e s t u g w a g h i i r a a g h u t a q u k u t _ mangteghagh mta _ tunuqagh ani _ .
U g h a r r a m e n g _ p i e - y e s q u n g l l a a g h a q u k u t _ akume luku _ q e n a a v z e g h a g h m e n g _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ q u q u n g a g h m e n g _ .
aki kaghqagh lug ke i _ e s t u g w a m n n i _ lli aqe aput _ .
ata mta _ i l a a k w a a g h a _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ t a m a a n l e n g u u t _ uviqligh ke ke put _ .
mangteghagh at _ n u t a a g h a q _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ tunemagh a _ nuna mun _ tuute nga lghii _ .
ellngit a _ mangteghagh at _ nuna meng _ tuute nga nghite ngughk _ u n a g h s i g h p a g m e n g _ n e n g k i l a g h l u n i _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ataasigh meng _ n e l l i q r u u g e m _ kaate ainkung _ .
A q e t l u _ a a g h h w m e n g _ itegh lutung _ mangteghagh m _ asi anun _ naalkute ukung _ l a a g w a a g h l l a g m e n g _ tesamani _ .
U q f i l q a a g h m e n g _ takaghqughvike luku _ s a a p a g h p u n g _ vegaagh meng _ q u q u n g a g h m e n g _ .
S a a p s a q e f u n g _ nallunagh ghhalek _ nuna mun _ i l a t n g w a a g h l u n i _ .
taagken _ e s g h a g h a g h p u n g _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ n a g h u g h l l e g h h i _ , _ t u q l u g h a g h p u n g _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ naghaagh lgusigh yaghtugh kung _ .
whani _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aaghhe uq _ sa kun _ waakaghte gpenani _ kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh mnnun _ .
â _ T h u n k _ ! _ â
K a l e f k a g t u q _ l a a g w a a g h m u n _ .
N e n g l a p a g l l a g e m _ repall _ aqsa ligh negh ka _ a q n i g h n a g h q w a g a a _ .
kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh ut _ pi niigh pigte yan _ n a n g h i i q w a a q a g h p u t _ taghnughhagh itnun _ i g l e g h a t _ .
W h a n i k u m i _ siqinegh _ tevigh ste gpenaan _ , _ A q e t l u _ aqfaate aqe ukung _ asitmun _ uusneghwaagh mi _ esnagh mun _ .
S u k e r a g h l l a g e m _ iqu aqe lghiikung _ ullghitagh magh emtung _ asitmun _ nenglagh te magh emtung _ .
wetku _ i q u n g h a n _ ingyaghaghte aqe kegka _ nategh anun _ iqu nghite negh mni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ meghnag liigh qu kung _ esghapag magh an _ siqinegh _ tevigh lghii _ .
elngaatall _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h y u g n a g h t u q _ esghapag kau luni _ .
qilag a _ kumgayaaghte luni _ iqeghta meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
Q i l a a w a a g h e t _ llangaqa _ s i l u g w e t _ angighhekagh t _ kumgayaagh m _ iqeghtagh atun _ .
ataasigh meng _ emta _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ taglagh lutung _ mangteghagh mnnun _ ingaghte qughtu kut _ .
A q e t e m _ sigutqugh aanga _ , _ â _ whaa tuq _ m a a n l l e g h h i i k u t _ quunperugllag _ . _ â
sivuqagh m _ uyghag i
Y i m i g g a a m _ apegh llegh a
kestekau nghite ngughk _ uyghag _ tutmagh kaqe a
tea- ma anun _ igleghte te ikagh t _ .
iimken _ ima
sivunegh mta _ tutmagh kaqe aat _ una _ nuna _ .
uyghag t _ maakut _ u l i m g h u s i i k a t _ .
liite tke ait _ apeghtu sagh neng
uuvganeng _ atugh u lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ighsa luni
qaatke te nghmeng _ naa minun
taagken _ unakegkagh a _ ila ni _ .
nengleg ketu te _ s e g h h e s l e n g l u t e n g _ u n u g m i _ ,
ukmangightu te _ maqaaghte luteng _ aghte llegh mi _ .
maakut _ uyghag t _ naghaagh vig ukagh t
naa m _ taghnughhagh ghhagh ni
esnagh mun _ naghaagh yagh te aqe kanga
A m s a a n a g h l l u g l l a g m i _ .
kestekau nghite ngugh t _ uyghag t _ ukut
T a w a t e l n g u u t _ ayumigh ke ta a _ tamaghhagh an
T u t m a a s g h a q e g k a t _ y u g w e t _ maaqute lghii stun
Q u u n p e g h l l a k _ a g h u l i i l l n g u n a a n _ .
alpa m _ manig i
A w i t a a m _ apegh llegh a
whangkuta _ maaten _ ataasigh inagh u gpenaan _ upenghagh mi _ p e n n a g h t e k a y u g u t e m m n e n g _ liisimake ke put _ alpa m _ manig i _ , _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ m e k e s t a a g h h a a g w a q l u t e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
enkaamllu _ alpa t _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ ighni aqe lghiit _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
ayumigh _ laluramke t _ kaate llghite luki _ sivunegh put _ u p e n g h a n g h a n i _ angyaghtu nghmeng _ taaqe negh meggni _ pennagh nun _ k i i g s a g h t u q a y u g w e t _ .
enkaam _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ m a n i g n i i q a y u g w e t _ .
tawatete kayugu te meggneng _ liite tke ait _ alpa m _ manig i _ naten _ sa kayugu ta i _ .
whaten _ enkaam _ ungipamsug kaqe ait _ , _ i g h n i y u g w a a g h l u t e n g u q _ tugu luki _ manig it _ u t e g h a g h t i l u t e n g _ sivuligh meng _ mani gmeggneng _ m e k e s t a a g h h a a g w a q u t _ manig it _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ pingayut igh nghmegteki _ nalighmeng _ estamat igh nghmegteki _ u t e g h a g h t i l l e t e n g _ , _ m a n i g i n n g u q _ inglugtun _ n u v u g y u g t a q u t _ .
tallimat igh nghmegteki nguq _ u t e g h a g h t i l l e t e n g _ qenwat _ manig it _ inglugtun _ n u v u g y u k g u u g h t a q u t _ .
ipa _ tawatete yaghqaa ut _ , _ qayughllak _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ alpa t _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ i g h n i k a y u g w e t _ .
enkaam _ inglu inagh anun _ n u v u g y u g t e n g n g a k u m e n g _ , _ i f k a g h y u g n a m e l n g u u t _ i f k a g h a a t a m _ avaquti naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
naqamalla _ inglugtun _ n u v u g y u k g u u g h t e k u m e n g _ uzive llegh i _ nengigh inagh meggnite luteng _ lliigh yaghqagh t _ .
taawa _ avaquti yaghqagh t _ .
T u g w e q _ / _ uunghagh
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
atughqagh t
atugh llghite ngugh meng _ igaasigh meng
1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ X _ 2 _ inches _ angka lghii meng _ igagh meng
kuynge m _ u k m a n g i s i i n e n g _ nalighmeng
me ke ta ghhagh meng _ paper _ c l i p - m e n g
ulima llegh a
1 _ . _ igaasigh m _ eraser- nge an _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ imeg te ggu _ igagh _ m a l g h u g e g n e n g _ .
neve steggu _ igagh _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ .
nuqnegh lleqe a _ igagh _ igaasigh m llu _ saag na yu kan llu _ .
kepe nakesi _ igagh _ u n e g h w a a g m u n _ .
2 _ . _ kuynge m _ u k m a a n g i i s i i _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ i n c h e s - n g h u l u k u _ kepe luku _ .
inglu a _ a g h u g h h n a k e s i _ o n e _ q u a r t e r _ i n h c - n g u l u k u _ .
A g u g h n e g h e m _ uziveaghaghte aghte snaanghite a _ i g a s i m u n _ nekegtekan _ .
nekegte nakesi _ wayagh _ igaasigh m _ i q u g w a n _ inglu akun _ s c o t c h _ tape- meng _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ inch _ piiznga an _ .
agughte nakesi _ wayagh _ piiznga lghii _ nekreg u luku _ .
taawa _ uunghagh _ taaqe uq _ .
nekreg a _ alngunak _ sa mun _ a t u g u q _ .
I g u q w a _ igagh leg _ u n e g h w a a g m u n _ kepekagh meng _ t u u g g h u u q _ .
mughute kayug _ tamaghhagh mi _ t u g w e g h m e n g _ kelqe aqe uq _ mughute negh meggni _ .
savikenghaagh leg _ n u v u g y u k e g t a m e n g _ ( _ igagh _ u n e g h w a a g m u n _ kepekagh _ ) _ siku mun _ u m u t a l e s u u s i g u q _ .
siku _ ugmestaaghhagh u kan _ nalighmeng _ qetustaaghhagh u kan _ t u g w e q _ sufluqaghte te yaghqagh _ siku mun _ .
mughu ta m _ liisimake yaghqagh a _ kanagh nagh ta a _ .
angyagh mi _ kangqwaaghtuqagh mi _ t u u m k a g h q a m e l n g u g h m e n g _ siku mun _ a y a g h q u s i q e g k a y u g w e t _ .
inglu a _ nekreg leg _ atuqe llegh a _ uglagh lghii _ .
unangkagh t _ siku m _ esne anun _ kaate nghata _ nekreg luki _ qaake aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh meng _ , _ m a k l a g m e n t _ pilag lghii ni _ u n g u u t i m u n _ a t u q a y u g w e t _ .
tuugtagh mun _ s i q l u g w a m e n g _ n u s u g u s i q e g k a y u g w e t _ .
â _ nekreg luku _ nekreg t _ n g e v y e g n e n g _ iknaqe nagh ut _ . _ â
â _ T u u g g h e n _ atugh ghhu _ .
ketngig gpeneng _ pinigh uq _ . _ â
leghllegh
leghllegh t _ upenghagh mi _ kaawtu ta itneng _ iingtagh lug ke i llu _ unake naqe kayugu ut _ .
leghllegh t _ qawaagyag neng _ negh yugnagh lghiit _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ .
qikmigh m _ I l a k u m t a a l l e g h p i g a a
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
A y u m i r u g l l a k _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ qikmigh _ uqfigtuqagh mi _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m i _ .
qikmigh _ amaa mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A m a a y _ , _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
â _ A - a a _ , _ sa aqe stuung _ legan _ , _ â _ akite ma kanga _ amaa m _ .
qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
tagtalmi _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te luni _ qilug ma kanga _ .
â _ ii-i _ qilug gpenang _ , _ â _ ineghte ma kanga _ amaa m _ , _ â _ kaynge _ tagi lleqe uq _ , _ neghe lleqe ainkung _ . _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ K a y n g a w h a _ w h a n g k u t e g n e n g _ iknaqe nghite a _ sangan qun _ amaa m _ alike agu _ . _ â
taagken _ qikmigh m _ ivagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ kaynge _ .
naalkellug qu _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
â _ A - a a _ , _ â _ angegh uq _ kaynge _ .
llaaghanam _ qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ qikmigh _ qilug laatagh ma lghii _ .
kaynge m _ a g h y u n i i g h a a _ , _ â _ saa _ una _ , _ qilug gpenang _ ! _ Y u g w e m _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
qemall _ tagi luni _ p i t e g q a g h l l e q i i n k u n g _ ! _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ awilleqa _ yuug _ iknaqe lleghpigagh u lghii _ .
sangan qun _ u u m _ alike laatagh agu _ . _ â
ivagh yaghtugh luku _ naalke ma kanga _ yuug _ .
taana llu _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ â _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
Y u g w e m _ angegh aa _ .
kiyaghte lqinagh lutek _ , _ ataasigh mi _ u n u g m i _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te laatagh luni _ qilug ma lghii _ .
Y u g w e m _ kayeme a _ , _ â _ taku gu _ , _ taku gu _ !
tugu gu _ , _ tugu gu _ ! _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ yuug _ ipa _ alinge igate uq _ . _ â
qikmigh _ taawa _ alligte ma lghii _ yug mi _ .
tefaay _ !
alpa
alpa t _ megh m _ qawaag ke ai _ .
qawaag m _ ila atun _ u q e g h h m u n _ aghulaqe igate ut _ uksugh mi _ .
uksugh mi _ megh ughte negh an _ a n g y a g h n a g h h n e g h a n i _ esghagh aqe ait _ .
upenghagh mi _ esne mun _ taglagh yagute aqe ut _ .
alpa _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ pennagh ni _ megh mi _ nalug ma uute aqe uq _ .
paninang _ uglagh ghllag _ tengaa te aqe uq _ .
alpa t _ pennagh ni _ ighni aqe ut _ .
manig i _ kiyang _ a t a a s i w a q u t _ , _ ila i _ m a a l g h u g w a a q u t _ .
manig i _ tugu lghii ni _ alla _ ighni aqe ait _ , _ u t e g h a g h t i i n i i q i i t _ .
pennagh ni _ piyaqnagh u i llegh ani _ y u g w e t _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ mayugh luteng _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ tugulagh te aqe ut _ .
P a l a s q u g h h a q _ t u g w a a q a a t _ .
uglagh ghllag _ piyaqnagh llegh anite ngughk _ tugu igate uq _ .
alpa m _ negh kangi _ negh aqe aput _ , _ nutaghagh at _ inikagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
tukrugtekagh t _ gaagh luki _ nalighmeng _ ilangani _ tawatete luki _ n e g h a a q u t _ .
amighqwaagh i _ atkug kaqe ait _ .
yuginagh _ qula _ siipnegh ke luku _ alpa m _ amighqwaagh a nguq _ naama aqe uq _ atkug u luni _ .
tunusagh t _ kumag nun
T a g i k a a m _ ungipagh aa
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh _ , _ umiileg at _ paallghu nkut _ , _ q e t g e g h y a a n k u t _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ m e l n g u u n k u t _ .
umiileg _ taana _ q a m a r i l a k a y u k _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ nunalgute ni _ taakut _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ Q a m a r i l a n a q u n g a _ , _ qerngughte te k _ ! _ kina _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ s a n q u t e l i l l e q a q a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ paallghu nkut _ , _ q e t g e g h y a a n k u t _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ m e l n g u u n k u t _ qerngughte te ma lghiit _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ qamarila m _ a y a a v i i g h a _ qiighw nge ta leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ , _ saaghw akun _ lli ma kangi _ sanqute t _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ q e t g e g h y a a n k u k _ paallghu nkuk _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ nuna _ uzive tegnegu _ . _ â
E n k a a n g a m _ m e l n g u u n k u k _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ kayagte ma kek _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ naayghagh _ uzive tegnegu _ , _ taagken _ uteghnigh ghhaasi _ whavek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ q e t g e g h y a a n k u k _ paallghu nkuk _ sivuke lutek _ igleghte ma lghiik _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ iigh ma lghiik _ .
iigh lutek _ pinitun _ m e g h n a a l i n g w a a g h u m a l g h i i k _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
kaate yamek _ nguuyngaaghagh _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ tagi ukung _ nuna _ uzive luku _ ! _ â
apayepayiigh ghhagh nkuk _ m e l n g u u n k u k _ uzive ma kangat _ pengughqagh ghllag _ .
qesiqun _ uzivekagh at _ pengughqagh u nghite uq _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ .
apayepayiigh _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh mun _ .
melngugh _ n u n m a a w h t a p a g e m _ kinguligh u luni _ kaate ma lghii _ .
katelghaate yata _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ sanqute meng _ tunqugh ma kangi _ .
paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ a t k u g w a n e n g _ qatelghii meng _ .
A a s a q m i n i g u _ taagken _ kenlanga _ paallghu t _ q a t e g h s i m a k a n g i _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ apayepayiigh t _ negaghpag niigh yagute ma lghiit _ sugukelengiigh meng _ nguuyngaaghagh meng _ .
qetgeghyagh _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh mineng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qetgeghyagh t _ q e t g e n e g h t u g h s i m a k a n g i _ s u k a a g h s i m a g h m e n g _ .
melngugh _ tuune mangite ma kanga _ qayughllak _ n u n m a a w h t a q a q _ .
quunpeng _ s u m e g h t a g h a g h l l a g u g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
enkaam nguq _ m e l n g u u t _ igleghte yagute ma lghiit _ naasqugh teng _ q u g h a g h l l u k i _ .
qamagte uq _ .
P a g r u g w a q
P a g r u g w a a t _ tamaakut _ p i n i g h r a k e g t a t _ qawaag t _ sivuqagh mi _ .
uksaagh mi _ a g h u l a q e g k a y u g w e t _ .
I g h n i k a y u g w e t _ pennagh ni _ q i l u g h a a g h n i _ a l n g u n a l _ naayghagh ni _ .
sa mun _ atuqe igate ngugh t _ a m i g h q a a g h i _ negh igate ngugh t _ negh kangi _ .
iwernga _ neghyaghqagh t _ negh ke igh sag mi _ .
ata m _ liilightugh llegh a _ ipa u uq
T a g i k a a m _ ungipagh aa
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ungazighmii _ aghnagh _ u g w i l e k _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh leg k _ .
tagtalmi _ u g w i n g i g h a a m a l g h i i _ .
sighineg mii m _ y u g w e m _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ u g w i n g i i l l g h i i _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
taana _ yuug _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ .
tagtalmi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ enkaam _ sighineg mun _ aglagh te ma kangi _ .
taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ atakaghqagh ita _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ â _ qagavek _ alngunak _ ilate qaghtagh gpenatek _ , _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ amyuutke lleqe i istek _ . _ â
P u u g h s i m a q e g k e k _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ ulape sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ ulape aqe lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ u k s u u m _ u n a n g u l u k u _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
uteghnigh lutek _ nagnegh ma lghiik _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ a w a l i g h p i g a a g h l l u t e k _ nefkagh aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh lutek _ taglagh aqe lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ taglagh uute lghii _ naghughte qugh luku _ kaate aqe lghiik _ ne mun _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ uksulqusigh _ .
ataasigh meng _ unaangu luku _ tungtuqu yagh laatagh ma lghiik _ .
tungtute lutek _ atghagh ma lghiik _ aghneghtu ghllag luku _ .
tungtu kekagh tek _ kaat ute te luki _ nagnegh laatagh ma lghiik _ yuug _ tamaa na _ maligte luku _ esavghagh ma lghiik _ .
ata ita _ a w a l i g h p i g a a g h t e s n a n i g h a q s a q e k _ .
tawani _ aghtugh ma lghiik _ ayveghagh nghmeng _ .
tamaakut _ ila i _ ayveghagh te luteng _ taglagh uute ma lghiit _ elkek _ ayveghagh naqe ma lukek _ .
qenwat _ w h a n i k u m a k a n g a _ .
ayveghagh qaghte lutek _ iiwenllu _ yataaghqe aqe ak _ uyughagh a _ kelute mun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghaate ma lghii _ puyughpag meng _ .
anengagh ni _ aragh u aghagh a _ , _ â _ I i i _ , _ iike te ainkung _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ ayvegh _ pegte luku _ kelute mun _ kilgaaqu ma lghiik _ .
esne anun _ siku m _ kaate yalghiimek _ nutem _ a m e l t u g h q w a a l u n i _ .
naqam _ iiwleng _ tea- te te _ â _ g a v e k _ siku _ s a a g r u k e g t a q _ .
tamaa na _ s a a g r u k e g t a q _ siku _ anuqe mi _ legan _ megh m _ teve yaghqagh a _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ .
uyavagh ghllag lutek _ kaate ma ka ak _ iighwilngugh ghllag _ .
sikuvag nun _ mayugh lutek _ tespamani _ qaye itni _ laag te lutek _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ weni _ tuqusigh naqngu nghite kumtung _ sa naqe i _ ! _ â
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ nuyekligh _ tunag mineng _ saguyagh igh luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uyughagh n _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ u y a v a g h p a n e n g _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ â
uyughagh n _ n a g a q u t e g h n g a a g h m i _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite unga _ . _ â
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ meteghllug _ qalghigh laatagh ma lghii _ u y a v a g h p a n e n g _ , _ iwernga _ maateghniineng _ q a n t a g h a n l l u n i _ .
uyughagh ni _ aapte laatagh ma kanga _ .
maaten _ uyughagh a _ n a g a q u n n i m a l g h i i _ .
nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ n u y e k l i i m l l u _ alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ alla _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ q a n t a g h a n l l i i g h a g h l u n i _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagaqugh nghite aqa _ ! _ â
iwernga _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qakma _ u q e g h h m i _ qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q u q q u q q u q q u q q u q _ . _ â
anengagh an _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awii _ .
whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ pi aqe uq _ whanga inagh ma _ taglaate na lunga _ . _ â
qakma _ qalghigh laatagh uq _ meteghllug _ , _ â _ Q u q q u q q u q q u q q u q _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ pi a _ , _ â _ A a a _ , _ nanghiiqu naqe i _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ meteghllug _ ? _ â
anengagh an _ akite a _ , _ â _ whaten _ pi aqe uq _ , _ â _ â _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ maalghug u lutek _ .
taawanginaq _ uka _ tume mi _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uusqagh lghii _ â _ . _ â
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ qemqagh u aghagh a _ a a n a l u t e k _ .
aane lutek _ uyughagh ni _ n e v e g h t e s q u m a k a n g a _ .
N e v e g h s a n _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ kenigh mineng _ saape ma kanga _ .
taagken _ m e t e g h l l u g w e m _ ghhatagh te ma kek _ igleghte ma lghiit _ q u u l v a q u n _ .
igleghte luteng _ , _ igleghte luteng _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ meghnaali ma lghiit _ .
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ n e v e g h t e s q e l l a a t a a m a k a n g a _ .
N e v e g h s a n _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ saape luku _ kenigh mineng _ ghhatagh laatagh ma lghiit _ .
mulu luteng _ n a l u g l a a t a m a l g h i i t _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ m e t e g h l l u g w e m _ m e g h n a l i v i g k u n _ naayghagh mi _ alungutellegh leg mi _ uyghag kun _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ taawanginaq _ naayghagh _ mayughvig ite uq _ .
anengagh an _ ila a _ tughneghagh- ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ .
amiklug _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
anengagh an _ aleghqugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ , _ â _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
anengagh an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ â _ pi aqe aanga _ whanga inagh ma _ may- te na lunga _ . _ â
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wetku qun _ whanga _ sivuke lunga _ mayugh te linga _ , _ taagken _ elpek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ a m i k l u g w e m _ sivuke luku _ uyughagh a _ may- te ma kanga _ .
taagken _ uteghte vike ma kanga _ anengagh a _ .
qaygeghte lutek _ ne mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ ne mii it _ i l a g a a n n e q e g s a a t a q e l g h i i t _ .
qagugh m _ nunalgute m _ alignalghii ngiighhagh a _ i l a g a q a y u w h a a _ ilagagh te aqe lghii _ .
ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ u n _ â _ g a _ tuquma ni lukek _ n a g a q u m a n i l u t e n g _ .
ata at _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ llangaqa _ whaa _ siku m _ ilu anite lunga _ ilagagh unga _ , _ iqlengiqe unga _ weni _ ! _ â
alla _ ilagagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghma _ m e t e g h l l u g w e m _ pi unga _ ghhatagh te na lunga _ .
aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ukung _ .
igleghte lutung _ aghuliigh lutung _ siku kun _ meghnaali ukung _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe laatagh ukung _ .
aghuliigh ukung _ ingani _ m e t e g h l l u g w e m _ meghnaali vig ani _ .
weni _ iqlengiqe unga _ . _ â
kaate lutek _ mekelghiigh k _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte lutek _ nagate ma lghiik _ .
qama _ ata ak _ ilagagh aqe uq _ .
ilagagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ taagken _ meghnaali lunga _ a m i k l u g w e m _ mayugh te aanga _ .
qaygeghte yamtung _ tagi unga _ .
kaate yama _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh unga _ . _ â
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ .
nukalpigagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ enta _ qakmavek _ iiyagh mun _ agigte yaghtuqagh tek _ . _ â
nukalpigagh t _ aane yalghiimeng _ paaghqite uq _ .
qayughllak _ mayugh naqe yata _ awatmun _ mekelghiigh k _ ullghitagh ma lghiik _ .
itegh luteng _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .
mekelghiigh k _ nenglu m _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghiik _ .
ata ak _ ellmi neng _ aane luni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
itegh sqe ma kek _ .
quyake ma kegket _ .
ata ita _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ sa lutek _ uugte lugh stek _ ? _ â
â _ taanegken _ ima _ t a k a g h p a g l l e l g a a t a a f t u q _ .
Y u l l e g h p a g k u n _ qutenge ukung _ . _ â
ata gkenka _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ llaaghinaan _ t a k a g h p a g l l e l g a a t a a m a a q _ ! _ â
uyuqligh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ llaaghinaan _ elpek _ iye llgagh u uten _ ! _ â
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ awavagh ghllag nanigh ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh k _ .
qamagte uq _ , _ tefaay _ !
tekeyiighagh
apegh aqe ait _ sivuqagh mi _ tekeyiighagh at _ upenghagh mi _ kingulighpigagh lug teng _ kaate luteng _ s i v u l i g h p i g a l u t e n g _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ aghulaqe aqe lghiit _ .
tekeyiighagh at _ i g h n i k a y u g w e t _ q e n a g h m i l l u _ qenaavzeghagh mi llu _ i m q a g h l l e g h a n i _ .
Q a w a a g g a a t _ tea- ma kut _ tenge qaghte luteng _ m a n g t a g h m e g g n e n g _ ukig aghtagh vike aqe kangit _ y u g w e t _ naghughte lghiit _ , _ m a n g t a g h m e g g n u n _ pinagh yu kata _ .
ilutuqagh _ A f s e n g a a g h a g h h a q
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
ilangani _ , _ aane ma lghii _ unaangu luku _ a f s e n g a a g h a g h h a q _ .
A g h n e l q u s i q _ aviite luni _ uteghnigh uq _ i g h i v g a a m a a n _ .
nengyugh ni _ ungipamsug te a _ a f s e n g a a g h a g h h a a m _ , _ â _ whanga _ iknaqe llegh u unga _ , _ p i n i g h q a l l g h u f t u n g a _ , _ nangyiite llegh u unga _ nunivag mi _ . _ â
â _ naten _ liigike ziin _ ? _ â _ nengyugh an _ aapte a _ .
eltughagh n _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ aane lunga _ riigte meng _ igleghte yalghiinga _ kaate unga _ megh mun _ .
yakugh yug gpenanga _ p u g w i m a m e n g _ aghvigh unga _ inglu anun _ . _ â
â _ liisimake aqa _ taana _ megh _ p u g w i m e g k a n _ , _ â _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ â _ quyngigh m _ tuumke a _ .
qantaghaqun _ naghughte ma uq _ quyngigh _ , _ t u m a n g i _ me u ma ut _ . _ â
nengyugh ni _ pi laatagh aa _ a f s e n g a a g h a g h h a a m _ , _ â _ nagaten _ .
esghagh aqa _ naayghagh _ enmis _ naghughte aqa _ . _ â
â _ liisimake aqa _ , _ â _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ â _ taana _ temke u uq _ naayghagh u ni ken _ . _ â
A f s e n g a a g h a g h h a q _ wata _ ungipagh uq _ , _ â _ pi yalghiinga _ pillugute aqe uk _ kaynge k _ , _ tagnegh lghii llu _ qategh lghii llu _ .
alinge gpenanga _ peglleghqute agka _ . _ â
nengyugh an _ pi a _ eltughagh ni _ , _ â _ kaynge u ni kegken _ taake uk _ n g u u y n g a a g h a a n k u n g u u k _ y a q e l l e n g e t a a n k u k _ . _ â
N a l l g h u g h q a a t a g h y a t n i _ qiya uq _ a f s e n g a a g h a g h h a q _ .
nengyugh an _ n e n g l a q l u k u _ pi a _ , _ â _ iwernga _ elpek _ alinge ma ite ngugh u te n _ , _ ipapik _ iknaqe uten _ , _ pinighqe aghte uten _ . _ â
taawa _ itagnaghi uq _ a f s e n g a a g h a g h h a q _ .
tefaay _ !
sangameng _ quyngigh t _ A g h u l i s i g a t a t
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
ilangani _ , _ quyngigh m _ nallagh ma kanga _ afsengagh _ .
afsengagh _ p e g h q i n g h u m a l g h i i _ .
afsengagh m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ quyngigh _ , _ navek _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ â
quyngigh m _ akite a _ , _ â _ vegaagh meng _ megh meng _ ivagh i qu nga _ . _ â
afsengagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ wiin _ iighaate aghte ltung _ . _ â
â _ A - a a _ , _ â _ angegh aa _ quyngigh m _ .
â _ quneghte naqe unga _ sivuke luten _ elpek _ iigh i _ ivagh lleqe amken _ , _ â _ afsengagh m _ kayagte a _ .
quyngigh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaaghtuqagh mun _ .
taawanginaq _ sighunegh kek _ aliite uk _ .
afsengagh m _ m a a t g h a q _ naalke a _ quyngigh _ qayughllak _ sighunegh kek _ esghagh kek _ .
quyngigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ H a a _ , _ e l p e g n g a m _ iigh i _ ivagh naqe amken _ . _ â
quyngigh _ quneghte yan _ afsengagh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaagh mun _ .
quyngigh m _ ivagh aa _ , _ ivagh aa _ afsengagh _ .
W h a v e m u n _ kenlanga _ naalke igate a _ .
E g l l u n g l l a q _ naghaaghute meng
iyaa- ka
atughqagh t
igagh meng _ meghutlug meng _ ( _ O a t s - m _ , _ meghaatagh ngllagh yaghqagh m _ qantagh aneng _ )
P l a s t i c - m e n g _ umeg meng
pumsukegtagh te meng _ , _ savig meng _ m e k e s t a a g h a g h m e n g
kuynge m _ ukmangiisigh aneng _ , _ waya meng _ t r a s h _ b a g - e m _ qeputagh aneng
C o n s t r u c t i o n _ paper- meng _ suflu kaghqagh meng _ , _ umeg mun _ tugutaghqagh meng
ulima llegh a
1 _ . _ kelgute llegh tun _ , _ kepe i uute kek _ qantaghqwaagh k _ naten _ t h r e e _ nalighmeng _ four _ i n c h e s - n g u l u k e k _ u u s q a g h t u l k e k _ .
taagken _ qiigh vigkagh _ negig te yaghqagh _ .
negig llegh a _ egllu kaghqagh m _ a n g t a l k e k _ nasiqute lukek _ .
plastic _ umeg _ qaye gkenkun _ nekegte yaghqagh _ .
2 _ . _ qiigh vig _ umeg ngllagh yaghqagh _ egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh gkeneng _ .
U u m w a a g h n g a s q e l l u k e k _ umegkagh _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ aange luku _ q i i g v i g k a m e n g _ uzimun _ iike yaghqagh _ .
kelgute llegh tun _ reghighsaghqagh _ umeg m _ a s i l i g h n e g h a _ t r i a n g l e - n g u l u k u _ me lug kegte sqellug kek _ egllu k _ .
T a p e - p e s a g h q a q _ tugumavigkagh _ umeg mun _ .
egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh k _ asiliqutagh u lukek _ ulima yaghqagh k _ .
egllu ngllagh lghii m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ u u s q a g h t u t k a a g k e n k a _ kepe lukek _ .
3 _ . _ kepe yaghqagh k _ maalghug _ uniistaaghhagh k _ waya k _ nalighmeng _ kuynge m _ ukmangiisigh aneng _ 2 _ i n c h e s - n g u l u k e k _ .
igaghqwaagh meng _ qantagh leg t _ w a y a a g h h a a t _ t r a s h _ b a g - m m u n _ qeputagh t _ pinigh ut _ .
peghte lukek _ waya k _ qukagh gkenkun _ T a p e - e s a g h q a k _ umeg mun _ kepellegh m _ tunge kek _ .
1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ p i i z n g a a g k e n k a _ p e g h n g a l l g h e m _ t u n g a n g a _ umeg meng _ .
agughte yaghqagh k _ piiznga lghiik _ agaghte yaghqaa lukek _ egllu m _ esne gkenkun _ qiigh vig m _ nalla akun _ .
4 _ . _ T a a m _ qantaghqwaagh m _ uumgagh kun _ angqaperug kegte luku _ teregh yaghqagh _ 1 _ i n c h - n g u l u k u _ d i a m e t e r _ esne aneng _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ a w a v a n t u t k a a n _ .
taana _ angqaperug kegtagh ngllaghkagh _ pilag yaghqagh _ qukaa kun _ .
taagken _ aveg llegh k _ taake uk _ qukagh gkenkun _ p i l a a g a a t a g h y a g h q a k _ .
angqaperug kegte aq _ e s t a m a g h q e s a g h q a q _ .
E s t a m a g h q e l l g h e t _ alla _ qukaa ii kete te _ aveg yaghqagh t _ .
taagken _ enraq _ qule mun _ agughte qugh yaghqagh t _ .
suflug mun _ a a t e s v i g k a a g u t . E g l l u m _ qaye akun _ umeg te yaghqagh _ .
5 _ . _ imeg yaghqagh _ angqaperug kegte luku _ c o n s t r u c t i o n _ a p p e r _ suflug m _ ukimallegh an _ e s l e g t a l n g a t u n _ .
S c o t c h _ tape- meng _ neve ste luku _ saagaghte na yu kan _ suflu ligh vig mun _ iqug a _ kanaghte yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ s u f l u l i g h v i g m e l n g u u t _ qule mun _ agughte qughkagh t _ qaye itgun _ suflug t _ aate stekayugu yagh ut _ .
igaghqwaagh u lghiit _ ukut _ uniistaaghhagh u ut _ suflu k _ nuqnegh naanghite aat _ .
S u l p i k _ naapte lghii _ kaviigh meng
T u u g _ â _ g h i m _ apegh llegh a
S u l p i k _ quunpeng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ u n k u s e n i i g h m e n g _ k a v i i g h n i i g h m e n g _ uksugh mi _ .
uspeqe aqe lghii _ neqesghagh ightugh na luni _ temngi _ tamaagun _ nunivag kun _ u y a v a n t e g h l l a g p e n a a n _ ne meng _ .
piyug meng _ kaate yugnagh luki _ s i i f q a g h n a l u n i _ .
S u l p i g e m _ kaviigh meng _ naapteaghaghte lleghqagh ni _ sighimake gpenaan _ s i i f q a q a a l g h i i _ .
unaami inagh _ esghagh yaghtugh na luki _ unkuse ni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
ata an _ repall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ legan _ siifte uten _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe yu ikagh i _ ? _ â
S u l p i g e m _ ata ni _ qingsig qagh luku _ y u k e m s u g s i m a g h m i _ aghulaqe uq _ .
kaate yaghtugh yamigu _ unkuseniigh vig ni _ e g t u g r u u g t u q _ .
sivuligh t _ unkuse ni _ q a n t a g h a n l l i i g h a g h y a m i k i _ wata _ egtugnegh a _ s u k a a g h t a a _ .
K a a s a q m i n i k i _ avangite ut _ .
â _ temngi _ egtugte ma unga _ a v a n g i r r u g n e n g _ ! _ â
S u l p i k _ uniigh miqe pigte luni _ pi ma lghii _ .
â _ maaten _ u n k u s e m a _ tuungligh ghhagh itnun _ kaate yaghtugh kuma _ emta _ e g t u g r u u g g n a a n g h i t u n g a _ , _ â _ S u l p i k _ ellmi neng _ akuzite ma lghii _ .
kaate yaghtugh yami _ ima _ n u q e t m i k u n _ taaggun _ egtugte laatagh uq _ .
elngaatall _ quupkagh ma lghii _ unkuse ni _ e s g h a g h y a q m i n i k i _ k a v i i g h h a g h n g u q _ taawa _ naapte ma lghii _ .
iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ , _ ungelegte magh mi _ esghagh luku _ n a a p t a n i _ .
â _ N a t e n n g a m _ tuqute naqe zikun _ kaviigh ii qu na _ , _ â _ S u l p i k _ pi uq _ , _ â _ entaqun _ atuute yagh kumkun _ , _ ilagaate yagh kumkun _ aghula magh ma _ aghuliigh nayagh uq _ amqeghte naqe nayagh nghite te aanga _ . _ â
taagken _ atugh uq _ aghula magh mi _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ aghuliigh luni _ esghapag aa _ .
maateqwaaqun _ elngaatall _ a n g a l k e l l a a t a g h t u q _ , _ iike te naqlaatagh uq _ .
S u l p i k _ e n r a g h n g a m _ aragh magh mi _ talligh gni _ a g h u l a s i m a a g k e n k a _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
paninang _ kaviigh _ aghuliigh nghite uq _ angalke uq _ elngaatall _ .
ima _ unaangu luku _ esghagh yaghtugh kaqe kangi _ unkuse ni _ .
A g h n e l q u s i q _ tuqute naqe m _ tagtale ani _ kaviigh _ , _ elpek nge yalghiimi _ mamlegte yaghtugh aqe a _ .
iighwziig magh mi _ , _ quneghte magh mi _ , _ qesigh kau magh mi _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ niinghute vikekagh a _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
qenwat llu _ tuquteqaghtekagh a _ .
esghagh yaghtugh nghite ai _ ila i _ unkuse mi _ qayughllak _ mamlegtekanga _ .
S u l p i k _ kaate yan _ kaviigh ligh luni _ ne mun _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aghyugh aat _ muluugh ghllag lghii _ p e n g _ â _ g i n n i l u k u _ .
sangan _ muluugh ta a _ ungipaghsugh aat _ .
S u l p i g e m _ ungipaate ai _ piyaqli i llegh mineng _ tuqute i naqe m _ kaviigh meng _ .
ata an _ aapte a _ , _ â _ naten mi _ tuqute zigu _ ? _ â
S u l p i g e m _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ ilagagh unga _ , _ aragh unga _ , _ talligh gka _ nengug te lukek _ aghulate agka _ , _ tukagh unga _ aghuliigh sqellug qu _ ngiigte na luku _ . _ â
ata an _ apeghtugh aa _ kaviigh meng _ tuqute i llegh meng _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaghsiighwagh ghhagh _ q a a n g h a n u n _ kanaghte luku _ amqeghtekagu _ up- lleghte luku _ tuute naken _ i g h s a q g h w a n _ nalla akun _ .
aga _ sukate pigte luni _ tuqu lleqe uq _ . _ â
tawani _ uksugh mi _ S u l p i k _ liite uq _ kaviigh niigh llegh meng _ tuqute i llegh meng _ .
elngaatall _ naapte aghtagh qu uq _ .
S u l p i k _ I i l q a y u g w i g a l n g u q
A n a g u t a a m _ apegh llegh a
Q a l u g y a a m _ ighnegh ghhagh ni _ , _ S u l p i k _ , _ ungipamsug te aqe kanga _ ullghitag igh te luku _ qimugsigh meng _ i g l e g h u s i q a q s a g h n i l u t e n g _ .
apegh aqe kanga llu _ ghhavegh _ , _ p i n g a y u w h a g h n e n g _ qikmigh ke luni _ tevragh kayugu yagh ni luku _ .
Q a l u g y a a n k u t _ qikmigh leg t _ ataasigh meng _ , _ q a m i s l u u l g e t _ , _ ullghitag leg t _ .
S u l p i k _ qimugsigh naqe ma lghii _ t o b o g g a n - n e k _ qamite kete lukek _ .
qikmigh eng _ pot _ , _ uyate te igh luku _ q i i p r a g h u t e n e n g _ s n a p - p e t i i _ t o b o g g a n - m u n _ .
igleghte na luni _ aqume qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ yeghlegi _ qikmigh m _ uughqaghte aqe kanga _ .
qenwat llu _ qikmigh _ k i l g a a n l e n g u q _ P o t - t e m _ esghagh luku _ malighqagh ma kanga _ u g w a v e k _ aatnegh mun _ .
S u l p i k _ taklagh an _ t o b o g g a n - k u n _ q a m u m a k a n g a _ .
aantagh ni _ pot _ aghuliigh luni _ aantagh niigh uq _ .
S u l p i g e m _ q a m u g h t a a g h n a q u t k a a _ igleghte na luni _ , _ aghtugh aa _ .
S u l p i g e m _ neghnagh igh lleg lghutagh _ plastic _ b a g - a _ naalkellug qu _ P o t - m u n _ naagh ste luku _ maghyaghqugh aa _ ne meggnun _ .
kaat ute qaghte yamigu _ p e t u g w a a _ .
itegh naqe yami _ kameraagh ghllag gni _ i t e g m i g h q u t n g w a a g h a a k _ .
saayguraagh mun _ itegh luni _ amig m _ saaghw akun _ nekeve ste lukek _ qamavek _ ilu te mun _ itegh uq _ .
paaghqite ut _ .

tefaay _ !
yaywaali _ nulightugh lghii _ nanugh meng
A p a n g a l u u m _ apegh llegh a
kiyang _ uglagh u pestaagh lghii m _ t a z i n g k e r u g l l a k _ imagh a _ nanugh t _ yugu yagh na iqe kangit _ .
taana _ nagate kaqe a _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ , _ nanugh t _ yugte yug nightu ta i _ y u g w e s t u n _ nangaghnegh i _ ayuqe ta i _ .
elngaatall _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ , _ pinigh lghii _ sa kun _ a l l a a g h h i n a g h q u n _ .
ilughagh ghhagh a _ y a y w a l i n g i i g h h a q _ y u g u g h t e k e s t a q _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ne ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ .
aflengake u kanga _ i l u g h w a g h h a n i _ pinitungwaaq _ iwerngaqun _ a m y u g h w a a g h e m _ saaghw akun _ a g h s a a g h m i k a a t k a q e g k a n g a _ .
enkaam _ uksaagh mi _ siku k _ t a g i n g h e g k e n i _ yataaghqe te ghllag aqe lghii _ yuug _ unangniighusighqagh meggneng _ .
uunghagh _ , _ uyiigh _ apeghiighsagh aqe kangat _ qayughllak _ siku k _ kaate kayek _ piyaa uute yaghqau aqe lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh _ s u m e g h t a g h a q a y u u g l l e g h h i i _ yugughte lghii _ .
ellngagh a llu _ uunghagh ghhagh meng _ ulimasigh u ma lghii _ .
luuraq _ maligte te luni _ nengigh yaghqaaghte na luni _ kayute ughte na luni _ tawavek _ nengllugute minun _ .
leganqun _ y u g w e m _ ilughagh ni _ esghagh aa _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ qinuyug a _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ ilughagh ka _ uunghagh ngllagh aqe uq _ sa u a ngam _ aqsaqugh u naqe a _ , _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe ukut _ whaa _ . _ â
elngaatall _ t a a n a s t a g h h i i n a q _ q a a n g h a n _ ima qaa _ .
qenwat _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kitumun _ u u n g h i i t a n g l l i i s q e l l u n g a _ pi zinga _ , _ naangilngugh nge a _ nulighh ite ngugh nge a _ nayag ite ngugh nge a _ wetku qun _ nuliigh gpek _ uunghiitagh ngllagh nakanganga _ . _ â
kii _ , _ yuug _ wata _ saghiighqe uq _ , _ qinuyug a _ i l u g h w a n i _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
qenwat _ w h a n i k u y a n _ meghnugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ kagtaghte ma lghii _ aane ma lghii _ .
tespikani nguq _ kelutagh nge i te ni _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a t _ .
tespikegkut _ uqiigh ghhagh itnun _ u q i t a g h y a g h t u m a l g h i i _ .
iiwen _ whaa _ kaate aqe uq _ up- qite vigkagh minun _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ mengqughte te ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ .
E s g h a g h a g h s a q m i n i k i _ amigh k _ qelpegh aqe uq _ aghnagh _ whaa _ qineghte uq _ , _ elngaatall _ ineqsunagh ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ n a n g l l e g n a g h q e s i n _ sa qu ziin _ aqlagha ghllag mi _ ne mete kestagh ghngaaghpek _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ , _ â _ elngaatall _ ilughagh ma _ qinuyugte aanga _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
wasiwa _ kitum _ uunghiitagh ngllagh lleqe aanga _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ utaqa i yagh a _ uunghiitagh ngllagh naqe amken _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ne u uq _ .
taawa nguq _ k e l u t a n g a n i _ nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ esghagh aa _ .
elngaatall _ aghnagh m _ pugnegh iigh te a _ sa meng _ akughtu te a _ .
A k u t u n n e q e g s a g h l u k u _ a p e g h i i g h y a q m i n i k i _ sagnegh ghllag k llu _ s a g n e s q u v e g a g h h a a k l u _ iigge m _ imagh ghhagh kek _ imightugh ma kangi _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ atghagh a _ .
Q i n u y u g l l a t a q a n g a t e n _ nungyaghagh gneng _ qiigh negh ke i i nagh luten _ aragh ghhaaten _ whaten _ â _ U u n g h i i t a m a a n g _ , _ u u n g h i t a m e n g _ . _ â
tuune lleqe amken _ .
taake uk _ angenegh ghllag kek _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ lli nakegken _ , _ tea- ma anun _ negh sqellug kek _ .
taake uk _ s a g n e s q u v e g a g h h a a k _ ilughagh gpenun _ t u u n a k e g k e n _ .
whaten _ pi naken _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ taawa _ u u n g h i t a g h t a a _ elngaatall _ . _ â
taaqe gkatki _ e n k a a n g a m _ aane te naketen _ tugu naagh anka _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
legan _ itegh uq _ ilughagh n _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ u u n g h i t a g h t u g h n a q u k u t l u _ entaqun _ keleg yaghtu ma a _ u u n g h i t a n g l l a g h t e k a g h q a n i _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ kitumun _ u u n g h i i t a n g l l i i s q e l l u n g a _ pi zinga _ , _ ava ite ngugh nge a _ sa ite ngugh nge a _ ? _ â
Y u g w e m _ t a w a n l e n g u u t _ pi a _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ m a a k u g h s i _ n e g h l a a g h p e n a a s i _ kepsugh yaghagh lleqe usi _ uunghagh ite aq _ seghlegh ghllag u naqe uq _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ whani _ . _ â
qinuyugte lqinagh yatni _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh ni _ tawavek _ pi a _ , _ â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ sullevneghhaleg _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ taawavek _ p i i g w a g h l u n i _ nuug ke i nagh luni _ nungyaghagh gneng _ aragh uq _ , _ â _ U u n g h i i t a m a a n g _ , _ uunghiitagh meng _ . _ â
whaa _ iiwen _ aghnagh _ .
sagnegh t _ tuune ai _ .
mekelghiigh m _ itghute ai _ .
kii _ , _ sagnegh ghnaggagh k _ nategh m _ qukagh kun _ lli uk _ .
â _ esnevagh lusi _ taake uk _ neghe tekek _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ tamaakut _ kayagte ai _ .
taake uk _ s a g n e s q u v e g a g h h a a k _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh minun _ aglagh te ak _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ ukuk _ elpek _ neghe kek _ .
elngaatall _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ sa aqe ziin _ . _ â
ilughagh n _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ ugumi ke pigte ma zinga _ m e k e l e n g e s t a y u w h a a k _ ukuk _ kepe yutekaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh k _ tagivagh agken _ . _ â
â _ legan _ qalleg gpenang _ negh i _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ .
esnevagh uute luni _ n e g h u n n e q e g s a a t u t _ .
taana _ ilughagh a _ s a g n e s q u v e g a g h h a a g n e n g _ tugu tete luni _ negh lukek _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe lukek _ .
amawha _ tugu tete luni _ negh luni _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe aqe kek _ .
M a t a a w i t n g w a a g h a a k _ n a a n g t e q a g h h n e g h m e n g _ .
iwerngaqun _ kepsugh ghllag ghngaaghmi _ n e g h y a g h a a k _ .
aghtugh yamikek _ , _ â _ I i - h i - h i - h i - h i i _ , _ kepsugh unga _ .
taawa _ u u n g h i i t a g h t u g h q a g h p e n g a _ , _ i l u u y _ . _ â
â _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe aqe luten _ sa aqe ziin _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ aghsaghte ma kanga _ .
â _ yeghlegi llu _ weni _ kepe yu ma unga _ , _ â _ Y u g w e m _ sagnegh squghhagh k _ t u u n u m a a g k e n k a _ pi a _ .
mekelghiigh m _ tugu lukek _ qamagte luku _ imagh a _ kanagh a _ qanegh minun _ .
aane te luki _ sagnegh t _ itegh uq _ .
iiwen _ ingaghte aqe uq _ mekelghiigh _ ilughagh n _ taku a _ .
kii _ , _ enraq _ qinuyug a _ q e m q a g h w a a g h a a _ asute na lutek _ .
â _ liisimake kevnga _ nulighh ite ngugh u nga _ , _ naten _ pi na luten _ pi ziin _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ .
â _ kitum i _ uunghiitagh ngllagh aten _ ?
nulighh ite yagh kuvek _ avangite nayagh uten _ .
whaa _ nuliigh lgu uten _ esghaghhu _ , _ â _ ilughagh n _ pi a _ .
Q a v a g h t e s n e g h i t n g w a a g h a a _ mekelghiigh _ i l u g h w a a n _ .
qenwat _ qavagh ste naqe nghite te yatni _ aane luni _ tespikavek _ taglagh laatagh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh aghte te laatagh aa _ .
â _ sa laatagh aten _ ? _ â _ aghnagh m _ aapte a _ .
â _ elngaatall _ qinuyugte aanga _ qavagh ste nghite aanga _ ilughagh ma _ a s u n a l u n i _ , _ asute na lutung _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ .
â _ legan _ atghagh luten _ whavek _ kayagte gu _ tagligh sqe gu _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ kayagte a _ .
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
itegh yan _ i l u g h w a a n _ pi laatagh aa _ .
â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ kii _ sullevneghhaleg _ .
enta _ pikavek _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh a _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ tagligh sqe a _ .
â _ ii _ , _ nutem qun _ p e q l i q u t a a q a g h p e n g a _ pi leg ghllag u ghngaaghpek _ , _ â _ y u g w e m _ pi a _ .
pilugug ragkiigh luni _ aga _ t a g l i n a a m a g h m i _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh te a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ aghnagh _ pi nigh _ kaki iqe uq _ taawa _ .
Y u g w e m _ i n g a g h h u n n a q u t k e s a q m i n i g u _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ p i i q s a g h a n g u q _ , _ â _ Q i n u y u g t a g h p e n g a _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ , _ ingaghte luten _ qavagh a _ .
I n g a g h f i k n a a n g h i t n g w a a g h a m k e n _ . _ â
ii _ , _ y u g w e m _ qinuyug a _ .
pi laatagh aa _ aghnagh m _ , _ â _ Q i n u y u g t a g h p e n g a _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ n a q a m a l l a m e n g _ u g w i n g i g h h a q a _ kaana _ n u l i i g h p e n i s a q a n _ ingaghte vike nayagh amken _ .
maaten _ kana _ a a v n g a a q _ ne mini tuq _ , _ iqite nga uq _ . _ â
â _ temngi _ pi uten _ aleghqugh ghllag luku _ n u l i g h q a _ taglagh unga _ .
qavigh sqellug kek _ pi kaqe aqa _ , _ â _ y u g w e m _ pi a _ .
â _ tagi aghten qun _ k e l g u v i k a g h l l a k e n _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
nanilghagh gni _ m a k r e g s a q m i n i g u _ reghigh uq _ kanavek _ nenglu mun _ .
E s g h a g h y a q m i n i k i _ kana _ u g w a t a n g a n i _ i l u g h w a g h h a n i _ a t k u w h a g h m i n e n g _ ulig luni _ enmis _ qavagh aqe uq _ .
nuliigh ni llu _ esghagh aa _ e l l n g i n a a f t u q _ .
â _ enta _ sa u lukek _ pi zikek _ allakagh mete uk _ test-kagh nkuk _ .
whangkutung _ allakagh mete ukung _ .
ingaghte ltung _ , _ â _ y u g w e m _ sagiqe te a _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh _ talligh akun _ tangyegh akun _ tugu luku _ s a y u g s i i g h l u k u _ lliigh aa _ y u g w e m _ .
â _ kii _ , _ yuug _ una _ qinu na pigte ma a _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ pi uq _ .
nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ aghnagh m _ aate luku _ yuug _ u g w i i g h h a a _ , _ tuqute a _ .
taagken _ yugusigh a _ mingllite luku _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ t a w a n t u q _ .
taagken _ unaami _ qenwat _ nighugte a _ .
ilughagh ni _ itegh yaghqagh _ mekelghiigh m _ qelanqe a _ .
mulu inagh yan _ qenwat _ aane luni _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh uq _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ whaa _ amig m _ qelpegh te a _ .
â _ naagu _ ilughagh ghrug ka _ pengeg luku _ qenwat _ esghagh yaghtugh aqe aqa _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ aghnagh _ aapte a _ .
â _ esgha _ taana ta _ ilughagh n _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ keleg u vike a _ , _ â _ ilughagh ke ken _ legan _ qivghuke yu kuvgu _ qivghuke yaghqaqe ken _ .
qinuyugte yanga _ taawa _ q i n u k u u m a a q a _ .
whanga _ yugu nghite unga _ esgha _ taana _ amiiragh ka _ .
aygugh lleqe unga _ ne mnun _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh kayek _ , _ maani _ k i i k a a t k a g u n g a _ .
saama _ nanglleg ke luten llu _ aghuliigh vike amken _ whani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ maligte naqe amken _ kitum qun _ aflengake linga _ .
taawa _ qinuyugte aqe naagh aatnga _ maa nte kuma _ .
elngaatall _ n a n g l l e k i s t e k a m k e n _ elpek _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ maligte naqngu kuvnga _ sa meng _ s a n q u t a a g h h a g h m e n g _ g u u n n i i g h u k a g h a g h m e n g _ avelghagh gpenang _ kelqe lghaaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ atghagh luni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
amennguq _ mekelghiigh _ ughluvegh llgagh u uq _ .
ughluvegh ni _ , _ saningughtagh ni _ tugu luki _ taglagh uq _ .
T a a m _ aghnagh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ a g h i q n g w a a g h a a _ qayughllak _ atuqe naqe kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ a a s a q m i n i g u _ amiiragh _ leganqun _ nanugh ghllag u uq _ .
taawa _ u n u g m i _ aane lutek _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe uk _ .
esnevagh yamek _ mekelghiigh _ nanugh m _ sigute gmi _ akule gkenkun _ aqume ste luku _ p u g w i m u t a a _ .
P u g w i m u t a a q e g k a n g a _ , _ p u g w i m u t a a q e g k a n g a _ siku mun _ kaate negh megteni _ uugte lutek _ piyug meng _ lliigh aqe lghiik _ .
igatagh negh megteni _ nanugh ghllag _ unange ni nghmini _ neghsagh meng _ u n a k e n g a q e l g h i i _ .
iwerngaqun _ mekelghiigh _ neghe ste luku _ aminaqekagh i _ ellnga n _ qamagte luki _ negh aqe kangi _ .
T a w a a t e n _ kiyaghtekagh k _ .
tagtalmi _ s i k u g n i t k u l l a a g h l l a g l u t e k _ qaallgute a _ nanugh m _ , _ â _ amenam _ taawa _ meghnugh unga _ .
M e g h n u t a m k e n _ , _ tuqlugh i naqe unga _ k u g w e m n e n g _ p a a y g h e s q e l l u t u n g _ .
imani _ aliigh kata _ k u u g _ â _ g h e n k a _ tallugh yug yaqunang _ kakave yaqunang _ .
payegh naketen _ gginagh it _ q u k a s a l e g l u k i _ e s g h a m a k l u k i _ sa naanghite aaten _ t a w a a t e n _ pi kuvek _ . _ â
nanugh m _ taawa _ vuuslegh t _ uqiigh at _ anigu a _ iigge a _ .
S u g r u g w e g n i _ kanaghte lukek _ t a w a a v e k _ kii _ u g w i n i g h l l a g a a t a g h l u n i _ sivugte luni _ igleghte uk _ .
T a z i n g a n i q a a g h a q _ t a w a a t e n g w a a q _ alla _ pi laatagh uq _ .
pingayut ii ta ani _ t a w a a t e n _ p i l l g h e m _ kii _ sivungagh t _ aga _ pengetaagte ghllag aa _ qaprag te ghllag _ aliighte yu gnite uq _ .
â _ taakwa _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ , _ k u g w e g h m a _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ .
aatak _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ pi naqe lghaaten _ , _ â _ nanugh m _ pi a _ .
tughwaagh yalghiimi _ kii _ , _ n a n u l g h u t e g h l l a a k _ pangaleg te aqe uq _ .
legan _ mekelghiigh _ taagken _ nanugh m _ saaghw aneng _ aqfaasnaq _ pi sqe llegh atun _ paayghi a _ s u m e g h t a g h a m a g h m i _ , _ â _ siingenllu _ tuqu kau lghiinga _ neghigh pigte luku _ . _ â
kii _ , _ kaat ute te luteng _ mekelghiigh _ q u y a k s a q m e g t e g g u _ nanugh t _ nagun _ ipa _ sugrug mig aqe aghte litgu _ alunge aghte aqe luku _ .
nayag eng llu _ taana _ kaate luku _ q u y a a k a a t _ .
mekelghiigh _ elngaatall _ nanugh m _ qaye inagh akun _ aygugh uq _ .
ne meggnun _ kaat ute aat _ .
nanugh lghute ghllag nguq _ tamaa _ .
ataasigh igh ngugh _ taawa _ aange pigte uq _ .
itghute aat _ ne meggnun _ mekelghiigh _ .
atkug teng _ m a t a g h q u g h y a q m e g t e k i _ yugughte uute ut _ .
uglaghyagagh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
U g w a t a n g a n i t e f t u g h n g u q _ taawani _ nanevgagh ghllag _ sa na nigh ke aq _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh _ , _ â _ U g w i k a g h q a l g u n g a _ qaga _ .
nagaqugh unga _ u g w i k a g h q a m a n g u q _ aqelqaghniigh naqe aaten _ , _ tuqute naqe aaten _ nuliighqagh ni _ wayagh naqe ni luku _ .
whaa _ u n a m i n g i n a q _ legan _ keleg naqe aaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ , _ â _ qayughllak qun _ pi langa _ .
elpek _ n a n g l l e k e s t e n g i i g h h a q a _ maligtekaqe kemken _ tuquma te kete na luten _ .
legan _ yugusigh ka _ pegte luku _ ayuqe aqa _ . _ â
unaami _ qakma _ mayugh ai _ iiyagh itnun _ .
K e l g i y a g h t u m _ pi a _ , _ â _ naagu _ mekelghiigh _ tesqamna _ aqelqagh i _ n u l i i g h q i i g h n a q e g k a a n n g u q _ keleg yaghtigh sqe a _ aglagh li nguq _ aaghqutaate naqe a _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ aglagh naqe unga nguq _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh aa _ .
mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ u g w a t e g n i l n g u u m _ qaallgute a _ , _ â _ kameg gka _ ukuk _ aate kek _ qiighnagh ite ngugh k _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ e s g h a g h y a q m i n i k e k _ ii _ , _ nanugh m _ ighu ghllag i _ itegaghtu magh meng _ .
â _ N a k a _ whatete ghngaaghma _ pi naqe unga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ pi magh an _ aane uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ m a l i g l l e g h a a t a a t _ aghnagh m _ k u g w e l g h u t a n g a n _ .
ii _ , _ yug ghllag u uq _ q e r n g u g h t a a g h v i k _ kangllu te ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh ghnaggagh _ tallu i kek _ naflugh mun _ kenle ke lukek _ melqiite ghllag ke ak _ .
Q u g h s a t k u g h n a a g g a a f t u q _ u t e g h p a a r k i t a g h a q e f t u q _ .
E l q u n e v r a g l l a g e k _ taawa _ saaghw ani _ .
mekelghiigh _ ellnga _ legan _ w h a t e g h l l u g w a a g h u l g h i i _ qughsatku ghllag _ kaate yaghtugh luku _ aghuliigh uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ qughsatku ghllag m _ pi a _ , _ â _ tamaa ke raaghinagh _ nuliighqagh ka _ wayagh ste nghmeng _ pi lunga _ tagsiqligh amken _ .
taawa _ n a n g h i q a g h l u k i _ wiin _ aghnaa igh naqe ait _ .
enankin _ nanghiigh te aghte lutung _ entaqun _ itagnagh yaghqaa lghiikung _ .
kayaalqe gkuvnga _ taawa _ aghnaa igh lleqe kevnga _ .
aamtaam _ whanga _ kayaalqe gkumken _ paninang _ whanga _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ . _ â
qughsatku m _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ â _ kelenga te i unga _ aangqagh ghhagh mneng _ whaken _ milugh naqe amken _ . _ â
taagavek _ aglagh qagh luni _ miluyagaghpaghqu yalghiimi _ uka _ a q f a y n g w a a g h y a l g h i i m i _ .
kaate lukek _ elqunevraag k _ talligh mineng _ p a t e g y a q m i n i k e k _ uka _ leveklugtu te _ mekelghiigh mun _ tagi stek _ .
â _ naten qun _ pi langa _ siingenllu _ kayaalqesaghqagh ke kanganga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ .

ighneghllug

U u s l u k i _ uulte nghmegteki _ e n r a g h n g a m _ ilepenghaagh i _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
keligagh luki _ tawaten _ taaqe nghmegteki _ sagnegh ghllag kun _ sa kun _ ughvugh aqe ait _ .
A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ megh i _ simigh aatagh nghmegteki _ anigu meng _ anigu t _ gheve nagh pigte na iqe ait _ .
anigu meng _ kanaghte vike luki _ g h e v n g w a a n g h a t a _ sivugh qaghaqe luki _ sa aqe luki _ .
G h e v n g w a a g h w a a n g h a t a _ ghhuugh luki _ uksugh mi _ a g h s u g h h n a q n e g h m e g t e k i _ ini aqe ait _ .
aamtaam _ a g h s u g h h n a q e n g h i n n e g h m e g t e k i _ kiig mi _ ini aqe ait _ .
ghhuugh luki _ ghhuugh luki _ tawaten _ qamagte luki _ nayemte aqe ait _ .
N a y e m l l u k i _ tawaten _ agaghte aqe ait _ .
agaghte luki _ k i i n g h w a a n g h a t a _ i t g h u i l u k i _ s e g g u g h l u k i _ imeg magh ita _ imeg luki _ imeg luki _ taawa _ qamagte aqe ait _ taaqe aqe ait _ .
A g h s u g h t a s _ tamaakut _ uksugh mi _ .
maklagu t _ tamaakut _ keligagh igate ait _ qaye i _ i i g g e m e g g n e n g _ kumlu meggneng _ qaye i _ ikugh aqe ait _ .
sa u luki _ a t i g h a q s a g h e t _ estugte aqe ait _ .
estugte luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ elngaatall _ .
maana _ u u s i u k i _ ilepenghaagh t _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
uksugh mi _ tawaten _ a g h s u g h h n e g h m e g t e k i _ k a n a g h l l u g e t _ ategh i _ aghsughtagh u ut _ .
tamaakut _ i g h n c g h l l u p i g e t _ i g f i n e g h l l u g e t _ a g h s u g h t e l l g h e l n g u u t _ qaligh kaqe ait _ .
A g h s u g h t a s _ tamaakut _ ighneghllug t _ a g h s u g h t e k a t _ .
aghsughtagh u aqe ut _ ategh i _ kaki nghmegteki _ .
siighnagh
siighnagh t _ tamaakut _ e n k a a n g a m _ ayvegh m _ siighni a _ angtughpag m _ aghnasaleg m _ siighni a _ .
amalleqa _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ saghna aqe kangit _ siighni a _ .
kelengake pigte luki _ p i l a g n a y u k a m e g t e k i _ imanagh lgu nghata _ taglagh nghmegteki _ imani _ n u s u g i u k i _ s a g n e g h p a g k u n _ niive luki _ .
amalleqa _ u g h v u g h w a a g h l u k i _ ughvugh luki _ m a a n a a q i i t _ .
qaye i _ sivuke luki _ qapigh aqe ait _ savig meng _ .
piig yaqunaki _ pikegken _ i g l a g a a n e n g _ kanavek _ q a p i g h h a q i i t _ kelengake pigte luki _ .
qapigh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ u u s l u k i _ amalleqa _ keligagh aqe ait _ q a a m n a n g i _ .
keligagh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ s a g n e g h p a g k u n _ tamaagun _ kanaghte luki _ u g h v u g h w a a g h a q i i t _ .
A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ megh i _ simigh aqe luki _ , _ tawaten _ upenghagh mi _ siighni a _ nekegte yagh te aqe ut _ .
anigu meng _ me ligh aqe luki _ .
anigu t _ gheve nagh pigte na iqe ait _ .
tawaten _ amalleqa _ ila i _ a q e f t a g h a g h q a a l u k i _ pi nghmegteki _ aghsughtagh ke ait _ .
elngaatall _ s i i g h n a s _ tamaakut _ kagpag sigh ghllag u ut _ atugh kaqsagh ait _ .
neqe mun _ , _ a q e f t a g h a g h a m u n _ u n a t a p s u g m u n _ saguyagh m _ sii anun _ siighnagh t _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
akitu pigte ut _ maani _ elngaatall _ .
A g h n a s a l l g h i i n a a m _ angtughpag m _ siighni a _ saghna aqe ait _ .
amalleqa _ g h e v n g w a a n g h a t a _ g h e v n g w a a n g h a t a _ ghhuugh luki _ .
ghhuu ghllag luki _ elngaatall _ ila i _ aange pigte aqe ut _ .
ghhuugh luki _ inillghaatagh ke te _ agaghte uute aqe ait _ pakregnegh akun _ .
kuug igh neghtu uute aqe ut _ k i i n g h a q i i s _ tawaten _ .
kiig mi _ sivungagh mi
kiig nghagu _ , _ sivuke luteng _ kiiw t _ pinagh uute aqe ut _ .
nani _ tanqigh mi _ entaqun _ may- mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ J u n e - m i _ taakwani _ .
anigu _ ughug nghaani _ , _ piite te siigh at _ nunivagseghagh t _ p i i t q u u t a q u t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ qawaag t _ ighni laghate te aqe ut _ .
manig yagh te aqe ut _ tawani _ tanqigh ani _ J u n e - n e m _ , _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ nunivagseghagh t _ p i i t q u u n n e g h a n i _ , _ aghulaghqugh te aqe ut _ aghnagh t _ , _ nunivag yagh te aqe ut _ .
akmagutagh ghhagh teng _ i m i g h t u u t a q h t _ .
Q u q u n g a g h m e n g _ saghna aqe ut _ , _ angukagh meng llu _ .
neghigh luku _ taagani _ , _ kiyang _ neghsapig meng _ nayug aqe ut _ n u n i v a a t a g h q a m e n g _ .
nayug luki _ kinegh nghata _ aghi ste luki _ uspeqe aqe ait _ yataaghqe aqe ait _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ awataghpag t _ kinegh nghata _ taakut _ y a t a a g h q e l l u k i _ .
sivuke luki _ itegagh i _ imigh aqe ait _ q u q u n g a g h m e n g _ .
taagken _ q u q u n g a g h m e n g _ imigh luki _ , _ navek _ qalqasigh an _ asi anun _ .
tawaten _ m e l q w i _ q a m a n i n g a n i l l u k i _ nunivag meng _ kevigh aqe ait _ , _ kenlanga _ i i g g a g h h i l l u _ taakut _ imigh luki _ q u q u n g a g h m e n g _ .
nunivag meng _ imigh luki _ ilangakun _ nunivagtu negh meggni _ , _ iwerngaqun _ pikavek _ , _ esleqe aqe ait _ .
nunivag t _ n u u g h n a q e n g h a t a _ q u q u n g a g h m e n g _ imigh aqe ait _ .
qilleghte luki _ t e p t a a q e l u k i _ ( _ teptaaqe aqe ait _ ) _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ , _ saayguraagh m _ qaye anun _ qaake aqe ait _ , _ nalighmeng _ s i q l u w a m _ qaye anun _ .
uksaagh mi _ taakwani _ nalighmeng _ uksugh mi _ taakwani _ mumigte ghesnagh aqe luki _ u k s u t e s t a q i i t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ila a _ saghna aqe lghiit _ .
siklagh niigh aqe ut _ aghnagh t _ tangighkagh meng _ , _ qullikagh meng _ , _ akughagh meng _ , _ uqfigagh meng _ , _ saqlag meng _ , _ saghna aqe ut _ .
siighnagh m _ kepellegh anun _ kanaghte luki _ navek _ a q l a g h a l i g h a n u n _ mingllite aqe ait _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwani _ tangigh ste aqe luki _ , _ u n a n g e n g h a t a _ nutaghagh kun _ , _ kemekrag kun _ uqugh ke te _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ y u g e s _ tamaakut _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ , _ quugkagh meng _ quugsaghtugh aqe luteng _ , _ siimghu meng _ qupugh aqe luteng _ quug meng _ , _ tagite uute aqe ait _ mangteghagh meggnun _ .
uksugh mi _ quugkagh u luki _ nalighmeng _ mayughti aqe ut _ unaghsigh meng _ .
uksugh mun _ quugkagh meng _ .
amalleqa _ , _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ pinighsagh aqe ait _ mangteghagh teng _ mat- qaghte yagh aqe ait _ .
sa u a _ neqesghaghqagh _ , _ neqesghagh ightugh aqe luteng _ .
sa aqe luteng _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ uksugh mun _ .
qawaagniigh aqe ut _ n g e l q a a g h a g h m e n g _ , _ leghllegh meng _ .
L e g h l l e g h e s _ tamaakut _ ghhiitagh luki _ agaghte aqe ait _ ulpegte luki _ .
N g e l q a a g h a a t _ tamaakut _ ilangakun _ ghhiitagh luki _ akmagutagh gnun _ kanaghte uute aqe ait _ , _ uksugh mun _ neqekaghqagh t _ ( _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ ) _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ nani _ taakwani _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ igaghyagh uute aqe ut _ taghnughhagh put _ .
igagh te aqe ut _ uksulqusigh _ h o l i d a y - n e g h a g u _ taaqe luteng _ h o l i d a y - l u t e n g _ alla _ piinligh luteng _ igagh te aqe ut _ uksulqusigh _ , _ kenlanga _ upenghagh mun _ .
upenghagh mi _ taaqe uute yaghagh aqe ut _ qayughllak _ samavek _ pugughilegh mun _ angyagh yagh uute aqe ut _ .
aghvegh niigh yagh te aqe ut _ .
pilaataqu negh meggni _ maalghug _ , _ pi nga yu t _ , _ estamat _ , _ unake aqe ait _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ allute luni _ yuug _ , _ mekelghiigh _ , _ teve uute aqe uq _ .
pilag yagh te aqe uq _ .
pilag aqe ait _ aghvegh ghllag t _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ nengighqe aqe luki _ .
inpite qugh aqe luteng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ aghveghni ii aagh _ t a a q e n g h a n i _ e n r a k _ angyaghte qu uute aqe ut
upenghagh mi _ ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ teghiglug meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ neqekaghqagh meng _ .
S i q l u w a l w a a q s a g h t u t _ .
S i q l u w a l w a a q s a g h t u k u t _ , _ maaten _ s i q l u w a p a g i i s i m a a q _ .
qantaghtugh luki _ , _ pinitun _ kagpag luki _ , _ nutaghagh u luki _ , _ kumlasighvig meggnun _ kanaghte uute aqe ait _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ neqe _ legan _ aklukaghte gpenaan _ .
unange ni uq _ i t a g h n a n g h a n i _ , _ pinigh nghaani _ , _ u n a n g s a g h w a a l l g h a t _ n e q e m e n g _ legan _ kagpag ghllag aqe ut _ .
S i q l u w a l g u l u t a _ neqe _ manguna _ tamaa na _ tuugte qugh luku _ .
S i q l u w a t _ u k m a n g i g h w a a g h l u k i _ , _ kanaghte uute aqe yagh ait _ .
neqekaghqagh u luki llu _ .
qikmigh mun llu _ neghqutkagh u luki _ .
amalleqa _ maana _ . . . _ a m i q e n g h a t a _ a g h n a s i n g h a g h m e n g _ amigh kau iqe ut _ .
ayvegh t _ aghnasaleg t _ amiiqagh u iqe ait _ .
amu iqe i luki _ , _ uqiigh luki _ , _ upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ amighkagh lug kun _ angyagh m _ amighkagh lug akun _ qantagh luki _ meqesigh aqe ait _ .
M e q e n g h a t a _ esneli luki _ aghnagh t _ kiigtagh ke ait _ .
T a a q e n g h a t k i _ niightugh aqe ait _ yug t _ kinegh llegh itnun _ kenlanga _ .
kinegh nghata _ maana _ , _ imeg luki _ , _ navek _ lli aqe ait _ , _ m a a n a s q e l l u k i _ atughqagh ke kangit _ .
ilangakun _ entaqun _ ayumiqullegh _ wiin _ amigh te gpenaki _ kiyaghute aqe ait _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ a m i i q a s _ tamaakut _ e n r a k _ tanpegh at _ megh mun _ ateghte luki _ aghisigh aqe ait _ kellii mi _ .
aghisigh luki _ aghi nghata _ aghnagh t _ piighhe aqe ut _ ivalu meng _ , _ a g h v e q i n g h a g h m e n g _ .
pi aghte luteng _ tawaten _ a s i s i g h q a m e n g _ sivuyag anun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ , _ kingu anun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ .
pi aghte luteng _ naate nghmegteki _ qiipagh t _ tamaakut _ aghisigh luki _ sa meng _ uqigtuqagh meng _ u y g h a g h m e n g _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ i q u g i k u n _ k a n a g u n _ uyghigh luki _ agaghte luki _ pikavek _ sa kun _ pikagun _ agaghte luki _ nengesigh aqe ait _ .
N e n g e n g h a t a _ taawa _ amu iqe i naqe negh meggni _ atugh aqe ait _ .
aghnagh t _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g u l u t e n g _ , _ kaki aqe ait _ angyagh t _ .
maana _ . . . . _ asiigh ke ut llu _ u u g n a n g i l l u _ kingu i llu _ k a k i l a g h a q i i t _ .
nalluke anka _ naten _ pilag llegh i _ .
tawaten _ iwernga _ amu iqe ait _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ k u v i g h l u k i _ piineqe aqe ait _ , _ taawa _ lli aqe ait _ .
apeghiigh nghmegteki _ , _ atughqagh u luki _ a n g y a s _ tamaakut _ angyapig t _ upenghagh mun _ .
kiig mi _ maaken _ savikenghaagh meng _ angyagh ke luteng _ upenghagh mi _ angyaghtugh aqe ut _ .
kiig mi llu _ navek _ pinegh meggni _ a n g y a q a q i i s _ tamaakut _ .
kiig mi _ enraq _ amalleqa _ nunaagh meggnun _ pi laghate aqe ut _ .
unangniigh na luteng _ , _ iqallug niigh na luteng _ , _ iigge na luteng _ , _ aki ughtekanga _ maaten _ tugutlug llu _ , _ a r t i f a c t - l l u _ s p e c i m e n - a _ .
naalkuteqaghte negh meggni _ elngaatall _ a k i v a g s i t k a q i i t _ t u k f i g h t u g h t e t _ aglagh nghata _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ sa mun _ akituqagh mun _ .
ullghitagh mun _ sa mun _ allgegh sigh ke aqe ait _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kiyang _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ iigge aqe ut _ elngaatall _ .
qawaagniigh magh meng _ .
uksaagh mi _ mughute magh meng _ .
uqlighsagh magh meng _ , _ unange negh meggni _ amiiragh it _ saghna luki _ aki ngllagh aqe ait _ .
N e q a n g i s _ tamaakut _ ilangakun _ neqetu negh meggni _ agaghte luki _ aqlaghsigh aqe ait _ .
nutaghagh yug negh meggni _ nutaghagh u luki _ gaagh aqe ait _ .
taana _ elngaatall _ megnu nagh pigte yagh uq _ .
awaligh uute aqe luteng _ ava ite ngugh nun _ ne nun _ .
awalightugh aqe luki _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ neqe _ quunpeng _ ila meggnun _ tuune luku _ a y u q a q s a g h a g h p u t _ y u p i g g a g h n i _ whangkuta _ .
laluramke t _ p i l l g h i t n i _ s h a r e - e l u k u _ yug lgute mnun _ ava ite ngugh nun _ .
neqe pig
afta luki _ neghsagh t _ u n a n g e n g h a t a _ , _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ . . . _ ugkelli luki _ , _ megh t _ taghyugh ligh luki _ , _ ilangakun _ aghipsaate luki _ , _ ilangakun _ k i t e g h q e l l u k i _ d e p e n d s _ o n _ naten _ piyuke llegh stun _ .
enkaam _ ayvegh t llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe aput _ , _ maana _ nutaghagh u luki _ maana _ ugkelli luki _ manguna t _ , _ kemekrag ligh luki _ .
qilu i _ ughvugh luki _ u u s l u k i _ , _ ilangakun _ ighsaqugh t llu _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
aghipsaate luki _ p i y u n e m t e k i _ k i t e g h q e l l u k i l l u _ .
uuk _ , _ maana _ ilangakun _ neghsagh t _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ aqlagh nghata _ ama _ gaagh aqe aput _ , _ n e g h s a t i u _ tamaakut _ .
inglu t _ legan _ agaghte aqe ke put _ a q l i i s q e l l u k i _ .
aa-a _ , _ taawa _ .
neqekrangllagh
sivuke luku _ m a s h _ b o w l - k u n _ , _ qayuusigh _ maatneghraag _ kuuve luku _ , _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ s a k a r a m e n g _ , _ a n g u r g h a a l l u k e k _ s a k a r a _ .
kuuve nakegken _ maalghug _ package-k _ y e a s t - a k _ tawavek _ maatneghraag mun _ megh mun _ .
qallaqugh neghsigh ma luku _ , _ p a l a q a n i i l u k u _ qayuusigh meng _ s a k a r a _ sagnegh mun _ tawavek _ kuuve luku _ .
para meng _ tawaten _ pi nga yu t _ p e n g u g h u g h l l u k i _ a l q u u t a g h p a g e t _ tawavek _ ilate naken _ s a k a r a m u n _ .
enkaam _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ taghyugh meng _ .
maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ u g u q n a g h l l a g m e n g _ megh meng _ kuuve nakegken _ tawavek _ para mun _ , _ p a r a n k u g n u n _ s a k a r a n k u g n u n _ kenlanga _ para _ ughug llegh anun _ .
ughug kan _ e n k a a n g a m _ a n g u r g h a a l l u k u _ , _ ilate naken _ maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ mamagh meng _ , _ f r e s h _ milk- meng _ nalighmeng _ d r y _ milk _ mamagh ngllagh qagh luku _ .
taake uk llu _ maalghug _ manig k _ , _ ilate lukek _ tawavek _ a n g u r g h a a l l u k e k _ , _ y e a s t - a l l u _ ilate luku _ .
enkaam _ elngaatall _ n u n m a a w h a q _ avlawa ligh luku _ e g g b e a t e r - e l g u k u v e k _ nalighmeng _ e l e c t r i c _ b e a t e r - e l g u k u v e k _ .
N u n m a a w h a q _ avlawa ligh magh an _ a n g u r g h a a n n a k e n _ , _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
aghtugh yagute kan _ e l e c t r i c _ b e a t e r - m e n g _ , _ iigge gpeneng _ taana _ akuute naken _ .
avlawa _ ilate naken _ tawavek _ akuutagh mun _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
igughtekan _ tawani _ sagnegh mi _ mesiigh ligh luku _ taana _ akuute an _ ghhuughsigh naken _ saape luku _ sangighqugh sigh meng _ v e g l l u m e n g _ kenlanga _ ghhuu llegh anun _ .
ghhuugh kan _ e n k a a n g a m _ gaagh naken _ mesiigh kun _ .
tawaten _ mesiighquute tke aat _ neqekrangllagh t _ kenlanga _ qamagte llegh gpeneng _ taana _ akuute aq _ .
mangteghapig
neghigh luku _ m a n g t e g h a p i g g a a l u t a _ mangteghapig put _ e f l u u g a l g e t _ nategh leg t _ angyagh m _ amu iqe yagh ka aneng _ ategh i _ vuvegh t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ mingle t llu _ quyngigh m _ amiiragh i _ , _ s a n g w a t _ allighaghqagh t _ , _ aagra t _ .
iwhani _ taakut llu _ , _ maana _ , _ s a n g a a w a t i i _ , _ p u y g a a n k a _ ima _ ( _ suugernge t _ ) _ .
tawaten _ e n g k a a n g a m _ , _ nanigh lightugh luteng _ nanigh m _ p u y u q e r u g a q e g k a n g i _ puyuqe aqe kangi _ entaqun _ .
maana _ aagra ten _ tamaakut _ tanughqe aqe kangit _ .
T a n u g h q e l l u k i _ m a a n a a q l u k i _ sa meng _ iwhani aqe luki _ ( _ sategte luki _ sallegte aqe kangit _ ) _ .
E n g k a a n g a m _ a q l a g h a g h r a a g m i _ q a t e g h r a k e t u n _ kinegh na iqe kangit _ s u p e l g a g h l u t e n g _ vuvegh teng _ tamaakut _ .
ama _ t a n u g h q e n g n g w a a g h a q e g k a n g i t _ .
neghigh luku _ ila it _ nekegte ghllag na iqe kangit _ legan _ whangkutestun _ maaten _ n e k e g s a g h w a a g h a q e l g h i i t _ .
temkagh ak
sivuke luki _ nazighagh at _ temkag ngllagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ qafsina t _ pi nga yu t _ estamat _ angtale akun _ amiiragh m _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ sivuke luki _ a f t a n e m t e k i _ aghvig aqe aput _ amiiragh t _ elngaatall _ u k m a n g i g h s a g h w a a g h l u k i _ , _ m e s i i g h i i t n g w a a g h l u k i _ .
maana _ kiig mi _ aane ste luki _ , _ sa kun _ tefte luki _ nalighmeng _ c l o t h e s l i n e - k u n _ , _ m e l q w i _ kinegh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ n i i g h t u g h a q h i k i _ .
uksugh mi _ anigu kun _ tuute aqe aput _ .
tuute luki _ ufsug luki _ niightugh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ e n k a a n g a m _ ( _ niighigh luki _ esne igh luki _ pellug aqe aput _ ) _ pellug luki _ , _ p e l l u g h i k i _ , _ pi nga yu t _ , _ estamat _ nalighmeng _ p e l l u g h i k i _ aghvig luki _ aane ste luki _ .
maana _ upenghagh mi _ qafsina neng _ qavagh ste luki _ itghute luki _ aqlagh ma nghata _ ulug aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ nenge qagh luki _ pellug meng _ taawa _ l i i g h q e l l u k i _ temkagh u luki _ kaki aqe aput _ .
amiiragh t _ , _ m a a l g h u t _ ighu ke luki _ ataasigh _ n a a l k a k l u k u _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ maaten _ z i p p e r - e l i g h l u k i _ u g h f i g i _ paagkut _ ( _ paagna i _ ) _ q i i p a g h a g h h a g l i m e n g _ iwhani luki _ kakivike luki _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe ait _ ( _ n u n g i g h s i g h a q a p u t _ ) _ .
kaankut llu _ tukughagh i _ e n k a a n g a m _ n u n g i g h s i g l i l u k i _ maana _ .

I l e p g h a a g h e t
Q u l l i g e t _ maakut _ i l e p g h a a g h e t _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ ulima aqe ke put _ .
amigh t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ entaqun _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe atki _ , _ y e a r l i n g - e t _ .
tamaaken _ i l e p g h a a n g l l a g h a q u t _ .
maana _ aghu iqe luki _ sa ta i _ a g h i q n g w a a g h l u k i _ .
imeg luki _ lli luki _ y u k u t a g h r a a g g n e g h a t a _ p e t l u g a q i i t _ .
pellug luki _ pellug luki _ y u k u t a q l u k i _ imeg luki _ lli luki _ , _ itghuugute nghata _ ketfagh luki _ ulug aqe ait _ elngaatall _ ulug luki _ esne i _ maana _ tukegh aqe ait _ , _ nengte aqe ait _ , _ unite te lugh u i aghagh aqe ut _ tukegh nghmegteki _ .
tawaten _ lli luki _ ketfagh aqe luki _ ulug aqe luki _ kenlanga _ unite te lugh u i aghagh llegh itnun _ .
unite te lugh u i aghagh nghata _ taawa _ k a v i g h v a a g m e n g _ kavighte aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tea- ma uten _ kaviigh igh yagh te lghiikut _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ qaye akun _ mesiigh ghhagh meng _ m e s i i g h q e l l u k i _ ( _ angighhe aqe ait _ ) _ .
M a a n a n a y u k a t a _ kavighyaag i _ gheve na yu kata _ ( _ ifkagh na yu kata _ ) _ .
tawaten _ ulug aqe luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ lliighqagh ke ait _ i l e p g h a a g h e t _ .

iwernga _ tawaten _ entaqun _ t u u n g g h u g h l l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ t e m k a a s t u n _ .
tawaten _ tukughagh i llu _ kaankut _ , _ qukagh i llu _ e s n e l a a g u s i g h l u k i _ q i i p a g h a g h h a g h m e a g _ n u n g i g h s i g h a q i i t _ .

kameg
amalleqa _ tamaakut _ neghsagh t _ amiiragh t _ , _ k a m e g m i m _ a t u q n a q n e m t e k i _ , _ neghsapig t _ u n Ê¼ g a v e k _ m u g h u n i i g h m u n _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
qazigyagh t _ quyillegtagh u aqe ut _ .
ategh it _ q u i y i l l e g t a t _ .
qazigyagh meng _ ulima aqe aput
E n k a a n g a m _ , _ neghsapig t llu _ qazigyagh t llu _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ amalleqa _ neghsapig t _ tamaakut _ amiiragh t _ qigugh luki _ , _ m e l q i g h a t _ atigh kau luteng _ .
M e l q i g h a s _ tamaakut _ amalleqa _ mughunniigh mun _ atugh aqe ut _ kameg t _ .
S a n g a a w a t i i _ ategh it _ , _ a k u g h v i g a w a a q u t _ .
kelulighagh ke aput _ maalghug gneng _ megh mun _ itegh yaghqaa fqiita _ ( _ taape yaghqaa fqiita _ ) _ .

ipigkingwaagh mun _ kaamwaagh ke ut _ ipigkingwaagh at _ takestaaghhagh t _ tukughagh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ ipigkingwaagh ngllagh aqe aput _ .

paagna i _ k a l e f t a g h l u k i _ n u n g i g h t e l i g h l u t e n g _ ( _ n u n g i g h t e l i g h l u k i _ ) _ .

sanaghte a
kamegkagh t _ amiiragh t _ .
quyillegtaghqagh t _ kamegkagh t _ .

neghsapig t _ .

uygaagh
E n k a a n g a m _ u y g a a g h q a s _ tamaakut _ .
neghsagh t _ nayug luki _ afta aqe aput _ .
nayug luki _ , _ a m i i i i i _ yugusigh aneng _ i i k n e m t e k i _ u u s l u k i _ uqiigh aqe aput _ .
uqiigh luki _ taagken _ itegagh i _ i i x i _ t a w a n l l u k i _ sagnegh mun _ kanaghte aqe aput _ .
T a a q n e m t e k i _ uqiigh nghmeng _ uqugh aneng _ saape aqe aput _ taakut _ uygaaghqagh t _ nayugkagh put _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ navek _ lli aqe aput _ maatnegh ghraag llegh mun _ meqesigh aqe aput _ .
meqesigh luki _ m e q e n g h a t a _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ kelenga kaqe aput _ .

sivuqagh m _ U N G I I P A A
A k u l k i m _ apegh llegh a
A k u w a a q _ qaye ii lleghte aqngamta _ , _ t a a m u m _ ila yan _ ategh i _ liite aput _ .
kinku u ta i _ taamani _ kiyaghtekagh t _ ayumigh _ liite aput _ .
ukut _ igagh t _ p i l l g h i t n i _ , _ a y u m i r u g l l a a k _ sa u a _ 1 1 , 0 0 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ uukna _ alaska _ salin _ ugpeqe llegh meggni _ qute u luku _ pamavek _ .
sivuligh t _ kiyaghtekagh t _ , _ ukani _ alaska- mi _ , _ kiyaghtekau lghiit _ esne mi llu _ , _ qungevagh ni llu _ pagani _ .
iqallug meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ n e q e k l u t e n g _ .

ayumightagh ghllag u uq _ .
whani _ igagh ni _ whaa _ ila i llu _ ategh i _ :

wata _ u n Ê¼ g a n l e n g u u t _ , _ maaten _ qagi m _ naafqekagh i _ , _ 1 9 0 0 - e m _ n a t a n g a n i _ ne u yagh lghiit _ : _ A n a n g t i n k u t _ , _ T a a n g y a t e n t k u t _ , _ kinku t llu _ .

punguug _ taake uk _ m a l g h u g h q e l l u t e k _ ayuqe uk _ :
sivuligh k llu _ , _ punguug _ , _ kinguligh k llu _ punguug _ .
P u n g u u m _ culture-nga _ mingite te luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
sivuqagh mi _ maani _ ulu ii ma uq _ naalke aqe aat _ pungughmii stun _ ayuqe lghii _ .

ila i _ p i n i i p i g t a a q u t _ .
naalkutaagh mteggun _ i l g g n e m t a _ liigike aqe aput _ naken _ c u l t u r e m e n g _ pi u ta i _ ulima llegh itgun _ .
uugte vig _ taana _ s i v u l i g h t a l l e g h p i i g a a g u q _ maani _ . _ naalkutaagh mnni _ terellegh it _ m a a l g h u t _ saaqwligh igh qutagh lghiit _ . _ terellegh t llu _ q a m a v n e g h t u q a t _ .

tuungligh kek _ uugte vig k _ taake uk _ O l d _ B e r i n g _ S e a _ O n e - n g u u k _ .
paninang _ uksughtutka lghiik _ tawaten _ 2 0 0 0 _ y e a r s _ .
O l d _ B e r i n g _ S e a - m _ igaqragh llegh an _ terellegh i _ s a m a v n e g h t u q a t _ agughte magh meng _ .
taamani _ u l i m a y i i t k a n i t _ , _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ igaqragh llegh i _ .
whaa _ maaten _ t u k f i g h t u g h t e t _ t u k f i i g h i n a a q u t e g h l i a q u u t _ taghnughhaghwaagh meng _ , _ n a a s q u g h w a a g h m e n g _ , _ ila aneng llu _ pinigh lghii meng _ sa meng _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h m e n g _ .
tamaakut _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ uugte vig nun _ kaate luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
kiyang _ t a w a t e k a n i q _ u l l i m a l l g h i _ ayuqe te ut _ .
