S I V U G A M _ K I Y A G H T A A L L G H A _ ayumigh
U v i m _ ungipagh a
elngaatall _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ liite llegh ma _ kenle aneng _ taagken _ m a n g t e g h a p i p e r e g w a a q _ .
nenglu m _ ulima llegh anun _ nuugh uute kau unga _ .
nalluke anka _ enkaam _ .
iwernga _ iigna llu _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t _ mangteghagh ita _ u k a k a g h a a n i l n g u q _ waamte uute te m _ allgegh vike a _ .
sallghite kanigh luku _ n a t a n g a _ , _ k a t u m l l u _ n e q e l g h u t a l u g g a m t a _ nalla ani _ , _ kaay _ , _ n a a v n g w a a l l g h i l n g u u t _ , _ q a k e m n a l l u _ peghukagh _ n a a v n g w a a l l g h i t e f t u q _ .
taakut _ e s g h a g h u _ .
mangteghapig ghllag u uq _ , _ ila i _ sama _ megh mun _ lliigh uute ut _ esghagh llegh nka _ , _ kiyang _ maalghug _ .
T a a n g y a t e n k u t l u _ , _ A n a n g t i n k u t l u _ t e s k a n a n l e n g u u t _ .
A n a n g t i g h l l a k _ , _ paa- a _ angli stekagh a _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ k a n a n s a g h p e t u k u t _ angyilghagh mnni _ .
enkaam _ u g w a k a g h a m n n i _ T e m k e r u u n k u t _ .
ingate kaghagh itni _ Q a n e n g u u n k u t _ , _ qeghagh lug t _ tazingkut _ kete kaghagh itni _ N e m a a y a a n k u t _ , _ u n Ê¼ g a n t u s a g h t u t _ .
qaasqagh _ u n Ê¼ g a r u g l l a k _ .
uughqaghtagh ughte aqe ghngaaghmi _ pi igate ngugh t _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ , _ t e s a m a n t e n g n g i n a g h a q u t _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ a l l a n g u g h t e m l l u _ a a s k e l l i k a a l g h i i _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ a k i l i g h n e g h a n i _ T a a n g y a t e n k u t _ sama _ samavek _ lliigh ma ut _ .
kelu kaghagh itni _ A n a n g t i n k u t _ .
enkaam _ kelu kaghagh itni _ A y m e r g e n k u t _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ t a z i k a n i q a a g h a q _ E g h q a a g h a a n k u t _ , _ maaten _ ikegkut _ I i r g u n k u t _ angyaghwaagh lghutagh ita _ kete kaghagh itni _ .
U k a k a g h i i t n i _ enkaam _ S i i v a g h h a a n k u t _ , _ M a a s q e m _ ata a _ .
enkaam _ t a a g e g k u t _ qiwaaghmii lghute u ut _ .
nalugvig m _ amenqun _ uyghagagh u ta t _ t a a g e g k u t _ .
ilagagh te ma nkut _ , _ U q e n g e l i i g h a a n k u t _ , _ N g u u n g a y a n k u t _ e s g h a g h t e g h a n k a _ .
mangteghapig it _ t a a g a n t u s a g h p e t u t _ , _ llangaqa _ maaken _ aafte aghagh luteng _ taagavek _ .
enkaam _ taakwna _ entaqun _ uzive te yu ainkut _ esghagh lleg mni _ u g a _ mangteghagh it _ aghula i te ut _ , _ n a y a a s _ taana _ .
kelu kaghagh at _ up- ke na nga _ p a q e q r a g g i i s a g h t u q _ , _ m a n g t e g h a q r a g g i i s a g h t u q _ , _ nunatu ghllag yagh uq _ .
kiyang _ u k a n t u s a l g h i i t _ , _ iwerngaqun _ t a a w a n i q a a g h a q _ S a a v l a n k u t l u _ , _ aghillug nkut llu _ , _ taawani _ maaten _ ayapghute m _ nayugh ani _ .
taakwani _ saaqwligh igh qutagh luteng _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ i m u t e m _ qaye ani _ iwhani _ , _ M i n a a n k u t _ .
tazingani _ A s u n a g h a a n k u t _ , _ P i i n t e g h l l a n k u t _ , _ U w e t e l e n k u t _ , _ Q u w a a r i n k u t _ , _ K i n g u w a a g h h a a n k u t _ , _ Q e n a a g h a a n k u t _ .
U w a l i i t _ u w a n i _ maaten _ angyilghagh vig it _ taawani _ .
tawatete yagh lghii _ taakwna _ nunaghllag _ .
iwerngaqun _ taawani _ A t a y a g h h a a m _ guygu an _ nalighnegh ani _ K u u l u n k u t _ t a w a n t u t _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m e n g _ .
ketfaghkagh ani _ tamaani _ mangteghagh t _ tamaa _ e s g h a g h t e g h a n k a _ .
taagani _ aghneghte neghtugh kanga _ , _ A y u w i g h s a a t e n k u n i l l u _ , _ N e g h y u g e n k u n i l l u _ .
T a a k w a n t u s a g h t u t _ ketfaghkagh ani _ .
K i y a g h n e g h u n e g h t u q a k u t _ taagani _ .
M a n g t e g h a p i p e r e g w a a q _ .
ayumigh m qun _ tanpigh kayug i _ , _ tamaa na _ .
aange lghii m _ whangkuta qun _ aange ghllag lghii _ mangteghagh ut _ .
T a l l i m a w a a q u t _ t a n p e g h h e t _ .
saye t _ uugkut _ amenqun _ qiipaghagh ghllag u aqe lghiit _ .
A g h v i l q e l l u k i _ saye t _ t a a w e g k u t _ .
tawatete aqe ut _ .
T a l l i m a n e n g _ whangkuta qun _ tanpegh ke aqe ut _ .
T a g s i g h a p e r u w a a g h m e n g _ niightugh lghii stun _ tawaten _ putu t _ ataasigh t _ aflu ke aqe luki _ n i i g h t u g h t e g h a q e g k a n g i t _ .
kisaate i _ sa i _ uyghag meng _ u q i g k u s i g h l u k i _ , _ qayughllak _ u p e n g h a n g h a n i _ kuug igh negh mun _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ masaaghi nghaani _ tuquuqagh tke aq _ tamaa na _ niightugh vig a _ makregaghte aghte aqe uq _ .
kii _ , _ kuug igh negh mun _ sayug i _ entaqun _ iknaqe pigte ut _ .
tamaakut _ malighqutagh ma t _ uyghu iqe aat _ itagnagh ma aqe lghiit _ uyghag t _ atugh it _ .
nenglullug u yagh lghii _ iigna _ naghaagh vig ghllag _ , _ u l a p n a a r i q f i g l l a k _ uyghagtuqagh _ tazigna _ qellinegh _ .
qerngughte vig u yagh lghii _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ qelli ghllag luni _ naghaagh vig m _ u l a p n a a r i q f i g a _ nukalpigagh m _ .
whangkuta qun _ m a l i k r u u t a g h t a q u n g a _ m e k e s t a a n g h i t g u n _ t a m a a k u t g u n _ pi aghte aqe ukut _ .
esgha _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ aange pigte aqe ut _ , _ neghqute m nguq _ tagite kaqe aqe ai _ .
entaqun _ iknaqe pigte uq _ .
kuule t _ estamat _ esgha _ maakut _ a a n g e p a a g h r u l l e g h p i g i i _ akmag kayugu ai _ , _ entaqun _ h u n d r e d _ p o u n d s - n g u u t _ .
amavek _ ivgagh naqe nghmini _ mangteghasqwaaghqagh ni _ sivugnagh mete te _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ a k m a k a y u g w a a _ .
kii _ , _ iknaqe pigte uq _ taawa _ .
I n g a n l l u k i _ esghaqagh ma aqa _ naten _ imani _ tullumeg t _ e s l e g k a k a a t _ .
aywaa neng _ a n u q l i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ amiiragh t _ i q u g i k u n _ petug luki _ , _ sa aqe aki _ ulug aqe aki llu _ .
kii _ , _ a g h n e g h h u t k a q i i _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
qayughllak _ uvinegtu pigte uq _ .
inglu anun _ aghvightagh ke luki _ a g h n e g h t e n g n g w a a g h a q u q _ .
simigh aqe ai _ amiiragh ni _ , _ qevuute luni _ pinigh ghllag _ ulima yu ghllag _ .
taakut _ tawatete yaghpete ut _ .

1 9 _ . _ O w i t t i l i n
2 0 _ . _ K u w a r i
2 1 _ . _ K i n g u w a h a k
2 2 _ . _ K e n a h a k
2 3 _ . _ K u l u
2 4 _ . _ A y u w i k s a n
2 5 _ . _ N e k y u k
tawaten _ ukavek _ nuugtekau ukut _ q a g i n g u g h t e g h l l u n i _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ aghsaan _ pi ste ghllag gpenaan _ salin _ .
taakwavek _ nuugh qugh te kau ukut _ .
tagi ukut _ taakwavek _ kelevagh uute kau ukut _ tamaani _ t a w a t e t u s a g h p e t u k u t _ .
elngaatall _ amalka _ piniqe te ghllag luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ , _ upughatu tete luni _ kiyaghnegh at _ .
nagaqugh lleg mni _ salleg mni _ , _ n e l l i q r u u g u n n e m t a l l u _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ a g h y u u g h e s q e l l u t a _ , _ ata mta llu _ t a a g e g k u g h h m i i n u n _ .
yimi ke gpenaamta _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ a g h y u u g h e s q e l l u t a _ .
ukut _ kiyang _ a ngam ta _ , _ N e g h y u g e n k u k _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkuk _ , _ naa mta _ kugegh kek _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
taakwani _ allangughte kestagh magh mi _ angli llegh a _ mangteghagh a _ u g l a a g h i k e s t a a m a g h m i _ .
taakwna _ imiite ghllag _ mangteghagh qaqu _ a l l g e r e g a a m a g h m i _ .
una llu _ pinigh yagh lghii _ iigna _ igaghvig _ una _ ukaligh _ naafqe llegh m _ kenle a _ taana _ , _ pinigh ghllag yagh lghii _ .
kii _ tawani _ aqfaqugh te ghllag aqe yagh lghiit _ .
ilulighnegh itgun _ whangkuta _ mekestaaghhagh ni _ .
E x e r c i s e - e s t i _ e v e r y _ d a y - k a n i q _ .
N e g h y a g h t u n e n g _ igaghyagh neng _ aag negh mta _ p u q l e g h a a g g n e g h a n i _ uksugh mi _ , _ whaa _ a q f a q u t _ .
legan _ aag negh mta _ ilate aqe lghiikut _ .
ilangakun _ p u q l e g h a a g g n e g h a n i _ , _ t a p g h a g h q u n n a q u n Ê¼ n g u q _ .
taakwagun _ U u y n e q _ kenle ke ma aqe kangat _ .
sukalqagh msiigh _ tamaa na _ .
whangkuta _ u k a v a n e n g _ ukegken _ .
taakwani _ s a a g g u t e g h l l a g a q u t _ .
qamaggute aqe uq _ , _ mekelghiigh iighpag ni _ whangkuta llu _ .
kaate negh meggni _ t u g h u m g h a n n e q e g s a a t a q u t _ .
aamta _ sariigh te lghiit _ , _ qemqagh uute lghiit _ tamaakut _ aqlagha _ yakugh ke igate aat _ .
I g h e n n a q u n _ esghaghtu pigte aqa _ .
sa meng _ s a t e r e g a a t k a t _ t a a n a n g u u q _ qemqagh uq _ , _ esghaate na luteng _ .
naligh _ menutu kan _ a l i k s a l i i s a g h q a a _ t a a m _ .
qaatke sag liite yaghqagh a _ .
tawatete uq _ .
sa meng _ naqam _ s e g h l e l i i g h m e n g _ avangite uq _ .
ghhuute igate ai _ , _ tughumgha te aqe ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ ineghte aqe ait _ .
kumlaaghqe lleqe aisi _ t a w a t e n Ê¼ n g a m _ pi tek _ .
aamta _ a r a n Ê¼ g h a t a _ sate luteng _ taawa _ aghulaqe uute aqe ut _ , _ kilgaaqu te sqe aqe kangit _ seghleliigh te laatagh naqe ni luki _ , _ sa naqlaatagh ni luki _ .
legan _ q e l e l l g h i s t u n _ , _ q a a t k u m t a a g h l l a g i t _ , _ whangkuta llu _ repall _ .
alingnaghte luteng _ repall _ nagate lleg mnni _ angeneghte aput _ tamaakut _ .
ii-ii _ esghagh lleqe aaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ , _ esgha _ esghapag lghii _ tazigna _ .
tawatete yaghpete ut _ , _ llangaqa _ sa meng _ itagnagh nghite ngugh meng _ kelengaruugh luteng _ .
qamugh te nghata _ tawaten _ k i i g w k e n _ , _ alngunak _ legan _ aghulaqe aqe lghii ni _ .
kina _ qamugh te na luku _ .
amalka _ qetgegh aatagh te kanigh luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .
nani _ u g a n i _ piyaqli i lghiit llu _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete ait _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
tawaten _ sa lghiit _ pillugute lghiit _ , _ n a n Ê¼ g h i i g h u t e s t a q i i t _ .
taana _ inglu a _ i k n a q e n g h a n i _ , _ aa-a _ t a a q n a k e n Ê¼ n g a m _ tawaten _ pi nghmeng _ .
â _ T a a q n a k e n Ê¼ n g a m _ qule ii uq _ e l p e n e n g _ , _ sa meng _ alla _ pi gpenaan _ . _ â
taawa _ ava iitagh ke ai _ .
piniqe llegh meng _ tuune aqe ait _ amalka _ .
siivanllegh t _ igleghte te i u ut _ tamaani _ .
taghtugh negh mta _ legan _ ilangakun _ taawa _ aghulaqe aqe ukut _ first _ b e l l - l e n a t a n g a n i _ .
T e s p i k e g k u s t a _ h i g h _ s c h o o l - e m _ u w a l i g h n e g h a n i _ uyghagagh ghhagh t _ .
tawani _ utaqa i te aqe ukut _ kaate negh mta _ .
nula ghllag negh mta _ tawani _ nukalpigagh ni _ taawa _ i v g a g h y a g h a m e n g _ g u u t u t a q u t _ t e s k i g w k e n _ .
tawaten _ unaangu luku _ esla _ seghleghu nghaani _ , _ tawani nguq _ uyghagte te naqe ut _ .
uyghag meng _ ategh leg t _ .
T u g h u m g h a n n e q e g s a a t a q u t _ t a a k u n i _ kinku ni _ mangteghagh ni _ , _ aagra itni _ .
uyghag u te meng _ ategh leg t _ .
anigu _ u m u g h h n e g h a n i _ naghaagh vig _ ulima aqe aat _ .
itegagh m _ n a a m a n Ê¼ g h a t u n _ nuqutupag fqaan _ .
qellughqagh vig k _ t a z i n g k u k _ qellughqagh vig ghllag u yagh uk _ , _ igaghvig m _ saaghw ani _ napaqagh k _ .
sa u a _ legan _ agleghnagh lghii _ sa u a _ uksugh mi _ tamaani _ pi igate kangat _ .
sa u aat _ sariigh t _ , _ n a g h a a l l q u s i i g h e m _ sariigh i _ agleghnagh ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ pi snanigh llegh it _ .
naqamalla _ k i i n Ê¼ g h a n i l l u _ , _ u p e n Ê¼ g h a n Ê¼ g h a n i _ taawa _ sa u a _ reghigh aqe uq _ , _ amalka _ sariigh _ .
K i i n Ê¼ g h a g u _ tawaten _ test- pig ke na _ maaten _ p i w h a n i n k u t _ , _ M a n g t a q u l i n k u t _ mangteghagh vike yagh kangat _ , _ ila ngllagh vig ghllag _ .
pika _ ayaviileg t _ a t g h a n Ê¼ g h a t a _ keleg qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ .
T i i g u n n a q u n Ê¼ n g u q _ .
ayaviileg t _ k e l e g t e t _ amalka _ yugpag t _ .
tiig te naqe ut _ !
elngaatall _ kemeg migkagh inagh meng _ sa meng _ aate luteng _ .
U g l a a g h i g h l l a n e g h m e g g n i _ , _ nanevgagh t _ qelegh nghmegteki _ .
angyilghagh neng _ , _ i v g a g h y u q a m e n g _ , _ uuvganeng _ t e s p i i k e g k e n _ q e l g h a a q e g k a n g i t _ .
ii _ , _ whangkuta _ taakwagun _ paayghi vig u ut _ ukegkut _ .
liilightugh aqe kangit _ â _ nuqeghsigh gpenaki _ , _ naayghagh m _ m i n g l e g h r u g w a a k u n _ qamagte lusi _ aag aqe tek _ . _ â
ila i _ qayughllak _ k e t f a g h p a q u n _ qiive aqe ut _ .
pi ste na nigh ke ait _ kaate nghata _ a g h y u u g h m i g a q i i t _ .
taawa _ tugutagh ke ut _ .
tanemlleqa _ t u g h u m g h a n n e q e g s a a t a q u t _ .
tamaani _ mekelghiigh ni _ , _ m e k e l g h i i g h p a g u g h s i m a a m t a _ pi aqe lghiikut _ .
iknaqe lleg leg t _ .
uuvganeng _ taana _ iknaqughi kestaghkagh _ , _ S u n a a g h r u k _ taana _ .
iknaqe lleghpigagh u yagh lghii _ A m a g u _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ pamaken _ .
anglegute ke te lghiik _ y u k e g h q e n g h e k _ , _ sa meng _ q u u f t i n a q l u n i _ whaken _ village- meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
qule ii naqe k _ anengagh ke te lghiik _ , _ may- u kau uq _ anengagh a _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ , _ ii-i _ S u n a a g h r u g e m _ kaate a _ , _ kaate luku _ , _ ii-i _ sa nanigh uq _ saste nanigh aa _ .
qalepangi ghllag kek _ sa kek _ , _ k e p s i g h a a k _ .
taawa _ kaate a _ kitugh aa _ sa nanighqe a _ .
llangaqa _ n a t a n g a _ iimna _ aghsaan _ lliighqagh a _ sa mi _ village- mi _ whani _ y u k e g h q e n n a q e l l g h a _ .
taawa _ kitugh aa _ .
taawa _ m a a l g h u _ , _ pi nga yu _ aghni te kaghte aqe aat _ , _ mulu negh meggni _ pi nga yu neng _ .
E x c e r c i s e - m e n g _ , _ k i l g a a q u m e n g _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ kilgaaqu _ , _ tughumgha _ .
ilangakun _ tawani _ maaten _ K u u l u n k u t _ angyilghagh itni _ .
aastu ghllag yagh lghii _ , _ kilgaaqu te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ kiyang _ w h a n i k u m i _ .
qellinegh ghllag mi llu _ tawani _ .
naghaagh vig ghllag u yagh uq _ taana _ .
uyghag _ taana _ kii _ , _ ila ita _ aya kataghaghkagh at _ .
ila i _ pi kegte pigte aqe ut _ , _ tughumgha igate ngugh t _ sa igate ngugh t _ , _ pi kegte pigte aqe ut _ esghapag kau luteng _ .
I g h i v g a s i i g h h n e g h a t a _ tawaten _ sigute gemni _ imani _ itegh nghata _ .
whangkuta qun _ a n e n g a a g p u t _ taake uk _ , _ kiyang _ entaqun _ qaagna llu _ tawatete aqe lghii _ .
â _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ U l a p s a n e n g _ pi ziin _ ? _ I g h i v g a s i g h l l a l g h i i t e n _ .
U l a p s a n e n g _ kaate ziin _ , _ sa ziin _ ? _ â
aghnagh t _ i g h i v g a s i s n a n i g h w a a q a y u w i i t _ , _ pi igate u aghte ut _ aghneq _ naten _ lliigh nghaani _ .
awatiiteg neng _ akequsagh leg t _ .
aane ste gpenaki _ aatkagh igh luki _ sakagh t _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ pikagh t _ sakagh t _ .
enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ sa u aat _ kelenga luteng _ .
iwerngaqun _ u g w i i q a s _ tamaakut _ itupill _ taawa _ itagnagh ut _ .
enkaam _ sa meng _ p e g g m e n g _ avangite kanigh yagh uq _ .
unaami _ entaqun _ pi nga yu _ , _ e s t a m a _ aflu _ a g h h m u n _ tuungsagte nghaani _ elngaatall _ aanleghaate aqe lghiit _ .
nukalpigagh _ sa aqe lghii _ iimna _ yuvghiigh aqe kangat _ sa aqe kangat _ .
qetgegh aatagh te luni _ ayuqe yaghpete uq _ .
whanga llu _ sa lghii nun _ piyaqli lghii nun _ pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ emta _ aghyuugh ta lgu uq _ pi nghite llegh _ piyaqli i lghii nun _ .
taawa _ aghyuugh llegh ke a _ kilgaaqu _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ a g h y u u l e q _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ , _ whanga llu _ ilate aghtekau unga _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ aga _ ii-i _ qayughllak _ alinge ste luta _ qelegh luta _ .
Y u g u g h t e k a s _ t a m a a k u n Ê¼ n g a m _ wata _ .
ila i _ ii-ii _ p i n q e g s a g g a g h n e n g _ ayuqe ut _ esghapag lleg mni _ whanga _ .
qaatke te ma ghllag t _ esghapag lleg mni _ .
ulape luteng _ iknaqughi aqe ut _ .
unaghsigh meng _ sa meng _ aa _ , _ navek _ naayghagh leg mun _ mayugh luteng _ ukig aqe luteng _ , _ tawaten _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ meghnugh pagllag gpenateng _ taaqe kayug t _ .
taqayuqe na yukagh meng _ taqayuqe gkumeng _ i k n a q u g h i m u n _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghqagh t _ , _ taaqe lleqe ut _ , _ avangite te lleqe ut _ .
I g h e n n a q _ esgha _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ .
T a q a y u q e m _ avangite tke aq _ .
A k u l g h a a g h t e s l u k u _ kilgaaqu ste aqe kangat _ .
T a m a a n a g h l a g e m _ taqayuqe stekagh _ .
kaate nghaani _ t a n p e g h h e k _ tespikagun _ qellinegh kun _ angayuqagh ita _ n a k u t l u _ angag ita _ aagkut _ k i i - i i _ , _ neqenghaghqe te aqe ut _ .

A Q E L L Q A G H N I I Q
A p a n g a l u u m _ apegh llegh a
neghigh luku _ sa u aat _ yug t _ naken _ kaate nghata _ maakumiu u nghite ngugh t _ aqelqagh t _ .
sivuqagh m _ i g l e g h n e g h a n i _ tamaakut _ aqelqagh t _ kaate nghata _ nanghiigh yaghqau aqe lghiit _ , _ i k n a q e t u l n g i _ , _ s u k a t u l n g i _ .
kiyang _ ungazigh meng _ pamaken _ pangeghte aat _ pi nghata _ , _ t a a k u n g u u t _ aqelqaghniigh yug aqe kangit _ , _ tea- ma anun _ pagsinga na lghiit _ .
tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pinaghvig mi _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ angutughvig mi _ pangegh t _ kaate nghata _ pamaken _ angyagh t _ , _ ilangakun _ family-tuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ akilpegagh na luteng llu _ , _ pirughte na luteng _ pangeghte aqe lghiit _ .

aqfaqugh vig mi _ uzivgagh aqe uq _ , _ n u l a n g l l a m e n g _ ategh leg _ .

A k u l k i m _ apegh llegh a

P e l a a s i m _ apegh llegh a

enkaam _ t a p g h a g h m e n g _ iqug i _ taakut _ kingu aneng llu _ pi meng _ , _ sivulighte nghmeng llu _ .
tapghagh a _ taaggun _ aghveghaqetagh m _ singig akun _ n e g a v l u k u _ .
sivulighte negh i _ takite aghagh aqe ut _ .
enkaam _ yug t _ tawavek _ mayugh aqe ut _ tullumeg t _ unaghsigh t _ nekegte luki _ .
taake ghllag lghiit _ tunuqagh m _ pi i _ .
ighulugh t _ sa u ut _ t h i r t y _ feet- ngugh t _ ila i _ o n e _ b y _ f o u r - e t _ .
enkaam _ nemegh te magh ita _ tugu aqe luki _ .
siingutagh igh luki _ nuuve te nghata _ pi aqe ait _ .
ayvegh m _ tulimagh i _ unaghsigh kun _ nuuve te luki _ taakut _ ighulugh t _ u n i i s t a a g h a a l g h i i t _ .
pikavek _ singikrag mun _ nuuve te luki _ taaggun _ unaghsigh kun _ inglu a llu _ tawaten _ i g g w a n i _ unaghsigh _ sa u a _ t u q u u q a g h p a k _ q u w a a t a q l u k u _ ingleghtagh kun _ , _ nemegh te vigkagh t _ iqug i _ ighulugh m _ r a n m e m e l n g u u t _ nemghutagh ke luki _ taagken _ tawaten _ n e f t e g h q u g h a q a a t _ ighulugh _ nemghutagh ke luku _ sani anun _ tawavek _ .
S i v u l i g h n e g h e s _ taakut _ tullumeg u ut _ atigh llegh i _ .
eslege lghiit _ , _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ teggmag lghiit _ tespikavek _ qule mun _ pilagh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ ighulugh a _ qamagte luki _ n e f t e g h q u n e g h m e g t e g g u _ guulgute u ut _ atigh llegh i _ m a a l g h u n e n g _ napaqagh leg t _ .
tuquuqagh meng _ lliigh kau lghiit _ , _ a g u q a a g m e l l u k i _ tunuqagh m _ pi i _ s i v u k l l u k i _ nekegte aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ esghapag aqe ai _ , _ qule mun _ a y a g s i n e g h q e s i i g h l u k i _ sakniqe te luki _ , _ nuna i _ tuute yameng _ ategh ke ut _ .
tuute vigkagh t _ apumeg iitagh t _ nuna mun _ unaghsigh t _ .
enkaam _ iqug i _ taakut _ ayagute u ut _ atigh llegh i _ guulgute m _ napaqagh i _ .
enkaam _ sakniqe te luki _ nekegte luki _ tawaten _ sani an _ pi i _ tawaten _ ama _ guulgute t _ taakut _ ayagute i _ ama _ tuusagh igh luki _ , _ enkaam _ esghapag lghii m _ yug m _ tawaten _ atunem _ g h h u u g h n e g h t u t a l a n g i _ , _ inglugtun _ n e f t e g h q u g h t e s t a q l u k i _ esghapag luki _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ guulgute t _ ighulugh tgun _ asighte te luki _ , _ allameng _ a m e l t u t a g h a g h a q e l g h i i t _ , _ iqug i _ taakut _ s a y u g t e g h a a t a q i i t _ a v l e g h n a y u k a t a _ ighulugh t _ .
enkaam _ t e g g m a a g h q w a a g h l l a g a q i i _ ighulugh t _ u n i i l e n g e s t a g h h a a y a l g h i i t _ .
enkaam _ mayugh aqe luteng _ .
T a n p e g h h e t _ , _ tafutagh u ut _ ila i _ , _ ranme m _ t u n g a n g a n i _ tanpegh t _ quupekagh t _ sivuke luki _ n e k e g h q u g h l u k i _ t a a k u s _ tunuqagh m _ t a n p e g h h i _ ighulugh tgun _ tamaagun _ qulighnegh i _ q e l u u g h t e g h u t a q i i t _ . _ taakut _ enkaam _ sani an _ pi i _ a s i l i i t _ pi nghata _ . _ yanga u ut _ reghillegh i _ .
taakut _ alla neng _ tanpegh meng _ ilaagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ uglagh u pigte luku _ .
Q u l i i t _ tanpegh t _ n e f t e g h q u n g h a t a _ mekelghiigh u luta _ tagsighagh mun _ n u v u g h t e n g u n e m t a _ putu nge i kete te _ teghigniqe aqe ukut _ m a y u g h a m u n _ nuvugh yug te aqe lghiikut _ .
T a n p e g h h a _ qamagte luku _ tawaten _ saye i _ entaqun _ o n e - t h i r d - e v z i i _ mangteghagh m _ uteghmun _ .
angyaghpag m _ t e l a n a n g a n g a n e n g _ u m u g h p a a r u g l l a g m e n g _ a t a s t a m e n g _ tanpigh aqe ait _ .
llaaghanwha _ t a n p e g h s u g h n a p a n g u n a a n _ lli aqe aat _ tawaten _ .
tagsigh aq _ uglagh u pigte luku _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
tagsighagh t _ tamaakut _ tapghagh at _ amenqun _ tanpegh mun _ atuqe aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh m _ , _ qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllagh llegh m _ taaqe negh a _ keleve aqe luki _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh m _ ikellegh aneng _ uziftagh ke luki _ qelutagh u luku _ tagsighagh u luku _ .
qasiqagh t llu _ ilangakun _ tawaten _ .
alngunak _ e s l e g k a k i i t a _ keleve aqe ut _ t a g s i g h a s _ tamaakut _ .
qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllaghkagh m _ taaqe negh i _ taakut _ .
unkuvag t _ pi nghmegteki _ taawa _ taaqe negh i _ .
sa u a _ i k e l l g h a q _ u z i f q u g h a q a a t _ talwa _ amiiqagh m _ liighqe llegh i _ , _ tekerqagh i _ u z i f q u g h a q i i t _ qelutagh u luki _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
Y u k u t a g h s i g h l u k u _ mangteghaghpag lghii ni _ .
enkaam _ n u t a g h a p e r u w a a g h m e n g _ kinegh nghhagh meng _ tunuqagh i _ a k i l i g h n e g h e m _ t u n g a n g i _ , _ ilangakun _ whangkuta qun _ a y w a n _ t u n g a n g i _ awatkaghtagh t _ ataasigh t _ , _ ilangakun _ malghugnegh t _ ilate aqe ut _ , _ p a l a g h h a a n Ê¼ g h a t a _ amiiqagh igh llegh t _ .
T a a q s u g g w a a g h m u n _ m a n g t e g h a g h p a g e s _ tamaakut _ , _ akuzi lghii ni _ q a y i i g r u g h l l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ , _ akuzillegh it _ t a a q s u g g w a a l g h i i n i _ .
tallimat _ t a n p e g h h e t _ m a n g t e g h a g h p a g m u n _ , _ esgha _ t a a k u s t a _ tawaten _ tunuqagh m _ taakut _ sanim- a _ malghugnegh t _ qule ii iqe te luteng _ , _ enkaam _ tallimagnegh t _ .
tawaten _ n e k e g h q u g h l u k u _ t a a q e n g h a t a _ , _ ingliigh magh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ qeghaate kayug _ .
nefkuuragh t _ pi nigh ghllag t _ . _ enkaam _ m a n g t e g h a s _ t a a q e n g h a t a a _ m i i g t e m m e n g _ ategh leg t _ .
kenegh meng _ k u m a g h l l u t e n g _ tamaaken _ qasiqagh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh aqe luteng _ .
kayute t _ ila i _ ighleke aqe kangit _ n e g h e s q e l l u k i _ .
K a a g t u u m a g h m e n g _ m a k l i n Ê¼ g h a g h m e n g _ nefkuuragh meng _ .
paaw i _ maligte luki _ nefku kayugu lghiit _ .
paaw i _ qupughragh negh meggni _ , _ uyghag kun _ , _ qalqalima meng _ , _ sa meng _ k a a g t u g h a q e g k a n g i t _ .
kavighrug ketu te _ qupughragh llegh i _ paaw m _ .
N e q n i i p i g t u u t _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ .
qayughllak _ sivuligh _ unakegkagh _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ nefku igate ngughk _ wiin _ , _ kepellegh ni _ sa ni _ qayugh utaghpag ni _ kiyaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ m e s i i g h u t n g w a a g h a q e l g h i i t _ . _ T e p e s u u n g n a q e k e s t a t _ nefku aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ qamavek _ iiwleng _ k i i n g h w a a q a y u g e t _ m e s i i g h u t n g w a a n e g h m e g g n i _ .
enkaam _ tepe kegte pigte ut _ .
taawa _ mangtag leg t _ mangtag meng llu _ m i i g t e m m e n g _ ategh leg _ .
neqnigh ghllagu ut _ n e f k u u r a s _ tamaakut _ sivu ligh aat _ .
aamtaam _ n e f k u n a g h s i m a n _ unakegkagh t _ k a a t u t a g h e s n a q _ nefku lghii ni _ , _ maaten _ elpek si _ nefku llegh gpesistun _ taawa _ alla u aqe ut _ .
mesugh i _ ellngagh lugh u aghte ste gpenaki _ qaye i _ k i i n Ê¼ g h a g h h n e g h m e g g n i _ ellngagh nanigh aqe lghiit _ enkaam _ q a a m n a n g i _ aghipate aqe luteng _ , _ alla u ut _ enkaam _ .
mesiigh tke aat _ n e q n i g h t u s _ taawa _ .
neqe m llu _ kagpag llegh a
P e l a a s i m _ apegh llegh a
taaqe negh mta _ sa mun _ u n a n g n i i g h m u n _ lliigh aqe ut _ .
naten _ nefkuuragh t _ qeghaate aqe aat _ ?
S i v u k l l u k i _ nefkuuragh t _ taakut _ .
I g h u u l u t _ n e k e g h q u q a y u g u l g h i i t _ qeghagh tgun _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ q a a y n g i k u n _ ighulugh m _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh u iqe aq llu _ sa aghte qugh luki _ t a n p e g h h a g h a a l i q a g h l u k i _ tanpegh meng _ .
uksugh mun llu _ p i n Ê¼ g h a t a _ tanpegh meng _ saape aqe luki _ pikayug u ut _ .
U p e n Ê¼ g h a a m _ p i l l g h i _ ukut _ aagra m _ s a g h y a a n g a n e n g _ t a n p e g h h a g h a a l i g h l u k i _ aatkagh meng _ pikayug t _ q a a y n g i k u n _ enkaam _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh aqe kangit _ .
uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ ama _ tawaten _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ uksughtekayug t _ .
eghqwaagh te yaghqagh t llu _ tawaten _ .
uqiigh luki _ nefku aqe lghiit _ .
uqiightugh luki _ e n k a a n g a m _ kinegh rakegtagh t _ .
tamaa na _ sa u a _ ila a _ t u l i i m a q _ kiilqusigh _ negh magh an _ ayuqe lghii _ .
M a n g t e g h a s q w a a l g h i i n i _ k i n e l l g h i s t u n _ sivuligh t _ nefku t _ kiig negh ke aat _ qeghaate kayugu ut _ , _ s i v u u l i i t _ kinegh nghhagh t _ .
alla u yagh lghii _ , _ nefku kayug t _ wetku _ kiiw t _ p i n a n Ê¼ g h a t a _ .
nefku yaghagh ngugh _ tagitugtu uq _ .
ila a _ uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh _ qeghaate aqe aat _ .
E g h q w a a g h u s a g h q a s _ tamaakut _ ama _ u p e n Ê¼ g h a g h h a a n e n g _ saghna kayug t _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh kayug t _ .
enkaam _ payangite nghaani _ quyngigh m _ kevigh a _ atghagh te nghatki _ angyaleg m _ k a g p a a g a q e g k a n g i _ .
taana _ kiig mi _ uukagh _ pi nghaani _ nefku kayug _ , _ nunivag _ saghna aqe kangat _ tuqusigh aqe luki _ .
awen _ ungipagh kaqe anka _ laluramke nun _ nunivag t _ tuqusigh aqe ni luki _ a k m a a g u t a k u n _ .
tuqu negh meggni _ mesugh i _ q u g a a g h q w a a k a y u g u n i l u k i _ , _ ila i _ katam _ j u i c e - e s t u n _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ maaten _ kinguligh nun _ o r a n g e _ j u i c e - n g u n i l u k i _ liite lghii nun _ j u i c e - m e n g _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ tamaa na _ uksaagh mun _ l l i i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ O c t o b e r - m u n _ nunivag meng llu _ kevigh te luku _ awataghpag mun _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani _ tamaa na _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh _ uukagh _ asighte aqe luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukaghtagh teng _ asighte luki _ tagite aqe kangit _ q e g h a g h n a q e n g h a t a _ .
eghqwaagh te kaghqagh t _ uksuqun _ ellngit a llu _ atuqe yaghqaa luki _ itake aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ qafsina _ asighnegh _ , _ qula neng _ u g l a a g h a q l u k u _ asighte aqe luku _ s a n g w a _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng _ pikayug t _ .
aamta _ whangkuta _ uukagh _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ pugneghqagh _ , _ nunivag t _ taakut _ q a a y n g a n i t a q u t _ qeghagh nun _ qaake luteng _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ enkaam _ a s i g h t e n g n g w a a g h a q i i t _ .
uukagh t _ kinegh nghhagh t _ , _ i g g w a n i _ pi niigh pigte ut _ S e p t e m p e r e m _ uukaghti a _ .
kinegh ghllag ste gpenaki _ qeghaate aqe lghiit _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh u luki _ .
aamta _ sivuligh t _ A u g u s t - e m _ pi i _ masleg kanigh aqe ut _ .
uuk _ , _ ila a _ uukagh _ J u l y - m i _ p i y a g h q a a n Ê¼ g h a n i _ kingugtagh u ghllag qagh yu k _ .
ukut _ e n k a m m _ ggata i _ n e q a n g i i t n g w a a g h u m a a q e g k a n g i _ kingug m _ .
september _ taana _ k i n g u g n a p a g i l n g u q _ enkaam _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aatkagh m _ kaki llegh a _ , _ atuqe llegh a _ neghigh luku
W a y e n g i m _ apegh llegh a
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ liite unga _ kaki meng _ .
I q r a g m e t a g h n g a a t a _ kaki naqutke kau unga _ , _ n a l i k e k _ e i g h t _ , _ n i n e - y e a r s - n g u l u n g a _ .
kelug nka _ natete yagh luteng _ n a n g h i i q w a a g h a a t a m _ qenwat _ tawaten _ liite unga _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ maana _ maaten _ atugh ut _ u k a v a n s a g h t u q _ .
iitek _ allgegh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ u k a v a n t e f t u q _ .
palaghhagh u yagh uq _ aate tke aq _ , _ iitegngam _ kameraagh _ aklunagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
kameg ngllagh aqe kangit _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh meng _ melqugh ligh luku _ yug t _ ipigtu luku _ , _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ kaame kegka _ yug t _ .
U y g i i n Ê¼ g h a g h m e n g _ k a y a n q u s i q a t _ , _ a a r r a g h w a a g h u s i i g u t _ .
whanga _ tawaten _ liite lleg mni _ .
ataasigh t _ amiiragh t _ kameg mun _ naama kayug t _ , _ neghsagh t _ a a n g k e g t a t _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh t _ a a n g e g h l l a n Ê¼ g h i l n g u u t _ amsakelghii t _ .
neghsapig t _ s u f l l u g h r a g g n e g h l l u g e t _ .
U n Ê¼ g a v e k _ u n Ê¼ g a p i s i i l u k i _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ , _ neghsapig t _ u n Ê¼ g a p i s i i l u k i _ piniqe aqe ait _ .
A y u m i q u n Ê¼ g h a n i _ s u f l l u g h r a g g n e g h l l u g e t _ qazigyagh neng _ .
qazigyagh t _ a y u m i q u n a q u t n g i n a q _ t a a p n g i g s i m a a q e g k a n g i _ .
kukupag t _ u n g l l e n e g h t u n g i t n e n g _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
aghi negh meggni _ unglleg neghtuqagh t _ .
amiiragh t _ k i n e n Ê¼ g h a t a _ , _ pellug luki _ iqangigh aqe ait _ sa ta i _ m e s i i g h n e g h i g h a q i i t _ m e l q w i l l u _ .
whaten _ uksugh mi _ pikagh t _ m e l q w i _ taane luki _ mesiigh i _ taane vyiigh aqe ait _ .
aane te luki _ anigu kun _ t u u t q u g h l u k i _ enkaam _ ilu akun _ niightugh aqe ait _ .
talwa _ l i i g h q i m u n _ pattern- nge isagh ut _ .
A t u l u g g a g h t e g g u n _ atuqe yagh ka itgun _ nasiqute luki _ aange aghagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
aghvegh m _ ivalu i _ qiipagh ke aqe ait _ asi an _ t u n g a n g i _ tukughagh i _ .
emta _ a n g t u g h a a t _ ivalu kegtekayugu ut _ .
iitek _ ila i llu _ amsakaghtagh t _ a g h v e p i g e t l l u _ ivalu kegte ut _ .
enkaam _ p i n e m t e k i _ iike luki _ qupughragh luki _ , _ qupughhugh luki _ , _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ k i n e n Ê¼ g h a t a _ qiipi aqe aput _ .
tallu luki _ pi aqe aput _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ a m e s t a a g h h a a t _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ , _ qule mun _ kaleftagh u sigh t _ , _ uygiinghagh t _ qule i _ kameg m _ .
kaleftagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
K a l e f t a g h l u k i _ kaki aqe ait _ .
Y a a g k e s t a a g h a a t _ kaki llegh t _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ a m e s t a a g h h a a l u k i _ qiipi luki _ tespagavek _ atuqe aqe ut _ .
aghvegh m _ pi i _ qayughllak _ ila i _ , _ iitek _ ila i _ taaqe kayug t _ a m e s t a a g h h a a l u k i _ .
qiipi lghii ni _ whaten _ t a p g h a g h p a w a a g h e m _ q i i p e l g h a t u n _ qiipe magh ita _ e s l e g t a l k a g h q i i s t u n _ tallu luki _ , _ uygaagh ke luki _ u u g n a n g i k u n _ , _ nuuve neghqagh i _ taakut _ a m e l l i i g h a g h a q l u k i _ taagavek _ .
tagneghsagh naqe lghii ni _ tagneghli meng _ sa meng _ t a g n e g h s a r e g a g h a q i i t _ , _ kaleftagh mun _ whaten _ atuqe naqe lghii ni _ , _ uygu sigh u luki _ pi lghii ni _ .
kenuleg t _ siku ut _ kameg mun _ kaki sigh t _ , _ maaten _ t h r e e - s i d e d - k a q e g k a n g i t _ kenuleg t _ tamaakut _ ipeg lghiit _ s a n g y i i l n g u u t _ .
tespagavek _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ kenug ite ngugh t _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ kaki sigh u ut _ .
atungag meng _ aange lghii meng _ , _ amsakaghtagh meng _ i w h a n i m e n g _ nateghqagh ke kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ u n Ê¼ g a v e k _ kameg t _ qasiqagh meng _ nateghqagh igh kayugu ait _ kiyang _ .
aghisigh luki _ yataaghqe aqe ait _ aghi nghata _ egte luki _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ amiiragh _ yukutate luni _ kaki nqegte uq _ .
elngaatall _ taaqe lghii ni _ k i n e n g l l a g h w a a g h a q i i t _ .
N a z i g h a a m _ amiiragh i _ temkagh ke kayugu ait _ , _ uksugh mi _ atugh u ut _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
sivuligh ghhagh mta _ aagkut _ kiig mi _ e l l n g i n a a l u k i _ u u s l l u k i _ sa ta i _ qaasligh u luki _ atuqe kayugu yaghpete ait _ .
maaten _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ atuqe yagute ma kangit _ .
amigh meng _ qamagun _ i l e p g h a a g h m e n g _ ilupeghagh igh luki _ .
T e m k a a s _ taakut _ qaye akun _ amiiragh t _ m e l q w i _ qaasligh ke luki _ uksugh mi _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
T a a k u n g u u t _ qaamkut _ ilukligh t _ ategh i _ i l e p g h a a g h e t _ .
taakut _ qaasligh at _ temkagh at _ , _ n u n g i g h t e l g e t _ paagna i _ qukagh i llu _ , _ tukughagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ temkagh at llu _ i l e p g h a a g h e t l u _ .
kameg m _ ilu akun _ allighte t _ amiiragh t _ .
ila i _ pi lget _ qallukagh meng _ allighte ke aqe ut _ .
amigh meng _ ama _ qalleg vag kaqe ut _ , _ nuqutuqagh t _ yugusigh a _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ n a r a n Ê¼ g h i l l u t e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
amalleqa _ tawaten _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ amigh meng _ iluklighte luki _ ila i _ uksugh mi _ m i l q w i _ q a m a n l l u k i _ .
qaasligh at _ taakut _ m i l q w i _ qaye anite luki _ .
uksugh mi _ whaten _ aghnagh m _ amalleqa _ atugh it _ q a s p i q u l l u k i _ .
ighu i _ segesqugh mun _ kenle kut _ .
maqaghqe ghllag luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ qiipaghagh _ k a y a a l n g u q _ tamaani _ iwernga _ ama _ ila i _ nuugh nga lghii ni _ inglupigagh ghhagh u kayugu ut _ , _ s a a t g h w a a g h h a a l u k i _ sa ta i _ qaasligh ke luki _ qallevag t _ , _ alla _ qaye akun _ atkug luteng _ .
amigh ghqu aq _ kiyang _ atkug kaqsagh kangat _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ alpa _ , _ metghagh _ , _ k a n g Ê¼ g h w a a g m e n g l l u _ atkug kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
weni _ whanga llu _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ kayaali kestagh ta a _ .
ila a _ atuqe pagnanigh magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
yug t _ n g e l q a g h m e n g _ , _ alpa meng _ kiyang _ atkug kaqe ut _ .
saye i _ atkug ngllagh aqe ait _ atuqe aqe ait _ a t k u n g l l a m u n _ .
P a a m n a n g i l l u _ atuqe kayugu ut _ naate lghii ni _ , _ n a a m a l i g h l l e g h h i i n i _ .
amalleqa _ amiiragh i _ aghvig luki _ yataaghqe llegh i _ pi aqe ait _ k e l i g a g h w a a g h l u k i _ .
taaqe neghllug pigu ut _ sukilpagh t _ wata _ mekestaaghhagh t _ .
naate neghllug pigu ut _ , _ pegte aqe luki qun _ enraq _ kaki aqe lghiit _ .
I g h i v g a g h m i l l u _ whaten _ kiyang _ pikayug u ut _ .
aghneghmi _ whaten _ sa meng _ neqenge naqe meng _ q e p g h a m s u r e g a g h t u q a q _ , _ qepghaqagh _ u g l a a p i g t e n g n g u y a g h t u q _ aghnagh ni _ mangteghapig mete luni _ , _ kiyang _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ aghuliigh qagh negh meggni _ kaki llegh kesagh kangat _ .
ne m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
sapeghhnagh mi _ whaten _ kanegh ghllag kayugu ut _ aagra m _ qaye i _ , _ nategh mi _ .
qama _ qayughllak _ puqla ghllag u aqe lghii _ , _ iiyagh _ e s l e g t a n q e l l u k u _ a g e p s u g h t a a q a y u g e t _ egllu stun _ , _ enkaam _ kanegh ghllag qagh yu k _ .
naqamllu _ t a w a n l l i q i i g a l k a n g i t _ . _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ alleg luki _ egte aqe luki _ .
nanigh t _ taakut _ ama _ uqughqagh aneng _ yataaghqe llegh i _ , _ uqugh isag lleghqagh i _ uqigh aqe luki _ .
nutaghagh inagh meng _ whaten _ pinegh meggni _ , _ iitegngam _ aqlagha mi _ whaten _ mesiigh i _ nuugh aatagh naqe ghllag t _ t a n g t a q e r e g a m e n g _ lliigh lghii ni _ .
kapeghte luteng _ kumlate luteng _ whaten _ tamaakut _ u g h u g t e m m e n g _ ayuqe lghiit _ sukate nagh ut _ .
aqlagha igh te mi _ t a n g t a q e r e g i l u t e n g _ lliigh aqe ut _ enkaam _ sukangiite aqe ai _ mesiigh ngllagh llegh i _ .
uglagh _ mesiigh _ atuqe aqe aat _ nanigh mun _ , _ ila ita _ maalghug u aqe lghiit _ p a g u m _ inglegh m _ nanigh a _ .
inga _ alla _ maalghug _ inglu ani _ enkaam _ estamat _ nanigh t _ atuqe kayugu ait _ .
tamaakut _ neghsagh m _ uqigh a _ awatkaghtagh meng _ akume vleghagh luteng _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aamta _ e l l n g i n a a l u t e n g _ kumaghugh naqe ghllag aqe ut _ .
A k s i g u n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ kumaghugh igate ut _ .
taawanginaq _ yakumangilngugh ni _ pama yug ma t _ .
neghsagh meng llu _ atkug ngllagh kayugu te u lghii ni _ .
P a q n i i l n g u u t _ qevuute luteng _ y u k u t a n a m i _ .
kiyang _ t a a k u n g u u t _ qawaag m _ a m i i r i _ kiyang _ atugh t _ .
qikmigh meng _ puvite ke ut _ , _ puvisaagh igh kayugu ut _ .
ataasigh t _ agaten _ amaa llgagh at _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ pamakaghtagh t _ .
weni _ maaten _ quynginge magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
quyngigh u uute luku _ salin _ t a a g a n i n g a n i _ tespamaken _ amigh llu _ pi ma aqe yagh kangat _ .
U p e n Ê¼ g h a m i _ amiiragh t _ m i l q w i g h l u k i _ kaame kaqe ait _ .
aghinaghte nghaani _ m e l q w i l n g u g h m e n g _ kaame kaqe ut _ .
uksugh mi _ aamta _ melqughtugh ma lghii meng _ kaame ke kayugu ut _ .
quyillegtagh u ut _ uksugh mi _ aatkagh it _ .
uliigh t _ tamaakut _ mughu te mun _ atugh u ut _ .
U n Ê¼ g a p i s i m _ kameg m _ ategh ke ai _ , _ uliigh _ .
quyillegtagh t _ maani _ qute mi _ n a v e g _ ama _ pi mun _ atugh t _ .
A k u g h v i g a a s _ tamaakut _ a g h i n a g h n e g h a n i _ angyagh mun _ ivghaagh sigh t _ u p e n Ê¼ g h a m i _ taape neghllug t _ .
taawanginaq _ tawaten _ t a a p n g i g g n e g h a t a _ t u k r u u g g n e g h a t a _ aghvig luki _ mesiigh meng _ sa ta i _ angighhe aqe ait _ q a a m n a n g i _ .
mulu negh meggni _ m e s i i g h n e g h i i t a q u t _ .
enkaam _ taape neghllug ghraagte aqe ai _ .
aghyugh negh meggni _ t a a p n g i g t e k a y u g i i _ .
amiiragh _ aklu niite luku _ simigh qiinagh aqe luku _ t a a p n g i g t e k a q _ pikayug u aat _ .
kiig mi _ enraq _ temkag lug t _ aghvig luki _ , _ sa ta i _ kavighte luki _ pi aqe ait _ kameg ngllagh aqe ait _ .
aamqute u ut _ nateghqagh m llu _ amiiragh m llu _ a k u l a n g a n i l n g u u t _ enkaam _ u k a t a n g a n i l n g u u t _ qiipagh m _ itegh qagh i uute ai _ elngaatall _ sagniite u ut _ , _ sagniite ke ai _ .
T a p g h a g h p a w a a g h m e n g q u n _ atugh lghii ni _ , _ kelug mun _ itegh qagh i aatagh u ut _ seve uute na yu kata _ sa na yu kata _ .
test-pag kut _ q u u l n g a n i l n g u u t _ uygu u ut _ .
U n Ê¼ g a n t u t _ u u m _ iteg ngestagh m _ t a a k w n a n g a n i l n g u u t _ mughnegh t _ , _ nateghqagh m _ t u n g a n g a n i _ .
paagna an _ pi i _ nungighte u ut _ , _ singigh a _ , _ putulghi i _ , _ n u n g i g h t e n g i _ .
uygu yan _ kaki llegh i _ neftegte llegh i _ kaleftagh u uute luki _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ .
test-pag kut _ nungighte yan _ i g g w h a n i n g i _ nungighte yiite te t _ .
qallukagh at _ kameg t _ estullug meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ quyngigh m _ ighu i _ ategh i _ qallukagh at _ e s t u l l u n g l a q a y u u g i t _ .
ipigtu luki _ piyug lghii ni _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ ilaaghtugh aqe luki _ aange lghiit _ ayuqe ait _ .
ipigkingwaagh t _ ipigkestaaghhagh at _ kameg t _ , _ enkaam _ ipigtuqagh t _ pagavesengwaagh t _ .
neghigh luku _ U N A N G N I I L E Q _ maani _ sivuqagh mi
A k u l k i m _ apegh llegh a
whaten _ uksaagh mi _ k u m l a l u n i _ a n i g u n Ê¼ g h a g u _ , _ elngaatall _ yuug _ yataaghqe te ghllag kayugu uq _ , _ siku k _ kaate ste gpenakek _ .
tapghagh _ , _ u u n Ê¼ g h a q _ , _ q a a n Ê¼ n g w a a q _ , _ sa u a _ atughqagh _ u n a n g n i i g h m u n _ apeghiigh naqe aqe kangat _ .
uyiigh _ , _ tuugkagh _ , _ a y v e g h n i i g h m u n _ atughqagh _ t u g a a g h e s n a n g l l a g h t e g h a q e g k a n g a t _ .
sa u a _ q a m i y a l l u _ tamaa na _ , _ qaghlu kaghqagh _ qikmigh mun _ ulima luku _ , _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ pi aqe kangat _ .
taagken _ u k s u n Ê¼ g h a n _ , _ uksugh na iqe aat _ siku k _ k a a n n e g h e g k e n i _ maavek _ .
tawani _ yuug _ tengghuniqe te aqe uq _ p i y a a m u n _ uksugh yuggaagh nghaani _ qayughllak _ teghig ke sagh m _ unake naqe llegh a _ piyaqnagh iitagh ke lghii _ siku gni _ u n Ê¼ g a n i _ .
unaangu luku _ aghte ste gpenaan _ sivuke pigte luku _ eslaqagh ke lghiit _ aane luteng _ , _ saamna llu _ esne _ qagi a _ a g i g s a g h t u u g h a q e g k a n g a t _ navek _ wiin _ pi vagilgameng _ .
P i n i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ mughu te mun _ , _ y a t a a g h q e l l u t e n g _ aga _ aghulaqe uute aqe lghiit _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ paamggun _ kiwavek _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh nun _ esghaate naqe magh meng _ t e g h i g m e n g _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
ilangakun _ t a a k w a n i n g i i g h a q _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ tegh ik _ qantaghate nghaani _ .
U y i i g h i s _ taakut _ elngaatall _ kelengake sqe lleg leg t _ i g l a k a a s i q n a y u k a t k i _ ayvegh niigh kumeng _ .
A y v e l g u n Ê¼ g h a n i _ tawaten _ sanqute teng _ quunpeng _ yataang _ pi aqe lghiit _ pi llgu na llegh ani _ siku m _ .
liilightuusagh _ taana _ , _ uyiigh teng _ quunpeng _ uughqa n _ t u n g a n g a n i l l u k i _ iiwleng _ pi sqe lleg leg t _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh _ n a n Ê¼ g h i i q a a l g h i i t _ , _ yug t _ ayvegh mun _ nusug na iqe ait _ uyiigh kun _ iglag ke aqe aat _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ a p a a l l u q l u k u _ uyiigh t _ anuqe m _ t u n g a n g a k u _ pi snanigh lleg leg t _ , _ t e n g t e k u y e n g _ i g l a k a a s i i y a g h q a t _ .
taana qun _ kiiw u aq _ sivungagh mi _ ayvegh m _ nusug qu a _ tawaten _ uyiigh an _ i g l a k a g h l u k u _ tazimantekagh _ .
unangniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ liilightuusagh ghllag u uq _ qayughllak _ awen _ peleghqe tke kayug _ .
ila a _ whaa _ p u y g u k e f u t _ .
T a m a a t u m _ liilightuusagh a _ , _ esla m _ , _ siku m _ , _ megh m _ , _ maaqellegh m _ s a a m l u _ ila yan _ n a t e t u l n g a n e n g _ liite luteng _ wetku _ e l l m e g n e n g _ mughute yaaghtekayug t _ nukalpigagh t _ . _ wiin _ sivuke luteng _ pi ke sigh nun _ maligsaagh te luteng _ u n a n g n i i g h m u n _ piinligh kayug t _ liite kayug t _ tawaten _ n a n Ê¼ g h i i g h l u k u _ mughute ni uq _ .
kina _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ ayveghagh nghmini _ tawani _ ila ni _ pi yaagh lgute ni _ apagh aatagh aqe ai _ uusqagh llegh anun _ siku m _ m a y u q a g h l i n i _ .
enkaam _ u v i l i g h n e g h m e l n g u u t _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ esghaate negh migte ni _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ nengigh yagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
K a a t q u u n n n e g h a t a _ uglagh te luki _ ayvegh teng _ qaake luki _ , _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ nengigh uute aqe uq _ .
aga _ asighte i luteng _ q a a n Ê¼ n g w a a t e n g _ kelute mun _ taglagh naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ kingu ligh qutagh luteng _ igleghte te aqe ut _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ .
uka _ qamugh te lghiit _ ne meng _ esghagh nghmegteki _ , _ nanevgagh u aqe ut _ q e l e g h r a g h t e t _ , _ siivanllegh t _ kayagte aqe ait _ mekelghiigh t _ p a a y g h i s q e l l u k i _ , _ igaghyagh t llu _ tamaakut _ pi ste aqe kangit _ igaghyagh u ghngaita _ .
kinku t _ tuungqagh teng _ qamuutagh ke ait _ , _ kinku t llu _ alngunak _ .
tawani _ neqe _ p i y u w h a a n Ê¼ g h a n i _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ quya kayugu uq _ , _ qayughllak _ sivuqagh _ iingunagh mi _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ naasiigh yaghqaa lghii _ .
tawatete uq _ tamaani _ ataasigh stun _ yug a _ ayuqe te yagh uq _ .
ilangani _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ yug t _ , _ tevragh t _ , _ up- qlighte te aqe lghiit _ meghhagh ni _ nalighmeng _ iighwilngugh m _ kangite gkeni _ .
neghsagh llu _ tamaani _ aklunagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
aga _ iighwilngugh t _ q u u p a g h n a q u t n g i n a q _ nuug inagh magh meng _ kiyang _ pi aqe yagh lghiit _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ tawaten _ .
tagtalmi _ ikevagh ughte luni _ megh ughte nghagu _ amalleqa _ angyagh meng _ pinegh meggni _ ayvegh _ , _ maklag _ , _ neghsagh _ unake aqe kangat _ .
taawanginaq _ uksugh mi _ s a l l e g y u g u m a g h t a q e g k a n g a _ . _ siku k llu _ p i n i n Ê¼ g h e g k e g n i _ kiyang _ aghneghtu mi _ esavghagh te aqe lghiit _ u n Ê¼ g a v e k _ ama _ neqete luteng llu _ taglagh aqe luteng _ .
neqete naqe a _ taana _ iiwleng _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ tawaten _ p i l l g h u g h t a g h h n e g h a n i _ .
neqangisag lleghqagh _ p a k i g g u t a q e g k a n g a t _ saama llu _ a g h n e g h t u g h n e g h a n i _ tegh ik llu _ awavagh qagh yu k _ .
tawani llu _ esla _ p i n i g h a g h l u k u _ pi naqe kayug t _ .
tawani llu _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ qawaagni ii aagh _ pikayug _ .
aygughara meng _ unaangu luku _ a g h t a g h a q e s t a n Ê¼ g h a n i _ k a n g Ê¼ g h w a a k _ , _ alpa meng _ , _ m e t g h a g h m e n g _ ilangakun _ akume luni _ aygugh ghllag qagh yu k _ , _ enkaam _ aygughara meng _ ategh leg _ .
I g h i v g a g h m i _ enraq _ eslugh ghllag qagh yu k _ u q u m i g t e n g n g u u q _ ategh a _ .
aywaa neng _ anuqe _ u g a v a n e n g _ a y u q e n Ê¼ g h a n i _ qawaagniigh llgu nagh aqe uq _ .
naten _ ilangakun _ siku k llu _ k a a s a g h a n Ê¼ g h e g k e g n i _ nani _ tamaani _ kaneghyengesi mi _ , _ qighunegh _ pi ghllag qagh yu k _ .
qighunegh meng _ ategh leg _ tamaa na _ a l p a a g h a a y a l g h i i _ tenge igate ngughk _ q u g i l i p a g l l a g e m _ , _ enkaam _ ilangani _ uksugh llegh m _ s i g h l a t k e g h l l a k a y u w a a t _ siku mete luku _ , _ meghagh ite u tke aq _ , _ kiyang _ amani llu _ , _ qawani llu _ .
emta _ i i n Ê¼ g h u s a l e k _ , _ uglagh negh mii ni nguq _ nenge a _ u g h u m a k a y u g u n i l u k u _ pi aqe aat _ enkaam _ kelenga sagh u uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ uksugh _ navek _ taakwavek _ L l u u g h v i g m u n _ l l i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ angyaleg _ t a m a g h a g h m i _ aghvegh mun _ sanqute t _ yataaghqe te aqe kangit _ .
angyaghwaagh u yagh lghiit _ aghvegh niigh sagh it _ tamaani _ . _ G a a r i n Ê¼ g h i _ ghhuugh m llu _ simigh aqe luki _ naavuma na yu kata _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aghqelengestagh i _ .
keniliigh te magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ p i l l g h u g h t e f a g i l g a g u _ kete ghesnagh yaghqaa luteng _ .
quunpeng _ taakut _ kenilegh t _ kelengake luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ a n i g u n Ê¼ g h a k i _ pekete aqe luki _ , _ amalleqa _ v u u m a n Ê¼ g h a k i l l u _ r e g h i g h t a q l u k i _ iiwleng _ .
aamta _ t u v a l g u n Ê¼ g h a n i _ tawaten _ ataasigh inagh t _ kenilegh t _ segge aqe ait _ , _ q a y u g h l a k _ ilangakun _ tuvagh _ aastu aqe lghii _ .
A a s k e s t a a g h h a a n Ê¼ g h a n i _ kiyang _ malghugnegh t _ pi aqe ait _ , _ u w a t a n g a g h m i i t l u _ , _ a k i n g a g h m i i t l u _ .
taawa _ aghveghni ii aagh _ piinligh aqe uq _ aghvegh llu _ igleghte magh mi _ pi aqe lghii _ .
saama llu _ m e g h u g h h n e g h t u g h t a q e g k a n g a _ . _ esla _ unaami _ p i n i g h s u g n i n n a q e n Ê¼ g h a n i _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ atugh naqe ni luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ ilangakun _ atghaghtegh te aqe lghiit _ iglag ke luku _ t e n g Ê¼ g h u n i q e m _ a q f a a l i g h a a t a a s i m a g h m e n g _ t a a y u g n i i g h e m _ .
taakut _ kiyang _ A w e r g e n k u t _ sivulii yuneghtuqagh t _ .
elngaatall _ aga _ kete uute negh meggni _ n a p a g h h w a a g h t a q e g k a n g a _ telaananga m _ .
pilaataqu negh meggni _ aga _ aghvenge i nagh magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ ilangani _ , _ ama _ tawaten _ ila a _ ayumiqullegh m _ avangite aqe luni _ ayuqe lghii _ angyaghnaghpag i te m llu _ pi ste aqe kanga _ .
kinku t _ taakut _ aghvenge negh meggni _ aga _ napaatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ liisimake luki _ ivenrugh u uute qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ napaatagh meng _ esghaate negh meggni _ .
P a a g k e n l u _ ne meng _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ liisima kaqe kangit _ ilangakun _ , _ enkaam _ ne mi llu _ qesugniqe te aqe lghiit _ a g h v e n g u u g h u m a g h m e n g _ .
tuqute luki _ aghvegh teng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ enraq _ kelute mun _ kaalgugh naqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyagh _ qamagte luni _ kaalguutagh ke lghii _ u y g u u q u t e g h l l a g l u n i _ uka _ aliinegh meggni _ .
kaalgughkagh teng _ kaat ute te nghmegteki _ ategh leg t _ teghlug te meng _ , _ teghlug te na iqe kangit _ .
unuk _ pi tke igate aat _ aga _ pilag naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ aqsaqughiitigh qagh luteng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ mangtag _ nengigh te igate yaghpete aat _ , _ enkaam _ angyagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh mi _ tawani _ pi naqute kayug _ .
tamaakut _ angyagh m _ yug i _ k a y u n g q a n Ê¼ g h e t _ suyvaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tea- ma a _ pikayug _ , _ naasiigh qagh yu k _ .
suqi a _ , _ llaag i _ , _ sa i llu _ t a a m _ a g h v e l g h e m _ agghi te aqe ai _ , _ inpite qugh magh mi _ pikayug llu _ navek _ alngunak _ .
taagken _ kiig m _ aghnagh a _ piite nghaani _ , _ aghvegh iitagh ke kanga _ .
tawani _ enraq _ a y v e g h n i i g h m u n _ n e q n i i g h m u n _ legh iigh aqe lghiit _ .
tawani llu _ tanqigh mi _ t e g h i g e m _ avaqutaghagh a _ a l l g e k q a y u k _ , _ qasiqagh leg _ , _ teghiglug leg _ u n a k u g h a q e g k a n g a t _ .
neqe _ uglagh luku _ pinagh kaqe kangat _ tegh ik _ aligh u aatagh luku _ , _ esla _ p i n i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ q a v a l q u g p e n a t e n g _ angyaghtugh aqe lghiit _ .
kagpag naqe magh an _ neqe _ pi aqe kangat _ .
tamaani llu _ qikmigh _ atugh ghllagu yagh lghii _ enkaam _ ila a _ kiyang _ neghqutkagh u luku _ saghna ghllag aqe aat _ .
tuugte magh an _ manguna _ , _ kemeg qragh k _ tamaa na _ nefku magh an _ , _ neqangisag lleghqagh _ p a k i g g u t k a q e g k a n g a t _ liisimake luku _ .
tawani _ pinaghvig mi llu _ ayughaayag _ qawani _ pi aqe aat _ nani _ taakwani _ tapghugh m _ ketanga ni llu _ .
siku pagite te aqe kanga _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ iwernga _ qavregh meng llu _ ayveghagh te kayug t _ u n Ê¼ g a n i _ .
qavregh _ taana _ aghnasaleg _ amsakaghtagh meng _ akume luni _ qasiqagh leg t _ akuuragh qaghaqe ait _ .
aga _ awavagh magh mi _ taana _ qavregh _ pikayug _ .
Q e m i i g h u n n e g h a n i i n g u q _ p i g t e k a y u g u f t a a t _ .
sikungigh te a _ maligte luku _ tegh ik llu _ maligte te kayug _ .
tawani llu _ pinaghvig mi _ kiyang _ m a t u m _ qiighqagh m _ qawaag a _ kaat quute te kayug _ .
alpa eng _ unake aqe aat _ qawaagniigh luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ u g a n i _ singikrag mi _ s u k i l p a q u l g h i i _ pi aqe kangat _ , _ i g h i n Ê¼ g h a n i l l u _ w h a n i k u m i _ .
amiiragh a _ t a m a a t u m _ qawaag m _ atkugkagh u luku _ p e g t i i r a k i g a l k a n g a t _ , _ alpa _ , _ ngelqagh _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ ila i llu _ .
kiwani _ naayghagh mi _ uzive yaaghte nghaani _ tawani _ a n n a v a g l u k u _ pikayug _ .
uugtekayug _ i g h i v g a g h m i l l u _ , _ unaangu luku llu _ .
ategh kek _ i g h i v g a a y a a n k u n g u u t _ , _ u n a a y a a n k u k _ .
naputuqagh _ naayghagh _ teskiwna _ anag vag vig meng _ , _ ategh i _ napu t _ .
aywaa neng llu _ i k e v a g h m e n g l l u _ napu leg _ , _ emta _ pinigh llegh i _ sivulii yug te kaqe ait _ anuqe _ p i n i n Ê¼ g h a n i l l u _ .
tamaa na _ anag vag ni uq _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ liite lghii ni _ a n a v a g m e n g _ .
enkaam _ a n a v a g y a q _ uglagh u pigte aqe uq _ .
U g l a a g h i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ qagugh ak _ kiyang _ nukalpigagh _ tamaavek _ t e n g Ê¼ g h u n i q u t a q e l g h i i _ .
uglagh luku _ qagugh ak _ unake nghmegteggu _ kagpag kayug at _ kiyang _ ighaluqi luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
I g h a l u q a m e n g _ ategh ke ut _ tamaakut _ mesiigh kun _ kanaghtekagh t _ .
tawaten _ ila a _ neqe m _ k a g p a l g h a _ ayuqe lghii _ tamaani _ neghigh luku _ .
nani _ tamaani _ elte nagh vig mi _ qagugh ak _ i g h n i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ agavek _ pennagh nun _ angyagh meng _ manig yagh te kayug _ megh _ p i n i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ , _ alpa m _ manig anun _ , _ amalleqa _ agavek _ nunivag mun _ kiyang _ piyug meng _ pi aqe ut _ m e t g h a a m _ s a a m _ manig anun _ ila i _ .
sukilpagh m llu _ manig anun _ k i g w a v e k _ naayghagh mun llu _ manig yagh aqe lghiit _ ama _ .
tamaani _ salin _ qawaagniighusigh _ a l l g e g h l a a l l g h i l l u k u _ neghigh luku _ tea- ma kut _ atugh aqe kangit _ negaghagh t _ , _ suqagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ metghagh mete te _ atugh t _ .
tamaakut _ sukilpagh mun _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ qitavestaagh t _ , _ naghuyagh mun _ enkaam _ atugh t _ maklegsagh meng _ ategh leg t _ , _ enkaam _ ngelqagh mete te _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ ayengqeghragh t _ .
ama _ tamaakut _ kuuvragh meng _ ategh leg t _ ulima llegh i _ negaghpag stun _ a y u q e k a n i t _ teghiglug mun _ naapte luki _ pi sigh t _ .
enkaam _ llangaqa _ unange ni uq _ t e g h i g m u n _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ kiig mi _ iwernga _ ila i _ nunaagh meggnun _ aglagh uute aqe lghiit _ kiyang _ unatagh anun llu _ .
nunivag anun _ , _ uqfigagh anun _ sa mun llu _ unatagh m _ ila anun _ .
sa u a _ atughqagh _ sa mun _ unaghsigh _ angwaaghute kaghqagh _ , _ yaavuquute kaghqagh _ , _ ivagh aqe kangat _ sa mun llu _ ila anun _ atughqagh _ .
quugkagh meng llu _ quug meng _ qerngughte i aqe luteng _ mayughtagh ke luki _ qerngagh ita _ .
kiig mi _ n u n a a g h m e l n g u u t _ yug t _ kiyang _ unange na i aaghet _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng llu _ .
sa mun _ tamaavek _ p i v i k e g l l a g h a k u n _ n u n a a n g l a g h a q e l g h i i t _ kiyang _ .
samavek llu _ uughqa nun _ i q a l l i y a g h a q e l g h i i t _ .
kiilqusigh _ iqallug eng _ naapte aqe kangat _ tesamani _ naayvaghllag mi _ .
W e k u l l u _ k u m l a y a g h t u n Ê¼ g h a n i _ uteghnigh uute aqe lghiit _ .
teskiwavek _ kangii nun _ angyagh meng _ itghagh luteng _ t e s k i w h k e n _ saghya eng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ teve te qugh luki _ qaqlungighig nun _ teve aqe lghiit _ naayvaghllag mun _ .
U k u m l l u _ uughqa n _ meghe a _ p i n i n Ê¼ g h a n i _ taakwagun _ angyagh meng _ pikayug u ut _ qagi ite nghaani _ .
pugughileghmii t llu _ taakut _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ kiig ta a _ kiyang _ t a m a g h a a n _ teskiwavek _ pikayug t _ iqallugagh nun _ w e k u _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ngelqagh u aghagh niigh nghmeng _ .
iqalliniighvig _ ategh leg _ , _ egkugh a _ tespagna _ , _ tapghaaghagh llu _ , _ aghvigh tek llu _ qupnegh niigh vig t _ , _ taanegna _ k e t l i g h n e q _ iqallupig niigh vig _ .
enkaam _ tespamna _ nuna meng _ ategh leg _ k i i g w t a g h n i i g h v i k _ .
ukani _ tamaa na _ iqallug _ pi igate yaghpete aat _ tamaani _ , _ wetku _ qantaghaqun _ pi yagute kau ut _ liite luku _ .
yeqay _ uukagh eng _ sighla tke ghllag kayugu aat _ nulugh luku _ k i i p a g h q e n Ê¼ g h a n i _ .
tamaa na llu _ kayu _ kiwani _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh ni _ pikayug at _ .
tawani _ u k s a a g h y a g h t u n Ê¼ g h a n i _ amalleqa _ yuug _ qimugsigh qagh yu k _ yataaghqe te kayug _ , _ qamiye meng _ , _ qaghlu meng _ qimugsigh sighqagh meng _ sa meng llu _ ila aneng _ u n a n g n i i g h m u n _ atughqagh meng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ qamiye _ paaragh ite usagh lghii _ , _ taatghusigh ite usagh lghii _ .
qamiye mun _ taatghusigh at _ atugh it _ unaghsigh t _ tamaani _ ingleghagh t _ akule itgun _ asitmun _ k e n Ê¼ g u t k a y u g e t _ , _ ategh ke ai _ y a g a a r i n a t _ .
talwa _ uyghiite ite ngugh t _ tamaani _ .
aghuliigh negh meggni _ taakut _ kagsagute teng _ qikmigh meng _ sivungagh kun _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
kagsagute t _ tamaakut _ qikmigh mun _ aghyuugh sigh u ut _ .

tawatete yagh lghii _ tamaani _ i g l e g h n e q _ .
N A T E N G _ angyapig m _ ulu ii ma llegh i
A k u l k i m _ apegh llegh a
ayumigh _ u l i m g h u s i q _ pinigh lghii _ maaten _ atugh ut _ aviite yagh lghii _ .
sa u a _ t a m a a g h h a a n _ maani _ a l l g e g h t e k a q _ atuqe kaqe kangat _ sa ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ unangniighusigh _ tamaghhagh an _ u l i m a p e r u g w a a g h l u k u _ pi aqe kangat _ tamaani _ .
angyaghtugh sigh t _ angyagh t _ tamaani _ atugh it _ ategh ke lghiit _ angyapig meng _ .
T a g t a l n g i _ kiyang _ yuginagh _ itegagh _ siipngagh lghiit _ .
I q e t u l n g i _ kiyang _ yaagnegh stun _ iqetutka aqe ut _ .
mayughneghqagh _ , _ neghqwaaghtaghqagh _ esne mi _ ivagh luku _ pi aqe kangat _ angyat ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ .
tuquuqagh igh te luku _ nemegh perewaagh _ nemegh yaghqagh _ pi aqe kangat _ s u q a g h m e m _ kelevekagh meng _ nemegh kete luteng _ .
enkaam _ s a a m n a n g i l l u _ angyagh m _ taklaghmete luki _ ulima aqe yagh kangit _ ayumigh _ .
I n g u s i g h l u k i _ tawaten _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ yuug _ aqume uute yaghqaa luku _ alla _ angyaleg _ angyalligh kun _ .
tamaakut _ aghnasaleg t _ uvineg kegtagh t _ amiiqagh u iqe ait _ amighqagh u luki _ angyagh mun _ .
sivuke luki _ kiighte luki _ niightugh kayug t _ m e q e n Ê¼ g h a t a _ .
amigh i naqe negh meggni _ sivuke luki _ kenite aqe ait _ a g h i n g w a a g h e s q e l l u k i _ .
M a a l g h u _ , _ pi nga yu _ tanpegh _ naama kayug _ angyagh mun _ amu i luni _ kiyang _ .
uyguragh anun _ qiipagh t _ kaki sigh t _ ategh ke ai _ tea-si sigh t _ ivalu meng _ ulimaagh it _ pi aghte luteng _ .
angyagh mun _ amu i luki _ aghnasaleg t _ liisima kangit _ mulu neghtuqagh t _ ugi neng _ , _ saama _ uvineg kegte yu i magh meng _ .
ugi t _ t a m a a k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ a t a a s i g h a g h m e n g _ a y u m i q u k a y u g u f t u t _ , _ imange yuguma magh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
angyagh m _ amu i _ tamaani _ talwa _ p i i n e q i i g a s a q a n g i t _ .
enkaam _ pi nga yu _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ amu i nguq _ simigh yaghqaaghtekayugu ut _ .
saamkut _ k u y a a g i t _ aghu kayug t _ , _ saama llu _ u k i y u g u m a g h t e k a y u g e t _ .
angyagh negh meggni _ igleghte te yu ait _ .
A n g w a a g h m e n g _ , _ y a a v u q u m e n g _ , _ telaananga meng llu _ .
siighnagh t _ kaki te uute luki _ telaananga ngllagh ma aqe kangit _ tamaani _ ayumigh _ .
sanqute t _ A Y V E G H N I I G H M U N
Q a v a l g h a a m _ apegh llegh a
sanqute t _ tamaakut _ unangniighusigh u ut _ t e g h i g m u n _ u n Ê¼ g a n i _ kellii ni _ .
T a a k u n g u u t _ awataghpag t _ , _ tapghagh at _ , _ u u n Ê¼ g h a t _ , _ tuugkagh at _ .
qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh i _ â _ sanqute t _ â _ .
angyagh mi _ atugh t _ allakanigh u ut _ siku gni _ atugh neng _ .
U u n Ê¼ g h a t _ unaghsigh u ut _ aghvinleg _ itegagh _ t a g t a t k e l g h i i t _ angqaperugtekagh t _ iigge meng _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ .
iqug ani _ tugegh meng _ ategh leg t _ naangqugh t _ n u v u g y u g t e k a t _ u u g n a n g i _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh tke aat _ .
taakut _ t u u g Ê¼ g h e t _ siku m _ u m u t a l n g a n u n _ esghaate yu i ut _ .
U n Ê¼ g a n i _ siku gni _ a t u p i g u u s _ tamaakut _ .
enkaam _ u u n Ê¼ g h a m _ inglu an _ iqug ani _ , _ ategh i _ i q u u y a t _ , _ tuugkagh ligh vig t _ .
ama _ tugute t _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh ke aat _ suqagh meng _ k e l e v n g w a a q a m e n g _ .
I q u u y a m _ u u g n a n g i _ kepe negh kegtagh t _ qukagh i _ igarutaagh lleg leg t _ giimagh mun _ nekegte vig t _ .
taakut _ giimagh t _ k i l g a a n l e n g u u t _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ nuuve luteng _ qukagh megteggun _ ayuqe ut _ .
tapghi a _ u u n Ê¼ g h a k u n _ nemegh tke aat _ naten _ entaqun _ t h r e e _ inches _ t a g k a l g h i i t _ , _ iqug i _ n u v u g y u g l l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
inglu i _ i q u u y a k u n _ aate stekayug t _ , _ inglu i _ tuugkagh kun _ aate stekayug t _ .

wetku _ naghullgute lghii ni _ i l e f k a g h a g h t e k a y u g e t _ .
taakut _ giimagh m _ tapghi a _ ategh lgu ut _ aaghsi meng _ .
enkaam _ t a a m _ aaghsi m _ u u n Ê¼ g h a m u n _ nemegh llegh m _ siipnegh i _ t a a k e g h p a g g a a t _ ama _ atugh u ut _ , _ ategh ke ai _ qalu ukut _ .
taakut _ tuugkagh m _ nuvug i _ savigtagh leg t _ , _ inglu i _ igarutaagh ke aat _ giimagh m _ inglu an _ nuvug a _ itegh yaghqaa luku _ tawavek _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ t u u g k a a m _ k i w a k a g h a a n i l n g u q _ tapghagh _ taana _ t u u g k a a m _ up- yu aatagh a _ , _ ukimallegh akun _ nuuve tke aq _ ategh a _ tukaghsiigh u uq _ .

tukaghsiigh m _ amalleqa _ uygu te llegh i _ taakut _ estu tete lugh qugh luteng _ kipullegmun _ pi yaghqagh t _ .

aga _ a y v e g h _ naghulleg kuni _ u u n Ê¼ g h a q _ aga _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uyiigh mete ghngaaghmi _ puglegh yaghqagh _ n a r a n Ê¼ g h i l n g u q _ nuqutuqagh _ .
taawa _ t a a k u n g u u t _ ayvegh niigh sigh t _ sanqute t _ .

sanqute i _ A G H V E G H N I I G H E M
Q a v a l g h a a m _ apegh llegh a
tamaakut _ whaa _ aghveghqutagh ke aqe kangit _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ , _ a g h v e g h q u t a a n Ê¼ g h i s a g h t u t _ .
ighlleghute u na iqe ait _ , _ ighlleghute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
elngaatall _ a g h v e g h q u t a n Ê¼ n g u q _ e s g h h a _ taakut _ uyghag t _ , _ ighlleghute m _ savigtigh a _ .
tuugkagh at qun _ giimagh lgu lghiit _ whaa _ k i n g u l i i g h a a m _ tuugkagh i _ s a v i k e n Ê¼ g h a a g h m e n g _ .
ighlleghute u ut _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ taakut _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ uyghag t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ aghveghqutagh u ut _ .
ukimallegh llgagh u aqe ut _ ila i _ .
S i v u y a g t e m _ quunpeng _ na sa mi _ nungighte nga kete te _ petug luki _ , _ u n Ê¼ g a a n i _ .
N e l e g t e n g n g w a a g h p e n a k i _ whavek _ ighlleghute mun _ , _ s i g i q n a y u k a m i k i _ kelenga ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
wetku _ whaa _ aghvegh meng _ pi naqe negh meggni _ nelegte luki _ pikayug u ait _ .
enkaam _ taakwegkut _ ighlleghute m _ k i w a k a g h a a n i l n g u u t _ amalka _ giimagh ghllag u ut _ , _ kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
A n g t u g h p i n Ê¼ g h a g h l l a g e t _ nuvug yugsaghkagh t _ whavek _ ighlleghute m _ t u n u t a n g a n u n _ .
K u u k e t _ amalka _ tungu i _ .
amenqun _ saveg t _ maakut _ tungig leg t _ .
tamaa na u ut _ .
kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
elngaatall _ uniilliighaghte yu aqe aat _ t u k a g h t e s _ taakut _ .
P e g h n g a g h m e n g _ nuuve te luteng _ taaggun _ , _ p e g h n g a g h l l a g m e n g _ tuteg te luteng _ kakitu tke aat _ saviigagh t _ maklag t _ t a p g h a g h r a k a a q e g k a n g i t _ maaten _ .
kingwaagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ t u k a g h t e n g u f t u n Ê¼ n g u q _ tawaten _ tuteg tke aat _ uniilliighaghte yaghkagh t _ awataghpag mun _ taaleg mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ k u k e g m u n _ tawavek _ aate ste luku _ , _ taaggun _ putu luteng _ keniqaate lgu na iqe ai _ , _ amalka _ tekeghmigute stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
U u n Ê¼ g h a a m _ ila i _ tekeghmigute lgu ut _ .
elngaatall _ uglagh te luki _ n e n g l l u k i _ tawavek _ keniqaate mun _ aate sqe aghte aqe ait _ , _ uglagh te luki _ n e n g l l u k i _ .
elngaatall _ quunpeng _ taakut _ taawa _ t a w a n t a q u t _ u p e n Ê¼ g h a l q u s i q _ .
ayag mun _ tawavek _ kumlu mun _ nemegh tekagh mun _ aate ste nghmegteki _ uglagh te luki _ , _ taawa _ quunpeng _ n e l g a q u t _ p e s k u g s i g a t u t _ , _ quunpeng _ t a w a n t a q u t _ .
quunpeng _ kete negh meggni _ , _ s a a v g u m i i g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ amalka _ , _ taawa _ taakut _ quunpeng _ a a t e z n g a l g h i i t _ ayag mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
taake uk _ elngaatall _ tukagh tek _ kangigh leg t _ , _ taaleg mun _ tukagh tek _ ilate te lutek _ amenqun _ a w a t i i t e g n e k u n _ ilate luteng _ q i l l g h u t k a y u g e t _ .
A w a t i t n g u u t _ .
T a a m _ kingu u i aghagh a _ tapghagh _ taana _ , _ taana _ tapghaghrag _ , _ tapghaghrag meng _ ategh leg _ , _ u n k u u v a k _ .
miglegrungigh u yagh ghngaaghmi _ qukiinaani _ .
miglegrungigh at _ elngaatall _ ayvegh _ a g h n a a g h a n Ê¼ g h h a a g h l l u k _ , _ t a g h n u g h h a n g e n Ê¼ g h h a g h l l u k _ miglegrungigh _ .
tamaa na u yagh ghngaan _ qukiinaani _ t a p g h a g h r a n g l l a a g h a q u t _ keleve luki _ two _ a n d _ a _ h a l f _ inches _ e s l e g k a k i i t a _ .
tapghaghrag meng _ elngaatall _ a a t q u s _ tamaakut _ unkuvag t _ , _ miglegrungigh at _ .
taaggun _ ineqerewaagh m _ kenle akun _ umu llegh akun _ uziftagh ke ait _ .

kingwaagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ elngaatall _ maklag t _ , _ saviigagh u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ meqesigh kaayagh ghngaaghmeng _ .

unkuvag t _ e n Ê¼ n g a a t a l l _ tapghaghrag u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ a w a t a g h p a a g e t _ .

taaleg _ , _ A k u u l a _ , _ kingwaagh _ .
taaleg u ut _ s i v u q l i g h p i i g a a t _ taakut _ .
U u g h q w a a g e t _ , _ aghsaan _ a a n g e p a g l l a n Ê¼ g h i l n g u u t _ .
tegag staghhiinagh t _ awataghpi aqe ait _ kiyang _ .
iitek _ aghnagh t llu _ awataghpi aqe ait _ amle i _ taakut _ q a g h r i l g h a g h l u k i _ .
qaghrilghagh at _ ilaagh sigh t _ unaghsigh t _ i i m l l u t e n g _ esneghrug i _ .
enkaam _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ kaki luki _ esneghrug i _ uzimun _ tawavek _ amalka _ ilaagh mun _ kumyugte aqe ait _ esneghrug i _ qamagun _ q u l i g h n e g h i k u n _ .
elngaatall _ n e m g h a q i i s _ t a a k u n g i _ iime negh kun _ taaggun _ .
qaghrilghagh m _ esneghrug a _ uzimun _ iimnga lghii _ .
asighte aqe ait _ taaggun _ n e n g l l u k i _ .
Q a g h r i l g h a a g u s _ taakut _ .
enkaam _ qepe luki _ inglugtun _ p u t u k g h i _ itegagh an _ qevuute luki _ n e n g l l u k i _ tawaten _ .
amenqun _ naflugh ghhagh a _ p u t u k g h a n _ .

E l t u q s a m a g h m e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
taakut _ ama _ sanqute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
ayumigh m _ eghqwaagh llegh a llu _ , _ eghqwaagh sagh a llu
A p a n g a l u u m _ apegh llegh a
kitum _ igleghte te lleqe agu _ ayumigh m _ yupig ita _ eghqwaagh llegh a _ ?
maalghug u uk _ , _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ allake te lghiit _ sivunegh leg t _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ ramke t _ .
ataasigh t _ taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ .
ila i _ s i v u n Ê¼ g h i t a _ ategh i _ aymaramket _ .
paamken _ ungazigh meng _ pi ut _ , _ q e r n g a g h l l a g m e n g _ nenglu t _ q e r n g a g h m e l n g u u t _ iimken _ sivunegh meggneng _ ima _ ataasigh mi _ ne mi _ .
sanighmelngughmii t _ ategh it _ .
nenglu it _ t a w a a t e n _ sani qligh ke te ghllag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ n e k e g n e g h i _ .
taakut _ ategh it _ , _ ramke t _ ilakwaagh ke te lghiit _ paamken _ tagikagh t _ , _ maani _ k i n g u n Ê¼ g h i t _ whaa _ kiyaghte ut _ , _ talwa _ angyaleg itnun _ atigh te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ila i _ taakut _ ramke t _ ategh i _ nangupagaghmii t _ .
nenglullug it _ ama _ qaye ii llegh ni _ ayumightagh t _ q e r n g a g h m e l n g u u t _ nenglu t _ .
ayumigh _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liisimake kangat _ naten _ eghqwaagh llegh llu _ , _ sa meng llu _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh meng _ , _ qerngughte i llegh m llu _ i g l e g h n e g h a _ .
ataasigh meng _ a y u u m i q u l l e g h n i _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ naate yagh aq _ kaate nghaani _ .
laluramke t _ â _ moon _ worship _ â _ - n g u n i i q e g k a n g a t _ , _ teme igh u u uq _ .
whaten _ A y m a a r a m k e t _ pikayug u ut _ eghqwaagh naqe negh meggni _ : _ u s a a _ taana _ u p e n Ê¼ g h a a _ tamaghhagh an _ pangeghtekau yu k _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh leg nun _ , _ quyngigh m _ tunugh anun llu _ qilu anun llu _ .
tamaakut _ qerngughte luki _ k a g p a a g a q l u k i _ kiig negh ke aat _ .
amalleqa _ nunivag meng _ awataghpag kun _ kagpag i kayugu ut _ .
uteghnigh nghmini _ t e s p a m k e n _ uukagh meng _ nefku kayug _ e g h q w a a g h m u n _ atughqagh meng _ .
salngag t llu _ tawaqa t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawaqapig meng _ pamaken _ atghagh te kayug _ .
aghvenge ma negh meggni _ , _ ataasigh t _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh luki _ siqlugagh mun _ k a n a g t a q l u k i _ .
tamaa na _ neqe _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ kagpag kayugu aat _ kenle aanga _ t a w a a v e k _ aghnegh anun _ eghqwaagh vigkagh mun _ , _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ kergamqun _ nutaghagh _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
T a a m _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ P i i f q e m m e n g _ ategh leg _ .
tawani _ taana _ angyaleg _ e g h q w a a g h m u n _ igleghte te i ste u aqe uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ angyaleg m _ sa meng _ akuute yaghqagh meng _ akuute qugh aqe uq _ .
ayvegh m _ uqugh an _ mesiigh i _ akuute sagh igh kaqe ai _ n u n i i v a g m u n _ , _ tunu meng _ ila luki _ .
qamagte lutek _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aatkagh meng _ , _ e g h q w a a g h e m _ aate te kaghqagh aneng _ aate yaghqagh k _ .
wetku _ t a w a n i n g i n a q _ aate yaghqagh t _ .
T a m a a k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ ateghagh m _ aate kaqe ai _ .
ateghagh naqe negh meggni _ aate kayug it _ .
aghneq _ ataasigh _ yataaghqe te kaqe aat _ , _ neqe _ sa u a _ a p e g h i i g h t e g h r a a n e g h m e g t e g g u _ .
unaghsigh kun _ sagnegh kun _ neqe _ qamagte luku _ q a n t a g h t e g h l u k u _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ qerngagh ita _ lli luki _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ qavaghtaghkagh it _ .
tawani _ u n u g m i _ t a a m _ angyaleg m _ qafsina t _ ilagaate t _ atugh aqe ai _ t a m a a v e n g i n a q _ pi sigh t _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ tamaakut _ .
nangllegsiisigh t _ .
taagken _ unaangu pigte luku _ a g h t a a g h a q e s t a q _ maligte luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ n e n g l l u u g u t e t e n g _ ila ke luki _ atghagh uute aqe ut _ tamaaken _ sagnegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh uute luteng _ , _ kanavek _ angyilghagh nun _ .
taagken _ angyagh _ angyilghagh neng _ ateghte luku _ , _ taakut llu _ neqe t _ qaake luki _ angyagh mun _ , _ k a n a a v e k _ k e n i i l e g h n u n _ angyagh _ atghagh te aqe aat _ .
T a w a a n i _ kenilegh ni _ aghuliigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ .
whaa _ siqinegh _ p i i t e k e s t a n Ê¼ g h a n i _ naayghagh m _ qaye aneng _ , _ angyaleg m _ tamaa na _ sagnegh _ llilaghtugh ste aqe a _ anigu m _ qaye akun _ , _ taagken _ tamaaken _ sagnegh m _ imaa neng _ tugu tete lugh aqe luni _ eghqwaagh aqe uq _ .
eghqwaagh negh meggni _ tugu tete lugh luteng _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ megh mun _ milugh utu te kete luku _ sa meng _ akuzimleghagh magh meng _ m a n i i g u u t u s i m e n g _ , _ igamsiqa yug magh meng _ a g u m _ ayumiqullegh m _ tunugh u sagh aneng _ pi aqe ut _ .
tawaten _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ angyaleg _ , _ tawaqa t llu _ iingunagh ita _ megh mun _ miluute luki _ p i i q e g k a a n g i _ taakut _ yug t _ n e g h e s q e l l u u k i _ .
tawani _ k e n i i l e g h n i _ neghe uute ghllag kayugu ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tagi lghii _ elngaatall _ negh sqe aqe aat _ .
taana _ llangaqa _ eghte qugh u aagh _ nangllegsiisigh u uq _ ama _ i g a m s i q a a y u g u u s i i g u q _ .
tanqigh mun _ m a n i i g u u t u s i i n Ê¼ g h i t u q _ , _ taawanginaq _ taana _ tanqigh m _ piite yuwhaagh llegh a _ iiskughte aqe aat _ t a w a n i g h l l u u g w a a q _ a y u u m i q u l l e g h m i _ pi na luteng _ .
nangllegsiisigh _ u u m u n _ u p e n Ê¼ g h a a m _ neqnigh u llegh a _ pilaataqu sqellug qu _ .
taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ ramke it _ eghqwaagh kayugu ut _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ L l u u g h v i g m i _ , _ amalleqa _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ p i i n Ê¼ g h a a l u k u _ .
tawaten _ ama _ neqe _ i i n g k e r u g l l a k _ n e g h y u g n a q _ qerngughte luku _ pikayug t _ .
taawanginaq _ t a a k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ pugughileghmii t _ , _ ilakwaagh ke te ii na lghiit _ eghte qugh u aagh mi _ negh te kayugu ut _ .
alla t _ pi igate ut _ .
taakut _ ila i _ ramke t _ , _ nangupagaghmii t _ , _ e g h q w a a q a y u u g u f t u t _ tawani _ teghiglugsigh mi _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
alngunak _ kina _ negh yaghtuqagh yu k _ tawani _ e g h q w a a n Ê¼ g h a t a _ .
tamaa na _ angyaleg _ eghqwaagh qagh yu k _ q a m a g g l u n i _ ateghagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luni _ pikayug _ .
temngi _ alla _ aate igate te ait _ , _ iwerngaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ wetku _ aate kayug it _ .
E G H Q W A A L L Q E M _ yataaghqe llegh
P e l a a s i m _ apegh llegh a
ila a _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh u sqe kayug _ .
A p r i l - e r u g l l a g m u n _ ilangakun _ kaate stekayugu ait _ .
L l u u g h v i g m i _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ .
whangkuta _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ ilangani _ F e b r u a r y - m u n _ k a a t n g w a a g h u m a a n _ , _ ilangani _ J a n u a r y - m _ naange nghaani _ .
amenqun _ kalanta ni _ tanqigh t _ n e w _ m o o n - e t _ alngunak _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
tanqigh pig kun _ ayuqe lghiit _ whangkuta _ .
piite ghesnagh nghata _ , _ sivulii lghii ni _ eghqwaagh yaghagh aqe lghii ni _ .
ataasigh u yagh na iqe aat _ angyagh _ tazimani _ , _ enkaam _ aafte lghiit _ tawaten _ legan _ ataasigh _ uspeqe llegh _ .
taana _ Q u w a a r e n _ allakanigh _ .
saki mini _ key- aghtekau uq _ , _ enkaam _ saki mitun _ p i l l g h a _ ayuqe uq _ .
A t a y a g h a a n k u t _ , _ P u s a a n k u t _ ata at _ .
whangkuta _ A n g q a t e n g a n w a t e n k u t _ taakut _ s i v u l i i w a q u t _ qayughllak _ i g w h a n i _ entaqun _ P e l a a s i n g u m a y a g h t u q _ ataasigh u luteng _ angyagh t _ .
taagken _ u g l a a g h i y a m e n g _ entaqun _ tegh leg nge a _ lli aqe aq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ Q u w a a r i n l l u _ aaftekagh _ .
enkaam _ eghqwaagh llegh it _ tawaten _ , _ whangkuta _ pi yagute yamta _ maaten _ A n g q a t e n g a n w a n _ taana _ s i v u l i i w a q e l g h i i _ .
whangkuta _ , _ P u s a a n k u t _ , _ U w e t e l e n _ , _ k i n g u l i g h h a _ angyaleg _ , _ qilleghte uute te _ taana _ a n g y a l g u g h t e n g n g a n _ eghqwaagh kayugu ste luku _ .
P u s a a m _ kinguligh u ste luku _ pika qaa _ .
ataasigh t _ negh kestagh u kut _ eghqwaagh sagh ke aqe ut _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ mangtag meng _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ tamaa na _ ategh qugh luku _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ aghneghmi _ , _ P i i f q e m m e n g _ ategh leg _ .
aavgugh qagh yu k _ mangtag meng _ mangtag lgu negh mta _ avegtugh magh an _ , _ uukagh _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pellug magh emta _ nunivag meng _ .
uqughqagh meng llu _ ayveghagh lghii ni _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ .
kapeghte i luteng _ uqingllagh magh meng _ .
tawaqa _ aavgugh magh an _ .
uukagh _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh stun _ , _ pugnegh iigh magh meng _ .
pugnegh t _ mekestaaghhagh u aqe ut _ .
paamken _ atghagh tke aat _ mekestaaghhaa lghiit _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ kagpag luki _ , _ unaami _ nighugte nghaani _ angyagh t _ ateghte luki _ , _ awataghpag t _ , _ t a p g h a g h r a g e s _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ .
sagnegh t _ neqe t _ a q f a a q e g g k e p u t _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh te luki _ .
siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ eghqwaagh gpenateng _ wiin _ .
igaghyagh kayugu luta _ utaqa i te kete luku _ k a y a g g n e g h i n k u t _ qaprag aqe lghiikut _ , _ mayughaate aqe lghiikut _ vuuslegh nun _ .
siqinegh _ piite kestagh nghaani _ , _ esnevagh u qugh luki _ megh m _ esne anun _ , _ eghqwaagh luten _ , _ eghqwaagh luteng _ , _ taaqe negh meggni _ , _ p e l l u u m e g h t a t _ , _ pugnegh t _ a a v g u g h w a a g h l u k i _ .
mangtag _ avegtugh aq _ sagneghnite aqe lghii _ .
tunuvagh te luki _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ esnagh a mi _ .
taawa _ kiyang _ a l n g u n a g _ naken _ negh yagh qagh yu k _ .
yuggagh t _ agigte lghiit llu _ , _ nagun _ , _ apagh aatagh luki _ n e g h e s q e l l u k i _ .
taawa _ mangtag lgu lghii ni _ , _ kiyang _ mangtag meng _ negh aqe ut _ .
N e q n i i g h q w a a g h l l a k a y u g e t _ w h a n g k u n n i _ aghyugh negh meggni _ .
A w a t a g h p a g m e l n g u u t _ n e q n i g h t u s _ taawa _ .
enkaam _ taaqe negh mta _ taglagh luteng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ qaake luki _ apeghiigh luki _ .
tamaa na _ awite qugh luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukagh t _ ilate katen _ legan _ tugulagh aqe kangit _ .

awalightugh aqe lghiit _ , _ mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ awalightugh aqe kangat _ .

whangkuta _ pinegh meggni _ walamnaag _ sa u a _ igarutaagh _ .
aghnagh t _ ighneghllug _ , _ sa u a _ amiiragh _ .
I m i i s a p e r u w a a l e k _ .
taawa _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ e g h q w a a g h e m _ negh kanga _ tamaa na _ n e g h y u u k a y u g a _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ whangkuta _ qamagte luten _ ila put _ kayusigh aqe luki _ ayuqe lghii ni _ e g h q w a a g h n a q e n g h a t a _ .
kayu siightu tete luta _ qerngughte te aqe luta _ ayuqe lghii ni _ .
aamta _ ila i _ n e g h y i i g a l n g u u s _ talwa _ , _ negh ka ite ngugh t _ n u n i v a g g a g h m e n g _ legan _ eghqwaagh tke kayug t _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ pugughileghmii neng _ ategh leg t _ u k u t a _ qasiqagh meng _ pikayug u ma ut llu _ , _ nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ , _ ila i _ ququngagh raaghinagh ghhagh meng _ .

ivaghullug _ I L A G A A T
P e l a a s i m _ apegh llegh a

ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ .
E l n g a t a a l l _ , _ repall _ t u s a q n a p a n g u n a t e n g l l u _ .

A G H V E G H N I I G H E M _ P I L L G H I
P e l a a s i m _ apegh llegh a
taawa _ enkaamngam _ angyaghnagh llegh mun _ tawavek _ .
aghvenge negh meggni _ avii kayug t _ , _ â _ W u - h u - h u - h u u m e n g _ ! _ â _ ayuqe ut _ a v i i s _ tamaakut _ .
aquutagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te luki _ , _ angyapig m _ aquutagh i _ .
K e l g u t n g u f t u n Ê¼ n g u q _ kiyaghnegh mun _ n u s u n Ê¼ g h a t a _ aga _ aghveqe luki _ .
enkaam _ tuqute nghata _ wiin _ angyagh _ awillaghate te luni _ .
uzive luki _ kaspugte lghii ni _ avii kayug t _ w u - h u - h u - h u u m e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
enkaam _ t a a q e n g h a t a _ tagi laghate te luni _ qepghagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ k a a l g u g h n a q e n g h a t a _ k a a l g u u t a g h q a a m e n g _ , _ ikute magh meng _ mangtag meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
awataghpag ightugh luku _ s i v u l i g h n e g h i k u n l l u _ , _ kingu nge i kete te llu _ .
