qukaghite lghii ni llu _ , _ whaa _ tamlag yaghtugh lghii ni llu _ avii aqe lghiit _ .
taawa _ qepghagh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ kaat ute te nghata _ taakut _ angyaleg t _ mangtag meng _ pi luteng _ awataghpag t _ imigh aqe kangit _ .
suqi a _ taakut _ inglu i _ sivuligh t _ iike yuggaagh t _ aghvenge lghii m _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
veghagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
inglu i _ suqagh n _ taakut _ angyagh mun _ a l l g h u u l e g n u n _ , _ p i n g a y u u l e g n u n _ , _ taakwavek _ i n p i q u u s g h a q a q i i t _ .
siipnegh _ tamaa na _ suqagh _ siivanllegh nun _ i n p i q u u s g h a q a q a a t _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ , _ angyaleg t _ elqiigh luteng _ ayuqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyaleg t _ kaate lghii ni _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ qepghagh llegh i _ aghvegh m _ , _ angyaleg m _ aa _ elqiigh uute luta _ s i v u y a g t e t l u _ angyaleg t llu _ .
aquutagh t _ , _ qalugyagh t _ s i v u y a g t e m _ tugu luki _ m a n g t a g g a g h m e n g _ ikute luteng _ enkaam _ taglagh aqe ut _ .
A q u u t a s t a a k u t _ mangteghagh m _ sivugh u nga kete te _ qavighnga i ta _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
Q a l u g y a s _ taakut _ amig m _ aywaa kun _ asighte te aqe ait _ napagh ita _ .
enkaam _ nunivag t _ egsug i _ taakut _ ikute luteng _ peghu aqe lghiit _ , _ a g h v e n g m u n _ pi kaghqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ tugu luki _ , _ itghute luki _ , _ angyagh m _ yug an _ u g l a g h t a l n g a t u q _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ , _ q i l l e g h t e n g n g u u s _ taakut _ , _ taqughtekete te _ , _ qiiyngu t _ amenqun _ quyngigh m _ manu i _ melqughtuqagh t _ .
taagken _ ikute te luteng _ naten _ angka i ta _ petug kayugu ait _ .
aavgugh aqe ait _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uglaghtala atun _ , _ aghtequgh ligh luki _ , _ enkaam _ qaltaaghwagh ghhagh u ut _ .
qaltaaghwagh ghhagh t _ , _ unaghsigh t _ sa u aat _ , _ ila i _ s u q a a w u t _ , _ tawavek _ kanaghte uute luki _ , _ megh meng _ ila aghte luki _ , _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ tugumiiqe luki _ atghagh aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ aquutagh t _ alla _ ila i _ , _ a n g y i l g h a n i l n g u u t _ , _ taakut _ k e l q e l l u k i _ , _ uugte luteng _ , _ s i v u y a g t e t l u _ , _ angyaleg t llu _ .
taakut _ aquutagh t _ angyaleg m _ atuqe luki _ , _ taakut _ angyaleg m _ nulighh i _ angyagh m _ sivuyag an _ kelu kaghagh ani _ , _ m a l l e g h q e n g n g w a a g h a q i i t _ a n g y a s _ tawaten _ .
angyagh t _ wiin _ iggagte aatagh aqe ait _ tawaten _ t a l l i m a n e n g _ iggagte aatagh luki _ a v i i n Ê¼ g h a t a _ .
aquutagh teng _ qule mun _ nengug te nghatki _ , _ enkaam _ nulugh igh i te a _ t a a m _ qaltaaghwagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te aqe ait _ .
avii nghmeng _ t a a q e n g h a a t a _ , _ enraq _ a g h v i g h l l u k i _ i g g a g a a t a g h l u t e n g _ .

anengagh ka _ G a l a a g e r n g e n _ aghnaa igh te yan _ kayagte aanga _ qepghagh te yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .

igaghvig _ sakmavek _ pi u yaghpete aat _ , _ P i n a a y a m _ itghagh te ma kanga _ , _ taghnughhagh a _ m a t u m _ pillgite na yu kan _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
P i w h a n i n k u t _ M r . _ F a r l i s - e n k u t _ , _ S i p e l a n k u t _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ P a n g a w y i n k u t _ ayvigtegh mi _ taamani _ quyngigh _ s i g h u n e g h t u p a a l u g l l a k _ tugu naqutke kangat _ .
A g Ê¼ g h i l g h i i t _ nagate vyiigh anka _ , _ ne m _ k e l u t a n g a n i _ taamani _ ayvigtegh mi _ .
T a m a a k e y a g g a q _ quyngigh neng _ s i g h u n g h i _ aange lghiik _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ ungazighmii m _ neli kaqsagh kanga _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ , _ M a y u k a a m _ .
enkaam _ amani _ sivukekagh _ Q u v e g s i l e g h m i _ nenglu ngiighhagh m _ aag llegh a _ makete luku _ .
alghigh ta ani _ n u n a l g u s i q a g h a g h p u t _ .
whangkuta _ l o g _ h o u s e - m e n g _ mangteghagh luta _ .
almesiqe a _ nutem _ tawaten _ mesag ghllag _ .
T u t e m q i i r a a g h h a g h m e n g _ t u u m k e l l u t a _ .
kelulighnegh itgun _ u w a l i g h n e g h i t g u n _ mangteghagh ukut _ M a y u k a a n k u t _ , _ maagun _ sivungagh kun _ .
T a a n Ê¼ g a n t e f t u q _ .
elngaatall _ nategh ke te luni _ f l o o r - e n g l l a a m a l g h i i _ p i w h a n i m e n g _ , _ salngagkwaagh m _ , _ i n g l i t r a a g h m e n g _ , _ taqughkwaagh aneng _ .
elngaatall _ taake uk _ neghe llegh nkuk _ , _ S i i v a g h h a a n k u k _ taghnughhagh ke lukek _ .
enkaam _ n u l i g h q e l l u k u _ T a l i q n a q _ , _ taana llu _ saki ni _ entaqun _ W a a y i _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ tawani _ itghagh yuwhaagh aqngamta _ , _ I i r g u m _ itghagh sigh nkut _ maavek _ .
amavek _ maaken _ M a y u k a a n k u t _ taakut _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ itghagh kau lghiit _ .
maghagh mete te _ i t g h a g h w a a q a g h t u k u t _ ayvigtegh meng _ amaken _ tawani _ kiig ani _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taamani _ G a l a a g e r n g e n k u k _ M a y u k a a n k u k _ uyghiite ngllagh uk _ .
angyi aghte tke aat
malghukuraagh _ tesqawani _ unguvigagh m _ tapghagh ani _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa ke aq _ aquutagh ii aghagh luni _ wallu _ tepe kau a _ .
yug i _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ tume liqe luteng _ , _ naalkekagh it _ qenwat _ , _ maalghug _ .
samagun _ naayghagh t _ u u g h q i t g u n _ ivagh luki _ qimugsigh meng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kitum _ t a a m _ a m a g h a g h s i n i _ nangllaghqe ghllag yan _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ , _ naayghagh t _ u u g h q i t n i _ samani _ .
up- lleghte luku _ , _ talwa _ akuzi nanigh luni _ , _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ i w h a n i m _ A y m e r g e m _ .
piiwagh te u yagh kangi _ i v a g h i t _ kinku t _ t a a m _ malghukuraagh m _ yug i _ .
esghaqagh kau ma aqa _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ .
unguvigagh m _ entaqun _ tapghagh ani _ tesqawani _ .
napaqagh ghllag a llu _ , _ taana llu _ yugusigh a _ .
kingu a llu _ taawa _ aminghagh vyiigh llgagh u uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
uugte aq
T a a k u n g u u k u t _ tawani _ , _ K e m u g y i l l u _ , _ veghtekagh llu _ , _ A t a q a _ wallu _ S i n g a a w e t e g h l l a k l u _ iwhani llu _ K a n e g h t e g h y a q l u _ , _ uugta nge ukut _ tesqawani _ ayvegh meng _ .
tuqute luku _ kagimtegkangat _ , _ elngaatall _ taana _ S i n g a a w e t e g h l l a k _ n a t a n g a n e n g _ tuufqaghtagh lghii _ .
ii _ aghnalqwaagh _ qemall _ , _ tukaate ma a _ neghekagh an _ entaqun _ , _ m i g h y a m _ kaate kaqe a _ elngaatall _ , _ tesqawani _ taaqe luni _ tuufqaghtagh nghmeng _ .
M a y u k a a n k u k _ A m a w u n k u k _ nayag ak _ .
tamaani _ aghnaaghtekau uq _ .
iknaqe qrug raaghinagh _ elngaatall _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
M a y u k a a m _ angyi lghii
T e s k a n a n t e f t u t _ M a y u k a a m _ angyi lghii _ , _ tekeghagh an _ u k u m _ t u n g a n g i i g h h a a n i _ .
anguksag kaqsagh aput _ amaken _ tapghapagagh meng _ maavek _ lliigh yama _ , _ t e s k a n a n i _ tukughagh i _ kenle nge i kete te _ samagun _ kepugh llegh it _ .
whaten _ ayuqe yaghpete ut _ , _ enkaam _ iighsuute meng _ qughagh qugh vike luteng _ .
arekull _ M a y u k a a m _ tamaani _ tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
F a m i l y - n g i n a g h h a a w a q e l g h i i t _ maani _ taakut _ M a y u k a a n k u t _ .
inglu a _ qaake luku _ angyaghwaagh m _ enkaam _ ayagsigh luku _ , _ inglu a _ enraq _ iighsugh luku _ qaake aqe a _ .
tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
mat- yu ke aq _ sivuke pigte luni _ maavek _ lliigh kau uq _ .
enkaam _ tuqu yan _ , _ S i p e l a n k u t _ kiiw gneng _ samaken _ quyngigh eng _ nula ghllag yan _ malghughqellug qu _ , _ ila a _ ayvigtegh mi _ , _ ila a _ maani _ , _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
angyaghpag ghllag _ R u b y
E n k a a n g a m _ una _ R u b y _ angyaghpag ghllag _ pi nga yug qu ragh u aagh _ , _ esghagh ma aqa _ taana _ , _ S t e a m e r - n g u y a g h p e t u q _ .
tawani _ esghagh aqe yamkun _ kingu mikun _ whaten _ m a l g h u k u r a a g h h a g h e s t u n _ e l q a g h t a g h h a g h m e n g _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
R u b y _ maagun _ uyghigh uq _ , _ igaghvig _ tagite a _ , _ igagh vike yuwhaagh _ .
P i n a a y a m _ itghagh tke a _ tawani _ .
tawaten _ pi luku _ umiileg llu _ t e s a k m u m l l u _ apeghtughiste a _ kina u yagh uq _ .
D u p e r t u i s - n g u y a g h t a a _ wallu _ p u y g a a q a _ t e s a k m u m _ apeghtughiste a _ .
ipa _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ igaghyagh vike yuwhaagh ka _ whanga _ C a m p b e l l - n g u y a g h t u q _ .
elngaatall _ taana _ apeghtugh i sta _ qepghaqagh ghllag pestaagh u yagh uq _ .
L o s _ angeles- meng _ tagi kau uq _ , _ C a l i f o r n i a - m e n g _ .
sa n _ F r a n c i s c o - m _ uughqa ghhagh anite ngughk _ taana _ L o s _ angeles _ .
T a w a l l i i m a _ naten _ angka aqa _ akileghtuusagh a _ aghvig nghaani _ .
wetku _ upenghagh ghhagh inagh mi _ m a i l - l e l i t k a y u k _ .
C u t t e r - e t g u n _ wetku _ m a i l e n g e g k a y u k _ taana _ yuug _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ elngaatall _ kuusme mi llu _ , _ N e w _ Y e a r - m i l l u _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kiiw gnun _ aglagh luni _ , _ kiiw gneng _ t e s a m a k e n _ pugughilegh mun _ .
pugughilegh meng _ wetku _ tagi aqe luni _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ kuusmeyagh aqe lghiik _ kiiw gnun _ tesamavek _ quyngighqwaagh nun _ .
petgegh nghhagh
quyngighqwaagh t _ liisimakekagh nka _ p i w h a n i n k u n g u u t _ , _ S i p e l a n k u t _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ taana _ iiwenllu _ liite aqe unga _ tuqu uq _ .
imagh yagh ghllag luku _ n a t a n g a k u n _ , _ wallu _ ighu an _ kenle akun _ .
taaghta mun _ p a s i s k a n g a t _ i o d i n e - m e n g _ aghaligh naqe luku _ tuqute ni luku _ .
ata an _ I m e g y u u t e m _ wallu _ pasike kanga _ .
elngaatall _ P i n a a y a m _ iknaqughi ni yagh aa _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ samani _ tapghagh mun _ taagavek _ quugsaghtugh negh meggni _ , _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ kakegllugiitagh mineng _ uygaaghte luku _ , _ whaten _ navek _ tamaavek _ qenaagh mun _ m u g h a a y a _ kanagagh gminun _ , _ ingavek _ q a m u g h t e m i n u n _ uyamig aghte luku _ a q f a l a a m e n g _ aglagh te kaqe a _ .
quyngigh m _ ataasigh m _ katamngwaagh _ usi a _ , _ taana _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ tuqu yan _ , _ uyughagh anun _ tagi ste aat _ quyngigh a _ U n m e g g a g h m u n _ .
enkaam _ quyngighqwaagh uq _ taana _ U n m e g g a q _ .
taakut _ amalka _ piinligh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
entaqun _ u y g u r e g h a n e n g _ maaken _ laaligh neng _ ungipamsug meng _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ g o v e r n m e n t e m n g u q _ maana _ quyngigh liqe aqe kanga _ i g a t a g h l l a g m e n g _ kenle ke luku _ .
P a n e g h a a t k a a l g h i i _ nalluke kegka _ whanga _ , _ sivuqagh _ tesakemna _ .
enkaam _ pugughilegh mun _ neqe meng _ aqfate aqe luteng _ .
kiyalighagh t _ maakut _ , _ kukuleg t _ yug lgutusagh lghiit _ , _ pugughilegh t _ tamaakut _ .
ungipamsug ke luki _ liite aqe anka _ .
alaka ghhagh
E n k a a n g a m _ t e s k i w h k u k _ N u n a a g a k _ , _ kukuleg mii u uq _ entaqun _ , _ alaka ghhagh u uq _ .
uyiigh meng _ a m e l t u l k e k _ usputagh qagh lukek _ , _ qute mun _ taglaate luku _ taana _ uyiigh _ .
aag vig kaghte luni nguq _ nalugute nghmini _ aghvigh qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ .
ighleke aqe kangat _ qetgegh luni _ t a n g e g h t u n g h a a s k u n i _ uteghmun _ megh mun _ ifkagh na yu kan _ uyghag ghllag u lghii _ .
T a a m a a _ E l q i l e g m i i _ u y a m i g a a t a k e k _ maalghug _ uyghag ghllag k _ t a k e r i i k a n i k _ .
aag llegh a _ naten _ whaten _ entaqun _ ten _ f e e t - e m y a a k _ , _ y a a g n e v z i q _ i q e t u l n g a _ .
U y a m i g a a t a q n i i q a g k e t _ , _ taake uk _ , _ alaka ghhagh mun _ tawavek _ .
tapghapagagh mi
taagken _ I i r g u m _ itghagh te luta _ amavek _ tapghapagagh mun _ , _ azigutagh leg ghllag u yagh uq _ unegken llu _ paagken llu _ , _ whaten _ unaghsigh meng _ azigutagh leg ghllag t _ t e s k a n a n s a g h t u t _ esnagh ghhagh m _ t u n u t a n g a n i _ .
sa qaghte laatagh sta _ uqughte ta ghhagh ngunaamta _ itghagh ma lghiikut _ .
nefkuuragh put _ elngaatall _ sika ke lghii stun _ aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ .
esghaghhu _ W a n g q e t e l e m _ t a z i n g k e n _ quyngigh _ qineghpeghwaagh yagh luku _ esghagh ma kanginkut _ .
esghagh luta _ legan _ tespikegken _ , _ u k a l i g h m e n g _ naayghagh meng _ , _ samavek _ mangteghagh mii meggnun _ pi gpenani _ tespikegken _ egmigh vike ma kanginkut _ .
taagken _ ungipaate luku _ , _ neqe ghllag u na ait _ ama _ elqiileg mi _ taamani _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ n a t a n g a n i _ t a a m _ whanga _ maligte luku _ taama _ pi ukung _ akmag yagh unga _ neqe meng _ .
unaami _ W i i g h a l l u _ tagi ukung _ esne perewaagh kun _ akmag aatagh lutung _ quyngigh meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ sa meng _ .
taamani _ W a a g h n a a m _ pennagh ghhagh ita _ qaye itni _ s i k i g g a q _ aga _ sivu ngiighhagh mtegni _ , _ suna _ p a m u m _ kayagte te agu _ malighqigh sqellug qu _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ pi yagh aqa _ , _ a k m a g a a t a l e g l l a g u l g h i i n g a _ .
taagken _ kaate lutung _ tamaani _ esgha _ k i y a g h t a a l l e q _ pi niigh pigte yagh lghii _ .
taana _ P a n g a w y i _ amalka _ tuvghagh ke luku _ , _ ataasiighte pagtekaayagh lghiit _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ V e g h t e k a a n k u t _ .
P a n g a w y i _ tuvghagh ke luku _ .
pedersen
pedersen _ una _ kaate nghaani _ ilangakun _ sakmavek _ piiwagh aqe lghiit _ , _ n a a p t a g h t e n g _ akike yaghtugh aqe kangat _ kaviigh _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ itghagh yamta _ taamavek _ tawaten _ aglagh yamta _ taawa _ pedersen _ itghagh kayugu yagh lghii _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ taamaken _ upag aqe lghiikut _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ ellnga n _ P e d e r s e n - e m _ t a a m _ u u n Ê¼ g g u n _ itghagh vike aqe kanginkut _ .
umiileg _ taana _ pilleg qrug raaghinagh _ .
aga _ siku m _ tugu luku _ naagu _ maaqute aqe a _ .
entaqun _ alpag te nghatni _ p i w h a n i l u n i _ whaa _ a l i i g h w a a q e s t a g h a q e l g h i i _ sakmaken _ .
pedersen _ taana _ angyaghugh magh mi _ , _ akilpegagh magh mi _ ayuqe uq _ .
aghvepig mun _ angyaghughtu yaghpete uq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ sivuqagh mete luta _ salin _ .
naghughte aqe uq _ , _ u k s a a g h e n k u g n i _ , _ u p e n g h a a n k u g n i _ .
N o m e - e t e l l e q
entaqun _ N o m e - a _ n e l i m u n _ s a g h i i g h q e s u w h a a g h a q n g a n _ liite kau lghiinga _ .
esghaghhu qun _ maaten _ whaa _ a n g y a g h p a n g e s t i i g h u s k a n g a _ .
N o m e - e l l u t e n g _ piiwagh negh meggni _ , _ esnagh aneng _ sa meng _ s a g h n a m s u g u m a a q e l g h i i t _ , _ egtekagh itneng _ laluramke t _ .
piyag qu te _ ( _ B e a r _ ) _ N o m e - e t a q u t _ .
C h e e c h a k o _ C o m p a n y - l l u t e n g _ tawaten _ akilpegagh luteng _ .
tawaten _ N o m e - e s a g h q a a n e g h m e g g n i _ aki kaghqagh meng _ yataaghqe aqe lghiit _ uksugh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ .
naten _ pi aqe aat _ , _ taana _ A t a a y a g h h a q _ entaqun _ kaangqugh ke luku _ .
esghaghhu qun _ suqagh meng _ akike luteng _ N o m e - e q a a t a q e l g h i i t _ .
T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ umyugagh meggneng _ lliigh ut _ .
C h e e c h a k o _ allgeghllug qu _ sivuqagh m _ t e s a k m u m _ .
sa yukagh yu k _ , _ whaten _ sanighte luku _ sayug aqe kangat _ i i g h s u u t e g n e k u n _ , _ p i y u g t e s t e m m e n g _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ tespamani _ ungazigh mi _ malghukuraagh _ , _ S a a p l a n g u f t u q _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ avate mi _ tawani _ H a z e l _ , _ ama _ malghukuraagh _ , _ a n g e r k a v a v l e g h a a g u q _ natengiighhaq _ U n a z i g h m i i t _ a n y a g h p a g i t n e n g _ .
tukfigh iqe ait _ N o m e - m e m e n g _ .
maaten _ paga _ N o m e - a _ angyaghpag ngestagh meng _ avaqraggiighute ma uq _ .
wetku _ entaqun _ nakmiigh aqe yagh kata _ tamaaken _ lipeghsagh luteng _ akmavek _ pi aqe nayagh lghiit _ .
tawaten _ nula kau uq _ sivu nge aq _ .
sivuke pigte luku _ M a y u k a a m _ ungazighmii m _ , _ atghagh luni _ S i v u q a m e t k u l l a a l u n i _ , _ S i v u q a g h h m i i n g u g h t e k a q _ .
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ A m a g u n k u k _ , _ nayag ke luku _ S i n g a a w e t e g h l l a k _ taakut _ .
taana _ A m a g u _ taawa _ iknaqe qrug pigte yaghtu uq _ .
iwernga _ S u n a a g h r u g e m _ entaqun _ kitugh yagh aa _ , _ pi nanigh magh an _ .
P a a n g Ê¼ g h e t
elngaatall _ upenghagh u uute nghaani _ payangite nghaani _ n a a v g h u t k a y u g y u g a g h t u u q _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tespamaken llu _ pangeghte luteng _ , _ maligte luki _ maakumiu t _ , _ sakmani _ .
ukavek _ lliigh yug niite ghllag luta _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ .
tespamavek _ nangenqagh naqe yagh luta _ , _ amsanaghllug _ elngaatall _ .
amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ teghigagh ighlliqe luta _ evlug ghllag t _ kaate luki _ .
entaqun _ B e r i n g _ S t r a i t - m i _ kaate kaqe ke put _ amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ evlug ghrugllag t _ .
taagken _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ i w h a n i n k u t _ A l a n k u t _ nallagh aput _ qavregh meng _ malighqugh luteng _ .
tawaten _ malighqugh llegh ke ut _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ayvasaa stekagh a _ naghulleg nghmegteggu nguq _ ellngit a _ pikayug u aat _ .
P i y a _ ( _ B e a r _ ) _ tespamavek _ e n g i n e - e k e g s a g h y a g h t u q a y u g u y a g h t u q _ , _ navek _ nalluke aqa _ .
P i y a _ una _ C o a s t _ G u a r d _ Cutter _ aqimle ightugh a _ .
apeghtughiste m _ tawavek _ apegh luki _ P i y a n k u n u n _ .
sa n _ F r a n c i s c o - t e l l e q
T h e t i s - n g u y a g h t u q _ aag llegh a _ .
taameng _ pi yameng _ q e m i g h t a a g h y a g h t u q _ p a l a g h h a g h m e n g _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ V e g h t e k a a n k u t _ t a a m _ i w h a n i n k u t _ angu sagh u te nkut _ , _ I n u u n k u t _ aghvigh te kaqsagh ai _ taaggun _ T h e t i s - e m _ .
I w h a n i n k u n g u y a g h p e t u n Ê¼ n g u q _ ipa _ aghvigh yaghqagh t _ , _ igaghyagh kayug t _ ukut _ , _ I i r g u n k u t _ entaqun _ kinku t _ S u n a a g h r u g e n k u t _ , _ kina u uq _ pi nga yu aat _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kiyaghte luni _ V e g h t e k a a m _ kanavek _ sa n _ F r a n c i s c o - m e n g _ b r i d g e - e l i i m a n i k a n g a t _ , _ tamaani nguq _ avangite yagh uq _ t a a k m a n l l u k i _ ellngit _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ eltughagh minun _ kelgute aqe kangi _ igaqegkagh nite luku _ esghagh nghminigu _ taana _ b r i d g e - e g h l l a k _ .
whaken _ sa n _ F r a n c i s c o - m e n g _ navek _ , _ G o l d e n _ gate- mun _ entaqun _ .
tawavek _ kenle ke luku _ b r i d g e - e l i i m a n i i q a a t _ .
F e r r y _ b o a t - k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ aghvigh qragh u llegh a _ ellngit _ t a a k m a n l l u t e n g _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ uteghnigh ut _ a n g y a g h u t g u n _ malghukuraagh kun _ , _ kina u yagh uq _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ , _ uksughte luteng _ wetku _ taakut _ .
I n u u g h n g u q _ taana _ i g a q a y u u g t e v y i i q a a l g h i i _ , _ umiileg anun _ lata ste luku _ a g h v e g h n i i g h y a t _ .
aygugh uute naqe yata _ tawavek _ tagi luteng _ legan _ pi naqe ni ma kangi _ .
ivagh i ma _ aghnagh _ iknaqe lghii
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ iknaqe lghii _ , _ yuguma neghtuqagh _ repall _ W o r l d _ W a r _ T w o - m i _ tamaani _ unguva yagh lghii _ .
A g h n a l q w a a g h l l a g l u n i _ , _ nekeve nanigh luni _ , _ p a k r e g n g a g h h a g h m i _ talwa _ lli aqe aq _ .
wetku _ t a a m _ p i l l u g a m _ kingu aneng _ tuqukagh _ .
ivagh i ma u uq _ ategh a _ , _ A g a a n k u k _ , _ K a r g i n k u k _ nayag ak _ .
sivuke luku _ A y n g e r a _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ , _ P a a l l e n g e t a q _ panike luku _ .
taake uk _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ qamagte lutek _ enkaam _ qalu m llu nguq _ tugu kaqsagh kanga _ .
ama _ taana llu _ tuqukagh _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ T u t m a t e l g e m _ tugukagh a _ .
taake uk _ ne k _ a g h y u p a a r i g h l l a g l u t e k _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ , _ wetku _ W o r l d _ W a r _ T w o - m _ kingu aneng _ .
flu- lutek _ qerngagh egmek _ , _ k i n g u l i g h a q u t a g h l u t e k _ , _ ikfiqepag gpenatek _ , _ qinuyug te kete luku _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ .
iknaqe pigte ma lghii _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
ayumigh _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ ayvii llegh it _ alla t _ maaten _ pilleg mnneng _ .
ayvegh meng _ n a s q u n g h i _ u y a v l u t u u m a g h l l a g i t a _ uteghvagh qu te _ iike aqe kangit _ neqetuumagh ita _ .
T a a m n g u q _ ivagh i ma m _ angtughpag m _ n a s q u n g h i i _ tugutagh nge i kete te _ tugu luki _ saaygu m _ qaye anun _ miluute ma aqe kangi _ .
sivu liigh aput
M e k e n e g h s i m _ apegh llegh a
T a a g a n i i _ qiighqagh _ maana _ yugtu pigte ma yagh lghii _ .
qafsina _ villages- nge ma yagh lghii _ , _ sivuqagh _ , _ sa igh kuvek _ , _ kiyalighagh _ , _ kukuleg _ , _ qangeghsagh _ - _ kiwatangaghmii t _ , _ tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ A q a a m _ .
a qaa _ i w h a n i t _ aghnagh ke ghrug aat _ , _ pagaliit _ .
pagaliit _ T u u s a a n k u k _ A k u m u t a a n k u k _ panig ak _ .
T u p a a n g a _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ I q m a l u w a _ , _ P a a z a k _ u y u q l i g h p i g a a n i i q a a _ .
kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ repall _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ .
angayuqagh gkenka nguq _ tesakmaken _ kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ kukuleg u te kaqe aat _ ellnga _ .
L e g a n Ê¼ n g u q _ kukuleg mun _ tagyuqa ut _ , _ taakwavek _ ketliqagh t _ sani itneng _ u w a l i g h n e g h a k u n _ igleghte aat _ .
kii _ , _ nenglu m _ qaye a _ paga _ k e t a n q w a a g h a q r i g t a a _ yuug _ naavghute uq _ .
angyaghyage neng _ sivuqagh meng _ aragh ut _ .
taamagun _ t a m l i i v i g g a a w a q e l g h i i k u n _ , _ t a a g g u n Ê¼ n g u q _ tamlag ut _ .
taana nguq _ tamlu ii vig u na iqe aat _ angyat igh vig u magh mi _ , _ kangegh igh lughkagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
yugtu pigte yaghpete uq _ .
elngaatall nguq _ angyagh eng _ saafte nghite aat _ tenpe te aqngan _ .
yug m nguq _ q a g h l e g t e k a q i i _ taagken _ .
tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe ai _ .
yug lgu luku nguq _ liisimake a _ .
T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ aghnaghagh penaagh u luteng _ ellngit _ , _ entaqun _ k e l l m i g s i g a l l u t e n g _ salin _ , _ iwernga _ ungipagh ngugh _ nagaqugh aqe uq _ whaten _ k i i p a g h q e m m i _ uksaagh m _ t u n g a n g a n i _ , _ K i y a l i g h a g h m i i n Ê¼ n g u q _ t e s q a g a _ aqiiyag ut _ .
ii _ , _ l e g r e t a q e l g h i i n Ê¼ n g u q _ aghnaghagh llegagh t _ ellngit _ .
kiyalighagh mii t _ pi nghmegteki _ , _ t e s q a g u m n g u q _ yug i _ angvigagh pigte ut _ .
pi nghmegteki _ m e t g h a g h m e n g _ atkug te luteng _ , _ aate kau uute luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ i l a n g a k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ , _ K i w a t a n g a g h m i i n Ê¼ n g u q _ t e s q a g a _ aqiiyag t _ .
pi nghmegteki _ , _ n a g h u y a m e n g u q _ atkug ghpagte te luteng _ .
esgha _ T u l i i n k u t _ nalighnegh it _ maaten _ entaqun _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
qangeghsagh mii t _ , _ t a a k u s t a _ kiwatangaghmii t _ elngaatall _ saki nka _ ukut _ whanga _ , _ M e g h y u u n k u t _ .
kiwatangaghmii u na iqe ait _ , _ pungughmii t _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
U n m e g g a a n k u k _ , _ M e g h y u u n k u k _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
P i n a a y a m _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ petgegh nghhagh _ t a a k u n i _ , _ aw lug ke i _ u y u q l i g h p i g a a n i i q s a g h a a t _ .
mekelghiigh u luteng _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aagna _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aamta _ entaqun _ seghleghllug u ma yagh uq _ .
U p e n g h a a m _ whaten _ u n u g a n i _ q a w a a g n i i g h n a g h s i m a a n _ , _ anengagh mi _ N g u u n g a y a n k u k _ A l a n g a n k u k _ qawaagniighusigh at _ metngeghute laatagh ma kanga _ .
qawaagyagh yagh luteng _ , _ E g h q a a g h a a m _ guute qaghte vike ma kanga _ taana _ aw lug ke i _ , _ sivuqagh mi _ .
A q a a m _ sivuqagh mete luni _ ungipagh a _ , _ aghnaghagh u luni _ .
taawa _ sivuqagh llu _ , _ sa igh kuvek llu _ nagate llegh mini _ uglagh na iqe yagh aa _ .
U p e n g h a a m n g u q _ esla ani _ tawaten _ amsanaghtu pigte yagh na iqe a _ t a a g a n i n g a n i _ elngaatall _ .
ataasigh ghhaghte negh nge uq _ aghnegh t _ qafsina t _ naqam _ e n r a g h n g u q _ naafte nghmini _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g n e n g _ umeg a qaa _ .
naqam _ aliigh nghmini _ t a a g a v e r u g l l a k _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ taagani _ sivunegh mnni _ m a a l g h u w a a q s a g h t u n Ê¼ n g u q _ mangteghagh t _ kiyaghute yu ait _ .
uksaagh mi _ m a n g t e g h a g h p a g t u u t a q u n Ê¼ n g u q _ k u m l a n a q e l l g h e m _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ .
upenghagh mi _ a n g y a g h n a q _ taaqe ghesnagh nghaani _ , _ m a n g t e g h a s q w a a g h m u n Ê¼ n g u q _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ .
taakut _ m a n g t e g h a g h p a t e n g u q _ naafqe aqe ait _ .
N a a f q e l l u k i _ kagpag aqe ait _ .
kiig mun _ , _ s u m m e r _ h o u s e - m u n _ nuugte aqe lghiit _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ .
M a n g t e g h a s q w a a g h e n Ê¼ n g u q _ tamaakut _ mekestaaghhaa ut _ m a n g t e g h a g h p a g n e n g _ .
B e d r o o m - m e n g i _ qaamkut _ u n g a v i g u u n Ê¼ n g u q _ atigh llegh i _ .
E n k a n g a m _ sivungagh ni _ taawani _ k i t c h e n - e t _ amalka _ , _ g a a t _ .
qula i _ r e g h i l n g u u t _ , _ gaagh vig t _ .
mangteghasqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ tawatete na iqe ait _ .
T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ sivuqagh _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ aanleghaate yuwhaagh luni _ , _ sivuqagh _ gaagh u uute nghmini _ , _ qaqsungigh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ , _ esne m _ t u n g a n g a k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ naghughte negh meggni _ nutem _ alpag negh meggni _ saye it _ p u y u q e m l e g a g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ .
T a w a t e n g w a a g h n g u q _ siquveg mi _ tesamani _ ayuqe na iqe ait _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ n e n g y u g h m a _ ungipamsug kaqe a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ entaqun _ s a a m _ aqnighnegh m _ qiighqagh m _ yug a _ v i l l a g e - e m t a _ m a a t u m _ yug a _ s t r i k e - e m a a _ ayumiqullegh mi _ wallu _ ataasigh mi _ yugu i ma a _ .
sivuqagh ghhagh inagh _ s u r v i v e - e m a l g h i i n g u q _ .
tamaa na _ v i l l a g e - e m _ ila a _ tuqu laghate tke aq _ tawani _ , _ paaghqite tke aq _ .
tawaten _ apegh kaqe a _ .
I i t e g n g o q _ sivuqagh llu _ yug igh ghllag kaqsagh aa _ , _ iwernga _ esgha _ siipnegh u ma lghii _ .
kukuleg _ entaqun _ esgha _ t a m a a t u m _ , _ I e g a n _ nenglu m _ ilu ani _ tesqamani _ aghuliigh uute tke aq _ .
qantaghaqun _ entaqun _ esgha _ kukuleg _ paaghqite tke aq _ .
nanigh u llegh a _ pugughilegh m
pugughilegh _ , _ r e p a l l n g u q _ pennagh t _ t a a g e g k u t _ t u u m l i g h l l a g l u k i _ ayuqe yaghpete ai _ .
neli yagh ghngaaghmegteggu _ nanugh m _ nenglu it _ kanagh aqe luki _ .
nellug yug negh meggni _ unite aqe luki _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ pugughilegh _ t a a g a n i n g a n i _ .
yuug nguq _ tespamaken _ avate meng _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ , _ Q a a q a _ .
sivuke luni nguq _ tapghugh kun _ neli kau uq _ .
tapghugh _ uksugh mi _ neqe niigh vig a _ a w a v a q a a n l e n g u q _ .
pugughilegh mun _ teve ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ nanugh _ ivagh i tke a _ naten _ e f l e g h h t e l l e g h q a m e n g _ .
tawaten _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ nanghiiqu ma kanga _ , _ k u m a g h t a q l u k u _ , _ sa u a _ k u m a g h t a q l u k u _ , _ nanugh _ tamaa na _ efleghte naqe nghmeng _ , _ iqite ste naqe nghmeng _ .
taawa nguq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ , _ nanugh m _ naanghagh aneng _ ayaawagh ke luni _ k e n g h e k _ k u m a g h s i m a k e k _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ taawagun _ singigpag qu te _ ategh kau uq _ .
L e g a n Ê¼ n g u q _ aneghnegh an _ agepsughte luku _ .
taawa nguq _ yuggagh m _ t a a m _ pugughilegh _ nanigh igh te stekaqe a _ .
nanugh m nguq _ ne ke yaghpete a _ t a a g a n i n g a n i _ .
tawaten _ apegh aqe aat _ .
S i v u n g h e n k a _ kingikagh at
taana ta _ esghaghhu _ whanga _ ategh ka _ me ke negh i _ .
F i f t h _ g e n e r a t i o n - n g u n i i q a a n g a _ nanevgaghtagh ghhagh ma _ whanga _ tespikegken _ ategh meng _ .
M e k e n e g h s i n g u u g h n g u q _ liisimake llegh a _ .
M e k e n e g h s i m _ ighnegh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ .
awte lugh u i ngam _ ighnegh kek _ A l a n g a n k u k _ N g u u n g a y a n k u k _ .
E n a a n g e n a _ nayag ke luku _ , _ M a a s q e m _ naange a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ G a l a a g e r n g e n k u k _ , _ K i n g i k a a n k u k _ M a a s q e n _ ilughagh ke ak _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taana _ awte lugh u i nga _ u n Ê¼ g a n i _ peleghqe kau na iqe aat _ uksugh yuwhaagh mi _ tanemlleqa _ qighuneghyage mi _ qimugsigh mi _ entaqun _ pi ke aq _ .
qikmigh ita _ qighunegh mun _ teghiigh tke a _ .
liilightuusagh u laatagh uq _ qighunegh _ uglagh ghllag _ q e r n g u g h n e g h l l a k _ kaate qaghte luku nguq _ , _ pula snanigh aqe aat _ .
kanagh naghtugh ngugh _ , _ kiingighte te ghllag luni nguq _ uglagh te mineng _ ayuqe uq _ .
liilightuusagh _ .
tamaavek _ qikmigh ita _ kaate qaghte te luku _ kanaghkagh _ .
entaqun _ qikmigh a llu _ atunem _ pi naqute yalghiimeng _ qikmigh ita _ mughugtekagh at _ wallu _ tawani _ aliite yagh luni _ .
taagani _ nani _ eskimo _ c u s t o m _ ellmi neng _ kenle ngllagh llegh _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ .
tawatete luni _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i n g u q _ peleghqekagh _ kiyang _ taglaate igate aat _ imaken _ ima _ .
taake uk _ ighnegh gkenka _ t u g u y u g l l a g h n g a a g h m e g t e g n e g u _ qayughllak _ pi lik _ liilightuusagh u lghii _ , _ mamlegte naqe magh mi _ .
iwerngaqun _ k u g u u t i t k e g h n g a a g h m e g t e g n e g u _ unitekagh ak _ .
tanemlleqa _ t a w a t e s a g h t u n Ê¼ n g u q _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ yug t _ peleghqe kau nghata _ aghnaghaghhagh u luki nguq _ atiiqe aqe yagh ait _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ N g u u n g a y a m _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe aat _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ atiiqekagh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ taana _ .
tanemlleqa _ awte lugh u i nga _ I m i n g a t e m _ ilughagh aneng _ A g h n a g h l l u g g a a m _ k u u g Ê¼ g h a n e n g _ E s t u g r u u g m e n g _ u g w i i g h u m a l g h i i _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ p a n i g g a g h q e k _ taake uk _ A v r u w a a n k u k _ , _ K u k i i y a n g a n k u k _ .
whangkuta _ i l u g h w a a g p u t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ tanemlleqa _ E s t u g r u u k _ tuqu yan _ taake uk _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ aflengake i ste nga i uute yayek _ , _ entaqun _ q a n t a g h a n l l e g h p i g a g h m u n _ I m i n g a t m u n _ aflengake sqellug kek _ qallegsaghagh te yagh lukek _ , _ I m i n g a t e q r u g e m _ entaqun _ apetuyuugte te ma uk _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ apangiighhagh mta _ qullug ightuqagh ke gkek _ qayughllak _ t a a m _ panig mi _ p a n i g g a g h q e k _ eltughagh ghhagh gni _ taawa _ tugukligh kaqe kek _ .
anglikagh k _ w h a n g k u n n i _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ taake uk _ u g w i i g h t u u t e l l e g h m e g n u n _ kenlanga _ .
K a l a a w y i n k u g n e n g _ K e m u g y i n k u g n e n g _ u g w i i g h t u u t k a a g u k _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taana _ E s t u g r u u k _ tuqu yan _ paninang _ A w a l q a m e n g _ u g w i i g h u m a l g h i i _ awte lugh u i nga _ , _ enkaam _ Q a v a l g h a a n k u k _ , _ A q u u t u n k u k _ mekelghiigh perewaagh ghhagh k _ taaggun _ a l l g e g h s i m a k e k _ .
taagken _ entaqun _ elngaatall _ q e r n g a q a n i i g m e k _ aviighute uute ma uk _ u g w i k u l l g h i i k _ .
tanemlleqa _ Q a v a l g h a g h l l a k _ taana _ esgha _ ilughagh ka _ taagken _ apallugh ke luku _ .
tawatete uq _ whanga _ l i i g i k e l l q a _ .
aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh at _ sivungagh mii t
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
pugughilegh mi _ aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ .
aghvegh niigh llegh _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ , _ tesamani _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ angayuqagh igh te magh mi _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ elngaatall _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m i _ .
taawanginaq _ angayuqagh igh te luni _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a g h t e k a a l g h i i _ , _ iitek _ anengagh ghhagh a _ , _ taawanginaq _ q i n u y u w a a g h a q e l g h i i _ .
ungipagh kaqe kangi _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ , _ u p e n g h a a m l l u _ ilangani _ t u v a g h l l a g l u n i _ tawaten _ , _ aghvegh t _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ k a a g h t a a g h a q e l g h i i t _ esghapag aqe kangi _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ sumeghtaghagh lunga _ elngaatall _ e s t u w a a g h s i m a g h m a l l u _ , _ e s t u w a g h m u n _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ .
puuskaate meng _ lipeghsagh yug unga _ , _ maalghug _ pi agka _ .
elngaatall _ sa u luki _ lipeghsagh ni luki _ atugh u naanghite ni luki _ pi kangit _ .
taana _ P i t i i m _ ungipamsug llegh a _ sanighte te luku _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ , _ ungipaate gpenaki _ pi luki _ .
taagken _ allgegh te yama _ estugagh meng _ qakiqniqe unga _ tesamavek _ 1 9 7 2 m i _ .
angyagh ut _ t e v u t a g h p u n g _ , _ P a g a y a g h m i i l l u _ m a a l g h u g g a a m t u n g _ .
sivuligh t _ ne t _ tesamani _ .
K a a t u t a g h p u t _ pegnem _ , _ iwernga _ P i t i i m _ kayusiite ainkung _ .
taawa _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ piinligh yuwhaagh kaqe a _ aghvegh niigh llegh _ .
sumeghtaghagh lunga _ kingumun _ ukavek _ atugh u yaghqaa uute yu gnite yan _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ atugh ughte uq _ .
aghvegh niigh vig ite yagh luteng _ sivungagh mii t _ , _ maaten _ kinguliighagh mnnun _ nutaan _ aghvegh niigh vigkagh _ allgegh uq _ .
iwerngaqun _ laluramke t _ sakwaaqe i naqe ghllag t _ , _ neqe mnnun _ a g h v e g h n i i g h m u n _ tamaavek _ .
tamaani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ a l l g e g h t e k a q a q a _ taana _ .
tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ i v e n r u m e n g _ nanghiiqu yagh luta _ maallgute nghmeng _ aghtugh ukut _ .
iitek _ I v e l g h a n i _ taakwani _ , _ I v e l g h a a f t u t _ taakwegkut _ , _ maaten _ I v e l g h a t _ liite ke put _ , _ aghvenge nayagh ukut _ ingutugh ghhagh meng _ .
aghveqe yagh kunigu _ taape nayagh kanga _ entaqun _ .
ghhuugh _ entaqun _ guute nayagh lghii _ s a v e g p a g k u n _ tamaagun _ .
taana _ i v e n r u m e n g _ k a a t e v z i g h a g h p u t _ , _ aaqun _ k a a s i m a a g h p u t _ iitek _ .
tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ aga _ aghvenge i nagh magh emta _ pikani _ , _ aghvenge i nagh magh emta _ elngaatall _ .
sivuke luta _ awatiigh qagh luta _ siku akun _ , _ qungughvig t _ k e t a n g i t n i _ .
A g h v i t e g h l l a k _ elngaatall _ , _ awatiigh ukut _ , _ t e l a n a n g a n g l l a g h l u t a _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ s a v e g p a l e g n u n _ pi luta _ , _ s a v e g p a n g l u t a _ alla neng _ awataghpag meng llu _ pi luta _ taawa _ aghvenge ukut _ .
A y u m i q u n g a n i _ taawa _ aghvenge aatagh kau ut _ .
entaqun _ maaghraghvinleg _ .
M a a g h r a g h v i l q e l l u k u _ qawiighnegh _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ elngaatall _ aghveghni ii aagh _ a k u z i s a g h a n g u q _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g g a a w a q l u n i _ lliigh uq _ .
tawaten _ a g h v e g h n i i g h e m _ tagtale ke a _ taawa _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a
quyngighqwaagh llegh
piinlillegh a _ quyngigh m
U v i m _ apegh llegh a
D r . _ J a c k s o n _ yusqughhagh u uq _ p i i n l i g h i y u w h a a g h t e v u t _ u g p e g h m e n g _ , _ maaken llu _ quyngigh meng _ .
esgha _ tawatete luta _ enraq _ itghagh aqe lghiikut _ tapghugh mun _ kiig mi _ .
me t _ kaate ut _ , _ piiwagh lta nguq _ .
nanevgaghtagh ut _ sulug _ piiwigh sqe aat _ quyngigh meng _ sa meng _ , _ taawa _ g o v e r n m e n t - m u n _ itegh uq _ amalka _ whaten _ qepghagh lghii stun _ .
taawa _ t u w a a t _ aawallu _ quynginge yaghqaaghte ut _ .
quyngigh _ a a n g Ê¼ g h a a _ , _ uglagh m _ ighsake yagh kanga _ tagite llegh a _ .
qule ke aghtagh te _ u s i k a a t a g h a g h p u t _ amavek _ , _ K e p k a g h y a l q a g n e k u n _ taaggun _ .
A s i g h q e l l u k i _ tawaten _ , _ qule ke aghtagh te _ .
entaqun _ yuginagh _ tallimat _ siipnegh ke luku _ .
saghligagh _ uglagh negh kellug qu _ .
taawa _ I i y i i t a a n k u t _ , _ A g h t u q a a y a g e n k u t _ , _ k i n k u g h y a g e t _ taawa _ , _ elngaatall _ ayaviigh iigh luteng _ p i l a a n q e l l u t e n g _ .
kevegtugh luki _ qaake luki _ lli luki _ asighqe sagh i _ i l e m t a q i i t _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh ughte nghata _ nekefqaghte luteng _ k e t a r w a a q s a q a n g i t _ , _ leganqun _ lli luki _ quyngigh m _ aga _ alpag aqe ait _ .
maalghug gneng _ usi ii kut _ , _ pi nga yu a _ taana _ t a l l i m a g g a a l u k i _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ taamavek _ maaken _ .
taamavek _ a g l a g h y u n Ê¼ g h i t u q _ P i y a _ ( _ B e a r _ ) _ angyaghpag _ .
taagken _ laag vlaagh ghhaat _ ( _ L a p l a n d e r s _ ) _ neqe at _ a g l a a t a g h p u t _ .
taakut _ T z a a r a n k u n g u u t _ entaqun _ aghnagh m _ ategh a _ , _ weni _ kellmighqepag llghite unga _ .
avaqutagh kek _ weni _ angli tete lutek _ ayuqe uk _ , _ maalghug u uk _ mekelghiigh k _ .
pinigh t _ ne t _ taakut _ , _ laag vlaagh ghhaat _ , _ quyngigh meng _ pi ut _ .

nayghapag kun _ taaggun _ k i w a l i g h n e g h a n _ kenle akun _ tiinta lug teng _ , _ ne ngllagh naqe kangit _ entaqun _ .
P a m a n s a l g h i i _ esghagh kesi _ entaqun _ , _ aqfayegaagnite yagh lghii _ .
N e k s a g h a a s _ taana _ .
G u y g u g h l l u g g a q _ pinigh lghii _ .
tawatete ut _ .
entaqun _ nuugte aqe luteng _ , _ nuugte aqe luteng _ , _ amenqun _ kangii kun llu _ ataasigh _ ulima kangat _ .
kangigh kun _ pamagun llu _ s a v i g g a q _ ulima kaqe aat _ , _ quyngigh _ m a l i g s a a g h e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
quyngighqwaagh llegh ka
T u l i i m _ apegh llegh a
liite yuwhaagh llegh ka
sivuke luku _ ighni llegh ka _ apegh naqe aqa _ .
sivuqagh mi _ allgegh kau unga _ .
taakut _ a p a g h p i g a q a _ una _ nalluke aqa _ , _ tegh leg nge a _ , _ S a a v l a n k u k _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
S a a v l a _ anguksag kaqe aqa _ , _ P e l a a s i n k u t _ ata at _ .
anguksag ghllag kaqe aqa _ .
aghillug nkut _ , _ Q u w a a r e n k u t _ , _ M i n a a n k u t _ , _ taakut _ siivanllegh t _ sulug nkut _ , _ ifkaghte te nkut _ anguksag ghllagkagh nka _ .
enmis _ qelegh i luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ esghapag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ nukalpigagh nun _ , _ qayughllak _ whaten _ anguyag leg stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
inglu qligh mnneng _ pamaken _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ payangite kayug _ .
A q e l q a g h n i i g h m e n g _ atigh luki _ , _ aqelqaghniigh kayugu kangit _ .
tamaakut _ aqfate te mun _ a y u q e s u g n i l n g u u t _ taawa _ elngaatall _ aqfate te meng _ pi ste aqe ait _ .
A a m t a a _ tughumgha te ste luki _ whaten _ i k n a q n g w a a g h m u n _ a y u q e s u g n i l n g u u t _ taawa _ i k n a q m e n g _ enraq _ pi ste naqutke aqe ait _ .
qayughllak _ pangeghtekan _ anguyag lgu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ .
tawatete ut _ payangite nghaani _ , _ taakut _ awatangani _ tughumgha te kayug t _ , _ taawa _ tugutu te aqe ut _ tughumgha te kayugu ut _ , _ nakaan _ anguyag ke te luteng _ taawanginaq _ aqelqaghni ii aagh _ .
anguyag ke te nghite ut _ piniqe te luteng _ elngaatall _ , _ n a a v g h u t u l l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ tespamaken _ ungazigh meng _ , _ n u u g h n a q a n i q _ entaqun _ tanpegh _ .
entaqun _ aghnasaleg pagite ma aqe uq _ tespamna _ natete aqa _ .
amu i qaghte na qaqu ut _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ atungagh k _ .

quyillegte neghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ aki kaqe kangit _ tapghagh at _ quyilleg nun _ tespagavek _ , _ enkaam _ tukfigh aqe kangit _ , _ n a v e g h t a q e g k a n g i t _ entaqun _ amigh meng _ .
tawatete ut _ .
T a a w a a _ sivuqagh mi _ allgegh kau unga _ 1 9 0 3 m i _ .

nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ taake uk _ , _ apeghtughiste k _ C a m p b e l l - e n k u k _ .

1 9 1 4 - m i _ quyngighqwaagh unga _ .

whanga _ uksugh ani _ itghagh unga _ .

tea- ngatu _ U n m e g g a a m _ tugu kaqe a _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ apeghtughiste m _ nanglleg yagute lunga _ m e k e l g h i i g h h a a g h n g a a g h m a a _ a p p r e n t i c e n g u g h t e s t e k a q e g k a n g a n g a _ A n a g h a y a a g h m u n _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ maavek _ lliigh lghiik _ .
1 9 1 4 - n g u f t u q _ taawa _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
I n u u m _ l o g _ h o u s e _ taana _ S i p e l a n k u k _ , _ l o g _ h o u s e - n g u f t u q _ 1 9 1 4 - m i _ ulimaagh u uq _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
estamagnegh ghhagh u ut _ .

aveg luteng _ pi kau ut _ .

taawa _ esgha _ 1 9 1 4 - m i _ quyngighqwaagh kanga _ .

whangkuta _ nalluniigh lleg mtestun _ nalluniigh kumteki _ , _ whaa _ pi kumteki _ , _ kii _ t a a m _ yug m _ quyngigh a _ naqam _ nughagh a _ una _ s a a m _ yug m _ nalluniigh luku _ .
tegleg yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ naa ita _ liisimake kangit _ .
naten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ quyngigh _ , _ nughagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ , _ kiiw ni _ whaten _ a g h v i g h h n a q n e m t e g g u _ , _ nughagh ngeltagh lghute _ elngaatall _ q e r n g u g h q u t e g h l l a g a q e l g h i i _ , _ naa ite a _ ivagh magh ita _ , _ naalke aqe ait _ legan _ aga _ , _ aghulaqe te magh ita _ .

quyngigh m _ nalluniightu llegh a

takestaaghhaa lutek _ sigute kek _ qamagte lutek _ .
whanga _ e n k a a n g a m _ aghenqignegh a _ awalighnegh a _ iike yalghiimi _ L _ .
taakwna _ kepe negh kegte uq _ inglu a _ .
ataasigh mi _ ayumiqullegh mi _ nalluniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ aghvinleg u uq _ .

aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ sivuligh mi _ aghvinleg _ .
estamat _ saghligagh t _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ aag llegh ani _ ayumiqullegh m _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
nalluniigh kayug t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ pi nga yagh u ni _ qula _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yugte aqe luki _ , _ tawaten _ nalluniightugh aqe luki _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ e s t a m a a n i _ tawani _ , _ qula _ allameng _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ , _ aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yug t _ .
taawa _ u p e n g h a n g h a n i _ , _ kiig nghaani _ kayagte aqe ait _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe ait _ , _ taawanginaq _ tiinta meng _ , _ egllu meng _ , _ avlawa _ sa u a _ , _ kagimkagh _ tunqugh aqe aat _ , _ sa meng _ pi yaghqaa gpenaki _ .
gaaghusigh _ qamagte luku _ tunqugh kayugu aat _ .
tawaten _ ayuqe uq _ .
katam _ tawaten _ ayumigh _ panig teng _ tugumiightu nghmegteki _ , _ saki itnun _ aglagh ste naqe nghmegteki _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ tawatengwaaq _ t u g u m i i g h t u q a l l g h u u g h a q i i t _ a p p r e n t i c e - e t e n g _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe kangit _ .
tawatete uq _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ katam _ .
tugumiigh iigh uq _ tamaa na _ , _ panig teng _ saki itnun _ aglagh sug kayugu ait _ m u l u p a g n a q e n g h a t a _ .
nengaa teng _ taakut _ tugumiightugh luki _ aglagh stekayug it _ .
tawatete laatagh ut _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ pi aqe unga _ , _ a p p r e n t i c e - e t _ tawaten _ e s l e q e n g h a t k i _ tugumiightugh luki _ a g l a g h t e s l e g h i i s t u n _ .
aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh yagu _ S i p e l a m _ pi a _ , _ â _ A n a g h a y a a q _ , _ qakun _ tulugh u i _ kayagte naqe zigu _ nalleghaghhalek _ aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ pi naqe a _ ! _ â _ upenghagh ke te _ pi naqe a _ .
U p e n g h a n g h a n i _ ivgagh mi _ taawani _ , _ pedersen _ kaate nghaani _ , _ taawani _ ighni ste i kayugu lghiikut _ .
akilpegagh niigh luta _ apeghiigh yamta _ , _ tent- a _ , _ qawaagniighusigh _ , _ suflugagh _ , _ e g l l u _ , _ a v l a a w a _ , _ ii- u na qaghtagh te _ tukfightugh aa _ sa meng _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenanga _ , _ taawa _ umyugagh mneng _ lliigh ste aanga _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ angayuqagh nka _ legan _ t e n t - a m n u n _ tagi ta nka _ , _ U n m e g g a a n k u n i t a q s a l g h i i t _ .
A t a a s i m e t a q s a l g h i i t _ , _ upenghagh mi _ taawavek _ ivgagh mun _ ighni ste i yagh te aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ c o r r a l - m u n _ kanaghtekayugu lghii _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ quyngigh _ keste nghmegteggu _ , _ quyngightutala _ liisima kaqe kangat _ , _ yug m _ t a a m _ quyngigh an _ u g l a g h t a t a l a n g a _ teregh te kayugu lghii _ .
tawaten _ ayumiqullegh ni _ k i y a g h t a a l l e m n i _ 4 0 0 - n g u g h t e k a q _ quyngigh ka _ s i i p n g a a g h l u n i _ .
legan _ naa itnite luki _ nughagh at _ , _ ighninghhagh u luki _ nalluniigh aqe aput _ .
naa ita _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ , _ repall _ unite igate ait _ t a w a n l l u k i _ , _ manu itnite luki _ inag itnite luki _ nalluniightugh aqe aput _ , _ ighninghhagh ghhagh u luki _ .
aamta _ ila ita _ angayuqagh ita _ unite qaghte luki _ esghapag aqe ait _ , _ a p e g h i i n e m t e k i _ wetku _ taku aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ s u g h u g a g h a q u t _ e n k a a n g a m _ ila mnnun _ naghpigh ste luki _ nuqnegh ste luki _ nalluniigh luki _ wetku _ , _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ s u g h u g a g h a q u t _ , _ avaqutagh teng _ tugu snanigh aqe ait _ .

four _ y e a r s - m i _ quyngigh ka _ 4 0 0 - n g u g h t u q _ , _ saghligagh nge yuqagh nge a _ qayughllak _ .
upenghagh mi _ i g h n i s t i n u n _ pinegh mni _ kiyang _ saghligagh meng _ ighni aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ saghligagh nge yuqagh t _ nula rakegte na pigte ut _ .
esghaghhu qun _ tawaten _ tuyugh i i aghagh ta mi _ quyngigh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu lghiit _ uksaagh nghaani _ .
seven _ h u n d r e d _ d o l l a r s - m e n g _ q u y n i g h t u q a t _ tamaakut _ m o n e y - n g u u t a q e l g h i i t _ D e c e m b e r - m i _ .

esgha _ tawatete laatagh ma lghii _ .
M o n e y - n g u u t k a y u g u y a g h t u t _ , _ igug ighkagh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu yagh lghiit _ akmavek _ B o x e r - k u n _ , _ unaghsigh u luku _ Boxer _ , _ unaghsigh ghhagh u luku _ , _ W h i t l e m _ umiileg kesagh kanga _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh ghllag kau lghii _ kayusigh i kau lghii _ .
pedersen _ taawa _ kayusigh i kau uq _ e s t u w i i l l u k u _ , _ akilpegagh niigh qagh yu k _ .
wetku _ apeghiigh nghata _ , _ pedersen _ , _ akilpegagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe negh mta _ , _ J u l y - e n a q e n g h a n i _ J u l y m i _ wetku _ tagi laghate te aqe ukut _ , _ tagi aqe ukut _ maavek _ sivungagh mun _ .
kiyang _ q u y n g i m e t u t e m n e n g _ nalluke kegka _ sa u a _ ila a _ , _ ne mun _ t a g i l q u n g i g a l n g u u n g a _ kiyang _ q u y n g i m e t k a y u g u l g h i i n g a _ qayughllak _ .
taakut _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ quyngigh igh kut _ kelengake u kangat _ .
wetku _ ighni ste i _ t a a q e n g h a n i _ , _ ne mun _ tagi luta _ unaami _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh ke luteng _ , _ quyngigh _ aqfa aqe luku _ tagite aqe luku _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
unaami _ tuungligh ghhagh t _ pi aqe luteng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taakut _ unaami _ , _ taakut _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ maalghug u luteng _ aghulaqe aqe ut _ .

neli llegh _ igaghvig ligh llegh
E n k a a n g a m _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igaghvig ligh naqe yan _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taamkut _ tagi laghate te ut _ .
M e e t i n g - e y a g h t u t _ .
qerngughte te ut _ meeting- aat _ .
igaghvig _ whaa _ qaake naqe kangat _ , _ nagun _ nekegte lleghqagh meng _ a g Ê¼ g h i t k a a t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ m e e t i n g - e l u t e n g _ tawaten _ , _ ayvigtegh _ t a a m n a a _ nuna kegte yagh ghngaan _ , _ uksugh mi _ sa nigh ite u ta aneng _ , _ u m e g n e g h p a a l l u u t a n g a n e n g _ , _ savig ite u ta aneng _ avelghagh aat _ anuqetuqagh _ .
ayvigtegh _ sa nigh ite ngughk _ piyaa nigh ite ngughk _ .
naqam _ q u u t f a g h m e n g _ quunpeng _ umegnegh ughte aqe kanga _ .
ivgagh _ taawna _ nuna kegte aq _ pi yu ghngaaghmegteggu _ atg- ghhaghte neghtuqagh _ .
mangteghagh t _ suupe te inaghte na yu kata _ qenaagh u ta aneng _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ , _ kii _ t i i n t a v i g e t _ suupute ghllag ma aqe kangi _ qenaagh u lghii _ .
maana _ mesagtu ghngaan _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ nakmike aat _ u k a g u n g i i g h h a q _ r e g h i g h t e k a y u g u t a n g a n e n g _ n e q n i i g h v i k e g t u t a n g a n e n g _ .
aghuliigh aat _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ maagun _ pi naqe aat _ .
aywaa meng _ anuqlighpag igate ngughk _ maana _ ikevagh ghhagh inagh meng _ anuqligh qagh yu k _ .
taawa _ ayvigtegh mii t _ itagnagh ut _ , _ tagite ait _ mangteghagh teng _ n a a f q e l l u k i _ tagi laghate te ut _ maavek _ .
tagi ut _ taghnughhagh teng _ i g a g h y i i s q e l l u k i _ , _ q e r n g u g h u n n e q i g t u t _ quyngighqwaagh t _ enkaam _ .
taawanginaq _ nani _ tanqigh mi _ puygu ma aqa _ igaghvig _ q a a k s u g w h a a l l g h a _ , _ naqamalla _ kitum _ entaqun _ .
igagh ngllagh llegh mete ngughk _ .
G o v e r n m e n t - e m _ igagh u ni te u lghiit _ , _ imatuq _ avangite aat _ .
igagh a _ pi yuwhaagh aqngami _ entaqun _ T h o m p s o n n g u u q _ entaqun _ .
D u p e r t u i s - n g u y a g h t u q _ ulimaghista _ igaghvig meng _ .
sivuqagh mi _ apeghtughiste u yagh lghii _ .
igaghvig _ ulima naqe aqngan _ , _ t a a m _ ulima yaghtugh aa _ .
igaghvig _ ulima ut _ , _ sivungagh m _ igaghvig a _ .

kenlanga _ T r o u t m a n - e n k u t _ maavek _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ atuqekagh at _ taana _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ M r . _ W i l l i a m - e n k u t _ lliigh magh ita _ igagh vike yuwhaagh m _ kingu ligh aa _ kumagh kau uq _ .
T a z i n g a g u n _ nekegtegkangat _ , _ maaten _ u u m _ nekagh ughtekanga _ , _ taaggun _ nekegtekagh at _ .
kumagh kau lghii _ , _ kii _ taawa _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a q a q a a _ .
D r u m - a _ tamaa na _ iqe iqe ughtagh ukagh at _ sukate luku _ , _ iqite kaqe kangat _ guute na yu kan _ .
iwerngaqun _ t a n k - a n g i _ taakut _ qafsinagnegh u lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ , _ wallu _ a g h v i n l e g n e g h u y a g h t a _ .
taakut _ aghula i te ut _ .
G u u q a q a t _ , _ qimagugh tke aat _ ukavek _ .
M r . _ W i l l i a m _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ t e s q a m a n l e n g u u k a k _ W a l t e r - e m _ aane te kaqe ak _ .
naten _ f l o o r - e m _ asi a _ r e g h i t e f t u q _ .
A a g h h w m e n g _ itegh vikekagh i _ .
agepsugh ghllagu lghii _ , _ esghagh vig ite ngughk _ a a g h h w m e n g _ ivagh lukek _ qikmigh llu _ , _ M r . _ W i l l i a m - l l u _ aane tke ak _ .
walter _ liisima laatagh ma a _ , _ saamna _ f l o o r - e m _ asi a _ agepsugh ghllagu ghngaaghmi _ , _ naten _ uusqaghtu tekagh mi _ s a a m n a n g a _ avangite ma a _ , _ r e g h i s i m a a _ , _ esghagh a _ aane te kaqe kangi _ .
naten _ ayuqe nayagh lghii _ , _ agepsugh m _ naafqe kanigh luku _ W i l l i a m _ talwa _ .
qaamte i na luni _ t e s q a m a n t e k a a y a l g h i i _ , _ qikmigh ghllag a llu _ t a w a n t e k a q _ .
unaghsigh llu _ , _ igaghyagh llegh ka llu
E l n g a t a a l l _ tawatete uq _ quug ghllag u yaghtu uq _ S a g u n g h a n g e s t a a n k u k _ , _ S a g u n g h a a n k u k _ taake uk _ , _ enkaam _ aklunagh isag lghii _ quugkagh meng _ .
mangteghiightuqagh u lghiit _ legan _ tamaaken _ unaghsigh meng _ qupughhugh luteng _ .
taakut _ S i p e l a n k u t _ l o g _ h o u s e - n g u l u k u _ ulima kaqe aat _ .
llaaghinaan _ esgha _ nalluniigh aa ta qaa _ I n u u m _ 1 9 1 4 - m i _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
T a a w a a _ sivuqagh mi _ whaten _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h p e n a n g a _ itghagh kau lghiinga _ maavek _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ 1 2 _ y e a r s n g n g u l u n g a _ .
igaghyagh unga _ tesakmani _ iitek _ .
S e c o n d _ g r a d e - n g u l u n g a _ taaqe unga _ , _ igaghyaghpag gpenanga _ .
maani _ itupill _ y o u n g _ me n _ c l a s s - e t g u n _ igaghyagh aatagh unga _ .
Y o u n g _ me n _ c l a s s - e t _ igaghyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ .
igagh te kayugu yagh ut _ yug t _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ .
igaghyagh kayugu yalghiikut _ tamaani _ yug tgun _ , _ ima _ taaqe aat _ sangan _ , _ piyug nanigh aat _ .
Q u y n g i g h n i i g h e m _ piyaqli i llegh a
quyngigh igh ni uq _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe na pigte uq _ .
talwa _ ighni ste i mi _ mangteghagh isag lghiikut _ .
esla mi _ legan _ uyghag t _ may- ughte luki _ , _ azigutagh ghhagh mi _ taawa _ .
talwa _ sa ngunaamta _ , _ s l e e p i n g _ b a g - n g u n a a m t a _ , _ ulig ngunaamta _ legan _ tawaten _ ingaghte aqe lghiikut _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
I w e r n g a a _ aatkagh put _ maqagh lghiit _ .
qamagun _ nughagh at _ maakut _ ighninghhagh t _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t _ , _ angli ma ite ngugh t _ qamagun _ ilukligh u luki _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ qaye akun _ tuqutagh nge ste aq _ maana _ aate te kaghqagh _ nughagh _ .
aate te kaghqagh ughtekagh _ .
tamaa na _ m e l q w i _ qaute kete luki _ atkug kaqe aput _ .
I l e p g h a a g h l u t a _ t e m k a g h l u t a _ .
amigh meng _ alla ighsigh luta _ , _ kameg luta _ , _ amigh meng _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ .
T a a n a n g i n a a g u q _ umegnegh ughte nghaani _ seghlegh pigu uq _ .
azigutagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ tagtalmi _ sunglug ta ghhagh neng _ , _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ sa u aat _ azigutagh liite aput _ .
mangteghagh ke yaag te aput _ .
legan _ unaghsigh meng _ tawaten _ ulima luki _ , _ c a n v a s - m e n g _ qantagh luki _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ azigutagh t _ piniraaghinagh t _ .
A n u q l i g h n a q e n g h a n i _ p e t u g t e g h a q l u k i _ up- lleghte na yu kaki _ .
alaghrang _ egllu ngllagh ut _ , _ ulluvikagh t _ f i v e _ g a l l o n - e t _ , _ tamaa na inagh u yagh lghii _ ulluvikagh _ f i v e _ g a l l o n - a _ .
tamaaken _ egllu ngllagh yagute ut _ , _ suflu ngllagh luteng _ k a g p e l e n g e s t a y u g g a g h m e n g _ .
suflugkagh t _ sa u aat _ , _ egllu kaghqagh meng _ pedersen _ tagite kayugu lghii _ saag nga lghii meng _ , _ g a l v a n i z e - e t _ sa u aat _ egllu kaghqagh ghllag t _ entaqun _ whaten _ p l y w o o d - e s t u n _ angka lghiit _ .
kepugh luki _ ulima kayug it _ .
whangkuta _ enkaam _ suflu ngllagh negh mta _ , _ meghutlug t _ legan _ uygu uute qugh te luki _ suflu ke aqe ke put _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
ivgagh m _ qaye ani _ ighni ta iqe lghiikut _ , _ pugughillghagh mete te _ ukig yagute ukut _ , _ pugughillghagh qun _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ ulima luki _ , _ egllu ligh luta _ , _ quugtu pigte lghii _ legan _ , _ q a v a n g s i y u w a a l g h i i _ , _ qavangsi yagh aqe lghii _ .
quyngigh ut _ ukig te luku _ pugughillghagh mete te _ aga _ mayugh aqe lghii _ .
mayugh nghaani _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ , _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ iwerngaqun _ unglegh qaqu luni _ l l i i g h n a q e n g h a n i _ , _ u m u l g h a g h a q a g h p u t _ , _ ukig taqagh ut _ tawavek _ nayugh mnnun _ .
pilaataqu lghii ni _ four _ hours _ unglegh ma te kaqe aat _ .
taawanginaq _ emta _ ila ita _ nayugh i lghiit _ kipullegte vig _ t u g h a a n g h a n i _ neghe snanigh aqe kangat _ ungllegtu aatagh aqe kangat _ t a k e l e n g e s t a y u g g a a l u k i _ , _ unglegh ma llegh _ lliigh ma aqe kangat _ , _ o n e _ hour _ , _ two _ hours _ .
ungllegtagh ta m _ whaa _ kipullegte i lleghqagh _ k a a n n a q e n g h a n i _ , _ ighleg yagute ma aqe kangat _ liigilliigh luki _ .
kiyang _ quyngigh mete kanga _ whanga _ .
utaqa i aqe lunga _ taakut _ aleghqagh nka _ tagi nghata _ .
esghaghhu qun _ G e n u g e n k u t _ , _ M a l i g u t k a a n k u t _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkut _ quyngighqwaagh aatagh kaayagh ut _ .
taawa _ mulu nghite ut _ .
sivugh qaghte negh meggni _ taawa _ itghagh igate ut _ .
entaqun _ iilqayug aqe ut _ nanghiigh nghmegteggu _ ikfiqe na a _ .
neghe gpenaamta _ , _ qavagh gpenaamta _ igleghte negh mta _ t a a n a n g u u q _ ikfiqe na llegh _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ivagh i yami _ tawani _ ilangakun _ u n a a m u n _ kenlanga _ kaate gpenaamta _ ivgagh mete luta _ pi aqe kanginkut _ .
nanghiigh aatagh kangat _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ ima _ piiwagh aqe ut _ q u y n g i g h q w a a g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ .
iilqayug neghllug te mneng _ whanga _ .
M e g h n u g h n a n i g h w a a g h l u n g a _ , _ t e n m a a w i n g w a a g h l u n g a _ .
A n g t a n g h h a m t e s t u n _ igleghte aqe lghiikut _ , _ enkaam _ m e g h n u g h n a n i g h w a a g h l u t a _ .
enmis _ uteghmun _ aqfaaghtu te aqe luku _ quyngigh ut _ l l i i g h a g h p u t _ tughwaagh negh mta _ , _ ivagh i yagh negh mta _ .
O n e _ week _ a g h u l a q u t k a q e g k e f u t _ quyngigh mun _ pinegh mta _ , _ tuqutagh ii lleghqagh _ p i n a q e n g h a n i _ .
A m a n s a g h t u q _ c o r r a l - a _ , _ tuqutagh igh yuwhaagh llegh ut _ qitneg mi _ .
qitneg mete yagh lghii _ c o r r a l - a _ , _ t a a n a n g i n a a y a l g h i i _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ c o r r a l - e n g l l a g h t u t _ ivgagh kun _ .
taawa _ taawavek _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh igh yagh yagute ut _ .
T a a m a v e r u g l l a k _ pikayug u yagh ut _ qitneg mun _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh yagh te aqe yagh ut _ .
H e r d - e m _ tukfigh kayugu yagh aa _ , _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ t e g h i g l a a q _ , _ qaghlu kau luku _ .
quyngilegti llegh
quunpeng _ q u y n g i l e g t i m e n g _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ , _ qimugsigh gpenaamta _ .
P e g h q i g h t i l u t a _ pi aqe lghiikut _ , _ repall qun _ ataasigh meng _ , _ e s t a m a n e n g _ inglu lgu luta _ pugughilegh meng _ c o a l - e m e n g _ piiwagh te i kau ukut _ , _ q u y n g i l e g t i p e r e w a a g h m e n g _ igaghvig mun _ , _ sivuqagh m _ apeghtughiste anun _ .
sivuqagh _ entaqun _ usingigh vig ite yan _ , _ natete yan _ pugughilegh kun _ c o a l - a _ qaake ma kangat _ .
G o v e r n m e n t - e m _ c o a l e n g a _ igaghvig m _ .
Q u y n g i l e g t i m e n g _ c o a l - e m e n g _ piiwagh te i yaghtugh ukut _ sivuqagh mun _ e s t a m a n e n g _ inglulegyag u luta _ .
M a a l g h u t _ usi ke aatagh aput _ ataasigh kun _ quyngigh kun _ , _ 1 5 0 _ p o u n d - e t _ c o a l - e t _ ataasigh t _ .
whangkuta _ quyngigh put _ u t u q a n g h u l g h i i t _ , _ tenmaawikagh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ qamugh qu sigh ghllag t _ .
ukut _ ayvigtegh mii t _ ellngit a _ nuteghagh t _ quyngigh teng _ atugh naqe luki _ , _ naavyigh yuguma lghiit _ qamugh u aatagh igate ngugh t _ , _ tenmaawi kau nghite ngugh t _ .
up- si llu ta _ tesamavek _ t e v m u n _ pangalegti tete yalghiimeng _ legan _ unite ainkut _ aga _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taakut _ quyngigh at _ nuteghagh u lghiit _ , _ whangkuta _ u t u q a n g h u l g h i i t _ .
pugughilegh meng _ up- si llu ta _ aygugh uute yalghiikut _ , _ nuug ukut _ whangkuta _ enraq _ usite yalghiikut _ .
tevelqug ni _ utaqa i ukut _ , _ pugughilegh meng _ s a a g g u t u k u t _ .
W a n g q e t e l e n _ aviite uq _ .
G a l a a g e r n g e m _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ W a n g q e t e l e n _ entaqun _ uka _ . _ â _ T a s l u g h a m e n g _ uka _ allgegh lghii _ .

aa _ , _ whangkuta _ sivungagh mii ni _ , _ salin _ tagi llghite luki _ ayvigtegh mii t _ , _ tamlu _ , _ whanga _ , _ M a a s q e n _ , _ M e g h y u q _ .

whangkuta _ e s t a m a g u u k u t _ , _ qule u ukut _ qerngagh emta _ .

taana _ enraq _ ighsa kau te aqe aat _ qaake naqe nghite aat _ .
pi atnga _ , _ â _ elpek _ nanghiiqu yagh kuvgu _ , _ usi ke yagh kuvgu _ . _ â _ sivuughagh kestagh ghngaamkun _ quyngigh ka _ naavyigh na yu kan _ pi nga yiite aqa _ .
â _ masingka _ legan _ itagnagh lghii _ ! _ â
M a g h y a g h q u g h t e k l u k u _ W a n g q e t e l e n _ igleghte ukut _ sukatutala atun _ .
quyngigh a _ u n g l e g h a a t a t u g h q w a a g a _ m e g h n u m _ .
qamiye put _ , _ qamiye pigu ut _ iqetu ghllag luku _ two _ f e e t n g w a a q u t _ i q e t a a g h a l l u k i _ qamiye ngllaghkagh t _ .
qayughllak _ kilgaa ni _ petug vike magh ita _ pi aqe ke put _ , _ legan _ aaghwte te luki _ unite aqe ke put _ quyngigh put _ .
ne mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikut _ a a g h h w l l u k i _ .
suqaghnegh i _ savikenghaagh u ut _ .

C h i e f _ H e r d e r - m e n g _ tugutellegh _ , _ nakmiigh llegh
taagken _ c h i e f _ h e r d e r - m e n g _ tugu tete naqe ut _ , _ c h i e f _ h e r d e r - k a g h q a m e n g _ .

quyngigh _ c o r r a l - m u n _ kanaghte luku _ , _ key-tagh ut _ , _ pi nga yug u luta _ , _ P a n g a w y i _ , _ ggayegllug _ , _ whanga _ .
N a l i m t a a _ t u n g q w a a g h a g h h n a q a g u _ , _ t u n g q w a a g h a g h t e l l e g h q a a _ esghagh naqe aat _ .
pi nga yu neng _ a y u m i q u k a t _ , _ y e a r l i n g - e t _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ uksughtekagh t _ , _ o l d _ d o g _ , _ o l d _ d o g - m e n g _ atigh yaghqagh t _ , _ tawaten _ .
atightugh aatagh yagh ke put _ whangkuta _ quyngigh m _ a y u m i q u t u t a l a n g i _ .
keste i luta _ apeghiigh luta _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ â _ kii _ ! _ whanga _ elqughaghte ma kegka _ quyngigh _ kiyang _ a y u m i q u t u t a l n g a _ ! _ â
amenam _ ungazighmii stun _ , _ p a a m k u s t u n _ , _ q u y i l l g i s t u n _ , _ q u y n g i m e t u t e m n e n g _ liigilliigh kaqe kegka _ quyngigh m _ uksughtutala a _ , _ nayugh ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
tawatete kangat _ pamani _ , _ quyilleg t _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h l u k i _ u k s u g h t u t a a l a _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh i _ , _ k i y a g h t a a l l g h i _ l i i t n g w a a g h l u k i _ ayuqe kangit _ .

E s t u w a m _ saghya a _ whangkuta _ a g Ê¼ g h i t k e g k a y u g u y a q e f u t _ , _ A n i c a - m _ tugu mangite luku _ .
akitutala _ qerngagh emta _ u l i m a l a g h l u k u _ , _ sivuqagh mii t llu _ qerngughte te luta _ ulima luku _ p i k a y u g u y a q e f u t _ .
sivuqagh mi _ K u z a a t a _ m a y o r - k e s a q a n g a t _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emtung _ K u z a a t a l l u _ qepghaqagh u lghiikung _ kiyang _ e s t u w a g h m u n _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ kayanqute _ maana _ u k i g h q u g h a q e g k e f u t _ , _ aki ite ngugh mun _ sa mun _ neqe mun _ u k i g t e l l e g h p u t _ p i k a y u g u k e f u t _ , _ enkaam _ e s t u w a g h p u t _ iflii igate ngughk _ .
aki pagite yagh ghngaaghmi _ ghhuugh _ tamaa na _ , _ tamaavek _ a g l a g h h n e m t e g g u _ ifla igate ngughk _ .

maaten _ A n i c a - m u n _ lliigh luni _ tawaten _ lli aqe aq _ .

M e e t i n g - e k a y u g u y a l g h i i k u t _ kiyang _ council-ni _ , _ sivuqagh m _ council-ngi _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ qerngughte te luta _ a g h v i g h a a t a m e n g _ tawaten _ m e e t i n g - e k a y u g n i _ .
ilangani _ maavek _ tagi luteng _ , _ kiyang _ whangkuta _ tesakmavek _ , _ M r . _ D a u g h e r t y _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ m e e t i n g - e y a q a y u g u y a g h t u k u t _ .
M r . _ D a u g h e r t y _ seghleghllug u yagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tamaani _ .
qayughllak _ whaten _ D a u g h e r t y - m _ quunpeng _ tesakmavek _ J u l y - e y a a m a a m t a _ pi stekayugu yagh kanginkut _ .

C h i e f _ H e r d e r - e m _ qepghaqagh a
C h i e f _ h e r d e r - e m _ qepghaqagh a _ tamaa na _ elngaatall _ quyngigh _ , _ q u y n g i g h q w a a g h t e t _ hour-ngit _ , _ i g a g h t e l i g h l u t a _ .
F o r t y - f i v e _ c e n t s - a n - h o u r - n g u f t u q _ tamaani _ qepghagh llegh _ .
aghsaghmete yaghtu uq _ f o r t y - f i v e - c e n t s - a n - h o u r _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ angka yagh uq _ .
enraq llu _ m o n e y - p i g m e n g _ akileghtugh gpenaamta _ , _ quyngigh meng _ pikayug u kanginkut _ .
iwerngaqun _ h e r d e r - n g u g h s i m a a m t a _ m o n e y - n g i i g h h a g h m e n g _ ila luta _ lliigh ainkut _ .
T a w a t e n g w a a g h w a a q _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu lgu luta _ quyngighqwaagh kau lghiikut _ .
C h i e f _ h e r d e r - e t _ tamaakut _ quyngigh mun _ k a y a g t i m u n _ , _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh yaghqagh t _ qepghagh kayugu ait _ , _ quunpeng _ quyngigh _ tawaten _ lliigh nghaani _ tawavek _ tuqute i lleghqagh _ lliigh nghaani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ , _ y a t a a g h q e s t e k e s t a a g h a q e g k a n g i t _ .
C h i e f _ h e r d e r - e m _ qelegh llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ ulima kayugu ai _ quunpeng _ .
tuqute i aagh mi _ , _ tawaten _ u g l a g h q a k a l g h i i _ sivuqagh meng _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ m o n e y - m e n g _ ila i _ , _ quynginge na ta it _ .
saama _ qepghagh negh meggni _ llaaghanwha _ hour-ngit _ taakut _ quyngigh mun _ legan _ qiifte aqe kangit _ .
aki msuggagh ngunaan _ urang _ , _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h w a a g h l u k u _ qepghagh lghii _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ quynginge uute kayugu yagh lghii _ , _ tuqu ta u uute aqe lghii _ .
saama _ ila ita _ pirughte i te aqe kangit _ .
whangkuta _ katam _ quyngigh leg ni _ , _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute ste aqe ainkut _ piyuke lleg mtestun _ inwa _ tukfigh luku _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ whangkuta _ t u n q u g h a q e g k e f u t _ aki u na an _ tanemlleqa _ quyngigh yaghkagh nun _ tamaavek _ .
whanga qun _ kayusiite i naqe nghmeng _ katam _ whanga _ tukfigh aqe luki _ aki it _ pilagh kanga _ , _ h e r d - e m _ p a l a g h a g h t e k a y u g u k a n g i _ .
whanga _ u p u u p e n g _ pinitun _ tukfigh aqe kenka _ , _ qayughllak _ negh yugnagh pigte lghii _ quyngigh _ , _ maaten _ paninang _ t a w a t e l n g u q _ .
urang _ nulasagh kumegteggu _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe yagh kumeng _ , _ whaa _ quyngigh m _ yug ita _ kelengake yagh kumegteggu _ ighni ta iqe luteng _ , _ tuqute llegh _ kayaate nayagh lghii _ .
kaviigh m _ , _ meteghllug m _ , _ tuqute kayugu kanga _ nughagh _ , _ kelengake nghite ngugh ni _ .
meteghllug qrug t _ tamaakut _ t e g h h i k u n _ nughagh ghhagh t _ qellu it _ n u s u k a t a a m a a q e g k a n g i t _ .
kaviigh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ u w i g h h u g h l u k i _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ e n k a a n g a m _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ S i p e l a m _ c h i e f _ h e r d e r - n g u l u n i _ tuqutagh ii negh mta _ , _ nayugh i negh mta _ , _ kaviigh niigh ste aqe kanginkut _ tuqu qite te neng _ .
taakut _ amiiragh i _ P e d e r s e n - m u n _ tuune luki _ money-ngi _ taakut _ nayugh ikagh ni _ , _ kaviigh t _ tuqu tke aput _ P e d e r s e n m u n _ tuune luki _ , _ akike luki _ , _ money-ngi _ taakut _ whangkuta _ nayugh ikagh ni _ nengigh te sta qaa _ .
money-ngi _ ne iitagh ke aput _ nayugh ikagh ni _ .
L l a a g h a n w h a a _ n u g h a a m _ tuqu llegh a _ k a y a a l n g u q _ , _ wetku _ u m e g n e g h u g h n e g h a n i _ upenghagh mi _ esla _ naafte nghminigu _ ghhuu ste qugh aqe lghii _ , _ g g h u u g a q e l g h i i t _ n u g h w a g h h a a t _ ilangani _ .
aamta _ ilangani _ aghsaan _ tuqu llegh a _ ayuqe aqe uq _ .
taawa _ esla _ naafte luni _ aliigh yuwhaagh llegh ani _ pinegh mta _ , _ kii _ , _ t u q w a a g h t a q u m a a q e l g h i i _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ i f l a n g i g a l k e f u t _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t llu _ tamaakut _ ighninghhagh ghhagh t _ akike kayugu kangi _ c h i e f _ h e r d e r - e m _ .
tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ nayugh ikagh ni _ tawani _ legan _ akingite ut _ , _ avangite ut _ pilagh aqe ke put _ saghna aqe ke put _ , _ aviite yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ qayughllak _ .
T a a n a n g u l g h i i _ u k s u m i i _ , _ uksaagh mi _ whaten _ k u m l a l u n i _ aniguvzeghagh yagh luni _ , _ eslallugughte luni _ p u q l a g h q w a a l u n i _ aqlaghate ghpagte nghmini _ s a a m n a n g a _ legan _ siku nghminigu _ negh vig iitagh ke lghii _ .
qayugtugh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ e s t u w i i n n e g h m e g g n i _ tuqu kayugu ut _ , _ estug teng _ n a a n g t a q e g k a n g i t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ kiyang _ naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte naqe neghtuqagh t _ , _ naayghagh t _ ava ite ngugh t _ itagnagh lghiit _ , _ enraq _ ungagagh pagite te kayugu lghiit _ .
ungagagh _ tamaa na _ uksugh mi _ n e q e k e g k a n g a _ quyngigh m _ .
ungagagh _ enraq _ tamaa na _ l i i s a q e f u t _ , _ laavlaaghmii t _ liite stekagh at _ ungagagh m _ piite llegh a _ .
T a l l i m a n Ê¼ n g u q _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ quyngigh m _ neghenghite nghminigu _ , _ nagu kayugu uq _ .
ungagagh t _ tamaakut _ talligh ma _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ wetku _ negh yaghqaaghte ma aqe lghiit _ .
piite luteng _ sukangite pigte ma lghiit _ .
upenghagh mi _ itagnagh lghii _ alngunak _ piinghagh _ maana _ quyngigh m _ neghe kayugu kanga _ .
laavlaaghmii t _ t a g i u w h a a q a a f t u t _ quyngigh _ maligte luku _ .
pinagh u yankut _ , _ S i p e l a n k u t _ , _ Q a l u n k u n g u l g h i i t _ sivuligh t _ , _ quyngigh _ qaake yuwhaagh aqngan _ qula _ .
A g h t u q a a y a g e n k u t _ quyngighqwaagh t _ , _ P e t g e n g h h a a n k u t _ kinku t _ sivuke luteng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ a y u m i q u n g a n i _ alla _ qaake tke aat _ quyngigh meng _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taakut _ taaqe ut _ , _ S i p e l a n k u n g u g h t u t _ taakut _ , _ elngaatall _ quunpeng _ S i p e l a _ , _ P i n a a y a _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ ( _ paninang _ kiyaghte yagh lghii _ ) _ .
petgegh nghhagh _ entaqun _ umiileg kesagh kangat _ tamaani _ , _ M e g h y u u n k u t _ anengagh at _ .
laag vlaagh t _ taakut _ entaqun _ maalghug u ma yagh uk _ , _ wallu _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g u y a g h t a t _ .
apeghtugh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
quyngigh m _ y u k u m t a a g h i _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ .
Q a m i y n g i n Ê¼ n g u q _ qayagh u ut _ , _ u u g g u n _ qamuutagh leg t _ , _ uvegh igate laatagh ut _ .
qaya stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ q a m i y n g i t _ .
amenam _ entaqun _ nuyaaghite te ghllag nghata _ atugh aqe kangit _ .
aamta _ nuyaagh luteng _ naafqesaghqagh ke ait _ , _ qapragtu ghllag ut _ .
quyngigh mun _ apeghtugh i llegh
apeghtugh naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ , _ naten _ u y a t u t k a a g h l u k i _ , _ sa u a _ f i v e - t o - s i x _ feet _ uyatu tke ai ta _ petug aqe aput _ .
taakut _ enlegkutagh t _ qamughaghtagh yaghqaa luki _ , _ qamugh ghllag yaghqaa gpenaki _ , _ aaw ghhaghtagh meng _ pi yaghqaa luki _ , _ aqnighte na yu kata _ , _ ii- sqeaghaghte na yu kata _ .
quunpeng _ n a l u g h q u t a g h l l a g a q u _ t u g u y u w h a a n e m t e k i _ .
qaprag ghllag aqe ut _ , _ s i g h u n g h i t _ kepugh luki _ h o l d a - l i g h l u k i _ petug aqe ke put _ .
unaami _ wetku _ p i n e m t e k i _ aghuliigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
unaami ani _ enraq _ qaghlu aqe aput _ .
qaghlu it _ p i y u w h a a n e m t e k i _ , _ enraq _ tanemlleqa _ qaghlu yuwhaagh negh meggni _ e f l e g h y u g e m _ iwernga _ mulu pagigate ut _ .
liisagh ke put _ t u g u y u w h a a n e m t e k i _ tawaten _ a p e g h t u g h n a q n e m t e k i _ qaghlu magh ita _ lliigh aput _ .
Q a g h l u u g h u m i i t a _ , _ qaghlu it _ p e t u g t e g h w a a g h l u k i _ tawavek _ , _ s a a g t e n g i t _ q u g h w a g h n a y u k a t a _ .
S a a g t e n g i t _ naten _ t a g k a a q u t _ , _ teghiglug t _ t a g t a l k e l l u k i _ .
tapghagh ghhagh meng _ uygaagh ke aput _ .
teghiglug t _ peghte luki _ whaten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ sa u a _ t h r e e _ inches _ , _ peghte luki _ tawaten _ s a a g t e k a q a p u t _ .
qaghlu t _ pi niigh pigte ut _ tamaakut _ teghiglug t _ , _ amiiragh i _ , _ m e l q w i _ qaye anite luki _ .
unange i _ melqiite aqe lghiit _ , _ u u k n a n g i _ a g t u g h a m _ q a g h l u k u s i i g h t e g h l l a g e m _ .
P e g h q i g s a n e m k i _ , _ whanga qun _ kiyang _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghtaghkagh nka _ , _ a p e g h t u g h n a q n e m k i _ .
amenam _ pi nqegtagh t _ wallu _ akuuragh aqe zingi _ .
emta _ ila ita _ ilullug t _ , _ s u g h u g a g h l l a a g e t _ quunpeng _ .
anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ uka _ legan _ sughug i kayugu ut _ , _ enkaam _ qamiye teng _ n a p a g h a g h t a q e g k a n g i t _ uka _ tagi nghata _ .
uyiigh t _ t a g t a l k e l l u k i _ tawaten _ s a a g t e k a q a p u t _ .
enkaam _ qamiye put _ uka _ tagi nghata _ sani igh te nghata _ uughqaghte aqe luta _ .
taawa _ u k a n l l u k i _ quunpeng _ sayughqaaghkagh put _ qiifte naqutke aqe aput _ , _ qiive yagute aqe ut _ ukavek _ aghenqignegh mun _ .
Q i i f n a q n e m t e k i _ angyalligh qugh magh ita _ qamiye put _ taakwavek _ , _ elngaatall _ taawa _ qiive aqe lghiit _ .
P a n g a l g u g h a q u t _ , _ p a n g a l g u g h a q u t _ , _ p a n g a l g u g h n a n i n g h a t a a _ amu kestagh aqe aput _ .
whaa _ q i i v a a t a t u g h l l u t e n g _ lliigh nghata _ , _ aghula i aghte aqe luki _ .
qenwat _ t e n m a a w i s n e m t e k i _ taawa _ u y a t u t a l a n g i s t u n _ lliigh aqe aput _ .
S a a g t e n g a n _ t a g t a l n g i _ , _ tenpe yaghqaa gpenaki _ sa u a _ s i x - f e e t _ entaqun _ f i v e - f e e t _ tawaten _ uyatu tekagh ligh aqe aput _ .
aghuliigh aghtekata _ , _ tenpe gkumteki _ , _ ighu i _ a y e m n n a a q e p u t _ .
kiyang _ pi nga yu _ whanga _ qavaghte luki _ peghqightu aatagh kaqe anka _ , _ pi nga yu _ qavagh _ .
tawatete kau ut _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghte luki _ peghqigh aqe ut _ peghqigsaghkagh nka _ .
akuuragh aatagh kaqe anka _ ilullug ite ngugh t llu _ .
I n g l u s i g h a q a p u t _ tenmaawi nghata _ , _ enkaam _ m a g h y a g h q u g h t e n g u g h t a q u t _ .
tamaakut _ aamta _ f o l l o w - m e n g _ ata iqe aput _ , _ t a a k w e g k e s t a g h h i i n a q _ , _ elngaatall _ f o l l o w - t _ tamaakut _ usi iigh aqe aput _ .
ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ quyngilegti sighqagh u nghite ut _ ellnginagh meng _ .
uziveketaagh ghllagu aqe ut _ igleghte gpenateng _ naqam _ petug luteng _ t a s l u g h a n q e g t u t _ , _ f o l l o w - m e n g _ atigh luki _ ayuqe aput _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ qamiye mteggun _ petug luki _ usi lug ke i _ whaa _ igleghte te kaqe aput _ , _ whaa _ usi igh ghllag luteng _ , _ naqamllu _ itagnagh aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ i g l e g h u s i q n e m t e k i _ , _ f o l l o w m e n g _ atunem ta _ yugu yagh nga a ta _ , _ aqume luteng _ maligte te aqe lghiit _ , _ taawanginaq _ ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ p e g n g a g h m e n g _ , _ uziveketaagh yaghqagh t _ igleghte gpenateng _ .
sangameng _ tawatete aqe aat _ inglusi i ma ite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ i n g l u t e l g e t _ pinigh ut _ quunpeng _ .
emta _ tawatete laatagh ut _ qikmigh stun _ , _ s u k a l l e l w a a q l u t e n g _ .
sukate ngugh t _ sukaghllag u ut _ .
whaten _ igleghte te negh mta _ , _ pangalegti tete naqe negh mta _ aga _ sukate ngugh meng _ quyngigh lgu negh mta _ aga _ unite qaghte aqe aput _ ila put _ .
A q f a y n g w a a k e g t a t _ t a m a a k u u t _ , _ aqfayngwaag negh meggni _ whaa _ p a n g a l g e t _ ila i _ .
pangalegti naqe te inagh _ aga _ , _ ilangani _ pangalegti te kayugu lghiikut _ qayughllak _ .
uyaute iqe aq _ taana _ kiyang _ tuqu qugh kau uq _ ii- sqeaghaghte ste aqe luki _ .
naten _ pi aqe aki _ apeghtugh i nghmini _ .
entaqun _ nuqnegh qagh nghminiki _ aghvequte ste aqe kangi _ .
ii- sqeaghaghte negh meggni _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ .
naasqugh t _ ukut _ iisqagh teng _ aqnighte nghmegteki _ , _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ , _ e n k a a n g a m _ tuqute aqe aput _ .
emta _ tawaten _ ayuqe laatagh ut _ , _ ila ita _ apeghtugh qu ait _ ilullug ghllag t _ s u g h u g a g h y u n e g h t u q a t _ .
whanga _ amenam _ apeghtuqagh nka _ ilulliqepag gpenateng _ , _ llangaqa _ p i n q e g t e g h r a a s t a g h h i i n a a t _ .
emta _ pi aqlaatagh ait _ tamaakut _ ilullug t _ , _ umyugagh it _ natete ma aqe lghiit _ , _ suugllug kanigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
T a w a t e t a q l l a a t a g h p e t u t _ .
manigugh luteng _ quyngigh t _ atughqagh u ut _ , _ s a s n a q e f q a a m e n g _ .
S u g h u g a g h y u n e g h t u q a s _ taawa _ anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ mekelghiigh t _ qamiye meggneng _ aafte igate ut _ .
S u g h u g l l a n g h i s t e n g _ legan _ qamiye teng _ n a p a g h a g h t a q i i t _ , _ q a y u g m i g n a q n e g h t u q a t _ qayughllak _ .
kii _ , _ taawa _ nula kaayagh uq _ , _ 1 0 , 0 0 0 - n g u k a a g u q _ kingulighpigagh _ c o r r a l - e k a q _ .
N a l i k e k _ ifkagh llegh nkuk _ , _ N u u q i t a a n k u t _ c h i e f _ h e r d e r - n g u l u k e k _ .
nula pagllag kau uq _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ tawani _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ , _ upenghaghyag u _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ kii _ uughqa ni _ samani _ naayghagh ghhagh t _ u v i t a n g i t n i _ .
yaywaalingiighhagh u na iqe kangat _ saamna _ i w h a n i m _ aygugh ghhagh anite ngughk _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ ayvigtegh m _ k e l u t a n g a n i l n g u u t _ .
N a y g h a n n a q _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ naayghagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
U v i t a n g a n i _ tawani _ kii _ , _ u n g l e g h u m a g h l l a a k _ , _ tuqukagh lghute ghllag _ .
legan _ unglegh ma negh ke te ziin _ tawaten _ p a n e g h a a t k a q _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ qiighqagh _ maana _ tawaten _ u g l a g h q a k a l g h i i m u n _ quyngigh mun _ atughqagh u nghite uq _ , _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ .
U k s u u m _ negh kanga _ piyaqnagh pigte lghii _ .
Q a l t e m e n g _ , _ aqsaqugh mig itgun _ pi yagh ke put _ , _ uyghag m _ q a l t e n g a n e n g _ , _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ amenam _ .
uyghag m _ q a l t e n g a n e n g _ a q s a q u g h h m i k e l g h i i t _ , _ seghleghu lghiit _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ .
quyngigh m _ atuqe llegh a
I m e g y u u t e m _ apegh llegh a
quyngigh t _ qamagte luteng _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
sugupag i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ , _ s i g u t a n g i _ , _ s i g h u n g h a n _ m e l q w i _ , _ itegagh i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ n e g h u g h a q i i t _ .
A q s a q g h w i _ p i w h a n i y u k a g h p e n a k i _ ukifkagh yukagh gpenaki _ .
taakut _ q a a y n g a n i l n g u u t _ aqsaqugh m _ taakut _ tunu t _ pugughyi u ut _ .
I i k n g w a a g h l u k i _ aqsaqugh t _ , _ wetku _ iike luki _ t e s q a m k u t _ imigh a _ i l a k e l l i l u k i _ , _ aqsaqugh mete luki _ tawani _ q u w i i s i g h l u t e n g _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
aqsaqugh m _ n a t a n g a n i _ alamke t _ , _ u g h v u g h w a a g h l u k i _ neghe kayug t _ , _ vegllugte yug nigh t _ tamaakut _ , _ aqsaqugh t llu _ u g h v u g h w a a g h l u k i _ neghe kayug t _ .
kevighqagh i _ taakut _ n a a n l e n g u u t _ , _ ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ imigh luki _ k e v i n g l l a q a y u w i i t _ .
ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ uulte magh ita _ imigh kayug t _ .
qellu i _ tamaakut _ ama _ uulte magh ita _ , _ tunughtuqagh t _ .
whangkuta _ negh igate aput _ iiskag i llu _ , _ tengug i llu _ .
ila ita _ negh aqe ait _ .
Q i l e g y i g h l l a g i _ taakut _ , _ qilu i _ uzimun _ pikayug t _ , _ i k u g h w a a g h l u k i _ q a n l a g i g h w a a g h l u k i _ tunu ghllag t _ angqaperugtu te _ tawaten _ .
amalleqa _ qamagte luku _ yugusigh anite ngughk _ taana _ neghe kayugu uq _ .
amu i _ uksaagh nghagu _ m e l q u g h t u g h n e g h a t a _ allighaghqagh ughte aqe ut _ .
upenghagh mi _ m e l q u g h l l u u g t e g h l l a g a q i i _ makugte negh meggni _ .
amiiragh i _ u g m e l e n g e s t a g h h a a t _ m e l q e g h q e l e n g e s t a a g h h a a t _ asiighqagh u luki _ saghna kaqe kangit _ .
taakwani _ nani _ J u l y - m i _ aate te kaghqagh ughte aqe uq _ .
katamngwaagh _ melqughtu langi _ lliigh aqe ut _ pi nigh ghllag t _ aange lghii u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ legan _ m e l q e g h q e l l i i g h a g h a q e g k a n g i _ .
ighni ste i _ april- mi _ piinligh aqe ut _ kiyang _ , _ yug inagh meng _ .
kipullegte i stekete te luteng _ o n e _ w e e k - e k a g h t a a n _ .
ivgagh mete luta _ nutaan _ maana _ quyngigh _ atghagh luni _ ellmi neng _ tamaani _ ighnegh iightugh aqe uq _ uvite kaghagh mnni llu _ .
taklaghte luta _ esghapag aqe aput _ tawaten _ esghapagkagh mtestun _ legan _ , _ nughagh at _ kinegh naqe te inagh _ aga _ igleghte aqe ut _ .
umegnegh u luku _ tiinta lug teng _ nayugh i aqe ut _ .
