M e k e n e g h s i m _ apegh llegh a
esgha _ taakut _ iike ta t _ tesakmaken _ .
Q u n a g h h a q _ mekelghiigh pigu luku _ i i k u t a a m a k a t _ .
qafsineg ii ta ani _ qavagh m _ u n u g m i _ tawani _ , _ ii _ , _ ayngelite ghllag mun _ kaat ute ma kagh nge i _ , _ eflugh te luki _ elngaatall _ maaqe ghllag _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangit _ ( _ entaqun _ liisimake kanga _ ) _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ navek _ lliigh te aqe inkut _ , _ N u n a a g a g n u n _ a k l i i t a q e n g h i t i n k u u t _ .
sangami _ ayngelite ghllag _ uukna _ allgegh a _ . _ â _ N u n a a g a k _ n e g h i g h h a a n e n g _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ .

tawaten _ a g Ê¼ g h i n g u u l l u t e n g _ ataasiighte luteng _ ( _ uusqagh pigte lghii _ amenqun _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ ) _ .
ayngelite ghllag k _ .
eflugh te nga llegh ghllag mun _ amu isigh negh meggni _ a a n Ê¼ n g a l l g h w a a q e l g h i i k _ .
ayngelite u na iqe ait _ , _ tuvagh m _ whaten _ maaqellegh m _ eflugh te ghllag m _ t a k l a g h r u k g i g h l l a g l u t e n g _ naqam _ vuuslegh i _ uusqagh ghllag t _ .
N u n a a g a g n i _ taakwani _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ .
entami qun _ ataasiighte pagte luteng _ ataasigh _ ayag ma kangat _ .
uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ sa ngugh ghllag k _ test- pig ka _ mamlegute uk _ . _ â
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ taawa _ N u n a a g a k _ ! _ N e g h i g h h a a n e n g _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ . _ â
tawaten _ uyiighagh teng _ , _ entaqun _ esgha _ uyiighagh leg perewaagh t _ , _ uyiighagh ni _ saagllug qu _ tawaten _ uyiighagh kun _ taaggun _ mayugh uute ut _ .
K i n g u l i g h p i g a g h n g u q _ iiwen _ nuyilegh u te kestagh aqe a _ sayug aghte aat _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ m u g h a a y a g h l l a a k _ , _ qivallug ghllag _ , _ m u g h a a y a g h l l a k _ .
naqam _ test- pig ka _ e n l e g a _ aligh ite ngughk _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ taawa _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ uugte ukut _ . _ â _ N u n a a g a k _ n e g h i g h h a a n e n g _ n a n g l e g t a g h n i i q a g k e t _ .
â _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ kaate ukut _ .
whaken _ igleghte naanghite ukut _ , _ tazingavek _ aglagh luta _ N u n a a g a g n u n _ qavangsi naqe ukut _ elngaatall _ egtug yug gpenaamta _ . _ â _ ( _ aatkagh kegte pigte lghiit _ entaqun _ neghigh luku _ . _ )
â _ unaami _ wetku _ aghtekan _ mingle anun _ taglagh lleqe ukut _ . _ â
taawa _ aghte neghsigh ma kangat _ .
llaaghanam _ a g h s a q m i n i g u _ , _ N u n a a g a k _ .
taawa _ mingle anun _ pagavek _ , _ q i v a l l u g l l a a k _ , _ t u u m l l u g l l a k _ , _ elngaatall _ igleghtekagh t _ .
aghneq _ naten _ lliigh magh an _ entaqun _ tapghagh ghhagh kun _ taakwagun _ qutenge ma lghiit _ .
siivanllegh ita _ apaate ma kangit _ u k a t m u n _ .
kukuleg mun _ u w a v e k _ kaate naqe sqe ai _ .
I i w e n Ê¼ n g u q _ mamleg a qaa _ kukuleg mun _ kaat quute ut _ , _ kukuleg nguq _ p a a g h q i i n n e g h h a q a n i i m a l g h i i _ tamaani _ .
nenge lunga _ kiyaghute lghii _ salin _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ elngaatall _ t e g h h u m a s a q u m e n g _ n a g h u g h e s n a g h t e s n a y a n g h i t i i s i _ , _ maani _ qavagh naqe ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ nenglu itnun _ itegh gpenasi _ . _ â

tamaani _ ighulugh meng _ ivagh i luteng _ mangteghasqwaagh ngllagh ut _ .
legan _ nanevgagh m _ apeghtugh ai _ , _ â _ kinku nun _ t a a k u n u n _ n a v g h a g h y a g h a q l u s i i _ legan _ unguva pigte lghii stun _ pi tek _ .
kinku t _ navghagh vike aqe luki _ sa meng _ tanpegh meng _ ighulugh meng _ tamaaken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ legan _ tawaten _ navghagh aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ azigutagh _ taaqe luku _ qavagh ut _ .
naagu nguq _ s a q r a g g a q _ llaaghanwha _ , _ wetku nguq _ unaami _ aghtaghagh naqe llegh mi _ , _ qaga nguq _ aghqiiw _ , _ q i i l l a g h q u _ .
nanevgagh m _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ upugha te aisi _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ n a v g h a g h h a s i _ tamaakut _ yug itnun _ veghute qugh nakesi _ .
maaken _ igleghte lleqe ukut _ . _ â
apeghiigh luteng _ i g l e g h n a q n g a m e n g _ whaten _ t u u m l l u g l l a g m i _ imani _ , _ whaten _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ igleghte ma ite ngugh t _ .
S a k i g h m e n g u q _ kangighagh anun _ pikavek _ taglagh kau ut _ .
E n t a q u n Ê¼ n g u q _ a l i n g y u w a a g h u t n g u k a a l g h i i t _ qamagte luteng _ .
tawaten _ taagken _ taglagh kau ut _ s a k i g h m e n g _ , _ pikavek _ kangighagh anun _ kukuleg m _ .
kangighagh u negh nge uq _ wetku _ ukavek _ igiigh yameng _ naallghute ut _ .
Q u n a g h h a q _ una _ atallug nkut _ ata at _ , _ Q e r n g u g h t e k a a m _ u g w i k s a q a n g a _ , _ atallug nkuk _ , _ W a a l l a n k u t _ ata ak _ , _ Q u n a g h h a q _ taana _ .
E n k a a n g a m n g u q _ n a n g y a g h t a g h q w a a g h l l a k a q _ , _ a n u s i m i g h t e m _ mekelghiigh pigu luni _ , _ i i k u t a a m a k a q _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe aat _ .
ila i _ iike ta t
taakut _ ila i _ ungipamsug m _ nunanigh ut _ , _ puygu kanigh luki _ iwernga _ ungipamsug ke naqe anka _ .
uksaagh ghhagh u negh nge uq _ iike tke aat _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh yayek _ .
N a p a z i g e n k u t _ , _ M e s u u r u n k u t _ , _ Q e t i i n a n k u t _ , _ kinku t _ , _ iike tke aat _ .
uksughtekagh t _ iitek _ B e r i n g _ S e a - m i _ esgha _ .
uksughte ma lghiit _ navek _ taakwavek _ .
T a w a t e n n i i q s a g h i i n Ê¼ n g u q _ t a a k w a g u n g i i g h h a g h n g u q _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ kiyang _ uteghnigh igate ut _ .
sivuqagh mi _ iike te neghtuqagh t _ .
naqamalla nguq _ awavagh qu te _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ entaqun _ maaqnegh m nguq _ aygugh mun _ ukavek _ ivgagh te aqe kangi _ .
aamta _ t a a k w a g u n g i i g h h a g h n g u q _ pi nghminiki _ entaqun _ i k e v r e g h a a m _ aghvigh te meng _ pi aqe kangi _ .
T a w a t e t k a n Ê¼ n g u q _ uksughtekagh t _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ maaqnegh m _ sukate pigte luki _ aygugh te aqe yagh kangi _ .
naayghagh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ aliigh aqe yagh lghii _ , _ ima nguq _ aygugh u aghte nghaani _ iivagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ aghneghtuumaan _ qiighqagh _ maana _ ila kepagningite te aat _ .
A y v i k a a t n g i n a g h h a g h n g u q _ taana _ talughte neghlliqe yagh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ tagtalmi _ aviighute uq _ temngi _ meraaghinagh ghllag mun _ lliigh ut _ .
S i k u v a g l l a g e n Ê¼ n g u q _ nekagh ughte ait _ , _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nalighnegh i _ ne ngllagh luki _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ tuvagh u te aqe kangi _ .
M u g h u t a q e l g h i i n Ê¼ n g u q _ tamaani _ .
P i y u w h a a g h h i i n a g h m u n Ê¼ n g u q _ taana _ sakniqe tkesagh aat _ megh _ , _ megh ite ngugh t _ .
ayveghagh luteng _ wallu _ maklagte luteng _ , _ qilu aneng _ entaqun _ ighneghllug ngllagh luteng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ kiigh akun _ whaten _ q e n l e g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ pi ma lghiit _ .
anigu meng _ , _ peghqinegh pigu ma ut _ esgha _ t a a g n a p u t _ , _ esghaghhu _ anigu meng _ imigh luki _ yugusigh megteggun _ mengllagh yagute ut _ .
yugusigh m _ maatnegh an _ u g h u g t a q e g k a n g i _ .
taawa _ megh _ a k l u k n a n i g h a a t _ .
taana nguq _ e s t a m a a t _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute uq _ .
aghipa m _ s a a m _ entaqun _ enraq llu _ kanagh luni _ , _ asi gni _ uniigh yayek _ iilqayug luni _ tuqute ma lghii _ .
taakut _ pi nga yu t _ uksughtekagh t _ tawani _ .
M e s u u r u n k u t _ , _ N a p a z i n k u t _ , _ Q e t i i n a n k u t _ .
qete i i na qrug ngugh _ taana _ atugh kayugu ma a _ .
taana _ N a p a z i n a q _ alignagh lghii _ , _ ilagagh qagh yu k _ .
T u g h n e g h a a n Ê¼ n g u q _ megh m _ uusqagh llegh anun _ pi igate ma lghiit _ , _ megh mi _ kiyaghsigate ma lghiit _ .
T u g h n e g h i i g h u t n g w a a q a a g u t _ meghllag mun _ lliigh yameng _ .
A l a l a k a n g i n a g h h i i n a a g h t e k a a g u n Ê¼ n g u q _ .
A l a l a k a n g u f t u g h n g u q _ tughneghagh i _ mesungesag t _ .
T a a k u n g i n a g h a a g h s i m a l g h i i t _ megh m _ pi i _ .
T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ esla _ naafte luni _ milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ ilutughsagh te aqe luteng _ iknaqsuugte te aqe luteng _ kiyaghtekagh t _ .
milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ taana _ p i n g a y u g h t e k _ pi aqe ka ak _ , _ â _ qete i i na _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ , _ seghletun _ kiyaghte naqlaatagh ukut _ , _ averngu lta _ . _ â _ atugh ghpagte ste aqe ka ak _ p i n g a y u g h t e k _ taana _ .
ii _ , _ n e m e t a l g h i i s t u n _ llaaghanwha _ qesugniqe aqe lghiit _ avara te magh meng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ .
llaaghanwha _ milegtaagh lleghqagh eng _ o v e r c o m e - a a q e g k a n g a t _ .
taaqe negh meggni _ taana _ pi nga yu aat _ enraq _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ mesungesag inagh ghhagh t _ taakut _ tughneghagh i _ tagi aqe lghiit _ .
aamta _ ila a _ tughneghaan _ ivegh igate ma ut _ entaqun _ , _ aviighute uute tke aat _ .
uksugh ghllag _ avii tke aat _ , _ uksaagh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh llegh gkeneng _ .
entaqun _ may- mi _ ima _ wetku _ nani _ K a m s a a t k a m _ nalighnegh akun _ qutengekagh t _ .
tawaten _ apegh ait _ .
A k l u k n a n i g h a a n Ê¼ n g u q _ megh _ .
anigullugte luni _ lliigh yalghiimi _ taakut _ nayigh ita _ akeleghraagh a _ meghaagh nge luni _ , _ tamaaken _ meqekagh t _ .
esghaghhu qun _ repall _ ughug yan _ , _ taakut _ nayugh teng _ u y i i g h a g h m e g g n e n g _ asighte ma kangit _ entaqun _ u g l a f n a y u k a k i _ .
T u v a g h n a n i q a n g i _ t a a k u n g i n a g h h a a g h t u t _ , _ aqlagha igh u uute kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ qute _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
qute mun _ paga _ t u g h a a g h t u t _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ kii _ , _ tekeghagh ghllag _ ika _ .
tawavek _ tekeghagh ghllag mun _ itghute kanigh ai _ u k u m _ t u n g a n g a k u n _ .
tekeghagh ghllag _ taana _ t u g h w a a g h y a q m e g t e g g u _ kii _ , _ sugenregh igh ghllag luni _ .
H a a k _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ tawavek _ kaatute kumegteki _ whaa _ seghleghu naqe ut _ .
iitek _ whaten _ aklu i te kanigh luteng _ , _ qute m _ k e t f a g g a a k u n _ taakwavek _ a a n u u g h u t k a n i q a n g i _ .
taana _ p i n g a y u g h t e k _ pi laatagh ma ka ak _ , _ alignagh lleghtagh tek _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ ingavek _ atneghagh anun _ lliigh kumta _ sugenregh mun _ , _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ unite lleqe ainkut _ .
alignagh na iqe luten _ naten _ pi naqe i _ . _ â
amsanaghllugllak _ .
tawaten _ ilagagh luni _ A l a l a k a n i _ taakut _ aleghqugh qu ai _ naten _ kayute ngllaghkagh _ .
qateghllug ghllag mi nguq _ imani _ sikuvag ghllag t _ kelute mun _ qukfighute naagh aat _ elngaatall _ , _ tawavek _ kangighagh anun _ .
qute meng _ a w a v a q a a n l l u t e n g _ t e g h h a k u n _ tuute tke aat _ , _ aghqe itagh i tke aat _ , _ nalugutekagh neng _ a w a v a q a a n l l u t e n g _ .
iwernga _ i f q a l l a g h n g a a g h m e n g _ u u g l l e g h a a t k a t _ .
tanemlleqa _ i i w e n Ê¼ n g u q _ g h h a t a g h t e k e s t a g h a q i i _ qute mun _ taakwavek _ uugtekagh t _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ t a p g h a g h l l a a k _ sa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ , _ enkaam _ n a a n t u l e y e n g _ nalluke kangat _ .
T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ tungtu tgun _ ( _ b i g _ d i p p e r _ ) _ aygugh ut _ .
aghte nghaani _ s i q i n g h e m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ igleghte aqe luteng _ .
T a p g h a g h l l a g u f t u g h n g u q _ aygugh mun _ esne _ tawaten _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ t u m e s u g n i n g i i g h h a q _ avangite uq _ .
temngi qun _ aatakqun _ igleghte ut _ .
qafsina _ qavagh _ atugh magh an _ , _ wallu nguq _ tanqigh _ .
H i i k _ , _ i i m q a g h t a l l e g h s u g n i n g i i g h h a a t _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ esghagh ait _ .
tume u lleghqagh i _ n a l l u n e q n a g h l u t e n g _ temngi _ iime qaghte luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ iime qagh ta vleghagh _ tamaa na _ nula kestagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ seghleghhalek _ negh ke igh te naqe ut _ qute mun _ lliigh yalghiimeng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ nalluniigh te ut _ tumete yug ni u luteng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ kii _ , _ peghwaagh ghllag t _ k a a s a q m e g t e k i _ i q a l l u w a g h l l a k _ peghwaagh ghllag _ .
negh ut _ elngaatall _ .
negh luteng _ , _ angyagh u aatagh luteng _ taawa _ igleghte ut _ .
aygugh lqinagh luteng _ peghwaagh t _ kaate nghmegteki _ taawa _ i q a l u w a a w a q e l g h i i t _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ tekeghagh _ q e m i g h y u k _ inga _ aliigh aat _ , _ iiwen _ q e m i g h y u g m e n g _ taagken _ mayugh aqe ut _ , _ amaken _ yug m llu _ atunem _ .
atunem _ aliigh te ut _ .
kii _ , _ piyaqmegteggu _ yuug _ tusaqepagningite aat _ , _ ulu _ alla _ .
seghleghhalek _ t u s a q u n n e g h i t e m _ enraq _ seghleghu naqe ut _ , _ l i i g i k u n n e g h i t e m _ .
qete i i na _ taana _ , _ esgha _ sa u a _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h l l a g e m _ a p e g h i i g h w a a g h l u k u _ ayuqe nghminigu _ , _ mekelghiigh u luni _ nukalpigagh pigu luni _ k i d n a p - e k a a m a l g h i i _ .
tespamna _ quteghllag _ n e g h i g h h a a n e n g _ y u w a _ amyuqetagh na iqe aat _ .
K i d n a p - e g h i k a y u g u n i i q a a t _ qiighqagh m _ m a t u m _ anglinghhagh aneng _ , _ aghnaghagh aneng _ , _ nukalpigagh aneng _ metngeghute i kayug _ .
taana _ qete i i na _ metngeghute kau ma yagh lghii _ .
tawaten _ enraq llu _ esgha _ tuune aqe luki _ , _ tuune aqe luki _ tawaten _ pi ma aqe ait _ .
A s a a g g a a n k u t _ maakut _ u n g i p a q a g e g k a n g i t _ tawaten _ pi kau ni luki _ .
taana _ Q e t i i n a q r u k _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghii _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike kau ma yagh lghii _ .
quyilleg ni _ qepghagh luni _ , _ qepghagh luni _ aghyuqe yami _ metngeqagh qrug u uq _ .
uteghnigh kau ma lghii _ naqam _ .
nukalpigagh k _ maalghug u lutek _ yug m _ q e p g h a g h t e k e g k a k e k _ quyilleg m _ .
Q i t e f k a y u u g t e q r u g u m a a _ esghaghhu _ .
seghleghhalek _ aag llegh gkenka _ p i l a a t a g h a a k _ , _ â _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ yug lgute mun _ k a a t n g w a a g h l u t a _ t u s a q u n n e g h i t e m _ seghletun _ pi naqe ukut _ , _ aatak _ qiteve te naqe gu _ ! _ â
Q e t i i n a q r u g e m _ q i t e v u s a q m i n i g u _ , _ ii _ iingken _ a k i s a q m i n i g u _ nutem _ n a g a t e l l g h i s t u n _ tawatengwaaq _ akuzillegh a _ ayuqe luni _ .
ii _ , _ napaghpagtagh te lutek _ aga _ payegh te uk _ .
ii _ , _ kaat ute te lutek _ q e t l e g h u t u g n g u q _ , _ elngaatall _ .
piyaqminigu _ taana _ q e p g h a l g u t n i _ neghigh luku _ mekelghiigh _ whaa _ nallagh utu te aqe uk _ .
tawaten _ aleghquute lutek _ pi ma kangi _ , _ ama _ negh ghllag _ t a a m a n n i l u k u _ , _ â _ keleg qaghte te yaghtugh naqe amsi _ .
T a a m u m _ ne m _ upugha te i llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ yug m _ kaate lghii m _ u u m _ pana teng _ u u t q i g h l l u k i _ elpesi nun _ nengug te aatagh lleqe ait _ .
tugu manginagh nakesi _ , _ tugu manginagh nakesi _ .
tuqute naanghite aisi _ , _ upugha te i llegh it _ tawatete ut _ . _ â
taawa _ aga _ aglagh uq _ llaaghanwha _ .
M a a t e q w a a q u n Ê¼ n g u q _ llaaghanam _ kii _ , _ yuug _ inwa nguq _ palaghhagh _ kaat quute uq _ .
llaaghanam nguq _ kaate lghii m _ u u m _ pana teng _ u u t q i g h l l u k i _ , _ taawa _ tugu ma inagh ke ait _ .
taake uk _ N a p a z u g e n k u k _ M e s u u r u n k u k _ ne m _ t a m a a t u m _ umiileg an _ aqelqagh ke ma kek _ .
taana _ Q e t i i n a q r u k _ t a a m _ aqelqagh ke ma kanga _ qepghagh lgutkekagh an _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ , _ Q e t i i n a n k u k _ taana llu _ .
P a n i n a n g u q _ ne m _ t a m a a t u m _ ulu a _ alla u uq _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ kiyaghte ut _ .
T a a m _ N a p a z u g e m _ , _ nuyekligh ke ma atgu _ ungipaate sqe ma kanga _ Q e t i i n a m u n _ , _ â _ I k i i f s i n Ê¼ n g u q _ ne mnni _ samani _ sivuqagh ghhagh mi _ tawaten _ u n i i l i q e g h l l a g l u t a _ qutengeqaghte negh mta _ taghyugh igh aqe yagh ukut _ !
a tuq _ sa u a _ p i n i g h y u u k _ a t u q a q s a g h a g h p u t _ . _ â
ii _ , _ umiileg m _ piyaqminiki _ , _ umiileg an _ nuna m _ t a a m _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ legan _ pi aqe llegh gpesistun _ pi tek _ . _ â _ taawa _ taana _ Q e t i i n a q r u k _ a t u g h t e k l a a t a a m a k a n g a t _ .
elngaatall nguq _ qesugniqe stekaqe a _ negh ghllag _ taana _ e l l n g i n a g h a g h m i _ .
taana _ entaqun _ N a p a z i n a q _ ilagagh luni _ , _ qaywalleqa nguq _ tughneghaghtu pigte ma a _ qute mun _ uugte yalghiimi _ .
T a a k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ A l a l a k a n g i _ a g h s a g h p a a g t e k a a g u t _ .
ghhute itgun _ , _ melghutagh itgun _ p u u g p a g h q u m _ yuug _ q i m a a g l l u k u _ .
tawatete kau ut _ .
maalghug gneng _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh k _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
ataasigh inagh u yaghqaa yagh lghii nguq _ naligh t _ , _ wallu _ qete i i na _ nelliqe luni _ sa luni _ taagken _ anaggute luni _ taake ughtagh aqe aat _ .
iike te llegh meggneng _ estamat ii te kun _ wetku _ , _ e s t a m a a n i _ ayumiqullegh m _ ungazigh mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .
E s t a m a a n i n g u q _ ayumiqullegh m _ wetku _ sivuqagh mun _ uteghnigh kau ut _ taakut _ .
taawa _ igleghte mafte ut _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe ait _ .
taawa _ k e n l e p g h i l l a a t a g h t u q _ .
aghnaghagh u lleg mneng _ neqamike llegh ka
N u u g h n a a m _ apegh llegh a
S i v u k e g h p i g a g h l u n g a _ liisagh lghiinga _ A n a s u g e n k u t _ pamani _ guygu ita _ kelu kaghagh itni _ mangteghapig mi _ , _ tawani _ liite unga _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ entaqun _ nuug ukut _ tespagavek _ , _ sa meng _ n u u g g u t f u t _ apallugh a _ nalluke aqa _ .
nekeve te _ , _ whanga _ , _ aqume igate ngughk _ , _ M i k l a g h h a q _ .
enkaam _ P a a z a g e m _ a n g l e g u t a n g i _ taakut _ I q m a l u w a _ , _ T u p a a n g a _ , _ a qaa _ , _ A g e z a _ .
whanga _ ategh ka _ A g e z a n g u n i i q a a t _ , _ u y u q l i g h p i g a q _ .
I q m a l u w a m _ t a a m _ M i k a g h a q _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
taana _ A g h n a g h a g h p a k _ u g w i n g i i s a n _ , _ entaqun _ qilleghte uute te m _ ata an _ n u l i g h q e s a q a n g a _ K i n g u w a a g h h a a m _ .
P e l e g h q e s a t a _ enkaam _ tugu te ste qugh luki _ tawavek _ lli aqe aq _ .
taakut _ ama _ atalgute ke te lghiit _ A n g q a t e n g a n w a t e n k u t _ , _ Q a a l u n k u t _ .
taakut _ P e l a a s i n k u t l u _ , _ U w e t e l e n k u t _ ila ke te ut _ .
ila ke te luta _ whangkuta _ ayuqe ukut _ .
taakut _ qayuutagh m _ ila ke ai _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ P e l a a s i _ apakagh ut _ imani _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ n e v n g a m _ entaqun _ atiiqe te aqe luteng _ .
saama _ entaqun _ ilaliigh te aqe lghiit _ tawaten _ neghe lgutke te luteng _ lliigh negh meggni _ .
tawaten qun _ liite lleg mni _ nagate aqe anka _ .
naange aat _ taana _ A t e k a n g u u q _ , _ T a n g a t u n k u t _ taakut _ entaqun _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ U w e t e l e n k u t _ .
U w e t e l e m _ nulighh a _ W a m i i y a q _ .
taana _ W i y a _ , _ aymaramket _ aghnaa t _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taana _ u g w i g h p i g a n i _ tuqu yan _ taagken _ I y e n g q i g h m e n g _ u g w i i q a q _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ taakut _ P a a n g a n k u k _ uziva nkuk _ , _ aghnagh t qun _ ataasigh t _ anglegute ke te pestaagh t _ , _ tume _ ataasigh _ , _ aanvig _ ataasigh _ , _ allameng _ a t a k a q s a g h n g a a g h n g a a t a _ .
P a a n g Ê¼ g h e t
whangkuta qun _ p a m a n l l i i m t a _ , _ asag ghllag mta _ t a a m _ , _ N a g h u q a n g u f t u q _ taana _ p a m a n l l i i m t a _ k i n g u n g h a t _ , _ elngaatall _ sungagh meng _ atghagh te aqe kanginkut _ tangyeghute meng _ , _ qupag meng _ .
elngaatall nguq _ tamaa na _ pi tke pigte aat _ megnu nagh lghii _ .
entaqun _ sivunegh put _ t e s p a m k e n _ pi u ut _ .
esgha qun llu _ ukut _ W a l a n g a n k u t _ , _ ila put _ whangkuta _ .
nallukngwaagh yalghiikut _ whangkuta _ , _ ellnga n _ U u k e t a m _ ungipamsug te kaqe ainkut _ .
liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ quunpeng _ pangeghte a _ .
tagitug mi _ qevuute luteng _ tawaten _ amsanaghllug ghllag mi _ suqsugh t _ uka _ aliigh aqe lghiit _ .
sakmani _ n a g h a a n e g h t u q a k u t _ aatnegh mi _ .
taagken _ emta _ tawaten _ tagitugllug _ , _ I q m a l u w a n k u k _ , _ A y a k i n k u k _ , _ aatnegh kun _ iggasighte lutek _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ , _ naghaagh te aqe lghiikut _ aatnegh m _ asi ani _ taakwani _ .
sangamta _ tawaten _ pi llegh ut _ nalluke kegka _ .
qaasqagh mi _ ama _ pinegh mta _ aghillug m _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ .
uuk _ mate- yaag yu ngiighhagh _ ama _ taana _ quunpeng _ q a a s q a m e n n e g h t u q a q _ .
L i i t n g w a a g h l u t a _ pi yalghiikut _ e s g h a p a l u u g u s i q _ taghnughhagh nun _ , _ nanugh t _ naken _ ikegken llu _ , _ kiiwhken llu _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
tawaten _ emta _ upenghagh mi _ kii _ uka _ s u q s u g h a l i i g h l l a k _ , _ nutem _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tagi laghate te k _ . _ â _ T a w a t e l n g u u t _ a r a q r u w a q e l g h i i t _ kaate yaghtugh negh meggni _ .
â _ aa _ , _ m i l u g h m i g t e k u u t _ , _ t a g h n e g h i i g h t e k u u t _ . _ â _ P i q r u w a q e l g h i i t _ ungazighmii t _ .
upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ kaate kayugu ut _ akilpegagh niigh ghllaget _ .
entaqun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ tespamani _ aklungi igh lleghtu ghngaaghmeng _ .
ila i qun _ wenigh a _ saaputagh ite aqe ut _ talwa _ qalleg vag qiinagh luteng _ , _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ q a l i p a a g g a g h m e n g _ .
yug t _ tamaakut _ saatghwaagh qiinagh luteng _ akilpegagh na i aaghet _ .
qevuute luteng _ aki kegte ghllaget _ .
qallukagh at _ s a n a g h t e n g n g w a a q a t _ k a v i g h t e n g n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ .
sungagh _ , _ ugtinghagh _ , _ qikmiiraagh _ k a v i g h t e n g n g w a a q a q _ , _ sa u a _ legan _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ aki kaghqagh _ .
qayugh leg nun _ , _ sa meng _ maaken _ e s t u w a a m _ pi anun _ aki it _ .
qiipaghagh put _ maakut _ w h a t e l n g u u t _ ugpeqagh meng _ atigh luki _ aghnagh ita _ .
ugpeqagh ghhagh leg nun llu _ aki it _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ akequsagh leg ni _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ puughte aqe kanginkut _ entaqun _ .
nalleqligh ke na iqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ taagani _ ila teng _ .
S i v u l i i g h a m t a _ ila ke te lghiit _ nalleqligh u lghiit _ ellngit ni _ .
nalleqligh mta nguq _ p i i q e g k a n g i n k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ tamaakut _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh si _ k e l e n g a k l u k i i _ kalngagmig lleqe aput _ . _ â _ puughte luta _ entaqun _ .
kalngagmig na yu kanginkut _ whangkuta _ i t e g h a a t a q e l g h i i k u t _ .
urang _ aki kegte pigte ut _ .
liite lleg mni _ taake uk _ U u g h q a g h t a a n k u k _ kinku k _ aklungite na iqe agket _ tespamani _ .
uughqaghte a qun _ taana _ kaate nghmini _ nulighh a _ qiipaghagh ghllag _ quunpeng _ .
enraq _ entaqun _ tawaten qun _ ila i _ n a k m i n Ê¼ g h h i i n a q a y u g e t _ .
iwernga _ sivuqagh meng _ sa u a _ allgegh qugh luku _ taglagh aqe lghiit _ tespamavek _ .
taake uk llu _ Q a a l l n a a n k u k _ pamapi kayugu yagh uk _ A g h y a g a a n k u k _ , _ arekull _ t e s p a m a n t e f t u t _ taakut _ A m a g u n k u t _ .

aqelqaghni ii aagh _ , _ upugha te i llegh
aqelqaghniigh ta leg _ tamaani _ .
liisagh lghiikut _ qellinegh _ esgha _ teskana _ igaghvig ghllag m _ n a t u m _ neliite tke a _ .
uyghag ghrugllag t _ taawa _ angqaperug kegtagh leg t _ pi nga yu t _ , _ mekestaaghhagh _ ataasigh _ , _ amalleqa _ taana _ aqelqaghniigh sagh it _ .
aqfaqugh vig leg ghllag u yaghpete uq _ taawa _ .
taana _ Q e l l i n g h u f t u q _ ategh a _ , _ q e r n g u g h v i k _ .
aqfaqugh te ghllag t _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ iitek _ liite aqa _ , _ esghapag kaqe anka _ legan _ ategh aqe luteng _ aga _ .
pekagh lghii _ entaqun _ una _ aqume magh mi _ , _ ila a _ ategh aqe luni _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ pekagh igate ngugh t _ y u g i q e n g n i i q i i t _ naqam _ .
enkaam _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ Q e l l i n g h e m _ qukaa ni _ tughumgha te ghllag aqe ut _ .
esghapag na pigte uq _ , _ iinghusaleg _ emta _ .
esghapag lqinagh naqe negh mta _ tunuvagh uute sqe aqe kanginkut _ .
â _ naghaagh kestagh tek _ ulape naanghite usi _ aghnaghagh ni _ . _ â _ naqam _ mekelghiigh t _ esghapag aqe ut _ .
ima wha _ wiin _ e s g h a p a g y u g h n g a a m t a _ tunuvagh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ esghapag aqe ukut _ .
liisagh lghiinga qun _ whanga _ , _ yug t _ taakut _ kinku t _ entaqun _ aagken _ naken _ kilgaaqu aqe aat _ s a m a w u n _ naayghagh m _ mingle akun _ kaspugte luku _ .
entaqun _ tawatete aqe yagh ut _ .
aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ k a l l e g h t e g h l l a n e g h m e g g n i _ p i n g a y u g h q e l l u t e n g _ .
aki yan _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ u w a t a n g a n _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ ne m _ t u n u t a n g a n i _ .
seghlegh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
whaa _ entaqun _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ tawaten _ , _ enraq _ atugh aqe lghiit _ t e s k a n a n i _ sulug nkut ni _ .
amenqun _ taakut _ atughte ghllagu na iqe yagh kangit _ .
iitek _ angukagh put _ .
M i k l a g h h a a m _ , _ sulug nkut _ nayag at _ tugukagh a _ , _ naa mta _ ata an _ , _ ategh a _ iknaqe negh _ .
kii _ , _ e n r a g h n g a m _ whangkuta _ asag mta _ t a a m _ S i n g l e n g a m _ , _ i g h l e k u m t a a g h l l a g i n k u t _ atugh nun _ kanavek _ panrengi naqe negh mta _ .
ellnga _ qayughllak _ l e g r e n g i g a t u q _ .
naqam _ taana _ panig a _ pugughileghmii u lghii _ , _ asag ke te lghiik _ atghagh aqe lghiik _ A n a s u g e n k u k _ .
kana _ elngaatall _ q e l p e g h q e n n i i q e g k a n g a t _ saye at _ una _ q e l p e g h q e l l u k u n g u q _ .
iglag it qun _ w h a a n t a l g h i i s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ .
atugh ghllag t _ tawaten _ .
sa sqe qaghte aqe linkut _ ipa _ meghtigh sqe ainkut _ , _ kayusiite sqe uq _ , _ taghnughhiqe te sqe uq _ , _ legre na yukagh mta _ .
naqam _ tazingkut _ yug ngertagh ghhagh t _ panig it _ atghagh uute kayug t _ .
pi aqe kanginkut _ whangkuta _ S i n g l e n g a m _ , _ â _ pagaliit _ atigh igate ut _ , _ aghula igate ut _ . _ â _ whangkuta _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh nghata _ tawaten _ atugh ghllag nghmeng _ , _ tumighqaate naqe negh meggni _ , _ taglagh uute naqe negh meggni _ , _ tumighqaate naqe na iqe ut _ .
P u y g i i m a g h m e n g _ ila i _ waame te aqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ amsanagh ghhagh u luku _ taglagh uute na luteng _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ maaten _ esgha _ , _ neve ste uute ghllag luta _ entaqun _ imaken _ ima _ ayuqe lghiikut _ whaa _ .
taagken _ enraq _ tumighqaate nghata _ pellagh nagh ni _ ama _ .
tawaten _ kingu itneng _ atugh ghllag qagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ esla llu _ naafte nghaani _ .
T e s k a n a n i l l u _ tawaten _ aneghte aghte aqe ut _ ilangani _ .
U z i v l e g h u l l u t e n g _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ tughumgha te aqe luteng _ , _ temngi _ aqelqagh ite ghngaaghmeng _ .
awiim _ ulape sigh ke kangit _ .
taana llu _ sivuqagh _ k a s p u g a g h t a q l u k u _ k i l g a a q u m e n g _ .
nalluke aqa _ whanga _ apegh luku _ pi aqe aat _ .
whanga _ apegh yug igate aqa _ sa na yu kangatnga _ .
apa ut llu _ taana _ k i l g a a q u k a y u g g a a n i i q s a g h a a t _ .
taana _ angag ke na iqe lghii _ naten _ nalluke aqa _ , _ awiim _ neve sqe te te m _ p i l q e g k a n g a _ .
angag ke na iqe lghii _ S u n a a g h r u k _ taana _ ama _ .
iknaqe llegh ke aqe kanga _ sivuqagh m _ , _ iknaqe uq _ .
mekelghiigh t _ enkaam _ entaqun _ amalka qun _ , _ amenqun _ whaa _ laluramke t _ esgha _ qimugte naqe aqe kangit _ .
T e a c h e r - k e f t a a t _ amalka _ .
K i l g a a q u m u n _ , _ t e s k a n a n i _ a q f a q u m u n _ .
I k n a q e l q a a n i i q a a t _ .
tamaakut _ Y a g h a a n k u t _ kilgaaqu ste u na iqe yagh ait _ , _ aantagh mii m llu _ ata a _ Q a a l u _ .
qepe qaghtugh usigh luteng _ kilgaaqu kayug t _ tamaakut _ .
qepe qagh uute kek _ taake uk _ aqume igate ngugh mete uk _ Q a a l u m _ .
qiinghigh mangite agka _ sa u te kek _ .
salem- perewaagh _ entaqun _ tamaghhagh mi _ sa llegh _ .
nanughaghtagh leg t _ tamaakut _ iknaqughi ghllagkagh t _ .
nanughaghtagh luteng _ aatkagh it _ tunugh ke isigh luteng _ q u l l i g i t _ , _ temkagh it _ , _ iknaqe lghiit _ , _ sukate ngugh t _ .
I i r g u g h l l a k l u _ una _ tunuqite lgu luku _ angukagh ka _ whanga _ .
temngi _ yuug _ k i y a g h t a a g h y a g h q a a n g h i s a g h p e t u q _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ nukalpigagh _ yugughtekagh _ , _ nukalpigagh _ maana _ anglinghhagh _ .
whaa _ whangkutestun _ entaqun _ yugtu tekagh liqe aq _ sa meng _ i k f i q l i i g h l l e g h h i i _ aga _ kayusigh magh an _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .
tawatete yaghpete ut _ kayusigh i ghllagu yaghpete ut _ .
kinku t _ ukut _ keveg iitagh u lghiit _ aga _ meghtagh uute ait _ .
whangkuta qun _ Q i p e n g a m _ quunpeng _ meghtagh uute aqe ainkut _ .
aga _ kinku t _ esghagh aqe ait _ , _ â _ U u - h u u k _ , _ qetgegh teki _ piyaqleg iigh uq _ . _ â _ aga _ qetgegh luki _ wayagh luki _ tugu aqe luki _ .
esghapag inagh yaghqaa nghite yaghpete ut _ .
taawa _ upleg luki _ tugumiigh it _ tugu aqe luki _ .
uksugh mi _ whaten _ umegnegh mi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ n e n g a a n g i t e g h n g a a t a _ anigu m _ pi nghaki _ p e k e t u t a q l u k i _ .
nengaa ita _ q e p g h a a t k a y u g w i i t _ .
maaten _ a l l a n g u g h t e m _ talwa _ kayusigh i na niite ut _ .
aghnagh ghhaat _ , _ aghnagh lqinagh u aghtekagh ghhagh t _ a a n t i t _ aga _ legan _ aghnaghagh nun _ qetgeghtugh luki _ aante i te ste aqe luki _ .
K a y u s i g h i p e r e w a a g h l l a g u y a g h t u t _ .
siivanllegh t _ tamaakut _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ yugpallaghte ghllagkagh t _ s i i v a n l l e g h u n i k a y u w i i t _ .

aghnagh t _ tamaakut _ ama _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ aghnagh nun _ ama _ a p e g h t u g h a m s u g e t _ .

puvalla
taakwani _ w h a n g k u n n i _ puvalla meng _ esghaate mangite unga _ angli u lunga _ .
avangite ukut _ sa ite ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ apa ghllag ut _ taana _ aghillug _ uksaagh te nghatni _ , _ isi _ k e v i i w a q e l g h i i _ quyngigh m _ kevigh kaqe kanga _ isigima _ .
L i i t n g w a a g h l u n g a _ pi yalghiinga _ aghveghwaagh ke uq _ aghvegh ngllaghkagh ghhagh _ .
sa u a _ wallu _ melqugh igh aq _ enraq _ liigike llghite aqa _ .
inglukutagh ke lghiikung _ whangkutung _ .
U u g h q a g h m i i n k u k _ aqume igate ngugh nkuk _ , _ nekeve te nkuk _ , _ T u u s a a n k u k _ , _ A g i g s u g e n k u k _ Q a g a q u n k u k _ , _ inglukutagh ke luta _ , _ whangkutung _ aghillug llu _ .
inglu ke neghtu aanga _ whanga _ .
P e g g n e m t e k i _ aga _ legan _ , _ akuqagh aqe ke put _ kaate nghata _ .
emta _ natete yaghqagh nun _ , _ ellnga qun _ taana _ whangkuta _ apa ut _ , _ whaa _ a y u m i q u l u k u _ , _ sa kan _ uksaagh kan _ ifla lleqe uq _ , _ taana _ legan _ igleghte aq _ , _ qukaghite nghmini _ s a l l i p g a g h t a q l u n i _ .
alingnagh igh ke ghrug ke aq _ nutem _ .
awiim _ ellngit a _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ .
sa meng _ puvalla raagh meng _ e s g h h a a s i m a n g i t u n g a _ whanga _ , _ tamaani _ liite aqngama _ w h a n g k u n n i _ .
aghqesaghtughtu ukut _ yeqay _ , _ A t a a y a g h h a q _ aghqesaghtughtu uq _ , _ taakwavek _ maaten _ h o u s i n g - e l i i t k a g h p e s i n u n _ .
T a a n Ê¼ g a n t u q _ naayvagh m _ esne ani _ wallu _ taakut _ anagh nge ainkut llu _ K e g y u u q e n k u t l u _ , _ naa n tuq _ taakwani _ akeleghraagh itni _ aghqesaghtugh vig _ .
talwa _ naaghte yameng _ k u m a g h t i s i q i g a l n g u q _ yuug _ .
saghna sqe aqe kanginkut _ taglagh negh mta _ , _ m a n g t a g g a a t _ upenghagh _ ima _ entaqun _ agaghtekagh t _ taakut _ k e l q e l l u k i _ .
â _ A w a l m i g g a g h m e n g _ saghna aqe tek _ , _ â _ pi aqe ainkut _ .
A w a l m i g g a g h m e n g _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ .
taakwani _ sa u aat _ masugkwaagh ghhagh t _ .
kaate negh mta _ esteg mineng _ nusug luku _ u y g h a g g a q _ qateghrakegtagh _ , _ aghnegh ghllag _ una _ awalmig _ peqagh ghhagh t _ lli luki _ a w a l m i g g a a t _ taakut _ .
qelanegh na ghllag _ k u m a g h t i n a q a _ .
taawa _ a a n g h u g h l l u t e n g _ taakut _ kumagh nghata _ supughragh nghminiki _ , _ qenwat _ kumagh aqe ut _ .
E n r a g h n g a m _ yuggagh m _ , _ whanga inagh u laatagh lghiinga _ sa kayug _ u g u m i n a g h n a g h q e g k a y u k _ ilangani _ .
aygughiketagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ taagani _ .
aghyuugh aqe kanganga _ sa meng _ qalleg aghtagh fqaama _ n a g a t n g w a a g h e s q e l l u n g a _ .
unegkut _ unguva lghiit _ eghqwaagh nghminiki _ P e l a a s i n k u t _ kinku t llu _ .
naqamllu _ sa u aat _ aviite aqe ut _ k e n g h e g n u n _ tawavek _ .
pi aqe kegka _ , _ â _ P e l a a s i _ kana _ k i y a g h t a a q e s t a g h n g a a g h m i _ q a a n g h a k u n _ . _ â
â _ aa _ , _ pi naqlaatagh uq _ una _ a g h n a g h a g h r u u p a k _ ! _ â _ A t a a y a g h h a q _ pi uq _ .
naqam _ kelgugh aqe kanginkut _ .
taghnughhagh perewaagh ni _ kelgugh luta _ aghqesagh uute aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ taakut _ aghqesaghtugh vig lgu ukut _ , _ naa n tuq _ ama _ taakwani _ tapeghagh m _ n a t a n g a n i _ .
teghigniqe te aqe ukut _ .
A g h v e n g e n g h a t a _ S a l q u m s i l l e q
whaa _ u p e n g h a n g h a n i _ tawaten _ u n Ê¼ g a _ aghvenge ni nghatki _ , _ naghaagh te ghngaamta _ elngaatall _ taglagh uute luta _ , _ uka _ k a a l g u n g h a a t a _ p i y u t q e r r a g k i i g h a q u k u t _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t llu _ , _ aghnaghagh t llu _ .
whangkuta _ aghnaghagh ni _ ughvughqe te luta _ taaqe luta _ t a q u g h t e n g n g w a a g h l u t a _ , _ samaken _ nanigh m _ asi aneng _ aallnegh meng _ qilag aput _ pi luki _ atghagh uute aqe ukut _ .
sangamta _ nalluke aqa _ nangaghnegh m _ almesiqe laatagh kanga _ .
taawa _ mangtagtu uute aqe ukut _ tesamani _ .
P i l a g e t _ atalughagh meng _ m i l u v i k a q e g k a n g i n k u t _ .
angyaleg t _ tamaakut _ esghapag na lleghpigagh at _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ angyilghagh ni _ .
kaankut _ u g w i m e n g _ aquutagh _ pi te lghii ii nigh itgun _ q a l t a a g h w r a g g a a t _ , _ a g h u l a k a l l g h u u n e g h m e g g n i _ esghapag na pigte ut _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ kenilegh m _ nalighnegh ani _ , _ angyaleg t _ kana _ angyagh mi _ , _ aghvenge lghiit _ taakut _ .
iwerngaqun _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ , _ q a l t a a g h w r a g g a g h m e n g _ nulighh it _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
K a t u m _ u g w i m e n g _ sa te lghii ii nagh u kete te _ qalta teng _ aghulate aqe luki _ .
tawatete laatagh lghiit _ entaqun _ .
taakut _ i v i g h t e n g i t _ manughagh kun _ aqume uute luteng _ .
uka _ llaag t _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ , _ taakut _ aghvegh leg t _ atigh aqe luki _ apallugh ke aqe luki _ ilagagh aqe lghiit _ .
ilagaate it _ nalluke anka _ liite mangite anka _ , _ naqam _ whanga llu _ aqume aqe lghiinga _ .
I v i g h u t e g h l l a g a q u t _ aghnagh perewaagh t _ , _ aghni ut llu _ entaqun _ naken _ u g w i i q a t _ tagi luteng _ aghvenge lghii nun _ u g w i t e n g _ sa teng _ a g h v e n g e n g h a t a _ .
taakut _ aymaramket pig t _ , _ aymaramket pigu na iqe anka _ yug squgh u ta ghhagh t _ taakut _ .
W i y a g h l l a w a a q e l g h i i _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh t _ panig it llu _ , _ whangkuta llu _ ila ke luta _ , _ iglakegte ghllag _ aghnagh _ ivi igh nghmini _ .
M a l i g t e v y i i q a g h a q a g h p u t _ iitek _ , _ tawaten _ angyaleg t _ atigh aqe luki _ .
I v i g h t e l e p e r e w a a l g e t _ entaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ .
iwerngaqun _ naangellegh itnun _ llaag t _ angaghqugh llegh it _ .
esgha _ siqlugagh lgu yaghpete ukut _ A p e t e k i n k u t _ kelu kaghagh itni _ llaag lghutagh lgu aq _ .
llaag lghutagh _ entaqun _ ilukligh u uq _ , _ ataasigh _ amig ke luku _ .
T a a k w a n t u t _ whangkuta _ siqlugagh put _ , _ taana _ ama _ neqelghutagh u na iqe a _ A n g q a t e n g a n w a t e m _ .
ellngit a nguq _ s i q l u w a q a g h a a t _ taana _ .
nuyekligh teng _ entaqun _ naasqugh ke luki _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
maaten _ qavngaq _ pi yaqegka _ K i n g u n g h a m _ k e l g u s a q m i n i g u _ , _ e n m i s s _ iiggellug igh ghllag luni _ , _ siqlugagh ut _ taana _ ughyugh ghllag luni _ .
esgha _ k e l u t a n g i t n i l n g u u t _ siqlugagh t _ taakwegkut _ , _ t a a k u n g u u t _ siqlugagh put _ t a a k w a n t u t _ .
K a g p a m s u g l l a g e t _ , _ nani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
paninang qun _ salin _ maana _ , _ u g w i i g h u m a g h m a _ tuyugh qaghaqe ainkut _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ R a a q u u n k u t _ .
uziva nkut _ salin _ entaqun _ angyeghetagh _ sa u a _ atuqe u luku _ .
mangtag _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ sa u a _ tuyugh aqe aat _ .
angyeghetagh t _ tamaakut _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ neqe t _ angyagh mun _ kelqe te aaghet _ , _ ategh i _ angyeghetagh t _ .
taakut _ alla _ akmagtagh ghhagh t _ aghinghwaagh u na iqe ait _ .
sanqute t _ , _ aghvegh mun _ pi sigh t _ , _ aghinghwaagh lghutagh t _ .
aghvenge naqe llegh _ piraamsi tete luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ .
eghqwaagh uute aqe luteng _ tanqigh mi _ nani _ .
angyagh mun _ pi sigh _ enkaam _ entaqun _ y a t a a g h q e n n a q n e g h m e g g n i _ eghqwaagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
K a a v a m _ angli naqe llegh a
K a a v a m _ apegh llegh a
siknegh
siknegh mi _ tesamani _ qafsina neng _ akuuragh aqe aqa _ qazigyagh _ , _ whaten _ iiwleng _ pi gpenaan _ , _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh t _ .
U w a l i g h n e g h m e n g _ t a a w e g k e n _ esneghag ni _ .
nalluqagh nge a _ , _ angyengestagh lgu lghiinga _ .
ilu te mun _ m a a q e k _ uughqaghtagh t _ a l l g e q e s t a t _ .
negig llegh k _ w h a a n g i i g h h a a g h l l u t e k _ kenle kek _ , _ u k s a a p a g m i _ whaten _ , _ ilu te mun _ t u n g y u u k _ maaqe ghllagek _ .
unake luki _ upag aghte luki _ tugu naqe i nagh ma luki _ , _ taakwavek _ malleg aghte nghminiki _ t e g h l u w a g h t a q l u k i _ .
tawatete naagh zinga _ .
naqam _ unange ghllag _ , _ qayughllak _ uygu te ghllag _ .
U u n Ê¼ g g u n _ aag lghii _ sa u luku _ .
T a w a t e n g i n a a n a q n g a m a _ , _ angalqatagh nka _ i l e m l l u k i _ kete qaghte lunga _ , _ kaate luki _ t a w a v e n g i i g h h a q _ a n g a l l q a t a m e n g _ , _ nekreg ite ngugh nge a _ , _ angalqatagh aghte aqe anka _ .
legan _ taakwavek _ , _ enraq _ y a k u g h n a q a n i q _ , _ k a g s a a t a q e g k a n g a n g a _ laagh anun _ .
W h a a n g i i g h h a q _ negig llegh m _ kenle kek _ .
aghvinleg _ tugu qaghte aqa _ .
ila a _ aga _ t e g h l u w a g h t a q a n g a _ , _ w h a n i k w a a q a a _ iiwen _ , _ siqinegh _ tevigh yagh uq _ .
G u u t n g w a a q a a g u n g a _ iwerngaqun _ w h a n i k w a a _ .
unaami _ uughqaghte aat _ kaate ghllag ma lghiit _ .
teskiwani _ U m e y a a l a g n i _ , _ qenu _ anuqe ngunani _ puglegh meng _ pi lghii _ amsanagh _ .
sa u a _ kagpesqwaagh _ , _ n a l l u k e g h l l a g h n g a a m k i _ suflugagh m _ qepghagh llegh i _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ lli aghte naqe aqa _ .
kingu a _ walamnaag aghagh aqa _ nakeghsagh ta a _ .
pinigh yagh lghii _ apeghiighkagh _ .
naakghite te ste ghllag aqa _ , _ u k a t g h u t a g h l l a k _ .
teskiwavek _ ( _ nutaan _ unange ghraag vyiigh yagute aqe unga _ ) _ kaate yalghiinga _ taawa _ , _ a g h n e g h u p a a g u m a a n _ , _ uksaagh mi _ , _ nuug aqe uq _ kiiwhken _ elngaatall _ .
W h a a n g i i g h h a a g h h n e g h a t a _ g u u n n e m k i _ , _ ukatghute ghllag luki _ .
ii _ guusagh lghiinga _ .
unange gpenanga _ seghleghhalek _ ghhuugh ghhagh nka _ sikna yagute anka _ .
nuug ghllag _ unite luku _ quug meng _ qerngughte i yalghiinga _ , _ ghhuugh meng _ s i k n a y a g u t e m _ .
teghiglug t _ esgha _ repall _ qungeghrug i _ aliigh aqe ut _ qenughhaghagh vleghagh mi _ mallegkagh m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ .
iwerngaqun _ , _ aglagh negh mni _ legan _ guute aqe unga _ .
â _ sangami _ tawatete a _ . _ â
awavagh qagh a qun _ nuug lghii _ p i i s u t a g h a g h l u k u _ guusagh kegka _ leganqun _ .
tugu naagh nghite kegka _ a m s a n a g h q w a a k a n g a _ .
entaqun _ kiiwna a _ w a l a m n a a p a g e m _ u k a t g h u t a t u g h q w a a s t e g h l l a k a q a _ .
taawa _ mataawi kau unga _ .
sivu nge aq
maana llu _ sivu nge aq _ nuugtu yagh lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ tuvagh _ r e g h i g h h n e g h m i n i _ nuug leg pigu uq _ , _ unange na pigte yagh uq _ , _ maaten _ avangite te a _ .
aghsaan _ nuug pagite te a _ .
tawaten _ malleg lutek _ me ngunani _ kiyaghte uq _ .
R a a q u q _ taana _ esavghaghtu raaghinagh _ .
K e l e n g a k a q e g k e f u t _ .
T u u m l l u g l l a k _ , _ angyagh llegh ke sigh ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ inwa _ w a l g u y a a g g a g h m u n _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ i k n a q e l g a q a t _ .
aa _ , _ maghyaghqugh aqe kanginkut _ w a l g u y a a g l u n i _ .
â _ puughte i lghiit _ tamaakut _ angwaaghute meng _ anagu aqe luki _ ! _ â _ amenam _ legan _ anagu aqe ke put _ .
esnevagh aqe ukut _ legan _ nuug aqe ut _ .
kayagte aqe kanginkut _ amsakellegh inagh aneng _ , _ nuugtu nghaani _ .
qafsina _ unake luku _ , _ tamaani _ i g l e q a q w a a q e l g h i i _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ilangakun _ maklagte aqe lghii _ qavaghsigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ taakwegkut _ segge llegh ghllag t _ uteghmun _ itagnagh aqe ut _ .
A n g y a l l q u s i g h l l a k _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
nuugtu pigte yagh uq _ .
sangami _ maaten _ nuug pagite te agu _ .
leveklug ghllag m _ s a a m _ t e g h h a _ s a k u s l u g t u g h q w a a m _ s a a m _ .
maana _ sivu nge aq _ nateghtu langa _ nallukngwaagh kegka _ .
siknegh mete aqe lghiinga _ quunpeng _ u n a n g s e g h w a a g h m u n _ lliigh ghngaan _ .
uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ .
uksaagh m _ u n a n g s e g h w a a g h a _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ .
qineghpeghwaagh aqe lghiinga _ liigilliigh yama _ .
naten _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ uksaaghpag kestagh nghaani _ , _ ayvegh _ ukavek _ e s g h a q a q u t u g h h n e g h a t g u _ .
kaana _ ayveghagh igate uq _ k i w a l i g h n e q a n i q _ .
negh niigh vig ghllag _ , _ quunpeng _ ayvegh leg _ , _ q a n t a a g h a n t u q _ kana _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ e s g h a a l l a a g h n a n i g h t u n g a _ .
qantaghante uq _ , _ aghula i aatagh u ghllag _ .
E s g h a a l l a a g h n a n i g h t u n g a _ .
nalluke kegka _ nateghtu langa _ , _ m a a n s i m a n g i t u n g a _ , _ siknegh mete kanga _ .
pugughilegh meng _ k e n q i g l l a a g h p e n a n g a _ tesamani _ tagi unga _ maavek _ .
taawa _ tagi ukut _ pugughilegh meng _ .
S i v u l i g h p i g a a l u t u n g _ , _ ( _ A n a g h a y a a n k u t _ quyngighqwaagh t _ m a a n l e n g u u t _ ) _ , _ W a a l l a l l u _ tagite ainkung _ I m i n g a t e m _ .
W a a l l a _ taana _ kiyalighagh mii u yagh lghii _ .
taakwagun _ , _ qamiye t _ malghugnegh t _ , _ W a a l l a _ qamugh ke luku _ .
qikmigh ghhagh t _ p i n i g h w a a g h e t _ , _ naten _ k e n q i g l l a a g h p e n a n g a _ , _ entaqun _ qavagh aqe lunga _ .
naten _ tawaten _ , _ wallu _ kangigh mii nun _ kaate sta _ .
A n a g h a y a a q _ quyngilegti _ .
taawa _ quyngigh a _ qateghrakegtagh ghllag _ .
sa u ak _ q a m i y e l l u u g p a g e k _ , _ natete ak _ , _ aghqestaagh pigu uk _ .
I w h a n i t w h a _ qamisli llegh ke nghite atkek _ L a p l a n d - e g h m i i t _ .
aa _ , _ u n u w a a _ mamleg a _ .
ii _ naayghagh ghrug ghllag _ whaa _ qigug mi _ a n g q a p e r u k e g l l a k _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h p e t a q a _ .
uugna qun _ N a a y g h a g h p a w u n i i q e g k a n g a t _ .
taana _ , _ tawani _ ima _ esghagh llegh ka _ .
unug llegh ke sigh _ tagi ukut _ , _ naten _ uyatu tke a _ , _ k e n q i g l l a a l l g h i t a q a _ .
naa kek _ taake uk _ qimugsigh k _ aviite uk _ .
M e n g y a a k e n g h i t a g p u t _ .
kaate luni _ legan _ quyngigh ni _ pegte a _ .
taawa _ alla _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh lgu uq _ .
W h a a n g i i g h h a q _ petug luni _ , _ mangteghagh m _ ingate kaghagh ani _ , _ u k u m _ qemi m _ u k a k a g h a a n i _ .
taawa _ sivungagh mun _ lliigh uq _ .
I m e g y u u t e m l l u _ angayuqagh i _ , _ S i p e l a n k u t _ , _ N u n g u g e n k u t _ , _ whangkuta _ , _ estamagnegh u uq _ mangteghagh _ .
M a n g t e g h a p i g g a a t _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ I m e g y u u t e m l l u _ angayuqagh i _ , _ N u n g u g e n k u t l u _ tanpegh ghhagh t _ .
taakut _ S i p e l a n k u t _ entaqun _ l o g _ h o u s e - n g u n i i q e g k a n g i t _ .
qaamkut _ mingle i _ unaghsigh t _ , _ sivuqagh m _ mangteghagh atun _ .
iwernga _ m a a n a n g i l n g u u t _ , _ unaghsigh t qun _ nuug uute ghllag luteng _ , _ whaten _ r o o f - e m s i i l g e t _ .
tanpegh meng _ r o o f - e l i g h l u t e n g _ .
T u u m l l u g l l a a k _ aghpumla ghllag _ .
maaten qun _ t u u m l l u g g n a n i q a n g a _ , _ aghpumla nga i uute kanga _ .
entaqun _ a n u q e t u g h t e k a n g a _ .
tamaani qun _ aghpumla u lghii _ q u u n p e g h l l a k _ .
anigu _ temngi _ tekite ghllag _ , _ mangteghagh t _ n u v u k r u g g i i _ , _ anigu ghllag _ .
umegnegh ughte nghminigu _ taagken _ , _ ii _ entaqun _ qaamte aqe a _ , _ tamaa na _ t e n g t e g h l l a n e g h m i n i g u _ .
A a y _ , _ ayveghagh lghiit llu _ w h a a n g i i g h h a a w a q u t _ .
unaagh nge i nagh u kete te _ naken _ qamugh t _ whaa _ .
neghsaghtu magh mi wha _ ayuqe yagh nghite a _ , _ esghaghhu qun _ k a n a n i _ tekeghagh ani _ kana _ eftughuute aqe ut _ awen _ .
K e l l m i g t e l l g h i l n g u u n g a _ nalluke kenka _ , _ entaqun _ luugh gni _ .
tawaten _ k u m l a a g h q e l l u n i _ , _ I n u u n k u k _ kinku k _ , _ N u n g u w a a l l u _ , _ U v i n g w a a l l u _ , _ quyngigh meng _ t a s l u g h w a g h l u t e k _ kiiwhken _ tagi aqe uk _ q a m i y n g i k _ usi lug teng _ .
K a a t u s a q m e g n e k i _ , _ neghsagh t _ i g u g h q w a a k a t _ paseghagh ghllag t _ .
entaqun _ ighivgaq _ unange luteng _ , _ naten _ aqfaqugh ma ait _ , _ q a z i g y a g h p a g h q u t _ naken _ pi atgu _ .
quyngigh t _ t a s l u g h a m e n g _ tagi aqe ut _ U v i n g w a a l l u _ , _ N u n g u w a a l l u _ , _ I n u u g h u u q _ iitek _ aag llegh a _ .
Q a z i g y a p a g l l a g s u g n i t u t l u _ aange pigte ut _ , _ enraq _ s i k u g h n a g l l a g l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
kukuleg
kukuleg _ teskiwna _ maaken _ esghaqaaluni _ , _ legan _ napaqagh m _ u l i w a a g h l u n i _ ayuqe uq _ .
qeghagh ghllag _ , _ sa u ut _ .
qeghaghtu pigte uq _ u l l e g h a a t e l l g h i l l u n i _ .
angyagh meng _ teskiwavek _ , _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe t _ , _ mangteghagh vyiigh ghhagh _ sa u a _ .
taakwegken _ esne meng _ unaghsigh meng _ angyagh kun _ usi ii kut _ , _ usi iigh ukut _ .
maligsaagh yug neghtugh kanga _ palaghmete ghngaaghma _ .
Y a a v u q u g h t e k l u k i _ I m i n g a t e n k u t _ , _ entaqun _ M e g h y u u n k u t _ , _ W a a g h y i n k u t _ , _ kinku t _ P e t g e n g h h a a n k u t _ .
E s n e g h r u w h a a k u n _ angyapig kun _ y a a v u q u m e n g _ .
teskiwani _ kukuleg m _ kangighagh ani _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ liigike yaqegka _ , _ kangighagh akun _ tamlag qagh luteng _ sa ut _ piyutagh u aghte te ut _ , _ uqligh aat _ wallu _ .
tamaa _ nenglullug t _ n a t a n g i _ ifkagh aqe luteng _ naqam _ n e f t e g n g a a q l u t e n g _ .
me nge ghllag luteng _ q a a m n a n g i _ .
yug m _ naasqugh lghutagh nge i _ tamaa _ .
ii _ t a n p e g h h a g h a a q _ sa u a _ tamaa _ .
angyagh t _ tamaa _ ulpig aghte aghte aqe luteng _ , _ ayemqugh aqe luteng _ .
amig lgu aqe luteng _ , _ sa ngllaghkagh ghllag pestaagh _ , _ pelungigh ghllag _ , _ s a a g r u k e g l l a k _ .
maaten _ kiwa _ qete llegh ughte ma uq _ .
S e g h l e g h w a a g h u u q _ .
tawani _ entaqun _ yugu i te ghllag mi _ , _ sa ma uq _ , _ tuqu laghate te ma uq _ .
sa n qun _ tamaa _ nenglu ni _ .
Y u v g h i i g h w a a g h y a q u m t a _ entaqun _ s a k u s l u g l l a k _ sama _ .
enraq llu _ tamaani _ llangaqa _ u n a y a g h a q i i g a t e s u g n i t u t _ .
T a a w a a _ unaghsigh meng _ usi iigh luteng _ , _ kepe te aqe luteng _ .
T a a k w n a n g a _ p u y g a a q e g k e g k a _ nateghtu langa _ , _ naqam _ n a t a n g a _ neqamike aqe anka _ .
uughqa ni _ samani
tagtale mii _ ii _ naten _ imani _ ayumiqullegh _ atuqe luku _ maani _ , _ llangaqa _ mulupag gpenani _ , _ aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
T a a k u n i i _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ taake uk _ , _ a p a g k a a _ , _ liite lghiinga _ angayuqagh ke lukek _ taake uk _ .
aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
tamaani _ kiig ainkut _ , _ upenghaghagh a _ , _ salin _ k e n q i g l l a a l l g h i l n g u u n g a _ .
tagtale mii _ kiig aqe a llu _ , _ A n a g h a y a a n k u t _ suna _ taakut _ , _ angyapig kun _ .
A n a g h a y a a n k u t _ , _ I m i n g a t e n k u t _ , _ kinangaawa _ W a a g h y i n g w a a l l u _ esteg ragh u a llu _ , _ taana llu _ naa ghllag ka _ , _ kaate ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
T a m a a n t e k u l l a a l u t a a n g _ kete ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ qikmigh t _ q u u t q u g h u t i i _ kangii nun _ kiwavek _ .
taakut _ P u g u g h i l e g h m e l n g u u t _ A g a a n k u t l u _ , _ A n a w u t a a n k u t l u _ malghugnegh t _ .
tawaten _ teve luta _ entaqun _ .
maaten _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ tapghaaghagh qun _ , _ iiwen _ siqinegh _ t e v i g h y a g h t u u g h a q u q _ tamlag ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ kangii neng _ taagken _ uteghte uq _ .
qikmigh t _ itghagh u uute kangi _ .
T a m a a n t e k u l l a a l u t a a _ , _ iqallug ut _ awen _ u n a k a g h p u t _ .
kii _ awen _ siknegh _ n a g a q u t u g h t a q a a _ .
siknegh _ quunpeng _ q a a n g h i t n u n _ lliigh uq _ .
arekull _ siknegh mun _ aglagh u aqe ukut _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ qenwat llu _ igleghte ukut _ .
tawaten _ t e k e g h a l g h u n q u n _ taakwna _ , _ naagu _ siknegh _ .
ii _ a t i q u s a t u g h l l a a t a g h a a t _ .
S u n g a g h y u g g a l e k _ kanagh a _ p e n g u g u l l u n i _ , _ siknegh u naqe lleqe uq _ .
T a a w a a _ ketmiighte vigkagh ut _ , _ E s n e g h a g h p a a g u f t u k _ ategh kek _ .
qateghllug tek _ inga _ .
esneghagh m _ k e l u t e g h l l u w a a g h a n i _ tapghagh mi _ taakwani _ , _ kelute mii ii aghte lutek _ E s n e g h a g h p a a g u f t u k _ .
naayvagh mun _ whavek _ kanaken _ esneghag neng _ esneghagh k _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ nuug t wha _ tamaa _ esghaqagh aqe aput _ , _ naayvagh mi _ .
T a z i n g k u k _ kaate yaghtugh yaqegput _ uugte ghllag lutek _ qategh ghraagte lutek _ , _ n e g h s a p i g p a g h q u g h l l a k _ .
temngi _ qenaagh kun _ uugte luteng _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ , _ kii _ .
guute nghite ait _ avelghagh ait _ .
kii _ ii _ , _ taakwagun _ aningugh luta _ , _ allakagh mi _ siknegh _ naayvagh lgu lghii _ .
atghagh ukut _ , _ ii _ aghqe i aghaghtu uq _ imani _ .
nuug _ tamaa na _ , _ q a w a a g l l a a k _ , _ s a m s e g h h a g h a a g h m e n g _ .
arekull _ aglekesegagh u aqe ut _ .
S a m s e g h h a g h a q n g w a a g h a q a n k a _ .
kii _ , _ teskanavek _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiikut _ , _ qagi t _ u n Ê¼ g a _ , _ esneghagh k _ r e g h i g h q e l l u t e k _ , _ ayeme aqe ut _ kana _ .
qawaag ghllag u uq _ , _ neghsagh ghllag _ .
ii _ legan _ suqsugh ghhalek _ neghsagh t _ qimag aqe ut _ naken _ .
unange naqe mun _ w a a k e n g h i t u t _ kaate naqe i nagh ut _ .
enraq llu _ n a k e v l e g h a g h m e n g _ anuqe _ ayuqe uq _ .

tamlag luta _ nenglullug lghute ghllag t _ kii _ t a a k w a a _ .
sungaghyug te aqe lghiit _ esghaghkagh nka _ , _ kaa _ s i q l u w a l g h u n q u n _ taakwna _ kelute mnni _ .
taagken _ tent- ta lug teng _ , _ uqlighsagh naqe ut _ ingavek _ .
angyapig llu _ esnevagh te naqe aat _ .
I n e g h q u g h w a g h w a a g h l u n g a _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh ma _ , _ legan _ aga _ uyavaghqagh ughte ut _ , _ kingu itneng _ , _ i g h s a k i n g h e g k e n i _ yaag aghte aqe lunga _ .
ii _ naqam _ riistuniqe magh ma _ aghyuugh na yu kangatnga _ .

siipnegh it _ kepugh ait _ taakut _ .

agaten _ paninang _ aviite qaghte aqe lunga _ , _ p u y g a a q l u n g a _ naten _ .

ggayegllug m _ apegh llegh a

iwerngaqun _ unake yu llegh megestun _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ unake kayugu yagh aat _ .
tawaten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ unake lleghqagh meng _ kenle ite yagh uq _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ angyaghtu negh meggni _ naamakaghte na iqe lghiit _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ n a a m a k a g h t e m m e n g _ atigh llegh ke uq _ .
ayveghagh llegh m _ uglaghtala a _ e i g h t _ , _ n a a m a k a g h t e n g n g u f t u q _ atigh llegh a _ .
yupig ii negh ghllag u aqe yagh lghiit _ .
ila i _ aamta _ whaten _ yug pagite aqe luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ .

taagken _ A n g q a t e n g a n w a t k u n _ angyagh na lunga _ p i y a g h _ l u n g a _ , _ kayute u naanghite ni lunga _ ighsake aanga _ .
elngaatall _ s u w a g h q w a a l u n g a _ nutem _ angli kuma _ ellngitgun _ angyagh yaghqaa gpenanga _ .
angli magh ma _ tawaten _ yungllagh yagh aanga _ , _ taana _ puygu nghite kegka _ ighsake llegh ka _ .

U w a l i i t _ , _ S a a v l a n k u t _ , _ aghillug nkut _ , _ Q u w a a r e n k u t _ , _ N e m a a y a a n k u t _ , _ T e m k e r u u n k u t _ , _ ifkaghte te nkut _ , _ E g h q a a g h a a n k u t _ , _ U n g a l a a n k u t _ , _ sulug nkut _ , _ N g u u n g a y a n k u t _ , _ akule ke inkut _ , _ angyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ angyaghwaagh kun _ lliigh magh meng _ .
taakut _ kiyang _ Q u w a a r e n k u t _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ aghvenge kayugu ut _ .

P u s a a _ s i v u y a g t e k l u k u _ Q u w a a r e n _ ata ke kanga _ .

elngaatall _ a g h t i i l n g u u t _ yuggagh t _ quunpeng _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ lliigh magh meng _ , _ amsanaghllug mi _ whaten _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ , _ quunpeng _ sivulii manginagh aqe lghiit _ y a a v u q u m e n g _ .
entaqun _ y a a v u q u m e n g _ neghaalipag igate ngugh t _ .
angyagh at llu _ enraq _ sukate magh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ entaqun _ .
P a k r e g r a k e g t a g h h a q _ angyagh ghhaat _ angyaghwaagh _ .
sivuke luku _ nanevgaghtagh ka _ piyaa nghaani _ maligte aqe kegka _ .
taagken _ maavek _ lliigh magh emta _ aviighute magh an _ umyugagh mneng _ lliigh unga _ .
kiyang _ umyugagh mneng _ piyaa aqe lunga _ lliigh unga _ , _ aviighute magh an _ nanevgaghtagh ghhagh ka _ taana _ .

yakugh nagh ite uq _ , _ uyiighagh t _ kangigh a _ taakut _ sa kun _ vuuslegh kun _ a y u g i l n g u g h q u n _ agaghte luki _ , _ qaamqaghte te luki _ .
S u g u p i l u k i _ pi aqe ke put _ whaten _ puglegh anite luki _ pi aqe ke put _ .
atghagh naqe negh meggni _ uygute luteng _ aneghte yagh qu aqe lghiit _ sugupag teng _ qerngughte yuggaagh qagh nghaki _ tawaten _ wetku _ sugupag ii iqe kenka _ .
aamtaam _ a s i t n g i n a a q a n i m e n g _ pi lghii ni _ neghqugh na lghii _ .
U u n g h a t l u _ , _ naghulleg qagh inagh luku _ pegte lghii ni _ uunghagh igh te na lghii _ .
tuugkagh mete luki _ tawani _ atghagh te kayug i _ .
naghulleg luki _ tawaten _ naqamalla _ , _ qesug lghii ni _ , _ pi igate kangi _ n e n g t e l g h i i n i _ .
uyiigh t _ nengte lghii ni _ u u n g h a k u n _ petug llegh i _ .
naghigh aghte aqe lghiit _ , _ iike aqe lghiit _ .
N e n g t a g h l u t e n g _ tawaten _ nasiqute luki _ sulleve te luki _ , _ siingenllu _ taku laghate te aqe kangit _ ayveghagh lghiit _ tawaten _ , _ sayug luki _ taawa _ tuqute aqe kangit _ .
nalluniite aqe ut _ anglu megteggun _ aneghte negh meggni _ agepsugh u aghte tete te kayugu ut _ .
A l l a a g h i i n a a g u t _ puglegh m _ n u q u t u l n g i _ .
aamta _ n a a f l e g h m e l l u k i _ uka _ samaken _ mayugh nghata _ , _ e s n e v a g h w a a g h l u t a _ tawavek _ laag ghhagh anun _ n a a f l e g h m i _ tawani _ .
uka _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ whaten _ q u n g u g h q e l l u t e n g _ .
whaa _ a a n a q e n g h a t a _ k e p e l l e g h t e g g u n _ taaggun _ naghulleg lghii ni _ , _ taawa _ unake na lghii _ .
Q a g a q u m _ pangeghte llegh kek
Q a g a q u m _ apegh llegh a

sivuqagh meng _ tesakmaken _ mekelghiigh u lunga _ p a n g e g h n a q u n g a _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pinaghvig m _ q u k a g h n e g h a n i _ taakwani _ .
tespamavek _ ungazigh igh unga _ sivuqagh meng _ .
â _ enkaam _ , _ i n a a n m e l l e n g i _ ungazigh _ ! _ T e g h r a a s t u _ ! _ â _ enkaam _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ u p e n g h a a m _ aghnegh ani _ i g h i v g a a m a a n _ taglagh ukut _ nani _ taakwani _ siqinegh _ tevigh magh an _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ igleghte ukut _ malghugnegh u luta _ , _ A t a a y a g h h a a n k u t l u _ qilleghte uute te nkut llu _ .
whanga _ qilleghte uute te nkut ni _ .
qavaghni nghite unga _ q e s u g n i q e m _ ungazigh _ esghagh naqe kegka _ .
tawaten _ iiwen _ mangteghagh t _ sivuqagh m _ mangteghagh i _ talughsaghtugh aqe aput _ , _ qayug ngllagh ukut _ .
qayugh te ma luta _ U u y g h a a m _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ aghviqagh mun _ kaate ukut _ . _ â _ qateghllug ghllag _ , _ aghviqagh u naqe lleqe uq _ , _ esneghag tun _ tawaten _ p a p a p a a g h l u t e k _ iqetu lutek _ .
alpag lukek _ taawa _ taglagh ukut _ .
U u y g h a q _ nekeve luni _ aruugh aqe lghii _ ingute kun _ nekeve luni _ .
qayugh te nghmeng _ taaqe luta _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ uaf- ke aq _ aliigh uq _ . _ â _ pi yalghiikut _ qemigh _ sa u a _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ .
qute m _ maaqe niite kek _ alpag lukek _ arughsit _ aliigh aput _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ , _ taglagh ukut _ .
siqinegh _ piite kestagh uq _ , _ whaa _ tamlag yaghtugh ukut _ .
angyagh ghllagu uq _ aatnegh at _ .
T a m l a g h q u t a q e f t u q _ angyaghugh tke aq _ .
elngaatall _ neqe siigh u te ma lghii _ , _ ayveghagh te ma lghii _ .
whaa _ kaate naqe ukut _ , _ kii _ yuug _ esnevagh uute yalghiimi _ , _ gginagh _ alla inagh _ e s g h a g h a g h p u t _ .
ivenruute k _ aghula i aghte lukek _ nusug agput _ .
angyagh _ k e l e v a g h p a n i _ nutem _ , _ ateghviga ii te ainkut _ u p u g h a m _ s a a m _ alngunak _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kanglluute kete luta _ .
T a a m _ angyagh m _ imagh a _ .
Q a a q a n g u f t u q _ taglaate ainkut _ ellmeggnun _ .
imani _ mangteghaghtu uq _ , _ yugtu uq _ p e g g u l l g h i _ tamaa na _ .
qesugniqe ghllag _ , _ k e t a n q w a a g h a a l l g h i _ S i v u q a g h h m i i t _ kaate lghiit _ .
taagken _ manughagh mun _ kaa llu ta _ angyagh m _ imigh u ni _ tawani _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tawani _ utaqa itek _ nengighqe lleqe amsi _ ilakwaagh mnun _ . _ â
â _ paye a _ kenegh meng _ aane uten _ . _ â _ qamaken _ anighqute _ tugumiiqe luku _ tuune a _ qaaqagh mun _ .
qaaqagh m _ tawaten _ milugh lghii stun _ pi aqe luta _ alleg luta _ , _ â _ H a a _ , _ taawa _ . _ â _ ilakwaagh i _ uvite mi _ utaqa it _ .
tea- ngatu llu _ whangkutung _ yug ghllag m _ s a a m _ aglagh te ainkung _ , _ m a l i g t a g h p u n g _ .
kaa llu ta _ itegh ukut _ .
yug ghllag m _ t a a m _ nughagh ak _ maalghug _ allighaghqagh k _ kiig negh ke ak _ ilu te mun _ miluqutagh ke ak _ .
atkug igh lutung _ itegh unga _ .
aghnagh m _ s a a m _ itegagh nka _ kelig ai _ .
taawa _ itegh lunga _ amsikaghte naqe yagh unga _ , _ aghnagh m _ a m s i k a g h a g h t a a k _ kameg gka _ , _ iikaghagh ak _ tawavek _ kayagte aanga _ allighagh mun _ .
nutaan _ allighagh kun _ iggasighte lunga _ negh naqe unga _ qayuutagh m _ esne ngiighhagh akun _ .
tea- ngatu _ qiive aghte yaqegka _ e l n g a l l u _ iggasighte ma lghii _ .
taakut _ tukugh pung _ aqumgagh meng _ .
taawa _ neghe uute ukut _ .
ikuyeg ka _ meghnugh uq _ a q u m y u g l l a g u g h t u n g a _ .
qenwat _ ayapegh lunga _ negh unga _ .
T a a q l u t a a _ qayugh te ukut _ .
taawa _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ may- nga u naqe lleqe uq _ .
T a a m q u n _ aleghqugh aqe aanga _ .
aane ukung _ .
aane luteng _ i g l e g h u s a q m i n i n g a _ tesqagani _ , _ naa ke i _ ila nka _ esghagh nanigh anka _ .
puughhe na yu kanganga _ uteghnigh yug unga _ .
aglagh ukung _ .
T a a k u n g u f t u t _ Q e r n g u g h t e k a a n k u n g u f t u t _ t a a m _ ata a _ may- ngam _ .
taagken _ aghnegh upag magh an _ qavaghni yama _ qavagh unga _ .
W h a n i k u m a a n _ taghtughtu inkut _ atugh naqe ni luki _ .
taagken _ atugh lghii nun _ aglagh ukut _ , _ navek _ pi langa _ maligte te unga _ atugh lghii nun _ .
mangteghagh ghrug ghllag _ , _ paagna a _ niighigh luku _ , _ yuug _ qineghte uute luni _ elngaatall _ asitmun _ .
whanga llu _ m a y e q e l l e g a g h l u n g a _ qineghte unga _ .
taagken _ qineghte yalghiinga _ yug ghllag u uq _ nategh _ elngaatall _ , _ a q u m g a v i g g a q _ t a a n a n g i n a q _ a g h u l a v i g g a q l u _ r e g h i t e f t u q _ .
yug ghllag u uq _ amig mun _ iiwleng _ .
legan _ ategh aqe ut _ alla t _ , _ ila i _ ategh vzigh luteng _ alla t _ mellu tete nghata _ ila i _ ategh aqe ut _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ neghe uute ut _ siivanllegh t _ , _ whangkuta _ neghenghite ukut _ tamaani _ temngi _ iglegha ukut _ , _ esghagh yukekagh ut _ e s g h a g h a g h p u t _ .
Y u g l l a g u f t u u q _ ungazigh _ , _ mangteghagh ghllag _ .
teghigniqe ukut _ k a l l e g h t a q l u t a a _ , _ naghaagh lqusiigh aqe luta _ .
mulu ukut _ tespamani _ anguugh ainkut _ n a k e m e n g _ a n u q l l i g h l u n i _ .
iwernga _ aghyuqe vig ite ngughk _ , _ t e n g Ê¼ g h u n a q _ elngaatall _ .

tukugh nka _ taakut _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
quyilleg t _ kaate ut
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ quyillgaagh ghhagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ t a a k u n i t u q _ , _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
akuzi igate ngughk _ whangkutestun _ naqam _ mumegh igh qugh te aqe kangat _ .
ungipamsug nghaani _ t a a m _ tukugh mta _ mumigte te aqe ainkut _ .
tea- magh an tuq _ ellnga llu _ , _ liite ghraag unga _ akuzillegh aneng _ n a g a t e m _ .
ila i _ neqamike anka _ paninang _ , _ ila i _ p u y g a a n k a _ quyillgaagh t _ akuzillegh it _ .
taana _ atuute llgagh u uq _ , _ atugh yaghtugh uq _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ nani _ .
nagaqugh unga _ , _ aghulaqe naqe negh meggni nguq _ quyillgaagh t _ mangteghagh nun _ qikmightuumagh meng _ takuughagh aqe ut _ .
tungsigh niigh llegh it _ tawatete na ait _ .
tukugh ma _ w a a k e n g h i s a t g u _ , _ aghulaqe naqe yayek _ nengiighhagh k _ taake uk _ , _ qaghluughisaghtugh agka _ .
qiteve aqe lghii _ , _ tusaqe igate kegka _ .
taakut _ qaghlu t _ akuqagh luki _ , _ kenigh nghaki _ taakut _ qaghlu yaghqagh t _ taku luki _ qaghlu aqe anka _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ melqupag _ sa u a _ qaghlu sqe a _ , _ kenigh aa _ , _ tawaten _ pi unga _ , _ â _ K u l u f t e n _ . _ â _ taawa _ K u l u f t e n e t _ entaqun _ melqupag u ut _ ellngit ni _ .

nuna an _ N e k e g n e g h a
taawa _ sivuqagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ naayvagh _ .

naayvagh kun _ taakwagun _ aghulaqe uq _ .

naayghagh i _ p a g a r u g l l a k _ .

tungeqligh a _ taana _ ungazigh m _ uughqa nun _ tume u uq _ , _ ategh a _ ukigyaghagh u uq _ .

maaken _ naayghagh neng _ paagken _ esghagh lghii ni _ naayghagh t _ a g h q e l e n g e s t a g h a a t _ , _ tawatete ut _ aghqestaaghhagh u ut _ aygugh mun _ .
taana _ ungazigh m _ aygugh ghhagh ani _ qiighqagh ghllag _ iwhani u uq _ nunangighagh u uq _ .
A l p a g h l l a g u f t u g h n g u u q _ nuna igh aq _ , _ ne m _ qula akun _ alpa _ igleghte ghllag _ , _ qawaagniigh igate ngugh t _ , _ alpa meng _ negh igate ngugh t _ .
metghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ qawaagniigh llegh ke ut _ .
taakut _ tukugh nka _ angyengestagh squllgagh u ut _ taawa _ petug luni _ nategh kun _ .
qawaagniighusigh ghhagh it llu _ takestaaghhaa ut _ kepe luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
upugha negh ghllag u ut _ ungazighmii t _ tamaani _ pilleg mni _ sivuligh mi _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ sivuligh _ whaa _ pangeghte yuwhaagh llegh ka _ salin _ laluramke nge i tete luku _ .
uglagh u pigte uq _ ungazigh _ , _ entaqun _ m a t u m l l u _ sivuqagh m llu _ qerngughte te yagh ghngaaghmi _ paninang _ uglagh uq _ .
U p u g h a n e g h l l a a k _ , _ aag negh mta _ taakut _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ qayugh yagh a _ . _ â _ ighsa negh mta _ pi aqe ainkut _ , _ â _ P e l u u s a n g i i g h h a a g h n g a a n _ . _ â _ taawa _ aane yug nanigh ukut _ u p u g h a g h l l a g e m _ , _ kepe yu m _ .
manguna _ whangkutestun _ negh kangat _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh t _ awatkaghtagh t _ aqii nghhagh t _ , _ awatangani _ aqii luteng _ tagi tke ait _ .
T u k r u u g l l u t e n g _ n e q n i t _ elngaatall _ awatkaghtagh t _ .
aqii ma aqe lghiit _ u p e n g h a y a g h a a l u k u _ taagavek _ aki anun _ angyagh kun _ .

quyngighqwaagh t _ K i y a g h t a a l l g h a t
Q u u n p e n g u q _ quyngigh eng _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ uksulqusigh igh ghllag _ .
uksugh mi _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ pagavek _ mugu aqe luteng _ , _ quyngigh eng _ negh manginigh sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
atigh llegh i _ tawatete ut _ nuugte naqe negh meggni _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
enkaam _ q a m i y e g h n a a q u n g i t _ tamaakut _ t a n Ê¼ n g u u r n g e n g u f t u t _ .
iwerngaqun _ usi igh ghllag luki _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
nunivag m _ qukaa nun _ pamavek _ uksugh mi _ u m e g n e p a g i l l g h a n u n _ entaqun _ negh vig kegtagh mun _ quyngigh eng _ aghulaqe te aqe luku _ , _ t u n u v a g h l l a g l u t a a n g _ ungazigh meng _ .
paamna _ ungazigh _ aange pigte lghii _ nuna _ .
tespagani _ uksughte luteng _ u p e n g h a q e s t a n g h a n i _ esne mun _ aligate ma aqe lghiit _ kiiw t _ pinagh lleghqagh i _ s i v u t g h u l l u k i _ .
quyngigh meng _ qikmigh ke luteng _ .
taawa _ mugu nqigte ma aqe lghiit _ esne anun _ u p e n g h a q e s t a n g h a n i _ .
taawa _ tamaaken _ neqenge ma aqe lghiit _ tukfigh i luteng _ , _ tuugte aq _ , _ manguna _ .
manguna t _ tuugtagh u lghiit _ w h a n g k u n n i _ , _ akike luki _ tanpegh _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ t a p g h a g h p a k _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike ma aqe kangat _ quynginge natke ma aqe kangat _ .
quyilleg t _ tamaakut _ tukfighagh eng _ tapghagh _ quyngigh meggnun _ s a a g t e k u m a a n _ .
sanqute ke aqe kangat _ , _ nateghqagh _ kameg meggnun _ .
ungazighmii t _ K i y a g h t a a l l g h a t
esghagh yagh kufsiki _ ungazighmii t _ aatkagh it _ n u q u t u p a a g h r u g l l a a g u u t _ , _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ nasaperagh meng _ nasagh ke lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ a t k u g w i t _ ukut _ collar-ngi _ maaten _ , _ qikmiiraagh t _ entaqun _ iingunagh ita _ c o l l a r - k a q i i t _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwavek _ qule mun _ iwhani luki _ nasaperagh meggneng _ taagken _ sigutngiitagh leg meng _ qepe nghmegteki _ legan _ puvite leg t _ , _ lliigh aqe ut _ naagu _ s u p u g g a q _ .
kameg it _ n u q u t u p a a g h r u g e t _ , _ ila i _ esghaghkagh nka _ q a l l u k a g h m e n g _ temkag lgu aqe ut _ , _ pinigh t _ maqagh t _ atugh it _ .
sa u aat _ maqagh u na iqe ait _ aatkagh t _ ama _ , _ wallu _ atkug ghllag t _ tamaakut _ .
liite qugh yagh unga _ , _ ungazighmii t _ akuzillegh it _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ ila i _ s a n i v a q a a n t a q u t _ , _ n a g n e g h a g h q u n g u u t _ .
avate meng _ kenle ke luni _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ ila a _ tawaten _ qiteve ma _ .
qiteve a _ nagate aqe a _ tespamani _ , _ aleghquute aqe ut _ katam _ whangkuta _ whaten _ aleghquute negh mta _ .
ungazigh _ taana _ ikevaghllug mun _ ukavek _ tekeghagh igh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ sivuqagh tun _ tawaten _ taakwagun _ .
A g h q e s t a a y u w h a a g u q _ , _ tawaten _ atigh llegh a _ sivuqagh m _ a t i l l q u m s i l l g h a t u n _ ayuqe uq _ .
aatnegh leg _ , _ uughqa _ , _ i m u n _ , _ s i q l u w a g h y a a g e t _ , _ tawaten _ sivuqagh m _ atightullegh atun _ .
taawanginaq _ naayghagh ite uq _ ungazigh _ t u u n g v a n i _ , _ ukigyaghagh ghhagh inagh _ k i w a r u g l l a k _ talwa _ entaqun _ kukuleg meng _ uyatu uq _ naayghagh m _ kenle a _ uughqa neng _ ukigyaghagh u ni kangat _ .
tamaani _ esghagh lleg mni _ qimugsigh u uq _ .
ugriilegh mun _ qimugsigh meng _ akilpegagh yagh te aqe ut _ , _ e s t u w a l g u f t u q _ U g r i i l l g h i i n a q _ taana _ , _ ungazigh _ e s t u w i i s a g h p e t u q _ tamaani _ .
sivuligh mi _ pangeghte aqngama _ .
elngaatall _ iqa _ piniqe aat _ seghleqe igate aat _ tamaani _ .
pelungighsagh yug pagigate yaghpete ut _ tamaani _ .
tawani _ esghapag aqe yamki _ angyagh t _ t a m l a g h q u l l g h i i t _ neqe meggneng _ angaghqugh yalghiimeng _ angyagh meng _ whaken _ , _ yug it _ mat-aghaghte luteng _ kemeg raaghinagh ughte luteng _ temkagh ke i i nagh luteng _ .
manguna t _ ugkellikagh t _ putu itgun _ tugu luki _ g g a a t m e g g n u n _ miluute luki _ taagken _ k e t a r w a t a q i i t _ angyagh meng _ qute mun _ .
tawaten _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ .
apeghiigh luteng _ tamaakut _ k a n u u g t e g h l l a k a t _ esnagh mi _ tawani _ aniguvzeghagh ghhagh kun _ qikmigh stun _ tawaten _ ighwaaghtuute aqe ut _ a q s a g e t e n g _ aaw igh aqe ait _ ila meggnun _ sangighqugh ste aqe ait _ .
taakwagun _ maaqe aqe ut _ pamyughagh itgun _ i l e p g h a a g h i t n u n _ qamavek _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ ungazighte llegh ka _ sivuligh _ .
teghigniqe kau unga _ nuna _ alla _ esghagh kegka _ .
elngaatall _ A m e r i c a - m _ tawaqa a _ piyuke aat _ , _ kuynge a _ .
ellngit a _ tawaqa it _ alqegkagh stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ tawaqapig it _ .
M a l g h u g h q e l l u t e n g _ ayuqe ut _ .
pinigh llegh i llu _ , _ sungaghyug kegtagh u ut _ kayaate llegh i _ .
iknaqe llegh i _ tamaakut _ kiiwhtagh stun _ tawaten _ iqeghtagh atun _ ayuqe ut _ s e q e m e n g e l t a g h a g h l u t e n g _ llangaqa _ isaah- iqe aghtagh lghii stun _ .
pinigh llegh i _ tawaqa m _ .
melugyaghqagh it _ tamaakut _ qellistekagh ghhagh u ut _ .
maaten _ entaqun _ D a y s - O - W o r k - e s t u n _ angka ut _ melugyaghqagh it _ .
kagime yug ma t _ elngaatall _ .
kuynge ngiighhagh it _ unaghsigh ghhagh t _ ulimaagh ghhagh t _ .
tamaani _ pingwaagh ghhagh inagh t _ aklungi igh llegh i _ I v a q a a n k u t _ tamaakut _ A m e r i c a - m _ angyaghpag aneng _ tukfigh i kayug t _ , _ suqagh meng _ , _ tugute meng _ kaate nghata _ tespamavek _ .
T a a k u n i _ I v a q a a n k u n i _ r i c e - a _ , _ pagunghangeltagh _ , _ neqekrag pig _ neghe stekaqe aat _ .
maaten _ kinguligh mi _ a k l u n g i g h i s q w a a g h a a m a l g h i i t _ taakut _ I v a q a a n k u t _ .
ighnegh i _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g u u t _ .
tamaani _ sivuligh mi _ esghagh aqe yamki _ taana _ ighnegh a _ angyaleg ughtekagh _ .

nukalpigaghlluggagh u uq _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ whangkutestun _ aqfaqugh te a _ , _ aqelqaghniigh aat _ tamaani _ .
T a a n a n g u f t u q _ a t u g h y u n e g h t u p i g t u u t _ ungazighmii t _ .
aghnegh m _ ilangani _ atugh aqe ut _ , _ sa u a _ naghaagh llegh ke sigh _ aviite kau uq _ , _ t a a n a n g u u q _ upugha te i sagh it _ a t u u n k u k _ igatagh gpenaamta _ k i y a g h t e s q e l l u t a _ .
tawatete uq _ ungazigh _ esghagh lleg mni _ .
P a n g e g h l l e g h m a _ aag llegh a
sivuligh _ puygu kanigh aqa _ ungazighte llegh ma _ ila a _ .
A t a a y a g h h a a m _ t a a m _ elngaatall _ ungazigh _ taku llegh a _ liisimake a _ sivuqagh meng _ whaken _ .
tawaten _ a k i k a n i g h m u n _ taglagh uute ukut _ naayghagh t _ taakut _ sivuqagh meng _ aligh ite ngugh t _ qukagh itgun _ tawaten _ .
maaqellegh m _ ungazigh _ elngaatall _ e l q u g h a g h t a q e f t a g h p u t _ .
sa u uq _ four _ h o u r s - k a g h t a g h p u t _ .
ivenruute t _ k a y a a l n g u u t _ angyaghwaagh kun _ tawani _ sivuligh mi _ .
kinguligh mi _ sukate kau ukut _ .
T h r e e _ hours _ s i i p n g a q a g h t e k a q a g h p u t _ .
wallu _ enmis _ n u u g h s i m a s t e g g u _ t h r e e _ hours _ .
sivuqagh meng _ q a n t a g h a g h h a n t u q _ ungazigh _ i m a g h l l u w i l n g u g h m i _ .

siku _ aghviqagh mun _ lliigh magh an _ .

kiiste i vig _ T u k a l e g a g h v i g m i
