elngaatall _ aragh aat _ , _ aatqaghte vike aqe aat _ legan _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ k i p u l l g i n a a l l u k u _ , _ araghqagh ii aagh _ kiiste i vig _ .
A r a g h q i n a q s a m i _ , _ sa u a _ ungazighmii _ mekelghiigh _ taku kestagh aa _ , _ tawaten _ d a n c e - e m a g h m i _ iigge ni _ qukagh mikun _ inglugtun _ nekegte luki _ , _ taawa _ legan _ ellngistun _ ruuseghmii stun _ ketngig ni _ napaghte luku _ aga _ itegagh mineng _ aga _ papasqitagh vike a _ , _ aga _ nekefqaghte sta _ .
nalug kau te aghte magh mi _ elngaatall _ sighla te ut _ .
naange niite anga _ P a n g e g h l l e g h m a
taagken _ navek _ pi laatagh ukut _ .
tawaten _ iiwen _ d a n c e - e v i g m e n g _ taglagh aqe ukut _ angyaghyag ni luteng _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ uughqa neng _ angyaghyag aqe ut _ .
upugha te ait _ , _ tawaten _ maakumiu stun _ upleg te ghllag aqe kangit _ quya ke m _ elngaatall _ .
qiteve ma u ut _ , _ akuzipig meng _ aghsaan _ ayuqe ut _ , _ iitek _ akuzi msiigh aqe ut _ .
T a a k u n g u f t u t _ t e n g t e k a t _ qiwaa neng _ .
avate meng _ pi u ut _ , _ qiwaaghmii t _ taakut _ esghaghkagh nka _ sivuqagh mi _ t e n g t e k a t _ .
taana _ N g e p e n k a w a a w e t n g u f t u q _ ataasigh _ liigike aqa _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ akuzi msiigh qagh yu k _ , _ G u t g u g y i _ .
G u t g u g y i n k u k _ , _ G u l g u g y i n k u k _ taake uk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
P i l u w u g e m _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h i i _ taakut _ G u l g u g y i n k u t _ , _ G u t g u g y i n k u t _ , _ piinliite nkut _ , _ whanga llu _ esghagh kaqe anka _ taakut _ t e n g t e k a t _ .
taana _ akuzipigpag igate ngughk _ N g e p e n k a w a a w e n _ , _ kiyang _ qiteve ghllagu ut _ .
nagate lghii ni _ q i t e v e t _ tamaakut _ liite nagh ut _ , _ liigike nagh aqe ut _ .
T a a m _ tukugh ma _ may- ngam _ apeghtugh aqe kanganga _ .
ruuseghmii stun llu _ q i t e v m e n g l l u _ .
A g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ ungipamsug te aqe aanga _ .
taakut _ A t a a y a g h h a a m _ pillgilliqe tke vzigh ai _ suqagh t _ ugriilegh mun _ akikesaghtugh stekagh i _ , _ m a y o r - n g a k u n _ , _ umiileg akun _ ungazigh m _ .
tugu vzigh aat _ A t a a y a g h h a q _ , _ iwernga _ peglleghqute ma kangat _ .
atghagh naqe ghngaamta _ piniighte ghngaan _ wiin _ nuqnegh ainkut _ .
A t a a y a g h h a q _ apeghiigh na luku _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ igagh _ , _ t e s p a m u m _ ungazigh m _ igagh a _ , _ quyngigh m _ amu i _ atghagh te yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaa na _ ila a _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ sivuke luku _ taana _ wiin _ , _ atg- ghhagh _ pi vagilgan _ , _ taana _ ugriilegh mun _ kingu u uq _ mayor-nga _ ungazigh m _ A t a a y a g h h a a m _ s u q a m e n g _ akilpegagh yaghkagh _ veghute ait _ suqi a _ pi naqe nghite ait _ .
taagken _ atghagh ukut _ .
E S T A M A A
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i
S i n g a a w e t e g h l l a g e m _ U n g i p a m s u w a
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
neghigh luku _ aghnagh ghllag _ taana _ S i n g a a w e t e g h l l a g u f t u q _ ategh a _ , _ P i l u g u g e n k u n i t e f t u q _ sivungagh mi _ .
taakut _ pilugug m _ avaquti a _ aflengake ghllagu ai _ .
quunpeng _ a n Ê¼ g i g h a q e l g h i i t _ .
esnagh mun _ tawaten _ alla _ pi yalghiikut _ kana _ tekeghagh ani _ a n Ê¼ g i g h a q e f t u t _ .
tagsigh luta _ aglagh uute yamta _ ungipamsug te ainkut _ .
qenaagh kun _ aqume uute luta _ whangkuta _ n a g a s a q e f u t _ nunanigh ghllag _ .
pi yalghiimi _ , _ e l l n g i n Ê¼ n g u q _ sivuke luteng _ sivungagh mi _ kiyaghte yuwhaagh kau ut _ salin _ taakwna _ paaghqite luku _ .
N e g h s a g h l l a g u y a g h p e t u g h n g u q _ qazigyagh meng _ neli yuwhaagh aqngameng _ .
R e p a l l n g u q _ afta vig ngllagh luteng _ pi kau ut _ quug meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ .
qayughllak nguq _ unaghsigh ghllag u yaghpete uq _ tamaa na _ .
ellnga nge uq _ taana _ quunpeng _ p i y u g g a g h m e n g _ sivugh qaghte aqe lghii _ , _ akmag aatagh luni _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
taakwna nguq _ maaten _ nalugvig ughtekagh _ naayvagh ghrugllag u yagh uq _ kiiw m _ esne aneng _ kenle ke luni _ .
piyug nghmini nguq _ kiiw m _ esne akun _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
tekeghagh a nguq _ taana _ p e n g u g r a k e g s a g h t u q _ mingle a llu _ i g g a g r u k e g s a g h p e t u q _ .
I i w h l a k a y u g u y a g h t u g h n g u q _ k a n a v e r u g l l a k _ repall _ talughte luni _ .
iinghusaleg u uq _ wataghllak _ i i w h l a n g h a n i _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ ategh yaqunaki _ pi sqe lleg leg _ , _ uleve qaghtekayugu ni luku _ sukate pigte luni _ .
A y u m i g h n g u q _ taghnughhagh lghute _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ i i w h l a g m i _ uleve qaghte te luki _ .
ilangani _ tawaten _ ellngit _ neqangisag ma lghiit _ , _ iyataghnagh iqe ma lghiit _ .
talwa nguq _ tawani _ tepagh isag ghllag _ , _ elqwaagh isag ghllag _ .
elngaatall nguq _ quunpeng _ esnighqwagh aqe lghii _ taana _ S i n g a a w e t e g h l l a k _ .
sa meng _ naalkute na luni _ elqwaagh ghhagh meng _ .
atgenra _ ava isag ghllag _ .
alla _ unaangu pigte luku _ esnighqwagh luni _ pi yalghiimi nguq _ tekeghagh a _ , _ teskana nguq _ , _ i i w h l a g l u n i _ u n Ê¼ g a v e r u g l l a k _ ayuqe uq _ .
U n Ê¼ g a l l u n g u q _ elqwaaghtu uq _ qiliigh nagh _ , _ enraq _ iinghusaleg u lghii _ .
saama llu _ enraq _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a l g h i i _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ atg- ghhaghte yu ghngaaghmi _ .
aqume luni _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ ayuqe luni _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ a q u m t a a g h n g a a g h m i _ p a a g h q i l n g u g h m i _ , _ pama _ k e l u t a n g a n e n g _ kafsagtagh ma lghii _ .
Q i i v y a q m i n i g u _ taawa _ temngi _ nuna meng _ amigh k _ q e l p a g h m i _ , _ ava isag lghii _ .
A g h n a s q u g h h w a g h n g u q _ aane aqe uq _ q a l i p a a k a g h l l u n i _ , _ nuna meng _ g h h a t a g h n g a g h m i _ .
naten _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh nghminikek nguq _ ellnga nge uq _ legan _ n u n a k i i g h w a g h a q e l g h i i _ , _ sa aqe lghii _ kayaali inagh aqe lghii _ .
elngaatall _ qevuute luni _ e l l p e k n g a n a q a q e l g h i i _ s a n a y u k a n g a t n i _ .
naqam nguq _ , _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ k a f s a g t a g h n a n i n g h e g k e n i _ ava iitagh ke luni _ .
L e g a n Ê¼ n g u q _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh aqe ak _ ellnga _ uniigh naqe aqe lghii _ , _ qevuute pigte luni _ iwernga _ esteqe aqe lghii _ , _ t e g h h u m a n a q a q e l g h i i _ wata _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnagh ghllag mi _ whani _ , _ aghtugh amken _ seghlegh ghllag u uten _ elngaatall _ iknaqe uten _ .
whanga _ aane vike amken _ kayusigh nagh u luten _ neqangisag lghiisi _ .
enta _ tawani _ u t a q i i g i _ u n Ê¼ g a v e k _ saghna yagh te naqe amken _ . _ â
naagu nguq _ legan _ aga _ atghagh uq _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ talugh qaghte luni _ qalmesagh t _ awata itnun _ .
naqamllu _ mulupag gpenani _ uka nguq _ aliigh uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi nguq _ kenigh ghhagh ni _ imigh ghllag luku _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ kenigh ghhagh n _ . _ â _ key- nghmini _ a g h n a s q u g h h w a a m _ kenigh anun _ katag ma kangi _ .
E s g h a g h y a q m i n i k i _ , _ elqwaagh _ , _ tepe aq _ , _ uupa _ a l l a a g h i i n a q _ .
llaaghanwha nguq _ neghekagh t _ .
siingenllu nguq _ p i l l g h u g h u l l u k i _ neqengekagh t _ .
tawaten _ ungipamsug ma luku _ tagitug ghrug mi _ aglu k _ allgegh uk _ .
pi inkut _ whaa _ , _ â _ esghapag tekek _ aglu k _ a y e m n n a q a g k a _ . _ â

ayvegh m _ aglu kek _ tamaaken _ tugu lukek _ napaghte ak _ .
taagken _ t a z i n g a p i g h q a a g h l u n i _ uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ aglu k _ m i l u g h y a q m i n i k e k _ unake lukek _ aglu k _ ayemkaghagh ak _ .
aga llu _ aglu k _ akuuraate lutek _ aglu m _ qukagh kek _ gheve uk _ .
suna _ aragh qrug a _ , _ â _ A a g l u k _ a y e m t a g k a a _ . _ â

A y u m i g h n g u q _ ellngit _ tawaten _ n a g h a a q a y u d e t _ .
akuuraate lutek nguq _ aglu k _ gheve aqe lghiik _ llaaghan _ .
T a a n a n g u u q _ taawa _ S i n g a a w e t e g h l l a g e m _ ungipamsug a _ .
talwa _ salin _ quyngighqwaagh t _ neli llghite luki _ .
ellngit a nguq _ sivu nge aq _ neli yuwhaagh kaqe aat _ .
K u u g Ê¼ g h e g k e n k a _ M a y u k a a n k u k _ , _ A m a g u n k u k _ , _ P i i n t e g h l a m _ ighnegh kek _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ G u g i i n g e m _ kasivag te llegh a _ nanugh meng
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
ungipamsug _ ayumigh _ yuggagh _ pugughileghmii _ G u g i i n g e n _ , _ nanevgagh ghhagh ughte magh mi _ .
sukate yagh lghii _ , _ iknaqe yagh lghii _ nukalpigagh u luni _ .
nanevgagh luni _ sa nanigh magh mi _ , _ temngi _ esnagh mun _ ukig qagh luni _ siku gnun _ k a n a v e n g i i g h h a q _ pi yagh luni _ analghu ghllag t _ awata itni _ nanugh ghllag nkuk _ kasivag tke ak _ .
N a n u u n Ê¼ n g u q _ tamaakut _ kasivag lghii ni _ sughug i kayugu ut _ qimag igate ngugh t _ .
legan _ sughukagh a _ uka _ .
aatak _ mayugh aghtekagh _ analghu nun _ .
sa ite ngughk _ sanqute ite ngughk _ iwerngaqun _ s a v i g g a n i _ tafsimig ke luku _ .
qaygeghte qaghte luni _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ , _ uka _ legan _ nagnegh aqe uq _ nanugh ghllag _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ s a v i g g a n i _ amaaghaghte luku _ qule mun _ nengug te luku _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ , _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag nguq _ tukegh aghte ghllag luni _ l e g a n Ê¼ n g u q _ aga _ siigte ghllag magh mi _ kete mun _ pakegte ma lghii _ .
pelleghmun _ anagniigh utu te ma lghiik _ .
ellnga _ qule mun _ pamavek _ key- llegh kaghte i yaghtugh aghtekagh _ .
pugughilegh _ uusqagh lghii _ p a m a n l e n g u q _ nenge aat _ .
iwernga nguq _ nani _ k a n a n i n g i i g h h a q _ tuqu tke aat _ malighqagh luku _ .
qilag m _ taghnughhagh a
M e k e n e g h s i m _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ pagaliit _ aghnaqe kangat _ , _ pagaliit _ entaqun _ ungipaghagh itneng _ , _ angayuqagh mineng _ ungipagh aq _ entaqun _ liite qugh kaqe kangi _ .
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ nenge uq _ tamaa na _ t a n e m l e q a _ umiileg leg _ .
umiileg a _ nuna m _ t a m a a t u m _ t a l l i m a n e n g _ panig leg _ .
U k s a a g h u n n e g h i s t e n g u q _ aghnaghagh t _ pagunghagh eng _ pi aqe kangat _ .
elngaatall _ i n g h u y i q u t a q e l g h i i t _ .
T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ i n g h u y a n e n g _ kaate nghata _ naa ita _ pikegken _ aakagh itneng _ inghu sightu ait _ n i v u g h t e g h a q e g k a n g i _ .
alla _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh _ pi luni _ , _ pagunghagh _ saghna yaghqaaghte luni _ inghu yagh llegh mi _ tawaten _ inghu ghngaaghmeng _ u y u q l i g h p i g a a m _ nanigh ke aagh _ anglegute mineng _ s a n i v a g h q a a g h l u n i _ taghnughhagh _ n a g a q u g h w a a _ qiya lghii _ .
ighninghhagh _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqe luku _ qiya llegh akun _ taakwavek _ pi luni _ k a a s a q m i n i g u _ taghnughhagh _ ighninghhagh _ m e k e l g h i i g h a a f t u g h n g u q _ .
elngaatall _ a n e g h r e n g i t k e m m e n g _ tugu luku _ n i i v u s g h a m i n u n _ kanagh a _ .
K u u g Ê¼ g h i l n g u u t _ whaa _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ seghleghhalek _ angayuqagh gkenka _ quyake naqe ak _ k u u g Ê¼ g h i l n g u u t _ .
taagken _ uteghnigh uute luteng _ tawaten _ emta _ naa ita _ almesigh ghhagh mitun _ aakagh itneng _ whaken _ i n g h u k e g k i i t _ nivugh kangi _ .
U y u q l i g h p i g a a m _ inghu sightu a _ k a t a g y a q m i n i g u _ kii _ , _ aga _ sa u a _ ifkagh uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ taghnughhagh _ enraq llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u uq _ .
ii _ , _ quyake naqe na iqe a _ aghnaghagh m _ piyaqminigu _ , _ t e n g v i m u n _ , _ kipullegmun _ , _ naa an _ piyaqminigu _ .
â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ seghleghhalek _ waran _ ata n _ , _ u g w i k a _ nuna m _ m a t u m _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kagu _ .
S a k u s i i q n a q l l u u m a f t a n _ elngaatall _ .
yug ngunang _ aqsanguma ziin _ qavngaq _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ ungipaate ghngaatni _ aygughike a _ , _ yug ngunani _ aqsa nge sta _ legan _ .
U g w i n i _ nani _ qaga _ yug ni _ q e r n g u g h t a a g h u l l g h i i t _ .
itegh yan _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ yug mi _ whani _ , _ panig gpek _ k a y n g u s a g h a a t e s n a q l u g h a a t e n _ s a k u s i i q n a q l u g h w a a t e n _ .
waran _ nuna m _ qagugh m _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kangaten _ . _ â

â _ saa _ , _ sangama _ ? _ â
â _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ taana _ taghnughhagh _ . _ â

yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh luni _ , _ â _ naken _ pi a _ ? _ â
â _ entaqun _ esgha _ yug ngunani _ aqsanguma uq _ . _ â
yuug _ iisqiighute luni _ panig ni _ pi a _ , _ â _ W h a a n n a a n g h i t u t e n _ , _ aane ste naqe amken _ , _ qagavek _ lliigh naqe uten _ .
nunalgute mnun _ qagavek _ talwa _ kinku nun _ itegh snaanghite amken _ , _ liilightugh te naqe amken _ , _ tesqagavek _ temngi _ lliigh naqe uten _ . _ â _ taawa _ a a n e s i m a k a n g a _ .
nunalgute m _ nanglleg yagute ghngaaghmigu _ qayughllak _ pi ligu _ umiileg m _ iinghute kanga _ .
taawa _ tesqagavek _ lliigh uq _ .
uksaaqestagh ma kanga _ , _ k u m l a l u n i _ aqlaghaghte a _ , _ kumlate a _ .
I g h i v g a g h m i _ tawaten _ t a n q i g h l l u g l l a a k _ , _ taghnughhagh a nguq _ qiya ghllag _ .
sa meng _ tesqagani _ azigutagh ngllagh vyiigh luni _ kiyaghte aagh _ .
wata _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ k u m l a k a n g a _ .
T a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ uteghpaarkitaagh te aqe a _ .
qenwat _ mengilegyagute luku _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ taghnughhagh mi _ whani _ nanglleg ke gpenanga _ qiyaaqe ai _ , _ piyaqnagh te _ whanga _ lli aghte lunga _ . _ â
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ h i i k _ , _ tanqigh _ mamlegpag u uute uq _ .
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh ghngaaghmi _ me m _ t u n u t a n g a n e n g _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnaghagh mi _ w h a n i i _ , _ n a f u g h n a g h q u t e n _ e l l n g a a t a l l _ , _ aqfa aqe amken _ .
wasaq _ whanga _ angayuqagh gken _ n a n g l e g y a g u l l u k e k _ , _ nanglleg ke lukek _ ava ite ngugh k _ ighnegh ite ngugh k _ , _ elpegun _ tuune kaqsagh agka _ ighneghqagh meng _ .
tea- ai _ maligte nga _ aqfa aqe amken _ . _ â

piyaqminigu _ yuug _ , _ q a t e g h r a k e g t e p i g l l e g h i i m e n g _ , _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ aatkagh leg _ .
Q i m u g s i i f t u g h n g u q _ , _ qikmigh a _ q a t e g h r a k e g t e p e r u w a a g h e t _ qamagte luteng _ .
â _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ taghnughhite gnun _ tawavek _ . _ â
mayugh te a nguq _ , _ mayugh te a _ . _ ( _ uyatu pigte ma a _ pamavek _ qilag mun _ . _ )
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh aq _ meqsug uq _ .
salug naqe uq _ m e q s u g e m _ ikfiqe sta _ .
yug m _ akuzite aqe yagh kanga _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ kaate yaghtugh ukung _ , _ kaate kuvek _ meghe lleqe uten _ . _ â _ seghleghhalek _ sakniqe uq _ salug naqe uq _ .
qenwat _ yug m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aa-a _ , _ tawani _ utaqa i ai _ meghqe te qagh naqe amken _ .
W a t a g h l l a g n g a a m _ p u u g h t e s a q u n a n g _ .
taawa _ p u u g h t e s i m a k u v e k _ qayughllak qun _ elpek _ p i l q e g k e n _ taawa _ ifla lleqe uten _ . _ â _ naagu _ aghulaqe uq _ .
legan _ aghulaqe luni _ m u l u g h p a g l u n i _ me m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ ukavek _ qiive aghten _ , _ esghaqagh nga qun _ .
aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ . _ â _ ii _ , _ iike na ghhalek _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ q u w a y u w i g a t a g h h a g h m e n g _ elngaatall _ .
W a r a n Ê¼ n g a m _ taawa _ qiive aghte ait _ . _ â
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ nuqete yagh luni _ qiive uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ kaay _ , _ t a g n e q g a l e k _ qallevag kek _ ngevreghagte lutek _ .
â _ aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ , _ ukut _ aatkagh nka _ esghaqagh ki qun _ pi nigh ghllag t _ elngaatall _ . _ â

â _ yaghlegillu _ i n e g h t e n g n g w a a q a q s a g h a a n g a _ wataghllak _ kitumun _ p u u g h n a y u k a n g a n g a _ . _ â

â _ elngaatall _ puughte aaten _ t a a g u m _ yug m _ .
pi naanghite uten _ , _ naten _ pi naanghite uten _ . _ â _ qinu na ghhalek _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ aaghte ste laatagh uq _ .
legan _ qallevag gni _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ qallevag kek _ taake uk _ aate ak _ , _ melngu u luni _ qamiye m _ ingleghagh an _ a k u l a n g a k u n _ ifkagh uq _ .
taawa _ aghnagh _ taana _ ellnga _ , _ aatkagh i _ aate luki _ taghnughhite gnun _ itegh uq _ .
M u l u g h p a g l l a g l u n i _ pama _ yuug _ uteghnigh uq _ .
aapte a _ , _ â _ naagu _ qaame na a _ , _ s a l u w a a g h t u t e n _ ? _ â

â _ yaghlegillu _ utaqa i aqe unga _ ! _ â _ aghnagh m _ puughte a _ .
aghnagh aq _ sa luni _ pi li _ sama _ melngu ughte luni _ , _ akuzi na luni _ pi yagh uq _ , _ temngi _ legan _ aneghte ghllag uq _ .
naagu _ aga _ unite luku _ igleghte uq _ .
yug m _ liigike a _ , _ liigike ghngaaghmiki _ igleghte uq _ .
taawa _ s p a c e - m i _ entaqun _ nani _ tespagani _ kiyaghte uq _ taana _ melngu ughte luni _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ t u n g t u n Ê¼ n g u q _ uka _ tagi aqe ut _ q e r n g a g h n e g h e t _ .
amig igh te naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ , _ aklu i uute naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ ima nguq _ aga _ alpag aqe ut _ kaate ste gpenateng _ , _ suka ite ngughk _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tawaten _ alla _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ u k a n t e r u g p a g l l a g l u k i _ ima _ sivu kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te naqutke uq _ .
sivuligh t _ qenwat _ aga _ , _ qenwat _ naghughte ut _ .
( _ taana _ pegte aghte luku _ tespamavek _ lliigh naqe unga _ . _ )
taghnughhagh _ q i y a g h l l a a k _ , _ yug m _ liigike ghngaaghmigu _ .
navek _ pi luni _ kaate nghmini _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin mi _ naqam _ aviillegh mni _ ? _ â
â _ S a s q e l l u n g a _ pi aqe zinga _ kaki aqe lghiinga _ , _ wangi aqe lghiinga _ , _ tekegh ngllagh aqe lghiinga _ . _ â _ taawa _ yug m _ nepiigh te aqe kanga _ .
( _ taagken _ taawa _ tawavek _ uteghte unga _ ) _ .
aghnagh aq _ taana _ tungtu t _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ s i v u t g h u l l u k i _ elngaatall _ tume kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te ragkiigh uq _ .
kii _ , _ sivuligh t _ aga _ naghughte uute ut _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh m _ nalighnegh akun _ agtugh qagh aa _ legan _ , _ qallevag kek _ q u u p a g h s a q m i n i k e k _ , _ aghnagh _ qallevag mineng _ aane yalghiimi _ , _ aghnagh _ legan _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tagtalmi _ yug m _ aatkagh meng _ kelqe te luku _ ivagh yaghtugh aa _ .
taawa _ naalke ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ aghnagh mi _ w h a n i i _ t a a m e n g w h a _ tawaten _ k i y a g h t a a g h a q u t e n _ , _ pineghllug pigu ma ziin _ elngaatall _ .
naagu _ l i i l i g h t u g h w a a g h y a q e m k e n _ wataghllak _ puughte ste gpenang _ p i s q e l l u t e n _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ taglaate naqe amken _ .
kaate kuma _ tespamavek _ t u u n g l i i y u g s a q u n a n g _ wataghllak _ pi lghaaten _ . _ â
mayugh te luku _ kaat ute a _ , _ legan _ itegh uq _ kii _ , _ t a g h n u g h a a n _ quyake magh an _ taku luku _ q e t l l e g h a a t a g h a a _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ kiyaghte luteng _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ taana _ aghnagh _ .
P u u g h t i s t e n i _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ .
qavagh ste a _ k e n g h e k _ kumaghllug kek _ .
qavagh ngllagh luku _ tagtalmi _ takuyangllagh aqe luku _ , _ aghnagh _ teghtugh nanigh uq _ qavagh uq _ .
taana _ puughte i ste nga _ aghnagh _ .
taagken _ qavagh yan _ , _ keveg luku _ k e n g h e g n u n _ tazingavek _ aglagh te kestagh aa _ .
K e n g h e g n u n _ miluute a _ , _ yug m _ t a a m _ mayugh te ikagh m _ .
taagken _ aga _ a v i i l g h w a s t u n _ ukikagh _ k e n g h e g n e k u n _ taaggun _ .
taana ta _ ungipagh aq _ t a w a t e l n g u q _ , _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ S a t a n - e n k u k _ .
taake uk _ esgha _ ungipaghaate k _ .
kiyaghnegh ghllag m _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ whavek _ tuune kaqsagh kanga _ .
nuna m _ yug an _ tugukligh ma ite kanga _ .

ungipaghagh mta _ title- nga ta _ taana _ .
paninang _ akeqe luku _ kenegh mun _ anusimingllagh yaghqaqe kanga _ .
taana ta _ ungipaghagh an _ yug lgute mnun _ u n g i p a g h a a t k e s u w a q e g k e g k a _ .
N a g h u y a n g u g h t e k a q
M e k e n e g h s i m _ apegh llegh a
taane a _ tanemlleqa _ I m i n g a t e m _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ .
( _ aagna _ p a n i g g a q a _ whanga _ N a g h u y a _ . _ pugughilegh llu _ naghuyagh lgu lghii _ . _ )
naghuyagh m _ t a a m _ a t i i q e l u u g u t a n g a _ , _ N a a w y a n g u y a g h t u g h n g u q _ yug m _ ategh a _ taana _ .
iike te luteng _ entaqun _ pugughileghmii t _ ighnegh ke te lghiit _ .
taawa _ naghuyagh m _ t a a m _ , _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h l l a g e m _ entaqun _ kayusillegh _ t u u n y a q m i n i g u _ .
entaqun _ naghuyagh mun _ tawaten _ naghuyagh t _ kayute kellug ke i _ qutenge stekagh i _ .
taawanginaq _ l i i l i g h t u g h w a a g h l u k i _ pi kaqsagh kangi _ , _ wataghllak _ kelute mun _ qamagte luki _ ingaghte uute luki _ q a v a a t e s q e l l u k i _ kayagtekaqsagh kangi _ .
taana _ ataasigh _ entaqun _ nukalpigagh _ sa u a _ entaqun _ aygugh itagh ma uq _ , _ pineghllug ma uq _ tawaten _ ungipamsug ughte yaghqaa luni _ .
unaami _ aghte yagh kanga _ taakut _ kelute mun _ ingaghte uute nga lghiit _ , _ qute mete luteng _ elpeg kekagh t _ .
taana _ aviite uq _ .
taawa nguq _ N a g h u y a n g u g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
nani _ pennagh ni _ n a a n l l u k u _ apegh aqe yagh aa _ I m i n g a t e m _ u k u n u n _ legan _ A g l u g h a a n k u n u n _ aghqesaghtugh vig at _ .
taana _ N a g h u y a _ ellnga n _ talwa _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ I m i n g a t e m _ , _ yugu yagh lghii _ taana _ N a g h u y a _ .
taawa nguq _ m e l q u g h l l u u g t e g h l l a g l u n i _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
qalghigh llegh a _ iglaglluugte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ esghagh nanigh aat _ e n t a q u n Ê¼ n g u q _ aviighute ma uq _ .
taana ta nguq _ esgha _ s i v u n g h a t _ taakut _ A g a a n k u t _ .
ungipagh aq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ taana _ .
aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ qerngughte i uq _ elngaatall _ .
kii _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu yameng _ a l i n g i g a t u t a n g a n e n g _ atigh ma ut _ entaqun _ .
ima _ t a z i m k e r u g l l a a k _ ungipagh aq _ taana _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
U p e n g h a n g h a n i n g u q _ pungughmii t _ sikungigh te nghaani _ t a a k w n a a _ , _ enlegmete te _ pagavek _ aghviqagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
upenghagh ii yaghtugh aqe ut _ m a i n l a n d - m u n _ tespagavek _ .
upenghagh ii aqe ut _ tespagani _ ne eng _ punguug _ unite lukek _ .
A l i n g t i i t u n g a n g i n a g h h a q _ t a m a a n t a q e l g h i i _ ne mi _ tamaani _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayngun _ whaa _ sa u a _ q i n u y u w a a g h l l a k _ pi lleqe uq _ tughneghagh igh naqe yagh kumkek _ punguug _ , _ entaqun _ . _ â
esgha _ a y u m i r u g l l a g u g h n g a a g h m i _ nenglullug lgu ma uq _ alla _ , _ sivu liigh ait _ a a g k u r u g l l a g e t _ entaqun _ .
alingtagh u itu ngam _ t a a m _ s i v u l i i g h a n i _ n a a f q e n n a q i i _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh igh naqe ma kek _ punguug _ .
kelgugh ma lghii _ , _ kelgugh ma kanga _ P u n g u u m _ yug a _ neghyu i sqellug qu _ ellmeggnun _ .
nenglullug nun _ kaate luni _ nenglullug t _ qineghte luki _ ategh it _ tuqlughragh luki _ n a g a s i i s q e l l u k i _ P u v a l l a n a q n i l u n i _ .
T a a k u n u n _ aglagh luni _ taakwna _ atigh luku _ p u v a l l a n a q n i l u n i _ n a g a s i i s q e l l u k i _ .
elngaatall _ neqenge naqe lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ k e n Ê¼ g h h w a k _ kumaghllug kek _ , _ sasiqumtaagh at _ ayumigh _ k e n Ê¼ g h h w i g h l u t e n g _ neqe _ k e n Ê¼ g h h w a m _ u v i t a n g a n u n _ llilaghtu ghllag aqe luku _ .
W u u t u t k a g h q a n i _ tiguynge _ sa u a _ , _ tiguynge t _ tamaakut _ aksigutagh u aqe ut _ , _ ayumigh m _ tiguynge i _ .
anighqute ni _ , _ tamaakut _ tiguynge t llu _ iigh luki _ navek _ t u g w a a g h e s n a g h y a g h q a a l u k i _ .
kelgugh qu a _ elngaatall _ punguug _ .
I i i _ , _ w h a n i k u k e s t a q _ maligte luku _ t u g h n e g h a l u w h a q a a _ qerngughte yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ .
ila i nguq _ mingle meng _ tamaaken _ itegh aqe lghiit _ , _ ila i _ qule aneng _ paagken _ ukig aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ mingle meng _ naken _ taagken _ , _ ila i _ samaken _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte a _ .
â _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ . _ â _ iwerngaqun _ t u g h n e g h a l u w h a q _ neqe mun _ whavek _ sekete uute lghii _ .
taakut _ w u u t u t k a g h q a n i _ anighqute t _ tugu luki _ aliigh aghte te kete luki _ qete te a _ tuqu qu ghllag aa _ .
ila a nguq _ a l i g n a p i g l l e g h i i _ aga _ nuna m _ asi anun _ itegh aqe uq _ , _ pagavek _ qilaga nun _ , _ mingle mun _ .
ila a nguq _ aamta _ n a t e l n g u u t _ , _ temngi _ t e n p u t a g h a a q e l g h i i n Ê¼ n g u q _ tamaani _ tughneghaan- ghngaaghmeng _ elngaatall _ , _ taawa _ a l i n g r u u g h e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ .
tawaten _ kelengaruugh uq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
qavagh nanigh uq _ sa uq _ kelenga uq _ , _ a k i n a y u k a n g a t n i _ .
elngaatall _ qavagh m _ s a k n i q e s a t n i i _ ( _ ii _ , _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ qalmesagh ghllag _ i i n e g h m i n i i _ qute mun _ lliigh qagh yu k _ ) _ qalmesagh ghllag mun _ teskanavek _ atghagh luni _ qavangsi ma lghii _ , _ iye gni _ s u q w a g h h a g h m e n g _ ayagsightugh lukek _ inglugtun _ , _ esghapag pigte lghii stun _ legan _ qavagh _ .
I y e g _ naqam _ t a g h p a g h r a k e g l l a g e k _ , _ taawa _ qavagh uq _ .
ii _ , _ m e n g e g h a g l l a g e m _ teghtugh a _ elngaatall _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ paga nguq _ esnagh mi _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ .
guutute kaghagh ni _ taakut _ k e l q e l l u k i _ tawani _ .
K a y a g t a g h w a a g h u t a q e f t a a t _ tughneghaan- lgute meggnun _ tamaavek _ .

â _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ aa _ K a n a n t a g h a a m _ pi naagh aa _ . _ â _ K a n a n l e n g u u m _ tughneghagh m nguq _ mingle anun _ kayagte te a _ .
â _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ aa _ P i k a n t a g h a a m _ pi naagh aa _ . _ â _ P i k u m _ q u u l v a n l e n g u u m _ tughneghaan _ .

ii _ , _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ aa _ taawa llu _ whanga _ .
makete qaghte te kete luku _ guute laatagh ma kangi _ .

taawa nguq _ tughneghagh igh te a _ .
naten _ kiik _ lliigh nghaani _ atghagh uute kayug t _ enleg meng _ t e s p a g k e n _ .
atghagh uute luteng _ elngaatall _ uksaaqestagh aa _ punguug ni _ tawani _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani qun _ mangteghagh t _ sa aqe lghiit _ miigtagh aqe lghiit _ w e t n g a a q w a a q e l g h i i t _ aqlagha mi _ .
T a k e v u q _ igleghte ma lghii _ , _ alingtagh u itu ngam _ kelengake ma kanga _ , _ s a a v g u m i i g h w a a g h l u n i _ ii _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ kangigh a _ iiyagh kun _ kanaghte luku _ , _ taagken _ n u q n e g h t e g h y a g h q a a _ .
wetku _ kaate kan _ naghulleg yaghqagh a _ .
mangteghagh nun _ k a a n n e g h m i n i i _ qagugh mig te ghllag aqe luni _ siklaate luni _ .
qama _ akite aqe kangat _ tenglugtugh aqe kangat _ , _ kii _ i q l i n q e g s a g h m i _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ siklaate luni _ .
iinghute ma ka nge a _ ellmeggnun _ kaate kan _ akite fqaan _ tenglugtugh fqaan _ p i s q e l l u k i _ .
taawa _ ellngit nun _ pi luni _ , _ akite nghite nghatni nguq _ , _ kii _ ii _ , _ q e n Ê¼ n g u l l i q e g h l l a g l u n i _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ .

ii _ ii _ , _ n e n g s a l g h i i m i _ elngaatall _ T a k e v u q _ anagniigh yalghiimi _ .
uyiigh _ qamaken _ nuqnegh kanga _ elngaatall _ .
nenglu _ pikegken _ segge ma kanga _ segge ma kanga _ , _ naange naqe yan _ uyiigh m _ kangigh a _ kaate yan _ peghhe qagh ma kanga _ .

uksaagh mi _ taakwani _ uksugh luni _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ p i y a a t a a g h l u n i _ navek _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ , _ mangteghagh _ suna _ taana _ .

gaagh te naqe aat _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ aa _ s i v u g l l u n i n g u g h a a _ , _ â _ aqelqagh ka _ aa _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ g a a g h u t e g g u u _ .
gaagh te ggu _ n e g h e s t e g g u u _ tuugkagh rraag meng _ , _ giimagh rraag meng _ , _ i q u u y a r r a g m e n g _ . _ â _ ahaa _ , _ gaagh te sqe ma kanga _ .
atightugh luki _ imanagh t _ sa u aat _ giimagh rraag t _ , _ i q u u y a r r a a g e t _ , _ tuugkagh rraag t _ , _ tapghaaghagh at _ .
gaagh te aat _ elngaatall _ .
ugute luteng _ negh ma lghiit _ .
neqnigh ghhalek _ imanagh _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ neghe a _ .

legan _ tawaten _ pi uq _ , _ ii _ a n g v a n g h a k u n _ u g m e s t a a l l g h a k u n _ tuugkagh _ , _ giimagh _ , _ i q u u y a q _ legan _ piisqaghte a tuq _ , _ tapghaaghagh _ tamaa na _ uya iigh aq _ .

ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ taana nguq _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
elngaatall _ n e q e n g y u p a a r u g l l a k _ urang _ .
Q u u n p e n g u q _ naken _ p i y a a n e n g _ , _ angyagh neng _ kaate nghmini _ n e g h s a g h s i g h a g h l l a g l u n i _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ elngaatall _ nulighh an _ nefku ghllag aqe kangi _ ila i _ negh kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ nayug luki _ , _ nayug luki _ negh kangi _ kanaghte uute aqe luki _ .
tagtalmi _ taagken _ yuug _ neqete nanigh yalghiimi _ , _ neqe meng _ kaat ute na nigh yagh lghii mi _ , _ ima _ neqe ngllagh ghllag qagh a _ taana _ nefku ghllag _ avangite te a _ negh ke igh te uk _ , _ yuug _ neqenge yu igh te yalghiimi _ .

neqenge nanigh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ U p u u p e n g _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh meng _ pi yagh kuma _ entaqun _ negh nayagh ukung _ ighivgaqun _ . _ â
pennagh nun _ nunivag yagh yalghiimi _ , _ tawaten _ saghna ma luku _ , _ u g w i n g a n g u q _ uka _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ qaya ghhagh a _ taglagh yalghiimi _ .
kii _ sama nguq _ usingigh yalghiimi _ neqe ghllag _ u g w i n g a n _ qaake ma kanga _ .
N a k e n Ê¼ n g u q _ pennagh m _ saye aneng _ taakwegken _ aghnagh _ aane luni _ kayusiite luku _ ima nguq _ aga _ i t e g h a a t u k _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ , _ uyghag m _ asi anun _ , _ amig anun _ tawavek _ i t e g h a a l l u t e k _ aga nguq _ umeg te uk _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ U g w i k a _ taameng _ n e q e n g y i i g h u l l i i _ , _ aghnagh meng _ naalkute ma lghii _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ whaa _ . _ â _ aglagh ma lghii _ nunivagte gpenani _ .
kaate yan _ u g w i n i _ p e m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ sangavek _ neqenge yu igh te ziin _ ? _ â
â _ esgha _ sangama _ n e q e n g y i i g h u s k a n g a n g a _ . _ â
taagken _ aghnagh _ quunpeng _ a g h h u t a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ pi ghllag ughte uq _ .
U g w i n i _ a g h u l a q e n g h a n i _ ellnga llu _ a g h u l a q a q l l u n i _ .
allamenguq _ pi yalghiimi _ ataasigh meng _ aghneghmi _ , _ aghnagh ngugh _ taawa _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ aqumga aqe uq _ , _ iwhani _ pellugtugh aqe uq _ elngaatall _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ .
taku ma kanga _ aghnagh m _ t a a m _ .
â _ sangavek _ agavek _ ne mun _ aglagh igate ziin _ , _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h p e k _ pellagh yug igate ziin _ ? _ â

â _ nakaa _ , _ ne ke aqa _ una _ neghightagh u unga _ una _ ne ke aqa _ whanga _ . _ â
â _ kumakigh te aghte ltung _ ? _ â
aa _ , _ aa _ i g h s a k e s t a m i k u n Ê¼ n g u q _ angegh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ gaagh aqe uq _ neghsagh meng _ esla kun _ elngaatall _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ sivuke luten _ kumakigh laken _ . _ â _ aqume luni _ taagken _ ingaghte ste luku _ kumakigh aa _ .
qavagh ngllagh aa _ elngaatall _ kumakigh aa _ , _ ima nguq _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh yan _ aghsug kestagh luku _ nuna kun _ lli kestagh luku _ ugke a _ taana _ qallaqugh ghllag _ tugu luku _ sigutanga kun _ aghnagh m _ kuuve ma kanga _ legan _ tuqute luku _ .
I i l q w a _ qaamna _ , _ sigute kek _ panegh yalghiimek _ tuquma lghii _ .
tuqu yalghiimi nguq _ taakwavek _ i q r a g h q e l l u n i _ llangaqa nguq _ ighyaghqesagh lghii mi _ i q l i g h m i _ .
aqume ste luku _ , _ aqume vyiigh ste luku _ , _ pelluk u a _ tawavek _ , _ iigge nge ai _ piifte luki _ , _ aqumgagh an _ tawaten _ unite ma kanga _ .
U n i l l u k u u _ pennagh m _ qaye ani _ taklaghte luni _ kelengake ma kanga _ qaya ghhagh _ taglagh yaghqagh _ , _ u g w i n i _ .
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ taglagh yalghiimi _ usi ii ghllag luni _ , _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ kaate yan _ esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh siigh ni _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ sa ni _ , _ elngaatall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â _ tuqu kau lghii _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
â _ egmiinaq _ sukate luten _ a g h n a q e l q u s i g p e n a n g _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â

â _ naqam _ i q l i g h p e k _ tespikani _ esghapag nga _ .
egmiinaq _ tea- ai _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ neqe ghllag u unga _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ â _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ naqam _ i q l i g h p e k _ esghapag nga _ . _ â _ qenwat _ sakrite uq _ .
uughqaghte luni _ s a y u g a g h s a q m i n i g u _ imani nguq _ uniistaaghhagh u uq _ .
P i y a q m i n i g u n g u q _ t u q u u l u n i _ , _ a n e g h n e g h s u g h y a q m i n i g u _ .
ii _ akuqagh luku nguq _ elngaatall _ yuug _ qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi _ inag mig ke luku _ nuliigh siigh ni _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ taana _ .
qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi nguq _ , _ qiyaaghwagh ma luku _ aghnagh m _ nuliigh pig an _ t e s p a m u m _ pennagh m _ q a a y n g a n i l n g u u m _ unite ma kanga _ .
nalleghaghhalek nguq _ naagu _ yuug _ .
kii _ kaate yalghiimi nguq _ up- ke aa _ qayugh a _ kaleve qaghte luni _ .
kaate luni nguq _ , _ â _ kii _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete uten _ ? _ â
â _ aa _ , _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete unga _ . _ â _ E s g h a l q u g p e n a a n Ê¼ n g u q _ iye gni _ iigh manginagh lukek _ , _ gginagh ni _ iigh manginagh luku _ .
kayusigh qu luku _ , _ taglaate qugh lgusigh luku _ i t e g h a a l l u t e k _ aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ sa yamek _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ . _ â
â _ esghaghhu _ nutaan _ neqenge yalghiinga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh yalghiinga _ entaqun _ iye gka _ puuve uk _ . _ â
gaagh ragkiigh lutek _ negh te kete luku _ .
â _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ â _ taawa _ naghughte nghminigu _ , _ â _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ â
qenwat _ yug m _ t a a m _ u g w i n g a n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U u m l l e q a _ pi ma kanga _ ! _ â _ taawa _ iye k _ puuve ghllag ni lukek _ q i n u n a g h q u t k e s a q m i n i g u _ .
â _ U u m l l e q a _ pi ma kanga _ â _ , _ t a w a t e n Ê¼ n g u q _ pi tkellug qu _ uulegh u ma lghii _ tawaten _ pi magh mi _ .
U u m l l e q a _ pi ma kanga _ .
taawa _ ungipaghaate m _ kenle ke a _ .
tefaay _ a l i i n g h a k u u n _ !

pugughilegh
K a a v a m _ apegh llegh a
pugughileghmii u llegh ut
Q u y n g i g h t u u m a g h m e n g u q _ anguyag nge luteng _ anag ma lghiit _ qavagh nanigh naqe yameng _ aate yameng _ .
tawatete ut _ naqamalla _ whaa _ a a p g h w a a g h a q a _ nagate lleg mtun _ .
sangan _ u g l a g h y a g a g h l l a g e n n g u q _ W a l a n g a m _ a a p g h w a a g h y a q m i n i g u _ tazingani _ aa sa mi _ .
nenglu _ ataasigh _ nenglu ghrug ghllag _ , _ yugunqegte pigte ma aqe aat llu _ .
angayuqagh gket _ tawani _ n e n g l u k s a q e m e g g n i _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg nguq _ W a l a n g a m _ apegh llegh ani _ , _ aanleghaate luni _ angyaghugh te aqe uq _ , _ angyagh _ , _ tesqamaken _ .
â _ tawaten _ sikig stun _ entaqun _ , _ â _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ .
taagavek _ nenglu ngllagh luteng _ , _ taakwavek _ taana _ ataasigh _ a n g a y u q a g t e n g _ tuumkellug qu _ .
A g h v e g h t a q e g k a n g a n n g u q _ elngaatall _ .
Y u g w i l n g a s i y u g w e m _ u n g i p a g h q a n g l l a g h y u g w e m _ k a a t e p i g n e g h i n k u t q u n _ esghaghhu _ .
aghvenge luteng _ , _ yugtu pigte lghii _ entaqun _ maaghaghte aqe kangit _ aghvenge ghngaaghmeng _ .
nuugh aqe lghiit _ .
Y u g i l n g a s i y u g w e m _ k a a s i m a k a n g l _ .
A g h v e l q a a g h a g h l l a g a _ tungyugh u uute yagu _ mat- llegte luku _ , _ qaye igh luku _ , _ putuugh luku _ iighsugh ma kangat _ mangtag a _ a l i i g h q e l l u k u _ .
G h h a t a g h s i m a k a n g a t _ pakag aat _ amalka _ .
nengqe ghllag luteng _ ukut _ tapghaghrag t _ iighsuute t _ .
amenqun _ uughqa _ esgha _ nangaghte aqe kanga _ uksaagh mi _ .
katelghaate ghllag yan _ , _ s a n q u t a a t e n g _ peghu luki _ t a a g a g u n _ .
ii _ , _ qelegh kangit _ legan _ tesamavek _ .
kergamqun _ samavek _ k a g p e s t a a l l g h a n u n _ lliigh yuwhaagh kau ta i _ taakwegkut _ kepe ma kangit _ .
ngiigte ghllag luku _ ila a _ kete mun _ a t e g h u g l l u k u _ .
waame lghii _ una _ legan _ s a n q u t a a t e n g u q _ tugulagh luki _ t u q u q u g h t a a g i i t _ qamagte luki _ .
ungipagh ngllagh naqe m _ piyaqminiki _ .
taagken _ taana _ t a a n a n g i n a q _ tume _ .
taku vigkagh a _ aasa mun _ uksugh mi _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a q _ .
naken _ sani gneng _ taku vig ite ngughk _ .
awiim _ neqe igh negh ke uq _ sa u a _ , _ sengngugh qagh yu k _ .
nagaqugh luteng _ entaqun _ aki naqe naqe lghiit _ .
megh meng _ taana _ kuvugh ghllag ma kangat _ tume _ taana _ .
S i k w a a g h a a g h t e s t e g h l l a g u m a k a n g a t _ , _ iwerngaqun _ samavek _ nategh anun _ .
taakwna _ , _ sani kek _ iighagh vigkagh meng _ u n Ê¼ g a v e k _ nategh anun _ .
I w e m g a q u n _ t e s k a n a n i _ n a t e q l i s a g h a m i _ uglagh luni _ guutute kaghqaghtuumagh mi _ , _ l e g a n n g u q _ s u g h u g w i _ kaate nghmini _ taakwani _ estu laghate te aqe lghii _ .
estu ma luku _ tuqu qu ghllag luku _ nateqlitekagh _ t e s k a n a n i _ pi aqe luku _ .
sughug ghllag _ qamagte ma kangat _ .
aki naqe m _ qavagh nanigh ma lghiit _ quunpeng _ kelenga ghllaget _ .
esla kegte na iqe yagh kangat _ .
quyngigh eng _ u m u l g h a a m a k a n g a t _ siku gnun _ .
T e s a m a g u n n g u q _ , _ aasagh mii lgu uq _ tesamna _ n a t u n g w a a _ pugughilegh m _ u g w a l i g h n e g h a _ .
aasagh mii lgu uq _ .
taaggun _ uugte ma lghiit _ quyngightugh ma ghllag meng _ .
quyngigh at _ tuqu ghllag ma lghii _ , _ e n t a q u n n g u q _ taakwani _ qavaghtagh llegh mi _ t a g h y u g h t u p a g l l a g e m _ .
â _ kii _ , _ u u g g u t k a t a a m a a t _ . _ â

tuqu qugh ma kangat _ n a a n g t e v z i g h l u k u _ .
tazimaken _ ima _ q u y n g i n g y a q l e g e s t u n _ .
tawaten _ entaqun _ gheve luteng _ , _ segheve luteng _ .
nalighnegh i _ e n r a g h n g a m n g u q _ , _ qafsinagnegh _ angyagh _ tawaten _ naayghagh nun _ pugughilegh _ k e t g h u t e q a g h l l u k u _ .
ila it _ taakut _ veghute ma lghiit _ .
â _ entaqun _ W a l a n g a t _ maaten _ .
whangkuta _ unegte ukut _ .
tawatete uq _ ungipagh a _ avatmii u lleg mta _ .
A g a r u g l l a a k _ .
pugughileghmii t
S a a m a a _ nagaqugh qaghaqe ukut _ q a v n g a r u g l l a k _ ategh _ A g h n a n g i i g h a q _ , _ N u n i i v a a g h m i _ .
whangkuta _ ateghkagh ut _ A g h n a n g i i g h a q _ .
G u g w i i n g e m n g u q _ nayag ke yaghpete a _ .
entaqun _ ipa u uq _ .
G u g w i i n g e n _ avatmii _ apa ka _ , _ apa ma _ ata a _ .
A n a n g w a a n a a g u q _ a p a g h p i g a q a _ s i v u l i g h p i g a q _ .
alla _ sivuligh leg _ .
T a a k u n e n g _ allgegh kau unga _ A n a n g w a a n a a n k u n e n g _ , _ G u g w i i n g e n k u n e n g _ , _ N a p a q a g h h a a n k u n e n g _ , _ Y u g n i i l q w a a n k u n e n g _ .
esghagh nghiteqaghte aqa _ nuughtugh qaghte aqa _ G u g w i i n g e n _ .
allgegh magh ma _ tuqukagh _ , _ wallu _ allgegh ste gpenanga _ .
nulighh a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ W a a l l a _ .
nanevgagh magh mi _ entaqun _ tugukagh a _ .
N u l i i g h p i g a a _ P a n g a n g a n g u f l u q _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ a p a g h p i g a q a q a _ Y u g n i i l q w a a m _ ata a _ u u m _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ , _ I t e g h y a g h a a m _ k u u g g h a _ .
W a a l l a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ , _ ukut _ I m e g y u u t e n k u t _ pi ke aat _ .
kiyalighagh mii u ut _ taakut _ ukut _ A y w a a g h m i i t _ nani _ qangeghsagh mii t _ .
M a l g h u g h q e l l u t e n g _ entaqun _ n u n a g h q a a t _ qangeghsagh _ .
U n m e g g a a n k u t _ , _ S u m u u s i n k u t _ , _ alaka ghhagh nkut _ kiyalighagh m _ yug ke ai _ .
maalghug _ alaka ghhagh k _ sivuligh llu _ kinguligh llu _ pi nigh staghhiinagh k _ qamagte lutek _ .
W a a l l a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tagi ukung _ enmis _ whangkutung _ .
tesamani _ pugughilegh mi _ k i y a g h l l e g h i i _ .
tespikavek _ qemi mun _ k e l u t e m m n i l n g u g h m u n _ mayugh lutung _ , _ segesqugh gmikun _ ayapegh luni _ aliineghllug _ k i w a t m u n _ nekegte luni _ aghuliigh aqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ qama _ kiyalighagh mun _ u m y u g w a k _ k a a t n g w a a g h l u t e k _ .
akuzillegh it _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ iitek _ whangkutestun _ anagte yaghqaa gpenateng _ tusaqe neghllugte yaghqaa gpenateng _ .
ungipamsug ke llegh a _ taana _ ellnga _ kiyalighagh mi _ , _ panignaghllug u yagh lghii nguq _ ellnga llu _ .
repall _ ne u yagh lghii _ W a a l l a _ taagani _ avaqutaghllug u lghii _ avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ .
ukegken _ enraq _ yug nge kau na yu kan _ pi aqe aat _ nallu negh ke te ziin _ , _ kiyalighagh _ .
alaska- meng _ , _ m a i n l a n d - m e n g _ .
Q a n t a g h a n l l e g h a n e n g _ taakwegken _ .
tawaten _ m a l g h u k l i t k e m m e n g _ , _ n a l l u n q e m m e n g _ a n g l i s a g h t e g m a _ taakut _ , _ aamta _ k e n q i g t e n g n g w a a g h p e n a t e k _ temngi _ yug nge kau na yu kan _ tazimaken _ pi aqe aat _ .
A g a a n k u t _ nagaqugh aqe anka _ saghumig nkuk nguq _ N a a g h u l u u n k u k _ avaqutagh ke ait _ walluumllu _ naa gket _ maalghug _ .
ivagh i ma nkut _ , _ tan- qagh u yankut _ , _ A g a a n k u t _ , _ K a r g i n k u t _ .
A g a a m _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ nengyugh ka _ .
I t e g h y a g h a a m _ aag na nga _ avatmii u uq _ .
naqamllu _ atghagh kau nghite ngugh ni _ t a z i n g a n i r u g l l a k _ a a g n a p u t _ aneghtekagh t _ tawaten _ .
T a w a t e l g u t k u t n g w a a g h n i i q i i t _ akuzillegh it _ .
enkaam _ A g a a m _ avaqutagh ke ai _ K a v n a g h u u n k u t _ , _ A g l u g h a a n k u t _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t _ , _ U k u m a n k u t _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ M a g h q a n e q _ .
allameng _ nuyekligh lgu ut _ nalug iqe yagh aat _ .
nagate lleg mni _ peleghqe tke ai _ K a r g i m _ , _ S a g h u m i g e n k u n g u u k _ S i n g i g p a a y a n k u k _ .
taagani _ qungughvig ni _ peleghqe ma na iqe ait _ .
A g a a m _ aag llegh a _ avaqutagh a _ K a r g i m _ ellnga n _ ila a _ .
K a r g i _ , _ A g a q _ , _ tan- qagh u nga _ , _ ivagh i ma _ taakut _ liisimake anka _ .
taana _ T u t m a t e l e k _ A q u l a g e n k u k _ Q a a q w a a n k u k _ avaqutagh ke ak _ .
qaaqu aq _ aghnagh u uq _ esghagh ghllag kaqe aqa _ t a a m _ maaten _ G u g w i i n g e m _ ata lgu ta an _ nayag a _ .
T u t m a t e l g e m _ n u l i g h q e s u w h a a g h a _ P i n i r k a g u f t u q _ .
taagken _ nengyugh ghhagh ka _ puughhute _ .
ivagh i ma _ kingulighpigagh _ .
avaquti a _ A n a g h a y a a n k u t _ , _ aki vig nkut _ , _ nategh mii nkut _ .
Y u g n i i l q w a a q _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighneghqagh ke a _ sa a _ qangigagh a _ , _ ilughagh n _ avaqutagh ke a _ .
T u t m a t e l g e m _ nayag a _ T e n m i i w e n _ , _ t a a n a n g i n a q _ liisimake aqa _ .
T a a k w n a a _ atalgute ni _ aviighute uute kau na iqe a _ uglagh ghllag na iqe yagh ai _ .
U n g u q t i _ i l u g h w a a _ , _ Q a a y a a m _ avaqutagh a _ , _ Q a a q w a a n k u t _ k u u g g h a t _ .
Q a a y a q _ t e s a m k u m i i n g u u q _ ilate nga uq _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
N a l i g h n e q a g h p u t _ whangkuta _ pikagh ut _ Q a a q w a a m _ kugegh ke a _ alla neng _ ata leg _ .
G u g w i i n g e m _ itegh yagh aq _ panig a _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ .
anglegutetu yagh lghii _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
anagutagh ghhagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh ma _ ataata ke a _ puughhute m _ .
A n a g u t a a m _ ata a _ melqughtu u na iqe aat _ .
aaga _ A n a g u t a a m _ nulighh a _ .
avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ tagneghli meng _ , _ peleghqe tke aat _ puughhute m _ k u u g g h a n _ .
atghagh u nga _ A g a a n k u t _ panike aat _ allughqagh m _ t a w a a t e n _ anagutagh mete te _ lli aqe aq _ .
tan- qagh u nga _ A g a a m _ nayag ke a _ .
G g i n a q u t k a n i k _ esghaqagh u lutek _ .
A a m t a y a q _ aghyugh kau uq _ naagu _ tamaani _ sa kaghqagh ghhagh _ .
K a r g i m _ avaquti a _ ayuqligh nkuk _ S i n g i g p a a y a n k u k _ .
Y u g w a a g h h a q _ puughhute m _ ata a _ , _ nulighh a _ N a a n g i i g h a q _ .
avaqutagh ke ai _ Y u g w a a g h h a a m _ , _ pekete te aq _ , _ agigte te _ , _ puughhute _ , _ N a l u g w i _ .
Y u g n i i l q w a a q _ e l l n g i n a q e l t a g h h a q _ ata ka _ .
naqam _ i l u g h w a l g h u t a n g i _ taakut _ , _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t _ .
A n a g h a y a a q _ taana _ anglegutkaghqagh a _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ , _ I k a n u q _ , _ N a l u g w i _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh ke a _ Y u g n i i l q w a a q _ .
Q a a n a a n k u t _ t e s a m a n t u q _ ama _ ramke t _ allakagh meng _ .
tanem _ avaqutagh a _ t a a n a n g i n a g h h a g h s u g n i l l u k u _ nagate te qugh aqe aqa _ elqwaagh ghqu _ , _ T a q a a n g a n k u k _ .
pugughileghmii t _ naqamllu _ whaten _ whangkutestun _ pugughileghmii stun _ qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh at _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ naqam _ .
alla t _ nunatagh t _ kinku t _ ungipagh ke igate ait _ .
iitek nguq _ nunatagh meng _ nula u yagh uq _ taku aqe luku _ whaten _ negh naqe m _ s a a m _ amenqun _ ivagh i ghllagu yagh lghiit _ , _ neqe _ taana _ .
nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ whaken _ qiighqagh m _ y u g w a n _ lliigh vike aqe luku _ nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ .
atigh llegh i _ pugughileghmii u nghite ngugh t _ , _ naqamllu _ liigike llghite anka _ n a k u m i i n g w a a q l u t e n g _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ t a a n a n g u u q _ nagate lleg mni _ N u n g u g w e n k u g n e n g _ A n a g h a y a a n k u g n e n g _ .
negh naqe m _ aneghneghte naqe m _ siivanllegh i nguq _ piiwagh mafte ut _ kiyang _ tawaten _ k e v g a g h q a l i g h l u t e n g _ .
legan _ nenglu meng _ taagken _ w h a n g k u n n e n g _ q e m g a g h m e t e g h l l a l l e m m n e n g _ aane luteng _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwaghkagh t _ , _ qavngaq _ imani _ .
ataasigh u yagh ukut _ , _ ataasigh mi _ nenglu mi _ , _ pelleghqagh ke te llegh u uq _ .
qafsina t _ entaqun _ kiyalighagh mun _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ ata ii qugh stegkangi _ A n a g h a y a a m _ tanem _ taagken _ nenglu meng _ aanekagh t _ ighsake te te nkut _ , _ silas-tu te te nkuk _ K i y a l i g h a m e l n g u u k _ .
kiyalighagh mun _ lli aqe aat _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ tesakmani _ nula ghllag lghii _ .
taagken _ nenglu meng _ ataasigh meng _ aane luteng _ piiwaghkagh t _ .
maani llu _ sivungagh mi _ nula aqe uq _ .
tawaten _ nagate vyiigh llegh ke aqa _ taagken _ a n g l i s a g h t e g e m n e n g _ .
N a g a s u g w i g a s a l g h i i n g a l l u _ qemall _ maaten _ avuteghqe ghllag _ .
neqamike yaghqagh t _ liigi _ n e q a m i k e s q e l l u k i _ ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ .
W a a k i g a l n g u g h n i _ .
taana _ ayumightagh ghllag _ qaaqu aq _ u n g i i p a m s u g t a a g h l l a k _ w a a k i g a l k e f u t _ .
I m i n g a t e m _ sa kagu _ ?
sakegh nghite a _ I m i n g a n _ s a k e n g h i t a g h p u t _ iike nagh te mineng _ nulighhtuqagh _ .
aghnagh nge naqe m _ akequsagh ke luku nguq _ yugusigh ni _ , _ i i n g k e r u g l l a k _ ellngit ni _ tawani _ nengaawagh u lghii _ .
T u t m a t e l g e m _ n a n g l l e g t a p a a y u g u t m i n e n g _ tugukligh laatagh qagh a _ .
alla ghllag _ quutmii neng _ ungazigh meng _ allgeghkagh _ , _ allgellegh a _ entaqun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
taakut _ A a l a a n k u t _ , _ A n a n g w a a n a a n k u t _ A a z u g w e n k u n n g u q _ anglegute ke te ut _ , _ apa nka _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ taana _ A a l a a q _ n u y e k l i g h p i i g a q _ A n a n g w a a n a q _ , _ A a z u k _ uyuqligh _ , _ lluu yu k _ maaten _ sakemna _ .
avaqutagh lgutu te lghiit _ .
taake uk _ melngu nkuk nguq _ T a p g h a l u g w e n k u k _ A a l a a m _ avaqutagh ke ak _ .
taana _ A a z u k _ uyuqligh _ panig inagh meng _ , _ Q a a q w a a n k u k _ , _ P a n i k u t a a n k u k _ .
temngi _ neqamike vyiigh llegh nka _ puygutagh unga _ apegh anka _ .
nepiigh igate yagh uk _ angli saghteke _ a a g n a m m n e n g _ ungipagh meng _ .
repall _ maaten _ avuteghqe aqe unga _ .
elngaatall nguq _ a g h v i t e g h l l a k _ u t a q i i g a q n a a g h t a n n g u q _ ingutugh meng _ .
ingutugh meng _ kiyang _ .
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ itagnaghi nghata _ a g h v e s a g m e n g u q _ kayagte aqe ait _ .
nemeghqagh u luki _ suqi a _ .
tagtale mii _ a a n g e p a a g h r u g m e n g _ q a a n n g w a a g h q a m e n g _ sa yaghqagh meng _ pakegte aqe luki qun _ amen _ sa ngllagh yaghqagh meng _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ nagaqughsugnite aqa _ whaa _ nagate llegh ka _ sa u a _ yuug _ Q a a q a m e n g u q _ ategh leg _ .
nakaan _ una _ Q a a q a _ ungazigh mete ngughk _ kina _ t a a n a n g u n g h i l n g u q _ .
ategh qu te _ a l l a k u s n a q _ uglagh lghii _ .
repall _ nagaqugh aqe lghiinga _ K i y a l i g h a q l u n g u q _ Y a a v g a g h s i l g u y a g h t u q l u _ , _ ategh ite ngugh lgu yagh uq _ .
S a k u n n e g h i l n g u u t _ ategh i _ akuuraate nga lghiit _ .
Q a a q a _ P u g u g h i l e n g l a q a q
taana _ sa u a _ Q a a q a _ pugughilegh ngllagh qagh ngugh _ .
sivuke luni nguq _ T u p n a g h q u n _ nekegtekau yaghpete uq _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ u l a p n a a r i q l u n i _ t a w a t e s u g w n i _ nagate aqa _ pugughilegh _ nallagh ma kanga _ neqetu ghllag _ , _ nanugh ghllag _ enraq _ .
entaqun _ upenghagh mi wha _ nallagh ma nghite agu _ , _ aghvegh ghllag nguq _ kellii ni _ tamaa na _ qavregh ghllag _ .
taawa _ entaqun _ takukagh a _ a l i n g y u g w i g a t u t m i n e n g _ nanugh meng _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ nanugh _ tawaten _ .
entaqun _ y u n g y u w h a a q _ nutaan _ nalluke kangat _ .
nanugh m _ ne ke luku _ .
ii _ , _ nenglu ngllagh llegh ke te luku _ l e g a n n g u q _ nenglu i _ ifkaghte aqe ai _ nanugh m _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ qule iqe te lukek _ a s i v a n l l u k u _ a s i l i q _ taana _ t a w a t e n n g u q _ nayugh keqaghte ak _ .
T a a g k e n n g u q _ e f l e g h h n a q u t k e s a q m i n i g u _ .
aghtugh aa _ pi neghllug _ .
tawaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ k e n l e k s a g g a g h n e n g _ uqugh a nguq _ ayaawagh ke luku _ k e n g h e g n u n _ .

tagtale mii _ ategh ghllag uq _ .

tawaten _ nagaqugh aqa _ .
taawa _ nanigh igh te a _ paninang _ nanughtuqagh _ .
ungipagh kaqe kanga _ T u t m a t e l g e m _ t a a m _ a n g l i s a g h t e m a _ n a p i i g h l l e g h h i i n n g u q _ waame aqe ut _ n a n u m u n _ sanitmiighte aghte lghiit _ tagtalmi _ .
tamaa na ngugh _ tume ghllag _ nanugh m _ t u u m l i l l e g h l l a k a a _ amenqun _ iqetu pigte lghiit _ .
nanugh m _ t u u m l i l a g h l l a g l u k u _ ila i _ i k f i q n a t _ kiigh ani _ .
nenglu _ q a f s i n Ê¼ g u y a g h t a _ uglaghraag _ qaya _ paamna _ nenglu ligh vig ite ngughk _ tangeghtu ghllag _ .
ketwhelqun _ , _ uygu na ni _ kana _ allameng _ taana _ K a n g k i i l g h e m _ asi ani qun _ , _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ estu igate ut _ .
M a n g t e g h a s q w a a g h v i g u y a g h t u g h n g u q _ qaye a _ paamna _ upenghagh mi _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ .
atigh llegh i _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ taakwavek _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ , _ kiigtagh ke ut _ taakwani _ .
pennagh ni nguq _ taagani _ p e n n a n i t k u l l a a l u t e n g _ qagugh ak _ piyuke llegh eng _ entaqun _ ngelqagh u aghagh u aghte llegh mun _ kenlanga _ .
itghagh aqe ut _ tagi luteng _ i q a l l u g w a n u n _ .
enkaam _ n a l l u n i i l k u t a q a q a g h p u t _ n g e l q a a g h a q _ t e n g e n g h a n i _ , _ iqallug _ sama _ tea- ma anun _ lliigh aqe uq _ u g w a v a g h a q u q _ ukavek _ aghvighteg nun _ navek _ kaate ghllag aqe uq _ .
S u g h u g w e t
T a a g a n i r u g l l a g a n i i _ talwa _ Q a a q w a a m _ entaqun _ sivungagh ni _ sughu k _ allgeghkagh _ .
tespamaken _ aywaa neng _ i g l e g h t a n e n g _ nakaan _ uughqa neng _ .
taakwegken _ u q e v a n e n g _ aate yameng _ pi llghite ut _ ukegken _ aywaa neng _ pikagh t _ .
taakwegkut qun _ y u g w i t _ tuqu qugh kau ni kangit _ kiyalighagh mii t _ .
entaqun _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aki naqe m _ .
U u g h q a n n g u q _ uukna _ y u g w a _ pi llghite uq _ uukna _ , _ A v a t e s t a a k w e g k u t _ , _ tea-si inkut _ .
aygugh a _ uukna _ anguyiqe kau uq _ ungazigh meng _ kenle ke luni _ .
qiighqagh _ entaqun _ u n a y m i g h w a a q a q s a q a n g a t _ .
pillugute lghii stun _ maaten _ katam _ entaqun _ .
