sa igh kuvek
taana _ sa igh kuvek _ ungipaghagh u luku _ repall _ nagaqugh aqa _ elngaatall nguq _ y u g l l a a k _ .
naken llu _ nagaqugh qagh nghite ngugh u kut _ whaa _ maaten _ t a a k u s t a _ siquveg mii u yagh lghiit _ .
yugtu lleghpigagh u na iqe aat _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ esgha qun _ napaqagh an _ iqetu langa _ entaqun _ i p a a n g u u q _ a g a r u g l l a k _ este na ghllag _ taana _ iqetutale kellug qu _ napaqagh u yagh ut _ agavek _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ t a l l i m a g h q e l l u n i _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
U n Ê¼ g a r u g l l a a k _ ketligh at _ ila it _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m nguq _ s u g w a g l u n i _ ayvegh aneng _ neqete nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ taglagh luni _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ meghsi ngllagh luni _ l e g a n n g u q _ t u u n e g h a t n i _ t u n u t m u n _ kuuve aqe ai _ .
negh ghllag _ qamagte luku _ taana _ u n Ê¼ g a v e k _ .
nuliigh ni _ kaate luku _ meghsi ngllagh vike a _ , _ agniqe te a _ itegh luni _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ ungipaghagh u uq _ .
tuune a _ qinuyagute luku _ .
T u n u t m u n _ kuuve a _ .
ii-i _ , _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ a g h i v a l e g h t a a g a a _ allghiinegh iqe qrug ni luku _ .
aga _ itegh uq _ enraq llu _ .
T a a k w a n t e q r u w h a a m a a _ enraq llu _ k e l u l i g h p i g a g h n i _ .
ii _ , _ l e g a n n g u q _ itegh uq _ , _ qagingughte ghllag aa _ .
nuliigh ni nguq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ .
ellnga neng _ kayagte a _ ellnga neng _ pi sqellug qu _ .
sagiqe te yatni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnalqwaagh _ kii _ , _ q a g i g h r u k u u t a a g h l l a g e t _ .
taawa nguq _ tungeqligh t _ taana _ k a s u g w a q e f t a a _ ayemqe aqe a _ .
maaten _ siquveg m nguq _ t e s a m u m _ liisimakekagh mta _ tuungligh a _ .
taanegna nguq _ n u t e m l u _ qamagte ma kanga _ ketligh _ .
T i d a l _ w a v e - e s t e g h l l a g u m a k a n g a _ .
negh ghllag _ taanegna _ estamat _ i q e t u g h l l a g a a t a t _ iighwte ai _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ y u g w i i t e l l g h a n _ kenle a _ .
naqamllu _ naa ke i _ k i n g u n g h i t _ siquveg mii t _ n a g a q i i g a l k e p u t _ .
entaqun _ q a m a g h q w a a m i i _ .
mayeraaghpag _ A n a q s i
siknegh mi _ ama _ a n g v i g a p i g n i i q a a _ yuug _ .
yug ghrugllag u na iqe aat _ , _ t a a w a a _ kelgute yagh aat _ napaqagh squghhagh _ .
W h a g u n n g u q _ kaapute luni _ ayuqe uq _ ( _ tuye akun _ ) _ whagun llu _ ighu m _ kenle akun _ .
nengug luku nguq _ esgha _ naama kusiigh aqlaatagh ma atgu _ .
U n g u q t i n g u q _ angvigagh ghllag uq _ , _ A n a g h a y a a m _ apegh aqe a _ .
nuqsaleg aqe a nguq _ taana _ napaqagh a _ nengug luku _ .
Q e m i g h l l u g w e m _ t a g t a a l a n g a _ .
qazigyaghagh ghhagh m nguq _ i q e l q w a k u n _ pakineg luku _ tuquma lghii _ .
ivghaagh lghii _ a m s i k a g h l l u n i _ entaqun _ qazigyaghagh meng _ , _ teghig ke sagh ke te _ nuyaaghite yagh lghii _ .
naghulleg aqe luki _ , _ p a k i n Ê¼ g u m a k a n g a _ nagun _ i q e l q w a k u n _ itegagh akun _ , _ taawa _ taana _ tuqusiigh iqe a _ , _ pakineg llegh a _ qazigyaghagh m _ .
ategh a _ A n a q s i _ , _ siknegh mii _ .
A t k u y a g h h a a m _ .
esgha qun _ tuqu naqe negh mta _ aghtugh igate ngugh u kut _ .
yug lgu luku _ enmis _ angu kaqe aat _ siknegh _ ukegkut _ kinguligh t _ .
Y u l g u f t u g h n g u q _ tamaa na ai _ y u g w i i t e l l e g h l l a g e m _ entaqun _ n a t a n g a n i _ yug lgu yagh uq _ enmis _ i n g u t u g h h a g h m e n g u q _ paaghqite te yan _ yug pagite te yan _ aghvenge aghte aqe ut _ tagtalmi _ , _ siknegh mi _ .
amenqun _ ama _ neghqwaaghtuqagh _ .
allakagh mi _ ne u uq _ siknegh _ .
siquveg meng _ allakagh mete uq _ .
yug lgu luku _ entaqun _ Q a a q w a a n k u t _ liite tke aat _ , _ liisimakekagh at _ .
negaghpag ngllagh llegh
Q i i p a m e n g u q _ ivalu meng _ negaghpag ke aqe ut _ taagani _ .
elngaatall _ uksulqusigh igh ngugh _ qiipe aqe kangat _ .
A m e r i i g a g h a l l g h i _ tamaakut _ qupneghqutaghqagh t _ , _ eslege llegh i _ kiiwhtaghqutaghqagh t _ , _ iqate lughqutaghqagh t _ , _ negaghpagkagh t _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ p u u s n g u g h r a g g a a t _ imigh aqe ait _ whaa _ qafsina m _ yaagneghqagh m _ negaghpag m _ , _ nalluniightugh luteng _ emta _ taaggun _ .
qafsina _ imightugh luku _ .
whaten qun _ kaki naqe negh meggni qun _ qiipi aqe lghiit _ , _ tawaten _ .
Q i n u n g i t u t _ .
entaqun _ itagnaghi nghata _ , _ aghi ste luki nguq _ e n r a g h n g a m _ paaggun _ n e n g q e l l u k i _ .
I g l a g t e n g n g w a a g h a q a a n n g u q _ , _ nenglute aq _ .
taawa _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ .
P e q l i g h s i g h a t _ .
tagtale mii _ a g h i s i g h l u k i i _ tawaten _ nekegte aqe luki _ .
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ kaate nghata _ e n r a g h n g a m _ qilag aqe luki _ negaghpag ngllagh aqe luki _ .
suqagh meng _ pugughyaagh ke na iqe ait _ yeqay _ .
kangghwaag niigh sigh t _ negaghpag t _ .
angli naqe llegh ka _ pugughilegh mi
A g h n a g h a g h n i i m _ apegh llegh a
akuzi naqe lghii _ aghnaghaghni ii unga _ ungipamsug naqe lghiinga _ pugughilegh mi _ angli lleg mneng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ allgegh ma lghii _ 1 9 2 8 - m i _ .
angayuqagh kek _ A g l u g h a a n k u k _ nategh mii nkuk _ .
A g l u g h a q _ taana _ A g a a n k u k _ I t e g h y a g h a a n k u k _ ighneghagh k _ , _ n u y e k l i g h p i g a a m _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ nategh mii m _ angayuqagh kek _ T u t m a t e l g e n k u k _ P i n i r k a g e n k u k _ .
taawa _ allgegh yalghiinga _ nalluke aqa _ talwa _ aakagh ka _ u g w i i g h u m a l g h i i _ sivungagh mii neng _ qiwaaghmii neng _ .
aakagh gka _ maalghug _ .
K u u g g h e g k a _ maalghug _ nuyekligh ak _ whanga mneng _ .
nuyeklighpigagh _ aakagh ka _ N a a n g i i g h a q _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ K a r g i _ .
naghuyagh nkuk _ , _ T a p g h a l u g w e n k u k _ yugte aqe lukek _ .
whanga _ A g h n a g h a g h n i q _ , _ uyughagh gka _ maalghug _ taake uk _ N a a g h u l u u n k u k _ P i t i i n k u k _ .
iitek _ angu aqa _ apa ka _ taana _ A g a q _ .
W h a t e n g w a a q _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h p e n a a n _ .
iitek _ naghaagh te negh mta _ n a g h a g h u t k a g h q a m e n g _ sa meng _ tagite aqe kanginkut _ , _ a k m a l i i g h a g h m e n g _ , _ qateghyiighagh meng _ sa meng _ naghaaghute kaghqagh meng _ .
W h a t e n g w a a q _ liigike gpenaan _ , _ A g a a f t u q _ taawa _ siivanllegh ut _ .
taake uk _ asag gka _ A g a a m _ panig kek _ A t g h a a n g a n k u k _ U k u m a n k u k _ .
Q a y g e g h t a a n k u k _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ ighnegh kek _ , _ A g l u g h a q _ n u y e k l i g h p i g a a m _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
kinku u ta i _ t a a g e g k u t _ nalluke anka _ .
taana _ asag ka _ atghagh u nga _ u g w i l g u f t u q _ taawa _ A g h t u q a a y a g m e n g _ .
enmis _ m a n g t e g h i l u t e n g _ m a a l g h u g y a a g e g n e n g _ .
aag llegh a _ mangteghapig _ tanpegh meng _ amu iqe lghii _ , _ aag llegh a _ guygu _ .
kiig nghaani _ nuugte aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ mangteghapig ghllag llu _ whanga qun _ angu aqa _ tawani _ n a y u q e g k a y u g w a t _ .
K i i g u n n e g h i s t e n g _ legan _ t a n p e g h h a _ iike luku _ qaame na nga _ u k m a n g i g h w a a g h l u k u _ kiigtagh ke ut _ guygu mi _ .
iwernga _ paninang _ ayagyu t llu _ atuqe u luki _ paninang _ taawa _ esghagh anka _ nanigh t _ .
angli naqe llegh ka _ elngaatall _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ , _ qawavek llu _ i q a l l i n i i g h y a a n u n _ pi aqe luta _ , _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ aate te kaghqagh _ .
qawaag m _ amiiragh a _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ qawavek _ enraq _ i q a l l u g w a n u n _ pikayug u ut _ .
iqallug igh ghllag luteng _ tesqawani _ elngaatall _ .
alla _ pamavek _ nuna mun _ enraq _ kiiwhtagh anun _ enraq _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
qanii luteng qun _ kangii nun _ alla _ uteghte pagte luteng _ wetku _ tawaten _ uteghnigh naqe aqe ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
liite lleg mni _ elngaatall _ neqetu pigte uq _ .
U p e n g h a a n n e g h i s t e n g _ kiyang _ llangaqa _ n a z i g h a a n k u k _ t e g h i g l u g w e n k u t _ .
teghiglug _ kuuvragh luku _ , _ tasigu luku _ enkaam _ pi aqe kangat _ .
S u f l u g w a q _ llangaqa _ atuqepag igate kangat _ .
kuuvragh _ neghusigh ke pigte aat _ elngaatall _ teghiglug meng _ .
whanga _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ kiyang _ n a y u g w a q e g k e p u t _ tapghaghqagh t _ , _ uyiighqagh t _ , _ angalqataasighqagh t _ .
taakut _ N g u s i g h m i i t _ tagi negh meggni _ tan- qagh u nga llu _ kiyaghte luku _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ amalleqa _ key- nqigte gpenaan _ .
A g a a m _ nayag ke a _ .
E l q w a a g h q u n k u t _ taakut _ kaate aqe ut _ uksugh mi llu _ qimugsigh meng _ , _ kiig mi llu _ angyagh meng _ .
tamaa na _ amiiragh _ nazighagh _ aate te kaghqagh u luku _ , _ teme kaghqagh _ inglukagh ghqu tete luku _ kinku nun _ tuune aqe kangi _ .
taana llu _ tengghu nagh pigte aqe lghii _ angyaghpag _ ategh a _ T r a d e r _ kaate nghaani _ .
amiiragh _ , _ tapghagh _ , _ sa u a llu _ i v o r y _ , _ aate tke aq llu _ , _ kameg llu _ .
T r a d e - a a q e g k a n g a t _ uksugh mun _ naamakaghqagh _ sa u a _ qayuq _ kagimkagh _ .
T o a s t _ b r e a d - e g h l l a g u f t u q u n _ tamaani _ liite lleg mni _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ atalgute nka _ Q a y g e g h t a a m _ avaquti a llu _ , _ W e s q e g e t e n k u t _ , _ ayuqligh nkut _ , _ T a k e q s i i g e n k u t _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ taana _ nulightugh luni _ K u k i y a n g a m e n g _ .
ayapghute nkut _ , _ A n a g u t a a n k u t _ , _ A g a a n k u t _ , _ asag u ma ainkut _ avaquti a _ .
T a a m _ enraq _ kingu aneng _ igaghyagh mun _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwagh qaghaqe luta _ .
whangkuta llu qun _ a n g y a g h n a g h h n e g h a n i _ a g h v e g h n i i g h m u n _ piiwagh qaghaqe ukut _ o n e _ m o n t h - n g i i g h h a q _ .
enkaam _ tawani _ p i i w a q a l l e m m n i _ t a a n a n g i i g h h a q _ i g a g h y a a t k a q a g h p u t _ , _ whanga llu _ N a a g h u l u q l u _ .
T a a m _ tagtale ngiighhagh a _ o n e _ month _ i g a g h y a a t k a q a g h p u t _ .
whanga _ igaghyagh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ sivungagh mun _ .
sivu nge aghte ukut _ nani _ , _ qafsina _ y e a r s - n g u g h t e g h l l a g u m a g h m a _ .
nategh mii m _ k u u g g h a _ t e s k i w a n l e n g u q _ , _ angag ka _ A n a g h a y a a q _ .
enkaam _ amalleqa _ qawavek _ tevnegh meggni _ , _ tesqawani _ q e m g u g h u t a q u k u t _ .
apangiighhagh ka _ taana _ naa ma _ ata a _ T u t m a t e l e k _ , _ U m a _ .
tea- ma ghhagh gkenka _ naqamalla _ ategh gni _ atuqe kek _ .
sivuligh _ n u l i i g h p i g a a _ P i n i r k a g u f t u q _ naa ma _ qantaghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ allameng _ aviighute yan _ nulightugh luni _ puughhute meng _ nalluke aqa _ .
wetku _ ivagh i ma meng _ nulightugh magh an _ taana _ liisimake aqa _ .
taana llu _ allughqagh at _ siftugh te _ .
E s n i g h q w a q l u _ kiyang _ tesqawani _ q e m g u g h u t a q e l g h i i n i _ taghnughhagh u luta _ salin _ mekestaaghhaatu tete luta _ .
tesqawavek _ pite kayugu ut _ , _ taakut llu _ N u n g u g w e n k u t _ , _ A p e t e k i n k u t l u _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ W a l a n g a n k u t l u _ taakut _ .
siknegh mun _ pi yamta _ tamaakut _ e s g h a g h t e g h a n k a _ .
N a q a m e n r a q _ nengyugh ka _ taana _ itegh yagh aq _ l i i s i m a k n g w a a g h a q a _ .
kiyang _ I t e g h y a g h a g h m e n g _ liite aqa _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ k a g p a r e g h a l l e q _ .
kagpag llegh a _ neqe m _ liite aqa _ I t e g h y a g h a g h m e n g _ akuute llegh i _ sa u aat _ liite qugh anka _ .
qaywa _ w h a t e g h l l u g w a a q _ apeghtugh aqe yanga _ tawani _ liite gpenaki _ , _ k i n g u v a q u n _ l i i g i k n g w a a g h a n k a _ .
piinlillegh aneng _ iwernga _ apeghtugh llegh an _ liite luki _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate aat _ .
talwa _ n g e l q a a m _ qilu ngiighhagh i _ s i p e g h q u g h w a a g h l u k i _ agaghte aqe luki _ .
M e t g h a a m _ , _ n g e l q a a m _ itegagh a _ n u v u g h t e g h l u k u _ kinegh ngllagh aqe luku _ .
angiite tke aq _ entaqun _ igataghnagh iqe llegh mun _ .
agnepa llu _ entaqun _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate kangat _ .
atugh yaghqagh perewaagh _ sangiighhagh _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ .
nunivagseghagh ghhagh mun _ talwa _ tamaavek _ k a g p a r e g h a l l g h i t _ ellnga neng _ l i i q u g h t e g h a n k a _ .
nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ akugh anun _ kenlanga _ .
akugh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ taawa _ neghe kayug ut _ elngaatall _ .
alqegkagh t llu _ , _ p u g h p u u q e t l u _ qallate luki _ kagpag kayugu ait _ , _ q a l l a t n g w a a g h l u k i _ uksugh mi _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ .
ila i llu _ akugh ghhagh m _ tamaakut _ suqlag t _ , _ suqlamengestagh t _ akughllug ke i _ ama _ p i k a y u g w i t _ neqnigh ghllaget _ , _ peknegh t _ .
sa u a _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh _ elngaatall _ liilightugh te aqe kangat _ .
ata ma _ A g l u g h a a m _ pi aqe kanganga _ , _ â _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh i _ ayvegh m _ a q s a q g h w a n i l n g u q _ neghyaghqagh perewaagh u uq _ tepagh u luku _ esghagh kufsigu _ . _ â
enkaam _ amalleqa _ tamaa na _ inghu yaghqaghte a _ aqavzig _ , _ pagunghagh _ , _ kaavlag _ .
T a a k u n g u f t u t _ inghu luteng _ enraq _ p i k a y u g w e t _ .
elngaatall _ aqavzig ghllag u uq _ , _ pagunghagh ghllag u uq _ .
nunivag _ taana _ kiyang _ S i n g i g p a m e n g _ aagken _ pennagh neng _ atate zikun _ t a g i t e g h l l a k a y u g w a t _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh ghllag luki _ .
laluramke t llu _ esghagh qaghte yug ni tke anka _ laalighte aat _ nalighmeng _ taakut llu _ kiyaghtekau aat _ tesamani _ .
nurse- a llu _ gallegher- meng _ ategh ke lghii _ kaate aghte uq _ .
asag ka _ taana _ up-uma _ emta _ qinuyug ghllagu laatagh uq _ tamaani _ .
liite lleg mni llu _ tawani _ legan _ B i b l e - e n e n g _ atightugh kayug ni _ , _ ilagagh kayug ni _ , _ yughagh te kayug ni _ .
S u n d a y - n k u k _ W e d n e s d a y - n k u k _ legan _ taake uk llu _ aflengake lukek _ ayuqe agput _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ atalgute nka _ q e m q a g h w a a g h a q e g k e n k a _ t a g i s q e l l u k i _ ellngit llu _ ilagagh aqe luta _ qerngagh emta _ yughagh aqe luta _ .
B i b l e - e g h l l a g e t q u n _ taawa _ igaqegkaghtuqagh t _ yuvghiigh na ghllaget _ w h a n g k u n n l _ t a w a n t e f t u t _ , _ naken _ imani _ pi kaqe atki _ umu ghllaget _ .
umuqagh meng _ qaspeghagh ke lghiit _ .
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ whanga _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghii _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ qaygeghte aq _ nalighmeng _ A g l u g h a q _ kaate nghmini _ usi igh ghllag luni _ mission _ b o x - n g u n i i q e g k a n g i t _ R e d _ C r o s s - e n e n g l l u _ .
W h a n g k u n n i _ taghnughhagh ni _ elngaatall _ qiliigh nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghiit _ , _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh at _ , _ quyanagh lleghpigagh at _ .
qaywa _ paper _ s a c k - e t _ talwa _ e s l e q e l l n g u n a t e n g _ imaleg u yagh ghngaita _ nuts- meng _ , _ c a n d y - m e n g _ , _ p o p _ c o r n - m e n g _ w h a n g k u n n i _ elngaatall _ quyanagh ghllag t _ .
uksugh mi _ enkaam _ sa yaghqagh ite aqe lghii ni _ , _ entaqun _ sa meng _ i w h a n i l l e g h q a m m n e n g _ quunpeng _ naghaagh ste aqe kanginkut llu _ sa meng _ .
kiyang _ llangaqa _ e x e r c i s e - e s t a q e g k a n g i n k u t _ ilu anite ghngaamta _ , _ u u l t a a t a m e n g _ sa meng _ peghlaaghwagh meng _ , _ e s t u g h p a g t a m e n g _ .
tawaten _ ilu ani _ q a w a w a a n g h i n n e m t a _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ uyghagagh u te aqe lghiikut llu _ .
whanga _ angli lleg mni _ igaghyaghqagh llu _ aklunagh pigte aqe lghii _ .
M a g a z i n e - e m _ i g i i t a l l g h a a k u n _ t e r u g w i t e g h l l a g a q e l g h i i k u t _ .
taana _ enkaam _ quunpeng _ whanga _ f a v o r i t e - k e l l u k u _ qimugsigh _ usi leg ghllag _ mission _ b o x - m e n g _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tagi lghii _ t e r u g w i y u k e l l e g h p i g a q e g k e g k a _ .
tawani qun _ s i v u l i g h p i g a g h m i _ igaghyagh lleg mni _ sivungagh mun _ a r t i s t - n g u n i i q a a t n g a _ qayughllak _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ t e r u g w i g h l l a g e m _ .
sa u aat _ legan _ t e r u g w i n e m k i _ elqughaghte aqe luki _ .
kiig mi _ amalleqa _ neqamike aqa _ teghigniqe llegh ka _ .
iighaate aqe lghiikut _ , _ veg a llu _ r i i g l l u g w a l l u _ taake ghllaget _ tamaavek _ iighaate aqe lghiikut _ .
sa meng llu _ ategh i _ esgha _ puygu kenka _ , _ naghpigh aqe luki _ aglu t _ ila mta _ inglu ke te luta _ ataasigh _ q a m u g h t e k l u k u _ aglu gneng _ naghpigh naqute aqe ke put _ .
qenwat _ naghpigh lleg t _ uglaghi ghllag aqe lghiit _ naghpigh iqe ait _ neghqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ qamugh it _ .
qetgagh te aqe luta llu _ , _ sa u aat _ tamaakut _ naghaagh lleg put _ teghig nagh tun _ avighaate aqe ut _ .
A t u q e s u g w a q a n k a _ whanga _ maaten _ eltughagh mnun _ .
tamaakut llu _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ i v a g h i n i i g h t e t _ , _ quyngighqwaagh t _ .
quyngigh ghllag u yagh u uq _ liite lleg mni _ tamaani _ , _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag _ enraq _ kaynge m llu _ entaqun _ malighqagh nghminiki _ pangaleg u ghllag aqe lghii _ quyngigh _ s a a m l l u _ vegtaagh m _ p a n g a l g u g h q e g h l l a g a q e g k a n g a _ .
aagken _ imagh a _ P e n g u t n e n g _ aliigh luni _ pamagun _ K a n g i g h a a g n e k u n _ kiwavek _ aga _ teve ghllag aqe lghii _ .
allameng _ sivuqagh meng _ uteghnigh yalghiikut _ uvite mi _ nughagh ghhagh t _ legan _ tuquma aqe lghiit _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ nula ghllag llegh ani _ quyngigh m _ .
ata ma _ A g l u g h a a m _ ungipamsug ke nghminiki _ qawani _ quyngigh igh na i aaghet _ P a n g a w y i n k u t _ kinku t _ kiyalighagh mi _ nani _ tesqawani _ .
Q u y n g i n n g u q _ legan _ qaghlu luki _ q a m i s l u u g l l a g e t _ u q f i l q a a g h m e n g _ t e s q a w a n l e n g u g h m e n g _ avayagh aneng _ kepugh ghllag luteng _ usi igh nghmegteki _ quyngigh t _ q a m u g h t e k l u k i _ qikmigh stun _ .
taawa _ ellnga llu _ igagh lgu uq _ b u c k _ d e e r - m e n g _ quyngigh lgu kau ni yagh uq _ ellmi llu _ .
enraq _ t a a m _ kingu aneng _ aviite luta _ salin _ pennaghqute te luni _ sa u a _ maana _ c a r e - e n a n i g h l u k u _ .
tamaani _ enkaam _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ q u y n g i g h y a t _ kaate aqe lghiit _ i w h a n i n k u t _ R a a q u u n k u t _ , _ k i n k u n g w a a q a t _ ila i _ uglagh _ katelghaate aqe lghii _ .
kiig mi _ enkaam _ anglu ighpag magh ma _ piyug meng llu _ U y a t i q a a n k u t _ maakut _ kaate aqe ut _ quyngigh meng _ i v a g h i y a t _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ A g h t u q a a y a g e n k u t _ , _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t _ i g a g h y i i s q e l l u k i _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh teng _ s i v u l i g h p i g a a g u t _ sivuqagh mun _ n u u g h q w a a t k a t _ liisimake lleg mni _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ siingenllu _ up-uma _ kiiste i vig meng _ u g w i i g h t u q _ .
enkaam _ kayute igh te naqe ni luni llu _ A g l u g h a q _ pi aqe lghii _ , _ sivuqagh mun _ ellnga llu _ p i i g w a g h t u k u t _ i w e m g a _ t a a m _ kingu aneng _ , _ A g l u g h a q _ aviighute magh an llu _ paninang _ P i t i i m _ nayugh ke yagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
nulightugh luni _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh uq _ tesamani _ elngaatall _ .
pi ta igh u uq _ whanga _ u g w i i g h u m a g h m a _ kingu mneng _ taagken _ pi te i uq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lli aqe aq _ .
tawani llu _ pi te i uq _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ t a a k u n g u u t _ N u n g u g w e n k u t _ , _ qagugh mii _ kelgute luni _ mangteghagh ghhagh a _ atugh naqe ni luku _ a g h v e g h n i i g h m u n _ .
A g h v e g h l l a g w a a q e l g h i i _ t a a k w n a n g i i g h h a q _ qantagh aq _ taawa _ taagken _ piinligh kau uq _ maaten _ neli kangat _ itagnatun _ a g h v e g h n i i g h m u n _ .
ipa _ whangkuta _ kingulighpigagh u ukut _ .
taana _ apa ka _ A g a q _ kiyaghte luki _ iitek _ entaqun _ s i i v a n l l e g h p i g a q a a t _ tesamani _ .
iitek _ T u t m a t e l g e n k u t l u _ kaate aghte aqe ut _ .
kiyang _ qawani _ iqalliniighvig mi _ qerngughte te aqe lghiikut _ taakut llu _ E l q w a a g h q u n k u t _ q a n t a g h a n t e n g n g u u t _ kaate neghtuqagh t _ tesamavek _ .
kiyang _ k i i g g u n _ tevnga kun _ A p e t e k i n k u t l u _ taakut _ waamte uute te nkut _ t e v e g k a y u g w e t _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ wetku _ esghagh aqe kegka _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ .
pugughilegh
U k u m a m _ apegh llegh a
iighwite luta _ K a r g i _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ taghnughhagh pagite ukut _ A g a a n k u n i _ .
piqalag _ taake uk _ nunaagh gket _ , _ ne gket _ mangteghagh leg k _ .
ighulugh leg k _ ika _ akmagutagh leg k _ .
iwernga _ mayugh aatagh lleg mni _ imani _ nuna ughtekagh _ .
I n g a n t a q e l g h i i n n g u q _ pennaghte negh meggni _ , _ sivuke luteng _ kuyag nge ma gni _ .
kuyag nge ma gni _ tawani _ kiyaghte luteng _ atghagh aqe lghiit _ agavek _ piqalag nun _ .
taakwagun _ sugugte luteng _ , _ y u g w i t a _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ .
aghni ut _ pamagun _ m a y u g h t u u t a q e l g h i i n n g u q _ .
I t e g h y a g h a a n k u t _ , _ W a l k u t a n k u t _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ W a l k u t a m _ k a y a a l q e k a t a g h a q e g k a n g a _ itegh yagh aq _ .
tawaten _ emta _ q u u t q u u t a q e g k a n g i n g u q _ qikmigh t _ , _ A g l u g h a a m _ .
amenqun _ P i q a l a m _ paagna a _ uusqagh ghllag _ tespagani _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ iiwenllu nguq _ ivgagh naqe aqe ut _ uugte na luteng _ I t e g h y a g h a a n k u t _ a r a g h t u n n g u q _ , _ â _ A g l u g h a q _ ullegh uq _ , _ pennaghqute te uq _ ! _ â _ test- pig ke na _ anigu leg _ .
legan _ taagken _ sa u luki _ usi teng _ qetgegh te aat _ .
ellnga n llu nguq _ iitek _ esghagh aa _ uka _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ naa ke i _ .
P a l a g h h a g h m e n g u q _ aliigh qaghaqe uq _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ K a r g i _ ataata a _ , _ A g a a m _ anengagh a _ , _ sa mi nguq _ sugugte lit _ aga _ nalug tke aq _ .
aga _ taakwagun _ whaa _ siingenllu _ itegh qaghte lghii _ anigu mun _ tespikavek _ .
I w e r n g a q u n n g u q _ sa luku _ pi litgu _ .
aliigh te nghminigu nguq _ pika _ y u g u y u g l l u n i _ .
qughagh nghaani nguq _ ima _ talughte te aqe a _ .
ullegh na nigh an _ tawaten _ ukig te ma kangat _ .
aaw yagh ghllag _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ u u k n a g h l l a g a _ k i i l u u g t e g h l l a k a q _ .
navek _ pi kau aat _ tawavek llu _ uugta t _ alaghrang _ piqalag nun _ .
taawa _ taana _ pennaghqute te llegh an _ angegh llegh ke a _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ avii tke aat _ naa ke i _ .
taana _ yugusigh ghhagh a _ tugu qaghtekagh at _ .
alignagh yagute aqe kanga _ ilagagh igate ngughk _ naqam _ sa igate ngughk _ , _ K a r g i _ , _ anengagh ni _ A g a a m _ .
E s g h h a g h u n g u q _ y u g u p a g n i n g i l n g u q _ unguva stekagh a _ A g l u g h a q _ qangigagh ni _ .
kinku u lghii ni _ tuqu yaghqagh _ .
N a a s q w a _ kagimekagh _ .
taakwani _ kingu ani _ whangkuta _ , _ N a a n g i i g h a q l u _ allgegh magh an _ , _ ifkagh nqigte laataghkagh _ .
ifkagh gpenani _ kaave i ke ghllag ke aq _ .
talligh kek _ sa ghllag ke ak _ .
N a p a q a g h h a a n k u n g u u t _ , _ A g l u g h a a n k u t _ , _ whangkuta _ M i l g h u l a g n i _ N a a n g i i g h a q _ , _ nategh mii _ , _ whanga _ .
utaqa i ni _ pennaghtagh neng _ .
N g e l q a a g h a g h y a t _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ A g l u g h a a n k u t _ , _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t _ .
kingu itneng _ whangkuta _ , _ N a a n g i i g h a q l u _ amsakelghii _ tamaani _ , _ a n g t a a l g u t k u t e v z i g n i _ .
neqe meng _ gaagh luta _ , _ apeghiigh luni _ nategh mii _ utaqa i ukut _ manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
nutem _ paga _ , _ aliigh yalghiimeng _ aga _ qagughrug mi _ tan-kaghyage m _ qula ani _ , _ imani llu _ sukaghllag t _ .
mate- te ghhagh inagh _ aga _ aliighagh ut _ whaa _ ukig ut _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ imani _ seghleghu ut _ .
iwerngaqun _ gginagh ghhagh _ una _ sallghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ manughagh mun _ tafsi igh yalghiimi _ a a w y a g h p a g h q u _ ifkagh qu uute uq _ .
ilapga qu te aqe uq _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ .
aaw ightugh luku _ , _ qantaghqagh leg nun _ aqfaqugh naqe uk _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ , _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u k _ .
manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
whangkuta _ sa aqe ukut _ ilu ani _ .
Q i i n g h a g h s a l g h i i m i _ imani _ sungghanagh uq _ â _ aglagh uute naqe ukut _ ! _ â _ ima _ aga _ s i v u g w a g h t u q _ .
pi naqe i nagh ma luta _ aga llu _ A k u l p e g h a m u n _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
M a l i g h q a q e f u t _ N a a n g i i g h a q _ , _ whanga _ , _ nategh mii _ .
ima _ aga _ n u u g h t u g h a q e r t a g h p u t _ .
enankin _ nategh mii m _ aga _ k a t q a g h t a a _ , _ u g w i n i _ A g l u g h a q _ , _ arekull _ sa ghllag _ nalpagh ghllag _ kenlanga ii te ghllag _ .
N u q n e g h t e g h a a t a q a n g a _ kaateqaghtagh ung _ .
N a a n g i i g h a q l u _ a g h n a g h a g h h a l u k u _ .
N u q n e q l u k u _ kenigh akun _ tukegh lleghtagh ghllag ni _ , _ legan _ ava igh lleg ke ainkut _ .
pugughilegh mun _ amavek _ aglagh te ainkut _ .
T u m a n g i l l g h a n u n _ atghagh te luta _ tume nun _ pi aqe luta _ .
ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe luta _ , _ uyghagkagh ightu aghagh a sa _ .
amalka _ qikmigh kun _ tugu laghate luta _ .
aawallu _ S i l q i n a n g a g n u n _ kaate aghte ukut _ .
iiwenllu _ samaken _ ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe ukut _ tume nun _ agavek _ ika _ nategh mii _ araghaatagh ghllag _ wasi _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ , _ i n g a r u g p a k _ , _ paghyugh lghiikut _ whangkuta _ .
enankin _ k a a t q a g h s a q m i n i n k u t _ y u w h a a k _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ .
aga _ ima _ , _ whangkuta _ peghte uute luta _ .
amalka _ qikmigh _ n e n g y a g h a _ , _ igleghte naqe a _ , _ A g l u g h a q _ .
sa mi _ kaate lta _ whangkuta _ , _ neghigh pigte luku _ kaat ute ma kagh nge aat _ .
taawa _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ ingaghte ma kangat _ n e k g u m a l g h i i _ A g h t u q a a y a g e m _ inag mig ke a _ .
aqfaqugh ma kanga _ I t e g h y a g h a a m _ A g h t u q a a y a k _ .
tamaa na _ qanegh mineng _ aaw a _ p a a m s u g t e g h a q e f t a a _ talligh m _ u u m _ kiitigh llegh a _ , _ a t k u g w a _ piig aqe luni _ .
nuqete naagh nghite ngugh t _ qaligh ghhaat _ qiipaghagh t _ , _ a t k u g w e t _ amighqwaagh t _ .
N a a s q w a _ qukfighte aqe luku _ , _ a g a v e s a a s l u k u _ aqume ste luku _ legan _ qanegh mineng _ nusug luki _ uyghag t _ lli aqe ai _ , _ kii _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ amighregagh m _ kiigh a _ .
whaa nguq _ naasqugh _ una _ ukifkagh kaayagh kuni _ unguva nagh u yagh nghite uq _ .
qanegh mineng _ ulu mineng _ , _ n u s u g w a q i i _ uyghag t _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ .
I w e m g a q u n _ e f l u g h w a a g h a q l u k i _ u y g h a g i g h t e g h w a a g h a a _ .
N e k e g r a a m s i i g h l u n i _ taagken _ igleghte yaaghte yalghiimi _ piniighte yalghiimi _ e l l n g i n a g h h a a y a g h q a a g p e n a n i _ , _ quunpeng _ a l e l i g h y u n e g h t u g h q w a a l u n i _ .
sa uq _ k a k a v l e g h w a a g h a q l u n i _ , _ alingruugh ghllag aqe luni _ , _ n e k g a q l u n i _ .
taawa _ ugpegh llegh gni _ aghula igh te lukek _ .
W h a n g k u n g i n a a m t a _ alignalghii mun _ pi naqe ghllag _ .
qenwat qun _ A a w y a a n k u k _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ tagi tke agput _ , _ aqfa kek _ kitum _ , _ a t g h a k _ maavek _ .
naqamllu _ sa nghite ak _ , _ temngi _ sa naanghite ni luku _ naten _ y u w h a a m _ .
N u l i i q r u w h a a _ taana _ leganqun _ tengghu nagh _ aghnagh ghhagh _ .
nalla ghhagh _ pi uq _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ , _ elpesi ni llu _ q u y a n g a p i g s i n g a _ ? _ â _ agnepa _ tawatete igate yagh unga _ t u g u n g h i i n e m k i _ iilqe ghllag aqe unga _ sa yaghqagh nun _ . _ â _ legan _ aghnagh ghhagh _ qalepangi ghllag _ i l a g a v a g h q u g h l l a k _ .
N u t e r n _ pi inkut _ , _ â _ tuqu naanghite uq _ alingutke gpenaan _ .
U m y u g w a g k a _ qama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ . _ â
taagken _ y u g w e m _ k e l q u t a a q s a q m i n i n g a _ A g l u g h a a m _ , _ navek _ pi nghmini _ .
piniighte a _ mulunghituq _ , _ maavek llu _ tagi aqe luni _ .
taawa _ tagtale ke a _ .
angli naqngu lunga
W e s q e g e t e m _ apegh llegh a
kiig mi _ tesamani _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ .
kii _ , _ ne mete igate ukut _ .
pennagh ni _ kiyaghte luta _ aga _ nasiqe negh meggni _ qawavek _ naayvagh mun _ .
M i l g h u l a g n i l l u _ , _ kuyag nge ma gni _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ .
alpa _ sa u a _ n g e l q a a g h a q _ pi iqagh ut _ kiilqusigh _ .
iqallug _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute luku _ , _ tagi aghte luta _ esnagh mi _ t e n t a l u t a _ kiyaghte aghte luta _ a p e g h i i n e g h m e g g t e g g u _ k a g p a g t e g h l u t a _ itghagh aqe luta _ aghvighteg nun _ .
F o u r t e e n _ y e a r s - n g u g h s i m a g h m a _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
aglagh aqe luta _ , _ piiwagh qagh luta _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aglagh qaghaqe luta _ tagi aqe luta _ .
tagi luta _ qenwat _ l l i i p i i g t u k u t _ ayuqligh _ igaghyagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tuungligh ka _ .
P i i g w a p i i g t u k u t _ f o u r t e e n _ y e a r s - n g u g h s i m a g h m a _ .
sivuqaghte negh mta _ I i r g u n k u n i t a q u k u t _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ u u m _ aasa m _ angayuqagh itni _ A g h n a g h l l u w h a a n k u t _ .
angyaghpag t _ pugughilegh mete luta _ kaate aqe lghiit _ T r a d e r _ , _ angyaleg at _ kina _ M r . _ R a n k a _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ Castell _ .
C a s t e l l - k u n _ a t a s i m e n g _ sivuqagh meng _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh ukut _ .
I i r g u n k u t g u n _ piiwagh luta _ aglagh te ainkut _ taaggun _ .
T a a k u n g i n a a g u t _ angyaghpag t _ .
igaghyagh llghite unga _ .
sivuqagh mi _ o n e - y e a r _ igaghyagh qagh lunga _ taaqe kau unga _ .
naghaaghute lgu ukut _ sa meng _ ulimaagh meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ n a g h a g h u t e n g l l a q a t _ , _ qamiye u aq _ , _ angyaghwaagh _ , _ sa u a _ .
uqfigagh t qun _ amen _ tangigh llegh ghqu aaghet _ p i c k u p _ s t i c k s - k e l l u k i _ tamaaken _ naghaagh te kaqsagh ukut _ , _ iighhagh u te meng _ , _ qawawaagh meng _ .
M e t e g h l l u g w a a g h e t _ sa u aat _ u n a g h s i i w a q l l u t e n g _ .
mangteghagh t _ A g h t u q a a y a g e n k u t _ , _ A g l u g h a q _ , _ whangkuta _ .
guygu mun _ whangkuta _ lliigh ukut _ l i i t n g w a a g h u m a g h m a _ neqamike aqa _ .
entaqun _ taakut _ qemtagh ghllag mi _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke te lghiit _ tawani _ whangkuta _ guygu mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
angyat nge llegh _ nalluke aqa _ , _ liisagh lghiinga _ taawa _ angyaghwaagh lgu ukut _ .
entaqun _ P e d e r s e n - m e n g _ p i k n i i q a a t _ .
nekreg te nkut llu _ t e s a m a n t a g h t a q l u t e n g _ entaqun _ anglegute mini _ tawani _ A g h t u q a a y a g m i _ esghagh aatagh aqe anka _ kaate aghte nghata _ ilangani _ .
U n g i p a m s u g w e t _ tamaakut _ ila i _ enraq _ a l i n g y u g w e m _ , _ kiyang _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ ungipamsug te lghii neng _ .
I p a n g u g h t e s u g n i g h q w a a n g h a t a _ a l i n g y a g u n n e m k i _ ila i _ , _ naa ke i _ q a v a g h n a q r a g k i i g h e m _ .
qevuute lunga _ qemall _ ilangani _ q i v g h u k a q l l u k i _ .
sangan lli _ n a g a t n g w a a g h n a n i g h s i n g a _ .
puygu ma anka _ u n g i p a m s u g w e t _ sa u aat _ nagate ghllag luki _ .
qemall _ whaa _ neqangugh lleqe anka _ .
amalka _ esgha _ legan _ liite lleg mni _ e x e r c i s e - e s t e g h l l a g u m a a q i n k u t _ estughte pagte aq _ sa u a _ , _ q e t g a q _ e x e r c i s e - e s i m a a q e g k a n g i n k u t _ esgha _ naghaagh ste nghmegtekut _ , _ p i n i g h y u u g t e s t a q i i n k u t _ .
aanqaghte luta _ alla _ mangteghagh t _ uzifqaghte luki _ wiin _ neghe ste gpenaamta _ .
I g h s a a n i n g i t e s q e l l u t a _ entaqun _ p i n i g h y u u g t e s q e l l u t a _ malighqutagh ke u yalghiikut _ legan _ .
kii _ , _ naghaaghute _ a l l a a g h i i n a q _ sa u a _ n a g h a a l q u s i i g h u t k a q s a q e f u t _ .
pugughilegh m _ P a n e g h a a t e l l g h a
U k u m a m _ apegh llegh a
A n a g u t a a m _ taana _ ungipamsug ke kanga _ p a n e g h a a t e g h l l a k _ .
talwa _ ellnga _ nukalpigagh u luku _ , _ ungipamsug ke yaghqagh a nguq _ talwa _ urang _ seghleghu uq _ .
Q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u n i _ pugughilegh _ y u g w i q a a _ , _ i g a t a m _ s a a m _ q i n u y u g w e m _ .
mesiighllug kun _ anigu t _ nepte luki _ negh aqe luki _ .
nanigh m _ peqagh i _ , _ u q u l l u g w i _ , _ ellngagh ta i _ qaamkut _ negh aqe luki _ .
avaqutagh teng _ paneghte yu i ma kangit _ .
taagavek _ aane te luki _ kiiw m _ inglu anun _ lli aqe luki _ , _ k a y a a l i m _ ukavek _ lliigh ut _ .
taagani _ kayaali llegh mi _ , _ legan _ amig meng _ aane ste luki _ ifkaghte aqe kangit _ , _ manughagh mun _ tawavek _ .
qenwat _ aane te nanigh ma kangit _ .
taana ta _ P i t i i m _ iiggekagh a _ a s i m m n i l n g u q _ saamna _ yug meng _ imaqe ghllag uq _ .
A g h u l i i g h t u u t e g h l a g l u t e n g _ .
katamqun _ anagte u ma lghiit _ I t e g h y a g h a a n k u t _ , _ A g a a n k u t _ , _ A n a g u t a a n k u t _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ u y u g h a q u t a l g h i i t _ .
pamavek nguq _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ taslugh kete te luteng _ .
sa meng _ neqe meng _ i v a g h i m s u g y a g h a q e l g h i i t _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ I t e g h y a g h a a n k u t _ .
tamaani nguq _ tuqu quqagh _ , _ llivegh _ .
K a n g k i i l g h e m _ p e g h y a l q a a n i _ taakwani _ .
entaqun _ i g l e g h t a a y a g h l u t e n g _ panegh pigesnaghkagh t _ , _ negh ke igh llegh m _ .
S i q l u g w a m _ , _ iigge llegh i _ afsengagh m _ sa i _ n e g h u g h a q l u k i _ , _ mesiighllug vyiigh ghhagh i _ n e g h u g h a q l u k i _ .
megh kun _ pugughilegh _ neqe igh ghllag kaqe na iqe kanga _ A n a g u t a a m _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ tuugtagh t _ aane te luki _ kaate nghata _ maaken _ , _ a a v g u n e g h m e g g t e k i _ q u k i k u n _ aafkagh inagh aqe luki _ .
A q i m l e n n g u q _ tuugtagh m _ aveg llegh m _ katamngwaagh _ .
P a n e g h a a t e l l g h a n i _ tamaani _ .
neqetu yagh lghii _ pugughilegh _ .
sivuqagh _ igataghnagh _ .
iwernga _ megh kun _ pugughilegh m _ negh ka aneng _ anagkagh t _ entaqun _ .
T e s a m a n t e k a a y a l g h i i k u t _ siipnegh ghhagh ni _ angayuqagh gka llu _ , _ a n g l e g u k a g h a a n k a l l u _ , _ t a a w a r a a g h i n a q _ nanevgaghtagh ut llu _ .
tazikani _ A n a g u t a a n k u t _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ A g h t u q a a y a g e n k u t _ .
taawa _ pugughilegh m _ yug ke aa _ .
T u t m a t e l g e n k u t _ neghigh pigte luteng _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ talwa _ itghaghkagh t _ sivungagh mun _ .
A n a g h a y a a m _ itghagh tke ai _ .
Q a a q w a a n k u t _ , _ T u t m a t e l g e n k u t _ , _ puughhute nkut _ .
taakut _ itghagh tke ai _ aki vig nkut _ , _ tagnegh linkut _ panig ni _ ila i _ .
Q a w a g e m _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ atkug ngllaghkagh t
nanevgaghtagh mta _ ungipagh iqe te igate kanginkut _ .
K u k u l e g m i i n n g u q _ pugughilegh mun _ piyug uute ghllag negh meggni _ upenghagh mi _ .
sagnegh _ pakegtekagh _ , _ akmag ke luku _ qayugh te aq _ .
sukilpagh mun _ , _ qawaag m _ amighqwaagh anun _ .
kiyang _ aate kau yaghpete ut _ n g e l q a a n k u t _ , _ sukilpagh nkut _ , _ alpa nkut _ , _ naghuyagh nkut _ , _ q a q s u n g i i n k u t _ .
esghaghteqagh nka _ angayuqagh ma _ naa ma _ ulima aqe kangi _ .
qaqsungigh at _ atkug u luteng _ entaqun _ alpa stun _ 3 5 - n g u u t _ .
naghuyagh t _ , _ ngelqagh stun _ 2 5 - n g u u t _ .
sukilpagh t _ 8 5 - n g u l u t e n g _ a t k u g w e t _ .
akmaliighagh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ 1 0 0 _ atkug u luteng _ n a a m a k a y u g w e t _ .
amighqwaagh t _ esghapag lleg mni _ sivuke luki _ ghhute kun _ ghhute ngllaghkagh kun _ tequgh kun _ , _ naagu _ s o a p - e n g i i g h h a q _ aghvig nghminiki _ naa ma _ , _ talwa _ whanga _ , _ q a t e g h r a k g a l e k _ t a a q n e m t e k i _ .
I n i n a q n e m t e k i _ , _ tequgh ghhagh t _ t e q u g h p a a g t e k a g h h a a t _ mesiigh meng _ kuuve luki _ q a t e g h q w a a s l u k i _ .
angighhwaagh luki _ amighqwaagh t _ .
itghuugute neghsigh luki _ , _ ini luki _ .
N e n g t a g h h n e m t e k i _ , _ a a y q a t e g h r a k e t u n _ .
whanga _ qantaghaqun _ taaqe kanga _ tamaaken _ amighqwaagh meng _ qepghagh nghmeng _ .
ighleg yagute yatnga _ taaqe unga _ .
aki ngllagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ amighqwaagh meng _ tamaaken _ , _ n g e l q a a n k u g n e n g _ , _ a l p a n k u g n e n g _ , _ s u k i l p a a n k u n e n g _ .
Q u g w i n i i _ sivuke luki _ keligagh aqe ke put _ .
G e v e s t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ ngelqagh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ .
qateg i _ ukut _ atugh aqe ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
qateg i _ allakagh meng _ atugh u ut _ , _ salleg i _ allakagh meng _ .
pinighhalek _ a t k u g w e t _ maqagh ghhalek _ .
ghhuu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh t _ .
aghsughtagh ghhagh meng _ kiigh mig luki _ , _ ngelqagh at _ qaasligh ke luki _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ i l e p g h a g h l u t e n g _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ amigh t _ taakut _ , _ i l e p g h a a g h e t _ k a v i r r a k g a l e k _ pinighhalek _ .
T e m k a g h l u k i _ a a t k a y u g w e t _ .
I t e g h y a g h a a m _ ungipamsug te nghminikut _ sangita _ p a a m k u g h h m i i n g i t a _ nalighnegh ita _ upenghagh u uute nghatni nguq _ n u g h a g h m e n g _ , _ neqe meng _ , _ amigh meng _ atghagh te ghllag aqe kanga _ , _ tagite aqe kangat _ .
sa eng _ nayag eng _ taana _ P a n g a n g a _ tagite aqe kangat _ , _ P a n g a n g a a w e n _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ amigh _ , _ neqe _ , _ quyngigh _ , _ tawaqapig _ .
talwa _ esghaghkagh nka _ tawaqapig i _ .
sungaghyug kegtagh ghllag t _ ququngagh ghllag t _ iknaqe ghllaget _ tawaqa t _ .
ila i _ sungaghyaag u aqe luteng _ .
taana qun _ naa ma _ imeg te a _ , _ maana _ nazighagh _ qukaa kun _ kepe luku _ tamaaken _ imaleg _ .
iknaqe ghllag _ , _ tawaqa isag negh meggni _ ikute aqe luteng _ taagken _ amiiragh meng _ taapekagh meng _ .
maaten _ esghapag lleg mni _ tawaqa llu _ allangughte uq _ .
melugyaghqagh _ allangughte uq _ .
pugughileghmii t
pugughilegh mi _ U k u m a m _ angayuqagh kek _ A g a a n k u k _ I t e g h y a g h a a n k u k _ .
avaquti a _ anglegute nka _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ .
qule u yaghpete ukut _ pi nga yu t _ siipnegh ke luki _ , _ k i n k u g h y a w a a t _ .
liisimakekagh ghhagh nka _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ A g l u g h a a n k u t _ , _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ K a v n a g h u u n k u t _ .
L i i s i m a k u q e n k a _ taakut _ .
A g a a m _ t a a m _ nayag i _ ivagh i ma nkut _ , _ tan- qagh u yankut _ , _ W e s q e g e t e n k u t _ , _ saghumig m _ avaquti a _ .
N a a g h u l u q _ ama _ sa ke aa _ .
K a r g i _ taana _ anengagh a _ , _ megh mi _ tuqukagh _ , _ ighnegh ghhagh a llu _ A g a a m l l u _ ighnegh a _ .
negaghaghni ii aagh mi _ uksugh mi _ S i n g i g p a m i _ taawani _ .
quunpeng _ negaghagh niigh ghllaget _ taakut _ m e t g h a g h m e n g _ .
kangghwaag _ u n a k u g h a q e g k a n g a t _ .
emta _ tawaten _ negaghagh yagh luteng _ aviite ut _ tazimante ut _ .
unaami _ i v a g h y a g h t u g h y a q m e g t e k i _ , _ taawa nguq _ qawaagtagh teng _ allakagh ita _ , _ avaqutagh mi _ qawaagtagh ghhagh i _ allakagh ita _ negaghagh ghhagh i _ ellnga n _ .
uugte ma lghii nguq _ kanaken _ aghipatuumagh mi _ .
tawani _ y a t a a g h q e l l u k i _ taakut _ aga nguq _ taaggun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ tazimante ut _ .
taakut _ T u t m a t e l g e n k u t _ t e s a m a n t e k a t _ esghaghkagh nka _ aki vig nkuk _ A n a g h a y a a n k u k _ avaqutagh kek _ T u t m a t e l g e m _ , _ nulighh a _ P i n i r k a k _ .
I t e g h y a g h a a m _ k u u g g h a _ taana _ T u t m a t e l e k _ .
itegh yagh aq _ naa ka _ , _ quutmii t _ panig at _ .
taana _ I t e g h y a g h a a m _ ata a _ G u g w i i n g e n _ .
N u l i i g h p i g a n i _ tuqu yan _ ungazigh mun _ nulightugh yaghtugh luni _ , _ G u g w i i n g e n _ .
atghagh yalghiimi nguq _ P a n g a n g a n g u f t u q _ nulighh a _ .
enkaam _ I t e g h y a g h a a n k u k _ , _ N a p a q a g h h a n k u k _ avaqutagh kek _ .
tuqu yan _ , _ kukuleg mun _ qawavek _ nulightugh yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
tagi yalghiimi _ nuliigh ligh luni _ W a a l l a m e n g _ .
talwa _ whanga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ , _ aghnagh ghllag _ kukuleg mii _ .
taana llu _ G u g w i i n g e n _ esghaqagh vyiigh kaqe aqa _ .
taana _ W a a l l a _ iwerngaqun _ p e k a m _ tuqu tke a _ .
taana _ G u g w i i n g e n _ u g w i n g a _ sa meng _ q u g w e l n g i m e n g _ negh neghllug te luni _ tuqukagh _ .
umeg ke i
A y u m i r u g l l a k _ , _ neghigh luku _ tesamani _ umeg ke i _ aghnagh _ tuquma lghii _ .
taglaate luku _ kiiw m _ taagavek _ inglu anun _ ika _ aliite uq _ .
T a l l i m a n e n g _ qavagh yan _ u g w i n g a n _ esghagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
taakwegken _ nenglu neng _ a g i g s a q m i n i g u _ ika nguq _ aqume luni _ .
taku luku _ aaggun _ uyavagh qu te _ alingyug ke m _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ alinge yu ke gpenanga _ tea- ai _ taku nga _ , _ tea- ai _ aqfa nga _ . _ â
aglagh luni _ yuug _ , _ s i q i n g h e m _ aghnagh _ q a t e g h r a k g i t a g h t a _ tagneghkwaagh lug ni _ siqinegh ghllag ke aq _ , _ ugu te ghllag ke aq _ .
tagite a _ atghagh te a _ , _ ighsa uq _ ne mun _ itegh nghmeng _ .
T e s q a g a g u n _ uvite megteggun _ t a n p e g h h e k _ ayagsigh lukek _ ne ke ak _ .
T a w a n l l u k u _ , _ sa yaghqagh t _ negh kangit _ ighsa kaqe luki _ .
pi niigh luni _ ungipamsug kekagh a _ kingu liigh aq _ allangughte lleqe ni luku _ .
lengaaghsi magh mi _ , _ qelmeghte magh mi _ , _ qilag kun _ igleghte yaaghte yaghqagh _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ esnagh mun _ u n Ê¼ g a v e k _ ugkelli yaghtugh aqe lleqe ut _ kinguliighagh put _ whangkuta _ .
taawa _ elqughte a _ .
ipapik _ tuqu nqigte ma lghii _ mulu luni _ qafsina _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ .
ataata ngiighhagh ma _ A n a g u t a a m _ esghagh kaqe na iqe kanga _ umeg ke i _ taana _ .
T a a k u n g i n a a f t u k u t _ whanga _ liisagh lghiinga _ katam _ family- ngiighhagh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ , _ A g l u g h a a n k u t _ .
l w e r n g a q u n _ tazikegkut _ A n a g u t a a n k u t _ , _ A g h t u q a a y a g e n k u t _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ .
A g h t u q a a y a k _ S i v u q a g h h m i i _ .
igagh a _ taana _ T a a s n a _ .
esla m _ seghlegh m _ tesamagun _ qaakekagh at _ .
talwa _ uksugh _ qukaghte ste gpenaan _ tagikagh _ .
laluramke meng _ esghaate igate ngugh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ .
angyagh t _ ayvegh m _ kangllukagh i
taakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ aviitete te luta _ , _ A g l u g h a g h h i i n a a n k u k _ A t g h a a n g a n k u k _ avaqutagh ke u lukek _ .
agigte te nkut _ taakut _ angyagh t _ G u g w i i n g e n k u t _ angyaghut _ .
nani _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ nalle inagh mi _ ayvegh m _ kanglu ghllag aatagh luki _ taakut _ G u g w i i n g e n k u t _ anag ma lghiit _ .
T a a k u n n g u q _ sama _ qagegh ta ghllag t _ .
Q a a g g h i i s a n _ taku luki _ p i y a q m e g t e k i _ megh _ yug ghllag _ , _ taakut _ agigte te nkut _ panig i _ , _ nulighh a _ , _ avaquti a _ .
ategh ka llu _ t a w a n n i i _ .
K a n u u g l l u n i n g u q _ iimna _ megh _ .
angyagh t _ a a g h w n g a g h m i _ n a a f q e l l u n i _ .
T a a n a n g i n a g h h a g h n g u q _ ategh ka _ pukanegh llgagh u yagh lghii _ s u f l i t a g h m i _ .
T a a m _ apangiighhagh mta _ ighsake ma kanga _ qaake lleghqagh a _ .
legan _ unite luki _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
K i n g u n g i t n e n g u q _ taakwani _ kiig mi _ qikmigh at _ naave ut _ mulaagh te aatagh ghllaget _ .
K a n g k i i l e g h m i _ i n g a n s a l g h i i t _ P e g h y a l q a m _ u k a k a g h a a n i _ mangteghagh at _ .
qikmigh ke te luki _ tuqu qugh ma ait _ , _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ panegh qugh ma kangit _ .
nanugh m _ T a g h n u g h h i i q e n g e l l g h a
nenglu it _ tamaakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ .
aviite luki _ talwa _ I t e g h y a g h a a n k u t _ tugutu te mangite luki _ .
entaqun _ ayumigh _ yugtu pigte yagh lghii nguq _ m a t u m e n g _ talwa _ .
nenglu i _ estamat _ yugtu ghllaget _ .
aatghute ghllag negh meggni nguq _ t a g h n u g h h a p e r u g w a a q _ unite luku _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag negh meggni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ naghaagh te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ taghnughhagh it _ .
alla _ tawaten _ n a g h a a g h u t e g h l l a g l u t e n g u q _ amaken _ U y g u n a n e n g _ nanugh ghllag m _ ivgagh ma aki _ qughsatku m _ .
qughsatku m _ uugte vike ma kangi _ .
nanugh ghllag m _ tuqu qugh ma a _ taghnughhagh _ tamaa na _ .
A t a s i g h h i i n a q _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ anagkagh _ .
tuqu quqagh ni _ tamaa na _ n e g h u u m a a _ ila i _ siipte aqe luki _ , _ naa squghhagh inagh i _ negh aqe luki _ , _ n a k a g h i i n i i _ negh aqe luki _ .
T a m l a g h q u s a l g h i i m e n g _ taghnughhagh ghllag _ , _ kanug ghllag _ kaana _ esnagh m _ kenle ani _ .
T a g h n u g h i i g h w a a g h l u n i _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ legan _ .
taamna _ taghnughhagh igh vig _ , _ naghaagh vig it _ akullghute aat _ aki itnite ngughk _ .
taghnughhagh _ naghaagh yagh te ghllag aqe lghii _ taamavek _ .
esghaghhu _ taakut _ kaave ghllag ma ut _ qula at _ .
sama _ taghnughhagh a _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ peghu ghllag qagh a _ naghaagh vig at _ .
neqamike llegh ka _ pugughilegh mete luta
ayapghute m _ apegh llegh a
whanga _ ayapghute u unga _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ panig a _ , _ K u k i y a n g a m _ panig a _ .
N g u s i i g n i _ allgegh kau unga _ O c t o h e r _ 2 9 , 1 9 2 7 _ .
ayumiqullegh _ ataasigh _ N g u s i i g n i l l u n g a _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh kanga _ .
napaqagh ghhagh meng _ K u k i y a n g a _ u g w i i g h u m a l g h i i _ .
tesamani _ liite unga _ .
K e m u g y i n g u y a g h p e t u q _ K u k i y a n g a m _ u g w i k s u w h a a g h a _ .
sivugh qaghte luni _ sivuqagh meng _ maaken _ aglagh yagh luni _ i f l a n g w a a g h a l u n i _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ ghhuu kau uq _ .
qikmigh ghhagh inagh ghhagh a _ m e g h y a g h q u g h t e n g a _ E l q w a a g h q u m _ apegh kaqe a _ kaate tke aq _ .
napaqagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ liite unga _ .
liisagh lghiinga _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t l u _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut llu _ q e r n g a g h m e t u t e f t u k u t _ .
taakut _ A g l u g h a a n k u t _ allakagh mete ut _ .
A g a q _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
itegh yagh aq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ .
A g a q _ aghuliigh yaghtugh magh an _ taghtugh kau unga _ .
taawa _ ingaghte luni _ qinuyug u uq _ , _ ighu a _ uki nga lghii _ sa u aat qun _ maame igate ngugh t _ , _ agha lgu aqe yagh kata _ tamaani _ entaqun _ pinigh aqe nayagh lghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ manu ani _ tawani _ qavagh aqe lunga _ ellnga ni _ .
A l i a _ tawaten _ qavagh laatagh lunga _ taghtugh yalghiinga _ nuugte ma kangatnga _ .
pi yalghiinga _ tuquma lghii _ .
A g a q _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke aat _ , _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ .
liite lleg mni _ ne t _ malghugnegh t _ iwerngaqun _ atghagh u yankut _ taakut _ p i n g a y u q l u k i _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghtekayug ni _ uksughte aqe luta _ kiigtagh ke luta _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh aqe luki _ .
sivuqagh m _ n a t e t u l n g a _ whanga qun _ nalluke yagh aqa _ .
whanga qun _ 1 7 _ y e a r s - n g u g h s i m a g h m a _ maavek _ lliigh kau unga _ .
S a t u g h q w a a k a n g i n k u t _ q i n u y u t u g h h n a q a a t a g h l l a g e t _ enkaam _ maavek _ sivuqagh mun _ tawaten _ agha leg nun _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh lghiit _ kayaali naqe ghllag ughte lghiit _ .
sa meng _ agha ite ngugh u lghiit _ tesamani _ , _ m a a k e n g i n a g h h a q _ a g h a n g e g k a y u g w e t _ .
maapi i aghagh u aatagh llegh ut _ liisimake aqa _ .
maapi luta _ aglagh aqe luta _ pi iigh aataghkagh ni _ .
K u z a a t a m _ aqfa aqe kanginkut _ a n g y a g h t u m u n _ , _ y u g w i s a g l l a g u l u n i _ .
enkaam _ maaken _ neqe ngllagh luteng _ aglagh te aqe luta _ .
maani _ mangteghagh ite yagh ukut _ .
tazikna _ kitum _ I v i g u g w e m _ p i k s a g h a a _ .
taakut _ liisimake anka _ M a a y a a n k u t _ w h a t e n g w a a q _ , _ alike magh ita _ esghagh kaqe anka _ .
upenghagh mi _ neqe niigh aqe ut _ esavghagh luteng _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ ayveghagh qaghaqe ut _ maklagte aghte aqe ut _ tawaten _ y u p a g i l n g u u t _ , _ qerngughte luteng _ , _ angyagh _ ataasigh _ .
J u n e - n g u g h h n e g h a n i _ elngaatall _ tawani _ u n a k u g h a q u t _ inwa _ ghhuugh ghhagh mun _ .
kuuvragh kun _ negaghpag kun _ maagun _ o a t e n _ i i s t u t k a l g h i i k u n _ .
tapghagh at _ , _ qasiqagh m _ amenqun _ tamaaken _ keleve te luteng _ inwa _ g h h u u g h s u g h n a g h h a q _ .
ghhuugh teng _ i t a k u m t a a g h l l a g i t _ .
W h a t e n g w a a q _ a n Ê¼ g i l q u g p e n a a m t a _ nanugh meng _ kelengaruugh ni _ , _ qayughllak _ nanughtuqagh _ .
A q i y a g a q i i n k u t _ , _ e s t u g w a a m l l u _ negh ka aneng _ aglagh te aghte aqe ainkut _ .
maaken llu _ quyngigh lgu luku _ piyug meng _ kaate aqe ut _ sivungagh meng llu _ maaken llu _ .
kaynge lgu luku _ , _ kaynge _ ama _ taana _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ esghagh kaqe a _ .
angli ghllag magh an _ ighleg yagute aqe kanginkut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ iiskughte aqe kanginkut _ navek _ aghulaqe lleghqagh ut _ .
qayughllak _ neqe mnneng _ tegleg u ghllag _ , _ qikmigh put _ tuqute aqe luki _ .
B r o w n - n g u u q _ color-nga _ t a g n e q e g n e g h i t u q _ .
T a a n a n g i n a a g u q _ nagate kaqe a _ kaynge _ ataasigh ghhagh _ , _ ava ite ngugh u yagh lghii _ k a y n g e n g i t n u y a l g h i i _ .
A g l u g h a a n k u t _ taakut _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ kingulighpigagh ughtekagh t _ .
taawa _ aglagh yug nanigh uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh u aghte uq _ iilqayug kanigh lghii _ y u g w i i t e m _ .
nenglutuqagh _ , _ iigge snanigh aqe kanginkut _ neghsagh meng _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh mta _ amenqun _ tepe a _ sa u a _ aliigh na yu kan _ i g h l e k e l u u g u t a n g a t _ .
wetku _ qagi inagh ghhagh m _ aliighte nghagu _ naalkute aghte aqe ukut _ t u g u t l u w h a g h m e n g _ , _ tuugkagh ghhagh meng _ .
tawatete ut _ iwerngaqun _ nengyugh mta _ u n g i p a m s u g w a _ I t e g h y a g h a a m _ taana _ mangteghagh squghhagh _ , _ k u u g g h a n _ uuknaliqe aqngami _ nekeftekaqe a _ c h u r c h - e n g u l u k u _ .
tagtalmi _ sa u aat _ angyaghpag t _ kaate luteng _ t e a c h e r - k a g h q a q _ t e s a m a g u n n g u q _ qaake ma kangat _ .
tesamani _ enkaam _ igaghyagh vleghagh kau ma lghiit _ esgha _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ A g l u g h a a n k u t _ taakut _ nekreg te nkut _ tesamavek _ pi luteng _ nagnegh luteng _ , _ W a a l a n k u t _ , _ ayuqe inkut _ tesamani _ igaghyagh te ma lghiit _ , _ U n i i g h t a q a a n k u t _ .
taana llu _ liisimake kegka _ G e i s t - t a _ .
taawa _ d y n a m i t e - t e g h l l a g e t _ , _ entaqun _ mining- u aqe ut _ .
tesamani _ uksugh ghqu ghllag ut _ , _ uksughte aatagh ut _ .
taana _ mangteghagh ghhagh _ guygu ngiighhagh _ qaake llegh a _ liisimake aqa _ .
N a n e k - e k u n _ angyaghpag squghhagh kun _ angaghqugh kaqe aat _ .
kaviigh meng _ , _ ulimaagh meng _ qerngughte te luteng _ Q a y g e g h t a a n k u t _ kakikagh meng llu _ ila luki _ tukfigh iqe aat _ .
tesamna _ maaten _ una _ aghqelli ma ut _ , _ uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ .
anuqe m _ tagtalmi _ tuquuqagh i _ entaqun _ anate te m _ naranghigh luni _ aghqelli kaqe aat _ .
uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ , _ a n u q e k e g t e g h l l a g t u q _ tesamna _ .
anuqligh nghmini _ mangteghagh t _ q a p r a g t a q e g k a n g i _ , _ uusqagh te mineng _ .
taana _ mangteghapig _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh llu _ q u u g w e t _ quupe aqe luki _ pinighsagh qaghkagh ut _ , _ u l i m a k a q a g h p u t _ whangkuta _ .
nenglu u yagh uq _ sivuke luni _ .
nenglu mi _ tawani _ liite kau unga _ , _ nenglu m _ ilu ani _ .
enkaam _ unaghsigh meng _ pi iigh aatagh yan _ angaghqugh aqe luki _ , _ quupe aqe luki _ u l i m a l a g h t e q a g h p u t _ .
tanpegh meng _ p i i k n a l i g h l u k u _ .
A g a a n k u t _ nenglu meng _ tawavek _ nuugtekagh t _ enkaam _ t a w a n l l u n i _ tuqu kau uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ a q s a l l u g w e m _ iwerngaqun _ taawa _ u n a m t a q e p i g e s n a q a q a a _ .
ayaa yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ whaten _ t a g h n u g h h a g h e s t u n _ lliigh kestagh aqe uq llu _ esghaghhu qun _ n a g h a a l g u t k e n n a q a q e g k e f u t _ .
nengyugh ghhagh inagh mta _ ungipamsug te aghte vyiigh qaghaqe ainkut _ .
A g a a m _ ata i _ taakut _ k i n k u n g w a a t _ uvegh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ l v e l g h a n i _ taakwani _ , _ qungughvig ni _ entaqun _ kangsumqaghte luteng _ tuqukagh t _ .
qerngagh emta _ A g h n a g h a g h n i q l u _ , _ ayuqligh llu _ a n g l i k a k u t _ r o o m - a _ entaqun _ mangteghagh _ una _ k a g p e l l i i g h a g h l u k u _ a a f q e n g e r t a a t u k u t _ .
N u l a g h i l g h i i n i q u n _ k a g p e l l i i g h a g h a q e g k a n g i _ mangteghagh t _ f a m i l y - t u g h l l e g h h i i n i _ .
tagtalmi _ nani _ tamaani _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ a n g u u g h e m _ neqangisag luta _ lliigh ukut _ .
qayugh m _ a w a r k i n g i i g h h i i _ uqug ligh aqe luki _ neqekagh ke ke put _ .
T a n p e g h h e t _ p u u f l u k i _ tapghaghqagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
S i q l u g w a m _ p u y a n e q r u w h a a _ kelig aqe luku _ , _ tawaten _ n e q e k e g k a g h p u t _ .
E l l m a a r a g l l e q _ maligte luku _ aliillegh _ maligte luku _ sakma _ J a n u a r y - m i _ tawani _ N a y e g r e g h a q _ aghvenge aqe uq _ mangtag ghllag t _ kaat ute i aat _ E l q w a a g h q u n k u t _ , _ K u z a a t a n k u t _ .
taawa _ neqete ukut _ .
naten _ sangamta _ negh ke igh te qaghte ghllagkagh ni _ sangamta _ , _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ entaqun _ .
T e g h i g l u g w e m _ inglu i _ , _ uksaagh mi _ u n a k u g h l l a g l u k u _ tanpegh nun _ kanaghte uute aqe luku _ kayu _ , _ iqallug _ , _ qagugh ak _ k a g p a g t e g h a q e g k a n g a t _ uksugh mi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ .
nalighnegh ghhagh a _ e g h q a l i k a g h t e g p e n a a n _ .
qawaag m _ itegagh i _ nuvugh aqe luki _ agaghte uute aqe luki _ uksugh mi _ p u u f l u k i _ , _ aghi ste luki _ , _ gaagh luki _ negh aqe ke put _ .
kiyang _ nulugh yagh qaghaqe ukut _ tagtalmi _ , _ i q s a p a g i l n g u g h n i _ tamaani _ .
nulugh yagh llegh _ tamaghhagh an _ s u f l u g w a l i q a a m a n g i n a q _ , _ nanugh meng _ k e l e n g a r u u g h e m _ .
N e g h e v l e g h a q e s t a n i _ tawaten _ .
riigh nge ka inagh _ angyaghpag _ , _ a t a s i g h h i i n a g h m e n g _ pedersen _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
kingulighpigagh u ni luku _ pugughilegh mun _ usingigh iqe aq _ .
T a a q n i i t n g u f t u g h n g u q _ iglegha llegh a _ .
T a a m _ kingu aneng _ riigh nge gkankut _ , _ N a n e k - e n k u t _ kaate aqe ut _ tesamavek _ sivulii luteng _ pugughilegh kun _ tekite aqe ut _ .
taagken _ k i n g u v a q u n _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sivungagh mun _ pi aqe ut _ .
akilpegagh aqe ut _ kagimkagh _ , _ iiqmig _ , _ tawaqa _ entaqun _ avelghagh igate kangat _ , _ sikeriigh t _ .
avlawa qun _ iitek _ p i i q e g k e f u t _ qayuq _ .
qayugh t _ tamaakut _ I i i s a l g h i i n g a _ qamagun _ f o i l - e l g e t _ qaye i _ vegaagh t _ J a p a n e s e - e m e n g _ ategh leg t _ , _ t u m a p a g i l n g u u t _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
F o i l - e n g i _ tamaakut _ A g h n a g h a g h n i q l u _ elngaatall _ teghigniqe tke aqlaatagh ke put _ aksaqe luku _ tegleg luki _ g g u t e r n t e g g u n _ m a t e g t a q l u k i _ .
iqenge negh mta _ q e l m e g h u u t e s q e l l u k i _ iingqagh put _ .
W h a t e n g w a a q _ enraq _ pi gpenaamta _ , _ nagate snanigh aqe kanginkut llu _ ungipamsug te nghata _ .
Q e p g h a m s u g l l a g n i _ quunpeng _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ .
nunivag niigh aqe luta _ , _ maani _ a v i i l n g u u t _ piitesighagh at _ saghna aqe luki _ , _ legan _ esghaqagh u luteng _ m i r u g w a n a t _ .
U n a t a a n k u t _ , _ mellu inkut _ s a g h n a l a g h a q a p u t _ uksugh mi _ pi kaghqagh u luki _ .
iitegngam _ aqavzig _ elngaatall _ s a g h n a a q a g h p u t _ .

kukuleg mii t
P e n a p a g e m _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ nagate lleg mtun _ U g w e t e l e m e n g _ a p a n g i i g h h a m m n e n g _ apegh naqe aqa _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ , _ kukuleg mii t _ p e l u n g i g h l l a g e n n g u q _ elngaatall _ iqangite naqe negh ghllag t _ , _ a a t k a q e g l l a g e t _ , _ igaqragh ghllag _ sa at _ tamaghhagh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ a t a a s i i g h n e g h u n a q e g h l l a g e t _ i p a p i g h q e n g n g a n a q e g h l l a g e t _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
S a g h l l a k a n n g u q _ tagtalmi _ .
elngaatall _ a m y u q e t a g h s i g h w a a g h l l a g e m _ kaate tke ai _ , _ entaqun _ nanghiiqu llegh m _ s a a m _ kaate te ghllag ke ai _ m a a t e n g u y a q a n _ sumeghtaghagh llegh _ .
tawaten _ ukut _ kiyaghte aaghet _ u u m _ nuna m _ pi yan _ puughte ghllag kaqe kangi _ sivuke luki _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ piyaa luteng _ u n Ê¼ g a n i _ ayvegh t _ unguva i ta _ manguna itneng _ ikute luteng _ , _ legan _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
pi aqe lghii _ whaten _ U g w e t e l e n _ , _ â _ imatuq llu _ talwa _ ayvegh ghhagh inagh t _ pi kaqe atki _ , _ awiim nguq _ teghig ke sagh _ q a m a g l u k u _ seghletun _ tawaten _ amyuutke kaqe kangat _ . _ â
tuqute gpenaki _ ikute aqe luteng _ legan _ .
entaqun _ tawaten _ teghig nagh nge tke ai _ elngaatall _ .
legan _ tawaten _ u n g u v a l n g u g h m e n g _ whaa _ ikute aqe luteng _ gaagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
tagtalmi _ yuug _ ataasigh _ sa ghllag ke aq _ elngaatall _ .
entaqun _ k e v g a a k a a l g h i i _ yuug _ taana _ .
S a a m _ kaate kaqe kanga _ , _ nunalgute ni _ elngaatall _ a a t k a n g l a a t e s q e g k i i _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ , _ pelungighsagh te naqe ni luteng _ pi kaqe kangi _ .
aghnagh _ kaki tke aq _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh tke aq _ igaqragh ghllag meng _ tawaten _ p i n i g h r a k e g t e p i g l l u k u _ ulima tete luteng _ .
entaqun _ a p e g h i i g h y a q m e g t e g g u _ tamaa na _ qelegh te llegh a _ , _ entaqun _ t a m a a n a n g i n a q _ pi gpenaan _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ s a g n e l l g h a q u l l u k i _ ukmangigh stekagh i _ y u g w e m _ t a a m _ .
Y u g w e m _ t a a m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ legan _ pikagh t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ alignagh ite ngughk _ yuug _ taana _ entaqun _ .
laluramke nun _ ungipamsug ke nghminigu _ p r o p h e c y - k a a n i i q e g k a n g a t _ yuug _ taana _ .
tawaten _ apeghiigh uute yan _ , _ enraq llu _ tawani _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ pi lleghqagh itni _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ , _ a n u q e q r a g g a n g u n a n i _ , _ q a g i q r a g g a n g u n a n i _ legan _ megh _ unegna _ taghneghaghqugh te stun _ q a t e g h l l u g w e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ lli aqe aq _ .
esnagh mun _ atghagh uute ste ghllag luku _ yuug _ elngaatall _ k u m a g h t i g h l l a g l u t e n g _ b o n _ f i r e - e g h l l a k a t _ entaqun _ .
K u m a g h t i g h l l a g l u t e n g _ quug _ qerngughte luku _ aarragh te luteng _ tawaten _ entaqun _ neqe meng _ k e l q e l l u t e n g _ .
Y u g w e m _ w h a l e n _ pi ke ai _ , _ â _ temngi _ tawaten _ aneghte nghite u amsi _ , _ nuna _ uukna _ tagi lghii _ qateghrakegtagh _ iqa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ t u u s a g h q a q e n g h i l k e f u t _ n u k e g n a g h l u t a _ . _ â
taana _ apeghiigh te sqellug qu _ pelungighsagh te sqellug qu _ .
esgha _ legan _ B i b l e - e t _ p i l l g h i s t u n _ pikagh t _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ megh kun _ u u n Ê¼ g g u n _ , _ mumigte aqe luteng _ yuvghiighkagh t _ .
elngaatall _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ entaqun _ seghletun _ pi llegh eng _ taana _ qivghukekagh at _ sa ke aat _ apeghraghkagh at _ .
seghleghqe llegh eng _ , _ s e g h l e g h y u k e l l e g h t e n g _ aag negh squgh ke aat _ elngaatall _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ nuna mun _ .
pi aqe kangi _ U g w e t e l e m _ , _ â _ E n t a q u n n g u q _ seghevute uute tke aat _ . _ â
piniqe llegh _ i g h i v g a g h m i _ tawani _ naalkekagh at _ .
I w e r n g a q u n n g u q _ tawaten _ taakwna _ nuna _ y u g w e m _ t a a m _ atigh aqe kanga _ taakwna _ nuna _ tagi lghii _ q a t e g h r a k e g l l a k _ ava ite ngughk _ tagneqragh ite ngughk _ iqa ite ngughk _ .
taana _ pelungighsagh te sqekagh a _ , _ ukmangigh sqekagh i _ nunalgute ni _ tamaakut _ .
entaqun _ apeghiigh luteng _ esgha _ t a a m _ kingu aneng _ mulu gpenateng _ , _ q a v a m e g g n e n g u q _ tuqu laghate kau ut _ .
A q n i g h p e n a t e n g u q _ q a v a g h p a g u t k a a n i i q e g k a n g i n n g u q _ .
nenglu m _ legan _ imigh a _ qavagh negh ke te ziin _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
ungipamsug _ taana _ elngaatall _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h y a g u t a q e g k e g k a _ c o m p a r e - r a a q e g k e g k a _ , _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ whaten _ igamsiqa yagute aqe kegka _ .
repall _ pi aqe kenka _ m i n i s t e r - e t _ , _ â _ T a a k w a n i n g a n i _ whaa _ k e n l e t g h u u s k a n _ nuna _ , _ entaqun _ ila i _ legan _ esghagh yaghqagh put _ yuguligh llegh nun _ iteghkagh t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh a _ esghagh kaqe kegka _ elngaatall _ , _ yupig t _ t a w a t e n g w a a g h w a a q _ laluramke stun _ ugpeqe luku _ ayuqe kangat _ h o n o r - e g h l l a g l u k u _ ( _ i n _ t h e i r _ o w n _ w a y _ ) _ ellmeng _ katam _ pi llegh megestun _ .
U n d e r s t a n d - t e l l e g h m e g e s t u n _ ayuqe kangat _ . _ â
anglinghhagh u lunga
A m i g i q a a m _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ whanga _ qaatke ghllag luki _ angayuqagh nka _ ata nka _ taakut _ angli kau lghiinga _ .
neqe _ sa u a _ angaghqugh ghllag nghatgu _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangatnga _ qinutagh ghllag naagh ni lunga _ .
enkaam _ kayusiite aqe kenka _ neqe meng _ qepghagh nghata _ .
P i s q e g h l l a g a t n g a _ s a s q e g h l l a g a t n g a _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ ilangakun _ k a l l e g h s a g h n a l u n g a l l u _ sa lunga llu _ qinuyug lunga _ .
panignagh u na iqe lunga _ nukeggnaghqe ste ghllag aqe aatnga _ .
U g w i i g h y a m a l l u _ tagi negh mni _ agligh sqe aqe kangatnga _ .
agligh sqe nghatnga _ A p a a t a n k u n u n _ atghagh aqe lghiinga _ .
amalleqa _ p i q r u g w a q e g k a n g a n g a _ , _ panike na iqe kanganga _ apagh ta m _ .
â _ S i n g l e n g a m _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ . _ â
S i n g l e n g a _ taana _ whangkuta _ agani _ p i k u m a k a n g a t _ .
â _ S i n g l e n g a m _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ aglagh a _ . _ â
aglagh aqe lghiinga _ qiya vleghagh magh ma _ sumeghtaghagh magh ma _ , _ panike na iqe lunga _ ighsayagute ghllag atnga _ .
l g h s a y a g u n n i l u n g a _ .
test-kagh nkuk _ enraq _ atalgute gka _ ugumikeraagh naqe ghllag k _ , _ A k u l i q a a n k u k _ , _ A g h n a a m k a m i n k u k _ .
apagh ta m _ panig i _ , _ taana llu _ T e p a r g h u q _ .
T e p a r g h u q _ taana _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u luku _ A y a k i n k u n u n _ angag itnun _ tuune kaqe aat _ .
E g m i g h a g h l l a k _ .
aag lleg nge a nguq _ naa ke a _ .
apagh ta m nguq _ n u l i g h q e f t a a _ aag lleg nge a _ .
ayag ke inkut _ nayag ke aat _ .
T a a g e g k e n _ tagi laghate kau ut _ .
whanga llu _ atalgute gka _ taake uk _ .
ugumi ke ghllag yagh kanginkut _ T e p a r g h u u m _ .
urang _ ugumi ke yagh ainkut _ , _ maaten _ qemall _ .
pi aqe kenka _ panig nka _ , _ maalliqun _ p i n i q s a l i i g h l l a g a a n g a _ qavngaq _ ugumi ke ghllag lunga _ .
alingyug ketagh ghllag _ , _ paninang _ maaten _ alingyug ketagh ghllag _ .
A l i n g y u g w i g a l n g u u n g a _ , _ u n u g t a q e l g h i i n g a l l u _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m a _ .
navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe aat _ .
itegh nghata _ pi aqe kenka _ , _ â _ navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe tsi _ ? _ â
pangeghte aat
ungipamsug ghllag t _ elngaatall _ .
payangite ghllag qagh yu k llu _ angukagh ut _ .
elngaatall _ legan _ t a m l a g h q u l l u t e n g _ whaa _ q a y u n g l l a q _ , _ aqelqagh put _ taakut _ qayug ngllagh te ma luki _ q e n a a g h p a l l a q u _ , _ q i i n q a n e m n i _ kana _ qaasqagh mi _ u z i v l e g h e t _ .
aqfaqugh te t _ aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ .
legan _ qayugh qiinagh luteng _ neghe gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ tawaten _ aqfaqugh te luteng _ uzimun _ ataasighhaaghte aqe luteng _ , _ entaqun _ aneghte negh meggni _ aatqaghte vike aqe luki _ .
apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ mataghqe te luteng _ t u g h u m g h a n n e q e g s a a t a q u t _ .
enraq _ talwa _ esghapag snanigh aqe kangit _ .
A g h n a a m k a m i l l u _ amigh k _ umeg sighwaagh luku _ r e g h i l q u g h l l u k u _ esghapag aqe lghiikung _ .
sangamta _ esghapag snanigh aqe inkut _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ liisagh lghiikut _ agleghnagh staghhiinagh _ .
iwerngaqun _ taaqe luteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ n e g h u l g h u t a q u t _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ n u n a t u g h q w a a s u g n i t a q i i n k u t _ .
l u t e n g _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ n e g h u l g h u t a q u t _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ n u n a t u g h q w a a s u g n i t a q i i n k u t _ .
K e l q u g h l u t e n g _ kalngag meng _ ila i _ uyamig luteng _ .
amigh m _ liiqnegh a _ legan _ t a n - e k a s t u n _ tawaten _ .
ugtinghagh it _ pi nigh ghllag t _ legan _ whaten _ .
qallukagh _ s a n a g h q u g h w a a g h l u n i _ .
ayallaghwaagh llu _ , _ angyaghwaagh llu _ allgegh naqe ghllag at _ elngaatall _ , _ iiwen _ kaki sigh m _ siku i _ .
S i k u u n n g u q _ ataasigh t _ a l l g e g h t e q a g h n e g h m e g t e k i _ , _ kaki yaghtugh negh meggni _ t a m a a n a l e g n u n _ k e l q e l l u k i _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ siku ut _ .
S i k u g h h n a q e g h l l a g e t _ maaken _ kaki sigh m _ sikugh aneng _ .
Q a v n g a g h t a r u g l l a g e t _ sikugh nka _ P e d e r s e n - m e n g _ ima _ tukfighagh t _ , _ pinigh t _ taake ghllag nghite ngugh t _ , _ t a a k e g h p a g e t _ katamngwaagh t _ kenug kegte nghite ngugh t _ pinigh t _ .
whaa _ panig ma _ n a a n g s a g h t u g h i i _ .
aflenga kaqe anka _ neghightagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh nka _ ima _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ a l l g e g h t e k a n k a _ .
K e l g u q u n e m k i _ kinku nun _ n a l l e g h a y a g u t a q e g k a n g i t _ .
talwa _ G e i s t - a m _ aqeftaghaagh i _ sungaghtuqagh t _ .
pi lgu unga llu _ tamaaken _ sakma _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ panig nka _ t a w a t e k a n i i g u t _ whanga mtun _ pivagru negh ghllag _ aag qagh ghhaat _ .
aamtaam _ eltughagh nka _ pillgite u aghte ut _ .
whanga mtun llu _ taawa _ p i s q e l l u k i _ aghyuugh aqe kenka _ , _ maligte naagh nghite kangatnga _ .
kii _ , _ akuzi aqe unga _ ilangakun _ apeghtugh na luki _ u n g i p a m s u g u n n e m k i _ angli naqe lleg mneng _ .
ineghneghlliqe gpenanga _ whanga _ angli kanga _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
P e l a a s i _ entaqun _ taana _ pilleg pigte yagh uq _ elngaatall _ ungipamsug nghmini _ .
taameng _ i g a g h y a q a y u g w e t l u _ liisagh lghiikut _ y u g w e t _ s e v e n - e k l a a g m i _ u n u g m i _ igaghyagh te aqe lghiit _ .
H i g h _ s c h o o l - e m _ igagh i _ qamagtekaqe kangi _ talwa _ .
enkaamllu _ p u y g i i n g i g a l q w a a g h l l a g u y a g h t u q _ .
l g a g h y a a t k a y u g u y a g h t u t _ u n u g m i _ .
apeghtughiste ke yuwhaagh t
taana _ igaghvig _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ tamaavek _ nanevgagh nun _ .
S a a v l a n k u n u n _ , _ P u s a a n k u n u n _ , _ kinku nun llu _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ .
K a y u s i i t k a q n i i q e g k a n g q a t _ tea- aghte a _ .
aglu m _ inglu igh llegh aneng _ repa ke luteng _ .
T a n g e g h t u g h l l a g t u n n g u q _ elngaatall _ aglu t _ tamaakut _ , _ ayvegh m _ aglu igh a _ .
tamaaken _ repa ke luteng _ ulima kaqe na iqe aat _ .
kayusigh kaqe na iqe aat _ .
iwernga _ liisagh lghiikut _ pinigh ghllag _ igaghvig ghllag _ .
whaten _ igagh yami _ ikiqun _ uglagh ghllag _ whangkuta _ t e a c h e r - k e g k a q e n g h i l k e f u t _ .
nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiit _ .
maaten llu _ t e a c h e r - e g h l l a g u g h l l e g h h i i _ .
N i c k e r s o n - e n k u t _ maani _ t e a c h e r - n g u g h l l a k a a g u t _ .
minister- nge magh mi _ , _ t e a c h e r - n g u m a g h m i _ ayuqe lghii _ .
T h o m p s o n - n e n k u t _ ama _ t e a c h e r - n g u g h l l a k a a g u t _ tawaten _ nulighhqaghtu an _ .
iwernga _ sa u a _ ayuqligh _ ama _ t e a c h e r - k e g k a q a g h p u t _ u k a v a n l e n g u g h n i _ .
A g h n a a r t u q _ ayuqligh _ .
P i l l w a a g h a t a g h a t _ taana _ N i c k e r s o n - n g u n i k a n g a t _ t e a c h e r - k e r t a a t _ .
whangkuta _ taana _ ayuqligh _ t e a c h e r - k e g k a q a g h p u t _ .
negh yagh uute kayug ni _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ .
negh yaghtugh luta _ o n e - e k l a a g y a g h t u n g h a n i _ tagi aqe luta _ .
talwa _ mangteghagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
T a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ .
enkaam _ uvite _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aante aput llu _ s a m a v e g h l l u g w i n a q _ , _ mallagh ite ngugh t llu _ .
sa kun _ avlawate ta kun _ , _ paper _ s a c k - k e k u n _ qantagh luki _ anuqligh nghaani _ aantagh nun _ aante i negh mta _ t e n g t e s t a q e g k e p u t _ , _ t e n g t a q e g k a n g i _ .
entaqun _ sa pagite luta _ mallagh ite ngugh u kut _ talwa _ .
akilpegaghkagh t
N u u g h t e k a n i g h m e n g _ anglikagh ni _ whangkuta _ .
T a a n a n g u r t u q _ kiyang _ tukfigh yug qumtaagh at _ tawaqa nkut _ , _ iiqmig nkut _ , _ q a y u u n k u t _ , _ avlawa nkut _ .
T a a k u n g u r t u t _ kiyang _ tukfigh yuke llegh it _ .
avlawa _ kiyang _ , _ avlawa t llu _ tamaakut _ neqekrangllaghpag gpenaki _ , _ kiyang _ avlawa liigh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ mulu ghllag aqe ut _ , _ neqekrangllagh qaghaqe luteng _ .
nutaghagh llu _ taawa _ nanigh m _ neqekrangllagh a _ neqekrangllagh meng _ negh yugnagh ghllag _ .
sa kun _ q a y u l g h u t a g b h a g h q u n _ J a v a _ T e a - n g u n i i q e g k a n g i t g u n _ ukite luki _ neqekrangllagh aqe lghiinga _ .
K a n g g h u g r a k g u u g h l l u t e n g _ ila i _ o a t e n _ mesiigh m _ t a a p e k a n i g h l u k i _ neqnigh ghllaget _ w h a n g k u n n i _ .
neqe ut
ii _ , _ neghsagh _ kaat ute ghllag nghmegteggu _ .
A y m a a k e l a g h t u g h a q e g k e f u n g _ N a p a a q l u _ .
tazingavek _ s a a g b h w a m m n u n _ s i q l u g w a m u n _ kanaghte aqe luki _ .
kaate negh megteni _ q a m u g b l l a g l u t e k _ .
qaye akun _ aligh mta _ qalqalima meng _ aveg aqe luki _ .
S i q l u g w i i g b a q e l g h i i k u n g _ qalqalima meng _ kemekrag meng _ .
S a g n e g h w a a g b l l a g e t _ imigh luki _ kapeghte i lutung _ i q u g w a k u n _ kapeghtekagh pung _ lli luki _ .
neghe uute negh mta _ taaggun _ kapeghtekagh kun _ iwhani _ neqnigh ghhalek _ , _ ilangakun _ tengug meng _ .
qalqalima kun _ elngaatall _ unaghsigh kun _ s i f t a g h l l u k i _ s i q l u g w i i q a k u n _ taaggun _ .
legan _ pellumeghtagh put _ pightugh vleghagh ghhagh t _ .
qazigyagh m llu _ , _ ayvegh m llu _ uqigh a _ l a r d - e s t u n _ ayuqe ut _ .
whaten _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ a k u u n n e m t e k i _ neve sqe aghtagh luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ .
P i r a a m s i t n g w a a g h l u k i _ akuute aqe ke put _ , _ neghyaghqagh stun _ tawaten _ angka i ta _ aavgugh aqe luki _ .
mesiightu luki _ pi sqe aqe kangit _ qavagh ghqu negh meggni nguq _ mesiigh i uute kayugu ut _ .
maaten _ tawaten _ pi aghte aqe yagh anka _ eltughagh nka _ ukut _ avaqutagh nka _ , _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
A k u u t a n g w a a g h l l a g l u t a _ uksulqusigh _ .
akuute luki _ k u m l a s i g h a q l u k i _ .
I q a l l u g w a q l u _ pi ghllag nghatgu _ N a p a a q _ tengertagh igh yu neghtu ghllag _ .
tengertagh t _ tenge kayugu na iqe kangit _ , _ taawanginaq _ aygughike aqe kenka _ .
A k u u n n e m t e k i _ uglagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh u aaghet _ takeriig t _ tamaagun _ tengertagh meng _ akuute ghllag lunga _ ateghte luku _ , _ neghe uute naqe yamta _ neqagh luku _ entaqun _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ akuute aq _ aqfa aghte naqe aqa _ . _ â
I t g h u s a q m i n i g u _ legan _ tekerqagh u ni te uq _ kanegh _ .
tenge ma na ait _ naqam _ .
tengertagh meng _ ategh ke lghiit _ .
nalighmeng _ mesiigh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ s a l l g h i _ anagte lghii ni _ tawatete ut _ .
ila i _ ghhuughpagtagh pigesnagh luteng _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ .
N e g h q w a a g h i g h w a a g h l u k i _ i q a l l u g w a t _ tamaakut _ , _ q a y e v r e g a g h h i i _ tamaakut _ ikugh luki _ , _ qete luki _ , _ mesiigh meng _ akuute luki _ qayagh itneng _ k u u v i k e v l e g h a g h l u k i _ k u m l a s i g h a q e g k e p u t _ .
tengertagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
aygughike ma aqe yaqenka _ , _ taana _ esghagh luku _ wetku _ ugpeqe yagute anka _ .
mangteghapig t llu _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh t llu
taagken _ mangteghagh put _ upenghagh mi _ , _ amaa iqe aq _ , _ tapghaghqagh _ a p e g h i i n e m t e g g u _ naafqe aqe ke put _ mangteghagh t _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mun _ lliigh aqe luta _ uqugh meng _ itagsi naqe nghmeng _ .
mangteghapig m _ t a n p e g h h i _ ikugh luki _ aagra i llu _ n a a f q e l l u k i _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qukaa kun _ taaggun _ , _ maqaghqute t llu _ , _ veg t llu _ maqagh te t _ llilaghtugh luki _ tanpegh meng _ asiliqutagh igh luki _ iwhani _ , _ kagpag aqe kangit _ t a n p e g h h m u n _ llilaghtugh luki _ sa meng _ t a p g h a l a a g m e n g _ nemegh luki _ .
kiigtagh ke lghiit _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mi _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikut _ ayagyu ligh luki _ .
aghte nghaani _ taakut _ ayagyu put _ m a k r e g l l u k i _ petug luki _ paaggun _ .
aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh aqe luta _ .
gaagh ngllagh luteng llu _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ eslallug mi _ .
aliinegh mi _ aamta _ qagani _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
aanqaghte pagte te luki _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ gaagh ngllagh aqe ut _ .
G a a n g u f t u t _ anuqe mi _ , _ eslallug mi _ taaggun _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
uqugh _ piyaqnagh kanigh yagh lghii _ liisagh lghiinga _ qayughllak _ .
U p e n g h a a m _ w h a l e n _ uqiightu llegh a _ uqug ngllagh llegh a _ e g s i g a l k e f u t _ , _ k a g p a p e r e w a a q _ akmagutagh kun _ .
wetku _ uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ esneli nghaani _ , _ k u m l a a g h t a q u l u n i _ lliigh nghaani _ mangteghagh uute aqe ut _ .
taakut _ paaggun _ iwhani sigh u ut _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ tanpeghtagh igh luteng _ .
tanpigh luta _ taakut _ aagra t _ nekegte aqe ke put _ .
amu i ut _ aagra t _ , _ amigh t _ maakut _ allighaghqagh ughtekagh t _ .
amenqun _ allighaghqagh u na iqe ke put _ melqughtuqagh t _ , _ tamaakut _ kaki luki _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ naten _ e s l e g k a k a l g h i i m e n g _ .
vuvegh m _ , _ v u v i g h n a q n e m t e k i _ .
una _ iiggereghwaagh vig _ iigge igate luni _ veg ghllag u yagh uq _ .
taagken _ veg meng _ saghna ghllag aqe luta _ .
samagun _ t a n p e g h h a g h a a g h e t _ ilaagh uute luki _ ikellegh ghqu aaghet _ tunemagh ke luki _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ veg meng _ pi luki _ vuvegh igh aqe ke put _ tanpegh meng _ .
ukite aqe luki _ , _ n a p a g h y e g h a a n i i q i i t _ u u m _ amigh m _ amalka _ ayagsigh ta i _ .
tawaten _ ameltu aqe luki _ napaghte qugh vike aqe ait _ .
test-pag kut _ kelu t _ eslege lghii meng _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ qukaa ii kete te _ llivike luki _ .
test-pag kut _ ama _ tawaten _ e s l e g k a k a l g h i i m e n g _ c e i l i n g - n g e n g i _ amalka _ aagra m _ .
sa ni te mun _ llilaghtugh vike luki _ ulig aqe ke put _ .
tawaten _ uusqaghtutka i ta _ unaghsigh t _ , _ kevigh luki _ veg meng _ .
U u y n e g h m u n _ enraq _ , _ n a t a n g a _ taake ghllag lghii _ veg a _ , _ w h a t e g h l l a k _ legan _ .
elngaatall _ akmag aatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ amenqun _ u q e n g e l e n g e s t a a g h h a a t _ .
tespamavek _ tawavek _ amenqun _ iiggereghwaagh vig u yagh lghii mun _ veg meng _ saghna yagh negh mta _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh aqe ke put _ aligh a _ qilleghte aqe luki _ .
U q e n g e s q u y u w h a a t _ kenegte ghllag aqe luki _ , _ keviite kaghqagh meng _ .
taakwegkut _ uzimun _ aagra t _ kevigh luki _ asi i _ kenegte ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ a t k u v l e g a q _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ atg- ke uk _ taaqegkagh _ a t k u v l e g a q _ , _ amigh _ .
amigh m _ qaye akun _ qakmagun _ eslatagh akun _ maqaasghagh igh uute kaqe kangit _ .
puqla ghllag t _ .
tespamna llu _ tawaten _ tanpigh luku _ veg meng _ u l i g a q e g k e f u t _ .
enkaam _ supug ite ngugh t _ .
taawanginaq _ p u q l a g h h n e g h a n i _ tanpegh pigu luku _ qepghagh na ghllag _ .
legan _ q a k e m n a _ naghigh aqe uq _ tanpegh pigu luta _ , _ kanegh _ ifkagh qu ghllag aqe uq _ .
taakut _ veg t _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ apeghiigh nghaani _ ifkagh qu nghmeng _ , _ kameraagh i llu ta _ kameg put _ repall _ aghi aqe kangi _ .
whaten _ anigu i _ ifkaghte luki _ miluute aqe luki _ .
A n i g u n g i g h w a a g h l u k i _ mayugh luta _ saul- ghqu nqigte aqe luku _ veg a _ .
taakut _ anigu t _ aane ste qugh aqe ke put _ ghhute tgun _ i n g l u g t a a g h u t a q l u k i _ .
N a p a a m _ emta _ kalngagagh t _ imigh luki _ uqigtu ghllaget _ q a m u n e m t e g n e k i _ e g t i v i m m n u n _ u g w a v e k _ .
anigu u lghiit _ k a a n g h e t _ egte aqe aput _ .
taawa _ mate- yagh i yaaghte nghaani _ taakwna _ uqegh _ ifkagh aqe lghii _ .
sa meng _ s a p u u g h a g h t a g h y a g h t u g h a q e g k e f u n g _ .
