allgellegh ke a _ F e h r u a r y _ 1 2 _ , _ 1 8 9 8 _ .
taana _ h i r t h _ d a y - k e f t a q a _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
angayuqagh nka _ nalluke anka _ , _ anglegute nka _ .
kergam _ taghnughhagh u lunga _ ifla laghate ma lghiit _ .
enkaam _ W a a y i n g u f t u q _ aflengake i steke _ , _ S i i v a g h h a a m _ nayag a _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ taaghta nkut _ tagi luteng _ 1 9 0 0 - m i _ allughqi ma kangatnga _ taaghta nkut _ .
entaqun _ esghaqagh u lunga _ seghleghu yalghiinga _ , _ esghaghhu qun _ allughqi kangatnga _ .
enkaam _ taaghta mi _ tawani _ , _ ( _ E . _ O . _ C a m p h e l l _ ) _ , _ qafsina _ y e a r s _ kiyaghte unga _ .
entaqun _ m e k e l g h i i g h p a g u g h s a m a _ , _ angyagh yaghqaaghte yama _ S u l u g w e n k u t g u n _ angyii sqe aanga _ .
enkaam _ S u l u g w e m _ i t a g n a q s a n g a _ taaggun _ angyagh unga _ taaghta m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ .
unaangu luku _ angyaghnagh nghaani _ A m a m e n g a m _ keleg yaghtugh aqe aanga _ .
teghtugh negh mni _ whaa _ angyaataghqe aat _ aqeftaghaagh kun _ kevigh te uute luteng _ kelqesaghqagh t _ .
enkaam _ atghagh lunga _ , _ kete luta _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ taakut _ angyagh m _ y u g w i t a _ taakut _ taaghta m _ angyaatagh igh uute yu ai _ kiyang _ negh aqe kangit _ .
whanga _ eghqwaagh sagh itneng _ qasiqagh meng _ neghe kayug _ .
tamaani _ laluramke m _ negh kanga _ piyaqnagh lghii _ , _ taaghta mi _ yeghrat _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ , _ nengigh aqe lunga _ nefku yagute uq _ maklag meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ .
Q e g h a s t a _ test-ankut _ M e k e n g a n k u t _ k e t a n g i t n i _ taaghta m _ qeghigh a _ .
elngaatall _ yuug _ p i n i i p i g t u u q _ tea- aghte a _ taana _ .
tagtalmi _ ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ , _ amaa iqe i ste aatnga _ S u l u g w e n k u t _ .
taawa _ taglaate luku _ , _ kitumun _ uqiigh ste luku _ taaghta m _ , _ akmagutagh gnun _ kanaghte luku _ akmavek _ tuyugh aa _ .
arekull _ q a w a a g n i i g h u s i n g e s q e l l u n g a _ pi ma kanganga _ ulimasightuumagh an _ .
enkaam _ a y u m i q u y a n _ kaate yalghiimi _ 1 6 _ qawaagniighusigh _ , _ kanuyaaghrug _ qafsina _ igagh ghqu aq _ , _ ulimasigh leg _ .
igaghqwaagh u yagh lghiit _ u l i m a k a y u g w e t _ qawaagniighusigh m _ pi i _ , _ ghhuugh t _ .

allameng _ upenghaghyag u _ angyagh laatagh unga _ .

elngaatall _ angyagh u uute i te aqe kangatnga _ , _ u n Ê¼ g a n i _ n e g h e s q e l l u n g a _ entaqun _ .
iwernga _ negh igate kenka _ , _ angyagh t _ y u g w i t a _ taakut _ negh aqe ait _ .

puygu qaghte aqa _ qafsina _ d r u m - a _ a n g t u g h h a a m _ i m i q a y u g w a _ mesiigh aneng _ .

amenqun _ q a a n n g w a a g h e t _ neqnigh raaghinagh t _ .
tawaten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ aghvenge luta _ tagi ukut _ .
K a y i m e n g _ elngaatall _ nengigh ut _ .
neqnigh raaghinagh t llu _ angyaghpag t _ k a y i n g i t _ .
K a y i t _ tamaakut _ kiyang _ quug ke aqe ait _ egllu meggnun _ .
S i v u y a g t e n g i n a a t _ gaagh kayugu ut _ aghvegh m _ uqugh aneng _ .
enkaam _ tagtalmi _ tagite luki _ , _ whangkuta _ maani _ kiyaghte ukut _ elngaatall _ .
K e m u g y i l l u _ whangkutung _ .
taakut _ u u g l l e g h a a t u t _ maagun _ , _ k e n l e t g h u u l l g h i i t _ .
tespamani _ akilpegagh llegh
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ pi inkut _ pamavek _ pi naqe ni luni _ , _ tespamavek _ taglagh ukut _ .
ungazigh m _ u k a t a n g a k u n _ tekite luta _ l m t u g m u n _ pi ukut _ taakwavek _ igleghte ukut _ , _ sighineg mun _ , _ N u n g l e g r a m u n _ .
N u n g l e g r a m i _ tawani _ , _ sighineg _ pika _ p i y a q e f u t _ sighineg _ n a g h u g h s a q e f u t _ pika _ aghvag ii ghllaget _ elngaatall _ .
arekull _ R e g t e l q u n _ aghvenge ma lghii _ .
R e g t e l q u n g u u q _ itegagh i _ mumignga lghiit _ .
enkaam _ N u t a w Y f n k u k _ qiteve ma llu _ ataasigh _ uka _ angyagh kun _ .
aghuliigh ukut qun _ , _ e n g i n e - e g t e n g _ aghuliigh ta gket _ , _ upenghagh u uq _ .
angyagh t _ uka _ e s g h a g h y a q m i n i k i _ aghuliigh ak _ .
kaate yalghiimeng _ N u t a w y i n k u k _ , _ qiteve ma lghii llu _ taana _ .
taawa _ suqagh t _ , _ sangaawa t _ ten _ f e e t - n g w a a t l u _ , _ e l e v e n _ f e e t - n g w a a t l u _ , _ aange pigte uq _ suqagh _ elngaatall _ .
tallimagnegh t _ .
akike yaghtugh aqe ait _ tawaqa leg nun _ .
talwa _ suughqagh leg ghllag t _ .
pedersen _ nangllegtagh aqe lghii _ .
suume a _ ataasigh _ , _ suuma u aqe ut _ 1 2 _ p o u n d - n e t _ qantagh ke aat _ , _ tawaqa t _ suuma u na iqe ait _ .

aga _ taglagh uk _ .
K e m u g y i _ pi aqe aqa _ , _ â _ entaqun _ paga _ tuqu yaag te ghllag uq _ elngaatall _ . _ â
enkaam _ taagken _ N u n g l e g r a m u n _ nagnegh ukut _ .
entaqun _ taana _ w h a l e n _ uyatu tke aagh _ , _ tapghugh tun _ wallu _ kangii tun _ , _ N u n g l e g r a q _ , _ qiteve ma perewaagh ghllag _ elngaatall _ .
neqangisag lghii nun _ kayusigh i llegh ut
uyghigh luta _ tawani _ , _ uka _ angyagh t _ malghugnegh t _ , _ pingayugnegh t _ uka _ .
U g w a _ amaa iqe aq _ ataasigh _ , _ uqugh _ , _ ayvegh m _ kemekrag a _ agaghte qugh aqe kangat _ s i v u y a g p a g k u n _ uzimun _ .
K e m u g y i _ taana _ qiteve llgu ma uq _ llaaghinaan _ .
qiteve te luki _ pi yalghiimeng _ , _ uksulqusigh _ elngaatall _ igataghnagh iqe aqe ut _ , _ n e q a n g i s a g l l a a k _ elngaatall _ .
enkaam _ K e m u g y i _ ungipaate a _ , _ â _ taawna _ nengighqe gu _ yug nun _ tawavek _ . _ â
â _ amaa iqe aq _ , _ uqugh _ , _ neqe _ tamaa na _ n e n g i g h q e n g n g w a a g h h u _ yug nun _ a t a a s i k a g h t a n u n _ elngaatall _ . _ â
whanga _ pi unga _ , _ â _ N e q e k r a a t a t _ malghugnegh t _ taglaate ki _ , _ tespagavek _ uyegte yaghtugh ki _ . _ â
N e q e k r a a t i i _ aange ghllag ut _ , _ entaqun _ qafsina _ p o u n d - e g h l l a g u u t _ .
malghugnegh t _ taglaate anka _ .

uugte nanigh ut _ .

pi yalghiinga _ r a h h i t _ skin- nge ma lghii _ .

taakut _ , _ ingaligh mii t _ .

taawa _ sighla luteng _ taglagh aqe lghiit _ .

tawaten _ angyagh meng _ atghagh luteng _ , _ taglagh naqe yameng _ ii-ii _ , _ angyagh m _ y u g w a _ q a l g h i l l a g h q u u q _ , _ angwaagh te kete luku _ .

aga _ taglagh ut _ .
kingu aneng _ P e d e r s e n - m u n _ pi lunga _ , _ â _ pagaveg- a _ atugh lghii nun _ nagate yagh yagh ka ite zinga _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ l g h e n n a q l u _ , _ whanga llu _ ? _ â
P e d e r s e n - e m _ pi unga _ , _ â _ U m i i l g a t a g h a q _ esgha _ tesqakemna _ liigike ste gu _ .
angegh amken _ liigike ste naken _ taana _ u m i i l g a t a g h a q _ taglagh u tsi _ liisimake sqellug qu _ . _ â
aane lunga _ ungipaate luku _ u m i i l g a t a a g h a q _ taana _ , _ â _ umiileg m nguq _ angegh ma kanganga _ legan _ esgha _ teskiwna _ dory _ , _ taaggun _ taglagh tek _ . _ â
taglagh ukut _ taaggun _ i g h e n n a q l u _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ whanga llu _ .
K e l u t e g h l l u g w i n a g h q u n _ tamlag ukut _ u y g h a g a p a g i l l g h a k u n _ .
I g h e n n a a m _ legan _ kayusiite gpenaamta _ , _ aga _ I g h e n n a q _ .
T u q l u g h a g h y a g h a g h p u n g _ imagh mii llu _ .
kelevagh te luku _ angyagh _ taana _ , _ aglagh ukung _ .
kii _ , _ atugh yug pigte ma lghii _ elngaatall _ .
kaate yalghiikut _ nutaan _ pi kestagh aqe ut _ .
ii _ , _ upugha te ainkut _ elngaatall _ .
ii _ , _ atughtu ut _ .
aghula ut _ elngaatall _ .
apeghiigh luteng _ kayagte ainkut _ a g h u l a s q e l l u t a _ aghula kayugu lghiinga qun _ whanga _ aga _ ategh unga _ .
nuna ni _ ighsa snanigh aqe kanginkut _ siivanllegh t _ sa meng _ .
ii _ , _ tawaten _ k a l l a g p a k _ pi yan _ uzive kestagh yalghiinga _ iwerngaqun _ aghnagh _ nekeve uute luni _ y a a q g h i i t u t a q e f t u q _ .
whanga mnun _ kayusiite i _ .
A t a s i q _ apeghiigh luku _ , _ imagh mii _ enraq _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawaten _ elngaatall _ .
aghnagh m _ a g h u l a s a q m i n i g u u _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh yan _ , _ I g h e n n a q _ alaghrang _ aghula igate uq _ k a y a g t a g h w a a g h y a g h a g h p u t _ pipagningite u aghte uq _ .
taagken _ atghagh luta _ inglu anun _ pi ukut _ enraq _ , _ ukavek _ N o m e - e m u n _ .
N o m e - e m u n _ kaa llu ta _ tawavek _ , _ malghugnegh t _ S c o w - e t _ akmaken _ s t e a m - a k u n _ tagite ma aqe kangit _ saghya anun _ ilakaghqagh t _ .
entaqun _ maaken _ angyaghpag a _ u l e v a g h a g h n g a a q e l g h i i _ a k i l p e g a m e n g _ .
tamaani _ 1 9 2 8 - n g w a a l l u _ , _ 1 9 2 9 - n g w a a l l u _ .
teller- mi _ aghqella llegh ut
enkaam _ taagken _ aygugh aqe luta _ tukfigh i aqe luta _ .
teller- mi _ tawani _ iqallug _ aghqella taqagh ut _ .
P e d e r s e n - n g u u q _ tanemlleqa _ teller- mete ngughk _ .
inglu anite ngughk _ m i s s i o n - n e t _ t u n g a n g i t n i l n g u q _ .
aghqella te aqe ainkut _ .
aghqella _ w h a l e n _ uzive te luku _ whanga _ a t e g h q u g h t e n g w a a q u n g a _ .
I i n g Ê¼ g g u r u g l l a k _ tamlag te luku _ , _ t a z i n g k e n _ s a y u n e m t e g g u _ , _ nutem _ uka _ kavighte te ghllag luni _ taglagh aqe uq _ .
ila a _ tepe ste luku _ , _ iingunagh an _ tepe sigate aat _ .
uglagh _ tepe luni _ tawani _ tepe ste luni _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh ghllag u uq _ .
nuna nge aik _ , _ iqallug _ , _ kayu _ , _ puvangitaghagh _ , _ neghnavregagh _ , _ sighunpayaag _ .
pekete ta meng qun _ imigh aqe aput _ kalngagagh t _ , _ k a n a n i _ avugh yaghqaa luki _ .
taana _ k i n g u m m n e n g _ u a t e n _ pi aqe atgu _ .
megh mun wha _ pekete aqe nghite atgu _ .
S i k u l i n g h w a a l l e g h p u t
taagken _ iqallug meng _ pi luta _ tespagavek _ enraq _ .
siku _ pi magh mi _ elngaatall _ siku _ .
siku anun _ kaate aqe ukut _ a y g u v a n i _ taakwani _ s i k u g h l l a w a a g h u u q _ .
siku niigh lleg pigu uq llu _ enraq _ pedersen _ taana _ .
gaarinegh pig meng _ d y n a m i t e - t e k l u t a _ .
elngaatall _ u g h u g w i g h p e n a a m t a _ d y n a m i t e - t e s t e n i _ siku mun _ ateghaate luta _ .
ii-ii _ , _ g u u q a g h a q a g h p u t _ megh kun _ ukimallegh kun _ ighllute aqe luki _ .
amenqun _ nakreg leg ghllag u aqe lghiit _ angyaghpag t _ t a a k e g h l l a g m e n g _ .

kii _ , _ 5 0 _ p o u n d - e m _ guute llegh i _ , _ siku t _ aange lghiit _ p a g a a a a _ !

angyaghpag _ uka _ tagi luni _ , _ tagi luni _ , _ saaghw mteggun _ taaggun _ aag luni _ aghuliigh igate ngughk _ .
pi ke sigh t _ legan _ nagun _ tapghagh kun _ akuqaghtugh luta _ uugte aqe ukut _ .

nukalpigagh ni _ elngaatall _ tengghu nagh _ elngaatall _ .
U g h u m a a g h m e n g _ naange luta _ .
tawaten _ siku mi _ igleghtekayugu uq _ .

aygugh llegh ut

angyaghpag ut _ kanagh a _ a w a v a n i _ .

esghaghhu _ N u r t h _ S t a r - e k s u w h a a g h u l u k u _ S i v u q a g h h m i i t _ e n l e g a q e g k a n g a t _ salngag _ qelpegh qugh ma ni luku _ , _ maani _ usingigh negh meggni _ .
tespagani _ tawatete uq _ .

ataasigh _ e l l n g a t u g h q w a a g a a _ awataghpag _ .

saallghaghte te llegh ut

aghqe itagh i te llegh

wayaghte llegh

Y u g h a q

ateghte i
kina lli _ ama _ angyat teng _ aga _ angyagh lghiit _ ateghte i lghii _ nagate laatagh aqa _ ?

T e g h i g s i t

ayumigh m _ K i y a g h t a a l g h a

puvalla t
puvalla t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ y u g w e m _ kitum _ sa u a _ esghagh luku _ puvalla ughtekayugu uq _ taawa _ puvalla liite kayugu uq _ , _ entaqun _ g i f t - t e n g a q e l g h i i t _ y u g w e t _ taakut _ sa meng _ nani _ .

S a a y a t

qawaag m nguq _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ alngunak _ qawaag t _ , _ iwhani _ esghaghkagh teng _ taakut _ qawaag t _ akuqagh kayugu kangit _ .

esghapag ghngaaghmegteki nguq _ qawaag t _ , _ yaqugh teng _ whaten _ s a a g l l u k i _ , _ neqe mun _ kanavek _ pi luteng _ , _ p u v u g l u t e n g u q _ , _ aga _ q u u l v a g h a g h t a q u t _ .

eghte qugh u aagh
eghte qugh u aaghet _ maakut _ angyagh m _ piinligh lleghqagh ani _ e l n g a a t a l i _ nangllegsiisigh t _ , _ tungsigh ragh sigh t _ elngaatall _ taakut _ .
Y e a r _ r o u n d _ entaqun _ neqe _ sa u a _ unakegkagh eng _ , _ part- sa _ taana _ s a v e e k a y u g w a t _ .
angyagh _ piinligh yaghtugh nghaani _ ategh qugh luku _ , _ tunugh _ tamaa na _ pugnegh iigh luku _ , _ kaape llegh ke i luteng _ nunivag meng _ , _ sa u a _ akuute aq llu _ pi luku _ .
aghveghaqetagh m _ u v i t a n g a k u n _ n e k e g h q u g h l u k i _ tawaten _ , _ alqimagh yukagh gpenaki _ , _ saafte yukagh gpenaki _ naten _ itake ghllag luki _ .

tanpegh meng _ ulig luki _ qavaghtekayugu ut _ .
U n u g w e m _ q u k a n g h a n i _ angyaleg nkuk _ , _ s i v u y a g t e n k u k _ nulighh a llu _ taana _ i v a g h u l l u g w a q u t _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
taaqe negh megteni _ sivuyagtekete te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuune i yaghtugh aqe uk _ .
taawa _ eghqwaagh aqe ut _ , _ e g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ q a y u u t a s q u v e g a g h h a a t _ sa u aat _ , _ sagnegh nge ste aq _ uglagh u pigte uq _ .
eghqwaagh yaghtugh negh meggni _ tuune i yaghtugh naqe na iqe ut _ .
Y e a r l y _ c a t c h - e y e n g _ taana _ a n g y a g h n a q _ p i n a q e n g h a n i _ t u n g s i g h w a a n e g h m e g g n i _ entaqun _ taana _ t u u n e g k a y u g w a a t _ .
I q u g w a _ amalka _ veghute lghii stun _ amalka _ p i k a y u g w a a t _ .
elngaatall _ tawani _ t u n g s i q a y u g w e t _ .
taawa _ u l i g i u k i _ unaami _ aghte nghaani qun _ samavek _ esnagh mun _ enraq _ angyat teng _ kete luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ eghqwaagh tkekagh teng _ taglagh negh meggni _ , _ taawa _ qaagken _ n e g h y a g h t u m _ negh aqe kangi _ .
taawa _ qagavek _ enraq _ taana _ m i n g i l a t k a y u g w a t _ a n g e f q a g h h a a n _ tawaten _ qamagte luku _ taagken _ ikute te luki _ a w a l i g h t u g h t a a k a y u g w i i t _ T e s q a g e g k u t _ enraq _ temngi _ tugu gpenaki _ a w a l i n g h i s t e n g _ sangiighhagh meng _ imiite aqe luki _ .
amalka _ n a v e g h t e v l e g h a g h a q l u k i _ .
kingulighpigagh _ qepghagh llegh _ nagate kaqe kegka _ w h a n g k u n n i _ eghqwaagh aqngameng _ .
tawani _ u n u g m i _ i v a g h u l l u n e g h m e n g _ U g w e t e l e n _ taaqe luni _ aane luni _ tuune i yaghtugh luni _ itegh luni _ , _ taawa nguq _ pugnegh at llu _ , _ kaapelqagh at llu _ tugu vike ma kangat _ P i n g a y u g g a a g u n n g u q _ t u g u v i k n e g h m e g g t e k i _ .
E s k i m o - t _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ , _ t u g h n e g h a a n n g u q _ p i n g a y u w h a g h n e n g _ ighneghwaagh ke ut _ .
taawa nguq _ i q u g w a n e n g _ tugu te ma lghii _ tawaten _ tugu te aatagh ma lghii _ .
kii _ alinge yalghiimek _ , _ W a m i i y a q _ alingruugh yalghiimi _ .
T u q i i n a q n g i n a n g h a t a n g u q _ negh ka itneng _ t e s a m a n l l u k i _ tawaten _ t u g u v i k e g k a y u g w i i _ tughneghagh m _ , _ taghneghagh m _ s a a m _ .
alingruugh ghllagkagh _ , _ ellnga _ tuqu kau uq _ .
entaqun _ a l i n g e g h l l a g e m _ tuqute kaqe a _ .
alinge igate yagh kumeng _ entaqun _ p a s s a a q n a y a l g h i i t _ .
ugpegh ke ghllag m _ , _ r e s p e c t - e g h l l a g e m _ taawa _ ipa _ a a t e s t e k a y u g w a a _ .
taana _ esgha _ puygu nghite kegka _ whaa _ .
pi nga yu neng _ tughneghagh t _ ighneghwaagh ke na iqe kangit _ .
uyvasaghqe a
uyvasaghqe a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u uq _ .
taana _ amenqun _ t a p e e n i _ qikmigh meng _ pi lghiit _ u y v a s a g h q e n g n g u u q _ tamaa na _ , _ tawaten _ a n e g h l l e q _ qamagte luni _ ategh a _ alngunak _ .
amalka _ alignalghii m llu _ kina _ kayagte yagh kunigu _ qinuyug ta ii lghiit _ , _ tusigagh luni _ sangameng _ tawaten _ a n e g h t u t s e n g _ alignalghii kun _ liigike naqe luku _ , _ alignalghii m _ kayagte yagh kumiki _ apeghtugh yagh kumiki _ tawaten _ p i s q e l l u k i _ u y v a s a g h q e n n a y a l g h i i t _ .
taana _ qikmigh _ tape- mi _ U u y g h a a n k u t _ i w h a n i n g a t _ .
qikmigh t _ tamaakut _ n g i i g a q i i t _ q i n u y u g l l a g n u n _ t a m a a k u n u n _ ngiigte ste luki _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
naavghusagh ke aqe ait _ .
qikmigh u naanghite ut _ , _ s a n g u g h l l u w h a g h t e n g _ pivake ghllagkagh eng _ taakut _ q i n u y u g w e t _ n a a l g h u t e s q e q a g h l l u k i _ n g i i g l u k i _ egte aqe ait _ .
S u f l u g w a q _ sa u a _ .
uyvasaghqe a _ tamaa na _ alla u uq _ .
uglagh uq _ ategh _ .
qani
tamaakut _ ama _ s u i c i d e - e k a t _ qani na iqe kangit _ .
S u i c i d e _ taana _ qani u uq _ , _ yugtagh u nghite ngughk _ yugte aq _ allakagh mete uq _ .
T a m a a k u n n g u q _ qanig ke aat _ s e g h l e l l e g h p i g a q i i _ y u g w e m _ elngaatall _ , _ u m y u g w i i t e l l e g h p i g a a n n g u q _ qani kayugu ut _ .
qinuyug negh meggni _ , _ k i y a n g u q _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ qanig perewaagh _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
N a q a m e n r a q _ l i i s i m a k i s t e l i g h l u t e n g _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nanevgaghtagh meggnun _ , _ nuyekligh igh ta meggnun _ a k u z i n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ , _ e x p l a i n - n e n g w a a g h l u t e n g _ , _ naallghute yaghqaa nghite lleg teng _ liigike negh meggni _ .
taawa _ amenqun _ ne m _ t u n u t a n g a n i _ uyghag ghllag _ i r r e g u l a r _ s i d e - t a w a n s a l g h i i _ .
neghqute mun _ uyghag ke na iqe kangat _ .
neghqute m nguq _ naken _ tagi tke a _ entaqun _ ulape u luni _ tawaten _ qani vig u luku _ .
P i y u g m e n g u q _ taglagh aqe ut _ qani naqe lghiit _ tamaakut _ y u g w e n n g u q _ kiyang _ pinighikagh t _ iilqayug yuguma ghllag ut _ .
pi aqe kangi _ U g w e t e l e m _ , _ â _ T a m a a k u n n g u q _ pinighi pigesnagh luteng _ qateghyiighagh m _ u m y u g w a a n e n g _ u m y u g w a l g e t _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ tuqute aqe ut _ naallghute lleghqagh eng _ iilqayuke nghmegteggu _ . _ â
taawa nguq _ taglagh luteng _ uyghag nguq _ taana _ akite kete luku _ , _ ila i nguq _ legan _ guute negh meggni _ , _ esghaghhu nguq _ uyghag _ taana _ iilqugh vleghagh ghllag u yagh uq _ .
ila i nguq _ legan _ kenuqagh aqe ut _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
entaqun _ e s g h a p a g t e l i g h l u t e n g _ maligte luteng _ .
entaqun llu nguq _ ila i _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ n a a l l g h u s a g h q a g h l l u w h a a t _ .
naqam nguq _ ila i _ tamaakut _ pinighi kau nghite ngugh t _ u m y u g w a g h t u q a t _ neghqwaagh it _ uki iqe luteng _ k e m g i m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ , _ naave luteng _ .
piniighte aqe ai nguq _ naallghute aqe ut _ igleghte yagute aqe ut _ .
M e r e g t e m e n g _ tume t _ sivuqagh mun
tapi i sag m _ apegh llegh a
N e g h q u n n g u q _ taana _ akmaneghpallugh _ , _ aglagh naqe negh meggni _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ sa u ut _ entaqun _ naten _ angka qaghte lit _ , _ t a n p e g h h e k _ tawaten _ .
esgha _ mangteghasqwaagh _ iingunagh an _ akmag ma kanga _ maaken _ taamavek _ aglagh negh meggni _ sivugnagh mete te _ .
ayag ke itagh te t _ sa it _ , _ naten _ angka an _ s a k u s i m a a t _ imani _ .
esghaghhu _ atiiqe te yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ aghsaan _ tawaten _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ayuqligh _ sangan _ ilughagh ke steggu _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
nanevgaghtagh ma _ t a a m _ angayuqagh ma _ sa ke aat _ entaqun _ .
tanemwha qun _ Y a a g h u _ U g w a l i i t l u _ pike kangat _ , _ t a a m e n g w h a _ apallugh ke luku _ pi ma nghite a _ .
esghaghhu _ maaken _ amavek _ akmag kayugu ma lghiit
M e r e g t e m e n g _ piinlillegh a
entaqun _ tazingani _ a a m n a n g u y a g h t u q _ neghpigagh a _ meregta _ .
tegh vleghagh m _ qula ani _ tazinga _ nenglu t _ a y u m i g h t a n e g h q e s i i g h e t _ esghagh aqe kenka _ tamaa _ naghughte aqe kenka _ .
aghvegh m _ e l q u n e v r a g i _ , _ a n g t u g h h a a m _ e l q u n e v r a k u m a a q e g k a n g i _ esghaghhu _ .
tawaten _ uyghag stun _ q a l t e t u t k a l i g h l u t e n g _ lli aqe aat _ , _ a y u m i g h t a n e g h q e s i i g h e m _ entaqun _ angtale aneng _ .
kinkungaawa t _ imani _ .
esgha _ y u l g e m _ kenle aneng _ ukavek _ tagi ste naqe kegka _ .
taawa _ tazingavek _ piiwagh luteng _ enraq _ qaye igh llegh nun _ .
qaye igh llegh t _ ama _ nenglullug llgagh u aqe ut _ tamaa _ n e n g l u r r a a g g a g h m e n g _ .
naqam _ taamna _ meregta _ n e g h l l a a k _ elngaatall _ uglagh pestaagh meng _ .
uglagh lghii _ nenge a _ elngaatall _ y u g w a _ .
mengyagh llegh
esghaghhu _ repall _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ u g w a v e k _ qerngughte vig ghllag mun _ , _ n e n g l u g h n a g l l a k _ sa u a _ qerngughte vig _ .
ayuqligh t _ q a r g i n g u n i n a y a q a n g a t _ taawavek _ uksaagh mi _ puvalla yagh uute kayugu ma lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ p u v a l l a n g h a n i _ yaywaali leg _ tamaa _ elngaatall _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m e n g _ kezemaghhagh meng _ .
N a y u g h i s t e k l u k u _ , _ k e l e n g a s t e k l u k u _ , _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ taana _ .
ne ghllag m _ taghnughhagh lghute ni _ , _ taana _ a f l e n g a k i s t e k l u k u _ , _ tawavek _ tagi qu ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ taawavek _ piiwagh uute ghllag luteng _ taana _ n a y u g h i s t e k l u k u _ .
legan _ tanqighllug ghllag _ aliigh neghllug ghllag _ .
S i i q a a t a g h t e k a y u g w i _ qayughllak llu _ sa nghata _ tawaten _ .
puvalla _ kitum _ pi a _ taana _ e f q u g h h n e g h m i n i g u _ , _ atugh laataqu nghminigu _ , _ kaa _ , _ leganqun _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ pi naqlaatagh yalghiimi _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ teghhwaaghigh tke aat _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ teghhwaaghigh te ut _ paye u naqe yalghiimi _ entaqun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ y u q e g h r a g h t a g h t u q _ sa uq _ elngaatall _ , _ egtug yug uq _ , _ ugmelli iqe uq _ sa uq _ .
qenwat llu _ alla _ yuqeghte yalghiimi _ , _ kii _ , _ k a v i g h h a l a a k _ kenegh ghllag _ uka _ unegken _ .
entaqun _ paye aneng _ k a n a k e n a _ mengyagh t _ esgha _ tawatete ma lghiit _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ qenwat llu _ m e n g y a g h n a q i i n k u t a a _ , _ heng _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
esghagh yaghtugh nghminigu _ uka _ t a g l a q _ a l i i g h i n a q _ naken _ teskanaken _ paye aneng _ .
â _ S e g h l e g h h a l e k a a _ qenwat llu _ mengyagh naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ pineghlliqe tek _ , _ aragh teki _ â
alla _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ legan _ kenegh ghllag _ .
tughneghagh t _ kenegh meng _ atkug na iqe kangit _ tughneghagh _ aamtayaghhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ i g l e g h n e g h a _ ayuqe lghii _ .
kii _ , _ alla _ pi yalghiimi _ kana _ malleg ma lghii _ .
â _ S e g h l e g h h a l e k a a _ , _ taawa _ pi naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
pi yalghiimi _ , _ ii- k _ sa u a _ aane uq _ tesqamaken _ uka _ mayugh uq _ .
elngaatall _ itegh qagh qiinagh luni _ , _ amenqun _ a g l u g h a t _ esghagh ke put _ nenglullug _ iikna _ ulima aqe yamegteggu _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ tamaavek _ uughqaghte luni _ elngaatall _ t a w a n i i _ , _ â _ heng _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ qakma _ saaygu tgun _ elpeg kesagh ke yagh lghii mi _ , _ e l p e k s a q m e g t e g g u _ , _ kii _ nenglu _ , _ nuna _ iggagte uq _ teskanavek _ , _ sunglug uq _ amig mun _ .
kii _ , _ s u p u g h r a g h y a q m i n i g u _ , _ sa yalghiimi _ aneghziig yalghiimi _ t e s k a n a v e k a a _ i g g a g l l a g u m a g h m i _ .
elngaatall _ pi megteggun _ taaggun _ , _ tatame aatagh te ut _ , _ kakave niigh te ut _ , _ sa luteng _ pi lit _ leganqun _ estu laghate te ut _ tesqamavek _ naa ke i _ .
T a g h n u g h h a q s a _ palaghhagh u a _ , _ q a m a k a g h i i _ .
S e g h l e g h a l e k _ mekelghiigh _ alinge uq _ .
amen- a _ i m g a g h a l g h i i n i _ sa lghii ni _ tughneghagh t _ pinegh meggni _ entaqun _ k e n g h i q e n g e g k a y u g u l g h i i t _ .
aga _ kenegh _ mayugh uq _ , _ aga _ qenwat _ qaame aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte luni _ .
nasiqute luku _ ukig luni _ agigte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ aga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ maalliqun _ whanga _ p i i q a g h h n a a g h y u k a g h p e n g a _ . _ â
ii _ , _ aghuliigh qaghte luni _ u u t q a g h t u q _ .
tespikavek _ ne minun _ maaten _ mayugh aghte uq _ .
elngaatall _ a n e g h p a g h q u y a l g h i i m i _ a l l a n q i g g a g h m e n g _ itegh luni _ , _ ii _ p e s k u g w a g h t e v z i g h a q l u n i _ , _ ifkagh vzigh aqe luni _ p a l a g h h a g h m e n g _ sa kun _ eltugh luni _ .

sa uq _ , _ nagnegh uq _ uteghnigh nghite uq _ .
atghagh uq _ aqeftapag m _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ paye anun _ .
tawatete aqe ainkut llu _ , _ n a n i q e n g y a t _ sa u aat llu _ pikayug u ut _ , _ naken _ megh meng _ , _ qute meng _ .
K e n e n g y a q a y u g w e t _ s a k a y u g w e t _ , _ enkaam _ megh _ kenegh meng _ itake pigte luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ , _ nunaagh ni _ whaten _ .
tagi laghate te ghllag luteng _ taghnughhagh teng _ p i y a q m e g t e k i _ , _ naate naagh aat _ , _ taakut _ angayuqagh it _ puvalla yaghkagh t _ .
E l n g a a t a l l a a _ a g h y u u g h m i g a a t _ sa ut _ , _ pegnem _ akuzi ste luku _ .
qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ E l n g a a t a l l a a _ elpek si llu _ aragh tek _ , _ pineghlliqe tek _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe naagh usi _ i n e g h h n e m s i _ , _ elpek qun _ naa gpek _ , _ ata gpek _ m e n g y a g h l l e q i i n k u t i _ ! _ â
Y u l q u s i g h l l a g e t _ anglikagh t _ a n g t a n i i t k a t _ , _ sa u a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tawaten _ ineghneghlliqe ut _ neghyuke luku _ uteghte na luki _ taghnughhagh teng _ , _ pi u lghiit _ .
wetku _ t a w a t e n g i n a q _ pi yaghqaa na yu kata _ .
qineghte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ ii- u ke _ .

A m u m _ y u g w i _ .

elngaatall _ kinku k _ taake uk _ maalghug _ taaggun _ amig m _ qula akun _ guutute ligh lutek _ utaqa uk _ , _ sa meng _ imani _ guutute ke ak _ .

iiwenllu _ estu laghate te naqe luni _ lliigh aqe uq _ , _ ii _ , _ u u h u u k a a q a g h l u k i _ sa ma kangat _ , _ guute ma kangat _ .
pakreg ghpagte ghllag ma lghii _ .
aanziigh ghllag yalghiimi _ sa yalghiimi _ , _ mighyagh ghllag yalghiimi _ taghnughhagh m _ a k i l e g h t e g h l l a g l u k u _ , _ qiya te ghllag t _ .

U g w a t m u n _ piinlillegh
taakwavek _ tagi ut _ , _ tagi ut _ ii _ , _ k i n g u n g h i t _ maaten _ esgha _ entaqun _ U n g a l a a n k u t _ , _ nekreg te nkut _ , _ W a a m s e g h a a t e n k u t _ , _ yuungaaghagh nkut _ , _ kinku t _ taakut _ M e r e g t e m _ y u g w i _ M a n g e n a n k u t _ .
enraq llu qun _ esghaghhu _ maavek _ lliigh yagh luteng _ entaqun _ m a a n t e k e s t a g h n g a a g h m e n g _ taamagun _ nenglu ngllagh ma lghiit _ M e r e g t e k u n _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ M a n g e n a n k u t _ ulimaagh at _ M e r e g t e m i i n g u l g h i i t _ qayughllak _ .
taamaken _ legan _ aglagh luteng _ sakmavek _ sivuqagh mun _ s i q l u g w a g h q u m a a q e l g h i i _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
legan _ sagnegh k _ uyamig ke lukek _ whavek _ ne mun _ tagi pigte lghii stun _ taaga _ aglagh aqe lghii _ s i q l u g w a g h q u _ amavek _ M e r e g t e m u n _ .
taakwa _ aghvigh qaghte vig t _ esghaghhu _ M a n g e n a n k u t _ t u m a n g i t _ .
aghsughalegh m _ k i w a t a n g a n i _ taawa _ qenngumsag _ sa u a _ nangupagagh meng _ ategh ke uq _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ y u g w i _ kinku t _ taakut _ nangupagaghmii u na iqe kangit _ esghaghhu _ taawavek _ piiwagh kestagh u u ma lghiit _ , _ t a g i k e s t a q _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ whaa _ .
N u l a m _ mingite kestagh yalghiimi _ M e r e g t e m _ y u g w a _ .
taawa _ taakwagun _ tume tgun _ piiwagh lghii ni _ S a n i v l e g h e t _ .
S a n i v l e g h n i _ taakwavek _ .
aghsughalegh _ taana _ kitugh lghii ni _ taakwegkut _ tume t _ taakwa _ .
esghaghhu _ ne kun _ t u u m l i l u t e n g _ ayuqe ma aqe lghiit _ taakwa _ nenglu t _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh t _ i n g a n g i i g h h a q _ uyghag t _ tamaakut _ mingle itni _ qulighnegh itni _ .
N e n g l u l l u w h a a t _ kaate aqe anka _ m a a l g h u g w a a q l u t e n g _ .
T a z i n g a n i q a a g h a q _ kitum i _ tawani _ ila i _ taawa _ .
sigasit ni _ tawani _ taawa _ ila i _ .
S a n i v l e g h e t _ legan _ tume ghllag leg t _ , _ ayumigh m _ M e r e g t e m _ y u g w i t a _ t u m a n g i t _ qelli ghllag luteng _ u g w a v e k _ .
uyghagagh ni _ tamaani _ uyghag _ n e k e g h q u g h a q l u n i _ t u u m l i n g w a a g h l u n i _ .
taawavek _ esnevagh negh mni _ whanga _ esghagh llegh ka _ apegh aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ yugtu yagh ni luki _ ugpeqe aqe kegka _ .
taawavek _ pi yalghiinga _ , _ t e s k i g w k e n _ , _ taakwa _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ , _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ ayvigtegh mun _ tawavek _ .
ayvigtegh mi _ taawa _ elngaatall _ nenglu t _ sa u aat _ .
nenglutu uq _ ayvigtegh llu _ taana _ .
tespikani _ quulvani _ , _ s a n i v l e g h n i _ taakwani _ , _ tazingani _ inglu anun _ aghvigh aghte lghii ni _ paninang _ nenglu t _ taawa _ .
N g i i g t e k a a n k u t
ayag ke inkut _ tawani _ , _ A y a k i m _ u n g i p a m s u g w a n i _ , _ sika ghhagh m _ ungipagh ani _ , _ aghqesaghtughtuqagh t _ , _ satuqagh t _ eghqwaaghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ .
N g i i g t e k a a n k u t _ t a w a n n i i q i i t _ .
ngiigtekagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ nenglu ghllag t _ , _ elngaatall _ negh ghllag _ entaqun _ uglaghyagagh ghllag t _ .
Q i l u g h a a g h e t _ legan _ siklaate ghllag luteng _ ngiigte ma kangit _ yugtuumagh an _ .
E n k a a n g a m _ ategh ke lghiit _ ngiigtekagh meng _ .
N g i i g t e k a a n k u t _ atigh neghllugte igate kangit _ taakut _ ellngit _ U g w a l i i t _ .
M e r e g t e m _ nalighnegh ke na luki _ entaqun _ I i r g u m _ esgha _ Q a v a l g h a a m _ e l t u u g h a a _ ataasigh _ taana _ ngiigtekagh _ .
uyuqligh _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ taana _ .
A w a l q a m _ panig a _ ngiigtekagh _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghiit
taagken _ aghvigh luta _ s a n i v l e g h e t _ k u k r a g n a g h q w a a g i i _ , _ entaqun _ qaye akun _ aag ma aqe ut _ , _ lliigh ma aqe ut _ .
taawa _ iwernga _ ivgagh lghii ni _ sani vleghagh ite te luni _ .
taawa _ n e n g l u l l u w h a q _ tawani _ A y a k i n k u n i _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ .
nenglu _ aange llegh ke sigh u uq _ .
elngaatall _ taakut _ amaken _ M e r e g t e m e n g _ qaygeghte luteng _ amalka _ tume t _ qaye itgun _ .
taagken _ t a n e m w h a q a _ tesamavek llu _ ukig vig lgu uq _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ nalighnegh meggnun _ sa meggnun _ ukig qagh kayugu ut _ taana _ nenglullug _ elngaatall _ , _ Q e n a a g h a a n k u t _ kinku t _ nenglu mun _ tawavek _ pikayug u ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ enraq _ S i v u g n a g h m e n g _ taakwa _ tume t _ u g w a v e k _ A k u l k e g n e k u n _ q a y g e g h t e k a y u g w e t _ t u u m l i l u t e n g _ t a a m _ n e n g l u l l u g w e m _ y u g w i t a _ t u u m l i l l g h i _ .
N e k e g h q u g h w a a g h l u t e n g _ elngaatall _ ukavek _ akulkeg nun _ q a v i m u n _ ukig luteng _ .
T a a m _ n e n g l u l l u g w e m _ y u g w a n _ t u u m l i l l g h i _ .
taakwavek _ A y a k i n k u n u n _ , _ N e g h q u t e n k u n u n _ , _ Q e n a a g h a a n k u n u n _ kaate luteng _ ayuqe lghiit
mayughwaagh mii t
entaqun _ esgha _ 1 6 0 0 - m i _ nani _ neli kau ma lghii _ maani _ .
tagi yalghiimeng _ esgha _ mayugh aagh mi _ tespikani _ .
uukna qun _ mangteghagh t _ aagkut _ manu at _ h o u s i n g - e t _ , _ esnagh u yagh lghii _ entaqun _ .
tapeghagh meng _ ategh ke lghii _ esgha _ .

sa lghii meng llu _ esgha _ A y v e g h y a g t e g g u n _ neli luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ taamaken _ t a g i k e s t a m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ .
sivuqagh _ yug nge kestagh yalghiimi _ .

taghnughhagh mun _ atigh i llegh _ sivuqagh mi
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ , _ K e p e l g u n k u k _ apegh llegh at
kitum _ atigh aqe aki _ taghnughhagh t
taghnughhagh teng _ atigh naqe nghmegteki _ sivuke luki _ ateghqagh meng _ siivanllegh teng _ aapte luki _ , _ ateghqagh meng _ tuunekagh aneng _ atigh aqe ut _ .
nalighmeng _ k i t u m e n g _ taagken _ atigh naqe ni luki _ siivanllegh teng _ ungipaate aqe ait _ , _ nalluke sigate ait _ .
ila ita _ ategh it _ a t a a s i i w a q u t _ , _ ila i _ naqam _ m a a l g h u g w a a q l u t e n g _ , _ p i n g a y u g w a a q l u t e n g _ .
naten _ ila i _ wata _ uglagh aqe luteng _ .
laluramke stun _ whaten _ ayuqe nghite ngugh u ut _ first _ n a m e _ , _ l a s t _ name- ke te nghite ngugh u ut _ , _ John _ P a u l _ H e n r y _ J o n e s - e t u n _ tawaten _ .
ategh t _ uglagh ghngaita _ kiyang _ ataasigh t _ ategh t _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
katam _ K a a v a m _ p i l l g h a t u n _ i g a n g l l a q a m m n i _ kitum _ t a a m _ ategh an _ legan _ n a l i k e k _ atughqagh _ .
ila ita _ ramke m _ taghnughhagh teng _ aane ste gpenaki _ ateghqagh meng _ y a t a a g h q u t k a y u g w i i t _ .
sivunegh neng
T a a g e g k e n _ ima _ ellmeng _ sivugh nghmeng _ ategh it _ a t i i t k a y u g w i i t _ kingumun _ ukavek _ aviigh tke aat _ .
enkaam _ puygu igate kangit _ sivunegh teng _ kinku u ta i _ .
taagani _ sivuqagh m _ akuzillegh a _ igaqe nga nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
wiin _ kiyaghte luki _ , _ unguva luki _ atiiqe igate kangit _ , _ entaqun _ t a a g e g k e n _ ima _ qelegh sagh _ .
iwernga _ esgha _ aghnaghagh m _ ighnegh ni _ qantaghaqun _ atigh ma yagh agu _ a ta mi _ ategh aneng _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ ata an _ efqugh ke ma nge i tke a _ , _ piyuke ma nge i tke a _ .
naten _ ategh t _ aglagh aqe aat _ ramke m _ ila anun
kiyang _ y u g w e m _ , _ ata m _ t u n g a n g a n e n g _ taghnughhagh t _ allgegh nghata _ atigh kayugu kangit _ .
iwernga _ nuliigh teng _ ellngit a _ pi itneng _ a t i i q i s t e k a y u g w i t _ , _ akileghtugh kayugu kangit _ .

aghnagh m _ ategh _ i g l e g h u t k a y u g w a _ .

ategh t _ whani _ igaqe llegh mi _ atuqekagh t _ temngingu ut _ .
ategh u kata _ a k u u r a m _ pi ste lleqe ai _ .
nuna meng _ , _ nunaagh mun _ atightullegh
kiyang _ ramke m _ ila yan _ taghnughhagh teng _ atightugh aqe ait _ pennagh m _ , _ nuna m _ , _ s a a m _ tekeghagh m _ ategh aneng _ .

ategh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh at

akuzillegh meng _ atigh llegh
kiyaghte luteng _ sa meng _ pituqagh t _ .
yuug _ taana _ sa meng _ pitu kan _ , _ taana _ akuzillegh a _ t a g h n u g h h a g h m u n n g u q _ atigh te yagh ghngaaghmi _ .
amalka _ yuug _ , _ M u k a q _ , _ kiyaghte luni _ pituqagh _ , _ â _ K g u u g g _ ! _ â
A t i i q s a q m e g t e g g u _ , _ taghnughhagh _ â _ K g u u g g m e n g _ â _ ( _ â _ K g u u g g _ â _ ) _ ata iigh aat _ .
sa mun _ elqughaghte tekagh mun _ atigh llegh
aghnagh _ aqsaleg _ sa llegh mun _ elqughute kan _ legan _ taana _ atigh te ma ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ qavangugh llegh _ , _ esghaghwaagh llegh _ .

allangughte na luteng _ atiiqe i llegh
taagani _ agha _ , _ aghaligh vig _ aviite luku _ , _ taghnughhagh nge nghmeng _ aghtugh lghiit _ , _ natete nghata llu _ qinuyugtu nghata _ , _ qiyatu nghata _ , _ alla _ atigh nqigte aqe kangit _ ategh lgu ghngaita _ alla neng _ .
amalka _ taana _ , _ tuumte i _ , _ alla _ atigh ma kangat _ qiyatu ta aneng _ , _ seghlegh meng _ .
megh mi _ aviigh tke aat
kiyang _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ megh mi _ y u g w e t _ peleghqekagh t _ atiiqe aqe ait _ aghnagh ghhagh u luki _ .
ategh t _ tan- kestagh u aghte yaghkagh t llu _ alla tun llu _ ata iqe aat
kiyang _ ategh t _ yeghrat _ taake ghllag lghiit _ takelli luki _ a t e l i i t k a y u g w i i t _ .

pi nga yu a
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i
A y n g a g h l i n g a a w e t e n k u k _ , _ Q i l a k a g h i i l a a n k u k
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ taake uk nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ i l u g h a q u t a l g h i i k _ .
K u g w e l e s t a g h h i i n a a k _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh at _ .
ategh ik _ A y n g a g h l i n g a a w e t e n k u k _ , _ Q i l a k a g h i i l a a n k u k _ .

ilughagh ghhagh a _ Q i l a k a g h i i l a q _ n e k e g g m e t a l g h i i _ , _ aatkagh kegte aq _ , _ pinitun _ kiyaghte aagh _ kaki ghllag _ quunpeng _ .
taana _ A y n g a g h l i n g a a w e n _ i t g h i i g h n a q e g h l l a k _ , _ a n Ê¼ g i g h n a q e g h l l a k _ sa gpenani _ .
alla _ tawaten _ kaki ma luku _ Q i l a k a g h i i l a q _ , _ k u u g g Ê¼ g h a a _ u g h l u v g h w a a n g l l a a m a l g h i i _ .
iiwen _ taaqe yaghtugh luku _ u g h s a g h t u u t k e l l u k u _ qineghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ , _ taana _ u g h l u v g h w a a g h h a n i _ n a p a g h l u k u _ mingle kun _ .
aga _ aane magh an _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ naten _ tekegh ni _ p e t g e g h l l a a t a q u l u k u _ , _ ten- ke i vike luku _ u g h l u v g h w a a g h a _ ayemkagh ma kanga _ .
alingruugh ma lghii _ , _ itegh kuni _ a g h y u u g h n a y u k a n g a t n i _ , _ ughneg mi _ asi anun _ iigh ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ k u u g g Ê¼ g h a a n _ ivagh ma kanga _ ughluvegh ni _ , _ â _ naagu _ ughluvegh u aqa _ w h a a n s a l g h i i _ navek _ pi zigu _ ? _ â
amenam _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ ivagh sighwaagh aa _ e l n g a n l l u _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te luku _ ivagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
qenwat _ u g h n e g g a a _ i k i g h a g h l u k u _ piyaqminigu _ whaa _ a y e m n g w a a g h l u n i _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nutaan _ qefliqe uq _ elngaatall _ pi igate yagh lghii _ .

aghnagh aq _ kagpag luni _ nengagh ma lghii _ aane luni _ navek _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ , _ iiwen _ aghtaghagh aqe a _ inga _ sa u aat _ iime negh m _ ilu ani _ esghagh ai _ .
kaate luki _ piyaqminiki _ i i m q a g h n e g h e m _ ilu ani _ k a m u l u g w a l g h u n _ ukaagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
aqume luni _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh ni _ nusug luku _ a m s i g h q u u g h t e g h u m a k a n g i _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k i _ .
taaqe luki _ negh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ m e v l u u g t e t _ nagate ai _ , _ p i i q u n n g u q _ whaa _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ a g h n a g h a g h h a q s a _ una _ n a n g l e g t a p i g t a _ .
elngaatall _ taghtughsagh qu na an _ meghnaali li _ . _ â
nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ aviite ut _ , _ kameg t llu _ taakut _ aviite ut _ .

tawaten _ me m _ t a g h t u g h t a q e g k a n g a _ , _ pi aqe kangat _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ igamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ nangllegtagh pigte a _ . _ â
nepiigh nghata _ aqume nghmini _ paaghqite te luni _ .

wasi _ k u u g g Ê¼ g h a g h m a _ sa aghte aqe aanga _ u g h l u v g h w a a g h m i n e n g _ qivghu vike lunga _ anagu kanganga _ , _ tekegh mneng _ petgegh vike luku _ a y e m s a m k u n _ .

nategh mi _ utaqa i lghaaten _ .

aghnagh aq _ legan _ teghigniqe uq _ nuvugh uq _ , _ nuvugh aa _ u y a q u g h h m i k _ , _ qukaghute kaghqagh _ , _ qenleghwaaghqagh _ , _ tangyeghute _ , _ tukughte te _ iwerngaqun _ sungagh ghllag _ qamagte a _ qiipi aghte te gpenani _ .
taaqe yaki _ aghnagh m _ a a t e s q u g h w i i _ ellnga nun _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ allakagh ghhagh gpek _ tesqamani _ ungavig ni _ qavagh ghhaaten _ legan _ egtug yug gpenang _ qavagh ghhaaten _ s a a m _ pi naanghite aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ itegh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ elpeg ke aghte yalghiimi _ m e n g e g h a a l l g h i i t _ llangaqa nguq _ n a p i t _ katelghaate lghiit _ ama _ nagate ai _ .

qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ teghtugh a _ .
â _ aghnagh aq _ aamyuq _ aqume i ngam _ , _ tea- ai _ ketfagh a _ . _ â

taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ yataaghqe i _ atghagh a ngam _ .
aane gkuvek _ tamaa na _ esghagh kan _ alike gpenaan _ pi naagh an _ , _ legan _ atghagh ghhaaten _ ne gpenun _ qiive yaqunang _ q u g w i n a y u g n g a a g h p e k _ uteghmun _ , _ legan _ avelghaqiinagh luki _ i g l e g h l l e g h a a t e n _ .
iwerngaqun _ legan _ kaate yaghtugh kuvek _ anengagh ghhagh n _ t u q l u g h w a g h n a k e n _ .
pi naken _ whaten _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ tagite amken _ â _ .

pama _ legan _ s a a m _ malighqagh aa _ t u n u t a n g a n e n g _ kavlegtu te _ , _ siinge aqe luku _ .
legan _ aghnagh m _ p i l l g h a _ neqamike luku _ kakave gpenani _ atghagh uq _ .
qemi meng _ agigte luni _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ tuqlughagh aa _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ elngaatall _ tagite amken _ . _ â
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ yug lghute _ ketanqu te ghllag _ ellnga nun _ , _ pana meng _ , _ p i t e g s e g h a m e n g _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ uka _ k a y n g e g h l a g e m _ malighqagh aqe a _ .
kaate luteng _ p i t e g s a q m e g t e g g u _ kaynge ghllag _ tuqute aat _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ , _ kii aneng _ yuug _ nukalpigagh _ aane yalghiimi _ n a n g a g h a l q e g l l a k _ , _ yuukegte ghllag _ , _ iknaqe ghllag _ .
uka _ aghnaghagh mun _ tagi uq _ .
taawa _ t a a n a n u f t u q _ u g w i k a g h q a a _ .
Q i l a k a g h i i l a q _ u g w i i q a g h t u q _ .
yuug _ neqengyu ghllag _ , _ aghvenge yu ghllag _ tawani _ kiyaghte ut _ k u g w e g h m i n i _ .
aga _ navek _ pi nghata _ mughute nghata _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ A y n g a g h l i n g a a w e t e m _ itegh vike aqe kanga _ .
siqni ghllag _ ellnga llu _ u g w i i g h y u g l l a k _ pi nigh ghllag meng _ .
A a p q u g h w a a g h a q e g k a n g a _ naten _ naqamalla _ u g w i i g h u m a t a n g a _ .
qenwat _ Q i l a k a g h i i l a a m _ ungipamsug te ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ I m a t u g h n g a m _ u g w i i l l e m t u n _ u g w i i g h l l e q s i n _ ighsanitagh lghiiten _ .
talwa _ kaki igate ngugh u te n _ .
waran _ p i i l l g h a g h t e n _ amsighqe igate keten _ .
N a l q i g a n g i l n g u u t e n _ . _ â
amenam _ aglagh luni _ , _ iitqiinagh luni _ anengagh ghhagh ni _ qinuyug a _ u g h l u v g h a a n g l l i i s q e l l u k u _ , _ weni _ qinuyug a _ .
qenwat _ anengagh ghhagh n _ mengilegyagute luku _ amenam _ yataaghqe te uq _ .
â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ wasagh ii te _ taana _ ata ma _ ulimaagh a _ sa llghite ngughk _ salin _ . _ â
pi msiigh luku _ pegte a _ .
aghnaghagh m _ qinuyug a _ enraq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ .
qenwat _ aga _ aane uq _ .
kingu aneng _ tekegh ni _ petgegh naqutke a _ petgeghsagh nghminigu _ anagte luku _ qenwat _ itegh yaghtugh uq _ .
U p u u p e n g _ aghtugh yamigu _ tugu luku _ ketngig luku _ ayemte a _ enraq llu _ a y e m l l u k u _ ughneg llegagh mi _ asi anun _ iigh aa _ .
iigh luku _ kaki sighwaagh uq _ .
anengagh ghhagh a _ itegh luni _ ne mikun _ aqume uq _ .
W a a k e n g h i t a a _ ughluvegh ngllaghkagh ni _ .
qenwat _ A y n g a g h l i n g a a w e t e m _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ ughluvegh n _ ivagh ghhu _ ukani llu _ ughneg ma _ asi ani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ tagivagh ghhu _ liisima kan _ . _ â
â _ enta _ nekeve luten _ ivagh ghhu _ . _ â
qenwat _ nekeve luni _ ivagh aa _ ughneg llegagh a _ ikighte luku _ t u g w a a _ ayeme luni _ .
â _ una _ aghnagh aq _ .
A y e m m n a l u k u _ u l i m a t e s q u g h w a a g h s i n g a _ awii _ , _ sa u luku _ . _ â
egte naqe yagh aa _ , _ aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ enta _ qivghuke gu _ , _ anagu nga _ . _ â
â _ sangan _ s a p i g l l e g h i i s t u n _ u l i m a t e s q u g h w a a g h l u n g a _ ayemte an _ , _ enraq llu _ a n a g u s q e s i n _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ anagu nga _ . _ â
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ yaakestaaghhagh an _ aagute lugh aa _ temngi _ .
qiya ghllag uq _ aqnigh magh mi _ .
kagpag ragkiigh luni _ aga _ aane uq _ nengagh uq _ .
iitek _ pi yagh aa _ k u u g g Ê¼ g h a a n _ .
aane luni _ taakwagun _ Q i l a k a g h i i l a a m _ apegh llegh akun _ igleghte uq _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ kameg lghute _ kaate a _ nuna m _ i i m q a g h l l e g h a n i _ lli luteng _ aghipa ghllag t _ , _ piig aqe luteng _ , _ naatghigh qugh te aqe luteng _ .
aqume luni _ e s g h a p a g g i i n a q _ qinuyagute ai _ .
sivughtu msiigh luki _ , _ a m s i g h q u v y i i g h l u k i _ taaqe gpenaki _ pegte aqe luki _ wata _ naafqe ai _ .
naafqe ghllag luki _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ elpeg ke yalghiimi _ m e n g e g h a a l l g h i i t _ .
â _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ q e p g h a l l a a g m e t u q _ .
ima _ kameg put _ wata _ naafqe ma ai _ . _ â _ nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
aqume luni _ igleghte uq _ .
inga _ sa u aat _ esghagh ai _ , _ piyaqminiki _ iqallug lghute _ afta ma ite ngugh t _ ila i _ a s i l i i t _ unegh ii aghte luteng _ repall _ .
kaate luni _ sivuke luni _ unegh ii aghtekagh meng _ negh ughtagh u uq _ .
taaqe luni _ afta vyiigh luki _ qinuyagute luki _ mingughhu te ghllag naqe yamiki _ taaqe ai _ .
Q a v a a m a l g h i _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ akuzite ghllag t _ â _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ nalqigangite uq _ elngaatall _ naqam _ n a a n g t e g h l l a g u m i i _ iqallug put _ . _ â
nepiigh yata _ aghnagh aq _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
mangteghagh t _ aliigh luki _ kaate ai _ , _ kaate luni _ mangteghagh mun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh _ qama _ qepghagh aqe uq _ nategh mi _ .
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi a _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ kina u ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ A y n g a g h l i n g a a w e t n g u u n g a _ , _ nengagh u unga _ qayughllak _ k u g w e g h m a _ a n a g u l e g h y a n g a _ ukavek _ nengagh unga _ .
tekegh mneng _ ughluvegh a _ ayemtegkegka _ . _ â
â _ naqam _ itegh luteng _ una _ tunugh _ k a g i m l l u k u _ pugnegh iigh ghhu _ . _ â
amenam _ iitqiinagh luni _ tunugh _ kagimte a _ .
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ iigge ten _ alqimagh yaqunaki _ pugnegh n _ mekelli i aghagh lleqe uq _ . _ â
amenam _ kelenga aghte yagh luni _ iigge ni _ alqimagh qiinagh aqe luki _ legan _ akuute a _ .

aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aatak _ i i n g k u n u n _ awaligh i _ .
kepsugh te u naanghite uq _ , _ legan _ itegh kuvek _ upugha lleqe aaten _ , _ i i t g h e s q u g h w a a g h l l e q a a t e n _ aagra nun _ .
wataghllak _ avelghaqiinagh naagh aten _ .
wata _ talwa _ qineghte yaqunang _ .
legan _ pugnegh n _ kanaghte luku _ utaqa i lghaaten _ . _ â
amenam _ aghnaghagh m _ pugnegh llegagh ni _ aglagh te a _ .
itghute a _ legan _ a q u p i l e g h n a g h h a g h m e n g _ u p u g h a s a q m e g t e g g u _ , _ itegh sqe aat _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ .

qenwat _ q i i n g h a g h s a l g h i i m i _ mamleg ghllag _ p a a g h q i l n g u q _ .
naqam _ s i v u g w a g h s a l g h i i m i _ qama _ legan _ uglagh ghllag t _ sagnegh kek _ kavlegtu te _ .
maateqwaaqun _ whaa _ sagnegh kek _ nuugte ta gket _ .

tagi luni _ itegh uq _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ivalu meng _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ piighhagh ngllagh a _ .
nuvagte yukagh gpenaan _ mekegragh yukagh gpenaan _ . _ â
amenam _ A y n g a g h l i n g a a w e n _ aqume luni _ tallu luku _ ivalu ni _ piighhe a _ nuvagragh qaghaqe luku _ .

aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tuune ak _ .
â _ ang _ , _ nuvugh a _ sungagh meng _ . _ â
tugu luku _ s u n g a g h p a k _ nuuve te a _ qiipagh mikun _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ .

aghnagh aq _ ivgagh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ taghtugh aat _ .

aqume luten _ tea- ai _ . _ â
aqume qaghte luni _ ivgagh yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ y a t a a g h q u t n g w a a g h l u k u _ .
â _ enta _ n e g h l u t e n n g a m _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ . _ â

aane yalghiimi _ tamaa _ kaynge ghllag u uq _ elngaatall _ .

enraq _ aghnagh m _ alinge snanigh kanga _ .
aghtugh uq _ nuqete nghmeng _ .
alinge uq _ , _ uuvganeng _ aragh magh mi _ ketanqusnaq _ qimag uq _ .
legan _ kingu aneng _ uka _ s a a m _ malighqagh aa _ , _ q e t e g h q e l l u n i _ anagniigh uq _ .
araghaatagh magh mi _ l e g a n n g u q _ t a k l a g h m i _ tekite nghmini _ .

qemi meng _ a g i g a g h t e q a g h s a m i _ , _ araghaatagh ghllag ma lghii _ .

tefaay _ naange uq _ .

aasa m _ ungipagh aa

pagavek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ , _ a n g y a n n g u q _ paga _ .

piyaqminigu _ pinighhalek _ .
tugu luku _ legan _ taaggun _ aate ste vig akun _ talligh mig ma kanga _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
iiwen _ uyavaghqagh ughte uq _ , _ eslallugughte ghllag ma kanga _ .

tawaten _ pi llegh tun _ akuzite ghllag t _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ angyagh t _ .

uka _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ t a z i n g a g u n _ tekite laatagh uq _ .
tazingavek _ taku a _ .

legan _ tugu nghminiki _ aate aqe kangi _ talligh mikun _ .
taawa _ igleghte laatagh uq _ , _ ne mineng _ uyavagh ghllag uq _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ p a l a g h h a g h m e n g _ kiyaghte uq _ , _ eslallug _ kaate laatagh uq _ , _ maateghniineng _ elngaatall _ yaagtu ghllag _ eslallug _ .

â _ Y a g e s g i i u u u _ , _ y a g e s g u _ , _ y a g e s g u _ .

elngaatall _ k i i n g h w a a g h i i _ aatkagh i _ whaa _ legan _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ pi laatagh uq _ meraaghinagh _ naken _ .

A n g y a l l i g h t e m n g u q _ pike ta mikun _ taaggun _ ateghte ma kanga _ , _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ .
A a y _ , _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ uka _ ukig yalghiimi _ elqiigh _ .
elngaatall _ utaqa laatagh aa _ uukna _ uki lghii _ .
uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ , _ tekite yan _ tazingavek _ piyaqminigu _ , _ p i n i g h a t a g h a q _ elqiigh _ elngaatall _ .
satuqagh _ qughalkutaghtuqagh _ elngaatall _ .
P i n i g h a t a g h a q _ t a a k u g n e n g _ maaten _ , _ legan _ tugu luku _ talligh mig laatagh aa _ .
talligh mig luki _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ aglagh yagh kuma _ esgha _ ne mnun _ . _ â
legan _ taakut _ qerngagh ita _ tugumiiqe luki _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ .
entaqun _ unuk _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ , _ aag llegh ani _ w h a n i k u m a a n _ kaa tuq _ ne minun _ .

allameng _ eslallugughte gpenani _ ne minun _ kaate tke aq _ .
aneghrengi ghllag _ elqiigh neng _ .

iiyagh ghhagh inagh leg
E l q i i l a a m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh nkuk nguq _ taake uk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ nenglu mi _ kiyaghte aaghek _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane igate ngughk _ sa luni _ aane li _ aatkagh ite ngughk _ .
Q u u n p e n g u q _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ a t k u w h a n i _ aate luku _ maghuyugte luni _ k i y a g h t a a g h a q e l g h i i _ .
M a g h u y u g t a a g h n e n g _ sivugte nghmini _ iiyagh ni _ taana nguq _ aghulate luku _ taawa _ almesimitun _ nekegte aqe lghii _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ tawaten _ kiyaghte aagh _ elngaatall _ .
sangan _ naqam _ iiyagh ni _ qelpeghte aqe agu _ .
alla nguq _ tawaten _ , _ u m i i l e l g u u n n g u q _ , _ maalghug _ u m i i l g e g k e t _ aag llegh a _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ , _ aag llegh a _ a k l u u m a l g h i i _ .
A n g y a g h u u n n a q e n n g u q _ upenghagh mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qakiqniqe ma lghii _ .
qaywa nguq _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ighleke yagh aa _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aate luten _ angyagh naqe ziin _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ , _ â _ aatkagh ten _ tagivagh ki _ aate naqe anka _ . _ â
L e g a n n g u q _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ aatkagh ghhagh i _ aate luki _ me akun _ taaggun _ aane ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ i q u k l i g h p i g a g h n u n _ esnevagh ma lghii _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ? _ â
â _ weni nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ nenglu m _ yugkwaagh a _ uyuq _ . _ â
siinge luku nguq _ aga nguq _ kete aqe ut
T u u n g l i g h h i t n u n _ tawavek _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ?
enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ . _ â
weniqruk nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ aga _ unite aqe aat
umiileg ghllag mun _ tawavek _ kaate ma lghii _ , _ a k l u n g i l n g u g h m u n _ .
kaate luni nguq _ pi a _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ! _ â
L e g a n n g u q _ y u g w e m _ taawa _ pi a _ , _ â _ I - i i _ s i v u y a g t e k a g h q a g h l l u w h a q _ !
elpek _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luten _ qalleg vag luten _ weni nguq _ sivuyagtekete lleqe amken _ . _ â
legan _ m i l u u s a q m i n i g u n g u q _ kelute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ .
taakwna _ angyagh _ tawaten _ qamagte a _ .
iwerngaqun _ iquklighpigagh at _ tazinga _ , _ umiileg m _ aag llegh a _ a g h n a g h a p e r u g w a a g h m e n g _ panike lghii _ .
A g h n a g h a p e r u g w a a g h m e n g _ y u k l u n i _ kete aqe lghii _ .
tawavek _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ? _ â
â _ legan _ angyagh naqe lghiiten _ .
taawa _ y u k n a q a m k e n _ , _ s i v u y a g t e k n a q a m k e n _ . _ â
kete i aqe ut _ qaake luku _ , _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ .
taana _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ a g h v e n g y u g h l a k _ .
I i w e n n g u q _ k e t f a g h q a a g h a q u t _ kaay _ , _ aghvegh m _ p u u g y a q m i n i k i n g u q _ legan _ tuune luni _ .
legan _ yaywaali ngiighhagh m _ a g h v e q s a q m i n i g u n g u q _ t u q u n n e q e g s a g h l u k u _ .
aawallu nguq _ taana _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ umiileg _ aghvenge aghte uq _ .
ii _ , _ angyagh m _ qetgegh te ma kangi _ elngaatall _ .
I i w e n n g u q _ kaalguutagh t _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ legan _ p a a g k e n n g u q _ anuqe _ atghaghsagh lghii mi _ uka _ legan _ eftugh tun _ , _ kii _ a n u q l i g h l l a g y a q m i n i g u _ .
â _ aa _ , _ sa u luku mi _ taana _ y u k l l a a t a a m a z i g u _ .
leganqun qun _ tuqu laghate naqe ukut _ whaa _ megh mi _ seghlegh mi _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ a n a l g h u v a g t e g g u n _ tugu laghate luni _ angyagh _ .
paagken _ a n u q l i g h l l a g y a q m i n i g u _ legan _ elngaatall _ p i k a y u w h a q _ s a k a y u w h a q _ tamaa na _ n a g h p a g h s i q a y u w h a q _ qamaggute uq _ , _ aghtugh aat
M e k e l g h i i g h h a g h n g u q _ taana _ maamtawha _ pi uq _ , _ â _ I l e n g t u q _ ima _ . _ â
naligh ita _ nagaqugh qagh laatagh luku _ .
â _ aa _ , _ u u m n g u q _ pi ligu _ , _ u u m n g u q _ pi ligu _ ! _ â
T a a m n g u q _ a k l u n g i l n g u u m _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ pi ligu _ e l l n g a n p i l l e q a a _ whaa _ amsanagh ste lleqe a _ p i k a y u g w a a g h h a a t _ maakut _ mataawi te aat _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ q e p u u g h y a l g h i i m i n g u q _ .
Q a l i v l u g w a g h h a g h q e k _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ atuqe lukek _ .
Q e p u u g h w a a g h l u n i _ tayeghqagh luni nguq _ ayapegh aatagh ghhaak _ aate lukek _ aanqute i ma lghii _ talligh ghhagh ani _ qule mun _ ayuqe luku _ aghulate magh an _ ,
â _ A - n u q - l i - i i _ , _ n a - n g e - l l u - g u - n g u _ ,
S i - l a - m i - n g i _ , _ u - k i - i - n a n g e - l l u - g u - n g u _ ,
A - i - y a - i - y a - n g a _ , _ y a - i - y a - i - y i - y a _ , _ i - y a - i y i - y a - n g a _ ,
S i l a m i t _ u k i n a g h n i n g i t _ a g h n i t _ p a y u g h a _ ,
U q - u g h - t a q _ , _ u q - u g h - t a q _ . _ â
megh _ pateg ma kanga _ inglu aneng _ - - _ â _ uqughte aq _ ! _ â _ - - _ maalghug gneng _ .
M a a t e q w a a q u n n g u q _ legan _ kaay _ qilag a _ kaagkagh a _ piikna nguq _ ukite aghte luku _ legan _ u k i g t e g h i i y a q m i n i g u _ .
A a y _ , _ amsanaghkwaagh lug ni _ naagu nguq _ maaten _ a n u q l l i g h l l a k _ .
qateghllug ghllag nguq _ taglagh ma lghiit _ aghvenge luteng _ taakut _ .
T a a m _ umiileg m _ taana _ umiileg _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ qayugham _ esghaghhu _ yaywaali t _ e s g h a p a g t e l e g l l a g e t _ yaywaali m llu _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg m _ yakugh ke a _ . _ â
taana nguq _ q a l l e m s u w h a q _ qemall _ umiileg _ .
taawa _ taglagh ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ aghvenge luteng _ .
impite igate kanga _ y u g w e m _ t a a m _ a g h v e n g u q a m _ , _ avelghagh qumtaagh an _ impite igate kanga _ q a m a g t e n g n g w a a g h l u k u _ impite qugh ma kanga _ .
A p e g h i i g h l u t e n g u q _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ ighsa nga kete te _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ ifkaghte luku _ atghagh te luku _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ a a t k a n g l l a g h y a q m e g t e g g u n g u q _ mekelghiigh _ pinighhalek _ .
taana _ uyuqligh _ panig ni _ aga _ n u l i g h q e s t e n g n g i n a a m a a n _ .
taawa nguq _ a g h v e n g y u g h i g h l l a g t u q _ taana _ a g h v e n g y i i t e p a a g h r u k _ yuug _ .
mekelghiigh perewaagh meng _ avaqutagh ligh luni _ .
taawa _ naange uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag nkuk _ anipaghllag nkuk
I t e g h y a g h a a m _ anagutagh mete te _ neghigh luku _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ m e t e g h l l u g w e t _ , _ anipa t _ qateg perewaagh u yagh lghiit _ .
anipa nkuk _ m e t e g h l l u g w e n k u k _ piniqe te pigte yagh lghiik _ , _ quunpeng _ q e r n g a g h m e t a q e l g h i i k _ .
tawaten _ k i y a g h t e g h n g a a g m e k _ anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ i g a q r a g h w a a g h u t e l t u n g _ , _ pinighnaghsagh te ltung _ . _ â
â _ A - a a _ ! _ â _ meteghllug ghllag m _ a n g g h a g h s i m a k a n g a _ .
â _ elpek _ sivuke laken _ . _ â
anipa ghrug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
I g a a s i t a q _ ketfagh ma ka ak _ s i l u g k a a g h h a g h m e n g l l u _ .
I g a a s i t a q _ taana _ nanigh m _ ellngagh ta aneng _ , _ qulmesiite m _ puyugh aneng _ akuutekagh meng _ imaleg _ tagnegh pigte lghii meng _ .
anipaghllag nguq _ a g h u l i i g h w a a g h l u n i _ i g a g h t e s i m a l g h i i _ , _ repall nguq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug ghllag m nguq _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ elngaatall _ igaqragh ma kanga _ .
taaqe luku _ t a g h t u g h s i m a k a n g a _ .
A n i p a g h r u g w e m _ taghneghagh ni _ meghaagh ghhagh mi _ e s g h a g h y a q m i n i g u _ imani nguq _ pinigh uq _ .
T a a g k e n n g u q _ ima _ anipa t _ i g a g h r a k g u u g h t e k a a f t u t _ .
anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ â _ heng _ , _ e l p e g n g a m _ . _ â
â _ A - a a _ â _ , _ meteghllug _ a n g g h u m a l g h i i _ .
anipa m _ silug _ i g a a s i t a m u n _ nepte luku _ meteghllug _ agtugh kau ma yagh kanga _ aga nguq _ nalug kau te uq _ qalghigh kau magh mi _ , _ â _ Q u n g _ ! _ â
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ aghula i luten _ seghletun _ pi ste lleqe te ni _ â _ amawha nguq _ agtugh qagh nghatni _ tamaani _ n a l u u m s i t u q _ qalghigh magh mi _ , _ â _ Q u n g _ , _ q u n g _ , _ q u n g _ ! _ â
anipaghllag m nguq _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ aghula igh te luten _ qenwat _ naafqe ta n _ igaqragh llegh ka _ ! _ â
taawa nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ qaprag ghllag _ qalghigh kaqe magh mi _ nalughqutagh ghllag _ tamaani _ .
qenwat llu nguq _ a n i p a g h l a g e m _ ugumi yagute luku _ i g a a s i t a m i n e n g _ meteghllug ghllag _ kuuve ghllag ma kanga _ .
aga nguq _ q a l g h i g h r u g u m a g h m i _ tenge qagh uq _ , _ â _ Q g h w a a q _ , _ q g h w a a q _ , _ q g h w a a q _ ! _ â
T a a g k e n n g u q _ ima _ m e t e g h l l u g w e t _ tagneghtekau ut _ .
enkaam nguq _ allameng llu _ i l a k u n n a n i i m a f t u n n g u q _ .
ivisa ngiighhagh
W a m i i y a a m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ .
ne mi nguq _ tawani _ , _ q u u n p e n g u q _ angyaghugh te aqe lghiit _ , _ neqe ngllagh te aqe lghiit _ .
taawa nguq _ t a m a a n t e f t u q _ ne mi _ tamaani _ yuug _ ataasigh _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
taawa nguq _ nulighh a _ , _ panike luku _ ataasigh _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag nghata nguq _ y u g w i s a g a q e l g h i i _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
nuliigh ni llu _ , _ p a n i g g a n i l l u _ y u k l u k e k _ angyagh aqe lghii _ .
kete aqe lghiit _ p a n i g g a n i _ taghtugh qaghte nghaani _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh u luteng _ kete luteng _ , _ aga _ angyagh t _ upleg te aqe lghiit _ nunavag meng _ elngaatall _ , _ uka nguq _ tagi laghate te nghata _ , _ taawa _ ellngit _ a g l a t _ .
ayveghagh llghite a nguq _ siipneghkwaagh ghhagh itneng _ saghna aqe lghiit _ ellngit _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawaten _ neqenge vleghagh aqe lghiit _ .
E n k a a n g a m n g u q _ uteghnigh aqe lghiit _ unugtagh u ghllag nghaani _ .
pegnem nguq _ n e q e t e r e g a g h a q e l g h i i t _ .
A t a a s i m e n g u q _ aghneghmi _ , _ n u n a v a g p a g h q u g h l l a g n g u q _ nani _ imani _ , _ aruugh yagh luteng _ esghagh luku _ u p l e g u n n e q e g s a a l l a a t a g h a a t _ .
L e g a n q u n n g u q - a a _ , _ atghaghtegh te ragkiighute yalghiimeng _ , _ e l l n g i n n g u q _ kingulighpigagh ghhagh u laatagh ut _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawatete ghngaan _ p a n i g g a n i _ taghtugh qaghte yan _ , _ naqamllu nguq _ t a g h t u g h s u g w i g a l k a n g a _ , _ atghaghtegh luteng _ ellngitllug nge uq _ kete ut _ .
T a w a t e n n g u q _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ qutenge uq _ q a n t a g h a n l l u k u _ wiin _ nallangigh naqe aqe kangi _ t e g h i g e t _ , _ angyagh t _ saamkut _ a n u q l i i t q a g h t e k a n g a t n i _ qute _ qantaghante sqe luku _ .
sa kan _ , _ t a g i t u g u g h u s k a n g a t n i _ qute _ qantaghante sqellug qu _ .
T a a g k e n n g u q _ t a w a t e n n g u q - a a _ , _ amsanaghllugllak- a _ , _ qute _ paga _ q a n t a g h a n l l u k u _ , _ a a g k u l g h u t e t _ upleg te te ghllag t _ uyavagh ghllag ke aat _ nalla itnun _ i g l e g h t e r e g a a m a l u k u _ , _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghiit
T a a g k e n n g u q _ y u g w e m n g u q _ t a a m _ pi a _ , _ â _ K a a - k a a _ , _ yaavuqugh nghmeng _ uyuq _ aghnagh aq _ taaqe aghten _ , _ k a a - k a a _ nagate aghte tek _ sangaawa _ ? _ â
yaavuquute ni _ qaake luki _ nasiigh luteng _ nagate yalghiimeng _ , _ sa u a nguq _ .
â _ U n e g k u g h s i i _ , _ n e n g a a k i t e n g n g a a _ , _ q a a k i t e n g n g a a _ , _ â _ l e g a n n g u q _ nagaqugh aat _ .
sunanguq _ y u g w e m _ aquutagh ni _ qiifte agu _ kelute mun _ .
aghnagh m _ t a a m _ nulighh an _ qiive qaghte luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ pi naqlaatagh zigu _ amyughaagh u aqe yaaghte uq _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ k e l u t m u n n g u q _ pi luteng _ , _ qute mun _ tenpete luteng _ , _ kayagte ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ sangaawa _ uugte luten _ , _ â _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
nulighh a nguq _ uugte luni _ , _ tawavek _ p e n g u g n e g h w a a g h a n u n _ qaasqagh m _ , _ y u g s u g h w a m a l g h i i _ .
Y u g s u g h w a l u n i _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ paaghqite uq _ . _ â
uugte naqe yaghtugh ngugh _ angyagh mun _ , _ n a k e n n g u q _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ whaante unga _ , _ whaante unga _ ! _ â _ qaghi ite ghllag _ .
taakwavek nguq _ y u g s u g h w a a g h a g h t a a t u t _ , _ ivagh i ragkiighute ut _ .
â _ whaante unga _ m e g h z e g h a a g h h a g h m i _ . _ â
â _ aatak _ meghhagh _ tazigna _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ . _ â
aga nguq _ aghnagh _ aglagh luni _ , _ m e g h a a g h m u n n g u q _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ avangite uq _ , _ i w e r n g a q u n n g u q _ taawa _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa ite uq _ , _ avangite uq _ iwerngaqun _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taawa _ . _ â
â _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ , _ taana _ naqam _ qaake lteggu _ . _ â
A g h n a g h a g h n g u q _ sa uq _ a g n i q s u u g t u q _ , _ â _ kimaawi ghllag ukut _ . _ â
aghnagh m nguq _ tugu luku nguq _ q u g w a k l a a g h p e n a a n _ , _ angyagh m _ aqume vig akun _ aqnighte naqe pigte luku _ miluute a _ , _ m e s a a q g u u l l u k u _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ puglegh luteng _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
igleghte ma luki nguq _ .
â _ N u l i i n g _ , _ n u l i i n g _ , _ angyagh m _ m e g h a a g h h a n u n _ kanaghte aghte nga _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
iwernga nguq _ ata an _ nagaqugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ seghleghhalek _ sa meng _ taana _ pi aqa _ weni _ , _ pie- ghesnagh aqe luku _ pi aghte gu _ .
sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
â _ esghaghhu _ angyagh m _ meghaagh anun _ k a n a g h t e s q e l l u n i _ pi lghii _ . _ â
â _ kanaghte gu _ . _ â
tugu luku nguq _ miluute a _ angyagh m _ m e g h z e g h a a g h a n u n _ .
T a a g k e n a a _ , _ imani nguq _ megh mete luni _ kana _ enraq _ .
â _ N u l i i n g _ , _ n u l i i n g _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ â _ avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ aghnaghagh m _ ugumi yagute pigtekanga _ .
imani nguq _ , _ â _ N u l i i n g _ , _ n u l i i n g _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ â
avelghaqiinagh yagh luku _ ata an _ aghyuugh laatagh aa _ .
aga _ yaavuquute gni _ agniqe pigte luni _ qaake ma kek _ unake naqe pigte luku _ taana _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ qaake ai _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek nguq _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek _ , _ t a w a t e n n g u q _ pi yalghiimeng _ sukera kestagh aqe ut _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ yuug _ n a n g l l a g h q e l l u n i _ , _ aghnagh aq llu _ , _ aghnagh llu _ n a n g l l a g h q e l l u t e n g _ elngaatall _ , _ u p u m y e g h a a m a g h m e n g _ , _ q u y a g h l l a g u m a g h m e n g u q _ .
S u k e r a g h l l a g y a l g h i i m e n g u q _ , _ l e g a n n g u q _ angyat lghute _ kaate qagh i luki _ naghughaghte aqe ait _ .
T e g h i g m u n _ kaate luteng _ , _ a y v e g h a l e g h t a a g h l l a g l u t e n g _ taglagh ma luki nguq _ , _ taawa nguq _ angyat lghute _ taagna _ upleg te a _ taagavek _ igleghte aq _ .
L e g a n n g u q _ nangllaghqe te luteng _ naghughaghte nghata _ esghapag nghmegteki _ .
saghiigha yug ghllaget _ , _ a l l a a g h l l u w h a g h y u g l l a g e t _ , _ â _ aagkut _ sukate pigte aat _ ! _ â
ima nguq _ yuug _ t a h n a _ i g h n e g h i t a l g h i i _ u n a n g y u u g h q w a a g h l l a g a a _ , _ aklungi igh i ghllag uq _ , _ a y v e n g y u u g h q w a a g h l l a g a a _ .
Q u u n p e n g u q _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taana _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ .
tefaay _ !
sikughaagh nkut _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh nkut _ , _ meteghllug ghllag nkut
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
U k s u u m _ negh ke igh sag ani _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pirughte yaghtugh ma lghii _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ .
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ akmag ke luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg ita _ nenglu anun _ , _ imani _ saaygu an _ amig a _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ nenglagh yug magh mi _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sikughwaagh t _ umiileg at _ qaamna _ u a t e n _ e s l e g k a k a a _ . _ â
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ pegnem _ kangsugh ghngaan _ amig kun _ ilu te mun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
aatkagh ni _ mataghte aqe luki _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ kangsugh ghngaaghmi _ .
itegh luni _ saaygu t _ ilu itni _ ilepghaagheg ni _ aate ma kek _ .
atkug ni llu _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ agaghte ma kangi _ .
taaqe luni _ aagra nun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ u m i i l g a n n g u q _ pika _ k e l u t a n g a n i _ aqume luni _ , _ qenngulliqe ghllag luni _ .
imani nguq _ a m e s t a a g h h a a g u q _ .
tamaa nguq _ sikughaagh t _ aghnagh ait _ qepghagh te ghllag t _ , _ qaprag te ghllag t _ naqam _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
U p u g h a t a g h h n e g h i t a a n n g u q _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ qalleg qagh gpenani _ alinge sighwaagh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ qiigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ U g h h u - g h h u u _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ upugh sighwaagh ma lghii _ tupag ghpagte magh mi _ .
umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ sa meng _ pi aghte gpenani _ .
taawa _ kaviigh ghhagh _ t a w a n t u q _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ aleghqugh qagh gpenaan _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ itegh yalghiimi _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ a t k u g w a _ atuqe luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ n e n g l a g h y u g l l a g h n g a a g h m i _ pegnem _ nuqete ma lghii _ elngaatall _ .
umiileg _ qiighw laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ U g h h u - g h h u u _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ tupag ghpagte sighwaagh aqe lghii _ .
umiileg _ nutaan _ akuzi uq _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ g g a a t f a k a _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh _ n e n g l a g h y u g l l a g h n g a a g h m i _ pi ma kanga _ qusevegte pigte luni _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ sangantuq- a _ a t k u w h a q a _ aate laatagh zigu _ , _ k e l u w h i i _ a v l e g h r u u g g n a l u k i _ . _ â
umiileg nguq _ temsiyaaghagh uq _ , _ aga _ aane uq _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ enraq _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ temkagh kek _ atuqe lukek _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag lukek _ .
sikughaagh ghhagh _ qiighw ghllag laatagh uq _ , _ â _ U g h h u - g h h u u _ . _ â
pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ i g h u v a g e g k a _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ me ni _ alingesugnite naqe pigte luku _ , _ â _ U u k - a a _ , _ sangan tuq _ q u l l i g g a a g k a _ aate laatagh zikek _ k e l u w h i i _ s e v u u t e s q e l l u k i _ . _ â
umiileg _ aga _ aane laatagh uq _ iqemyaaghagh magh mi _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ i q l i g h m i _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ .
â _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ aqelqagh _ upugha teggu _ , _ neqlightugh teggu _ ! _ â
umiileg m _ kayagte ai _ .
nutaan _ upugha te aat _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
neqe meng _ a l l a a g h i i n a g h m e n g _ ketfagh te aat _ .
kaviigh ghhagh nkuk _ umiileg nkuk _ negh uk _ .
negh te kete luku _ umiileg m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ S a a m _ u k a g u n - a a _ aagte ta ten _ ? _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ avaqutagh ghhagh nka _ n e g h e s q e l l u k i _ n e q e l l g a a n a y u k a v e k _ enankin _ , _ aag vike amken _ . _ â
umiileg m _ aragh ai _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ pirughte i uute yaghqagh meng _ . _ â
taagken _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ , _ â _ qavagh luten _ unaami _ wetku _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ pirughte i lleqe aaten _ . _ â
unaami _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi yalghiimi _ akmagtagh ghhagh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ imigh luni _ .
akmagtagh ni _ aane sta _ .
ellnga llu _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aane uq _ , _ kangsugh nghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ iiwenllu _ akmagtagh ni _ mataghte aqe a _ , _ meteghllug ghllag _ whaa _ tagi uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ meteghllug ghllag m _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ naqamalla _ naken _ neqete yu igh ziin _ . _ â
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ pirughte yaghtugh lunga _ , _ llaaghanwha _ taawa _ . _ â
meteghllug ghllag _ imani _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ whanga llu _ unaami _ pirughte yaghtuqagh lleqe unga _ . _ â
K a v i i g h h a m _ pi a _ , _ â _ ii-ii _ p i g p e n g a n g _ , _ q a y n g u n w h a a _ igiiterug naanghite uten _ .
whaken _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ â
imani nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ tunusagh t _ kemnagh u i te ut _ . _ â
unaami _ meteghllug ghllag _ a k m a g t a g h p a g l l a n i _ akmag ke luku _ s i k u g h a a g h e n k u n u n _ pi uq _ .
K a a s a l g h l i m i _ imani nguq _ amig at _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ n a t e n l l a a m _ qaamna _ umiileg _ e s l e g k a k a a _ ? _ â
amig m _ paye a _ naafqellug qu _ , _ nuqutughte luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
nategh kun _ atkug ni _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ mat- aghte luki _ , _ agaghte luki _ itegh ma lghii _ aagra nun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ pika _ k e l u t a n g a n i _ a q u m l u n l _ , _ imani _ a m e s t a a g h h a a g u q _ , _ naqam _ qenngu ghllag a _ , _ n u l g l i g h l l a g l u n i _ .
upugha te aghte nghite aat _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ naqam _ tamaa _ i l a n g l _ qaprag te ghllag t _ .
sa meng _ pi aghte gpenaan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ â _ alike naanghite anka _ , _ akmagtagh ka _ whanga mneng _ imigh lleqe aqa _ . _ â
umiileg _ itegh yalghiimi _ M e t e g h l l u g w e m _ a t k u g w a _ atuqe luku _ , _ angegh lleg ke ghllag luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .

umiileg m _ pi a _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ g g a a t f a k a _ ? _ â

llangaqa _ atkug ka _ , _ ne mni _ inga _ p e l l u g u t a a g h m e n g _ nuuvekagh _ .

â _ U g u m i n a q r u w h a g h m e n g _ ! _ â _ pi magh mi _ aane uq _ umiileg _ .

itegh yalghiimi _ gginagh _ seghlegh _ , _ qenngu ghnaggagh a _ .

nanugh ghhagh m _ u k u n u n _ igagh nun _ ila tke aat _ 3 2 3 4 - n g u u t _ .
6 _ . _ V a l e n t i n a _ V i r i _ ( _ W i r i _ ) _ ( _ 1 9 4 2 - m i _ allgeghkagh _ ) _ .
imtugmii _ sighineg meng _ .
liite u aqe aq _ R u u s e g h m i i t e l l e g l l a l g h i i _ .
ima _ a g h n a a g h a g h h a a t m i n e n g _ nagate u aqe aq _ , _ ungipaghaate kekagh i _ igaqugh qu ai _ ungipaghaate t _ .
up-uni _ igagh ni _ ungipagh aatnga _ pi sta _ 3 5 - n g u u q _ .
U k a m a n g a a n
iimnanguq _ ungazighmii t _ sivuqagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
ila meng _ sivuqagh mii t _ taghnughhaghqagh it _ w a y a a m a q e g k e t _ m a a l g h u k n a y a k u l l g h i i k _ .
aglagh te ma kegket _ ungazigh mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ K a a n g h u _ , _ u y u q l i g h p i g a q _ .
aghnaghagh ghllag m _ ategh a _ U k a m a n g a a n _ .
aghnaghagh ghllag _ ugi igh yaghqagh stun _ angka lugh u ikagh _ .
ungazigh mun _ kaate luteng _ maalghug gneng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
A q i m a l g h i i t _ U v i n g e m u n 1 _ taghnughhagh k _ tuune yaghtugh ma kegket _ quyngigh leg nun _ .
kaate yameng _ U v i n g e m u n _ esghagh ma kangit _ quyilleg ghllag t _ .
aapte ma kangi _ quyilleg m _ , _ â _ sangafsi _ tagi stek _ ? _ â
akite ma kangat _ ungazighmii t _ , _ â _ whangkuta _ tagi ukut _ i n q u n a m e n _ taghnughhagh k _ tukfigh sqellug kek _ quyngigh meng _ . _ â
quyilleg _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ naqam _ ighnegh leg _ aange lghii meng _ . _ â
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itupilqun _ ighnegh ka _ nulightugh yagh kuni _ y u g i n a k a g h n a y a g h a m s i _ quyngigh meng _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ tuune aqe aat _ U k a m a n g a a n _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ .

uteghte ma lghii _ ungazigh mun _ .
U k a m a n g a a n _ ugiigh uq _ quyilleg mun _ U v i n g e g h m i i m e n g _ .
ugi a _ yuukegte pigte lghii _ ama _ sukate pigte lghii _ ama _ iknaqe pigte lghii _ .
U k a m a n g a a n _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii _ ama _ sungaghate pigte lghii _ .
U k a m a n g a a n _ meghtagh aqe lghii _ ama _ ukini aqe lghii _ .
meghtagh naqe nghmini _ ugke meng _ qugtuqagh gni _ kevigh igh aqe kek _ .
kiiw gnun _ kaate nghmini _ tamaghhagh an _ aghneq _ ugke meng _ milugh qutagh aqe lghii _ inglu anun _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ .
ilangani _ kameg ngllaghtagh ma lghii _ .
uglagh pigte lghii _ kameg lghute _ ulima ma kanga _ .
taaqegkagh ni _ ugke meng _ imigh aqe luku _ .
kameg _ taaqe ma kanga _ yuginagh _ qula _ siipnegh ke luku _ tumangani _ i n q u n a m e n _ a a s a g h q a l u k u _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ metngegh ma lghii _ .
kameg lghute _ akmag luku _ a q e f t a g h a g h m u n _ kanaghte luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
igatagh nghmini _ kameg t _ tugu luki _ ugke meng _ tugu tete luni _ negh aqe lghii _ .
Q a v a g h y i m e g h m i n i _ nuna mi _ temngi _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
kameg i _ n a a v e n g h a t a _ alla neng _ kameg aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ kaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh ghllag kun _ p a a g h q i l n g u g h q u n _ .
mengteghagh _ neqetu pigte lghii _ , _ mangtag meng _ ayvegh meng _ neghsagh meng _ ama _ quyngigh meng _ .
amig m _ saaghw ani _ saghumignegh m _ t u n g a n g a n i _ yug m _ negh kanga _ .

taghtugh naagh unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ negh te ma lghiik _ mangtag meng _ U k a m a n g a a t e n k u k _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh nkuk _ .

llaaghanwha _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ U k a m a n g a a n _ ungazigh mun _ .

itegh ma lghii _ aagra mun _ .
ata ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkufsi _ yuug _ qaagna _ kelgugh luku _ angyaatagh ghhagh nka _ saamkut _ pilag yaghtugh nakesi _ ! _ â
ata an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa kun _ tagi ma ziin _ ? _ â

aghvegh k _ maalghug _ pilag ma kegket _ .

tefaay _ .
ungipaghagh an _ ukiivag mii t
iimnanguq _ ukiivag mii _ nuliigh leg _ , _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ .
nuliigh ni _ awen _ iiwleng _ qitegh aqe kanga _ .
ama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh _ aane ma lghii _ ugi a _ mughute ma luku _ .
aane luni _ , _ a n i g u s i g h a q l u n i _ , _ megh k _ anigu meng _ kevigh ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ itegagh an _ asi i _ aghi ma kangi _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh yami _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yami _ , _ qulmesiite ni _ megh meng _ imigh ma kanga _ .
ama _ ugkelli ma lghii _ .
apeghiigh yami _ ugkelli nghmeng _ , _ qulmesiite ni _ agaghte ma kanga _ .
ama _ nanigh t _ q e t n g i g h q u m a k a n g i _ .
taagken _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .

kaate luni _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ unange ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ neghsagh _ taawa _ ! _ â
nulighh a _ angegh ma lghii _ , _ â _ aa-a _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ neghsagh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
ugi a _ e f s u g h l u n i _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ .

llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ ugi mi _ itegagh i _ alleg ma kangi _ .
yuug _ a y a v i s i t a m u n _ aaghhe ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ atkug ni _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
taagken _ amsikaghte uq _ .

â _ waniwanllu _ , _ ugiigh igate unga _ !

unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ .
taghtugh luteng _ yuug _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghii _ .
kingu aneng _ aghnagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ .

ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ megh mi _ tuqu yagh kuma _ , _ pinigh nayagh unga _ . _ â
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .

puqla yagh kete yami _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .

tawani _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .

qenwat _ unug yaghtugh aa _ .

taagken _ sumeghtaghagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ , _ ukiivag mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .

taaggun _ aghnagh _ aqume ma lghii _ .
tawani _ q i y a a m a l g h i i _ , _ nuna _ tukeghragh magh an _ .
nutaan _ ugi ni _ q i t e l q u v i n g h a a _ neqagh te a _ .
Q i y a m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ repall _ aragh ma lghii _ .
qiya ma luku _ s a g l e g h a g h l l a k _ sivutmute _ aghelqute qaghte ma lghii _ .
Q i y a q e s t a g h n g a a g h m i _ aghuliigh aghte ma lghii _ .
uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ paye k _ e s g h a g h a a k _ .
aghnagh _ nekeve luni _ paye gnun _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ qaame na nga _ mamleg ghllag uq _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ entaqun _ qamavek _ ifkagh yagh kuma _ , _ tuqu nayagh unga _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aqume luni _ paye gnun _ ighu gni _ kanaghte uute ma kek _ .
tesqamani _ saafte te naqutkesagh uq _ mingle aneng _ .

llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .

taagken _ aghnagh _ k i w a t m i i g h s i m a l g h i i _ , _ talligh gni _ s a a g t a g h l l u k e k . a q f a a t a q l u n i _ .
qenwat _ egkugh anun _ kaate nghmeng _ aghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ una _ n e n g l u k u n i q e g k e g k a _ entaqun _ nunaghllag u uq _ . _ â

kaate ma lghii _ aghnagh _ mengteghagh ghrukutaaghllag mun _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ .

â _ ugi ma _ qitegh kanganga _ uglagh pigte luku _ i p a g f i g u n _ tuqu na lunga _ pi yagh unga _ .

llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ amsikaghte uq _ .

apeghiigh luni _ avegtughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
