taagken _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yamek _ , _ aghnagh _ ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ mughute aghte naqe unga _ qaya kun _ aghvegh leg nun _ .
aghvenge lunga _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ â
yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
ategh luni _ qaya ni _ u k i g s i m a k a n g a _ .
ukigllug qu _ , _ aqume ma lghii _ qaya minun _ .
uunghagh ni _ tugu luku _ , _ mingle _ naghulleg yagh kete ni _ mingle _ quupaghte ma lghii _ .
quupaghte yalghiimi _ megh ghllag _ mingle meng _ itegh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ kete ma lghii _ , _ esla mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
A n q a g h s a n _ q u u p a g h l l a k _ maame ma lghii _ , _ ama _ nategh _ megh i te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ ugi mi _ kingu aneng _ ukini ma lghii _ kameg neng _ .
iiwenllu _ aghnegh m _ qute kaghagh ke a _ , _ kameg k _ taaqe ma kek _ .
taaqe yamikek _ enraq _ ugkelli ma lghii _ .
gaagh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute yaki _ a q u m e s i m a k a n g i _ .
mulunghituq _ u v i t a n g a n e n g _ mengqughte te ma lghii _ , _ ama _ megh ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ awituwaq _ ugi ka _ taglagh uq _ . _ â
taagken _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ q u u p a g h l l a g k u n _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug yalghiimi _ aghvenge ma lghii _ .
aghvegh _ ii- u na ghllag an _ nategh mun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
Q u u p a g h l l a k _ taana _ maame ma lghii _ .
nategh mi _ yug m _ aghvegh ghllag _ kagimte ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
aqsa nge luni _ ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ , _ taagken _ taghnughhagh nge ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh nghmini _ tungtu nge aqe lghii _ .
megh mun _ pi nghmini _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh a _ allaghhiinaq _ unake aqe kanga _ .
ama _ awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ tawani _ kiyaghte lghii _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ angli ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge laatagh uq _ , _ ighni yalghiimi _ aghnaghaghhagh meng _ .
taawa _ m a a l g h u g e g n e n g t a g h n u g h h a n g u m a l g h i i k _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ whavek _ tagi aghten _ .
kingunegh ten _ nagate yaghtuqagh ki _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ugi mi _ saaghw anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ nagate ma lghii _ .
nagaqugh te nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ .
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ â
â _ nakaa _ n a g a q u u t a g h n e g h h i t u n g a _ . _ â
â _ aa-a _ ! _ â
yug m _ nuliigh mi _ sigute kek _ s u u p a t a g h a a k _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ a l l a m e n g m i n g l e m u n _ sigute gken _ mategllug kek _ nagaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ sigute gni _ mingle mun _ mategsagh ke gni _ kingunegh ni _ atugh ghllag lghiit _ nagate ma kangi _ .
aghnagh _ qiya ma lghii _ ama _ aragh ma lghiit _ k i n g u n g h i _ eslallugughte te ni luteng _ .
taagken _ tawani _ qiya nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ amen _ nuna mnun _ aglagh naanghite unga _ .
luuraq llu _ nuna mnun _ kaate kuma _ ugi ma _ tuqu lleqe anga _ . _ â
ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ â _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ â
akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma _ sa lunga _ pi langa _ ?
T u m a n g a _ whanga mni _ n a l l u n a g h t e k a n g a _ . _ â
â _ enta _ k a l n g a g g a a k _ kumlu gpetun _ angka lghiik _ maalghug _ ulima kek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ k a l n g a g g a a k _ maalghug _ ulima ma kek _ .
apeghiigh yakek _ , _ ugi minun _ kelgute ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ awergha m _ a l l a g h h i i n a m _ melqugh aneng _ imigh ma kek _ .
imigh nghmeng _ taaqe yamikek _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ piighhagh ngllagh a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ piighhagh ngllagh ma lghii _ .
taaqe yami _ ugi minun _ kelgute laatagh aa _ .
ugi an _ piigh ghhagh kun _ k a l n g a g g a a k _ maalghug _ petug ma kek _ ama _ aghnagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whagun _ nategh m _ qukaa nun _ u k i g g n a q a m k e n _ .
enan _ k i n g u v n e n g _ mengteghagh llu _ maligte te naagh uq _ . _ â
taagken _ nategh m _ qukaa nite ngughk _ s a g l e g h a g h l l a k _ awite ma kanga _ .
awite yagh kete ni _ paye ghllag k _ aliigh ma lghiik _ .
qaame na nga _ nighugh pigte lghii _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ pinitun _ negh lta _ aghulaqe vagilgavek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ negh ma lghiik _ .
negh te kete luku _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ elpek _ keveg aqe lleqe an _ .
whanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ keveg aqe lleqe aqa _ .
ama _ ungipaate naqe amken _ , _ ukiivag mi _ saama _ ugi n _ nulightugh ma uq _ aghnaghagh neng _ maalghug gneng _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii neng _ .
enekiitek _ v u v a l l a a q u t _ , _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
E n t a q u n n g a m _ u k i g g n a q a m k e n _ .
enan _ mengteghagh _ k i n g u v n e n g _ maligte te naagh uq _ .
iiwen _ u g i v e k _ aapte naagh aaten _ , _ avelghaqiinagh naken _ .
sagiqe gkan _ pi naken _ , _ â _ enan _ unaami _ ungipaate nagh amken _ . _ â
iiwen _ nategh anun _ kaate kuvek _ uteghmun _ esghagh naagh uten _ .
mengteghagh _ esghagh lleqe an _ .
esghagh kuvgu _ piighhe aq _ i l e m q u g h l u k u _ panike te lghiitek _ aglagh ghhaatek _ mengteghagh mun _ .
aglagh kuftek _ mengteghagh _ qelpeghtekufsigu _ , _ itegh kuftek _ signegh t _ m a a l g h u g n e g h e t _ tugu lleqe aten _ .
tugu kufki _ ila kek _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
U g i v e k _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh u lleqe agken _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh at _ neghe lleqe ait _ .
taawa _ qamagte unga _ .
U k i g g n a q a m s i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ paye k _ suupe yagh ke gni _ anglu igh aatagh ma lghiik _ .
taakwagun _ p a y e g n e k u n _ u k i g s i m a k a n g i t _ .
nuna mun _ tuute ma lghiik _ .
tuute yamek _ kalngag _ e s g h a g h y a q e s e n g _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh _ tunutagh nge i te nun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
A g h n a k p a n i k u l l g h i i k _ , _ q i i v l u t e k a g l a a m a l g h i i k _ .
kaate lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh lutek _ aghnagh m _ signegh t _ m a a l g h u g n e g h e t _ t u g u m a k a n g e k _ .
tugu luki _ ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ imigh ma kek _ , _ ila kek _ mangtag meng _ .
apeghiigh yamikek _ p a n i g g a n i _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ tawani _ utaqa nga _ .
ugi ka _ payugte naqe aqa _ , _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ . _ â
panig an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ugi minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ v u v a l l a a q e f t u t _ ama _ yugtu ghllagu uq _ .
atugh aqe ut _ aghula magh meng _ .
aghnagh _ aagra mun _ nuug yan _ q a l l e g n a n i g h w a a g h u s i m a l g h i i t _ .
taagken _ tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ quulqite m _ qaye ani _ n u l i i g q e k _ maalghug _ i n g a g h t a a g h u t a q e f t u k _ .
aghnagh m _ ugi minun _ signegh k _ quyngigh meng _ imaqe lghiik _ tuune ma kek _ .
â _ ang _ , _ ukuk _ naasiigh kek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh gneng _ ataasigh _ avegtugh aq _ negh ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ nuliigh minun _ tuune ma kek _ .
sivuke luku _ nuliigh ni _ liisuqe mangite ma kanga _ .
nulighh an _ signegh k _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ yug nun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ uyegte ma kek _ avegtughagh t _ a t a a s i k a g h t a a n _ .
T a a w a t e g h p i g a q _ naama ma lghiik _ signegh k _ .
ila kek llu _ signegh k _ tugu ma kek _ m a n t a g m e n g _ imaqe lghiik _ .
tanemwha _ ugi minun _ t u u n l a a t a g h a a k _ .
pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ ukuk llu _ n a a s i g h q e k _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ imaqe lghiik _ tugu ak _ n a a s i g h l a a t a g h a a k _ .
avegtugh aq _ ataasigh _ neghe a _ .
taaqe yamigu _ nuliigh minun _ signegh k _ tuune ma kek _ .
nulighh an _ sughukagh nun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ uyegte ma kek _ .
tanemwha _ signegh m _ imagh a _ naama laatagh uq _ .
signegh t _ imaa igh te yata _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ugi an _ yug lghute _ tamana _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U k u g h s i y _ , _ entaqun _ aagna _ nulighhqagh ka _ ! _ â
nuliigh ni _ aag llegh a _ ineqsunagh lleghpigagh a _ tugu ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ a t a v e k n a a v e k _ enngaatall _ panike nakangaten _ ! _ â
U w a t m u n _ ayagaghte ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ quulqite meng _ asitmun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ U k u g h s i y _ , _ entaqun _ aagna _ nulighhqagh ka _ , _ llangaqa _ n u l i g h q a _ . _ â
ila a llu _ nuliigh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ uyuq _ elpek llu _ n a a v n u n _ a t a v n u n _ aglagh ghhaaten _ ! _ â
yug m _ siinge ma kanga _ quulqite m _ qaye aneng _ asitmun _ .
ifkaghte laatagh aa _ .
aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
yuug _ pilugug ma lghii _ enkaam _ aane ma lghii _ .
nutaghagh _ mengteghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tazingavek _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ nuliigh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
nulighh an _ quyake ma kanga _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangaawa gmi _ taake uk _ aghnaghagh k _ ? _ â
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ n u l i g h q e s a g h a g k a _ . _ â
yug m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ elpek _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
â _ unaami _ ungipaate naagh amken _ . _ â
taagken _ aghnagh m _ qayugh te aq _ ketfagh luku _ ugi ni _ neqlightugh ma kanga _ .
ugi a _ negh ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ nulighh a _ alla igh i ma lghii _ nutaghagh u ta ghhagh inagh meng _ .
allighagh igh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ i n g a g h q u l l u t e n g _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ nulighh an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ pilugug i _ ungipaate naqe amken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
enkaam _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
aanleghaate lutek _ ukiivag mun _ mayugh ma lghiik _ .
qaye anun _ uugte yalghiimek _ s a g l e g h a g h l l a k _ esghagh ma kangat _ s a g l e g h a m _ saaghw ani _ maye ghllag t _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ ungipaate naqe amken _ , _ maye t _ ukut _ angegh qugh lteki _ mengteghagh mun _ . _ â
ugi an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angegh qugh ait _ mengteghagh mun _ .
awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ amigh _ ila ke te nghite ngughk _ m e l q w a _ .
U n a g h h a a n e n g _ angaghqugh aat _ unug llegh m _ kenlanga nun _ .
apeghiigh yameng _ aghnagh m _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaami _ n u n a l g u t f u t _ tamaghhagh an _ awergha meng _ tallimat ke aghtagh te _ uyegte naken _ amig ligh aqe luku _ a t a a s i k a g h t a a n _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ i t e g h a a t u k _ .
I t e g h a a l l u t e k _ negh uk _ .
taagken _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ , _ yug m _ nunalgute ni _ qamagte luku _ t u q l u g h t e g h u m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ uyegte ma kanga _ amigh meng _ a t a a s i k a g h t a a n _ awergha neng _ tallimat ke aghtagh te _ .
qamagte ma kanga _ mengteghagh _ tamaghhagh an _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pillugagh nanigh aa _ ama _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ut _ .
yuug _ n e q e n g y u g h i g h l l a g t u q _ , _ ama _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
yaywaalingiighhagh ak
iimnanguq _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ n a y a k u t a l g h i i k _ .
nayag an _ ategh a _ T a y k e n g a a w e n _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ .
nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ N u u t q a m i _ .
nunalgutetuqagh t _ ama _ umiileg leg t _ .
umiileg ita _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ piniqe pigte kek _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ igatiqe ma lghiit _ nuna lgu ta it _ .
katamqun _ umiileg at _ neqe leg _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ nuliigh ni _ p i m a q e g k a n g a _ , _ â _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ neqagh ghhagh meng _ t u u n a g h t a a q i k e k _ , _ salin _ esghaghhu _ k a y a a l n g u u k _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nulighh an _ neqe meng _ aglagh te ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ negh kayugu ma lghiik _ igatiqe mangite ma lghiik _ .
nuna lgu ta it _ p a n e g h a a s i m a l g h i i t _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ naten _ pi yagh kuma _ neqe meng _ tugu tete nayagh zinga _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ u n a g h s i g h w a a g h m e n g _ itghute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ savighhe ma kanga _ .
T u l l u m k e g h l l u k u _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ neghqwaagh ghhagh _ t u g u t k u v i n g h a g h h a q _ ulima ma kanga _ t u g e g h p a g g a q _ .
taaqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ ivagh i ma lghii _ .
naalkute yami _ u n a g h s i g h w a a g h e m _ iqug akun _ petug ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ asi anun _ u y g h a g g a q _ petug ma kanga _ .
taagken _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ .
nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qiiptaasigh meng _ taaqe te unga _ .
qiiptagh yagh naqe unga _ .
aghulaqe gkuma _ elpek _ siklagh yagh naagh uten _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw anun _ piitute leg nun _ . _ â
taagken _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
sigugnegh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ anglaagh _ ukite naqe ma kanga _ .
ukite yamigu _ qiiptaasigh ni _ ateghte luku _ qiiptagh ma lghii _ elqwaagh meng _ .
nayag a _ T a y k e n g a a w e n _ aane ma lghii _ .
alungutellegh m _ asi ani _ siklagh ma lghii _ .
siklagh luni _ piitute meng _ akugh ke tete te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ s a g h n a a m a l u k u _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ratamiiragh kek _ qategh lghiik _ .
kaate luni _ T a y k e n g a a w e n _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a y k u n g _ , _ T a y k u n g _ , _ whanga _ tugu yug aqe yagh amken _ ! _ â
T a y k e n g a a w e m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpenun _ s u m e g h t a g h a n g h i t u n g a n u l i g h q e s q e l l u n g a _ .
enmis _ aghulaqe i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
pi yalghiimi _ qatelghii u uq _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ila a _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ratamiiragh kek _ kavilngugh k _ .
kaate luni _ yug m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a y k u u n g _ , _ T a y k u u n g _ , _ tugu na luten _ pi aqe yagh amken _ ! _ â
T a y k e n g a a w e m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh nghite unga _ elpenun _ nulightugh u lunga _ !
enmis _ aghulaqe i _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
pi yalghiimi _ k a v i i p i g g a a f t u q _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
kiyaghte ma luku _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ tagneqegtagh meng _ atkug ke lghii _ .
yug m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a y k u n g _ , _ T a y k u n g _ , _ esghaqagh qu te _ ukavek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T a y k e n g a a w e m _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ iqlighte ma lghii _ .
allameng _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a y k u n g _ , _ T a y k u n g _ , _ ugi ke yukagh nghite zinga _ ? _ â
T a y k e n g a a w e n _ yaghlegi _ nenglagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ E t e _ , _ e t e _ . _ â
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nengligh sqe nghite amken _ ipapik _ pi amken _ . _ â
T a y k e n g a a w e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawanginaq _ whanga nge i na nghite unga _ , _ anengagh lgu unga _ .
aamtaam _ ighleke kau yanga _ ugiigh naanghite unga _ .
aamtaam _ angegh kanganga _ ugiigh lleqe unga _ . _ â
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ aghulaqe naqe unga _ .
enan _ anengagh an _ tagi kan _ whanga llu _ tagi naagh unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
T a y k e n g a a w e n _ piitute meng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ s a g h n a a m a l g h i i _ .
taaqe luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ esnagh meng _ taglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
Q i i p t a q e n g u m a l g h i i _ elqwaagh meng _ .
elqwaagh t _ q u n g a n g i t g u n _ maklag _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q i i p t a q e n g u m a n g a _ elqwaagh meng _ .
elqwaagh t _ q u n g a n g i t g u n _ maklag meng _ q i i p t a q e n g u m a n g a _ . _ â
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ w a l e n q a k u n _ !
neghe lleqe ukung _ i g h i v g a g h h a q _ ataasigh ghhagh _ . _ â
taagken _ T a y k e n g a a w e m _ maklag _ a f l a a m a k a n g a _ .
T a y k e g e r g e m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ umiileg ut _ neqe meng _ aglagh te gu _ , _ elqwaagh meng _ unatagh meng _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ T a y k e n g a a w e m _ sagnegh ni _ neqe meng _ imigh ma kek _ elqwaagh meng _ ama _ unatagh meng _ .
taagken _ aglagh te ma kek _ umiileg m _ nulighh anun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ qamaken _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ kinangaawa _ ? _ â
T a y k e n g a a w e m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ whanga u unga _ , _ taawa _ neghyaghqagh ghhagh t _ . _ â
umiileg m _ nulighh an _ nuug vike ma kanga _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ kinku t _ neqenge aat _ ? _ â
â _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ maklag meng _ q i i p t a q e n g u m a l g h i i _ . _ â
taagken _ aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ niive lukek _ T a y k e n a a w e m u n _ tuune ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ T a y k e n g a a w e m _ aglagh te ma kek _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ nategh meng _ kavleg u te ma lghii _ .
T a y k e g e r g e m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ kinangaawa _ ? _ â
yug m _ nategh meng _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga u unga _ . _ â
â _ I i t q a a l t e n _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ aghneghniimna u uq _ .
itegh yan _ T a y k e g e r g e m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa qu ghllag ziin _ ? _ â
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ nayag n _ tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ .
I i t e g _ â _ qute _ ighleke nghite kuvgu _ enan _ nayag ka _ tugu nayagh an _ . _ â
T a y k e n g a a w e m _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ aksaqe luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a y k e g u r _ , _ angegh nakevnga _ ! _ â
taagken _ yuug _ T a y k e g e r g e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ umyugaleg u lghii _ angegh yug kuni _ ugiigh lleqe lghii _ . _ â
taagken _ T a y k e n g a a w e n _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ taawa _ ugiigh unga _ , _ ighsa nghite unga _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ T a y k e n g a a w e n _ aglagh te naqe a _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ wiin _ ataasigh meng _ qavagh a _ .
unaami _ aglagh ghhaaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ tawani _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ nuliigh ni _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
yug m _ nayag a _ T a y k e g e r g e m u n _ tagi ma lghii _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n _ nulightugh uq _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n _ enngaatall _ u n a n g y u p i g l l e g h i i _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ T a y k e g e r g e m u n _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a y k e g u r _ , _ s e g h l e g h u n a y a n g h i s t a _ mengteghagh put _ qerngughte te yagh kumteki _ . _ â
T a y k e g e r g e m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ pinigh nayagh ukut _ . _ â
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ mengteghagh teng _ naafqe ma kangat _ .
naafqellug qu _ mesungesag m _ saaghw anun _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ mesungesag t _ tunuqagh itgun _ mengteghagh u ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ T a y k e g u r _ , _ w h a n g k u n n u n _ aglagh qagh a _ , _ esghapag yaghtuqagh nga _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ ellngit nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ T a y k e n g a a w e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ugi ka _ esghapag ggu _ mughute naqe lghii _ . _ â
yug m _ kameg ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ nuliigh minun _ tuune ma kanga _ .
â _ T a y k e n g a a y _ , _ kaame ka _ piginegh igh ghhu _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T a y k e n g a a w e m _ maklag m _ u n g a l g h u n g a n e n g _ kameg a _ kanaghte vike ma kanga _ .
inglu a _ neghsagh m _ u n g a l g h u n g a n e n g _ kanaghte vike ma kanga _ .
taagken _ yuug _ kameg ma lghii _ .
kameg luni _ nekeve yalghiimi _ aghenqignegh a _ itegagh a _ maklag stun _ puug ma lghii _ .
inglu a _ neghsagh stun _ puug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqume uq _ .
aqume yan _ maklag _ neghsagh _ n u u g l e g h a s i m a l g h i i _ .
taagken _ yug m _ savig mineng _ kenuqagh ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ maklag meng _ neghsagh meng _ taglagh qu uute ma lghiik _ mengteghagh megtenun _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n l l u _ lli te i yalghiimi _ enngaatall _ u n a n g y u u g h s i m a k a n g a _ .
teghig ke te yameng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aghtugh nanigh ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ tagi luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaami _ vuvallate lleqe ukut _ .
I n g l u k l i g h h a m n n e n g _ kayaalqe i i ragh yagh ut _ tagi lleqe ut _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ .
tagi lleqe ut _ atungag meng _ t a n p e g h h m e n g _ temkag meng _ t a p g h a g h m e n g _ .
ellngit a _ aghula stekaqe aat _ a m i q l u g g a q _ .
aghula nghmini _ taawanginaq _ ilagaate inagh kun _ nalughqutagh aqe uq _ .
kayaalqe gkumikut _ s a n q u t a m n n e n g _ wayagh lleqe ainkut _ . _ â
taagken _ yuug _ mengteghagh minun _ a g l a a m a l g h n _ .
enngaatall _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ nagaqugh luni _ qevuute luni _ alinge ma lghii _ inqun _ w a y a g h n a y u k a n g i s t e n g _ .
unug yagu _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ uughqa nun _ esghagh yagh ma lghii _ .
agepsughtu aaghet _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
taku ma kangi _ .
kaate yagh kete ni _ nenglu u uq _ .
itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ nanevgagh ghllag llu _ a g h n a l w a a g h l l a k l u _ e s g h a a m a k a n g e k _ .
N a n e v g h a g h l l a g e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa qu ziin _ ? _ â
T a y k e g e r g e m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A p e g h t i i s q e l l u n g a _ tagi nga _ . _ â
N a n e v g a g h l l a k p i m a l g h i i _ , _ â _ enta _ apeghtugh laken _ !
taawanginaq _ aapte naqe amken _ , _ i n g l u k l i g h h a g h p e s i _ a g h u l a s t e n g a t _ naten _ pi yaghqau a _ ? _ â
â _ taawanginaq _ a m i q l u g g a q _ nalughqutagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ â
nanevgagh ghllag m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A g h n a l q w a a y _ , _ enta _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ a g h n a l q w a a m _ s a g u y a k n a n e v g a m u n _ tuune ma kek _ .
nanevgagh m _ tugu ma kek _ .
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ nagu _ teghla ghllag _ ?
tea- ai _ whavek _ .
ilagagh te naqe amken _ ! _ â
teghla ghllag _ nanevgagh m _ kaagkagh akun _ nalug ma lghii _ .
N a n e v g a a m _ ilagagh te ma kanga _ , _ â _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ y a n g i y a n g a a _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ â
teghla ghllag m _ yaqugh gni _ s a a g t a a t a m a a g k e n k a _ tuye gni _ q a p r a g s i m a k e k _ .
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ q a l g h i q a a m a l g h i _ .
T a a g k e n n a n e v g a a m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ taawa _ apeghtugh amken _ !
aglagh ghhaaten _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ a m s i k a g h l l u n i _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ u n a n g u l u k u _ nayag an _ a q f a a m a k a n g a _ .
qineghte luni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagu _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ ? _ â

nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ W h a n g k u n n u n _ aglagh a qaa _ !
ugi ka _ v u v a l l a n a q u q _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ pilugug luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ inglu aneng _ qimugsigh lghute _ k a a t q u s i m a l g h i i _ atungag meng _ t a p g h a g h m e n g _ temkag meng _ t a n p e g h h m e n g _ usi lug teng _ .
taagken _ tukugh ita _ itghute te ma kangit _ .
V u v a l l a l g h i i t _ sivuke luteng _ ilagagh ma lghiit _ .
taaqe yata _ aqelqagh it _ ilagagh ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ a m i q l u g g a q _ k e f t a g h l u n i _ nalughqutagh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ aqelqagh t _ kayaalqe i i ma lghiit _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n _ ugumi yug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ enta _ saguyagh k _ tagivagh tekek _ !
whanga llu _ ilagagh qagh langa _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ saguyagh k _ tuune ma kegket _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n _ kallagte ma lghii _ .
ilagaate ni _ puygu ma kanga _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ ilagaate ka _ puygu aqa _ !
N a t u n g a a w a l l i _ ? _ â
nayag an _ aanqute ma kanga _ .
liisimake a _ , _ â _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ year- nge i yanga _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ , _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ â
T a y k e g e r g e n _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ taawa _ taawa _ !
nagu _ aghula stekaghqagh ka _ teghla _ ? _ â
teghla ghllag _ T a y k e g e r g e m _ kaagkagh akun _ nalug ma lghii _ .
T a y k e g e r g e n _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ â _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ y a n g i y a n g a a _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ , _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ â
aga _ tuye gni _ q a p r a g s i m a k e k _ .
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
nanevgagh at _ aragh te ma lghiit _ .
â _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ kayaalqe i i uq _ ! _ â
taagken _ T a y k e g e r g e n _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghii _ ama _ aklungi igh i ghllag ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q
iimnanguq _ , _ yug t _ tallimat _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ata leg t _ ama _ naa leg t _ .
maalghug _ mughute lutek _ i i l a a m a l g h i i k _ .
ila a _ nunivag mun _ aghulaqe luni _ i f l a a m a l g h i i _ .
ila a _ qayaghtu luni _ i f l a a m a l g h i i _ .
aminaqe ma lghii _ ataasigh _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ u n u g m i _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh gpenaan _ qavaghni yami _ itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ nutaan _ n i g h u u g t a g h a g h a q e f t a a _ .
ata ni _ t a g h s a s m a k a n g a _ .
ata a _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaya ghhagh ka _ amiiragh igh qagh ghhu _ ! _ â
ata an _ yaghlegi _ qayugh a _ ayemqe ughtagh ma kanga _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ qaya ni _ q i y a k u m a k a n g a _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ u y u q l i g h p i g a q _ .
ata an _ natmun _ pi sqe igate kanga _ , _ q a y u g h l l a g _ â _ qute _ ataasighhaaghte lghii _ ila i _ ifla laghate te lghiit _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ e l l n g i n a g h h a g h m i _ lliigh lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ allameng _ unug yagu _ q a y a n g l l a a m a l g h i i l _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh aa _ .
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luku _ a ta mi _ uunghagh i _ awataghpag i _ tegleg luki _ kete ma lghii _ .
kete luni _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ u y a v a g h q a a g h a q u q _ tagitug ughte ghllag ma kanga _ .
kete mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ t a g i t u g i s i m a k a n g a _ .
tagitug ite yagh kete ni _ pennagh ghllag _ a l i g h u m a k a n g a _ .
pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ ighu gni _ kulngaghllug kek _ , _ megh mun _ itegagh ni _ nepte luki _ , _ aqumga ragh aqe uq _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ t u q l u m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ aagyuq _ tagi aghten _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ akite aghte mangite ma kanga _ .
yug ghrug qu ta ghllag m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ iiwen _ evlug ughte ste lleqe aqa _ ! _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighu gni _ aghulate yagh ke gni _ evlug ughte ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ yuggagh _ alinge luni _ yugrukutaagh ghllag meng _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ .
â _ yeqay _ i i g h a r i i g h a a l l u t u n g _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A - a a - a a _ ! _ â
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ quneghten _ ! _ â
yuggagh _ quneghte ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ n e v e g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
N e v e g h s a n _ yuggagh m _ i v a m a k a n g a _ .
â _ nagu _ n a a n t a q s i n _ ? _ â
yuggagh _ aqsa anun _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
yuggagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ naqam _ aqsaute yu gnite a qaa _ . _ â
yuggagh _ ukig ma lghii _ .

pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ whaante unga _ . _ â

A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ pi ma kanga _ â _ wiintaku _ qaya ghhagh ka _ t u g m a g h s a g h t u q a g h l a k u n _ ! _ â
taagken _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ qaya ghhagh minun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
ellnga _ tumangani _ n e g h s a g h t e k a l g h i i _ .
neghsaghtagh mi _ tengug i _ ighneghagh i _ nusug ma kangi _ .
nusug luki _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ aate lukek _ atkug ni _ aate luku _ tafsi ma lghii _ .
tafsi luni _ neghsagh m _ ighneghagh ghhagh i _ qumig ma kangi _ .
qumig luki _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ n e v e g h t e n _ . _ â
yuggagh _ n e v e g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
N e v e g h l l u n i _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ yuggagh m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
tengug i _ aliighte ma kangi _ .
yuggagh m _ atkug mi _ ilu anun _ tengug t _ qumig kaqe kangi _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ liigike mangite ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ tengug meng _ negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tengug ten _ llangaqa _ neghsagh m _ tengug i _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whangkuta _ tengug put _ tawatete ut _ neghsaghpagnite aqe ut _ .
enta _ elpek llu _ n e v e g h t e n _ !
â _ llaaghanwha _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ n e v e g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
N e v e g h s a n _ yuggagh m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighneghagh i _ aliigh ma lghiit _ .
I g h s a q g h w a _ k u k e g h q w a a q e f t u q _ .
yuggagh m _ i g h s a q g h w a _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ .
maaten wha _ megh m _ evlug ughte mangite ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh luni _ wata _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
sukate luni _ qiighqagh kun _ tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ghhagh ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ uunghagh ghhagh ni _ awataghpag ni _ tugulagh luki _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ esla mi _ nanigh ghhagh _ k u m a n g a l g h i i _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
kiyaghte ma luku _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ aragh magh mi _ tagi ma lghii _ .
nanigh ghhagh kun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ n u g h q a g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a y _ , _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a y _ qilu ten _ tagivagh ki _ sukate luki _ ! _ â
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ neghsagh m _ qilu i _ tuune ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh _ agitaghte yalghiimi _ talwa _ q a m a v e r u g l l a k _ ggute ghllag _ .
qilu t _ negh luki _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
kalefkaghte luni _ allameng _ n u g h q a g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
N u g h q a g h s a n _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ kemagnagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ a l l a m e n g n u u g u m a l g h i i _ .
nuug luni _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a y _ , _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a y _ , _ ighsaqugh n _ tagivagh ghhu _ . _ â
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan _ , _ ighsaqugh ka _ t u u n a a n g h i t a q a _ !
ighsaqugh ka _ unguva sigh ke aqa _ , _ k i y a g h t a a g h u s i q a q a _ sumeghtaghagh sigh ke aqa _ ! _ â
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a y _ ,
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a y _ iiwen _ neghe lleqe amken _ ! _ â
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ agitaghten _ , _ agitaghten _ ! _ â
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ u u n g h a m i n e n g _ naghulleg ma kanga _ .
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t llu _ kalefkaghte ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ t u m a n g a k u n _ maligte ma kangi _ .
taagken _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ malighqagh ma kangi _ awataghpag t _ nuughqaghte luteng _ kalefkaghte aqe luteng _ .
suna _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ mengteghagh mete te _ i t q a g h t a _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ amig m _ saaghw ani _ utaqa ma kanga _ .
aagra mun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t _ amig m _ e s l a t a n g a n i _ .
itegh luni _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ ngillegte ma lghii _ .
qama _ nulighh an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ N a t u _ aqnigh aqa _ ? _ â
tughneghagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ aqsaqugh ka _ a g r e p e m a a _ . _ â
taagken _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ ila itnun _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ iightu ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ t u g h n e g h a g h h a g e k _ maalghug _ esghagh ma kek _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ i i y n g i t a l g h i i k _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ aapte ma ka ak _ , _ â _ kaay _ !
kina u ziin _ ? _ â
â _ whanga u unga _ . _ â
â _ kina _ elpek _ ? _ â
â _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ . _ â
â _ A a a _ weni _ inga _ umiileg ut _ aqnigh aqe uq _ aqsa mineng _ .
langetaq _ aqfa lleqe aatnga _ . _ â
nepiigh yan _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ sangaawa _ taana _ uyaqugh gpeni _ k u m a g l l a g u y e n g a l g h i i _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ esghaqagh ghhu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ taku ma kanga _ .
kaate luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ qeteghten _ ! _ â
aghnalqwaagh _ qeteghte ma lghii _ .
qeteghte yan _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ ighsalqagh gkenkun _ nunugh yagh kete ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ amiiragh ghhagh a _ qapigh ma kanga _ .
qapigh yamigu _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ aate ma kanga _ .
aate luku _ ellnga tun _ q i i p i m s u g u m a l g h i i _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ yuug _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ naagu _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ ? _ â
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ ! _ â
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqfa amken _ .
umiileg ut _ inga _ aqnigh aqe uq _ .
aglagh qagh a _ . _ â
â _ aglagh nayagh unga _ taawanginaq _ k a y a t e p i g t u n g a _ . _ â
â _ amagh laken _ . _ â
â _ aa-a _ ! _ â
taagken _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ nekeve ma lghii _ .
nekeve yan _ yug m _ amagh ma kanga _ .
amagh yagh kete ni _ uqigtu uq _ .
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ u q i g t u g h q a a g a t e n _ ? _ â
â _ qayughllak _ qugili ghllag lghiinga _ , _ saama _ alignagh m _ . _ â
yug m _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mengteghagh ghllag mun _ .
itghute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ aghnagh mi _ whani _ enta _ qaagna _ kelgugh ghhu _ .
qamagte luni _ taghnughhagh ke te luni _ tagi laghate li _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kelgugh aa _ qamagte luku _ .
â _ T a a w a a _ qamagte aqa _ . _ â
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ aqnigh lghii _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ q a a n g h a n i _ uunghagh _ ama _ aneghte aqe uq _ kenegh meng _ .
mulunghituq _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ i t e g h a a t u t _ nanevgagh ke te luteng _ aghnalqwaagh ke te luteng _ taghnughhagh ke te luteng _ leganqun _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ .
A g h h a g h h a n a a w r a a m p i m a k a n g i _ , _ â _ E n t a n a n i q q a a m t e g g u _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ nanigh _ qaamllug qu _ nategh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ enta _ kayusigh tengnga _ .
kina _ ilagaate leg _ ilagaate mineng _ ilagagh li _ .
iiwen _ ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ temngi _ aragh li _ .
iiwen _ aanqute kuma _ a a n q u l l g h a s i _ . _ â
taagken _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute uq _ .
tamana _ ellmeng _ ilagaate meggneng _ aanqute uq _ .
ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ aragh te ghllag uq _ .
aragh te ma luki _ A g h h a g h h a a w r a a m _ tughneghagh _ aqnigh lghii _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ uunghagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ aanqaghte ma lghii _ eslate mun _ .
aanqaghte luni _ taagken _ qimag ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh t _ nepiigh aghtagh te ma lghiit _ .
nepiigh aghtagh te yata _ tughneghagh m _ nulighh an _ nanigh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itghute luku _ k u m a g h s i m a k a n g a _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tuquma lghii _ .
A n q a g h l l u t e n g _ A g h h a g h h a n g a w r a q _ malighqagh ma kangat _ .
pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ i i t e g Ê¼ u n _ kaate kumken _ neghe lleqe kemken _ .
sangavek _ iqlengiqe ma ziin _ ? _ â
I w e m g a _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ unite ma kangi _ .
qaya ghhagh ni _ aliigh ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaya ghhagh _ , _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piiften _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piifte ma lghii _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ qaya minun _ kaa tuq _ .
uugte luni _ kete uq _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ esnagh mun _ kaat quute ma lghii t _ .
tughneghagh t _ megh mun _ a t e y i i l n g u u t _ .
ataasigh m _ tughneghagh m _ megh _ megh ma kanga _ .
megh yagh kete ni _ A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a q _ t u g n e g h a a m _ q a a n g h a n u n _ tagi ma lghii _ .
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ q a y a m i n i l n g u q _ t e p l u g g a q _ tugu luku _ megh _ anagutagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ uteghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ tughneghagh m _ tugu mangite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nuna mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ angayuqagh gni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
qagugh mig te lutek _ aqumga aqe uk _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qenwat _ tuqu ni luten _ pi aqe amken _ . _ â
A g h h a g h h a n g a a w r a a m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nakaa _ , _ entaqun _ anglegute nka _ nallu te te meggneng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ .
maaten _ whanga _ uyavagh nun _ aghulaqe ghngaaghma _ kitum _ tuqute naanghite aanga _ .
whanga _ nanevgagh lunga _ tuqu lleqe unga _ . _ â
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
ungipaghagh an _ Q i g i g h h m i i k
iimnanguq _ , _ Q i g i g h h m i i k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ a n g l e g u t k u l l g h i i k y a y w a a l i n g i i g h h a a k _ .
Q i g i g h t a q _ mengteghaghtu pigte lghii _ .
ama _ umiileg leg t _ .
umiileg at _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
awen _ iiwleng _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ .
A g h v e n g e n g h a a n i _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ esnagh mun _ a t g h a g h a g h a q e l g h i i k _ .
kaate nghata _ umiileg m _ uqugh mun _ s i i n g w a a g h a t a g h a q e g k e k _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava u na tek _ t a g l a a m a q e l g h i i k _ taawanginaq _ mesiigh mun _ angighte te lutek _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ mengteghagh mun _ taglagh nghaani _ esnagh mun _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ a t g h a a m a q e l g h i i k _ .
kaate negh meggni _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ ikugh qu te ma aqe lghiik _ ama _ kemekrag meng _ .
taglagh lutek _ kaate negh meggni _ n u t a a n n e g h u m a a q e l g h i i k _ .
ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ a a n e n g h a n i _ umiileg m _ s i i n g w a a g h a t a a m a q e g k a n g a _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ maa nte kumtung _ tuqu lleqe ainkung _ .
upupeng _ qaya ngllagh lutung _ a g h u l a q e l q u n g _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nayag an _ a a n g h u m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii neng _ .
qayagh _ taaqe yamigu _ tanpegh ghhagh ghhagh meng _ q e m g u g h t i l u t e k _ nayag ke te lghiik _ i l a g h t u u s i m a k a n g a t _ .
taaqe yamegteki _ qayagh eng _ amigh ma kangat _ .
qaya ghrukutaaghllag _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii _ t a a q u m a k a n a g t _ .
M e k e l g h i i g h h a a m n a y a g g a n i _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ maani _ ataasigh meng _ qavaa ltung _ .
unaami _ u n a n g u l u k u _ mengteghagh ut _ naafqellug qu _ k e l l g h a k u n g _ . _ â
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
unug yagu _ negh ma lghiik _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
taagken _ unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ mengteghagh eng _ n a a f q u m a k a n a t _ .
U n a n g u p i g l l u k u _ kete ma lghiik _ .
ukiivag m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ .
unug yagu _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ q a l p e g h l l u k u _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ ukiivag mun _ .
meghnugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ uyghigh luku _ a n g y a t a g h q u u m a l g h i i k _ .
taagken _ negh ma lghiik _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ atugh te ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya mini _ nalughqutagh ma lghii _ .
M e g h n u n g h y a m i _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ angwaagh ltung _ . _ â
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angwaagh uk _ .
unug yagu _ uyghigh laatagh uk _ .
uyghigh lutek _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ angwaagh aqe lghiik _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ .
aghnegh m _ qukaghyag u _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ negh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghuliigh lutek _ qayagh ek _ uyghigh luku _ negh uk _ .
taaqe yamek _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ atugh te nga _ , _ aghula naqe unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ atugh te luku _ nayag an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aghula ma lghii _ .
meghnugh yami _ taaqe luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ u y g h i n _ amu gu _ .
angwaagh ltung _ ! _ â
nayag an _ u y g h i n _ amu ma kanga _ , _ enkaam _ angwaagh uk _ .
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ nuna _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
taagken _ taku ma kangat _ .
sukate luni _ nuna _ angli ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghiik _ .
arekull _ ukiivag mun _ kaate aqe uk _ .
qute mun _ u g l l e g h a a s i m a l g h i i k _ .
qayagh eng _ sayug ma ka ak _ .
sayug luku _ a a w g h s i m a k a n g a k _ .
mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
S i v u l i g h p i g a g h t e g g u n _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
I t e g h a a s a m e k m e k e l g h i i g h h a q _ qiighw ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ ineqsunagh ghllag lghii _ aagra meng _ nuug ma lghii _ .
aleghqugh yalghiimi _ q a g h i t u m r a a g l l a g u f t u q _ , _ â _ K a a a y _ , _ s a a m _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ ?
maani _ aviite usi _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q i g i g h h m i i n g u u k u n g _ . _ â
â _ aa _ , _ sa kun _ tagi stek _ ? _ â
â _ qaya kun _ tagi kung _ .
Q a y u g h l l a k n u n a m n n i _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ , _ enngaatall _ umiileg ut _ seghlegh pigu uq _ , _ naqam _ aghvenge yu pigte uq _ .
A g h v e n g e n g h a n i _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ ama _ uqugh mun _ s i i n g v a g a t a g h a q i i n k u n g _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava ngunaamtung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ mengteghagh mnnun _ .
kaate negh mtung _ sa meng _ negh ltung _ .
taawanginaq _ igatagh lutung _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikung _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikung _ .
pilagkagh meng _ ikugh qu te aqe lghiikung _ .
enkaam _ taglagh aqe lghiikung _ .
taglagh negh mtung _ wetku _ negh aqe lghiikung _ .
E n k a a m a m _ tea- ma ken _ ukavek _ tagi kung _ tuqute na yu kanginkung _ . _ â
aghnagh ghllag _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ e n k a a m p i m a l g h i i _ , _ â _ waran wha _ avaqutagh ke lleqe amtek _ .
qamavek _ aagra mun _ itegh tek _ .
asangsi _ ugi ka _ tagi kuni _ qevuute luni _ quya lleqe uq _ . _ â
I t e g h a s i m a l g h i i k _ aagra mun _ .
aghnagh m _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i te kete luku _ neqlightugh ma kek _ .
negh ma lukek _ sama _ ugi a _ kavleg u uute ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ q e l a m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ A v _ ? _ â
â _ whaante unga _ . _ â
yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ esghapag ma kek _ .
yaghlegi _ nuliigh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ S a a m _ ukuk _ taghnughhagh ke akek _ ? _ â
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ e l p e n e n g _ aapte aghte kek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ aapte ma kek _ , _ â _ S a a m _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ â _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q i g i g h h m i i n g u u k u n g _ , _ yaywaali u ukung _ , _ ata ite ukung _ , _ naa ite ukung _ .
ukavek _ tukughqagh ghhagh leg nun _ ivagh i u kung _ nani _ inqun _ pinitun _ kiyaghte na lutung _ .
qayughllak _ nuna mnni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ .
umiileg ut _ enngaatall _ seghlegh pigu uq _ . _ â
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ ? _ â
â _ A g h v e n g e n g h a n i _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ mesiigh mun _ s i i n g w a a g h a t a g h a q i i n k u n g _ .
llaaghanwha _ a v a n g u n a m t u n g _ taglagh aqe ukung _ .
umiileg _ wetku _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aqe ukung _ .
atghagh negh mtung _ pilagkagh meng _ ikugh kete te lutung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ .
taglagh negh mtung _ wetku _ tawani _ negh aqe ukung _ .
A a n Ê¼ g i i m a l u t u n g l l u _ umiileg m _ esghagh nghminikung _ s i i n g w a a g h a t a g h a q i i n k u n g _ .
qenwat _ tuqute na yu kanginkung _ tagi ukung _ . _ â
nepiigh yan _ yuug llu _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ q i y a g h u s i m a l g h i i k _ .
yug m _ a a p l a t a g h i i _ , _ â _ atatagh nge istek _ ama _ a s a g i s t e k _ ? _ â
â _ avangite ukung _ .
taawanginaq _ nunalgutete ukung _ , _ alla u ut _ . _ â
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ waran wha _ avaqutagh nge ukut _ .
elpek _ angayuqagh ten _ aqfa ki _ ! _ â
nulighh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nulighh a _ pilugug ma lghii _ , _ aane luni _ angayuqagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ ugi ma _ aglaqugh ii sqe aisi _ , _ inqun _ u n g i p a g h a g h y a g h t i i s q e l l u s i _ . _ â
N a n e v g a a m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aa _ , _ aglagh naqe ukut _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aane luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
itegh yan _ ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ ? _ â
â _ qaywa _ , _ tagi naqe ut _ . _ â
aghnagh _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulu nghite uk _ n a n e v g a g h h a v a k l u _ aghnalqwaagh ghllag llu _ i t e g h a a s i m a l g h i i k _ .
I t e g h a a s a t a _ yug m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ whanga _ tuqlugh aqe amsi _ inqun _ u n g i p a g h i i s q e l l u s i _ .
Q i g i g h h m i i k _ kaate ma uk _ taghnughhagh k _ naa ite ngugh k _ , _ ata ite ngugh k _ .
enngaatall _ pellagh yug lutek _ aqumga lghiik _ . _ â
nanevgagh ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ enta _ , _ ungipaghagh langa _ .
iimnanguq _ , _ ukuk _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ naa it _ ata it _ whanga _ uyvala luki _ tuqu qu ma anka _ .
tefaay _ ! _ â
enkaam _ nanevgagh ghllag llu _ aghnalqwaagh ghllag llu _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
yaghlegi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ m i l e g p a g t a a s i m a l g h i i k _ .
Y u g e m n u l i i n i _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A w i m a m _ angayuqagh gken _ nanglleg ke lleqe keten _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ iitek _ angayuqagh nka _ nanglleg ke naanghite anka _ .
talwa _ s a n g i g h h a g h m e n g _ mekestaaghhaa luku _ t u u n a a n g h i t a n k a _ .
elpek _ awituwaq _ saki ten _ nanglleg ke lleqe keten _ ? _ â
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ asangsi _ whanga _ nanglleg ke naanghite anka _ ! _ â
nuliigh ni _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ â _ enta _ whanga _ angayuqagh nka _ aqfa aghte ki _ .
T a g i g h l l i n n g u q _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh lit _ .
A q e l q a t n a g a s u g t u t _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ aane uq _ .
ugi mi _ angayuqagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ ugi mi _ angayuqagh kek _ ungipaate ma kek _ , _ â _ ugi ma _ aqfa sqe aisi _ aglagh qagh tek nguq _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh tek _ . _ â
nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ a g h n a g h l q w a a g h l l a k l u _ angegh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qaywa _ qaywa _ aglagh naqe ukung _ ! _ â
aglagh yan _ aghnagh _ ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ ? _ â
â _ tagi naqe uk _ . _ â
aghnagh _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh llu _ nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ i t e g h a a s i m a l g h i i k _ .
yug k _ pi te ma lghiik _ , _ â _ whanga _ aqfa ste aqe amsi _ inqun _ aqelqagh k _ pellagh yug lghiik _ ungipaghagh te sqellug kek _ .
nuliigh ma _ angayuqagh kek _ tagiyagh uk _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ yaghlegi _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ milegmiqe ak _ .
E l l n g a n n g u q _ uyvala lukek _ tuqu qu mafte ak _ angayuqagh kek _ . _ â
yuug _ nepiigh yan _ nanevgagh ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ enta _ ungipaghagh langa _ . _ â
â _ iimnanguq _ , _ nunatagh mii t _ mengteghagh t _ malghugnegh ghhagh t _ .
ataasigh mi _ mengteghagh mi _ kiyaghte lghiik _ yuug llu _ aghnagh llu _ nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiik _ .

yuug _ u n a n g y u p i g l l e g h i i _ .
naqam _ neqete nghmini _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ neqe meng _ awaligh aqe kanga _ .
enngaatall _ a g h n a l w a a g h h a q l u _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ pinitun _ yug m _ k i y a g h t e s i m a k e k _ .

eltughagh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqnigh yagh kuma _ ! _ â _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ â _ sangavek _ ? _ â _ â _ qayughllak _ unguva nghmeng _ qinuyagute unga _ .
qemall _ aqnigh lunga _ tuqu yagh kuma _ aghnagh _ iigna _ aqfa nayagh an _ enkaam _ u g h v u g h q e n n a y a g h a n g a _ .
ughvughqe i na ma lunga _ iiggagh aneng _ taagken _ ifla nayagh unga _ .
qemall _ aghnagh kun _ tagi nayagh unga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ . _ â _ â _ neghe pigesnagh na luten _ ! _ â _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q a y u g h l l a k k i y a g h h n e g h m e n g _ qinuyagute unga _ ! _ â _ nepiigh luni _ aqniima lghii _ .
A q n i i m a l g h i _ , _ aqniima lghii _ .
maalghug gneng _ qavagh luni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ tuquma lghii _ .

taawa _ ungipaghagh unga _ . _ â

negh nghmeng _ taaqe yata _ a g h n a l g h w a a g h h a q l u _ nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .

ungipaghagh an _ Y a q e l l e n g e t a q
iimnanguq _ y a q e l l e n g e t a a k _ naa ke te lghiik _ .
nuna m _ a s i n g a n i l n g u u k _ yug stun _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
ighnegh a _ alignagh lghii _ .
aghneq _ tamaghhagh an _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ aneghte aqe lghii _ , _ â _ I i y h i i - h i i - h i - h i i y _ , _ T e n g a g e r g e n t u q _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ nulighh igh yaghtugh kegka _ ! _ â
naa an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ tengagergete _ aange ghllag uq _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
nepiigh i _ !
ellnga n _ ulima aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ .
naagu mi _ ikiwan _ q a a y n g a n i l n g u u m _ nateghqagh meggnun _ angighhe te aqe kanginkut _ . _ â

ayumigh _ w a a m s e g h a g h t e t _ yugu na iqe aat _ .
whangkuta nge uq _ T e n g a g e r g e m _ ulima aqe ainkut _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ y a q e l l e n g e t a q _ aane luni _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ vegtagh ma lghii _ .

itghute luki _ piighhe ma kangi _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ akmag ma kangi _ .
akmag luki _ a g h u l a q u m s i m a k a n g i _ .

mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
paye gnun _ kaate ma lghii _ .

vuvalla a _ A y a p e g h y u g e m
vuvalla m _ s a n q u t a n g i _ sivuligh _ qaligh k _ , _ signegh t _ , _ qaltaghwaagh k _ , _ aghqe sigh ghhagh k _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ saguyagh k _ , _ tagnegh lghii _ nanigh ghhagh _ k u m a n g a l g h i i _ .
vuvalla m _ yug a _ u n a n g u l u k u _ pi nga yu mi _ kellaag gni _ nekegte aqe aat _ vuvalla _ .
taaqe nghmegteggu _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ aane aqe uq _ esla mun _ .
K i y a g h t a l l e g h m u n _ kelgute aqe uq _ mumegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ nalighmeng _ aquutagh meng _ .
aragh aqe uq _ , _ â _ W u - h u u - h u u - h u u - u u _ , _ w u - h u u - h u u - h u u - u u _ , _ w u - h u u - u u _ , _ w u - h u u - u u _ ! _ â
taagken _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ ategh aqe uq _ nategh mun _ .
nuliigh ni _ pi aqe a _ , _ â _ enta _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ ! _ â
nulighh an _ tuune aqe ak _ .
K a a g t u u s i m a g k e n k a _ uzive aqe uq _ ilagagh aqe uq _ uzive te kete luku _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ pi aqe ai _ , _ â _ qaagna _ nanevgagh _ ungipaate qugh teggu _ .
legan _ whaten _ pi nakesi _ , _ â _ W u - w u u - u - h u u - u u _ , _ w u - w u - u - h u u - u u _ , _ neghsagh yagh i uute usi _ , _ pugnegh yagh i uute usi _ , _ iqallug yagh i uute usi _ , _ tengug yagh i uute usi _ , _ a k u t a g h y a g h i i t u s i _ .
A y a p e g h y u k _ v u v a l l a a q _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ avii yaghtugh aqe ut _ mengteghagh nun _ t a m a g h h a n u n _ nanevgagh at _ aghnalqwaagh t _ .
aapte aqe ait _ , _ â _ navek _ ? _ â
pi aqe ut _ , _ â _ A y a p e g h y u g m u n _ ! _ â
nanevgagh at _ aglagh uute aqe ut _ v u v a l l a l g h i i n u n _ negh na luteng _ qetustaaghhagh meng _ .
tawani _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ k a y a l q i i r a a g h u t a q u t _ saama _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ v u v a l l a m a l u k i _ alla nun _ neqe meng _ s a n q u t a a g h m e n g _ tuune i naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
aghtaghagh nghagu _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
V u v a l l a l g h i i t _ ateghaate aqe ut _ nategh mun _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ iiwen _ kinku t _ tawavek _ ila tke aat _ .
ilate naqe negh meggni _ mengteghagh meggneng _ tugutagh ke ut _ tawaqa meng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ivalu meng _ inqun _ v u v a l l a l g h i i t _ mengteghagh it _ qilleghte vike na luki _ .
U n a n g u l u k u _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ negh te aqe ut _ s i q i n g h e m _ piite llegh anun _ kenle anun _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghaani _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
nategh mun _ ateghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ v u v a l l a l g h i i t l u _ .
ateghaate negh meggni _ q u y n g i i r a a t e n g _ tugulagh aqe ait _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ikute uute aqe ut _ .
esla mun _ aane aqe negh meggni _ q u y n g i i r a a t e n g _ l l i v i k u g h a q i i t _ .
aanleghaate luteng _ milugh qutagh aqe ut _ tughneghagh nun _ k i y a g h t a a l l e g h m u n _ megh m _ yug anun _ .
T a q n e g h m e g g n i _ i t e g h a a t a q u t _ .

taaqe nghatki _ v u v a l l a l e k n u l i i g h m i n u n _ saguyagh gni _ tungsigh aqe ak _ .

vuvalla legte aq _ uzive aqe uq _ .
iiwen _ vuvalla yaghtuqagh t _ iiwen _ avaquti a _ .

vuvalla legte aq _ avii aqe uq _ , _ â _ W u h u u u u _ , _ w u h u u u u _ , _ w u h u u u u _ ! _ â
ilagaate _ n a a n g e n g h a n i _ uzive lghiit _ aghuliigh aqe ut _ .

taana _ aghulasigh ke aqe aat _ .

tungtu ghllag _ enkaam _ K a v e n g e n g h a g h h a q
iimnanguq _ , _ tungtu ghllag _ esnagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ kayengenghaghhagh _ .
K a y e n g e n g h a g h h a a m a g h i v a m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ a m e s t a g h h a a k _ , _ talligh kek _ a m e s t a g h h a a k _ . _ â
tungtu ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ K a y e n g e n g h a g h h a a y _ , _ k a y e n g e n g h a a g h h a a y _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ â
K a y e n g e g h a g h h a q _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ e g l l e g h s i m a k a n g a _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ â
itagnatun _ tungtu ghllag m _ kayengenghaghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
K a y e n g e n g h a g h h a a m _ tungtu ghllag _ aghiva laatagh aa _ , _ â _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ a m e s t a g h h a a k _ , _ talligh kek _ a m e s t a g h h a a k _ . _ â
tungtu ghllag m _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ â _ K a y e n g e n g h a g h h a a y _ , _ k a y e n g e n g h a a g h h a a y _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ â
K a y e n g e g h a g h h a q _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ e g l l e g h s i m a k a n g a _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ â
tuquma lghii _ t u k r u u g h q w a a y a q e n n i _ .
T u k r u u g h q _ w a a y a n _ tungtu ghllag m _ negh ma kanga _ .
tungtu ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ kayengenghaghhagh _ taana _ n e q n i r k a p i g g a q _ . _ â
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
nuna meng _ uzive ikagh _ paallghu nkuk _ ama _ Q e t n g a l l e g h y a n k u k
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ kumag _ umiileg _ q a m a r i l a k a y u k _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ kumag m _ nunalgute ni _ pi ma kangi _ paallghu nkut _ , _ q e t n g a l l e g h y a n k u t _ apayepayiigh nkut _ ama _ melngu nkut _ .
pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ Q a m a r i l a n a q u n g a _ !
Q e m g u g h u t e k _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ kumag m _ mengteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ qamarila m _ ayaviigh a _ kingutagh leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
kumag m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ q e t n g a l l e g h y a q l u _ paallghu llu _ nuna _ uzive teggu _ .
elpek tek _ melngu llu _ apayepayiigh llu _ naayghagh _ uzive teggu _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aga _ k i l g a q u u s i m a l g h i i k _ q e t n g a l l e g h y a n k u k _ paallghu nkuk _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ meghnaali ma lghiik _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
legan _ kaate yamek _ aneghte ma lghiik _ pekagh nigh ke utek _ .
apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ naayghagh _ .
qesiqun _ paallghu nkuk _ q e t n g a l l e g h y a n k u k _ u y g h a l q u s i g h h a q _ uzive ma kangat _ .
ama _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ .
llaaghanwha _ kumag m _ paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ atkug aneng _ qatelghii meng _ , _ enraq _ q e t n g a l l e g h y a q _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh meng _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ enraq _ melngu _ aghyuugh ma kanga _ sumeghnegh ke luku _ .
ellnga _ kumag _ aklungi msuggagh igh te ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tungtu _ A q a n g a
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ aghnaanegh _ tungtu _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ighni naqe ma lghii _ .
ighni naqe ma luku _ amaa ghllag k _ maalghug _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
amaa ghllag m _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute lteggu _ ! _ â
legan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ ighni aghte li _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ ighni ma lghii _ .
ighni yan _ aghnagh _ taana _ tungtu _ tuqute luku _ negh ma kangat _ qamagte luku _ .
qamagte yatgu _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ taghnughhagh a _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ â
aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ wetku _ angli kan _ n e g h n a k e f u t _ .
salin _ maaten _ kemgite uq _ . _ â
A t i m a f t a a t _ A q a n g a m e n g _ .
taagken _ aga _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
aga _ talugh qaghte yaag a _ A q a n g a n g i i g h h a q _ nekeve luni _ tan- a _ naayghagh _ mayugh ma kanga _ pegnem _ .
qaygeghte yamigu _ ukig luni _ inglu anun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ ulape ma lghii _ .
nasiqute luku _ tagi yaghqaaghte negh an _ ne mineng _ aglagh luni _ unglegh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ p a l a g h h a g h m e n g _ k i y a q a a t a n g a a _ t a g i m a l g h h k _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
aghneqwaaqun _ a g h u l a q e n g h e g k e n i _ ulape aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ amaa k _ ama _ taana llu _ tungtu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ amaa m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ â
aag llegh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
I w e m g a _ A q a n g a m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ egyug usi _ .
wiin _ whanga llu _ nanghiiqu aghte ngnga _ k a y a a l q i i r a a g h m e n g _ . _ â
taagken _ A q a n g a y e n g _ amaa k _ malighqughtagh ma ka ak _ .
sivuke luni _ A q a n g a _ temngi _ n a l u m s i m e n g _ qimag ma lghii _ .
qaygeghte yami _ ukig luni _ naayghagh m _ inglu anun _ tawaten _ qimag ma lghii _ .
amaa k _ malighqugh nghmeng _ pekagh ghllag lutek _ aghuliigh te ma kangat _ .
ila a _ amu a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ T a a m e n g w h a _ A q a n g a _ qugili igate uq _ ! _ â
taagken _ ila yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tawa _ ellnga _ alla _ kitum _ qinuyugte naanghite a _ ! _ â
A q a n g a _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ ilangani _ teghigagh _ t a m a g g h a g h m i _ q e m g u u m a l g h i i _ A q a n g a _ naanghagh igh na luku _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ pi aqe yagh kangat _ .
A q a n g a m _ sighunegh mineng _ egte ma aqe kangi _ .
tamana _ teghigagh _ qamagte luku _ tuqu qu ma kanga _ .
ungleghtagh aqe lghii _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ esghagh luku _ temngi _ quyngigh u ni luku _ taku aqe yagh kangat _ .
liigike nghmegteggu _ negugh aqe kangat _ aleghqugh magh meng _ , _ â _ A q a n g a n g i i g h h a q _ q a v a g h s i g h a g h a q e l g h i i _ . _ â
A q a n g a _ miiwen llu _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ iike te ma uk
kiyaghte ma uq _ ungazigh mi _ aghnagh _ ugi leg _ enkaam _ taghnughhagh llgagh ak _ .
ilangani _ ugingighagh u ma lghii _ .
sighineg mii m _ yug m _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ sighineg mun _ aghvigh te ma kanga _ .
naqam _ taana _ sighineg mii _ yuug _ a k l u n g i l n g u q _ .
kaa sa mi _ taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ ata an _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ â _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ .
amyuutke lleqe aisi _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ u l a p u m a l g h n k _ inqun _ iknaqughi na lutek _ .
ata ita _ waamte ma kek _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ iknaqughi sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ uksugh m _ u n a n g u l u k u _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
tagi yamek _ nagnegh lutek _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamana _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ a w a l i g h p i g a a l u t e k _ ketfagh aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh lutek _ taglagh aqe lghiik _ .
tamana _ taglagh uute lghii _ naghughte qugh luku _ kaate aqe lghiit _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ uksulqusigh _ .
ilangani _ u n a n g u l u k u _ tungtuqu yagh te ma lghiik _ .
tungtu nge lutek _ atghagh ma lghiik _ aghneghtu ghllag luku _ .
kaate yamek _ tungtu kekagh teng _ lli luki _ nagnegh lutek _ yuug _ tamana _ maligte luku _ esavghagh ma lghiik _ .
naqam _ ata ita _ pi aqe yagh kangit _ inqun _ a w a l i g h t a g h w a a g h p e n a k i _ p i s q e l l u k i _ .
taagken _ a a g h t u u m a l g h i i k _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n i _ .
tamana _ ila a _ ayveghagh luni _ qamagte luni _ taglagh uute ma lghii _ .
E l k e k a y v e g h a g h n a q u m a l g h i i k _ .
qenwat _ i g h i v g a a m a k a n g a _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh ma lghiik _ .
iiwenllu _ y a t a g h q a q a a t _ uyughagh a _ kelute mun _ qiive yalghiimi _ puyugh ghllag u uq _ .
anengagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ii-i _ , _ iike te ainkut _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ ayvegh _ pegte luku _ kelute mun _ k i l g a q u u m a l g h i i k n u u g e m _ esne anun _ siku m _ k a a s a l g h i i m e k n u t e m _ ameltughqagh u luni _ .
naqam _ iiwleng _ t a a n Ê¼ g a v e k _ siku _ s a a g r u k e g t a q _ .
tamana _ s a a g r u k e g t a q _ siku _ anuqe mi _ q a t e g h m i _ legan _ megh m _ teve yaghqaqe a _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ megh m _ teve yagu _ siku _ anuqligh ma kanga _ u v l u g u g h s i m a k a n g a _ , _ umegnegh ughte ma kanga _ qanigtuumagh mi _ .
kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ .
uyavagh ghllag lutek _ siku _ kaate ma kangat _ aange pigte lghii _ .
tawavek _ mayugh lutek _ tespamagun _ laag luku _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ weni _ tuqusiigh naqngu nghite kumta _ sa naqagh ten _ ! _ â
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ nuyekligh _ t u u n a g h m i n e n g _ m a g h u y i g h l u k i _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ u y u q l i i m m e k e l g h i i g h e m n a g a q u m a k a n g a _ u y a v a g h p a n e n g _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ .
mekelghiigh m _ n u y e k l i i m _ ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ â
uyuqligh m _ nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite unga _ ! _ â
alla _ nuyekligh _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ qalghigh laatagh ma lghii _ u y a v a g h p a n e n g _ iwernga _ maateghniineng _ q a n t a g h a n l l u n i _ .
aapte laatagh ma kanga _ iwernga _ nagaqugh ma lghii _ nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ ama _ n u y e k l i i m l l u _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ t u u n a g m i n e n g _ saguyagh ke luni _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ alla _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ q a n t a g h a n l l i i g h a g h l u n i _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagaqugh nghite zigu _ ? _ â
â _ nagaqugh nghite aqa _ ! _ â
iwerngangam _ nagaqugh ma lghiik _ uyughagh n llu _ ama _ anengagh an llu _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qakma _ u q e g h h m i _ qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ q u q q u q q u q q u q q u q _ .
anengagh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awi _ , _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ . _ â
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ S a m e n g p i i q a _ ? _ â
â _ pi aqe aaten _ whanga inagh ma _ taglaate na lunga _ . _ â
alla _ qakma _ qalghigh ma lghii _ meteghllug _ , _ q u q q u q q u q q u q q u q _ .
anengagh a _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ A - a a - a a _ , _ nanghiiqu naqe i _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ meteghllug _ ? _ â
â _ whaten _ pi aqe uq _ nanghiiqu na luta _ maalghug u luta _ .
taawanginaq _ uka _ tume mi _ ataasigh _ siku _ uusqagh lghii _ . _ â
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ aanesqe ma kanga _ .
aane ma lghiik _ q e m g a a g m e k _ .
aane lutek _ anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ n e v e g h t e s q u m a k a n g a _ .
uyughagh a _ n e v e g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
N e v e g h s a n _ aqume ma kanga _ .
aqume luku _ gginagh a _ kenigh mineng _ saape ma kanga _ .
saape yamigu _ ghhatagh ma lghiit _ , _ igleghte ma lghiit _ q u u l v a q u n _ .
mulu luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
sivugte yalghiimeng _ siku mi _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ meghnaali luteng _ alla _ anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ n e v e g h t e s q u m a k a n g a _ .
tawaten _ aqume luku _ anengagh an _ gginagh a _ saape ma kanga _ kenigh mineng _ .
P a l a g h h a g h m e n g _ aqumga aghte luteng _ ghhatagh laatagh ma lghiit _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
mulu luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
esghagh yalghiimeng _ meteghllug m _ meghnaali vig mi _ temngi _ naayghagh mi _ alungutellegh mi _ uyghag mi _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ mayughvig ite uq _ .
anengagh an _ ellmi _ tughneghagh- ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ a m i q l u k _ .
A m i q l u k _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
anengagh a _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
â _ U u m _ pi aqe aanga _ whanga inagh ma _ mayugh te na lunga _ . _ â
â _ wetku qun _ whanga _ sivuke lunga _ mayugh u uute kuminga _ t u n g a n g i g h h a a n i _ elpek _ m a y u u l l i t e n _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ uyughagh a _ mayugh ma lghii _ t u n g a n g i g h h a a n i _ anengagh a _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh mii it _ i l a g a a n n e q e g s a a t a q u t _ .
qagugh m _ nunalgute meng _ alignalghii ngiighhagh t _ i l a g a q a y u g g a a t _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ .
ila ita _ pi aqe kangat _ u n Ê¼ g a _ tuquma ni luki _ , _ ila ita _ pi aqe kangit _ salin _ unguva tete ni luki _ , _ tamana _ ila a _ ilagagh te aqe uq _ temngi _ .
ellngit _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh ma lghiit _ , _ nagate ma lghiit _ .
ata at _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
S a g a q e s t a g h n g a a g h m i _ aghuliigh qagh luni _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ llangaqa _ whaa _ siku m _ ilu anite lunga _ ilagagh unga _ .
iqlengiqe unga _ weni _ ! _ â
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ilagagh ma lunga _ siku m _ ilu ani _ meteghllug m _ qalghigh llegh a _ nagaqugh aqa _ ! _ â
ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghma _ nepiigh lunga _ meteghllug m _ pi unga _ , _ ellmi _ ghhatagh te na lunga _ , _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe unga _ .
igleghte unga _ siku kun _ aghuliigh lunga _ meghnaali lunga _ .
meghnaali nghmeng _ taaqe yama _ aghulaqe laatagh unga _ .
igleghte unga _ .
aghuliigh unga _ ingani _ meteghllug m _ meghnaali vig ani _ .
weni _ iqlengiqe unga _ . _ â
mekelghiigh k _ nagate ma lghiik _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte lutek _ .
qama _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh aqe luni _ nepiigh aqe luni _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ taagken _ meghnaali lunga _ mayugh unga _ .
mayugh lunga _ tagi nga _ .
kaate yama _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh unga _ ! _ â
nepiigh ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ nukalpigagh at _ pi ma kangit _ , _ â _ enta _ qakmavek _ iiyagh mun _ esghagh yaghtuqagh tek _ . _ â
nukalpigagh at _ aane yalghiimeng _ avangite ut _ .
itegh luteng _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .
qayughllak _ mayugh naqe yata _ awatmun _ u l l g h i i t a m a a t _ .
uteghte luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu m _ saaghw anun _ .
ata at _ ellmi neng _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
esghagh yamiki _ itegh sqe ma kangi _ .
itegh ma lghiit _ .
quyake ma kangit _ .
ata ita _ pi ma kegket _ , _ â _ sa lusi mi _ ullegh stek _ ? _ â
akite ma kangat _ , _ â _ taanegken _ ima _ t a k a g h p a g l l e l g u f t u q _ .
Y u l l e g h p a g m u n _ taaggun _ taglagh ukut _ . _ â
ata ita _ akite ma kangit _ , _ â _ anighta qun _ t a k a g h n a l l g h a g u u s i _ ! _ â
uyuqligh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ anighta qun _ elpek _ iye ghllag u uten _ ! _ â
T a a m _ kenlanga neng _ awavagh ghllag nanigh ma lghiik _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
A y m a n g a a w e n
kiyaghte ma ut _ esnagh mii t _ taawanginaq _ quyilleg t _ maalghug _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ maalghug _ avaqutagh gket _ mekelghiigh k _ .
A l l g h a _ mekelghiigh m _ nuyekligh _ , _ aag llegh a _ uyuqligh _ .
taawanginaq _ ata an _ taana _ nuyekligh _ amyuutke aqe kanga _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ quyngighqwaagh luni _ quyngigh _ uzimun _ kilgaaqu ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ sukaghi ma lghii _ saama _ iknaqughi ma lghii _ .
atghagh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ naqam _ qavagh igate ngughk _ .
repall _ ata an _ q a v a g h t e s i g a l k a n g a _ saama _ n e g h e s i g a l k a n g a _ .
nutaan _ negh naqe yagh uq _ ighlegute a _ .
ighlegute yatni _ ingaghte luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
ata an _ qavagh lghii _ esghagh luku _ aki n _ iptag aghte ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh _ upugh te kete luku _ makete qaghte yalghiimi _ aki n _ a y e m l l u k u _ .
ata a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ una _ mekelghiigh _ qavngaq _ iknaqughi a _ ? _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ pilugugkagh meng _ ulima te gu _ taawanginaq _ pinigh pigte lghii meng _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ ulima te ma kanga _ .
ata an _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aga _ , _ naalkesaghtugh ghhu _ pinighqe aq _ A y m a n g a a w e n _ .
A y m a n g a a w e t e m _ sakimag anun _ sukate luten _ qavagh yagh a _ .
tawaten _ aghulaqe lghaaten _ ! _ â
apaate ma kanga _ tume kaghqagh meng _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ mekelghiigh _ ghhatagh ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ pilugug t _ seghlegh pestaagh t _ .
aate ma kangi _ mekelghiigh m _ taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ mengteghagh t _ .
U q e g h h m i _ nanevgagh _ qayugtugh aqe uq _ .
amenam _ mekelghiigh _ igleghte uq _ naaghte ghllag aqe luni _ .
N a n e v g a a m _ nenglagh qu ma kanga _ .
kaate yan _ aapte a _ , _ â _ S a a m _ yug ke aten _ ? _ â
akite ma kanga _ mekelghiigh m _ , _ â _ esnagh m _ y u k a n g a _ ! _ â
aapte laatagh aa _ n a n e v g a a m _ , _ â _ N a t u m _ esnagh m _ ? _ â
â _ M a a k u n m i _ n a a y v a a g h a a m _ esne i _ ategh kaqe ai _ tea- ma kut _ esnagh t _ .
maaten _ whangkuta _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ samani _ megh m _ esnagh mi _ .
nagaqugh ziin _ ? _ â
â _ nagaqugh unga _ . _ â
nanevgagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ I - i - i _ , _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ ! _ â
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A - a _ , _ itegh i _ negh yagh a _ ! _ â
â _ kangsugh lleqe unga _ , _ itegh naqe gkuma _ . _ â
â _ tawatete ghngaaghpek _ itegh i _ ! _ â

negh te ma lghiit _ .

unaami _ unaangu luku _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

ketligh _ aange lghii _ .

tamana _ yuug _ A y m a n g a a w e m _ ugi ke aqe a _ .
iwernga _ qavagh igate ngugh t _ ellnga ni _ .

â _ iitek llu _ kuuve i ste u luten _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ yugyag ghllaget _ .
qesiqun _ A y m a n g a a w e m _ ugi ke aqe ai _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh i _ qullug k _ kuuve yaghtugh kek _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ itegh luni _ taake uk _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ ugate mii ii aghte ma lghii _ pegnem _ ullegh aghte vzigh aqe luni _ .
maaten _ alla _ amllugh naqe yalghiimi _ kuuve ma kek _ taagavek _ u g a t a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ sanqute nun _ .
allameng _ i g l e q a g h l u n i _ inglu anun _ enraq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
amig mun _ amllugh luni _ a a n a q s a l g h i m i _ manughagh kun _ qamagte lukek _ kuuve ma kek _ .
A y m a n g a a w e n _ t a p g h a g h m e n g _ e s l e g a l g h i i m e n g _ tugu tete luni _ k a g s a g p a g a t a a m a k a n g a _ mekelghiigh _ .
mekelghiigh _ aqnigh nghite uq _ qayughllak _ atkug a _ umu pigte lghii _ .
I g h i v g a g h y a g u _ i t e g h a a t u t _ .
negh luteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ mekelghiigh _ nategh mi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu na luni _ a n q a g h t a a s i m a l g h i i _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ t u t q a g h t a q l u k u _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aki naqe ma kangi _ n a g h u g h h n a q e n g h a t a _ ighu mineng _ itegmig qagh nghminiki _ n a g h t e g h l l a g a q e l g h i i t _ .
yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu te ma lghii _ A y m a n g a a w e n l l u _ maligte te luni _ yuug _ taana llu _ mekelghiigh _ .
ghhatagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ sivuke luni _ p i y u g g a g h m e n g _ .
yug m _ t a m a t u m _ nenglagh qu magh an _ naghughte aqe kanga _ .
mekelghiigh _ uusneghwaagh mun _ talughte yami _ pilugug ni _ mat- aghte luki _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
tamana _ y u u k n a g h u g h q u u m a k a n g a _ .
taana _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghii _ .
tagimun _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh aq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aagyuq _ utaqa nga _ ! _ â

mekelghiigh m _ avelghagh luku _ kaate ma lghii _ .

llaaghanwha _ tugu ma kanga _ .
yuug _ tamana _ aglagh uute ma lghii _ ellmeng _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ mekelghiigh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata an _ a g h n a g h a a m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ siingenllu _ aghnagh _ afta kayugu uq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mengteghagh meng _ aveg te luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh m _ nuna anun _ .
kaate luteng _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ mengteghagh an _ k e l u t a n g a n u n _ mengteghagh u ma lghiit _ .

aane luni _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ mengteghagh t _ , _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh t _ .
aghnagh _ quyngigh neng _ alinge luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .

kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .

ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ negh sqe gu _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nuug luni _ negh sqesagh aa _ .

makete luni _ a a t g h a a m a l g h i i _ .

ata an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ whanga _ tuqu yagh langa _ ! _ â
ata a _ aane luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .

itegh luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q a m a y _ , _ meghsi aghte ngnga _ . _ â

yug m _ pateg ma kanga _ meghute _ .
