qavagh luni _ unaami _ yug m _ m e k e g h i i g h h a q _ kevgaagh qu ma kanga _ mekelghiigh meng _ a n k u n a m e n g _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ mughute lgute u luku _ .
mekelghiigh _ angegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ata ni _ mughute lghii _ maligte ma kanga _ .
unaangu ma lghiit _ .
ata an _ aghillug ni _ inglupigagh _ megh mun _ egte ma kanga _ aksaqe luni _ .
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ uuk _ aghillug ka _ megh mun _ a t q a g h t u q _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ enan _ alla neng _ aghillug igh ghhaaten _ ! _ â
wanlegi _ ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayughllak _ nuliigh ma _ ukini kaqe a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh _ qukagh mikun _ qaamqaghte luni _ ugmestaaghhagh mun _ siku mun _ ategh uq _ a q f a g h i i q _ aghillug meng _ .
whaa _ aga _ ategh yan _ tapghagh a _ nengpagte yagh kete ni _ megh mun _ a t q a g h t e s l u k u _ ata an _ sayug luku _ siku meng _ maligte ma kanga _ .
maligte luku _ kaape ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
( _ 1 _ ) _ ruuseghmii t _ mumigte llegh ani _ q e m g a g h m e n g u u n i i t _ ;
U u z a g e m _ p i l l g h a n i _ atg- ke te nagh u na ai _ , _ atg- qu uute yu i aaghek nguq _ q a l i i r a a g h e s t u n _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
kaa lli mi _ itegh ma lghii _ .
A y m a n g a a w e n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ugi n _ tuquma uq _ qayughllak _ ighleke ghngaamni _ aghillug ka _ a q f a a m a a _ .
W a s i i n m i _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ q a a m l l u k i _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ masisu _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
yuug _ qulligeg ii ma lghii _ .
qulligeg iigh luni _ uka _ ellnga nun _ tagi ma lghii _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ ugi n _ elpek _ tuquma uq _ , _ qayughllak _ i g l e k e g h n g a a m n i _ naa minun _ aghillug _ ulima aqe ni luku _ .
aqfa naqe yagh kete ni _ kaleve uq _ .
W a s i i n m i _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ q a a m l l u k i _ i l a g a a g h n a q u m a l u k u _ yug m _ t a a m _ akughtugh magh an _ qinunaghqe magh mi _ taku ma kanga _ ellnga _ .
aghnagh aq _ i l a g a a g h y a l g h i i m i _ yuug _ taana _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qayughllak _ aghnagh aq _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ ilagagh kau luni _ .
aghnagh aq _ taana _ a t g h a g h a t a a m a l g h i i 2 _ .
atghaghatagh luni _ ugi mi _ t u m a n g a _ tuumte ma kanga _ .
ategh ma lghii _ siku gnun _ .
ategh yalghiimi _ esghagh aa _ ugi ni _ savig ligh luni _ angvanegh mikun _ .
legan _ savig a _ amu luku _ u i l u u m a k a n g a _ .

mekelghiigh _ piyug meng _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ atghaghatagh luni _ .
aghnagh aq _ inglegh kun _ aane ma lghii _ .
A a n y a l g h i m i _ yuug _ esghagh aa _ .
A k u g t e g h a t a l g h i i _ e l q e m s i g h a g h m e n g _ . _ ( _ ? _ ) _ tawani _ p a l a g h h a g h m e n g _ k i y a g h t a a l l u t e n g _ mekelghiigh _ nategh mun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
qiighw ma lghii _ .
ata an _ q i i l g h w i i _ nagaqugh luku _ qulligeg ni _ aate ma yagh kek _ .
aate ma kanga _ inglupigagh _ temkagh m _ ighu a _ inglu anun _ aate ma kanga _ i l e p g h a a g h e m _ ighu a _ .
repall _ ata a _ a a g h h w e r e g a g h m e n g _ aane ma lghii _ , _ llangaqa _ pi nga yu neng _ ighu ke lghii _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aane ste nagh u na i ma kanga _ unegte sqellug qu _ .
ata a _ aane ma lghii _ .
A y m a n g a a w e n k u k _ ugi ke te lghiik _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ ne meggnun _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ n i m a a q _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ .
whaa _ salin _ taana _ kiyaghte uq _ nuna _ .
tawani _ nunugh a mi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ yuug _ avaqutaghtuqagh _ .
taawanginaq _ avaquti a _ yug m _ qayaghtugh u luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ qamagte luteng _ .
taagken _ uksugh mi _ ila i _ y u g e m n u l i g h h a _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ighni ma lghii _ .
P i y a q e s e n g _ taana _ taghnughhagh _ mekelghiigh u uq _ .
atigh ma kangat _ Q a y a q s i g h v i g m e n g _ .
taagken _ angli te aatnga _ maligte luku _ quunpeng _ angalqataasigh meng _ petug luku _ .
kiyaghute ma kanga _ i n q u n a m e n _ a n g l e g u t a n g i t u n _ tuqunagh yu kan _ .
qenwat _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aapute ma lghii _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ saama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayagh ite uten _ avangite uten _ . _ â
taagken _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ angegh ma lghii _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ esnagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esnagh mi _ naalke ma kanga _ qaya m _ sivuyag a _ .
Q a k a q s i g h v i g e m _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
kaate luni _ ata ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ S a n g a w a _ taana _ ? _ â
ata an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ qaya m _ sivuyag ke a _ . _ â
taagken _ Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ ata ni _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaya meng _ ulima te nga _ whanga _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan _ ulima tete naanghite amken _ . _ â
Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ ulima te nga _ whanga _ qaya meng _ ! _ â
taagken _ ata an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
ata a _ llaaghanwha _ ulima te ma lghii _ .
qayagh _ ata an _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taaqe luku _ sivuyag akun _ ama _ angyaleg akun _ ukite ma kanga _ qayugh a _ .
unaami _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ a a n g h u m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ ata an _ angalqataasigh _ s a a g s i m a k a n g a _ .
saagllug qu _ qaya m _ sivuyag akun _ qepute ma kanga _ iqukrug a _ angalqataasigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ kete ma lghii _ .
ata an _ tapghagh _ a a g h h e s i m a k a n g a _ .
qenwat _ naayghagh mun _ talughsi ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ata an _ amu ma kanga _ wetku _ aaghte yan _ .
tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag yalghiimi _ unaagh nge ughtagh ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
taagken _ taglaate ma kangit _ mengteghagh meggnun _ neghsagh t _ .
unaami _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ alla _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k k e s i m a l g h i i _ .
alla _ ata an _ aaghhe ste laatagh ma kanga _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ temngi _ taagavek _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ talugh qaghte ma lghii _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ esghagh ma kanga _ puugzagh _ qavagh lghii _ megh m _ qaye ani _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ uyavagh qu te _ puug ma lghii _ .
puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ uyavagh qu te _ puug ma lghii _ .
puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ puug laatagh uq _ .
taku kestagh ghngaaghmigu _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ u y a v a n n a q n i l u k u _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh ma luku _ sukilpagh _ savinagh akun _ qaya m _ nalug uq _ .
nalug luni _ q a a n g h a n u n _ i t q a g h t e s i m a k e k _ sugrug gni _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k g g i i s t u s i m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ taglagh ragkiigh ma lghii _ .
I g h l e g h u t k e l l u k u _ aglu kek _ meghnugh ma lghiik _ .
meghnugh yayek _ n a a l l g h u n n a q s a g h a a k _ sukilpagh _ wata _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ g g i i s t u l l a a t a a m a k a n g a _ i n q u n a m e n _ itegh na yu kan _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aglu kek _ meghnugh ma lghiik _ .
naallghute na lukek _ aglu gni _ n a a l l g h u n n a q s a g h a a k _ sukilpagh _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ , _ taawanginaq _ p a p a s q w a _ aliite luni _ unegte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag yan _ ata an _ taana _ sukilpagh _ nusug ma kanga _ .
qavaa ma lghiit _ unug yagu _ .
unaami _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ , _ â _ nunivag mun _ pi yaag qagh langa _ ? _ â
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .

llaaghanwha _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ meghnaali yuguma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ pennagh m _ asi akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqumga ma luku _ kaate ma lghii _ yuug _ savikenghaagh meng _ pilugug ke lghii _ .
Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ naqam _ naatghigh lleg leg _ .
yug m _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii m _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ itegagh ni _ qanegh _ Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ agitaghpagtagh ai _ .

yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ pi gpenanga _ pilugug nka _ ukut _ pi lleqe aten _ ! _ â

taagken _ yug m _ pilugug ni _ tuune ma kangi _ .

uugte yalghiimi _ saama _ pennagh m _ asi ani _ esghagh ma kanga _ negaghpag _ .

ukig ma luku _ pika _ pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yuug _ esghagh ma kanga _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii _ taawanginaq _ aange pigte lghii _ .

aghtugh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ aghneghte ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aa _ Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .

nanevgagh ghhagh m _ n a a p t i g h l u k u _ taglaate ma kanga _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k n e g h s a q _ .
ellmi ni _ maani _ yupig _ taawanginaq _ tuqu sighwaagh lghii _ .
taglaate kete luku _ itegagh ni _ Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ uqfig kun _ e l t u g h t e s a q e n n i _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ sivutmute _ iqu ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .

taglaate ma kanga _ alla _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ .

nanevgagh ghhagh _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
I t e g h y a n n u l i g h h a n _ quyake ma kanga _ .

itghute luku _ ughugsigh ma kanga _ .

llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .

anag nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi _ anagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ anagh mni _ whani _ kelengake nakesi _ neghsagh _ taana _ . _ â

nanevgagh ghhagh _ ingaghte luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .

Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ i n g a g h a g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
mulu luni _ nutaan _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ payugte yagh uq _ anagh _ a r a g h y a l g h i m i _ llangaqa _ sa kun _ ukimallegh kun _ qineghte luni _ alla _ Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ ghhukaghagh meng _ kuuve yagh kete ni _ talugh qaghte ma lghii _ .

aane luni _ temngi _ tespagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ , _ k i i i i i i _ mengteghagh lghute ghllag t _ .

taagken _ aglagh te ma kangat _ .
kaat ute te luku _ itghute ma kangat _ .
aghnagh m _ afta ma kanga _ .
afta luku _ gaagh ma kangat _ .
unug yan _ negh te ma lghiit _ .

aghnagh m _ llilagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k n e g h i _ . _ â

maalghug _ ighu k _ ugugnaghagh m _ ighu kek _ negh ma kek _ .

unug ma kanga _ qavagh luteng _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ Q a y a q s i g h v i g e m _ n a g a q u m a k a n g i _ esla mi _ aragh te lghiit _ , _ â _ tungtuvag _ e s g h a g h a g h p u t _ ! _ â
taagken _ aanleghaate luteng _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ naayghagh nun _ .
ama _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k l u _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ yug t _ iighagh uute lghiit _ .
legan _ makete kestagh nghaani _ alinge aqe lghiit _ .

aragh te ma lghii _ yuug _ tamana _ , _ â _ tungtuvag _ tuqute a _ n e n g a a w a a m _ tuute qaghte luku _ !

ama _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k l u _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ ighnegh nge kau lghii _ .

esghagh ma kanga _ nanevgagh _ .

â _ I m a n g u u u u q _ , _ ayumigh _ anengagh ka _ Q a y a q s i g h v i k _ y u q a q a a f t u q _ .
whanga _ whaa _ atigh mafte aatnga _ taameng _ ategh meng _ .
saama _ ata put _ naa put _ neghigh pigte luteng _ tuqu kau ut _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
qayuutagh m _ kayusigh iqe a _ aghnagh
I i n m a n g u q _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nula i kek _ avaqutaghtuqagh _ .
uksugh nghagu _ yuug _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ kiig yagu _ qayaghtugh nghmini _ aghtugh ma lghii _ unange nghmeng _ ama _ ila aneng _ aghnegh neng _ palaghhagh u luku _ unange aqe lghii _ .
uksugh yagu _ amalleqa _ unange nghmeng _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
H a n g a n i _ negh kangit _ palaghhagh ughte yata _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ pirughte yaghtugh naqe unga _ amavek _ q a n t a g h a n l e n g u g h n u n _ quyilleg nun _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ qamiye gneng _ qamugh luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ , _ N e g h e s i m a a n _ alla _ gaagh te magh an _ quyngigh meng _ .

unug aqe a _ iiwenllu _ s a m a k a v l e g u s i m a l g h i i _ .

nuug ma lghii _ .

aghnagh m _ upugha te ma kanga _ negh sqellug qu _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ I g l e g h t a a g u n g a _ negh na lunga _ t a a k u n e n g _ avaqutagh gpeneng _ aghuliigh unga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U t a q i i g i _ , _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh _ a t q a g h l l u n i _ uughqa nun _ s i n u m u n _ ivagh i luni _ t i g u y n g a 1 _ tugu luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ anigu _ q a a n g h a n i t e g h n g a a n _ nusug ragh aqe zigu _ ? _ â
itegh ma lghii _ .
saama _ tughneghagh _ t u n g s i g h w a a g h a q u q _ avaquti a _ negh na luki _ .
tiguynge _ aanqute yalghiimi _ ilagaate meng _ imani _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghii _ tughneghagh _ .
tamaani _ ilagagh ma lghii _ i w e m g a q u n _ ilagaate i _ qamagte ma kangi _ .
qamagte yamiki _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ t u n g s i g h w a a g h u m a l g h i i _ .
A g h n a m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ U t a q i i g i _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
A t q a g h l l u n i _ aywaa nun _ s i n u m u n _ ivgagh i luni _ tugu luki _ neqe mun _ igu qugh sigh _ quyngigh m _ k e l p a n g a _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
aleghqugh magh an _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ u g u q n a m _ i l u n g a n i l n g u u t _ nusug ragh aqe ziki _ ? _ â
mulu luni _ taama _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ nunaki luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ unaghsigh _ anegh igh uute ma kanga _ .
A n i g h q w a a m a l g h i i _ iiwenllu _ nepiigh aqe uq _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ t u n g s i g h w a a g h a q e l g h i i _ t a g h n u g h h a m e n g n e g h n a l u n i _ .
nuug luni _ anighqute ni _ tugu luku _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
anighqute ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ anighqute mi _ whani _ sumeghnegh gpegun _ sa luki mi _ sa u aat _ gaagh aqe ziki _ k u k i l a m a g h n g a t a _ . _ â
anighqute _ ilagagh yalghiimi _ imani _ wata _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .
talwa _ tughneghagh _ qavaa ma lghii _ umu luku _ .
aghnagh _ a t q a g h l l u n i _ vegaagh t _ uygu qu tete luki _ tughneghagh _ amig mun _ qepute ma kanga _ .
anighqute _ naange yalghiimi _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ qaprag naqe yalghiimi _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iteme te nga _ !
pi naanghite amken _ ! _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iteme te naanghite amken _ .
ugi ka _ utaqa naqe aqa _ t u q u t e s q e l l u t e n _ . _ â
whaken _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ â
â _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ â
tughneghagh m _ kelgute ma kanga _ qayuutagh ni _ saama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ aghtugh sigh ke nghite na yaqen _ sa u a _ neghyuke gkan _ tugu na yaqen _ . _ â
â _ enta _ esghapag laken _ .
piigh ten _ . _ â
T u g h n e g h a a m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ taawanginaq _ quunpeng _ aaghte luku _ k i y a g h t a a g h u t a q i g u _ saama _ whaten _ pi yaghqaa uten _ . _ â
legan _ mat- ketu te kete luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ quyngigh yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ , _ lli yagh kete ni _ quyngigh _ .
â _ tawa _ tawaten _ pi aqe i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ iteme te ma kanga _ .
aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ A g u m _ waamte aanga _ ! _ â
qayuutagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ tughneghagh _ aagna _ esghagh yug aqa _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ u t e g h t e s i m a k a n g a _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga mnun _ pi u luku _ tuune mangite aqa _ ! _ â
aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ megh mun _ nengug te luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ neghsagh yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
ukigsagh kete ni _ neghsagh meng _ .
allameng _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ maklag yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
U g i g s a q e n n i _ , _ maklag meng _ .
afta luku _ s i n u m u n _ lli ma kanga _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ yuggagh _ quyngigh meng _ qamiye gni _ u s i l u k e k _ tagi ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ kayusigh qagh nga _ ! _ â
aghnagh _ aatqaghte luni _ kayusi ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ aghnagh _ s i n u m u n _ ivgagh luni _ s i q l u g i g h u m a l g h i i _ k u y a g a g h m e n g _ .
yuggagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ naqam _ sa meng _ siqlug igh aqe ziin _ , _ avangite aqe luta _ . _ â
â _ K a k a k a k a k a _ , _ n e p i i g h e l t e n _ ! _ â
yuggagh _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ u y u q l i g h p i g a a m _ i g h e g h a n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ sama _ q a y u u t a g h a l g u u q _ . _ â
yuug _ legan _ u q e n g a g h y u g s i m a l g h i i _ yuuke ma lghii _ quya ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ itegh yami _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ manguna yug qu a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ qayuutagh ni _ nengug te luku _ megh m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ manguna yug unga _ ! _ â
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
ukigsagh kete ni _ manguna lgu uq _ .
ugi an _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ A g h v e g h y u g i g a t e p i g s i n _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ megh mun _ qayuutagh ni _ nengug te luku _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ mangtag yug unga _ ! _ â
katag te ma kangi _ mangtag ghllag _ .
taagken _ tawani _ pinitun _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
Y u g h q u t a a m _ ighnegh a _ kiighwyagh ughtekagh
kiyaghte ma a _ nalighmeng _ kiyaghte ma ita _ , _ maalghug _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ yug k _ avaqutagh ite ngugh k _ .
ilangani _ yuug _ k i w a t m e g g n u n _ pi ma luku _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh _ ighni naqe lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh meng _ qesiqun _ tuute ma kanga _ yughqutagh _ pi na aqa _ .
taana _ taghnughhagh _ angli ma lghii _ atghagh te yagh kete ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ S a a m _ una _ pi kagu _ ? _ â
â _ una mi _ y u g h q u t a a m _ i g h n i i g h a _ . _ â
K i y a g h n e g h e m p i m a k a n g a _ taghnughhagh _ , _ â _ aa _ ingavek _ aglagh a _ kiighwyagh nun _ . _ â
taghnughhagh _ aglagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh ughte ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ . _ tefaay _ .
kiighwyagh
iimnanguq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ salin _ .
mughunniigh aqe lghii _ n a q a m u n a n g a q e l g h i i _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ mughute luni _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ unug ma kanga _ .
qule mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh neng _ mengteghagh ite nigh m _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ key- nghhagh _ .
legan _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ i t e g h y a l g h n m i _ nulighh a _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
negh te luteng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ yuug _ mughute ma lghii _ .
unange luni _ neghsagh meng _ tagi yalghiimi _ nulighh a _ ighni i ma lghii _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
ugi an _ aghnagh m _ atigh ma kanga _ , _ kiighwyagh meng _ .
qavagh ghhagh inagh kun _ angli ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ aqsa nge laatagh ma lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ aghnaghagh meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ alla _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge nanigh ma lghii _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
tawani _ nunugh a mi _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ ama _ mekelghiigh llu _ taana _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata at _ mughute luni _ iike te ma kanga _ .
ima _ tuquma lghii _ .
N a a n g a t u g i m i n e n g n a g a q u u l l u n i _ tuqute ma lghii _ ellmi neng _ .
mekelghiigh m _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ata nka _ naa nka _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe uten _ entaqun _ temngi _ nuna mete ni luki _ .
whaa _ u u m _ kenle aneng _ aqnigh gpenani _ tuqukagh _ kaape luni _ kanagh luni _ meghqe te luni _ taana _ kiighwyagh mun _ mayugh aqe uq _ .
aga _ ata put _ naa put _ may- ma ut _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ unug yagu _ aane luni _ tapghagh _ qule mun _ miluute yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh kun _ a g a a m a l g h i i _ .
taaggun _ tapghagh qun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ a g h q u t a a l l g h i i n u n 1 _ ilate ma lghii _ repall _ t e g h i g n i q e m _ puygu luku _ nayag ni _ .
qesiqun _ uksugh qugh aqe uq _ .
tea- ma kut _ kiighwyagh t _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ u m i i l g u g h t e s i m a k a n g a t _ .
qesiqun _ aane yan _ mengteghagh mineng _ salin _ nuna mete luku _ yug t _ ila ita _ qemite ma ut _ .
llaaghanwha _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
ama _ yuug _ kaapekagh _ , _ qemitekagh _ , _ suflugagh ke aq _ sangami _ tuqu rakegte aqa _ ?
Q a y u g h l l a g Ê¼ q u n _ kiighwyagh ni _ aghqe taute lghii ni _ t e g h i g n i q e m _ puygu aqe lghiit _ yug t _ unguva lleghqagh teng _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
neghsagh m _ vuvalla a
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ saama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .
naqam _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ taana _ yuug _ unaaqute nghagu _ unange gpenani _ .
talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ a k u r a a s i g a l n g u q _ .
ila i _ unange uute aqe lghiit _ .
ila ngam _ yuug _ taana _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute luni _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate luku _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
T a w a n s i m a l u k u _ neghsagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug luni _ y u u k p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ R a m k e l a s a p _ ! _ â _ legan _ taaqe luni _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
Y u u k t a a n a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aagna _ pi a _ ? _ â
taagken _ yug m _ k e n g a g n i _ tenglug lukek _ k a k e g h q u g h y a m i _ itegagh mi _ asi i _ kanuughqe ma kangi _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ nuliigh ni _ w a a m n n a l u k u _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yami _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unange ma yagh unga _ ima _ sefkagh te ma uq _ . _ â
L l a a g h n a w h a _ nulighh an _ ugpeqe ma kanga _ ugi ni _ .
taagken _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ u n a n g u p i g l l u k u _ taghtugh luni _ negh luni _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute yalghiimi _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate yamigu _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ neghsagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
yug m _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ ighivgaghniimna u uq _ .
neghsagh m _ t a a m _ p i l a t a a m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ R a m k e l a s a p _ ! _ â
aga _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yuug _ nekeve luni _ maligte te ma lghii _ neghsagh mun _ .
megh mun _ ategh yalghiimi _ t e g h h a n u n _ pesugh yug qagh nghite uq _ .
masisu _ esghagh ma kanga _ aga _ yuggagh _ talligh leg llu _ ighu leg llu _ takestaaghhagh meng _ naqam _ yugusigh a _ aange pigte lghii _ .
qesiqun _ neghsagh u uq _ .
yug m _ taana _ yuggagh _ m a l i g s i m a k a n g a n e n g l u m u n _ .
itegh yan _ iteghvig anun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kanga _ yug m _ t a a m _ neghsagh t _ v u v a l l a l g h i i t _ .
tesqamaken _ neghsagh t _ nanevgagh ita _ yuug _ taana _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh i _ esghapag yagh a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ esghapag ma kangi _ .
N a n e v g a a m _ neghsagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ !
ilagagh naqe unga _ . _ â
nulighh an _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ tuune ma kek _ ugi minun _ .
ugi an _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q u l i g h h a m t a a n g u q _ p a a a a - a a m k u t _ , _ q u l i g h h a a m t a a n g u q _ p a a a a - a a m u t _ , _ I y n g i g h h a p u t _ mesiighpag llaagllug qu ai _ neqniqe aqe ait _ ! _ â
qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q a g i s a v i s a v i s a v i i _ , _ q a g i s a v i s a v i s a v i i _ ! _ â
taagken _ nanevgagh at _ neghsagh t _ aghnaghagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh t _ p u t u g h u t e k _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ neghsagh _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ â _ I q u y e l q u t a a _ i y a a a a _ , _ qaghpa lug ke a _ iyaa- a _ , _ m a n u q e l l e g h a a q a a _ iyaa- a _ ! _ â
tawa _ vuvalla _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
N a n e v g a a m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ una _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune gu _ . _ â
nulighh an _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
N a n e v g a a m _ neghsagh m _ yuug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qaa _ u g g n a q e g k u v e k _ quunqagh magh gpek _ qesigh u qagh magh gpek _ uugte lghaaten _ .
ima _ naten _ pi naagh ut _ elqwaagh t _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aane luni _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
U g g n a q s a m i _ quunqagh magh mi _ uugte ma lghii _ saama _ elqwaagh t _ lli ma kangi _ .
esghagh ma kangi _ neghsagh lghute t _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate luku _ angaghqugh ma kangit _ qamagte luki _ .
taawa _ t a a m _ kenle aneng _ yuug _ taana _ u n a n g y u g h i g h l l a g u m a l g h i i _ .
qamagte uq _ .
meteghllug _ nulighhtuqagh _ ayuqligh t _ aghnagh itneng
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma ut _ tallimat _ mengteghagh t _ .
taakut _ mengteghagh t _ yug i _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ .
naqam _ k e l u l i g h n e g h h i t n i _ kiyaghte lghiik _ meteghllug nkuk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ .
ilangani _ n u y e k l i i m p a n i g a _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .
M e t e g h l l u g e m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ M e q p a k p a y a y _ , _ m e q p a k p a y a y _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
meteghllug _ megh naqe yalghiimi _ megh _ nuna mun _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
A g h n a g h a a m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ â _ saa _ una _ megh _ i m i g h u t a a _ p i q p i g u t a a _ . _ â
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ P i y a q t a q p e n g u y o y _ , _ p i y a q t e l q e n _ taana _ m i q i i t i g u u _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ M i q i n i n g i l a k _ , _ t a s k w i g u _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ ama _ meteghllug _ ellmeggnun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ kaate luni _ nengyugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfaqugh ghhu _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aane luni _ mengteghagh nun _ s i v u l i g h p i g a g h n u n _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ â
yug m _ l l i l a s i m a k a n g a _ n g e p e g h a k u n _ savig meng _ pilag sqellug qu _ .
pilag ma kangat _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
unaami _ uyuqligh m _ yug m _ panig a _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ kaate ma lghii _ m e g h e g h l l u k _ i g h i v g a g h t a q _ .
meteghllug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ M e q p a k p a y a y _ , _ m e q p a k p a y a y _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .

kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nengyugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfa qu gu _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
T u n g l i g h h i i t g u n _ m a n t e g h a n u n _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ sangavek _ tagi ziin _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ â
akite ma kangat _ , _ â _ U q u k l u k u u g h a q u q _ , _ a n a q l u k a g u q _ m e k e s i t a g h a g u q _ . _ â
saama _ savig meng _ n e p e g h h a k e k _ pilag ma gkek _ , _ saama _ ketngig kek _ pilag ma kegket _ .
qiya magh mi _ aghnalqwaagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ q e n g a k e k p u u v u m a k e k _ .
unaami _ enraq _ pi nga yiite a _ mengteghagh at _ aghnaghagh t _ meghtagh a _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .

taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .

ighsa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ pingayut ii te nun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uyatu luni _ amig meng _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ â

llaaghanwha _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ amig meng _ uyatu pigte luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ â
talwa _ akuzi magh mi _ qimag ma lghii _ .
iwernga _ aghnaghagh m _ ata an _ panig ni _ angegh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yalghiimi _ kagpestaaghhagh u ut _ .
taagken _ aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ .
A g h a g h a q _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnagh aq _ qiya lghii _ esghagh luku _ atugh magh mi _ aghula yalghiimi _ mengteghagh ni _ angli te ma kanga _ saama _ iqa nge i tesi ma kanga _ .
taana _ eltugh aa _ yupig ughte ma lghii _ ama _ taana llu _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
aghnagh aq _ unaami _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ imani _ enngaatall _ pinigh pigte ut _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ awaligh ta ii sqe ma kanga _ quyngigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh aq _ awalightugh ma lghii _ .
T u u n e g h m i n i k i _ aghnaghagh t _ ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ â _ ipa _ whanga _ p i k s a g h a q a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ saama _ yupig ughte ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ , _ tefaay _ .
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte aagh _ quurkeli _ meteghllug
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ tannge t _ umiileg at _ quyngightu pigte lghii _ .
quyngigh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ .
naqam _ taana _ umiileg _ ighnegh leg _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ umiileg m _ quyngigh a _ aveg luni _ i i l a a m a l g h i i _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ qevuute pigte luni _ .
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ quurkeli _ ighnegh leg _ maalghug gneng _ , _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ aghnaasigh _ , _ uyughagh a _ itagnagh lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aane yalghiimi _ nuyekligh _ esghaate ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ uglagh pigte lghii meng _ .
itegh luni _ ata ni _ quurkeli _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ S a a m _ q a k e m n a _ quyngigh ke agu _ ? _ â
â _ enta _ amig mun _ aliighte aghte gu _ . _ â
ata ni _ pi yatni _ n u y e k l i i m _ i g h e g h a n _ ivgagh te ma kanga _ .

ungipaate kangaten _ ukig ggaaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ uyuqligh _ mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
qaygeghte yamigu _ tamana _ m e n g t e g h a a m _ k i w a t a n g i t n i _ negh niigh ma lghii _ .

aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ meteghllug _ .

â _ aqfa gu _ tagi li nguq _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ aqfa ma kanga _ .

meteghllug m _ qule mun _ esghaqagh luku _ uugte luni _ negh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ aglagh ma lghii _ .

kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ T e n g a g e r g e m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa u a mi _ pi aqe zigu _ ? _ â
â _ S a a m _ saamna _ quyngigh ke agu _ . _ â
T e n g a g e r g e m _ nanigh _ awite luku _ esghagh yalghiimi _ meteghllug _ asitmun _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh t _ ama _ tannge t _ .

uyughagh ke te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuqutagh igh ma lghiik _ .

itghute luki _ negh ma kangat _ .

umiileg _ mayugh ma lghii _ tume iigh aqe luni _ .
uugte luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .

alla _ aapte laatagh ma kangi _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ , _ esghaate aghte aqe i te n _ quyngigh meng _ ? _ â
â _ waniwanllu _ ! _ â
tannge t _ aga _ qiive luteng _ ukig yalghiimeng _ aga _ quyngigh eng _ ukig sigh u ma kangat _ q a m a g a g h l l u k u _ .

qukaghte yamigu _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ .

veghte nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ taana _ naayghagh _ naagh llegh u tesi ma kanga _ nekegneghagh tun _ .

afsengagh ghhagh
iimnanguq _ , _ afsengagh ghhagh _ meqsaghtugh ma lghii _ naayvagh m _ qukaa nun _ .
megh ma lghii _ anglaagh ghhagh _ ukite luku _ .
megh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ anglaagh m _ saaghw ani _ .
meghnaali ma lghii _ tawani _ .
meghnaali ma luku _ papeg a _ k u m l a t u s i m a k a n g a _ .
ilagagh ma lghii _ i n q u n a m e n _ papeg ni _ g h h a t a g h t e s q e l l u k u _ , _ â _ K a n a k i i i _ , _ k a n a k i i i _ , _ k a n a k i i i _ , _ k a n a k i i i _ , _ u k i g e m _ talate anga _ !

uuynite uten _ ! _ â

mayeraaghpag
aghnaghaghhagh t _ tallimat _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luki _ r a t a m i i r e g n u n _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
unaghsigh ghllag mun _ petug ma kangi _ .
taaqe luki _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ â _ U n a q e k a a _ ! _ â
unaghsigh _ t a k l a a g h a g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
unite luku _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ aga _ kaynge ghllag _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ kaynge ghllag _ aagyuq _ l l a g h a n _ y u g g a y e n g a a l g h i i t e n _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ â
â _ N e g h n i i m s u g u m a l u t a _ yug gpesi _ unake naqe aqe ainkut _ . _ â
â _ sa qrugte aqe uq _ aagna _ ! _ â
aga nguq _ m e t e g h l l u r u k _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ M e t e g h l l u r u k _ aagyuq _ l l a g h a n y u g g a y e n g a a l g h i i t e n _ , _ iteme teqaghti kut _ . _ â
â _ iteme teqaghte naanghite amsi _ .
aantagh ni _ n e g h n i i m s u n e m t a _ m i l u g h p a g a a t a g h a q a g h p e s i k u t _ . _ â
aga _ kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
â _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aagyuq _ llaaghan _ y u g g a y e n g a a l g h i i t e n _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ â
â _ iteme teqaghte na aqe amsi _ . _ â
taku luki _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ â _ naten _ pi aqe isi _ ? _ â

unaghsigh igh ghllag _ a g u g h a g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
iteme te ma kangi _ .
aanleghaate ma lghiit _ .

pagunghagh t _ i f a q u u s i m a l g h i i t _ .
â _ I y e r u u g e t _ , _ i y e r u u g e t _ ! _ â

â _ A p a y _ , _ aane aghte langa _ . _ â

aane luni _ t a w a n s i m a l u k u _ yuggagh k _ tapghagh mi _ esghagh ma kek _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Y u g g a g k a _ a l i i g h h a g h t u k _ a a a a _ tapghagh meng _ a a a a _ aligh kaghte uq _ a a a a _ aag llegh a _ pana leg _ aag llegh a _ p i t e g s i t a l e k _ ! _ â
â _ P a n i k e l l e m a a y _ sa meng _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ â

mayeraaghpag m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ P a n i k e l l e m a a y _ , _ p a n i k e l l e m a a y _ . _ â
qalleg kau mangite uq _ .
aane yalghiimi _ aga _ uyavagh utu te ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ .
taagken _ malighqagh ma kangi _ .
â _ I i t e g Ê¼ q u n _ kaate kumsi _ neghe lleqe kemsi _ ! _ â
qimag inagh ma luki _ kaate yaghtu ma kangi _ .
â _ aghnaghaghhagh u aagh mi _ siingenllu _ t u g h n e g h a a g h t e k a l g h i i t e n _ sa naqe i _ ! _ â
uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ napaghte yagh kete ni _ naayghagh ghllag _ taaqe a _ aghvigh vig ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ .
pegnem _ mayeraaghpag m _ mayugh luku _ malighqagh takagh nge i _ k a a s a g h t u g h y a t e n g _ , _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh _ siingenllu _ tughneghagh ughtekau uten _ , _ sa naqe i _ ! _ â
iqelqugh ghhagh ni _ t a w e k e n g a _ qiipe ma lghii _ suupe magh an _ nuna _ teregh yagh kete ni _ kiiw ghllag k _ taaqe ma kek _ .
â _ P a n i k e l l e m a a y _ naten _ a g h v i g h l a g n g e k _ ? _ â
â _ megh lukek _ ! _ â
megh yagh ke gni _ megh yagh ke gni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iitek _ tawa _ n a a n g s a g h t u g h a g k e n _ ! _ â
qamagte lukek _ nekeve ma lghii _ aqsa ghllag ni _ qamugh ke luku _ e s l e q e m _ a n g t a l a n g a n e n g _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ , _ â _ A p a y _ sangan _ pikavek _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye anun _ p u t u g h y a n g h i s i n _ ? _ â
mayeraaghpag _ mayugh luni _ nutaan _ talligh gni _ qule mun _ n e n g u g u s a g h a a k _ aqsa a _ quupeaghaghte ma uq _ .
quupeaghaghte yalghiimi _ qayungllaasigh _ , _ q a y u s i q _ , _ signegh u aq _ , _ qaltagh _ legan _ allaghhiinaq _ sanqutraagh _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tallimat _ ngelqagh t
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ yug nkuk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
taghnughhagh ite ngugh k _ ava ite ngugh k _ .
ugi a _ quyngigh ni _ esghapag yaghtugh aqe kanga _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ piyaa ma lghii _ quyngigh minun _ .
tallimat _ ngelqagh t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
taku yagh kete ni _ tenge nghite ut _ .
kaate luki _ tugu luki _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nulighh a _ quya ma lghii _ .
itghute ma kangi _ .
ugi a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yalghiimi _ s a g h n a a m a l g h i i _ .
llaaghanwha _ negh te ma lghiit _ ngelqagh t _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ unite luki _ ngelqagh teng _ aane ma lghiik _ .
nulighh a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ mengteghagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ atugh ghllag meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ .
â _ P a g e l l e g r a a y _ , _ p a g e l l e g r a a y _ , _ s i n g t s e r a a y _ , _ n i q u r a a n g a a n g a a a a _ aange a _ iyaa- na nga a _ . _ â
I i t q e s t a g h l u n i _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh t _ estamat _ atugh aqe ut _ ataasigh _ aghula aqe uq _ amiiragh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ .
I t q a g h l l u n i _ amiiragh itgun _ aqume qaghte ma lghii _ .
P n g i g h s i i m a k a n g i _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ taaqe ma lghii _ quyngigh mun _ pi nghmeng _ .
taakut _ mekelghiigh t _ ellngit a _ taghnughhagh ke ma kangit _ .
yuggagh _ U n a n g y i i l n g u q _ enkaam _ nanugh
iimnanguq _ yuggagh _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nunaagh mi _ enngaatall _ unange yiite pigte lghii _ .
ila i _ mughu ta lgu ta i _ unange aqe lghiit _ ellnga _ mughute luni _ taglagh nghmini _ ava ngunani _ .
nulighh a _ qagani _ nunalgute meggnun _ tungsigh niigh aqe lghii _ .
nuna lgu ta ita _ unange kaqe kangat _ neghsagh _ , _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ , _ nanugh _ .
ellnga _ yuggagh _ sakenge igate ngughk _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mughute luteng _ t a a n Ê¼ g a n l l u k i _ anuqligh te ma kangi _ .
mughute aat _ nanughagh luteng _ amiiragh igh qiinagh luku _ a n u q l i i s i s t e n g _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
enraq _ alla _ yuggagh _ unange yu i aatagh lghii _ iike te ma kanga _ .
aghtugh luni _ aghvigh naqe nghmeng _ inglu anun _ t u n g e m e g g n u n _ ellmeng _ , _ kete mun _ anag ma lghii _ i i g h w i l l g h a a n u n _ .
kaa sa mi _ a n g a l g h u n u n _ aglagh luni _ tawani _ nenglu ngllagh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
tesqamani _ a q u m g a a m a l u k u _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ uka _ a l i g h u m a l g h i i _ ghhuu naqe ghllag _ sa u a _ .
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ uuk _ , _ enraq _ alla _ ifla ma yalghiinga _ .
sa u a _ uukna _ tagi a _ ? _ â
uka nguq _ legan _ pi aqe uq _ , _ â _ G h u u t a a n g a _ g h u u t e p i g t a a n g a _ ! _ â
iiwen _ yuggagh _ qineghte naqe aqe uq _ suna _ taana _ nanugh ghllag _ amiiragh ite ngughk _ , _ enngaatall _ ghhuu naqe aqe uq _ .
nanugh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ yuggagh _ uyuq _ n a v g h i t a g h t i n g a _ pilugug gpeneng _ ghhuute pigte aanga _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng qun _ n a v g h i l l a k e n _ ? _ â
â _ E s g h a a t a a k u k _ a t k u g k e n _ â _ â _ U k u u k _ ? _ â
â _ nakaa _ ila a _ ! _ â
â _ U k u u k _ ? _ â
kenigh ma kek _ a t k u g g a a g n i _ i l u k l i g h p i g a g h h a a k _ aligh u aatagh lghiik _ nanugh m _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimaagh k _ .
nanugh m _ a a n g h u m a k a n g a _ .
yuggagh m _ mat- aghte lukek _ tuune ma kek _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ ! _ â
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ .
quupute gnun _ kaate lutek _ yuggagh m _ atugh kuvinghagh u kek _ nanugh m _ megh mun _ nepte lukek _ nusug yagh ke gni _ ellngaate meng _ m a a q u m a l g h n k _ mesiighllug meng _ nuyiigh llegh _ maligte te luni _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayughllak _ unange aqe i _ nulighh n _ ukini aqe lghii _ ellngagh sigh u magh mi _ nuyiigh magh mi _ llaaghanwha _ ukini uq _ taaqe kanga _ nukeggnagh _ maligte te luku _ . _ â
qafsina neng _ nepte aghte lukek _ ukmangigh u sagte a _ alla _ nepte lukek _ nusug yagh ke gni _ nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ nusug ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wiin _ mengteghagh mnun _ maligte nga _ !
enan _ taglaate naagh amken _ . _ â
nanugh m _ amu i ragh ghllag _ aate luku _ yuggagh nkuk _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
ketmiighte ma lghiik _ .
quupute t _ kaate nghmegteki _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ amagh luku _ aghvigh te aqe kanga _ .
iiwen _ m a a m l e g t a q a a _ nanugh m _ ne anun _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tawa _ kaate ukut _ itegh ghhaaten _ . _ â
itegh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ qakma _ tenglugtugh ma kangit _ , _ â _ naagu _ qaamna _ ? _ â
â _ taawa _ â _ â _ A a a m _ aane lghaaten _ . _ â
â _ qaywa _ aane aqe unga _ . _ â
yuggagh _ nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ esgha _ q a k m u n _ amyuutke aqe kanganga _ aqnigh qugh lunga _ .
maame ste gpenanga _ itagnatun _ a q f a q e g k a n g a n g a _ tughumgha lgute u lunga _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ aane aqe yan _ ipegsagh llegh meng _ igagh ma kanga _ qenleghwaagh akun _ .
nanugh _ aane ma lghii _ .
tagi gpenani _ mulu yan _ yuggagh _ agipanegh kun _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ nanugh k _ enngaatall _ tugutagh ke uk _ .
nutem _ aag llegh a _ pekagh ma lghii _ igaqe a _ aqume luni _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ p a t e g p a g a t a g h a q e f t a a _ .
yuggagh m _ u g h l u f g h a n i _ y a t a g h q e l l u k u _ pitegsagh kete ni _ unake ma kanga _ aag llegh a _ .
nanugh _ pategmig kestagh ghngaaghmi _ u l l g h a g h s i m a l g h i i _ .
ullegh aghte yan _ aag llegh an _ esghapagtugh ma kanga _ .
â _ saa _ una _ ? _ â
esghapagtugh kestagh ghngaaghmigu _ esghagh ma kek _ aaygu m _ t a g h r u g h h a k e k _ u u n g h a n e n g _ aliite lutek _ .
aagtuqagh ke uq llu _ kii mineng _ .
yuggagh _ aane luni _ tazingavek _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nanugh m _ tukugh an _ aapte ma kanga _ yuggagh _ , _ â _ sa zigu _ ? _ â
â _ sa nghite aqa _ ! _ â
â _ taawa _ amyuqetaghteke _ unake an _ .
whaken _ kenlanga _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute naqe unga _ .
maame gkuma _ n u n a v n u n _ aglagh u lleqe amken _ saama _ u n a n g y u g h i s l e q a m k e n _ . _ â
nanugh ghllag _ nekeve luni _ pegnem _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ .
itegh yan _ tea- ma kut _ amiiragh an _ makreg aghtagh llegh i _ s a g h n a a m a k a n g i _ .
yuggagh m _ m a t e g t a q l u k i _ u k i n i g h t e g h u m a k a n g i _ .
apeghiigh yamigu _ aane luni _ yuggagh m _ tuqutekagh ni _ nanugh _ afta ma kanga _ .
negh ka aneng _ n e q e k u m a l g h i i _ maame neghsigh te kete luku _ tukugh ni _ .
llaaghanwha _ maame yami _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
A g h v i g h y a t _ kaate nghmegteki _ nanugh m _ amagh aqe kanga _ yuggagh _ .
Y u g a a m _ nuna anun _ qute mun _ kaate yaghtugh yamek _ unug neghsi ma kangat _ .
wetku _ unug yagu _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ qute mun _ maallgute ma kanga _ .
uugte yan _ yuggagh _ nanugh _ qiive luni _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ .
yuggagh _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ yuggagh _ u n a n g y i i t k u v i n g h a a q _ u n a n g y u g h q a a m a k a n g a _ .
qamagte uq _ .
yuug _ N a p a q u t a g h h m i i
yuug _ N a p a q u t a g h h m i i _ qayaghtugh ma lghii _ pennagh m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ esghagh ma kangi _ angyagh t _ kaalgugh lghiit _ aghvegh meng _ .
kaate luki _ esghaghte yagh ke yagh uq _ .
esghagh nghite aat _ .
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ nagun tuq _ aghvegh eng _ maallgute nagh katgu _ ?
esgha _ maligte yagh kumki _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ kaalgugh lghiit _ kingu itneng _ maligte ma kangi _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luteng _ yuggagh _ esghapag yalghiimi _ n u n a q _ a l l a q _ nuna ke nghitekagh minun _ tamlag uq _ .
esnagh mun _ uugte luni _ qaya ni _ sayug luku _ esghapag yalghiimi _ atghagh uute lghiit _ yug t _ nutaan _ esghagh ai _ .
aghvegh _ pilag ma kangat _ .
qepghagh lghiit _ a k u l a n g i t n i _ yuug _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
K i t u r a a g g a a m _ kiimsigh iqe igate kau nga _ .
aagute ghngaaghmegteggu _ esghagh igate kangat _ .
aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh leg m _ ugi ni _ tuqlugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ panig n _ atalughagh u te aghte gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ p a n m i _ atalughagh u uute luku _ atalughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ nuliigh mi _ manu anun _ .
atalughagh t _ tuute yata _ yug m _ tuute ma kangi _ .
aghnagh m _ ii- ligh u ai _ atalughagh t _ .
ivagh ma kangi _ uvite mini _ .
maaten _ agavek _ sa yan _ i s e k i y u g e s q e l l u k u _ aghnagh _ yug m _ , _ atalughagh t _ tugu luki _ ggatmeghrug anun _ lli yagh ai _ .
aga _ atalughagh t _ amighregagh nun _ kii igh i te ma lghiit _ .
aghnagh _ aragh ma lghii _ agrepeni lug ni _ ggatmeghrug mikun _ .
ugi an _ tagi luni _ qamiye gnegun _ qaake luku _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
kingu itneng _ yuug _ maligte te luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ kaate ma kanga _ aghnagh _ qamiye gnegun _ mangtag meng _ usi lug ni _ qamugh meng _ taglagh aqe uq _ .
yug m _ kaate yamigu _ aqume ma lghii _ qamiye gnegun _ .
aghnagh _ igleghte nghmeng _ aghtugh yagute ma lghii _ .
pi uq _ aghnagh _ , _ â _ sa yamek _ qamugh ke agka _ qamiye k _ s a n g y a g h q w a a g a k e k _ ?
agnepa _ m e g h n u g h y i n g a l g h i i n g a _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aghuliigh luni _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
yuug _ qamiye gneng _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh nun _ kaate luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh _ g a a g h a q e f t u q n e q m e n g _ .
taawa _ saaghw ani _ q a y u t a m _ qaye ani _ ugke t _ u g i m n e g h h a t _ .
Y u u k p i m a l g h i i _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ uyuq _ u g k e v n e n g _ tuune aghte nga _ .
igatagh pigte unga _ . _ â
â _ kaay _ ava ii aanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ .
U r a a m r a _ ugke meng _ tungsigh lghii _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ tawani _ avii i _ ! _ â
Q a y u t a m e n g _ tugu te ma lghii _ ugke meng _ .
aghnagh _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ K a a a a y _ sulleve na ghhalek _ avii laatagh aanga _ a l e g h q u p i g m e n g _ !
weni _ ugke ka _ aga _ t e n g u q _ ima _ aga _ aane uq _ !
K a a a a y _ entaqun _ imgagh unga _ ! _ â
yug m _ ugke _ aane te luku _ u q e g h h m i _ negh ma kanga _ .
ugke _ qamagte yamigu _ ila itnun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqume ma lghii _ amig m _ i i q n g a a k u n _ .
maalghug _ aghnaghagh k _ neqe meng _ i n g l u g t a a l g h i i k _ esnagh meng _ kaate lutek _ mengteghagh mun _ neqe _ i t g h u t u t k e l l u k u _ aghnaghagh k _ kangsugh aatagh ma lghiik _ amig mi _ .
pi ma lghiik _ , _ â _ sangami _ amig ut _ k a g p e l l i g h a g h t a _ ? _ â
yuug _ e s g h a g h s a q n e g h m e n g _ mataawi uq _ .
taagken _ mengteghagh neng _ aglagh ma lghii _ a q n i g h t e l g e t _ mengteghagh itnun _ .
kaate luni _ uqegh itni _ nagate ma lghii _ paninang _ aghnagh _ qama _ enngaatall _ ngillegte aqe uq _ .
alignagh lghiit _ qanemsug kayug t _ mataawi te ma kangat _ naallghute nghmeng _ .
qama _ y u u k p i m a l g h i i _ , _ â _ enta _ enraq _ iigna _ aqfa aghte gu _ .
E n a n n g u q _ aki ligh nagh aqa _ ellnga n _ nakmikegkagh neng _ . _ â
yuug _ u q e g h h m i _ nekevgha lghii _ n a g h u g h t a m _ kiimsigh qagh igate kanga _ q a y u g h l l a g Ê¼ q u n _ esghagh igate kangat _ .
tawani _ u q e g h h m i _ n e k e v g h a a m a l u k u _ yug m _ kinguligh u luku _ aqfa stekagh a _ uka _ tagi ma lghii _ .
yuug _ t i i g m e r a a g h m e n g _ pilugug ke lghii _ kaate yaghtugh te ni _ maligte luku _ yug mun _ u q e g h h m i _ nekevgha lghii mun _ ayuqe luni _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ S a a m _ yug ke aten _ n a k u m i n g u z i n _ sangavek _ itegh igate ziin _ ? _ â
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghvegh meng _ kaalgugh lghii tgun _ maligte te lunga _ tagi kau unga _ .
whanga _ N a p a q u t a g h h m i i n g u u n g a _ .
nalluke aqa _ n a a n s i n g a _ .
E s g h a g h s a q n e g h m e n g _ aghtugh unga _ .
esghagh igate aatnga _ .
E l l n g i i n a g h h a g h p e k _ whaa _ e s g h a g h a g h p e n g a _ .
aghneq _ esnagh mi _ esghaate lunga _ i s e k i y u k u n i _ aghnagh m _ ggatmeghrug anun _ lli ma yagh anka _ atalughagh t _ .
taakut _ esgha _ agrepe siigh ke kangi _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yan _ y u u k n u t a a n _ esghagh ma kangat _ .
yuug _ aqfa stekagh at _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ aqelqagh _ maame ste i nghmeng _ aghtugh igate ngughk _ .
wetku _ enraq _ nuna anun _ napaqutagh mun _ aglagh te yaghqaqe gkufsigu _ temeghte negh yaghqagh u uq _ . _ â
aqnigh lghii m _ aghnagh m _ u g i n a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ametall _ a g l a a t e p e s t a a g h l l e q a g h p u t _ .
N u l i g h q a _ ikfiqe pigte uq _ .
temeghte na qaghte ligu _ . _ â
katam _ t a a n a n g u f t u q _ aghvengekagh t _ angyaleg at _ .
yuug _ aqelqagh _ aghnagh mun _ aqnigh lghii mun _ aglagh luni _ tunute ste luku _ atalughagh t _ aghneq _ llikagh ni _ agha m _ ggatmeghrug anun _ amighregagh an _ kiigh aneng _ nusug luki _ nanigh m _ manu akun _ lli ma kangi _ .
aghnagh _ i g i g h i y a g u m a l g h i i _ .
M e n g t e g h a l e g t a a m _ yug m _ aghneq _ a t a l u g h a q a n i _ liisuqe ma kangi _ .
unaami _ yug m _ tukugh an _ yug ni _ kelgugh luki _ angyagh eng _ kete luku _ mangtag meng _ u s i l u k u _ yuug llu _ aqelqagh _ qaake luku _ aglagh te ma kangat _ nuna anun _ qayugh a _ qamugh ke luku _ .
kaat ute te luku _ napaqutagh mun _ yuug _ esnagh mun _ uugte yan _ angyagh eng _ usingigh luku _ kete ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ kelute mun _ esghagh luni _ kete mun _ qiive luni _ angyagh t _ esghagh naqe yagh kete ni _ aviite ut _ .
katam _ mesungesag t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii nkuk
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ q e m g a a g m e k _ meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii ngiighhagh nkuk _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ igagh te iqe ma lghiik _ .
U n u g m i _ qategh lghii _ aqume luni _ p i l u g u g l u m _ aane ma lghii _ .
manaate i _ tugu luki _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
anglaagh mun _ kaate luni _ manaate i _ ateghte luki _ managh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ manaate i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ amu ma kangi _ manaate i _ .
uka nguq _ qiya lghii _ amu ma kanga _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ E n g a a e n g a _ , _ aqsa ka _ s e g g i g u u _ ! _ â
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ qaygeghte yagh kete ni _ taghnughhagh ghrukutaaghllag _ .
naqam _ aqsa ghllag a _ .
savig ni _ nusug luku _ aqsa a _ segge yagh kete ni _ iqallugagh ghllag _ a q s a n g a n i s i m a l g h i i _ .
akmagtagh ni _ tugu luku _ iqallugagh meng _ imigh ma kanga _ e s l e m k a g h a g h l l u k u _ .
imigh i nghmeng _ apeghiigh yami _ taghnughhagh _ ateghte luku _ megh mun _ manaate i _ imeg luki _ akmag aatagh luni _ t a g l a a m a l g h n _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yami _ meteghllug _ taghsagh luku _ negh ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ aghneghte lutek _ unug luku _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ qavagh yan _ meteghllug m _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ manaate i _ tegleg luki _ aane luni _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ managh ta i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
amu ma kangi _ .
amu ma luki _ uka nguq _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
meteghllug m _ manaate i _ pegte luki _ qimag ma lghii _ .
ilangani _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ managh yagh naqe yalghiimi _ managh ta i _ ima _ aviite ut _ .
meteghllug _ aapte yagh kete ni _ k a l e f s i m a n i l u k i _ pi ma kangi _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ tapghagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh neng _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ , _ mayugh luni _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ quyngigh _ uzive aqe uq _ .
nughagh ghhagh _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ nughagh ghhagh _ eslate mun _ egte ma kanga _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ ukig luni _ akmag luku _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
unaami _ enraq _ meteghllug _ t a p g h a m i m _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh meng _ esghaate luni _ aglagh luni _ iiyagh anun _ mayugh luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ quyngigh _ uzive lghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
aange lghii ii ghllag _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ a a n e s i m a k a n g a _ .
meteghllug _ ukig luni _ mengteghagh meng _ akmag naqe yagh kete ni _ tapghi uute uq _ .
quyngigh m _ q i l e g y i n g i _ nusug luki _ akmagite ngllagh naqe yagh uq _ enraq _ amawha _ kepe qagh ut _ .
aghtugh luni _ akmag nghmeng _ qineghte luni _ mengteghagh mun _ tungsigh ma yagh lghii _ aghnagh mun _ a k m a g i t k a g h a g h h a g h m e n g _ .
yaghlegi _ aghnagh m _ yaqiiraag ni _ akuqagh lukek _ aane luni _ meteghllug _ a n a g u l e g h t a a m a k a n g a _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ U u m l l e q a _ quyngigh ghhagh nka _ tuqu qugh aqe kangi _ . _ â
meteghllug _ ava ngunani _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ , _ â _ kii _ sa luten _ esnegte iqe ughtagh u ziin _ ? _ â
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghnagh mun _ akmagite kaghqagh niigh naqe lunga _ quyngigh ke kaqe a _ tagite na luku _ yaghlegi _ aanqaghte luni _ a n a g u l e g h t a a g a a n g a _ . _ â
â _ U u m _ n a n g l l e k i s t e n g i i g h h a a n k a _ seghleghqe aqe ai _ . _ â
N e q s e n g _ naange yan _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ piyaa ma lghii _ pennagh m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ .
taagani _ mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh ma kanga _ nuliigh leg _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ a m e l e n g e s t a a g h h a a k _ .
yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ enankinam _ aqelqagh _ !
nategh mun _ tawavek _ itegh i _ ! _ â
Y u g e m n u l i i n i _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaagh te gu _ aqelqagh _ q a l l a l l u k u n e g h n a q e l g h i i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ itegh ma lghiik _ tukuqe te lghiik _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ aghnagh m _ itghute luki _ negh ma lghiit _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ pi ma lghii _ tukugh _ , _ â _ aane aghte naqe unga _ qakmavek _ .
sukate lunga _ itegh naagh unga _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aga _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q a m a y _ aqelqagh _ ukavek _ nuug qu a _ ! _ â
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ nuug yalghiimi _ atkug a _ aate ma kanga _ tukugh an _ .
llangaqa nguq _ atkug a _ u n a g h s i i g h w a a g h m e n g _ nuuvekagh _ .
Q a t e l g h i i n g i i g h h a a m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ U u k p i i g l l e q a n _ !
sangan _ aate zigu _ ?
sagiqe ste pigte an _ !
esleqeaghaghte an _ ! _ â
taakut _ tukugh i _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ sikughwaagh u aqe ut _ .
llaaghanwha _ s i k u g h w a a m _ yuuke magh mi _ atkug a _ aqelqagh m _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
S i k u g h w a a g h e m n u l i i n i _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ aghulaqe naqe gkan _ pirughte i tete naken _ i w e r n g a m _ kepsugh llegh anun _ . _ â
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ aghulaqe naqe yan _ s i k u g h w a a m _ nulighh an _ pirughte i te ma kanga _ a q e l q a g h t e n g n e q m e n g _ i w e r n g a m k e p s u l l g h a n u n _ .
Q a t e l g h i i h g i i g h h a q _ akmag aatagh luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ mengteghagh mun _ meteghllug m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ K i i - i _ , _ naken _ p i m g h q u g h t a z i n _ ? _ â
â _ aagken _ pennagh m _ t u n g a n g a n e n g _ . _ â
unaami _ meteghllug _ piyaa ma lghii _ taagavek _ .
mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh aa _ nuliigh leg _ a m e l e n g e s t a a g h h a a k _ .
qesiqun _ kaate aqe uq _ s i k u g h w a a n k u n u n _ .
S i k u g h w a a m _ tukugh an _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ ilu anun _ .
asanut _ atkug ni _ unite luku _ nategh mi _ , _ nuliigh ni _ g a a g h e s q u m a a n _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghiit _ .
taaqe luteng _ sikughwaagh _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ meteghllug m _ atkug a _ aate luku _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q a m a y _ aqelqagh _ u k a v e k n u u k a a _ ! _ â
M e t e g h l l u k n u u g u m a l g h i i _ .
esghagh luku _ sikughwaagh _ n e n g l a g h q w a a m a l g h i i _ , _ â _ H a h a h a _ , _ llangaqa _ e l p e k k a n a q a r u k _ ! _ â
S i k u g h w a a m _ aqelqagh mi _ atkug a _ mat- aghte luku _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ aqelqagh _ aane ste gu _ !
aglagh li _ !
pirughte i te aghte gpenaan _ pi naken _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ meteghllug _ a a n e s i m a k a n g a _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ ava ngunani _ p i r u g h t a n g u n a n i _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qatelghii m _ unite ma kanga _ meteghllug _ alla _ kiyaghte lgutesaghqagh u gpenaan _ .
qamagte uq _ .
egeghagh mii
yuug _ egeghagh mii _ nukaghagh leg _ .
nuliigh pig a _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ nukaghagh a _ maalghug neng _ mekelghiigh staghhiinagh neng _ avaqutagh leg _ .
nukaghagh a _ taana _ A n g e t e q u g h h m i i _ .
angyaghtugh aqe lghii _ yuug _ nuliigh pig ni _ kelqellug qu _ .
yuug _ angyagh nghmini _ aghvenge aqe lghii _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ nukaghagh ni _ miite i stekaqe kanga _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ ataasigh t _ pilagkagh t _ tuune aqe kangi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ n u k a g h a g h m i n u n _ .
elkek _ nuliigh pig ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ quyngigh meng _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ angyagh yata _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh ni _ nuyekligh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ angyat put _ taglagh yaghqagh t _ esghapag ki _ .
uka _ aliigh kata _ ungipite nakevnga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ siighnagh m _ a q e f t a g h a a _ imigh ma kanga _ megh meng _ .
ila a _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te luku _ saama _ ugi mi _ ila yan _ nuliigh pig an _ iighagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ tugu tete luni _ avegtugh luni _ ila ma kangi _ mangtag t _ avegtughagh ni _ .
enkaam _ uyuqligh m _ taghnughhagh mi _ ila a _ maka a _ imigh ma kanga _ peqagh meng _ tukrug lghii meng _ sii ma i te u luku _ .
iiwen _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ ighnegh an _ n u y e k l i i m _ ungipaate ma kanga _ uka _ taglagh ni luki _ angyagh t _ .
itegh sqe ma kanga _ ighnegh ni _ .
itegh yan _ neghe ste luku _ taagken _ atghii sqe ma kanga _ esnagh mun _ .
angyagh t _ tamlag yalghiimeng _ aghvenge ma lghiit _ .
angyaleg ita _ yug ni _ l l i l a m a k a n g a _ nukaghagh ni _ aqfa sqellug qu _ , _ â _ A g h v e n g u m a k u n n g u q _ , _ miite i yaghtugh li nguq _ . _ â
K e v g a a q _ taglagh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ ugi anun _ aqfa ste ni luku _ miite i yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .
â _ A a a _ atghagh naqe unga _ . _ â
utaqa ma kangat _ .
naagu _ ?
atghagh nghite uq _ .
itagnatun _ yug m _ aqfate ma kanga _ , _ â _ sukate luni nguq _ atghagh li _ .
ghhuute ai nguq _ . _ â
K e v g a a q _ taglagh luni _ u n g i p a a s i k a a n g a _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ k e v g a a q _ , _ â _ enraq _ taghnughhagh ka _ qiyaaqe uq _ , _ atghagh aqe nayagh unga _ . _ â
K e v g a a q _ atghagh luni _ angyaleg _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh pig an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga _ puughte isaghtugh lakun _ miite i yaghtugh naqe lghii _ . _ â
angegh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
N u k a g h a a m _ aksaqe luni _ esghapag ma kanga _ taglagh lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nutaan _ qineghte yan _ a n a g u u m a k a n g a _ n a a s q w a k u n _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ angyaatagh ni _ akmag luki _ avaqutagh ni _ tugu luku _ qimag ma lghii _ M a y e g h a g n e k u n _ .
qaygeghte yami _ uyghag m _ a k u l a n g a n u n _ iigh ma lghii _ .
siingenllu _ unug kanga _ .
aghvengekagh t _ utaqa i yagh luteng _ esnagh mi _ utaqakagh eng _ aviite yan _ yuug _ taglagh yalghiimi _ nuliigh pig ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ tuqu luni _ amig mi _ naqam _ nukaghagh a _ aviite uq _ .
yuug _ atghagh luni _ yug ni _ l l i l a m a k a n g i _ i v a g h i y a g h t i i s q e l l u k i _ .
I v a g h y a q e s e n g _ mamleg mi _ esghagh nghite aat _ .
aviite uq _ .
aviite yan _ u t e g h q a a s i m a l g h i i t _ .
aghnagh _ a n g y a t a g h q e l l u n i _ apeghiigh yami _ ukig ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ meghnaali te kete luku _ tulughagh ma lghii _ .
tulughagh te kete luku _ nagaqugh ma kangi _ suqsughtagh lghiit _ .
enkaam _ kana _ nalla akun _ q e n a a g h t a l l a s i m a l g h i i t _ .
pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ piiksuq _ !
sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
aghnagh m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ angetequgh mun _ aglagh yug aqe yagh unga _ , _ i w e m g a n a t e n _ aglagh langa _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ uugten _ !
A n g e t e q u g h h m i i n g u u k u t _ , _ aglagh te naqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh _ angyagh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
â _ quneghte lghaaten _ ! _ â
taagken _ itagnatun _ suqsughtagh meng _ aghnagh _ nagate ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ p i l a t a g h a a t _ , _ â _ A a a m _ esghagh ghhaaten _ aga _ uugten _ ! _ â
aghnagh _ uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ angetequgh u nghite ngughk _ a l l a q _ nuna _ .
maaten _ angyagh ke vig ni _ uteghmun _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ aga _ mesungesag t _ p u u g l e g h a a t a q e f t u t _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ nenglu ghrukutaagh _ pika _ esghagh ma kanga _ tunuqligh ke luku _ nenglu squghhagh _ .
nenglu ghllag m _ qaye ani _ nekevgha aqe uq _ yuug _ k a p e s e g a g h l u n i _ .
K a p e s e g a k e k _ ghhuu ghllag lutek _ nasagh ni _ , _ aligh ni _ , _ kenigh ni _ t u g h q u g h l u k i _ .
aghnagh mun _ e s n a m e l n g u g h m u n _ ayuqe luku _ talligh ni _ , _ aligh n _ inglu a _ i l e m a g h a q s a q e n n i _ anuqligh ghllag ma kanga _ e s l a l l u g p a g t u u m a g h m i _ .
aghnagh _ taghnughhaghtuumagh an _ t e n g s i m a k a n g a _ qagi t _ t u n u t a n g i t g u n _ tuute ste luku _ .
naqam _ anuqe _ alpag ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ itagnatun _ uugte aqe uq _ .
yug m _ enraq _ inglu a _ aligh mi _ ilemeaghaghte yagh kete ni _ itagnatun _ anuqligh ghllag laatagh aa _ e s l a l l u g p a g t u u m a g h m i _ .
aghnagh _ t e n g t a q e g k a n g a _ qagi t _ t u n g a n g i t g u n _ tuute ste luku _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ alpag nghaani _ anuqe ghllag _ u u g n e g h a n i _ yug m _ nasagh ni _ enkaam _ kenigh ni _ itemqugh yagh kete ni _ aghnagh _ itagnatun _ t e n g t a q l u k u _ qenwat _ taghnughhagh ke te lghiik _ aghnaa nkuk _ mataghqe uk _ pilugug i uute uk _ .
wetku _ yuug _ ukig luni _ nenglu mineng _ uka _ atghagh ma lghii _ pilugug meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aghnagh mun _ kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ yug m _ , _ â _ taawa _ pilugug meng _ tagite amtek _ qayughllak _ pilugug si _ nukeggnagh pigte ut _ .
whanga _ elpek _ aqfa ste aqe amken _ nanglleg yagute luten _ .
pilugug tek _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ taglagh ghhaakut _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ pilugug nghmeng _ t a a q s a g Ê¼ t a _ taglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu anun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh aqe lghii _ , _ aghnagh m _ a f t a q e g k a n g i _ .
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ angli uq _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ igleghte yaaghte uq _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aag nghmini _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
tespamani _ aghneghte aqe lghii _ nenglu squghhagh mi _ .
I g h i v g a a m a a n _ tagi nghmini _ igaghtu pigte lghii meng _ pilugug luni _ .
K i y a g h t a a l l g h e m _ tagtala ani _ aghnagh _ ighni ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
taana llu _ angli ma lghii _ qenwat _ .
taana llu _ uyuqligh _ ellmi neng _ igleghte yagute ma lghii _ .
anengagh ke te lghiik _ a a n e g h m e g m _ aghneghte aqe lghiik _ nenglu ngiighhagh mi _ .
tagi negh megteni _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ pilugug lutek _ i g a g h t u p i g l l e g h i i m e n g _ .
tagi negh megteni _ legan _ neghe gpenatek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te aqe lghiik _ .
yug m _ pi aqe kanga _ aghnagh _ , _ â _ A s a n u t e l p e k _ espamavek _ tunuqligh ghhagh mnnun _ aglagh gpenang _ pi aqe i _ ! _ â
maaten _ ilangani _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ S a n g a n l l a a m _ pamavek _ p i s n a a n i g h a q a n g a _ .
enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nenglu squghhagh mun _ iiyagh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ ilu te mun _ avaqutagh kek _ quulqite m _ qaye akun _ aqume lutek _ ighu teng _ aghulate magh ita _ n a g h a g h u t a q e f t u k _ .
taawa _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ gaagh magh mi _ ukini magh mi _ pellugtuumagh mi _ enngaatall _ aveniqe aqe uq _ .
aghnagh m _ iiyagh meng _ esqamavek _ k a y a g h u m a y a q a a n g a _ .
aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
avaqutagh kek _ u l l g h a g h s a n _ q i y a g h w a a s i m a l g h i i k _ .
aghnagh _ iiwen _ nekeve aqe uq _ yuug _ uka _ aliigh aqe uq _ qefliqe magh mi _ , _ â _ K i i i _ aghnagh _ pineghllug ghllag pigu a _ .
imamta _ ineghte aqe yu i kete te _ ! _ â
nenglu mun _ itegh luni _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ aglagh luni _ tespamavek _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ k a l l a g a g h y a q e n n i _ saguyagh gmineng _ u n g u v a g h s i m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnagh _ aglagh nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
enraq _ nenglu m _ t e k e r k a a n i t a q e l g h i i k _ maalghug _ kalngag sngwaaghagh ghhagh k _ ila a _ aywaa n _ t u n g a n a n i _ ila a _ uughqa n _ .
taake uk llu _ k a l n g a s n g a a g h a g h h a a k _ yug m _ iinghute aqe kek _ saafte sqe gpenakek _ .
kiyaghte luteng _ maaten _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ , _ â _ S a n g a n l l a a m _ k a l n g a g g a a k _ ukuk _ iinghute aqe akek _ ?
enta _ ila a _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ â
ketfagh luku _ aghnagh m _ nusug ragh yagh kete ni _ awergha m _ amiiragh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nusug ragh aa _ .
S a a g h w a m i k u n _ may- ughte ghllag aa _ .
iiwen _ wata _ asi anun _ kaaw aqe uq _ , _ ugu qagh ma lghii _ .
asi a _ kalngag m _ k e n g h u f t u q _ .
iiwen _ talligh ni _ s a y u w a g h t a q a a _ yuug _ qefliqe magh mi _ qakma _ kaate aqe uq _ .
â _ ugumi nagh ghhalek _ a g h n a q s a _ q a a m n a p i n e g h l l u g l l a p i w a a _ ! _ â
iitghute kete luku _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ k a l l a g a g h y a q e n n i _ uteghte luni _ u m y u g a g h m i n e n g _ awergha _ kanaghte uute ma lghii _ k a l n g a g g a g h m u n _ .
taana llu _ aghnagh m _ tallu i _ k a l l a g a g h y a q e n n i _ saguyagh gmineng _ uguqe llghite te yu i ma kanga _ .

pineghlliqe nagh u nighte uq _ .

enkaam _ s a g l e g h a q _ ne anun _ lli ma kanga _ .
yug m _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aane luten _ yughqutagh meng _ ghhiitagh luten _ ighnegh gpenun _ pamavek _ a g l a a t e s q e n n a k e t e n _ u y g u q u u t e s q e l l u k i _ .
uygu te uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh kaki _ t a g i t e s q e n n a k e t e n _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
uygu te uute luki _ tagite ma kangit _ .
yug m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ M a a l g h u m _ quyngigh m _ s i g u t a n g i _ paasqute te ki _ .
enkaam _ ataasigh _ a l l a g h h i i n a m _ awergha m _ m e l q w a n e n g _ ikute luten _ imeg naken _ ila a _ tungtu m _ amigh aneng _ .
aligh gpek _ inglu a _ quyngigh m _ unguva lghii m _ m e l q w a n e n g _ ikute aqe luku _ imigh naken _ .

laagh an wha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
apeghiigh yan _ aghnagh _ yug m _ s a g l e g h a q _ aw ite u te kete luku _ pi a _ , _ â _ taana _ elpek _ tagite kan _ ighnegh n _ k e l q e n n a k e n _ .
una _ uyughagh a _ whanga mni _ unegte lleqe uq _ .
ukig lusi _ nateqlite kufsi _ quneghte luten _ aligh gpek _ inglu a _ efsug te naken _ enkaam _ inglu a llu _ .
enkaam _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh kuvek _ taake uk _ maalghug _ sigute k _ paasqute te nga lghiik _ ama _ quneghte luten _ efsug te nakegken _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh n _ nuyekligh _ taglagh kan _ u q u g h u t a g h q a g h h a q _ e s g h a g h y a g h t i i s q e n n a k e n _ tekeghagh m _ awata anun _ uyughagh ke te lghii gnun _ anengagh a _ sivulii luku _ . _ â
taagken _ yug m _ naa ke te lghiik _ u k i g s i m a k e k _ .
tuute ma lghiit _ egeghagh m _ k e l u t a n g a n i _ .
tuute yameng _ aghnagh m _ q i m e g h l l u n i _ aligh gni _ efsug te lukek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ mengteghagh _ , _ ama _ saaghw itni _ quyngigh _ .
itegh luni _ q u n a g h m i _ paasqute te nga lghiit _ quyngigh m _ m a a l g h u m _ s i g u t a n g i _ efsug te luki _ esghagh yalghiimi _ awergha ghllag _ a l l a g h h n n a q _ amigh ghllag _ mingllite qugh ma kanga _ .
egeghagh mii _ yuggagh _ aane luni _ u n a n g u l u k u _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ pika _ esghagh ai _ quyilleg t _ .
amenam _ yuggagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yalghiimi _ iflakagh _ nunalgute mi _ nulighh a _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ ighnegh mineng _ n u y e k l i g h m e n g _ enkaam _ ugi mineng _ .
yuggagh m _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
negh luni _ aane aqe yan _ quyngigh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh ni _ lipeghsagh ma kanga _ taglagh qigh sqellug qu _ .
llaaghanwha _ ighnegh a _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
naa an _ neghe ste luku _ alla neng _ pilugug luku _ nutaghagh u ta ghhagh inagh meng _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ llilagh ma kek _ amavek _ tapghagh m _ awata anun _ esnighqwigh sqellug kek _ asanut _ anegh nge aq _ sivulii luku _ .
nagaqugh luni _ ugi a _ aghnagh m _ nutaghagh _ nuliigh ni _ enngaatall _ agligh sqellug qu _ angayuqagh itnun _ a a n e s i m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ yuug _ taglagh ma lghii _ tespikavek _ utuqa mun _ nuliigh minun _ .

nunalgute teng _ kelgugh luki _ pilag ma kangat _ aghvegh _ .

kiyaghte ma uq _ qigi mi _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
kiig te nghagu _ qayaghtugh nghmini _ unake aqe kanga _ masingka _ uksugh mi _ naama te kaghqagh _ neqe _ .
ayumigh ite nghagu _ uksaagh mi _ nutaan _ siku ligh nghagu _ Y a g r a k e n u t a g h m i i _ quyilleg _ yuug _ pirughte yaghtugh aqe lghii _ qigi mun _ .
A g l a g n a q e n g h a n i _ quyilleg ni _ esnagh mii an _ i w e m g a m _ usitutala atun _ tuune aqe kanga _ neqe meng _ .
naqam _ uksaagh mi _ tuqutiighvig _ kaate nghaani _ qigi mi _ yuug _ quyillegte nghaani _ angyagh ni _ neqe meng _ u s i l u k u _ quyilleg an _ esnagh mii ni _ tuune aqe kanga _ inglu t _ ataasigh t _ amig ligh luki _ q a l l u k a g h m e n g _ .
naqam _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ enan _ ayumiqun _ tuqute i tete nagh amken _ . _ â
ayumigh ite nghagu _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ qigi mi _ y u u k u k s a a g h m i _ quyillegte yan _ emta _ quyilleg an _ tawaten _ u g l a g h q a k a a n _ tuune luku _ a n g y a g h h u t a m e n g _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ S i k u l i g h a k u _ pirughte yaghtugh lleqe unga _ elpenun _ .
tenge ta ghhagh meng _ y a t a g h q u t a g h h n a k e v n g a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ esnagh mii an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
qigi mun _ aglagh yami _ amsakaghtagh m _ amiiqagh a _ sa iqe luku _ esne a _ amiiqagh m _ t u u g h l l u k u _ siqlugagh m _ paye anun _ p e t u g t e g h u u m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ ayvegh m _ tengug aneng _ imigh ma kanga _ i w e m g a m _ esleqeaghaghte luku _ .
enkaam _ megh _ kumlate luni _ lliigh yan _ siqlugagh m _ tenge ta m _ paye a _ megh meng _ kuvughtagh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ siqlugagh _ imaghtuumagh an _ k u m l a g h q u m a k a n g a _ .
qigi mi _ yuug _ m e n g t e g h a m e s i m a l u k u _ qakma _ kaate ma lghii _ quyilleg a _ pirughte yagh uq _ .
yug m _ aane vike ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ atkug ngunani _ naqam _ nasaperagh luni _ aghillug luni _ .

â _ legan _ teskana _ kiyaghte uq _ .
U l i m a s i m a m k e n _ .
enmis _ aqfa lteggu _ . _ â
L l a a g h a n g w h a _ aane lutek _ siqlugagh anun _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
siqlugagh mun _ kaate yamek _ esnagh mii m _ pi ma kanga _ quyilleg _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ sa aqe zigu _ nusug ggu _ . _ â

quyilleg m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ k a k u _ sa ma m _ ! _ â
quyilleg _ sivughagh u ma lghii _ tenge ta meng _ nusug te nghmeng _ .
S i v u g h a g h y a n _ quyilleg _ esnagh mii m _ atghileg mineng _ putu nge i kete te _ amaa iqe aq _ kagu luku _ sayug aghte yagh kete ni _ siqlugaghtuumagh an _ p i i k s i g a g h l l u k u _ tenge te aq _ amaa iqe aq _ nusug aghte ma kanga _ .

ayumiqun _ uksaagh yagu _ awen _ quyillegte llegh meng _ kingute aghagh lutek _ ata ke te lghiik _ Y a g r a k e n u t a m u n _ quyillegsi ma lghiik _ .

sangafsi _ m u l u g h t a a s t e k _ ?

legan _ tawaten _ aghneghmi _ quyilleg _ tuqutagh igh ma lghii _ .

pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek u u vag lghii meng _ aghnagh meng _ ataasigh meng _ s i g u t a n g i n n a q a m k e n _ saama _ t a l l i m a n e n g _ tuqute i lleqe amken _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ pilugugkagh meng _ a m i i l i g h l u k i _ . _ â

yug m _ qigi mii m _ ata an _ n a n e v g a g h h a a m p i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ quyngigh t _ malghi ghngaita _ w h a n g k u n n i _ esnagh mii ni _ avangite ut _ aglegh ite ut _ qayugh ghllag mi _ whangkuta _ qikmigh t _ saghligagh put _ ighni aqe lghiit _ uglagh pigte luku _ tuqu qagh igate ke put _ .
maaten _ quyngigh ghhagh ut _ malghi ghngaan _ n e p i g h u l l u k u _ tuqute gpenaan _ aag llegh a _ ighni ghngaan _ .

llaaghanwha _ quyilleg _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qigi mii t _ quyillegte nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ qigi mii _ aghvenge yagute uq _ ukileghyag meng _ .

quungvagh ghhagh si _ .

llaaghanwha _ qigi mii t _ qamilgugh ma lghiit _ Y a g r a k e n u t a m _ k e l u t a n g a n u n _ .

tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ Q i g i m i i k u v i n g h a a m _ nanevgagh a _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nuliigh ni _ D i m a k a n g a _ , _ â _ enta _ ighnegh ut _ pamavek _ quungvagh nun _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ v a g h i s a g h t u u l t e g g u _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nutaghagh t _ pilugug teng _ meteghllug meng _ q a s p i q u t i g h l u k i _ y a t a g h q e l l u t e k _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
tespagani _ quungvagh ni _ i g l e g h l l u t e k m e n g t e g h a t m a a l g h u g n e g h e t _ esghagh ma kangit _ .
sivuligh tgun _ mengteghagh tgun _ kaate lutek _ itegh gpenatek _ uughqu ii te ni _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
qesiqun _ kaate vike aqe aat _ quyilleg _ ighnegh leg _ panig leg _ .
taake uk _ avaqutagh kek _ t e s p a m a n t a q e f t u k _ aag llegh ani _ mengteghagh m _ .

qaprag qagh negh megteni _ meteghllug m _ m e l q w a _ a n u q a t a g h a a m _ t e n g q a t a q e g k a n g a _ .
itegh luni _ mekelghiigh _ a ta mi _ mengteghagh anun _ u n g i p a s i m a k a n g a _ ata ni _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii neng _ aqelqagh neng _ .
ata an _ mekelghiigh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ itegh sqe ki _ !

aane luni _ mekelghiigh m _ itegagh mineng _ taghsagh ma kek _ aqelqagh k _ .
itegh uk nguq _ .
itegh yata _ yug m _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ â _ K i i i _ natmun _ i g l e g h t a a s t e k _ ? _ â
â _ arekull _ taawa _ t a a w a n g i i n a g h h a q _ w h a m i g h p u t _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ i v a g h i t n g w a a g h p u t _ . _ â
â _ uuk _ legan _ tawa _ p a n i l e g p i g u n g a _ .

aane luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
sivu itni _ mekelghiigh _ kaate luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ ata mta _ a a n g h u t a a t e n _ seghlegh pestaagh nun _ .
saki ghhaghqagh ten _ kaate kata _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
A k l u m a s i p i g u t _ .
talwa _ meteghllug m _ amighqwaagh aneng _ pilugug ke uk _ . _ â
aqelqagh k _ kaate lutek _ i t e g h y a g Ê¼ t a _ aghnaghagh m _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ imani _ ukuk _ pilugugllug ghllag uk _ .
utuqa _ alla igh aq _ saagllug qu _ taaggun _ aqume sqe ma kegket _ .
neghyaghqagh meng _ k e t f a a s a q m e g t e k e k _ quyngigh m _ nefkuuragh a _ taagkaghtagh _ t u k r u u g h q w a a g h l l a k a q _ iqlugte lutek _ aghtugh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe te ma lghiik _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ y a t a g h q e s a t a _ aqelqagh t _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ ighnegh minun _ atghagh te sqe ma kangit _ q u y n g i l e g t i m e n g _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ panig ni _ i g h s a g h w a a g h n g a a n _ qiya ghngaan _ angegh te naqe ni luni _ wanlegi _ maligte te sqe ma kanga _ .
aghtugh yamigu _ ellmi neng _ q a g h l u g h i l u n i _ panig ni _ qaake luku _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwen _ esnagh mun _ t u n g a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ quyilleg nun _ aliigh aqe ut _ uka _ quyngilegti _ payegh i _ aliigh aqe uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ i m a n i g u q _ quyngigh kek _ pinigh uk _ ukileghyag kegte ta ghhagh inagh k _ .
yug a _ imani nguq _ atkug kegte uq _ n u g h a g h m e n g _ u k i l e g h y a k e g t a a m e n g _ saama _ mekelghiigh _ n u k a l p i g a q s a _ seghleghu qagh a _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ p i l u g u g l l u g a l g h i i _ qaake luku _ aga _ uteghte ma lghii _ .

langetaq _ aagna _ ugi kaghqagh ke an _ . _ â

quyngigh mun _ kaate luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
quungvagh m _ quyilleg ita _ quyngigh _ e s g h a p a g y a q e s e n g _ imani _ uglagh uq _ naqam _ u k i l e g h y a p e r u w a a g h l l a k _ .

itegh kan _ allighaghllug kun _ aqume ste naagh an _ .
enkaam _ ketfagh te naagh an _ upenghaghtagh m _ ayvegh m _ t u k i g h u g g n e q _ qasiqagh m _ nefkuuragh aneng _ .
enkaam _ negh nghmeng _ aghtugh kagu _ pi naken _ , _ â _ wasaq _ elpek _ nanevgagh t _ neqlightugh aqe aten _ ggutangigh tke aat _ tukrug ghllag meng _ .
whangkuta llu _ esnagh m _ negh ka aneng _ tukrugsigh kayugu kut _ .
ikiwan _ elpek _ ggute kegte aq _ wha _ aghtugh uten _ . _ â _ wetku _ k i n g u v a q u n _ pinitun _ neghe ste naken _ .
