yuug _ enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh
yuug nguq _ iimna _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ t a n p e g h h m e n g _ akmagutagh ngllagh a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ tusaqe i nagh gpenani _ nulighh a _ akmagutagh ngllagh ma lghii _ t a n p e g h h m e n g _ .
taaqe yakek _ akmagutagh k _ t a n p e g h h e k _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ akuqagh luku _ kanaghte luku _ tesqamavek _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ keveg aqe naqe amken _ anguyag mnun _ s u g h u g i s q e l l u t e n _ . _ â
taagken _ t a n p e g h h e k _ akmagutagh k _ m i l u u l l u k e k m e g h m u n _ kete ma kek _ .
anuqe m _ akmagutagh k _ t e n g s i m a k e k _ i w e m g a m _ natmun _ .
megh m _ itegh gpenakek _ u v l u g e m _ qapragsagh ke gni _ up- llghite aghte yagh ke gni _ akmagutagh k _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ akmagutagh m _ nukeggnagh anun _ .
tagtalmi _ tepe ma kanga _ esnagh kun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ akmagutagh m _ allungag a _ vuveghte qugh yagh kete ni _ r e g h i g h s i m a k a n g a _ .
taagken _ aane yalghiimi _ tepe ma kanga _ tapghaghte lakun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ taglagh luni _ tapghagh m _ qaye anun _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ yuug _ .
yug m _ kaate luku _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ nenglagh qu ma kanga _ .
P i m a k a n a g a _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ nani _ n u k e g g n a a g h q e g h l l a g s i n _ ? _ â
â _ sughug u unga _ elpenun _ . _ â
yug m _ n e n g l a q l u k u _ unite ma kanga _ .
mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te aqe uq _ .
legan _ nukeggnagh ghllagu uq _ .
aapte yaqegka _ w h a n g a m n u n n g u q _ sughug u uq _ . _ â
N e n g l a q l a a t a a m a k a n g a t _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ t a g l a g h l u m _ ungavig itnun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nanugh ita _ mesiigh anun _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ .
melqugh ni _ mesiighqe ghllag yamigu _ ungavig neng _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ s u g e r n g e n g i t g u n _ kavirrakegtagh tgun _ aviigh uute ma lghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ s u g e m g i t _ mesiighqe ughtagh u luki _ u g a t a n g a n u n _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ qefliqe ma lghii _ , _ â _ K i i i _ , _ q a m a y _ ungavig mta _ s u g e r n g a n g i _ seghleghu ut _ whaa _ legan _ mesag igh ghllagu ut _ .
ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ enankinam _ s a a m _ yeghrat _ n u k e g g n a a g h q e g h l l a g u m a a _ . _ â
U g a n g u q _ u w a t a n g a n e n g _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ â _ pi yagh amken ta _ sughug u unga _ ! _ â
â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ una _ ! _ â _ yuug _ pi ma lghii _ .
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ m a l i g h q a g h a t a g h l u k u _ tugu yamigu _ piigugh luku _ eslate mun _ egte ma kanga _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ â _ enngaatall _ aglagh a _ sughug ggaaten _ ! _ â
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ i i g h w i i g h l u n i _ unguvagh yalghiimi _ j a i g h q u t a m e n g _ g h h i t a g h l u k i _ uygu qugh utagh ma lghii _ .
masingka _ t a k u y a q m i n i k i _ yug m _ mengteghagh anun _ mayugh luni _ q a a k g i t _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mineng _ yughqutagh meng _ kenle nge i kete te _ q a m q a g h s i m a k a n g i _ .
iqug a _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mi _ q a m u t i g h l u k u _ aate ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ unug llegh ke sigh _ mengteghagh _ qule mun _ yaqii te ma kanga _ .
iiwen _ u n u g e m _ qukaa neng _ aghvigh aqe uq _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ mengqughtagh luku _ llaag igh aqe a _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ .
qenwat llu _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ ghhatagh aghte ma kanga _ .
ghhatagh aghte yamigu _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ atghagh te ma kanga _ megh m _ qula anun _ .
taagken _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ megh kun _ lli kestagh ma kanga _ .
qama nguq _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ â _ U u u g g _ naken _ enraq _ megh m _ itegh inkut _ ?
enta _ qiigh negh ke a _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ a t q a g h l l u n i _ qineghte yalghiimi _ uzimun _ megh ghllag _ esghagh aa _ .
ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ megh mun _ l l i g h u m a k u t _ .
uzimun _ meghllag u uq _ . _ â
iiwen _ aghnagh _ nepiigh aqe uq _ qakma nguq _ k a a k e g g n e n g _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ pi aqe yagh amken _ , _ sughug u unga _ ! _ â
yug m _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ naten _ pi ligu _ aanvig ite ngughk _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ lli yagh kete ni _ mengteghagh _ aga _ kaleve ma lghii _ .
megh mun _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ makugte naqe yagh uq _ .
aghtugh ma lghii _ .
ellnga llu _ mengteghagh mun _ maligte te luni _ kaleve ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ angayuqagh ite ngughk
A g h n a g h a g h h a g h n g u q _ iimna _ kiyaghte ma uq _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ .
T a a w a n g i i n a q _ apa leg _ enkaam _ nengyugh llgagh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuna lgu ta ita _ aghnaghagh t _ keleg ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aghulaghqugh naqe ni luteng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapute ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh minun _ .
angegh ma kanga _ ellnga llu _ maligte te sqellug qu _ a g h u l a g h q u n u n _ .
taagken _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ .
tespagani _ unatagh ma luki _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ piitekagh meng _ tagitug ughte te ma kangi _ .
A t g h a m u n _ aghnaghaghhagh _ p i y a q e s e n g _ aviite uq _ .
taagken _ aghnaghagh t _ alinge luteng _ angayuqagh meggneng _ aghnaghaghhagh _ t u q l u g h a g h a a t a g h y a q e s e n g _ akite nghite te i _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ .
ima _ aviite uq _ .
aghtugh luku _ tuqlughagh aatagh nghmeng _ miiwen _ sivu meggni _ atghagh ma na yu kan _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila i _ a v i i l n g a g h y a m i k i _ qiyaaghwagh ma lghii _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ .
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavaa ma luku _ i w e m g a _ taghsagh ma kanga _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ a g h n a g h a g h n g u q _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kau nga _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ aghulaghqugh u yagh lunga _ t a g i t u g h u g h s a g u _ ila nka _ i f l a a m a a n k a _ .
entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ .
ifla u iqe lunga _ ila nka _ aghtugh luki _ ivagh nghmeng _ whani _ qavaa ma lghiinga _ . _ â
A g h n a m p i l a a t a g h a a _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ .
qamavek _ itegh ltung _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ nenge lunga _ qetngigh uq _ naqam _ nenglu an _ ugate anga _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqetu uq _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ n e g h e s i m a k a n g a _ mangtag meng _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ â _ wiin _ whani _ kiyaghten _ .
unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ whani _ utaqa aqe nga _ .
igatagh aqe gkuvek _ neghyukekagh gpeneng _ negh aqe i _ utaqa gpenanga _ . _ â
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ aghnagh _ aane aqe lghii _ .
A g h n e l q u s i q _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yaghtugh magh an _ tagi nghmini _ itghute aqe lghii _ tungtu meng _ ilangani _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ apa an _ enkaam _ nuna lgu ta ita _ ivagh yagh luku _ aghtugh yamegteggu _ aviite yan _ qenwat _ wisqaawi te ma kangat _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ E l p e k n e g p e n u n _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ â
â _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ aglagh langa _ .
N a a n t a t _ apa nka _ nalluke kenka _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ qavagh yaghtugh unga _ .
qavagh kuma _ angatumeng _ taghtugh naanghite unga _ .
qemall _ elpek _ aghyuqe lleqe uten _ pellagh yug lleqe uten _ .
apa gpek _ sama _ s u u m q e n n e g h m e n g _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
repall _ iye igh qagh ta iigh ma ut _ .
I g h i v g a n g h a g u _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavagh naqutke aqe uk _ . _ â
â _ wetku qun _ elpek _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
â _ whaa _ apeghtugh naqe amken _ vuvalla mi _ egmightagh tate kumeng _ k a y a a l q e n n a y u k a n g a t e n _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ a l i g n a g h t a g h u m a l g h i i _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ liite ziin _ ? _ â
â _ A a a _ liite unga _ . _ â
â _ legan _ atghagh luten _ v u v a l l a k u f s i _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ .
ahaam _ pilugug i _ .
A t g h a n n a q a m k e n _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ aane yalghiimek _ nutaan _ uksaagh aqe a _ .
atghagh ma lghiik _ .
atghagh ma lutek _ unug ma kanga _ .
kaate yaghtugh yameng _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uteghte naqe unga _ whanga _ .
E l l n g i n a g h p e k k a a l l g h a t e n _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uteghmun _ qiive yagh kete ni _ kaynge _ aga _ maaten _ t u m a n g i t g u n _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ kaate luni _ amig m _ reghillegh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ apa kek _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavaa te aqe uk _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ tenglugtugh magh an _ amigh k _ q a m a y a g h m i g h y a q e n n i _ t a g h t u g h s i m a k e k _ .
qama _ pi ma lghiik _ , _ â _ kaay _ llangaqa _ eltughagh ghhagh mta _ me a _ ! _ â
â _ aaqun _ whanga nge unga _ tagi nga _ .
enmis _ sukate luku _ q a l p e g h u t e n g n g a _ ! _ â
â _ kaay _ eltughagh ut _ tea- uq _ ! _ â
Q a l p e g h u s i m a k a n g a t _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ q a v a g h l a a g h i g a l l g j i e m _ iqeghtiigh luteng _ .
eltughagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ a a p q u g h a g h y a g h a a t _ apa gkenka llu _ enkaam _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ a g h u l a g h q u l g u t a n g i t a _ , _ naken _ p i t a n g a . A g h n a g h a g h h a q _ a k s a q n g w a a g h u m a l g h i i _ .
taagken _ a g h n a g h a g h a a m _ apa a _ v u v a l l a m a l g h i i _ .
sughu ke aq _ tagi laghate te luni _ negh te nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ ungipaghagh te ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa a _ v u v a l l a m a l g h i i _ .
taagken _ alla _ negh te luteng _ enraq _ e g m i i g h t a t a a s i m a l g h i i t _ alignaghtaagh te ma lghiit _ .
ila ita _ s u n g a t _ k a g i m l l u k i _ saguyagh meggnun _ qaake luki _ saguyagh teng _ k a l l a g n e g h m e g t e k i _ s u n g a t _ iighwigh aqe ut _ .
enraq _ ila ita _ tugu ta i _ ayvegh m _ mengqugh tun _ u l q a g h t a a g h a q e g k a n g i t _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga llu tuq _ egmightu aatagh qagh lghiinga _ . _ â
nutem nguq _ apa a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ?
sa naqe aqa _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ E l l n g a l l u t u g h n g u q _ egmightu aatagh qagh lghii _ . _ â
â _ legan mi _ sa aqa _ ! _ â
nutem nguq _ ila i _ sughukagh m _ aghnalqwaagh it _ pi ma lghiit _ yakugh ke luteng _ , _ â _ A g h n a g h a q r a a g g a q _ a g g h i y u g n e p i w a a _ !
kimaawi ta ii naqe uq _ ila itneng _ alignaghtaagh naqe lghii neng _ . _ â
aghnaghaghhagh _ ketfagh luni _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uka nguq _ suksug ghllag _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ pi aqe ut _ amig kun _ u g a _ qagi t _ kasug te ma lghiit _ ilu te mun _ nategh mun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ saguyagh gni _ k a l l a g a g h y a q e n n i _ qagi t _ i g h h u s a l g h i i m e n g _ nategh mi _ siipte ma lghii _ tepe aq _ allaghhiinaq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nekeve luni _ signegh gneng _ tugu tete luni _ tea- ma ken _ tepagh meng _ imigh lukek _ signegh gneng _ sughu ke aq _ tunqugh ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ tunqugh nghmeng _ enraq _ siklagh meng _ t u n g s i m a l g h i i _ .
tuune yatni _ u w a t a n g a n u n _ aglagh luni _ mingle _ siklagh yagh kete ni _ allaghhiinaq _ tangegh iqe aq _ peksigaghte ma kanga _ .
itagnatun _ signegh k _ tugu lukek _ imigh aqe lukek _ tea- ma ken _ tangighkagh meng _ sughu ke aq _ uyegte ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ mumegh _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mingle _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ meghe rakegte pigte lghii _ maaqe ma lghii _ mingle aneng _ .
meghute meng _ tugu tete luni _ m e q s i l a a m a k a n g a _ tamaghhagh an _ sughu ke aq _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ u g p e q s a l i t a a t _ .
V u v a l l a n e g h m e g g n i _ a q f a q e g k a n g a t _ nuna lgu ta ita _ .

qatelghii nkuk _ amaa nkuk
qategh lghii _ tapghagh m _ qukaa ni _ mallu nge luni _ ayvegh meng _ negh ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ amu a _ .
kaate luni _ amaa m _ qategh lghii _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga llu _ neqagh langa _ .
igatagh pigte unga _ . _ â
â _ legan _ negh i _ .
uglagh ghllag uq _ .
W h a n g a n g i n g a g h m a _ n a a n g n n a a n g h i t a q a _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ amu a llu _ negh ma lghii _ .
I w e m g a q u n _ kepsugh lutek _ negh lutek _ tapghagh m _ k e l u t a n g a n i l n g u g h m u n _ uusneghwaagh mun _ mayugh ma lghiik _ .
qaygeghte yamek _ qatelghii m _ amu a _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whani _ yeqay _ meghnaali ltung _ .
wiin _ qavaa ltung _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ amu a _ a a n g h u m a l g h i i _ .
tawani _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye ani _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
qategh lghii _ qavagh gpenani _ t e g h h u m a a m a l g h i i _ .
amu a _ qavagh yan _ whaa _ t u n g u n g h a q a s a n _ qategh lghii _ nekeve luni _ tamaani _ q e m g u g h t i m a l g h i i _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh aneng _ .
qafsina t _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh i _ nuuve te luki _ amaa m _ papeg akun _ qilleghte ma kangi _ .
enkaam _ amu a _ taghsagh ma ke aanga _ .
qatelghii m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ anguyag t _ s u g h u g e t _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh u ngestagh ma i kung _ .
uusneghwaagh mun _ maye ii aqe ut _ .
whanga _ qimag naqe unga _ .
elpek _ sa aqe ziin _ ? _ â
amu a _ qavaa i na ma te te kun _ nekefqaghte luni _ pangaleg yalghiimi _ kelute mun _ uka _ t u n g a n g a n e n g _ k a v l e g g a l e k _ .
naqam _ papeg a _ aqnigh magh mi _ .
amu a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ S e g h l e g h h a l e k k a a n n a q a a t n g a _ anguyag t _ .
tuqute naqe aatnga _ .
A w i t w u w a q l u _ papeg mkun _ kiitegte aatnga _ .
sangami _ papeg ka _ aqnigh aqa _ ? _ â
amu a _ i w e m g a q u n _ qevuute luni _ qimagkagh _ t u q u n n a y u k a n g a t n i _ .
qimagugh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ k i n g u m i n i l n g u q _ kavleg _ almesiqe nga i nagh yagu _ saama _ pekagh pigte yami _ amu a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ qaywaam _ tuqu langa _ . _ â
aghuliigh te kete luku _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ sughu meng _ esghaate nghite uq _ .
katam _ taawa _ papeg akun _ qilleghte luteng _ qafsina t _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh i _ .
amu a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qatelghii penaagh _ p e k a g h t e p i g t a a n g a _ .
kergam _ taawa _ esghagh qaghtekumken _ unguva lleqe uten _ . _ â
qatelghii m _ kiiw k _ kaate lukek _ aki mun _ ayuqe lghiik _ maligte ma kek _ i w e m g a m _ esnagh mun _ .
tawani _ esnagh mi _ tepagh meng _ n e g h e m s u g l i m i _ taglagh ma lghii _ esnagh m _ k e l u t a n g a n u n _ .
P e n g u g h a g h h a g h m u n _ kaate luni _ tawani _ qavagh naqe yami _ iye gni _ nusug ragh lukek _ saaghw mikun _ lli lukek _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
taagken _ amaa m _ ugumi yagute luku _ qategh lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ivaghtagh u yagh kete ni _ .
qenwat llu _ naalke qaghte ma kanga _ .
qategh lghii _ qavagh aqe uq _ enngaatall _ umu luku _ naqam _ saaghw ani _ iye k _ .
A m a a m t a g h s a g h p e n a a n _ i i s k e k q a t e l g h i i m t u t m a g h t a a l u k e k _ qageghqugh lukek _ unite ma kanga _ .
kingu aneng _ amaa m _ qatelghii m _ i w e m g a q u n _ qavagh gni _ nusug lukek _ taghtugh yami _ iye gni _ tugu naqe yagh ke gni _ aviite uk _ .
K a t a m n a a l k u m a k e k q a g e g h q u g h l l e r a a g h i n a a k _ .
qategh lghii _ ayaa luni _ panegh luni _ tuquma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
aghnagh aq _ uyughagh leg
aghnagh aq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ uyughagh leg _ .
mekelghiigh _ aane igate ngughk _ quunpeng _ i t g h u m a g h l l a k _ .
nayag a _ quyngighqwaagh aqe lghii _ .
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh luni _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ .
aghnagh aq _ quyngigh mun _ aghulaqe nghmini _ quyngighqwaagh te kete luku _ ulape aqe lghii _ .
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh niigh aqe lghii _ saama _ pilugug meng _ ukini aqe lghii _ .
uyughagh ni _ qelegh aqe yagh kanga _ waran _ u u g h q a g h m u n _ aane aghte aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga llu _ mekelghiigh _ a a n i g a l g n u q _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ a g h a g h a a m _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ unite naqe amken _ .
miite ta lgigh a _ seghleghu lghiiten _ .
taawa _ whaa _ s i n u m i g g a a n _ ifla naqngu uq _ .
saama _ elpek _ langetaq _ mengteghagh igh te naqe uten _ .
A a t a g Ê¼ q u n _ t u k u g h q a g h h a n u n _ i _ v a g h i y a g h n a q u n g a _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ aghnagh aq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
igleghte ma lghii _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ .
unug nghagu _ aghuliigh luni _ ayaviigh ni _ napaghte luku _ a n g y a t a g h q e l l u n i _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luni _ ayaviigh ni _ esghagh nghminigu _ iqunighte ma aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ i q u n i g h l l e g h a m u n _ aghnagh aq _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ iiwen _ siqinegh _ tevigh yaghtugh aqe uq _ qemi meng _ agigte yalghiimi _ kana _ negh ghllag _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
ne m _ a k u l a n g a n i _ a a n g q a t e g h l l a g a q e f t u q _ t a a m _ nuna m _ yug a _ .
aghnagh _ k i l g a a q u m e n g _ ukig ma lghii _ qemi meng _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ q u n g a n g i t g u n _ aag ma lghii _ enkaam _ nagnegh ma lghii _ ingavek _ s i v u l i g h p i g a g h n u n _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaa sa mi _ nagnegh luni _ nategh mun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ esghagh ma kangi _ malghugnegh t _ ungavig t _ aywaa n _ t u n g a n g a n i l n g u u t _ m e k e t a g h a l g h i i t _ .
tawavek _ ungavig nun _ aywaa n _ t u n g a n g a n i l n g u g h n u n _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ lengaagh meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghiit _ taagken _ alingyug luteng _ taaqe te ma lghiit _ .
nuna m _ a m a t u m _ sukate lleghpigagh a _ aghnagh aq _ talwa _ nukalpigagh neng _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
taana _ sukate ngughk _ aghnagh aq _ tugu naqute kaqsagh kangat _ aghtugh aqe kangat _ .
aghnaghagh m _ k a y a l q i i r a g h m i _ k a y a l q a q e g k a n g i _ nukalpigagh at _ .
wetku _ kina _ k a y a l q i i l g h i i _ taana _ nulightugh yaghqagh _ sukate ngugh meng _ aghnaghagh meng _ .
aghnagh aq _ mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
ungavig minun _ aglagh luni _ s u u g e m g e n i _ ikighte yagh kete ni _ k e l u t a n g a n i _ i g g a s i g h t a g h a q e f t u q _ n u k a l p i g a q s a _ seghleghu qagh a _ .
aghnaghagh m _ naa ni _ tuqlugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ yeqay _ whanga _ gaagh langa _ ! _ â
naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ imukun _ sangavek _ gaagh yug ghllag ziin _ ? _ â
panig an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ I w e m g a l l u _ whanga mneng _ gaagh yug unga _ ! _ â
taana _ aghnagh aq _ gaagh igate yagh lghii _ .
naange a _ g a a g h t e n g w a a q s a l g h i i _ .
aghnagh aq _ ugkelli ma lghii _ tunughtu llegh inagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ .
ugute yami _ angayuqagh ni _ mani ste vike luki _ ugke meng _ ellmi _ allakagh mi _ taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aqelqagh ke te lghiik _ negh lutek _ taaqe yamek _ ungipamsug te ma lghiik _ .
tukugh an _ aghnaghagh m _ uyguma lgute kete na luku _ a t k u g i i s q u g h a g h a q e g k a n g a _ .
aqelqagh an _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ wetku _ tawani _ mat- aghte naagh unga _ . _ â
Q a y u g h l l a g Ê¼ q u n _ kayngu yug aqe lghii _ mat- aghte nghmeng _ .
ellnga llu _ aghnagh u lghii _ .
qenwat _ pilugugtugh ma lghii _ ingaghte ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ , _ qavaghni pigte ni li mi _ .
unaami _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh an _ nuna lgu ta ita _ nagaqugh luku _ aqelqagh _ kaate ma ni luku _ keleg ma kangat _ aqelqaghniigh naqe na i luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh nkuk _ aqelqagh ke te lghiik _ aglagh ma lghiik _ aqelqaghniigh naqe lghii nun _ .
taagken _ kilgaaqu uute ma lghiit _ .
kelgute ma kangat _ naayghagh _ s u n g a g h y u g g i i n a q _ aligh ite ngughk _ .
taana _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ uteghte yaghqagh at _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe te ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ aghnagh aq _ igleghte ma lghii _ a q f a a l a a m e n g _ .
leganqun _ aga _ sivungagh ni _ kilgaaqu lghii nun _ u g l e g h u t a q u q _ s i v u l i g h p i g a l u n i _ tukagh a _ aghnagh aq _ .
naayghagh _ a l i i g h w a a g h y a m e g t e g g u _ q e v u u l l i g h a a m a l g h i i _ .
taakwna _ kilgaaqu te lghii _ aghnaghagh m _ naghughte qugh ma kanga _ .
iiwen _ naayghagh mun _ kaate aqe uq _ s i v u l i g h p i g a q _ tukugh ni _ kaate ma kanga _ .
taagken _ qerngagh egmek _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ sivu liqe luku _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ uteghte ma lghiik _ .
igleghte ma lghiik _ .
whaa _ mengteghagh t _ a l i i g h w a a g h y a y e g t e k i _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ingavek _ mengteghagh nun _ kaate ragkiighute aghte luteng _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ naghughte luku _ qevuute luni _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ t a a m _ nunaagh m _ s u k a l l g h a _ tukugh ni _ naghughte luku _ qevuute luni _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ t a a m _ nunaagh m _ s u k a l l g h a _ tukugh ni _ aghnagh aq _ unite ghllag ma kanga _ , _ nutem nguq _ tea- ma kut _ esghapag lghiit _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ â _ naken _ u t e g h s i n _ ? _ â
A q e l q a a m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ enan _ kinguligh ghhagh ma _ kaate kumeng _ ungipaate naagh aisi _ . _ â
tukagh a _ aghnagh aq _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ esghapag lghiit _ nunalgute ni _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ pi yagh ka iitagh i _ .
M a t u m _ nunaagh m _ yug a _ k a y a l q u g h t a a g a a _ .
sukate ghllag pigte uq _ .
kitum _ inglu ke naanghite a _ .
Q e m g a a m t u n g _ naayghagh _ u z i v a g h p u n g _ .
tagimun _ unite ghllag aanga _ . _ â
kilgaaqu te tke aq _ kaat quute te yan _ qamagte luni _ q e m g u g h u s a n _ enraq _ tughumgha tete na aqe ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ yug t _ mat- aghte luteng _ tughumgha te ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ ketfagh yan _ atkugtuumagh mi _ pi ma kangat _ tawaten _ tughumgha naanghite ni luku _ mataghte sqellug qu _ .
A q e l q a a m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ â _ whangkuta _ ima _ s i v i m e m n n e n g _ kenlanga _ nunaagh nun _ nutaan _ pi yuggaagh negh mta _ mataghte igate ukut _ .
wetku _ alghigh luku _ tawavek _ nunaagh mun _ pinegh mta _ taawa _ mat- aghte yaghqaaghte aqe ainkut _ .
aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ e s g h a g h l l e q a g h s i _ uvinke a _ .
enngaatall _ tawani _ mataghte lleqe unga _ . _ â
laagh an wha _ u g p e g h s i m a k a n g i _ a q e l q a a m _ tea- ma kut _ yug t _ m a t a g h t e s q u g h w a a l g h i i t _ .
tughumgha ma kangat _ yug t _ aqelqagh at _ atkugtugh ma ghngaan _ .
aqelqagh _ imani _ iknaqe ghllag uq _ .
ila i _ tunuvagh nghata _ ila ita _ atg- ghhagh ke luku _ mataawi te aat _ iqute nghmeng _ .
A q e l q a a m _ k a y a l q u g h t a g a a _ nunaagh m _ t a m a t u m _ yug a _ iknaqe llegh a _ .
aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ tukugh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ tukugh an _ aghnaghagh m _ qevuute luku _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ ungavig t _ ilu itnun _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ aghnaghagh m _ tukagh a _ itegh luni _ a t k u g i i s q u g h a a g h u m a k a n g a _ aqelqagh ni _ .
aqelqagh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ungipaate amken _ l e g a n i i t e k _ s a g i q u t a g h p e n g a _ .
mat- aghte naanghite unga _ .
aglagh lunga _ tagi kuma _ yugusigh ka _ e s g h a g h l l e q a n n a t e t u l n g a _ . _ â
aqelqagh _ tukugh mi _ u y g u m a l q i i n a g h n a q e n g h a t n i _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ â _ qavaghni pigte aanga _ .
ingaghte naqe unga _ . _ â
atkugtuumagh mi _ ingaghte te kete luku _ qavaa sighwaagh aqe lghii _ qavagh nghite ghngaaghmi _ .
unaami _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ aglagh naqe unga _ .
S u k a l l u n g a t a g i l l e q u n g a _ .
utaqa nakevnga _ . _ â
aghulaqe ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aghnagh aq _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ , _ â _ miiwen _ inga _ quyngigh ghhagh ut _ uglafqe uq _ .
naagu _ inga _ uyughagh ka _ ighsanitagh lghii _ , _ panegh luni _ tuqu uq _ . _ â
uusnegh u aq _ q u y n g i g h q w a a g h v i k u m t a a n i _ kaate luku _ agigte yagh kete ni _ i i t e k k a n a _ q u y n i g h t e n g _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
quyngigh m _ awatangani _ g u u g h n g a g h m i _ yuug _ kameg gni _ p i g i n g h i _ sivughtugh aqe ai _ .
aghnaghagh m _ i g k a g h a g h l u k u _ kaate yaghtugh yamigu _ up- ughte naqe pigte luku _ w a a k e s t e g p e n a a n _ teskanavek _ metngeqagh vike yagh kete ni _ i i w e n n g u q _ ama _ quyngigh m _ awatangani _ .
taagken _ aghnaghagh m _ pi yagh kete ni _ uyughagh ni _ liisuqe ma kanga _ .
piyug meng _ taku luku _ nayag an _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tawaten _ p i s q e l l u t e n _ pi aqe yagh amken _ .
ahaam _ atghagh luten _ negh yaghtugh ltung _ . _ â
â _ inga _ qantagha m _ tungtuute ma kanga _ .
taana _ aag vike lteggu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ tungtutagh mikun _ uyughagh n _ nayag ni _ aagute ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh m _ tungtutagh ani _ i i s q a g h m i i g u m a k a n g a _ .
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ gaagh te yaghtugh naqe amken _ .
sivullgaagh naqe amken _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ uuvganeng _ taagken _ k i l g a a q u m e n g _ ghhatagh ma lghii _ .
M e n g t e g h a m i m _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ uteghmun _ uyughagh ni _ iisqagh mig leg _ tungtu meng _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tungtu aneng _ maligsaagh aqe a _ uyughagh n _ .
aghnagh aq _ piyug ma lghii _ enkaam _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enankin _ yugu lghiiten _ .
inglu ke te yagute yaghqaaghte ma uten _ y u l g u t e v n u n _ . _ â
kaate lutek _ aghnagh aq _ afta uute kete luku _ tungtu meng _ gaagh ma lghii _ .
ugute yami _ negh te kete luku _ uyughagh ni _ ungipamsug te ma kanga _ aqelqaghniigh llegh mineng _ ataasigh mi _ nunaagh mi _ .
pi ma kanga _ uyughagh ni _ , _ â _ iitek _ tazinga _ aghnagh nge te ma yagh amken _ .
miitalgi _ mengteghagh at _ s i v u l i g h p i g a a g u q _ .
ayumigh ani _ kaate kuvek _ wiin _ itegh gpenang _ .
U q e g h h m i _ mat- aghte naagh uten _ .
atkug igh kuvek _ upag te lghiit _ pinagh aaten _ , _ â _ A t k u g i i s q u g h a g h a q a g h p e s i n g a _ .
taawa _ yugusigh ka _ esghaghte ggu _ ! _ â
enkaam _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh kuvek _ esghagh naagh an _ aghnaghqagh n _ .
ungavig anun _ itegh kuftek _ aghnagh aq _ pi naken _ , _ â _ A m s i k a g h t e s q u g h a g h a q e g k e v n g a _ .
enngaatall _ a m s i k a g h h n a q u n g a _ . _ â _ naqamllu _ aqelqaghniigh naanghite aaten _ .
whanga _ apeghiigh kaqe aatnga _ .
ikiwan _ whanga _ aghnagh _ k a y a l q e s i m a n g i t u n g a _ . _ â
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ mekelghiigh m _ nayag mi _ ayaviigh a _ wanitagh leg _ tugu luku _ nayag mi _ apaate llegh atun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
wata _ palaghhagh at _ qavagh t _ atugh luki _ qemigh _ agigte yaghqagh ni _ kaate ma kanga _ .
agigte yagh kete ni _ negh ghllag _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
W h a n i k u n e g h s i i m a k a n g a _ .
iiwen _ siqinegh _ i k a l i i q a a _ , _ akule mi _ nunaagh m _ yug a _ q e m g u g h u t e g h l l a g u m a l g h i i _ .
taagken _ aangqagh te ma lghiit _ .
katam _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ mekelghiigh _ qemi meng _ ukig ma lghii _ k i l g a a q u m e n g _ .
angqagh u te lghiit _ a k u l a n g i t g u n _ i g l e g h a a m a l g h i i _ ingavek _ s i v u l i g h p i g a a n u n _ mengteghagh nun _ .
kaa sa mi _ mengteghagh mun _ u q e g h h m i _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ l e n g a g h m e n g _ nagaqugh te yameng _ taaqe te ma lghiit _ .
pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ awituwaq _ aqelqagh _ a k u w a a g h n i i m n a _ kaa tuq _ . _ â
enkaam _ tazingavek _ sivuligh nun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ kaate lghii _ upag ma kangat _ .
U p a g u t _ tagi laghate te yata _ mekelghiigh m _ aqelqagh m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ A t k u g i i s q a q a g h p e s i n g a _ .
taawa _ yugusigh ka _ esghaghte ggu _ . _ â
atkug ni _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
U p a g u t _ whaten _ pi inagh ai _ , _ â _ ahaam _ aghulaqe utek _ . _ â
U v i n Ê¼ g a n e n g _ esghaate luteng _ nukalpigagh t _ aghulaqe te ma lghiit _ .

â _ kaay _ tagi ziin _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
â _ qamavek _ ungavig nun _ itegh i _ .
gaagh aqe unga _ .
sukate luteng _ ugu lleqe ai _ ugke t _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh _ itegh ma lghii _ ungavig mun _ .
ugute yami _ aghnaghagh m _ angayuqagh ni _ ugke meng _ mani ste vike luki _ itegh ma lghii _ ungavig mun _ .

A m s i k a g h h n e g h m e n g _ taaqe yan _ mekelghiigh _ , _ negh ma lghiik _ a l e g h q u u s i m a g h m e k _ aghnaghagh nkuk _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ a g h n e l q u s i q _ y a t a g h q u m a l g h i i k _ .
unaami _ aghulaqe yaghqagh k _ .
naqamllu _ naagu _ aqelqaghniigh yug nghite te aat _ aqelqagh _ .
llaaghanwha _ qavagh luteng _ unaami _ q u y n g i l e g t i m e n g _ atghagh ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh m _ mengteghagh anun _ .
kaate lutek _ mekelghiigh m _ nayag an _ upugha te ma kanga _ ukaagh ni _ .
aghnaghagh m _ ukuk _ esghapag yagh ke gni _ nayag ke te lghiik _ gginagh ik _ a t a a s i i s t u k a n i k _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
aghnagh _ aqsa nge luni _ ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug at _ aviite luku _ nayag a _ qulite luni _ qulite sigh ani _ kuuve luku _ esla mun _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ i q l i g h a g h l u n i _ .
ukaagh an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ n u n a l g u t e v n e n g l l u _ waamte i llegh ka _ .

ukaagh an llu _ neqangugh luku _ uyguma lleg ni _ ama _ m a t a g h t e s q u g h a a l l e n i _ , _ q e m g a a g m e k _ nenglagh te ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh ni _ tagi yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaami _ ukavek _ uughqa n _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ eslugh lleqe unga _ .
yugusigh ka _ ivagh i lleqe aqa _ t u k u g h q a g h h a n u n _ . _ â

apeghiigh aat _ .

tala ka
iiwleng _ y a y w a a l e n g i i g h h a q _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ quunpeng _ tukugh ita _ n e g h e s i g a l k a n g a t _ .
quunpeng _ i l a a k w a a g h m i n i _ kiyang _ negh aqe lghii _ .
P a l a s e k e t a g h h a g h m e n g _ negh aqe lghii _ .
V u v a l l a n a q e n e g h m e g g n i _ i l a g i i s q u g h a g h a q s a q a n g a t _ .
I g h s a g h w a a g h a q e l g h i i _ .
A n a g u l g h a q e g k a n g a t _ aghtugh nghmegteggu _ .
quunpeng _ yug m _ a n a g u l e g h t a a g a q e g k a n g a _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ uksugh mi _ emta _ tawaten _ v u v a l l a n a q s a t a _ , _ whaa _ apeghiighsagh yata _ , _ ellngagh a nguq _ mekelghiigh _ u n a g h h a a n e n g _ a n Ê¼ g i q a q _ a n Ê¼ g i q a q _ a n Ê¼ g i q a q _ .
unugtagh u ghllag aa _ .
qenwat _ m a m l e g h q w a a g a a _ .
pi ma kanga _ yug m _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â
â _ qayughllak _ tukugh nka _ v u v a l l a n a q a q u t _ .
enkaam _ iwhani aqe unga _ . . .
kagtaghtaghwaagh aqe unga _ .
I l a g i i s q u g h a a g h a q s a q a n g a t n g a _ , _ aghtugh nghmegtengnga _ a n a g u l e g h t a a g a q e g k a n g a t n g a _ . _ â
â _ aa-a _ , _ enkaam _ elpek _ T a l a k a n g u l g h i i t e n _ . _ â
kallagte te kete luku _ ilagagh yalghiimi _ , _ â _ tala ka _ tala ka _ tala ka _ , _ ay _ !
T a l a k a - T a l a k a - T a l a y a a y _ !
saguyagh gka _ k a l l a g u t a g h s a m k e k a y _ !
mumegh ghhagh ka _ a n a g u t a g h s a m k u n a y _ ! _ â
nuna _ mumegh mineng _ tenpe yagh kete ni _ quupaghte ghllag aa _ .

pi sta
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ataasigh _ yuug _ nuna mi _ t u n g a n g a n i _ ava ite ngughk _ nuna lgu ta ite ngughk _ .

talwa llu _ sikig meng _ n e q e k e l g h i i _ .
naqam _ quunpeng _ p i y a n i i g h a q e l g h i i _ .
piyaa vig meng _ kaate nghmini _ ellmi neng _ gaagh niigh aqe lghii _ .
gaagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ negh luni _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ ingliigh luni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ taghtugh nghmini _ piyaa aqe lghii _ .
unange luni _ uteghnigh nghmini _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig t _ afta luki _ aymaake it _ gaagh aqe kangi _ amiiragh it _ kinegh ngllagh aqe kangi _ .
ingleghqagh u luki _ naliini _ tanpeghqagh u luki _ .
l l a n g a m _ maaten _ u n a n g u l u k u _ taghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ s u v u k l u n i _ esnighqwagh na luni _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ esnagh m _ t u n g a n g a n u n _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ igleghte ma luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ esne mi _ unguva lghii _ tepe nghhagh _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ .
taana _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ tugu luku _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
taglagh luni _ k a k i g h a n i _ mengteghagh m _ p u t u g t a q _ amigh _ qepe luni _ u k i g s i m a k a n g a _ .
ukigllug qu _ i t e m s i m a k a n g a _ .
I t e m l l u k u _ n e g h n a a v r e g a g h h a q _ unguva an _ q i p u s i m a k a n g a _ .
kepe luku _ almesigh tun _ petug ma kanga _ kangighagh anun _ .
taagken _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ kilgaa nun _ .
piyaa vig mi _ u n a n g l l a a t a a m a l g h i i _ sikig meng _ .
sikigtagh ni _ akmag igh luku _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig _ lli ma kanga _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ .
lli luku _ ellnga _ akite kun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ imeg tekagh ni _ neghnavregagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ sa aqe ziin _ ?

unangkagh a _ sikig _ umyugagh mineng _ qayuutagh mun _ uugte luni _ ellmi neng _ a m i i r i g h u m a l g h i i _ .
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi neng _ llaag it _ uglafqe te ma lghiit _ ama _ ighneghagh igh ma lghii _ .

yug m _ e s g h a p a g y a q m i n i g u _ sikig m _ a y i m s i m a k a n g a n g a _ ellmi neng _ .
uughqaghte luni _ qulmesiite mun _ kanaghte uute ma lghiit _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ , _ egllu m _ qula akun _ agaghte ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ p i s t e m n i _ inglegh u te nga _ !
itegh naqe unga _ . _ â
ellnga _ yuug _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ .
mulu gpenani _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ungavig _ ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yami _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ .
I i w e n n g u q _ qemi neng _ teve aqe uq _ meteghllug _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ aqelqagh _ !
natmun _ igleghte aqe ziin _ ? _ â
â _ temngi _ maagun _ igleghte aqe unga _ . _ â
yug m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuk _ weni _ whanga _ aqelqagh ke laken _ !
atghagh lta _ .
negh yaghtugh lta _ . _ â
taagken _ yug m _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ mengteghagh minun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
kaate luteng _ itegh ma lghiit _ .
itegh luteng _ yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ a l q e l q a n i _ meteghllug _ .

yuug _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ p i s t e m n i _ ?
aqelqagh _ gaagh te gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangit _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ ketfagh luteng _ ugkelli aqe lghiit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ e l l m e g g n e n g _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula anun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ .
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ esghaate nghmeng _ kitum _ yuug _ apeghiighsagh te aqe agu _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ itegh ma lghiit _ .

qenwat _ aghtugh luni _ meteghllug _ q e i l i q u m a l g h i i _ .
uzimun _ mengteghagh _ ivagh i vike ma kanga _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ esghagh aa _ kangighagh ni _ petug luni _ amigh _ umeg u aqe aq _ .

alla _ pi laatagh aa _ .
